40001001	Yiesu Klistu yejɑnm sɑnɑ e nɑ: u din tie Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn e, k Dɑɑfiid mun din tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonn.
40001002	Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din mɑl Isɑɑk, k Isɑɑk din mɑl Sɑɑkɔb, k Sɑɑkɔb mun din mɑl Suudɑ nɑn u wɑɑli.
40001003	Suudɑ din mɑl Fɑɑles nɑn Sɑɑlɑ, k b nɑɑ e din tie Tɑɑmɑɑl, k Fɑɑles din mɑl Eslɔnm, k Eslɔnm din mɑl Alɑɑnm.
40001004	Alɑɑnm din mɑl Amiinɑɑdɑɑb, k Amiinɑɑdɑɑb din mɑl Nɑɑsɔn, k Nɑɑsɔn mun din mɑl Sɑlmɑ.
40001005	Sɑlmɑ din mɑl Buos, wun nbɑ nɑɑ din tie Lɑɑhɑɑb, k Buos din mɑl Obet, wun nbɑ nɑɑ din tie Lut, k Obet mun din mɑl Sese.
40001006	Sese din mɑl kpɑnbɑl Dɑɑfiid, k Dɑɑfiid mun din mɑl Sɑɑlomɔn, wun nbɑ yɑɑ nɑɑ din sint kun Uli nɑ.
40001007	Sɑɑlomɔn din mɑl Luobuɑnm, k Luobuɑnm din mɑl Abiɑ, k Abiɑ mun din mɑl Asɑɑf
40001008	Asɑɑf din mɑl Suosɑɑfɑ, k Suosɑɑfɑ din mɑl Suolɑɑnm, k Suolɑɑnm mun din mɑl Osiɑ.
40001009	Osiɑ din mɑl Soɑtɑɑnm, k Soɑtɑɑnm din mɑl Ahɑs, k Ahɑs mun din mɑl Esekiɑ,
40001010	Esekiɑ din mɑl Mɑɑnɑɑse, k Mɑɑnɑɑse din mɑl Amɔn, k Amɔn mun din mɑl Suosiɑ,
40001011	k Suosiɑ din mɑl Yekuoniɑ nɑn u wɑɑli, bɑɑ din suol Islɑɑeltieb dɑɑbɑ k sɑɑn nɑn’m Bɑbiilonn yuo nbɑ nɑ.
40001012	Bɑɑ din suol’b k sɑɑn nɑn’m Bɑɑbiilonn duo ni nɑ puolpo, lenŋ e k Yekuoniɑ din mɑl Sɑɑlɑɑtiel, k Sɑɑlɑɑtiel mun din mɑl Solobɑɑbel.
40001013	Solobɑɑbel din mɑl Abiud, k Abiud din mɑl Eliiɑkiinm, k Eliiɑkiinm mun din mɑl Asuol.
40001014	Asuol din mɑl Sɑɑdɔk, k Sɑɑdɔk din mɑl Akiinm, k Akiinm mun din mɑl Eliut.
40001015	Eliut din mɑl Eleɑsɑɑl, k Eleɑsɑɑl din mɑl Mɑɑtɑn k Mɑɑtɑn mun din mɑl Sɑɑkɔb.
40001016	Sɑɑkɔb din mɑl Suosiɑf, k Suosiɑf mun din tie Mɑɑli sɔlɔ, k Mɑɑli din mɑl Yiesu nbɑ k b yi’u Klistu nɑ.
40001017	Dɑɑfiid din tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonpiik nɑn ŋɑnnɑ e. K Dɑɑfiid yuo k tɑn tuu yuo nbɑ k b din suol niib mɑnŋ dɑɑbɑ k sɑɑn nɑn’m Bɑɑbiilonn nɑ mun din tie yɑɑbuonpiik nɑn ŋɑnnɑ. Lɑɑ din nyii l yuo k tɑn tuu Klistu mɑɑlu yuo mun biɑ din tie yɑɑbuonpiik nɑn ŋɑnnɑ e.
40001018	Bɑɑ din mɑl Yiesu Klistu biɑnŋ nbɑ e nɑ: u nɑɑ Mɑɑli din tie Suosiɑf sɑlkpenŋ e. B dɑɑ din k kuɑn lieb, ŋɑɑn k Suosiɑf din tɑn lɑ k Mɑɑli mɔk puol, k Foŋɑnm pɑnŋ ni e k u suol puol mɑnŋ.
40001019	Suosiɑf nbɑ k u din yɑɑ wun kunn’ɔ nɑ din tie Yennu nipiemɔ e. L pɑɑk, u din k luon k wun nyinn’l pɑɑnu ni k lin dinn Mɑɑli fei, ŋɑɑn u din lol u pɑl ni e nɑn u ji kɑn kuɑn’ɔ.
40001020	Wɑɑ ji din duki lin nbɑ nɑ po nɑ e, k Yennu bɑɑl u buol ni u dɑmiit ni k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin Suosiɑf, wun nbɑ tie Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn, dɑɑ tiin ɑ sɑlkpenŋ Mɑɑli kuɑnu jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn wɑɑ mɔk puol nbɑ nɑ, Foŋɑnm pɑnŋ ni e k u suol puol mɑnŋ.
40001021	U tɑn sɑɑ mɑl bonjɑk e, k ɑ sɑɑ pul u sɑnn Yiesu, k mɑɑn u tɑn sɑɑ fiel u niib b biit ni.»
40001022	Lin nbɑ nɑ kul din tun ɑ lin gbien lin nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ din te k u sɔkniisuɑ yet ɑ:
40001023	«Sɑpɑɑnmunn tɑn sɑɑ suol puol k mɑl bonjɑk, k b tɑn sɑɑ pul u sɑnn Emɑɑnuel.» (L pɑɑk tie ɑ: «Yennu be nɑn’t.»)
40001024	Suosiɑf nbɑ din tɑn fiil guɑn ni yuo nbɑ k u tun nɑn Yennu mɑlɑkɑ nɑ nbɑ yet’ɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k ji din gɑɑl u sɑlkpenŋ Mɑɑli u ŋɑɑk ni,
40001025	ŋɑɑn u din k duɑ nɑn’ɔ mɔkmɔk nɑn wɑɑ din tɑn mɑl u sɑpɑɑnmɑl, bonjɑk nɑ. K Suosiɑf din pul u sɑnn Yiesu.
40002001	Mɑɑli din mɑl Yiesu dosɑu nnɑ ni, k b yi’l Betlehenm, k l be Suude tinŋ ni. U din mɑl’ɔ kpɑnbɑl Heluod yuo e. L yuo nɑ k bɑntesiɑb din nyii yendopo k bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm,
40002002	k tɑn boi niib ɑ: «Islɑɑeltieb kpɑnbɑl nbɑ k b mɑl’ɔ nɑ, u be lee? T dɑɑn lɑ u ŋmɑɑbil e yendopo k bɑɑl nɑ ɑ t tɑn jiɑnt’ɔ.»
40002003	Kpɑnbɑl Heluod nbɑ din gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k l biil ŋuɑ nɑn Selusɑɑlenmtieb kul pɑlɑ ni.
40002004	K u din yiin Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb k tɑn boi’b ɑ: «Lee k b sɑɑ mɑl Klistu nɑ?»
40002005	K b jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Betlehenm duo nbɑ be Suude tinŋ ni nɑ, k mɑɑn Yennu sɔkni nɑ din diɑn ɑ:
40002006	‹Fin Betlehenm nbɑ be Suudɑ tinŋ ni nɑ, ɑ k tie tinbik kɑɑ Suudɑ yiɑl ni, k mɑɑn Kpɑnbɑlsuɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi ɑ ni e, k ŋuɑ e tɑn sii tie n niib Islɑɑeltieb nɑ pekpɑɑlk.›»
40002007	Lin nbɑ nɑ puolpo e k kpɑnbɑl Heluod din yiin bɑntieb mɑnŋ wuol ni, k tɑn boi’b k fiit’b fɑnu ɑ wun bɑnn yuo nbɑ k ŋmɑɑbil nɑ dɑɑn nyii,
40002008	k din yet’b: «Ii sɑɑ mɑn Betlehenm k sɑɑ lon bik mɑnŋ fɑnu. Yuo nbɑ k i lɑ’u, yin jen ɑ k tɑn yet’n k n mun sɑɑn k sɑɑ jiɑnt’ɔ.»
40002009	Kpɑnbɑl nɑ nbɑ din pɑk nnɑ k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k b nyii k suol sɔnu. Bɑɑ din sɑɑ mɑnŋ k b lɑ ŋmɑɑbil nbɑ dɑɑn nyii yendopo nɑ, k l gɑl b tuɑnn po k sɑɑ set bik mɑnŋ nbɑ be ŋɑɑk nbɑ nɑ ni, l sɑnpɑɑpo.
40002010	Bɑɑ lɑ ŋmɑɑbil mɑnŋ nɑ, k b pɑlɑ ni penn bonciɑnn.
40002011	K b kuɑ ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni, k lɑ bik mɑnŋ nɑn u nɑɑ Mɑɑli. Ŋɑnn e k b gbɑɑn k jiɑnt bik mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn biit b pɑkɑ k nyinn piini k tul’ɔ. Piini mɑnŋ din tie sɑlmɑ nɑn tulɑɑlnyun nɑn tulɑɑlsiɑl nnɑ k b yi’l miil.
40002012	Tɔn, k Yennu din pɑk k tul’b b dɑmiit ni, ɑ b ji dɑɑ ŋmɑt kpɑnbɑl Heluod buol ni. L pɑɑk, k b ji din tɔkn sɑnjogɑɔnŋ k ŋmɑt kun b duo ni.
40002013	Bɑntieb nɑ nbɑ din kun nɑ puolpo e k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu mɑlɑkɑ din bɑɑl Suosiɑf buol u dɑmiit ni, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fiit k jii sɑnpɑntk mɑnŋ nɑn u nɑɑ kii tiin kii sɑɑ Ejipt tinŋ ni, k sɑɑ kɑl lenŋ nɑn yuo nbɑ k n tɑn sɑɑ tul’ɑ mɔb biɑk, k mɑɑn kpɑnbɑl Heluod luon k wun lon bik mɑnŋ buol e k kpi’u.»
40002014	K u din fiil nyiɑɔk k jii bik nɑ nɑn u nɑɑ k ciɑl k sɑɑn nɑn’m Ejipt tinŋ ni.
40002015	U din be lenŋ e nɑn yuo nbɑ k kpɑnbɑl Heluod din tɑn kpo nɑ. Lin nbɑ nɑ kul din tun ɑ lin gbien lin nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu din te k u sɔkniisuɑ pɑk l po nɑ e ɑ: «Min, Yennu, n din yiin n Bijɑ ɑ wun nyi Ejipt tinŋ ni.»
40002016	Heluod nbɑ din tɑn bɑnn nɑn bɑntieb mɑnŋ kpɑl’ɔ e nɑ, k u wutuol din duo bonciɑnn. K u din tun sejenm ɑ bin sɑɑn Betlehenm nɑn l digbɑnbis ni k sɑɑ kpi bonjɑbis kul, lɑɑ jii sɑnpɑnti k sɑɑ tuu bin nbɑ mɔk binɑ ŋɑnle, nɑn wɑɑ dɑɑn boi bɑntieb mɑnŋ k bɑnn yuo nbɑ k ŋmɑɑbil nɑ dɑɑn nyii nɑ.
40002017	Nnɑ e k lin nbɑ k Yennu sɔkni Selemi din pɑk nɑ din gbien ɑ
40002018	«Lɑɑmɑ duo nuɑk ni e k b gbiɑ kunkɔl, mɔni nɑn fɑbni, k Lɑɑsiɑl mɔ u wɑɑs pɑɑk, k b bɑln’mɔ k tɑn guo, k mɑɑn u wɑɑs kul ɑ kpo wɑɑ.»
40002019	Tɔn, k kpɑnbɑl Heluod tɑn kpo, k u kuun puolpo k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu mɑlɑkɑ biɑ din sɑɑn Suosiɑf buol u dɑmiit ni, Ejipt tinŋ ni,
40002020	k sɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fiit k jii bik mɑnŋ nɑn u nɑɑ, k ŋmɑt sɑɑn Islɑɑel tinŋ ni, k mɑɑn bin nbɑ din lol ɑ bin kpi bik mɑnŋ nɑ kpo wɑɑ.»
40002021	K Suosiɑf din fiil k jii bik mɑnŋ nɑn u nɑɑ k din ŋmɑt k sɑɑn Islɑɑel tinŋ ni.
40002022	Ŋɑɑn wɑɑ din tɑn gbɑt ɑ Alkelɑus dii nɑɑn k kɑl u bɑɑ Heluod nɑɑngbɑnt pɑɑk Suude tinŋ ni nɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol’ɔ nɑn wun kun lenŋ, k Yennu biɑ din kpɑɑn’ɔ u dɑmiit ni, k u din sɑɑn Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni,
40002023	k din sɑɑn k sɑɑ kɑl duo nbɑ k b yi Nɑɑsɑɑlet nɑ ni. Nnɑ e k l tien gbien mɑɑn nbɑ k Yennu sɔkniinbɑ din yet ɑ: «B tɑn sii yi’u Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ e.»
40003001	Binɑ bonciɑnn din gɑl e wɑɑ, k Sɑn nbɑ din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ tɑn dɔkt muuk ni, Suude tinŋ ni, k muɑntl Yennu mɑɑn k yien ɑ:
40003002	«Mɔn kuɑŋɑɑn mɑn k lebt binbenŋ, k mɑɑn Yennu nɑɑn pel nɑ.»
40003003	Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi din ponŋ diɑn ŋuɑ Sɑn po e wɑɑ ɑ: «Suɑ be muuk ni k huot k yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Ŋɑnmt mɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑlu sɔnu k tul’ɔ, k te k u sɔni ii tuok.› »
40003004	Sɑn din liɑ yuyouk kobt liɑtfuouk o, k biɑ buob gbɑnn u siɑk ni, u jiet din tie nɑɑsuut nɑn siɑt e.
40003005	L yuo k Selusɑɑlenm duo ni tieb, nɑn Suude tinŋ kul ni tieb, nɑn digbɑnɑ nbɑ din kpiɑ Suulden kpenu kul tieb din sɑɑn u buol ni,
40003006	k fiit b biit, k u wul’b Yennu nyunwulu Suulden kpenu mɑnŋ ni.
40003007	Wɑɑ din tɑn lɑ k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ bonciɑnn k b mun bɑɑt u buol ni ɑ wun wul’b Yennu nyunwulu nɑ, k u yet’b ɑ: «Yinm wɑɑlɑbli nɑ. Ŋmee kpɑɑn’i ɑ i tin k nyi Yennu wutuol nbɑ yɑɑ lin bɑɑl i pɑɑk nɑ ni?
40003008	Ii tuun mɑn lin nbɑ sɑɑ wɑnn nɑn i set mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ.
40003009	I dɑɑ mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnt nɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm tie i yejɑ. N yien’i e, Yennu sɑɑ fit k fiin tɑnɑ nbɑ nɑ k lin kpɑnt Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ.
40003010	Pɑjɑl ponŋ tien siil ɑ, ɑ wun cuɑ tiini nɑn l jiinɑ, k tiik kul nbɑ k luon luɑnŋɑnɑ, b sɑɑ cuɑ’l e k lu’l muu ni.
40003011	Min ŋɑnin wuul’i Yennu wulu nɑn nyun ɑ i mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun bɑɑl n puolpo nɑ cie’n, k n ponŋ k ŋɑn nɑn k n jii u tɑɑsɑɑt. Ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ jii Foŋɑnm nɑn muu k wul’i Yennu wulu.
40003012	U diɑ u dilenn ŋmɑni e k yɑɑ wun lenn bonŋɑnn, k nyinn u dibin k wuun u buɑl ni, ŋɑɑn juo founŋ nɑ muu nbɑ kɑn mi k kpien nɑ ni.»
40003013	L yuo mɑnŋ k Yiesu din nyii Gɑɑliile k sɑɑn Suulden kpenu po, k bɑɑl Sɑn buol ni ɑ wun wul’ɔ Yennu nyunwulu.
40003014	K Sɑn k sɑk, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Min e bo sɑɑ bɑɑl ɑ buol ni k ɑ wul’n, ŋɑɑn k ɑ mun tɑn bɑɑt n buol ni ii?»
40003015	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k lin tun nnɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ, k mɑɑn nnɑ e k t sɑɑ fit tun lin nbɑ kul k Yennu luon.» L yuo nɑ k Sɑn sɑk.
40003016	Wɑɑ wul Yiesu Yennu nyunwulu k gbenn yuo nbɑ, l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Yiesu nyii nyun nɑ ni, k sɑnpɑɑpo tɑn luot, k u lɑ k Foŋɑnm siik u pɑɑk k nɑɑn nɑn ŋmɑnn nɑ, k tɑn jɑkn u pɑɑk.
40003017	K kunkɔl nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k yet ɑ: «N Bilonkɑk e nɑ, ŋuɑ e k n nunm gbuo’u.»
40004001	K Foŋɑnm din sɑɑn nɑn Yiesu pɑɑnpieonŋ ni ɑ Sɑɑtɑn n sɑɑ jɑnm’ɔ.
40004002	U din be lenŋ k k dii siɑl dɑpiinnɑ yennu ni nɑn nyiɑɔk, k kon ji din tɑn suol’ɔ.
40004003	K Jɑnmidɑɑnɔ bɑɑl u buol ni k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ tie Yennu Bijɑ i e, fɑn yet tɑnɑ nɑ k lin kpɑnt pɑɑnu.»
40004004	K Yiesu jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹Pɑɑnu kuukuɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ te k nilɔ fo, ŋɑɑn mɑɑn nbɑ kul nyi Yennu mɔb ni nɑ pɑɑk e te k nilɔ fo.› »
40004005	L puolpo k Sɑɑtɑn jii’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Yennu duo nbɑ k b yi lenŋ Selusɑɑlenm, k sɑɑ donn’ɔ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk mɔpinyelk pɑɑk,
40004006	ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ tie Yennu Bijɑ i e, fɑn yukl mɔb nnɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹U sɑɑ te k u mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ i guu’ɑ. B sii diɑ’ɑ nɑn b nii k ɑ tɑɑl kɑn gbiɑt tɑnn k ɑ lɑ dɑnŋ.› »
40004007	K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «L biɑ yet Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹Suɑ dɑɑ biki Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu.› »
40004008	L puolpo k Sɑɑtɑn biɑ din jii’u k duo nɑn’ɔ juɑl nbɑ fɔk bonciɑnn pɑɑk k sɑɑ wɑnn’ɔ tingbounŋ nɑ yent kul kul nɑn l ŋɑnt,
40004009	ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ gbɑɑn k jiɑnt’n, n sɑɑ tul’ɑ yent mɑnŋ kul ɑ.»
40004010	K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «Sietl nnɑ Sɑɑtɑn. L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹Nilɔ i jiɑntl Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu kuukuɑ e, kii biɑ kii tuun kii tien ŋuɑ kuukuɑ.› »
40004011	Ŋɑnn e k Sɑɑtɑn ji din yɑɑt ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ, k Yennu mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑɑl k tɑn cɑnt’ɔ.
40004012	Yiesu nbɑ din tɑn gbɑt nɑn Heluod suol Sɑn kuɑn’ɔ dɑnsɑlk nɑ, k u sɑɑn Gɑɑliile.
40004013	Wɑɑ din bɑɑl Nɑɑsɑɑlet nɑ u din k wei lenŋ, ŋɑɑn gɑl k sɑɑn Kɑpelnɑunm duo nbɑ be mɔk-kpinŋ, Sɑɑbuulɔn nɑn Neftɑɑli tinŋ ni nɑ.
40004014	Lin nbɑ nɑ din tun ɑ lin gbien Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi nbɑ din pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ po e ɑ:
40004015	«Sɑɑbuulɔn tinŋ nɑn Neftɑɑli tinŋ nbɑ be Suulden kpenpuotl po, k biɑ be mɔkgbenŋl buol, nɑn Gɑɑliile tinŋ nbɑ k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ kɑl l ni;
40004016	bin nbɑ be bunbɔnn ni nɑ lɑ yentjɑɑnn; bin nbɑ kɑl kuun bunbɔnn yent ni nɑ lɑ k yentu nɑ yentl k bɑɑt’b.»
40004017	L yuo mɑnŋ k Yiesu din piin k muɑntl Yennu lɑbɑmɑnn k tien niib ɑ: «Mɔn kuɑŋɑɑn mɑn k lebt binbenŋ, k mɑɑn Yennu nɑɑn pel nɑ.»
40004018	Yiesu nbɑ din sonm Gɑɑliile mɔkgbenŋl kpinŋ nɑ, k u tɑn lɑ nilɔ, wun nbɑ k b yi’u Siimɔn k biɑ yi’u Piɑl nɑ, nɑn u ninjɑ Andle, k b lubn jɑnlɑɑɔnŋ mɔkgbenŋl ni, k mɑɑn b din tie jɑnsuolɑ e.
40004019	K u yet’b ɑ: «Ii wɑɑ’n mɑn, k n sɑɑ te k i so niib nɑn yɑɑ so jɑni bɑnnu nbɑ.»
40004020	K b set din nyik b jɑnlɑɑnt l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni ŋɑɑn wɑɑ’u.
40004021	Wɑɑ din nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn tuɑnn po, k u lɑ jɑb bɑnle, Sɑɑk nɑn u ninjɑ Sɑn k b tie Sebede wɑɑs. B din be bulgbetl ni nɑn b bɑɑ Sebede k ŋɑnmt b jɑnlɑɑnt k u yiin’m.
40004022	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni, k b nyik bulgbetl nɑ nɑn b bɑɑ, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ Yiesu.
40004023	Yiesu din lin Gɑɑliile tinŋ mɑnŋ kul ɑ po, k tumi niib, Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, k muɑntl Yennu nɑɑn lɑbɑmɑnn k tien’m, k te k bin nbɑ mɔk yiɑlbuoli buoli kul nɑn bin nbɑ mɔk gbɑnɑntont kul pɑɑkt.
40004024	K niib din lin k muɑnt u sɑnn Siili tinŋ ni kul ɑ po. K b din jikt bɑɑtbuoli buoli kul ɑ, k bɑɑt nɑn’m u buol ni: bin nbɑ din yiɑl yiɑlbuolu nbɑ kul, gbɑnɑntont, bin nbɑ din gbie nɑn nɑlnbiit, bin nbɑ din bɑɑ gbitgbiɑ, nɑn gbɑnɑnkpienɑ dɑnm, k u din te k b pɑɑk.
40004025	K nibulciɑɔnŋ nbɑ din nyii Gɑɑliile, nɑn Doi-piik cinciɑɔnŋ, nɑn Selusɑɑlenm, nɑn Suude, nɑn Suulden kpenpuotl din bit k wɑɑ’u.
40005001	Yiesu nbɑ din lɑ nibulciɑɔnŋ mɑnŋ nɑ, k u duo juɑl pɑɑk k sɑɑ kɑl, k u puolpoweitieb lɑkn u buol ni.
40005002	K u yɑɑt u mɔb k piin k tumi’b k yien ɑ:
40005003	«Bin nbɑ mi b mɔnŋ nɑn b nɑmi, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e, k mɑɑn Yennu nɑɑn tie b yɑl e.
40005004	Bin nbɑ mɔ k fɑbn, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e, k mɑɑn Yennu sɑɑ mɑɑn b pɑlɑ wɑɑ.
40005005	Bin nbɑ sikn b mɔnŋ, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e, k mɑɑn ŋɑnm e tɑn sii yen tingbounŋ nɑ.
40005006	Bin nbɑ yɑɑ ninbinɑ mɔn ɑ bii be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ ni pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e, k mɑɑn Yennu sɑɑ gbuo’m ɑ.
40005007	Bin nbɑ tiin b lieb ninbɑɑɔk nɑ, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e, k mɑɑn ŋɑnm e k Yennu mun biɑ sɑɑ tin’m ninbɑɑɔk.
40005008	Bin nbɑ yɑɑ pɑlɑ ni yien, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e, k mɑɑn ŋɑnm e sɑɑ lɑ Yennu.
40005009	Bin nbɑ tie sɑndɑntinnɑ nɑn kunkɔnpɑt-tieb, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e, k mɑɑn ŋɑnm e k Yennu sɑɑ yii’m u wɑɑs.
40005010	Bin nbɑ k b muks’b bɑɑ tuun Yennu lonm nɑ pɑɑk, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e, k mɑɑn Yennu nɑɑn tie b yɑl e.»
40005011	«Niib i suki’i k muks’i, k fɑ fɑɑk buoli buoli kul k biil’i, k mɑɑn yɑɑ tie n puolpoweitieb nɑ pɑɑk, pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e.
40005012	Ii mɔk pɑlpienn mɑn bonciɑnn, k i pɑlɑ ii mɑn, k mɑɑn i nyuɑt tɑn sii yɑb Yendɔunŋ ni. Nnɑ e k b ponŋ din muks Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nbɑ din be yɑɑyuo ni nɑ.»
40005013	«I tie nɑn yɑɑln nɑ e tingbounŋ nɑ ni. Yɑɑln i tɑnŋ i biil k ji k mɑn, nlee k b biɑ sɑɑ fit mɑnŋ’ɔ ɑ? L ji kɑɑ nyuɑt. Sie k b kpɑɑl k yɑl nɑn-yel po k niib sonm l pɑɑk.
40005014	«Yinm e tie tingbounŋ nɑ yentu. Duo nbɑ k b mɑɑ k senn kunkonn pɑɑk, l kɑn fit bɔl.
40005015	Suɑ mun k jokt fitl ŋɑɑn jikt bokt k cibnt l pɑɑk. Sie k u jii’l k tuɑn bonsiɑl nbɑ fɔk nɑ pɑɑk, k lin tul ŋɑɑk niib kul ɑ yentu.
40005016	Yinm mun, ii be nnɑ. Ŋɑɑnt k i yentu n yent tul nifosɑɑli, ɑ bii lɑɑt i tuonŋɑnɑ kii dont i Bɑɑ nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ.»
40005017	«I dɑɑ duki nɑn n bɑɑl mɑɑ n tɑn piin Yennu senni nɑn u sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn nɑ kɑɑ. N k bɑɑl mɑɑ n tɑn kpien’n kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n bɑɑl mɑɑ n sɑk’l nɑn bɑlmɔni e.
40005018	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ bot, ŋɑɑn Yennu senni kɑn mi bot nɑn bonmintk nnɑ wɑɑ, sie k l kul ɑ tɑn tun k gbenn.
40005019	L pɑɑk, wun nbɑ tɑn tun k kpet Yennu senni mɑnŋ yenn kuɑ, k biɑ wɑnn lieb bonkpetl mɑnŋ, u tɑn sɑɑ juont tɑlk e Yennu nɑɑn ni, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ wɑɑ senni mɑnŋ fɑnu, k biɑ wɑnt u lieb fɑnu, ŋuɑ e tɑn sii tie nijɑɑnn Yennu nɑɑn ni.
40005020	K mɑɑn min yien’i nɑn sie k i tuun Yennu nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ k cie senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ yɑl, l i kii tie nnɑ i kɑɑ, i kɑn mi k kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni.»
40005021	«I ponŋ gbɑt k b din yien yɑɑyuo ni niib ɑ: ‹Dɑɑ kpi nilɔ, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ tɑn kpii nilɔ tɑn sii be mɑɑn ni,›
40005022	ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin yien’i e lɑɑ, wun nbɑ dont wutuol u nɑɑ bik pɑɑk, u tɑn sii be mɑɑn ni, k wun nbɑ sukl u nɑɑ bik ɑ: ‹Bon-yɑnn nɑ,› u tɑn sii be mɑɑn ni, k wun nbɑ mun biɑ sukl u nɑɑ bik ɑ: ‹Bonjɑtl nɑ,› u tɑn sii be mɑɑn ni k kuɑ muu nbɑ kɑn mi kpien nɑ ni.
40005023	L pɑɑk, wun nbɑ tɑn kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni ɑ wun pi Yennu piini binbintl buol, ŋɑɑn tiɑl nɑn u mɔk biit nɑn u nɑɑ bik,
40005024	wun nyik u piini mɑnŋ lenŋ, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt sɑɑn u nɑɑ bik nɑ buol k bin sɑɑ ŋɑnm b mɑɑn k gbenn ɑ, k wun jen k tɑn pi u piini mɑnŋ k tul Yennu.
40005025	«Fin nɑn suɑ i mɔk mɑɑn, k sɑɑ mɑɑn mɑnŋ buut, fɑn ŋɑɑn k yin tɑɑn mɔyenm kuɑ k ŋɑnm i mɑɑn mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ k i dɑɑ be sɔnu ni nɑ. L i kii tie nnɑ i kɑɑ, dɑɑnɔ nɑ sɑɑ jii’ɑ k sɑɑn nɑn’ɑ bɑlbuulɔ buol ni, k bɑlbuulɔ nɑ n mun jii’ɑ k tien’ɑ dɑnsɑlguulɔ nuu ni k wun kuɑn’ɑ dɑnsɑlk.
40005026	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’ɑ nɑ, ɑ kɑn mi nyi lenŋ, sie k ɑ tɑn pɑ likli kul nbɑ k b jiɑl’ɑ, k kuuk kɑn tenn.»
40005027	«I ponŋ biɑ gbiɑ k b din yien ɑ: ‹I mi k ɑ tun boncuncontuonɑ,›
40005028	ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin yien’i e, nɑn wun nbɑ got puo k u niɑɔnŋ kuɑ’u, u tun boncuncontuonn u pɑl ni wɑɑ.
40005029	L i tie k ɑ diitu po ninbinn i e te k ɑ tuun biit, fɑn kpɑkl’ɔ k lu’u bɑnfɔkl ɑ, k mɑɑn l i tie k ɑ kɔnŋ siɑl buol gbɑnɑnt, l cie nɑn k Yennu n tɑn kuɑn ɑ gbɑnɑnt kul muu nbɑ kɑn mi kpien nɑ ni.
40005030	L i tie k ɑ niidiitu e te k ɑ tuun biit, fɑn pot’ɔ k lu’u bɑnfɔkl ɑ, k mɑɑn l i tie k ɑ kɔnŋ ɑ nuuyenŋ kuɑ, l cie nɑn k ɑ gbɑnɑnt kul n tɑn kuɑ muu mɑnŋ ni.»
40005031	«B biɑ din yien ɑ: ‹Wun nbɑ luon k wun yet u ŋɑɑpuo, wun tul’ɔ puoyetu kɑdɑɑɔk,›
40005032	ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin yien’i e, nɑn wun nbɑ kul tɑn yet u ŋɑɑpuo, k l k tie u tun boncuncontuonn kɑɑ, ŋuɑ e te k puo mɑnŋ tun boncuncontuonn, k wun nbɑ kuɑn puo nbɑ k b yet’ɔ nɑ mun biɑ tun boncuncontuonn ɑ.»
40005033	«I ponŋ biɑ gbiɑ k b din yien yɑɑyuo ni niib ɑ: ‹I mi k ɑ pol mɔb nɑn fɑɑk, ŋɑɑn l i tie k ɑ pol mɔb Yennu sɑnn ni, l ŋɑn k ɑ tun k gbenn ɑ mɔpol mɑnŋ,›
40005034	ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin yien’i e, nɑn i mi k i pol mɔb. Dɑɑ yien ɑ: ‹N pol sɑnpɑɑk,› k mɑɑn l tie Yennu nɑɑngbounŋ o.
40005035	Dɑɑ yien ɑ: ‹N pol tingbounŋ,› k mɑɑn l tie Yennu tɑɑpɑnŋmɑɑtl e. A biɑ dɑɑ yien ɑ: ‹N pol Selusɑɑlenm,› k mɑɑn l tie Yɑbnt Yennu duo e.
40005036	A biɑ dɑɑ yien ɑ: ‹N pol n yul,› k mɑɑn ɑ kɑn fit te k ɑ yukobuk yenn kuɑ n penn ɑmi k bɔnn,
40005037	ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑnt mɑn k i jiinu i tie ‹Nnn,› ɑmi ‹Aɑi,› k mɑɑn l i tie k i pɑk siɑl k pukn lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, l ji nyii Biit dɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ buol e.»
40005038	«I ponŋ biɑ gbiɑ k b din yien ɑ: ‹Suɑ i kpɑkl ɑ ninbinn, fɑn mun kpɑkl u yɑl k jiin pɑnn. Suɑ i fɑɑ’ɑ k fokt ɑ nyɑnn, fɑn mun fɑɑ’u k fokt u yɑl k jiin pɑnn,›
40005039	ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin yien’i e nɑn, i dɑɑ jiint lieb pɑnɑ. Suɑ i peb’ɑ tɑnpɑk ɑ niidiitu po kpiɑnu, fɑn ŋmɑnt ɑ gɑnŋ po mun k wun peb.
40005040	Suɑ i yɑɑ wun sɑɑn nɑn’ɑ buut buol k sɑɑ gɑɑl ɑ suot, fɑn sɑk k wun tont ɑ liɑtfuouk biɑk kii sɑɑ.
40005041	Suɑ i miɑ’ɑ ɑ, ɑ jii u jik-kpiɑtl k sɑɑn nɑn’n kiiluomiɑtl yenn, fɑn jii k sɑɑn nɑn’n kiiluomiɑtɑ ŋɑnle.
40005042	Wun nbɑ miɑl’ɑ siɑl, fɑn tul’ɔ, k wun nbɑ mun biɑ luon k ɑ kpent’ɔ siɑl, fɑn kpent’ɔ k dɑɑ miin’ɔ.»
40005043	«I ponŋ biɑ gbiɑ k b din yien ɑ: ‹Ii luon ɑ luɑ ŋɑɑn kii nɑn ɑ dɑtɑɑk,›
40005044	ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin yien’i e, nɑn ii luon i dɑtɑi mɑn, kii mei Yennu kii tien niib nbɑ muks’i nɑ.
40005045	Ŋɑnn e sɑɑ te k i set kii tie i Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ wɑɑs, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ e te k yennu do nifobiit nɑn nifoŋɑnm pɑɑk, k biɑ te k sɑɑk bɑɑ nifobiit nɑn nifoŋɑnm doi ni.
40005046	L i tie k i luon bin nbɑ luon’i nɑ i e, nyɔlɑnt po e k i sɑɑ lɑ Yennu buol ni? L k tie nnɑ kɑɑ k lɑnpogɑɑltieb mun tuun ii?
40005047	K l i tie k i fuont i nɑɑ wɑɑs kuukuɑ i e, tuonŋɑnlɑnn po e k i tun k gɑl lieb i? Nnɑ kɑɑ k bin nbɑ k wɑɑ Yennu sɔnu nɑ mun tuun ii?
40005048	L pɑɑk, ii tuun bonŋɑnɑ kii tien niib kul nɑn i Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo k tuun k tien niib kul nɑ.»
40006001	«I dɑɑ tuun i tuonŋɑnɑ ɑ niib n lɑ k pɑk’i, k mɑɑn ii tuun nnɑ, i kɑn lɑ nyuɑt i Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ buol ni.
40006002	«L i tie k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm piini e, fɑɑ dɑɑ muɑntl nɑn kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nbɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, nɑn doi ni, ɑ niib n lɑ b tuonŋɑnɑ k pɑk’b nɑ. Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, b ponŋ gɑɑl b nyuɑt ɑ.
40006003	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ pi tɑlɑs-dɑɑnɔ e, fɑn pi’u, k dɑɑ te k ɑ niigɑnŋ mi ɑ niidiitu nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ,
40006004	k fɑɑ tuun lin nbɑ n biɑl wuol ni, k ɑ Bɑɑ nbɑ lɑɑt wuol ni nɑ sɑɑ pɑ’ɑ pɑɑnu ni.»
40006005	«L i tie k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ miɑl Yennu, fɑɑ dɑɑ tuun nɑn kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nɑ nbɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn b luon bii sie Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni e, nɑn sɔnpɑɑtɑ nbɑ be doi ni, kii mei Yennu ɑ niib i lɑɑt’b. Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, b ponŋ gɑɑl b nyuɑt ɑ.
40006006	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ miɑl Yennu e, fɑn kuɑ ɑ dieok ni k luon ɑ gɑnn, ŋɑɑn miɑl ɑ Bɑɑ nbɑ be wuol ni mɑnŋ, k ɑ Bɑɑ nbɑ lɑɑt lin nbɑ k ɑ tuun wuol ni nɑ sɑɑ tul’ɑ nyuɑt.
40006007	«L i tie k ɑ mei Yennu e, fɑɑ dɑɑ mɑntk mei mɔbonɑ nbɑ yɑb nɑn bin nbɑ k wɑɑ Yennu sɔnu nbɑ mei biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. B duki nɑn b miɑlu bonciɑnn pɑɑk e k b sɑɑ lɑ bɑɑ luon lin nbɑ.
40006008	I dɑɑ tie nɑn ŋɑnm nɑ, k mɑɑn i Bɑɑ mɔnŋ ponŋ mi lin nbɑ k i luon k i dɑɑ k miɑl’ɔ.
40006009	Yɑɑ tuu sii mei Yennu biɑnŋ nbɑ e nɑ: ‹T Bɑɑ nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni, ɑ sɑnn n lɑ dontl,
40006010	ŋɑɑnt k ɑ nɑɑn n bɑɑl, ŋɑɑnt k ɑ lonm n tien dulnyɑ nɑ ninŋ, nɑn lɑɑ tie Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ.
40006011	Tul’t mɑnn dɑɑl kul.
40006012	Nyikn cɑb t biit nɑn tɑɑ mun nyikt cɑbt bin nbɑ biil’t nɑ.
40006013	A dɑɑ te k tin kuɑ jɑnmi ni, ŋɑɑn nyinn’t bonbiil ni.›
40006014	«L i tie k i nyikt i lieb k cɑbt’b yuo nbɑ k b biil’i nɑ, i Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ mun sɑɑ nyik k cɑb’i wɑɑ,
40006015	ŋɑɑn i kii nyikt cɑbt i lieb biit, i Bɑɑ mun kɑn nyik cɑb i biit.»
40006016	«L i tie k i yɑɑ i lol mɔi e, i dɑɑ biil i nuni po nɑn kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nɑ, k mɑɑn b tuu biil b nuni po, ɑ suɑ kul n lɑ k bɑnn nɑn b lol mɔi e. Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, b ponŋ gɑɑl b nyuɑt ɑ.
40006017	Ŋɑɑn, l i tie k ɑ lol mɔb i e, fɑn yibl ɑ nunm po k sɑɑt ɑ yut fɑnu.
40006018	Lin nbɑ nɑ e sɑɑ te k lieb kɑn bɑnn nɑn ɑ lol mɔb ŋɑɑn ɑ Bɑɑ nbɑ be wuol ni nɑ kuukuɑ e sii mi, k ɑ Bɑɑ nbɑ lɑɑt lin nbɑ k ɑ tuun wuol ni nɑ sɑɑ tul’ɑ nyuɑt.»
40006019	«Dɑɑ kpɑɑn mɔktuk tingbounŋ nɑ ni, siɑn nbɑ k bonŋmiŋmɑbt nɑn tintɑni sɑɑ biil, k nɑn-yukb biɑ sɑɑ kuɑ k jɑn,
40006020	ŋɑɑn mɑntk kpɑɑn Yendɔunŋ ni, siɑn nbɑ k bonŋmiŋmɑbt nɑn tintɑni kɑn fit k biil, k nɑn-yukb biɑ kɑn fit kuɑ k jɑn,
40006021	k mɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k ɑ mɔktuk be nɑ, ɑ dudukt mun be lenŋ e.»
40006022	«A ninbinɑ e tie ɑ gbɑnɑnt fitl. L pɑɑk, ɑ ninbinɑ i ŋɑn, ɑ gbɑnɑnt kul po sii be yentu ni e,
40006023	ŋɑɑn ɑ ninbinɑ i kii ŋɑn, ɑ gbɑnɑnt kul sii be bunbɔnn ni e. L pɑɑk, l i tie k yentu nbɑ be ɑ ni nɑ tɑn bɔnn, bunbɔnciɑɔnŋ i nɑ.»
40006024	«Suɑ kɑn fit tun k tul yonmdɑnm bɑnle. U sii nɑn yenɔ ŋɑɑn kii luon luɑ, ɑmi u sii niɑn yenɔ e, ŋɑɑn kii jɑkn luɑ nɑ. I kɑn fit wɑɑ Yennu nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ mɔktuk biɑk.
40006025	«L pɑɑk e te k n yien’i, i dɑɑ fɑbn i binbenŋ po nɑn yɑɑ sɑɑ di lin nbɑ ɑmi k nyu lin nbɑ, k biɑ dɑɑ fɑbn i gbɑnɑnt pɑɑk nɑn yɑɑ sɑɑ liɑ lin nbɑ. Mɑnfuol k gɑl jiet ii? K gbɑnɑnt mun biɑ k gɑl tiɑt ii?
40006026	Gotl nuɑni nbɑ yuuk k lin nɑ. B k buul. B biɑ k jɑɑn k wu sukɑ nɑn nɑɑpɑɑt ni, ŋɑɑn k i Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ dint’b. I k mɔk nyuɑt k gɑl nuɑni ii?
40006027	I ŋmee sɑɑ fit fɔkn u mɑnfuol u dudukt nbɑ muksl’ɔ nɑ pɑɑk i?
40006028	«Bee k i fɑbn i mɔnŋ liɑnt pɑɑk i? Gotl mɑn tipuuk nɑn l ŋɑnt, ŋɑɑn b k tuun siɑl k fɑnŋt b mɔnŋ,
40006029	ŋɑɑn n yien’i e, kpɑnbɑl Sɑɑlomɔn nbɑ lek din mɔk tɑŋɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ, u din k mi liɑ liɑnt k l ŋɑn nɑn tipuut nɑ.
40006030	Muɑt nbɑ be dinnɑ, ŋɑɑn wonn k b juo muu wɑɑ nɑ, Yennu nbɑ fɑnŋt’l biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k u kɑn lɑnn yinm ii? Yinm yɑdɑ-kɑnpuɑnɑ dɑnm nɑ.
40006031	«L pɑɑk, i dɑɑ fɑbn k duki ɑ: ‹T sɑɑ di bee?› ɑmi: ‹T sɑɑ nyu bee?› ɑmi: ‹T sɑɑ liɑ bee?›
40006032	Bin nbɑ k wɑɑ Yennu sɔnu nɑ bɑkɑ tuu be lin nbɑ nɑ kul ni e, ŋɑɑn i Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ set mi nɑn i luon lin nbɑ nɑ kul ɑ.
40006033	Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k i ninbinɑ i mɔn Yennu nɑɑn nɑn lin nbɑ tuok k Yennu yɑɑ yii tuun nɑ pɑɑk, k u sɑɑ jii bonɑ nbɑ nɑ kul k tul’i.
40006034	L pɑɑk, dɑɑ te k wonn mɑɑn muks’i ni, k mɑɑn wonn e sɑɑ muks u mɔnŋ. Dɑɑl kul mɔk u fɑlɑ k l jɑnŋt’ɔ e.»
40007001	«I dɑɑ kpɑɑn lieb biit nbɑ k i sɑɑ fit tɑɑl’b l pɑɑk, k Yennu mun dɑɑ tɑɑl’i ni,
40007002	k mɑɑn yɑɑ kpɑɑn lieb biit k tɑɑl’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, nnɑ e k Yennu mun sɑɑ tɑɑl’i, k biɑnŋ nbɑ k i biki k tien i lieb nɑ, nnɑ e k Yennu mun sɑɑ bikn k tul’i.
40007003	Bee k ɑ goli lɑɑt muɑnu nbɑ be ɑ luɑ ninbinn ni, ŋɑɑn k k lɑ jɑɑntɑlk nbɑ be ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ninbinn ni nɑ?
40007004	Nlee k ɑ sɑɑ yet ɑ luɑ ɑ: ‹Ŋɑɑnt k n nyinn muɑnu nbɑ be ɑ ninbinn ni nɑ,› ŋɑɑn k jɑɑntɑlk e be ɑ mɔnŋ ninbinn ni?
40007005	Fin kpinkpɑnni dɑɑnɔ nɑ, nyint jɑɑntɑlk nbɑ be ɑ ninbinn ni nɑ sinsinn, k ji fit lɑ fɑnu k nyinn muɑnu nbɑ be ɑ luɑ ninbinn ni nɑ.
40007006	«I dɑɑ jikt lin nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl k tien bɔi, k mɑɑn l i tie k i tun nnɑ b sɑɑ fit ŋmɑt junt’i. I dɑɑ jikt lin nbɑ mɔk nyuɑt bonciɑnn k tien duoli, k mɑɑn l i tie k i tun nnɑ b sɑɑ ŋmɑt ŋmɑt nɑn tɑnt e.»
40007007	«Miɑt mɑn, k b sɑɑ tul’i. Lomin mɑn, k i sɑɑ lɑ wɑɑ. Kpɑɑn gɑnn mɑn, k b sɑɑ luot k tul’i,
40007008	k mɑɑn wun nbɑ kul mei gɑɑn e, k wun nbɑ mun luon, u lɑɑt e, k wun nbɑ kpɑɑn gɑnn, k b luotl tien’ɔ.
40007009	Yinm, i ŋmee k u bik sɑɑ miɑl’ɔ jiet k wun jii tɑnn k tul’ɔ?
40007010	Ami ŋmee k u bik sɑɑ miɑl’ɔ jɑnŋ k wun jii wɑɑɔk k tul’ɔ?
40007011	L i tie k yinm nbɑ tie biitdɑnm nɑ mi biɑnŋ nbɑ k i sɑɑ tul i wɑɑs bonŋɑnɑ, i Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ ji kɑn tul bin nbɑ mei’ɔ nɑ bonŋɑnɑ ɑɑ?
40007012	«Biɑnŋ nbɑ k ɑ luon lieb ii tuun kii tien’ɑ nɑ, ii mun ii tuun nnɑ kii tien ɑ lieb, k mɑɑn Yennu senni nɑn u sɔkniinbɑ wɑnnu nɑ ni wɑnt nnɑ e.»
40007013	«Kuɑn mɑn tɑnmɔyebk nɑ ni, k mɑɑn tɑnmɔb nbɑ kuɑ muu nbɑ kɑn mi kpien nɑ ni nɑ yɑln hei, k l sɔnu biɑ mɑn nɑn sonml, k niib bonciɑnn e kuɑ tɑnmɔb mɑnŋ ni.
40007014	K mɑnfuol tɑnmɔb nɑ ŋɑnin tie bon-yebk e, k l sɔnu biɑ pɑɑl nɑn sonml, k niib wɑɑnm-nnɑ e lɑɑt.»
40007015	«Ii mi mɑn fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ nɑ po, bin nbɑ bɑɑt i buol ni k nɑɑn nɑn pei nɑ, ŋɑɑn tie kinkɑtɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ.
40007016	B tuonɑ ni e k i sɑɑ bɑnn bɑɑ tie bin nbɑ. B k lɑɑt luɑnɑ nbɑ k b yi lɑɑsen penn pɑɑk k pɔ, k biɑ k lɑɑt luɑnɑ nbɑ k b yi fiignbɑ nɑ kunkoni pɑɑk k pɔ.
40007017	Nnɑ e k tiŋɑnŋ kul luon luɑnŋɑnɑ, k tibiiuk mun luon luɑnbiit.
40007018	Tiŋɑnŋ kɑn lon luɑnbiit. Tibiiuk mun biɑ kɑn lon luɑnŋɑnɑ.
40007019	Tiik kul nbɑ k luon luɑnŋɑnɑ, b sɑɑ cuɑ’l e k lu’l muu ni.
40007020	L pɑɑk, fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ tuonɑ ni e k i sɑɑ bɑnn’b.»
40007021	«L k tie bin nbɑ yi’n ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ, Yonmdɑɑnɔ› nɑ kul kɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni, sie bin nbɑ sɑk n Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ mɔb.
40007022	Dulnyɑ cɑɑtu mɑnŋ dɑɑl i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, niib bonciɑnn e tɑn sii yi’n k yien ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ, Yonmdɑɑnɔ, t din k sɔknt Yennu mɑɑn ɑ sɑnn ni ii? A sɑnn ni e k t din nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni, ɑ sɑnn ni e k t biɑ tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ.›
40007023	L yuo k n mun tɑn sɑɑ jiin k yet’b ɑ: ‹N k mi’i ni, yinm biitdɑnm nɑ, sietl nnɑ mɑn.› »
40007024	«L pɑɑk, wun nbɑ kul gbiɑ n mɑɑn nɑ k wɑɑ’l fɑnu, n sɑɑ nɑnn’ɔ nɑn yɑndɑɑnsuɑ nbɑ din mɑɑ u ŋɑɑk tɑnpiiuk pɑɑk nɑ e,
40007025	k sɑɑk tɑn bɑɑ, k nyun gbie k yɑt nɑn duo, k wounŋ dɑ k tut ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ dikpinɑ, ŋɑɑn k l lek sie kenken k k bɑɑ, k mɑɑn u din mɑɑ’l tɑnpiiuk pɑɑk e.
40007026	«Wun nbɑ kul gbiɑ n mɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn yet l weiu, nɑɑn nɑn jɑjɑtsuɑ nbɑ din mɑɑ u ŋɑɑk tɑnbiini ni nɑ e,
40007027	k sɑɑk tɑn bɑɑ, k nyun gbie k yɑt nɑn duo, k wounŋ dɑ tut ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ dikpinɑ, k l kul bet bɑɑ, k nɑn siɑl ɑ k tenn.»
40007028	Yiesu nbɑ din pɑk mɔbonɑ nɑ k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k u wɑnnu mɑnŋ din bɑkt nibul nɑ bonciɑnn,
40007029	k mɑɑn u din wɑnt’b nɑn minu e, k k wɑnt’b nɑn senniwɑntieb nbɑ wɑnt’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
40008001	Yiesu nbɑ din tɑn nyii juɑl mɑnŋ pɑɑk k sik yuo nbɑ, k niib bonciɑnn wɑɑ u puolpo.
40008002	K gbɑɑtsuɑ bɑɑl k tɑn gbɑɑn u tuɑnn k yien ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l i tie k ɑ luon, ɑ sɑɑ fit k te k n ŋɑɑɔk nɑ n gbenn.»
40008003	K Yiesu tɑnt u nuu ŋɑɑn sii’u k yet’ɔ ɑ: «N luon. A ŋɑɑɔk mɑnŋ n gbenn.» L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u ŋɑɑɔk nɑ set gbenn.
40008004	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii mi k ɑ yet suɑ mɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn i sɑɑ Yennu mɑnntuɑ buol k jii ɑ mɔnŋ k wɑnn’ɔ, k biɑ mɑnn mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu nɑn Muois nbɑ din senn bɑnnu nbɑ, ɑ suɑ kul n bɑnn nɑn ɑ ŋɑɑɔk mɑnŋ set gbenn ɑ.»
40008005	Yiesu nbɑ din kuɑ Kɑpelnɑunm yuo nbɑ k Luonm tinŋ sejenm yudɑɑnsuɑ cet’ɔ sɔnu ni, k bɑln’mɔ k yien ɑ:
40008006	«Yonmdɑɑnɔ, n tuontunsuɑ e yiɑl. U gbɑnɑnt kpo wɑɑ, k l muks’ɔ bonciɑnn, k u duɑ dieok ni.»
40008007	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «N sɑɑ sɑɑn k sɑɑ te wun pɑɑk.»
40008008	K u jiin ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, n k ŋɑn nɑn fɑn bɑɑl kuɑ n ŋɑɑk ni, ŋɑɑn pɑkn mɔbonn e, k n tuontunnɔ nɑ n lɑ lɑɑfiɑ.
40008009	K mɑɑn n mɔk bin nbɑ gɑl’n k yen’n, k n mun diɑ sejenm k yen’m, k fit yien yenɔ ɑ: ‹Ii sɑɑ,› k u sɑɑ, k yien luɑ ɑ: ‹Bɑɑt,› k u bɑɑt, k biɑ yien n tuontunnɔ ɑ: ‹Tient nnɑ, k u tie.› »
40008010	Yiesu nbɑ din gbɑt lin nbɑ nɑ, k l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’ɔ, k u jiɑnt got niib nbɑ wɑɑ u puolpo nɑ k yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, n dɑɑ k mi lɑ yɑdɑ nɑ buolu suɑ buol nɑn Islɑɑeltieb sinsuuk ni wɑɑ.
40008011	N yien’i e, niib bonciɑnn tɑn sɑɑ nyi yendopo nɑn yenbɑɑpo, k ŋɑnm nɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm, nɑn Isɑɑk, nɑn Sɑɑkɔb tɑn sɑɑ lɑkn k kɑl k di jɑɑnm Yennu nɑɑn ni,
40008012	ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ k tie nɑɑn mɑnŋ ni niib nɑ, b tɑn sɑɑ jii’b k lu’b nɑn-yel po, bunbɔnn ni. Lenŋ mɑnŋ e k niib tɑn sii fɑbn mɔ k nyiitl nyɑnɑ.»
40008013	K Yiesu din ŋmɑnt k yet sejenm yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ ɑ: «Ii kun. Fɑɑ tien yɑdɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l sɑɑ tun nnɑ e k tul’ɑ.» K u tuontunnɔ nɑ set din pɑɑk l yuo nɑ.
40008014	Tɔn, k Yiesu din sɑɑn kuɑ Piɑl ŋɑɑk ni k lɑ k Piɑl diɑnpuok duɑ yiɑl gbɑnɑntounŋ.
40008015	K Yiesu sii u nuu, k u gbɑnɑntounŋ nɑ gbenn, k u fiil k tien’ɔ sɑɑɔnŋ.
40008016	L dɑɑl mɑnŋ dɑɑjuouk, k b din jii niib bonciɑnn nbɑ k nɑlnbiit be b ni nɑ, k bɑɑl nɑn’m Yiesu buol ni, k u lek pɑk mɑɑn k nɑlnbiit nɑ nyii, k biɑ tul bin nbɑ yiɑl nɑ kul ɑ lɑɑfiɑ.
40008017	U din tun lin nbɑ nɑ ɑ Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi nbɑ din pɑk nɑ n gbien ɑ: «U mɔnŋ mɔnŋ gɑɑl t gbɑnɑntounŋ nɑn t yiɑlbuolu buolu k jii yɑɑt.»
40008018	Yiesu nbɑ din lɑ k nibulciɑɔnŋ tɑn lint’ɔ yuo nbɑ, k u yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ bin fiil k bin puot mɔkgbenŋl puotl nɑ po.
40008019	K Yennu senniwɑntɔsuɑ din bɑɑl k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, n sɑɑ wei’ɑ siɑn nbɑ kul po k ɑ sɑɑ.»
40008020	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Lunlonɑ mɔk fɔli, k nuɑni mun biɑ mɔk tiɑt, ŋɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k mɔk dinduɑlbuol.»
40008021	Tɔn, k u puolpoweitieb yenɔ mun tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ŋɑɑnt k n sɑɑn k sɑɑ pii n bɑɑ sinsinn ɑ.»
40008022	K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii wɑɑ’n, ŋɑɑn nyik k kpienm ii pii b kpienlieb.»
40008023	Yiesu nbɑ din kuɑ bulgbetl ni yuo nbɑ, k u puolpoweitieb mun wei k kuɑ.
40008024	K wonpɑɑluk din fikt k dɑ mɔkgbenŋl mɑnŋ ni, k nyunpɑnɑ din pil k kuɑ bulgbetl nɑ ni k tɑn yɑɑ lin gbie, ŋɑɑn k Yiesu duɑ k guɑnt.
40008025	K u puolpoweitieb din bɑɑl k fiin’ɔ, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, fiel’t. T sɑɑ kpo wɑɑ.»
40008026	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Yinm yɑdɑ-kɑnpuɑnɑ dɑnm, bee k i tiin jɑŋmɑɑni?» ŋɑɑn fiil k tiɑn wounŋ nɑn nyunpɑnɑ nɑ pɑɑk ɑ bin ŋmin, k b set ŋmin suon nnɑ.
40008027	K l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b, k b ji boi b lieb ɑ: «Nilɔ nɑ tie nibuol bee? K wounŋ nɑn nyunpɑnɑ set sɑɑk u mɔb i?»
40008028	Yiesu nbɑ din puot Gɑɑliile mɔkgbenŋl nɑ, k u kuɑ Gɑɑdɑɑlenn tinŋ ni. K jɑb bɑnle nbɑ gbie nɑn nɑlnbiit nɑ din nyii kɑɑt ni k cet’ɔ. B din mɔk jɑŋmɑɑni hei, k suɑ k fit gɑɑl bɑɑ be siɑn.
40008029	K b din yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ k yien ɑ: «Fin Yennu Bijɑ, tinm nɑn fin, nlee mɑntk i? A bɑɑl nnɑ ɑ ɑ tɑn din’t fɑlɑ e, ŋɑɑn k l yuo nɑ dɑɑ k bɑɑl ii?»
40008030	Tɔn, k duoli bonciɑnn din sie kpinŋ po nnɑ wɑɑ, k di, k k fɔk nɑn’m.
40008031	K nɑlnbiit mɑnŋ din bɑln Yiesu bonciɑnn k yet’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ nyinn’t i e, fɑn tun’t k tin sɑɑn k sɑɑ kuɑ duoli nɑ ni.»
40008032	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ mɑn.» K b nyii jɑb mɑnŋ ni, k sɑɑn k sɑɑ kuɑ duoli nɑ ni, k duoli nɑ kul din tin billl, k sik juɑl nɑ pɑɑk k sɑɑ bɑɑ mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni k dii nyun.
40008033	K bin nbɑ guu duoli mɑnŋ fiil k ciɑl k sɑɑn duo ni, k sɑɑ muɑnt lin nbɑ kul tien mɑnŋ, nɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ k nɑlnbiit nyii wɑɑtb nɑ ni.
40008034	K duo nɑ niib kul ɑ din bit k sɑɑn k sɑɑ tuok Yiesu. Bɑɑ din lɑ’u yuo nbɑ, k b piin k bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun nyi b tinŋ ni.
40009001	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu din ŋmɑt kuɑ bulgbetl nɑ ni, k puot mɔkgbenŋl nɑ gbingbɑnliel k kun u duo ni.
40009002	K nisiɑb din tɑn jii jɑsuɑ nnɑ k u gbɑnɑnt kpo, k b din tien’ɔ liɑnŋ pɑɑk k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ Yiesu buol ni. Yiesu nbɑ din lɑ bɑɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k u yet bɑɑtɔ nɑ ɑ: «N bik, ii mɔk pɑlcienn. N nyik cɑb ɑ biit ɑ.»
40009003	K senniwɑntesiɑb ji din duki b pɑlɑ ni ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ piɑk k biil Yennu e.»
40009004	Yiesu ŋɑnin din bɑnn b dudukt mɑnŋ ɑ, k boi’b ɑ: «Bee tien k i duki dudukbiit i pɑlɑ ni?
40009005	Mɑɑ yet bɑɑtɔ nɑ ɑ: ‹N nyik cɑb ɑ biit› ɑmi mɑɑ yɑɑ n yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Fiit kii sonm nɑ,› mɑɑn munle nɑ sinsuuk ni lɑnn po e pɑɑl i?
40009006	N ji sɑɑ wɑnn’i nɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mɔk yiikuo tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k sɑɑ nyik cɑb niib b biit,» ŋɑɑn jiɑnt yet juɑ nbɑ k u gbɑnɑnt kpo nɑ ɑ: «Fiit k jii ɑ liɑnŋ kii kun ɑ ŋɑɑk ni.»
40009007	K juɑ mɑnŋ fiil k kun.
40009008	Nibul nɑ nbɑ din lɑ nnɑ mɑnŋ k jɑŋmɑɑni suol’b, k b piɑk dont Yennu nbɑ tul nisɑɑlk yiikuo nɑ buolu.
40009009	K Yiesu din nyii lenŋ k sɑɑ, k sɑɑ lɑ jɑsuɑ nnɑ, k b yi’u Mɑɑtieo, k u kɑl u tuonn pɑɑk lɑnpogɑɑldieok ni, k Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fiit kii wɑɑ’n.» K u fiil k wɑɑ’u.
40009010	Yiesu nbɑ din sɑɑn Mɑɑtieo nɑ ŋɑɑk k sɑɑ kɑl k di jiet yuo nbɑ nɑ, k lɑnpogɑɑltieb nɑn biitdɑnm bonciɑnn din kuɑ k tɑn kɑl pukn Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb po k di nɑn’m.
40009011	Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ nbɑ din lɑ nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b boi u puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ: «Bee k i wɑntuɑ mɑnŋ di jiet nɑn lɑnpogɑɑltieb nɑn biitdɑnm i?»
40009012	K Yiesu din gbɑt b pinpɑɔk mɑnŋ k yet’b ɑ: «Bin nbɑ mɔk lɑɑfiɑ k luon tebtuɑ. Bin nbɑ yiɑl, ŋɑnm e luon tebtuɑ.
40009013	Ii sɑɑ mɑn k sɑɑ tumi bɑnn lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu mɑɑn ni ɑ: ‹Min, Yennu, n luon ninbɑtinu e k gɑl mɑlunŋ.› K mɑɑn min, Yiesu, n k bɑɑl ɑ n yiin niŋɑnm kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n bɑɑl ɑ n yiin biitdɑnm e.»
40009014	Tɔn, k Sɑn puolpoweitieb din tɑn bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni k boi’ɔ ɑ: «Tinm nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ loln mɔi yuo kul ɑ. Bee tien k ɑ puolpoweitieb k loln i?»
40009015	K Yiesu din jiin k boi’b ɑ: «Puociɑnu i be, sɑɑnm sii mɔk pɑlbiil yuo nbɑ k puoyuokl sɔlɔ dɑɑ be b buol ni nɑ wɑɑ ɑɑ? Aɑi. Ŋɑɑn yuo bɑɑt, k b tɑn sɑɑ nyinn puoyuokl sɔlɔ nɑ b buol. L yuo e k b sɑɑ lol mɔi.
40009016	«Suɑ kɑn jii cɑbpɑɑnn k lik tɑkpel. L i tie k u tien nnɑ i e, cɑbpɑɑnn nɑ sɑɑ pɑt tɑkpel nɑ e, k l pɑtmin nɑ n ŋɑnm pukn.
40009017	Suɑ biɑ kɑn sɑk liɑk dɑpɑɑnin dɑlenkpel ni. Wun nbɑ tun nnɑ, dɑpɑɑnin nɑ i tɑnŋ i mɔ, l sɑɑ put dɑlenkpel nɑ e k biil, k dɑɑn n muɑn, ŋɑɑn b tuu jii dɑpɑɑnin k liɑk linlenpɑɑnn ni e, ɑ l kul dɑɑ biil.»
40009018	Yiesu nbɑ din dɑɑ piɑk nɑn Sɑn puolpoweitieb nɑ, k yudɑɑnsuɑ nnɑ bɑɑl k tɑn gbɑɑn u tuɑnn po, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «N bipoyenml e kpo mɔtɑɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ. Bɑɑt nɑ k tɑn jii ɑ nuu k yii u pɑɑk, k wun lɑ mɑnfuol.»
40009019	K Yiesu din fiil k jii u puolpoweitieb pukn u mɔnŋ pɑɑk, k b wei’ɔ k sɑɑn.
40009020	Puosuɑ nnɑ mun din be lenŋ, k siik fɑbounŋ k tɑn jɑnŋ binɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle, k u din tɑn bɑɑl lint Yiesu puolpo k sɑɑ sii u liɑtfuouk mɔgbɑnn,
40009021	k mɑɑn u ponŋ din dukn u pɑl ni e wɑɑ ɑ: «Mi i lek i sii u liɑtfuouk, n sɑɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ wɑɑ.»
40009022	K Yiesu din jiɑnt k lɑ puo nɑ, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «N niipuo, ii mɔk pɑlcienn. A yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e te k ɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ.» L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni, k u set lɑ lɑɑfiɑ.
40009023	Yiesu nbɑ din sɑɑ bɑɑl yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ ŋɑɑk ni yuo nbɑ, k u lɑ yelpeblɑ pieb yeli, k nibulciɑɔnŋ biɑ bui kumɔni k fɑbn.
40009024	K u yet’b ɑ: «Ii nyi mɑn. Bonpobik nɑ k kpo kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u guɑnt e.» Ŋɑɑn k b lɑɑ’u.
40009025	Bɑɑ bel niib mɑnŋ k nyinn’b nɑ, k Yiesu kuɑ k suol bonpobik nɑ nuu, k u yient k fiil.
40009026	K niib din muɑnt l lɑbɑɑl tinŋ mɑnŋ ni kul po.
40009027	Yiesu nbɑ din nyii lenŋ k gɑɑl sɑɑ tuɑnn po nɑ, k jɑb nnɑ bɑnle din tie juɑni k wɑɑ u puolpo, k yikn k yien ɑ: «Fin Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn, tin’t ninbɑɑɔk.»
40009028	Yiesu nbɑ din sɑɑn k sɑɑ kuɑ ŋɑsiɑk nnɑ ni yuo nbɑ, k juɑni nɑ bɑɑl k kuɑ lenŋ. Ŋɑnn e k u boi’b ɑ: «I tien yɑdɑ nɑn n sɑɑ fit k teb’i wɑɑ?» K b jiin ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, nnn.»
40009029	Ŋɑnn e k u jii u nuu k sii b ninbinɑ, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Yɑɑ tien yɑdɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, lin tun nnɑ e k tul’i.»
40009030	K b ninbinɑ mɑnŋ nyuɑnt. K Yiesu din yet’b nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ bii mi k bin yet suɑ l po.
40009031	Ŋɑɑn k b din nyii k sɑɑ muɑnt u lɑbɑɑl tinŋ mɑnŋ ni kul ɑ.
40009032	Niib bɑnle nbɑ k Yiesu nyuɑnt b ninbinɑ nɑ nbɑ din fiil k nyi yuo nbɑ, k siɑb mun din bɑɑl nɑn jɑsuɑ wun nbɑ k nɑlnbimuuk be u ni nɑ, Yiesu buol ni.
40009033	K Yiesu din nyinn nɑlnbimuuk nɑ juɑ nɑ ni, k u ji fit piin k piɑk l yuo. L din yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit nibulciɑɔnŋ mɑnŋ, k b ji yien ɑ: «T dɑɑ k mi lɑ bonbuolu nɑ Islɑɑel tinŋ ni nɑ.»
40009034	Ŋɑɑn k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ din dɑɑn nyɑtuk ɑ: «Nɑlnbiit bɑt e tien’ɔ yiikuo ɑ wuu nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni.»
40009035	Tɔn, k Yiesu din kɑk lin doi kul ni nɑn digbɑnbis ni, k kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, k muɑntl Yennu nɑɑn lɑbɑmɑnn k tumi niib, k te k bin nbɑ yiɑl yiɑlbuoli buoli nɑn bin nbɑ mɔk gbɑnɑntont kul pɑɑkt.
40009036	Wɑɑ din tɑn lɑ nibulciɑɔnŋ mɑnŋ nɑ k ninbɑɑɔk suol’ɔ, k mɑɑn b din bɑk e k b yɑn ŋmɑt k b kɑɑ somsiɑl, k nɑɑn nɑn pei nbɑ kɑɑ pekpɑɑlk nɑ.
40009037	Ŋɑnn e k u din yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Dii nɑ biel k biɑ yɑb ɑ, ŋɑɑn k dijɑɑntieb wɑɑl.
40009038	L pɑɑk, ii mei mɑn dii mɑnŋ dɑɑnɔ k wun ŋɑnm pukn dijɑɑntieb k te k bin sɑɑn jɑɑn u dii mɑnŋ.»
40010001	K Yiesu din tɑn yiin u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ, k tɑn cɑb’b yiikuo ɑ bii nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni, k biɑ te k bin nbɑ yiɑl yiɑlbuoli buoli kul nɑn bin nbɑ mɔk gbɑnɑntont kul n pɑɑk.
40010002	U tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle mɑnŋ sɑnɑ e nɑ. Sinsinn pɑɑk Siimɔn, wun nbɑ yɑɑ sɑnn biɑ din yi Piɑl nɑ nɑn u ninjɑ Andle nɑn Sɑɑk nɑn u ninjɑ Sɑn, bin nbɑ din tie Sebede wɑɑs nɑ
40010003	nɑn Fiiliip nɑn Bɑɑltelemi nɑn Tuomɑ, nɑn Mɑɑtieo wun nbɑ din tie lɑnpogɑɑltuɑ nɑ, nɑn Sɑɑk wun nbɑ din tie Alfe bijɑ nɑ, nɑn Tɑɑde
40010004	nɑn Siimɔn wun nbɑ din luon ŋɑnm Suifnbɑ i yen b mɔnŋ nɑ, nɑn Suudɑ Iskɑɑliɑɔt wun nbɑ din tɑn nyii Yiesu puol nɑ.
40010005	K Yiesu din tun u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle mɑnŋ, k kpɑɑn’m k yet ɑ: «I dɑɑ sɑɑ bin nbɑ k tie Islɑɑeltieb nɑ buol ni, k biɑ dɑɑ kuɑ Sɑɑmɑɑliitieb doi ni,
40010006	ŋɑɑn ii sɑɑ Islɑɑeltieb nbɑ tie nɑn pei nbɑ bot nɑ buol ni kuukuɑ e.
40010007	Yɑɑ sɑɑ nɑ, ii muɑntl ɑ: ‹Yennu nɑɑn pel nɑ.›
40010008	Ii te k bɑɑtb n pɑɑk, kii fiint kpienm, k biɑ te k gbɑɑtɑ ŋɑɑt n gbenn, kii biɑ kii nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni. I gɑɑl tebu yiikuo mɑnŋ yɑnn e, ii mun i biɑ kii tieb k dɑɑ gɑɑn likli.
40010009	I dɑɑ jikt likli. Ii mi mɑn k yin jii kuuk k tien i likbuɑli ni.
40010010	I dɑɑ jikt pɑkɑ k sɑɑ i sɔnu mɑnŋ, ɑmi liɑtfɔkt ŋɑnlele, ɑmi k jii tɑɑsɑɑliet k pukn, ɑmi kii diɑ pɑti, k mɑɑn l ŋɑn k tuontunnɔ n di u tuonɑ ni.
40010011	«Digbɑngbenŋɑ ɑmi digbɑnbis nbɑ yɑɑ ni k i sɑɑ kuɑ, yin boi k lɑ nibulcimɔ ŋɑɑk ɑ, k kuɑ kii be lenŋ nɑn i fiilu dɑɑl.
40010012	K yuo nbɑ k i yɑɑ i kuɑ ŋɑɑk nbɑ ni, yin fuont ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni tieb fɑnu.
40010013	Ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ tieb i tie nibulcinm, i mɑnu n biɑl ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ tieb pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn nibulcinm i kɑɑ lenŋ, i mɑnu mɑnŋ biɑ sɑɑ jen i pɑɑk nɑ.
40010014	Wun nbɑ sɑɑ yet i gɑɑlu k biɑ yet wun gbɑt i mɑɑn, yuo nbɑ k i nyii ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni ɑmi duo mɑnŋ ni, yin pit pit i tɑɑpɑnt ni tɑnt k lu.
40010015	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, dɑɑl nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ bu niib buut nɑ, duo mɑnŋ niib tubdɑtu tɑn sɑɑ gɑl Suodonm tieb nɑn Guomuɔl tieb yɑl ɑ.»
40010016	«Gotl mɑn, n tuun’i k i sii tie nɑn pei nbɑ be kinkɑtɑ sinsuuk ni nɑ e. Ii cek mɑn nɑn wɑɑlɑbli nɑ, ŋɑɑn kii be suon nnɑ nɑn ŋmɑnɑ nɑ.
40010017	Ii mi mɑn niib po, k mɑɑn b tɑn sɑɑ suol’i sɑɑn nɑn’i bɑlbutieb buol ni, k biɑ buo’i lɑnbɑnɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni.
40010018	B tɑn sɑɑ sɑɑn nɑn’i tinŋ yudɑnm nɑn kpɑnbɑlɑ buol ni, yɑɑ wɑɑ’n nɑ pɑɑk, i sii tie n siɑlɑɑdɑnm k tul ŋɑnm nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ.
40010019	Ŋɑɑn b i tɑnŋ i sɑɑn nɑn’i buut dɑnm buol, i dɑɑ fɑbn yɑɑ sɑɑ pɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ ɑmi yɑɑ sɑɑ pɑk lin nbɑ yɑɑ pɑɑk. L yuo nɑ e k i sɑɑ lɑ mɔbonɑ nbɑ k i sɑɑ pɑk k jiin’m,
40010020	k mɑɑn l k tie yinm kɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ pɑk, Bɑɑ Siek e tɑn sii be i ni k piɑk.
40010021	«L yuo mɑnŋ, nilɔ tuu tɑn sɑɑ kuɑt u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ninjɑ k bin kpi’u, k bɑɑnbɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ kuɑt b wɑɑs k bin kpi’b, k wɑɑs mun biɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn b dɑnm k cɑb’b nɑn kuun.
40010022	K suɑ kul tɑn sii nɑn’i k mɑɑn yɑɑ wɑɑ’n nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tɑn gubn nɑn fɑlɑ yuo nɑ juontu tɑn sɑɑ lɑ fielu wɑɑ.
40010023	B i tɑnŋ i muks’i digbɑn-yenn ni, yin nyi lenŋ k luɑl digbɑnliel ni. Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, i dɑɑ kɑn fit k lin k gbenn Suifnbɑ digbɑnɑ kul, k suɑ Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ ponŋ jen ɑ.
40010024	«Tɔn, wun nbɑ siɑn k cie u tumiituɑ. Tuontunnɔ mun biɑ k cie u Yonmdɑɑnɔ.
40010025	L jɑnŋ nɑn wun nbɑ siɑn binbenŋ ii tie nɑn u wɑntuɑ binbenŋ nɑ, k tuontunnɔ binbenŋ ii mun ii tie nɑn u Yonmdɑɑnɔ binbenŋ nɑ. B i tɑnŋ i pul ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ Beelsebuul, nlee k b ji sii yi u ŋɑɑtieb i?»
40010026	«I dɑɑ tiin niib jɑŋmɑɑni, siɑl kɑɑ k be wuol ni k tɑn kɑn wuot k nyi pɑɑnu ni, ɑmi k bɔl k tɑn kɑn nyi pɑɑnu ni.
40010027	Lin nbɑ k n yien’i bunbɔnn ni nɑ, nyint’l mɑn yienin ni, k lin nbɑ k n lɔkn’i nɑ, i do mɔpinyelk pɑɑk kii muɑntl.
40010028	I dɑɑ tiin bin nbɑ sɑɑ fit kpi i gbɑnɑnt, ŋɑɑn kɑn fit k kpi i siek, ŋɑɑn ii tiin mɑn Yennu nbɑ sɑɑ fit k biil i gbɑnɑnt nɑn i siek kul ɑ muu nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ ni nɑ.
40010029	B k kɔi nuɑnbit bɑnle kuuk kuukuɑ ɑɑ? Ŋɑɑn b yenɔ kuɑ kɑn bɑɑ tinŋ ni k i Bɑɑ Yennu k mi u po.
40010030	Yinm ŋɑnin, i yut mɔk kɑnn.
40010031	L pɑɑk, i dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn i mɔk nyuɑt k gɑl nuɑnbit bonciɑnn.»
40010032	«Wun nbɑ nyint u mɔnŋ pɑɑnu ni niib buol ni nɑn u tie n yuɑ e, nnɑ e k n mun tɑn sɑɑ nyinn’ɔ pɑɑnu ni n Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ buol, ɑ u tie n yuɑ e.
40010033	Wun nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ u k mi’n niib ni, nnɑ e k n mun tɑn sɑɑ yet ɑ n k mi’u n Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ buol ni.»
40010034	«I dɑɑ duki nɑn n bɑɑl nɑn mɑnu tingbounŋ nɑ tieb pɑɑk, n k bɑɑl nɑn mɑnu kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n bɑɑl nɑn kunkɔnn e.
40010035	N bɑɑl mɑɑ n tɑn tukn bonjɑbik e nɑn u bɑɑ, bonpobik nɑn u nɑɑ, puo nɑn u sipuok.
40010036	Nilɔ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ŋɑɑtieb e tɑn sii tie u dɑtɑi.
40010037	«Wun nbɑ luon u nɑɑ ɑmi u bɑɑ k gɑl’n, u k ŋɑn nɑn wun tien n yuɑ. Wun nbɑ mun biɑ luon u bijɑ ɑmi u bipuo k gɑl’n, u k ŋɑn nɑn wun tien n yuɑ.
40010038	Wun nbɑ k jii u kuun dɑpunpunn k buk k wɑɑ’n, u k ŋɑn nɑn wun tien n yuɑ.
40010039	Wun nbɑ yɑɑ ŋuɑ deki u mɑnfuol tɑn sɑɑ kɔnŋ’l ɑ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ kɔnŋ u mɑnfuol n pɑɑk, u tɑn sɑɑ lɑ u mɑnfuol ɑ.»
40010040	«Wun nbɑ gɑɑl’i sɑɑɔnŋ, u gɑɑl min e sɑɑɔnŋ, k wun nbɑ mun biɑ gɑɑl min sɑɑɔnŋ, u gɑɑl wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ e mun biɑk.
40010041	Wun nbɑ gɑɑl Yennu sɔkni sɑɑɔnŋ nɑn wɑɑ tie Yennu sɔkni nɑ pɑɑk, u tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl Yennu sɔkni nyuɑt ɑ. Wun nbɑ gɑɑl niŋɑnɔ sɑɑɔnŋ nɑn wɑɑ tie niŋɑnɔ nɑ pɑɑk, u tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl niŋɑnɔ nyuɑt ɑ.
40010042	Wun nbɑ finn nyunmɑɑsn wɑɑnm-nnɑ kuukuɑ k tul n puolpoweituɑ yenɔ nbɑ pɔ i ni, nɑn wɑɑ tie n puolpoweituɑ nɑ pɑɑk, bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, u tɑn kɑn mi kɔnŋ l pɑɑɔk u.»
40011001	Yiesu nbɑ din wɑnn u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ wɑnnu mɑnŋ k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k u nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn b doi ni k muɑntl Yennu mɑɑn k tumi niib.
40011002	Tɔn, Sɑn din be dɑnsɑlk, k tɑn gbɑt Klistu tuonɑ lɑbɑɑl po, k tun u puolpoweitieb u buol ni
40011003	ɑ bin sɑɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun tɑn bɑɑl nɑ ɑmi tii dɑɑ kii guu luɑ ɑ?»
40011004	K Yiesu ji yet Sɑn tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «Ii ŋmɑt mɑn k sɑɑ yet Sɑn lin nbɑ k i gbɑt k biɑ lɑ nɑ.
40011005	Juɑni nyuɑntl, k wɔbi tɑɑ nɑɑtl k b sonm, k gbɑɑtɑ ŋɑɑt gbent, k tuukpɑɑ ji gbiɑ, k kpienm fi kuun ni, k tɑlɑs-dɑnm gbiintl lɑbɑmɑnn muɑnti.
40011006	K pɑlpienn be wun nbɑ k bils’n nɑ pɑɑk.»
40011007	Tɔn, Sɑn tuomiinbɑ nɑ nbɑ din nyii lenŋ k ŋmɑt kun yuo nbɑ nɑ, k Yiesu ji din piin k piɑk Sɑn po k boi ɑ: «Yɑɑ dɑɑn sɑɑn Sɑn penŋ muuk ni nɑ, i dɑɑn duki ɑ i sɑɑ sɑɑ lɑ bee? I dɑɑn mi ɑ i sɑɑ lɑ muuk nbɑ k wounŋ dɑnm nɑ ee?
40011008	I mɑntk jiɑ dɑɑn sɑɑn ɑ i sɑɑ lɑ bee? Nilɔ k u liɑ tɑŋɑnt ɑmi ii? Nnɑlɑ, bin nbɑ liɑ tɑŋɑnt be kpɑnbɑlɑ ŋei ni e.
40011009	Ŋɑɑn i mɑntk jiɑ dɑɑn sɑɑn ɑ i sɑɑ lɑ bee? I dɑɑn duki ɑ i sɑɑ lɑ Yennu sɔkni ee? Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, Sɑn ŋɑnin gɑl sɔkni wɑɑ.
40011010	Ŋuɑ po e k Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ponŋ din diɑn wɑnt nɑ, ɑ: ‹Min Yennu, n sɑɑ tun n tuomu k wun liit k gɑl ŋɑnm ɑ bɑɑlu sɔnu.› »
40011011	K Yiesu biɑ din yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, b dɑɑ k mi mɑl suɑ k u cie Sɑn nbɑ dɑɑn wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ juont tɑlk Yennu nɑɑn ni cie’u.
40011012	Lɑɑ dɑɑn nyii Sɑn nbɑ dɑɑn wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ mɑnŋ yuo k tɑn tuu mɔtɑɑnɑ, bin nbɑ k b ninbinɑ mɔn nɑn bin tɑn kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni diɑ ninmɔnn ɑ bin tɑn kuɑ nɑn pɑnŋ.
40011013	Yennu senni nɑn u sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn nɑ ponŋ din pɑk u nɑɑn po e wɑɑ, k Sɑn tɑn bɑɑl.
40011014	L i tie k i luon yin tien lin nbɑ nɑ yɑdɑ i e, ŋuɑ e tie Yennu sɔkni Elii wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun tɑn bɑɑl nɑ.
40011015	Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint.»
40011016	K Yiesu biɑ yet ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ, n sɑɑ bikn’m nɑn bee nɑ? B nɑɑn nɑn wɑɑs nbɑ tuu tikl k kɑl dɑɑk ni k tiɑn lieb pɑɑk nɑ e ɑ:
40011017	‹T pieb yeli k tien’i, ŋɑɑn k i k wɑɑ. T yiin kuyɑni k tien’i, ŋɑɑn k i k mɔ fɑbn.›
40011018	Sɑn dɑɑn bɑɑl k k di jemɔnt, k biɑ k nyu dɑɑn, ŋɑɑn k i yɑɑ ɑ u wɑɑt e,
40011019	k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mun tɑn bɑɑl k di k nyu, ŋɑɑn k i biɑ yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Gotl juɑ nɑ. u tie podɑɑnɔ nɑn dɑnyuuluk o. U biɑ tie lɑnpogɑɑltieb nɑn biitdɑnm yuɑk e.› Tɔn, Yennu nbɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ e wɑnt nɑn u mɔk yɑn nbɑ ŋɑn.»
40011020	L yuo nɑ k Yiesu din piin k piɑk biil doi nbɑ dɑɑn lɑ u bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k u dɑɑn tun lenŋ, ŋɑɑn k b yet nɑn bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ.
40011021	K u din yet ɑ: «L tɑn sii bi yinm Kolɑsen tieb pɑɑk. L tɑn sii bi yinm Betsɑidɑ tieb mun yɑɑ pɑɑk, k mɑɑn mi i bo i tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ Tiil nɑn Siidɔn doi ni nɑn mɑɑ dɑɑn tun i doi ni nɑ, b dɑɑn bo mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ yiɑn ɑ, k pɑt fɑɑɔk k puk b mɔnŋ tɑnpent ɑ mɑn.
40011022	Ŋɑɑn n yien’i e, dɑɑl nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ bu niib buut nɑ, i tubdɑtu tɑn sɑɑ gɑl Tiil nɑn Siidɔn tieb yɑl ɑ.
40011023	K yinm Kɑpelnɑunm tieb, Yennu tɑn sɑɑ donn’i sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ? Aɑi. U tɑn sɑɑ sikn’i muu nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ ni wɑɑ, k mɑɑn mi i bo i tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ Suodonm duo ni nɑn mɑɑ dɑɑn tun i duo mɑnŋ ni nɑ, Suodonm duo mɑnŋ din dɑɑ bo sii be nɑn dinnɑ.
40011024	Ŋɑɑn n yien’i e, Yennu bɑlbunu dɑɑl mɑnŋ, i tubdɑtu tɑn sɑɑ gɑl Suodonm tieb yɑl ɑ.»
40011025	L yuo mɑnŋ k Yiesu din yet ɑ: «N Bɑɑ wun nbɑ tie sɑnpɑɑpo nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ, n piɑk’ɑ, k mɑɑn ɑ bɔl ɑ mɑɑn nɑ subndɑnm nɑn mitieb, ŋɑɑn fiit wɑnn wɑɑs e,
40011026	k mɑɑn nnɑ e k ɑ tuun ɑ tuonɑ k l mɑn’ɑ.
40011027	«Tɔn, n Bɑɑ e wɑnn’n mɑɑn kul ɑ, k suɑ k mi u Bijɑ nbɑ tie wun nbɑ, sie n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ, k suɑ mun biɑ k mi Bɑɑ mɑnŋ, sie u Bijɑ nɑ, nɑn bin nbɑ k u luon k wun fiit wɑnn’b nɑ.
40011028	«Yinm nbɑ tuun tuonɑ k jii jik-kpiɑtɑ k bɑk nɑ, bɑɑt n buol ni mɑn, k n sɑɑ tul’i fuon.
40011029	Ii sɑk n weiu mɑn, kii tumi n wɑnnu, k i sɑɑ lɑ fuon k tul i sei, k mɑɑn n tie sikn-n-mɔnŋ dɑɑnɔ e, k n pɑl mei.
40011030	N weiu biɑ k pɑɑl, k n jikl mun biɑ k kpɑi.»
40012001	L yuo mɑnŋ k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din gɑɑl dii kpɑɑnt ni Fuondɑɑl, k kon tɑn suol u puolpoweitieb nɑ. Ŋɑnn e k b kɔni dikɑlɑ k pini k ŋmɑn.
40012002	Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ siɑb nbɑ din lɑ nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b yet Yiesu ɑ: «Gotl, ɑ puolpoweitieb tuun lin nbɑ k t senni k cɑb nɑn tii tuun Fuondɑɑl.»
40012003	K Yiesu jiin k boi’b ɑ: «I k lii Dɑɑfiid nbɑ din tun biɑnŋ nbɑ dɑɑl nbɑ k kon din suol ŋuɑ nɑn u juɑmu uu?
40012004	U din kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k sɑɑ jii Yennu pɑɑnu nbɑ k b din tuu senn k l tie Yennu yɑl nɑ, k ŋuɑ nɑn u juɑmu ŋmɑn, ŋɑɑn k senni nɑ din k cɑb nɑn b nisuɑ n di pɑɑnu mɑnŋ, sie Yennu mɑnntieb kuukuɑ.
40012005	Kuo i k lii Muois senni kɑdɑɑɔk ni, mɑnntieb nbɑ din tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ ɑɑ? B din tuu tun tuun tuonɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni Fuondɑɑl kul ɑ k biil senni nɑ, ŋɑɑn kɑɑ biit.
40012006	Ŋɑɑn n yien’i e, wun nbɑ cie Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk be nnɑ.
40012007	L i tie k i bo bɑnn mɔbonɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ: ‹Min Yennu, n luon ninbɑtinu e k gɑl mɑlunŋ,› i bo kii piɑk k biil bin nbɑ kɑɑ biit,
40012008	k mɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ e mun biɑ yen Fuondɑɑl.»
40012009	K Yiesu din nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni.
40012010	K jɑsuɑ nnɑ mun din be lenŋ, k u nuu kpo k guon. K siɑb din luon bin lɑ Yiesu biit ɑ k tɑɑl’ɔ. L pɑɑk, k b boi’ɔ ɑ: «T senni sɑɑk ɑ nilɔ n te k bɑɑtɔ n pɑɑk Fuondɑɑl ii?»
40012011	K u mun din ŋmɑnt boi’b ɑ: «I yenɔ i mɔk peyeunŋ kuɑ, k pieok mɑnŋ tɑn bɑɑ bunbunn ni Fuondɑɑl, u kɑn donn’ɔ Fuondɑɑl nɑ ɑɑ?
40012012	I k mi nɑn nisɑɑlk mɔk nyuɑt k gɑl pieok uu? L pɑɑk, senni nɑ cɑb ɑ tii tuun bonŋɑnn Fuondɑɑl.»
40012013	Ŋɑnn e k u din ŋmɑnt yet niikpienn dɑɑnɔ nɑ ɑ: «Tɑntl ɑ nuu mɑnŋ.» K u tɑnt u nuu mɑnŋ, k l nɑɑt k tie nɑn liel nɑ.
40012014	Ŋɑɑn k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ nyii nɑn-yel po, k lol lol suol nɑn lieb bɑɑ sɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ k kpi Yiesu.
40012015	K Yiesu din bɑnn b lol mɑnŋ po, k din nyii lenŋ. K niib bonciɑnn din wɑɑ u puol, k u te k bɑɑtb kul ɑ pɑɑk,
40012016	ŋɑɑn yet’b nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ b dɑɑ muɑntl wɑɑ tie wun nbɑ.
40012017	U din tun nnɑ e, ɑ lin nbɑ k Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi din sɔkn nɑ, lin tien gbien, ɑ
40012018	«Gotl, min Yennu, mɑɑ lukt n tuontunnɔ nbɑ e nɑ ŋuɑ e k n mɑntk luon’ɔ nɑ; n nunm mɑntk gbuo’u wɑɑ. N sɑɑ jii n Siek k tien u ni. U tɑn sɑɑ muɑnt buut bunu nbɑ tuok k tul niib kul ɑ.
40012019	U tɑn kii mɔk mɔniɑɔk, k biɑ tɑn kii tie kpɑyɑɔk dɑɑnɔ, k biɑ tɑn kii mɔk fuut yɑnn yɑnn sɑnjot ni.
40012020	U tɑn kɑn kɔnn tikuɑnn k tont, k biɑ tɑn kɑn kpien fitl nbɑ k di fɑnu. U tɑn sɑɑ te k bɑlbunu nbɑ tuok n lɑ nyɑnnu.
40012021	U sɑnn ni e, k niib kul ɑ tɑn sii mɔk dindɑnn.»
40012022	L yuo nɑ k nisiɑb din bɑɑl nɑn jɑsuɑ k nɑlnbiiuk be u ni k tien’ɔ muuk k biɑ tien’ɔ juɑnŋ, k Yiesu din te k u pɑɑk, k ji nyuɑn, k biɑ piɑk.
40012023	K l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit niib nɑ kul nɑ bonciɑnn, k b boi b lieb Yiesu po ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ e nɔk tie Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn nɑ ɑɑ?»
40012024	Ŋɑɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ nbɑ din gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b yɑɑ ɑ: «Nɑlnbiit bɑt Beelsebuul e tien juɑ mɑnŋ yiikuo ɑ wuu nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni.»
40012025	Yiesu nbɑ din bɑnn bɑɑ duki lin nbɑ nɑ, k u yet’b ɑ: «Nɑɑn niib i ŋmɑt kɔn k tuokt b lieb, b nɑɑn mɑnŋ sɑɑ biil ɑ. K doyenu kuɑ niib ɑmi ŋɑyenŋ kuɑ niib i ŋmɑt kɔn nɑn lieb, l kɑn set.
40012026	L i tie k Sɑɑtɑn nyint u mɔnŋ, l wɑnt nɑn u kɔn k bɔktl u mɔnŋ e. Nlee k u nɑɑn nɑ sɑɑ set i?
40012027	K l i tie k Beelsebuul tien’n yiikuo ɑ mii nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni, k yinm mun, ŋmee mun cɑb i niib ɑ bii nyint nɑlnbiit i? I mɔnŋ niib mɑnŋ tuonɑ e wɑnt nɑn i k mɔk mɔni.
40012028	Ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin, Yennu Siek pɑɑk e k n nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni. Ŋɑnn e mun biɑ wɑnt nɑn Yennu nɑɑn bɑɑl i buol ni wɑɑ.»
40012029	«Suɑ kɑn fit kuɑ jɑwɑktl ŋɑɑk ni k bɑkl u bonɑ k nyi nɑn’n, l i kii tie k u dɔnŋ k lol’ɔ ŋmii kɑɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn fit k kuɑ k bɑkl u bonɑ mɑnŋ.
40012030	«Wun nbɑ k sie n puol, u kɔn nɑn’n e, k wun nbɑ k tɑɑnt’n k tiki niib, u yɑɑt’b e.
40012031	L pɑɑk te k n yien’i nɑ, Yennu sɑɑ nyik cɑb nifosɑɑlk u biit nɑn bɑlbiit kul ɑ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tɑn suki Foŋɑnm, Yennu kɑn mi k nyik cɑb l dɑɑnɔ.
40012032	Wun nbɑ piɑk bɑlbiit k tien Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ, Yennu sɑɑ nyik cɑb’ɔ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tɑn piɑk bɑlbiit k tien Foŋɑnm, Yennu kɑn nyik cɑb l dɑɑnɔ dulnyɑ nɑ ni, ɑmi dulnyɑ nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ ni.»
40012033	K Yiesu biɑ din yet ɑ: «L i tie k tiik ŋɑn, u luon tiluɑnŋɑnɑ e, ŋɑɑn l i tie k tiik k ŋɑn, u sii luon luɑnbiit e, k mɑɑn tiik luɑnɑ ni e k b bɑnt’ɔ.
40012034	Yinm wɑɑlɑbli buolu nɑ, yɑɑ tie nifobiit biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, nlee k lɑbɑmɑnn sɑɑ fit nyi i mɔi ni? K mɑɑn lin nbɑ k nifosɑɑlk duki u pɑl ni, ŋɑnn e biɑ nyi u mɔb ni.
40012035	Niŋɑnɔ nyint bonŋɑnn u mɔktuk nbɑ ŋɑn nɑ ni e, k nibiiuk nyint bonbiit u mɔktuk nbɑ bi nɑ ni.
40012036	«N yien’i e nɑ, bɑlbunu dɑɑl, Yennu tɑn sɑɑ bu niib buut nɑn bɑɑ din piɑk bɑlyɑnɑ kul nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk,
40012037	k mɑɑn suɑ kul pinpɑɔk o tɑn sɑɑ nyinn’ɔ dɑɑl mɑnŋ ni. Suɑ kul pinpɑɔk o mun biɑ tɑn sɑɑ biil’ɔ.»
40012038	Ŋɑnn e k senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ din yet Yiesu ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, t luon k ɑ tun bɑktnɔunŋ nyinn e k wɑnn’t.»
40012039	K u din jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nbɑ tie biitdɑnm k biɑ k tuun Yennu nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ luon k bin lɑ bɑktnɔunŋ nyinn, ŋɑɑn b kɑn mi lɑ nyinsiɑl. Yennu sɔkni Suonɑ nyinbuolu nɑ kuukuɑ e k b sɑɑ lɑ.
40012040	K mɑɑn Suonɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ din be jɑngbenŋl puol ni yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk k sɑɑn jɑnŋ dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ nɑ, nnɑ e k min Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mun tɑn sii be tinŋ ni yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk k sɑɑ jɑnŋ dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ.
40012041	Yennu buut dɑɑl, Niiniif tieb tɑn sɑɑ set wɑnn nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ mɔk biit, k mɑɑn Suonɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ din muɑnt Yennu mɑɑn k tul’b nɑ, b din mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, k gotl mɑn, min nbɑ cie Suonɑ be nnɑ.
40012042	Yennu buut dɑɑl, puo nbɑ din tie kpɑnbɑl nɑ nbɑ din nyii gɑnŋ po nɑ mun biɑ tɑn sɑɑ set wɑnn nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ mɔk biit, k mɑɑn u din nyii digbɑnbɑnfɔkl e wɑɑ, k tɑn bɑɑl ɑ wun gbiint kpɑnbɑl Sɑɑlomɔn yɑnfuon nɑ pinpɑɔk, k gotl mɑn, min nbɑ cie Sɑɑlomɔn be nnɑ.»
40012043	«L i tie k nɑlnbiiuk tɑn nyii nilɔ ni, u tuu yiek e k lin mɔkuounŋ ni, k luon fuon buol, ŋɑɑn k k lɑɑt.
40012044	L pɑɑk, u tuu tɑn yet u mɔnŋ e ɑ: ‹N sɑɑ ŋmɑt sɑɑn ŋɑɑk nbɑ ni k n dɑɑn nyii ni e.› Yuo nbɑ k u tɑn bɑɑl, k lɑ k l duɑ yɑnn, k b piɑl k ŋɑnm ɑ,
40012045	u ji sɑɑ ŋmɑt nyi e k sɑɑ yiin nɑlnbiliet bɑnlole, bin nbɑ bi k cie u pɑɑk, k bɑɑl nɑn’m, k bin kuɑ k lɑkn kii be. Nilɔ mɑnŋ binbenŋ ji sii bi bonciɑnn k gɑl wɑɑ dɑɑn tuu bi sinsinn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ. L tɑn sii tie nnɑ e mɔtɑɑnɑ biitdɑnm nɑ pɑɑk.»
40012046	Yiesu nbɑ din dɑɑ piɑk k tien niib nɑ yuo nbɑ, k u nɑɑ nɑn u ninjɑnm bɑɑl k tɑn sie nɑn-yel po, k luon bin pɑk nɑn’ɔ.
40012047	Ŋɑnn e k suɑ din yet’ɔ ɑ: «Gotl, ɑ nɑɑ nɑn ɑ ninjɑnm sie nɑn-yel po, k luon k bin pɑk nɑn’ɑ.»
40012048	K Yiesu boi nilɔ nbɑ yet’ɔ lin nbɑ nɑ ɑ: «Ŋmee tie n nɑɑ? k lɑnm e biɑ tie n ninjɑnm i?»
40012049	ŋɑɑn din tɑnt u nuu k wɑnn u puolpoweitieb ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «Gotl ii, n nɑɑ nɑn n ninjɑnm e nɑ.
40012050	K mɑɑn wun nbɑ kul tuun n Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ lonm, ŋuɑ e tie n ninjɑ, nɑn n niipuo nɑn n nɑɑ.»
40013001	L dɑɑl mɑnŋ k Yiesu din nyii ŋɑɑk nɑ ni k sɑɑn k sɑɑ kɑl mɔkgbenŋl kpinŋ.
40013002	K nibulciɑɔnŋ lɑkn u buol ni. Ŋɑnn e k u sɑɑn kuɑ kɑl bulgbetl ni, k nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ din sie gbingbɑnn.
40013003	K u din yin’m bɑljokt bonciɑnn k yet ɑ: «Jɑsuɑ din duo kpɑɑb ɑ wun sɑɑ bul tɑn.
40013004	Wɑɑ din buul nɑ k bonbuoli nɑ yenn-nbɑ din yɑt bɑɑ sɑnjouk ni, k nuɑni bɑɑl k tɑn dii.
40013005	K liel mun din bɑɑ tɑnpuut pɑɑk, siɑn nbɑ k tɑnt k yɑb k l din piɑ k kpɑɑt yiɑn ɑ, k mɑɑn tɑnt k yɑb lenŋ,
40013006	ŋɑɑn yennu nbɑ din tɑn tonŋ yuo nbɑ, k l juɑk. Lɑɑ din k fit sikn jiinɑ nɑ pɑɑk, l kul din kpo e.
40013007	K liel mun biɑ din bɑɑ kunkoni ni, k tɑn lɑkn piɑ k kpɑɑt, ŋɑɑn k kunkoni ŋmɑbl’l.
40013008	Ŋɑɑn k liel mun din bɑɑ tinŋɑnŋ ni, k nɑn nɑɑnŋɑɔnŋ, k siɑb nɑn kobk kobk, k siɑb piinluob luob, k siɑb mun piintɑtɑ.
40013009	«Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint.»
40013010	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu puolpoweitieb din bɑɑl u buol ni k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bee k ɑ piɑk bɑljokt k tien niib nɑ?»
40013011	K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Yinm ŋɑnin, Yennu cɑb ɑ yin bɑnn wuol ni mɑɑn k jii jiin u nɑɑn po, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm ŋɑnin, u k cɑb’b.
40013012	Tɔn, wun nbɑ mɔk siɑl, ŋuɑ e sii lɑɑt k puki, k sii mɔk bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ k mɔk, u sɑɑ kɔnŋ lin nbɑ k u mɔk nɑ gbɑɑ.
40013013	L pɑɑk e te k n yiin’m bɑljokt, k mɑɑn b goli e, ŋɑɑn k lɑɑt, k biɑ gbiɑ e, ŋɑɑn k bɑnt l pɑɑk.
40013014	Nnɑ e k b ni, k lin nbɑ k Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi din yet nɑ sɑɑ gbie ɑ: ‹I sɑɑ gbɑt, ŋɑɑn i kɑn bɑnn l pɑɑk. I sii goli, ŋɑɑn i kɑn bɑnn yɑɑ lɑ lin nbɑ nɑ.
40013015	K mɑɑn niib nɑ yɑn dɔkn, b nyɑl b tubɑ, k biɑ mun b ninbinɑ e, k mɑɑn b k luon bin lɑ siɑl, k biɑ k luon bin gbɑt, k biɑ k luon ɑ b yɑn n dɔkt, k biɑ k luon bin ŋmɑt bɑɑl n buol ni, k min Yennu n tul’b lɑɑfiɑ.›
40013016	«Tɔn, yinm ŋɑnin, pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e, k mɑɑn i ninbinɑ lɑɑt. Pɑlpienn biɑ tie i yɑl e, k mɑɑn i tubɑ gbiɑ mɑɑn.
40013017	Ŋɑɑn bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i, Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nɑn yentinnɑ bonciɑnn din luon bin lɑ lin nbɑ k i lɑɑt nɑ, ŋɑɑn din k lɑ, k biɑ din luon bin gbɑt lɑbɑɑl nbɑ k i gbiɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn din k gbɑt.»
40013018	K Yiesu din yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Gbiintl mɑn k bɑnn tɑnbultuɑ nɑ bɑljouk pɑɑk.
40013019	Bin nbɑ gbiɑ Yennu nɑɑn lɑbɑɑl ŋɑɑn k k bɑnn l pɑɑk nɑ tie nɑn sɑnjokpinŋ nbɑ k bonbuoli bɑɑ lenŋ nɑ e, k Klistu dɑtɑɑk bɑɑl k tɑn nyinn lin nbɑ bo kuɑ b pɑlɑ ni mɑnŋ.
40013020	Wun nbɑ gɑɑl bonbuoli nbɑ bɑɑ tɑnpuut pɑɑk tie wun nbɑ gbiɑ Yennu mɑɑn, k gɑɑl’l yiɑn ɑ nɑn pɑlpienn,
40013021	ŋɑɑn k k nyik k l bɑɑ jiinɑ u ni k biɑ kɑn wei, k yuo nbɑ fɑlɑ nɑn muksuk bɑɑl u pɑɑk nɑ, u tuu bɑɑ e.
40013022	Wun nbɑ gɑɑl bonbuoli nbɑ bɑɑ kunkoni ni nɑ mun tie wun nbɑ gbiɑ Yennu mɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn k tingbounŋ nɑ fɑlɑ nɑn mɔktuk lonm nyɑkn mɑɑn mɑnŋ u pɑl ni, k l kɑn nɑn.
40013023	Wun nbɑ gɑɑl bonbuoli tinŋɑnŋ ni nɑ tie nɑn wun nbɑ gbɑt Yennu mɑɑn nɑ, k bɑnn l pɑɑk, k l tɑn kpɑɑt k yenn-nbɑ nɑn kobk kobk, k liel nbɑ mun nɑn piinluobluob, liel mun biɑ nɑn piintɑtɑ nɑ e.»
40013024	K Yiesu biɑ din yin’m bɑljouk nɑ k pukn ɑ: «Yennu nɑɑn tie nɑn jɑsuɑ nbɑ din duo u kpɑɑb ni k sɑɑ bul dibuolŋɑni nɑ e.
40013025	K niib tɑn duɑl, k u dɑtɑɑk sɑɑn sɑɑ bul dinɑtimi k kuɑn dibuolŋɑni nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn yɑɑt.
40013026	Dii nɑ nbɑ din tɑn puk k ji mɑɑl yuo nbɑ, k b ji bɑnn nɑn dinɑtimi be lenŋ.
40013027	Ŋɑnn e k u ŋɑɑtuontunnɑ bɑɑl k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, dibuolŋɑni kuukuɑ kɑɑ k ɑ dɑɑn bul ɑ kpɑɑb nɑ ni ii? Ŋɑɑn l tien nlee k dinɑtimi tɑn be lenŋ i?›
40013028	K u yet’b ɑ: ‹Dɑtɑsuɑ e tun nnɑ.› K b boi’ɔ ɑ: ‹K ɑ luon tin sɑɑn k sɑɑ ŋɑbl dinɑtimi mɑnŋ ii?›
40013029	Ŋɑnn e k u jiin ɑ: ‹Aɑi, k mɑɑn i yɑɑ yin ŋɑbl, i tɑn sɑɑ kpet ŋɑbl dimɔni e.
40013030	L pɑɑk, nyikn mɑn k lii be nɑn dijɑɑn-yuo, k dijɑɑn-yuo e k n tɑn sɑɑ yet dijɑɑntieb nɑ k bin cuɑ dinɑtimi nɑ sinsinn k puo’n k juo muu, ŋɑɑn kpen nɑn diŋɑni nɑ k tɑn wuun n dii sinsonŋ ni.› »
40013031	K Yiesu biɑ din yin’m bɑljouk nɑ k pukn ɑ: «Yennu nɑɑn tie nɑn kpint tiik nbɑ k b yi’l muutɑɑld nɑ binn nbɑ k nilɔ din jii k bul u kpɑɑb ni nɑ e.
40013032	L wɑɑl k gɑl bonbuoli kul sɑɑk ɑ, ŋɑɑn k l tɑn piɑ k kpɑɑt k yɑb kpint tiini kul ɑ, k tɑn tien tiik, k nuɑni bɑɑl k tɑn tiɑ tiɑt l yiini nɑ pɑɑk.»
40013033	K Yiesu biɑ din yin’m bɑljouk nɑ k pukn ɑ: «Yennu nɑɑn tie nɑn dɑtinŋ nbɑ k puo jii k ŋmɑt nɑn pɑɑnu yon nbɑ yɑb, k lin tɑn miik k tɑn pukl nɑ e.»
40013034	Yiesu din yiin bɑljokt e k piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ kul ɑ k tien nibul mɑnŋ. U din k pɑk siɑl k tul’b k l k tie bɑljokt ni kɑɑ.
40013035	U din tun nnɑ, ɑ lin nbɑ k Yennu sɔkniisuɑ din sɔkn nɑ, lin tien gbien. Sɔkni nɑ din yet ɑ: «N tɑn sɑɑ yɑɑt n mɔb k yet nɑn bɑljokt e, k pɑk fiit wɑnn wuol ni bonɑ nbɑ din wuon k k nyii pɑɑnu dulnyɑ piinu ni wɑɑ, k tɑn tuu mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ.»
40013036	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu din nyik nibul mɑnŋ lenŋ, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn kuɑ u ŋɑduɑtk ni. K u puolpoweitieb bɑɑl u buol ni k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yet’t dinɑtimi bɑljouk nɑ pɑɑk.»
40013037	K u yet’b ɑ: « Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ e tie wun nbɑ bul dibuolŋɑni nɑ.
40013038	Tingbounŋ nɑ e tie kpɑɑb nɑ, k dibuolŋɑni nɑ tie Yennu nɑɑn ni niib, ŋɑɑn k dinɑtimi nɑ mun tie Klistu dɑtɑɑk niib.
40013039	Dɑtɑɑk nbɑ bul dinɑtimi nɑ mun tie Sɑɑtɑn, k dijɑɑn-yuo nɑ tie dulnyɑ nɑ gbennu yuo, k dijɑɑntieb nɑ mun tie Yennu mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ.
40013040	Biɑnŋ nbɑ k b tikl dinɑtimi nɑ k juo muu nɑ, nnɑ e k l tɑn sii tie dulnyɑ gbennu dɑɑl.
40013041	Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tɑn sɑɑ tun u mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ k bin gɑnn nibiit kul nbɑ te k lieb tuun biit, nɑn biitdɑnm kul nbɑ be u yent ni,
40013042	k lu’b musɑɑkɑu ni. Lenŋ e k niib tɑn sii fɑbn mɔ k nyiitl nyɑnɑ.
40013043	Ŋɑɑn l yuo mɑnŋ, bin nbɑ tuun Yennu nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ kul tɑn sii be b Bɑɑ nɑɑn ni e wɑɑ k nyili nɑn yennu nɑ. Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint.»
40013044	«Yennu nɑɑn tie nɑn mɔktuk nbɑ din pii tinŋ ni suɑ kpɑɑb ni nɑ e, k jɑsuɑ tɑn bɑɑl lɑ k ŋɑnm gbiil tɑnt piin’l, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn nɑn pɑlpienn k sɑɑ kɔi wɑɑ mɔk lin nbɑ kul ɑ, k jen tɑn dɑɑ kpɑɑb mɑnŋ.»
40013045	«Tɔn, Yennu nɑɑn biɑ tie nɑn dɑɑkuɑlɔ nbɑ din kɑk lin luon pelilnbɑ nbɑ ŋɑn ɑ wun dɑɑ nɑ e.
40013046	U din sɑɑ lɑ yenn k l dɑɑɔk pɑɑl bonciɑnn, k u ŋmɑt sɑɑ kɔi wɑɑ mɔk lin nbɑ kul ɑ, k sɑɑn sɑɑ dɑɑ pelilnbɑ mɑnŋ.»
40013047	«Yennu nɑɑn biɑ tie nɑn jɑnlɑɑɔnŋ nbɑ k b tuu jii k lu nyun ni k suol jɑnbuolu buolu nɑ e.
40013048	L i gbie yuo nbɑ bin dɑt donn gbingbɑnn, k kɑl gɑnn jɑnŋɑni k tien kpɑncubt ni, ŋɑɑn lu jɑnbiit nɑ.
40013049	L tɑn sii tie nnɑ e dulnyɑ nɑ gbennu dɑɑl. Yennu mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl e k gɑnn nifoŋɑnm, ŋɑɑn nyik nibiit.
40013050	B tɑn sɑɑ jii nibiit mɑnŋ k lu’b musɑɑkɑu ni. Lenŋ mɑnŋ e wɑɑ, k niib tɑn sii fɑbn mɔ k nyiitl nyɑnɑ.»
40013051	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «I bɑnn bɑljokt mɑnŋ kul pɑɑk ɑɑ?» K b sɑk ɑ: «Nnn.»
40013052	K u yet’b ɑ: «L pɑɑk, Yennu senniwɑntuɑ nbɑ kul tumi Yennu nɑɑn po wɑnnu nɑ, u tie nɑn ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ nbɑ nyint bonkpelɑ nɑn bonpɑɑnɑ u mɔktuk ni nɑ e.»
40013053	Yiesu nbɑ din yin bɑljokt nɑ k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k u nyii lenŋ
40013054	k kun u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ duo ni Nɑɑsɑɑlet, k sɑɑ tumi niib Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni. U wɑnnu mɑnŋ din tien niib nɑ bɑktnɔunŋ bonciɑnn, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «Lee k juɑ nɑ lɑ yɑnbuolu nɑ? Lee k u lɑ yiikuo k tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nɑ?
40013055	Kɑnpintɑ bik nɑ kɑɑ nɑ ɑɑ? U nɑɑ kɑɑ tie Mɑɑli nɑ ɑɑ? U ninjɑnm kɑɑ tie Sɑɑk nɑn Suosiɑf nɑn Siimɔn nɑn Suudɑ nɑ ɑɑ?
40013056	U niipuob kɑɑ k tinm nɑn ŋɑnm lɑkn be duo nɑ nɑ ɑɑ? U lɑ lin nbɑ nɑ kul lee?»
40013057	Lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk b din k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ. Ŋɑnn e k u din yet’b ɑ: «Yennu sɔkni k kɔnŋt nibɑɑkl, sie u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ duo ni, nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb buol ni.»
40013058	L pɑɑk, u din k tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ bonciɑnn lenŋ, k mɑɑn niib mɑnŋ nbɑ k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
40014001	L yuo mɑnŋ k Gɑɑliile kpɑnbɑl Heluod din tɑn gbɑt k b piɑk Yiesu po,
40014002	k u yet u tuontunnɑ ɑ: «Sɑn nbɑ dɑɑn wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ e nɑ. U fiil kuun ni e. L pɑɑk te k u mɔk yiikuo k tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nɑ.»
40014003	Heluod ponŋ din yet u niib ɑ bin suol Sɑn nɑ, k bɑɑn’ɔ bɑnt k kuɑn’ɔ dɑnsɑlk ni. U din tun nnɑ u ninjɑ Fiiliip ŋɑɑpuo nbɑ k b yi’u Heluodiɑd nɑ pɑɑk e.
40014004	K mɑɑn Sɑn din tuu yien Heluod ɑ: «Yennu senni k cɑb’ɑ nɑn fɑn fɑt Heluodiɑd k kuɑn’ɔ.»
40014005	Heluod din luon wun kpi Sɑn, ŋɑɑn tiin niib jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn suɑ kul ɑ mɑntk din tien yɑdɑ nɑn Sɑn tie Yennu sɔkni e.
40014006	K kpɑnbɑl Heluod mɑɑlu jɑɑnm dɑɑl tɑn bɑɑl, k Heluodiɑd bonpobik bɑɑl k tɑn wɑɑ siɑk jɑɑnm niib tuɑnn, k l mɑnŋ kpɑnbɑl Heluod bonciɑnn.
40014007	L pɑɑk, k u pol mɔb ɑ u sɑɑ tul bonpobik nɑ lin nbɑ k u sɑɑ yet ɑ u luon nɑ kul ɑ.
40014008	Ŋɑnn e k u nɑɑ Heluodiɑd wɑnn’ɔ wɑɑ sɑɑ boi lin nbɑ po, k bonpobik mɑnŋ yet kpɑnbɑl Heluod ɑ: «Potl Sɑn nbɑ wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ yul k kpien tɑtlɑɑɔk ni k tul’n.»
40014009	Lin nbɑ nɑ din biil kpɑnbɑl nɑ pɑl ni hei, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ sɑt dɔnŋ pol mɔb sɑɑnm nɑ tuɑnn nɑ, k u cɑb ɑ bin sɑɑn tun nnɑ,
40014010	k tun siɑb ɑ bin sɑɑn dɑnsɑlk ni, k sɑɑ pot Sɑn yul nɑ.
40014011	K b sɑɑn k sɑɑ pot u yul k kpien tɑtlɑɑɔk ni, k tɑn tul bonpobik mɑnŋ, k u mun gɑɑl sɑɑn tul u nɑɑ.
40014012	Ŋɑnn e k Sɑn puolpoweitieb bɑɑl k tɑn jii u gbɑnɑnt k pii, ŋɑɑn ji sɑɑn k sɑɑ yet Yiesu.
40014013	Yiesu nbɑ gbɑt Sɑn kpinu po yuo nbɑ, k u fiil lenŋ k kuɑ bulgbetl, k puot kuɑ muuk ni. Nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ nbɑ lɑ nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b nyii b doi ni k sonm tɑɑtinŋ k wɑɑ’u.
40014014	Yiesu nbɑ sɑɑ nyii bulgbetl ni k lɑ nibul mɑnŋ nɑ, k ninbɑɑɔk suol’ɔ bonciɑnn, k u te k bin nbɑ yiɑl k be lenŋ nɑ kul ɑ pɑɑk.
40014015	Yennu nbɑ tɑn mɑɑkt yuo nbɑ, k u puolpoweitieb bɑɑl u buol ni, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Nnɑ nɑ tie muuk ni e, k yennu mun yɑɑ wun bɑɑ e. L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt k niib nɑ n sɑɑn digbɑnbis nbɑ kpiɑ nɑ k sɑɑ lɑ jiet k dɑɑ.»
40014016	Ŋɑnn e k u yet’b ɑ: «B dɑɑ sɑɑ. I mɔnŋ n tul’b jiet k bin di.»
40014017	K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Pɑɑni ŋɑnŋmu nɑn jɑnbis ŋɑnle kuukuɑ e be t buol ni.»
40014018	Ŋɑnn e k u yet’b ɑ: «Jiin nɑ mɑn k tul’n.»
40014019	K u yet nibul nɑ ɑ bin lɑkn kɑl kɑl muɑt pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn jii pɑɑni ŋɑnŋmu nɑ, nɑn jɑnbis ŋɑnle nɑ, k gokt u yul sɑnpɑɑpo, ŋɑɑn tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ŋmit ŋmit pɑɑni nɑ k tul u puolpoweitieb, k b jii tol nibul nɑ.
40014020	K b kul dii gbuo k tenn. K u puolpoweitieb lɑkn jiet nbɑ tenn nɑ, k l gbie kpɑncubt piik nɑn ŋɑnle.
40014021	Niib nbɑ dii mɑnŋ din tie nɑn jɑb tusɑ ŋɑnŋmu nɑ, ŋɑɑn k puob nɑn wɑɑs kɑnn k pukn lenŋ.
40014022	L puolpo k Yiesu din te k u puolpoweitieb kuɑ bulgbetl nɑ ni k liit k sɑɑ u tuɑnn po puotl, ŋɑɑn k u biɑl ɑ wun cɑb nibul nɑ.
40014023	Wɑɑ cɑb nibul nɑ k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k u duo juɑl pɑɑk ɑ wun sɑɑ miɑl Yennu. K dɑɑjuouk tɑn bɑɑl k u biɑ dɑɑ be lenŋ u kuɑ.
40014024	L yuo k u puolpoweitieb ŋɑnin ji be bulgbetl nɑ ni e, k biɑ fɔk nɑn gbingbɑnn ɑ, k nyunpɑnɑ diɑ k lɑb’m, k mɑɑn b din toki wounŋ o.
40014025	L puolpo e k Yiesu tɑn sik nyun pɑɑk k sonm kojomuɑk, k sɑɑ b buol ni.
40014026	U puolpoweitieb nbɑ tɑn lɑ k u sonm nyun pɑɑk k bɑɑt nɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol’b bonciɑnn, k b yɑɑ ɑ: «Gotl mɑn, funfɔntuk o.» ŋɑɑn yikn jɑŋmɑɑnwuyikni.
40014027	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u yet’b ɑ: «Cien i pɑlɑ mɑn, l tie min e. I dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni.»
40014028	K Piɑl jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l i set kii tie fin i e, fɑn te k n sonm nyun nɑ pɑɑk k cet’ɑ.»
40014029	K u mun jiin yet Piɑl ɑ: «Bɑɑt nɑ.» K Piɑl nyii bulgbetl nɑ ni k sik nyun nɑ pɑɑk, k piin sonm ce Yiesu.
40014030	Wɑɑ lɑ k wounŋ pil nyunpɑnɑ k bɑɑt yuo nbɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol’ɔ, k u piint kpii l yuo, ŋɑɑn yikn ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, fiel’n.»
40014031	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Yiesu tɑnt u nuu k suol’ɔ, ŋɑɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin yɑdɑ-kɑnpuɑn-dɑɑnɔ nɑ, bee k ɑ bils’n i?»
40014032	Bɑɑ ŋmɑt sɑɑ kuɑ bulgbetl nɑ ni yuo nbɑ, k wounŋ nɑ nyik dɑnu.
40014033	K bin nbɑ din be bulgbetl nɑ ni bɑɑl k tɑn gbɑɑn jiɑntl Yiesu ŋɑɑn yien ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e, ɑ set tie Yennu Bijɑ e.»
40014034	Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb nbɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl mɔkgbenŋl nɑ puotl yuo nbɑ, k b nyii duo Genesɑɑlet.
40014035	Duo mɑnŋ tieb nbɑ din bɑnn Yiesu nɑ pɑɑk, k b muɑnt lenŋ mɑnŋ niib kul ɑ, k b tikl b bɑɑtb kul k bɑɑl nɑn’m u buol ni,
40014036	k tɑn bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun sɑk k bɑɑtb mɑnŋ n sii u liɑtfuouk mɔgbɑnn. K bin nbɑ sii’l nɑ kul ɑ din lɑ lɑɑfiɑ wɑɑ.
40015001	L yuo nɑ k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn senniwɑntieb nyii Selusɑɑlenm k bɑɑl tɑn boi Yiesu ɑ:
40015002	«Bee k ɑ puolpoweitieb k wɑɑ t yejɑnm kɑɑl i? K mɑɑn b k nit b nii kɑɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn di.»
40015003	K Yiesu mun boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i mun k sɑk Yennu senni weiu ŋɑɑn wɑɑ i yejɑnm kɑɑl i?
40015004	Yennu e din yet ɑ: ‹Bɑɑk ɑ bɑɑ nɑn ɑ nɑɑ,› k biɑ yet ɑ: ‹Wun nbɑ tɑn pol u bɑɑ ɑmi u nɑɑ mɔb, bin kpi’u.›
40015005	Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin yɑɑ ɑ, nilɔ i yet u bɑɑ ɑmi u nɑɑ ɑ: ‹Mɑɑ bo sɑɑ tul’i lin nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn l kpɑnt Yennu yɑl ɑ,› ɑ
40015006	l ji k tie miɑl kɑɑ nɑn wun tul u dɑnm siɑl. Yɑɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, i yiin Yennu senni yɑnn ɑ, i yejɑnm kɑɑl pɑɑk.
40015007	Yinm kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nɑ, Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi nbɑ din pɑk i po nɑ, set tie mɔni e, ɑ:
40015008	‹Niib nɑ tien’n bɑɑkl mɔi ni e, ŋɑɑn b pɑlɑ fɔk nɑn’n sɑɑn ɑ.
40015009	B jiɑntl’n yɑnn e, k mɑɑn b diɑ nisɑɑli kɑɑ e k wɑnt niib nɑn l set tie min Yennu senni e nɑ.› »
40015010	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yiin nibul nɑ k tɑn yet’b ɑ: «Gbiintl mɑn, k bɑnn lin nbɑ k n yɑɑ n yet’i nɑ pɑɑk.
40015011	Lin nbɑ kuɑ nisɑɑlk mɔb ni kɑn fit tien’ɔ jɑknt u pɑl ni, ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ nyi u mɔb ni e tien’ɔ jɑknt.»
40015012	Ŋɑnn e k u puolpoweitieb bɑɑl u buol ni k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «A mi nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ nbɑ gbɑt ɑ mɑɑn mɑnŋ nɑ, b dukn nɑn ɑ sukl’b e k l k mɑnŋ’b ii?»
40015013	K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «Tiik nbɑ kul k n Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ k wuu, sie k b tɑn ŋɑbl e k lu.
40015014	L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt’b mɑn k bii sɑɑ, k mɑɑn b tie nɑn juɑni nɑ e k dɑɑl b juɑnlei, k l i tie k juɑnŋ dɑɑl u luɑ, sie k b kul ɑ bɑɑ buotuk ni.»
40015015	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑnt’t bɑljouk nɑ pɑɑk.»
40015016	K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «I mun biɑ lek dɑɑ k fit bɑnn n mɑɑn nɑ pɑɑk ii?
40015017	I k mi nɑn lin nbɑ kuɑ mɔb ni, l yɑɑ lin sik puol ni e, k kpɑnt bint k nyi ii?
40015018	Ŋɑɑn bɑlbiit nbɑ k nisɑɑlk piɑk u mɔb ni, l nyii u pɑl ni e, ŋɑnn mun e tien’ɔ jɑknt.
40015019	K mɑɑn nilɔ pɑl ni e k dudukbiit nyi, nɑn nikpinu, nɑn boncuncontuonɑ, nɑn nɑn-yukn, nɑn fɑɑk siɑlɑ, nɑn sɑnjɑɑɔnŋ.
40015020	Lin nbɑ nɑ nbɑ e tien nisɑɑlk jɑknt, ŋɑɑn niijɑknɑ dinu k fit tien nilɔ jɑknt.»
40015021	Tɔn, k Yiesu nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn Tiil nɑn Siidɔn bɔkl po.
40015022	Ŋɑnn e k Kɑɑnɑɑn tinŋ ni puosuɑ nnɑ mun din be bɔkl mɑnŋ po, k tɑn bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni, k yien ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn, tin’n ninbɑɑɔk. Nɑlnbiiuk be n bipuo ni, k muks’ɔ bonciɑnn.»
40015023	K Yiesu din k jiin siɑl, ŋɑɑn k u puolpoweitieb yet’ɔ ɑ wun bel puo nɑ, k mɑɑn u mɔk fuut.
40015024	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Islɑɑeltieb nbɑ tie nɑn pei nbɑ bot nɑ, ŋɑnm kuukuɑ e k Yennu tun’n ɑ mɑn sɑɑn b buol ni.»
40015025	K puo mɑnŋ bɑɑl k tɑn gbɑɑn Yiesu tuɑnn, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, sonmt’n»
40015026	K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «L k ŋɑn k nilɔ n jii wɑɑs jiet k tul bɔi.»
40015027	Ŋɑnn e k puo nɑ jiin ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l set tie mɔni e, ŋɑɑn bɔi nbɑ duɑ b dɑɑnɔ sɑɑŋmɑni buol nɑ k kɔnŋt jebulɑ nbɑ bɑɑ tinŋ ni k tɔki di.»
40015028	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu ji yet’ɔ ɑ: «A tien’n yɑdɑ bonciɑnn. Lin nbɑ k ɑ luon nɑ, Yennu n tun nnɑ k tul’ɑ.» K u bipuo mɑnŋ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni.
40015029	L puolpo e k Yiesu nyii lenŋ k gɑl Gɑɑliile mɔkgbenŋl kpinŋ, k sɑɑ duo kɑl juɑl pɑɑk.
40015030	K nibulciɑɔnŋ bɑɑl u buol nɑn wɔbi, nɑn juɑni, nɑn mui, nɑn diɑni, nɑn bin nbɑ yiɑl yiɑlbuolu buolu kul ɑ, k tɑn bil’b u tuɑnn, k u te k b kul ɑ pɑɑk.
40015031	K nibul nɑ nbɑ lɑ k mui piɑk, k diɑni pɑɑk, k wɔbi sonm, k juɑni lɑɑt nɑ, k l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b, k b piɑk dont Islɑɑeltieb Yennu nɑ sɑnn.
40015032	K Yiesu yiin u puolpoweitieb k tɑn yet’b ɑ: «Ninbɑɑɔk mɔk’n nɑn niib nɑ, k mɑɑn dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ e nɑ k b be n buol nnɑ, ŋɑɑn k mɔk jiet k di. N k luon mɑn kunn’b kon, k b tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn fib kon.»
40015033	K u puolpoweitieb boi’ɔ ɑ: «Lee k t sɑɑ lɑ jiet muuk nɑ ni k tul nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ k bin di k gbuo?»
40015034	K u boi’b ɑ: «I mɔk pɑɑni ŋɑnŋɑ e?» K b jiin ɑ: «Ŋɑnlole, nɑn jɑnbis wɑɑnm-nnɑ.»
40015035	K u yet niib nɑ ɑ bin kɑl tinŋ ni,
40015036	ŋɑɑn jii pɑɑni ŋɑnlole nɑn jɑnbis nɑ, k tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ŋmit ŋmit tul u puolpoweitieb, k b jii tol tol niib mɑnŋ.
40015037	K niib nɑ kul dii k gbuo ŋɑɑn k l tenn. K u puolpoweitieb lɑkn jiet nbɑ tenn nɑ, k l gbie kpɑncubt ŋɑnlole.
40015038	K niib nbɑ dii mɑnŋ din tie jɑb tusɑ ŋɑnnɑ, k puob nɑn wɑɑs kɑnn k pukn lenŋ.
40015039	L puolpo k Yiesu cɑb niib mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn kuɑ bulgbetl ni k puot kuɑ Mɑɑgɑɑdɑn tinŋ ni.
40016001	L puolpo k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni. Bɑɑ luon k bin jɑnm’ɔ nɑ pɑɑk, k b yet’ɔ ɑ wun tien bɑktnɔunŋ nyinn k lin wɑnn nɑn u yiikuo set nyii Yennu buol ni e.
40016002	K u jiin ɑ: «Dɑɑjomɑɑsl, l i tie k sɑnpɑgbɑnt mɔn kpein, i tuu yet ɑ: ‹Wonn ŋɑnin, dɑɑl won sii yien.›
40016003	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k sɑnpɑgbɑnt mɔn ŋɑɑn tɑn bɔnt sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni, i tuu yet ɑ: ‹Dinnɑ ŋɑnin, sɑɑk sɑɑ bɑɑ wɑɑ.› I fit buktl sɑnpɑgbɑnt nyinɑ, ŋɑɑn kɑn fit bukt mɔtɑɑnɑ yuo nɑ.
40016004	Mɔtɑɑnɑ niib, biitdɑnm nbɑ k wɑɑ Yennu nɑ luon k bin lɑ bɑktnɔunŋ nyinɑ, ŋɑɑn b kɑn lɑ nyinsiɑl l i kii tie Suonɑ nyinbuolu nɑ kuukuɑ i kɑɑ.» L puolpo k u siet k nyik’b ŋɑɑn yɑɑt.
40016005	Tɔn, Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb nbɑ din sɑɑ mɔkgbenŋl puotl nɑ, k u puolpoweitieb nɑ ji tiɑl nɑn b k jii pɑɑnu.
40016006	Ŋɑnn e k u yet’b ɑ: «Ii mi mɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ dɑtinŋ po.»
40016007	K b ji piin k yien b lieb ɑ: «Tɑɑ k bɑɑl nɑn pɑɑnu nɑ pɑɑk e te k u yien nnɑ mɑnŋ.»
40016008	K Yiesu bɑnn bɑɑ yien lin nbɑ mɑnŋ, k u boi’b ɑ: «Yinm yɑdɑ-kɑnpuɑnɑ dɑnm nɑ, bee k i yien i lieb nɑn yɑɑ k bɑɑl nɑn pɑɑnu nɑ pɑɑk e?
40016009	I biɑ lek dɑɑ k bɑnn l pɑɑk ii? I k tiɑn mɑɑ dɑɑn jii pɑɑni ŋɑnŋmu k dinn jɑb tusɑ ŋɑnŋmu nɑ ɑɑ? Kpɑncubt ŋɑnŋɑ e k i dɑɑn lɑkn jiet nbɑ tenn nɑ?
40016010	K i biɑ k tiɑn jɑb tusɑ ŋɑnnɑ nbɑ k n dɑɑn jii pɑɑni ŋɑnlole dinn’b nɑ po oo? I dɑɑn lɑkn jiet nbɑ tenn nɑ k gbien cubt ŋɑnŋɑ e?
40016011	Bee k i k bɑnn nɑn l k tie pɑɑnu po kɑɑ k n piɑk i? Ii mi mɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ dɑtinŋ nɑ po.»
40016012	Ŋɑnn e k u puolpoweitieb ji bɑnn nɑn l k tie dɑtinmɔnŋ po kɑɑ k u piɑk ɑ bii guu b mɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn l tie Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ wɑnnu nɑ e k u piɑk l po.
40016013	K Yiesu nbɑ din tɑn bɑɑl duo nbɑ k b yi Fiiliip Seesɑɑle nɑ ni yuo nbɑ, k u boi u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Niib yɑɑ ɑ Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tie ŋmee?»
40016014	Ŋɑnn e k b jiin ɑ: «Siɑb yɑɑ ɑ, ɑ tie Sɑn wun nbɑ dɑɑn wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ e, k siɑb yɑɑ ɑ, ɑ tie Elii e, k siɑb yɑɑ ɑ, ɑ tie Selemi e ɑmi Yennu sɔkniisuɑ.»
40016015	K u ji boi’b ɑ: «K yinm mun, i yɑɑ ɑ n tie ŋmee?»
40016016	Ŋɑnn e k Siimɔn Piɑl jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie mɑnfodɑɑnɔ Yennu Bijɑ Klistu.»
40016017	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin Siimɔn, Suonɑ bijɑ nɑ, pɑlpienn be ɑ pɑɑk, k mɑɑn nisɑɑlk kɑɑ fiit mɑɑn nɑ wɑnn’ɑ ni, ŋɑɑn n Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ e fiit k wɑnn’ɑ.
40016018	Fin Piɑl, min ŋɑnin yien’ɑ e, ɑ tie tɑnn e, k tɑnpiiuk nɑ pɑɑk e k n sɑɑ jii n jɑɑnti k senn, k kuun kɑn fit nyɑnn’l.
40016019	N sɑɑ tul’ɑ Yennu nɑɑn tɑnmɔb gɑnn pieni. L pɑɑk, lin nbɑ k ɑ tɑn lol tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ŋɑnn e k n Bɑɑ mun biɑ sɑɑ lol Yendɔunŋ ni, k lin nbɑ k ɑ biɑ lot, ŋɑnn e k n Bɑɑ mun biɑ sɑɑ lot Yendɔunŋ ni.»
40016020	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet u puolpoweitieb nɑ nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ bii mi k bin yet suɑ nɑn ŋuɑ e tie Klistu nɑ.
40016021	Lɑɑ din nyii l yuo mɑnŋ k jii sɑɑ, k Yiesu piin k yien u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Sie k n fɑbl k sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm, ŋɑɑn t tinŋ ni sɑɑkɑb, nɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm, nɑn senniwɑntieb sɑɑ din’n fɑlɑ bonciɑnn, k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ kpi’n ɑ, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k n sɑɑ fiil kuun ni.»
40016022	K Piɑl yiin’ɔ kpinŋ po k sɑɑ kpil’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, Yennu n bɔl bonbiil nɑ k l dɑɑ bɑɑt ɑ pɑɑk.»
40016023	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu jiɑnt yet Piɑl ɑ: « Sɑɑtɑn nɑ, sietl nnɑ nɑ. A tie tɑngbiɑtkɑl e n sɔnu ni, k mɑɑn ɑ k duki lin nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl po, ŋɑɑn duki lin nbɑ tie nisɑɑli yɑl po,»
40016024	ŋɑɑn yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Wun nbɑ i luon wun wei’n, sie k u yit u mɔnŋ sɑlk k jii u kuun dɑpunpunn kii wɑɑ’n,
40016025	k mɑɑn wun nbɑ k sɑk wun jii u mɑnfuol k tul’n, ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ kɔnŋ’l, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ yit u mɑnfuol sɑlk n pɑɑk, ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ lɑ’l nɑn bɑlmɔni.
40016026	L i tie k nilɔ yen tingbounŋ nɑ mɔktuk kul ɑ, ŋɑɑn tɑn kɔnŋ u mɑnfuol, nyɔlɑnt po e k u sɑɑ lɑ? Suɑ sɑɑ fit jii siɑl k dɑɑ u mɑnfuol ii?
40016027	K mɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tɑn sɑɑ jen nɑn u Bɑɑ yiikuo, nɑn u mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ, k l yuo mɑnŋ u tɑn sɑɑ pɑ suɑ kul nɑn u tuonɑ nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
40016028	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, siɑb be nnɑ, k dɑɑ kɑn kpo sie k b tɑn lɑ Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑɑn dinu bɑɑlu.»
40017001	L puolpo e k l tɑn tien dɑɑ ŋɑnluob, k Yiesu jii Piɑl, nɑn Sɑɑk nɑn u ninjɑ Sɑn, k duo nɑn’m juɑl nbɑ fɔk bonciɑnn pɑɑk, b kuukuɑ.
40017002	L yuo nɑ k b lɑ k u lebt, k u nunm po kpint nyili nɑn yennu nɑ, k u tiɑt penn k nyilk nɑn yentu nɑ.
40017003	K b lɑ Muois nɑn Elii lekt yonm, k sie piɑk nɑn’ɔ.
40017004	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l ŋɑn nɑn tii be nnɑ nɑ. L i tie k ɑ bo sɑɑ sɑk, n bo sɑɑ fɑɑ lɑnbont ŋɑntɑ e, k yenn i tie ɑ yɑl, k liel i tie Muois yɑl, k liel i mun i tie Elii yɑl.»
40017005	K Piɑl mɔb dɑɑ k bɑɑ tinŋ, k sɑnpɑgbɑnpieonŋ sik bɑkn b pɑɑk, k b gbɑt kunkɔsiɑl nyii sɑnpɑgbɑnn nɑ ni, k yet ɑ: «N Bilonkɑk e nɑ, wun nbɑ k n nunm gbuo’u nɑ. Gbiintl u mɔb mɑn.»
40017006	K Yiesu puolpoweitieb nɑ nbɑ gbɑt kunkɔl mɑnŋ nɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol’b, k b bɑɑ wokn tinŋ ni.
40017007	K Yiesu bɑɑl k tɑn yii yii’b, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Fiit mɑn. I dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni.»
40017008	K b gokt b yulɑ, ŋɑɑn ji k lɑ suɑ b buol, sie Yiesu kuukuɑ.
40017009	Bɑɑ nyii juɑl nɑ pɑɑk k sik yuo nbɑ, k Yiesu yet’b nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ: «I dɑɑ yien suɑ lin nbɑ k i lɑ nɑ, k sɑɑ tuu yuo nbɑ k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni.»
40017010	Ŋɑnn e k u puolpoweitieb boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bee k senniwɑntieb yɑɑ ɑ sie k Yennu sɔkni Elii bɑɑl Klistu sinsinn i?»
40017011	K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «L set tie mɔni e nɑn sie k Elii mɑnŋ bɑɑl sinsinn k tɑn ŋɑnm bonsiɑl kul k senn’l l sɔnu ni.
40017012	Ŋɑɑn min e yien’i nɑ, Elii ponŋ bɑɑl nɑ, ŋɑɑn b k bɑn nɑn l tie ŋuɑ e, k diɑ’u gbɑkɑ gbɑkɑ nnɑ, nɑn bɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ. Nnɑ e k b mun biɑ sɑɑ tien Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ, k din’ɔ fɑlɑ.»
40017013	Ŋɑnn e k u puolpoweitieb ji bɑnn nɑn u piɑk Sɑn wun nbɑ dɑɑn wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ po e.
40017014	K Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb bɑntɑ mɑnŋ tɑn bɑɑl nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ buol, k jɑsuɑ bɑɑl k tɑn gbɑɑn Yiesu tuɑnn, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ:
40017015	«Yonmdɑɑnɔ, tinin n bijɑ nɑ ninbɑɑɔk, k mɑɑn u bɑɑ gbitgbiil e. L dɑɑmi’ɔ bonciɑnn k u tun bɑɑ muu ni, k biɑ tun bɑɑ nyun ni yuo kul ɑ.
40017016	K n bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ ɑ puolpoweitelieb buol ni, k b gbɑl u tebu.»
40017017	K Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «Yinm mɔtɑɑnɑ niib nbɑ mɑntk kɑɑ yɑdɑ, k biɑ k wɑɑ Yennu fɑnu nɑ, n sɑɑ wei nɑn’i nlee? Yuo nlee k n sɑɑ di suklu nɑn’i mɑntk i? Bɑɑt mɑn nɑn bik mɑnŋ nnɑ.»
40017018	K Yiesu tiɑn nɑlnbiiuk nɑ pɑɑk, k u ciɑl nyii ŋɑɑn nyik bik nɑ, k u pɑɑk kenken l yuo nɑ.
40017019	L puolpo, k Yiesu puolpoweitieb bɑɑl u buol, b kuukuɑ, k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bee k tinm ŋɑnin bo k fit nyinn nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ i?»
40017020	K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «I yɑdɑ kɑɑln pɑɑk. Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, l i tie k i tien Yennu yɑdɑ k l yɑb nɑn junjukl binn nɑ, i sɑɑ fit yet juɑl nɑ ɑ: ‹Fiit k sɑɑ bɑɑ nɑ wɑɑ,› k l set sɑɑ fiil e. I bo sɑɑ fit tun bonsiɑl kul ɑ.
40017021	Ŋɑɑn nɑlnbiiuk nɑ buolu ŋɑnin, i kɑn fit nyinn’l, sie k i lol mɔi k mei Yennu.»
40017022	Tɔn, Yiesu puolpoweitieb nbɑ tɑn lɑkn lieb Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni nɑ, k u yet’b ɑ: «B tɑn sɑɑ jii Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k kubn’ɔ niib nuu ni
40017023	k b sɑɑ kpi’u, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k u biɑ sɑɑ fiil kuun ni.» K l ji biil u puolpoweitieb pɑlɑ ni bonciɑnn.
40017024	K Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl Kɑpelnɑunm yuo nbɑ, k Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk likgɑɑltieb bɑɑl k tɑn boi Siimɔn Piɑl ɑ: «A wɑntuɑ k pɑ likli mɑnŋ ii?»
40017025	K Piɑl jiin ɑ: «U pɑ,» ŋɑɑn kuɑ ŋɑɑk ni. L yuo nɑ k Yiesu dɔnŋ piin l mɑɑn k boi’ɔ ɑ: «Siimɔn, ɑ duki nlee? Lɑnm e tuu pɑ lɑnpo k tien tingbounŋ nɑ kpɑnbɑlɑ, b mɔnŋ buolu ni niib ɑmi sɑɑnm i?»
40017026	K u jiin ɑ: «Sɑɑnm e.» K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Tɔn, l i tie nnɑ i e, l wɑnt nɑn b mɔnŋ buolu ni nuu kɑɑ l ni.
40017027	Ŋɑɑn tɑɑ k luon k tin donn b wutuol nɑ pɑɑk, i sɑɑ mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni, k sɑɑ lu jɑnpienu k dɑt jɑnŋ nbɑ k ɑ suol’ɔ sinsinn nɑ k donn. L i tie k ɑ yɑɑt u mɔb, ɑ sɑɑ lɑ likli nbɑ sɑɑ fit pɑ min nɑn fin pɑɑk, k fɑn jii k pɑ’b.»
40018001	L yuo nɑ k Yiesu puolpoweitieb bɑɑl u buol ni k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋmee tie nijɑɑnn Yennu nɑɑn ni?»
40018002	K u yiin bik nnɑ k tɑn senn’ɔ b sinsuuk ni,
40018003	ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, wun nbɑ k lebt u binbenŋ k l tie nɑn bik binbenŋ nɑ, u kɑn kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni kɑɑ wɑɑ.
40018004	Wun nbɑ siknt u mɔnŋ k tie nɑn bik nɑ, ŋuɑ e tɑn sii tie sɑɑkuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni.
40018005	Wun nbɑ gɑɑl bik nɑ buolu n sɑnn pɑɑk, min e k u gɑɑl’n.»
40018006	«Wɑɑs nbɑ tien’n yɑdɑ nɑ ŋɑnin, wun nbɑ te k b yenɔ kuɑ tun biit, b i bo i lɑnn nɑɑl l dɑɑnɔ tulu ni k tut’ɔ nɑn’n k lu’u mɔkgbenŋl ni gbɑɑ k u dii nyun, l bo sii sɔ k tul’ɔ.
40018007	Bonbiil sii be tingbounŋ nɑ tieb nbɑ kpɑnn b lieb k b tuun tuonbiit nɑ pɑɑk. Jinjɑnmi set sɑɑ bɑɑl, ŋɑɑn l sii bi k tien wun nbɑ te k jinjɑnmi bɑɑt niib pɑɑk.
40018008	«L i tie k ɑ nuu ɑmi ɑ tɑɑpɑɔnŋ te k ɑ tuun biit, fɑn pot’l k lu. L i tie k ɑ mɔk nuu yenu kuɑ, ɑmi tɑɑpɑn-yenn kuɑ, k lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, l cie nɑn fii mɔk ɑ nii kul nɑn ɑ tɑɑ kul ŋɑɑn Yennu n tɑn kuɑn’ɑ muu nbɑ kɑn mi kpien nɑ ni.
40018009	A ninbinn i te k ɑ tuun biit, fɑn kpɑkl’ɔ k lu bɑnfɔkl ɑ. L i tie k ɑ mɔk ninbin-yenn k lɑ mɑnfuol mɑnŋ, l cie nɑn fii mɔk ninbinɑ ŋɑnle ŋɑɑn Yennu n tɑn kuɑn’ɑ muu mɑnŋ ni.»
40018010	«Ii mi mɑn k suɑ n siɑn wɑɑs mɑnŋ ni yenɔ kuɑ. K mɑɑn n yien’i e, b mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ be n Bɑɑ tuɑnn yuo kul.
40018011	K mɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ bɑɑl ɑ wun tɑn fiel bin nbɑ bot e.
40018012	«I duki nlee? L i tie k nilɔ mɔk pei kobk, k yenɔ kuɑ tɑn bot, u kɑn nyik pei piin-yiɑ nɑn bɑn-yiɑ nɑ juɑl pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn k sɑɑ lon pebotkɑɔk nɑ ɑɑ?
40018013	U lɑ’u yuo nbɑ, bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, u sii mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn mɔni pebotkɑɔk nbɑ k u lɑ’u nɑ pɑɑk, k gɑl pei piin-yiɑ nɑn bɑn-yiɑ nbɑ k bot nɑ pɑɑk.
40018014	Nnɑ e mun k i Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ k luon k wɑɑs nɑ ni yenɔ kuɑ n bot.»
40018015	«A nɑɑ bik i tun siɑl k biil’ɑ, fɑn sɑɑn u buol ni yuo nbɑ k u dɑɑ be u kuukuɑ nɑ, k pɑk wɑnn’ɔ u biit, k l i tie k u bɑnn u biit, i biɑ ŋɑnm tien nɑɑ wɑɑs e nɑ.
40018016	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k u k sɑk wun gbɑt tul’ɑ ni, fɑn yiin niyenɔ ɑmi niib bɑnle k pukn ɑ pɑɑk k yin sɑɑn u buol ni nɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ wɑnt bɑnnu nbɑ, ɑ niib bɑnle ɑmi bɑntɑ mɑnŋ n gbɑt mɑɑn mɑnŋ k tien ɑ siɑlɑɑdɑnm.
40018017	L i tie k u biɑ k sɑk wun gbɑt k tul’b, fɑn pɑk k wɑnn jɑɑnti niib kul ɑ, k l i tie k u biɑ k sɑk nɑn wun gbɑt k tul Yennu niib, yin ji ŋɑɑn k wuu tie nɑn lɑnpogɑɑltuɑ nɑ ɑmi wun nbɑ k tie Yenweilɔ nɑ.»
40018018	«Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, lin nbɑ k i tɑn lol tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ŋɑnn e k n Bɑɑ mun biɑ sɑɑ lol Yendɔunŋ ni, k lin nbɑ k i biɑ lot, ŋɑnn e k n Bɑɑ mun biɑ sɑɑ lot Yendɔunŋ ni.
40018019	«N biɑ yien’i e nɑ, i ni bɑnle i tɑɑn mɔb tingbounŋ nɑ ni k mei n Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ siɑl pɑɑk, u sɑɑ tun yɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ k tul’i wɑɑ.
40018020	K mɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k niib bɑnle ɑmi bɑntɑ tɑɑn lɑkn n sɑnn ni, n be b sinsuuk ni.»
40018021	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l i tie k n nɑɑ bik tun’n biit, tɑɑl munŋɑ e k n nyik cɑb’ɔ? Tɑɑl munlole ee?»
40018022	K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Aɑi, tɑɑl munlole kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn tɑɑl piinlole k sɑɑ jɑnŋ tɑɑl munlole.
40018023	L pɑɑk, Yennu nɑɑn tie nɑn kpɑnbɑlsuɑ nbɑ din tɑn yiin u ŋɑɑtuontunnɑ ɑ wun gɑɑl u pɑnɑ nɑ e.
40018024	Wɑɑ piin kɑnu yuo nbɑ k b kuɑ nɑn jɑsuɑ nnɑ, k u diɑ kpɑnbɑl nɑ pɑnn tɑɑlɑnnbɑ tusɑ piik (10.000).
40018025	K u kɑn fit lɑ k pɑ, k kpɑnbɑl nɑ tul mɔb ɑ bin kɔi ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑpuo nɑn u wɑɑs, nɑn wɑɑ mɔk lin nbɑ kul ɑ, k tɑn pɑ pɑnn mɑnŋ.
40018026	Ŋɑnn e k juɑ mɑnŋ gbɑɑn kpɑnbɑl nɑ tuɑnn ni nɑn bɑlunŋ, ŋɑɑn yien ɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, n sɑɑ pɑ l kul ɑ. Lek din suklu.›
40018027	K ninbɑɑɔk suol kpɑnbɑl nɑ bonciɑnn, k u cɑb’ɔ nɑn pɑnn mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑ’u.
40018028	«Juɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ ŋɑnin nyii yuo nbɑ, k u cet u tuontunluɑ, k u mun diɑ u pɑnn denienbɑ kobk (100), k u cek u kunkɔl ni k ŋmɑki, ŋɑɑn yien’ɔ ɑ: ‹Pɑn n pɑnn nɑ.›
40018029	K u luɑ nɑ mun gbɑɑn u tuɑnn ni nɑn bɑlunŋ, k yien ɑ: ‹Din suklu, k n sɑɑ pɑ’ɑ wɑɑ.›
