40018030	K juɑ nɑ ŋɑnin ji k sɑk u luɑ nɑ bɑlunŋ nɑ, ŋɑɑn te k b jii’u k kuɑn’ɔ dɑnsɑlk, ɑ sie k u tɑn pɑ pɑnn nɑ wɑɑ, k wun nyinn’ɔ.
40018031	K u tuontunlieb nɑ nbɑ lɑ nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k l biil b pɑlɑ ni bonciɑnn, k b ŋmɑt k sɑɑ yet kpɑnbɑl nɑ lin nbɑ kul tun mɑnŋ.
40018032	K kpɑnbɑl nɑ tun ɑ bin yiin juɑ mɑnŋ nɑ, ŋɑɑn piin u sukt ɑ: ‹Fin bon-yuonn nɑ, fɑɑ bo bɑln’n nɑ pɑɑk, k n cɑb› ɑ fɑɑ diɑ n pɑnn nbɑ kul.
40018033	L mun bo ŋɑn nɑn fɑn cɑb ɑ luɑ nɑ k tin’ɔ ninbɑɑɔk, nɑn mɑɑ bo cɑb’ɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.›
40018034	K kpɑnbɑl nɑ wutuol nbɑ duo bonciɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k u jii juɑ mɑnŋ k sɑɑn kuɑn’ɔ dɑnsɑlk ɑ bin ŋmɑnn u tubl k wuu be lenŋ k sɑɑ tuu dɑɑl nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ pɑ pɑnn nɑ kul.»
40018035	Bɑljouk nɑ puolpo k Yiesu ji yet ɑ: «L i tie k i k nyikt cɑbt i lieb nɑn i pɑlɑ kul, nnɑ e k n Bɑɑ nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ sɑɑ tien yinm mun.»
40019001	Yiesu nbɑ pɑk mɔbonɑ nɑ k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k u nyii Gɑɑliile k sɑɑn Suude tinŋ nbɑ be Suulden mɔk-puotl.
40019002	K nibulciɑɔnŋ wɑɑ u puolpo, k u te k bin nbɑ yiɑl nɑ kul ɑ pɑɑk lenŋ.
40019003	K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb bɑɑl u buol ni k luon bin jɑnm’ɔ, k boi’ɔ ɑ: «Yennu senni cɑbt nɑn juɑ n yet u ŋɑɑpuo yɑnn ii?»
40019004	K u jiin ɑ: «I k lii Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ɑɑ? ɑ: ‹Piinu ni wɑɑ, Yennu din nɑn juɑ nɑn puo e,
40019005	ŋɑɑn din yet ɑ, Lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk e k juɑ tuu sɑɑ nyik u bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑpuo n kuɑn lieb, k b niib bɑnle n tɑɑn tien gbɑnɑn-yent kuɑ.›
40019006	L i tie nnɑ, b ji k tie niib bɑnle kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn b tie niyenɔ kuɑ e. L pɑɑk, bin nbɑ k Yennu jii’b k tɑɑn nɑn lieb, nisɑɑlk i mi k wun bɔkt’b.»
40019007	K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bee k Muois ŋɑnin din tul yiikuo u senni nɑ ni, nɑn juɑ sɑɑ fit tul u ŋɑɑpuo puoyetu kɑdɑɑɔk ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ?»
40019008	K Yiesu jiin k yet’b ɑ: «I tonu pɑɑk e te k Muois din tul yiikuo ɑ yii yien i ŋɑɑpuob, ŋɑɑn piinu ni l din k tie nnɑ kɑɑ.
40019009	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i, wun nbɑ yet u ŋɑɑpuo, k l k tie u tun boncuncontuonn kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn kuɑn puogɑnɔ, u tun boncuncontuonn ɑ.»
40019010	K Yiesu puolpoweitieb yet’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie nnɑ i e juɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑpuo sinsuuk ni, ŋɑnn ŋɑnin juɑ i kii kuɑn puo, l sɔ.»
40019011	K u yet’b ɑ: «Suɑ kul kɑn fit diɑ wɑnnu mɑnŋ. Bin nbɑ k Yennu tul’b l yiikuo nɑ, ŋɑnm kuukuɑ e sɑɑ fit diɑ’l.
40019012	K mɑɑn bonɑ bonciɑnn e te k jɑsiɑb k kuɑnt puob. B tuu mɑl siɑb, k b k tie jɑb. Siɑb mun, niib e tuu tien’m jɑtuɑkɑ, k siɑb mun, Yennu nɑɑn pɑɑk e tuu te bin yet puo kuɑnu, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ sɑɑ fit diɑ wɑnnu mɑnŋ, wun diɑ’l.»
40019013	Tɔn, k nisiɑb tɑn bɑɑl nɑn b wɑɑs Yiesu buol ni, ɑ wun yii u nii b pɑɑk, k miɑl Yennu b pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn k u puolpoweitieb tiɑn niib mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
40019014	K Yiesu yet ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k wɑɑs mɑnŋ i bɑɑt n buol ni nɑ, k dɑɑ tiɑn’m, k mɑɑn b buolu e yen Yennu nɑɑn,»
40019015	ŋɑɑn jii u nii k yii yii b pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ji siet sɑɑn.
40019016	L yuo mɑnŋ k nɑɑsimɔ nnɑ bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, tuonŋɑnlɑnn po e k n sɑɑ tun, k lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu?»
40019017	K Yiesu jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Bee k ɑ boi’n lin nbɑ ŋɑn po? Yenɔ kuɑ e ŋɑn, l i tie k ɑ luon k ɑ kuɑ mɑnfuol ni, ii diɑ Yennu senni nɑ.»
40019018	K nɑɑsimɔ nɑ boi Yiesu ɑ: «Senlɑni po e?» K u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Dɑɑ kpi nilɔ. Dɑɑ tuun boncuncontuonɑ. Dɑɑ jɑɑn. Dɑɑ tie fɑɑk siɑlɑ.
40019019	Ii tien ɑ bɑɑ nɑn ɑ nɑɑ nibɑɑkl, ŋɑɑn kii luon ɑ luɑ nɑn fɑɑ luon ɑ mɔnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.»
40019020	K nɑɑsimɔ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «N ponŋ wei senni nɑ kul ɑ. Lɑnn po e k n biɑ sɑɑ tun pukn lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk i?»
40019021	K Yiesu jiin’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ luon k ɑ binbenŋ i tie fɑnu nɑn bɑlmɔni, fii sɑɑ k sɑɑ kɔi fɑɑ mɔk lin nbɑ k jii l likli mɑnŋ k tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm, k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ mɔktuk sɑnpɑɑpo. L puolpo k ɑ jen nɑ kii wɑɑ’n.»
40019022	K nɑɑsimɔ nɑ nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k u siet nɑn pɑlbiil, k mɑɑn u din mɔk mɔktuk bonciɑnn.
40019023	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu ji yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, l sii pɑɑl bonciɑnn nɑn mɔktɔ n kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni.
40019024	L pɑɑl nɑn yuyouk n kuɑ kpɑlpienu miɑl ni, ŋɑɑn l biɑ mɑntk pɑɑl k cie nɑn mɔktɔ n kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni.»
40019025	K u puolpoweitieb nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b bonciɑnn, k b piin k boi b lieb ɑ: «L i tie nnɑ i e, ŋmee ji sɑɑ fit k lɑ fielu?»
40019026	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu got’b ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «Nisɑɑlk kɑn fit tun lin nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn siɑl k pɑɑl Yennu buol ni.»
40019027	L yuo nɑ k Piɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Gotl, tinm ŋɑnin nyik t bonsiɑl kul ɑ ŋɑɑn wɑɑ’ɑ. T nyuɑt tɑn sii tie bee?»
40019028	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, yuo nbɑ k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ tɑn kɑl u nɑɑngbɑnt pɑɑk nɑn pɑnŋ bonciɑnn dulnyɑ pɑɑnn nɑ ni, yinm nbɑ tie u tuomiinbɑ nɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ kɑl nɑɑngbɑnt piik nɑn ŋɑnle pɑɑk e, kii bu Islɑɑeltieb buolu piik nɑn ŋɑnle nɑ buut.
40019029	K wun nbɑ kul nyik u ŋɑɑk, ɑmi u yuɑlb, ɑmi u wɑɑli, ɑmi u bɑɑ, ɑmi u nɑɑ, ɑmi u wɑɑs, ɑmi u kpɑɑnt, n pɑɑk, u tɑn sɑɑ lɑ bonɑ buolu buolu tɑɑl fuunu kobk kobk, k biɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
40019030	Ŋɑɑn niib bonciɑnn nbɑ dɔnŋ gɑl tuɑnn mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ, b tɑn sɑɑ jil puol ɑ, k bonciɑnn nbɑ mun biɑ juont puol mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɔnŋ gɑl tuɑnn ɑ.»
40020001	«K mɑɑn Yennu nɑɑn tie nɑn ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ nbɑ din nyii sɑn-nyɑpob ni k luon niib ɑ wun jii’b k bin ko u kpɑɑb nbɑ k wuu tilonti nbɑ k b yi fiinyɑ nɑ e.
40020002	K b dii l dɑɑɔk k u sɑk k sɑɑ pɑ’b dɑɑl pɑɑɔk denie denie. Ŋɑnn e k b din duo k sɑɑ jɑk konu.
40020003	Lɑɑ din tɑn bɑɑl kut mun-yiɑ yuo nbɑ, k ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ fiil sɑɑn dɑɑk ni, k sɑɑ lɑ siɑb k b sie k k tuun siɑl.
40020004	K u yet’b ɑ: ‹Ii do mɑn n kpɑɑb ni kii sɑɑ i ko, k n pɑ’i lin nbɑ jɑnŋ.›
40020005	K b din duo. Lɑɑ din tɑn bɑɑl kut piik nɑn munle yuo nbɑ, k u biɑ ŋmɑt tien nnɑ, k kut muntɑ yuo nɑ, k u biɑ ŋmɑt k biɑ tien nnɑ.
40020006	Lɑɑ din tɑn bɑɑl kut munŋmu yuo nbɑ, k u biɑ ŋmɑt sɑɑn k sɑɑ lɑ siɑb k b lɑkn sie, k u boi’b ɑ: ‹Bee k i sie nnɑ yɑnn dɑmunn k k tuun siɑl i?›
40020007	K b jiin ɑ: ‹Suɑ k jii’t tuonn.› Ŋɑnn e k u yet’b ɑ: ‹Ii mun i do mɑn n kpɑɑb nɑ ni kii sɑɑ i ko.›
40020008	«Lɑɑ din tɑn bɔnt yuo nbɑ, k ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ nɑ yet u ŋɑɑtuontunnɑ sɑɑkuɑ ɑ: ‹Ii sɑɑ k sɑɑ yiin kpɑɑlɑ mɑnŋ nɑ, k tɑn pɑ’b. A yɑɑ ɑ pɑ’b yuo nbɑ, fɑn piin kii pɑ bin nbɑ bo juont k bɑɑl nɑ, k tɑn juont bin nbɑ bo dɔnŋ bɑɑl nɑ pɑnu.›
40020009	K u tuontunnɑ sɑɑkuɑ mɑnŋ piin k pɑ bin nbɑ bo juont k bɑɑl nɑ, denie denie.
40020010	L pɑɑk, lɑɑ din tɑn bɑɑl bin nbɑ bo bɑɑl sɑn-nyɑpob ni wɑɑ pɑɑk nɑ, k b duki mi ɑ b yɑl sii yɑb e, ŋɑɑn k u pɑ’b denie denie mun biɑk.
40020011	Bɑɑ din gɑɑl b likli gbenn yuo nbɑ, k b piin k buln suki ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ nɑ,
40020012	k yien ɑ: ‹Gotl, bin nbɑ juont k duo kut munŋmu nɑ kuo yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ e, ŋɑɑn k tinm nbɑ ŋɑnin lɑ fɑlɑ sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni wɑɑ, k yennu fɑɑ’t bonciɑnn nɑ, ŋɑɑn k tinm nɑn ŋɑnm tɑn lɑkn gɑɑl denie denie ee?›
40020013	«Ŋɑnn e k ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ nɑ yet b yenɔ ɑ: ‹N yuɑk, gbiintl, n k ŋmɑb’ɑ ni, k mɑɑn t bo dii dɑɑɔk o k ɑ sɑk denie dɑɑl.
40020014	L pɑɑk, jiin ɑ yɑl kii sɑɑ. Min e luon k n pɑ fin nɑn bin nbɑ bo juont bɑɑl mɑnŋ yonm.
40020015	N k mɔk yiikuo nɑn n jii n likli k tun mɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ ɑɑ? Ami ɑ mɔk funfunn nɑn mɑɑ k wuun nɑ pɑɑk ee?› »
40020016	Yiesu nbɑ din yin bɑljouk nɑ k gbenn nɑ puolpo e, k u ji yet’b ɑ: «L pɑɑk, bin nbɑ dɔnŋ gɑl tuɑnn tɑn sɑɑ jil puol, k bin nbɑ juont puol mun biɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɔnŋ gɑl tuɑnn.»
40020017	Yiesu nbɑ din tɑn do Selusɑɑlenm nɑ, k u yiin u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ k tɑn bɔl k yien’m ɑ:
40020018	«Gotl mɑn, t do Selusɑɑlenm e nɑ, k b tɑn sɑɑ jii Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k tien Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb nuu ni, k b sɑɑ bu u buut k yet ɑ u ŋɑn nɑn kuun e.
40020019	B tɑn sɑɑ jii’u k tul bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ ɑ bin fiɑk’ɔ, k buo’u gbɑnn, k kpɑɑ tɑbn’ɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk k wun kpo, ŋɑɑn k l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl, u biɑ sɑɑ fiil kuun ni wɑɑ.» yudɑnt
40020020	L yuo nɑ k Sebede ŋɑɑpuo din jii u wɑɑs k bɑɑl nɑn’m Yiesu buol ni, k tɑn gbɑɑn u tuɑnn, ŋɑɑn miɑl’ɔ sonml po.
40020021	K Yiesu boi’ɔ ɑ: «A luon bee?» K u jiin ɑ: «Tul’n mɔsonn nɑn n wɑɑs nɑ yenɔ tɑn sɑɑ kɑl ɑ diitu po, k luɑ nɑ mun sɑɑ kɑl ɑ gɑnŋ po, yuo nbɑ k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ di ɑ nɑɑn nɑ.»
40020022	K Yiesu jiin yet’b ɑ: «I k mi yɑɑ mei lin nbɑ po. I sɑɑ fit nyu kɔp nbɑ ni k n yɑɑ n nyu lenŋ nɑ wɑɑ ɑɑ?» K b jiin ɑ: «T sɑɑ fit ɑ.»
40020023	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Tɔn, i set sɑɑ nyu lenŋ ɑ. Ŋɑɑn min kɑɑ sɑɑ lukt wun nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɑl n diitu po ɑmi n gɑnŋ po, k mɑɑn n Bɑɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ e lukt bin nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɑl l kinkɑɑni pɑɑk.»
40020024	Yiesu puolpoweitelieb nɑ nbɑ din gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k b wutuol duo b bɑnle mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
40020025	K Yiesu din yiin b kul ɑ k lɑkn’m u buol ni, k tɑn yet’b ɑ: «I mɔnŋ mi nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb yudɑnm dont b mɔnŋ e, k nijɑɑnɑ biɑ diɑ b niib nɑn ninmɔnn e,
40020026	ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin, l dɑɑ tie nnɑ kɑɑ i sinsuuk ni. L i tie k suɑ luon wuu tie nijɑɑnn i sinsuuk ni, l ŋɑn wun kpɑnt tuontunnɔ kii tuun kii tien i kul ɑ.
40020027	K l i biɑ tie k suɑ luon wun tɑn gɑl sinsinn, wun kpɑnt i tuontuunɔ.
40020028	K i tie nɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn u k bɑɑl ɑ niib n tun tul’ɔ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u bɑɑl ɑ wun tun k tul niib e, k biɑ kpo k te k niib bonciɑnn n lɑ fielu.»
40020029	Tɔn, Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb nbɑ din tɑn nyi Seliiko yuo nbɑ k nibulciɑɔnŋ wɑɑ Yiesu puolpo.
40020030	K juɑni bɑnle din kɑl sɑnjokpinŋ k gbɑt ɑ Yiesu bɑɑt ɑ wun tɑn gɑl lenŋ. K b piin k yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ tie Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn, tin’t ninbɑɑɔk.»
40020031	Ŋɑnn e k nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ din tiɑn b pɑɑk ɑ bin ŋmin. Ŋɑɑn k b ŋɑnm yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn, tin’t ninbɑɑɔk.»
40020032	K Yiesu din set ŋɑɑn yiin’m k tɑn boi’b ɑ: «I luon k n tun bee k tul’i ni?»
40020033	K b jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, t luon k ɑ nyuɑnt t ninbinɑ e.»
40020034	K ninbɑɑɔk din suol’ɔ, k u sii sii b ninbinɑ mɑnŋ, k l nyuɑnt nyuɑnt, k b ji din wɑɑ’u k sɑɑ.
40021001	Bɑɑ din tɑn pel Selusɑɑlenm k bɑɑl Betfɑɑje duo nbɑ biɑk jɑgbɑɑk nbɑ k b yi’l Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk nɑ, k Yiesu tun u puolpoweitieb nɑ ni bɑnle u tuɑnn po,
40021002	ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ mɑn digbɑnbik nbɑ be i tuɑnn po nɑ ni. I sɑɑ sɑɑ lɑ k b lol bonnɑɑnŋ nɑn u bik, k yin lot’b k bɑɑl nɑn’m n buol ni nɑ.
40021003	L i tie k suɑ boi’i siɑl i e, yin yet’ɔ Yonmdɑɑnɔ e luon’m, k u sɑɑ cɑb’i k yin bɑɑl nɑn’m.»
40021004	Lin nbɑ nɑ din tun k tien nnɑ ɑ lin gbien lin nbɑ k Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi din sɔkn nɑ po e, ɑ:
40021005	«Yetl Siiɔn duo tieb ɑ: ‹Gotl mɑn, i Kpɑnbɑl nɑ e bɑɑt i buol ni nɑ. U tie wun nbɑ siknt u mɔnŋ e k jɑk bonnɑɑnŋ nɑn bonbik.› »
40021006	K Yiesu puolpoweitieb bɑnle nɑ set din sɑɑn k sɑɑ tun nɑn wɑɑ yet’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
40021007	K b din bɑɑl nɑn bonnɑɑnŋ nɑ nɑn u bik, k tɑn jii b tiɑt k pɑɑn b buɑnɑ pɑɑk k Yiesu jɑk’b.
40021008	K niib nɑ bonciɑnn din lɑt b tiɑt sɑnjouk pɑɑk, k lieb mun cuɑn tiini yiini nɑn tutuut k lɑt sɑnjouk nɑ pɑɑk.
40021009	K nibulciɑɔnŋ nbɑ din gɑl u tuɑnn po nɑn bin nbɑ din wɑɑ u puolpo ji din yikn k yien ɑ: «Hosɑnɑ. Ii piɑk mɑn Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn mɑnŋ. Yennu yetŋɑnm ii be wun nbɑ bɑɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn ni nɑ pɑɑk. Ii wuot mɑn hosɑnɑ sɑnpɑɑpo.»
40021010	Wɑɑ din tɑn kuɑ Selusɑɑlenm yuo nbɑ, k duo mɑnŋ niib kul fiil, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «Ŋmee e nɑ?»
40021011	Ŋɑnn e k nibul nɑ jiin ɑ: «Yiesu, wun nbɑ tie Yennu sɔkni nbɑ nyii Nɑɑsɑɑlet nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni nɑ.»
40021012	K Yiesu din kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k sɑɑ bel nyinn bin nbɑ dɑɑ nɑn bin nbɑ kɔi nɑ kul ɑ, k lɑbl cibn lik-kpentɑ tiebulɑ nɑn ŋmɑnkɔitieb koki k lɑbl cibn cibn,
40021013	ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹N ŋɑɑk nɑ sii tie Yenmiɑlu ŋɑɑk e,› ŋɑɑn yinm e kpint’l k tien nɑn-yukb kinkɑl buol.»
40021014	K juɑni nɑn wɔbi din bɑɑl u buol ni Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k u din te k b kul ɑ pɑɑk.
40021015	Ŋɑɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb nbɑ din lɑ bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ nbɑ k u tun nɑ, k biɑ gbɑt k wɑɑs yikn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k yien ɑ: «Hosɑnɑ. Ii piɑk mɑn Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn nɑ,» k l donn b wutuol.
40021016	K b boi’ɔ ɑ: «A gbɑt bɑɑ yien lin nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ ɑɑ?» K u jiin ɑ: «Nnn, ŋɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹A te k wɑɑs nɑn sɑnpɑnti piɑk’ɑ fɑnu.› I k mi lii ii?»
40021017	Ŋɑnn e k u din nyik’b ŋɑɑn nyii Selusɑɑlenm k sɑɑn Betɑɑni k sɑɑ duɑ. fiigie mɔb
40021018	Lɑɑ din yent k Yiesu nyii lenŋ k ŋmɑt Selusɑɑlenm. K kon sɑɑ suol’ɔ,
40021019	k u lɑ fiigie, k l sie sɑnjokpinŋ. K u sɑɑn k sɑɑ bɑɑl ɑ wun puɑl fiignbɑ, k suɑ siɑl kɑɑ fiigie nɑ pɑɑk, sie fɑɑt kuukuɑ. Ŋɑnn e k u yet tiik nɑ ɑ: «Lɑɑ nyii dinnɑ k jii sɑɑ, ɑ kɑn mi k lon luɑnɑ.» L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni nɑ, k tiik nɑ kuol.
40021020	U puolpoweitieb nɑ nbɑ din lɑ nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k l bɑkt’b, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «L tien nlee k fiigie nɑ tɑɑn kuol yiɑn ɑ nɑ?»
40021021	Ŋɑnn e k u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, l i tie k i mɔk yɑdɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni k k bils, i mun sii tuun nɑn mɑɑ tun tiik nɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e. Ŋɑɑn l k tie nnɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ k i sɑɑ tun. L i tie k i yet juɑl nɑ ɑ wun fikt k sɑɑ bɑɑ mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni, l sɑɑ tun ɑ.
40021022	L i tie k i mɔk yɑdɑ, i sɑɑ lɑ lin nbɑ kul k i boi l po i yenmiɑlu ni wɑɑ.»
40021023	Yiesu nbɑ din sɑɑn k sɑɑ kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k wɑnt niib Yennu mɑɑn yuo nbɑ nɑ, k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn tinŋ mɑnŋ ni sɑɑkɑb bɑɑl u buol ni, k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Yiikuo lɑnn po e k ɑ mɔk k tuun lin nbɑ nɑ kul i? K ŋmee cɑb’ɑ l yiikuo?»
40021024	K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «N mun mɔk buboit k sɑɑ boi’i. L i tie k i fit k jiin, n mun sɑɑ wɑnn’i yiikuo buolu nbɑ k n diɑ k tuun lin nbɑ nɑ:
40021025	Sɑn wun nbɑ dɑɑn wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ, Yennu e cɑb’ɔ l yiikuo ɑmi nisɑɑlk e?» Ŋɑnn e k b ji din fɑɑ b lieb lɑbɑɑl k yien ɑ: «T i yet ɑ Yennu e cɑb’ɔ l yiikuo, u sɑɑ boi’t ɑ k bee te k t k tien u mɑɑn nɑ yɑdɑ?
40021026	K t mun biɑ tiin nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ jɑŋmɑɑni nɑn tin yet ɑ: ‹Niib e cɑb’ɔ l yiikuo,› k mɑɑn suɑ kul tien yɑdɑ nɑn Sɑn set dɑɑn tie Yennu sɔkni e.»
40021027	Ŋɑnn e k b jiin k yet Yiesu ɑ: «T k mi.» K Yiesu mun yet’b ɑ: «Tɔn, n mun kɑn yet’i wun nbɑ cɑb’n l yiikuo k n tuun lin nbɑ nɑ.»
40021028	L puolpo e k Yiesu din boi’b ɑ: «I duki nlee lin nbɑ nɑ po? Jɑsuɑ nnɑ mun din mɔk u wɑɑs bɑnle, k tɑn yet wun nbɑ tie sɑɑkuɑ po nɑ ɑ: ‹N bik, don kpɑɑb nbɑ k n wuu tilonti nbɑ k b yi fiinyɑ nɑ ni k sɑɑ ko dinnɑ,›
40021029	k u yet u bɑɑ ɑ u kɑn do. Ŋɑɑn l puolpo e k u ji tɑn lebt u dudukt k duo.
40021030	Ŋɑnn e k u bɑɑ din nyik’ɔ ŋɑɑn yet u ninjɑ nɑ nɑn wɑɑ bo yet u yuɑlɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k ŋuɑ ŋɑnin sɑk k jiin ɑ: ‹N bɑɑ, min sɑɑ do wɑɑ,› ŋɑɑn k k duo.»
40021031	Yiesu nbɑ din yim’m bɑljouk mɑnŋ k gbenn nɑ, k u ji boi niib nɑ ɑ: «Wɑɑs bɑnle nɑ ni, ŋmee tun u bɑɑ lonm u?» K b jiin ɑ: «Sɑɑkuɑ po nɑ.» K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, lɑnpogɑɑltieb nɑn boncunconɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɔnŋ’i Yennu nɑɑn ni kuɑnu wɑɑ,
40021032	k mɑɑn Sɑn dɑɑn bɑɑl i buol ni k wɑnn’i yɑɑ sii be binbenŋ nbɑ k l gbuot Yennu nunm, ŋɑɑn k i k tien u mɑɑn nɑ yɑdɑ, ŋɑɑn k lɑnpogɑɑltieb nɑn boncunconɑ tien u mɑɑn mɑnŋ yɑdɑ. Yɑɑ lek lɑ lin nbɑ nɑ nbɑ kul puolpo, ŋɑɑn i k mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ k tien mɑɑn mɑnŋ yɑdɑ.»
40021033	K Yiesu biɑ din yet’b ɑ: «Gbiintl mɑn bɑljolieok. Ŋɑɑdɑɑnsuɑ nnɑ e din be k wuu tilonti nbɑ k b yi fiinyɑ nɑ u kpɑɑb ni, ŋɑɑn cɑɑn gungounŋ k lint tiini mɑnŋ, k biɑ gbiil buotuk nbɑ k b tuu sii ŋmɑki tilonti mɑnŋ luɑnɑ nyun lenŋ, k biɑ mɑɑ siɑl k b sii do l pɑɑk k guu kpɑɑb nɑ, ŋɑɑn jii kpɑɑb nɑ k tien kpɑɑlɑ nii ni ɑ bii goli. L i tɑnŋ i jɑnŋ nɑn puɑlu, bin puɑl k tul’ɔ, ŋɑɑn mun tɑn puɑl b yɑl. L puolpo e k u din yɑɑt k sɑɑn digbɑnsiɑl.
40021034	K tiluɑnɑ mɑnŋ punpuɑlyuo tɑn bɑɑl, k ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ nɑ tun u tuontunnɑ, ɑ bin sɑɑn kpɑɑlɑ nɑ buol ni ɑ k sɑɑ gɑɑl u tiluɑnɑ nɑ.
40021035	Ŋɑɑn k kpɑɑlɑ nɑ din suol u tuontunnɑ mɑnŋ, k buo yenɔ bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn kɔt luɑ, ŋɑɑn jɑɑt luɑ nɑ mun tɑnɑ kpii’u.
40021036	Ŋɑnn e k u biɑ ŋɑnm tun tuontunlieb, k b yɑb k gɑl sinsinn yɑb nɑ, k kpɑɑlɑ nɑ biɑ tien’m nnɑ.
40021037	Lin nbɑ nɑ puolpo k u ji tun u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ bijɑ, ŋɑɑn yien ɑ: ‹N mi nɑn b sɑɑ bɑɑk n bijɑ nɑ wɑɑ.›
40021038	Ŋɑɑn kpɑɑlɑ nɑ nbɑ din tun ninbinn k lɑ u bijɑ nɑ k u bɑɑt nɑ, k b yet lieb ɑ: ‹U fɑdiilɔ e nɑ. Ŋɑɑnt tin kpi’u mɑn, ŋɑɑn k fɑɑl nɑ n kpɑnt t yɑl.›
40021039	K b din suol’ɔ k nyii nɑn’ɔ kpɑɑb nɑ kpinŋ po k sɑɑ kpii’u.»
40021040	Yiesu nbɑ yin bɑljouk nɑ k gbenn nɑ k u boi’b ɑ: «L pɑɑk, kpɑdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ i tɑn bɑɑl, u sɑɑ tien kpɑɑlɑ mɑnŋ nlee?»
40021041	Ŋɑnn e k b jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «U sɑɑ kpi kpɑɑyuonɑ mɑnŋ gbenn ɑ, ŋɑɑn biɑ jii u kpɑɑb mɑnŋ k tul lieb nbɑ sɑɑ sɑk kii tun kii tien’ɔ l luɑnɑ l punpuɑlyuo.»
40021042	K Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ k mi lii lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ ɑɑ? L diɑn ɑ: ‹Tɑnn nbɑ k tɑnmɑɑlɑ yet’ɔ nɑ, ŋɑnn e set tien ŋɑɑk nɑ pɑnŋ, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu e tien nnɑ, k l tien’t bɑktnɔunŋ nɑ.› »
40021043	K Yiesu ji yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, Yennu tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl u nɑɑn i buol ni k tul nibuolu nbɑ sɑɑ te k wun di u nɑɑn nyuɑt.
40021044	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tɑn bɑɑ tɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk, u sɑɑ but but e, ŋɑɑn tɑnn mɑnŋ i bɑɑ wun nbɑ pɑɑk, sie k l nɑn’ɔ buk buk nɑn yon nɑ.»
40021045	K Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ nbɑ din gbɑt bɑljokt nɑ k gbenn, k b bɑnn nɑn Yiesu yin bɑljokt nɑ k denn ŋɑnm e.
40021046	K b ji din luon bin suol’ɔ, ŋɑɑn tiin nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn suɑ kul din tien yɑdɑ nɑn u set tie Yennu sɔkni e.
40022001	K Yiesu biɑ din piin k piɑk tien niib mɑnŋ nɑn bɑljokt ɑ:
40022002	«Yennu nɑɑn tie nɑn kpɑnbɑlsuɑ nbɑ din tien siil ɑ wun tien puociɑnu jɑɑnm k tul u bijɑ nɑ e.
40022003	K u din tɑn tun u tuontunnɑ, ɑ bin sɑɑn k yiin niib nbɑ k u dɑɑn yiin’m nɑ, ɑ bin bɑɑl nɑ, ŋɑɑn k b k luon bin bɑɑl.
40022004	K u ŋɑnm tun tuontunlieb k yet’b ɑ: ‹Ii sɑɑ mɑn k yet niib nbɑ k n dɑɑn yiin’m nɑ, ɑ jɑɑnm jiet tien siil ɑ. N ponŋ kpii nɑɑjɑi nɑn bonkobkpɑnmɑ, k l kul tien siil ɑ. Ii sɑɑ nɑ mɑn k tɑn di jɑɑnm mɑnŋ.›
40022005	Ŋɑɑn wɑɑ din poi bin nbɑ mɑnŋ nɑ, b din k gbiint k tul u tuontunnɑ, ŋɑɑn yɑɑt yɑɑt k sɑɑn b tuonɑ ni: k yenɔ duo u kpɑɑb ni, k luɑ mun sɑɑn u bont kɔiu dɑɑk ni.
40022006	Ŋɑɑn k siɑb mun suol u tuontunnɑ nɑ k buo’b k sɑɑ kpii’b.
40022007	Ŋɑnn e k kpɑnbɑl nɑ wutuol din duo bonciɑnn, k u tun u sejenm, k b sɑɑn k sɑɑ kpii nikpiilɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn juo b duo muu.
40022008	L puolpo k kpɑnbɑl nɑ ji din yiin u tuontunnɑ k tɑn yet’b ɑ: ‹Puociɑnu jiet nɑ tien siil ɑ, ŋɑɑn niib nbɑ k n ponŋ dɑɑn dɔnŋ yiin’m nɑ, b ji k ŋɑn nɑn’n.
40022009	L pɑɑk, ii sɑɑ mɑn sɑnjɑlɑ pɑɑk, k sɑɑ yiin bin nbɑ kul k i sɑɑ lɑ’b, ɑ bin bɑɑl nɑ k tɑn di jɑɑnm mɑnŋ.›
40022010	K u tuontunnɑ nɑ nyii k sɑɑn sɑnjɑlɑ pɑɑk, k sɑɑ yiin bin nbɑ kul k b lɑ’b nɑ, nibiit nɑn niŋɑnm, k b bɑɑl tɑn gbie puociɑnu ŋɑɑk kenken.
40022011	«Tɔn, k kpɑnbɑl nɑ tɑn kuɑ ɑ wun gɔn puociɑnu niib mɑnŋ, k tɑn got lɑ jɑsuɑ nnɑ k u fuo b sinsuuk ni k k liɑ puociɑnu jɑɑnm tiɑt.
40022012	K kpɑnbɑl nɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: ‹N yuɑk, ɑ tien nlee k tɑn kuɑ nnɑ ŋɑɑn k k liɑ puociɑnu jɑɑnm nɑ tiɑt i?› K juɑ nɑ k jiin siɑl.
40022013	K kpɑnbɑl nɑ din yet u ŋɑɑjɑb nɑ: ‹Loln mɑn u nii nɑn u tɑɑ, k nyi sɑɑ lu’u nɑn-yel po bunbɔnn ni. Lenŋ e wɑɑ k niib sii mɔ fɑbn k nyiitl nyɑnɑ.› »
40022014	Yiesu din yin bɑljouk mɑnŋ k juont, k yet ɑ: «Yennu yiin niib bonciɑnn e, ŋɑɑn u tɑn sɑɑ gɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ e.»
40022015	K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ din sɑɑn k sɑɑ lol suol bɑɑ sɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ k lɑ Yiesu mɔbonkpetl.
40022016	Ŋɑnn e k b din tun b puolpoweitieb nɑn kpɑnbɑl Heluod puolpo juɑmu Yiesu buol ni, k b din boi’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, t mi nɑn ɑ tie bɑlmɔnpɑklɔ e, k wɑnt niib Yennu sɔnu nɑn bɑlmɔni, ŋɑɑn k k fiin niib po, k mɑɑn ɑ bɑkɑ kɑɑ nɑn nisɑɑlk nbɑ tie wun nbɑ po.
40022017	L pɑɑk, yet’t, ɑ duki nlee k jii jiin lɑnpo pɑnu po? T senni cɑb’t nɑn tii pɑ lɑnpo kii tien Luonm tinŋ kpɑnbɑl Sesɑɑl, ɑmi t dɑɑ pɑ?»
40022018	K Yiesu din mi b dudukbiit mɑnŋ. L pɑɑk, k u din jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Yinm kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nɑ, bee k i luon k yin pii’n bɑluk u?
40022019	Wɑnt’n mɑn likbinn nbɑ k t sɑɑ jii pɑ lɑnpo mɑnŋ.» K b jii likbinn k tul’ɔ.
40022020	K u boi’b ɑ: «Ŋmee nɑɑɔnŋ nɑn sɑnn e be likbinn nɑ pɑɑk i?»
40022021	K b jiin ɑ: «Sesɑɑl nɑ yɑl e.» K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Tɔn, i yenn i pɑ mɑn kii tien Sesɑɑl lin nbɑ tie u yɑl, ŋɑɑn kii mun i biɑ pɑ kii tien Yennu lin nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl.»
40022022	Bɑɑ gbɑt lin nbɑ nɑ k gbenn k l ji bɑkt’b, k b siet nyii, ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ.
40022023	L dɑɑl mɑnŋ k Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ siɑb din bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni. (Ŋɑnm e din tuu yɑɑ ɑ kpienm tɑn kɑn fiil kuun ni.)
40022024	K b din yet Yiesu ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, Muois din wɑnn nɑn l i tie k juɑ kuɑn u puo ŋɑɑn kpo k k mɑl bik, ɑ u bɑɑ bik n fɑɑl u pɑkuɑk mɑnŋ k mɑl wɑɑs tul kpiemɔ nɑ.
40022025	K jɑb bɑnlole nbɑ tie bɑɑnuɑk din be duo nɑ ni, k sɑɑkuɑ po tɑn kuɑn puo ŋɑɑn kpo k k mɑl bik, k wun nbɑ pɑɑ u pɑɑk fɑɑl puo nɑ.
40022026	Nnɑ e k l jii nnɑ k tɑn bɑɑl wun nbɑ pukn bɑnle nɑ ni, nɑn wun nbɑ pukn bɑntɑ nɑ ni, k sɑɑ gbenn jɑb bɑnlole mɑnŋ kul pɑɑk.
40022027	L puolpo k puo nɑ mun din tɑn juont k kpo.
40022028	L pɑɑk, l i tie k kpienm fiilu dɑɑl tɑn bɑɑl, b ŋmee tɑn sii yen puo mɑnŋ i? K mɑɑn b kul ɑ din kuɑn’ɔ wɑɑ.»
40022029	K Yiesu din jiin k yet’b ɑ: «I bot ɑ, k mɑɑn i k mi Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk k biɑ k mi wɑɑ mɔk yiikuo biɑnŋ nbɑ,
40022030	k mɑɑn kpienm i tɑnŋ i fiil kuun ni, b tɑn sii tie nɑn mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ e. Puokuɑnt nɑn jɑkunt tɑn sii kɑɑ.
40022031	Gotl, k jii jiin kpienm fiilu po, i k mi lii lin nbɑ k Yennu pɑk k yet’i u lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ ɑɑ?
40022032	U din yet ɑ: ‹Min e tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm Yennu, nɑn Isɑɑk Yennu, nɑn Sɑɑkɔb Yennu.› Yennu k tie kpienm Yennu kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u tie fuotb Yennu e.»
40022033	Niib nɑ nbɑ din gbɑt u wɑnnu mɑnŋ k l bɑkt’b.
40022034	Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ nbɑ din gbɑt ɑ Yiesu mɑɑn nɑ nyɑnn Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ nɑ, k b tɑɑn lieb k bɑɑl.
40022035	K b ni yenɔ wun nbɑ din tie senniwɑntuɑ boi Yiesu buboit ɑ wun jɑnm’ɔ, ɑ:
40022036	«Wɑntuɑ, sennlɑnu po e tie sennjɑɑnn k gɑl sennliɑ nɑ kul ii?»
40022037	K Yiesu jiin’ɔ ɑ: «‹Ii luon Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu. Kii mɑntk kii luon’ɔ nɑn ɑ pɑl kul ɑ, nɑn ɑ siek kul ɑ, nɑn ɑ dudukt kul ɑ.›
40022038	Sennu mɑnŋ tie sennjɑɑnn e k biɑ tie sinsinn sennu.
40022039	Lin nbɑ pukn ŋɑnle ni k kpɑɑ bɑlkpɑnn mun biɑ tie nnɑ e: ‹Ii luon ɑ luɑ nɑn fɑɑ luon ɑ mɔnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.›
40022040	Muois senni nɑ kul ɑ, nɑn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ wɑnnu nɑ kul ɑ gɑɑ senni ŋɑnle nɑ pɑɑk e.»
40022041	Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ nbɑ din lɑkn lieb yuo nbɑ k Yiesu boi’b ɑ:
40022042	«I dukn nlee k jii jiin Klistu nɑ po? U tie ŋmee yɑɑbuonn e?» K b jiin ɑ: «U tie Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn e.»
40022043	K u ji boi’b ɑ: «K bee k Dɑɑfiid din yiin’ɔ ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ?› K mɑɑn Foŋɑnm nbɑ din gbie nɑn Dɑɑfiid nɑ k u yet ɑ:
40022044	‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu din yet n Yonmdɑɑnɔ ɑ Kɑln n niidiitu po mɔk mɔk nɑn mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ te fɑn ŋmɑɑ ɑ dɑtɑi ɑ tɑɑpɑɔnŋ ni.›
40022045	L pɑɑk, Dɑɑfiid nbɑ din yiin Klistu ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ,› k nlee k Klistu tie ŋuɑ Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn i?»
40022046	K suɑ din k fit jiin u buboit mɑnŋ. L pɑɑk, lɑɑ din nyii l dɑɑl mɑnŋ k jii sɑɑ, suɑ ji din k mɔk pɑl k sɑɑ boi Yiesu buboisiɑt jik
40023001	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu din piin k piɑk tien nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb ɑ:
40023002	«Senni wɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ e k b tul’b yiikuo nɑn bii wɑnt Muois senni nɑ pɑɑk.
40023003	L pɑɑk, l ŋɑn k i sɑɑk kii wɑɑ bɑɑ wɑnt’i lin nbɑ nɑ kul ɑ, ŋɑɑn k ii mi mɑn k yin gɑɑl b binbenŋ, k mɑɑn b k tuun bɑɑ wɑnt lin nbɑ mɑnŋ.
40023004	B jint niib jik-kpiɑtɑ nbɑ pɑɑl nɑn bin jii, ŋɑɑn kɑn sɑk k bin jii b niibil k bɑbl suɑ k wun jii.
40023005	Lin nbɑ kul k b tuun nɑ, b tuun ɑ niib n lɑ’b e. B tuu nyinn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni kinkɑlnboyennɑ e, k diɑn, k tien tien kunkoni ni, k lol lol b yulɑ nɑn b kpinkpɑnt pɑɑk. B biɑ tuu te k bin nyɑl b liɑtbɑɑnt mɔgbɑnɑ nɑn l kpinkpɑnt k l fɔk fɔk, k biɑ yɑln yɑln e.
40023006	B i sɑɑn jɑɑnm ni, b tuu luon bii kɑl yudɑnm kinkɑɑni pɑɑk. B i kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, b biɑ luon nijɑɑnɑ kɑɑni boɑ e.
40023007	B biɑ tuu luon k niib n fuont’b nɑn bulcint e dɑi ni, kii yi’b ɑ: ‹Wɑntieb.›
40023008	Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin, i dɑɑ te k b yi’i ‹Wɑntuɑ›, k mɑɑn i kul ɑ tie nɑɑtɑɑnn e nɑn lieb, k mɔk i Wɑntuɑ yenɔ kuɑ.
40023009	I dɑɑ yi suɑ i ‹Bɑɑ› tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k mɑɑn i mɔk Bɑɑ yenɔ kuɑ e. Ŋuɑ e tie Yennu wun nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni.
40023010	I biɑ dɑɑ te k niib yi’i b ‹Yonmdɑnm›, k mɑɑn i mɔk Yonmdɑɑnɔ yenɔ kuɑ e. Ŋuɑ e tie Klistu.
40023011	Wun nbɑ tie nijɑɑnn i ni, wun tien u mɔnŋ i kul ɑ tuontunnɔ.
40023012	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ dont u mɔnŋ, Yennu tɑn sɑɑ sikn’ɔ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ siknt u mɔnŋ, Yennu e tɑn sɑɑ donn’ɔ.»
40023013	K Yiesu biɑ din yet ɑ: «Yinm senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nbɑ tie kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nɑ, l sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn yinm e luon Yennu nɑɑn tɑnmɔb ɑ niib dɑɑ kuɑ. I mɔnŋ mɔnŋ kɑn kuɑ, ŋɑɑn dɔk bin nbɑ luon bin kuɑ tɑnmɔb nɑ.
40023014	«Yinm senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nbɑ tie kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nɑ, l sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn i ŋmɑb pɑkɔi, k mei Yennu k wei k kpɑnn nɑn i tie yentinnɑ e. L pɑɑk, i tubdɑtu tɑn sii bi bonciɑnn.
40023015	«Yinm senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nbɑ tie kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nɑ, l sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn i kuɑ bulgbetɑ nɑn ŋɑlnt k sonm mɔkgbenŋɑ pɑɑk k puotl kpeni k sɑɑ digbɑnbɑnfɔkɑ ni, k luon wun nbɑ sɑɑ kpint u binbenŋ kii wɑɑ i puolpo e, k l i tie k i tɑn lɑ suɑ k u wɑɑ’i ni, i tuu te k u biit nbɑ jikt’ɔ sɑɑ Sɑɑtɑn muu ni nɑ n ŋɑnm pukn tɑɑl munle e nɑn i yɑl nɑ.
40023016	«Yinm nbɑ tie juɑni ŋɑɑn dɑɑl lieb nɑ, l sii bi i pɑɑk. I wɑnt niib nɑ ɑ: ‹Suɑ i pol Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk, l kɑɑ biit, ɑ ŋɑɑn l i tie k suɑ pol likli nbɑ be dieok mɑnŋ ni nɑ, ɑ sie k u gbien wɑɑ pol biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.›
40023017	Yinm juɑni nbɑ k mɔk yɑn nɑ, bonɑ ŋɑnle nɑ ni, lɑnn po e kpɑɑ bɑlkpɑnn, likli nɑ ɑmi Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nbɑ te k likli nɑ tie Yennu yɑl nɑ?
40023018	K i biɑ yet ɑ: ‹L i tie k suɑ pol mɑnnu binbintl, l kɑɑ biit, ɑ ŋɑɑn l i tie k suɑ pol mɑnnu bonkobuk nbɑ pɑɑ binbintl nɑ pɑɑk nɑ, sie k u gbien wɑɑ pol biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.›
40023019	I set tie juɑni e nɑn bɑlmɔni. Bonɑ ŋɑnle nɑ ni, lɑnn po e kpɑɑ bɑlkpɑnn, mɑnnu bonkobuk nɑ ɑmi binbintl nbɑ te k l tie Yennu yɑl nɑ?
40023020	L pɑɑk, l i tie k suɑ pol mɑnnu binbintl, l wɑnt nɑn u pol binbintl nɑ nɑn lin nbɑ kul pɑɑ l pɑɑk nɑ e mun.
40023021	L i tie k suɑ biɑ pol Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk, l wɑnt nɑn u pol dieok mɑnŋ nɑn Yennu nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ e mun.
40023022	L i biɑ tie k suɑ pol Yendɔunŋ, u pol Yennu nɑɑngbounŋ nɑn wun nbɑ kɑl l pɑɑk mɑnŋ e.
40023023	«Yinm senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nbɑ tie kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nɑ, l sii bi i pɑɑk. I jikt bɑɑli nɑn bukunŋ nɑn nɑli nɑn l bonliɑ piik nuɑk ni yenn kuɑ k tien Yennu, ŋɑɑn nyik lin nbɑ tie bɑlkpɑnɑ u senni ni. Ŋɑnn e tie bɑlbunu nbɑ tuok nɑn ninbɑtinu nɑn Yennu senni wɑɑnu nɑn bɑlmɔni. Lin nbɑ nɑ nbɑ e bo ŋɑn nɑn yii tuun, k dɑɑ nyikt l yenn-nbɑ tumu.
40023024	Yinm juɑni nbɑ dɑɑl lieb nɑ, i tuu lot nɑɑyun-yuolk nyun ni k lu e, ŋɑɑn nɑk yuyouk nɑn nyun.
40023025	«Yinm senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nbɑ tie kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nɑ, l sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn i soki kɔp nɑn senŋ puolpo e, ŋɑɑn k nuɑk ni gbie nɑn nɑn-yuk nɑn jɑwuuk.
40023026	Yinm Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nbɑ tie juɑni nɑ, sokt mɑn kɔp nɑn senŋ nɔi ni sinsinn, k l puolpo n fit nyi.
40023027	«Yinm senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nbɑ tie kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nɑ, l sii bi i pɑɑk. I tie nɑn kɑɑt nbɑ k b mɑɑ k pent senn, k l puolpo fɑn, ŋɑɑn k l nuɑk ni gbie nɑn kpɑbɑ nɑn pɔiu nɑ e.
40023028	Nnɑ e k niib goli i nɑn-yel po k i fɑn ŋɑɑn i pɑlɑ ni gbie nɑn fɑi nɑn biit.»
40023029	«Yinm senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nbɑ tie kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nɑ, l sii bi i pɑɑk. I mɑɑ Yennu sɔkniinbɑ kɑɑt, k jɑb’b, k sent, k l tie lin nbɑ sɑɑ tiɑl niib niŋɑnm kuun po,
40023030	ŋɑɑn yien ɑ: ‹T ii dinŋ ii bo i be t yejɑnm yuo, t din bo kɑn tun bɑɑ din tun lin nbɑ k kpii Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nɑ.›
40023031	L pɑɑk, lin nbɑ nɑ wɑnt nɑn i set sɑk nɑn i tie bin nbɑ din kpii Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nɑ yɑɑbuonɑ e.
40023032	L pɑɑk, i yejɑnm nbɑ din piin k tun biit biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, tontl mɑn.
40023033	Yinm wɑi. Yinm wɑɑlɑbli nɑ, nlee k i tɑn sɑɑ nyi tubdɑtu muu nbɑ kɑn mi kpien nɑ ni?
40023034	L pɑɑk te k n yien’i nɑ, n tɑn sɑɑ tun Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nɑn yɑndɑnm nɑn wɑntieb i buol ni, ŋɑɑn i tɑn sɑɑ kpi b siɑb e, k kpɑɑ siɑb kuun dɑpunpunn pɑɑk, k buo siɑb Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, k biɑ wei tɔki b tɑɑ k nyi doyenu ni k tuɑtl doleu ni.
40023035	L pɑɑk, bɑɑ din kpii niŋɑnm nbɑ nɑ kul ɑ tubdɑtu be i yulɑ pɑɑk, lɑɑ nyii nipiemɔ Abel pɑɑk, k sɑɑ tuu Bɑɑlɑɑsi bijɑ Sɑɑkɑɑli pɑɑk, wun nbɑ k b din kpii’u Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑn mɑnnu binbintl sinsuuk ni nɑ.
40023036	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ tubdɑtu biit mɑnŋ kul pɑɑk e.»
40023037	«Nbɑɑyuoo, Selusɑɑlenm tieb, yinm nbɑ kpi Yennu sɔkniinbɑ, k biɑ jɑɑt u tuomiinbɑ nbɑ k u tun’m i buol ni nɑ tɑnɑ, biknu biknu tɑɑl munŋɑ e k n gbɑɑ mɑɑ n tikl’i yonm nɑn kolk nbɑ tuu tikl u kobis u kpinkpɑnt ni nɑ, k i k sɑk.
40023038	Gotl mɑn, Yennu nyik i jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ e nɑ, k l sɑɑ nyint ŋɑyɑnn.
40023039	N yien’i e, lɑɑ nyii dinnɑ k jii sɑɑ i kɑn mi k lɑn’n k sɑɑ tuu dɑɑl nbɑ k i tɑn sɑɑ yet ɑ: ‹Yennu yetŋɑnm ii be wun nbɑ bɑɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn ni nɑ pɑɑk.› »
40024001	Yiesu nbɑ din nyii Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k sɑɑ nɑ, k u puolpoweitieb din bɑɑl u buol ni k tɑn wɑnt’ɔ jɑɑnti ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ diet.
40024002	Ŋɑnn e k u boi’b ɑ: «I lɑ lin nbɑ nɑ nbɑ kul ɑɑ? Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, b tɑn sɑɑ tut l kul, k lu tinŋ ni wɑɑ, k l tɑnn yenn kuɑ tɑn kɑn biɑl k pɑɑ liel pɑɑk.»
40024003	Yiesu nbɑ din tɑn sɑɑn k sɑɑ kɑl jɑgbɑɑk nbɑ k b yi’l Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk nɑ pɑɑk nɑ, k u puolpoweitieb tɑn bɑɑl u buol ni, b kuukuɑ, k boi’ɔ ɑ: «Yet’t, yuo nbɑ k nɑ kul ɑ tɑn sii tie. Bee tɑn sii tie ɑ bɑɑlu nyinn nɑn dulnyɑ gbennu nyinn i?»
40024004	K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Ii mi mɑn k suɑ n tɑn kpɑnn’i,
40024005	k mɑɑn niib bonciɑnn tɑn sɑɑ jii n sɑnn e k bɑɑl k yien ɑ ŋɑnm e tie Klistu nɑ, k kpɑnn niib bonciɑnn.
40024006	I tɑn sɑɑ gbɑt tɔb fuut i kuɑnn ni, nɑn l lɑbɑɑl bɑnfɔkl, ŋɑɑn i dɑɑ jie, k mɑɑn l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ kul n tun, ŋɑɑn l k wɑnt nɑn dulnyɑ gbennu bɑɑl e nɑ.
40024007	Nibuolu nɑn nibuolu tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn lieb, k kpɑnbɑlɑ nɑn kpɑnbɑlɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ tuok k kɔn nɑn lieb. K kon nɑn tinŋ jijekt tɑn sii be lokɑ kul po.
40024008	Lin nbɑ nɑ nbɑ kul tɑn sii tie nɑn mɑtyiɑlu pinpiik nɑ e.
40024009	«L yuo mɑnŋ k b tɑn sɑɑ suol’i k din’i fɑlɑ biɑk, k kpi’i k buolu kul tɑn sii nɑn’i k mɑɑn yɑɑ wɑɑ’n nɑ pɑɑk.
40024010	L yuo mɑnŋ, niib bonciɑnn tɑn sɑɑ yet n weiu, k biɑ kuɑt lieb, k biɑ nɑn lieb.
40024011	K fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi k kpɑnn niib bonciɑnn.
40024012	Biit nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ mɑntk yɑbt tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑ pɑɑk, k niib bonciɑnn lonm tɑn sɑɑ mɑɑk.
40024013	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tɑn gubn nɑn fɑlɑ yuo nɑ juontu tɑn sɑɑ lɑ fielu wɑɑ.
40024014	K b tɑn sɑɑ muɑnt Yennu nɑɑn lɑbɑmɑnn muɑnti nɑ tingbounŋ nɑ kul po, ɑ lin tien siɑlɑ k tul niib kul, k dulnyɑ gbennu n yen fit bɑɑl.»
40024015	«I tɑn sɑɑ lɑ bonbilɑnkɑnt nbɑ k Yennu sɔkni Dɑniel din yet l po nɑ, k l tɑn sii sie Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni.» (Wun nbɑ kul tɑn lii diɑni nɑ, wun bɑnn lɑɑ wɑnt lin nbɑ.)
40024016	«L yuo mɑnŋ, bin nbɑ tɑn be Suude tinŋ ni, bin ciɑl kii do juɑt,
40024017	k wun nbɑ tɑn be u dituɑtuk pɑɑk, u dɑɑ kuɑ u dieok ni ɑ wun sɑɑ jii u siɑl,
40024018	k wun nbɑ tɑn be u kpɑɑb ni, u dɑɑ ŋmɑt ɑ wun sɑɑ jii u tiɑɔk.
40024019	L yuo mɑnŋ, podɑnm nɑn bin nbɑ diɑ wɑlɑi tɑn sɑɑ di fɑlɑ bonciɑnn.
40024020	Ii mei mɑn Yennu k u dɑɑ te k fɑlɑ nɑ bɑɑt wonfufuk yuo, ɑmi Fuondɑɑl.
40024021	K mɑɑn l yuo mɑnŋ, fɑlciɑɔnŋ sii be. Yennu nbɑ nɑn dulnyɑ wɑɑ nɑn dinnɑ, l fɑlɑ buolu dɑɑ k mi bɑɑl. L buolu mun biɑ ji kɑn mi k bɑɑl.
40024022	Yennu i tɑnŋ i kii wɑt dɑɑ mɑnŋ yɑbnt, suɑ tɑn kɑn biɑl, ŋɑɑn u nigɑnnkɑb pɑɑk k u tɑn sɑɑ wɑt dɑɑ mɑnŋ yɑbnt.
40024023	«L yuo mɑnŋ, suɑ i tɑnŋ i yet’i ɑ: ‹Gotl mɑn, Klistu be nnɑ,› ɑmi: ‹U be nɑ wɑɑ,› i dɑɑ tie’u yɑdɑ,
40024024	k mɑɑn l yuo mɑnŋ, fɑɑk Klistunbɑ nɑn fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi k tuun nyinɑ nɑn bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ ɑ bin kpɑnn niib. K l i tɑnŋ i fit, b tɑn sɑɑ kpɑnn Yennu nigɑnnkɑb tiɑɔnŋ ɑ.
40024025	Gbiintl mɑn, n ponŋ dɔnŋ yet’i e wɑɑ, k yuo mɑnŋ dɑɑ k bɑɑl.
40024026	«L pɑɑk, b i tɑnŋ i yet’i ɑ: ‹Gotl mɑn, u be muuk ni,› i dɑɑ sɑɑ, ɑmi b i yet’i ɑ: ‹Gotl mɑn, u be dieok ni,› i dɑɑ tie yɑdɑ,
40024027	k mɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ bɑɑlu tɑn sii tie nɑn sɑɑk nbɑ tuu nyiknt k nyi yendopo k sɑɑ sik yenbɑɑpo nɑ e.
40024028	«Siɑn nbɑ k bonkpienn be, lenŋ e k juut tiki.»
40024029	«Fɑlɑ nɑ puolpo k yennu tɑn sɑɑ bɔnn, k ŋmɑɑlk ji kɑn yent, k ŋmɑɑbilɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi sɑnpɑɑpo k bɑɑ, k lin nbɑ kul be sɑnpɑɑpo tɑn sɑɑ dɑnm k ŋmɑt ŋmɑt.
40024030	L yuo mɑnŋ k niib tɑn sɑɑ lɑ Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nyinn sɑnpɑɑpo, k nibuolu buolu nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ kul tɑn sii fɑbn, k ji lɑ Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k u be sɑnpɑgbɑnɑ ni k siik nɑn yiikuo nɑn yentsɑɑkɑl.
40024031	Kɑtkɑɑk tɑn sɑɑ bui, k wun tun u mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ k bin sɑɑn k sɑɑ tikl u nigɑnnkɑb nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ lokɑ ŋɑnnɑ nɑ kul po k bɑɑl.» Fiigie nyinn lɑbɑɑl
40024032	«I jii fiigie k tumi yɑn mɑn. Yɑɑ tuu lɑ k tiik mɑnŋ bintl yuo nbɑ, i ji tuu bɑnn nɑn siɑɔk pel e nɑ.
40024033	Nnɑ e mun, yuo nbɑ k i tɑn lɑɑt k lin nbɑ nɑ nbɑ kul tuun, yin bɑnn nɑn lin nbɑ k n piɑk l po nɑ pel e nɑ.
40024034	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ kɑn kpo k gbenn kɑɑ wɑɑ, k lin nbɑ nɑ kul n tun.
40024035	Sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ tɑn sɑɑ bot ɑ, ŋɑɑn n mɑɑn ŋɑnin kɑn mi k bot fɑb ɑ.»
40024036	«Suɑ k mi dɑɑl mɑnŋ ɑmi yuo nbɑ k l kul sɑɑ tien. L sɑnpɑɑpo mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ, ɑmi Bijɑ mɔnŋ k mi, sie Bɑɑ kuukuɑ e mi.
40024037	Lɑɑ din tien biɑnŋ nbɑ Noe yuo nɑ, l mun biɑ tɑn sii tie nnɑ e Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ jenu yuo.
40024038	Noe yuo mɑnŋ, yuo nbɑ k nyunciɑɔnŋ din dɑɑ k bɑɑl, k niib din di jiet k nyu, k kuɑnt puob, k jikt b wɑɑs k tien’m jɑb, k tɑn tuu dɑɑl nbɑ k Noe din kuɑ ŋɑlngbenŋl ni.
40024039	K niib mɑnŋ din biɑ dɑɑ k bɑnn lin nbɑ tuun, k tɑn tuu dɑɑl nbɑ k nyunsɑɑkɑn din bɑɑl k tɑn dii b kul sɑɑk ɑ. L biɑ tɑn sii tie nnɑ e yuo nbɑ k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tɑn sɑɑ jen.
40024040	L dɑɑl mɑnŋ, jɑb bɑnle tɑn sii buɑ kpɑɑb ni k ko, k b tɑn sɑɑ jii yenɔ ŋɑɑn nyik luɑ.
40024041	Puob bɑnle tɑn sii lɑkn buɑ nɑɑn dii, k b tɑn sɑɑ jii yenɔ ŋɑɑn nyik luɑ.
40024042	«L pɑɑk, i cekn i mɔnŋ pɑɑk mɑn, k mɑɑn i k mi dɑɑl nbɑ k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑɑ jen.
40024043	Ŋɑɑn bɑnt mɑn nɑn l i tie k ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ ponŋ mi yuo nbɑ k nɑn-yukɔ yɑɑ wun bɑɑl u ŋɑɑk ni nyiɑɔk, u sii kɑl e k guu. U kɑn sɑk k nɑn-yukɔ n tɑn kuɑ k jɑn’ɔ.
40024044	L pɑɑk, l ŋɑn k i mun n tien siil yuo kul ɑ, k mɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mun biɑ tɑn sɑɑ jen yuo nbɑ k i k duki u jenu nɑ po nɑ e.
40024045	«Tuontunlɑnɔ e tie yɑndɑɑnɔ k tuun u Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ wɑnt’ɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ? Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ k u Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑɑ tien’ɔ tuontunnɑ yudɑɑnɔ ɑ wuuu goli u tuontunlieb, kii tien’m mɑnn nɑn l sɔnu.
40024046	L i tie k u Yonmdɑɑnɔ tɑn kpen k lɑ k u tuun nnɑ, pɑlpienn sii tie tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ yɑl e.
40024047	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ sɑɑ jii u mɔktuk kul k tien tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ nuu ni, ɑ wuu goli.
40024048	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ tie tuontun-yuonn k dukn u pɑl ni ɑ, n Yonmdɑɑnɔ kɑn kpen yiɑn,
40024049	ŋɑɑn piin k buo u tuontunlieb, k ŋuɑ nɑn dɑnyuulɑ biɑ lɑkn k nyu k di,
40024050	Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ tɑn sɑɑ kpen dɑɑl nbɑ k u ŋɑɑ u kpenu tɑmɑ e, nɑn yuo nbɑ k u k mi.
40024051	Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ sɑɑ dɑt u tubl bonbiil, k tien’ɔ nɑn bɑɑ tuu tien kpinkpɑnni dɑnm biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Lenŋ mɑnŋ e k niib tɑn sii fɑbn mɔ k nyiitl nyɑnɑ.»
40025001	«Yennu nɑɑn tɑn sii tie nɑn sɑpɑɑnm piik nbɑ din jii b fitɑ k sɑɑ ɑ bin sɑɑ tuok puoyuokl sɔlɔ nɑ e.
40025002	Sɑpɑɑnm mɑnŋ ni bɑnŋmu din tie jɑtt e, k bɑnŋmu mun din tie subndɑnm.
40025003	Sɑpɑɑnjɑtɑ nɑ din jii b fitɑ, ŋɑɑn k jii kpɑn k guun b mɔnŋ,
40025004	ŋɑɑn k sɑpɑɑnsubndɑnm nɑ ŋɑnin din jii kpɑn k liɑk liɑk sɑlenɑ ni k diɑ pukn b fitɑ po.
40025005	Puoyuokl sɔlɔ mɑnŋ din k bɑɑl yiɑn, k guɑn tɑn suol sɑpɑɑnm nɑ kul ɑ, k b guɑn.
40025006	«K tɑnsuuni k b tɑn gbɑt wuyikinŋ ɑ: ‹Gotl, puoyuokl sɔlɔ nɑ e bɑɑt nɑ. Nyin mɑn k tin tuok’ɔ mɑn.›
40025007	K sɑpɑɑnm piik nɑ kul ɑ fiil k ŋɑk ŋɑk b fitɑ nɑ.
40025008	Ŋɑnn e k sɑpɑɑnjɑtɑ nɑ miɑl subndɑnm nɑ ɑ: ‹I kɑn tul’t i kpɑn nɑ wɑɑn ii? K mɑɑn t fitɑ nɑ luon lin kpien e.›
40025009	K subndɑnm nɑ jiin ɑ: ‹Aɑi, t yɑlɑ mun kɑn jɑnŋ tinm nɑn yinm. Ii sɑɑ mɑn bin nbɑ kɔi kpɑn buol ni, k sɑɑ dɑɑ i mɔnŋ yɑlɑ.›
40025010	Sɑpɑɑnjɑtɑ nɑ nbɑ din yɑɑt k sɑɑn ɑ bin sɑɑ dɑɑ kpɑn yuo nbɑ, k puoyuokl sɔlɔ nɑ dɔkt. Subndɑnm bɑnŋmu nɑ nbɑ din tien siil nɑ din wei puoyuokl sɔlɔ mɑnŋ e, k sɑɑn puociɑnu ŋɑɑk nɑ ni k kuɑ dieok ni, ŋɑɑn k b luon gɑnn k kpɑl.
40025011	«L puolpo k sɑpɑɑnjɑtɑ nɑ nbɑ din tɑn jen yuo nbɑ, k b bɑɑl k tɑn sie tɑnmɔb nɑ buol k yi ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ, Yonmdɑɑnɔ, luotl gɑnn k tin kuɑ.›
40025012	Ŋɑɑn puoyuokl sɔlɔ nɑ jiin k yet’b ɑ: ‹Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, n k mi’i ni.› »
40025013	K Yiesu biɑ din yet’b ɑ: «Ii mi mɑn, k mɑɑn i k mi l dɑɑl ɑmi l yuo.»
40025014	«Yennu nɑɑn lɑbɑɑl biɑ tɑn sii tie nɑn ŋɑɑdɑɑnsuɑ nbɑ din lol ɑ wun sɑɑn sɔnu lɑbɑɑl nɑ e, k din yiin u tuontunnɑ k tɑn tien u mɔktuk b nii ni nɑ.
40025015	U din tul sinsinn yuɑ nɑ likli bonciɑnn, tɑɑlɑnnbɑ ŋɑnŋmu, k tul wun nbɑ pɑɑ nɑ likli k l yɑb, tɑɑlɑnnbɑ ŋɑnle, k tul wun nbɑ juont nɑ tɑɑlɑn yenn. U din tul suɑ kul nɑn wɑɑ mi l dɑɑnɔ kotl nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ e, ŋɑɑn yɑɑt k sɑɑn.
40025016	K wun nbɑ din gɑɑl tɑɑlɑnnbɑ ŋɑnŋmu nɑ, nyii nɑn u likli yiɑn ɑ, k piin kpinkpounŋ, k lɑ nyuɑt tɑɑlɑnnbɑ ŋɑnŋmu k pukn l pɑɑk biɑk.
40025017	Nnɑ e k wun nbɑ mun biɑ din gɑɑl tɑɑlɑnnbɑ ŋɑnle nɑ, mun din nyii k kpent k lɑ nyuɑt tɑɑlɑnnbɑ ŋɑnle k pukn l pɑɑk.
40025018	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ din gɑɑl tɑɑlɑn yenn nɑ ŋɑnin din nyii e, k gbiil buotuk, k pii u Yonmdɑɑnɔ likli nɑ lenŋ.
40025019	«L din wei bonciɑnn, k ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ din tɑn jen, k yiin u tuontunnɑ nɑ, ɑ wun kɑn b likli mɑnŋ, k lɑ bɑɑ lɑ nyuɑt biɑnŋ nbɑ.
40025020	K wun nbɑ din gɑɑl tɑɑlɑnnbɑ ŋɑnŋmu nɑ nbɑ kuɑ yuo nbɑ, k u jii tɑɑlɑnnbɑ ŋɑnŋmu liel nɑ k pukn tul u Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ din tul’n tɑɑlɑnnbɑ ŋɑnŋmu e, ŋɑɑn gotl n mun biɑ lɑ nyuɑt tɑɑlɑnnbɑ ŋɑnŋmu.›
40025021	K u Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Nfɑɑn, ɑ tie tuontunŋɑnɔ e, k biɑ tuun fɑnu. Fɑɑ diɑ wɑɑnm-nnɑ fɑnu biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l pɑɑk, n sɑɑ jii sɑɑn e wɑɑ k tien ɑ nuu ni. Pɑlpienn nbɑ k n mɔk nɑ, l ji tie min nɑn fin yɑl e.›
40025022	«K wun nbɑ mun din gɑɑl tɑɑlɑnnbɑ ŋɑnle nɑ kuɑ k bɑɑl u Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ buol, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ, gotl, ɑ din tul’n tɑɑlɑnnbɑ ŋɑnle e, ŋɑɑn n mun biɑ kpent k lɑ nyuɑt tɑɑlɑnnbɑ ŋɑnle.›
40025023	K u Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Nfɑɑn, ɑ tie tuontunŋɑnɔ e, k biɑ tuun fɑnu. Fɑɑ diɑ wɑɑnm-nnɑ fɑnu biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l pɑɑk, n sɑɑ jii sɑɑn e wɑɑ, k tien ɑ nuu ni. Pɑlpienn nbɑ k n mɔk nɑ, l ji tie min nɑn fin yɑl e.›
40025024	«Ŋɑnn e k wun nbɑ mun din gɑɑl tɑɑlɑn yenn nɑ ŋɑnin kuɑ k bɑɑl u Yonmdɑɑnɔ buol k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ, n mi nɑn ɑ tie pɑɑlɔ e. Siɑn nbɑ k ɑ lek k bul, ŋɑɑn fin ŋɑnin tuu jɑɑn lenŋ e.
40025025	L pɑɑk, min dɑɑn tiin’ɑ jɑŋmɑɑni e, k jii ɑ tɑɑlɑn yenn nɑ k gbiil k pii tinŋ ni. L pɑɑk, ŋɑnn e nɑ. Gɑɑt ɑ bont.›
40025026	«Ŋɑnn e k u Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Fin tuontun-yuonn nɑ, ɑ tie gbɑn-nyɑkdɑɑnɔ e. A mi nɑn n tie pɑɑlɔ e, k biɑ mi nɑn n jɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k n k bul e,
40025027	k bee k ɑ din k jii n likli mɑnŋ k kuɑn bɑnŋ ni? Mɑɑ bo tɑn jen nɑ n bo sɑɑ lɑ n bont k nyuɑt pɑɑ l pɑɑk e.
40025028	L pɑɑk, gɑɑt likli mɑnŋ u buol ni mɑn, k pukn wun nbɑ mɔk tɑɑlɑnnbɑ piik nɑ,
40025029	K mɑɑn wun nbɑ kul mɔk bonɑ, b sɑɑ pukn’ɔ k wun mɔkt bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ kɔnŋ bont, b biɑ sɑɑ tont bonmintk nbɑ k u mɔk nɑ.
40025030	Ŋɑɑn jɑyɑnn nɑ ŋɑnin, jiin’ɔ mɑn kii nyi k sɑɑ lu’u nɑn-yel po bunbɔnn ni. Lenŋ e wɑɑ k niib tɑn sii mɔ fɑbn k nyiitl nyɑnɑ.› »
40025031	«Tɔn, Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ i tɑnŋ i jen nɑn u pɑnŋ nɑn mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ kul ɑ, u tɑn sɑɑ kɑl u nɑɑngbounŋ pɑɑk, k lɑ bɑɑkciɑɔnŋ,
40025032	k tɑn lɑkn tingbounŋ nɑ nibuolu kul u tuɑnn po, k u tɑn sɑɑ bɔkt’b nɑn pekpɑɑlk nbɑ tuu bɔkt pei nɑn buuni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
40025033	U tɑn sɑɑ jii pei k senn’b u niidiitu po, ŋɑɑn jii buuni nɑ mun k senn’b u niigɑnŋ po.
40025034	K Kpɑnbɑl nɑ sɑɑ yet bin nbɑ sie u niidiitu po nɑ ɑ: ‹Yinm nbɑ k n Bɑɑ yɑt yetŋɑnm i pɑɑk nɑ, ii sɑɑ nɑ mɑn k tɑn kuɑ nɑɑn nbɑ k n Bɑɑ din ŋɑnm k guun’i dulnyɑ piinu ni wɑɑ nɑ,
40025035	k mɑɑn kon din mɔk’n k i din’n, k nyun-nyuklu din mɔk’n k i tul’n nyun. N din tie sɑɑmɔ e ŋɑɑn k i gɑɑl’n sɑɑɔnŋ i ŋei ni.
40025036	N din sonm yɑnn e k i gbɑbn’n, k n din yiɑl k i sonm’n, k n din kuɑ dɑnsɑlk, k i tun gɔnt’n.›
40025037	«K niŋɑnm nɑ tɑn sɑɑ jiin k boi’ɔ ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ, biɑ yuo e k t din lɑ’ɑ k kon mɔk’ɑ k t dinn’ɑ ni? Ami biɑ yuo e k nyun-nyuklu din mɔk’ɑ k t tul’ɑ nyun i?
40025038	Ami biɑ yuo e k t din lɑ’ɑ k ɑ tie sɑɑmɔ k t gɑɑl’ɑ sɑɑɔnŋ t ŋei ni? Ami k ɑ sonm yɑnn k t gbɑbn’ɑ ni?
40025039	Ami bee dɑɑl e k t din lɑ k ɑ yiɑl k t sonm’ɑ ni? Ami k ɑ kuɑ dɑnsɑlk, k t bɑɑl k tɑn gɔn’ɑ ni?›
40025040	K Kpɑnbɑl nɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ jiin k yet’b ɑ: ‹Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, yɑɑ din tun lin nbɑ k tul wun nbɑ juont tɑlk n nɑɑ wɑɑs sinsuuk ni nɑ yenɔ kuɑ, i din tuun k tien min e.›
40025041	«L puolpo, u tɑn sɑɑ jiɑnt k yet bin nbɑ sie u niigɑnŋ po nɑ ɑ: ‹Yinm nibiit nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn tubdɑtu nɑ, sietl nnɑ mɑn. Ii sɑɑ mɑn k sɑɑ kuɑ muu nbɑ di k kɑɑ kpienu nbɑ k Yennu din ŋɑnm k guun Sɑɑtɑn nɑn u mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑ ni,
40025042	k mɑɑn kon din mɔk’n, ŋɑɑn k i minn’n jiet, k nyun-nyuklu din mɔk’n, ŋɑɑn k i minn’n nyun.
40025043	N din tie sɑɑmɔ e, k i k sɑk yin gɑɑl’n sɑɑɔnŋ i ŋei ni, k n din tɑn sonm yɑnn, ŋɑɑn k i minn’n tiɑt, k n din tɑn yiɑl k i k sonm’n, k n biɑ tɑn kuɑ dɑnsɑlk, k i k gɔn’n.›
40025044	«L yuo k b mun tɑn sɑɑ ŋmɑt k boi’ɔ ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ, biɑ yuo e k t din lɑ’ɑ k kon mɔk’ɑ, ɑmi nyun-nyuklu mɔk’ɑ, ɑmi k ɑ tie sɑɑmɔ, ɑmi k ɑ sonm yɑnn, ɑmi k ɑ yiɑl, ɑmi k ɑ kuɑ dɑnsɑlk, ŋɑɑn k t yet ɑ sonml i?›
40025045	L yuo mɑnŋ e k u sɑɑ jiin k yet’b ɑ: ‹Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, yɑɑ din yet nɑn yin tun lin nbɑ k tul wun nbɑ tie tɑlk n nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑ sinsuuk ni nɑ yenɔ kuɑ nɑ, i din yet nɑn yin tun k tul min e.›
40025046	Bin nbɑ nɑ e tɑn sɑɑ sɑɑn k sɑɑ lɑ tubdɑtu nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ, ŋɑɑn k niŋɑnm n mun sɑɑn kii sɑɑ ii be mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu ni.»
40026001	Yiesu nbɑ din pɑk mɑɑn mɑnŋ kul k gbenn yuo nbɑ k u yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ:
40026002	«I mi nɑn dɑɑlpo e tie yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm, k b dɑɑn sɑɑ jii Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k tul niib ɑ bin kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.»
40026003	L yuo mɑnŋ k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn Suifnbɑ sɑɑkɑb din tikl lieb Kɑɑyiif ŋɑɑk ni, wun nbɑ tie Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm sɑɑkuɑ nɑ.
40026004	B din lol bɑɑ sɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ k bɔl suol Yiesu e k kpi’u.
40026005	Ŋɑɑn b din lol ɑ b kɑn suol’ɔ jɑɑnm dɑɑ ni, k mɑɑn b i tien nnɑ sie k kpikpiluk bɑɑl.
40026006	Tɔn, Yiesu nbɑ din tɑn be Betɑɑni duo ni, Siimɔn nbɑ din tuu tie gbɑɑtl nɑ ŋɑɑk,
40026007	k kɑl di jiet, k puosuɑ din kuɑ k diɑ sɑlenŋɑnn, k tulɑɑli nbɑ k l dɑɑɔk pɑɑl bonciɑnn din gbie lenŋ ɑ, k bɑɑl tɑn but Yiesu yul pɑɑk.
40026008	K Yiesu puolpoweitieb nɑ nbɑ din lɑ nnɑ yuo nbɑ k b piɑk buln nɑn wutuol k yien ɑ: «Bee k puo nɑ biil tulɑɑli nɑ nnɑ mɑn i?
40026009	K mɑɑn b bo sɑɑ fit kɔi’l k gɑɑl likli bonciɑnn k sonm tɑlɑs-dɑnm.»
40026010	K Yiesu din bɑnn b bunbulmi mɑnŋ, k boi’b ɑ: «Bee tien k i buln k dɑɑmi puo nɑ? Bonŋɑnn e k u tun k tul’n mɑnŋ.
40026011	Tɑlɑs-dɑnm ŋɑnin sii tun be i buol ni yuo kul e, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin kii tun be nnɑ kɑɑ.
40026012	Tulɑɑli nbɑ k u but n pɑɑk nɑ, u tien n piinu siil e.
40026013	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, siɑn nbɑ kul k b sɑɑ muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, b biɑ sɑɑ muɑnt puo mɑnŋ nbɑ tun lin nbɑ nɑ, k lii tie lin nbɑ k b sii tiɑn u po.»
40026014	L yuo nɑ k Yiesu puolpoweitieb nɑ ni yenɔ, wun nbɑ k b yi’u Suudɑ Iskɑɑliɑɔt nɑ, nyii k sɑɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm buol ni,
40026015	k sɑɑ boi’b ɑ: «I sɑɑ tul’n bee ŋɑɑn k n lon sɔni k Yiesu n kuɑ i nuu ni?» K b kɑn likbin piintɑ k tul’ɔ.
40026016	K lɑɑ din nyii l yuo mɑnŋ k jii sɑɑ k u lon sɔni nbɑ k u sɑɑ jii Yiesu k kuɑn’ɔ b nuu ni. Yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm dinu lɑbɑɑl
40026017	K pɑɑnu nbɑ k b din k tie dɑtinŋ nɑ jɑɑnm piinu dɑɑl, k Yiesu puolpoweitieb din bɑɑl u buol ni, k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «A luon k tin sɑɑn lee k sɑɑ tien siil k guun’ɑ yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm nɑ dinu?»
40026018	K u yet’b ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ mɑn duo nɑ ni jɑsuɑ nnɑ ŋɑɑk ni, k sɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹T Wɑntuɑ e tun’t ɑ t tɑn yet’ɑ ɑ u yuo pel nɑ, k u luon ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb n di yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm ɑ ŋɑɑk nnɑ.› »
40026019	K u puolpoweitieb mun din tun nɑn wɑɑ wɑnn’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k din tien jɑɑnm mɑnŋ jiet siil.
40026020	Dɑɑjuouk nbɑ din tɑn bɑɑl, k Yiesu nɑn u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ kuɑ k kɑl ɑ bin di.
40026021	Bɑɑ din di yuo nbɑ k Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, i ni yenɔ sɑɑ k kuɑt’n ɑ.»
40026022	K u puolpoweitieb nɑ pɑlɑ ni din biil bonciɑnn, k b piin k boi’ɔ yenɔ yenɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, bɑlmɔni, ɑ yien min ee?»
40026023	K u jiin k yet ɑ: «Wun nbɑ k min nɑn ŋuɑ lɑkn suk kpinsenyenŋ ni nɑ e sɑɑ kuɑt’n.
40026024	Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ set sɑɑ kpo nɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ wɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e, ŋɑɑn bonbiil sii be wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun kuɑt’n nɑ pɑɑk. B i bo ii dinŋ ii kii mɑl l dɑɑnɔ, l bo din sɔ.»
40026025	Ŋɑnn e k Suudɑ wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun kuɑt’ɔ nɑ mun din boi’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, ɑ yien min ee?» Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Nnn, fin e yɑɑ.»
40026026	Bɑɑ tɑn kɑl di jiet yuo nbɑ nɑ k Yiesu jii pɑɑnu, k tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ŋmit ŋmit, k tul u puolpoweitieb, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Gɑɑt mɑn k ŋmɑn. Nɑ e tie n gbɑnɑnt.»
40026027	K u biɑ din jii kɔp nɑn dɑmunŋ, k tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, k jii’l k tul’b ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Gɑɑt mɑn, k i kul ɑ n nyu.
40026028	Lin nbɑ nɑ e tie n sɔn nbɑ sɑɑ te k Yennu mɔsonn n set nɑn bɑlmɔni, sɔn nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi n gbɑnɑnt ni, ɑ nisɑɑli bonciɑnn n lɑ nyikcɑbu b biit pɑɑk e nɑ.
40026029	N yien’i e, n kɑn mi nyu dɑmunŋ mɑnŋ, sie dɑɑl nbɑ k min nɑn yinm tɑn sɑɑ lɑkn ŋɑnm nyu n Bɑɑ nɑɑn ni.»
40026030	Ŋɑnn e k b din yin Suifnbɑ Yenjiɑntu yɑni, ŋɑɑn nyii k sɑɑn Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk pɑɑk.
40026031	L yuo nɑ k Yiesu din yet’b ɑ: «Nyiɑɔk nɑ, i kul ɑ sɑɑ tin ŋɑɑn nyik’n ɑ, k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹N tɑn sɑɑ kpi pekpɑɑlk nɑ, k pei nbɑ k u tuu kpɑɑl’b nɑ sɑɑ tin yɑt.›
40026032	Ŋɑɑn mi i tɑnŋ i fiil kuun ni, l puolpo, n sɑɑ liit i tuɑnn k sɑɑn Gɑɑliile.»
40026033	K Piɑl jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, suɑ kul i lek i tɑnŋ i tin k nyik’ɑ, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin kɑn mi tin k nyik’ɑ ni.»
40026034	K Yiesu jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’ɑ nɑ, dinnɑ nyiɑɔk nɑ, nɑn kojouk n tɑn bui nɑ, k ɑ noi tɑɑl muntɑ wɑɑ ɑ ɑ k mi’n.»
40026035	K Piɑl jiin ɑ: «L i lek i bɑɑl ɑ min nɑn fin n lɑkn kpo, n kɑn mi k noi ɑ n k mi’ɑ ni.» K u puolpoweitieb nɑ kul ɑ mun din yet nnɑ.
40026036	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din sɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k b yi Getsemɑɑne nɑ, k u sɑɑ yet’b ɑ: «Ii be nnɑ mɑn, ŋɑɑn k n gɑl i tuɑnn po nɑ k sɑɑ miɑl Yennu»
40026037	K jii Piɑl nɑn Sebede wɑɑs bɑnle nɑ k pukn u mɔnŋ po. K piin k lɑ pɑlbiil nɑn yɑn-yetuk,
40026038	k yet’b ɑ: «Pɑlbibuolu nbɑ suol’n nɑ pel lin kpi’n ɑ. Biɑt nnɑ mɑn kii nyɔi nɑn’n.»
40026039	Ŋɑnn e k u cɑt k sɑɑn wɑɑnm-nnɑ b tuɑnn po, k gbɑɑn tinŋ ni, ŋɑɑn mei Yennu k yien ɑ: «N Bɑɑ, l i bo i sɑɑ fit, fɑn ŋɑɑn k fɑlɑ nbɑ bɑɑt n pɑɑk nɑ n yɑkl’n. Ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑnt k ɑ lonm o n tun, k l dɑɑ tie n lonm u.»
40026040	K u tɑn ŋmɑt u puolpoweitieb bɑntɑ nɑ buol ni, k bɑɑl suɑ k b guɑnt, k u boi Piɑl ɑ: «I lek kɑn fit kii nyɔi nɑn’n yuo wɑɑn ii?
40026041	Ii nyɔi mɑn ŋɑɑn kii mei Yennu k i tɑn dɑɑ kuɑ jinjɑnmi ni, k mɑɑn i sei ŋɑnin luon lin tun lin nbɑ ŋɑn, ŋɑɑn k i gbɑnɑnt kɑɑ pɑnŋ.»
40026042	K Yiesu din ŋmɑt tɑɑl munle ni k sɑɑ mei Yennu k yien ɑ: «N Bɑɑ, l i tie k fɑlɑ nbɑ bɑɑt n pɑɑk nɑ kɑn fit gɑl’n ŋɑnn sie k n dii’l, ŋɑɑnt k ɑ lonm n tun.»
40026043	K u biɑ ŋmɑt k sɑɑ bɑɑl suɑ k u puolpoweitieb nɑ biɑ guɑn ɑ, k mɑɑn guɑn din mɔk’b bonciɑnn.
40026044	K u nyik’b k biɑ ŋmɑt tɑɑl muntɑ ni, k sɑɑ mei Yennu k yien l biɑnŋ nɑn wɑɑ bo miɑl sinsinn nɑ.
40026045	Ŋɑnn e k u ŋmɑt k bɑɑl u puolpoweitieb mɑnŋ buol ni k tɑn boi’b ɑ: «I biɑ lek dɑɑ guɑnt e k foi ii? Gotl mɑn, yuo mɑnŋ pel nɑ. B sɑɑ jii Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ k tien’ɔ biitdɑnm nuu ni wɑɑ.
40026046	Fiit mɑn k tin sɑɑn. Gotl mɑn, wun nbɑ nyii n puol nɑ pel ɑ.»
40026047	U mɔb dɑɑ din k bɑɑ tinŋ, k Suudɑ wun nbɑ tie u puolpoweitieb nɑ ni yenɔ dɔkt nɑn nibulciɑɔnŋ, k siɑb diɑ juk-bɑnjɑi, k siɑb mun diɑ gbɑjɑlɑ, k nyii Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn Suifnbɑ sɑɑkɑb buol ni.
40026048	Suudɑ wun nbɑ nyii u puol nɑ ponŋ dɑɑn wɑnn niib mɑnŋ nyinsiɑl e ɑ: «Mi i sɑɑ i fuont wun nbɑ k muɑt u tɑnkpinn, ii mi nɑn ŋuɑ e nɑ, k yin suol’ɔ kenken mɑn.»
40026049	Suudɑ nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u sɑɑn k sɑɑ set Yiesu penŋ ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, ɑ nyiɑɔk po,» ŋɑɑn muɑt u tɑnkpinn.
40026050	K Yiesu jiɑnt yet’ɔ ɑ: «N yuɑk, Fɑɑ bɑɑl ɑ tun lin nbɑ nɑ, tumn yiɑn.» L yuo nɑ k niib nɑ ji wuul bɑɑl k tɑn bib Yiesu.
40026051	Ŋɑnn e k u puolpoweitieb nɑ ni yenɔ tɑɑn kɑkt nuɑt juk-bɑnjiɑk ŋɑɑn cuɑ pot Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ tuontunnɔ tubl k lu.
40026052	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Jiint ɑ juk-bɑnjiɑk mɑnŋ k nuɑn l tuok ni, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ kɔn nɑn juk, u kpenn juk kuun e.
40026053	Nnɑlɑ, n bo sɑɑ fit miɑl n Bɑɑ sonml po, k u bo sɑɑ tun mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ yiɑn ɑ, k bin gɑl tusɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle.
40026054	Ŋɑɑn mi i tien nnɑ, nlee k l sɑɑ tun k gbien lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni k yet ɑ sie k lin nbɑ nɑ n tien i?»
40026055	Ŋɑnn e k u boi nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ: «I bɑɑl nɑn juki nɑn gbɑjɑlɑ ɑ i tɑn suol’n nɑn n tie fɑt-tuɑ e nɑ ɑɑ? N dɑɑn tuu be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni dɑɑl kul ɑ k tumi niib, ŋɑɑn k i tuu k so’n.
40026056	Ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ nɑ kul tun, ɑ lin gbien Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nbɑ din diɑn lin nbɑ nɑ e.» L yuo k u puolpoweitieb nɑ kul ciɑl ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ.
40026057	K bin nbɑ suol Yiesu nɑ jii’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ Kɑɑyiif ŋɑɑk, siɑn nbɑ k senniwɑntieb nɑn tinŋ nɑ ni sɑɑkɑb kɑl k guu nɑ.
40026058	Bɑɑ sɑɑn nɑn Yiesu nɑ, k Piɑl wɑɑ u puolpo bɑnfɔkl ɑ, k sɑɑ bɑɑl sie Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ ŋɑɑk nɑn-yel po, k tɑn kuɑ dundounŋ ni, k sɑɑn sɑɑ kɑl tuontunnɑ buol ni, ɑ wun lɑ l juontu.
40026059	K Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn sɑɑkɑb mɑnŋ kul yɑbl b mɔnŋ pɑɑk ɑ bin lɑ fɑɑk siɑlɑɑdɑnm mɔb ni lin nbɑ k b sɑɑ jii Yiesu biit k kpi’u.
40026060	K niib bonciɑnn set dii fɑɑk siɑlɑ u pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn kɔnŋ u bisiɑt. L puolpo k jɑb bɑnle nyii set k yet ɑ:
40026061	«Juɑ nɑ dɑɑn yet ɑ u mɔk yiikuo k sɑɑ fit bet Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ, ŋɑɑn biɑ mɑɑ’l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ sinsuuk ni.»
40026062	Ŋɑnn e k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ fiil set, ŋɑɑn boi Yiesu: «A k mɔk l jiinu uu? Lin nbɑ k jɑb mɑnŋ piɑk ɑ po nɑ, l pɑɑk tie bee?»
40026063	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu k jiin siɑl. K Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ ŋɑnm boi’ɔ ɑ: «Yet’t Yennu nbɑ fo nɑ pɑɑk, fin e set tie Klistu nɑ k biɑ tie u Bijɑ nɑ ɑɑ?»
40026064	K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Nnn, fin e yɑɑ. Ŋɑɑn n yien’i e, lɑɑ nyii mɔtɑɑnɑ k jii sɑɑ, i tɑn sɑɑ lɑ Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k u kɑl Yiikuo Dɑɑnɔ niidiitu po, k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ’u k u be sɑnpɑgbɑnɑ ni k siik.»
40026065	Ŋɑnn e k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ wutuol duo, k u dɑt u mɔnŋ liɑtfuouk pɑt, ŋɑɑn tiɑn ɑ: «U piɑk biil Yennu e. K t ponŋ ji luon siɑlɑɑdɑnm ɑ t tien bee? I kul ɑ nɑ gbɑt wɑɑ piɑk biil Yennu biɑnŋ nbɑ.
40026066	K i lɑ nlee?» K b jiin ɑ: «U ŋɑn nɑn kuun e.»
40026067	L yuo nɑ, k b ji piin k siin mɔsɑnt u pɑɑk, k buo’u, k siɑb pebt’ɔ tɑnpɑki,
40026068	ŋɑɑn yien ɑ: «Fin Klistu, buntl wun nbɑ pebt’ɑ nɑ.»
40026069	Piɑl nbɑ kɑl Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ ŋɑɑdundounŋ ni nɑ, k ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni bonposiɑk bɑɑl u buol ni k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «A mun tuu tun be nɑn Yiesu nbɑ nyii Gɑɑliile nɑ.»
40026070	K Piɑl yet niib mɑnŋ kul ɑ buol ɑ: «N k mi fɑɑ piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.»
40026071	L puolpo k u fiil nyii k sɑɑ kɑl nɑn-yel po. K ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni bonpoliek biɑ nyii lɑ’u, k yet bin nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ mun tuu tun be Yiesu nbɑ nyii Nɑɑsɑɑlet nɑ buol ni.»
40026072	K Piɑl noi buun nii muu ni, k pol ɑ ŋuɑ tɑɑn k mi juɑ mɑnŋ.
40026073	K l yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ k bin nbɑ sie lenŋ nɑ bɑɑl k tɑn yet Piɑl ɑ: «A set tie b ni yenɔ e, k mɑɑn ɑ mɑɑn nɑ e wɑnt.»
40026074	K Piɑl pol ɑ: «L i tie k n fɑ i e, Yennu n dɑt n tubl. N k mi juɑ mɑnŋ.» L yuo mɑnŋ k kojouk bui.
40026075	K Piɑl ji tiɑl Yiesu nbɑ bo yet’ɔ nɑ ɑ: «Kojouk dɑɑ tɑn kɑn bui sinsinn dɑɑnn, k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ noi tɑɑl muntɑ, ɑ ɑ k mi’n.» K Piɑl nyii nɑn-yel po k sɑɑ bui k fɑbn bonciɑnn.
40027001	Lɑɑ yent sɑn-nyɑpob ni, k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn sɑɑkɑb lol bɑɑ sɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ k kpi Yiesu.
40027002	K b lol’ɔ ŋmii k jii’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ tinŋ yudɑɑnɔ nbɑ k b yi’u Piilɑɑt nɑ buol ni.
40027003	Suudɑ, nbɑ nyii Yiesu puol nɑ nbɑ gbɑt k b bu juont k yɑɑ ɑ Yiesu ŋɑn nɑn kuun e nɑ, k u pɑl din biil bonciɑnn, k u jii likbin piintɑ nɑ k ŋmɑt sɑɑ jiin tul Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn sɑɑkɑb mɑnŋ,
40027004	ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «N tun biit ɑ, k mɑɑn n kuɑt wun nbɑ kɑɑ biit ɑ.» Ŋɑnn e k b jiin k boi’ɔ ɑ: «T bɑkɑ mun ji be lin nbɑ nɑ ni ii? L ji tie ɑ mɑɑn e.»
40027005	K Suudɑ jii likli nɑ k lu Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, ŋɑɑn nyii k sɑɑn sɑɑ jɔnn u mɔnŋ ŋmiiuk.
40027006	Ŋɑnn e k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm tɔkl likli mɑnŋ ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «Lin nbɑ nɑ ji tie sɔn likli e, k t senni nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ, t kɑn fit jii pukn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk likli ni.»
40027007	L pɑɑk, k b kɑl dukn likli mɑnŋ po, k tɑn jii sɑɑn sɑɑ dɑɑ yɔkmɑluɑ tinŋ ɑ bii pii sɑɑnm lenŋ.
40027008	L pɑɑk e te k b lek biɑ dɑɑ yi tinŋ mɑnŋ ɑ: «Sɔn Tinŋ» k tɑn tuu dinnɑ.
40027009	K l gbien Yennu sɔkni Selemi nbɑ din pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ k l tien mɔni ɑ: «B jii likbin piintɑ nbɑ k Islɑɑeltieb siɑb din pɑ k l tie u dɑɑɔk nɑ,
40027010	k dɑɑ yɔkmɑɑlɔ tinŋ, nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ wɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.»
40027011	K Yiesu sie tinŋ mɑnŋ yudɑɑnɔ Piilɑɑt tuɑnn, k Piilɑɑt boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e set tie Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl nɑ ɑɑ?» K u jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Nnn, fin e yɑɑ.»
40027012	Ŋɑɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn sɑɑkɑb nɑ nbɑ tɑɑl’ɔ nɑ, u k jiin’m siɑl.
40027013	K Piilɑɑt biɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «A k gbiɑ bɑɑ tɑɑl’ɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ mɑnŋ ii?»
40027014	Ŋɑɑn Yiesu ji k pɑk siɑl k jiin u po, k l ji bɑkt Piilɑɑt bonciɑnn.
40027015	Tɔn, l i tie k yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm dinu dɑɑl i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, tinŋ yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ tuu nyinn niyenɔ kuɑ e dɑnsɑlk ni, wun nbɑ k niib nɑ luon’ɔ, k ŋɑɑ’u.
40027016	Suɑ din be dɑnsɑlk l yuo, k u sɑnn din yi Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs, k niib nɑ mi’u fɑnu nɑn u tuonɑ nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
40027017	Bɑɑ tɑn lɑkn yuo nbɑ k Piilɑɑt boi’b ɑ: «Ŋmee k i luon k n nyinn’ɔ dɑnsɑlk ni k ŋɑɑ’u? Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs ɑmi Yiesu nbɑ k b yi’u Klistu nɑ?»
40027018	k mɑɑn Piilɑɑt mi nɑn nɑnŋ pɑɑk e te k b suol Yiesu k tien u nuu ni.
40027019	Piilɑɑt nbɑ dɑɑ kɑl buut kok pɑɑk nɑ, k u ŋɑɑpuo tun tuomi k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Nyint ɑ nuu nifopiemɔ nɑ mɑɑn ni, k mɑɑn nyiɑɔk nɑ n won lɑ dɑɑmuk bonciɑnn n dɑmiit ni u pɑɑk.»
40027020	K Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn sɑɑkɑb mɑnŋ biil niib nɑ ɑ bin yet Piilɑɑt ɑ wun nyinn Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs ŋɑɑn kpi Yiesu.
40027021	K Piilɑɑt biɑ ŋɑnm k boi’b ɑ: «Niib bɑnle nɑ ni, i luon k n nyinn ŋmee ŋɑɑ’u?» K b jiin ɑ: «Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs e.»
40027022	K Piilɑɑt biɑ ŋɑnm boi’b ɑ: «K Yiesu nbɑ k b yi’u Klistu nɑ ŋɑnin, i luon k n tien’ɔ nlee?» K b kul ɑ jiin ɑ: «Kpɑɑn’mɔ k tɑbn’ɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.»
40027023	K Piilɑɑt boi’b ɑ: «Bee pɑɑk e? U biit mɑntk tie lɑnn po e?» K b ŋɑnm tien guoluk, ŋɑɑn jiin sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Kpɑɑn’mɔ tɑbn dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.»
40027024	Piilɑɑt nbɑ bɑnn nɑn wuu piɑk l kɑɑ nyuɑt, k biɑ sɑɑ pukn guoluk nɑ, k u jii nyun k wuul wuul u nii, niib nɑ ninbinɑ ni, ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «N nuu kɑɑ juɑ nbɑ kɑɑ biit nɑ sɔn nyinu ni. I mɑɑn e nɑ.»
40027025	K niib nɑ jiin ɑ: «Nnn, u sɔn n jii tinm nɑn t wɑɑs yulɑ pɑɑk.»
40027026	Ŋɑnn e k Piilɑɑt nyinn Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs ŋɑɑ’u, ŋɑɑn te k b buo Yiesu gbɑnn, k jii’u tul’b ɑ bin sɑɑ kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.
40027027	K tinŋ yudɑɑnɔ Piilɑɑt nɑ sejenm jii Yiesu k kuɑ nɑn’ɔ dundounŋ ni, k b sejenm mɑnŋ kul ɑ tikl k lint’ɔ.
40027028	B din liɑt u liɑnt nɑ e, ŋɑɑn jii liɑtfomunŋ nnɑ k lɑnn’ɔ,
40027029	ŋɑɑn luu kunkoni foklk k yiln’mɔ, k jii pɑtu k kubn’ɔ u niidiitu ni, k gbɑɑn u tuɑnn, k sɑlkt’ɔ k yien ɑ: «Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl, t fuont’ɑ.»
40027030	K b piin k siin mɔsɑnt u pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn gɑɑn pɑtu nbɑ k b bo kubn’ɔ nɑ k fɑɑ u yul pɑɑk.
40027031	Bɑɑ tɑn sɑlk’ɔ gbenn yuo nbɑ, k b liɑt liɑtfomunŋ nɑ, ŋɑɑn jii u mɔnŋ liɑnt nɑ k lɑnn’ɔ, ɑ bin ji sɑɑn k sɑɑ kpɑɑ’u k tɑbn’ɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.
40027032	Bɑɑ din sɑɑ nɑ, k b cet Siilenn tinŋ ni jɑsuɑ nbɑ k u sɑnn yi Siimɔn, k suol’ɔ, k miɑ’u jinn’ɔ Yiesu kuun dɑpunpunn nɑ.
40027033	Bɑɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl siɑn nbɑ k b yi’l Golgotɑ nɑ, k l pɑɑk tie ɑ: «Yukpɑbuk buol,»
40027034	k b jii dɑɑn nbɑ ŋmɑt nɑn bonkobuk yɑn k tul’ɔ ɑ wun nyu, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ lenm yuo nbɑ k u yet nyunu.
40027035	Bɑɑ kpɑɑ’u k tɑbn’ɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk gbenn yuo nbɑ, k b tɔ tiɑtiɑ k cent cent u tiɑt nɑ,
40027036	ŋɑɑn ji kɑl lenŋ k guu’u.
40027037	K b diɑn bɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ u tun biit nbɑ nɑ, k tɑbn u dɑpunpunn nɑ yul pɑɑk. Bɑɑ din diɑn lin nbɑ e nɑ, k l wɑnt ɑ: «Yiesu nbɑ tie Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl nɑ e nɑ.»
40027038	B mun biɑ din kpɑɑ fɑt-tieb bɑnle dɑpunpunɑ pɑɑk lenŋ, k pukn Yiesu po, k yenɔ din be u niidiitu po, k luɑ mun din be u niigɑnŋ po.
40027039	Bin nbɑ din sonm gɑɑl lenŋ nɑ pɑkn b yulɑ e ŋɑɑn suki’ɔ,
40027040	k yien ɑ: «Fin nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ ɑ sɑɑ fit bet Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ŋɑɑn biɑ mɑɑ’l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ sinsuuk ni nɑ, fin e nɑ, fiet ɑ mɔnŋ. L i tie k ɑ set tie Yennu Bijɑ i e, fɑn nyi dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk k sik nɑ.»
40027041	Nnɑ e biɑk k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb nɑn sɑɑkɑb kul ɑ mun din sɑlkt’ɔ
40027042	k yien ɑ: «U tuu fie lieb e, ŋɑɑn kɑn fit k fiel u mɔnŋ. Tɔn, u tie Islɑɑeltieb Kpɑnbɑl e. Wun sikn u mɔnŋ dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk nɑ, k tin fit tien’ɔ yɑdɑ mɑntk.
40027043	U tien Yennu yɑdɑ wɑɑ, k yɑɑ ɑ u tie Yennu Bijɑ e. Tɔn, l i tie k Yennu set luon’ɔ, ŋɑɑnt tii goli mɑn k lɑɑn u sɑɑ fiel’ɔ mɔtɑɑnɑ wɑɑ.»
40027044	Nnɑ e mun fɑt-tieb bɑnle nbɑ k b kpɑɑ’b k pukn u po nɑ mun biɑ sɑlkt’ɔ.
40027045	Lɑɑ tɑn bɑɑl yensuuk ni, k tinŋ nɑ kul ji din bɔnn k sɑɑ bɑɑl yenlekl kut muntɑ.
40027046	Kut muntɑ yuo po e, k Yiesu yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Elii Elii lemɑ sɑɑbɑɑktɑɑni?» (L pɑɑk tie ɑ: «N Yennu, n Yennu, bee k ɑ nyik’n i?»)
40027047	K bin nbɑ sie lenŋ nɑ nbɑ gbɑt u yiini mɑnŋ k b siɑb yet ɑ: «U yi Elii e nɑ.»
40027048	K b ni yenɔ tin sɑɑ jii sɑɑpo k suunt dɑmiituk nnɑ ni, k jii sɑkn dɑɑɔk pɑɑk, k donn tul’ɔ ɑ wun nyu.
40027049	K u lieb nɑ yien’ɔ ɑ wun nyik’ɔ, ɑ k lɑɑn Elii sɑɑ bɑɑl k tɑn fiel’ɔ wɑɑ ɑɑ?
40027050	K Yiesu ŋɑnm yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ŋɑɑn ji kpo.
40027051	L yuo nɑ k cincenn nbɑ tuu juɑn k puun Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni nɑ ji bɔkt l yul pɑɑk k tɑn sik tinŋ ni, k tinŋ dɑnm, k tɑnpiit bɔktl,
40027052	k kɑɑt biɑ luotl, k kpienm nbɑ din kpo k din tie Yennu niib nɑ bonciɑnn fiil kuun ni,
40027053	k nyii b kɑɑt ni, k Yiesu kuun fiilu puolpo k b kuɑ Selusɑɑlenm, k niib bonciɑnn lɑ’b nɑn b ninbinɑ.
40027054	K sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ, nɑn u sejenm nbɑ pukn u pɑɑk k b guu Yiesu nɑ nbɑ lɑ nnɑ yuo nbɑ, nɑn tinŋ dɑnmu nɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol’b bonciɑnn, k b yien ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e, juɑ nɑ set tie Yennu Bijɑ e.»
40027055	Puob nbɑ din tuu wɑɑ Yiesu k nyii Gɑɑliile k sonmt’ɔ nɑ ji wokl k sie bɑnfɔkl ɑ ŋɑɑn goli lin nbɑ tuun mɑnŋ.
40027056	B yenm e din tie Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli, nɑn Sebede wɑɑs nɑɑ nɑ, nɑn Mɑɑli nbɑ din tie Sɑɑk nɑn Suosiɑf nɑɑ nɑ.
40027057	Lɑɑ tɑn bɔnt yuo nbɑ k Aliimɑɑte duo mɔktsuɑ bɑɑl, k u sɑnn din tie Suosiɑf. U mun biɑ din tie Yiesu puolpo juɑ e.
40027058	K u sɑɑn yudɑɑnɔ Piilɑɑt buol ni, k sɑɑ miɑl’ɔ ɑ wun cɑb’ɔ k wun kpɑɑt Yiesu gbɑnɑnt k pii. K Piilɑɑt tul yiikuo ɑ bin sɑɑn k sɑɑ jii Yiesu k tul’ɔ.
40027059	K Suosiɑf sɑɑn k sɑɑ jii Yiesu gbɑnɑnt k pɔbn’ɔ kɑtin-yienŋ ni,
40027060	k jii’u sɑɑn sɑɑ pii’u u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ kɑpɑɑɔnŋ nbɑ k u din gbiil’l tɑnpiiuk lokl ni nɑ, ŋɑɑn bilnt kɑtɑngbenŋl k tɑn biin kɑmɔb, ŋɑɑn ji ŋmɑt kun.
40027061	K Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli, nɑn luɑ nbɑ k b mun yii’u Mɑɑli nɑ ji kɑl kpiɑ lenŋ k goli kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ.
40027062	Lɑɑ yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, dɑɑl nbɑ tie ŋɑnm Suifnbɑ Fuondɑɑl nɑ, k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ sɑɑn Piilɑɑt buol ni, k sɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ:
40027063	«Cɑnbɑɑ, t tiɑn nɑn fɑɑk dɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ nbɑ dɑɑn be nɑ, u dɑɑn yet ɑ l i tie k u tɑn kpo, ɑ ŋɑɑn dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl u biɑ sɑɑ fiil kuun ni wɑɑ.
40027064	L pɑɑk, tuln sejenm mɔb k bin sɑɑn kii sɑɑ i guu u kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ bonŋɑnn k sɑɑ tuu dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ mɑnŋ dɑɑl. L i kii tie nnɑ i kɑɑ, u puolpoweitieb tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl k jɑn’ɔ e, ŋɑɑn yet niib ɑ u fiil kuun ni e. K kpinkpɑnni mɑnŋ tɑn sɑɑ gɑl sinsinn yɑl nɑ pɑɑk ɑ.»
40027065	K Piilɑɑt yet’b ɑ: «Jiin guutieb mɑn k bin sɑɑn kii sɑɑ i guu kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ nɑn yɑɑ sɑɑ fit guul biɑnŋ nbɑ.»
40027066	K b jii guutieb k b sɑɑn sɑɑ guu kɑɑɔk nɑ, ŋɑɑn buun tɑnt k pɔl’l fɑnu.
40028001	K Suifnbɑ Fuondɑɑl nɑ gɑl, ŋɑɑn k lɑsl dɑɑl sɑn-nyɑfɑɑl k Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli nɑn luɑ nbɑ k b mun yii’u Mɑɑli nɑ nyii sɑɑn, ɑ bin sɑɑ gɔn kɑɑɔk nɑ.
40028002	K tinŋ din dɑnm bonciɑnn, k mɑɑn Yennu mɑlɑkɑ nyii sɑnpɑɑpo sik, k tɑn bikt kɑtɑngbenŋl nɑ kɑmɔb nɑ pɑɑk, k kɑl l pɑɑk.
40028003	K u gbɑnɑnt din nyili nɑn sɑnyiknti nɑ, k u liɑnt pien nɑn sɑnpɑgbɑnpieonŋ nɑ.
40028004	K jɑŋmɑɑni din suol guutieb nɑ bonciɑnn, k b ji jekl k tɑn bɑɑ k duɑ duɑ nɑn kpienm nɑ.
40028005	K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ yet puob mɑnŋ ɑ: «I dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni mɑn. N mi nɑn i luon Yiesu nbɑ k b kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk nɑ e.
40028006	U kɑɑ nnɑ, u fiil kuun ni nɑn wɑɑ dɑɑn yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Ii sɑɑ nɑ mɑn k tɑn got wɑɑ dɑɑn duɑ siɑn nbɑ nɑ.
40028007	Ii sɑɑ mɑn yiɑn yiɑn, k sɑɑ yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ, u fiil kuun ni k gɑl sɑɑn Gɑɑliile wɑɑ. Lenŋ e wɑɑ k i sɑɑ lɑ’u. Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ.»
40028008	K puob nɑ nyii kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ penŋ k ciɑl sɑɑ ɑ bin sɑɑ yet u puolpoweitieb, k jɑŋmɑɑni lek mɔk’b, ŋɑɑn k b biɑ mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn.
40028009	Bɑɑ din sɑɑ nɑ, k Yiesu cet’b sɔnu pɑɑk k fuont’b, k b gbɑɑn u tuɑnn k suol u tɑɑ k jiɑnt’ɔ.
40028010	K u yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. Ii sɑɑ mɑn k sɑɑ yet n nɑɑ wɑɑs mɑnŋ ɑ bin sɑɑn Gɑɑliile. Lenŋ e wɑɑ k b sɑɑ lɑ’n.»
40028011	Puob mɑnŋ nbɑ din sɑɑ nɑ, k guutieb nbɑ guu kɑɑɔk nɑ siɑb ŋmɑt sɑɑn duo ni, k sɑɑ wɑnn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑ lin nbɑ tien mɑnŋ kul ɑ.
40028012	Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm mɑnŋ nɑn sɑɑkɑb nbɑ lɑkn kɑl k lol lol nɑ, k b tul guutieb nɑ likli bonciɑnn,
40028013	ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «I yet ɑ Yiesu puolpoweitieb e bɑɑl tɑnsuuni, yuo nbɑ k i duɑl k guɑnt nɑ, k tɑn jɑn piit u gbɑnɑnt.
40028014	k l i tie k tinŋ yudɑɑnɔ nɑ gbɑt nnɑ i e, tinm sɑɑ dɔkn i pɑɑk u buol ni k nyinn’i.»
40028015	K guutieb mɑnŋ gɑɑl likli nɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt k sɑɑ yet niib nɑn bɑɑ wɑnn’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. K Suifnbɑ gɑɑl mɑɑn nɑ k l tien bɑlmɔni mɔkmɔk nɑn dinnɑ.
40028016	K Yiesu tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn yenɔ kuɑ nɑ sɑɑn Gɑɑliile jɔsiɑl pɑɑk, siɑn nbɑ k Yiesu din wɑnn’b ɑ bin sɑɑn nɑ.
40028017	Bɑɑ tɑn lɑ’u yuo nbɑ k b gbɑɑn k jiɑnt’ɔ, ŋɑɑn b siɑb din bils u pɑɑk.
40028018	Ŋɑnn e k u cɑt k nɑkn’m, ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «Yennu tul’n sɑnpɑɑpo nɑn tinŋ ni yiikuo kul ɑ wɑɑ.
40028019	L pɑɑk, ii sɑɑ mɑn tingbounŋ nɑ ni, nibuolu kul ɑ buol ni, k sɑɑ tien’m n puolpoweitieb, k wul’b Yennu nyunwulu, Bɑɑ, nɑn Bijɑ, nɑn Foŋɑnm sɑnn ni,
40028020	k wɑnn’b k bin sɑk lin nbɑ k n wɑnn’i nɑ kul. Ii tiɑn mɑn nɑn n be nɑn’i yuo kul ɑ, mɔkmɔk nɑn dulnyɑ gbennu.»
41001001	Yiesu Klistu Yennu Bijɑ lɑbɑmɑnn piinu e nɑ.
41001002	Yennu Sɔkni Esɑɑyi kɑdɑɑɔk ni l diɑn ɑ Yennu yet ɑ: «N tuomu e nɑ, k n yɑɑ n tun’ɔ ɑ wun dɔnŋ k gɑl ɑ tuɑnn, k ŋɑnm ɑ sɔnu k tul’ɑ.
41001003	Suɑ be muuk ni k huot k yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Ŋɑnmt mɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɔnu k tul’ɔ k te k sɔni i tuok.› »
41001004	Sɑn din be muuk ni, k muɑntl k tien niib ɑ bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ k wun wul’b Yennu nyunwulu k Yennu n nyik cɑb b biit.
41001005	Suude tinŋ ni nɑn Selusɑɑlenm duo ni niib kul din bɑɑl Sɑn buol ni, k fiit b biit, k Sɑn wul’b Yennu nyunwulu, Suulden kpenu ni.
41001006	Sɑn din liɑ yuyouk kobt liɑtfuouk o, k biɑ buob gbɑnn u siɑk ni, k u jiet din tie nɑɑsuut nɑn siɑt.
41001007	k u muɑntl k tien niib ɑ: «Nilɔ nbɑ yɑɑ wun tɑn wei n puol k bɑɑl nɑ cie’n, k n ponŋ k ŋɑn nɑn k n buɑn u tuɑnn ni k lot u tɑɑsɑɑŋmi.
41001008	Min wuul’i nɑn nyun e, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ ŋɑnin tɑn sɑɑ wul’i nɑn Foŋɑnm.»
41001009	L yuo nɑ k Yiesu din nyii Nɑɑsɑɑlet duo nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni nɑ, k bɑɑl Sɑn buol, k Sɑn wul’ɔ Yennu nyunwulu Suulden kpenu mɑnŋ ni.
41001010	Yiesu nbɑ din nyii nyun mɑnŋ ni k duo yuo nbɑ, l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u lɑ k sɑnpɑɑk luot, k Foŋɑnm sik tuɑn u pɑɑk k nɑɑn nɑn ŋmɑnn nɑ
41001011	k u gbɑt kunkɔl sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ, k kunkɔl nɑ yet ɑ: «Fin e tie n Bilonkɑk. Fin e k n nunm gbuo.»
41001012	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Foŋɑnm din te k Yiesu kuɑ muuk ni,
41001013	u din be muuk mɑnŋ ni k sɑɑ jɑnŋ dɑɑ piinnɑ, k Sɑɑtɑn sɑɑ jɑnm’ɔ. Yiesu nɑn muuk ni bonkobt e din be, k Yennu mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ cɑntl’ɔ.
41001014	Tɔn, k b din tɑn suol Sɑn k kuɑn’ɔ dɑnsɑlk, k l puolpo k Yiesu sɑɑn Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni, k muɑntl Yennu lɑbɑmɑnn,
41001015	k yien ɑ: «Yuo bɑɑl ɑ, k Yennu nɑɑn pel nɑ. L pɑɑk i mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ mɑn k tien lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ yɑdɑ.»
41001016	Yiesu nbɑ din sonm Gɑɑliile mɔkgbenŋl kpinŋ nɑ, k tɑn lɑ Siimɔn nɑn u ninjɑ Andle, k b lubn jɑnlɑɑɔnŋ mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni, k mɑɑn b din tie jɑnsuolɑ e
41001017	K u yet’b ɑ: «Ii wɑɑ’n mɑn, k n sɑɑ te k yii so niib nɑn yɑɑ so jɑni nɑ.»
41001018	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k b nyik b jɑnlɑɑɔnŋ nɑ, ŋɑɑn k wɑɑ’u.
41001019	K u biɑ ji din sɑɑn tuɑnn po wɑɑnm-nnɑ k lɑ Sɑɑk nɑn u ninjɑ Sɑn, bin nbɑ din tie Sebede wɑɑs nɑ, k b din be b bulgbetl ni k ŋɑnmt b jɑnlɑɑnt.
41001020	Yiesu nbɑ lɑ’b yuo nbɑ k u yiin’m, k b nyik b bɑɑ Sebede nɑn u tuontunnɑ bulgbetl mɑnŋ ni, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ’u.
41001021	K Yiesu nɑn ŋɑnm din sɑɑn kuɑ digbɑnsiɑl ni k l sɑnn yi Kɑpelnɑunm, k Fuondɑɑl tɑn bɑɑl, k b kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni, k u piin k tumi niib.
41001022	K u tumiu mɑnŋ bɑkt’b bonciɑnn, k mɑɑn u din k tie nɑn senniwɑntieb nɑ kɑɑ ŋɑɑn u din tumi’b nɑn minu e.
41001023	K l yuo nɑ k juɑ nbɑ k nɑlnbiiuk be u ni nɑ be Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok nɑ ni k yikn sɑnpɑɑpo k yien ɑ:
41001024	«Fin Yiesu, Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ, tinm nɑn fin nlee mɑntk i? A bɑɑl ɑ ɑ tɑn biil’t ee? N mi fɑɑ tie wun nbɑ. A tie Yennu Niŋɑnɔ nɑ e.»
41001025	K Yiesu tiɑn u pɑɑk, k yet ɑ: «Ŋminin fuut, ŋɑɑn nyi u ni.»
41001026	K nɑlnbiiuk nɑ fuun juɑ nɑ k tɑn lu’u k wɑɑ nyi u ni yuo nbɑ k u yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ.
41001027	K l din tien b kul yɑɑl-lituk, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «Bee nɑ? U wɑnn wɑnnsɑɑnn nɑn yiikuo e, k biɑ tien nɑlnbiit mɔb, k b sɑɑk.»
41001028	L yuo ni k u sɑnn din muɑnt yiɑn ɑ k lin Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni kul ɑ.
41001029	Yiesu nbɑ din nyii Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok mɑnŋ ni nɑ, k ŋuɑ nɑn Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn din sɑɑn kuɑ Siimɔn nɑn Andle ŋɑɑk ni.
41001030	K Siimɔn diɑnpuok din duɑ k yiɑl k u gbɑnɑnt ton, k b yet Yiesu u yiɑlu mɑnŋ po.
41001031	K Yiesu din sɑɑn suol u nuu k fiin’ɔ, k u yiɑlu mɑnŋ gbenn, k u fiil k cɑnt’b.
41001032	L dɑɑl mɑnŋ dɑɑjonyiɑɔk, k niib din jii bɑɑtb nɑn bin nbɑ k nɑlnbiit be b ni nɑ, k bɑɑt nɑn’m Yiesu buol ni.
41001033	K duo mɑnŋ ni niib kul ɑ din lɑkn k tɑn yiɑ dieok nɑ tɑnmɔb.
41001034	K u te k nisiɑb bonciɑnn bin nbɑ yiɑl yiɑlbuolu kul ɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k biɑ nyint nɑlnbiit niib bonciɑnn ni, k k sɑk nɑlnbiit mɑnŋ n yet siɑl, k mɑɑn b din mi wɑɑ tie wun nbɑ.
41001035	K Yiesu din dɔnŋ nyii k kojouk dɑɑ k mɔ, k kuɑ muuk ni k sɑɑ mei Yennu.
41001036	K Siimɔn nɑn u lieb nɑ ji din lin k luon u buol,
41001037	k bɑɑ sɑɑ lɑ’u yuo nbɑ k b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Suɑ kul luon fin e.»
41001038	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin sɑɑn digbɑnɑ nbɑ kpiɑt nɑ ni nɑ, k n sɑɑ muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ lenŋ mun, k mɑɑn l pɑɑk e te k n bɑɑl.»
41001039	K nnɑ e k u din lin Gɑɑliile tingbounŋ ni kul po, k muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, k biɑ nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni.
41001040	Tɔn, k gbɑɑtsuɑ din bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni, k tɑn gbɑɑn u tuɑnn ni, k bɑln’mɔ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ luon, ɑ sɑɑ fit te k n ŋɑɑɔk nɑ n gbenn.»
41001041	K ninbɑɑɔk din suol Yiesu k u tɑnt u nuu k sii’u, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «N sɑk ɑ. A ŋɑɑɔk mɑnŋ n gbenn.»
41001042	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k juɑ mɑnŋ ŋɑɑɔk nɑ gbenn, k u gbɑnɑnt ji jen l bɑnnu ni.
41001043	K Yiesu din yɑki nɑn’ɔ fɑnu wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ji bel’ɔ k u sɑɑn ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ:
41001044	«Ii mi k ɑ yet suɑ l mɑɑn. Ii sɑɑ k jii ɑ mɔnŋ k wɑnn Yennu mɑnntuɑ nɑ, k mɑnn mɑnnu nbɑ k Yennu sɔkni Muois din senn k jiin gbɑɑtɑ pɑɑku po nɑ, k suɑ kul n bɑnn nɑn ɑ ŋɑɑɔk mɑnŋ set gbenn ɑ.»
41001045	Ŋɑɑn k juɑ nɑ sɑɑn k muɑnt u pɑɑku mɑnŋ lɑbɑɑl lokl kul ɑ po. Ŋɑnn e din te k Yiesu k fit nyi pɑɑnu ni k kuɑ digbɑnsiɑl ni. U din tuu be digbɑnkpini e, ŋɑɑn k niib bonciɑnn din nyi lokl kul po k bɑɑt u buol ni.
41002001	K l din tɑn tien dɑɑ ŋɑnle nnɑ e, k Yiesu biɑ ŋmɑt Kɑpelnɑunm, k niib bonciɑnn gbɑt nɑn u ŋmɑt ŋɑɑpo wɑɑ.
41002002	K b din tikl hɑli nɑn yiɑl bonmintk nnɑ wɑɑ tɑn kɑɑ ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni k suɑ sɑɑ fit bɑɑl tɑnmɔb buol ni, k u muɑntl Yennu mɑɑn k tien’m.
41002003	K niib bɑnnɑ din tɑn jii bɑɑtsuɑ k u gbɑnɑnt kpo.
41002004	Bɑɑ din k fit bɑɑl Yiesu buol k mɑɑn niib nbɑ din yɑbt nɑ pɑɑk, k b cuɑ luot mɔpinn yul pɑɑk, k sikn bɑɑtɔ nɑ k u duɑ u liɑnŋ pɑɑk k tɑn bil’ɔ Yiesu tuɑnn ni.
41002005	Yiesu nbɑ din lɑ bɑɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k u yet bɑɑtɔ nɑ ɑ: «N bik, n nyik cɑb ɑ biit ɑ.»
41002006	L yuo nɑ k Yennu senniwɑntesiɑb din kɑl lenŋ mɑnŋ k boi b pɑlɑ ni ɑ:
41002007	«Bee tien k juɑ nɑ piɑk nnɑ? U biil Yennu sɑnn. Ŋmee dɑɑ sɑɑ fit nyik cɑb nilɔ biit, k l k tie Yennu kuukuɑ kɑɑ?»
41002008	K Yiesu din bɑnn dudukt nbɑ be b pɑlɑ ni, k u boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i mɔk dudukt nɑ buolu?
41002009	Mi i yet bɑɑtɔ nɑ ɑ: ‹N nyik cɑb ɑ biit› ɑmi mi i yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Fiit k jii ɑ liɑnŋ kii sonm,› mɑɑn munle nɑ sinsuuk ni lɑnn po e pɑɑl i?
41002010	Ŋɑɑn n luon k yin bɑnn nɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mɔk yiikuo tingbounŋ nnɑ, k sɑɑ fit nyik cɑb nilɔ biit.» Ŋɑnn e k u jiɑnt yet wun nbɑ k u gbɑnɑnt kpo nɑ ɑ:
41002011	«N yien’ɑ e fiit, k jii ɑ liɑnŋ kii kun ɑ ŋɑɑk ni.»
41002012	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k gbɑnɑnkpienn dɑɑnɔ nɑ fiil, k jii u liɑnŋ k nyii b kul ɑ ninbinɑ ni, k l bɑkt b kul ɑ, k b piɑk dont Yennu sɑnn k yien ɑ: «T k mi lɑ l buolu.»
41002013	L puolpo e k Yiesu biɑ din ŋmɑt mɔkgbenŋl nɑ kpinŋ, k niib bonciɑnn tikl u buol ni k lint’ɔ wɑɑ, k u din wɑnt’b Yennu mɑɑn.
41002014	Ŋɑnn e k u din gɑl tuɑnn po k sɑɑ lɑ jɑsuɑ nnɑ k u sɑnn din tie Liefi, wun nbɑ din tie Alfe bijɑ nɑ, k u kɑl u tuonn pɑɑk lɑnpogɑɑldieok ni, k Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fiit kii wɑɑ’n.» K u fiil k wɑɑ’u.
41002015	L puolpo e k Yiesu din be Liefi ŋɑɑk k di jiet, k lɑnpogɑɑltieb bonciɑnn nɑn biitdɑnm bonciɑnn lɑkn kɑl nɑn Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb k di jiet. Bin nbɑ din wɑɑ’u din yɑb bonciɑnn.
41002016	K senniwɑntieb, bin nbɑ din tie Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ, lɑ k Yiesu di jiet nɑn biitdɑnm nɑn lɑnpogɑɑltieb nɑ, k b boi u puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ: «Bee k u lɑkn di nɑn lɑnpogɑɑltieb nɑn biitdɑnm i?»
41002017	Yiesu nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ k u yet’b ɑ: «Bin nbɑ mɔk lɑɑfiɑ k luon tebtuɑ, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ yiɑl, ŋɑnm e luon tebtuɑ. L k tie bin nbɑ tie niŋɑnm Yennu buol nɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ te k n bɑɑl, biitdɑnm pɑɑk e k n bɑɑl.»
41002018	Dɑsiɑl k Sɑn puolpoweitieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ din loln mɔi. K nisiɑb din bɑɑl k boi Yiesu ɑ: «Sɑn puolpoweitieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ puolpoweitieb loln mɔi. Bee tien k ɑ puolpoweitieb k loln i?»
41002019	K Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «Puociɑnu i be, sɑɑnm sɑɑ fit lol mɔi yuo nbɑ k puoyuokl sɔlɔ dɑɑ be b buol ni nɑ wɑɑ ɑɑ? Aɑi. Puoyuokl sɔlɔ nbɑ dɑɑ be b buol ni nɑ, b kɑn fit lol mɔi.
41002020	Ŋɑɑn siɑn-yuo bɑɑt nɑ k b tɑn sɑɑ jii puoyuokl sɔlɔ nɑ b buol. L yuo mɑnŋ e k b sɑɑ lol mɔi.
41002021	«Suɑ kɑn sɑk jii cɑbpɑɑnn k lik tɑkpel. L i tie k u tien nnɑ i e, cɑbpɑɑnn nɑ sɑɑ pɑt tɑkpel nɑ e, k l pɑtmin nɑ sɑɑ ŋɑnm pukn.
41002022	Nnɑ e mun k suɑ kɑn jii dɑpɑɑnin k liɑk dɑlenkpel ni. L i tie k u tien nnɑ i e, k dɑpɑɑnin nɑ tɑn mɔ yuo nbɑ l sɑɑ yiel dɑlenkpel nɑ e, k dɑɑn mɑnŋ n muɑn yɑnn k linlenn nɑ n mun yiel. L pɑɑk b tuu jikt dɑpɑɑnin k liɑkt linlenpɑɑnn ni e.» Suifnbɑ Fuondɑɑl lɑbɑɑl
41002023	Tɔn, Suifnbɑ fuondɑsiɑl, k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din gɑɑl dii kpɑɑnt ni. Bɑɑ din sɑɑ mɑnŋ k u puolpoweitieb nɑ toktl dikɑlɑ k pini k ŋmɑn ŋɑɑn sɑɑ.
41002024	Ŋɑnn e k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «Gotl, bee k b tuun lin nbɑ k t senni k cɑb ɑ bii tuun Fuondɑɑl i?»
41002025	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «I k mi lii Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni Dɑɑfiid nbɑ din tun biɑnŋ nbɑ yuo nbɑ k kon din gbɑt ŋuɑ nɑn u juɑmu, k b din k mɔk jiet nɑ ɑɑ?
41002026	U din kuɑ Yennu ŋɑɑk ni, k sɑɑ jii pɑɑnu nbɑ k b bil Yennu tuɑnn k ŋmɑn yuo nbɑ k Abiɑtɑ din tie mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ nɑ. K senni nɑ din k cɑb nɑn suɑ n di pɑɑnu mɑnŋ sie Yennu mɑnntieb kuukuɑ e. Ŋɑɑn Dɑɑfiid mɑnŋ din ŋmɑn e, k biɑ tul u juɑmu nɑ gbɑɑ k b mun ŋmɑn.»
41002027	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu ŋɑnm k yet’b ɑ: «Nisɑɑlk sonml pɑɑk e k Yennu senn Fuondɑɑl. L k tie Fuondɑɑl pɑɑk kɑɑ k u din nɑn niib.
41002028	L pɑɑk Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ e tie Fuondɑɑl Yonmdɑɑnɔ biɑk.»
41003001	Yiesu din biɑ kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni, k jɑsuɑ din be lenŋ k u nuu kpo.
41003002	K nisiɑb din be lenŋ k goli Yiesu, ɑ bin lɑɑn u sɑɑ te k niikpienn dɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ n pɑɑk Fuondɑɑl, k bin tɑɑl’ɔ l po oo?
41003003	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yiin niikpienn dɑɑnɔ nɑ ɑ: «Fiit k set niib nɑ sinsuuk ni,»
41003004	ŋɑɑn boi niib nɑ ɑ: «T senni cɑb ɑ tii tuun bonŋɑnn Fuondɑɑl ɑmi bonbiil i? A t fɑt nilɔ k lu ɑmi t kpi’u u?» Ŋɑɑn k b ji din ŋmin ɑ.
41003005	K u got k lint’b nɑn wutuol, k mɑɑn u pɑl din biil bonciɑnn nɑn bɑɑ tie kɑngbɑtɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k u ŋmɑnt k yet juɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «Tɑntl ɑ nuu mɑnŋ.» K u tɑnt u nuu mɑnŋ k l lɑ lɑɑfiɑ.
41003006	L yuo nɑ k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ din ŋmɑt nyii, k ŋɑnm nɑn kpɑnbɑl Heluod puolpo juɑmu din lol suol nɑn lieb bɑɑ sɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ k kpi Yiesu.
41003007	K Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din fiil k sik mɔkgbenŋl nɑ kpinŋ, k nibulciɑɔnŋ din wɑɑ u puolpo, bin nbɑ din nyii Gɑɑliile nɑn Suude
41003008	nɑn Selusɑɑlenm nɑn Idume nɑn Suulden mɔk-puotl, nɑn Tiil nɑn Siidɔn tingbounŋ ni, k b yɑb bonciɑnn k tikl u buol. Bɑɑ din gbɑt wɑɑ din tuun lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k b din bɑɑl u buol ni.
41003009	K u yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ bin lɑ bulgbetl tul’ɔ, ɑ k nibul nɑ tɑn dɑɑ tut’ɔ,
41003010	k mɑɑn wɑɑ din te k bɑɑtb bonciɑnn pɑɑk nɑ pɑɑk e din te k bin nbɑ kul yiɑl ji din nɑki ɑ bin sii’u.
41003011	Nɑlnbiit nbɑ din tuu lɑ’u yuo nbɑ kul ɑ b din tuu bɑɑ u tuɑnn e k fɑɑ wuyikinŋ k yien ɑ: «Fin e tie Yennu Bijɑ.»
41003012	K u din kpɑɑn’m nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ b dɑɑ muɑntl wɑɑ tie wun nbɑ. piik nɑn bɑnle
41003013	L puolpo k Yiesu duo juɑl pɑɑk ŋɑɑn yiin bin nbɑ k u luon bin bɑɑl nɑ, k b bɑɑl u buol ni.
41003014	K u gɑnn niib piik nɑn bɑnle, k yi’b tuomiinbɑ, ɑ bii be u buol ni, ɑ wuu tuun’m k bii muɑntl u lɑbɑmɑnn,
41003015	kii biɑ kii mɔk yiikuo kii fit kii nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni.
41003016	Wɑɑ din gɑnn niib nbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ, b sɑnɑ e nɑ: Siimɔn, wun nbɑ k Yiesu din pul’ɔ Piɑl nɑ,
41003017	nɑn Sɑɑk nɑn u nɑɑ bik Sɑn, bin nbɑ din tie Sebede wɑɑs nɑ, bin nbɑ k Yiesu din pul’b Boɑneljes, k l pɑɑk tie sɑtiɑni wɑɑs,
41003018	nɑn Andle nɑn Fiiliip, nɑn Bɑɑltelemi, nɑn Mɑɑtieo, nɑn Tuomɑ, nɑn Sɑɑk wun nbɑ din tie Alfe bik, nɑn Tɑɑde, nɑn Siimɔn wun nbɑ din luon ŋɑnm Suifnbɑ i yenn b mɔnŋ,
41003019	nɑn Suudɑ wun nbɑ din tɑn nyii Yiesu puol nɑ.
41003020	L puolpo k Yiesu kun, k nibulciɑɔnŋ din tikl ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb buol ni, k b tɑn kɔnŋ yɑɑk nɑn jiet dinu.
41003021	U ŋɑɑtieb nbɑ din gbɑt nnɑ, k b bɑɑl ɑ bin suol’ɔ, k mɑɑn b din yien ɑ u wɑɑt e.
41003022	K Yennu senniwɑntieb nbɑ din nyii Selusɑɑlenm nɑ mun din yet ɑ: «Nɑlnbiit bɑt Beelsebuul nɑ e be u ni, k u nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni, ŋuɑ Beelsebuul yiikuo ni.»
41003023	K Yiesu din yiin wɑntieb mɑnŋ ɑ bii bɑɑt nɑ, ŋɑɑn yin’m bɑljokt k boi’b ɑ: « Sɑɑtɑn sɑɑ sɑk nyinn u mɔnŋ ii?
41003024	Nɑɑn niib i ŋmɑt k kɔn tuokt b lieb, b nɑɑn mɑnŋ kɑn fit set.
41003025	K ŋɑɑk niib i ŋmɑt kɔn nɑn lieb, b ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ kɑn fit set.
41003026	K Sɑɑtɑn i ŋmɑt kɔn nɑn u mɔnŋ, u kɑn fit set, u juontu telk e nɑ.
41003027	«Suɑ kɑn fit kuɑ pɑnŋ dɑɑnɔ ŋɑɑk ni k sɑɑ jɑn u mɔktuk, sie k u dɔnŋ k lol’ɔ ŋɑɑn yen ji fit k jɑn u mɔktuk mɑnŋ.»
41003028	K Yiesu ŋɑnm yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, Yennu sɑɑ nyik cɑb nifosɑɑli b biit nɑn b bɑlbiit kul ɑ,
41003029	ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ kul suki Foŋɑnm, Yennu kɑn mi k nyik cɑb l dɑɑnɔ fɑb ɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.»
41003030	Yiesu din pɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn bɑɑ din yet ɑ: «Nɑlnbiiuk be u ni nɑ.»
41003031	L yuo nɑ k Yiesu nɑɑ nɑn u ninjɑnm din bɑɑl k sie nɑn-yel po, ŋɑɑn tun suɑ ɑ wun yiin’ɔ nɑ.
41003032	K nibulciɑɔnŋ din kɑl k lint’ɔ wɑɑ, k u be sinsuuk ni, k b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Gɑfɑlɑ, ɑ nɑɑ nɑn ɑ ninjɑnm [nɑn ɑ niipuob] be nɑn-yel po k luon’ɑ.»
41003033	K Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «Ŋmee dɑɑ tie n nɑɑ, k lɑnm e mun tie n ninjɑnm i?»
41003034	ŋɑɑn got bin nbɑ kɑl k lint’ɔ nɑ k yet ɑ: «N nɑɑ nɑn n ninjɑnm e be nnɑ nɑ.
41003035	Wun nbɑ kul tuun Yennu lonm, ŋuɑ e tie n ninjɑ nɑn n niipuo nɑn n nɑɑ.»
41004001	Yiesu yɑɑn din piin k tumi niib Gɑɑliile mɔkgbenŋl kpinŋ, k nibulciɑɔnŋ bɑɑl u buol ni. Wɑɑ din lɑ k nigbɑnu nɑ yɑbt nɑ, k u kuɑ bulgbetsiɑl ni, k sik nyun ni, ŋɑɑn k niib nɑ biɑl k sie gbingbɑnn
41004002	U din yiin’m bɑljokt k wɑnt’b mɑɑn bonciɑnn. U din yin ɑ:
41004003	«Gbiintl mɑn, jɑsuɑ din duo u kpɑɑb ɑ wun sɑɑ bul tɑn.
41004004	Wɑɑ din buul nɑ, k bonbuoli nɑ yenn-nbɑ yɑt k bɑɑ sɑnjouk pɑɑk k nuɑni wei k tɔkl.
41004005	K liel mun din bɑɑ tɑnpuut pɑɑk siɑn nbɑ k tɑnt k yɑb. Tɑnt nbɑ k yɑb nɑ, k l piɑ k kpɑɑt yiɑn ɑ,
41004006	ŋɑɑn yennu nbɑ tɑn tonŋ yuo nbɑ, k l juɑk. Lɑɑ din k fit sikn jiinɑ nɑ pɑɑk, l kul din kpo e.
41004007	K liel mun din bɑɑ kunkoni ni, k tɑn lɑkn piɑ k kpɑɑt nɑn’m, ŋɑɑn k kunkoni ŋmɑbl’l k l k fit nɑn.
41004008	Ŋɑɑn k liel mun din bɑɑ tinŋɑnŋ ni k piɑ, k kpɑɑt fɑnu, k nɑn nɑɑnŋɑɔnŋ, k yenn-nbɑ nɑn dibin piintɑtɑ, k lielnbɑ mun nɑn piinluobluob, k siɑb mun nɑn kobk kobk.»
41004009	Yiesu yet ɑ: «Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ k sɑɑ gbɑt, wun gbiint»
41004010	L puolpo e k nisiɑb nbɑ din be Yiesu penŋ, nɑn u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ, tɑn boi’ɔ bɑljokt nɑ pɑɑk.
41004011	K u yet’b ɑ: «Yinm ŋɑnin, Yennu fiit wuol ni mɑɑn k jii jiin u nɑɑn po k wɑnn’i wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ k be i ni nɑ ŋɑnin gbiɑ bonsiɑl kul ɑ nɑn bɑljokt e ɑ:
41004012	‹Bin got ŋɑɑn dɑɑ lɑɑt k biɑ gbiint ŋɑɑn dɑɑ bɑnt l pɑɑk, k mɑɑn b i lɑ k bɑnn b sɑɑ jen k bɑɑl Yennu buol ni k wun nyik cɑb b biit ɑ.› »
41004013	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu boi niib nɑn u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ: «I k bɑnn bɑljouk nɑ pɑɑk ii? K nlee k i sɑɑ mi bɑnn bɑljokt kul ɑ pɑɑk i?
41004014	Tɑnbultuɑ buul Yennu mɑɑn nɑ e.
41004015	K nisiɑb nɑɑn nɑn sɑnjouk nbɑ k Yennu mɑɑn bɑɑ l pɑɑk nɑ e, k yuo nbɑ k b gbɑt mɑɑn mɑnŋ, Sɑɑtɑn tuu bɑɑl e k nyinn’l b pɑlɑ ni yiɑn ɑ.
41004016	Nisiɑb mun gɑɑl bonbuoli tɑnpuut pɑɑk e. B tie bin nbɑ gɑɑl Yennu mɑɑn nɑn pɑlpienn yiɑn ɑ,
41004017	ŋɑɑn mɑɑn mɑnŋ k mɔk jiinɑ b ni k b k diɑ’l k l wei. Yuo nbɑ k niib dint’b fɑlɑ, ɑmi muksuk tɑn bɑɑl’b mɑɑn mɑnŋ pɑɑk, b tuu lu e yiɑn ɑ.
41004018	Lieb mun gɑɑl bonbuoli mɑnŋ kunkoni sinsuuk ni. B gbiɑ mɑɑn mɑnŋ,
41004019	ŋɑɑn tingbounŋ nɑ fɑlɑ, nɑn mɔktuk lonm, nɑn niɑnbuolu buolu tuu kuɑ k nyɑkn mɑɑn mɑnŋ k l kɑn nɑn.
41004020	Lieb mun gɑɑl bonbuoli tinŋɑnŋ ni. Ŋɑnm e tie bin nbɑ gbiɑ mɑɑn mɑnŋ k gɑɑn. Siɑb nɑɑn fuunu piintɑtɑ, k siɑb nɑɑn fuunu piinluobluob, k siɑb mun biɑ nɑɑn fuunu kobk kobk.»
41004021	Yiesu biɑ din boi’b ɑ: «Suɑ mi k kuɑ ŋɑɑk ni nɑn fitl k cibn bokt l pɑɑk, ɑmi k gul’l gɑdo lɔunŋ ni ii? Aɑi. Sie k u jii’l k tuɑnn bonsiɑl nbɑ fɔk nɑ pɑɑk.
41004022	Mɑɑn nbɑ kul wuo, sie k l tɑn wuot nyii pɑɑnu ni, k lin nbɑ kul mun be bunbɔnn ni tɑn sɑɑ nyi yentu ni.
41004023	Suɑ i mɔk tubɑ k sɑɑ gbɑt, wun gbiint.»
41004024	«Gotl mɑn, ŋɑɑn kii mi yɑɑ gbiintl lin nbɑ. Yɑɑ gɑɑl Yennu piini k tuun nɑn’n biɑnŋ nbɑ, Yennu tɑn sɑɑ pɑ’i l biɑnŋ k biɑ pukn’i siɑl l pɑɑk.
41004025	K mɑɑn wun nbɑ mɔk, b biɑ sɑɑ pukn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ k mɔk nɑ, b biɑ sɑɑ gɑɑl lin nbɑ k u yɑɑ ɑ u mɔk wɑɑn nɑ.»
41004026	K Yiesu biɑ ŋɑnm yet ɑ: «Yennu nɑɑn nɑɑn nnɑ e: l tie nɑn nilɔ nbɑ tuu bul tɑn u kpɑɑb ni.
41004027	Wuu lek i guɑnt nyiɑɔk kuo u fiil yennu ni, bonbuoli nɑ tuu pɑ k kpɑɑtl, ŋɑɑn k u k mi lɑɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ k pɑ k kpɑɑtl.
41004028	Tinŋ nɑ e tuu te k bonbuoli mɑnŋ n pɑ k kpɑɑtl k biɑ nɑɑn. L tuu put kpɑnn e sinsinn, l puolpo k fɑɑt n nyi, k dipukɑ n nyi k wei.
41004029	Dii mɑnŋ i biel yuo nbɑ, kpɑɑlɔ nɑ ji sɑɑ piin jɑnu e nɑn u dijɑɑnjuk, k mɑɑn jɑɑmu yuo ji bɑɑl e nɑ.»
41004030	Lin nbɑ nɑ puolpo k Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «T dɑɑ sɑɑ bikn Yennu nɑɑn nɑn lɑnn po e? T sɑɑ yin bɑljolɑnn e k wɑnn lɑɑ tie bɑnnu nbɑ?
41004031	L tie nɑn kpint tiik nbɑ k b yi’l muutɑɑld nɑ e. B i jii k bul tinŋ ni, k l wɑɑl k gɑl tingbounŋ nɑ bonbuoli kul ɑ,
41004032	ŋɑɑn l i tɑn piɑ k kpɑɑt l ji tuu yɑb kpint tiini kul ɑ, k mɔk yiingbenŋɑ, k nuɑni ji tuu tɑn tiɑ tiɑt l yiini nɑ pɑɑk.»
41004033	Yiesu din yiin bɑljokt bonciɑnn nɑn nɑ nɑ e, k nyint Yennu mɑɑn k tien niib nɑn bɑɑ sɑɑ fit bɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ.
41004034	U k mi k pɑk nɑn’m mɑɑn sie bɑljokt kuukuɑ. Ŋɑɑn u din tuu tɑn ŋɑnm wɑnn u puolpoweitieb bɑljokt mɑnŋ kul pɑɑk yuo nbɑ k b tɑn biɑl be b kuukuɑ e.
41004035	L dɑɑl mɑnŋ dɑɑjuouk k Yiesu yet u puolpoweitieb k yɑɑ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin puot mɔkgbenŋl nɑ puotl mɑn »
41004036	L yuo e k b nyik nibul nɑ, k kuɑ wɑɑ kɑl bulgbetl nbɑ ni nɑ, k ŋɑnm nɑn ŋuɑ lɑkn sɑɑn, k bulgbetliɑ biɑ din be nɑn’ɔ.
41004037	Bɑɑ be bulgbetl mɑnŋ ni k suɑ wonpɑɑluk fikt, k nyunpɑnɑ piin liɑt kuɑ bulgbetl mɑnŋ ni, k l tɑn yɑɑ lin gbie.
41004038	L yuo Yiesu din duɑ bulgbetl mɑnŋ puolpo k kpɑɑk yukpɑktl pɑɑk k guɑnt. Ŋɑnn e k u puolpoweitieb fiin’ɔ k yɑɑ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, tɑɑ yɑɑ t kpo nɑ, ɑ bɑkɑ kɑɑ t po oo?»
41004039	K u fiil set k tiɑn wonpɑɑluk nɑ pɑɑk k biɑ yet nyunpɑnɑ nɑ mun ɑ: «Duɑt suon nnɑ.» K wonpɑɑluk mɑnŋ gbenn, k nyun nɑ mun ji duɑ k muu dik dik.
41004040	Ŋɑnn e k u boi u puolpoweitieb mɑnŋ ɑ: «Bee k i mɔk gbɑnɑnjeknt i? I biɑ dɑɑ k mɔk yɑdɑ ɑɑ?»
41004041	K jɑŋmɑɑni din suol’b bonciɑnn, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «Jɑbuol bee e nɑ? K wounŋ nɑn nyunpɑnɑ wɑɑ sɑɑk u mɔb i?»
41005001	L puolpo Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din puot Gɑɑliile mɔkgbenŋl nɑ gbingbɑnliel po, Gelɑsetieb tinŋ ni.
41005002	Yiesu nbɑ nyii bulgbetl nɑ ni yuo nbɑ, l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k jɑsuɑ nyii kɑɑt ni k cet’ɔ. Nɑlnbiiuk din be juɑ nɑ ni,
41005003	k u duɑ kɑɑt nɑ ni. Suɑ ji din kɑɑ k sɑɑ fit bɑɑn’ɔ bɑnt, k biɑ kɑn fit lol’ɔ nɑn jɑluk gbɑɑ,
41005004	k mɑɑn b i bɑɑn u nii nɑn u tɑɑ bɑnt, ŋɑɑn u din tuu yɑn bɑnt nɑ kul ɑ k biɑ ciel kut nɑ u tɑɑ ni. Suɑ din k mɔk pɑnŋ nbɑ sɑɑ fit diɑ’u.
41005005	Nyiɑɔk nɑn yennu ni kul k u lin kɑɑt nɑn juɑt ni k yikn ŋɑɑn diɑ tɑnɑ k ŋmɑ u mɔnŋ.
41005006	Wɑɑ din dɑɑ be bɑnfɔkl ɑ ŋɑɑn lɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ, k u tin k tɑn gbɑɑn Yiesu tuɑnn ni,
