41005007	ŋɑɑn yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ k yet ɑ: «Yiesu fin nbɑ tie Yɑbnt Yennu Bijɑ, min nɑn fin nlee mɑntk i? Yennu pɑɑk k n bɑln’mɑ, ɑ dɑɑ muksl’n.»
41005008	U yet nnɑ e, k mɑɑn Yiesu ponŋ yɑki nɑn nɑlnbiiuk nɑ ɑ: «Fin nɑlnbiiuk nɑ, nyin juɑ nɑ ni.»
41005009	L puolpo k Yiesu boi’ɔ ɑ: «A sɑnn ii?» K u jiin ɑ: «N sɑnn yi Bul e, k mɑɑn t yɑb bonciɑnn.»
41005010	K u bɑln’mɔ ɑ u dɑɑ nyint’b tinŋ nɑ ni.
41005011	L yuo mɑnŋ k duoli bonciɑnn din k fɔk nɑn juɑl k di jiet.
41005012	K nɑlnbiit nɑ bɑln Yiesu ɑ: «Cɑb’t k tin sɑɑn kuɑ duoli nɑ ni.»
41005013	K Yiesu cɑb’b sɔnu, k b nyii juɑ nɑ ni, k kuɑ duoli nɑ ni. K duoli nɑ nyii juɑl nɑ pɑɑk k tin sik mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni k sɑɑ dii nyun b kul ɑ. Duoli nɑ kɑnn din tie nɑn tusɑ ŋɑnle nɑ e.
41005014	K bin nbɑ guu duoli nɑ fiil k ciɑl k sɑɑ muɑnt l lɑbɑɑl duo ni nɑn kpɑɑnt ni. K niib bɑɑl ɑ bin lɑ lin nbɑ tun mɑnŋ kul ɑ.
41005015	Bɑɑ bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni yuo nbɑ k lɑ juɑ nbɑ k nɑlnbul bo be u ni nɑ, k u ji kɑl lenŋ nɑn lɑɑfiɑ nɑn u dudukt kul ɑ fɑnu k ji liɑ tiɑt, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol’b.
41005016	K bin nbɑ lɑ’l nɑn b nuni nɑ yet’b lin nbɑ tun k tul juɑ nbɑ k nɑlnbiit din be u ni nɑ, k biɑ yet’b duoli nɑ lɑbɑɑl.
41005017	Ŋɑnn e k niib nɑ din piin k bɑln Yiesu ɑ wun nyi b tinŋ ni.
41005018	Yiesu nbɑ din tie siil ɑ wun kuɑ bulgbetl nɑ yuo nbɑ, k juɑ nbɑ k Yiesu nyinn nɑlnbiit u ni nɑ bɑln’mɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k min nɑn fin n lɑkn sɑɑn »
41005019	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu k sɑk, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii ŋmɑt kii kun ɑ ŋɑɑk ni ɑ niib buol k sɑɑ wɑnn’b Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ tin’ɑ ninbɑɑɔk k tun lin nbɑ k tul’ɑ.»
41005020	Ŋɑnn e k juɑ nɑ ji lin tingbounŋ nbɑ k b yil Doi-piik nɑ ni, k muɑntl lin nbɑ kul k Yiesu tun tul’ɔ mɑnŋ, k l tien suɑ kul yɑɑl-lituk.
41005021	L puolpo k Yiesu biɑ ŋmɑt puot mɔkgbenŋl nɑ gbingbɑnliel. Wɑɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl mɔkgbenŋl gbingbɑnn pɑɑk nɑ, k nibulciɑɔnŋ tikl k lint’ɔ.
41005022	K jɑsuɑ bɑɑl lenŋ, k u sɑnn yi Sɑilus. U din tie Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni sɑɑkɑsuɑ e. Juɑ nɑ nbɑ lɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ k u gbɑɑn Yiesu tuɑnn ni,
41005023	k bɑln’mɔ nɑn u pɑl kul ɑ ɑ: «N bonpobik e yiɑl k pel kuun ɑ. N bɑln’mɑ e. Bɑɑt k tɑn yii ɑ nii u pɑɑk k wun lek lɑ lɑɑfiɑ k biɑl u mɑnfuol ni.»
41005024	Ŋɑnn e Yiesu ji ciɑn’ɔ. K nibulciɑɔnŋ mun biɑ wɑɑ k muk k tut Yiesu
41005025	Puosuɑ nnɑ mun din be k siik fɑbounŋ k tɑn jɑnŋ binɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle.
41005026	U din lɑ fɑlɑ bonciɑnn wɑɑ tuu lin tebtieb bonciɑnn buol ni ɑ wun teb u mɔnŋ, k tɑn gbenn u likli, ŋɑɑn k yiɑlu nɑ biɑ puki yuo kul.
41005027	Wɑɑ din tɑn gbɑt Yiesu po nɑ, k u bɑɑl nibul nɑ ni, k wei u puolpo k sii u liɑtfuouk, k mɑɑn u din duki u pɑl ni ɑ:
41005028	«Mi i lek i sɑt sii u liɑtfuouk kuukuɑ i e, ŋɑɑn n sɑɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ wɑɑ.»
41005029	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u fɑbounŋ nɑ ji din jit, k u bɑnn nɑn u lɑ lɑɑfiɑ wɑɑ.
41005030	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Yiesu bɑnn nɑn pɑnŋ nyii u ni wɑɑ. K u gbiɑ boi niib nɑ ɑ: «Ŋmee sii n liɑtfuouk u?»
41005031	K u puolpoweitieb mun ŋmɑnt boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin lɑ k nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ muk’ɑ nnɑ, ŋɑɑn k ɑ boi ɑ ŋmee siit’ɑ ni i?»
41005032	Ŋɑɑn k u lek biɑ goli lintl, ɑ wun lɑ nisuɑ nbɑ e sii’u.
41005033	Ŋɑɑn puo nɑ nbɑ bɑnn lin nbɑ tun u gbɑnɑnt ni nɑ pɑɑk, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol’ɔ, k u jekl yɔl yɔl, k bɑɑl tɑn gbɑɑn Yiesu tuɑnn ni, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ bɑlmɔni kul.
41005034	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «N bipuo, fɑɑ tien’n yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e te k ɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ. Ii sɑɑ nɑn mɑnu k ɑ yiɑlu kul gbenn ɑ.»
41005035	Yiesu nbɑ dɑɑ be piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ k siɑb nyii Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok sɑɑkuɑ nɑ ŋɑɑk ni k bɑɑl k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «A bonpobik nɑ tɑɑn kpo wɑɑ. Bee k ɑ ji muks Wɑntuɑ nɑ?»
41005036	K Yiesu lek k fiin bɑɑ yet lin nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn yet sɑɑkuɑ nɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. Tient’n yɑdɑ kuukuɑ.»
41005037	Yiesu din k sɑk k suɑ n ciɑn’ɔ, sie Piɑl nɑn Sɑɑk nɑn u ninjɑ Sɑn.
41005038	Bɑɑ din bɑɑl ŋɑɑk nɑ ni yuo nbɑ k Yiesu gbɑt fuut nɑn kumɔni.
41005039	Ŋɑnn e k u kuɑ k boi’b ɑ: «Bee fuut e nnɑ mɑn i? Bee k i bui? Bik nɑ k kpo kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u guɑnt e.»
41005040	Bɑɑ gbɑt u mɑɑn nɑ k b lɑɑ’u. Ŋɑnn e k u bel’b nyinn’b, ŋɑɑn jii bik nɑ bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ k pukn bin nbɑ ciɑn’ɔ nɑ po, k b kuɑ siɑn nbɑ k bik nɑ duɑ.
41005041	Bɑɑ kuɑ yuo nbɑ, k u suol bik nɑ nuu ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Tɑɑliitɑ kuunm.» (L pɑɑk tie: «Bonpobik, mi i yet’ɑ, fiit.»)
41005042	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k bonpobik nɑ fiil set kɑkbi, k sonm lin, (U din tie binɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle bik e.). K l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b bonciɑnn.
41005043	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu kpɑɑn’m, ɑ bii mi k bin yet suɑ, k biɑ yet’b ɑ bin tul bik nɑ jiet k wun di.
41006001	L puolpo e k Yiesu nyii lenŋ k ŋmɑt kun u mɔnŋ duo ni, k u puolpoweitieb din wɑɑ’u.
41006002	K Fuondɑɑl k u tɑn kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni k wɑnt niib Yennu mɑɑn k l tien nibul nɑ kul yɑɑl-lituk, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «U lɑ dudukt nɑ lee? Yɑnbuol-lɑnn po e k u mɔk mɑn i? K nlee k u tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nɑ?
41006003	Kɑnpintɑ nɑ kɑɑ nɑ ɑɑ? Mɑɑli bijɑ nɑ kɑɑ ɑɑ? Ŋuɑ kɑɑ tie Sɑɑk nɑn Suosiɑf nɑn Suudɑ nɑn Siimɔn ninjɑ nɑ ɑɑ? U niipuob kɑɑ be nnɑ nɑ ɑɑ?» L pɑɑk e te k b ji k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.
41006004	Ŋɑnn e k u yet’b ɑ: « Yennu sɔkni k kɔnŋt nibɑɑkl sie u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ duo ni nɑn u tiɑɔnŋ niib buol ni, nɑn u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ŋɑɑk ni.»
41006005	U din k fit tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ lenŋ, sie bɑɑtb bɑnŋɑ nnɑ e k u din yii u nii b pɑɑk, k b lɑ lɑɑfiɑ.
41006006	U niib nɑ nbɑ din k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’ɔ bonciɑnn. piik nɑn bɑnle L puolpo e k Yiesu lin digbɑnbis ni k tumi niib,
41006007	k din tɑn lɑkn u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle k tul’b pɑnŋ ɑ bii nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni, k yɑɑ wun tun’m bɑnlele,
41006008	k u yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ jikt siɑl k sɑɑ, sie pɑtdiɑkɑi kuukuɑ. I dɑɑ diɑ pɑɑnu, i biɑ dɑɑ diɑ sunsonmpɑkɑ, i biɑ dɑɑ wuu likli i jɑfɑɑnbɑ ni.
41006009	I pil tɑɑsɑɑt, ŋɑɑn suɑ dɑɑ jikt liɑtfuouk k puki ŋɑnle.»
41006010	K u biɑ yet’b ɑ: «L i tie k i bɑɑl ŋɑɑk nbɑ ni, k b gɑɑl’i, yii be lenŋ nɑn dɑɑl nbɑ k i tɑn sɑɑ nyi duo nɑ ni.
41006011	L i tie k i bɑɑl duo nbɑ ni, k niib nɑ k gɑɑl’i, k biɑ k gbiintl i mɑɑn, yin nyi duo mɑnŋ ni, k pit i tɑɑpɑnt ni tɑnt bil l duo ni, k lin wɑnn nɑn bin suol b mɔnŋ.»
41006012	K u puolpoweitieb fiil sɑɑn muɑntl k yien niib ɑ bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ,
41006013	k biɑ nyint nɑlnbiit niib bonciɑnn ni, k biɑ jikt kpɑn k sɔ bɑɑtb bonciɑnn pɑɑk k b pɑɑkt.
41006014	Tɔn, kpɑnbɑl Heluod din gbɑt Yiesu lɑbɑɑl k mɑɑn u sɑnn din duo bonciɑnn, k nisiɑb yien ɑ: «Sɑn wun nbɑ dɑɑn wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ fiil kuun ni. Ŋɑnn e te k u mɔk yiikuo k fit tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ nɑ.»
41006015	K siɑb mun yɑɑ ɑ: «U tie Yennu sɔkni Elii e,» k lieb mun biɑ yɑɑ ɑ: «U tie Yennu sɔkni nɑn yɑɑyuo ni sɔkniinbɑ nbɑ yenɔ nɑ e.»
41006016	Kpɑnbɑl Heluod ŋɑnin nbɑ gbɑt yuo nbɑ nɑ, k u yet ɑ: «U tie Sɑn wun nbɑ k n dɑɑn te k b pot u yul nɑ e, ŋɑɑn k u jen be u mɑnfuol ni.»
41006017	Heluod tiɑɔnŋ o din te k b suol Sɑn k bɑɑn’ɔ bɑnt k kuɑn’ɔ dɑnsɑlk. Heluod mɑnŋ din tun nnɑ k mɑɑn wɑɑ din fɑt u ninjɑ Fiiliip ŋɑɑpuo Heluodiɑd k kuɑn’ɔ nɑ pɑɑk.
41006018	K Sɑn din tuu yien Heluod ɑ Yennu senni k cɑb’ɔ nɑn wun fɑt u ninjɑ ŋɑɑpuo k kuɑn.
41006019	Lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk Heluodiɑd ji din nɑn Sɑn, k luon wun kpi’u, ŋɑɑn k k fit,
41006020	k mɑɑn Heluod din tiin Sɑn, k biɑ diɑ’u fɑnu k mɑɑn u mi nɑn Sɑn tie niŋɑnɔ k tiin Yennu. Yuo nbɑ k Heluod din gbiintl Sɑn mɑɑn nɑ, fei tuu mɔk’ɔ k l ŋmɑt u yɑn, ŋɑɑn k u lek luon mɑɑn mɑnŋ gbiintu.
41006021	L puolpo siɑl din tɑn tien k luot sɔnu tul Heluodiɑd. Heluod mɑɑlu jɑɑnm dɑɑl tɑn bɑɑl, k u yiin u nɑɑn kpɑɑkɑ, nɑn sejenm yudɑnm, nɑn Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni sɑɑkɑb kul.
41006022	Ŋɑnn e k Heluodiɑd sɑpɑɑnbik bɑɑl k wɑɑ siɑk, k kpɑnbɑl Heluod nɑn u sɑɑnm pɑlɑ penn, k u yet sɑpɑɑnbik mɑnŋ ɑ: «Boi’n lin nbɑ kul k ɑ luon po, k n sɑɑ tul’ɑ.»
41006023	K Heluod pol ɑ: «N sɑɑ tul’ɑ lin nbɑ kul k ɑ luon, hɑli l i lek i bɑɑl k n tul’ɑ n yent ni bɔkl gbɑɑ.»
41006024	Ŋɑnn e k sɑpɑɑnbik nɑ nyii, k sɑɑ boi u nɑɑ ɑ: «N tɑɑn sɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ n luon bee nɑ?» K u nɑɑ jiin ɑ: «Yetl’ɔ ɑ ɑ luon Sɑn wun nbɑ wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ yul e.»
41006025	L yuo nɑ k bonpobik nɑ ŋmɑt yiɑn ɑ k sɑɑn kpɑnbɑl Heluod buol ni k yet’ɔ ɑ: «N luon Sɑn wun nbɑ wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ yul e k ɑ kpien tɑtlɑɑɔk ni k tul’n mɔtɑɑmɔtɑɑnɑ.»
41006026	K lin nbɑ nɑ tul kpɑnbɑl Heluod pɑlbiil bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn u ji din k luon wun yet bik mɑnŋ nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn wɑɑ pol lin nbɑ sɑɑnm mɑnŋ buol ni nɑ pɑɑk.
41006027	Ŋɑnn e k u tun yupot-tuɑ l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni, k yet’ɔ ɑ wun jen nɑn Sɑn yul tul’ɔ. K yupot-tuɑ nɑ sɑɑn dɑnsɑlk ni k sɑɑ pot Sɑn yul,
41006028	k kpien tɑtlɑɑɔk ni, k jen nɑn’n k tɑn tul bonpobik mɑnŋ, k u mun jii’l k tul u nɑɑ.
41006029	Sɑn puolpoweitieb nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ nɑ, k b bɑɑl k tɑn jii u gbɑnɑnt k pii.
41006030	L puolpo e k Yiesu tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ ŋmɑt jen u buol ni k tɑn yet’ɔ lin nbɑ kul k b tun k biɑ wɑnn niib.
41006031	Nigbounŋ lek din tut, k siɑb bɑɑt k siɑb ŋmɑt, k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb kɔnŋ yɑɑk nɑn bin di jiet. L pɑɑk k u yet’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k t yɑɑt sɑɑn muuk ni t kuukuɑ, k foi wɑɑn.»
41006032	Ŋɑnn e k b kuɑ bulgbetl ni k puot sɑɑn muuk ni, b kuukuɑ.
41006033	Ŋɑɑn bɑɑ din sɑɑn yuo nbɑ k niib bonciɑnn lɑ’b k bɑnn’b, k nyii doi kul ni k tin k kokn mɔkgbenŋl kpinŋ k dɔnŋ cet’b.
41006034	K Yiesu nbɑ tɑn nyii bulgbetl nɑ ni, k u lɑ k nigbɑnu nɑ ponŋ tikl k muk, k ninbɑɑɔk suol’ɔ bonciɑnn, k mɑɑn b nɑɑn nɑn pei nbɑ k mɔk pekpɑɑlk nɑ e. K u piin l yuo k wɑnt’b bonɑ bonciɑnn.
41006035	K yuo din tɑn gɑl bonciɑnn k u puolpoweitieb tɑn bɑɑl u buol ni k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yuo gɑl ɑ, k nnɑ nɑ mun tie muuk ni e.
41006036	Nyikn niib mɑnŋ k bin sɑɑn duo ni nɑn digbɑnbis nbɑ kpiɑ nɑ ni k lɑ jiet k dɑɑ k di.»
41006037	Ŋɑɑn k u mun jiin yet’b ɑ: «I mɔnŋ n tul’b jiet k bin di.» K b ŋmɑnt boi’ɔ: «A luon k t jii denienbɑ kobiinle (200) k sɑɑn dɑɑ pɑɑnu k tɑn tul’b ɑ bin di ii?»
41006038	K u boi’b ɑ: «I mɔk pɑɑni ŋɑnŋɑ e? Ii sɑɑn got mɑn.» Bɑɑ sɑɑn got k bɑnn yuo nbɑ k b jen k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «L tie pɑɑni ŋɑnŋmu e nɑn jɑni ŋɑnle.»
41006039	L puolpo k Yiesu yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ bin te k nibul mɑnŋ n bɔkt kɑl mɔpɑɑɔnŋ pɑɑk wolɑ wolɑ nnɑ.
41006040	K b bɔkt kobk kobk, nɑn piinŋmuŋmu, k kɑl pɑɑbu pɑɑbu.
41006041	K u jii pɑɑni ŋɑnŋmu nɑ, nɑn jɑni ŋɑnle nɑ, ŋɑɑn yɑɑt got sɑnpɑɑpo, k tul Yennu niipuouk, ŋɑɑn ŋmit ŋmit pɑɑni nɑ k tul u puolpoweitieb ɑ bin tol niib mɑnŋ, k u biɑ ŋmit ŋmit jɑni ŋɑnle nɑ, k b tol suɑ kul ɑ.
41006042	K suɑ kul dii gbuo k biɑ tenn.
41006043	K u puolpoweitieb lɑkn pɑɑnbulɑ nɑn jɑni nbɑ tenn nɑ, k l gbie kpɑncubt piik nɑn ŋɑnle.
41006044	Jɑb nbɑ din dii jiet mɑnŋ din tie tusɑ ŋɑnŋmu e (5,000).
41006045	Lin nbɑ nɑ puolpo, l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Yiesu miɑ u puolpoweitieb k b kuɑ bulgbetl nɑ ni k gɑl u tuɑnn po k puot mɔk-puotliel po, k sɑɑn Betsɑidɑ, ŋɑɑn k ŋuɑ biɑl ɑ wun cɑb nibul mɑnŋ.
41006046	Wɑɑ cɑb’b gbenn yuo nbɑ k u duo jɔsiɑl pɑɑk k mei Yennu.
41006047	Nyiɑɔk nbɑ din tɑn bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, k bulgbetl nɑ dɑɑ be mɔkgbenŋl sinsuuk ni, ŋɑɑn k u mun tɑn dɑɑ be juɑl mɑnŋ pɑɑk u kuukuɑ,
41006048	k tɑn lɑ k u puolpoweitieb gbɑɑ nɑn bulgbetl kɑnnu, k mɑɑn b din kɑn k tuokt wounŋ o. Ŋɑnn e k u din cet’b kojomuɑk sɑn-nyɑfɑɑl k sonm nyun pɑɑk k bɑɑl b buol ni k yɑɑ wun gɑl’b. Wɑɑ tɑn bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, k u tien nɑn u yɑɑ wun gɑl’b nɑ.
41006049	K b lɑ k u sonm nyun pɑɑk k b mi ɑ l tie funfɔntuk o, k b yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ,
41006050	k mɑɑn b kul lɑ’u wɑɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol’b bonciɑnn. L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u yet’b ɑ: «Cien i pɑlɑ mɑn. Min e. I dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni mɑn.»
41006051	Ŋɑnn e k u kuɑ k pukn’m bulgbetl mɑnŋ ni, k wounŋ nɑ ji ŋmin suon nnɑ. K l bɑkt’b bonciɑnn,
41006052	k mɑɑn b dɑɑ din k bɑnn wɑɑ dɑɑn jii pɑɑnu nɑ k tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk. B dudukt dɑɑ din k fit suol’l fɑnu.
41006053	Bɑɑ tɑn nyii mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni k duo kunkonn pɑɑk Genesɑɑlet tinŋ nnɑ, k b lol b bulgbetl k senn.
41006054	Bɑɑ nyi bulgbetl ni yuo nbɑ nɑ, k l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k niib bɑnn Yiesu,
41006055	k tiin sɑɑ tingbounŋ mɑnŋ lokɑ kul po k jikt b bɑɑtb liɑni pɑɑk k bɑɑt nɑn’m u buol ni, siɑn nbɑ kul k b din tuu gbɑt nɑn u be lenŋ.
41006056	Wɑɑ tuu dɔkt doi nɑn digbɑnbis nbɑ kul ɑ ni, k niib bonciɑnn diɑ b bɑɑtb k bil’m dɑi ni, k bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun ŋɑɑn k bin lek sii u tiɑt mɔgbɑnɑ, k bin nbɑ siin nɑ kul tuu lɑ lɑɑfiɑ.
41007001	Tɔn, k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn senniwɑntieb din tɑn nyii Selusɑɑlenm k bɑɑl Yiesu buol,
41007002	k b lɑ k u puolpoweitesiɑb jɑk jiet di, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ k nit b nii.
41007003	(Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn Suifnbɑ nilieb kul tuu k gbiɑ b di jiet sie k b nit b nii fɑnu nɑn b yejɑnm kɑɑl nbɑ din wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
41007004	L i tie k b nyii dɑɑk ni, b tuu k di sie k b tɑn wul sinsinn. B biɑ din tuu diɑ kɑɑ bonciɑnn k pukn l po. B din tuu diɑ kɑɑl nbɑ senn nyun-nyuŋmɑni soklu nɑn b bobɑ soklu nɑn b dunduɑni wuulu po e.)
41007005	K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn senniwɑntieb mɑnŋ boi Yiesu ɑ: «Bee k ɑ puolpoweitieb nɑ k diɑ t yejɑnm kɑɑl, ŋɑɑn kpɑn gbiɑ b di jiet k k nit b nii?»
41007006	K Yiesu jiin yet’b ɑ: « Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi din pɑk i po fɑnu, ɑ Yennu yet ɑ: yinm kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nɑ, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ɑ: ‹Niib nɑ tien’n nibɑɑkl b mɔi ni kuukuɑ e, ŋɑɑn b pɑlɑ set fɔk nɑn’n bonciɑnn.
41007007	B jiɑntl’n yɑnn e, k mɑɑn b jii nisɑɑlk kɑɑ k wɑnn niib, k l nɑɑn nɑn min Yennu senni nɑ.› »
41007008	K Yiesu ŋɑnm yet ɑ: «I bɑkn Yennu senni e k bil siɑl po wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn sɑk nisɑɑli kɑɑl nbɑ wɑnt lin nbɑ nɑ.
41007009	Yinm, i lek yet Yennu senni weiu ɑ yin diɑ i mɔnŋ mɔnŋ kɑɑl e,
41007010	k mɑɑn Muois din senn k yet ɑ: ‹Suɑ kul n tien u bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ nibɑɑkl, k wun nbɑ sukl u bɑɑ ɑmi u nɑɑ, bin kpɑn kpi’u.›
41007011	Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin yɑɑ ɑ nilɔ i yet u bɑɑ ɑmi u nɑɑ ɑ: ‹Mɑɑ bo sɑɑ tul’i sonml nbɑ nɑ tie Kolbɑnn k l wɑnt nɑn l tie Yennu yɑl e,›
41007012	ɑ u ji mɔk yiikuo k kɑn sonm u bɑɑ ɑmi u nɑɑ.
41007013	Kɑɑl nbɑ k i din gɑɑl nɑ te Yennu mɑɑn tie yɑnn. I biɑ tie bonsiɑ bonciɑnn k l nɑɑn nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ buolu.»
41007014	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu ŋɑnm din yiin nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ u buol ni, k tɑn yet’b ɑ: «Yinm nbɑ kul be nnɑ nɑ, gbiintl mɑn k bɑnn mɑɑ yɑɑ n pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
41007015	Bonsiɑl kɑɑ k sɑɑ kuɑ nisɑɑlk mɔb ni k fit tien’ɔ jɑknt u pɑl ni. Ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ nyi nisɑɑlk pɑl ni e fit tien’ɔ jɑknt.
41007016	Wun nbɑ kul mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint»
41007017	Wɑɑ yet’b nnɑ gbenn yuo nbɑ k u nyik niib mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn kuɑ ŋɑsiɑk nnɑ ni. K u puolpoweitieb boi’ɔ ɑ wun wɑnn’b mɑɑn mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
41007018	Ŋɑnn e k u boi’b ɑ: «I mun biɑ lek dɑɑ tie yɑnkpienɑ ee? I k mi nɑn lin nbɑ kul kuɑ nisɑɑlk mɔb ni k tien’ɔ jɑknt ii?
41007019	K mɑɑn l k kuɑ u pɑl ni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u puol ni e k l kuɑ, k biɑ kpɑntl bint k nyi.» Wɑɑ yet biɑnŋ nbɑ mɑnŋ wɑnt nɑn jiet kul ɑ k kuɑ.
41007020	K u biɑ ŋɑnm yet pukn ɑ: «Lin nbɑ set nyi nisɑɑlk pɑl ni e tien’ɔ jɑknt,
41007021	k mɑɑn u pɑl ni e k dudukbiit bɑɑt nɑn puoweiu nɑn jɑweiu, nɑn nɑn-yuk, nɑn nikpinu,
41007022	nɑn boncuncontuonɑ, nɑn niɑnciɑɔnŋ nɑn biitbuolu buolu nɑn fɑɑk fɑɑlu, nɑn tuon-yɑnɑ, nɑn funfunn, nɑn sɑnjɑɑɔnŋ, nɑn kɑlnbɑɑni, nɑn jɑt-tuonɑ.
41007023	Lin nbɑ nɑ kul e nyi nilɔ pɑl ni k tien’ɔ jɑknt.»
41007024	Lin nbɑ nɑ puolpo k Yiesu nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn Tiil bɔkl po, k kuɑ ŋɑsiɑk nnɑ ni, k k luon suɑ n bɑnn nɑn u be lenŋ, ŋɑɑn u din kɑn fit bɔl u mɔnŋ.
41007025	K puosuɑ nbɑ k nɑlnbiiuk din be u bonpobik ni nɑ gbɑt u po, k u bɑɑl u buol ni k tɑn gbɑɑn u tuɑnn ni.
41007026	Puo mɑnŋ din tie Glek nilɔ e. B din mɑl’ɔ Feniisi tinŋ ni e, Siili tingbounŋ ni. K puo nɑ bɑln Yiesu ɑ wun nyinn nɑlnbiiuk nɑ u bonpobik mɑnŋ ni.
41007027	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k wɑɑs n di sinsinn ɑ, k mɑɑn l k ŋɑn k nilɔ n jii wɑɑs jiet k tul bɔi.»
41007028	K puo nɑ jiin ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l set tie mɔni e, ŋɑɑn bɔi nbɑ tuu duɑ tiebul lɔunŋ ni nɑ mun gɑni wɑɑs jebulɑ nbɑ bɑɑ nɑ.»
41007029	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «A jiinu nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, n ji cɑb’ɑ, ii kun. Nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ ponŋ nyii ɑ bonpobik nɑ ni wɑɑ.»
41007030	K puo mɑnŋ set din fiil yɑɑt kun k sɑɑ bɑɑl k lɑ k u bik nɑ duɑ u dunduɑnu pɑɑk, k nɑlnbiiuk nɑ set nyii wɑɑ.
41007031	Tɔn, k Yiesu ji din nyik Tiil yɑkl nɑ, ŋɑɑn tɔkn nyii Siidɔn yɑkl, nɑn tinŋ nbɑ k b din yi Doi-piik nɑ mɔkmɔk k sɑɑ bɑɑl Gɑɑliile mɔkgbenŋl ni.
41007032	K nisiɑb din bɑɑl nɑn jɑsuɑ k u tie tuukpɑɑl k biɑ k fit k piɑk fɑnu, k b bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun yii u nuu juɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
41007033	K Yiesu gɑɑl’ɔ k b nyii kpinŋ po, b kuukuɑ, k u jii u niibilɑ k tun juɑ mɑnŋ tubɑ ni, ŋɑɑn siil mɔsɑnt ŋɑɑn sii juɑ mɑnŋ jeln,
41007034	k got sɑnpɑɑpo ŋɑɑn kulnt sikn, k yet juɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «Efɑtɑ,» k l pɑɑk tie: «Lotl ɑ mɔnŋ.»
41007035	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni nɑ k juɑ nɑ ji gbiɑ, k u jeln biɑ tɑbt k u ji fit piɑk mɑɑn fɑnu.
41007036	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yɑki nɑn niib nɑ ɑ b i mi k bin yet suɑ lin nbɑ k u tun mɑnŋ po, ŋɑɑn nɑn kpɑyɑɔk mɑnŋ kul b lek din ŋɑmi k yɑln mɑɑn mɑnŋ.
41007037	K bin nbɑ kul gbɑt lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ, k l tien’m bɑktnɔunŋ bonciɑnn, k b yet ɑ: «Lin nbɑ kul k u tuu tuun ŋɑn bonciɑnn. U te k tuukpɑɑ gbɑɑ tɑn fit gbiɑ, k te k mui biɑ fit piɑk.»
41008001	L yuo nɑ, k nibulciɑɔnŋ yɑɑn lɑkn lieb Yiesu buol ni. Bɑɑ k mɔk jiet nɑ, k Yiesu yiin u puolpoweitieb nɑ u buol ni, k tɑn yet’b ɑ:
41008002	«Ninbɑɑɔk suol’n bonciɑnn nibul nɑ pɑɑk, k mɑɑn dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ e nɑ k b be nɑn’n, ŋɑɑn k ji k mɔk jiet nbɑ k b sɑɑ di.
41008003	Mi i mun i cɑb’b nɑn kon, b sɑɑ sɑɑ fib sɔnu ni wɑɑ, k mɑɑn b siɑb sɔnu fɔk ɑ.»
41008004	K u puolpoweitieb nɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «T sɑɑ lɑ jiet lee muuk nɑ ni k lin jɑnŋ nibul nɑ kul i?»
41008005	K u boi’b ɑ: «Pɑɑnu kunɑ ŋɑnŋɑ e be i buol ni nnɑ nɑ?» K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑnlole.»
41008006	Ŋɑnn e k u te k nibul nɑ kul kɑl tinŋ ni. L puolpo k u jii pɑɑni ŋɑnlole nɑ, k tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ŋmit ŋmit k tul u puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ bin tol nibul mɑnŋ.
41008007	B biɑ din mɔk jɑnbis wɑɑn b buol ni, k u biɑ tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn yet u puolpoweitieb mɑnŋ ɑ bin jii tol’b biɑk.
41008008	K suɑ kul din dii wɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ. B din tie nɑn jɑb tusɑ ŋɑnnɑ (4,000) nɑ e. K u puolpoweitieb tikl jiet nbɑ tenn nɑ, k l gbie kpɑncubt ŋɑnlole. K u ji cɑb jɑb mɑnŋ,
41008010	ŋɑɑn k ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb kɑkt k kuɑ bulgbetl ni, k sɑɑn Dɑlmɑnutɑ tinŋ ni.
41008011	L puolpo e k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni k tɑn tie selmi, ɑ bin bikn’ɔ k lɑ u mɔbonkpetl, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ wun tien nyinn k lin wɑnn nɑn u yiikuo mɑnŋ nyii Yennu buol e.
41008012	L yuo k u kulnt ŋɑɑn boi’b ɑ: «Bee tien k mɔtɑɑnɑ niib nɑ luon nyinn i? Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i ɑ n kɑn tun nyinn k tul’b.»
41008013	L puolpo k u nyik’b, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt kuɑ bulgbetl nɑ ni, k puot mɔkgbenŋl puotl nɑ po. Heluod dɑtinŋ lɑbɑɑl
41008014	Tɔn, Yiesu puolpoweitieb din tɑnm k k diɑ jiet k l yɑb. B din diɑ pɑɑn-yenn kuɑ e bulgbetl nɑ ni.
41008015	K Yiesu yet’b nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ: «Ii mi mɑn, kii guu i mɔnŋ nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn Heluod dɑtinŋ nɑ mɑn.»
41008016	Ŋɑnn e k b ji piɑk b lieb sinsuuk ni ɑ: «Tɑɑ k diɑ pɑɑnu nɑ e k u piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ.»
41008017	Ŋɑɑn k u bɑnn bɑɑ piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ, k boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i piɑk k yɑɑ ɑ i k diɑ pɑɑnu? I dɑɑ k bɑnn siɑl biɑk ii? I dudukt ni biɑ dɑɑ k yent ii?
41008018	I mɔk ninbinɑ, ŋɑɑn bee k i k lɑɑt i? I biɑ mɔk tubɑ, ŋɑɑn biɑ k gbiɑ ɑɑ? I k tiɑn
41008019	yuo nbɑ k n ŋmit ŋmit pɑɑni ŋɑnŋmu k tul niib tusɑ ŋɑnŋmu nɑ ɑɑ? Kpɑncubt ŋɑnŋɑ e k i tikl pɑɑnbulɑ nbɑ tenn i?» K b jiin ɑ: «Piik nɑn ŋɑnle.»
41008020	K u boi’b biɑk ɑ: «K yuo nbɑ k n ŋmit ŋmit pɑɑni ŋɑnlole k tul niib tusɑ ŋɑnnɑ nɑ, kpɑncubt ŋɑnŋɑ k i tikl pɑɑnbulɑ nbɑ tenn i?» K b jiin ɑ: «Ŋɑnlole.»
41008021	Ŋɑnn e k u boi’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑn k i biɑ lek dɑɑ k gbɑt l pɑɑk ii?»
41008022	K b din tɑn bɑɑl Betsɑidɑ, k nisiɑb din jii jɑjuɑnsuɑ nnɑ k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ Yiesu buol ni, k tɑn bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun sii’u.
41008023	K Yiesu suol u nuu k nyii nɑn’ɔ duo kpinŋ po, k siil mɔsɑnt juɑ nɑ ninbinɑ ni, k jii u nii k yii u pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «A lɑɑt siɑl ii?»
41008024	Ŋɑnn e k juɑ mɑnŋ gokt got, ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «Nnn, n lɑɑt niib, ŋɑɑn b nɑɑn nɑn tiini nɑ e k sonm.»
41008025	K Yiesu biɑ jii u nii k yii juɑ mɑnŋ ninbinɑ pɑɑk, l yuo nɑ k juɑ mɑnŋ ji got silll, k suɑ k u ninbinɑ mɔk lɑɑfiɑ, k u ji lɑɑt bonsiɑl kul pul pul pul.
41008026	K Yiesu te k juɑ mɑnŋ kun u ŋɑɑk ni, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ: «Ii mi k ɑ ŋmɑt duo mɑnŋ ni jik.»
41008027	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din yɑɑt k sɑɑ Sesɑɑle Fiiliip tingbounŋ ni. Bɑɑ dɑɑ be sɔnu pɑɑk k sɑɑ nɑ k u boi’b ɑ: «Niib yɑɑ ɑ n tie ŋmee?»
41008028	K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Nisiɑb yien ɑ ɑ tie Sɑn, wun nbɑ dɑɑn wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ e, k nilieb mun yɑɑ ɑ tie Elii e k nilieb mun biɑ yɑɑ ɑ tie Yennu sɔkniinbɑ yenɔ e.»
41008029	Ŋɑnn e k u boi’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑn k yinm ŋɑnin yɑɑ ɑ n tie ŋmee?» K Piɑl jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie Klistu nɑ.»
41008030	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yɑki nɑn’m ɑ bii mi k bin yet suɑ lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ.
41008031	L puolpo k Yiesu ji din piin k wɑnt u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Sie k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ dii fɑlɑ bonciɑnn, k sɑɑkɑb nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb n tɑn yet’ɔ, k biɑ kpi’u, ŋɑɑn l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k u sɑɑ fiil kuun ni biɑk.»
41008032	U din pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ k k bɔl siɑl. Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl yiin’ɔ k nyii nɑn’ɔ kpinŋ po k sɑɑ yɑki nɑn’ɔ.
41008033	Ŋɑɑn Yiesu nbɑ gbiɑ jiɑnt got u puolpoweitieb nɑ, k ji mun yɑki nɑn Piɑl ɑ: «Fin Sɑɑtɑn nbɑ nɑ, sietl nnɑ nɑ. A k mɔk Yennu dudukt kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ mɔk nisɑɑlk dudukt e.»
41008034	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yiin u puolpoweitieb nɑn nibul nbɑ wɑɑ’u nɑ, k tɑn yet’b ɑ: «Wun nbɑ i luon wun wei’n, sie k u likn u sɑɑŋmɑnŋ, k jii u kuun dɑpunpunn kii wɑɑ’n,
41008035	k mɑɑn wun nbɑ k sɑɑk wun jii u mɑnfuol k tul’n, ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ kɔnŋ’l, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ likn u sɑɑŋmɑnŋ, min nɑn lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ pɑɑk, ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ lɑ u mɑnfuol.
41008036	Nilɔ i lɑ tingbounŋ nɑ mɔktuk kul ɑ ŋɑɑn kɔnŋ u mɑnfuol, nyɔlɑnt po e k u sɑɑ lɑ?
41008037	Ami nilɔ sɑɑ fit jii bee k kpent u mɑnfuol i?
41008038	K wun nbɑ i tiin fei k jiin min nɑn n mɑɑn nɑ po biitdɑnm nɑn tubkɑngbɑtɑ dɑnm sinsuuk ni, Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mun sɑɑ tin fei k jiin u po yuo nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ jen nɑn u Bɑɑ yudɑnt nɑn mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑ.»
41009001	Tɔn, k Yiesu biɑ yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yɑɑ n yet’i, siɑb be nnɑ k dɑɑ kɑn kpo sie k b tɑn lɑ Yennu nɑɑn bɑɑlu nɑn pɑnŋ.»
41009002	L puolpo e k l tɑn tien dɑɑ ŋɑnluob, k Yiesu jii Piɑl nɑn Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn k duo nɑn’m juɑl nbɑ fɔk bonciɑnn pɑɑk, k b be b kuɑ. L yuo k b lɑ k u lebt b nunm ni,
41009003	k u tiɑt nyilk k pien pɑl pɑl. K suɑ kɑɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni k sɑɑ fit penn tiɑt nɑn ŋɑnn nɑ.
41009004	K b lɑ k Elii nɑn Muois lekt yonm k piɑk nɑn Yiesu.
41009005	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl yet Yiesu ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, l ŋɑn nɑn tii be nnɑ nɑ. Ŋɑɑnt k tin fɑɑ lɑnbont ŋɑntɑ, k yenn i tie ɑ yɑl, k liel i tie Muois yɑl k liel mun i tie Elii yɑl.»
41009006	Jɑŋmɑɑni nbɑ din suol Piɑl nɑn u lieb mɑnŋ bonciɑnn nɑ pɑɑk din te k u din k mi wɑɑ sɑɑ pɑk lin nbɑ.
41009007	L yuo k sɑnpɑgbounŋ dɔkt k tɑn piin’m, k b gbɑt kunkɔl sɑnpɑgbounŋ nɑ ni, k l yet ɑ: «N Bilonkɑk e nɑ. Gbiintl u mɔb mɑn »
41009008	K b jiɑnt got, ŋɑɑn ji k lɑ suɑ b buol, sie Yiesu kuukuɑ.
41009009	Bɑɑ nyii juɑl mɑnŋ pɑɑk k siik, k Yiesu yet’b nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ b dɑɑ yien suɑ lin nbɑ k b lɑ nɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni.
41009010	K b sɑk u mɑɑn mɑnŋ, k diɑ lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ b sinsuuk ni, k biɑ boi b lieb ɑ: «‹Kuun fiilu› nɑ pɑɑk tie bee?»
41009011	K b tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bee te k senniwɑntieb yɑɑ ɑ sie k Elii e bɑɑl sinsinn i?»
41009012	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Elii set bɑɑt sinsinn, ɑ wun tɑn ŋɑnm bonsiɑl kul fɑnu e. Ŋɑɑn, bee te k l biɑ diɑn ɑ l tie k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ n di fɑlɑ bonciɑnn k niib n yet’ɔ?
41009013	N yien’i e, Elii ponŋ bɑɑl nɑ, k niib diɑ’u gbɑkɑ gbɑkɑ nnɑ bɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.»
41009014	Yuo nbɑ k Yiesu din tɑn bɑɑl nɑn u puolpoweitieb Piɑl, Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn u puolpoweitelieb buol ni yuo nbɑ k b lɑ nibulciɑɔnŋ lɑkn, k senniwɑntieb biɑ noi nɑn’m mɔniɑɔk.
41009015	Nibul mɑnŋ nbɑ lɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ k l tien’m bɑktnɔunŋ, k b tin bɑɑl fuont’ɔ.
41009016	Ŋɑnn e k u boi u puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ: «I noi nɑn’m lɑnn po pɑɑk e?»
41009017	K jɑsuɑ nnɑ nyii nibul mɑnŋ ni k jiin ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, min e bo bɑɑt nɑn n bijɑ ɑ buol ni, k mɑɑn nɑlnbiiuk be u ni k l te k u k fit piɑk.
41009018	Siɑn nbɑ kul ɑ k nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ fiil, l tuu lu’u tinŋ ni e, k mɔsɑnkunkuounŋ nyi u mɔb ni, k u ŋmɑn u nyɑnɑ, k u gbɑnɑnt kul n wɑkl kenken. N bɑln ɑ puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ bin nyinn nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn k b gbɑl.»
41009019	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu jiin k yet ɑ: «Yinm mɔtɑɑnɑ niib yɑdɑ mɑntk puɑl hei. N sɑɑ wei nɑn’i nlee? L sɑɑ wei nlee k n mɔk suklu nɑn’i ni? Bɑɑt nɑn bik mɑnŋ nnɑ.»
41009020	K b bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ Yiesu buol. Nɑlnbiiuk nɑ nbɑ lɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ k u fiil bik nɑ ni k lu’u tinŋ ni, k u duɑ k biln, k mɔsɑnkunkuounŋ nyi u mɔb ni.
41009021	K Yiesu boi u bɑɑ ɑ: «Nlee yuo e k l piin k tie’u nnɑ?» K u jiin ɑ: «L piin’ɔ u bisn ni e wɑɑ.
41009022	Yuo bonciɑnn e k nɑlnbiiuk nɑ tuu te k u bɑɑ muu ni, nɑn nyun ni, ɑ wun lek kpi’u. Ŋɑɑn l i tie k ɑ sɑɑ fit tien siɑl, ɑ lek tin’t ninbɑɑɔk k sonm’t.»
41009023	K Yiesu yet ɑ: «A yet ɑ l i tie k n fit i e. Bonsiɑl kul k pɑɑl k tul wun nbɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ buol ni.»
41009024	K juɑ nɑ yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «N tien yɑdɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn puknt n yɑdɑ pɑnŋ.»
41009025	Yiesu nbɑ lɑ k nibul nɑ ŋɑnmt tut bɑɑt b pɑɑk nɑ, k u tiɑn nɑlnbiiuk nɑ pɑɑk ɑ: «Fin nɑlnmutuukpɑɑl nɑ, min e tul’ɑ mɔb, nyimin u ni k ji dɑɑ mi jent u ni.»
41009026	K nɑlnbiiuk nɑ yikn k tɔkl bik mɑnŋ k lu’u tinŋ ni gbɑb, ŋɑɑn nyii u ni, k bik mɑnŋ ji nɑɑn nɑn u kpo e nɑ, k niib nɑ ni bonciɑnn yet ɑ: «U kpo e nɑ.»
41009027	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu suol bik mɑnŋ nuu k sonm’ɔ k u fiil set.
41009028	Yiesu nbɑ din tɑn kuɑ ŋɑɑk ni yuo nbɑ, k u puolpoweitieb nbɑ bo biɑl nɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bee k tinm ŋɑnin bo k fit nyinn nɑlnbiiuk nɑ?»
41009029	K u yet’b ɑ: «I kɑn fit nyinn nɑlnbiiuk nɑ buolu sie k i mei Yennu.»
41009030	K Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb mɑnŋ nyii lenŋ k tɔkn Gɑɑliile tingbounŋ po. Ŋɑɑn u din k luon suɑ n bɑnn wɑɑ be siɑn nbɑ,
41009031	k mɑɑn u din wɑnt u puolpoweitieb nɑ k yien’m ɑ: «B tɑn sɑɑ jii Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k tien’ɔ niib nuu ni k bin kpi’u, ŋɑɑn l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl u tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni.»
41009032	Ŋɑɑn u puolpoweitieb mɑnŋ din k bɑnn mɑɑn mɑnŋ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn mun tiin jɑŋmɑɑni nɑn bin boi’ɔ.
41009033	Tɔn, k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb nbɑ din bɑɑl Kɑpelnɑunm k tɑn kuɑ ŋɑɑk ni yuo nbɑ k u boi’b ɑ: «I bo diɑ lɑbɑlɑnn po e sɔnu ni nɑ?»
41009034	Ŋɑɑn k b ŋmin ɑ, k mɑɑn sɔnu ni b noi nɑn b lieb yudɑnt pɑɑk e b sinsuuk ni.
41009035	Ŋɑnn e k u ŋmɑnt k kɑl, ŋɑɑn yiin u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ, k yet’b ɑ: «Wun nbɑ kul luon wun tien yudɑɑnɔ, sie k wun kpint u mɔnŋ k tien bik i kul ni, k biɑ tien i kul tuontunnɔ,»
41009036	ŋɑɑn jii bik nnɑ k senn’ɔ b sinsuuk ni, k puul u nii k wɔb bik mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ:
41009037	«Wun nbɑ kul gɑɑl bik nɑ buolu n sɑnn pɑɑk, min e k u gɑɑl’n, k wun nbɑ gɑɑl’n k gɑɑl min kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u gɑɑl wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ e nɑ mun biɑk.»
41009038	Tɔn, k Sɑn yet Yiesu ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, t lɑ k jɑsuɑ nnɑ mun tɑɑn ɑ sɑnn k nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni, k t yɑki nɑn’ɔ ɑ wun nyik, k mɑɑn u k tie t ni yenɔ.»
41009039	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ biel’ɔ mɑn, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ sɑɑ tɑɑ n sɑnn k tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonn, l puolpo u ji kɑn fit pɑk siɑl k biil’n.
41009040	K mɑɑn wun nbɑ kul k kɔn nɑn’t, u sie t puol e.
41009041	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, wun nbɑ kul got lɑ’i k tul’i nyun, ɑ yɑɑ tie Klistuyɑb nɑ pɑɑk, l dɑɑnɔ tɑn kɑn mi kɔnŋ u nyuɑt.»
41009042	K Yiesu biɑ ŋɑnm k yet ɑ: «Wun nbɑ te k wɑɑs mɑnŋ nbɑ tien’n yɑdɑ nɑ yenɔ kuɑ bɑɑ biit ni, b i bo i lɑnn nɑɑl l dɑɑnɔ tulu ni k tut’ɔ nɑn’n k lu’u mɔkgbenŋl ni gbɑɑ, l bo sii sɔ k tul’ɔ.
41009043	L pɑɑk, ɑ nuu i te k ɑ tun biit, fɑn pot’ɔ k lu. A i mɔk nuu yenu kuɑ k lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, l cie fɑn tɑn kuɑ muu nbɑ kɑn mi kpien nɑ ni nɑn ɑ nii kul.
41009045	A tɑɑpɑɔnŋ i te k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ tun biit, fɑn pot’l lu. L sɔ k ɑ i mɔk tɑɑyenn k lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k gɑl fii mɔk tɑɑ ŋɑnle ŋɑɑn tɑn kuɑ muu mɑnŋ ni.
41009047	A ninbinn i te k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ tun biit, fɑn kpɑkl k lu. L sɔ k fɑn tɑn kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni nɑn ninbin-yenn kuɑ k gɑl fɑn tɑn kuɑ muu mɑnŋ ni nɑn ninbinɑ ŋɑnle.
41009048	Lenŋ e k ‹nɑnwubɑ nbɑ k kpenn nɑ be k di’b k muu nbɑ biɑ k kpient nɑ be k di’b.›
41009049	«B tɑn sɑɑ ŋɑnm suɑ kul nɑn muu nɑn yɑɑln e.»
41009050	«Yɑɑln mɑn, ŋɑɑn yɑɑln mɑnu i nyii, nlee k ɑ ji sɑɑ jiin l mɑnu? «Ii mɑn nɑn yɑɑln nɑ mɑn, k mɑnu ii be yinm nɑn i lieb sinsuuk ni.»
41010001	K Yiesu nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn Suude tinŋ ni nɑn Suulden kpenpuotl po, k nigbounŋ bonciɑnn ji lɑkn u buol ni, k u yɑɑn wɑnt’b Yennu mɑɑn nɑn wɑɑ ponŋ tuu wɑnt’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
41010002	K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ bɑɑl u buol ni, k luon bin bikn’ɔ, k boi’ɔ ɑ: «Senni nɑ cɑb nɑn juɑ n yet u ŋɑɑpuo ɑmi ii?»
41010003	Ŋɑnn e k u mun jiin k boi’b ɑ: «Muois din tul’i senni nlee k jiin l po?»
41010004	K b jiin ɑ: «Muois din cɑb yiikuo ɑ juɑ sɑɑ fit diɑn puoyetu kɑdɑɑɔk ŋɑɑn yet u ŋɑɑpuo.»
41010005	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «I tubkɑngbɑtɑ pɑɑk e din te k Muois diɑn senni mɑnŋ k tul’i.
41010006	Ŋɑɑn Yennu nbɑ din nɑn dulnyɑ pinpiik ni: ‹U din nɑn juɑ nɑn puo e.›
41010007	Lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk k juɑ tuu sɑɑ nyi u bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ buol ni, ŋɑɑn k ŋuɑ nɑn puo n tɑɑn lieb,
41010008	k b bɑnle sɑɑ tɑɑn kii tie niyenɔ kuɑ. Ŋɑnn e sɑɑ te k b ji k tie niib bɑnle, ŋɑɑn b ji tie gbɑnɑn-yent kuɑ e.
41010009	L pɑɑk, lin nbɑ k Yennu jii k tɑɑn nɑn liel, nisɑɑlk i mi k wun bɔkt’l.»
41010010	Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb nbɑ din tɑn jen ŋɑɑk ni yuo nbɑ, k u puolpoweitieb boi’ɔ mɑɑn mɑnŋ pɑɑk nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
41010011	K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «Juɑ nbɑ yet u ŋɑɑpuo ŋɑɑn kuɑn puogɑnɔ, u tun boncuncontuonn k jiin puo nbɑ k u bel’ɔ nɑ po e nɑ.
41010012	Nnɑ e mun biɑk, puosuɑ i yet u sɔlɔ ŋɑɑn sɑɑn kun jɑgɑnɔ, u mun tun boncuncontuonn ɑ.»
41010013	Tɔn, k nisiɑb din tɑn bɑɑt nɑn b wɑɑs Yiesu buol ni ɑ wun tɑn yii u nii b pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn k u puolpoweitieb tiɑn b pɑɑk.
41010014	Ŋɑɑn wɑɑ bɑnn bɑɑ tiɑn b pɑɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ k u wutuol duo, k u yet’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k wɑɑs mɑnŋ i bɑɑt n buol ni nɑ, k dɑɑ tiɑn’m, k mɑɑn b buolu e yen Yennu nɑɑn.
41010015	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, wun nbɑ k gɑɑl Yennu nɑɑn nɑn bik nɑ, u kɑn mi kuɑ l ni fɑb ɑ.»
41010016	K u gɑɑl wɑɑs mɑnŋ u nii ni, k yii u nii b pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn yɑt yetŋɑnm b pɑɑk
41010017	Yiesu nbɑ din nyii lenŋ k sɑɑ mɑnŋ, k jɑsuɑ tin k cet’ɔ k tɑn gbɑɑn u tuɑnn, ŋɑɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntɔŋɑnɔ, n sɑɑ tien nlee k tɑn lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu?»
41010018	K Yiesu jiin boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bee k ɑ yi’n niŋɑnɔ? Niŋɑnsuɑ kɑɑ sie Yennu kuukuɑ.
41010019	A ponŋ mi Yennu senni nbɑ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ, ɑ: ‹Dɑɑ kpi nilɔ. Dɑɑ tuun boncuncontuonɑ. Dɑɑ jɑɑn. Dɑɑ fɑ fɑɑk suɑ pɑɑk. Dɑɑ ŋmɑb nilɔ. Ii bɑɑkt ɑ bɑɑ nɑn ɑ nɑɑ.› »
41010020	K juɑ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, n ponŋ sɑk lin nbɑ nɑ kul n bisn ni e wɑɑ.»
41010021	K Yiesu got’ɔ silll nɑn lonm, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑn bon-yenn kuɑ e pɔt’ɑ. Ii kun k sɑɑ kɔi lin nbɑ k ɑ mɔk nɑ kul, k jii l likli mɑnŋ k tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm, k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ mɔktuk sɑnpɑɑpo. L puolpo k ɑ jen ɑ kii wɑɑ’n.»
41010022	Juɑ nɑ nbɑ din gbɑt lin nbɑ nɑ k u pɑl ni biil bonciɑnn, k u ŋmɑt kun nɑn pɑlbiil, k mɑɑn u din mɔk mɔktuk bonciɑnn.
41010023	K Yiesu ŋmɑnt got u puolpoweitieb nɑ k lint, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «L sii pɑɑl bonciɑnn nɑn mɔktɑ n kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni.»
41010024	K u mɑɑn mɑnŋ yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b, k u biɑ ŋɑnm yet’b ɑ: «N wɑɑs, l lek pɑɑl nɑn nilɔ n kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni.
41010025	L pɑɑl nɑn mɔktɔ n kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni k cie lɑɑ pɑɑl nɑn yuyouk n kuɑ kpɑlpienu miɑl ni nɑ.»
41010026	K mɑɑn mɑnŋ yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b bonciɑnn, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «L i tie nnɑ i e, ŋmee ji sɑɑ fit k lɑ fielu?»
41010027	K u kpɑɑ u nuni b pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn tɑn yet’b ɑ: «Lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑl k tul nisɑɑlk e, ŋɑɑn l k pɑɑl Yennu yɑɑ buol ni, k mɑɑn Yennu sɑɑ fit tun bonsiɑl kul ɑ.»
41010028	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl tɔl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Gotl, tinm ŋɑnin nyik t bonsiɑl kul e ŋɑɑn wɑɑ’ɑ.»
41010029	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, wun nbɑ kul nyik u ŋɑɑk, ɑmi u ninjɑnm, ɑmi u niipuob, ɑmi u nɑɑ, ɑmi u bɑɑ, ɑmi u wɑɑs, ɑmi u kpɑɑnt, n sɑnn pɑɑk nɑn lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ pɑɑk
41010030	u tɑn sɑɑ biɑ lɑ bonɑ k lin gɑl wɑɑ nyik lin nbɑ nɑ. U tɑn sɑɑ lɑ ŋei, nɑn ninjɑnm, nɑn niipuob, nɑn nɑɑnbɑ, nɑn wɑɑs, nɑn kpɑɑnt, kobi kobi e tingbounŋ nɑ ni, l i lek i tie k b muks’ɔ, k yuo nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ k u biɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
41010031	Niib bonciɑnn nbɑ dɔnŋ tuɑnn mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ, b tɑn sɑɑ jil puol ɑ, ŋɑɑn bonciɑnn nbɑ mun biɑ juont puol mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɔnŋ gɑl tuɑnn nɑ.»
41010032	L yuo nɑ k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din nyii sɔnu ni k do Selusɑɑlenm, k u gɑl b tuɑnn po, k b yɑn put k jɑŋmɑɑni biɑ suol nibul nbɑ wɑɑ nɑ kul ɑ. Ŋɑnn e k u yɑɑn nyii nɑn u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ kpinŋ po, k yet’b lin nbɑ sɑɑ tien’ɔ,
41010033	ɑ: «Nnɑlɑ, t do Selusɑɑlenm e, siɑn nbɑ k b sɑɑ jii Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k kuɑn Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb nii ni ɑ bin bu u buut ŋɑɑn kpi’u, k jii’u tul bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ,
41010034	k b sɑɑ sɑlk’ɔ, k siin mɔsɑnt u pɑɑk, k buo’u gbɑnn, k biɑ tɑn kpi’u, ŋɑɑn l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k u sɑɑ fiil kuun ni.» yudɑnt
41010035	L yuo k Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn, bin nbɑ din tie Sebede wɑɑs nɑ, bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, t luon k ɑ tun lin nbɑ k t sɑɑ boi’ɑ nɑ po k tul’t.»
41010036	K u boi’b ɑ: «I luon k n tun bee k tul’i ni?»
41010037	K b jiin ɑ: «Yuo nbɑ k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ ɑ nɑɑn yudɑnt nɑ, ɑ tɑn ŋɑɑn k t yenɔ n kɑl ɑ niidiitu po, k luɑ mun n kɑl ɑ niigɑnŋ po.»
41010038	K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «I k mi yɑɑ mei lin nbɑ po. I tɑn sɑɑ fit nyu n wɑhɑlɑ kɔp nɑ ni wɑɑ ɑɑ? Kuo i sɑɑ fit gɑɑl n fɑlɑ Yennu nyunwulu nɑ wɑɑ ɑɑ?»
41010039	K b jiin ɑ: «T sɑɑ fit ɑ.» K u yet’b ɑ: «I set tɑn sɑɑ nyu kɔp nbɑ k n tɑn sɑɑ nyu lenŋ nɑ wɑɑ, k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl Yennu nyunwulu nbɑ k n tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl nɑ wɑɑ.
41010040	Ŋɑɑn n k mɔk yiikuo nbɑ sɑɑ gɑnn wun nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɑl n niidiitu po nɑn n niigɑnŋ po. Yennu e gɑnn bin nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɑl l kinkɑɑni pɑɑk »
41010041	K Yiesu puolpoweitelieb piik nɑ nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k b wutuol duo Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn pɑɑk.
41010042	K Yiesu yiin b kul ɑ k lɑk’m u buol, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «I mɔnŋ mi nɑn bin nbɑ k b goli’b k b tie tingbounŋ nɑ ni yudɑnm nɑ diɑ’b nɑn ninmɔnn e, k nijɑɑnɑ mun gɑɑnt nɑn b yiikuo.
41010043	Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin, l dɑɑ tie nnɑ kɑɑ i sinsuuk ni. I suɑ i luon wun tien nijɑɑnn, sie k wun tien u mɔnŋ suɑ kul ɑ tuontunnɔ,
41010044	k wun nbɑ mun luon wun tien yudɑɑnɔ, sie k wun tien suɑ kul ɑ dɑɑbl,
41010045	k mɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ, k bɑɑl ɑ niib n tun tul’ɔ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u bɑɑl ɑ wun tun k tul niib e, k biɑ kpo ɑ wun fiel niib bonciɑnn.»
41010046	Tɔn, k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din bɑɑl Seliiko k tɑn nyii, k ŋɑnm nɑn nibulciɑɔnŋ tɔk sɑɑ, k juɑnsuɑ din be k tie miɑtɔ, k kɑl sɔnjokpinŋ, k u sɑnn yi Bɑɑltiime, wun nbɑ tie Tiime bijɑ nɑ.
41010047	Wɑɑ tɑn gbɑt ɑ Yiesu wun nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ be yuo nbɑ, k u yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Yiesu, Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn, tin’n ninbɑɑɔk.»
41010048	K niib bonciɑnn tiɑn u pɑɑk ɑ wun ŋmin, ŋɑɑn k u biɑ ŋɑnm yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn, tin’n ninbɑɑɔk.»
41010049	K Yiesu set k yet ɑ: «Yiint’ɔ nɑ mɑn » K b yiin’ɔ, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cien ɑ pɑl. U yi’ɑ. Fiit k set.»
41010050	Ŋɑnn e k juɑnŋ mɑnŋ lu u liɑtfuouk, ŋɑɑn fiil k set, k bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni. K Yiesu boi’ɔ ɑ: «A luon k n tun bee k tul’ɑ ni?»
41010051	K juɑnŋ mɑnŋ jiin ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, n luon k ɑ munt’n e.»
41010052	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Tɔn, ii sɑɑ. A yɑdɑ te k ɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ.» L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u ninbinɑ nyuɑnt, k u ji lɑɑt k wɑɑ Yiesu, k b sɑɑ.
41011001	Tɔn, k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb nbɑ din tɑn pel Selusɑɑlenm k bɑɑl doi nbɑ k b yi Betfɑɑje nɑn Betɑɑni nɑ, k doi mɑnŋ biɑk jɑgbɑɑk nbɑ k b yi’l Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk nɑ, k u tun u puolpoweitieb nɑ ni bɑnle, k yet’b ɑ:
41011002	«Ii sɑɑ duo nbɑ be tuɑnn po nɑ ni mɑn. Ii sɑɑ i bɑɑl, i sɑɑ lɑ bonbik nbɑ k suɑ dɑɑ k mi k jɑk’ɔ, k u lol ŋɑsiɑk nnɑ nɑn-yel po tɑnmɔb ni. Yin lot’ɔ k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ n buol nnɑ.
41011003	Suɑ i boi’i ɑ bee k i lot bonŋ mɑnŋ, yin yet’ɔ Yonmdɑɑnɔ e luon’ɔ, ɑ ŋɑɑn u sɑɑ jiin’ɔ mɔtɑɑnɑ.»
41011004	Ŋɑnn e k b din sɑɑn k set sɑɑ lɑ k bonbik lol ŋɑsiɑk nnɑ nɑn-yel po. Bɑɑ set lot’ɔ yuo nbɑ
41011005	k nisiɑb nnɑ sie lenŋ k boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i lot bonbik mɑnŋ i?»
41011006	K b yet’b nɑn Yiesu nbɑ bo yɑɑ bin yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k b cɑb’b k b sɑɑn.
41011007	Bɑɑ din bɑɑl nɑn bonbik mɑnŋ Yiesu buol ni yuo nbɑ, k b jikt b tiɑt k pɑɑ bonŋ mɑnŋ buɑnn pɑɑk, k Yiesu jɑk.
41011008	K niib bonciɑnn jikt b tiɑt k lɑt sɔnu ni, k siɑb mun ŋɑt fɑɑmɑɑsɑɑ k lɑt sɔnu ni.
41011009	Bin nbɑ din gɑl Yiesu tuɑnn po, nɑn bin nbɑ din wɑɑ u puolpo kul ɑ din yikn k yien ɑ: «Hosɑnɑ. Yennu yetŋɑnm ii be wun nbɑ bɑɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu sɑnn ni nɑ pɑɑk.
41011010	Yennu yetŋɑnm i biɑ kii be t yejɑ Dɑɑfiid nɑɑn nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ pɑɑk. Hosɑnɑ. Yudɑnt tie Yendɔunŋ ni yɑl e.»
41011011	K Yiesu bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm k kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k lin got bonsiɑl kul ɑ, ŋɑɑn nyiɑɔk nbɑ din tɑn bɔnt nɑ pɑɑk, k ŋuɑ nɑn u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ nyii k ŋmɑt sɑɑn Betɑɑni. fiigie nɑ mɔb
41011012	L sɑn-nyɑfɑnnuk o k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb nyii Betɑɑni k jent Selusɑɑlenm, k kon tɑn suol’ɔ.
41011013	K u lɑ fiigie nbɑ mɔk fɑɑmɑɑsɑ, k l sie bɑnfɔkl ɑ. K u sɑɑn tiik mɑnŋ nyɑkl ni ɑ wun sɑɑ lɑ luɑnɑ l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ bɑɑl lenŋ k u k lɑ siɑl, sie fɑɑt kuukuɑ, k mɑɑn fiignbɑ yuo dɑɑ k bɑɑl.
41011014	Ŋɑnn e k u pol tiik nɑ mɔb ɑ: «Suɑ ji kɑn mi di ɑ luɑnɑ lɑɑ nyii dinnɑ k sɑɑ.» K u puolpoweitieb gbɑt u mɑɑn mɑnŋ.
41011015	Tɔn, k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb tɑn bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm, k Yiesu sɑɑn kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k bel kɔitieb nɑn dɑɑtieb kul k nyint’b, k tut lik-kpentɑ tiebulɑ k lubn, k tut bin nbɑ kɔi ŋmɑnɑ nɑ koki k lubn,
41011016	k lek k sɑk k suɑ n jii bonsiɑl gɑl nɑn’n Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni.
41011017	Ŋɑnn e k u tumi niib nɑ k yet’b ɑ: «L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹B sii yi n ŋɑɑk Yenmiɑlu ŋɑɑk e k tul nibuolu kul ɑ.› Ŋɑɑn yinm e kpintl k tien nɑn-yukb kinkɑl buol.»
41011018	K Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb gbɑt wɑɑ tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k b ji luon sɔnu nbɑ k b sɑɑ kpi’u, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ tiin’ɔ jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn u wɑnnu din tien nibul nɑ kul ɑ yɑɑl-lituk bonciɑnn.
41011019	Dɑɑjuouk nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl yuo nbɑ k ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb nyii Selusɑɑlenm.
41011020	L sɑn-nyɑfɑnnuk o biɑk k b sonm sɔnu ni k gɑɑl, k lɑ k fiigie nɑ kuol nɑn jiinɑ ni wɑɑ k sie.
41011021	Piɑl nbɑ tiɑl Yiesu nbɑ won yet lin nbɑ nɑ, k u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, gotl, fɑɑ won pol fiigie nbɑ mɔb nɑ kuol ɑ.»
41011022	K Yiesu yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, tient Yennu yɑdɑ mɑn.
41011023	Wun nbɑ kul yet juɑl nɑ ɑ lin fikt k sɑɑ bɑɑ mɔkgbenŋl ni, ŋɑɑn k k mɔk bilsuk u pɑl ni, k tien yɑdɑ nɑn wɑɑ yet lin nbɑ mɑnŋ sɑɑ tun ɑ, l set sɑɑ tun tul’ɔ wɑɑ.
41011024	L pɑɑk e k n yien’i, l i tie k i mei Yennu k boi’ɔ siɑl po, yii mɔk yɑdɑ i pɑlɑ ni nɑn i ponŋ gɑɑl bont mɑnŋ ɑ, k i set sɑɑ lɑ wɑɑ.
41011025	L i tie k i fiil k set ɑ yin miɑl Yennu, ŋɑɑn tiɑl nɑn suɑ tun biit k biil’i, yin nyik cɑb’ɔ, k i Bɑɑ Yennu nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ mun sɑɑ nyik i biit k cɑb’i wɑɑ.
41011026	(Ŋɑɑn l i tie k i k nyikt cɑbt i lieb b biit, i Bɑɑ Yennu nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ mun kɑn nyik cɑb i biit.)»
41011027	Tɔn, k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb mɑnŋ yɑɑn din tɑn jen Selusɑɑlenm, k u kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k sonm lin. K jɑɑnti yudɑnm, nɑn senniwɑntieb, nɑn tinŋ mɑnŋ ni sɑɑkɑb, bɑɑl u buol ni,
41011028	k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Yiikuo lɑnn po e k ɑ mɔk k tuun lin nbɑ nɑ kul i? Ŋmee cɑb’ɑ l yiikuo?»
41011029	K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k n boi’i buboiyent kuɑ sinsinn. L i tie k i sɑɑ fit tul’n l jiinu, tɔn, n sɑɑ wɑnn’i yiikuo buolu nbɑ k n mɔk k tuun lin nbɑ nɑ kul ɑ.
41011030	Sɑn wun nbɑ dɑɑn wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ, Yennu e cɑb’ɔ l yiikuo ɑmi nisɑɑlk e? Yetl’n mɑn.»
41011031	K b ŋmɑnt fɑɑ b lieb lɑbɑɑl k yien ɑ: «T i yet ɑ Yennu e cɑb’ɔ l yiikuo, u sɑɑ boi’t ɑ k bee te k t k tien u mɑɑn nɑ yɑdɑ?
41011032	K t sɑɑ fit yet ɑ nisɑɑli e cɑb’ɔ ɑɑ?» (B tiin niib nɑ, k mɑɑn b kul din duki nɑn Sɑn mɑnŋ set dɑɑn tie Yennu sɔkni e nɑn bɑlmɔni.)
41011033	L pɑɑk, k b jiin k yet Yiesu ɑ: «T k mi.» K Yiesu mun yet’b ɑ: «Tɔn, n mun kɑn yet’i wun nbɑ cɑb’n l yiikuo k n tuun lin nbɑ nɑ.»
41012001	L yuo k Yiesu jɑk bɑljokt yinu ɑ: «Jɑsuɑ din wuu tilonti nbɑ k b yi fiinyɑ nɑ u kpɑɑb ni, k cɑɑn gungounŋ lint’l, ŋɑɑn gbiil buotuk nbɑ k b tuu sii ŋmɑki tilonti mɑnŋ luɑnɑ nyun lenŋ, k biɑ mɑɑ siɑl k b sii do l pɑɑk k guu kpɑɑb nɑ, k jii kpɑɑb nɑ k tien kpɑɑlɑ nii ni ɑ bii goli, ŋɑɑn yɑɑt sɑɑn duo.
41012002	K luɑnɑ nɑ punpuɑlyuo tɑn bɑɑl, k u tun tuontunnɔ ɑ wun sɑɑn gɑɑl tiluɑnɑ u kpɑɑlɑ nɑ buol ni, k u sɑɑn.
41012003	K kpɑɑlɑ nɑ suol’ɔ k buo’u fɑnu, ŋɑɑn bel’ɔ, k u kun yɑnn.
41012004	K kpɑdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ biɑ tun tuontunluɑ, ŋɑɑn k kpɑɑlɑ nɑ biɑ fɑɑ u yul k suki’ɔ.
41012005	K kpɑdɑɑnɔ nɑ biɑ ŋɑnm tun tuontunluɑ b buol ni, ŋɑɑn k b kpii ŋuɑ. L puolpo k u biɑ ŋɑnm tun tuontunlieb bonciɑnn b buol ni, k b biɑ tun nnɑ, k buo siɑb, ŋɑɑn kpii lieb.
41012006	Kpɑdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ tiɑɔnŋ bilonkɑk kuukuɑ din tɑn biɑl, k u tun’ɔ kpɑɑlɑ mɑnŋ buol ni, k yet ɑ: ‹B sɑɑ bɑɑk n tiɑɔnŋ bijɑ nɑ wɑɑ.›
41012007	Ŋɑɑn k kpɑɑlɑ mɑnŋ yet b lieb ɑ: ‹Wun nbɑ tɑn sii tie kpɑɑb nɑ dɑɑnɔ dɑsiɑl e nɑ. Ŋɑɑnt k tin kpi’u mɑn, ŋɑɑn k kpɑɑb nɑ n kpɑnt t yɑl.›
41012008	K b suol’ɔ k kpii’u k nyii nɑn’ɔ kpɑkpinŋ po k lu.»
41012009	K Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «I dukn k kpɑdɑɑnɔ nɑ sɑɑ tien nlee? U sɑɑ bɑɑl k tɑn kpi kpɑɑlɑ mɑnŋ e, ŋɑɑn jii kpɑɑb nɑ k tien kpɑɑlieb nii ni.
41012010	I dɑɑ k mi lii lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ ɑɑ? L diɑn ɑ: ‹Tɑnn nbɑ k tɑnmɑɑlɑ yet’ɔ nɑ, ŋɑnn e set tien ŋɑɑk nɑ pɑnŋ, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu tien nnɑ e, k t lɑ nɑn l tie bɑktnɔunŋ nɑ.› »
41012012	Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm yɑbi b mɔnŋ ɑ bin suol’ɔ, k mɑɑn b mi nɑn wɑɑ yin bɑljouk mɑnŋ nɑ, l sɑɑn gɑɑn b pɑɑk e. Ŋɑɑn k b tiin nibul nɑ jɑŋmɑɑni. L pɑɑk k b nyik’ɔ ŋɑɑn yɑɑt.
41012013	Ŋɑnn e k jɑɑnti yudɑnm, senniwɑntieb nɑn tinŋ mɑnŋ sɑɑkɑb tun Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb nɑn kpɑnbɑl Heluod puolpo juɑmu nɑ ni siɑb Yiesu buol ni ɑ bin tɑn boi’ɔ buboit k lɑ u mɔbonkpetl.
41012014	K b tɑn bɑɑl k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, t mi nɑn ɑ piɑk bɑlmɔni, k k mɔk jɑŋmɑɑni nɑn niib nbɑ sɑɑ dukn l po biɑnŋ nbɑ, k mɑɑn ɑ k mɔk ningɑnni niib buol ni. Ŋɑɑn ɑ wɑnt niib Yennu sɔnu nɑn bɑlmɔni. Ŋɑnn yet’t, t senni cɑb’t nɑn tii pɑ lɑnpo kii tien Luonm tinŋ kpɑnbɑl Sesɑɑl, ɑmi t dɑɑ pɑ?»
41012015	K Yiesu bɑnn b sel nbɑ k b tie nɑ, k jiin’m ɑ: «Bee k i luon k yin piin’n bɑluk u? Bɑɑt mɑn nɑn liklib k n got.»
41012016	K b bɑɑl nɑn’n. Ŋɑnn e k u boi’b ɑ: «Ŋmee nɑɑɔnŋ nɑn sɑnn e be l pɑɑk nɑ?» K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Luonm tinŋ kpɑnbɑl Sesɑɑl yɑl e.»
41012017	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Tɔn, ii yenn i pɑ kii tien Luonm tinŋ kpɑnbɑl Sesɑɑl lin nbɑ tie u yɑl, ŋɑɑn kii mun i pɑ kii tien Yennu lin nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl.» K l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b bonciɑnn nɑn Yiesu.
41012018	Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ, bin nbɑ din tuu yɑɑ ɑ niib tɑn kɑn fiil kuun ni nɑ, din bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ:
41012019	«Wɑntuɑ, Muois din diɑn senni k yet ɑ: ‹Juɑ i kpo ŋɑɑn nyik u ŋɑɑpuo, ŋɑɑn k b k mɑl wɑɑs, l ŋɑn k u ninjɑ n fɑɑl pɑkuɑk nɑ k mɑl wɑɑs k tul kpiemɔ nɑ.›
41012020	Tɔn, jɑb bɑnlole din be k tie ninjɑnn, k sɑɑkuɑ po tɑn kuɑn puo, ŋɑɑn kpo k k mɑl wɑɑs.
41012021	Ŋɑnn e k wun nbɑ wɑɑ u pɑɑk nɑ fɑɑl puo mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn mun tɑn kpo k wɑɑs kɑɑ, k wun nbɑ wɑɑ bɑntɑ nɑ ni mun fɑɑl puo mɑnŋ biɑk, ŋɑɑn mun tɑn kpo, k k mɑl wɑɑs nɑn’ɔ.
41012022	Nnɑ e k bin nbɑ wɑɑ nɑ kul ɑ kuɑn puo mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn tɑn kpo, k b suɑ k mɑl bik nɑn’ɔ. L puolpo, k puo mɑnŋ mun tɑn kpo juont.
41012023	Tɔn, k kpienm fiilu dɑɑl, b ŋmee tɑn sii yen puo mɑnŋ i? K mɑɑn b bɑnlole mɑnŋ kul ɑ din kuɑn’ɔ wɑɑ.»
41012024	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «I kpɑnn i mɔnŋ e. I mi l pɑɑk ii? I k mi Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk, k biɑ k mi u yiikuo.
41012025	Kpienm i tɑnŋ i fiil kuun ni, b tɑn sii tie nɑn mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ e. Puokuɑnt nɑn jɑkunt tɑn sii kɑɑ.
41012026	Nnɑlɑ, k jii jiin kpienm fiilu po, i k mi lii Yennu sɔkni Muois diɑni ni siɑn nbɑ yien kunkonjɑgotuk tiik nɑ po nɑ ɑɑ? L diɑn k yet ɑ Yennu din yet Muois ɑ: ‹Min e tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm Yennu, nɑn Isɑɑk Yennu, nɑn Sɑɑkɔb Yennu.›
41012027	Yennu k tie kpienm Yennu kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u tie fuotb Yennu e. I k mi e.»
41012028	Tɔn, senniwɑntɔsuɑ din be lenŋ k gbɑt Yiesu nɑn Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ nɑ lɑbɑfɑɑnu mɑnŋ, k lɑ Yiesu nbɑ jiin b buboit mɑnŋ fɑnu biɑnŋ nbɑ. L pɑɑk k u bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni, k mun tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «K senlɑnu po e kpɑn tie senjɑɑnn i?»
41012029	K Yiesu jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Lin nbɑ tie senjɑɑnn tie nnɑ e: ‹Islɑɑeltieb, gbiintl mɑn, Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu tie Yen-yenɔ kuɑ e.
41012030	‹Ii luon mɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu nɑn i pɑlɑ kul, nɑn i sei kul, nɑn i dudukt kul, nɑn i pɑnŋ kul ɑ.›
41012031	Senjɑɑnn nbɑ pukn ŋɑnle tie nnɑ e: ‹Ii luon ɑ luɑ nɑn fɑɑ luon ɑ mɔnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.› Sensɑu ji kɑɑ k gɑl senni ŋɑnle nbɑ nɑ.»
41012032	K senniwɑntuɑ mɑnŋ yet Yiesu ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, ɑ yɑbl ɑ. A yet bɑlmɔni e, Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu tie Yen-yenɔ kuɑ e, k yensɑu ji kɑɑ k pukn u po,
41012033	ɑ nisɑɑlk i luon Yennu e nɑn u pɑl kul ɑ, nɑn u dudukt kul ɑ, nɑn u pɑnŋ kul ɑ, kii biɑ kii luon u luɑ nɑn wɑɑ luon u mɔnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs bonciɑnn nɑn nilɔ n sɑk senni nbɑ ŋɑnle nɑ k gɑl wun jii bonkobt k mɑnn mɑnnsɑu k tul Yennu.»
41012034	Yiesu nbɑ lɑ k u jiin nɑn yɑn nɑ, k u yet’ɔ ɑ: «A k fɔk nɑn Yennu nɑɑn.» Lin nbɑ nɑ puolpo k suɑ ji din k mɔk pɑl nɑn wun boi Yiesu buboisiɑt Klistu nbɑ tie wun nbɑ
41012035	Yiesu nbɑ din tumi niib Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k u tɑn boi’b buboit ɑ: «Bee k senniwɑntieb yɑɑ ɑ Klistu tie Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn i?
41012036	K mɑɑn Foŋɑnm din ŋmɑktl Dɑɑfiid k u tiɑɔnŋ yet ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu din yet n Yonmdɑɑnɔ ɑ Kɑln n niidiitu po mɔkmɔk nɑn mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ te fɑn ŋmɑɑ ɑ dɑtɑi ɑ tɑɑpɑɔnŋ ni.›
41012037	Dɑɑfiid mɔnŋ mɔnŋ nbɑ din yiin Klistu nɑ ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ,› k nlee k b yien ɑ Klistu nɑ tie ŋuɑ Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn i?» Nibul bonciɑnn din gbiint Yiesu wɑnnu mɑnŋ nɑn pɑlpienn.
41012038	Wɑɑ wɑnn’b nɑ k u yet’b ɑ: «Ii mi senniwɑntieb nɑ po mɑn. Ŋɑnm e luon bii liɑ bɑɑnt kii lin kii sonm, kii biɑ kii gɑɑn bulcinfuonti dɑi ni nɑ.
41012039	B i kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, b luon bii kɑɑl nijɑɑnɑ kɑɑni pɑɑk, k b i sɑɑn jɑɑnm ni, b biɑ luon yudɑnm kinkɑɑni boɑ e.
41012040	Ŋɑnm e biɑ di pɑkɔi fobt, ŋɑɑn ji tuu jen ɑ k mei Yennu k wei, ɑ bin wɑnn b mɔnŋ nɑn b tie niŋɑnm e. B buolu tubdɑtu tɑn sii bi bonciɑnn.»
41012041	Tɔn, k Yiesu kɑl Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni k kpiɑ nɑn Yennu piini lɑkl, ŋɑɑn goli niib nbɑ kpie b likli biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. K mɔktɑ bonciɑnn kpie likyulɑ bonciɑnn,
41012042	ŋɑɑn k pɑkɔtɑlɑs-dɑɑnsuɑ mun tɑn bɑɑl kpien jinjennbɑ ŋɑnle. Ŋɑnn e tie kuuk nɑ.
41012043	K Yiesu yiin u puolpoweitieb k yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, pɑkɔtɑlɑs-dɑɑnɔ nɑ kpien piini nbɑ yɑb piini lɑkl nɑ ni k gɑl suɑ kul,
41012044	k mɑɑn b kul pɑɑt b piini b mɔknciɑɔnŋ ni e, ŋɑɑn pɑkɔtɑlɑs-dɑɑnɔ nɑ ŋɑnin tul lin nbɑ kul k u mɔk e.»
41013001	Yiesu nbɑ nyii Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni yuo nbɑ, k u puolpoweitieb yenɔ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, gotl tɑnŋɑnɑ nɑn digbenŋɑ nɑ jiɑk.»
41013002	K u jiin ɑ: «A lɑ digbenŋɑ mɑnŋ ɑɑ? Ŋɑɑn b tɑn sɑɑ tut l kul k lu tinŋ ni wɑɑ, k nɑn fiɑkl tɑn kɑn tenn.» dulnyɑ pɑɑk
41013003	K Yiesu din tɑn sɑɑn kɑl Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk pɑɑk Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk tuɑnn po, k Piɑl nɑn Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn nɑn Andle tɑn bɑɑl u buol ni, b kuukuɑ, k boi’ɔ ɑ:
41013004	«Yet’t, biɑ yuo e k nɑn fiɑkl ɑ tɑn kɑn tenn i? K bee tɑn sɑɑ tun k wɑnn nɑn l yuo mɑnŋ pel nɑ k l kul ɑ n tɑn tien’i?»
41013005	K u yet’b ɑ: «Ii cek mɑn, k dɑɑ te k suɑ n kpɑnn’i mɑn.
41013006	Niib bonciɑnn tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl k tɑɑn n sɑnn k yien ɑ: ‹N tie Klistu e›, k kpɑnn niib bonciɑnn.
41013007	I tɑn sii gbiɑ tɔbi dɑnml nnɑ, nɑn bɑnfɔkl, ŋɑɑn i dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. L bonbuolu tɑn sɑɑ fɑbl ɑ l tun, ŋɑɑn l kɑn wɑnn ɑ l juontu e nɑ.
41013008	«Nibuolu nɑn nibuolu tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn lieb, k kpɑnbɑl nɑn kpɑnbɑl mun tɑn sɑɑ tuok k kɔn nɑn lieb. Tinŋ jijekt tɑn sii be tingbounŋ nɑ lokɑ kul po. K kon tɑn sii bɑɑ. Lin nbɑ nɑ tɑn sii tie nɑn mɑtyiɑlu pinpiik nɑ e.
41013009	«Ii cek i mɔnŋ pɑɑk mɑn. B tɑn sɑɑ suol’i k sɑɑn nɑn’i buut-dɑnm buol ni, k buo’i Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni. I tɑn sɑɑ set tini yudɑnm nɑn kpɑnbɑlɑ tuɑnn ni, n sɑnn pɑɑk, k di n siɑlɑ b buol ni.
41013010	L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k tingbounŋ nibuolu kul ɑ n gbɑt n lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ e wɑɑ.
41013011	B i tɑnŋ i suol’i k sɑɑn nɑn’i buut buol ni yuo nbɑ, i dɑɑ te k l dɑɑmi’i nɑn yɑɑ sɑɑ pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ. L yuo i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, yin pɑk mɑɑn nbɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl i mɔi ni, k mɑɑn l kii tie yinm kɑɑ piɑk, ŋɑɑn l sii tie Foŋɑnm.
41013012	L yuo mɑnŋ, nilɔ tuu tɑn sɑɑ kuɑt u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ninjɑ k bin kpi’u, k bɑɑnbɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ tun nnɑ e k tul b mɔnŋ mɔnŋ wɑɑs, k wɑɑs mun biɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn b dɑnm, k cɑb’b nɑn kuun.
41013013	K suɑ kul ɑ tɑn sii nɑn’i k mɑɑn yɑɑ wɑɑ’n nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tɑn gubn nɑn fɑlɑ yuo mɑnŋ juontu, tɑn sɑɑ lɑ fielu wɑɑ.»
41013014	«I tɑn sɑɑ lɑ k bonbilɑnkɑnt nbɑ biil bonɑ bonciɑnn sie lɑ bo kii ŋɑn nɑn lii sie siɑn nbɑ. (Wun nbɑ tɑn lii diɑni nɑ, wun bɑnn lɑɑ wɑnt lin nbɑ.) L yuo mɑnŋ, bin nbɑ tɑn be Suude tinŋ ni, bin ciɑl k do juɑt.
41013015	Nisuɑ nbɑ i tɑnŋ i be u dituɑtuk pɑɑk, u ji tɑn dɑɑ siik kuɑ u dieok ni ɑ wun jii siɑl.
41013016	K nisuɑ nbɑ tɑn sii be kpɑɑb ni, u dɑɑ ŋmɑt ɑ wun jii u liɑtfuouk.
41013017	L yuo mɑnŋ, tinpunmɑ nɑn bin nbɑ diɑ wɑlɑi tɑn sɑɑ di fɑlɑ bonciɑnn.
41013018	Ii mei Yennu mɑn k u dɑɑ te k fɑlɑ nɑ bɑɑt wonfufuk yuo,
41013019	k mɑɑn Yennu nbɑ din nɑn dulnyɑ nɑ pinpiik ni wɑɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, suɑ dɑɑ k mi lɑ ninbɔnŋ k l bi k bɑɑl ninbɔnŋ nbɑ tɑn sii be dɑɑ mɑnŋ ni biɑnŋ nbɑ. K nunbɔnsiɑk mun ji kɑn mi be nɑn ŋɑnn nɑ.
41013020	Yonmdɑɑnɔ i bo i kii wɑt dɑɑ mɑnŋ yɑbnt, suɑ bo tɑn kɑn biɑl u mɑnfuol ni, ŋɑɑn u nigɑnnkɑb pɑɑk k u wɑt dɑɑ mɑnŋ yɑbnt.
41013021	«L yuo mɑnŋ, suɑ i tɑnŋ i yet’i ɑ: ‹Gotl mɑn Klistu be nnɑ,› ɑmi nɑ wɑɑ, i dɑɑ tie’u yɑdɑ,
41013022	k mɑɑn fɑɑk Klistunbɑ nɑn fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl k tuun nyinɑ nɑn bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ, ɑ bin kpɑnn Yennu nigɑnnkɑb, l i bo i sɑɑ fit.
41013023	N ponŋ yet’i bonsiɑl kul e sinsinn ɑ, k suɑ yuo mɑnŋ dɑɑ k bɑɑl. Ŋɑɑn i cek mɑn fɑnu.»
41013024	«Fɑlɑ nɑ puolpo e, k yennu nɑ tɑn sɑɑ bɔnn, k ŋmɑɑlk ji kɑn yent,
41013025	k ŋmɑɑbilɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi sɑnpɑɑpo k bɑɑ, k lin bɑɑ kul be sɑnpɑɑpo tɑn sɑɑ jekl.
41013026	L yuo mɑnŋ k niib sɑɑ lɑ k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɔkt sɑnpɑgbɑnɑ ni nɑn yiikuo nɑn yudɑnt bonciɑnn.
41013027	U tɑn sɑɑ tun mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ tingbounŋ nɑ lokɑ ŋɑnnɑ nɑ kul po k bin tikl Yennu nigɑnnkɑb k lɑk’m.» Fiigie nyinn lɑbɑɑl
41013028	«Ii ji fiigie k tumi yɑn mɑn. Yɑɑ tuu lɑ k tiik mɑnŋ bintl yuo nbɑ nɑ, i ji tuu mi nɑn siɑɔk pel e nɑ.
41013029	Nnɑ e mun yuo nbɑ k i tɑn lɑɑt k lin nbɑ nɑ nbɑ kul tuun, yin bɑnn nɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ jenu mɑnŋ pel e nɑ, l ji kɑn wei.
41013030	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ kɑn kpo k gbenn kɑɑ wɑɑ k lin nbɑ nɑ kul n tun.
41013031	Sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ tɑn sɑɑ bot ɑ, ŋɑɑn n mɑɑn ŋɑnin kɑn mi k bot fɑb ɑ.»
41013032	«Suɑ k mi l dɑɑl mɑnŋ ɑmi l yuo. Mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni k mi, k Yennu Bijɑ biɑ k mi. Bɑɑ Yennu kuukuɑ e mi.
41013033	Ii cek mɑn, k dɑɑ guɑnt, k mɑɑn i k mi dɑɑl nbɑ k yuo mɑnŋ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl.
41013034	L tɑn sii tie nɑn jɑsuɑ nbɑ nyii u ŋɑɑk ni k yɑɑt sɑɑ sɔnbɑnfɔkl, k cɑb u ŋɑɑjɑb yiikuo ɑ bii diɑ u ŋɑɑk, k biɑ cent b kul ɑ tuonɑ, k yet u ŋɑguulɔ ɑ wuu guu, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn.
41013035	Ii mun i guu mɑn, k mɑɑn i k mi yuo nbɑ k ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ sɑɑ jen, pɑsiɑl dɑɑjuouk o, ɑmi tɑnsuuni e, ɑmi sɑn-nyɑfɑɑl e, ɑmi sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni e.
41013036	L i tie k u jen yiɑn ɑ, i dɑɑ te k wun lɑ’i k i guɑnt.
41013037	L pɑɑk, mɑɑ yet’i lin nbɑ nɑ, n yien suɑ kul e, ii guu mɑn.»
41014001	Tɔn, dɑɑ ŋɑnle din biɑl nɑn yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm nɑn dɑɑ nbɑ k b di pɑɑnu nbɑ k b din tuu k tie dɑtinŋ nɑ n piin, k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb luon sɔnu ɑ bin bɔl suol Yiesu k kpi’u, k yien ɑ:
41014002	«T dɑɑ so’u jɑɑnm nɑ dɑɑ nɑ ni, k mɑɑn kpikpiluk sɑɑ bɑɑl ɑ.»
41014003	Tɔn, k Yiesu din be Betɑɑni, juɑ nbɑ din tuu tie gbɑɑtl, k b yi’u Siimɔn nɑ ŋɑɑk ni, k di jiet. L yuo k puosuɑ tɑn kuɑ nɑn sɑlenŋɑnn, k l gbie nɑn tulɑɑli nbɑ mɔk nublu bonciɑnn nɑ wɑɑ, k l dɑɑɔk biɑ pɑɑl bonciɑnn, k b yi’l nɑɑl nɑ. K puo mɑnŋ biit sɑlenn nɑ k but tulɑɑli mɑnŋ Yiesu yul pɑɑk.
41014004	K nisiɑb nbɑ din be lenŋ nɑ piɑk nɑn wutuol k yien ɑ: «Bee tien k u biil tulɑɑli nɑ nnɑ?
41014005	B bo sɑɑ fit kɔi’l k lɑ likli k lin gɑl denienbɑ kobi ŋɑntɑ (300) wɑɑ, k bo jii’l sonm tɑlɑs-dɑnm.» K b jii puo mɑnŋ nɑn mɔdunŋ bonciɑnn.
41014006	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Nyikn puo nɑ. Bonŋɑnn e k u tun k tul’n mɑnŋ, k bee k i kpiln’mɔ nnɑ?
41014007	Tɑlɑs-dɑnm sii tun be i buol ni yuo kul ɑ, k i sɑɑ fit sonm’b yuo nbɑ kul k i luon, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin kii tun be nnɑ kɑɑ.
41014008	Puo mɑnŋ tun wɑɑ sɑɑ fit tun lin nbɑ e k tul’n. Wɑɑ but tulɑɑli nbɑ n gbɑnɑnt pɑɑk nɑ, u tien n kuun piinu siil e.
41014009	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, siɑn nbɑ kul k b sɑɑ muɑnt n lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, b biɑ sɑɑ muɑnt puo mɑnŋ nbɑ tun lin nbɑ nɑ, k lii tie tiɑlu e k tul’ɔ.»
41014010	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ yenɔ, wun nbɑ k b yi’u Suudɑ Iskɑɑliɑɔt nɑ, din sɑɑn Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm buol ni ɑ wun kɔi Yiesu.
41014011	Bɑɑ gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ nɑ, b pɑlɑ penn, k b senn mɔsonn ɑ b sɑɑ tul’ɔ likli l pɑɑk. K u ji piin luon sɔnu nbɑ k u sɑɑ jii Yiesu k kubn’ɔ b nuu ni. Yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm dinu lɑbɑɑl
41014012	Tɔn, l dɑɑl nbɑ din tie dɑsinsinn nbɑ k b tuu di pɑɑnu nbɑ k b din tuu k tie dɑtinŋ nɑ, l dɑɑl e k b din tuu kpi pebis k tien yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm jiet nɑ, k Yiesu puolpoweitieb boi’ɔ ɑ: «A luon k tin sɑɑn lee k sɑɑ tien jɑɑnm mɑnŋ jiet siil k tul’ɑ ni i?»
41014013	K u tun b ni bɑnle k yet’b ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ duo nɑ ni mɑn, k i sɑɑ sɑɑ cet jɑsuɑ k u jii nyunsuɑl. Ii wɑɑ’u mɑn
41014014	nɑn ŋɑɑk nbɑ k u sɑɑ sɑɑ kuɑ nɑ ni, k yet l ŋɑɑk dɑɑnɔ ɑ: ‹Wɑntuɑ nɑ yɑɑ ɑ tin boi’ɑ ɑ sɑɑnm dieok nbɑ k ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb sɑɑ di yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm jiet nɑ be lee?›
41014015	K u sɑɑ wɑnn’i dituɑtuk nbɑ yɑb k ponŋ tien bonsiɑ kul siil ɑ, k yin tien jiet mɑnŋ lenŋ.»
41014016	K Yiesu puolpoweitieb bɑnle mɑnŋ sɑɑn duo mɑnŋ ni, k set sɑɑ lɑ k siɑl kul ɑ tun l biɑnŋ ni nɑn wɑɑ yet’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. K b tien jɑɑnm mɑnŋ jiet siil.
41014017	K Yiesu nɑn u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ tɑn bɑɑl dɑɑjuouk.
41014018	Bɑɑ kɑl k di jiet yuo nbɑ, k u tɑn yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, min nɑn i yenɔ nbɑ di jiet nɑ, l dɑɑnɔ yɑɑ wun kuɑt’n e.»
41014019	K l biil b pɑlɑ ni, k b boi’ɔ yenɔ yenɔ ɑ: «A yien min ee?»
41014020	K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «L lek tie yinm tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ ni yenɔ nbɑ k min nɑn ŋuɑ lɑki tuun senn-yienŋ ni k di jiet nɑ e.
41014021	Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ set sɑɑ kpo nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e, ŋɑɑn bonbiil sii be dɑɑnɔ nbɑ yɑɑ wun kuɑt’n nɑ pɑɑk. B ii dinŋ ii bo i kii mɑl l dɑɑnɔ gbɑɑ, l bo din sii sɔ u po.»
41014022	Bɑɑ kɑl k di jiet mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ k Yiesu jii pɑɑnu k tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ŋmit’l k tul u puolpoweitieb, k yet’b ɑ: «Gɑɑt mɑn. Nɑ e tie n gbɑnɑnt.»
41014023	Ŋɑnn e k u biɑ jii kɔp nɑn dɑmunŋ k tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, k jii k tul’b. K b kul ɑ nyuu.
41014024	K u yet’b ɑ: «Lin nbɑ nɑ e tie n sɔn nbɑ sɑɑ nyi n gbɑnɑnt ni niib bonciɑnn pɑɑk, k l wɑnn nɑn Yennu lol lolpɑɑnn.
41014025	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, n ji kɑn mi k nyu dɑmunŋ nɑ sie dɑɑl nbɑ k n tɑn sɑɑ nyu l dɑmunpɑɑnn Yennu nɑɑn ni nɑ.»
41014026	Ŋɑnn e k b yin Yenjiɑntu yɑni, ŋɑɑn nyii k sɑɑn Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk pɑɑk.
41014027	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «I kul ɑ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ tin k nyik’n ɑ, k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹N tɑn sɑɑ kpi pekpɑɑlk nɑ, k pei nɑ tɑn sɑɑ tin yɑt.›
41014028	Ŋɑɑn mi i tɑnŋ i fiil kuun ni, l puolpo n sɑɑ dɔnŋ k gɑl i tuɑnn k sɑɑn Gɑɑliile.»
41014029	K Piɑl jiin yet ɑ: «N lieb nɑ kul i lek i nyik’ɑ, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin kɑn nyik’ɑ ni.»
41014030	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’ɑ nɑ, nyiɑɔk nɑ, ɑ sɑɑ noi ɑ ɑ k mi’n tɑɑl muntɑ e wɑɑ k kojouk n bui liel tɑɑl munle.»
41014031	K Piɑl ŋɑnm yet nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ: «L i lek i tie ɑ min nɑn fin n lɑkn kpo gbɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n kɑn mi k noi ɑ n k mi’ɑ ni.» K u lieb nɑ mun biɑ yet nnɑ.
41014032	L puolpo k Yiesu nɑn u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle sɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k b yi Getsemɑɑne nɑ. Lenŋ e k u yet’b ɑ: «Kɑln nnɑ mɑn ŋɑɑn k n sɑɑn k sɑɑ miɑl Yennu.»
41014033	Ŋɑnn e k u jii Piɑl nɑn Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn k sɑɑn. K u yɑn put k u pɑl biil bonciɑnn,
41014034	k u yet’b ɑ: «Pɑlbiil buolu nbɑ suol’n nɑ pel lin kpi’n ɑ. Biɑt nnɑ mɑn kii nyɔi.»
41014035	Ŋɑnn e k u cɑt k sɑɑn tuɑnn po wɑɑnm-nnɑ, k bɑɑ fɑbn, k mei Yennu ɑ l i bo i sɑɑ fit, Yennu n ŋɑɑn k fɑlɑ nbɑ bɑɑt u pɑɑk nɑ n yɑkl’ɔ, k yet ɑ:
41014036	«Abbɑ! n Bɑɑ, ɑ sɑɑ fit tun bonsiɑl kul ɑ. Dɑɑ ŋɑɑnt k n kuɑ bonbiil nbɑ bɑɑt n pɑɑk nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ te k l tie mɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn te k lin tien fɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ e.»
41014037	Ŋɑnn e k u tunn k jen u puolpoweitieb bɑntɑ nɑ buol ni, k suɑ k b tɑɑn guɑn ɑ. K u boi Piɑl ɑ: «Siimɔn, ɑ guɑnt ee? A kɑn fit kii nyɔi wɑɑn ii?»
41014038	ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Ii nyɔi mɑn ŋɑɑn kii mei Yennu k i tɑn dɑɑ kuɑ jinjɑnmi ni. I sei ŋɑnin luon lin tun lin nbɑ siɑn, ŋɑɑn k i gbɑnɑnt kɑɑ pɑnŋ.»
41014039	K u biɑ sɑɑn Yenmiɑlu k sɑɑ mei nɑn wɑɑ bo miɑl biɑnŋ nbɑ sinsinn nɑ,
41014040	ŋɑɑn biɑ ŋmɑt k sɑɑ bɑɑl suɑ k u puolpoweitieb nɑ biɑ guɑn ɑ, k mɑɑn guɑn mɔk’b bonciɑnn. K b k mi bɑɑ sɑɑ yet’ɔ lin nbɑ l yuo mɑnŋ.
41014041	Wɑɑ tɑn jen tɑɑpɑɔnŋ muntɑ ni, k u boi’b ɑ: «I biɑ lek dɑɑ duɑ guɑnt e k foi ii? L jɑnŋ ɑ mɑn. Yuo mɑnŋ bɑɑl nɑ. Gotl mɑn, b ji kuɑt Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ k tien’ɔ biitdɑnm nuu ni wɑɑ.
41014042	Fiit mɑn k tin sɑɑn. Wun nbɑ nyii n puol nɑ bɑɑt.»
41014043	Yiesu nbɑ dɑɑ piɑk nɑ, k u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ ni yenɔ, wun nbɑ k b din yi’u Suudɑ nɑ, bɑɑl nɑn nibulciɑɔnŋ, k b siɑb diɑ juk-bɑnjɑi, k siɑb mun diɑ gbɑjɑlɑ, k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb nɑn sɑɑkɑb tun’m.
41014044	K mɔlɑnfikdɑɑnɔ Suudɑ mɑnŋ ponŋ wɑnn’b nyinsiɑl ɑ, ɑ: «Mi i sɑi fuont wun nbɑ k muɑt u tɑnkpinn, yi mi nɑn ŋuɑ e nɑ. Yin suol’ɔ kii guu’u kii sɑɑ nɑn’ɔ mɑn.»
41014045	Suudɑ nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u sɑɑn Yiesu buol ni k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ.» ŋɑɑn muɑt u tɑnkpinn.
41014046	K niib nɑ ji suol Yiesu k kub’ɔ kenken.
41014047	Ŋɑnn e k u puolpoweitieb ni yenɔ nbɑ sie lenŋ tɑn nuɑt u juk-bɑnjiɑk k cuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ dɑɑbl tubl k lu.
41014048	K Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «I bɑɑl nɑn juk-bɑnjɑi nɑn gbɑjɑlɑ nɑ ɑ i tɑn suol’n nɑn n tie fɑt-tuɑ e nɑ ɑɑ?
41014049	N dɑɑn tuu be i buol Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni dɑɑl kul ɑ k wɑnt niib Yennu mɑɑn, k i tuu k so’n, ŋɑɑn l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk diɑni mɑnŋ n tien gbien.»
41014050	K u puolpoweitieb nɑ kul ji ciɑl ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ.
41014051	K nɑɑsinbisuɑ nnɑ din gbɑb cincenn kuukuɑ k wɑɑ Yiesu puolpo K b tɑn bib’ɔ k suol u cincenn,
41014052	k u nyik u cincenn mɑnŋ b nuu ni, ŋɑɑn ciɑl yɑnn.
41014053	K b jii Yiesu k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ ŋɑɑk, siɑn nbɑ k jɑɑnti yudɑnm, nɑn tinŋ nɑ ni sɑɑkɑb, nɑn senniwɑntieb din lɑkn.
41014054	K Piɑl din be Yiesu puolpo k wɑɑ bɑnfɔkl ɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn bɑɑ tɑn kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ ŋɑɑk ni. K Piɑl sɑɑn kɑl k pukn sejebit nɑ po k b nɑni muu.
41014055	Ŋɑnn e k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn sɑɑkɑb mɑnŋ kul yɑbl b mɔnŋ pɑɑk ɑ bin lɑ siɑlɑɑdɑnm mɔb ni lin nbɑ k b sɑɑ jii Yiesu biit k kpi’u, ŋɑɑn kɔnŋ u bisiɑt.
41014056	Siɑlɑɑdɑnm bonciɑnn din fɑ fɑi k tien’ɔ, ŋɑɑn k b fɑi mɑnŋ din k wei liel.
41014057	L yuo k jɑsiɑb fiil set k fɑɑl fɑɑk tul’ɔ ɑ:
41014058	«T gbɑt k u yet ɑ u sɑɑ bet Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nbɑ k niib din mɑɑ nɑn b nii nɑ, ŋɑɑn l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ sinsuuk ni k u sɑɑ jii k mɑɑ’l, k l tɑn kii tie nilɔ nii kɑɑ mɑɑ’l.»
41014059	Ŋɑɑn l kul yɑnn. B fɑi mɑnŋ lek biɑ din k wei liel.
41014060	Ŋɑnn e k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ nɑ fiil k boi Yiesu ɑ: «Bɑli nbɑ k jɑb mɑnŋ piɑk k tien’ɑ nɑ po, l pɑɑk tie bee? A k mɔk l jiinu uu?»
41014061	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu lek ŋmin ɑ, k k jiin siɑl. K u biɑ ŋɑnm boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e set tie Klistu wun nbɑ tie ŋuɑ Yennu nbɑ k t dont’ɔ nɑ Bijɑ nɑ ɑɑ?»
41014062	K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Nnn, min e nɑ. K i tɑn sɑɑ lɑ Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k u kɑl Yɑbnt Yennu niidiitu po, k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ’u k u be sɑnpɑgbɑnɑ ni k siik.»
41014063	Ŋɑnn e k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ wutuol duo k u suol u mɔnŋ tiɑt k pɑt, ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «Bee te k t ji luon siɑlsuɑ.
41014064	I mɔnŋ gbɑt wɑɑ piɑk k biil Yennu biɑnŋ nbɑ. I duki nlee?» K b kul sɑk ɑ u biil ɑ, u kpɑn ŋɑn nɑn kuun e.
41014065	K b siɑb siin mɔsɑnt u pɑɑk, k b piit u nunm po, ŋɑɑn lubn’ɔ nikulɑ k yien’ɔ ɑ: «Buntl wun nbɑ peb’ɑ nɑ.» K sejebit nɑ suol’ɔ, k jɑk’ɔ nɑn tɑnpɑki.
41014066	Tɔn, Piɑl lek dɑɑ din be nɑn-yel po k nɑni muu, k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ ŋɑɑsɑpɑɑntuontun-yenɔ tɑn bɑɑl lɑ’u,
41014067	k got’ɔ silll, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «A mun tuu wɑɑ Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ Yiesu mɑnŋ.»
41014068	K Piɑl noi k yet ɑ: «N k mi. N k gbɑt fɑɑ piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk,» ŋɑɑn fiil nyii.
41014069	K sɑpɑɑmɔ nɑ biɑ lɑ’u lenŋ k ŋɑnmt yien nisiɑb nbɑ sie lenŋ nɑ ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ mun tie u puolpoweitieb nɑ yenɔ e.»
41014070	Ŋɑɑn k Piɑl biɑ ŋɑnm noi. K l biɑ yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ k bin nbɑ sie lenŋ mɑnŋ ŋɑnm jɑk Piɑl ɑ: «A set tie niib nɑ ni yenɔ e, k mɑɑn ɑ mun tie Gɑɑliile nilɔ.»
41014071	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl pol ɑ: «L i tie k n fɑɑl fɑɑk i e, Yennu n dɑt n tubl, min k mi juɑ nbɑ k i piɑk u po nɑ.»
41014072	L yuo mɑnŋ k kojouk bui k pukn tɑɑpɑɔnŋ munle ni, k Piɑl ji tiɑl biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yiesu yet’ɔ nɑ ɑ: «A sɑɑ yet ɑ ɑ k mi’n tɑɑl muntɑ e wɑɑ, ɑ k kojouk n tɑn bui tɑɑl munle ni.» L yuo k Piɑl mɔ.
41015001	K Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm, nɑn tinŋ nɑ ni sɑɑkɑb, nɑn senniwɑntieb, nɑn Suifnbɑ sɑɑkɑb kul lɑkn sɑn-nyɑpob ni, k lol lolɑ, k bɑɑn Yiesu bɑnt k jii’u sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ tinŋ yudɑɑnɔ nbɑ k b yi’u Piilɑɑt nɑ buol.
41015002	K Piilɑɑt boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e set tie Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl nɑ ɑɑ?» K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Fin yɑɑ.»
41015003	K Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm mɑnŋ tɑɑl Yiesu bonɑ bonciɑnn pɑɑk.
41015004	K Piilɑɑt biɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «A kɑn jiin siɑl ii? Gbiintl bɑɑ wɑɑ’ɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ.»
41015005	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu k jiin siɑl, k l ji bɑkt Piilɑɑt.
41015006	Tɔn, yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm dinu yuo kul, Piilɑɑt tuu nyinn niyenɔ kuɑ e dɑnsɑlk ni, wun nbɑ k niib luon bin ŋɑɑ’u.
41015007	L yuo mɑnŋ k jɑsuɑ din be dɑnsɑlk, k u sɑnn yi Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs. Ŋuɑ nɑn nisiɑb din be dɑnsɑlk k mɑɑn b kpikpiluk nbɑ k b dɑɑn tie duo nɑ ni k kpii nilɔ nɑ pɑɑk.
41015008	Ŋɑnn e k nibul mɑnŋ din lɑkn k mei Piilɑɑt ɑ wun tun wɑɑ din tuu tuun bɑnnu nbɑ yɑɑnn.
41015009	K u boi’b ɑ: «I luon k n nyinn Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl nɑ ee?»
41015010	K mɑɑn u din mi fɑnu nɑn jɑɑnti yudɑnm funfunn pɑɑk e te k b jii Yiesu k tien u nuu ni.
41015011	Ŋɑɑn k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm mɑnŋ din wɑɑ tik nibul nɑ ɑ bin yet’ɔ k wun nyinn Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs e k tul’b.
41015012	K Piilɑɑt biɑ ŋɑnm boi’b ɑ: «K wun nbɑ k i yi’u Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl nɑ, i luon k n tien’ɔ nlee?»
41015013	K b tiɑn jiin sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Kpɑɑn’mɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.»
41015014	K Piilɑɑt boi’b ɑ: «Bee pɑɑk i? U biit mɑntk tie lɑnn po e?» K b biɑ ŋɑnm tiɑn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Kpɑɑn’mɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.»
41015015	K Piilɑɑt luon wun penn nibul mɑnŋ pɑlɑ, l pɑɑk k u nyinn Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs tul’b, ŋɑɑn te k b buo Yiesu, k jii’u tul’b ɑ bin kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.
41015016	K sejenm jii Yiesu k kuɑ nɑn’ɔ tinŋ nɑ yudɑɑnɔ Piilɑɑt ŋɑɑdundounŋ ni, k yiin b tɔk-nɑn-lieb kul.
41015017	K b jii bɑɑnmunŋ nnɑ k lɑnn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn jii kunkoni k luu nɑɑn foklk k yiln’mɔ,
41015018	ŋɑɑn ji fuont’ɔ ɑ: «Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl, fuontu wɑɑ.»
41015019	ŋɑɑn jii lɑnbɑnbik k fɑɑ u yul pɑɑk, k siin mɔsɑnt u pɑɑk, k gbɑɑ b dunɑ pɑɑk u tuɑnn ni.
41015020	Bɑɑ dɑɑn’ɔ nyɑtuk k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k b liɑt bɑɑnmunŋ nɑ, ŋɑɑn jii u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ tiɑt nɑ k lɑnn’ɔ, k jii’u k nyii nɑn’ɔ ɑ bin sɑɑn kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.
41015021	L yuo k Siilenn jɑsuɑ din be, k u sɑnn yi Siimɔn, wun nbɑ tie Aleksɑndl nɑn Lufus bɑɑ nɑ, k u nyii kpɑɑnt ni k gɑɑl lenŋ. K sejenm miɑ’u ɑ wun gɑɑl Yiesu kuun dɑpunpunn nɑ k jii.
41015022	K b jii Yiesu k sɑɑ nɑn’ɔ siɑn nbɑ k b yi’l Golgotɑ, k l pɑɑk tie: «Yukpɑbuk buol nɑ.»
41015023	Lenŋ e k nisiɑb din tul’ɔ dɑmunŋ nbɑ ŋmɑt nɑn nyɔksɑu nbɑ k b yi’l miil nɑ, ŋɑɑn k u yet l nyunu.
41015024	K sejenm kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn tol b lieb u tiɑt nɑ, ŋɑɑn tɔ tiɑtiɑ k cent u tiɑt mɑnŋ.
41015025	B din kpɑɑ’u sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni e, kut mun-yiɑ yuo.
41015026	K b din diɑn lin nbɑ pɑɑk te k b kpɑɑ’u k tɑbn u dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk, k l yɑɑ ɑ: «Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl mɑnŋ e nɑ.»
41015027	B biɑ din kpɑɑ fɑt-tieb bɑnle dɑpunpunɑ pɑɑk k pukn u po, k yenɔ din be u niidiitu po, k luɑ nɑ mun din be u niigɑnŋ po.
41015028	(K l gbien lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «B jii’u tien biitdɑnm sinsuuk ni.»)
41015029	Tɔn, k bin nbɑ sonm gɑɑl lenŋ nɑ gumi yulɑ ŋɑɑn suki’ɔ, k yien ɑ: «Fin. A tuu yɑɑ ɑ sɑɑ fit bet Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ŋɑɑn biɑ mɑɑ’l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ sinsuuk ni.
41015030	Tɔn, fɑn nyi dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk k sik k fɑt ɑ mɔnŋ.»
41015031	Nnɑ e k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb mun biɑ lɑɑ’u, ŋɑɑn yien tien b lieb ɑ: «U tuu fɑɑl lieb, ŋɑɑn tɑn kɑn fit k fɑt u mɔnŋ.
41015032	Ŋɑɑnt k Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl, Klistu nɑ, n nyi dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk k sik nnɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ, k tin lɑ k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.» K bin nbɑ k b pukn u po k kpɑɑ’b nɑ mun suki’ɔ.
41015033	Lɑɑ din tɑn bɑɑl yensuuk ni yuo nbɑ, k duo nɑ kul ji din bɔnn k sɑɑ bɑɑl kut muntɑ.
41015034	Kut muntɑ yuo e, k Yiesu yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl, k yet ɑ: «Eloi, Eloi, lemɑ sɑɑbɑɑktɑɑni?» k l pɑɑk tie ɑ: «N Yennu n Yennu, bee k ɑ lu’n i?»
41015035	K bin nbɑ sie lenŋ nɑ nbɑ gbɑt u yiini mɑnŋ, k b siɑb yet ɑ: «Gbiintl mɑn. U yi Elii e.»
41015036	Ŋɑnn e k b ni yenɔ tin k sɑɑ jii sɑɑpo k suunt dɑmiituk nnɑ ni, k jii sɑkn dɑɑɔk pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn donn k tul’ɔ ɑ wun nyu, k biɑ yet ɑ: «I ŋɑɑn k tii guu k lɑɑn Elii bɑɑt ɑ wun sikn’ɔ dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk.»
41015037	K Yiesu ŋɑnm yikn nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl, ŋɑɑn nɑk l yuo.
41015038	L yuo nɑ k cincenn nbɑ tuu juɑn k puun Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni nɑ ji bɔkt l yul pɑɑk k tɑn sik tinŋ ni.
41015039	K sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nbɑ din sie dɑpunpunn mɑnŋ buol nɑ, wɑɑ lɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yiesu kpo nɑ, k u ji yet ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e, juɑ nɑ set tie Yennu Bijɑ e.»
41015040	Tɔn, Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli nɑn Mɑɑli wun nbɑ din tie Sose nɑn Sɑɑk bik nɑɑ nɑ, nɑn Sɑɑlome din be, k b din pukn puosiɑb po k sie bɑnfɔkl ɑ ŋɑɑn goli.
41015041	B ponŋ din wɑɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ k u din be Gɑɑliile ni e wɑɑ k sonmt’ɔ. Puolieb bonciɑnn nbɑ wei Yiesu k bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm nɑ mun biɑ din be lenŋ.
41015042	L dɑɑl dɑɑjuouk k Aliimɑɑte duo ni juɑ nbɑ sɑnn din yi Suosiɑf nɑ din bɑɑl. U din tie Suifnbɑ tintɑɑnkɑɑnu ni sɑɑkɑyenɔ e, k din tie bulcimɔ nɑn bɑlmɔni, k din tuu guu Yennu nɑɑn bɑɑlu. K l dɑɑl din tie dɑɑl nbɑ k Suifnbɑ tuu tie b mɔnŋ siil nɑn Fuondɑɑl. L pɑɑk, k u din sɑɑn yet Piilɑɑt ɑ wun cɑb’ɔ Yiesu gbɑnɑnt, ŋɑɑn u din k tiin jɑŋmɑɑni.
41015044	Piilɑɑt nbɑ din gbɑt ɑ Yiesu ponŋ kpo wɑɑ nɑ, k l ji yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’ɔ, k u yiin sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ wun lɑɑn Yiesu nbɑ kpo l wei wɑɑ?
41015045	Yuo nbɑ k u gbɑt yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ mɔb ni nɑ, k u yiin Suosiɑf mɑnŋ k tɑn cɑb’ɔ ɑ wun jii Yiesu gbɑnɑnt nɑ.
41015046	K Suosiɑf din dɑɑ kɑtinŋ, k kpɑɑt Yiesu gbɑnɑnt dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk, k pɔbn’ɔ lenŋ, k jii’u k pii kɑɑɔk nbɑ k b ponŋ din jiɑl tɑnpiiuk, k bikt kɑtɑnu, k biin l mɔb nɑ.
41015047	K Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli nɑn Mɑɑli wun nbɑ din tie Sose nɑɑ nɑ din lɑ siɑn nbɑ k b pii Yiesu gbɑnɑnt mɑnŋ ɑ.
41016001	Fuondɑɑl nbɑ din tɑn gɑl nɑ, k Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli, nɑn Sɑɑlome, nɑn Mɑɑli wun nbɑ din tie Sɑɑk nɑɑ nɑ, din sɑɑn k sɑɑ dɑɑ tulɑɑlnunubt ɑ bin sɑɑn but Yiesu gbɑnɑnt pɑɑk.
41016002	Suifnbɑ Fuondɑɑl nbɑ din gɑl k l yent sɑn-nyɑpob ni k b din sɑɑ kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ buol ni.
41016003	Bɑɑ dɑɑ din be sɔnu ni yuo nbɑ, k b fɑɑ nɑn lieb lɑbɑɑl ɑ: «Ŋmee sɑɑ sɑɑ bilnt kɑtɑnu kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ mɔb pɑɑk k tul’t i?» L kɑtɑnu din gbenŋ bonciɑnn. Ŋɑɑn k b tɑn pel lenŋ, k got lɑ k kɑtɑnu mɑnŋ ponŋ bilnt k duɑ l kuɑ.
41016005	Bɑɑ kuɑ kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ ni nɑ, b lɑ nɑɑsimɔ nnɑ, k u liɑ bɑɑnpieounŋ k kɑl niidiitu po, k l tien’m jijiet bonciɑnn.
41016006	K nɑɑsimɔ mɑnŋ yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ jie siɑl mɑn. I luon Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ Yiesu nbɑ k b kpii’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk nɑ e. U fiil kuun ni wɑɑ. U kɑɑ nnɑ. Gotl mɑn, bɑɑ dɑɑn bilɔ siɑn nbɑ nɑ.
41016007	Ŋɑɑn i ŋmɑt k sɑɑ yet Piɑl nɑn puolpoweitelieb ɑ u gɑl i tuɑnn po k sɑɑn Gɑɑliile wɑɑ. Lenŋ e k i sɑɑ sɑɑ lɑ’u nɑn wɑɑ ponŋ dɑɑn yet’i biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.»
41016008	K l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit puob mɑnŋ, k b gbɑnɑnt jek bonciɑnn, k b nyii kɑɑɔk nɑ ni, k ciɑl. B lek k fɑɑ suɑ l lɑbɑɑl, k mɑɑn jɑŋmɑɑni din suol’b bonciɑnn.
41016009	[Tɔn, Yiesu nbɑ din fiil kuun ni lɑsl dɑɑl sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni nɑ, u din dɔnŋ dɔkt Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli pɑɑk e, wun nbɑ k u din nyinn nɑlnbiit bɑnlole u ni nɑ.
41016010	K puo mɑnŋ sɑɑn sɑɑ yet Yiesu wei-nɑn-lieb nbɑ mɔ k fɑbn nɑ.
41016011	Ŋɑɑn bɑɑ gbɑt ɑ Yiesu jen u mɑnfuol ni k u lɑ’u nɑ, b k sɑk tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.
41016012	Lin nbɑ nɑ puolpo e k Yiesu puolpoweitieb bɑnle siɑb din tɑn nyii duo nɑ ni k sonm sɔnu ni k sɑɑ siɑl buol, k u lebt u mɔnŋ k dɔkt b pɑɑk.
41016013	K b ŋmɑt jen duo nɑ ni k tɑn yet b lieb, ŋɑɑn k b lek k tien’m yɑdɑ.
41016014	L puolpo e biɑk k Yiesu tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn yenɔ kuɑ nɑ din kɑl k di jiet, k Yiesu tɑn dɔkt b pɑɑk, k kpil’b b yɑdɑ puɑln pɑɑk nɑn b tubɑ nbɑ kpɑɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k mɑɑn b k tien bin nbɑ lɑ nɑn u fiil kuun ni nɑ yɑdɑ.
41016015	K u biɑ yet’b ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ kii muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ k tul suɑ kul tingbounŋ nɑ kul sɑɑk ɑ po.
41016016	Wun nbɑ kul tien yɑdɑ, k b wul’ɔ Yennu nyunwulu, u sɑɑ lɑ fielu, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ kul k tien yɑdɑ, Yennu sɑɑ bu u buut k biil’ɔ wɑɑ.
41016017	Ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ tien yɑdɑ sɑɑ tun yɑɑl-lituk tuonɑ nɑ e: b sii tɑɑn n sɑnn k nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni, k biɑ piɑk mɑɑn nbɑ k b k mi pɑk.
41016018	B i tɑnŋ i suol wɑi, ɑmi b i tɑnŋ i nyuu bonbiil, l kɑn tien’m siɑl. B biɑ sɑɑ yii b nii bɑɑtb pɑɑk k b sɑɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ.»
41016019	Tɔn, Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu nbɑ pɑk mɑɑn nɑ k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k Yennu te k u duo sɑnpɑɑpo k sɑɑ kɑl ŋuɑ Yennu niidiitu po.
41016020	L puolpo k u puolpoweitieb sɑɑn k sɑɑ muɑntl u lɑbɑmɑnn lokl kul po, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ din be nɑn’m, k te k b tuun yɑɑl-lituk tuonɑ, k l tuonɑ nɑ din wɑnn siɑlɑ ɑ b muɑnti mɑnŋ set tie bɑlmɔni e.]
42001001	Cɑnbɑɑ Teofiil: Niib bonciɑnn din lɑ Yennu nbɑ din tun lin nbɑ t sinsuuk ni l pinpiik ni nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ.
42001002	Bɑɑ din lɑ lin nbɑ nɑn b ninbinɑ, b biɑ din wɑnn’t. Bin nbɑ din wɑnn’t lin nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑnm e kpɑnt Yennu tuontunnɑ.
42001003	Ŋɑnn e te k n mɔnŋ boi k fiitl bonŋɑnn k lɑ l bonsiɑl kul nbɑ din piin biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑn lɑɑ din sɑɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ. Cɑnbɑɑ, n biɑ dukn nɑn l ŋɑn k n diɑn l kul k tul’ɑ
42001004	k ɑ fit bɑnn nɑn lin nbɑ kul k b wɑnn’ɑ nɑ, l set tie bɑlmɔni e.
42001005	Yuo nbɑ k Heluod din tie Suude tinŋ kpɑnbɑl nɑ, k Yennu mɑnntɔsuɑ din be k u sɑnn yi Sɑɑkɑɑli, k u be Abiɑ pɑɑbu ni k tuun, k u ŋɑɑpuo mun din tie mɑnntuɑ Aɑlɔn yɑɑbuonn e, k u sɑnn yi Eliisɑɑbet.
42001006	B bɑnle din mɔk binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm, k sɑɑk u mɔb senni kul nyiknyik.
42001007	B din k mɔk bik, k mɑɑn Eliisɑɑbet din tie puokɑnmɑtl e, k b bɑnle kul biɑ ponŋ din kpet ɑ.
42001008	Dɑsiɑl k Sɑɑkɑɑli tuontun-yuo tɑn bɑɑl u pɑɑbu ni, k u din tɑn yɑɑ wun tun u tuonn k tul Yennu nɑn b pɑɑbu nbɑ tuu tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
42001009	L yuo nɑ k b din tɑn tɔ tiɑtiɑ nɑn b mɑnntieb kɑɑl nbɑ din tie biɑnŋ nbɑ, k lukt’ɔ ɑ wun kuɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k wubn bonnunubt.
42001010	K nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ kul din biɑl sie nɑn-yel k mei Yennu, yuo nbɑ k u dɑɑ din wubnt bonnunubt nɑ.
42001011	L yuo nɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑlɑkɑ dɔkt Sɑɑkɑɑli pɑɑk k set bonnunubt binbintl nɑ diitu po.
42001012	Sɑɑkɑɑli nbɑ din tɑn lɑ’u yuo nbɑ, k u yɑn put ŋmɑt, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol’ɔ.
42001013	Ŋɑɑn k mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Sɑɑkɑɑli, dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. Yennu ponŋ dɔnŋ gbɑt ɑ miɑlu wɑɑ, k ɑ ŋɑɑpuo Eliisɑɑbet tɑn sɑɑ mɑl bonjɑk k tul’ɑ, k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ pul u sɑnn Sɑn.
42001014	K l tɑn sɑɑ mɑnŋ’ɑ k ɑ pɑl n penn, k niib bonciɑnn pɑlɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ penn u mɑɑlu mɑnŋ pɑɑk,
42001015	k mɑɑn u tɑn sii tie tuontunjɑɑnn e Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuɑnn. U kɑn mi k nyu dɑmunŋ ɑmi dɑbuolu kul nbɑ mɔ, k u tɑn sɑɑ gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm ŋɑɑn dɑɑ be u nɑɑ puol ni.
42001016	U tɑn sɑɑ te k Islɑɑeltieb bonciɑnn n ŋmɑt k jen Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu buol ni.
42001017	U sii mɔk siek nbɑ din be Elii ni nɑ nɑn u pɑnŋ k tɑn sɑɑ dɔnŋ liit Yonmdɑɑnɔ ɑ wun ŋɑnm bɑɑnbɑ nɑn b wɑɑs sinsuuk ni, k biɑ tunn mɔyetdɑnm yɑn k lii tie nɑn yentinu dɑnm yɑl nɑ, k biɑ te k niib n tien siil kii guu Yonmdɑɑnɔ.»
42001018	K Sɑɑkɑɑli ji din boi mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ, «N sɑɑ tien nlee k bɑnn nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ tie mɔni? K mɑɑn n kpet ɑ, k n ŋɑɑpuo mun biɑ kpet ɑ.»
42001019	K mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Min e tie Gɑbliel! Min e be Yennu tuɑnn k tuun u tuonn, k u tun’n ɑ buol, ɑ n tɑn yet’ɑ ŋɑɑn wɑnn’ɑ lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ.
42001020	Ŋɑɑn ɑ sɑɑ muu k kii fit piɑk i nɑn yuo nbɑ k l tɑn sɑɑ tien mɔni nɑ, k mɑɑn ɑ k tien n mɑɑn nbɑ sɑɑ tien mɔni nɑ yɑdɑ.»
42001021	Tɔn, k niib nbɑ din biɑl sie nɑn-yel k guu Sɑɑkɑɑli, k l bɑkt’b k mɑɑn wɑɑ wei Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
42001022	Wɑɑ ji din tɑn nyii yuo nbɑ, u din k fit piɑk, k b ji din bɑnn nɑn u lɑ yelntu e Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni, k u ji piɑk muutl k lɑbn nii k tien’m.
42001023	Yuo nbɑ k u tuonɑ din tɑn gbenn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nnɑ k u kun ŋɑɑk ni.
42001024	L puolpo e k u ŋɑɑpuo Eliisɑɑbet din tɑn suol puol, ŋɑɑn bɔli u mɔnŋ ŋɑɑk ni tɑɑtɑɑtɑ nɑn ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnŋmu,
42001025	k din tɑn yet u mɔnŋ ɑ nnɑ: «Nnɑ e k Yonmdɑɑnɔ tun tul’n k tin’n ninbɑɑɔk k nyinn’n fei ni.»
42001026	Tɔn, Eliisɑɑbet puol suolu ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnluob ni e, k Yennu din tun u mɑlɑkɑ Gɑbliel ɑ wun sɑɑn duo nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni, k b yi duo mɑnŋ Nɑɑsɑɑlet,
42001027	k sɑɑ pɑk tul sɑpɑɑnmunn, wun nbɑ sɑnn tie Mɑɑli nɑ. Sɑpɑɑmɔ mɑnŋ din tie jɑsuɑ sɑlkpenŋ e, k u sɑnn din tie Suosiɑf k u tie kpɑnbɑl Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn.
42001028	K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ din tɑn bɑɑl Mɑɑli buol ni k fuont’ɔ ɑ: «Fuontu lɑɑ. Yonmdɑɑnɔ pɑl mei ɑ pɑɑk, k u biɑ be nɑn’ɑ.»
42001029	Wɑɑ yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k Mɑɑli yɑn ji din put ŋmɑt bonciɑnn k sɑɑ bɑɑ nuɑk ni, k u ji duki fuonti mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
42001030	K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ biɑ yet’ɔ, «Mɑɑli, dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn Yennu pɑl mei ɑ pɑɑk.
42001031	A tɑn sɑɑ suol puol k mɑl bonjɑk, k ɑ sɑɑ pul u sɑnn Yiesu.
42001032	U tɑn sii tie nijɑɑnn e, k b tɑn sii yi’u Yɑbnt Yennu Bijɑ. Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu sɑɑ te k wun di u yejɑ Dɑɑfiid nɑɑn,
42001033	k u tɑn sii tie Sɑɑkɔb yɑɑbuonɑ ni Kpɑnbɑl nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k u nɑɑn mɑnŋ biɑ tɑn kɑn mi gbenn.»
42001034	K Mɑɑli boi mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «N dɑɑ tie sɑpɑɑnmunn e, k nlee k n sɑɑ suol puol i?»
42001035	K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Foŋɑnm sɑɑ sik ɑ pɑɑk, k Yɑbnt Yennu pɑnŋ sɑɑ sik bɑkn ɑ pɑɑk. L pɑɑk, bik nbɑ k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ mɑl’ɔ mɑnŋ tɑn sii tie niŋɑnɔ, k b sii yi’u Yennu Bijɑ.
42001036	Bɑnt nɑn ɑ niipuo Eliisɑɑbet, wun nbɑ kpet ɑ nɑ, mɔtɑɑnɑ u lek suol puol ɑ k sɑɑ mɑl bonjɑk. U puol ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnluob e nɑ, ŋuɑ nbɑ k b tuu yi’u puokɑnmɑtl.
42001037	K mɑɑn siɑl kɑɑ k Yennu kɑn fit tun.»
42001038	K Mɑɑli yet’ɔ, «Tɔn, n tie Yennu tuontunnɔ e. Ŋɑɑnt k lin tien nɑn fɑɑ yet’n biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.» K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ ji din yɑɑt ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ.
42001039	L puolpo k Mɑɑli din tɑn fiil k sɑɑn yiɑn yiɑn k sɑɑ juɑt nbɑ be Suude tingbounŋ ni buol, k sɑɑ bɑɑl dosɑu ni,
42001040	k kuɑ Sɑɑkɑɑli ŋɑɑk ni k fuont Eliisɑɑbet.
42001041	Yuo nbɑ k Eliisɑɑbet gbɑt Mɑɑli fuonti nɑ, k bik nbɑ dɑɑ be Eliisɑɑbet puol ni mɑnŋ ji din dɑnm. L yuo nɑ k Eliisɑɑbet gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm,
42001042	k yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ, «Wui wui ɑ: Yennu yetŋɑnm be ɑ pɑɑk k gɑl puolieb kul ɑ, k u yetŋɑnm biɑ be bik nbɑ be ɑ puol ni nɑ pɑɑk.
42001043	L tien’n nlee nɑ k n Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑɑ tɑn bɑɑl n buol nnɑ?
42001044	Mɑɑ gbɑt ɑ fuonti yuo nbɑ nɑ, k bik nbɑ be n puol nnɑ dɑnm nɑn pɑlpienn.
42001045	Fin nbɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yennu mɑɑn nbɑ k u pɑk tul’ɑ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ tien mɔni, pɑlpienn tie ɑ yɑl e.»
42001046	Ŋɑnn e k Mɑɑli ji din yet ɑ «N dont Yennu sɑnn n pɑl ni,
42001047	k mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn Yennu wun nbɑ tie n Fietuɑ nɑ pɑɑk,
42001048	k mɑɑn u tin min nbɑ tie u tuontunpuok nɑ ninbɑɑɔk, Lɑɑ jii dinnɑ k sɑɑ, nigbounŋ kul tɑn sii yien ɑ n tie pɑlpienn dɑɑnɔ e,
42001049	k mɑɑn Yennu tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ k tul’n, k u sɑnn tie sɑn-yienŋ.
42001050	U biɑ mɔk ninbɑtinu nɑn nigbounŋ kul nbɑ tiin’ɔ lɑɑ nyii yejɑnm ni k sɑɑ tuu bɑɑnbɑ nɑn yɑbuontuɑt-tuɑt ni.
42001051	U tɑnt u nuu k tun pɑnŋ tuonɑ, k yɑt kɑlnbɑɑndɑnm k biil b lolɑ,
42001052	k liɑt kpɑnbɑlɑ b nɑɑn ni, ŋɑɑn donn sikn-n-mɔnŋ dɑnm,
42001053	k u nuɑb bonŋɑnɑ k tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm, ŋɑɑn te k mɔktɑ ŋmɑt nɑn niikuoni.
42001054	U bɑɑl k sonm u tuontunnɑ Islɑɑeltieb, u k tɑnm u ninbɑtinu nbɑ k u din senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul
42001055	Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑn u yejɑŋɑɑk nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k l tie nɑn wɑɑ din senn mɔsonn k tul t yejɑnm nɑ.»
42001056	Tɔn, l din tien nɑn ŋmɑɑli ŋɑntɑ nɑ k Mɑɑli dɑɑ be Eliisɑɑbet buol ni k tɑn ŋmɑt kun.
42001057	Eliisɑɑbet mɑtuk yuo din tɑn bɑɑl, k u mɑl bonjɑk.
42001058	K b ŋɑkpiɑsnbɑ nɑn u ninjɑnm din gbɑt biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ tin’ɔ ninbɑɑɔk bonciɑnn nɑ, k b kul mɔk pɑlpienn.
42001059	Tɔn, k l dɑɑ ŋɑnniin dɑɑl e k b din bɑɑl ɑ bin pot bik mɑnŋ punn, k luon bin pul u sɑnn Sɑɑkɑɑli, nɑn u bɑɑ sɑnn nɑ,
42001060	ŋɑɑn k u nɑɑ jiin k tul’b ɑ: «Aɑi, u sɑnn sii yi Sɑn e.»
42001061	K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «A dɑnm ni, suɑ sɑnn k yi Sɑn.»
42001062	Ŋɑnn e k b pɑk muutl ni nɑn bik mɑnŋ bɑɑ, ɑ bin boi k lɑɑn u luon bii yi u bik mɑnŋ sɑnn ɑ bee,
42001063	k u wɑnn muutl ni ɑ bin jii dɑpɔuk tul’ɔ. Bɑɑ jii k tul’ɔ k u diɑn ɑ: «Bik mɑnŋ sɑnn e tie Sɑn.» K l ji din bɑkt b kul ɑ.
42001064	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni nɑ k Sɑɑkɑɑli muut k ji din piin mɑɑn pɑku k piɑk Yennu.
42001065	K jɑŋmɑɑni din suol b duo niib kul ɑ, k lɑbɑɑl nɑ din muɑnt yɑt digbɑnɑ kul nbɑ be Suude juɑt pɑɑk,
42001066	k l tul bin nbɑ kul din gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ dudukt, k b boi b lieb, «Bik nɑ tɑn sii tie nibuol bee nɑ?» k mɑɑn Yennu pɑnŋ ponŋ din be nɑn’ɔ.
42001067	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Foŋɑnm din gbie nɑn bik mɑnŋ bɑɑ Sɑɑkɑɑli, k u sɔknt Yennu mɑɑn k yien ɑ:
42001068	«Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin pɑk Yonmdɑɑnɔ wun nbɑ tie tinm Islɑɑeltieb Yennu nɑ, k mɑɑn u bɑɑl ɑ wun sonm u niib k fɑt’b ŋɑɑ’b.
42001069	U tul’t Fietuɑ nbɑ mɔk pɑnŋ k u nyii Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonɑ ni.
42001070	Yɑɑyuo ni k Yennu din pɑk mɑɑn u sɔknŋɑnm mɔi ni k tul’t,
42001071	k yien ɑ u tɑn sɑɑ nyinn’t t dɑtɑi nii ni, k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyinn’t bin nbɑ kul nɑn’t nɑ nii ni.
42001072	U biɑ din yet ɑ u sii mɔk ninbɑtinu nɑn t yejɑnm, k kɑn tɑnm u lol
42001073	nbɑ k u din lol k tul t yejɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑ.
42001074	U din senn ɑ u sɑɑ nyinn’t t dɑtɑi nii ni, k tin fit jiɑnt’ɔ k jɑŋmɑɑnsɑi sii kɑɑ,
42001075	k t sii tie niŋɑnm nɑn niŋɑnm u buol ni nɑn t mɑnfuol gbennu.
42001076	N bik nɑ, b tɑn sii yi’ɑ: ‹Yɑbnt Yennu sɔkni e.› A sɑɑ liit Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuɑnn k sɑɑ ŋɑnm u sɔni k tul’ɔ,
42001077	k wɑnn u niib k bin bɑnn nɑn u tɑn sɑɑ fiel’b wɑɑ sɑɑ nyik cɑb b biit nɑ pɑɑk,
42001078	k mɑɑn t Yennu mɔk ninbɑtinu nɑn bulcint, k l pɑɑk, k u sɑɑ te k yentgbenŋl n nyi sɑɑnpɑɑpo k dɔkt t pɑɑk k tie nɑn yenduol nɑ,
42001079	k l tɑn sɑɑ yent sɑnpɑɑpo k tul bin nbɑ be bunbɔnn ni nɑn bin nbɑ be kuun miɑl ni, k l biɑ tɑn sɑɑ yent t tɑɑ ni k tin tɔkn mɑnu sɑnjouk ni.»
42001080	K Sɑn din kpɑɑtl k puki pɑnŋ u siek ni, k be muuk ni tɑɑtɑɑ nɑn dɑɑl nbɑ k u din tɑn dɔkt Islɑɑeltieb buol ni nɑ.
42002001	L yuo nɑ k kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Ogust din tul mɔb ɑ bin diɑn suɑ kul nikɑnt Luonmtieb yent kul ni.
42002002	Ŋɑnn e din tie sinsinn nikɑnt diɑnu, k Kiiliinius din tie Siili tinŋ yudɑɑnɔ l yuo.
42002003	L pɑɑk, suɑ kul din kun u duo ni ɑ bin sɑɑ diɑn u sɑnn.
42002004	Suosiɑf mun din nyii Nɑɑsɑɑlet nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tingbounŋ ni, k sɑɑn Suude tingbounŋ ni, k kun Dɑɑfiid duo ni, Betlehenm. Setk nɑn mɔni, Suosiɑf din tie Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn e.
42002005	U din kpen ɑ bin diɑn ŋuɑ nɑn u sɑlkpenŋ Mɑɑli sɑnɑ e. L yuo nɑ, k Mɑɑli mɔk puol.
42002006	Bɑɑ din dɑɑ be Betlehenm nɑ, k Mɑɑli mɑtuk yuo tɑn bɑɑl.
42002007	K u ji din mɑl bonjɑk, u sɑpɑɑnmɑl. U din jii cincenn k pɔbn’ɔ, k bil’ɔ bonkobluok ni, k mɑɑn dieok nbɑ k b din guun nikɑnt niib nɑ din gbie wɑɑ.
42002008	Pekpɑɑli mun din be duo mɑnŋ ni k kpɑɑl b pei nyiɑɔk muuk ni.
42002009	K Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑlɑksuɑ din tɑn dɔkt b pɑɑk, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ yentsɑɑkɑl yent lint’b, k jɑŋmɑɑni mɑntk ji din suol’b bonciɑnn.
42002010	Ŋɑɑn k mɑlɑkɑ nɑ yet’b ɑ: «Dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni mɑn, k mɑɑn n bɑɑl nɑn lɑbɑmɑnn e mɑɑ n wɑnn’i, lin nbɑ sɑɑ tul niib kul pɑlpienn bonciɑnn.
42002011	Dinnɑ nyiɑɔk nɑ, Dɑɑfiid duo ni, b mɑl i Fietuɑ wun nbɑ tie Klistu, Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ.
42002012	Nɑ e sii tie nyinn k tul’i; I sɑɑ lɑ sɑnpɑntk nɑ puɑb cincenn ni k duɑ bonkobluok ni.»
42002013	L yuo nɑ k Yendɔunŋ ni mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bonciɑnn dɔkt k pukn mɑlɑkɑ nɑ po, k yiin dont Yennu sɑnn ɑ:
42002014	«Yudɑnt tie Yennu nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ yɑl e, k mɑɑn mɑnu be Yennu nɑn niib sinsuuk ni, u lonm pɑɑk.»
42002015	K mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑ tɑn nyik pekpɑɑli nɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt duo Yendɔunŋ ni. K pekpɑɑli yet b lieb ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin sɑɑn Betlehenm k sɑɑ got lɑ lin nbɑ tien, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ yien’t nɑ.»
42002016	Ŋɑnn e k b fiil sɑɑn yiɑn yiɑn k sɑɑ bɑɑl k lɑ Mɑɑli nɑn Suosiɑf, k sɑnpɑntk mɑnŋ duɑ bonkobluok ni.
42002017	Bɑɑ bɑɑl lɑ’u yuo nbɑ k b muɑnt lin nbɑ k mɑlɑkɑ nɑ yet’b bik mɑnŋ po nɑ.
42002018	K bin nbɑ din gbɑt lin nbɑ k pekpɑɑli muɑnt nɑ, k l bɑkt b kul.
42002019	Ŋɑɑn Mɑɑli din tiɑl lin nbɑ tien nɑ kul, k din duki l po u pɑl ni bonciɑnn.
42002020	L puolpo e k pekpɑɑli nɑ ŋmɑt b pei buol muuk ni. Bɑɑ sɑɑ nɑ, k b piɑk dont Yennu sɑnn, lin nbɑ kul k b gbɑt k lɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k l set tie nɑn mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ yet’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
42002021	Yiesu mɑɑlu dɑɑ ŋɑnniin dɑɑl e, yuo nbɑ k b sɑɑ pot u punn nɑ, k b pul u sɑnn Yiesu, sɑnn nbɑ k mɑlɑkɑ din pul k suɑ u nɑɑ din dɑɑ k suol u puol nɑ.
42002022	Tɔn, l din tɑn jɑnŋ nɑn Mɑɑli nɑn Suosiɑf n tun nɑn Muois senni nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ, k mɑnn mɑlunŋ k ŋɑnm Mɑɑli Yennu buol ni. Ŋɑnn e k b ji din jii bik nɑ k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Selusɑɑlenm, ɑ bin sɑɑ jii’u k tul Yonmdɑɑnɔ
42002023	nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ senni ni ɑ: «Bikpelk kul nbɑ tie bonjɑk e tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ yuɑ.»
42002024	K b biɑ mɑnn mɑlunŋ nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ din senn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ɑ: «Bin lɑ lɑnjeli bɑnle ɑmi ŋmɑnbilɑ bɑnle k mɑnn.»
42002025	L yuo nɑ k jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm, k u sɑnn din tie Siimeɔn. U din be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm k din bɑɑkt Yennu bonciɑnn, k guu yuo nbɑ k Yennu sɑɑ fiel Islɑɑeltieb, k Foŋɑnm din be nɑn’ɔ.
42002026	K Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ ponŋ din fiit k wɑnn’ɔ ɑ u kɑn kpo sie k u tɑn lɑ Klistu, nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ tun’ɔ nɑ.
42002027	L yuo nɑ k Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ din te k Siimeɔn kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k sɑɑ lɑ Yiesu bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ ɑ bin tien’ɔ nɑn senni nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ.
42002028	K Siimeɔn din gɑɑl bik mɑnŋ ŋɑɑn pɑk Yennu k yet ɑ:
42002029	«N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ gbien ɑ mɔsonn nɑ wɑɑ. Lɑɑ tie bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑnt k ɑ dɑɑbl n kpo, k kun nɑn mɑnu,
