42002030	k mɑɑn n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ninbinn lɑ fɑɑ tun lin nbɑ k fiel ɑ niib ɑ,
42002031	lin nbɑ k ɑ tien niib kul ninbinɑ ni.
42002032	L sii tie yentu nbɑ sɑɑ te k niib kul n bɑnn’ɑ, k l biɑ sɑɑ te k ɑ niib Islɑɑel n lɑ dontl.»
42002033	Tɔn, Siimeɔn nbɑ pɑk k jikt sɑɑ bik mɑnŋ po biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k l bɑkt bik nɑ nɑɑ nɑn u bɑɑ bonciɑnn.
42002034	K Siimeɔn tul’b yetŋɑnm, ŋɑɑn yet bik nɑ nɑɑ Mɑɑli ɑ: «Nnɑlɑ, Yennu nyinn bik nɑ k senn’ɔ ɑ Islɑɑeltieb bonciɑnn n bɑɑ yɑnn u pɑɑk, k lieb bonciɑnn mun biɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ fielu u pɑɑk e. Ŋuɑ e tɑn sii tie nyinn nbɑ k niib bonciɑnn tɑn kɑn sɑk l mɑɑn.
42002035	Lin nbɑ nɑ sɑɑ te k b wuol ni dudukt n nyi pɑɑnu. Ŋɑɑn bonsiɑl tɑn sɑɑ tun k pint ɑ pɑl pɑɑk bonciɑnn.»
42002036	Tɔn, k Yennu sɔkniiluɑ mun din be lenŋ k tie puo, k u sɑnn yi Aɑnn, wun nbɑ tie Fɑɑnuel bipuo, k biɑ tie Aɑsel buolu ni nilɔ, k din tie puokpelcɑɑnwonŋ, wun nbɑ din yuo binɑ ŋɑnlole.
42002037	K l puolpo k u sɔlɔ tɑn kpo ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ pɑkuɑk, k u ji mɔk binɑ piiniin nɑn ŋɑnnɑ. U din tuu k nyi Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk, k jiɑntl Yennu k loln mɔb k mei’ɔ.
42002038	L yuo nɑ k u bɑɑl k tul Yennu niipuouk, k din piɑk bik nɑ po k tien bin nbɑ kul din guu yuo nbɑ k Yennu yɑɑ wun fiel Selusɑɑlenm tieb.
42002039	Yuo nbɑ k Mɑɑli nɑn Suosiɑf nbɑ din tun gbenn Yonmdɑɑnɔ senni nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k b ŋmɑt kun b duo Nɑɑsɑɑlet nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni.
42002040	K Yiesu tɑn kpɑɑt nɑn pɑnŋ nɑn subni bonciɑnn, k Yennu yetŋɑnm din be u pɑɑk.
42002041	Tɔn, binn kul k Yiesu nɑɑ nɑn u bɑɑ din tuu do Selusɑɑlenm k sɑɑ di yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm.
42002042	Yuo nbɑ k Yiesu din tɑn bɑɑl binɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle, k b din duo ɑ bin sɑɑ di jɑɑnm mɑnŋ nɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ k b din tuu tie nɑ.
42002043	Jɑɑnm dɑɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ din tɑn gbenn yuo nbɑ, k b ji piin kunu, ŋɑɑn k bik nɑ, Yiesu, din biɑl k be Selusɑɑlenm, ŋɑɑn k Mɑɑli nɑn Suosiɑf k mi nɑn u biɑl.
42002044	B din duki mi ɑ u be nibul nɑ ni e, k b sonm dɑɑl mɑnŋ kul. L puolpo k b luon’ɔ b niib ni nɑn b lieb ni.
42002045	Bɑɑ k lɑ’u nɑ, k b din ŋmɑt sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm k sɑɑ luon’ɔ lenŋ.
42002046	K dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k b tɑn lɑ’u Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k u lɑkn kɑl nɑn wɑntieb k gbiintl b mɑɑn ŋɑɑn biɑ boi’b buboit.
42002047	K bin nbɑ kul din gbiintl u mɑɑn, l din bɑkt’b nɑn wɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ k mɔk bɑnnu k piɑk k jiint’b.
42002048	K u nɑɑ nɑn u bɑɑ nbɑ din lɑ’u lenŋ, k l bɑkt’b bonciɑnn, k u nɑɑ ji boi’ɔ ɑ: «N bik, bee k ɑ tien’t nnɑ? A k mi ɑ min nɑn ɑ bɑɑ lɑ pɑlbiil hei k luon’ɑ ni ii?»
42002049	K u jiin k boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i dɑɑn luon’n i? I k mi ɑ sie k n fɑbl kii be n Bɑɑ ŋɑɑk ni ii?»
42002050	Ŋɑɑn b din k gbɑt u mɑɑn mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
42002051	Ŋɑnn e k b din ŋmɑt nɑn Yiesu k sik Nɑɑsɑɑlet, k u din sɑɑk b mɔb. K u nɑɑ din tiɑn lin nbɑ tien nɑ kul u pɑl ni.
42002052	K Yiesu kpɑɑtl k u yɑn puki, k Yennu nɑn nisɑɑli pɑlɑ din mei u pɑɑk.
42003001	Yuo nbɑ k kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Tiibel Sesɑɑl din dii nɑɑn binɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnŋmu, Pɔns Piilɑɑt mun din tie Suude yudɑɑnɔ. Heluod mun din tie Gɑɑliile kpɑnbɑl, k u ninjɑ Fiiliip mun din tie Ituule nɑn Tlɑɑkoniit kpɑnbɑl. Liisɑniɑs din tie Abiilenn kpɑnbɑl.
42003002	Ann nɑn Kɑɑyiif mun din tie Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm. L yuo nɑ k Yennu din jii u mɑɑn k tul Sɑn nbɑ tie Sɑɑkɑɑli bik nɑ, k u din be muuk ni.
42003003	Ŋɑnn e k Sɑn din tuu lin Suulden kpenu po kul, k muɑntl k tien niib ɑ bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ k wun wul’b Yennu nyunwulu k Yennu n nyik cɑb b biit.
42003004	Lin nbɑ nɑ tie nɑn Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi nbɑ din diɑn u kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ɑ «Nisuɑ tɑn sii be muuk ni k huot k yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Ŋɑnmt mɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑlu sɔnu k tul’ɔ, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm u sɔni k lii tuok.
42003005	Bɑɑt kul sɑɑ gbie k nɑɑ; juɑt nɑn kunkonɑ kul sɑɑ bit k nɑɑ. Sɔnu nbɑ ŋmɑl siɑn nbɑ buol, l sɑɑ sont fɑnu; sɔnbuotɑ sɑɑ piin k lɑt nɑɑ,
42003006	k tingbounŋ niib kul sɑɑ lɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu sɑɑ fiel’b nɑ.› »
42003007	Niib bonciɑnn din bɑɑl Sɑn buol ɑ wun wul’b Yennu nyunwulu, k u yet’b ɑ: «Yinm wɑɑlɑbli nɑ. Ŋmee kpɑɑn’i ɑ i tin k nyi Yennu wutuol nbɑ yɑɑ lin bɑɑl i pɑɑk nɑ ni?
42003008	Ii tuun mɑn lin nbɑ sɑɑ wɑnn nɑn i set mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ. I dɑɑ yien i pɑlɑ ni nɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm tie i yejɑ. N yien’i e, Yennu sɑɑ fit k fiin tɑnɑ nbɑ nɑ k lin kpɑnt Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ.
42003009	Pɑjɑl ponŋ tien siil ɑ, ɑ wun cuɑ tiini nɑn b jiinɑ, k tiik kul nbɑ k luon luɑnŋɑnɑ, b sɑɑ cuɑ’l e k lu’l muu ni.»
42003010	K nibulciɑɔnŋ mɑnŋ din boi’ɔ ɑ: «K t ji sɑɑ tien nlee?»
42003011	K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «Wun nbɑ mɔk liɑtfɔkt ŋɑnle, sie k wun pɑɑt yenn k tul wun nbɑ k mɔk, k wun nbɑ mɔk jiet, sie k wun wɑt tul wun nbɑ k mɔk.»
42003012	Ŋɑnn e k lɑnpogɑɑltesiɑb mun din bɑɑl ɑ wun wul’b Yennu nyunwulu, ŋɑɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, tinm sɑɑ tien nlee?»
42003013	K u yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ gɑɑn likli k gɑɑl bɑɑ senn’i senni biɑnŋ nbɑ.»
42003014	L puolpo k sejesiɑb mun boi’ɔ ɑ: «K tinm mun, t sɑɑ tien nlee?» K u yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ muksl suɑ k gɑɑn siɑl i ɑmi k fɑ fɑɑk niib po. Ii mɔk pɑlpienn i pɑɑɔk nbɑ k i gɑɑn nɑ pɑɑk.»
42003015	Tɔn, k niib nbɑ din guu Klistu bɑɑlu nɑ, ji din piin k boi b mɔnŋ, ɑ pɑsiɑl Sɑn sii tie Klistu e.
42003016	L yuo mɑnŋ k Sɑn yet b kul ɑ: «Min ŋɑnin wuul’i Yennu wulu nɑn nyun e, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ cie’n bɑɑt. N ponŋ k ŋɑn nɑn k n lot u tɑɑsɑɑŋmi. Ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ jii Foŋɑnm nɑn muu k wul’i Yennu wulu.
42003017	U diɑ u dilenn ŋmɑni ɑ wun lenn bonŋɑnn, k nyinn dibin k wuun u buɑl ni, ŋɑɑn juo founŋ nɑ muu nbɑ kɑn mi k kpien nɑ ni.»
42003018	Sɑn nbɑ din muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ k tien niib nɑ, k u pɑk mɑɑn bonciɑnn k kpɑɑn’m,
42003019	ŋɑɑn k biɑ din tɑɑl kpɑnbɑl Heluod, k mɑɑn u din fɑt u mɔnŋ ninjɑ ŋɑɑpuo Heluodiɑd k kuɑn’ɔ wɑɑ, k biɑ tun biit bonciɑnn.
42003020	L puolpo e, k Heluod din tɑn tun bonbiil mɑntk k biɑ pukn l pɑɑk, k kuɑn Sɑn dɑnsɑlk.
42003021	Yuo nbɑ k Sɑn din wul niib kul Yennu nyunwulu nɑ, k Yiesu tɑn bɑɑl u buol k u wul’ɔ Yennu nyunwulu mun. Lenŋ mɑnŋ e k Yiesu din mei Yennu, k sɑnpɑɑpo tɑn luot,
42003022	k Foŋɑnm sik u pɑɑk nɑn gbɑnɑnt nbɑ nɑɑn nɑn ŋmɑnn nɑ, k kunkɔl nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k yet ɑ: «Fin e tie n Bilonkɑk. Fin e k n nunm gbuo.»
42003023	Yuo nbɑ k Yiesu din piin u tuonn nɑ, k u din mɔk nɑn binɑ piintɑ nɑ. Niib din duki nɑn u tie Suosiɑf bijɑ e, k Suosiɑf bɑɑ din tie Heli,
42003024	k Heli bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑtɑ, k Mɑɑtɑ bɑɑ din tie Liefi, k Liefi bɑɑ din tie Melki, k Melki bɑɑ din tie Sɑɑnɑi, k Sɑɑnɑi bɑɑ din tie Suosiɑf,
42003025	k Suosiɑf bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑtɑɑtiɑs, k Mɑɑtɑɑtiɑs bɑɑ din tie Amos, k Amos bɑɑ din tie Nɑɑhunm, k Nɑɑhunm bɑɑ din tie Esli, k Esli bɑɑ din tie Nɑɑkɑi,
42003026	k Nɑɑkɑi bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑt, k Mɑɑt bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑtɑɑtiɑs, k Mɑɑtɑɑtiɑs bɑɑ din tie Semeɑn, k Semeɑn bɑɑ din tie Suosek, k Suosek bɑɑ din tie Juodɑ,
42003027	k Juodɑ bɑɑ din tie Suɑnɑn, k Suɑnɑn bɑɑ din tie Lesɑ, k Lesɑ bɑɑ din tie Solobɑɑbel, k Solobɑɑbel bɑɑ din tie Sɑɑlɑɑtiel, k Sɑɑlɑɑtiel bɑɑ din tie Neli,
42003028	k Neli bɑɑ din tie Melki, k Melki bɑɑ din tie Adi, k Adi bɑɑ din tie Kuosɑɑnm, k Kuosɑɑnm bɑɑ din tie Elmɑɑdɑnm, k Elmɑɑdɑnm bɑɑ din tie El,
42003029	k El bɑɑ din tie Yiesu, k Yiesu bɑɑ din tie Eliesel, k Eliesel bɑɑ din tie Suoliinm, k Suoliinm bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑtɑ, k Mɑɑtɑ bɑɑ din tie Liefi,
42003030	k Liefi bɑɑ din tie Siimeɔn, k Siimeɔn bɑɑ din tie Suudɑ, k Suudɑ bɑɑ din tie Suosiɑf, k Suosiɑf bɑɑ din tie Suonɑɑnm, k Suonɑɑnm bɑɑ din tie Eliiɑkiinm,
42003031	k Eliiɑkiinm bɑɑ din tie Meleɑ, k Meleɑ bɑɑ din tie Menɑ, k Menɑ bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑtɑɑtɑ, k Mɑɑtɑɑtɑ bɑɑ din tie Nɑɑtɑn, k Nɑɑtɑn bɑɑ din tie Dɑɑfiid,
42003032	k Dɑɑfiid bɑɑ din tie Jese, k Jese bɑɑ din tie Suobet, k Suobet bɑɑ din tie Buos, k Buos bɑɑ din tie Sɑɑlɑ, k Sɑɑlɑ bɑɑ din tie Nɑɑsɔn,
42003033	k Nɑɑsɔn bɑɑ din tie Amiinɑɑdɑɑb, k Amiinɑɑdɑɑb bɑɑ din tie Admin, k Admin bɑɑ din tie Alni, k Alni bɑɑ din tie Eslɔnm, k Eslɔnm bɑɑ din tie Fɑɑles, k Fɑɑles bɑɑ din tie Suudɑ,
42003034	k Suudɑ bɑɑ din tie Sɑɑkɔb, k Sɑɑkɔb bɑɑ din tie Isɑɑk, k Isɑɑk bɑɑ din tɑn tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm, k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm bɑɑ din tie Telɑ, k Telɑ bɑɑ din tie Nɑɑkɔl,
42003035	k Nɑɑkɔl bɑɑ din tie Seluk, k Seluk bɑɑ din tie Lɑɑgo, k Lɑɑgo bɑɑ din tie Fɑɑlek, k Fɑɑlek bɑɑ din tie Ebel, k Ebel bɑɑ din tie Sɑɑlɑ,
42003036	k Sɑɑlɑ bɑɑ din tie Kɑinɑɑnm, k Kɑinɑɑnm, bɑɑ din tie Alfɑɑksɑɑt, k Alfɑɑksɑɑt bɑɑ din tie Senm, k Senm bɑɑ din tie Noe, k Noe bɑɑ din tie Lɑɑmek,
42003037	k Lɑɑmek bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑtuusɑɑlɑ, k Mɑɑtuusɑɑlɑ bɑɑ din tie Henɔk, k Henɔk bɑɑ din tie Jɑɑlet, k Jɑɑlet bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑleliɑl, k Mɑɑleliɑl bɑɑ din tie Kɑinɑn,
42003038	k Kɑinɑn bɑɑ din tie Enos, k Enos bɑɑ din tie Set, k Set bɑɑ din tie Adɑn, k Adɑn bɑɑ din tie Yennu.
42004001	L yuo nɑ k Yiesu din nyii Suulden kpenu po, k gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm, k Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ k u kuɑ muuk ni,
42004002	k lenŋ e k Sɑɑtɑn din sɑɑ jɑnm’ɔ dɑɑ piinnɑ. K u k dii siɑl i yuo mɑnŋ ni, k l yuo nɑ dɑɑ tɑn gɑl k kon ji din suol’ɔ.
42004003	K Sɑɑtɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ set tie Yennu Bijɑ i e, fɑn yet tɑnn nɑ k lin kpɑnt pɑɑnu.»
42004004	K Yiesu jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹Pɑɑnu kuukuɑ kɑɑ te k nilɔ be.› »
42004005	L puolpo e k Sɑɑtɑn ji din jii’u k duo nɑn’ɔ sɑnpɑɑpo k sɑɑ wɑnn’ɔ tingbounŋ yent kul kul l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni,
42004006	ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «N sɑɑ tul’ɑ yiikuo l kul pɑɑk nɑn l mɔktuk kul, k mɑɑn b tul’n ɑ, k n mun sɑɑ fit tul wun nbɑ k n luon.
42004007	Ŋɑnn, l i tie k ɑ gbɑɑn k jiɑnt’n, l kul sii tie ɑ yɑl e.»
42004008	K Yiesu jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹Nilɔ i jiɑntl Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu kuukuɑ e, kii biɑ kii tuun kii tien ŋuɑ kuukuɑ.› »
42004009	Ŋɑnn e k Sɑɑtɑn biɑ jii’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Selusɑɑlenm, k sɑɑ donn’ɔ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk mɔpinyelk pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ tie Yennu Bijɑ i e, fɑn yukl mɔb nnɑ nɑ,
42004010	k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹U sɑɑ te k u mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ i guu’ɑ.›
42004011	L biɑ diɑn ɑ: ‹B sii diɑ’ɑ nɑn b nii k ɑ tɑɑl dɑɑ fɑɑ tɑnn k ɑ lɑɑt dɑnŋ.› »
42004012	K Yiesu jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «L yet Yennu kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹A dɑɑ biki Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu.› »
42004013	K Sɑɑtɑn nbɑ din jɑnm Yiesu k tɑn guo nɑ, k u dɑɑ nyik’ɔ sie yuo nbɑ k u ji tɑn sɑɑ lɑ yɑɑk.
42004014	K Yiesu din gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm pɑnŋ k tɑn ŋmɑt sɑɑn Gɑɑliile. K b din muɑnt u lɑbɑɑl k l yɑt tinŋ mɑnŋ kul kul po.
42004015	K u din wɑnt’b Yennu mɑɑn b Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, k niib kul piɑk’ɔ.
42004016	L puolpo e k Yiesu din sɑɑn Nɑɑsɑɑlet, siɑn nbɑ k b din wubi’ɔ. K Fuondɑɑl k u din tɑn kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni nɑn wɑɑ ponŋ din tuu kuɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k tɑn fiil ɑ wun lii Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk.
42004017	K b jii kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ k Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi din diɑn nɑ k tul’ɔ, k u pint kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k lɑ siɑn nbɑ k l diɑn k yet ɑ
42004018	«Yonmdɑɑnɔ Siek be n ni, k u lukt’n ɑ n muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn k tul nɑndɑnm nɑ. U tun’n ɑ n tɑn yet yonmi ɑ n sɑɑ nyinn’b yɑnn, k biɑ yet juɑni ɑ b sɑɑ nyuɑnt ɑ, k biɑ fɑt bin nbɑ be fɑlɑ ni k lu’b yɑnn,
42004019	k biɑ muɑnt ɑ l jɑnŋ nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ n fiel u niib ɑ.»
42004020	Yiesu nbɑ lii gbenn yuo nbɑ k u pin kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k jiin tul Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok tuontunnɔ, ŋɑɑn kɑl. K niib kul nbɑ be dieok nɑ ni ji din goli’ɔ.
42004021	K u piin piɑk k tien’m ɑ: «Mɑɑn nbɑ k n lii Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ, l tɑn tien bɑlmɔni dinnɑ, yuo nbɑ k l bɑɑ i tubɑ ni nɑ.»
42004022	K b kul ji din piɑk’ɔ, k l bɑkt’b nɑn mɑɑn nbɑ k u pɑk nɑ, k b ji boi b lieb ɑ: «Suosiɑf bijɑ nɑ kɑɑ nɑ ɑɑ?»
42004023	L yuo nɑ k u yet’b ɑ: «Bilsuk kɑɑ nɑn i tɑn sɑɑ yet’n bɑljouk nɑ e ɑ: ‹Fin tebtuɑ, tebn ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ,› k i biɑ tɑn sɑɑ yet’n ɑ: ‹Tient bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ duo nɑ nɑn tɑɑ gbɑt nɑn fɑɑ dɑɑn tun Kɑpelnɑunm nɑ.›
42004024	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, niib k cɔln Yennu sɔkni u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ duo ni.
42004025	Bɑlmɔni e, pɑkɔi bonciɑnn din be Islɑɑel tinŋ ni, yuo nbɑ k Elii dɑɑ din be nɑ. L yuo mɑnŋ, sɑɑk din k bɑɑ binɑ ŋɑntɑ nɑn ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnluob, k kon din tɑn bɑɑ bonciɑnn tinŋ mɑnŋ ni kul,
42004026	ŋɑɑn Yennu din k tun Elii suɑ buol fɑb ɑ, tinŋ mɑnŋ ni. U din tun’ɔ pɑkuɑk nbɑ din be Sɑɑleptɑ nbɑ be Siidɔn tinŋ ni nɑ buol e.
42004027	Yuo nbɑ k Eliise dɑɑ din be nɑ, gbɑɑtɑ bonciɑnn din be Islɑɑel tinŋ ni, ŋɑɑn b suɑ din k lɑ pɑɑku tinŋ mɑnŋ ni. Nɑɑmɑn nbɑ din tie Siili juɑ nɑ, ŋuɑ kuukuɑ e din lɑ pɑɑku.»
42004028	K niib kul nbɑ din be Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok mɑnŋ ni nbɑ gbɑt Yiesu mɑɑn mɑnŋ nɑ, k b ji din donn wutuol bonciɑnn u pɑɑk.
42004029	K b fiil bel’ɔ k nyinn’ɔ duo nɑ ni, k sɑɑ donn’ɔ kunkonn nbɑ k b din mɑɑ b duo nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ bin lu’u bɑɑɔk ni,
42004030	ŋɑɑn k u buut b ni k yɑɑt.
42004031	L puolpo k Yiesu din sik Kɑpelnɑunm nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni. Fuondɑɑl k u din tumi niib.
42004032	Wɑɑ din wɑnt’b bɑnnu nbɑ din bɑkt’b, k mɑɑn u din piɑk nɑn yiikuo.
42004033	K jɑsuɑ nbɑ k nɑlnbiiuk be u ni nɑ din be Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok nɑ ni k tiɑn sɑnpɑɑpo ɑ
42004034	«Fin Yiesu nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ, tinm nɑn fin, nlee mɑntk i? A bɑɑl ɑ ɑ tɑn biil’t ee? N mi fɑɑ tie wun nbɑ. A tie Yennu niŋɑnɔ nɑ e.»
42004035	K Yiesu din yɑki nɑn nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ ɑ: «Ŋminin fuut, ŋɑɑn nyi juɑ mɑnŋ ni.» K nɑlnbiiuk nɑ lu juɑ nɑ tinŋ ni b nunm ni, k nyii u ni, ŋɑɑn k k tien’ɔ dɑnŋ.
42004036	K l din tien suɑ kul yɑɑl-lituk, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «Mɑbuol bee nɑ? U mɔk yiikuo nɑn pɑnŋ k tien nɑlnbiit mɔb, k b nyi niib ni.»
42004037	L pɑɑk, k b din muɑnt Yiesu sɑnn tinŋ mɑnŋ ni kul.
42004038	L yuo nɑ k Yiesu din nyii Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok nɑ ni k sɑɑn Siimɔn ŋɑɑk. K b sɑɑ lɑ Siimɔn diɑnpuok k u yiɑl k u gbɑnɑnt ton bonciɑnn, k b bɑln Yiesu, puo nɑ po.
42004039	K Yiesu buɑn k got’ɔ, ŋɑɑn yɑki nɑn yiɑlu nɑ, k l gbenn, k puo nɑ fiil yiɑn ɑ k tien’m sɑɑɔnŋ.
42004040	Yuo nbɑ k yennu din tɑn bɑɑ, k bin nbɑ kul mɔk bɑɑtb b ŋei ni din jii’b k bɑɑl nɑn’m Yiesu buol, k b din yiɑl yiɑlbuolu buolu, k u yii u nii bɑɑtb nɑ kul pɑɑk yenɔ yenɔ k te k b pɑɑk.
42004041	Nɑlnbiit bonciɑnn din nyii niib ni. Bɑɑ nyii yuo nbɑ k b tiɑn sɑnpɑɑpo k yien ɑ: «A tie Yennu Bijɑ e.» Ŋɑɑn Yiesu din k cɑb’b k b pɑk jik, k mɑɑn b mi nɑn u tie Klistu e.
42004042	Lɑɑ din yent k Yiesu nyii duo nɑ ni k sɑɑn muuk ni, k niib nɑ din tɑn lin luon’ɔ k sɑɑ lɑ’u. Bɑɑ din tɑn lɑ’u yuo nbɑ k b ji guɑl’ɔ ɑ u dɑɑ yɑɑtl ŋɑɑn nyikt’b.
42004043	Ŋɑɑn k u yet’b ɑ: «Sie k n sɑɑn digbɑnliɑ biɑk kii sɑɑ i muɑntl Yennu nɑɑn lɑbɑmɑnn po, k mɑɑn l pɑɑk e te k Yennu tun’n.»
42004044	Ŋɑnn e k u din lin Suude digbɑnɑ k kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni k wɑnt niib mɑɑn mɑnŋ.
42005001	Dɑsiɑl k Yiesu din sɑɑn sɑɑ sie Genesɑɑlet mɔkgbenŋl gbingbɑnn pɑɑk, k nibulciɑɔnŋ din tut gbin ɑ bin gbiint Yennu mɑɑn.
42005002	K u lɑ bulgbetɑ ŋɑnle din be mɔkgbenŋl mɑnŋ gbingbɑnn, k jɑnsuoltieb din nyik’l ŋɑɑn cɑt sɑɑn ɑ bin wuul b jɑnlɑɑnt.
42005003	K u kuɑ bulgbetl nbɑ tie Siimɔn yɑl ni nɑ, ŋɑɑn miɑl’ɔ ɑ wun cɑt wɑɑn k fɔkt nɑn gbingbɑnn. K Yiesu kɑl bulgbetl nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn wɑnt nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ Yennu mɑɑn.
42005004	Wɑɑ din wɑnn niib k gbenn yuo nbɑ k u biɑ yet Siimɔn ɑ: «Jiln nyun sunsunŋ po k lu i jɑnlɑɑnt k suol jɑni.»
42005005	Ŋɑɑn k Siimɔn jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, wonn nyiɑɔk munn ɑ, t won yɑbl ɑ t suol jɑni, ŋɑɑn k fit suol siɑl. Tɔn, fɑɑ pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑnn ŋɑnin n sɑɑ lu k got.»
42005006	K Siimɔn nɑn u lieb nɑ ji din lu b jɑnlɑɑnt nɑ k suol jɑni bonciɑnn, k b jɑnlɑɑnt ji yɑɑ lin pɑt.
42005007	L pɑɑk, k b kɑbnt b lieb bulgbetliel nɑ ni ɑ bin bɑɑl k tɑn sonm’b. Bɑɑ bɑɑl yuo nbɑ k b din donn jɑni k tɑn gbien b bulgbetɑ ŋɑnle kul ɑ, k l din kpiɑk k b ji yɑɑ bin kpii nyun ni.
42005008	K Siimɔn Piɑl nbɑ din lɑ lin nbɑ tien nɑ, k u gbɑɑn Yiesu tuɑnn ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, nyikn’min ŋɑɑn kii sɑɑ k mɑɑn n tie biitdɑɑnɔ e,»
42005009	k mɑɑn bɑɑ suol jɑni bonciɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k l bɑkt Siimɔn Piɑl nɑn bin nbɑ din be nɑn’ɔ kul,
42005010	k l biɑ tie nnɑ e k tul Siimɔn lieb, Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn nbɑ din tie Sebede wɑɑs nɑ. Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu yet Siimɔn ɑ: «Dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. Lɑɑ jii dinnɑ k sɑɑ, ɑ sɑɑ sɑɑn kii so niib.»
42005011	Ŋɑnn e k b ji din tut b bulgbetɑ mɑnŋ k donn gbingbɑnn, ŋɑɑn nyik b bonɑ kul lenŋ ŋɑɑn wɑɑ Yiesu.
42005012	Siɑn yuo k Yiesu din be dosɑu, k gbɑɑtl din be lenŋ k ŋɑɑɔk be u pɑɑk bonciɑnn. Wɑɑ din tɑn lɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ, k u bɑɑl k gbɑɑn finfɑbl u tuɑnn k miɑl’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l i tie k ɑ luon ɑ sɑɑ fit te k n ŋɑɑɔk nɑ n gbenn.»
42005013	K Yiesu tɑnt u nuu ŋɑɑn sii’u k yet’ɔ ɑ: «N luon. A ŋɑɑɔk mɑnŋ n gbenn.» L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u ŋɑɑɔk nɑ set gbenn.
42005014	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Dɑɑ piɑk suɑ mɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn i sɑɑ Yennu mɑnntuɑ buol k jii ɑ mɔnŋ k wɑnn’ɔ, k biɑ mɑnn mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu nɑn Muois nbɑ din senn k jiin gbɑɑtɑ pɑɑku po nɑ, k suɑ kul n bɑnn nɑn ɑ ŋɑɑɔk mɑnŋ set gbenn ɑ.»
42005015	Ŋɑɑn Yiesu sɑnn set din duo bonciɑnn k gɑl sinsinn yuo nɑ, k nibulciɑɔnŋ din lɑkn u buol ɑ bii gbiintl u mɑɑn k biɑ lɑ pɑɑku b yiɑli pɑɑk.
42005016	Ŋɑɑn u din tuu tun nyi k sɑɑ muuk ni k sɑɑ mei Yennu.
42005017	Siɑn yuo, Yiesu din tumi niib k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn senniwɑntieb mun din nyii Gɑɑliile doi kul ni, nɑn Suude doi kul ni, nɑn Selusɑɑlenm, k bɑɑl Yiesu buol k kɑl. L yuo k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu pɑnŋ din be Yiesu ni ɑ wun te k niib n pɑɑk.
42005018	K nisiɑb din tɑn bɑɑt k jii gbɑnɑnkpienn dɑɑnɔ liɑnŋ pɑɑk, k b din kol ɑ bin jii’u k kuɑ nɑn’ɔ ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni k bil’ɔ Yiesu tuɑnn,
42005019	ŋɑɑn b din k lɑ yiɑl nbɑ sɑɑ kuɑ, k mɑɑn niib din yɑbt bonciɑnn. L pɑɑk k b din jii’u k duo nɑn’ɔ mɔpinn pɑɑk, k cuɑ luot mɔpinn yul pɑɑk, k sikn’ɔ nɑn liɑnŋ nɑ k tɑn bil’ɔ Yiesu tuɑnn, niib nɑ sinsuuk ni.
42005020	Yiesu nbɑ din lɑ b yɑdɑ nbɑ tie bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, k u yet juɑ nɑ ɑ: «N yuɑk, n nyik cɑb ɑ biit ɑ.»
42005021	K senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ ji din duki b pɑlɑ ni ɑ: «Nilɑnɔpo e mun piɑk nnɑ k piɑk biil Yennu? Ŋmee dɑɑ sɑɑ fit nyik cɑb nilɔ biit, k l k tie Yennu kuukuɑ kɑɑ?»
42005022	Yiesu ŋɑnin din mi bɑɑ duki biɑnŋ nbɑ, k u boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i duki nnɑ i pɑlɑ ni?
42005023	Mi i yet ɑ: ‹N nyik cɑb ɑ biit,› ɑmi mi i yet ɑ: ‹Fiit kii sonm,› mɑɑn munle nɑ sinsuuk ni lɑnn po e pɑɑl i?
42005024	Ŋɑɑn n luon k yin bɑnn nɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mɔk yiikuo tingbounŋ nɑ ni k sɑɑ nyik cɑb niib b biit.» Ŋɑnn e k u yet gbɑnɑnkpienn dɑɑnɔ nɑ ɑ: «Fin, fiit k jii ɑ liɑnŋ kii kun ɑ ŋɑɑk ni.»
42005025	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k juɑ mɑnŋ din fiil k set b nunm po, k jii u liɑnŋ mɑnŋ, k kun. Wɑɑ sɑɑ nɑ k u piɑk dont Yennu.
42005026	K l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit b kul ɑ, k b piɑk dont Yennu k yien ɑ: «Dinnɑ t jiɑ lɑ dulnyɑ.»
42005027	L puolpo e k Yiesu din nyii ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni k sɑɑ, k sɑɑ lɑ lɑnpogɑɑltuɑ, k u sɑnn din tie Liefi, k u kɑl u tuonn pɑɑk lɑnpogɑɑldieok ni, k Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fiit kii wɑɑ’n.»
42005028	K u nyik u bonɑ kul ŋɑɑn fiil k wɑɑ’u.
42005029	Ŋɑnn e k u tɑn tien jɑɑngbenŋl u ŋɑɑk ni k tul Yiesu, k lɑnpogɑɑltieb nɑn niib bonciɑnn din bɑɑl k lɑkn di nɑn’m.
42005030	K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb nɑn b senniwɑntieb din bɑɑl k tɑn buln nɑn Yiesu puolpoweitieb k boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i di k nyu nɑn lɑnpogɑɑltieb nɑn biitdɑnm i?»
42005031	K Yiesu din jiɑnt k yet’b ɑ: «Bin nbɑ mɔk lɑɑfiɑ k luon tebtuɑ, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ yiɑl luon’ɔ.
42005032	N k bɑɑl ɑ n yet bin nbɑ be binbenŋɑnŋ ni kɑɑ ɑ bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, ŋɑɑn n bɑɑl mɑɑ n yet biitdɑnm e ɑ bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ.»
42005033	Ŋɑnn e k nisiɑb din yet Yiesu ɑ: «Sɑn puolpoweitieb tun loln mɔi k mei Yennu, k t puolpoweitieb mun tie nnɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ puolpoweitieb ŋɑnin di k nyu.»
42005034	K u jiin k boi’b ɑ: «Puociɑnu i i be, suɑ sɑɑ fit k te k sɑɑnm n lol mɔi yuo nbɑ k puoyuokl sɔlɔ dɑɑ be b buol ni wɑɑ ɑɑ? Aɑi.
42005035	Ŋɑɑn yuo sɑɑ bɑɑl k b tɑn sɑɑ nyinn puoyuokl sɔlɔ nɑ b buol, k l yuo mɑnŋ e k b sɑɑ lol mɔi.»
42005036	K Yiesu din yin’m bɑljouk biɑk ɑ: «Suɑ kɑn pɑt tɑpɑɑnn cɑbl k lik tɑkpel. L i tie k u tien nnɑ i e, u sɑɑ biil tɑpɑɑnn mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn cɑbpɑɑnn nɑn tɑkpel mɑnŋ biɑ lek kii jɑn.
42005037	Nnɑ e mun k suɑ kɑn jii dɑpɑɑnin k liɑk dɑlenkpel ni. L i tie k u tien nnɑ i e, k dɑpɑɑnin nɑ tɑn mɔ yuo nbɑ, l sɑɑ yiel dɑlenkpel nɑ e, k dɑɑn mɑnŋ n muɑn yɑnn, k linlenn nɑ mun n yiel.
42005038	Sie k ɑ jii dɑpɑɑnin k liɑk linlenpɑɑnn ni.
42005039	Tɔn, l i tie k wun nbɑ nyu dɑkpel i e, u i lɑ dɑpɑɑnin, u k fɑɑt’l, u sɑɑ yet ɑ: ‹Dɑkpel e mɑn.› »
42006001	Tɔn, fuondɑsiɑl k Yiesu din gɑɑl dii kpɑɑnt ni, k u puolpoweitieb nɑ din sonm kɔni dikɑlɑ k pini k ŋmɑn.
42006002	K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb din boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i tuun lin nbɑ k t senni wɑnt nɑn t dɑɑ tuun Fuondɑɑl i?»
42006003	K Yiesu jiin k boi’b ɑ: «I k mi lii Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni Dɑɑfiid nbɑ din tun biɑnŋ nbɑ yuo nbɑ k kon din mɔk ŋuɑ nɑn u juɑmu nɑ ɑɑ?
42006004	U din kuɑ Yennu ŋɑɑk ni k sɑɑ jii pɑɑnu nbɑ k b din tuu senn k l tie Yennu yɑl nɑ, k biɑ tul u juɑmu nɑ. K senni nɑ din k cɑb nɑn suɑ n di pɑɑnu mɑnŋ sie mɑnntieb kuukuɑ e.»
42006005	K Yiesu biɑ yet’b ɑ: « Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ e yen Fuondɑɑl.»
42006006	Fuondɑliel k Yiesu din kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni k tul niib wɑnnu, k jɑsuɑ din be lenŋ k u niidiitu kpo k guon.
42006007	K senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb mun din be lenŋ, k goli Yiesu ɑ bin lɑɑn u sɑɑ te k wun pɑɑk Fuondɑɑl ii? K mɑɑn b din luon bin lɑ lin nbɑ k b sɑɑ tɑɑl’ɔ l po.
42006008	Ŋɑɑn Yiesu din mi b dudukt ni, k yet juɑ nbɑ k u nuu kpo nɑ ɑ: «Fiit k set suɑ kul tuɑnn po.» K juɑ mɑnŋ fiil k set.
42006009	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «N boi’i e, t senni sɑk ɑ t tun lɑnn e? T tun bonŋɑnn Fuondɑɑl ɑmi t tun bonbiil i? T fit fɑt nilɔ mɑnfuol ɑmi tin kpi’u u?»
42006010	Ŋɑnn e k u got lint niib mɑnŋ kul ɑ, ŋɑɑn yet niikpienn dɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ, «Tɑntl ɑ nuu mɑnŋ.» K u tɑnt, k u nuu mɑnŋ nɑɑt.
42006011	K senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ ji din yɑɑ bin put nɑn wutuol, k b ji piin k piɑk yien lieb bɑɑ sɑɑ tien Yiesu biɑnŋ nbɑ. piik nɑn bɑnle
42006012	L puolpo k Yiesu duo juɑl pɑɑk ɑ wun sɑɑ miɑl Yennu, k din sɑɑ mei Yennu nyiɑɔk nɑn lɑɑ tɑn yent.
42006013	K sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni k u din yiin u puolpoweitieb k tɑn lukt piik nɑn bɑnle k yi’b tuomiinbɑ.
42006014	U din gɑnn Siimɔn (wun nbɑ k u din pul’ɔ Piɑl nɑ) nɑn Siimɔn ninjɑ Andle, nɑn Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn, nɑn Fiiliip nɑn Bɑɑltelemi,
42006015	nɑn Mɑɑtieo nɑn Tuomɑ, nɑn Sɑɑk nbɑ din tie Alfe bijɑ nɑ, nɑn Siimɔn (wun nbɑ din luon k Suifnbɑ ii yen b mɔnŋ nɑ),
42006016	nɑn Suudɑ nbɑ din tie Sɑɑk bik, nɑn Suudɑ Iskɑɑliɑɔt (wun nbɑ din tɑn nyii Yiesu puol nɑ).
42006017	Yiesu nbɑ din nyii juɑl nɑ pɑɑk k sik nɑn’m yuo nbɑ, k u din sɑɑn set pɑɑnu ni, k u puolpo juɑmu lɑkn bonciɑnn, k niib bonciɑnn mun dɔnŋ nyii Suude po nɑn Selusɑɑlenm nɑn Tiil nɑn Siidɔn nbɑ kpiɑ mɔkgbenŋl nɑ,
42006018	k din bɑɑl ɑ bin tɑn gbiint u mɑɑn, k biɑ luon wun te k bin pɑɑk. Bin nbɑ k nɑlnbiit dɑɑmi’b mun din bɑɑl k u te k b pɑɑk.
42006019	K suɑ kul luon wun sii’u, k mɑɑn pɑnŋ din nyi u ni k te k suɑ kul pɑɑkt.
42006020	L yuo nɑ k Yiesu got u puolpoweitieb ŋɑɑn yet ɑ «Yinm nɑndɑnm, pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e, k mɑɑn Yennu nɑɑn tie i yɑl e.
42006021	Yinm nbɑ k kon mɔk’i mɔtɑɑnɑ, pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e, k mɑɑn i tɑn sɑɑ gbuo. Yinm nbɑ mɔ mɔtɑɑnɑ, pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e, k mɑɑn i tɑn sii lɑɑ.
42006022	«Niib i nɑn’i k bɔktl’i k suki’i k biil i sɑnɑ, k mɑɑn yɑɑ wɑɑ Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ pɑɑk, pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e.
42006023	Ii yikn mɑn kii kpɑnm nɑn pɑlpienn mɑn l dɑɑl, k mɑɑn i nyuɑt tɑn sii yɑb Yendɔunŋ ni. B yejɑnm mun din tie Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nnɑ e.
42006024	«Yinm mɔktɑ, l tɑn sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn i dɔnŋ lɑ i yɑnbuɑbonɑ wɑɑ.
42006025	«Yinm nbɑ gbuo mɔtɑɑnɑ, l tɑn sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn kon tɑn sɑɑ gbɑt’i. Yinm nbɑ lɑɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ, l tɑn sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn i tɑn sii fɑbn k mɔ.»
42006026	«L tɑn sii bi i pɑɑk yuo nbɑ k niib kul piɑk’i k mɑɑn b yejɑnm mun din tie nnɑ e k tien fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ.»
42006027	«Yinm nbɑ gbiintl n mɑɑn nɑ, n yien’i e, ii mɔk lonm nɑn i dɑtɑi mɑn, kii tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn kii tien bin nbɑ nɑn’i.
42006028	Bin nbɑ polntl’i mɔpolɑ, yin yɑt yetŋɑnm b pɑɑk. Bin nbɑ sɑlkt’i, ii mei Yennu kii tien’m.
42006029	Wun nbɑ peb ɑ tɑnpɑk, fɑn ŋmɑnt liel po mun k wun peb. Wun nbɑ jii ɑ liɑtfuouk nbɑ tie gbɑktl, fɑn sɑk k wun gɑɑl ɑ suot mun biɑk.
42006030	Wun nbɑ kul miɑl’ɑ siɑl, fɑn tul’ɔ. Wun nbɑ fɑt ɑ bonɑ, ɑ ji dɑɑ wɑɑ gɑɑn.
42006031	Biɑnŋ nbɑ k i luon niib ii tuun kii tien’i nɑ, ii mun ii tuun nnɑ kii tien i lieb.
42006032	«L i tie k i luon bin nbɑ luon’i nɑ kuukuɑ i e, nlee k i sii guu nyuɑt i? Biit dɑnm mun luon bin nbɑ luon’m nɑ.
42006033	L i tie k i tuun bonŋɑnn k tien bin nbɑ tuun bonŋɑnn k tien’i nɑ, nlee k i sii guu nyuɑt i? Biit dɑnm mun tuun lin nbɑ nɑ.
42006034	L i tie k i kpentl k tien bin nbɑ k i dɑɑn nɑn b sɑɑ jiin ɑ, nlee k i sii guu nyuɑt i? Biit dɑnm mun kpentl nnɑ, k tien b lieb k biɑ tuu tɑn gɑɑl b bont biɑnŋ jinŋ.
42006035	«L pɑɑk, ii mɔk lonm nɑn i dɑtɑi mɑn, kii tuun bonŋɑnn kii tien’m, kii biɑ kii kpentl kii tien’m k dɑɑ dɑɑn nɑn b sɑɑ jiin ɑ. Nnɑ e k i nyuɑt sii yɑb k i biɑ sii tie Yennu wɑɑs, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ e tuun bonŋɑnn k tien bin nbɑ k tien’ɔ niipuouk, nɑn biitdɑnm.
42006036	Ii mɔk ninbɑtinu mɑn nɑn i Bɑɑ Yennu nbɑ mɔk ninbɑtinu biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
42006037	«I dɑɑ kpɑɑn lieb biit nbɑ k i sɑɑ fit tɑɑl’b l pɑɑk, k Yennu mun dɑɑ tɑɑl’i ni. Dɑɑ piɑk nilɔ biil k gbent’ɔ, k Yennu kɑn biil k gben’ɑ ni. Nyikn cɑb niib k Yennu sɑɑ nyik cɑb’ɑ mun.
42006038	Ii tien niib mɑn, k Yennu mun sii tien’i. Yennu sɑɑ cɑɑt bonŋɑnn nɑn ŋmɑnbɑnŋ nbɑ gbie nɑn mɔgbɑnɑ k tul’i k mɑɑn Yennu sɑɑ cɑɑt k tul’i biɑnŋ nbɑ k i cɑɑtl k tien i lieb nɑ e.»
42006039	L puolpo k Yiesu din yin’m bɑljouk ɑ: «Juɑnŋ sɑɑ fit dɑɑl u luɑ wɑɑ? Aɑi, b kul tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑ buotuk ni wɑɑ.
42006040	Tumiituɑ k gɑl u wɑntuɑ, k tumiituɑ mun i bɑnn gbenn, ŋuɑ nɑn u wɑntuɑ sii jɑn e.
42006041	«Bee k ɑ goli lɑɑt muɑnu nbɑ be ɑ luɑ ninbinn ni, ŋɑɑn k k lɑ jɑɑntɑlk nbɑ be ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ninbinn ni?
42006042	Nlee k ɑ sɑɑ yet ɑ luɑ ɑ: ‹N yuɑk, ŋɑɑnt k n nyinn muɑnu nbɑ be ɑ ninbinn ni,› ŋɑɑn k k lɑɑt jɑɑntɑlk nbɑ be ɑ mɔnŋ ninbinn ni? Fin, kpinkpɑnni dɑɑnɔ nɑ, nyint jɑɑntɑlk nbɑ be ɑ ninbinn ni nɑ sinsinn, k ji fit lɑ fɑnu k nyinn muɑnu nbɑ be ɑ luɑ ninbinn ni nɑ.
42006043	«Tiŋɑnŋ k luon luɑnbiit, k tibiiuk mun k luon luɑnŋɑnɑ.
42006044	Tiik luɑnɑ ni e k b bɑnt’ɔ. B k lɑɑt luɑnɑ nbɑ k b yi fiig kunkonŋ pɑɑk k pɔ, k biɑ k lɑɑt lɑɑsen penn pɑɑk k pɔ.
42006045	Niŋɑnɔ e tuun bonŋɑnn k mɑɑn u pɑl ni gbie nɑn bonŋɑnn mɑnŋ, k nibiiuk mun tuun bonbiil k mɑɑn u pɑl ni gbie nɑn bonbiil mɑnŋ. Lin nbɑ be nilɔ pɑl ni, ŋɑnn e nyi u mɔb ni.
42006046	«Bee k i yi’n Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yonmdɑɑnɔ ŋɑɑn k k tuun mɑɑ wɑnn’i biɑnŋ nbɑ?
42006047	Wun nbɑ kul bɑɑt n buol k gbiintl n mɑɑn k sɑɑk k tuun l biɑnŋ, n sɑɑ wɑnn’i wɑɑ nɑɑn wun nbɑ.
42006048	U nɑɑn nɑn juɑ nbɑ din mɑɑ u ŋɑɑk nɑ e. Sinsinn u din gbiil fiɑkl k l sunŋ, k sɑɑ tuu tɑnpiiuk, k ji fɔkn fiɑkl mɑnŋ l pɑɑk. L puolpo k sɑɑk tɑn bɑɑ bonciɑnn, k kpenu gbie nɑn nyunmɔnn k sɑɑ duo k liɑt ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn k l k bɑɑ, k mɑɑn u din mɑɑ’l bonŋɑnn e.
42006049	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ gbiintl n mɑɑn ŋɑɑn k k tuun l biɑnŋ, u nɑɑn nɑn juɑ nbɑ mun din mɑɑ u ŋɑɑk tɑnbiini ni, ŋɑɑn k k gbiil fiɑkl nɑ e, k nyunmɔnn din tɑn gbie k sɑɑ duo k yil ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ, k l bɑɑ yiɑn ɑ k nɑn siɑl ɑ k tenn.»
42007001	Yiesu nbɑ din wɑnn niib lin nbɑ nɑ kul k gbenn nɑ, k u ji din gɑl sɑɑn Kɑpelnɑunm.
42007002	K Luonm tinŋ sejenm yudɑɑnsuɑ din be lenŋ k mɔk dɑɑblonkɑk, k yiɑlu din suol’ɔ k u pel kuun ɑ.
42007003	L yuo mɑnŋ k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ gbɑt Yiesu po k tun Suifnbɑ sɑɑkɑb u buol ni ɑ bin sɑɑn k sɑɑ bɑln’mɔ k wun bɑɑl k tɑn te k u dɑɑbl nɑ n pɑɑk.
42007004	K b din sɑɑn Yiesu buol k sɑɑ bɑln’mɔ bonciɑnn k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Juɑ mɑnŋ jɑnŋ nɑn fɑn sonm’ɔ wɑɑ,
42007005	k mɑɑn u luon t niib k biɑ te k b mɑɑ tinm Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok k tul’t ɑ.»
42007006	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu din wei’b sɑɑn. Wɑɑ din sɑɑ pel ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ din tun u yuɑsnbɑ k yet’b ɑ bin yet Yiesu nnɑ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, dɑɑ bɑknt ɑ mɔnŋ k bɑɑt, k mɑɑn n k ŋɑn nɑn fɑn bɑɑl kuɑ n ŋɑɑk ni.
42007007	Ŋɑnn e k n bo dukn nɑn n k ŋɑn nɑn k n nɑkn ɑ buol. Ŋɑɑn fɑn lek tul mɔb k n dɑɑbl sɑɑ pɑɑk ɑ.
42007008	K mɑɑn n mɔk bin nbɑ gɑl’n k yen’n, k n mun diɑ sejenm k yen’m, k fit yien yenɔ ɑ: ‹Bɑɑt,› k u bɑɑt, k yien luɑ ɑ: ‹Sɑɑnt,› k u sɑɑ, k biɑ yien n dɑɑbl: ‹Tient nnɑ,› k u tie.»
42007009	Yiesu nbɑ din gbɑt lin nbɑ nɑ, k l yɑɑl lit’ɔ, k u jiɑnt k got nibulciɑɔnŋ nbɑ wɑɑ u puolpo nɑ k yet’b ɑ: «N yien’i e, n dɑɑ k mi lɑ yɑdɑ nɑ buolu nɑ, nɑn Islɑɑeltieb sinsuuk ni wɑɑ.»
42007010	L yuo mɑnŋ e k tuomiinbɑ din ŋmɑt k sɑɑn sejenm yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ ŋɑɑk ni k sɑɑ bɑɑl suɑ dɑɑbl mɑnŋ pɑɑk ɑ.
42007011	L din yent e k Yiesu din sɑɑ duo nbɑ k b yi Nɑen nɑ, k u puolpoweitieb nɑn nibulciɑɔnŋ din wɑɑ’u.
42007012	Wɑɑ din sɑɑ bɑɑl duo mɑnŋ tɑnmɔb ni yuo nbɑ, k u lɑ k b nyi duo mɑnŋ ni k jii kuun ɑ bin sɑɑn pii. Kpiemɔ mɑnŋ nɑɑ din tie pɑkuɑk e, k ŋuɑ e din tie u bijɑyenml k nibulciɑɔnŋ din ciɑnt pɑkuɑk mɑnŋ.
42007013	Yiesu nbɑ din lɑ pɑkuɑk nɑ, k ninbɑɑɔk suol’ɔ, k u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Dɑɑ mɔ,»
42007014	ŋɑɑn sɑɑn sii kuun liɑnŋ nɑ, k bin nbɑ jii’u nɑ set. K Yiesu yet ɑ: «Ŋɑɑjuɑ, n yien’ɑ e, fiit.»
42007015	K bik nbɑ kpo mɑnŋ nɑ fiil k kɑl k piin k piɑk. K Yiesu din jii’u k kubn’ɔ u nɑɑ.
42007016	K jɑŋmɑɑni ji din suol niib kul nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ, k b din dont Yennu sɑnn k yien lieb ɑ: « Yennu sɔkniijɑɑnn be t sinsuuk ni,» k biɑ yien b lieb ɑ: «Yennu sik, ɑ wun sonm u niib.»
42007017	K Yiesu lɑbɑɑl nɑ din yɑt Suude tinŋ nɑn digbɑnkpini kpini nbɑ kpiɑ lenŋ mɑnŋ kul ɑ.
42007018	L puolpo e k Sɑn puolpoweitieb din sɑɑn k sɑɑ yet’ɔ l lɑbɑɑl kul, k u tɑn yiin u puolpoweitieb bɑnle b ni,
42007019	k tun’m Yonmdɑɑnɔ buol, ɑ bin sɑɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun tɑn bɑɑl nɑ ɑmi tii dɑɑ kii guu luɑ?»
42007020	Yuo nbɑ k b din bɑɑl Yiesu penŋ nɑ, k b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Sɑn, wun nbɑ wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ tun’t ɑ penŋ ɑ t tɑn boi’ɑ k lɑɑn fin e tie wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun tɑn bɑɑl nɑ ɑmi tii dɑɑ kii guu luɑ?»
42007021	L yuo l yuo nɑ k Yiesu din te k bɑɑtb nɑn yiɑlpɑɑli dɑnm bonciɑnn pɑɑk, k nyinn nɑlnbiit siɑb ni, k nyuɑnt juɑni bonciɑnn.
42007022	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu jiin k yet Sɑn tuomiinbɑ nɑ: «Ii ŋmɑt mɑn k sɑɑ yet Sɑn lin nbɑ k i lɑ k biɑ gbɑt nɑ, ɑ i lɑ k juɑni nyuɑntl, k wɔbi tɑɑ nɑɑtl k b sonm, k gbɑɑtɑ ŋɑɑt gbent, k tuukpɑɑ ji gbiɑ, k kpienm fi kuun ni, k tɑlɑs-dɑnm gbiintl lɑbɑmɑnn muɑnti.
42007023	Pɑlpienn tie wun nbɑ kɑn nyi u yɑdɑ ni nɑ yɑl e.»
42007024	Sɑn tuomiinbɑ nbɑ din ŋmɑt nɑ puolpo e k Yiesu ji din piin k boi niib mɑnŋ buboit k jikt sɑɑ Sɑn po ɑ: «Yɑɑ dɑɑn sɑɑn muuk ni nɑ, i dɑɑn duki nɑn i sɑɑ sɑɑ lɑ bee? I dɑɑn mi ɑ i sɑɑ lɑ muuk nbɑ k wounŋ dɑnm nɑ ee?
42007025	Nnɑ i kɑɑ, i mɑntk jiɑ dɑɑn sɑɑn ɑ i sɑɑ lɑ bee? Nilɔ k u liɑ tɑŋɑnt ɑmi ii? Nnɑlɑ, niib nbɑ liɑ tɑŋɑnt k be b yɑmɑ ni nɑ be kpɑnbɑlɑ ŋei ni e.
42007026	I dɑɑn sɑɑn muuk nɑ ni ɑ i sɑɑ lɑ bee? Yennu sɔkni ɑmi ii? Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i, Sɑn ŋɑnin gɑl sɔkni wɑɑ.
42007027	Ŋuɑ po e k b din diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹Nnɑlɑ, n sɑɑ tun n tuomi ɑ tuɑnn po, wun nbɑ sɑɑ gɑl k ŋɑnm ɑ bɑɑlu sɔnu.› »
42007028	K Yiesu biɑ din yet’b ɑ: «N yien’i e, b dɑɑ k mi mɑl suɑ k u cie Sɑn, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ juont tɑlk Yennu nɑɑn ni cie’u.»
42007029	(Niib kul nɑn lɑnpogɑɑltieb din gbiintl Sɑn mɑɑn k bɑɑ din ŋɑɑn k Sɑn wul’b Yennu nyunwulu nɑ, din wɑnn nɑn b sɑk ɑ Yennu e ŋɑn.
42007030	ŋɑɑn k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn senniwɑntieb din k gɑɑl lin nbɑ k Yennu lol tul’b, k mɑɑn b din k sɑk ɑ Sɑn n wul’b Yennu nyunwulu.)
42007031	K Yiesu biɑ yet’b ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ, n sɑɑ bikn’m nɑn bee? B nɑɑn nɑn bee?
42007032	B nɑɑn nɑn wɑɑs nbɑ tuu tikl k kɑl dɑɑk ni k tiɑn lieb pɑɑk nɑ e ɑ: ‹T pieb yeli k tien’i, ŋɑɑn k i k wɑɑ. T yiin kuyɑni k tien’i, ŋɑɑn k i k mɔ fɑbn.›
42007033	K mɑɑn Sɑn din bɑɑl k k di pɑɑnu, k biɑ k nyu dɑmunŋ, ŋɑɑn k i yɑɑ ɑ u mɔk nɑlnbiiuk,
42007034	k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mun tɑn bɑɑl k di k nyu, ŋɑɑn k i yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Gotl mɑn, u tie podɑɑnɔ nɑn dɑnyuuluk o. U biɑ tie lɑnpogɑɑltieb nɑn biitdɑnm yuɑk e.›
42007035	Tɔn, bin nbɑ kul gɑɑl Yennu yɑn tuu yɑɑ ɑ l ŋɑn.»
42007036	K Fɑɑliisiɑnsuɑ din be, k din tɑn yiin Yiesu ɑ wun bɑɑl k di jiet u ŋɑɑk ni, k Yiesu din sɑɑn juɑ nɑ ŋɑɑk ni, k b sɑɑ lɑkn kɑl k dii.
42007037	K puosuɑ mun din be duo mɑnŋ ni k tie puocunconn, k wɑɑ tɑn gbɑt ɑ Yiesu di jiet ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni, k u bɑɑl nɑn sɑlenŋɑnn nbɑ gbie nɑn tulɑɑli,
42007038	k din set Yiesu puol, u tɑɑ buol, ŋɑɑn mɔ, k u nyin-nyuut bɑɑ Yiesu tɑɑ pɑɑk k tɑn mɑɑk, k u din tɑn jii u yut k fiɑn Yiesu tɑɑ, k puul lol u tɑɑ, k tɑn but tulɑɑli nɑ u tɑɑ pɑɑk.
42007039	K Fɑɑliisiɑnjuɑ nbɑ yiin Yiesu nɑ din lɑ lin nbɑ nɑ, k u dukn u pɑl ni ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ i bo i tie Yennu sɔkni e nɑn bɑlmɔni, u bo sɑɑ bɑnn puo nbɑ sii’u nɑ nbɑ tie wun nbɑ. U bo sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn u tie biitdɑɑnɔ wɑɑ.»
42007040	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet Fɑɑliisiɑnjuɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «Siimɔn, n mɔk mɔbonsiɑl k yɑɑ n yet’ɑ.» K Siimɔn jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, yetl’n.»
42007041	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Jɑb bɑnle din be k mɔk lik-kpent-tuɑ pɑnn. Yenɔ din mɔk u pɑnn denienbɑ kobi ŋɑnŋmu (500), k luɑ nɑ mun din mɔk u pɑnn denienbɑ piiŋmu (50).
42007042	B bɑnle mɑnŋ suɑ din k fit pɑ. Ŋɑnn e k u din cɑb b kul ɑ, ɑ bii sɑɑ. Tɔn, ɑ duki nɑn ŋmee mɑntk sii luon lik-kpent-tuɑ mɑnŋ i?»
42007043	K Siimɔn jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «N dukn nɑn l sii tie wun nbɑ k u cɑb’ɔ k u pɑnn yɑb nɑ e.» K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «A mɔk mɔni,»
42007044	k din jiɑnt got puo nɑ, ŋɑɑn yet Siimɔn, «A lɑ puo nɑ wɑɑ? N kuɑ ɑ ŋɑɑk nnɑ, k ɑ k tul’n nyun k n fobt n tɑɑ, ŋɑɑn puo mɑnŋ ŋɑnin fobt n tɑɑ nɑn u nyin-nyuut, k biɑ jii u yut k fiɑl’n.
42007045	Fin ŋɑnin k puul wɔbn, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ ŋɑnin k nyik n tɑɑ bɑlmu mɑɑ bɑɑl yuo nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ teee nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ.
42007046	A biɑ lek k suɑl n yut nɑn kpɑn, ŋɑɑn puo mɑnŋ biɑ jii tulɑɑli k suɑl n tɑɑ.
42007047	L pɑɑk, n yien’ɑ e, wɑɑ luon’n bonciɑnn nɑ pɑɑk e wɑnt nɑn u lɑ nyikcɑbu u biit nbɑ yɑb nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ lɑ nyikcɑbu u biit nbɑ k yɑb nɑ pɑɑk nɑ, mun luon’n wɑɑnm-nnɑ e.»
42007048	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu jiɑnt k yet puo nɑ ɑ: «N nyik ɑ biit k cɑb’ɑ wɑɑ.»
42007049	K nilieb nbɑ kɑl k di nɑ ji din piin yien b lieb ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ tie ŋmee k sɑɑ fit nyik cɑb nilɔ u biit i?»
42007050	K Yiesu yet puo nɑ: «A yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ lɑ fielu wɑɑ. L pɑɑk, i sɑɑ nɑn mɑnu.»
42008001	L puolpo k Yiesu din lin digbɑnsɑɑkɑlɑ ni nɑn digbɑnbis ni, k muɑntl Yennu nɑɑn lɑbɑmɑnn k u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle din wɑɑ’u.
42008002	Puob nbɑ k u din nyinn nɑlnbiit b ni, k biɑ te k b yiɑli nɑ gbenn nɑ mun din be lenŋ mɑnŋ k wɑɑ’u. Yenɔ din tie Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli, wun nbɑ k nɑlnbiit bɑnlole din nyii u ni,
42008003	k lieb mun din tie Suusɑ ŋɑɑpuo Sɑɑnn (Suusɑ din tie Heluod ŋɑɑtuontunnɑ sɑɑkuɑ), nɑn Suusɑɑnn, nɑn puolieb bonciɑnn. K b kul ɑ din jikt b mɔnŋ mɔnŋ bonɑ k tien Yiesu k sonmt ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb.
42008004	Niib lek din nyi digbɑnn nɑn digbɑnn k bɑɑt Yiesu buol, k nibulciɑɔnŋ din lɑkn, k Yiesu yin’m bɑljouk ɑ:
42008005	«Jɑsuɑ din duo u kpɑɑb ni ɑ wun sɑɑ bul tɑn. Wɑɑ din buul nɑ, k bonbuoli nɑ yenn-nbɑ din yɑt bɑɑ sɑnjouk pɑɑk, k niib gɑɑl ŋmɑɑt l pɑɑk, k nuɑni biɑ tɔki k di.
42008006	K liel mun din bɑɑ tɑnpuut pɑɑk. Bonbuoli mɑnŋ nbɑ din tɑn piɑ yuo nbɑ, l tɑn kpo e, k mɑɑn l din k bɑɑ mɑɑtuk ni.
42008007	K liel mun din bɑɑ kunkoni ni, k tɑn lɑkn piɑ k kpɑɑt nɑn’m, ŋɑɑn k kunkoni ŋmɑbl’b.
42008008	Ŋɑɑn k liel mun bɑɑ tinŋɑnŋ ni, k piɑ k kpɑɑt bonŋɑnn, k tɑn nɑn nyik nyik nyik.» Yiesu nbɑ yin’m bɑljouk mɑnŋ k gbenn nɑ, k u yet ɑ: «Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ k sɑɑ gbɑt, wun gbiint.»
42008009	L puolpo e k Yiesu puolpoweitieb din boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bɑljouk nɑ pɑɑk tie bee?»
42008010	K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Yinm ŋɑnin, Yennu cɑb ɑ yin bɑnn wuol ni mɑɑn k jii jiin u nɑɑn po, ŋɑɑn nilieb ŋɑnin, n yii’m bɑljokt e, ɑ n te k: Bin got ŋɑɑn dɑɑ lɑɑt; Bin biɑ gbiint, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ bɑnt l pɑɑk.»
42008011	«Bɑljouk nɑ pɑɑk tie nnɑ e: Bonbuoli nbɑ nɑ e tie Yennu mɑɑn.
42008012	Bin nbɑ tie nɑn sɑnjokpinŋ nbɑ k bonbuoli bɑɑ lenŋ nɑ, tie bin nbɑ tuu gbɑt mɑɑn mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn Sɑɑtɑn n bɑɑl k nyinn’l b pɑlɑ ni ɑ b dɑɑ tie yɑdɑ k lɑ fielu.
42008013	K lieb mun nɑɑn nɑn tɑnpuut nɑ e. B tuu gbɑt mɑɑn mɑnŋ k gɑɑl’l nɑn pɑlpienn; ŋɑɑn b k ŋɑɑnt k l bɑɑ jiinɑ. B tuu tien yɑdɑ yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ, ŋɑɑn nyik yɑdɑ mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ k jinjɑnmi bɑɑl b pɑɑk.
42008014	Bonbuoli nbɑ bɑɑ kunkoni ni nɑ nɑɑn nɑn bin nbɑ gbɑt mɑɑn mɑnŋ ŋɑɑn binbenŋ dɑɑmiu nɑn mɔktuk lonm nɑn niɑnbiiuk nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni tuu nyɑkn mɑɑn mɑnŋ b pɑlɑ ni, k lin ŋɑkt.
42008015	K lin nbɑ mun bɑɑ tinŋɑnŋ ni nɑ ŋɑnin nɑɑn nɑn bin nbɑ gbiint n mɑɑn k diɑ’l kenken nɑn bɑlmɔni b pɑlɑ ni, k b pɑlcienn ni b biɑ luon luɑnɑ.
42008016	«Suɑ k jokt fitl ŋɑɑn liknt bokt l pɑɑk, ɑmi k gul’l u gɑdo lɔunŋ ni. Sie k u jii’l k tuɑn bonsiɑl nbɑ fɔk pɑɑk, k niib i jik i kuɑ yuo nbɑ, bii lɑɑt yentu nɑ.
42008017	Bɑli nbɑ kul wuo, sie k l tɑn wuot nyii pɑɑnu ni, k lin nbɑ mun liik, sie k l tɑn likt k nyii.
42008018	«L pɑɑk, ii mi mɑn yɑɑ gbiintl Yennu mɑɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ. Wun nbɑ mɔk, u biɑ sɑɑ lɑ k pukn, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ k mɔk, b sɑɑ jii bonmintk nbɑ k u mɔk nɑ e.»
42008019	L yuo nɑ k Yiesu nɑɑ nɑn u ninjɑnm din bɑɑl, ŋɑɑn k k fit lɑ sɔnu nbɑ k b sɑɑ nɑkn’ɔ, k mɑɑn niib nɑ din yɑbt ɑ.
42008020	K suɑ tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «A nɑɑ nɑn ɑ ninjɑnm be nɑn-yel po k luon bin lɑ’ɑ.»
42008021	Ŋɑnn e k u yet’b ɑ: «Bin nbɑ gbiɑ Yennu mɑɑn k sɑɑk k biɑ tuun l biɑnŋ, ŋɑnm e tie n nɑɑ nɑn n ninjɑnm.»
42008022	Dɑsiɑl k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din kuɑ bulgbetl ni, k u yet’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k t puot k sɑɑn mɔkgbenŋl nɑ gbingbɑnliel po.» K b sɑɑn.
42008023	Bɑɑ sɑɑ yuo nbɑ k Yiesu duɑl guɑn. K wonpɑɑluk tɑn fikt k dɑ mɔkgbenŋl mɑnŋ ni, k nyunpɑnɑ pil k kuɑ bulgbetl nɑ ni k tɑn yɑɑ lin gbie, k b ji din kuɑ ninbɔnŋ ni.
42008024	K u puolpoweitieb din bɑɑl k fiin’ɔ k yi ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, cɑnbɑɑ, t be kuun ni e.» K u fiil k tiɑn wounŋ nɑn nyunpɑnɑ nɑ pɑɑk ɑ bin ŋmin, k l ji din fuɑ k ŋmin suon nnɑ.
42008025	K u jiɑnt boi u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «I yɑdɑ be lee?» K jɑŋmɑɑni din suol’b, k l biɑ yɑɑl lit’b, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «Jɑbuolbee e nɑ, k u tɑn yet mɔb k tul wounŋ nɑn nyunpɑnɑ k b sɑk u mɔb u?»
42008026	Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din puot mɔkgbenŋl k bɑɑl Gelɑɑsɑ tinŋ ni, k set, ŋɑɑn k Gɑɑliile tinŋ biɑl puolpo.
42008027	K Yiesu nbɑ din nyii bulgbetl nɑ ni, k Gelɑɑsɑ jɑsuɑ din cet’ɔ, k nɑlnbiit din be juɑ mɑnŋ ni, k u din k liɑ siɑl i k l wei hei. U biɑ din k sɑɑk kɑɑl ŋɑɑk ni, ŋɑɑn duɑ kɑɑt ni.
42008028	Wɑɑ din lɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ, k u yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn gbɑɑn Yiesu tuɑnn k tiɑn yet ɑ: «Yiesu, fin nbɑ tie Yɑbnt Yennu Bijɑ, min nɑn fin, nlee mɑntk i? N bɑln’mɑ e, dɑɑ muksl’n.»
42008029	U din yet nnɑ k mɑɑn Yiesu ponŋ tiɑn u pɑɑk k yet’ɔ ɑ wun nyi juɑ mɑnŋ ni. Yuo kul, nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ din tuu fiil e, k b din tuu bɑɑn u nii nɑn u tɑɑ nɑn jɑlt k guu’u, ŋɑɑn k u tuu yɑn jɑlt nɑ, k nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ biel’ɔ k kuɑnt’ɔ muuk ni.
42008030	K Yiesu boi’ɔ, «A sɑnn ii?» K u jiin ɑ: «N sɑnn yi bul e,» k mɑɑn nɑlnbiit bonciɑnn din kuɑ juɑ mɑnŋ ni.
42008031	L yuo nɑ k nɑlnbiit mɑnŋ ji din bɑln Yiesu hei ɑ, u dɑɑ te k b sɑɑ buotsunsunŋ ni.
42008032	K duoli bonciɑnn din be kunkonn nɑ pɑɑk k di, k nɑlnbiit nɑ bɑln Yiesu ɑ wun cɑb’b bin sɑɑn kuɑ duoli mɑnŋ ni, k Yiesu cɑb’b sɔnu.
42008033	Ŋɑnn e k nɑlnbiit nɑ nyii juɑ nɑ ni k sɑɑn sɑɑ kuɑ duoli nɑ ni, k duoli nɑ kul din tin bulbulbul k nyii kunkonn nɑ pɑɑk k sik k sɑɑ bɑɑ mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni, k dii nyun.
42008034	Duokpɑɑli nɑ nbɑ din lɑ lin nbɑ tien mɑnŋ, k b ciɑl l yuo nɑ, k sɑɑ muɑnt l lɑbɑɑl duo ni nɑn kpɑɑnt ni.
42008035	K niib bɑɑl ɑ bin lɑ lin nbɑ tun nɑ, k sɑɑ bɑɑl Yiesu buol, k suɑ juɑ nbɑ k nɑlnbiit ponŋ nyii u ni nɑ, k u kɑl Yiesu buol nɑn lɑɑfiɑ nɑn u dudukt kul ɑ fɑnu, k ji liɑ tiɑt, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol niib nɑ.
42008036	K bin nbɑ lɑ’l nɑn b nuni nɑ yet’b biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yiesu te k juɑ nbɑ mɔk nɑlnbiit nɑ pɑɑk.
42008037	Ŋɑnn e k Gelɑɑsɑ tinŋ tieb kul din bɑɑl Yiesu buol k bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun siet nnɑ kii sɑɑ, k mɑɑn jɑŋmɑɑni suol’b hei. K Yiesu ji din kuɑ bulgbetl nɑ ni ɑ wun ŋmɑt.
42008038	Juɑ nbɑ k nɑlnbiit nyii u ni nɑ bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun ŋɑɑn k wun ciɑn’ɔ. Ŋɑɑn Yiesu din te k u nyik ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ
42008039	«I ŋmɑt kii kun k sɑɑ muɑnt bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnn nbɑ k Yennu tun k tul’ɑ nɑ.» K u ŋmɑt k lin duo nɑ kul k muɑntl bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnn nbɑ k Yiesu tun k tul’ɔ nɑ.
42008040	Yuo nbɑ k Yiesu din ŋmɑt k sɑɑ puot mɔkgbenŋl nɑ, k suɑ k nibulciɑɔnŋ din tuok’ɔ nɑn pɑlpienn, k mɑɑn b kul ponŋ din guu u bɑɑlu e.
42008041	Jɑsuɑ nnɑ din bɑɑl lenŋ k b din yi’u Sɑilus, k u din tie Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok sɑɑkuɑ, k u tɑn bɑɑl k gbɑɑn Yiesu tuɑnn k bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun bɑɑl u ŋɑɑk ni,
42008042	ɑ k mɑɑn u bonpoyenml nbɑ mɔk nɑn binɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle nɑ yiɑl, k pel kuun ɑ. Yiesu nbɑ din sɑɑ nɑ k nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ mun wɑɑ’u k gbin muk k tɑn tut’ɔ.
42008043	K puosuɑ nnɑ mun biɑ din be lenŋ, k siik fɑbounŋ k tɑn jɑnŋ binɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle, k u din tɑn yɑt u bonɑ kul k tul tebtieb, ŋɑɑn b suɑ din k fit teb’ɔ k u pɑɑk,
42008044	k u tɑn bɑɑl Yiesu puol k sii u liɑtfuouk mɔgbɑnn k l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni, k u fɑbounŋ nɑ ji din jit.
42008045	K Yiesu boi ɑ: «Ŋmee sii’n i?» Suɑ kul nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ din noi, k Piɑl tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, ɑ k lɑ nibulciɑɔnŋ nbɑ muk’ɑ ni ii?»
42008046	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu yet ɑ: «Suɑ sii’n ɑ, k mɑɑn n bɑnn nɑn pɑnsiɑk nyii n ni wɑɑ.»
42008047	Ŋɑnn e k puo nɑ ji din bɑnn nɑn u kɑn fit bɔl u mɔnŋ, k ji din nyii pɑɑnu ni k jekl, k tɑn gbɑɑn Yiesu tuɑnn, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ suɑ kul nunm ni lin nbɑ pɑɑk k u sii’u, nɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ k u pɑɑk l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni.
42008048	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «N bipuo, ɑ yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e k ɑ pɑɑk. Ii sɑɑ nɑn mɑnu.»
42008049	Yuo nbɑ k Yiesu dɑɑ din sie k piɑk nɑ, k tuomi nyii Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok sɑɑkuɑ mɑnŋ ŋɑɑk ni k tɑn bɑɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «A bonpobik nɑ tɑɑn kpo wɑɑ, k ɑ ji dɑɑ bɑknt Wɑntuɑ nɑ.»
42008050	K Yiesu gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ k jiɑnt yet Yennu jɑɑnti dieok sɑɑkuɑ nɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. Tient yɑdɑ kuukuɑ, k u sɑɑ fiil ɑ.»
42008051	Yiesu nbɑ din bɑɑl ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ nɑn-yel ni yuo nbɑ, u din k sɑk k suɑ n kuɑ, l i kii tie Piɑl nɑn Sɑn nɑn Sɑɑk k pukn bik nɑ bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ.
42008052	K bin nbɑ kul be lenŋ mɔ kumɔni k fɑbn bik mɑnŋ pɑɑk. Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ mɔ mɑn. Bik nɑ k kpo kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u guɑnt e.»
42008053	K niib nɑ lɑɑ’u; k mɑɑn b mi nɑn bik nɑ set kpo wɑɑ.
42008054	K Yiesu suol bik nɑ nuu ŋɑɑn yiin ɑ: «N bik, fiit.»
42008055	K u jen u mɑnfuol ni k fiil yiɑn ɑ, k Yiesu yet’b ɑ bin tul bik nɑ jiet k wun di.
42008056	L din bɑkt bik nɑ bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ bonciɑnn; ŋɑɑn Yiesu din yet’b nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ bii mi k bin yet suɑ lin nbɑ tien nɑ.
42009001	L puolpo k Yiesu din tɑn yiin u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ k lɑkn’m, k tul’b pɑnŋ nɑn yiikuo nbɑ k b sii nyint nɑlnbiit nbɑ kul be niib ni, kii biɑ kii te k bɑɑtb i pɑɑkt,
42009002	k ji din te k b yɑt ɑ bii lin kii muɑntl Yennu nɑɑn po, k biɑ te k bɑɑtb i pɑɑkt.
42009003	K u yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ jikt siɑl k sɑɑ nɑn’n. I dɑɑ diɑ pɑti, ɑmi pɑkɑ, ɑmi pɑɑnu, ɑmi likli, ɑmi liɑtfɔkt ŋɑnlele.
42009004	Ŋɑɑk nbɑ k i sɑɑ kuɑ, yin biɑl lenŋ nɑn yɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi duo mɑnŋ ni.
42009005	Siɑn nbɑ kul k niib k tuok’i nɑn pɑlpienn, yin pit i tɑɑpɑnt ni tɑnt bil l duo ni yuo nbɑ k i nyi lenŋ, k l sii tie siɑlɑ nbɑ wɑnt nɑn b mɔk biit.»
42009006	Ŋɑnn e k u puolpoweitieb nɑ din nyii k lin digbɑnɑ ni k muɑntl Yennu lɑbɑmɑnn, k biɑ te k bɑɑtb pɑɑk l digbɑnɑ kul ni.
42009007	K Gɑɑliile kpɑnbɑl Heluod din tɑn gbɑt lɑbɑɑl nbɑ din tun nɑ kul, k l ŋmɑt u yɑn ni, k mɑɑn yenm din yɑɑ ɑ Sɑn e fiil kuun ni,
42009008	k lieb yɑɑ ɑ yɑɑyuo ni sɔkni Elii e dɔkt, k lieb mun yɑɑ ɑ yɑɑyuo ni sɔkniinbɑ yenɔ e fiil kuun ni,
42009009	ŋɑɑn k Heluod yet ɑ: «N dɑɑn te k b pot Sɑn yul ɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋmee k n jin gbiɑ u po nɑ mun i?» K u ji din kol l yuo nɑ ɑ wun lɑ Yiesu.
42009010	Tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle mɑnŋ nbɑ din tɑn jen k yet Yiesu lin nbɑ k b dɑɑn sɑɑn sɑɑ tun. K u ji din jii’b k b sɑɑn dosɑu nbɑ k b yi Betsɑidɑ, b kuukuɑ.
42009011	Ŋɑɑn nibul nɑ nbɑ din gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b wei Yiesu k sɑɑn, k u tuok’b nɑn pɑlpienn, k wɑnn’b Yennu nɑɑn po, k biɑ te k bin nbɑ luon pɑɑku nɑ pɑɑk.
42009012	Yuo nbɑ k yennu din tɑn mɑɑkt nɑ, k u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ bɑɑl u buol k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k nibul nɑ n sɑɑn doi nɑn digbɑnbis nbɑ kpiɑ nɑ ni k lɑ jiet nɑn dunduɑnbuol, k mɑɑn nnɑ nɑ tie muuk ni e.»
42009013	K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «I mɔnŋ n tul’b jiet k bin di.» K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «T k mɔk siɑl k pukn pɑɑni ŋɑnŋmu nɑn jɑni ŋɑnle nɑ po, k t nɔk sɑɑ sɑɑn dɑɑ jiet k tɑn dinn nibul nɑ kul ɑmi ii?»
42009014	(Jɑb nbɑ din be lenŋ nɑ din tie nɑn tusɑ ŋɑnŋmu nɑ.) K Yiesu yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k niib nɑ n bɔkt kɑl piinŋmuŋmu.»
42009015	K u puolpoweitieb ŋɑɑn k b kul bɔkt kɑl kɑl.
42009016	K u jii pɑɑni ŋɑnŋmu nɑn jɑni ŋɑnle nɑ, ŋɑɑn yɑɑt got sɑnpɑɑpo, k tul Yennu niipuouk jiet nɑ pɑɑk, k ji din ŋmit ŋmit k tul u puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ bii tuol nibul nɑ,
42009017	k b kul dii k jɑnŋ. K u puolpoweitieb lɑkn jiet nbɑ k niib nɑ dii k tɑn tenn nɑ, k l gbie kpɑncubt piik nɑn ŋɑnle.
42009018	Dɑsiɑl k Yiesu din mei Yennu u kuukuɑ, k u puolpoweitieb din tɑn bɑɑl u buol ni l yuo nɑ, k u boi’b ɑ: «Nibul nɑ yɑɑ ɑ n tie ŋmee?»
42009019	K b jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yenm yɑɑ ɑ ɑ tie Sɑn wun nbɑ din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ e, k lieb mun yɑɑ ɑ ɑ tie Elii, k siɑb mun yɑɑ ɑ yɑɑyuo ni sɔkniinbɑ yenɔ e tɑn fiil kuun ni.»
42009020	K u boi’b ɑ: «K yinm ŋɑnin yɑɑ ɑ n tie ŋmee?» K Piɑl jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie Yennu Klistu nɑ.»
42009021	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet’b nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ b dɑɑ yien suɑ lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ,
42009022	k biɑ yet’b ɑ: «L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ n di fɑlɑ bonciɑnn, k t tinŋ ni sɑɑkɑb nɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb sɑɑ yet’ɔ, k biɑ kpi’u wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k u sɑɑ fiil kuun ni.»
42009023	Ŋɑnn e k u yet b kul ɑ: «Wun nbɑ i luon wun wei’n, sie k u yit u mɔnŋ sɑlk k jii u kuun dɑpunpunn dɑɑl kul kii wɑɑ’n,
42009024	k mɑɑn wun nbɑ luon wun kɔn u mɑnfuol pɑɑk, ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ kɔnŋ’l, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ yit u mɔnŋ sɑlk n pɑɑk, ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ lɑ u mɑnfuol nɑn bɑlmɔni.
42009025	Nilɔ i lɑ tingbounŋ nɑ mɔktuk kul, ŋɑɑn biil u mɔnŋ binbenŋ k kɔnŋ u mɑnfuol, nyɔlɑnt po e k u sɑɑ lɑ?
42009026	Wun nbɑ tiin fei k jiin min nɑn n wɑnnu nɑ po, Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ i tɑnŋ i jen nɑn u yudɑnt, nɑn u Bɑɑ yudant nɑn u mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ yudɑnt, l yuo mɑnŋ u tɑn sɑɑ tin’ɔ fei mun.
42009027	Bɑlmɔni e k n yɑɑ n yien’i nɑ, siɑb be nnɑ k dɑɑ kɑn kpo sie k b tɑn lɑ Yennu nɑɑn sinsinn.»
42009028	Yiesu nbɑ din pɑk nnɑ k gbenn yuo nbɑ, l puolpo e k l tien nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnniin nɑ, k u jii Piɑl nɑn Sɑn nɑn Sɑɑk, k duo nɑn’m juɑl pɑɑk ɑ bin sɑɑ miɑl Yennu.
42009029	Wɑɑ din mei Yennu nɑ k u nunm po tɑn kpint, k u tiɑt penn k nyilk.
42009030	L yuo nɑ k jɑb bɑnle nnɑ lekt lenŋ. L din tie Muois nɑn Elii e,
42009031	k b tiɑt nɑn b gbɑnɑnt nyili. B din piɑk nɑn Yiesu k jikt sɑɑ bɑnnu nbɑ k u sɑɑ kpo Selusɑɑlenm k tun u tuonn k gbenn.
42009032	Guɑn din suol Piɑl nɑn u lieb bonciɑnn, k b guɑn k tɑn kpil yelk k fiil, k lɑ k yentsɑɑkɑl yent k lint Yiesu, k b biɑ lɑ jɑb bɑnle nbɑ din sie u buol nnɑ.
42009033	Jɑb mɑnŋ nbɑ din tɑn nyikt Yiesu nɑ, k Piɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, l ŋɑn nɑn tii be nnɑ nɑ. T sɑɑ fɑɑ lɑnbont ŋɑntɑ e, k yenn i tie ɑ yɑl, k liel i tie Muois yɑl, k liel mun i tie Elii yɑl.» Piɑl nbɑ din piɑk lin nbɑ mɑnŋ, u din gbiɑ ɑ u piɑk e.
42009034	Wɑɑ din dɑɑ piɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ, k sɑnpɑgbɑnn dɔkt k tɑn piin’m, k jɑŋmɑɑni din suol u puolpoweitieb nɑ nɑn sɑnpɑgbɑnn nbɑ dɔkt k piin’m nɑ.
42009035	K b din gbɑt kunkɔl sɑnpɑgbɑnn nɑ ni, k l yet ɑ: «N Bijɑ wun nbɑ k n lukt’ɔ e nɑ. Ii sɑɑk u mɔb mɑn.»
42009036	Kunkɔl nɑ nbɑ din pɑk gbenn yuo nbɑ, k b ji lɑ k Yiesu kuɑ e biɑl sie. L puolpo e k b ji din biɑl ŋmin k jikt sɑɑ lin nbɑ k b lɑ nɑ po, ŋɑɑn k k kumi suɑ lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ l yuo nɑ.
42009037	L din tɑn yent k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb nyii juɑl nɑ pɑɑk k sik, k nibulciɑɔnŋ din tuok’ɔ.
42009038	K jɑsuɑ din be nibul nɑ ni, k din tɑn tiɑn yiin Yiesu ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, n bɑln’mɑ e, tɑn gotl n bijɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ e kpɑn tie n biyenml,
42009039	k nɑlnbiiuk tuu te k wun kpil yikn k lu’u, k u tɑbt, k mɔsɑnkunkuounŋ nyi u mɔb ni, k u dint’ɔ wɑhɑlɑ k l gbiɑ’u k tuu tɑn wolk’ɔ wɑɑnm-nnɑ, ŋɑɑn k k nyikt’ɔ.
42009040	N bɑln ɑ puolpoweitieb ɑ bin nyinn nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ, k b gbɑl.»
42009041	K Yiesu jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Yinm biitdɑnm, yinm nbɑ kɑɑ yɑdɑ. N sɑɑ wei nɑn’i nlee k di suklu nɑn’i mɑntk i?» K u biɑ yet juɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «Bɑɑt nɑn ɑ bijɑ nɑ.»
42009042	K bik nɑ nbɑ din bɑɑt Yiesu buol ni yuo nbɑ k nɑlnbiiuk nɑ libl’ɔ nɑn tinŋ gbɑb, k u bɑɑ duɑ k tɑbt. Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu tiɑn nɑlnbiiuk nɑ pɑɑk, k te k bik nɑ pɑɑk, k jii’u k tul’ɔ u bɑɑ.
42009043	Ŋɑnn e k l yɑɑl lit niib nɑ kul nɑn Yennu nbɑ mɔk pɑnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. L dɑɑ din bɑkt nibul nɑ nɑn wɑɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ kul nɑ pɑɑk, k Yiesu ŋmɑt yet u puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ
42009044	«Luotl i tubɑ mɑn k gbɑt fɑnu lin nbɑ k n yɑɑ n pɑk k tul’i nɑ. B tɑn sɑɑ jii Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k kubn’ɔ niib nuu ni.»
42009045	Ŋɑɑn b lek din k bɑnn l pɑɑk, k mɑɑn siɑl din dɔkn b yɑn e, ɑ b dɑɑ bɑnt, k b biɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni nɑn bin boi Yiesu l mɑɑn pɑɑk.
42009046	L puolpo e k mɔniɑɔk din tɑn bɑɑl Yiesu puolpoweitieb nɑ sinsuuk ni, k b noi ɑ bin lɑɑn ŋmee tie nijɑɑnn b sinsuuk ni.
42009047	K Yiesu bɑnn bɑɑ duki biɑnŋ nbɑ. L pɑɑk k u jii bik nnɑ k senn’ɔ u nunm ni,
42009048	ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Wun nbɑ gɑɑl bik nbɑ nɑ n sɑnn pɑɑk, u gɑɑl min e, k wun nbɑ mun sɑk k gɑɑl’n, u gɑɑl wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ e mun biɑk. K mɑɑn wun nbɑ tie tɑlk i ni, ŋuɑ e tie nijɑɑnn k gɑl i kul ɑ.»
42009049	Ŋɑnn e k Sɑn din yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, t dɑɑn lɑ k jɑsuɑ mun tɑɑn ɑ sɑnn k nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni, k t yet’ɔ ɑ wun nyik, k mɑɑn u k tie t ni yenɔ.»
42009050	K Yiesu jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «I dɑɑ tɑb’ɔ mɑn, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ kul k kɔn nɑn’i ni, u sie i puol e.»
42009051	Tɔn, yuo nbɑ k l din tɑn pel nɑn Yiesu n do Yendɔunŋ ni, k u din tɑn fɑɑ pɑl k suol sɔnu ɑ wun sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm,
42009052	k u tun tuomiinbɑ ɑ bin gɑl Sɑɑmɑɑli niib digbɑnbik nbɑ be liik ɑ bin tien siil nɑn u bɑɑlu,
42009053	ŋɑɑn lenŋ niib din k luon bin gɑɑl’ɔ, k mɑɑn b din mi nɑn u sɑɑ Selusɑɑlenm e.
42009054	K u puolpoweitieb Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ k b boi’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ luon k t te k muu n nyi sɑnpɑɑpo k sik di biil’b ii?»
42009055	Ŋɑɑn Yiesu jiɑnt gɑɑl jɑt b pɑɑk ɑ bin nyik ɑ, [k yet ɑ: «I k mi siek nbɑ te k i mɔk l dudukt.
42009056	K mɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k bɑɑl ɑ wun buon niib sei kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u bɑɑl ɑ wun fiel’b e,»] k b nyik, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn digbɑnliel po.
42009057	Yuo nbɑ k b din sɑɑ mɑnŋ k jɑsuɑ tɑn yet Yiesu ɑ: «N sɑɑ wei’ɑ siɑn nbɑ kul po k ɑ sɑɑ.»
42009058	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Lunlonɑ mɔk fɔli, k nuɑni mun biɑ mɔk tiɑt, ŋɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k mɔk dunduɑnbuol.»
42009059	K u biɑ tɑn yet jɑluɑ ɑ: «I wɑɑ’n.» K juɑ mɑnŋ yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ŋɑɑnt k n sɑɑn k sɑɑ pii n bɑɑ sinsinn ɑ.»
42009060	K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k kpienm i pii b kpienlieb. Fin, i sɑɑ wɑɑ, kii sɑi muɑntl niib Yennu nɑɑn po.»
42009061	K luɑ mun yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, n sɑɑ wei’ɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑnt k n kun k sɑɑ cɑb n ŋɑɑtieb sinsinn ɑ k ji fit wei’ɑ.»
42009062	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wun nbɑ diɑ nɑɑsɔk k ko ŋɑɑn goli puolpo, l dɑɑnɔ k ŋɑn nɑn Yennu nɑɑn tuontumu.»
42010001	L puolpo e k Yonmdɑɑnɔ din lukt nilieb piinlole nɑn bɑnle k tun’m bɑnlele ɑ bin dɔnŋ gɑl doi ni, siɑn nbɑ po kul k u sɑɑ bɑɑl.
42010002	Ŋɑnn e k u yet’b ɑ: «Dii nɑ biel k yɑb ɑ, ŋɑɑn k dijɑɑntieb wɑɑl. L pɑɑk, ii mei mɑn dii nɑ dɑɑnɔ k wun ŋɑnm pukn dijɑɑntieb k te k bin sɑɑn jɑɑn u dii mɑnŋ.
42010003	Ii sɑɑ mɑn. Gotl, n tuun’i, k i sii tie nɑn pebis nbɑ be kinkɑtɑ sinsuuk ni nɑ.
42010004	Ŋɑɑn i dɑɑ jikt likbuɑli ɑmi pɑkɑ ɑmi tɑɑsɑliɑ. I biɑ dɑɑ sie sɔnu ni k fuont niib k kpɑmi.
42010005	Ŋɑɑk nbɑ yɑɑ ni k i sɑɑ kuɑ, yin fuont k yet ɑ: ‹Mɑnu ii be ŋɑɑk nɑ niib pɑɑk.›
42010006	K ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ i luon mɑnu, u sɑɑ gɑɑl. L i kii tie nnɑ, mɑnu mɑnŋ biɑ sɑɑ jen i pɑɑk nɑ.
42010007	L i tie k i kuɑ ŋɑɑk nbɑ yɑɑ ni, ii be lenŋ kii di kii nyu lin nbɑ k b tien’i, k mɑɑn tuontunnɔ ŋɑn k wun gɑɑl u pɑɑɔk o. I dɑɑ lin k luɑn ŋei k duɑ.
42010008	L i tie k i bɑɑl duo nbɑ yɑɑ ni k b tuok’i nɑn pɑlpienn, ŋɑɑn tɑn tul’i jiet nbɑ, yin di.
42010009	I te k bɑɑtb n pɑɑk lenŋ ŋɑɑn kii yien niib mɑnŋ ɑ: ‹Yennu nɑɑn nɑkn’i wɑɑ.›
42010010	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k i bɑɑl duo nbɑ ni k niib nɑ k gɑɑl’i, yin nyi sɔni pɑɑk ŋɑɑn kii yien ɑ:
42010011	‹T tɑɑ nbɑ tɑb i duo nɑ tɑnbiini nɑ, t pit ŋɑnn e k lubn k cɑbt’i. Ŋɑɑn ii mi mɑn nɑn Yennu nɑɑn ponŋ nɑkn’i wɑɑ.›
42010012	N yien’i e nɑn buut bunu dɑɑl, duo mɑnŋ niib tubdɑtu tɑn sɑɑ gɑl Suodonmtieb yɑl ɑ.»
42010013	«L sii bi yinm Kolɑsentieb pɑɑk. L sii bi yinm Betsɑidɑtieb mun yɑɑ pɑɑk. K mɑɑn mi i bo i tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ Tiil nɑn Siidɔn doi ni nɑn mɑɑ dɑɑn tun i doi ni nɑ, b bo sɑɑ mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn yiɑn ɑ k jii bɔtuot k liɑ liɑ k puk b mɔnŋ tɑnpen k wɑnn nɑn b luon k bin lebt binbenŋ.
42010014	Dɑɑl nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ bu niib buut nɑ, i tubdɑtu tɑn sɑɑ gɑl Tiil nɑn Siidɔn tieb yɑl ɑ.
42010015	Yinm Kɑpelnɑunmtieb, i duki nɑn i tɑn sɑɑ do sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ? Aɑi, i tɑn sɑɑ sik muu nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu ni e.»
42010016	L yuo nɑ k Yiesu din yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Wun nbɑ gbiin i mɑɑn, u gbiin min e, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ yet’i, u yet min e, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ yet’n, u yet Yennu nbɑ tun’n nɑ e mun biɑk.»
42010017	Ŋɑnn e k jɑb piinlole nɑn bɑnle mɑnŋ din tɑn jen nɑn pɑlpienn k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ sɑnn ni e k nɑlnbiit tɑn sɑɑk t mɔi.»
42010018	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «N lɑ k Sɑɑtɑn nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k tɑn bɑɑ nɑn sɑnyiknti nɑ.
42010019	Gbiintl mɑn, n ponŋ tul’i yiikuo k i sii ŋmɑɑt wɑi nɑn nɑni pɑɑk, kii nyɑni i dɑtɑɑk pɑnŋ kul, k siɑl kɑn tien’i ni.
42010020	Ŋɑɑn i dɑɑ mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn nɑlnbiit nbɑ sɑk i mɔi nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn kii jik i mɔk pɑlpienn mɑn nɑn Yennu ponŋ diɑn i sɑnɑ Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ.»
42010021	L yuo mɑnŋ k Foŋɑnm din te k Yiesu mɔk pɑlpienn hei, k yet ɑ: «N Bɑɑ wun nbɑ tie sɑnpɑɑpo nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ, n piɑk’ɑ, k mɑɑn ɑ bɔl lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ subndɑnm nɑn mitieb buol e, ŋɑɑn fiit wɑnn wɑɑs. Nnn Cɑnbɑɑ, nnɑ e k ɑ luon k ɑ tun, k l mɑn’ɑ.»
42010022	Yiesu biɑ din ŋɑnm yet ɑ: «N Bɑɑ e wɑnn’n mɑɑn kul ɑ. Suɑ k mi Bijɑ nɑ nbɑ tie wun nbɑ sie Bɑɑ mɑnŋ, k suɑ mun biɑ k mi Bɑɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ tie wun nbɑ, sie Bijɑ nɑ, nɑn bin nbɑ k Bijɑ luon wun fiit Bɑɑ mɑnŋ wɑnn’b nɑ.»
42010023	L yuo nɑ k Yiesu ji din ŋmɑt got u puolpoweitieb ŋɑɑn yet’b b kuukuɑ ɑ: «Pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e, k mɑɑn i ninbinɑ nbɑ lɑ lin nbɑ k i lɑɑt nɑ.
42010024	N yien’i e nɑn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nɑn kpɑnbɑlɑ bonciɑnn din luon bin lɑ lin nbɑ k i lɑɑt nɑ, ŋɑɑn din k lɑ, k biɑ din luon bin gbɑt lɑbɑɑl nbɑ k i gbiɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn din k gbɑt.»
42010025	Dɑsiɑl k senniwɑntɔsuɑ din fiil k set k luon wun bikn Yiesu k boi’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, n sɑɑ tien nlee k lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu?»
42010026	K Yiesu jiin k boi’ɔ ɑ: «L diɑn nlee Yennu senni ni? A lii k lɑɑt nlee?»
42010027	K juɑ nɑ jiin ɑ: «Fii mɑntk kii luon Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu nɑn ɑ pɑl kul ɑ, kii biɑ kii luon’ɔ nɑn ɑ siek kul ɑ, nɑn ɑ pɑnŋ kul ɑ, nɑn ɑ dudukt kul ɑ, kii biɑ kii luon ɑ luɑ nɑn fɑɑ luon ɑ mɔnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.»
42010028	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «A jiinu ŋɑn. Ii tuun nnɑ k tɑn lɑ mɑnfuol mɑnŋ.»
42010029	Ŋɑɑn k senniwɑntuɑ nɑ lek din luon wun wɑnn nɑn u tie niŋɑnɔ Yennu buol ni, k boi Yiesu ɑ: «Tɔn, k ŋmee tie n luɑ?»
42010030	K Yiesu jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Jɑsuɑ din nyii Selusɑɑlenm k siik Seliiko, k fɑt-tieb tɑn pikn’ɔ k liɑt u tiɑt k fɑt, ŋɑɑn buo’u bonciɑnn, k tɑn tenn u kuun dɑlk dɑlk nnɑ, ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ.
42010031	L puolpo e k tɑn suɑ k Yennu mɑnntɔsuɑ nnɑ mun tɔk l sɔnu k siik bɑɑt k tɑn lɑ juɑ nɑ k u duɑ, k u lɔk gɑl ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ.
42010032	L biɑnŋ e nɑ biɑk, k Liefi buolu ni jɑsuɑ mun din bɑɑt lenŋ k tɑn lɑ juɑ mɑnŋ, k mun biɑ lɔk k gɑl ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ.
42010033	Ŋɑɑn Sɑɑmɑɑli jɑsuɑ mun din tɔk l sɔnu k bɑɑt k tɑn dɔkt juɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk k lɑ’u, k ninbɑɑɔk suol’ɔ bonciɑnn,
42010034	k u bɑɑl k jii kpɑn nɑn dɑɑn k wuul u fiɑt nɑ ŋɑɑn fin tɑnɑ, k jii’u k pɑɑn’ɔ u bonŋ pɑɑk k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ sɑɑnm dieok ni k sɑɑ got’ɔ.
42010035	Lɑɑ din tɑn yent yuo nbɑ k u jii denienbɑ ŋɑnle k tul wun nbɑ din goli sɑɑnm dieok nɑ, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ: ‹Ii goli juɑ nɑ, k mi i tɑnŋ i jen dɑɑl nbɑ, n sɑɑ pukn’ɑ lin nbɑ k ɑ din’ɔ k pukn nɑ pɑɑk.› »
42010036	Yiesu nbɑ pɑk nnɑ k gbenn, k u boi senniwɑntuɑ nɑ ɑ: «Jɑb bɑntɑ nɑ ni, ŋmee wɑnt nɑn u tie wun nbɑ k fɑt-tieb fɑt’ɔ nɑ luɑ?»
42010037	K u jiin ɑ: «Wun nbɑ din tin’ɔ ninbɑɑɔk nɑ.» K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Tɔn, fin, i sɑɑ kii tuun l biɑnŋ mun.»
42010038	Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din sɑɑ b sɔnu, k b sɑɑ bɑɑl digbɑnbisiɑk nnɑ ni, k puosuɑ din be lenŋ k b yi’u Mɑɑlt, k u din gɑɑl Yiesu nɑn pɑlpienn u ŋɑɑk ni.
42010039	U din mɔk niipuo k u sɑnn tie Mɑɑli, k Mɑɑli nɑ din bɑɑl k tɑn kɑl tinŋ ni k nɑkn Yonmdɑɑnɔ tɑɑ po k gbiintl u mɑɑn.
42010040	Ŋɑɑn k Mɑɑlt mun din gbɑɑ nɑn sɑɑncɑntuk kul kul, k u tɑn bɑɑl yet Yiesu ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, mɑɑ gbɑɑ nɑn sɑɑɔnŋ cɑntuk n kuukuɑ, ŋɑɑn k n niipuo nɑ k sonmt’n, ɑ bɑkɑ kɑɑ l po oo? Yet’ɔ k wun bɑɑl k tɑn sonm’n.»
42010041	K Yonmdɑɑnɔ jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Mɑɑlt, Mɑɑlt, n mi nɑn ɑ gbɑɑ nɑn bonɑ bonciɑnn, k l muks’ɑ hei,
42010042	ŋɑɑn bon-yenn kuukuɑ e kpɑɑ tɑlɑs. Mɑɑli gɑnn lin nbɑ ŋɑn, k suɑ kɑn fɑt’l.»
42011001	Dɑɑsiɑl k Yiesu din be siɑl po k mei Yennu. Wɑɑ miɑl gbenn yuo nbɑ, k u puolpoweitieb yenɔ tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, wɑnt’t tɑɑ sii mei Yennu biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑn Sɑn nbɑ mun din wɑnn u puolpoweitieb biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.»
42011002	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Yɑɑ tuu sii mei Yennu biɑnŋ nbɑ e nɑ: Bɑɑ, ɑ sɑnn n lɑ dontl. Ŋɑɑnt k ɑ nɑɑn n bɑɑl.
42011003	Tul’t mɑnn dɑɑl kul
42011004	Nyikn cɑb t biit nɑn tɑɑ mun nyikt k cɑbt bin nbɑ biil’t nɑ. A dɑɑ te k t kuɑ jɑnmi ni.»
42011005	Yiesu biɑ yet’b ɑ: «T sɑɑ yet ɑ i yenɔ mɔk u yuɑk k sɑɑn u ŋɑɑk ni nyiɑɔk tɑnsuuni k yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N yuɑk, kpentl’n pɑɑni ŋɑntɑ,
42011006	k mɑɑn n yuɑs nbɑ ni yenɔ nyii sɔnu k bɑɑl n ŋɑɑk ni, ŋɑɑn k n k mɔk siɑl k sɑɑ tul’ɔ.›
42011007	K wun nbɑ be ŋɑɑk ni jiin ɑ: ‹Dɑɑ muks’n. N ponŋ kpɑl gɑnn ɑ, k min nɑn n wɑɑs biɑ duɑl ɑ. N kɑn fit fiil k tul’ɑ pɑɑnu.›
42011008	Gotl, n yien’i e, u kɑn sɑk fiil k tul’ɔ jiet mɑnŋ, wɑɑ tie u yuɑk nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ k tiin fei k biɑ mei’ɔ nɑ, sie k u tɑn tɑt fiil k tul’ɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ k u luon.
42011009	«L pɑɑk, n biɑ yien’i, miɑt mɑn, k b sɑɑ tul’i. Lomin mɑn, k i sɑɑ lɑ wɑɑ. Kpɑɑn gɑnn mɑn, k b sɑɑ luot k tul’i,
42011010	k mɑɑn wun nbɑ kul mei, gɑɑn e, k wun nbɑ mun luon, u lɑɑt e, k wun nbɑ kpɑɑn gɑnn, b luotl tien’ɔ.
42011011	Yinm bɑɑnbɑ, i ŋmee k u bijɑ sɑɑ miɑl’ɔ jɑnŋ k wun jii wɑɑɔk k tul’ɔ?
42011012	Ami ŋmee k u sɑɑ miɑl’ɔ jenn k wun jii nɑnŋ k tul’ɔ?
42011013	K l i tie k yinm nbɑ tie biitdɑnm nɑ mi biɑnŋ nbɑ k i sɑɑ tul i wɑɑs bonŋɑnɑ, k i Bɑɑ Yennu nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ ŋɑnin kɑn jii Foŋɑnm k tul bin nbɑ mei’ɔ l po nɑ ɑɑ?»
42011014	Yiesu din nyint nɑlnbiiuk nbɑ din be jɑsuɑ ni k tien’ɔ muuk nɑ. Yuo nbɑ k nɑlnbiiuk nɑ nyii u ni k gbenn, k juɑ nɑ muut k piin k piɑk. K l bɑkt nibul nɑ bonciɑnn.
42011015	Ŋɑɑn k yenm din yet ɑ: «Nɑlnbiit bɑt Beelsebuul e tien’ɔ yiikuo k u nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni.»
42011016	Ŋɑɑn k yenm mun din luon k bin bikn Yiesu, k yɑɑ ɑ wun wɑnn’b nyinn nbɑ nyii Yendɔunŋ ni.
42011017	K Yiesu bɑnn bɑɑ duki lin nbɑ, k yet’b ɑ: «Nɑɑn niib i ŋmɑt k kɔn tuokt b lieb, b nɑɑn mɑnŋ sɑɑ biil ɑ, k ŋɑɑk niib i mun i ŋmɑt kɔn nɑn lieb, l kɑn set.
42011018	Tɔn, l i tie k Sɑɑtɑn ŋmɑt kɔn nɑn u lieb, nlee k u nɑɑn sɑɑ set i? N yet nnɑ k mɑɑn i yɑɑ ɑ Beelsebuul e tien’n yiikuo ɑ mii nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni.
42011019	L i tie k n nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni nɑn Beelsebuul yiikuo nɑ, ŋmee yiikuo ni e k i mɔnŋ mɔnŋ wɑɑs nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni i? Ŋɑnn e k b tuonɑ wɑnt nɑn i k mɔk mɔni.
42011020	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k l tie Yennu yiikuo ni k n nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni, l wɑnt nɑn Yennu nɑɑn ponŋ bɑɑl i buol ni wɑɑ.
42011021	«Jɑwɑktl nbɑ tien siil nɑn u jɑtiɑt k guu u ŋɑɑk, u bonsiɑl kul kɑn sii,
42011022	ŋɑɑn u pɑɑlɔ mun i tɑnŋ i pikn’ɔ k pɑɑk’ɔ, u sɑɑ fɑt u jɑtiɑt nbɑ k u dɑɑn l pɑɑk nɑ e, k biɑ jii u mɔktuk k tol niib.
42011023	«Wun nbɑ k sie n puol, u kɔn nɑn’n e, k wun nbɑ mun k tiki niib k tien’n, u yɑt’b e.»
42011024	«L i tie k nɑlnbiiuk tɑn nyii nilɔ ni, u tuu yiek e k lin mɔkuounŋ ni, k luon fuonbuol, ŋɑɑn k k lɑɑt. L pɑɑk, u tuu tɑn yet u mɔnŋ e ɑ: ‹N sɑɑ ŋmɑt sɑɑn ŋɑɑk nbɑ ni k n dɑɑn nyii nɑ ni e.›
42011025	U ji kii ŋmɑt tɑn bɑɑl, wun lɑ k b piɑl k ŋɑnm ɑ,
42011026	u ji sɑɑ ŋmɑt nyi e k sɑɑ yiin nɑlnbilieb bɑnlole, bin nbɑ bi k cie u pɑɑk, k bɑɑl nɑn’m, k bin kuɑ k lɑkn be, k nilɔ mɑnŋ binbenŋ ji sii bi bonciɑnn k gɑl wɑɑ dɑɑn tuu be sinsinn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ.»
42011027	Yiesu nbɑ din dɑɑ yien nnɑ mɑnŋ, k puosuɑ nnɑ be nibul nɑ ni, k yet sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Puo nbɑ mɑl’ɑ k muɑn’ɑ nɑ, pɑlpienn tie u yɑl e.»
42011028	K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Bin nbɑ gbiɑ Yennu mɑɑn k sɑɑk’l, ŋɑnm e k pɑlpienn tie b yɑl.»
42011029	Nibul nbɑ din gbin Yiesu buol ni yuo nbɑ nɑ, k u yet’b ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ tie biitdɑnm e, k mɑɑn b luon bin lɑ nyinn, ŋɑɑn b kɑn lɑ nyinsiɑl, l i kii tie Suonɑ nyinn nɑ i kɑɑ.
42011030	Biɑnŋ nbɑ k Suonɑ din tien nyinn k tul Niiniif tieb nɑ, l biɑnŋ e mun k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mun sɑɑ tien nyinn k tul mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ.
42011031	Buut dɑɑl, puosuɑ nbɑ din tie kpɑnbɑl nbɑ din nyii gɑnŋ po nɑ tɑn sɑɑ set wɑnn nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ tingbounŋ nɑ niib mɔk biit, k mɑɑn u din nyii digbɑnbɑnfɔkl e wɑɑ k tɑn bɑɑl ɑ wun gbiint kpɑnbɑl Sɑɑlomɔn yɑnfuon nɑ pinpɑɔk, k gotl mɑn, wun nbɑ cie Sɑɑlomɔn nɑ be nnɑ.
42011032	Buut dɑɑl, Niiniiftieb tɑn sɑɑ set wɑnn nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ mɔk biit, k mɑɑn Suonɑ muɑnti pɑɑk k b din mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, k gotl mɑn, wun nbɑ cie Suonɑ be nnɑ.»
42011033	«B k jokt fitl ŋɑɑn jikt k tie wuol ni, ɑmi k liknt bokt l pɑɑk. Sie k b jii’l k tuɑnn bonsiɑl nbɑ fɔk nɑ pɑɑk k lin yent, k niib i jik i kuɑ yuo nbɑ, bii lɑɑt yentu nɑ.
42011034	A ninbinɑ e tie ɑ gbɑnɑnt fitl. A ninbinɑ i ŋɑn, ɑ gbɑnɑnt kul sii mɔk yentu, ŋɑɑn ɑ ninbinɑ i kii ŋɑn, ɑ gbɑnɑnt kul sii be bunbɔnn ni e.
42011035	Ii mi mɑn k yentu nbɑ be i ni nɑ dɑɑ kpɑntl tie bunbɔnn.
42011036	Tɔn, ɑ gbɑnɑnt kul i yien bonŋɑnn k siɑl po k be bunbɔnn ni, l sii yien e k nyili pilpilpil, k nɑɑn nɑn fitl nbɑ yien k tien’ɑ yienŋɑnu nɑ.» senniwɑntieb
42011037	Yuo nbɑ k Yiesu pɑk gbenn nɑ, k Fɑɑliisiɑnsuɑ din yet’ɔ ɑ wun wei’ɔ k bin sɑɑ di jiet. K u din wei sɑɑn k sɑɑ kuɑ k kɑl ɑ wun di.
42011038	K l din tien Fɑɑliisiɑn mɑnŋ bɑktnɔunŋ wɑɑ lɑ k Yiesu k fobt nɑn b kɑɑl nbɑ tie bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn yɑɑ wun di nɑ.
42011039	K Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yinm Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ, i tuu soki ŋmɑni nɑn seni puolpo kuukuɑ e, ŋɑɑn k i pɑlɑ ni gbie nɑn fɑtu nɑn bonbiil.
42011040	Yinm jɑtt nɑ. Wun nbɑ din nɑn puolpo nɑ, ŋuɑ kɑɑ din nɑn nuɑk ni mun ii?
42011041	Tuln tɑlɑs-dɑnm lin nbɑ be i ŋmɑni ni nɑn i seni ni, k i nɑn-yel po nɑn nuɑk ni kul sii yien.
42011042	«Yinm Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ, l sii bi i pɑɑk. I jikt ment nɑn luu nɑn kpinliet nbɑ k b buul gungounŋ ni l buolu kul ni bɔktu piik ni bɔkyenn kuɑ, k tien Yennu, ŋɑɑn bɑkn lin nbɑ tuok, k biɑ k luon Yennu. L bo sii ŋɑn k yii tuun ŋɑnn, k dɑɑ nyikt lin nbɑ tenn.
42011043	«Yinm Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ, l sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn i luon nijɑɑnɑ kinkɑɑni boɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, k biɑ luon niib i fuont’i nɑn nibɑɑkl fuonti dɑi ni.
42011044	L sii bi i pɑɑk. I tie nɑn kɑɑt nbɑ k niib tuu ŋmɑɑ k do l pɑɑk ŋɑɑn kɑn bɑnn’l nɑ e.»
42011045	Ŋɑnn e k senniwɑntɔyenɔ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, fɑɑ yet nnɑ nɑ, ŋɑnn ɑ sukl’t e nɑ mun.»
42011046	K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yinm senniwɑntieb, l sii bi i pɑɑk mun, k mɑɑn i jint niib jik-kpiɑtɑ nbɑ pɑɑl nɑn bin jii, ŋɑɑn i mɔnŋ k sɑɑk k yii siin jikɑ mɑnŋ kii sonmt’b.
42011047	L sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn i mɑɑ sɔkniinbɑ kɑɑt k sent bonŋɑnn. Ŋɑnm mɑnŋ e tie sɔkniinbɑ nbɑ k i yejɑnm din kpii’b mɑnŋ.
42011048	Yɑɑ tuun lin nbɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑnn e wɑnt niib nɑn i set sɑk i yejɑnm nbɑ din tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ. Ŋɑnm e din kpii sɔkniinbɑ mɑnŋ, k i mun sɑɑn sɑɑ mɑɑ b kɑɑt mɑnŋ.
42011049	L pɑɑk, k Yɑndɑɑnɔ Yennu din yet ɑ: ‹N sɑɑ tun sɔkniinbɑ nɑn tuomiinbɑ b buol ni, k b sɑɑ kpi siɑb ŋɑɑn muks lieb,›
42011050	ɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ n tɑn lɑ tubdɑtu sɔkniinbɑ kul kpinu nɑ pɑɑk. Kpinu mɑnŋ din piin dulnyɑ nɑmu yuo e wɑɑ,
42011051	Kɑɑen nbɑ din kpii Abel yuo nbɑ nɑ, k l jii k tɑn bɑɑl Sɑɑkɑɑli kpinu, wun nbɑ k b din kpii’u Yennu mɑnnu binbintl nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk sinsuuk ni nɑ. N yien’i nɑn bɑlmɔni e, mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ tubdɑtu lin nbɑ nɑ kul pɑɑk.
42011052	«Yinm senniwɑntieb, l sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn i mɔk pienu nbɑ sɑɑ fit luot minu gɑnn. I k kuɑ lenŋ k i biɑ k cɑb bin nbɑ luon bin kuɑ.»
42011053	Yiesu nbɑ siet lenŋ mɑnŋ, k senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ wutuol ji din duo bonciɑnn, k b ji din piin boi’ɔ buboit k jikt sɑɑ lɑbɑɑl bonciɑnn po,
42011054	k b lek din kol ɑ bin lɑ u mɔbonkpetl k fit tɑɑl’ɔ.
42012001	L yuo mɑnŋ k niib tusɑ tusɑ din muk lɑkn lieb, k tɑn ŋmɑɑt lieb tɑɑgbinɑ, k Yiesu din pɑk nɑn u puolpoweitieb sinsinn k yɑɑ ɑ: «Ii lɔktl mɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ tumiiu nbɑ k tuok nɑ, b tie kpinkpɑnni dɑnm e.
42012002	Bɑlsɑi kɑɑ k duɑk k tɑn kɑn nyi pɑɑnu ni. Siɑl mun k be wuol ni k b tɑn kɑn bɑnn’l.
42012003	L pɑɑk, lɑbɑɑl nbɑ k i pɑk bunbɔnn ni nɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi yentu ni. Lin nbɑ k i lek lɔkn diet ni, ŋɑɑn l tɑn sɑɑ wuot k muɑnt nyi wɑɑ.»
42012004	«N yuɑsnbɑ, n yien’i e, i dɑɑ tiin bin nbɑ kpi gbɑnɑnt kuukuɑ nɑ jɑŋmɑɑni mɑn, k mɑɑn b kpi i gbɑnɑnt kuukuɑ e, k l puolpo b kɑn fit tien’i siɑl.
42012005	N sɑɑ wɑnn’i wun nbɑ k i sii tiin’ɔ. Tinin wun nbɑ fit kpi i gbɑnɑnt k biɑ mɔk yiikuo nbɑ k sɑɑ fit lu’i muu nbɑ kɑn mi kpien nɑ ni. N yien’i e, tinin ŋuɑ e mɑn.»
42012006	«B k kɔi nuɑnbit bɑnŋmu kujɑ ŋɑnle ee? Ŋɑɑn Yennu k mi tɑnm nɑn b yenɔ kuɑ po wɑɑ.
42012007	Setk nɑn mɔni Yennu ponŋ mi i yulɑ pɑɑk yut kɑnn. I dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn i mɔk nyuɑt k gɑl nuɑnbit bonciɑnn.»
42012008	«N yien’i e, wun nbɑ nyint u mɔnŋ pɑɑnu ni niib ni nɑn u tie n weilɔ e, Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ nyinn’ɔ pɑɑnu ni Yennu mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ buol ni, nɑn u tie u yuɑ e,
42012009	ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ u k tie n weilɔ, niib ni, Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ yet ɑ u k mi’u, Yennu mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ mɑnŋ buol ni.
42012010	«Wun nbɑ kul pɑk mɔbonn k biil Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ, Yennu sɑɑ nyik cɑb’ɔ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ pɑk biil Foŋɑnm nɑ, Yennu kɑn nyik cɑb’ɔ.
42012011	«B i suol’i k bɑɑl nɑn’i Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni ɑmi kpɑnbɑlɑ buol ɑmi tinŋ yudɑnm buol, i dɑɑ te k l dɑɑnm’i nɑn yɑɑ sɑɑ pɑk jiin biɑnŋ nbɑ, ɑmi yɑɑ sɑɑ pɑk lin nbɑ,
42012012	k mɑɑn l yuo nɑ e k Foŋɑnm tɑn sɑɑ wɑnn’i biɑnŋ nbɑ k i sɑɑ pɑk.»
42012013	L yuo mɑnŋ k jɑsuɑ din yet Yiesu nibul nɑ ni ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, yetl n yuɑlɔ nɑ k wun bɔkt t bɑɑ fɑɑl k tul’n.»
42012014	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «N yuɑk, ŋmee tien’n bɑlbuulɔ ɑ n bu k bɔkt i fɑɑl mɑnŋ i?»
42012015	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu ŋɑnm pɑk nibul nɑ ɑ: «Ii mi mɑn mɔktuk lonm po. K mɑɑn mɔktuk bonciɑnn kɑɑ sɑɑ te k nilɔ i mɔk mɑnfuol.»
42012016	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yin’m bɑljouk ɑ: «Mɔktsuɑ din be k mɔk u kpɑɑb, k u kpɑɑb nɑ din tien’ɔ jiet bonciɑnn,
42012017	k u tɑn dukn dudukt ɑ: ‹N sɑɑ tien nlee, k mɑɑn n k mɔk yiɑl nbɑ k ji sɑɑ tien n jiet nɑ kul lenŋ.›
42012018	K u yet u mɔnŋ ɑ: ‹N sɑɑ tien nnɑ e. N sɑɑ yiel n bɔkpelɑ nɑ e ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm mɑɑ bɔpɑɑnɑ nbɑ yɑb. Lenŋ e k n ji sɑɑ tien n dii nɑn n bonkokuot kul ɑ,
42012019	k n biɑ sɑɑ yet n mɔnŋ ɑ: N mɔk jiet nbɑ sɑɑ jɑnŋ nɑn binɑ sɑɑn ɑ. N ji sii foi k di k nyu kii mɔk pɑlpienn.›
42012020	Ŋɑnn e k Yennu yet’ɔ ɑ, ‹Jɑjɑtuk nɑ. Nyiɑɔk nɑ, ɑ mɑnfuol sɑɑ kɑt. Ŋɑɑn lɑɑn, ɑ mɔktuk nbɑ k ɑ mɔk nɑ, ŋmee sɑɑ yent i?›
42012021	«Tɔn, wun nbɑ kul tiki mɔktuk k tien u mɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn k mɔk mɔktuk Yennu buol, l mun sii tie nnɑ e k tul’ɔ.»
42012022	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet u puolpoweitieb biɑk, «L pɑɑk k n yien’i, i dɑɑ te k l muks’i i binbenŋ po nɑn yɑɑ sɑɑ di lin nbɑ, k biɑ dɑɑ te k l muks’i i gbɑnɑnt po nɑn yɑɑ sɑɑ liɑ lin nbɑ,
42012023	k mɑɑn mɑnfuol gɑl dinu wɑɑ, k gbɑnɑnt mun gɑl tiɑt ɑ.
42012024	Gotl kinkɑɑt, b k buul. B biɑ k jɑɑn. B biɑ k mɔk dii nɑɑpɑɑt ɑmi sukɑ, ŋɑɑn Yennu dint’b. I k mɔk nyuɑt bonciɑnn k gɑl kinkɑɑt ii?
42012025	I ŋmee sɑɑ fit fɔkn u mɑnfuol u dudukt ni nbɑ muks’ɔ nɑ pɑɑk i?
42012026	Yɑɑ k fit tun bonbik nɑ, bee k l sii dɑɑmi’i nɑn bongbenŋl tumu?
42012027	Gotl mɑn tipuuk nɑn l ŋɑnt, ŋɑɑn b k tuun k luu b mɔnŋ cincenɑ, ŋɑɑn n yien’i nɑ, kpɑnbɑl Sɑɑlomɔn nbɑ din lek mɔk tɑŋɑnɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ, u din k mi liɑ tiɑt k l ŋɑn nɑn tipuuk nɑ.
42012028	Muɑt nbɑ be dinnɑ, ŋɑɑn wonn k b sɑɑ juo muu nɑ, Yennu nbɑ te k l fɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k u kɑn lɑnn yinm ii? Yinm yɑdɑ-kɑnpuɑnɑ dɑnm nɑ.
42012029	«I biɑ dɑɑ gbɑɑ nɑn yɑɑ sɑɑ di lin nbɑ ɑmi yɑɑ sɑɑ nyu lin nbɑ, k biɑ dɑɑ muks i dudukt,
42012030	k mɑɑn niib nbɑ k wɑɑ Yennu nɑ tuu muks b dudukt lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk e. Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin, i Bɑɑ ponŋ mi nɑn i luon lin nbɑ nɑ.
42012031	L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt k i bɑkɑ ii be Yennu nɑɑn ni, k u sɑɑ jii bonɑ nbɑ nɑ k tul’i.
42012032	«N niib nbɑ k yɑb nɑ, i dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn i Bɑɑ lɑ nɑn l ŋɑn wun tul’i nɑɑn mɑnŋ ɑ.
42012033	Kɔin i bonɑ nbɑ k i mɔk k jii l likli k tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm. Lomin mɑn likbuɑli nbɑ kɑn biil, kii biɑ kii mɔk mɔktuk Yendɔunŋ ni, siɑn nbɑ k l kɑn wɑt, k nɑn-yukɔ kɑn kpiɑn lenŋ, k bonŋmiŋmɑbt biɑ kɑn muɑ’l.
42012034	Siɑn nbɑ k ɑ mɔktuk be nɑ, ɑ dudukt mun be lenŋ e.
42012035	«Siknt gbounŋ siɑk ni mɑn, k ŋɑɑn k i fitɑ ii di,
42012036	kii tie nɑn niib nbɑ tuu guu b cɑnbɑɑ nbɑ tuu nyi puociɑnu k kpen k tɑn bɑɑl yiin ɑ bin luot gɑnn tul’ɔ, k bin luot gɑnn yiɑn ɑ nɑ.
42012037	Tuontunnɑ nbɑ k b cɑnbɑɑ kpen k lɑ’b k b guu u kpenu nɑ, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e. Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, b cɑnbɑɑ nɑ sɑɑ te k u dɑɑbɑ n kɑl k wun bɑɑl nɑn jiet k tul’b k bin di.
42012038	L i tie k b cɑnbɑɑ tɑn kpen tɑnsuuni ɑmi kojomuɑk, k lɑ k b guu’u, pɑlpienn sii tie tuontunnɑ mɑnŋ yɑl e.
42012039	«Nnɑlɑ, l i tie k ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ ponŋ mi yuo nbɑ k nɑn-yukɔ sɑɑ bɑɑl i e, u kɑn ŋɑɑn k wun bɑɑl kuɑ.
42012040	Yinm mun n tien siil kii guu, k mɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tɑn sɑɑ jen yuo nbɑ k i k duki ɑ u sɑɑ jen e.»
42012041	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl boi Yiesu ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ yiin tinm e bɑljouk nɑ ɑmi suɑ kul ee?»
42012042	K Yonmdɑɑnɔ jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Tuontunlɑnɔ e tie yɑndɑɑnɔ k tuun u cɑnbɑɑ nbɑ wɑnt’ɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ? Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ k u cɑnbɑɑ sɑɑ tien’ɔ tuontun-yudɑɑnɔ ɑ u goli tuontunnɑ kul nbɑ be u ŋɑɑk ni, kii tien’m mɑnn yuo kul nbɑ jɑnŋ.
42012043	L i tie k u cɑnbɑɑ tɑn kpen k lɑ k u tuun nnɑ, pɑlpienn sii tie tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ yɑl e.
42012044	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ sɑɑ jii u mɔktuk kul k tien tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ nuu ni ɑ wuu goli’l.
42012045	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ yet u mɔnŋ ɑ u cɑnbɑɑ kɑn jen yiɑn, k ji piin k buo u tuontunliɑ nɑ, jɑb, puob, k u buo’b, k biɑ di k nyu dɑɑn k tɑn yib,
42012046	u cɑnbɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ jen dɑɑl nbɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ k tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ k duki ɑ u sɑɑ jen, k tɑn sɑɑ dɑt u tubl bonbiil, k tien’ɔ nɑn wɑɑ tuu tien mɔyetdɑnm biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
42012047	«Tuontunnɔ i mi lin nbɑ k u cɑnbɑɑ luon wun tun, ŋɑɑn k tien u mɔnŋ siil, k biɑ k tun, b sɑɑ buo’u gbɑnn bonbiil.
42012048	Tuontunnɔ nbɑ k mi lin nbɑ k u cɑnbɑɑ luon wun tun, ŋɑɑn kpet tun bonkpetl nbɑ jɑnŋ nɑn buot, b sɑɑ buo’u wɑɑnm-nnɑ. «Wun nbɑ k b tul’ɔ sɑɑn, ŋuɑ e k b tɑn sɑɑ boi gɑɑl sɑɑn. Wun nbɑ k b kubn’ɔ sɑɑn ɑ, ŋuɑ e k b tɑn sɑɑ boi k gɑɑl bonciɑnn mun.»
42012049	«Min Yiesu, n bɑɑl mɑɑ n lu muu e tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn n sunmɑn k l ponŋ yinn ɑ mɑn.
42012050	Wulsɑu be k n sɑɑ wul, ŋɑɑn l muks n dudukt e mɔkmɔk nɑn lɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ gbenn.
42012051	I duki mi ɑ n bɑɑl nɑn mɑnu tingbounŋ nɑ ni ee? Aɑi. N yien’i e, n bɑɑl nɑn bɔktu e.
42012052	Lɑɑ jii dinnɑ k sɑɑ, niib bɑnŋmu tɑn sii be ŋɑɑk ni, k b tɑn sɑɑ bɔkt. Bɑntɑ sɑɑ kɔn nɑn bɑnle, k bɑnle mun sɑɑ kɔn nɑn bɑntɑ.
42012053	Bɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn u bijɑ, k bijɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn u bɑɑ. Nɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn u bipuo, k bipuo mun tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn u nɑɑ. Siponɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn u sipopuok, k sipopuok nɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn u siponɑɑ.»
42012054	L yuo mɑnŋ k Yiesu pɑk tul nibul nɑ k yet ɑ: «Yuo nbɑ k i tuu tɑn lɑ sɑnpɑgbɑnt k lin do yenbɑɑpo, k i tuu yet yiɑn ɑ, ɑ sɑɑk sɑɑ bɑɑ wɑɑ, k u set tɑn bɑɑ.
42012055	Yuo nbɑ k i lɑɑt k gɑnŋ po wounŋ dɑ, i tuu yɑɑ ɑ nɑɑɔk sii be, k l set tɑn ton.
42012056	Yinm kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nɑ, i fit gbɑt lin nbɑ tien tingbounŋ ni nɑn sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ pɑɑk ɑ, ŋɑɑn bee tien k i kɑn fit bɑnn mɔtɑɑnɑ yuo nɑ pɑɑk i?
42012057	«Bee tien k i kɑn fit dukn i mɔnŋ k senn lin nbɑ tuok i?
42012058	L i tie k fin nɑn suɑ mɔk mɑɑn k sɑɑ bɑlbuulɔ buol, yɑɑ dɑɑ be sɔnu pɑɑk k sɑɑ nɑ, l ŋɑn k ɑ kot ɑ mɔnŋ k ŋɑnm fin nɑn ŋuɑ sinsuuk ni. L i kii tie nnɑ i kɑɑ, u sɑɑ dɑt’ɑ bɑɑl nɑn’ɑ bɑlbuulɔ buol, k bɑlbuulɔ nɑ mun sɑɑ jii’ɑ k tien’ɑ dɑnsɑlguulɔ nuu ni, k dɑnsɑlguulɔ nɑ mun sɑɑ kuɑn’ɑ dɑnsɑlk.
42012059	N yien’ɑ e, b kɑn mi ŋɑɑ’ɑ ni, sie k ɑ tɑn pɑ likli kul nbɑ k b jiɑl’ɑ nɑ, k kuuk kɑn tenn.»
42013001	L yuo nɑ k nisiɑb din bɑɑl k yet Yiesu k jikt sɑɑ Gɑɑliile tieb nbɑ k Piilɑɑt din kpii’b yuo nbɑ k b din mɑnn mɑlunŋ k tien Yennu nɑ.
42013002	K Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «Bɑɑ din kpii Gɑɑliile tieb mɑnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, i duki ɑ b mɑntk din tie biitdɑnm k gɑl b lieb kul nɑ ee?
42013003	Aɑi, ŋɑɑn n yien’i e, l i tie k i k mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ i kɑɑ, i kul mun tɑn sɑɑ kpo nnɑ e.
42013004	Dɔnfuouk nbɑ din be Siiloe k tɑn bɑɑ k nyɑk niib piik nɑn bɑnniin k kpii’b nɑ, i duki ɑ niib mɑnŋ din jiɑ mɑntk tie biitdɑnm k gɑl lieb kul nbɑ be Selusɑɑlenm nuɑk ni ɑmi?
42013005	Aɑi, ŋɑɑn n yien’i e, l i tie k i k mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ i kɑɑ, b mun tɑn sɑɑ kpi’i nnɑ e.» Fiigie nɑ nbɑ k luon bɑljouk
42013006	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu din yin’m bɑljouk k yet ɑ: «Jɑsuɑ din wuu fiigie u kpɑɑb nbɑ k u wuu tilonti nbɑ k b yi fiinyɑ nɑ ni, k tɑn bɑɑl ɑ wun puɑl fiignbɑ, ŋɑɑn k k lɑ siɑl.
42013007	Ŋɑnn e k u yet u kpɑguulɔ nɑ ɑ: ‹Nnɑlɑ, binɑ ŋɑntɑ e nɑ k n tun bɑɑt fiigie nɑ buol mɑɑ n tuu puɑl fiignbɑ, ŋɑɑn k k lɑɑt siɑl. Cuɑn’mɔ lu. Bee k l sii sie biil tinŋ yɑnn i?›
42013008	K u kpɑguulɔ nɑ jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, dɑɑ nyikn binn nɑ dɑɑnn k n gbiil l nyɑkl ni k pii luln.
42013009	Pɑsiɑl binn nbɑ wɑɑ nɑ u sɑɑ lon luɑnɑ. L i tie k l k lon i e, fɑn ji tɑn ŋɑɑn k bin cuɑ’u.›»
42013010	Fuondɑsiɑl k Yiesu din tumi niib Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni,
42013011	k puosuɑ din be dieok mɑnŋ ni, k nɑlnbiiuk din be u ni k tien’ɔ wɑɑgolk binɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnniin, k u k fit nɑɑtl u mɔnŋ fɑb ɑ.
42013012	Yiesu nbɑ tɑn lɑ’u, k u yiin’ɔ ɑ wun bɑɑl, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «A yiɑlu mɑnŋ ŋɑɑ’ɑ wɑɑ,»
42013013	ŋɑɑn jii u nii k yii puo mɑnŋ pɑɑk, k l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u fiil set nɑɑt u mɔnŋ k ji piɑk Yennu.
42013014	Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok yudɑɑnɔ wutuol din duo, k mɑɑn Yiesu nbɑ te k puo nɑ pɑɑk Fuondɑɑl nɑ pɑɑk, k u yet niib nɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑ ŋɑnluob k t sii tuun tuonn. I tuu bɑɑl l dɑɑ ni kii lɑɑt pɑɑku, ŋɑɑn i dɑɑ bɑɑt Fuondɑɑl ɑ wun te k i pɑɑk.»
42013015	K Yonmdɑɑnɔ jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yinm kpinkpɑnni dɑnm, i kul nɑ tuu k luotl i nei nɑn i boni bonkobloi ni k dɑɑl sɑɑ nɑn’m k sɑɑ nyunt’b Fuondɑɑl ii?
42013016	K puo nɑ nbɑ tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonn nɑ, ŋuɑ e k Sɑɑtɑn din tien’ɔ yonmk binɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnniin, l bo k jɑnŋ nɑn k n nyinn’ɔ yomsn nɑ ni Fuondɑɑl ii?»
42013017	Yiesu nbɑ din pɑk lin nbɑ mɑnŋ, k mɔnɔnoilɑ nɑ kul ɑ ji din dii fei, ŋɑɑn nibul nɑ kul ji din mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn wɑɑ tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ kul mɑnŋ.
42013018	L puolpo k Yiesu boi niib mɑnŋ ɑ: «N sɑɑ bikn Yennu nɑɑn nɑn lɑnn po e? N sɑɑ nɑn’l nɑn biɑ?
42013019	L nɑɑn nɑn kpint tiik nbɑ k b yi’l muutɑɑld nɑ binn nbɑ k nilɔ jii k bul u gungounŋ ni, k l kpɑɑt k tien tiik, k nuɑni bɑɑt k tiɑ tiɑt l yiini pɑɑk nɑ e.»
42013020	K Yiesu biɑ ŋɑnm boi’b ɑ: «N sɑɑ bikn Yennu nɑɑn nɑn lɑnn po e?
42013021	Yennu nɑɑn tie nɑn dɑtinŋ nbɑ k puo jii k ŋmɑt nɑn pɑɑnu yon nbɑ yɑb, k lin tɑn miik mɔkmɔk nɑn lɑɑ tuu tɑn pukl nɑ e.»
42013022	Yuo nbɑ k Yiesu din be sɔnu pɑɑk k sɑɑ Selusɑɑlenm nɑ, u din gɑl digbɑngbenŋɑ nɑn digbɑnbis ni, k tumi niib,
42013023	k suɑ tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, niib nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ fielu nɑ, b tɑn sii tie wɑɑnm-nnɑ ɑmi ii?» K u yet’b ɑ
42013024	«Sie k i muks i mɔnŋ k yebn k kuɑ tɑnmɔyebk nɑ ni. K mɑɑn n yien’i e, niib bonciɑnn tɑn sii luon bin kuɑ lenŋ, ŋɑɑn tɑn gbɑl l kuɑnu.
42013025	Ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ i tɑnŋ i fiil k luon tɑnmɔb nɑ, i sɑɑ biɑl sie nɑn-yel po, k kpɑɑn tɑnmɔb k yi k yɑɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, luotl tul’t,› ŋɑɑn l yuo, u tɑn sɑɑ jiin yet’i ɑ: ‹N k mi yɑɑ nyii siɑn nbɑ.›
42013026	K i tɑn sɑɑ jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹T din tuu di k nyu nɑn’ɑ, k ɑ tuu tumi’t t doi ni.›
42013027	K u biɑ tɑn sɑɑ jiin k yet’i ɑ: ‹N k mi yɑɑ nyii siɑn. Yinm biitdɑnm kul nɑ, sietl n buol ni nɑ mɑn.›
42013028	Lenŋ e k i tɑn sii fɑbn mɔ k nyiitl nyɑnɑ yuo nbɑ k i sɑɑ lɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑn Isɑɑk nɑn Sɑɑkɔb nɑn sɔkniinbɑ kul ɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni, ŋɑɑn b tɑn sɑɑ jii’i k lu’i nɑn-yel.
42013029	K niib tɑn sɑɑ nyi yendopo nɑn yenbɑɑpo nɑn diitu po nɑn gɑnŋ po k tɑn kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni k kɑl k di jiet.
42013030	L yuo nɑ, nisiɑb nbɑ juont tɑn sɑɑ dɔnŋ sɑɑn liik, k siɑb nbɑ mun dɔnŋ sɑɑn liik tɑn sɑɑ juont.»
42013031	L yuo nɑ k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb din bɑɑl Yiesu buol k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Sie k ɑ nyii nnɑ k sɑɑn siɑl po, k mɑɑn Heluod luon k wun kpi’ɑ.»
42013032	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Ŋuɑ wonŋ nɑɑnɑɑt nɑ, ii sɑɑ mɑn, k sɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Gotl, dinnɑ nɑn wonn e k n sii biel nɑlnbiit niib ni ŋɑɑn biɑ kii te k bii pɑɑkt, k dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k n sɑɑ gbenn n tuonn.›
42013033	Lɑɑ jii dinnɑ nɑn wonn nɑn dɑɑlpo, sie k n lek fɑbl sonm n sonm ɑ, k mɑɑn l k ŋɑn k bin kpi Yennu sɔkni siɑl po l i kii tie Selusɑɑlenm i kɑɑ.
42013034	«Selusɑɑlenm tieb, nbɑɑyuoo! Yinm nbɑ kpi Yennu sɔkniinbɑ, k biɑ jɑɑt u tuomiinbɑ nbɑ k u tun’m i buol ni nɑ tɑnɑ, biknu biknu tɑɑl munŋɑ e k n gbɑɑ mɑɑ n lɑkn’i yonm nɑn kolk nbɑ tuu lɑkn u kobis u kpinkpɑnt ni nɑ, k i k sɑk.
42013035	Gotl mɑn, i ŋɑɑk sɑɑ duɑl yɑnn e. N yien’i e nɑ, lɑɑ nyii dinnɑ k jii sɑɑ, i ji kɑn mi k lɑ’n k sɑɑ tuu dɑɑl nbɑ k i tɑn sɑɑ yet ɑ: ‹Yennu yetŋɑnm ii be wun nbɑ bɑɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn ni nɑ pɑɑk.› »
42014001	Tɔn, fuondɑsiɑl k Yiesu din tɑn kuɑ Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ yudɑɑnsuɑ ŋɑɑk ni ɑ wun di jiet, k bin nbɑ be ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni din diisl’ɔ.
42014002	L yuo nɑ k bɑɑtsuɑ bɑɑl u tuɑnn, wun nbɑ k bonwuunkɑl wuun’ɔ.
42014003	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu boi senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «T senni sɑk ɑ nilɔ n te k bɑɑtɔ n pɑɑk Fuondɑɑl ii?»
42014004	Ŋɑɑn k b ŋmin ɑ. K Yiesu gɑɑl bɑɑtɔ mɑnŋ k te k u pɑɑk. L puolpo k u cɑb’ɔ ɑ wuu sɑɑ.
42014005	Ŋɑnn e k u yet’b ɑ: «I yenɔ i mɔk bijɑ ɑmi nɑɑb k u tɑn bɑɑ bunbunn ni Fuondɑɑl, u kɑn donn’ɔ Fuondɑɑl mɑnŋ i?»
42014006	Ŋɑɑn k b k fit jiin’ɔ siɑl.
42014007	L yuo nɑ k Yiesu lɑ k bin nbɑ k b yiin’m nɑ luon bin gɑnn yudɑnm kɑɑni buol k kɑl. L pɑɑk, k u yin’m bɑljouk ɑ
42014008	«B i yiin’ɑ puociɑnu k ɑ bɑɑl, fɑɑ dɑɑ kɑɑl yudɑɑnɔ kɑɑnu buol, k mɑɑn pɑsiɑl b ponŋ bo yiin suɑ e wɑɑ, wun nbɑ cie’ɑ,
42014009	k yiintuɑ mɑnŋ sɑɑ bɑɑl ɑ buol ni k tɑn yet’ɑ ɑ: ‹Fiit ŋɑɑn tul’ɔ u kɑɑnu.› L yuo nɑ, k fɑn ji di fei k ji fiil k sɑɑn kɑl kpinŋ.
42014010	Tɔn, b i yiin’ɑ puociɑnu k ɑ bɑɑl, fɑn kɑl kpinŋ, k yiintuɑ n tɑn fit k bɑɑl k yiin’ɑ: ‹N yuɑk, bɑɑt nɑ k tɑn kɑl yudɑnm kɑɑni buol.› L yuo nɑ k ɑ sɑɑ lɑ nibɑɑkl ɑ lieb mɑnŋ buol ni.
42014011	K mɑɑn wun nbɑ kul dont u mɔnŋ, b tɑn sɑɑ sikn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ siknt u mɔnŋ, b tɑn sɑɑ donn’ɔ.»
42014012	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu biɑ yet wun nbɑ yiin’ɔ nɑ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ yiin jɑɑnm, fɑɑ dɑɑ yi ɑ yuɑsnbɑ ɑmi ɑ yuɑlb ɑmi ɑ ninjɑnm ɑmi ɑ mɔktlieb, k mɑɑn ŋɑnm mɑnŋ tɑn sɑɑ jiin’ɑ b jiinu wɑɑ, k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl lin nbɑ k ɑ dɑɑn tien nɑ pɑnn.
42014013	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k ɑ yiin jɑɑnm u e, fɑn yiin tɑlɑs-dɑnm nɑn wɔbi nɑn diɑni nɑn juɑni,
42014014	k ɑ sii mɔk pɑlpienn. B i kii fit jiin’ɑ ŋɑɑn ɑ sɑɑ gɑɑl ɑ jiinu Yennu buol ni, dɑɑl nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ fiin bin nbɑ tie niŋɑnm u buol ni kuun ni.»
42014015	Bin nbɑ k b din yiin’m k b din di nɑn Yiesu nɑ yenɔ nbɑ gbɑt lin nbɑ k Yiesu pɑk nɑ k u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wun nbɑ sɑɑ di jiet Yennu nɑɑn ni, pɑlpienn sii tie u yɑl e.»
42014016	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Jɑsuɑ din be k tɑn yɑɑ wun di u jɑɑngbenŋl, k poi niib bonciɑnn.
42014017	Jɑɑnm nɑ yuo nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl k u tun u tuontunnɔ ɑ wun sɑɑn yiin niib nbɑ k u dɑɑn yiin’m nɑ, ɑ bin bɑɑl nɑ, ɑ k jiet nɑ kul tien siil ɑ.
42014018	K b kul tɑɑn dukn dudukyent, k mei’ɔ ɑ wun cɑb’b k b dɑɑ bɑɑt, k sinsinn yuɑ nɑ yet tuontunnɔ nɑ ɑ: ‹N dɑɑ kpɑpɑɑnŋ. L pɑɑk, cɑb min k n sɑɑn sɑɑ got,›
42014019	k luɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N dɑɑ nɑɑkuoki piik. L pɑɑk, cɑb min k n sɑɑn bikn’m,›
42014020	k luɑ mun biɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N dɑɑ yonn n puopɑɑnŋ e, k l pɑɑk e te k n kɑn fit bɑɑl.›
42014021	«Ŋɑnn e k tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ ŋmɑt k sɑɑ yet u cɑnbɑɑ lin nbɑ nɑ kul. K u cɑnbɑɑ mɑnŋ wutuol duo bonciɑnn, k u yet u tuontunnɔ nɑ ɑ: ‹Nyimin k sɑɑn duo ni yiɑn yiɑn, k sɑɑ got sɔni ni, k yiin tɑlɑs-dɑnm nɑn wɔbi nɑn diɑni nɑn juɑni k jen nɑn’m nɑ.›
42014022	L puolpo e k u tuontunnɔ nɑ yet ɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, n tien fɑɑ yet lin nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k yiɑl dɑɑ be.›
42014023	Ŋɑnn e biɑk k u cɑnbɑɑ nɑ yet u tuontunnɔ nɑ ɑ: ‹Nyimin biɑk k sɑɑ got pɑnɑ pɑɑk nɑn sɑnjobis ni nɑn kpɑɑnt ni, k mɑbn niib k bin bɑɑl, k n ŋɑɑk n gbie.
42014024	N yien’ɑ e, bin nbɑ k n dɑɑn yiin’m nɑ, b suɑ ponŋ tɑn kɑn lenm n jɑɑnm nɑ jiet nɑ kɑɑ wɑɑ.› »
42014025	Nibulciɑɔnŋ din wɑɑ Yiesu, k u tɑn jiɑnt k yet’b ɑ
42014026	«Wun nbɑ luon k wuu be nɑn’n, sie k u luon’n bonciɑnn k gɑl wɑɑ luon u cɑnbɑɑ, nɑn u nɑɑ, nɑn u puo, nɑn u wɑɑs, nɑn u yuɑlb, nɑn u wɑɑli, nɑn u mɔnŋ mɑnfuol biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. L i kii tie nnɑ i kɑɑ, u kɑn fit k tien n puolpoweituɑ.
42014027	Wun nbɑ k jii u kuun dɑpunpunn k buk k wɑɑ’n, u kɑn fit k tien n puolpoweituɑ.
42014028	«Wun nbɑ luon k wun mɑɑ detuɑtuk, sie k wun kɑl sinsinn, k dukn wɑɑ sɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ k suol l mɔb, k lɑɑn u likli sɑɑ jɑnŋ ɑmi l kɑn jɑnŋ,
42014029	k mɑɑn l i tie k u fɔkn fiɑkl nɑ ŋɑɑn tɑn k fit kɑɑl mɑɑlu mɑnŋ, niib ji sii lɑɑ’u e k sɑlkt’ɔ.
42014030	B ji sii yien ɑ: ‹Juɑ nɑ dɑɑn fɔkn u dɔunŋ ŋɑɑn tɑn gbɑl kɑɑlu.›
42014031	«Kpɑnbɑl i mɔk niib tusɑ piik (10.000) k sɑɑn nɑn’m ɑ wun tuok u kpɑnbɑl luɑ nɑn u niib tusɑ piinle (20.000) mun, nlee k kpɑnbɑl nbɑ mɔk niib tusɑ piik (10.000) nɑ sɑɑ tien i? Sie k u kɑl sinsinn k dukn k bɑnn bɑɑ sɑɑ jɑnŋ nɑn bɑɑ kɑn jɑnŋ nɑn u tuoku.
42014032	B i kii jɑnŋ i e, sie k wun tun tuomi k bin ŋɑk fɑɑɔk, wɑɑ dɑɑ be bɑnfɔkl nɑ.
42014033	«Tɔn, nilɔ i kii nyik u mɔktuk kul, u kɑn fit tien n puolpoweituɑ.
42014034	«Yɑɑln mɑn, ŋɑɑn l mɑnu i tɑnŋ i biil, nlee k l ji sii mɑn i?
42014035	L lek k ŋɑn k ɑ jii’l k pɑk kpɑɑb ni, k biɑ k ŋɑn k ɑ pukn luln po. Sie k ɑ lu. Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint.»
42015001	Siɑn yuo k lɑnpogɑɑltieb nɑn biitdɑnm bonciɑnn din bɑɑt Yiesu buol ni k gbiintl u mɑɑn.
42015002	K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn senniwɑntieb din buln k yien ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ gɑɑl biitdɑnm k biɑ di nɑn’m.»
42015003	L pɑɑk, k Yiesu yin’m bɑljouk nɑ ɑ
42015004	«I yenɔ i mɔk pei kobk, k yenɔ n tɑn bot, u sɑɑ tien nlee? Sie k u nyik pei piin-yiɑ nɑn bɑn-yiɑ nɑ muuk ni, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn lon peyeunŋ mɑnŋ nbɑ bot nɑ nɑn wɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ’u.
