42015005	Wɑɑ ji tɑn lɑ’u yuo nbɑ k u ji mɔk pɑlpienn. L yuo k u jii’u k buk’ɔ u bɔpiɑt pɑɑk
42015006	k kun ŋɑɑk ni. L yuo nɑ k u yiin u yuɑsnbɑ nɑn u ŋɑkpiɑsnbɑ k lɑkn’m k yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Ii mɔk pɑlpienn mɑn, k mɑɑn n lɑ n pebotkɑɔk mɑnŋ ɑ.›
42015007	«Ŋɑnn e mun, k n yien’i biɑk, biit dɑɑn-yenɔ i mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, pɑlpienn sii be Yendɔunŋ ni l dɑɑnɔ pɑɑk, k gɑl lɑɑ sii be biɑnŋ nbɑ bin nbɑ tie niŋɑnm Yennu buol ni piin-yiɑ nɑn bɑn-yiɑ nbɑ k l k siɑn nɑn b sii mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ nɑ pɑɑk.
42015008	«K puo mun ii mɔk likbinɑ piik, k yenn tɑn bot, u sɑɑ tien nlee? Sie k u juo fitl k piɑl u dieok k lon fɑnu nɑn wɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ’l.
42015009	Wɑɑ ji tɑn lɑ’l yuo nbɑ, k u ji yiin u yuɑsnbɑ nɑn u ŋɑkpiɑsnbɑ k lɑkn’m k yet’b ɑ: ‹Ii mɔk pɑlpienn mɑn, k mɑɑn n lɑ n likbin nɑ wɑɑ.›
42015010	«Nnɑ e mun k n yien’i biɑk, l i tie k biitdɑɑn-yenɔ mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, Yennu mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ sii mɔk pɑlpienn u pɑɑk e.»
42015011	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu ŋɑnm yet ɑ: «Jɑsuɑ din mɔk bonjɑi bɑnle,
42015012	k wɑɑlɔ po tɑn yet u bɑɑ ɑ: ‹N bɑɑ, n luon k ɑ jii fɑɑl nbɑ k n bo tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl ɑ kuun puolpo nɑ e k tul’n.› L yuo mɑnŋ k u bɑɑ bɔkt b fɑɑl mɑnŋ k tul’b.
42015013	Ŋɑnn e l k wei k wɑɑlɔ po nɑ jii u mɔktuk kul k yɑɑt sɑɑn digbɑnn bɑnfɔkl ɑ. Lenŋ e k u binbenŋ din k ŋɑn, k u biil u likli yiɑn yiɑn ɑ.
42015014	Wɑɑ gbenn u likli yuo nbɑ nɑ, k kon bɑɑ tinŋ mɑnŋ ni bonciɑnn, k suol’ɔ hei.
42015015	Ŋɑnn e k u ji sɑɑn be jɑsuɑ ŋɑɑk duo mɑnŋ ni, k u tuun’ɔ u kpɑɑb ni ɑ wuu dint u duoli.
42015016	K u tuu luon wun di duoli dɑbint nɑ k gbuo, ŋɑɑn suɑ din k tien’ɔ siɑl.
42015017	L puolpo k u yɑn jen, k u yet u mɔnŋ ɑ: ‹N bɑɑ tuontunnɑ kul ɑ lɑɑt jiet di k l jɑnŋt’b, k biɑ tent, ŋɑɑn k n tɑn kpenn kon nnɑ nɑ.›
42015018	Lɑɑ ji be nɑ, n sɑɑ kun n bɑɑ buol e k sɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «N cɑnbɑɑ, n tun bonbiil k biil Yennu nɑn’ɑ wɑɑ.
42015019	N ji k ŋɑn nɑn k ɑ yiin’n ɑ bijɑ. Tient’n ɑ tuontun-yenɔ.»
42015020	Ŋɑnn e k u ji fiil k ŋmɑt k kun u bɑɑ buol. «Yuo nbɑ k u dɑɑ din be bɑnfɔkl k kun nɑ, k u cɑnbɑɑ lɑ’u, k ninbɑɑɔk suol’ɔ bonciɑnn, k u ciɑl k bɑɑl suol u bik nɑ bɔpiɑt k puul wɔb’ɔ.
42015021	Ŋɑnn e k bik nɑ yɑɑ ɑ: ‹N cɑnbɑɑ, n tun bonbiil k biil Yennu nɑn’ɑ wɑɑ. N ji k ŋɑn nɑn k ɑ yiin’n ɑ bijɑ.›
42015022	Ŋɑɑn k u bɑɑ yiin u tuontunnɑ, ‹Tient yiɑn ɑ k jii cincenŋɑnn, nɑn bɑnŋ, nɑn tɑɑsɑɑt nɑ, k tɑn gbɑbn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn piln’mɔ bɑnŋ nɑn tɑɑsɑɑt nɑ,
42015023	ŋɑɑn kii sɑɑ mɑn k sɑɑ suol nɑɑjɑkpɑnml nɑ nɑ k tɑn kpi’u k tin tien jɑɑnm.
42015024	N tuu miɑ n bijɑ nɑ kpo e, ŋɑɑn k u be, k biɑ miɑ u bot e, ŋɑɑn k u tɑn jen ɑ.› Ŋɑnn e k b ji piin b jɑɑnm dinu nɑn pɑlpienn.
42015025	«L yuo nɑ k u bijɑkpel nɑ dɑɑ din be kpɑɑb ni e, k ji din tɑn kpent k pel ŋɑɑk k gbɑt fuut, k siɑk wɑɑ k jinjeluk jeln.
42015026	K u yiin u bɑɑ tuontun-yenɔ k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: ‹Bee fuut e fu ŋɑɑk nnɑ?›
42015027	K tuontunnɔ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹A wɑɑlɔ nɑ e kpen, k ɑ bɑɑ te k b kpii nɑɑjɑkpɑnml, k mɑɑn u jen nɑn lɑɑfiɑ e.›
42015028	Ŋɑnn e k u yuɑlɔ mɑnŋ wutuol ji duo hei, k u yet ŋɑɑk ni kuɑnu. K u cɑnbɑɑ nyii k bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun bɑɑl kuɑ.
42015029	Ŋɑɑn k u jiin u cɑnbɑɑ ɑ: ‹Nnɑlɑ, min e tuun’ɑ hei binɑ bonciɑnn. N biɑ k mi yet ɑ mɔb u, ŋɑɑn ɑ ponŋ tɑn k mi tul’n bubik k n kpii k yiin n nɑɑsin-yuɑsnbɑ k t tɑn dii k mɔk pɑlpienn.
42015030	Ŋɑɑn ɑ bijɑ nɑ e mɑntk biil ɑ fɑɑl kul k wei jɑntonɑ, k wɑɑ tɑn jen yuo nbɑ, k ɑ biɑ kpii nɑɑjɑkpɑnml k tul’ɔ.›
42015031	K u bɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N bik, fin ŋɑnin ponŋ tuu be nɑn’n yuo kul ɑ, k lin nbɑ kul k n tuu mɔk, l tuu tie ɑ yɑl e.
42015032	L ponŋ ŋɑn nɑn tin tien jɑɑnm kii mɔk pɑlpienn, k mɑɑn, ɑ wɑɑlɔ dɑɑn kpo wɑɑ ŋɑɑn jen u mɑnfuol ni; u biɑ dɑɑn bot ɑ ŋɑɑn k n tɑn lɑ’u.› »
42016001	K Yiesu din yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Mɔktsuɑ din be k mɔk u kɑlɑci, k b din tɑn kumi mɔktɔ nɑ ɑ u kɑlɑci nɑ biil u likli nɑn u bonɑ.
42016002	Ŋɑnn e k mɔktɔ nɑ din yiin’ɔ k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: ‹Bee tien k n gbiɑ ɑ po nnɑ? I sɑɑ k sɑɑ diɑn fɑɑ tuu tuun nɑn n mɔktuk biɑnŋ nbɑ, k mɑɑn ɑ ji kɑn mi k tien n kɑlɑci.›
42016003	K kɑlɑci mɑnŋ tɑn dukn dudukt ɑ: ‹N cɑnbɑɑ yɑɑ wun bel’n u tuonn ni e. N sɑɑ tien nlee? N k mɔk pɑnŋ nbɑ k n sɑɑ ko, k n biɑ tiin fei nɑn mii mei.
42016004	N mi mɑɑ sɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ k niib n gɑɑl’n b ŋei ni yuo nbɑ k n cɑnbɑɑ nyik’n gbenn.›
42016005	Ŋɑnn e k u yiin u cɑnbɑɑ pɑndɑnm kul yenɔ yenɔ, k tɑn boi sinsinn yuɑ ɑ: ‹A mɔk n cɑnbɑɑ pɑnn yinŋɑ e?›
42016006	K u jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Kpɑn ɑnkɔlɑ kobk (100).› K u yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Jiin ɑ kɑdɑɑɔk k sɑɑn kɑl yiɑn yiɑn k diɑn ɑnkɔlɑ piinŋmu (50).›
42016007	K u biɑ yiin luɑ k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: ‹Fin, yinŋɑ e k ɑ mɔk n cɑnbɑɑ pɑnn i?› K u jiin’ɔ ɑ: ‹Dii bɔtuot kobk (100).› K u yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Jiin ɑ kɑdɑɑɔk k diɑn dii bɔtuot piiniin (80).›
42016008	Tɔn, yuo nbɑ k cɑnbɑɑ nɑ gbɑt u kɑlɑci fobdiilɔ nɑ nbɑ tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k u pɑk’ɔ, ɑ u tun nɑn yɑn e. Bin nbɑ wɑɑ tingbounŋ nɑ sɔnu e mɔk yɑn b mɔnŋ niib sinsuuk ni k gɑl bin nbɑ wɑɑ yentu sɔnu nbɑ mɔk biɑnŋ nbɑ.
42016009	Min e yien’i nɑ, i jii tingbounŋ nɑ mɔktuk kii tuun nɑn’n kii so niib yuɑs, k mɔktuk mɑnŋ i tɑnŋ i gbenn yuo nbɑ, Yennu sɑɑ gɑɑl’i ŋei nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ ni.
42016010	«Wun nbɑ tuun fɑnu bonbis ni, u biɑ sii tuun fɑnu e bonsɑɑkɑ ni, k wun nbɑ mun k tuun fɑnu bonbis ni, u mun biɑ kɑn tun fɑnu bonsɑɑkɑ ni.
42016011	L i tie k ɑ tuun nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ mɔktuk k biil, ŋmee sɑɑ jii mɔmɔnm mɔktuk k tien ɑ nuu ni.
42016012	L i tie k ɑ di fobt nɑn lieb yɑl, ŋmee sɑɑ tul’ɑ ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ yɑl i?
42016013	«Tɔn, tuontunnɔ kɑn fit tun k tul cɑnbɑɑnbɑ bɑnle. U sii luon yenɔ k gɑl luɑ, ɑmi u sii sɑɑk yenɔ mɔb ŋɑɑn kii sɑlkt luɑ nɑ. A kɑn fit wɑɑ Yennu nɑn likli biɑk.»
42016014	Yuo nbɑ k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ din gbɑt lin nbɑ nɑ, k b ji din dɑɑn Yiesu nyɑtuk, k mɑɑn b din tie liklonnɑ e.
42016015	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Yinm, i wɑnt i mɔnŋ niib ni nɑn i tie niŋɑnm e Yennu buol ni, ŋɑɑn Yennu mi i pɑlɑ ni. Lin nbɑ k nilɔ duki nɑn l tie bonjɑɑnn e, ŋɑɑn l nubl e Yennu buol.
42016016	«Yennu senni nɑn u sɔkniinbɑ diɑni din mɔk yiikuo mɔkmɔk nɑn Sɑn nbɑ din tɑn bɑɑl. Lɑɑ nyii Sɑn bɑɑlu yuo ni e wɑɑ, k b muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn k jikt sɑɑ Yennu nɑɑn po, k suɑ kul muksl u mɔnŋ ɑ wun kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn mɑnŋ ni.
42016017	Sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ tɑn sɑɑ fit bot k l k pɑɑl, ŋɑɑn Yennu senni bonmintk nnɑ kɑn mi k bot fɑb ɑ.
42016018	«Wun nbɑ yet u ŋɑɑpuo ŋɑɑn kuɑn puogɑnɔ, tun boncuncontuonn nɑ, k wun nbɑ mun kuɑn puo nbɑ k u sɔlɔ yet’ɔ nɑ, mun biɑ tun boncuncontuonn nɑ.»
42016019	K Yiesu biɑ yet’b ɑ: «Mɔktsuɑ din be, k dɑɑl-yejɑŋɑɑk kul k u liɑ tɑŋɑnt, k be u yɑmɑ ni nɑn pɑlpienn.
42016020	K tɑlɑs-dɑɑnsuɑ mun din be, k u sɑnn yi Lɑɑsɑɑl, k u din mɔk fiɑt hei. K b din tuu bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ k wun kɑl mɔktɔ nɑ ŋɑɑtɑmɔyɑnŋl ni,
42016021	k tuu luon wun di mɔktɔ nɑ jebulɑbulɑ nbɑ tuu bɑɑ nɑ, k bɔi tuu bɑɑl k leni u fiɑt nɑ.
42016022	«L puolpo e k tɑlɑs-dɑɑnɔ nɑ tɑn kpo, k Yennu mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ jii’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm buol Yendɔunŋ ni. K mɔktɔ nɑ mun tɑn kpo, k b pii’u,
42016023	k u din sɑɑn fɑlɑ buol muu ni, k din di fɑlɑ bonciɑnn. K u tɑn yɑɑt got k lɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm bɑnfɔkl ɑ, nɑn Lɑɑsɑɑl k u be Ablɑɑhɑɑnm buol ni.
42016024	Ŋɑnn e k mɔktɔ nɑ yikn yet ɑ: ‹N yejɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm, tin’n ninbɑɑɔk, k tun Lɑɑsɑɑl k wun pɑk u niibl nyun ni, k tɑn tien n jeln pɑɑk k lin mɑɑk, k mɑɑn n di fɑlciɑɔnŋ o muu ni nnɑ.›
42016025	Ŋɑɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N bik, tiɑt fɑɑ din tuu be ɑ mɑnfuol ni nɑ, ɑ din tuu mɔk ɑ bonŋɑnɑ e, ŋɑɑn Lɑɑsɑɑl mun din tuu tie fɑlɑ e. Mɔtɑɑnɑ u be u yɑmɑ ni e nnɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn fin e tɑn be fɑlciɑɔnŋ ni nɑ.
42016026	K lin nbɑ pukn, buotsunsunŋ be tinm nɑn fin sinsuuk ni, k suɑ kɑn fit nyi k luɑl sɑɑn ɑ buol ni, k suɑ mun kɑn fit nyi ɑ buol ni k luɑl t buol ni nnɑ nɑ.›
42016027	Ŋɑnn e k mɔktɔ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N yejɑ, l i tie nnɑ e i e, n bɑln’mɑ e, tumin Lɑɑsɑɑl n cɑnbɑɑ ŋɑɑk ni,
42016028	k mɑɑn n ninjɑnm bɑnŋmu be. Ŋɑɑnt wun sɑɑn kpɑɑn’m, k b ji tɑn dɑɑ bɑɑt fɑlɑ buol nɑ ni jik.›
42016029	K Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹A ninjɑnm mɔk Muois nɑn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn. Bin gbiint mɑɑn mɑnŋ.›
42016030	K mɔktɔ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N yejɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm, ɑɑi, ŋɑɑn suɑ i fiil kuun ni k sɑɑn b buol ni, ŋɑnn b sɑɑ mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ ɑ.›
42016031	K Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹B i kii gbiint mɑɑn nbɑ diɑn Muois kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ kɑdɑɑt ni, nilɔ i lek i fiil kuun ni, ŋɑɑn b kɑn sɑk u mɔb.› »
42017001	Yiesu yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Jinjɑnmi nbɑ te k niib tuun biit nɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl, ŋɑɑn l sii bi k tien wun nbɑ te k jinjɑnmi bɑɑt niib pɑɑk.
42017002	B i bo i jii nɑɑl k lɑnn u tulu ni k lu’u mɔkl ni, l bo sii sɔ nɑn wɑɑ bo sɑɑ te k wɑɑs nɑ yenɔ kuɑ n tun biit.
42017003	Suot i mɔnŋ. «A nɑɑ bik i tun bonbiil, fɑn kpɑɑn’ɔ nɑn ninmɔnn, k l i tie k u yɑɑ ɑ u biil’ɑ, fɑn nyik u biit k cɑb’ɔ.
42017004	L i tie k u tun k biil’ɑ tɑɑl munlole dɑɑl nuɑk ni, ŋɑɑn tuu bɑɑl ɑ buol ni tɑɑl munlole k yɑɑ ɑ u biil’ɑ k mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn, fɑn nyik cɑb’ɔ.»
42017005	L yuo mɑnŋ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuomiinbɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Puknt’t yɑdɑ.»
42017006	K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «L i tie k i bo mɔk yɑdɑ k l yɑb k bɑɑl nɑn jinjuklu binn nɑ, i bo sɑɑ fit k yet tiik nbɑ k b yi siikomɔl nɑ ɑ: ‹Ŋɑbt ɑ mɔnŋ k sɑɑn wuu mɔkgbenŋl ni,› k siikomɔl mɑnŋ sɑɑ sɑk i mɔb.
42017007	«Tɔn, i yenɔ i mɔk tuontunnɔ k u ko tɑnmɔnn ɑmi k kpɑɑl pei, k tuontunnɔ nɑ nyii kpɑɑb ni k kpen ŋɑɑk ni, u sɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ bɑɑt yiɑn k tɑn kɑl k di jiet ii?
42017008	U sɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Liɑtl ɑ kpɑkotiɑt k bil, ŋɑɑn liɑ tɑyieni, k tien n jiet k senn’n k n bɑɑl nɑ k tɑn di k nyu. L puolpo k ɑ mun sɑɑ di k nyu.›
42017009	A duki nɑn cɑnbɑɑ mɑnŋ sɑɑ tul u tuontunnɔ nɑ niipuouk k mɑɑn wɑɑ sɑk u mɔb nɑ pɑɑk ii?
42017010	L mun biɑ tie nnɑ e i buol ni. Yuo nbɑ k i tun tuonn nbɑ k b tul’i nɑ k gbenn, yin yet ɑ: ‹T tie dɑɑbɑ e. T kpɑn tuu tun lin nbɑ k t bo sɑɑ tun nɑ kuukuɑ e.› »
42017011	Yiesu nbɑ din sɑɑ Selusɑɑlenm yuo nbɑ nɑ, k u din gɑl Sɑɑmɑɑli nɑn Gɑɑliile sinsuuk ni,
42017012	k din tɑn bɑɑl digbɑnsiɑl, k gbɑɑtɑ piik din cet’ɔ lenŋ, k din set bɑnfɔkl ɑ,
42017013	ŋɑɑn yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ, k yien ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ Yiesu, tin’t ninbɑɑɔk.»
42017014	K Yiesu nbɑ lɑ’b yuo nbɑ k u yet’b ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ mɑn Yennu mɑnntieb buol ni k bin bikn’i got.» L yuo mɑnŋ k b ŋmɑt sɑɑ, k b ŋɑɑt mɑnŋ ji sɑɑ gbenn sɔnu ni.
42017015	K b yenɔ nbɑ bɑnn nɑn u ŋɑɑɔk gbenn nɑ, k u ŋmɑt Yiesu penŋ k sɑɑ pɑk Yennu nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl,
42017016	ŋɑɑn bɑɑl gbɑɑn finfɑbl Yiesu tuɑnn k tul’ɔ niipuouk. Juɑ mɑnŋ din tie Sɑɑmɑɑli nilɔ e.
42017017	K Yiesu din boi ɑ: «Niib piik kɑɑ bo lɑ pɑɑku uu? Ŋɑɑn k niib bɑn-yiɑ nbɑ tenn nɑ be liɑ?
42017018	B suɑ k jen ɑ bin tɑn tul Yennu niipuouk sie Sɑɑmɑɑli juɑ nɑ kuukuɑ ee?»
42017019	Ŋɑnn e k u yet juɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «Fiit kii sɑɑ. A yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e k ɑ lɑ pɑɑku.»
42017020	Tɔn, k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ din boi Yiesu ɑ: «Yennu nɑɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nlee yuo e?» Ŋɑnn e k u din jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Yennu nɑɑn kɑn bɑɑl bɑnnu nbɑ k i sɑɑ fit lɑ’l kɑɑ.
42017021	Suɑ kɑn yet ɑ: ‹Gotl, ŋɑnn i nɑ,› ɑmi: ‹L be nɑ wɑɑ,› k mɑɑn Yennu nɑɑn be i ni.»
42017022	Ŋɑnn e k u yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Yuo bɑɑt k i tɑn sii sunmɑn k i lɑ Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ, ŋɑɑn kɑn lɑ.
42017023	B tɑn sɑɑ yet’i: ‹Gotl, u be lenŋ,› ɑmi: ‹Gotl, u be nnɑ nɑ.› I dɑɑ sɑɑ goli, k biɑ dɑɑ wɑɑ’b,
42017024	k mɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ bɑɑlu tɑn sii tie nɑn sɑnyiknti nbɑ tuu nyiknt k yent sɑnpɑɑpo kul nɑ e.
42017025	Ŋɑɑn sinsinn, u tɑn sɑɑ di fɑlɑ bonciɑnn, k mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ biɑ tɑn sɑɑ yet’ɔ.
42017026	Noe yuo nbɑ din tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l mun biɑ tɑn sii tie nnɑ e Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ bɑɑlu yuo.
42017027	Noe yuo e k b din di jiet k nyu, k kuɑnt puob, k jikt b wɑɑs k tien’m jɑb, k tɑn tuu dɑɑl nbɑ k Noe din kuɑ ŋɑlngbenŋl ni ŋɑɑn nyik’b, k nyunciɑɔnŋ bɑɑl k dii b kul ɑ.
42017028	Lɔt yuo nɑ mun biɑ din tie nnɑ e. B din di k nyu, k dɑɑ bonɑ k kɔi bonkukɔit, k buul tɑn, k mɑɑ ŋei,
42017029	ŋɑɑn dɑɑl nbɑ k Lɔt din tɑn nyii Suodonm, k sɑlwuutɑ nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k tɑn bɑɑ nɑn muu k dii b kul ɑ.
42017030	K dɑɑl nbɑ k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɔkt, l mun tɑn sii tie nnɑ e.
42017031	«L dɑɑl mɑnŋ, juɑ nbɑ be dituɑtuk pɑɑk, u dɑɑ siik k kuɑ u dieok ni ɑ wun sɑɑ jii u bonɑ, k wun nbɑ mun biɑ be kpɑɑb ni, u dɑɑ ŋmɑt lin nbɑ be puolpo nɑ buol.
42017032	Tiɑtl Lɔt ŋɑɑpuo mɑɑn po mɑn.
42017033	Tɔn, wun nbɑ k yit u mɔnŋ sɑlk n pɑɑk, u tɑn sɑɑ kɔnŋ u mɑnfuol, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ yit u mɔnŋ sɑlk n pɑɑk, ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nɑn bɑlmɔni.
42017034	N yien’i e, yuo nbɑ k n sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ, niib bɑnle tɑn sii duɑ dunduɑn-yenu pɑɑk, k mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ tɑn sɑɑ jii yenɔ ŋɑɑn nyik luɑ.
42017035	Puob bɑnle tɑn sii be k nɑɑn dii, k b tɑn sɑɑ jii yenɔ ŋɑɑn nyik luɑ.
42017036	Jɑb bɑnle mun tɑn sii be kpɑɑb ni, k b tɑn sɑɑ jii yenɔ ŋɑɑn nyik luɑ.»
42017037	K u puolpoweitieb boi’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, lee?» K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Bonkpienn nbɑ be siɑn, lenŋ e k juut tiki.»
42018001	Yiesu yin Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ bɑljouk ɑ wun wɑnn’b nɑn l ŋɑn k bii mei Yennu yuo kul ɑ, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ mɔk kpinkpɑngbɑtuk u,
42018002	k yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlbuulɔ din be digbɑnsiɑl k din tuu k tiin Yennu k tɑn boi ɑ u bɑɑkt nilɔ.
42018003	Pɑkuɑk mun biɑ din be duo mɑnŋ ni, k din tuu tun bɑɑt u buol yuo kul k yien’ɔ ɑ: ‹Min nɑn nilɔ mɔk mɑɑn, bun k tul’n.›
42018004	Ŋɑɑn k u tuu yet. L puolpo k u tɑn dukn dudukt ɑ: ‹N ponŋ tɑɑn k tiin Yennu, k biɑ k bɑɑkt nilɔ,
42018005	ŋɑɑn pɑkuɑk nɑ dɑɑmiu pɑɑk, n sɑɑ tɑt k bu u mɑɑn mɑnŋ nɑn l sɔnu k tul’ɔ. Nnɑ i kɑɑ u sii bɑɑt e tieee k n tɑn bɑk.› »
42018006	K Yonmdɑɑnɔ ŋɑnm yet’b ɑ: «Gbiintl bɑlbutounŋ dɑɑnɔ nbɑ piɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ.
42018007	K Yennu mun ii? U nigɑnnkɑb nbɑ mei’ɔ yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk nɑ, u kɑn bu k tul’b ii?
42018008	N yien’i e, u sɑɑ bu b buut yiɑn yiɑn. Ŋɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ i bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, u sɑɑ lɑ bin nbɑ mɔk yɑdɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni wɑɑ ɑɑ?» lɑnpogɑɑltuɑ bɑljouk
42018009	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yin bɑljouk k tul bin nbɑ duki nɑn b tie niŋɑnm, ŋɑɑn sɑlkt b lieb nɑ, ɑ
42018010	«Jɑb bɑnle din sɑɑn sɑɑ kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni ɑ bin miɑl Yennu, k yenɔ din tie Fɑɑliisiɑn, k luɑ mun din tie lɑnpogɑɑltuɑ.
42018011	K Fɑɑliisiɑn nɑ set k miɑl u mɔnŋ po k yet ɑ: ‹Yennu, n tien’ɑ niipuouk nɑn mɑɑ k tie nɑn nilieb nɑ. N k tie nɑn-yukɔ, k biɑ k tie biitdɑɑnɔ, k mun biɑ k tuun boncuncontuonɑ. Niipuouk nɑn mɑɑ k tie nɑn lɑnpogɑɑltuɑ nɑ nɑ.
42018012	N loln n mɔb tɑɑl munle dɑɑ ŋɑnlole nuɑk ni, k mɑɑ tuu lɑ lin nbɑ, n biɑ tien’ɑ yenn kuɑ piik nuɑk ni.›
42018013	K lɑnpogɑɑltuɑ nɑ ŋɑnin din set bɑnfɔkl ɑ, k din k luon wun yɑɑt got sɑnpɑɑpo, ŋɑɑn pɑk yul k yet ɑ: ‹Yennu, tin’n ninbɑɑɔk, k mɑɑn n tie biitdɑɑnɔ e.› »
42018014	K Yiesu ŋɑnm yet’b ɑ: «N yien’i e, Yennu ponŋ din nyik cɑb juɑ nɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn yet Fɑɑliisiɑn nɑ miɑlu. K mɑɑn wun nbɑ kul dont u mɔnŋ, b tɑn sɑɑ sikn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ mun siknt u mɔnŋ, b tɑn sɑɑ donn’ɔ.»
42018015	Tɔn, k nisiɑb din bɑɑt nɑn b wɑɑs Yiesu buol ni, ɑ wun tɑn yɑt yetŋɑnm b pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn k u puolpoweitieb nbɑ lɑ k b bɑɑt nɑn wɑɑs mɑnŋ nɑ, k b tiɑn b pɑɑk.
42018016	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu te k wɑɑs mɑnŋ bɑɑl u buol ni, ŋɑɑn yet u puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k wɑɑs mɑnŋ i bɑɑt n buol nɑ mɑn, k dɑɑ tiɑn’m, k mɑɑn b buolu e yen Yennu nɑɑn.
42018017	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, wun nbɑ k gɑɑl Yennu nɑɑn nɑn bik nɑ, u kɑn mi kuɑ l ni fɑb ɑ.»
42018018	L yuo nɑ k yudɑɑnsuɑ din bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntɔŋɑnɔ, n sɑɑ tien nlee k tɑn lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu?»
42018019	K Yiesu ŋmɑt boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bee k ɑ yi’n niŋɑnɔ? Niŋɑnsuɑ kɑɑ sie Yennu kuukuɑ.
42018020	A ponŋ mi Yennu senni: Dɑɑ tuun boncuncontuonɑ, dɑɑ kpi, dɑɑ jɑɑn, dɑɑ tie fɑɑk siɑl ɑ, bɑɑkt ɑ bɑɑ nɑn ɑ nɑɑ.»
42018021	K juɑ mɑnŋ jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «N ponŋ sɑk lin nbɑ nɑ kul n bisn ni e wɑɑ.»
42018022	Yiesu nbɑ gbɑt u jiinu nɑ k u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Bon-yenn kuɑ e pɔt’ɑ, kɔin lin nbɑ kul k ɑ mɔk k jii l likli k tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm, k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ mɔktuk Yendɔunŋ ni. L puolpo k ɑ jen ɑ kii wɑɑ’n.»
42018023	Wɑɑ gbɑt lin nbɑ nɑ k u pɑl ji biil, k mɑɑn u din mɔk mɔktuk bonciɑnn.
42018024	Yiesu nbɑ bɑnn nɑn u mɔk pɑlbiil nɑ, k u yet ɑ: «L pɑɑl nɑn mɔktɑ n kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni.
42018025	L biɑ pɑɑl nɑn mɔktɔ n kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni nɑn yuyouk nbɑ kɑn fit kuɑ kpɑlpienu miɑl ni nɑ.»
42018026	Niib nbɑ gbɑt wɑɑ piɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ k b boi’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie nnɑ e i e, ŋmee ji sɑɑ fit k lɑ fielu?»
42018027	K u yet’b ɑ: «Lin nbɑ k nilɔ kɑn fit tun, ŋɑɑn Yennu sɑɑ fit tun’l ɑ.»
42018028	K Piɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Nnɑlɑ, t din nyik lin nbɑ k t din mɔk nɑ ŋɑɑn wɑɑ’ɑ.»
42018029	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i, wun nbɑ kul nyik u ŋɑɑk ɑmi u bɑɑ ɑmi u nɑɑ ɑmi u puo ɑmi u wɑɑs ɑmi u yuɑlb ɑmi u wɑɑli Yennu nɑɑn pɑɑk,
42018030	u biɑ sɑɑ lɑ bonɑ bonciɑnn tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k lin gɑl wɑɑ nyik lin nbɑ nɑ, k yuo nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ, u tɑn sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.»
42018031	Yiesu yiin u puolpoweitieb k nyii nɑn’m kpinŋ k sɑɑ yet’b ɑ: «Nnɑlɑ, t sɑɑ Selusɑɑlenm e, k lenŋ e k b sɑɑ tien Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ lin nbɑ kul k Yennu sɔkniinbɑ din diɑn u po biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
42018032	B tɑn sɑɑ suol’ɔ k tien’ɔ bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nuu ni, k b tɑn sɑɑ dɑɑn’ɔ nyɑtuk k suki’ɔ k siin mɔsɑnt u pɑɑk,
42018033	k biɑ buo’u gbɑnn, k biɑ tɑn kpi’u, ŋɑɑn k dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k u tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni.»
42018034	Ŋɑɑn u puolpoweitieb nɑ din k bɑnn mɑɑn nɑ pɑɑk. Siɑl din dɔkn b yɑn ɑ, k b k bɑnn lin nbɑ k u piɑk nɑ pɑɑk.
42018035	K Yiesu nbɑ din tɑn pel Seliiko nɑ, k juɑnsuɑ din be k kɑl sɑnjokpinŋ k din tuu mei,
42018036	k tɑn gbɑt k nibulciɑɔnŋ gɑɑl, k u boi ɑ: «Bee tie?»
42018037	K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yiesu nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ e gɑɑl.»
42018038	K u yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Yiesu, Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn, tin’n ninbɑɑɔk.»
42018039	K sɔnliitɑ nɑ din tiɑn u pɑɑk ɑ wun ŋmin, ŋɑɑn k u biɑ ŋɑnm yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn, tin’n ninbɑɑɔk.»
42018040	K Yiesu set, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ bin dɑt juɑnŋ mɑnŋ k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ u buol. Wɑɑ din bɑɑl kpiɑn Yiesu yuo nbɑ k Yiesu boi’ɔ ɑ
42018041	«A luon k n tun bee k tul’ɑ ni?» K u jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, n luon k ɑ nyuɑnt n ninbinɑ e tul’n.»
42018042	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Nyuɑntl. A yɑdɑ pɑɑk k ɑ ninbinɑ nɑ lɑ tebuk.»
42018043	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u ninbinɑ nyuɑnt k u ji lɑɑt, k wɑɑ Yiesu k sɑɑ k dont Yennu sɑnn. Yuo nbɑ k niib nɑ kul lɑ nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b ji piɑk Yennu.
42019001	L puolpo e k Yiesu din bɑɑl Seliiko k gɑɑl.
42019002	K jɑsuɑ din be lenŋ mɑnŋ k tie lɑnpogɑɑltieb yudɑɑnɔ, k u sɑnn din yi Sɑɑse, k u din mɔk mɔktuk bonciɑnn.
42019003	K u din kol ɑ wun lɑ Yiesu nbɑ tie wun nbɑ, ŋɑɑn k fit lɑ’u. Niib din yɑbt nɑn wun lɑ’u wɑɑ, k mɑɑn u din tie jɑjinjinŋ e.
42019004	L pɑɑk k u ciɑl k gɑl tuɑnn po k sɑɑ duo tiik nbɑ k b yi siikomɔl nɑ ɑ wun lɑ Yiesu gɑlu, k mɑɑn u yɑɑ wun gɑl lenŋ e.
42019005	K Yiesu nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl siikomɔl mɑnŋ buol, k u yɑɑt got’ɔ k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Sɑɑse, kɑktl k sik nɑ. Sie k n duɑl ɑ ŋɑɑk ni dinnɑ.»
42019006	K Sɑɑse din kɑkt k sik yiɑn ɑ k gɑɑl’ɔ nɑn pɑlpienn, k b sɑɑn u ŋɑɑk ni.
42019007	K niib nbɑ din lɑ lin nbɑ nɑ mɑnŋ, k b ji din buln k yien ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ sɑɑn kuɑ biitdɑɑnɔ ŋɑɑk ni.»
42019008	K Sɑɑse fiil k set k yet Yonmdɑɑnɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, gotl, n sɑɑ bɔkt n mɔktuk kul k tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm l bonjinn. L i tie k n mi dii suɑ fobt, n sɑɑ jiin’ɔ tɑɑl munnɑ.»
42019009	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Dinnɑ ŋɑɑk nɑ niib bɑnn nɑn Yennu fiel’b ɑ, k mɑɑn juɑ mɑnŋ mun tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonn e.
42019010	Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ bɑɑl ɑ u lon bin nbɑ bot nɑ k lɑ’b ŋɑɑn fiel’b.»
42019011	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yin niib nbɑ gbiintl mɑɑn mɑnŋ nɑ bɑljouk, k mɑɑn wɑɑ pel Selusɑɑlenm nɑ, k b duki ɑ l pɑɑk Yennu nɑɑn yɑɑ lin bɑɑl yiɑn e.
42019012	K u yet’b ɑ: «Nijɑɑnsuɑ din be k din tɑn nyii k sɑɑn digbɑnn bɑnfɔkl ɑ, ɑ bin sɑɑ din’ɔ nɑɑn, k l puolpo k wun jen kpen ŋɑɑk ni.
42019013	Wɑɑ dɑɑ din k nyii yuo nbɑ nɑ, k u yiin u tuontunnɑ piik k tul tul’b sɑlmɑ binn binn, k yet’b ɑ: ‹Ii sɑɑ mɑn k sɑɑ kpent kpinkpounŋ nɑn likli mɑnŋ nɑn mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ jen.›
42019014	Ŋɑɑn k u duo ni niib nɑ nɑn’ɔ. Wɑɑ sɑɑn yuo nbɑ k b tun tuomi kpɑnbɑl nɑ buol ni, ɑ b k sɑk ɑ ŋuɑ n tien b kpɑnbɑl.
42019015	«Tɔn, k nijɑɑnn nɑ sɑɑn sɑɑ set dii nɑɑn mɑnŋ k tɑn jen. Wɑɑ jen yuo nbɑ, k u te k b yiin u tuontunnɑ nbɑ k u dɑɑn tul’b likli nɑ, ɑ wun lɑ nyuɑt nbɑ k b lɑ likli nbɑ k u dɑɑn tul’b nɑ ni.
42019016	K sinsinn yuɑ nɑ bɑɑl u buol k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, sɑlmɑ binn nbɑ k ɑ dɑɑn tul’n nɑ, n kpent kpinkpounŋ k lɑ sɑlmɑ binɑ piik k pukn l pɑɑk.›
42019017	K u cɑnbɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N fɑɑn, ɑ tie tuontunŋɑnɔ e. Fɑɑ diɑ bonmintk fɑnu biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l pɑɑk, n sɑɑ tul’ɑ doi piik yudɑnt.›
42019018	K wun nbɑ mun pɑɑ u pɑɑk nɑ bɑɑl k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, sɑlmɑ binn nbɑ k ɑ dɑɑn tul’n nɑ, n kpent kpinkpounŋ k lɑ sɑlmɑ binɑ ŋɑnŋmu e.›
42019019	K u cɑnbɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N sɑɑ tul’ɑ doi ŋɑnŋmu yudɑnt e.›
42019020	«K luɑ mun biɑ bɑɑl k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, gotl ɑ sɑlmɑ binn nɑ e nɑ. N dɑɑn gbin n ninfiɑnŋ ni e k bɔl,
42019021	k mɑɑn n dɑɑn tiin’ɑ ɑ tonu nɑ pɑɑk e. A tuu jikt lin nbɑ k ɑ k bil, k biɑ jɑɑn lin nbɑ k ɑ k bul.›
42019022	K u cɑnbɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Fin tuontun-yuonn nɑ, n sɑɑ jii ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mɑɑn e k pɑk gbenn ɑ. A ponŋ mi nɑn n tuu tie nitounŋ o, k tuu jikt lin nbɑ k n k bil, k biɑ jɑɑn lin nbɑ k n k bul.
42019023	Bee tien k ɑ dɑɑn k jii n likli mɑnŋ k kuɑn bɑnŋ ni k nyuɑt n tɑn pɑɑn l pɑɑk i? Mɑɑ bo tɑn jen nɑ, n bo sɑɑ lɑ n likli pɑɑtl ɑ,›
42019024	k u yet bin nbɑ sie lenŋ nɑ ɑ: ‹Gɑɑt sɑlmɑ binn mɑnŋ u buol ni, k tul wun nbɑ mɔk sɑlmɑ binɑ piik nɑ.›
42019025	K b yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, u ponŋ mɔk sɑlmɑ binɑ piik.›
42019026	K u jiin’m ɑ: ‹N yien’i e, wun nbɑ mɔk bonɑ, b sɑɑ pukn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ kɔnŋ bont, b biɑ sɑɑ tont bonmintk nbɑ k u ponŋ mɔk nɑ.
42019027	Tɔn, n dɑtɑi nɑ nbɑ k luon k n tien b kpɑnbɑl nɑ, ŋɑnn bɑɑt nɑn’m nnɑ nɑ k tɑn kpi’b n nunm nnɑ.› »
42019028	Yiesu nbɑ pɑk k gbenn nɑ, k ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb yɑɑ bin do Selusɑɑlenm, k Yiesu gɑl b tuɑnn.
42019029	K b tɑn pel Betfɑɑje nɑn Betɑɑni doi nbɑ kpiɑ jɑgbɑɑk nbɑ k b yi’l Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk nɑ, k Yiesu tun u puolpoweitieb nɑ ni bɑnle,
42019030	k yet’b ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ digbɑnbik nbɑ be i tuɑnn po nɑ ni. I i sɑi bɑɑl, i sɑɑ lɑ bonsɑl k u lol, k suɑ dɑɑ k mi jɑk’ɔ. Yin lot’ɔ k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ nɑ,
42019031	k wun nbɑ i boi’i ɑ: ‹Bee tien k i lot’ɔ?› yin yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ e luon’ɔ.› »
42019032	K b sɑɑn lɑ bonn kul nɑn Yiesu nbɑ pɑk’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
42019033	Bɑɑ sɑɑn sɑɑ lot bonŋ mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ k bondɑnm lɑ’b k boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i lot bonŋ mɑnŋ i?»
42019034	K b jiin yet’b ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ e luon’ɔ,»
42019035	ŋɑɑn dɑt bonŋ mɑnŋ k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ Yiesu buol ni. K u puolpoweitieb jii b cincenɑ nɑn tiɑt k pɑɑn bonŋ nɑ pɑɑk k jɑkn Yiesu.
42019036	Wɑɑ jɑk bonŋ nɑ yuo nbɑ k nisiɑb jikt b cincenɑ nɑn b tiɑt k lɑt sɔnu ni.
42019037	Wɑɑ tɑn pel Selusɑɑlenm k u bɑɑl sɔnsinsikl nbɑ nyi Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk pɑɑk nɑ. Lenŋ e k u puolpoweitieb kul libn piin k dont Yennu sɑnn nɑn pɑlpienn, bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ kul nbɑ k b lɑ nɑ pɑɑk k b yien ɑ
42019038	«Yennu yetŋɑnm ii be Kpɑnbɑl nbɑ bɑɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn ni nɑ pɑɑk. Mɑnu i be Yendɔunŋ ni k yudɑnt i tie Yennu yɑl.»
42019039	Ŋɑnn e k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb nbɑ be nibul nɑ ni yet Yiesu, «Wɑntuɑ, yetl ɑ puolpoweitieb nɑ, ɑ bin ŋmin.»
42019040	K Yiesu jiin yet’b ɑ: «Nnɑlɑ, niib mɑnŋ i ŋmin, ŋɑɑn tɑnɑ nbɑ duɑ sɔnu ni nɑ sii yikn e.»
42019041	Wɑɑ din pel k tɑn lɑ Selusɑɑlenm k u mɔ duo nɑ pɑɑk,
42019042	k yet ɑ: «L i bo i tie k ɑ bɑnn mɑnu sɔnu dinnɑ, l bo sii ŋɑn k tul’ɑ. Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ l liil ɑ yɑn, k ɑ kɑn fit bɑnn.
42019043	Yuo bɑɑt k ɑ dɑtɑi tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl, k mɑɑ juonjɑl k lint’ɑ ŋɑɑn luon ɑ pɑɑk lokl kul po.
42019044	B tɑn sɑɑ biil’ɑ cɑin, fin nɑn niib kul. B kɑn nyik k tɑnn pɑɑ liel pɑɑk, k mɑɑn ɑ bo k bɑnn yuo nbɑ k Yennu bɑɑl ɑ buol ni.»
42019045	L Puol po e k Yiesu din sɑɑn kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k din sɑɑ bel bin nbɑ kɔi bonɑ,
42019046	ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹N ŋɑɑk sii tie Yenmiɑlu ŋɑɑk e,› ŋɑɑn k yinm e kpint’l k tien’l nɑn-yukb kinkɑl buol.»
42019047	Tɔn, dɑɑl kul k Yiesu din be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k tumi niib. K Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb nɑn tinŋ mɑnŋ yudɑnm luon bin kpi’u,
42019048	ŋɑɑn k fit lɑ sɔnu nbɑ k b sɑɑ kpi’u, k mɑɑn niib nɑ kul din cɑɑn b tubɑ k gbiintl u mɑɑn.
42020001	Dɑsiɑl Yiesu nbɑ din be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k tumi niib k biɑ muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn, k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb nɑn sɑɑkɑb din bɑɑl u buol
42020002	k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yet’t, ŋmee yiikuo ni e k ɑ tuun lin nbɑ nɑ? Ŋmee cɑb’ɑ yiikuo mɑnŋ i?»
42020003	K u jiin ɑ: «N mun mɔk buboit k sɑɑ boi’i. Yetl’n mɑn,
42020004	Sɑn nbɑ din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ, Yennu e cɑb’ɔ l yiikuo ɑmi nisɑɑli ee?»
42020005	K b ŋmɑnt fɑɑ l lɑbɑɑl nɑn b lieb k yien ɑ: «T i yet ɑ Yennu e cɑb’ɔ l yiikuo, u sɑɑ boi’t ɑ bee k t k tien u mɑɑn nɑ yɑdɑ?
42020006	K t i biɑ kii yet ɑ nisɑɑli e din cɑb’ɔ, niib nɑ kul ɑ sɑɑ jɑɑt’t tɑnɑ wɑɑ, k mɑɑn b tien yɑdɑ nɑn Sɑn din tie Yennu sɔkni e.»
42020007	L pɑɑk, k b jiin k yet Yiesu ɑ: «T k mi u yiikuo nbɑ nyii siɑn.»
42020008	K Yiesu mun yet’b ɑ: «Tɔn, n mun kɑn yet’i bɑnnu nbɑ k n lɑ l yiikuo k tuun lin nbɑ nɑ.»
42020009	L puolpo k Yiesu yin niib nɑ bɑljouk ɑ: «Jɑsuɑ din wuu tilonti nbɑ k b yi fiinyɑ nɑ u kpɑɑb ni, ŋɑɑn ji din jii kpɑɑb nɑ k tien kpɑɑlɑ nuu ni ɑ bii goli, ŋɑɑn tɑn yɑɑt sɑɑn siɑl po k sɑɑ wei.
42020010	K puɑlyuo tɑn bɑɑl k u tun u tuontunnɔ ɑ wun sɑɑn kpɑɑlɑ nɑ buol ni, ɑ bin bɔkt tiluɑnɑ nbɑ tie kpɑdɑɑnɔ yɑl k tul’ɔ. Ŋɑɑn kpɑɑlɑ nɑ sɑɑ buo tuontunnɔ nɑ k jiin’ɔ yɑnn.
42020011	Ŋɑnn e k u biɑ tun tuontunluɑ, k kpɑɑlɑ nɑ biɑ sɑɑ buo’u k din’ɔ fei k biɑ jiin’ɔ yɑnn.
42020012	K kpɑdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ biɑ tun tuontunluɑ, k b sɑɑ tien’ɔ dɑnŋ k jii’u lu’u.
42020013	Ŋɑnn e k kpɑdɑɑnɔ nɑ yet ɑ: ‹N sɑɑ tien nlee nɑ? Lɑɑ ji be nɑ, n sɑɑ tun n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ bilonkɑk e. Ŋuɑ ŋɑnin, pɑsiɑl b sɑɑ tul’ɔ nibɑɑkl ɑ.›
42020014	Ŋɑɑn kpɑɑlɑ nɑ nbɑ din tun ninbinn k lɑ u bik nɑ k u bɑɑt nɑ, k b yet b lieb ɑ: ‹Kpɑdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ fɑdiilɔ e nɑ. Ŋɑɑnt tin kpi’u mɑn, k u fɑɑl mɑnŋ n ji tien t yɑl.›
42020015	K b suol’ɔ k nyii nɑn’ɔ kpɑɑb nɑ kpinŋ po k sɑɑ kpii’u. «Tɔn, kpɑɑlɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, kpɑdɑɑnɔ nɑ sɑɑ tien’m nlee?
42020016	U sɑɑ bɑɑl k kpi’b, ŋɑɑn biɑ jii kpɑɑb mɑnŋ k tul lieb.» Niib mɑnŋ nbɑ gbɑt lin nbɑ nɑ k b yet ɑ: «Yennu n bɔl ŋɑnn.»
42020017	K Yiesu got’b ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni pɑɑk tie bee? ‹Tɑnn nbɑ k tɑnmɑɑlɑ yet’ɔ nɑ, ŋɑnn e set tien ŋɑɑk nɑ pɑnŋ.›
42020018	«Tɔn, wun nbɑ kul bɑɑ tɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk sɑɑ but but e, ŋɑɑn tɑnn mɑnŋ i bɑɑ wun nbɑ pɑɑk, binm, l sɑɑ mɑt mɑt’ɔ e.»
42020019	K senniwɑntieb nɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm bɑnn nɑn Yiesu nbɑ yin bɑljouk nɑ l sɑɑn gɑɑn b pɑɑk e. L pɑɑk, k b ji din kol ɑ bin suol’ɔ l tonton nɑ, ŋɑɑn tiin niib nɑ jɑŋmɑɑni.
42020020	Senni wɑntieb nɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm ji din wɑɑ piki Yiesu, k tun pikiitieb bin nbɑ kpɑnn ɑ b tie mɔmɔnpɑklɑ e, ɑ bin lɑ u mɔbonkpetl nbɑ tie lin nbɑ, k ji fit suol’ɔ k tien’ɔ l tinŋ yudɑɑnɔ nuu ni nɑn u yiikuo ni.
42020021	K pikiitieb mɑnŋ tɑn bɑɑl boi Yiesu buboit ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, t mi nɑn fɑɑ yien lin nbɑ k biɑ wɑnt nɑ, l ŋɑn. A biɑ k tie luktn dɑɑnɔ, ŋɑɑn fin e biɑ wɑnt Yennu sɔnu nɑn bɑlmɔni.
42020022	Tɔn, t senni cɑb’t nɑn tii pɑ lɑnpo kii tien Luonm tinŋ kpɑnbɑl Sesɑɑl ɑmi t dɑɑ pɑ?»
42020023	K Yiesu bɑnn b sel nbɑ k b tie nɑ k yet’b ɑ
42020024	«Wɑnt’n liklib. Tɔn, k ŋmee nɑɑɔnŋ nɑn sɑnn e be liklib nɑ pɑɑk i?» K b jiin ɑ: «Sesɑɑl yɑl e.»
42020025	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Tɔn, ii yen i pɑ kii tien Sesɑɑl lin nbɑ tie u yɑl, ŋɑɑn mun i pɑ kii tien Yennu lin nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl.»
42020026	K pikiitieb nɑ lek k lɑ u mɔbonkpetl niib nɑ tuɑnn ni, k l tien’m yɑɑl-lituk nɑn Yiesu jiinu mɑnŋ k b ji ŋmin.
42020027	K Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ siɑb din bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni. Ŋɑnm e din tuu yɑɑ ɑ niib tɑn kɑn fiil kuun ni, k b boi’ɔ ɑ
42020028	«Wɑntuɑ, Muois din diɑn senni k yet ɑ: ‹Nilɔ i kuɑn u ŋɑɑpuo k k mɑl wɑɑs ŋɑɑn tɑn kpo, ɑ l ŋɑn k u ninjɑ n fɑɑl pɑkuɑk nɑ k mɑl wɑɑs k tul kpiemɔ nɑ.›
42020029	Tɔn, jɑb bɑnlole din be k tɑɑ bɑɑ, k sɑɑkuɑ po tɑn kuɑn puo, k k mɑl wɑɑs, ŋɑɑn kpo,
42020030	k wun nbɑ mun pɑɑ u pɑɑk nɑ fɑɑl puo mɑnŋ, k mun biɑ k mɑl, ŋɑɑn kpo,
42020031	k wun nbɑ wɑɑ muntɑ ni nɑ mun din fɑɑl puo mɑnŋ k bin nbɑ biɑl nɑ kul ɑ din tɑn fɑɑl puo nɑ ŋɑɑn mun tɑn kpo kpo, k k mɑl wɑɑs mun biɑk.
42020032	K l juontu k puo mɑnŋ mun biɑ tɑn kpo.
42020033	K lɑɑ ji be nɑ, kuun fiilu dɑɑl, b ŋmee tɑn sii yen puo mɑnŋ i? K mɑɑn b bɑnlole kul ɑ din kuɑn’ɔ wɑɑ.»
42020034	K Yiesu jiin yet’b ɑ: «Tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb kuɑnt puob k biɑ ciɑnt b wɑɑs k tien’m jɑb,
42020035	ŋɑɑn k bin nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn kuun fiilu, k biɑ ŋɑn nɑn bii be dulnyɑ pɑɑnn ni nɑ, b kii kuɑnt puob, k b biɑ kii ciɑnt b wɑɑs k tien jɑb,
42020036	k b ji kɑn mi k kpo, k mɑɑn b sii tie nɑn mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑ e. B biɑ tie Yennu wɑɑs e k mɑɑn b fiil kuun ni wɑɑ.
42020037	Tɔn, Muois e mun din ponŋ wɑnn nɑn kpienm tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni. Muois nbɑ din diɑn jɑgotkunkonŋ po nɑ, u din yi Yonmdɑɑnɔ ɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm Yennu, nɑn Isɑɑk Yennu, nɑn Sɑɑkɔb Yennu.
42020038	Ŋɑnn Yennu k tie kpienm Yennu kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u tie fuotb Yennu e, k mɑɑn b kul tie fuotb e u tuɑnn ni.»
42020039	Ŋɑnn e k senniwɑntesiɑb yet Yiesu ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, ɑ jiin bonŋɑnn ɑ.»
42020040	K b ji din jie nɑn bin boi Yiesu buboisiɑt.
42020041	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «Nlee k b yien ɑ Klistu tie Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn i?
42020042	K mɑɑn Dɑɑfiid mɔnŋ mɔnŋ diɑn yɑni kɑdɑɑɔk nuɑk ni ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet n Yonmdɑɑnɔ ɑ: Kɑln n niidiitu po
42020043	mɔkmɔk nɑn mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ jii ɑ dɑtɑi k tien’m ɑ tɑɑkpɑktɑ.›
42020044	Dɑɑfiid nbɑ din yiin Klistu ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ› nɑ, nlee k Klistu nɑ tie ŋuɑ Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn i?»
42020045	Niib kul nbɑ gbiintl Yiesu mɑɑn mɑnŋ nɑ, k u yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ
42020046	«Suot i mɔnŋ mɑn nɑn senniwɑntieb. Ŋɑnm e luon bii liɑ liɑtbɑɑnt, kii lin kii sonm, k biɑ gɑɑn bulcinfuonti dɑi ni. B i kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, b luon bii kɑɑl nijɑɑnɑ kɑɑni pɑɑk e. B i sɑɑn jɑɑnm ni, b biɑ luon yudɑnm kinkɑɑni buɑ.
42020047	Ŋɑnm e biɑ gɑɑn pɑkɔi nbɑ mɔk lin nbɑ kul, ŋɑɑn ji tuu jen ɑ k mei Yennu k wei ɑ bin kpɑnn ɑ b tie niŋɑnm e. B tubdɑtu tɑn sii bi bonciɑnn.»
42021001	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu got lint k lɑ mɔktɑ, k b kpient likli Yennu piini lɑkl ni,
42021002	k u biɑ lɑ pɑkɔtɑlɑs-dɑɑnɔ k u mun kpien jinjennbɑ ŋɑnle Yennu piini lɑkl nɑ ni.
42021003	K Yiesu yet ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i, pɑkɔtɑlɑs-dɑɑnɔ nɑ kpien k gɑl suɑ kul ɑ,
42021004	k mɑɑn b kul pɑɑt b likciɑnt nɑ ni e, ŋɑɑn pɑkɔtɑlɑs-dɑɑnɔ nɑ kpɑn jii lin nbɑ k u yɑɑ wun di nɑ e k kpien.»
42021005	Ŋɑnn e k siɑb din piɑk Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk po, k yien bɑɑ te k l fɑn nɑn tɑnŋɑnɑ nɑn Yennu piini k l ŋɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ. Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu yet’b ɑ
42021006	«Yɑɑ lɑɑt lin nbɑ nɑ kul ɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn yuo bɑɑt k b tɑn sɑɑ tut l kul ɑ k lu tinŋ ni, k l tɑn-yenn kuɑ tɑn kɑn tenn k tuɑ liel pɑɑk.»
42021007	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu puolpoweitieb boi’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, biɑ yuo e k lin nbɑ nɑ tɑn sii tie e? K l nyinn biɑ tɑn sii tie nlee, lɑɑ tɑn sii yɑɑ lin tien i?»
42021008	K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Ii mi mɑn k bin tɑn kpɑnn’i. K mɑɑn niib bonciɑnn tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl n sɑnn ni k yien ɑ: ‹Min e tie Klistu,› ɑmi: ‹Yuo bɑɑl ɑ.› I dɑɑ wɑɑ l nibuolu.
42021009	I sɑɑ gbɑt tɑb nɑn kunkɔnɑ po, ŋɑɑn i dɑɑ te k l mɔk’i jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ kul n tun sinsinn dɑɑnn ɑ, ŋɑɑn l k tie k dulnyɑ gbennu sɑɑ bɑɑl l tonton nɑ kɑɑ.»
42021010	K u ŋɑnm yet’b ɑ: «Nibuolu nɑn nibuolu tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn lieb, k kpɑnbɑl nɑn kpɑnbɑl mun tɑn sɑɑ tuok k kɔn nɑn lieb.
42021011	Tinŋ jijekjɑɑnɑ nɑn kon nɑn nikuuk tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑ tingbounŋ lokl kul po buol buol, k niib biɑ tɑn sii lɑɑt lin nbɑ sii mɔk’b jɑŋmɑɑni nɑn nyinsɑɑkɑlɑ nbɑ nyi sɑnpɑɑpo.
42021012	Ŋɑɑn nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ kul n tɑn tien, b tɑn sɑɑ suol’i k muks’i, k kubn’i Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet yudɑnm nii ni, k kuɑn’i dɑnsɑli, k b tɑn sɑɑ sɑɑn nɑn’i kpɑnbɑlɑ nɑn tinŋ yudɑnm buol ni k bin bu i buut, k mɑɑn yɑɑ wɑɑ’n nɑ pɑɑk.
42021013	K ŋɑnn e tɑn sɑɑ te k i lɑ yɑɑk k lin tien siɑlɑ k jiin n po.
42021014	L pɑɑk, i tɑn suol i mɔnŋ mɑn k dɑɑ te k l dɑɑmi’i nɑn yɑɑ sɑɑ pɑk jiin biɑnŋ nbɑ l yuo,
42021015	k mɑɑn l yuo nɑ, n tɑn sɑɑ tul’i yɑn nɑn mɔbonɑ nbɑ k i tɑn sɑɑ pɑk, k i dɑtɑi kɑn fit nyɑnn i mɔbonɑ ɑmi k noi’i ni.
42021016	I cɑnbɑɑnbɑ nɑn i nɑɑnbɑ, nɑn i ninjɑnm, nɑn i dɑnm, nɑn i yuɑsnbɑ mɔnŋ tɑn sɑɑ kuɑt’i, k b tɑn sɑɑ kpi i siɑb.
42021017	K suɑ kul tɑn sii nɑn’i, k mɑɑn yɑɑ wɑɑ’n nɑ pɑɑk.
42021018	Ŋɑɑn i yul yut nɑn yenn kɑn bɑɑ yɑnn gbɑɑ.
42021019	Ii diɑ mɑn fɑnu mɑn, k i tɑn sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
42021020	«Yuo nbɑ k i tɑn lɑ sejenm k b lint Selusɑɑlenm, yin bɑnn nɑn l yɑɑ lin biil e nɑ.
42021021	L yuo mɑnŋ, bin nbɑ tɑn be Suude tinŋ ni, bin ciɑl k do juɑt, k bin nbɑ mun be Selusɑɑlenm, bin nyi duo mɑnŋ ni, k bin nbɑ mun be digbɑnkpini nɑ ji dɑɑ bɑɑt duo mɑnŋ ni,
42021022	k mɑɑn l yuo nɑ tɑn sii tie yuo nbɑ k Yennu sɑɑ dɑt niib tubɑ. Lin nbɑ nɑ kul tɑn sɑɑ tien nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e.
42021023	L yuo mɑnŋ, l tɑn sii bi k tien podɑnm nɑn bin nbɑ diɑ wɑlɑi, k mɑɑn fɑlɑ bonciɑnn tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl tinŋ nɑ pɑɑk, k Yennu wutuol tɑn sɑɑ do niib mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
42021024	K sejenm tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl k kpi niib bonciɑnn nɑn juk-bɑnjɑi, k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ suol bonciɑnn k sɑɑn nɑn’m tini kul po, k tien’m dɑɑbɑ. K bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ tɑn sii cibt lin Selusɑɑlenm mɔkmɔk nɑn b yuo nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ gbenn.
42021025	«K nyinɑ tɑn sii be yennu ni nɑn ŋmɑɑlk ni nɑn ŋmɑɑbilɑ ni. K tingbounŋ ni, pɑlbiil tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl tini ni, k yɑnputuk biɑ tɑn sii be, k mɑɑn mɔkgbenŋl nyunpɑnɑ nbɑ tɑn sii fu bonciɑnn nɑ pɑɑk.
42021026	Jɑŋmɑɑni tɑn sɑɑ jek niib, bɑɑ sii guu lin nbɑ yɑɑ lin tɑn bɑɑl tingbounŋ ni nɑ, k mɑɑn lin nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo kul ɑ nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɑnm k ŋmɑt nɑ.
42021027	L yuo k b tɑn sɑɑ lɑ k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ dɔktl bɑɑt sɑnpɑgbounŋ ni nɑn pɑnŋ bonciɑnn nɑn yentsɑɑkɑl.
42021028	Yuo nbɑ k lin nbɑ nɑ kul tɑn sɑɑ piin tienu, yin ŋɑnm set fɑnu k donn yulɑ k mɑɑn yuo nbɑ k Yennu sɑɑ fiel’i nɑ ŋmɑn bɑɑl ɑ.» Fiigie nyinn lɑbɑɑl
42021029	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yin’m bɑljouk ɑ: «Gotl fiigie nɑn tiini kul.
42021030	Yɑɑ tuu lɑ k tiini mɑnŋ fɑɑt bintl, i ji tuu bɑnn nɑn siɑɔk pel nɑ.
42021031	Nnɑ e mun biɑk, yuo nbɑ k i tɑn lɑɑt k lin nbɑ nɑ nbɑ kul tuun, yin bɑnn nɑn Yennu nɑɑn pel ɑ.
42021032	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ kɑn kpo k gbenn kɑɑ wɑɑ k lin nbɑ nɑ kul n tun.
42021033	Sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ tɑn sɑɑ gɑl ɑ, ŋɑɑn n mɑɑn ŋɑnin kɑn mi k gɑl fɑb ɑ.
42021034	«Ii mi mɑn, k dɑɑ kpɑkint jɑɑnm-nbɑ dinu ni, nɑn dɑnyunu ni, k dɑɑ te k i binbenŋ pɑɑk dɑɑmi’i ni. Nnɑ i kɑɑ dɑɑl nbɑ k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tɑn sɑɑ bu niib buut nɑ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl k i k mi.
42021035	Dɑɑl mɑnŋ tɑn sɑɑ nyɑk niib kul ɑ nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni k suol’b nɑn tɑnbɑl nɑ e.
42021036	Ii guu mɑn kii mei Yennu yuo kul, ɑ yii mɔk pɑnŋ nbɑ sɑɑ te k i nyinn i mɔnŋ fɑlɑ kul nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ ni, k i biɑ sɑɑ fit set Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tuɑnn.»
42021037	Tɔn, yennu ni k Yiesu din be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k tumi niib, k din tuu tɑn sɑɑn nyiɑɔk k sɑɑ be jɑgbɑɑk nbɑ k b yi’l Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk nɑ pɑɑk.
42021038	K sɑn-nyɑpob ni k niib kul din tuu bɑɑt u buol Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k tɑn gbiintl u mɑɑn.
42022001	Yuo nbɑ din tɑn pel nɑn bin tikl k di jɑɑnm, k ŋmɑn pɑɑnu nbɑ kɑɑ dɑtinŋ nɑ, k b din yi jɑɑnm mɑnŋ yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm,
42022002	k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb din kol ɑ bin lɑ sɔnu nbɑ k b sɑɑ kpi Yiesu, ŋɑɑn b din tiin niib nɑ jɑŋmɑɑni.
42022003	L yuo nɑ k Sɑɑtɑn kuɑ Suudɑ ni, wun nbɑ k b din yi’u Iskɑɑliɑɔt k u biɑ din tie Yiesu tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ ni yenɔ.
42022004	K ŋuɑ Suudɑ din sɑɑn k sɑɑ pɑk nɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk sejenm yudɑnm biɑnŋ nbɑ k u sɑɑ fit k kuɑt Yiesu k bin suol’ɔ.
42022005	K b ji din mɔk pɑlpienn k gɑɑl ɑ b sɑɑ pɑ Suudɑ likli.
42022006	K u sɑk b lol mɑnŋ k ji piin luon sɔnu nbɑ k u sɑɑ jii Yiesu k kubn’ɔ b nuu ni yuo nbɑ k niib nɑ ji kɑɑ nɑ. Yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm jiet dinu
42022007	Pɑɑnu nbɑ kɑɑ dɑtinŋ nɑ jɑɑnm dɑɑl nbɑ k b yɑɑ bin kpi pebis k tien yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm jiet nɑ,
42022008	k Yiesu tun Piɑl nɑn Sɑn duo nɑ ni k yet’b ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ mɑn k sɑɑ tien yuktgɑltiɑlu jiet nɑ siil k tul’t k tin di.»
42022009	K b boi’ɔ ɑ: «Lee k ɑ luon k tin sɑɑn tien siil i?»
42022010	K u yet’b ɑ: «Nnɑlɑ, yuo nbɑ k i bɑɑt duo nɑ ni, i sɑɑ cet jɑsuɑ k u jii nyunsuɑl. Ii wɑɑ’u nɑn ŋɑɑk nbɑ k u sɑɑ kuɑ,
42022011	k yin yet ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ ɑ: ‹Wɑntuɑ nɑ yɑɑ ɑ t boi’ɑ ɑ dieok nbɑ k ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb yɑɑ bin kuɑ di yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm jiet nɑ be lee?›
42022012	K u sɑɑ wɑnn’i dituɑtuk nbɑ yɑb k ponŋ tien siil, k yin tien jiet mɑnŋ lenŋ.»
42022013	K b din sɑɑn k set sɑɑ lɑ bonn kul nɑn Yiesu nbɑ yet’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k b ji din tien jɑɑnm mɑnŋ jiet siil.
42022014	Jɑɑnm jiet dinu nɑ yuo nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl, k Yiesu kɑl ɑ wun di, k u tuomiinbɑ nɑ mun kɑl ɑ bin di nɑn’ɔ.
42022015	K u yet’b ɑ: «L mɑntk wɑnt n pɑl ni nɑn min nɑn yinm n lɑkn di yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm dinu dɑɑnn e wɑɑ k fɑlɑ n ji tɑn bɑɑl’n.
42022016	N yien’i e, n ji kɑn mi k di jɑɑnm nɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k bɑlmɔni jɑɑnm nɑ tɑn sɑɑ tien Yennu nɑɑn ni.»
42022017	Ŋɑnn e k u jii kɔp nɑn dɑmunŋ, k tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Gɑɑt nɑ mɑn k cent i lieb k nyu.
42022018	N yien’i e nɑn lɑɑ jii dinnɑ k sɑɑ, n ji kɑn mi nyu dɑmunŋ nɑ, sie k Yennu nɑɑn tɑn bɑɑl.»
42022019	Ŋɑnn e k u jii pɑɑnu k tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, k ŋmit ŋmit k tul’b ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Nɑ e tie n gbɑnɑnt, k n yɑɑ n jii’l k tul’i. Ii tun kii ŋmɑn mɑn kii tiɑn n po.»
42022020	K dinu nɑ puolpo e k u biɑ jii kɔp nɑ nɑn dɑmunŋ, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Dɑmunŋ nɑ tie Yennu lol pɑɑnn nbɑ lol nɑn n sɔn, k l muɑn i pɑɑk.
42022021	«Gotl mɑn wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun kuɑt’n nɑ, ŋuɑ e kɑl k di nɑn’n nɑ.
42022022	Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ set yɑɑ wun kpo nɑn Yennu nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e, ŋɑɑn l sii bi k tul wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun kuɑt’ɔ nɑ pɑɑk.»
42022023	K b ji din piin k boi b lieb k yien ɑ: «T ŋmɑ po e yɑɑ wun tun lin nbɑ nɑ?»
42022024	L yuo k mɔniɑɔk bɑɑl u puolpoweitieb mɑnŋ sinsuuk ni, k b din noi k yien ɑ lɑnm e cie lieb.
42022025	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb kpɑnbɑlɑ diɑ b niib nɑn ninmɔnn, k b yudɑnm yi b mɔnŋ ‹b sonmtieb,›
42022026	ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin, l k tie nnɑ. Wun nbɑ tie nijɑɑnn i ni, sie k u tien nɑn bik nɑ, k yudɑɑnɔ mun n tien nɑn tuontunnɔ nɑ.
42022027	Tɔn, ŋmee tie nijɑɑnn k gɑl u luɑ, wun nbɑ di jiet, ɑmi wun nbɑ tien e? L k tie wun nbɑ di nɑ kɑɑ ɑɑ? Ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin be i sinsuuk ni nɑn tuontunnɔ nɑ e.
42022028	«Yinm ponŋ tun be nɑn’n n jinjɑnmi ni yuo kul.
42022029	N Bɑɑ nbɑ din’n nɑɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, nnɑ e mun k n yɑɑ n din’i nɑɑn,
42022030	k yin di k nyu nɑn’n n nɑɑn ni, k i tɑn sɑɑ kɑl nɑɑngbɑnt pɑɑk k bu Islɑɑeltieb buolu piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ buut.»
42022031	«Siimɔn, Siimɔn, gbiintl, Sɑɑtɑn bɑln ɑ wun lɑ yiikuo nbɑ k u sɑɑ bikn i kul k len’i nɑn dii nbɑ k b tuu lenn founŋ nɑ.
42022032	Ŋɑɑn fin Siimɔn, min e miɑl Yennu ɑ pɑɑk k ɑ yɑdɑ dɑɑ bɑɑ, k yuo nbɑ k ɑ ji jen n buol ni, ɑ tot ɑ nɑɑ wɑɑs.»
42022033	K Piɑl jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l i tie dɑnsɑlk ɑmi kuun i e, n tien siil ɑ, nɑn min nɑn fin n sɑɑn.»
42022034	K Yiesu din jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Piɑl, n yien’ɑ e, kojouk dɑɑ tɑn kɑn bui dinnɑ sinsinn dɑɑnn i k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ noi tɑɑl muntɑ ɑ ɑ k mi’n.»
42022035	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «Mɑɑ din tun’i doi ni nɑ k i din k diɑ likbuɑli nɑn pɑkɑ nɑn tɑɑsɑliɑ nɑ, i din kɔnŋ siɑl ii?» K b jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Aɑi.»
42022036	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ jik lɑɑ, wun nbɑ mɔk likbuɑlk ɑmi pɑkl, wun jii’l, k wun nbɑ mun k mɔk juk-bɑnjiɑk, wun kɔi u liɑtfuouk k dɑɑ.
42022037	Min e yien’i nɑ, l tie k lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ n tɑn tien mɔni n ni ɑ: ‹B jii’u k pukn’ɔ biitdɑnm kɑnn ni.› Setk nɑn mɔni, lin nbɑ k b din diɑn k jiin n po yɑɑ lin bɑɑl n pɑɑk.»
42022038	K b din yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, gotl, juk-bɑnjɑi ŋɑnle nɑ.» K u yet’b ɑ: «L jɑnŋ ɑ.»
42022039	Yiesu din nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk pɑɑk, nɑn wɑɑ ponŋ tuu tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k u puolpoweitieb wɑɑ’u sɑɑ.
42022040	Wɑɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl lenŋ k u yet’b ɑ: «Ii mei Yennu mɑn k i tɑn dɑɑ kuɑ jinjɑnmi ni.»
42022041	Ŋɑnn e k u cɑt b buol ni k sɑɑn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, k sɑɑ gbɑɑn tinŋ ni k miɑl Yennu,
42022042	k yet ɑ: «N Bɑɑ, l i tie ɑ lonm, dɑɑ ŋɑɑnt k n kuɑ bonbiil nbɑ bɑɑt n pɑɑk nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑnt k ɑ lonm o n tun, k l dɑɑ tie n lonm kɑɑ.»
42022043	K mɑlɑkɑ nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k tɑn dɔkt u pɑɑk k tot’ɔ.
42022044	U din dii fɑlɑ bonciɑnn k miɑl Yennu nɑn u pɑnŋ kul, k nɑɑɔk tɑn pu u pɑɑk k tɑn tuot nɑɑn nɑn sɔn nɑ.
42022045	K u tɑn fiil Yenmiɑlu ni k ŋmɑt u puolpoweitieb nɑ buol, k sɑɑ lɑ k b guɑnt, k mɑɑn pɑlbiil nbɑ din be b pɑlɑ ni nɑ pɑɑk.
42022046	K u boi’b ɑ: «Bee tien k i guɑnt i? Fiit kii mei Yennu mɑn k i tɑn dɑɑ kuɑ jinjɑnmi ni.»
42022047	Yiesu nbɑ din dɑɑ piɑk nɑn u puolpoweitieb nɑ, k nibul dɔkt. K Suudɑ, wun nbɑ tie u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ ni yenɔ, gɑl b tuɑnn, k tɑn bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni ɑ wun muɑt u tɑnkpinn.
42022048	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu boi’ɔ ɑ: «Suudɑ, ɑ muɑtl n tɑnkpinn ɑ ɑ kuɑt Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ ee?»
42022049	L yuo nɑ k u puolpoweitieb nɑ lɑ lin nbɑ yɑɑ lin tien nɑ, k b boi Yiesu ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, t kɔn nɑn’m nɑn juk-bɑnjɑi ii?»
42022050	K b yenɔ tɑɑn kɑkt cuɑ Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ tuontunnɔ niidiitu tubl k pot.
42022051	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Nyikn mɑn,» ŋɑɑn sii juɑ nɑ tubl mɑnŋ k l lɑ lɑɑfiɑ.
42022052	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu boi Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk sejenm yudɑnm nɑn sɑɑkɑb nbɑ bɑɑl ɑ bin suol’ɔ nɑ ɑ: «N tie fɑt-tuɑ e k i bɑɑl nɑn juk-bɑnjɑi nɑn gbɑjɑlɑ ɑɑ?
42022053	N ponŋ tuu tun be nɑn’i dɑɑl kul Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, ŋɑɑn k i k so’n. Tɔn, ŋɑɑn yuo nɑ lek tie i yɑl e, nɑn bunbɔnn yiikuo yɑl.»
42022054	L yuo nɑ k b ji din suol Yiesu k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ ŋɑɑk ni, k Piɑl ji sɑɑ wɑɑ u puolpo bɑnfɔkl ɑ.
42022055	Ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni, niib din juo muu dundonsinsuuk ni k kɑl lint ɑ, k Piɑl tɑn kuɑ k kɑl pukn’m.
42022056	Wɑɑ kɑl kpiɑ muu nɑ, k tuontunbipuoyenɔ lɑ’u k got’ɔ silll, k yet ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ tuu be nɑn’ɔ.»
42022057	K Piɑl noi ɑ: «Puo, n k mi’u.»
42022058	Lɑɑ yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, k jɑsuɑ mun lɑ’u k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin, ɑ mun tie u puolpoweitieb yenɔ e.» K Piɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ, kɑi, l k tie min kɑɑ.»
42022059	Lɑɑ biɑ yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, k jɑluɑ nnɑ mun biɑ yet ɑ: «Yɑunwɑ, bɑlmɔni e, juɑ nɑ tuu be nɑn’ɔ k mɑɑn u mun biɑ tie Gɑɑliile nilɔ e.»
42022060	K Piɑl jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ, min tɑɑn k mi lin nbɑ k ɑ yien nɑ kɑɑ wɑɑ.» Wɑɑ dɑɑ piɑk nɑ e k kojouk fɑn bui l tonton nɑ.
42022061	K Yonmdɑɑnɔ jiɑnt got lɑ Piɑl, k Piɑl ji tiɑl ŋuɑ Yiesu mɔbonɑ nɑ po, wɑɑ yet biɑnŋ nbɑ ɑ: «Kojouk dɑɑ tɑn kɑn bui dinnɑ sinsinn dɑɑnn i k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ noi tɑɑl muntɑ e ɑ ɑ k mi’n.»
42022062	K Piɑl ji nyii k bui bonbiil.
42022063	L puolpo e k bin nbɑ guu Yiesu nɑ dɑɑn’ɔ nyɑtuk k buo’u,
42022064	ŋɑɑn jii cincenn k bobn u nunm po ŋɑɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Buntl wun nbɑ fɑɑ’ɑ nɑ.»
42022065	K b biɑ pɑk k biil u sɑnn bonciɑnn k suki’ɔ.
42022066	Lɑɑ yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni k Suifnbɑ sɑɑkɑb nɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb din tɑɑn kɑl b yudɑnm tituk kɑɑnu, k te k b bɑɑl nɑn Yiesu.
42022067	K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin i e set kii tie Klistu, fɑn yet’t.» K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Mi i yet’i, ŋɑɑn i ponŋ tɑn kɑn tien’n yɑdɑ gbɑɑ,
42022068	k mi i mun i biɑ kii boi’i buboit, i kɑn sɑk jiin’n buboit mɑnŋ.
42022069	Ŋɑɑn lɑɑ nyii mɔtɑɑnɑ k jii sɑɑ Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tɑn sii kɑl Yɑbnt Yennu niidiitu po.»
42022070	K b kul ɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «K ŋɑnn fin e tie Yennu Bijɑ ɑɑ?» K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Nɑn yɑɑ kpɑn yɑɑ nɑ.»
42022071	K b yet b lieb ɑ: «T ponŋ ji luon siɑlɑɑdɑnm biɑ po e nɑ? T ponŋ gbɑt u mɔnŋ mɑɑn ɑ.»
42023001	Ŋɑnn e k niib nɑ kul ɑ din fiil jii Yiesu k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Piilɑɑt buol.
42023002	Lenŋ e k b ji din piin k wɑnt u biit k yien ɑ: «T lɑ nilɔ nɑ k u biil t niib k yɑɑ ɑ b dɑɑ pɑ lɑnpo k tien kpɑnbɑl Sesɑɑl, k biɑ yien ɑ ŋuɑ e tie Klistu k biɑ tie Kpɑnbɑl.»
42023003	K Piilɑɑt boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie Suifnbɑ kpɑnbɑl nɑ ɑɑ?» K u jiin k yet ɑ: «Fin e yɑɑ.»
42023004	K Piilɑɑt yet Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn nibul nɑ: «N k lɑ juɑ nɑ biit.»
42023005	K niib nɑ din yien nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ: «U tumiiu nɑ pilnt niib cenɑ. U din piin k wɑnt Gɑɑliile niib k tɑn sɑɑn Suude doi ni kul ɑ nɑn wɑɑ tɑn bɑɑl nnɑ nɑ.» Heluod bu Yiesu buut
42023006	Piilɑɑt nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ nɑ k u boi’b ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ tie Gɑɑliile nilɔ ee?»
42023007	Wɑɑ bɑnn nɑn Yiesu nyii Gɑɑliile tinŋ nbɑ k kpɑnbɑl Heluod yen nɑ, k u ŋɑɑn k b sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Heluod buol, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ Heluod mun din be Selusɑɑlenm l yuo.
42023008	K Heluod ponŋ din tuu gbiɑ Yiesu po, k luon wun lɑ’u k l wei wɑɑ. Wɑɑ din tɑn lɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ k u ji mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn, k luon Yiesu n tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonn k wun lɑ.
42023009	U boi Yiesu buboit bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn k u k jiin’ɔ siɑl.
42023010	K Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb mun din sie lenŋ k piɑk nɑn pɑnŋ k wɑnt Yiesu biit.
42023011	K Heluod nɑn u sejenm ji din sɑlkt Yiesu k dɑɑn’ɔ nyɑtuk, k gbɑbn’ɔ cincenŋɑnn k jiin’ɔ Piilɑɑt buol.
42023012	L dɑɑl mɑnŋ k Piilɑɑt nɑn Heluod suol lieb yuɑs, k mɑɑn b din tuu tie dɑtɑi e sinsinn tuuk.
42023013	K Piilɑɑt din yiin Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑn nilieb
42023014	k tɑn yet’b ɑ: «I bɑɑl nɑn nilɔ nɑ k yɑɑ ɑ u kpɑnn niib e. Gotl, n bu u buut i nunm nnɑ, k k lɑ u biit nbɑ tie lin nbɑ k i yɑɑ ɑ u tun mɑnŋ.
42023015	Heluod mun biɑ k lɑ u biit. L pɑɑk te k u jiint’ɔ k tien’t nɑ. Gotl, juɑ nɑ k tun bisiɑt nbɑ k l jɑnŋ nɑn kuun.
42023016	Ŋɑnn i e, n sɑɑ buo’u gbɑnn, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑ’u k wun sɑɑn.»
42023017	[K binn kul yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm yuo nɑ, Piilɑɑt din tuu nyinn dɑnsɑlyenɔ e k ŋɑɑ’u.]
42023018	K nibul nɑ din tiɑn sɑnpɑɑpo k yien ɑ: «Kpin juɑ nɑ. Nyint Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs yɑnn k tul’t.»
42023019	(B din kuɑn Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs dɑnsɑlk ni k mɑɑn b din bɑɑl nɑn kpikpiluk duo ni, k u kpii nilɔ.)
42023020	Ŋɑnn e k Piilɑɑt nbɑ din luon wun ŋɑɑ Yiesu nɑ, k u biɑ ŋɑnm k pɑk nɑn nibul nɑ,
42023021	ŋɑɑn k niib nɑ mun biɑ tiɑn sɑnpɑɑpo k jiint Piilɑɑt ɑ: «Kpɑɑn’mɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk. Kpɑɑn’mɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.»
42023022	K Piilɑɑt boi’b tɑɑl muntɑ ni: «Bee pɑɑk e? U biit mɑntk tie lɑnn po e? N k lɑ lin nbɑ k u tun i k l jɑnŋ nɑn kukpinu. Ŋɑnn ŋɑnin, n sɑɑ buo’u gbɑnn e, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑ’u k wun sɑɑn.»
42023023	Ŋɑɑn k niib nɑ biɑ lek tiɑn tintiɑni ɑ wun kpɑɑ Yiesu k tɑbn’ɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk, k b tintiɑni mɑnŋ tɑn nyɑnn Piilɑɑt yɑl.
42023024	K Piilɑɑt ji cɑb’b bɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ ɑ lin tien nnɑ,
42023025	k u nyinn juɑ nbɑ k b luon wun nyinn’ɔ nɑ, wun nbɑ k b din kuɑn’ɔ dɑnsɑlk k mɑɑn kpikpiluk din bɑɑl duo ni k u kpii nilɔ, k u cɑb’b Yiesu nɑn bɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ lin tien mɑnŋ.
42023026	L yuo nɑ k sejenm jii Yiesu k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ, k sɑɑ tuok jɑsuɑ k u sɑnn yi Siimɔn, wun nbɑ din tie Siilenn juɑ, k u nyii kpɑɑnt ni, k b suol’ɔ k jii Yiesu dɑpunpunn nɑ k bukn’ɔ k u wɑɑ Yiesu puol.
42023027	K nibulciɑɔnŋ din wɑɑ Yiesu k b tɔk sɑɑ. B ni mɑnŋ puosiɑb din wɑɑ k bui k fɑbn u pɑɑk.
42023028	K Yiesu din tɑn jiɑnt b pɑɑk k yet’b ɑ: «Selusɑɑlenm puob, i dɑɑ bui n pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn kii bui mɑn i mɔnŋ pɑɑk nɑn i wɑɑs pɑɑk.
42023029	K mɑɑn, yuo bɑɑt k niib tɑn sii yien ɑ: ‹Puokɑnmɑtɑ, bin nbɑ k mɑl wɑɑs k muɑn’m biil, ŋɑnm e mɔk pɑlpienn.›
42023030	L yuo mɑnŋ e k niib tɑn sii yien juɑt ɑ: ‹Bɑɑn t pɑɑk.› k yien kunkonɑ ɑ: ‹Piin’t.›
42023031	K mɑɑn muu i di dɑmɑɑtɑ, k dɑkuont jik ii?»
42023032	Ŋɑnn e k b ji din jii doyieltieb bɑnle k pukn Yiesu pɑɑk ɑ bin kpi’b.
42023033	Bɑɑ din bɑɑl siɑn nbɑ k b yi’l Yukpɑbuk nɑ, lenŋ e k b din kpɑɑ Yiesu k tɑbn’ɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk, k biɑ din kpɑɑ doyieltieb bɑnle nɑ dɑpunpunɑ pɑɑk, k yenɔ din be Yiesu niidiitu po, k luɑ nɑ mun din be u niigɑnŋ po.
42023034	K Yiesu yet k yɑɑ ɑ: «N Bɑɑ, nyikn cɑb niib nɑ, k mɑɑn b k bɑnn bɑɑ tuun lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.» K b tɔ tiɑtiɑ k cent u tiɑt.
42023035	K niib nɑ sie k goli, ŋɑɑn k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ din dɑɑn’ɔ nyɑtuk k yien ɑ: «U tuu fie nilieb. L i tie k u set tie Klistu, Yennu Nigɑnntuɑ nɑ i e, wun fie u mɔnŋ.»
42023036	K sejenm biɑ din dɑɑn’ɔ nyɑtuk, k tɑn bɑɑl nɑn dɑmiituk k tien’ɔ,
42023037	ŋɑɑn yɑɑ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ set tie Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl i e, fɑn fiel ɑ mɔnŋ.»
42023038	B biɑ diɑn diɑni k tɑbn dɑpunpunn nɑ, u yul pɑɑk, k l yet ɑ: «Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl i nɑ.»
42023039	L yuo nɑ k doyieltieb nbɑ tɑɑb nɑ yenɔ din suki Yiesu k yɑɑ ɑ: «A k tie Klistu kɑɑ ɑɑ? Fiel ɑ mɔnŋ ŋɑɑn mun fiel’t.»
42023040	K luɑ din tiɑ’u k yet ɑ: «A k tiin Yennu uu? K mɑɑn fin nɑn ŋuɑ nbɑ be tubdɑtyenn kuɑ ni nɑ.
42023041	Tinm ŋɑn nɑn l tubdɑtu, k mɑɑn b jiint’t pɑnkpelɑ nbɑ k t tuu tuun nɑ pɑɑk e, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ ŋɑnin k biil siɑl.»
42023042	ŋɑnn e k u yet Yiesu ɑ: «Yiesu, yuo nbɑ k ɑ dii ɑ nɑɑn, ɑ tɑn tiɑl n po.»
42023043	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’ɑ, dinnɑ min nɑn fin sii be Yendɔunŋ ni.»
42023044	L yuo din tie yensuuk ni e, k tingbounŋ nɑ kul ji din bɔnn mɔkmɔk nɑn yenlekl, kut muntɑ yuo,
42023045	k mɑɑn yennu ji din lib. Cincenn nbɑ din tuu juɑn k puun Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k l ji din tɑn suol sinsuuk ni k bɔkt tɑɑl munle.
42023046	K Yiesu tɑn yikn sɑnpɑɑpo k yet ɑ: «N Bɑɑ Yennu, n jikt n siek k tie’l ɑ nuu ni.» Wɑɑ yet nnɑ mɑnŋ k u ji nɑk.
42023047	K sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nbɑ lɑ lin nbɑ tien nɑ, k u pɑk Yennu k yet ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e, juɑ nɑ set tie niŋɑnɔ e.»
42023048	K nibulciɑɔnŋ nbɑ din lɑkn lenŋ ɑ bin lɑ lin nbɑ din tie nɑ, k b lɑ lin nbɑ tien nɑ, k b ji ŋmɑt kun nɑn pɑlbiil ŋɑɑn pɑkn yulɑ.
42023049	K u yuɑsnbɑ kul nɑn puob nbɑ nyii Gɑɑliile nɑn’ɔ din be lenŋ k sie bɑnfɔkl ɑ, ŋɑɑn goli lin nbɑ tie.
42023050	K jɑsuɑ din be k u sɑnn yi Suosiɑf k din nyii Suifnbɑ duo nbɑ k b yi’l Aliimɑɑte, k din tie niŋɑnɔ nbɑ tie bulcimɔ, k din guu Yennu nɑɑn bɑɑlu nɑ. U din tie Suifnbɑ yudɑɑn-yenɔ e, ŋɑɑn u din k sɑk nɑn Suifnbɑ yudɑɑnlieb nbɑ din lol b lol nbɑ k tun nɑ.
42023052	K juɑ mɑnŋ sɑɑn Piilɑɑt buol k sɑɑ miɑl’ɔ ɑ wun cɑb’ɔ Yiesu gbɑnɑnt.
42023053	Ŋɑnn e k u sɑɑn kpɑɑt gbɑnɑnt nɑ dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk, k jii’u k pɔbn’ɔ kɑtinŋ ni, k pii’u kɑɑɔk ni, lin nbɑ k b ponŋ din jiɑl tɑnpiiuk lokl ni nɑ, k b din dɑɑ k pii suɑ kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ ni.
42023054	L din tie dɑɑl nbɑ k b tie siil fuon pɑɑk e, k Fuondɑɑl nɑ din tɑn yɑɑ lin piin.
42023055	K Puob nbɑ din nyii Gɑɑliile k din wɑɑ Yiesu nɑ wei Suosiɑf, k b sɑɑ lɑ Yiesu kɑɑɔk buol nɑn bɑɑ pii’u biɑnŋ nbɑ.
42023056	Ŋɑnn e k b ji din ŋmɑt kun ŋɑɑk ni, k sɑɑ tien siil k ŋɑnm kpɑnunubt nɑn tulɑɑli, ŋɑɑn Fuondɑɑl k b din foi nɑn Yennu senni nbɑ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
42024001	Lɑsl dɑɑl sɑn-nyɑfɑɑl, k puob mɑnŋ nyii sɑɑn kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ buol nɑn b kpɑnunubt nɑn tulɑɑli nbɑ k b ponŋ ŋɑnm nɑ.
42024002	Bɑɑ bɑɑl lenŋ, k b lɑ k kɑtɑngbenŋl nɑ, k l nyɑkt kɑɑɔk nɑ mɔb pɑɑk, k bilnt k sɑɑ duɑ.
42024003	Ŋɑɑn bɑɑ kuɑ kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ ni, b k lɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu gbɑnɑnt,
42024004	k b ji biɑl sie jiiɑɑ, k l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k jɑb bɑnle sie k liɑ liɑtfɔkt nbɑ nyili.
42024005	Lɑɑ tien puob nɑ jɑŋmɑɑnsuoluk, k b gbɑɑn tinŋ ni, k jɑb nɑ boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i luon fuotɔ kpienm ni?
42024006	U kɑɑ nnɑ. U fiil kuun ni wɑɑ. Tiɑt mɑn wɑɑ din yet’i biɑnŋ nbɑ, yuo nbɑ k u dɑɑ din be Gɑɑliile nɑ,
42024007	ɑ l tie k bin suol Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k jii’u tien biitdɑnm nuu ni k bin kpɑɑ’u tɑbn’ɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk k wun kpo, k u tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl.»
42024008	Ŋɑnn e k puob nɑ ji tiɑl u mɑɑn mɑnŋ po.
42024009	K puob nɑ ji siet kɑɑɔk nɑ buol k ŋmɑt kun, k sɑɑ yet lin nbɑ kul tien, k tul u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn yenɔ kuɑ, nɑn bin nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ kul ɑ.
42024010	Puob mɑnŋ sɑnɑ e din tie Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli, nɑn Sɑɑnn, nɑn Mɑɑli nbɑ din tie Sɑɑk nɑɑ nɑ, k puolieb mun din pukn b pɑɑk k be b ni k b din yet Yiesu tuomiinbɑ mɑɑn mɑnŋ.
42024011	Ŋɑɑn tuomiinbɑ nɑ din duki nɑn l tie mɑyɑnɑ e, k b k tien’m yɑdɑ.
42024012	Ŋɑɑn k Piɑl ŋɑnin din fiil k ciɑl sɑɑn kɑɑɔk nɑ buol, k sɑɑ tibn k got k lɑ kuun cincenn nɑ k l duɑ l kuukuɑ, k u ji ŋmɑt kun ŋɑɑk ni nɑn yɑɑl-lituk nɑn lin nbɑ tien mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
42024013	L dɑɑl mɑnŋ e k Yiesu puolpoweitieb bɑnle din sɑɑ digbɑnbik nbɑ k b yi Emɑus nɑ. Lenŋ nɑn Selusɑɑlenm din tie nɑn kiiluomiɑtɑ piik nɑn yen nɑ e.
42024014	K b din sonm piɑk nɑn lieb lin nbɑ nɑ kul nbɑ tien mɑnŋ po.
42024015	Bɑɑ piɑk k fɑɑ lɑbɑɑl nɑn lieb yuo nbɑ nɑ, k Yiesu mɔnŋ nɑkn’m k lɑkn nɑn’m sɑɑ,
42024016	ŋɑɑn k Yiesu te k l liil’b k b k bɑnn’ɔ.
42024017	K u boi’b ɑ: «I sonm piɑk ɑ bee?» K b set nɑn ninbiik.
42024018	Ŋɑnn e k b yenɔ, wun nbɑ sɑnn yi Kleopɑɑs nɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «A kuukuɑ e tie sɑɑmɔ nbɑ be Selusɑɑlenm nɑ k tɑn k gbɑt lin nbɑ tien dɑɑ ŋɑnlele nɑ ɑɑ?»
42024019	K u boi’b ɑ: «Lɑnn po e tien i?» K b jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «K jikt sɑɑ Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ Yiesu po. Juɑ nɑ dɑɑn tie Yennu sɔkni e, u bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nɑn u mɑɑn dɑɑn mɔk pɑnŋ, Yennu nɑn niib tuɑnn.
42024020	K t yudɑnm nɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm jii’u k tien’ɔ bɑlbuulɔ nuu ni, k yet ɑ u ŋɑn nɑn kuun e, k b tɑn kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.
42024021	Ŋɑɑn k t tuu dɑɑn nɑn ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ nyinn tinm Islɑɑeltieb t dɑtɑi nuu ni, k lin nbɑ pukn, dinnɑ tie dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ e nɑ lɑɑ tien.
42024022	Ŋɑnn mɑnŋ e biɑk, k t ni puosiɑb pɑk’t u po k l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’t, k mɑɑn bɑɑ sɑɑn kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ buol sɑn-nyɑfɑɑl nɑ,
42024023	b sɑɑ k lɑ u gbɑnɑnt. Bɑɑ jen yuo nbɑ k b yet’t ɑ ŋɑnm bo lɑ Yennu mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ, k mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ mɑnŋ yet’b ɑ Yiesu jen u mɑnfuol ni wɑɑ.
42024024	Ŋɑnn e k t yenm tɑn sɑɑn kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ buol k sɑɑ lɑ nɑn puob nbɑ dɔnŋ yet’t nɑ, ŋɑɑn b k lɑ Yiesu.»
42024025	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Yɑnkpienɑ nɑ, bee k i tɑɑntl nɑn yin tien Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn nɑ yɑdɑ?
42024026	L k kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn Klistu n di fɑlɑ mɑnŋ, k tɑn lɑ u yudɑnt ii?»
42024027	Ŋɑnn e k u wɑnt’b u mɑɑn nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk kul ni nɑ pɑɑk, k piin Muois diɑni ni nɑn sɔkniinbɑ diɑni kul ɑ ni.
42024028	Tɔn, k b tɑn pel digbɑnbik nbɑ k b bɑɑt nɑ, k Yiesu tɑn tien nɑn u gɑɑl e nɑ.
42024029	Ŋɑɑn b guɑl’ɔ k yien ɑ: «Biɑt nɑn’t nnɑ, k mɑɑn yennu bɑɑ wɑɑ k l ji bɔnt e.» L pɑɑk, k u ji kuɑ k biɑl b buol ni.
42024030	K u tɑn kɑl ɑ wun di nɑn’m, k jii pɑɑnu nɑ k tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ŋmit ŋmit k tul’b.
42024031	L yuo nɑ k b nunm po ji yent k b ji bɑnn’ɔ. L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u biɑ lil bot b ni.
42024032	K b ji yien lieb ɑ: «Wɑɑ piɑk nɑn’t sɔnu pɑɑk k wɑnt’t lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ pɑɑk, l bo k tie nɑn muu nɑ kɑɑ k di t pɑlɑ ni ii?»
42024033	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k b fiil ŋmɑt Selusɑɑlenm, k sɑɑ lɑ u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn yenɔ kuɑ nɑ nɑn siɑb k b lɑkn lieb.
42024034	Ŋɑnn e k u puolpoweitelieb nɑ yet’b ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ set fiil e nɑn bɑlmɔni. U dɔkt Siimɔn pɑɑk.»
42024035	K niib bɑnle nɑ mun yet’b lin nbɑ tien sɔnu pɑɑk, nɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ k b bɑnn Yiesu yuo nbɑ k u tɑn ŋmit ŋmit pɑɑnu nɑ.
42024036	Puolpoweitieb bɑnle nbɑ nyii Emɑus nɑ nbɑ yien’m lin nbɑ nɑ nɑ, l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Yiesu set b sinsuuk ni k yet’b ɑ: «Mɑnu ii be i pɑɑk.»
42024037	K gbɑnɑnjijekt nɑn jɑŋmɑɑni kuɑ’b hei, k mɑɑn b duki mi ɑ b lɑ siɑl ɑ funfɔntuk o.
42024038	Ŋɑnn e k u boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i yɑn pɑɑk put i? Bee k bilsuk be i ni?
42024039	Gotl n nii nɑn n tɑɑ mɑn, k bɑnn nɑn l set tie min e. Sii’n k bɑnn nɑn min e. Funfɔntuk k mɔk gbɑnɑnt nɑn kpɑbɑ nɑn yɑɑ lɑ mɑɑ mɔk’l biɑnŋ nbɑ.»
42024040	Wɑɑ yet nnɑ mɑnŋ k u wɑnn’b u nii nɑn u tɑɑ.
42024041	Bɑɑ dɑɑ k fit tien yɑdɑ nɑn ŋuɑ e nɑ b pɑlpienn nɑn b yɑɑl-lituk pɑɑk nɑ, k u boi’b ɑ: «I mɔk jesiɑt nnɑ ɑɑ?»
42024042	K b jii jɑnpulkjinn k tul’ɔ,
42024043	k u gɑɑl k ŋmɑn b nunm ni.
42024044	Ŋɑnn e k u yet’b ɑ: «Gotl mɑɑ dɑɑn wɑnn’i lin nbɑ mɑɑ dɑɑ dɑɑn be nɑn’i. Lin nbɑ kul k b diɑn Muois senni ni nɑn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ diɑni ni nɑn Yennu yɑni ni k jiin n po nɑ, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn l kul n tɑn mɑntk tun k gbenn.»
42024045	Ŋɑnn e k u ji yent b nunm ɑ bin bɑnn lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ pɑɑk,
42024046	k yet’b ɑ: «L diɑn ɑ Klistu sɑɑ di fɑlɑ k kpo k tɑn fiil kuun ni dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl,
42024047	k b sɑɑ piin Selusɑɑlenm ni k sɑɑn tuu nibuolu kul k muɑnt, u sɑnn ni, niib nbɑ sɑɑ mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ nɑn biit nyikcɑbu lɑbɑɑl.»
42024048	K u biɑ yet’b ɑ: «Yinm e tie lin nbɑ nɑ siɑlɑɑdɑnm.
42024049	Nnɑlɑ, min e yɑɑ n tɑn tul’i lin nbɑ k n Bɑɑ senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul’i nɑ. Ŋɑɑn i dɑɑ biɑl kii be mɑn Selusɑɑlenm mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k yiikuo tɑn sɑɑ nyi sɑnpɑɑpo k sik i pɑɑk.»
42024050	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu nyii nɑn’m duo mɑnŋ ni k sɑɑn nɑn’m Betɑɑni. Lenŋ e k u sɑɑ donn u nii sɑnpɑɑpo ŋɑɑn yɑt yetŋɑnm b pɑɑk.
42024051	Wɑɑ yɑt yetŋɑnm nɑ yuo nbɑ nɑ, k u yɑɑt k nyik’b ŋɑɑn duo Yendɔunŋ ni.
42024052	K b ji jiɑnt’ɔ k tɑn ŋmɑt Selusɑɑlenm nɑn pɑlpienn bonciɑnn.
42024053	K b ji din jii b yuo k be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni yuo kul ɑ, k piɑk dont Yennu sɑnn.
43001001	Sintɑnsinm dinn, yuo nbɑ k Yennu din nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ, Mɑɑn ponŋ din be. U din be nɑn Yennu e, k biɑ tie Yennu.
43001002	Mɑɑn mɑnŋ e din be nɑn Yennu sinsinn.
43001003	Yennu din jii Mɑɑn mɑnŋ e nɑn bont kul, k siɑl din kɑɑ k Yennu nɑn k l k nyii u ni,
43001004	k u ni e biɑk k mɑnfuol be, k l mɑnfuol mɑnŋ e tie niib yentu,
43001005	k yentl tingbounŋ nɑ bunbɔnn, k bunbɔnn nɑ k fit bɔnt yentu mɑnŋ.
43001006	Jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be k u sɑnn yi Sɑn k Yennu din tun’ɔ.
43001007	U din bɑɑl ɑ wun yet niib yentu mɑnŋ po, ɑ niib kul n tien yɑdɑ u mɑɑn nɑ pɑɑk.
43001008	Sɑn tiɑɔnŋ kɑɑ din tie yentu mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn u din bɑɑl ɑ wun tien yentu mɑnŋ siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ e.
43001009	Bɑlmɔni yentu mɑnŋ nbɑ yentl niib kul nɑ din bɑɑl tingbounŋ ni.
43001010	Mɑɑn din be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k Yennu ponŋ din jii Mɑɑn mɑnŋ e k nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ kul, ŋɑɑn tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb lek tɑn k bɑnn Mɑɑn mɑnŋ.
43001011	U din bɑɑl u tiɑɔnŋ duo ni, ŋɑɑn u niib din k gɑɑl’ɔ.
43001012	Ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ kul gɑɑl’ɔ k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, ŋɑnm e k u din tul’b yiikuo ɑ bii tie Yennu wɑɑs.
43001013	Bɑɑ din tien Yennu wɑɑs nɑ, l k tie nɑn bɑɑ tuu mɑɑl wɑɑs biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ kɑɑ, k biɑ k tie nilɔ nbɑ luon lin nbɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn Yennu e tul’b mɑnfopɑɑnn.
43001014	Mɑɑn mɑnŋ din tɑn kpɑnt nisɑɑlk, k tinm nɑn ŋuɑ din lɑkn kuɑ, k u gbie nɑn ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn bɑlmɔni. T din lɑ u yudɑnt, k l yudɑnt tie lin nbɑ k Bijɑyenml lɑɑt u Bɑɑ buol ni.
43001015	Sɑn din piɑk u po k nyinn u siɑlɑ k yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ k n dɑɑn yet ɑ: ‹Wun nbɑ wɑɑ n puol nɑ cie’n k mɑɑn u ponŋ din be e wɑɑ k b tɑn mɑl’n.› »
43001016	Wɑɑ gbie nɑn ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ, k u tul’t yetŋɑnm k pukn yetŋɑnm pɑɑk.
43001017	Muois din tul’t Yennu senni e, ŋɑɑn Yiesu Klistu e din bɑɑl nɑn ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ k biɑ din bɑɑl nɑn bɑlmɔni.
43001018	Suɑ kɑɑ k mi lɑ Yennu. U mɔnŋ Bijɑyenml nbɑ set tie Yennu k biɑ kpiɑ’u nɑ, ŋuɑ e fiit’ɔ k wɑnn’t.
43001019	Tɔn, nɑ e tie Sɑn siɑlɑ nbɑ k u nyinn yuo nbɑ k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nbɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm nɑ din tun Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn Liefiitnbɑ Sɑn mɑnŋ buol, ɑ bin boi’ɔ k lɑɑn u tie ŋmee?
43001020	K Sɑn mun din k yet jiinu, ŋɑɑn jiin k yet yent k yɑɑ ɑ: «Min kɑɑ tie Klistu nɑ.»
43001021	Ŋɑnn e k b boi’ɔ ɑ: «K ɑ tie ŋmee? A tie Elii ee?» K u jiin k yɑɑ ɑ: «N k tie Elii kɑɑ.» K b biɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «K ɑ tie sɔkni nbɑ nɑ ee?» K u jiin ɑ: «N k tie ŋuɑ kɑɑ biɑk.»
43001022	Ŋɑnn e k b boi’ɔ: «K ɑ tie ŋmee? Wɑnt’t fɑɑ tie wun nbɑ k t ŋmɑt sɑɑ yet bin nbɑ tun’t nɑ. A sɑɑ yet nlee k jikt sɑɑ ɑ mɔnŋ po?»
43001023	K Sɑn jii sɔkni Esɑɑyi mɔbonɑ k jiin k yɑɑ ɑ: «Min e tie wun nbɑ be muuk ni nɑ, k huot yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Ŋɑnmt mɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑlu sɔnu k lii tuok.› »
43001024	Niib nbɑ k b tun’m Sɑn buol nɑ din tie Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ e.
43001025	K b biɑ boi Sɑn k yɑɑ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ k tie Klistu, k biɑ k tie Elii, k biɑ mun k tie sɔkni nbɑ nɑ, k l tien nlee k ɑ wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu?»
43001026	K Sɑn yɑɑ ɑ: «Min ŋɑnin wuul niib Yennu wulu nyun ni e, ŋɑɑn suɑ be i sinsuuk nnɑ k i k mi’u.
43001027	Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun wei n pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn k n k ŋɑn nɑn k n lot u tɑɑsɑɑŋmi.»
43001028	Lin nbɑ nɑ kul din tien duo nbɑ sɑnn yi Betɑɑni e, k l din be Suulden kpenu puotl. Lenŋ e k Sɑn din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu.
43001029	Lɑɑ yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k Sɑn mɑnŋ lɑ Yiesu k u bɑɑt, k u yet niib nɑ ɑ: «Gotl mɑn. Yennu Pebik nbɑ nyint tingbounŋ nɑ biit e nɑ.
43001030	Ŋuɑ e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k n won yet’i ɑ: ‹Jɑsuɑ tɑn sɑɑ wei n pɑɑk, k cie’n nɑ, k mɑɑn u ponŋ din be e wɑɑ k b tɑn mɑl’n.›
43001031	N tuu k mi nɑn ŋuɑ e nɑ, ŋɑɑn n dɑɑn bɑɑl k wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu, ɑ Islɑɑeltieb n bɑnn’ɔ.»
43001032	K Sɑn biɑ yet niib nɑ ɑ: «N dɑɑ lɑ Foŋɑnm, k u nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k siik, k nɑɑn nɑn ŋmɑnn nɑ, k tɑn tuɑn u pɑɑk k biɑl nɑn’ɔ.
43001033	N dɑɑn dɑɑ k mi nɑn ŋuɑ e nɑ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tun’n ɑ n wul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ dɑɑn yet’n ɑ: ‹Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k ɑ tɑn lɑ k Foŋɑnm siik k tɑn tuɑn u pɑɑk k biɑl nɑn’ɔ, fɑn bɑnn nɑn ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ jii Foŋɑnm k wul niib Yennu nyunwulu.›
43001034	N set lɑ nnɑ, k biɑ yien’i nɑn ŋuɑ e tie Yennu Bijɑ.»
43001035	Lɑɑ yent, k Sɑn sie lenŋ biɑk nɑn u puolpoweitieb nɑ ni bɑnle,
43001036	k tɑn lɑ k Yiesu gɑɑl sɑɑ, k u yet ɑ: «Gotl mɑn, Yennu Pebik e nɑ.»
43001037	K Sɑn puolpoweitieb bɑnle nɑ nbɑ gbɑt k Sɑn yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b nyik’ɔ, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ Yiesu.
43001038	K Yiesu sɑɑ jiɑnt got k lɑ k b wɑɑ’u, k u boi’b ɑ: «I luon bee?» K b jiin ɑ: «Lɑɑbi, (l pɑɑk tie wɑntuɑ) t luon k t bɑnn fɑɑ kuɑ siɑn e.»
43001039	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Ii wɑɑ mɑn k sɑɑ lɑ mɑɑ kuɑ siɑn nbɑ.» L din tie nɑn kut munnɑ yuo nɑ e dɑɑjuouk, k b wei’ɔ k sɑɑn k sɑɑ lɑ wɑɑ be siɑn nbɑ, k b ji din biɑl k be nɑn’ɔ dɑɑl mɑnŋ ni.
43001040	B bɑnle mɑnŋ nbɑ din dɔnŋ gbɑt Sɑn nbɑ yet lin nbɑ k wɑɑ Yiesu nɑ, b yenɔ din tie Andle, wun nbɑ din tie Siimɔn Piɑl ninjɑ nɑ.
43001041	Wɑɑ din nyii Yiesu buol ni nɑ puolpo e, k u sɑɑn yiɑn ɑ k sɑɑ lon u yuɑlɔ Siimɔn buol, k tɑn yet’ɔ yɑɑ ɑ: «T lɑ Meesi nɑ wɑɑ,» (k l pɑɑk tie Klistu,)
43001042	ŋɑɑn bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ Yiesu buol. K Yiesu got’ɔ silll, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie Siimɔn wun nbɑ tie Sɑn bijɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ sɑnn biɑ sii yi Sefɑɑs.» (k l pɑɑk tie Piɑl Glek mɑɑn ni.)
43001043	L sɑn-nyɑfɑnnuk o, k Yiesu luon wun sɑɑn Gɑɑliile k cet Fiiliip k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii wɑɑ’n.»
43001044	Fiiliip din nyii Betsɑidɑ e. Lenŋ e tie duo nbɑ k Andle nɑn Piɑl mun din nyii nɑ.
43001045	K Fiiliip mun cet Nɑɑtɑɑniɑl k yet’ɔ ɑ: «T lɑ wun nbɑ k Muois din diɑn u po Yennu senni kɑdɑɑɔk ni, k sɔkniinbɑ biɑ din diɑn u po. Ŋuɑ e tie Yiesu wun nbɑ tie Suosiɑf bik, k nyii Nɑɑsɑɑlet.»
43001046	K Nɑɑtɑɑniɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Nɑɑsɑɑlet ii? Bonŋɑnn sɑɑ fit nyi Nɑɑsɑɑlet ɑɑ?» K Fiiliip yet’ɔ: «A mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mun n bɑɑl k tɑn lɑ.»
43001047	Yiesu nbɑ lɑ Nɑɑtɑɑniɑl k u bɑɑt u penŋ nɑ, k u pɑk u po k yet ɑ: «Mɔmɔnm Islɑɑel nilɔ e nɑ k fɑɑk kɑɑ u ni.»
43001048	K Nɑɑtɑɑniɑl boi’ɔ: «A tien nlee k mi’n i?» K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fiiliip nbɑ dɑɑ bo k bɑɑl k yiin’ɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn suɑ k n ponŋ lɑ’ɑ wɑɑ, k ɑ kɑl fiigie nyɑkl.»
43001049	K Nɑɑtɑɑniɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, ɑ tie Yennu Bijɑ e, k biɑ tie Islɑɑeltieb Kpɑnbɑl.»
43001050	K Yiesu boi’ɔ: «Mɑɑ yet’ɑ ɑ n lɑ’ɑ k ɑ kɑl fiigie nyɑkl ni e, k ɑ tien’n yɑdɑ ɑɑ? ŋɑɑn ɑ sii lɑɑt bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ k lin gɑl lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
43001051	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, i tɑn sɑɑ lɑ Yendɔunŋ ni luot, k Yennu mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ siik Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k ŋmɑt do sɑnpɑɑpo.»
43002001	L dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl, k puokuɑnu jɑɑnm be Kɑɑnɑ duo ni, Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni. K Yiesu nɑɑ din be lenŋ,
43002002	k b biɑ yiin Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb, k b mun din be.
43002003	Tɔn, dɑmunŋ nbɑ k b tuu nyu nɑ, k l tɑn gbenn, k Yiesu nɑɑ bɑɑl yet Yiesu ɑ: «Dɑmunŋ nɑ gbenn ɑ.»
43002004	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «N nɑɑ, bee te k ɑ wɑnt’n mɑɑ sɑɑ tun lin nbɑ. N yuo e dɑɑ k bɑɑl.»
43002005	Ŋɑnn e k u nɑɑ mɑnŋ yet tuontunnɑ nɑ ɑ: «Lin nbɑ k u yet’i ɑ i tun, yin tun nnɑ.»
43002006	Tɔn, k bui ŋɑnluob nnɑ din sie lenŋ, lin nbɑ k Suifnbɑ tie nyun lenŋ k nit nɑn b jɑɑnti kɑɑl nbɑ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ, k l bui din fit kuɑ nɑn liitɑ kobik kobik nɑ.
43002007	K Yiesu yet tuontunnɑ nɑ ɑ: «Gbient bui nɑ nɑn nyun.» K b gbien nɑn mɔgbɑnɑ wɑɑ.
43002008	K u ji yet’b: «Fint mɑn nyun mɑnŋ, k sɑɑn tul jɑɑnm nɑ sɑɑkuɑ.» K b finn k sɑɑn tul’ɔ,
43002009	k u gɑɑl lenm nyun nbɑ kpɑnt dɑmunŋ nɑ, k k mi dɑmunŋ nɑ nbɑ nyii siɑn, ŋɑɑn tuontunnɑ nbɑ dul nyun bui nɑ ni ŋɑnin mi. Ŋɑnn e k sɑɑkuɑ nɑ yiin puo nɑ sɔlɔ
43002010	k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Suɑ kul tuu tol dɑmɑnm sinsinn e wɑɑ. L i tie k b tɑn nyuu k yib ɑ, wun ji tol lin nbɑ k mɑn fɑnu nɑ, ŋɑɑn k yinm ŋɑnin ŋmin ɑ, k ji tɑn juont tuol dɑmunŋ nbɑ mɑn k gɑl siɑl kul nɑ.»
43002011	Tɔn, Yiesu nbɑ din tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnn mɑnŋ Kɑɑnɑ nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni nɑ, ŋɑnn e din tie u sinsinn nyinn, k l wɑnn niib wɑɑ mɔk yudɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ, k u puolpoweitieb nɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ l pɑɑk.
43002012	L puolpo k Yiesu nɑn u nɑɑ nɑn u ninjɑnm nɑn u puolpoweitieb sik Kɑpelnɑunm, k sɑɑ be lenŋ nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnle nnɑ nɑ.
43002013	Ŋɑnn e k Islɑɑeltieb yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm tɑn pel, k Yiesu sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm.
43002014	Wɑɑ bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm yuo nbɑ, k u kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k sɑɑ lɑ niib k b kɔi nei nɑn pei nɑn ŋmɑnɑ k lieb biɑ kɑl kpentl likli.
43002015	K u jii ŋmiit k piɑn gbɑnn, k bel niib nɑn b bonkobt nɑ kul ɑ, k nyinn’b Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk mɑnŋ ni, ŋɑɑn tut tut lik-kpentɑ nɑ tiebulɑ k lu, k likli nɑ yɑt bɑɑ bɑɑ,
43002016	ŋɑɑn biɑ yet bin nbɑ kɔi ŋmɑnɑ nɑ, ɑ bin nyinn ŋmɑnɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn biɑ yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ tie n Bɑɑ ŋɑɑk kpinkpent buol.»
43002017	L yuo nɑ k u puolpoweitieb ji tiɑl Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ɑ: «N Yennu, n lonm nbɑ k n mɔk k jiin ɑ ŋɑɑk po di n pɑl ni nɑn muu nɑ e.»
43002018	Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm boi Yiesu ɑ: «A sɑɑ tun nyinn lɑnn po e k wɑnn’t ɑ ɑ mɔk yiikuo k tun fɑɑ tun lin nbɑ nɑ?»
43002019	K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Tɔn, i yiel Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ sinsuuk ni n sɑɑ mɑɑ’l kɑɑl.»
43002020	K b yet ɑ: «Wɑɑ. T jii binɑ piinnɑ nɑn ŋɑnluob o k mɑɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ, ŋɑɑn k fin tɑn yɑɑ ɑ sɑɑ jii dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ kuukuɑ e k mɑɑ ɑɑ?»
43002021	Ŋɑɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nbɑ k Yiesu din pɑk l po nɑ, din tie u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ gbɑnɑnt e.
43002022	Yennu nbɑ din fiin’ɔ kuun ni nɑ puolpo e, k u puolpoweitieb tiɑl lin nbɑ k u yet nɑ. K b tien yɑdɑ nɑn lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑn lin nbɑ k Yiesu pɑk nɑ.
43002023	Yiesu nbɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm mɑnŋ yuo nɑ, k niib bonciɑnn din lɑ bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k u tun nɑ k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ,
43002024	ŋɑɑn Yiesu din k jii u mɔnŋ k cɑb’b, k mɑɑn u din mi suɑ kul nbɑ tie wun nbɑ.
43002025	U din k luon suɑ n wɑnn’ɔ nifosɑɑlk po, k mɑɑn u din mi lin nbɑ be niib pɑlɑ ni nɑ.
43003001	Jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be k u sɑnn yi Niikodenm. U din tie Suifnbɑ yudɑɑnɔ e, k biɑ din tie Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ ni yenɔ,
43003002	k nyɑsiɑɔk k u tɑn bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, t mi nɑn Yennu tun’ɑ ɑ ɑ tɑn tumi’t e, k mɑɑn suɑ kɑn fit tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k ɑ tuun nɑ buolu, l i tie k Yennu k be nɑn’ɔ i kɑɑ.»
43003003	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’ɑ nɑ, suɑ kɑn fit k kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni, l i kii tie k b ŋɑnm mɑl’ɔ i kɑɑ.»
43003004	K Niikodenm boi’ɔ ɑ: «Nlee k b sɑɑ fit k ŋɑnm mɑl nilɔ nbɑ tie nikpel i? K mɑɑn u ji kɑn fit k ŋmɑt kuɑ u nɑɑ puol ni, k wun ŋɑnm mɑl’ɔ.»
43003005	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’ɑ, suɑ kɑn fit kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni, sie k b mɑl’ɔ nyun nɑn Foŋɑnm ni.
43003006	Nisɑɑlk mɑɑl nisɑɑlk, ŋɑɑn Foŋɑnm nɑ ŋɑnin mɑɑl Foŋɑnm yuɑ e.
43003007	L pɑɑk, ɑ dɑɑ te k l tie’ɑ bɑktnɔunŋ nɑn mɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Sie k b ŋɑnm mɑl i kul nɑ.›
43003008	Wounŋ dɑ wɑɑ luon siɑn e. A gbiɑ k u dɑ e, ŋɑɑn ɑ k mi wɑɑ nyi siɑn, k biɑ k mi wɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn. L mun biɑ tie nnɑ e k tul suɑ kul nbɑ k Foŋɑnm mɑl’ɔ nɑ.»
43003009	K Niikodenm boi’ɔ ɑ: «Nlee k l sɑɑ fit tien nnɑ?»
43003010	K Yiesu jiin’ɔ ɑ: «A tie Islɑɑeltieb wɑntieb yudɑɑnɔ, ŋɑɑn tɑn k gbɑt lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk ii?
43003011	Bɑlmɔni e k n yɑɑ n yet’ɑ, t piɑk lin nbɑ k t mi l po nɑ, k t muɑnt lin nbɑ k t lɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn k i k gɑɑn t mɑɑn.
43003012	L i tie k i k tien’n yɑdɑ, nɑn mɑɑ yet’i tingbounŋ nɑ bonɑ po nɑ, nlee k i ji sɑɑ tien’n yɑdɑ, l i tie k n yet’i Yendɔunŋ ni bonɑ po?
43003013	Suɑ kɑɑ k duo Yendɔunŋ ni sie Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nbɑ nyii Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ.»
43003014	Muois nbɑ din be muuk ni k fin kut wɑɑɔk k donn’ɔ dɑɑɔk pɑɑk nɑ, l mun biɑ tie nnɑ e k b tɑn sɑɑ jii Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ, k donn’ɔ sɑnpɑɑpo,
43003015	k bin nbɑ kul tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ, sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
43003016	K mɑɑn Yennu mɑntk din luon tingbounŋ nɑ niib bonciɑnn. L pɑɑk, k u tul’b u Bijɑyenml, k wun nbɑ tien u Bijɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ u tɑn kɑn kpo, ŋɑɑn u sii mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu,
43003017	k mɑɑn Yennu nbɑ din tun u Bijɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, u din k tun’ɔ ɑ wun tɑn bu tingbounŋ nɑ niib buut k biil’b kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u din yɑɑ wun fiel’b u Bijɑ mɑnŋ ni e.
43003018	K dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tie Yennu Bijɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ, Yennu kɑn bu u buut k biil’ɔ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ k tie’u yɑdɑ, Yennu ponŋ bu u yɑɑ buut k biil’ɔ wɑɑ, k mɑɑn u k tien ŋuɑ Yennu Bijɑyenml mɑnŋ yɑdɑ.
43003019	Lin nbɑ pɑɑk te k Yennu bu b buut k biil’b mɑnŋ tie nnɑ e: yentu din bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni ŋɑɑn k niib luon bunbɔnn k gɑl yentu mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn bɑɑ tuun biit nɑ pɑɑk.
43003020	Dɑɑnɔ kul nbɑ tuun bonbiil, u nɑn yentu mɑnŋ e, k k luon wuu nɑki’ɔ, k mɑɑn u k luon u biit nɑ n tɑn nyi pɑɑnu.
43003021	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ wɑɑ Yennu bɑlmɔni k biɑ tuun l biɑnŋ, ŋuɑ e bɑɑt yentu mɑnŋ buol, ɑ suɑ kul n bɑnn nɑn u tuonɑ kul, Yennu be l ni.
43003022	L puolpo e k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn Suude siɑl po, k sɑɑ be lenŋ nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnŋɑ nnɑ, k u din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu.
43003023	L yuo nɑ k suɑ k Sɑn din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu Ainɔn duo ni k l k fɔk nɑn Sɑɑliim k mɑɑn nyun din yɑb lenŋ. Niib din bɑɑt u buol ni k u wuul’b Yennu nyunwulu.
43003024	(L yuo nɑ k suɑ b dɑɑ din k kuɑn Sɑn dɑnsɑlk ni.)
43003025	Ŋɑnn e k mɔniɑɔk tɑn fiil Sɑn mɑnŋ puolpoweitieb nɑn Suifsuɑ nnɑ sinsuuk ni k jikt sɑɑ Suifnbɑ nbɑ tuu nit b nii nɑn b jɑɑnti nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ po.
43003026	K b sɑɑn Sɑn buol ni k sɑɑ yet’ɔ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, wun nbɑ dɑɑn be nɑn’ɑ Suulden kpenpuotl, k ɑ dɑɑ wɑnn’t u po nɑ, tɔn, u ji wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu k suɑ kul sɑɑ u buol ni.»
43003027	K Sɑn yet’b ɑ: «Nilɔ kɑn fit lɑ siɑl, l i kii tie k Yennu cɑb’ɔ.
43003028	I mɔnŋ gbɑt k n yet mɑɑ min kɑɑ tie Klistu, ŋɑɑn Yennu tun’n u tuɑnn.
43003029	Puosɔlɔ e tie wun nbɑ yen puoyuokl nɑ. Wun nbɑ tie puosɔlɔ nɑ yuɑk tuu be u buol k gbiin u mɑɑn k mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn wun gbɑt puosɔlɔ nɑ kunkɔl. Pɑlpienn mɑnŋ tie n yɑl k yɑb bonciɑnn k siɑl ji k tenn.
43003030	L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn ŋuɑ Klistu ii yɑbtl, ŋɑɑn k min ii wɑɑbt.»
43003031	Wun nbɑ nyii sɑnpɑɑpo, ŋuɑ e cie suɑ kul ɑ; wun nbɑ nyii tingbounŋ nɑ ni tie tingbounŋ nɑ nilɔ, k biɑ piɑk tingbounŋ bonɑ nɑ po. Wun nbɑ nyii Yendɔunŋ ni, ŋuɑ e cie suɑ kul.
43003032	U yien niib lin nbɑ k u lɑ k biɑ gbɑt, ŋɑɑn suɑ k gɑɑl u mɑɑn.
43003033	Wun nbɑ gɑɑl u mɑɑn mɑnŋ, l wɑnt nɑn ŋuɑ e sɑɑk nɑn Yennu mɑɑn mɑnŋ tie bɑlmɔni.
43003034	Wun nbɑ k Yennu tun’ɔ nɑ, u piɑk Yennu mɑɑn e, k mɑɑn Yennu tul’ɔ Foŋɑnm nbɑ yɑb k kɑɑ biknu.
43003035	Bɑɑ luon u Bijɑ, k kubn bonɑ kul u nuu ni.
43003036	Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien Bijɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, ŋɑɑn dɑɑnɔ nbɑ yet Bijɑ mɑnŋ, Yennu wutuol be u pɑɑk k u kɑn lɑ mɑnfuol mɑnŋ.
43004001	Tɔn, k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ din gbɑt ɑ Yiesu dɑɑk niib k wuul’b Yennu nyunwulu k b tie u puolpoweitieb, k b yɑb gɑl Sɑn yɑb ɑ.
43004002	Bɑlmɔni ŋɑnin e Yiesu din k wuul niib u mɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn u puolpoweitieb e din wuul’b.
43004003	Yiesu nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ, k u nyii Suude tinŋ ni k ŋmɑt sɑɑ Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni.
43004004	K u sɔnu mɑnŋ ni, k l tie tɑlɑs e nɑn wun gɑl Sɑɑmɑɑli tinŋ ni.
43004005	K yensuuk ni, wɑɑ din tɑn pel Sɑɑmɑɑliitieb digbɑnsiɑl ni, k b yi’l Siisɑɑl, k u bɑɑl nɑkn Sɑɑkɔb bunbunn buol. Lenŋ din k fɔk nɑn kpɑɑb nbɑ k Sɑɑkɔb din tul u bik Suosiɑf nɑ. Wɑɑ din tɑn pel bunbunn nɑ, k bɑknt ji din suol’ɔ k u bɑk k mɑɑn sonml nɑ pɑɑk, k u biɑl kɑl bunbunn nɑ nyɑkl.
43004007	Ŋɑnn e k Sɑɑmɑɑli puosuɑ tɑn bɑɑl bunbunn mɑnŋ buol, ɑ wun luun nyun. K Yiesu miɑl’ɔ ɑ: «Tul’n nyun k n nyu.»
43004008	(L yuo nɑ ɑmi k suɑ k u puolpoweitieb ponŋ sɑɑn duo ni wɑɑ, ɑ bin sɑɑ dɑɑ jiet.)
43004009	K puo nɑ ji boi’ɔ ɑ: «A tie Suif nilɔ e, k n mun tie Sɑɑmɑɑli puo e, k l tien nlee wɑɑ k ɑ tɑn mei’n nyun i?» (Suifnbɑ nɑ din tuu sinŋ Sɑɑmɑɑli niib e, k k luon bii tɑɑnt nɑn’m.)
43004010	K Yiesu din jiin’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ bo mi piini nbɑ k Yennu luon wun pi’ɑ nɑ, k biɑ mi mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ k mei’ɑ nyun nɑ, fin e bo sɑɑ boi’n nyun po k n sɑɑ tul’ɑ nyun nbɑ tien mɑnfuol.»
43004011	K puo nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, bunbunn nɑ sumi hei, k ɑ mun biɑ k mɔk guokɑ. Lee k ɑ sɑɑ luun mɑnfuol nyun mɑnŋ i?
43004012	T yejɑ Sɑɑkɔb din lukl bunbunn nɑ, k ŋuɑ nɑn u wɑɑs nɑn u bonkobt kul ɑ din nyu lenŋ e. A duki nɑn ɑ gɑl Sɑɑkɔb ɑmi?»
43004013	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wun nbɑ nyuu bunbunn nɑ nyun, nyun-nyuklu tɑn sɑɑ ŋɑnm suol’ɔ wɑɑ,
43004014	ŋɑɑn mi i tul wun nbɑ n nyun nɑ k u nyuu, nyun-nyuklu kɑn mi k suol’ɔ jik, k mɑɑn mi i tul suɑ n nyun nɑ, l sii buni mɑnfuol nyun e u ni, k biɑ sɑɑ tul’ɔ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.»
43004015	K puo nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, tul’n l nyun, k nyun-nyuklu ji dɑɑ mi k so’n, k n biɑ ji dɑɑ mi k bɑɑt nnɑ k tɑn lu nyun.»
43004016	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «I sɑɑ k sɑɑ yiin ɑ sɔlɔ k jen nɑn’ɔ nɑ.»
43004017	K u yet’ɔ ɑ: «N k mɔk sɔlɔ.» K Yiesu jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Fɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ ɑ k mɔk sɔlɔ nɑ, ŋɑnn ɑ mɔk mɔni,
43004018	k mɑɑn ɑ ponŋ kun jɑb bɑnŋmu ɑ, k juɑ nbɑ k ɑ dɑɑ be nɑn’ɔ mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ, u k tie ɑ sɔlɔ nɑn mɔni kɑɑ. A set pɑk mɔni e.»
43004019	K puo nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, n ji bɑnn nɑn ɑ tie Yennu sɔkni e.
43004020	T yejɑnm din jiɑntl Yennu juɑl nɑ pɑɑk e, ŋɑɑn k yinm Suifnbɑ ŋɑnin yɑɑ ɑ Selusɑɑlenm e tie siɑn nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn Yenjiɑntu.»
43004021	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnnɑɑ, tient’n yɑdɑ, yuo bɑɑt k niib tɑn kii jiɑntl Bɑɑ Yennu juɑl nɑ pɑɑk, k biɑ tɑn kii jiɑntl’ɔ Selusɑɑlenm mun biɑk.
43004022	Yinm Sɑɑmɑɑliitieb k mi yɑɑ jiɑntl wun nbɑ, ŋɑɑn tinm Suifnbɑ ŋɑnin mi tɑɑ jiɑntl wun nbɑ, k mɑɑn niib fielu nyii Suifnbɑ ni e.
43004023	Ŋɑɑn yuo bɑɑt, k l ponŋ set bɑɑl nɑ, k bin nbɑ jiɑntl Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ sii jiɑntl’ɔ b pɑlɑ ni nɑn mɔni, k mɑɑn l nibuolu e k Yennu luon bii jiɑntl’ɔ nnɑ.
43004024	Yennu tie siek e, k bin nbɑ jiɑntl’ɔ nɑ, l tie tɑlɑs e bii jiɑntl’ɔ b sei ni nɑn mɔni.»
43004025	K puo nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «N mi nɑn Meesi (wun nbɑ k b yi’u Klistu nɑ) tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ. U i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, u sɑɑ wɑnn’t mɑɑn kul ɑ.»
43004026	K Yiesu jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Min e nɑ, min nbɑ piɑk nɑn’ɑ nɑ.»
43004027	L yuo mɑnŋ e k Yiesu puolpoweitieb jen, k l tien’m bɑktnɔunŋ nɑn Yiesu nbɑ tɑn piɑk nɑn puo, ŋɑɑn b suɑ k boi ɑ: «A luon bee?» kuo: «Bee k ɑ tɑn piɑk nɑn puo o?».
43004028	Ŋɑnn e k puo nɑ nyik u nyunsuɑl nɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt sɑɑn duo nɑ ni, k sɑɑ yiin niib ɑ:
43004029	«I bɑɑl mɑn, k tɑn got juɑ nbɑ yet’n bonsiɑl kul nbɑ k n ponŋ mi tun. Pɑsiɑl u k tie Klistu kɑɑ ɑɑ?»
43004030	Ŋɑnn e, k b nyii duo nɑ ni k sɑɑn Yiesu penŋ.
43004031	Yuo nbɑ k puo nɑ dɑɑ din piɑk nɑn niib duo nɑ ni nɑ, k Yiesu puolpoweitieb bɑln’mɔ, k yɑɑ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, dimin jiet.»
43004032	K Yiesu jiin’m yɑɑ ɑ: «Min mɔk jiet nbɑ k n sɑɑ di, ŋɑɑn k i k mi l po.»
43004033	K u puolpoweitieb ji boi b lieb ɑ: «I mi suɑ tɑn sii tul’ɔ jiet i?»
43004034	K Yiesu jiin’m: «Min yɑɑ jiet tie mɑn cɔln wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ lonm e, k biɑ tun tuonn nbɑ k u tul’n nɑ gbenn.»
43004035	«B tuu k yet ɑ: ‹L tenn ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnnɑ e nɑn bin jɑɑn dii ii?› Ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin yien’i e, gotl mɑn. Dii biel ɑ; k l jɑnŋ nɑn bin jɑɑn ɑ.
43004036	Dijɑɑntieb lɑɑt b pɑɑɔk o, k tiki dibin nbɑ sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu k ŋɑnn e sɑɑ te k wun nbɑ buul nɑn wun nbɑ jɑɑn dii mɑnŋ sii mɔk pɑlpienn.
43004037	T mɔk bɑljouk, k l yiin ɑ: ‹Yenɔ e buul, k luɑ mun jɑɑn,› k l set tie mɔni.
43004038	Min tun’i ɑ yin jɑɑn dii siɑn nbɑ k i k kuo. Siɑb e ponŋ kuo wɑɑ, k i mun lɑɑt nyuɑt b tuonn pɑɑk.»
43004039	Sɑɑmɑɑli duo mɑnŋ ni niib bonciɑnn gbɑt puo nɑ nbɑ yien’m yɑɑ ɑ: «U yet’n bonsiɑl kul nbɑ k n ponŋ mi k tun,» k b tien Yiesu yɑdɑ.
43004040	Ŋɑnn e, bɑɑ bɑɑl bunbunn nɑ buol ni Yiesu penŋ, k b bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun biɑl kii be nɑn’m. K Yiesu sɑk k biɑl be nɑn’m dɑɑ ŋɑnle,
43004041	k u mɑɑn nɑ pɑɑk k b bonciɑnn din tien’ɔ yɑdɑ k pukn.
43004042	L yuo nɑ k b yet puo nɑ: «Tɑɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ, l k tie fɑɑ yien’t u po nɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn tɑɑ gbɑt u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mɑɑn nɑ pɑɑk e k t tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, k bɑnn nɑn ŋuɑ e set tie tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb Fietuɑ.»
43004043	L dɑɑ ŋɑnle puolpo e, k Yiesu nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni.
43004044	(U mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ponŋ yet ɑ: «Yennu sɔkni kɑn lɑ nibɑɑkl u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ duo ni.»)
43004045	Ŋɑɑn wɑɑ din bɑɑl Gɑɑliile yuo nbɑ, niib nɑ din gɑɑl’ɔ, k mɑɑn b mun dɑɑn sɑɑn yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm Selusɑɑlenm, k lɑ lin nbɑ kul k u ponŋ tun Selusɑɑlenm ni jɑɑnm mɑnŋ yuo nɑ.
43004046	Wɑɑ din lin Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni nɑ, k u din sɑɑn Kɑɑnɑ, siɑn nbɑ k u din te k nyun kpɑnt dɑmunŋ nɑ. K yudɑɑnsuɑ din be Kɑpelnɑunm, k u bijɑ din yiɑl.
43004047	K wɑɑ din gbɑt ɑ Yiesu nyii Suude k bɑɑl Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni nɑ, k u bɑɑl u penŋ, k bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun bɑɑl Kɑpelnɑunm, ɑ k tɑn te k u bijɑ n pɑɑk, k mɑɑn u yɑɑ wun kpo e.
43004048	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie k i k lɑ nyinɑ nɑn bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ ii kɑɑ, i kɑn tien’n yɑdɑ.»
43004049	K yudɑɑnɔ nɑ jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, ŋɑɑnt tin sɑɑn, k n bik dɑɑ k kpo nɑ.»
43004050	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «I kun. A bijɑ nɑ pɑɑk ɑ.» Ŋɑnn e k yudɑɑnɔ nɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yiesu nbɑ pɑk’ɔ lin nbɑ mɑnŋ, k ji ŋmɑt kun.
43004051	U sɔnu ni e k u tuontunnɑ cet’ɔ nɑn lɑbɑɑl ɑ: «A bik nɑ pɑɑk ɑ.»
43004052	K u boi’b ɑ: «Nlee yuo e k bik mɑnŋ pɑɑk i?» K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wonn, kut yonm yenlekl, k bik nɑ gbɑnu won mɑɑk.»
43004053	K juɑ nɑ tiɑl nɑn l yuo e tie yuo nbɑ k Yiesu won yet’ɔ ɑ: «A bijɑ nɑ pɑɑk ɑ,» nɑ. L pɑɑk k ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb kul ɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ.
43004054	Nɑ e tie bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnn nbɑ pukn munle, yuo nbɑ k Yiesu nyii Suude tinŋ ni k bɑɑl Gɑɑliile.
43005001	L puolpo e k Suifnbɑ jɑɑnsiɑb tɑn bɑɑl, k Yiesu sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm.
43005002	Lenŋ e k biɑɔnŋ nɑn nyun din be, k bɑkt ŋɑnŋmu din cɑɑn lint ɑ, k Suifnbɑ mɑɑn ni, b din yi’l Betesdɑ, k l kpiɑ nɑn Pei Tɑnmɔb.
43005003	K bɑɑtb bonciɑnn din tuu duɑ lenŋ, k siɑb tie juɑni, k siɑb mun tie diɑni, k siɑb mun tie gbɑnɑnkpienɑ dɑnm. (B tuu duɑ k guu nyun nɑ e, ɑ lin dɑnm.
43005004	Yosɑu tuuk Yennu mɑlɑksuɑ tuu sik e k dɑnm nyun mɑnŋ. Yuo nbɑ k u dɑnm nyun mɑnŋ, k bɑɑtɔ nbɑ sint sik nyun nɑ ni, u yiɑlu tuu gbenn e.)
43005005	Tɔn, k jɑsuɑ din be l buol, k din yiɑl binɑ piintɑ nɑn ŋɑnniin.
43005006	K Yiesu tɑn bɑɑl lɑ k u duɑ l buol, k bɑnn nɑn juɑ mɑnŋ yiɑlu wei wɑɑ, k u boi’ɔ: «A luon k ɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ ɑɑ?»
43005007	K bɑɑtɔ nɑ jiin ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, nyun nɑ ii dɑnm yuo nbɑ, n k mɔk suɑ nbɑ sɑɑ jii’n sikn’n l ni. K mi i tuu yɑɑ n sik, suɑ tuu dɔnŋ k sik e, ŋɑɑn nyik’n.»
43005008	K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «Fiit, k jii ɑ duɑnu kii sonm.»
43005009	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k juɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k fiil k jii u duɑnu k sonm sɑɑ. Dɑɑl nbɑ k juɑ nɑ din lɑ lɑɑfiɑ nɑ din tie Fuondɑɑl e.
43005010	L pɑɑk e tien k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm din yet’ɔ ɑ: «Dinnɑ tie Fuondɑɑl e. T senni k cɑb nɑn fɑn jii ɑ duɑnu kii sonm nɑn’n.»
43005011	K u jiin ɑ: «Juɑ nbɑ te k n pɑɑk nɑ, ŋuɑ e yet’n ɑ n jii n duɑnu mɑnŋ kii sɑɑ nɑn’n.»
43005012	K b boi’ɔ ɑ: «Jɑlɑnɔ po e yet’ɑ ɑ ɑ jii ɑ duɑnu mɑnŋ kii sɑɑ nɑn’n i?»
43005013	Ŋɑɑn juɑ nɑ ji din k mi wun nbɑ din te k u pɑɑk jik, k mɑɑn Yiesu ji din ponŋ kuɑ nibul nɑ ni k juɑ nɑ ji k lɑ’u.
43005014	L puolpo e k Yiesu ji lon juɑ nɑ, k tɑn lɑ’u Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Gotl, ɑ ji pɑɑk ɑ. A ji dɑɑ mi k tuun biit, nnɑ i kɑɑ siɑl ɑ bonbisiɑl tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl’ɑ k gɑl nnɑ.»
43005015	Yiesu nbɑ pɑk nɑn juɑ nɑ, k juɑ nɑ nyii k sɑɑn Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ buol k sɑɑ yet’b ɑ: «Yiesu e te k n pɑɑk.»
43005016	L pɑɑk te k yudɑnm mɑnŋ ji piin Yiesu muksuk, k mɑɑn wɑɑ te k juɑ nɑ pɑɑk Fuondɑɑl nɑ pɑɑk.
43005017	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu din yet’b ɑ: «N Bɑɑ tun tuun e, k n mun tuun nnɑ e.»
43005018	L pɑɑk e k Suifnbɑ mɑnŋ ŋɑnm donn wutuol k luon bin kpi’u k gɑl sinsinn nɑ. B dukn nɑn l k tie wɑɑ biil Fuondɑɑl senni nɑ pɑɑk kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ biɑ jii u mɔnŋ k yekn nɑn Yennu, k yɑɑ ɑ Yennu tie u Bɑɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
43005019	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, Yennu Bijɑ k fit tuun siɑl u kuukuɑ. U lɑɑt u Bɑɑ nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ e, k mun tuun. Lin nbɑ kul k Bɑɑ mɑnŋ tuun nɑ, u Bijɑ mun tuun ŋɑnn e.
43005020	K mɑɑn Bɑɑ mɑnŋ luon u Bijɑ, k wɑnt’ɔ lin nbɑ kul k u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ tuun. K u biɑ sɑɑ wɑnn’ɔ bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ wuu tuun, k lin gɑl lin nbɑ k i lɑ nɑ, k l sɑɑ tien’i bɑktnɔunŋ.
43005021	Bɑɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ fiint kpienm k tien’m mɑnfuol nɑ, nnɑ e mun, k u Bijɑ nɑ mun sɑɑ tul bin nbɑ k u lukt’b nɑ mɑnfuol.
43005022	«Bɑɑ mɑnŋ k bu suɑ buut, ŋɑɑn u cɑb u Bijɑ e, ɑ wuu bu niib buut,
43005023	ɑ k suɑ kul i tien u Bijɑ bɑɑkl nɑn bɑɑ tien Bɑɑ mɑnŋ bɑɑkl biɑnŋ nbɑ. Wun nbɑ k tie u Bijɑ nɑ bɑɑkl, u biɑ k tien u Bɑɑ nbɑ tun’ɔ nɑ bɑɑkl.
43005024	«Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ gbɑt n mɑɑn nɑ, k biɑ tien wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ yɑdɑ, ŋuɑ e mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k Yennu kɑn bu u buut k biil’ɔ. U biɑ ponŋ nyii kuun nuu ni wɑɑ, k be mɑnfuol mɑnŋ ni e.
43005025	«Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, yuo bɑɑt, k l ponŋ bɑɑl ɑ, k kpienm tɑn sɑɑ gbɑt Yennu Bijɑ kunkɔl, k bin nbɑ gbɑt kunkɔl mɑnŋ sii be mɑnfuol ni.
43005026	Bɑɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ yen mɑnfuol k tien niib nɑ, nnɑ e mun k u cɑb ɑ u Bijɑ mun i yen mɑnfuol kii tien niib,
43005027	k u biɑ cɑb’ɔ yiikuo ɑ wuu bu niib buut, k mɑɑn u Bijɑ tie Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ e.
43005028	I dɑɑ te k l tie’i yɑɑl-lituk u. Yuo bɑɑt k kpienm kul tɑn sɑɑ gbɑt Yennu Bijɑ kunkɔl,
43005029	k fiil. Bin nbɑ tun bonŋɑnn, b tɑn sɑɑ fiil k be b mɑnfuol ni, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ mun tun bonbiil nɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ fiil, k u sɑɑ bu b buut k biil’b.
43005030	«N kɑn fit tun siɑl n mɔnŋ. Mi i bu nilɔ buut biɑnŋ nbɑ, Yennu e tuu yet’n ɑ n bu. L pɑɑk e tien k n buut ŋɑn, k mɑɑn n k luon k n tun n mɔnŋ yɑnbuɑtuonɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n tuun Yennu nbɑ tun’n nɑ yɑnbuɑtuonɑ e.»
43005031	«N pinpɑɔk nɑ e wɑnt mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ, ŋɑɑn l k mɔk nyuɑt.
43005032	Ŋɑɑn suɑ e be wɑɑ, k piɑk wɑnt niib mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ, k n mi nɑn wɑɑ piɑk n po mɑnŋ, l tie bɑlmɔni e.
43005033	«Tɔn, i tun i niib Sɑn buol, k u jii l bɑlmɔni k tul’i.
43005034	L k kpɑɑ tɑlɑs kɑɑ nɑn nilɔ n pɑk n po, ŋɑɑn n yien’i lin nbɑ nɑ e ɑ yin lɑ fielu.
43005035	Sɑn mɑnŋ dɑɑn tie nɑn fitl nbɑ k b tuu juo, k l yentu nyɔkt nɑ e, k i dɑɑn jii yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ k niɑn u yentu mɑnŋ.
43005036	«Ŋɑɑn siɑl be k wɑnt n siɑlɑ k cie Sɑn siɑlɑ nɑ k mɑɑn bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ yɑɑ mii tuun, k n biɑ tuun nɑ, ŋɑnn e wɑnt nɑn Bɑɑ mɑnŋ tun’n.
43005037	Bɑɑ mɑnŋ wɑnt n siɑlɑ. I k mi gbɑt u kunkɔl, k biɑ k mi lɑ’u nɑn i ninbinɑ,
43005038	k u mɑɑn biɑ kɑɑ i pɑlɑ ni, k mɑɑn i k tien wun nbɑ k u tun’ɔ nɑ yɑdɑ.
43005039	«Tɔn, i lek tuu lii Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ, k mɑɑn i tuu duki mi ɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu be lenŋ e, k Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk mɑnŋ wɑnt n po,
43005040	ŋɑɑn k i lek yet nɑn k i bɑɑl n penŋ k n tul’i mɑnfuol mɑnŋ.
43005041	«N k luon nisɑɑlk pɑku,
43005042	ŋɑɑn n mi i po nɑn i k luon Yennu i pɑlɑ ni fɑb ɑ.
43005043	N bɑɑl n Bɑɑ sɑnn ni e, k i k gɑɑl’n. Ŋɑɑn l i tie k suɑ bɑɑl u mɔnŋ sɑnn ni, i tuu gɑɑl’ɔ e.
