43005044	I tuu luon k i gɑɑl i lieb pɑku e, ŋɑɑn i tuu k luon bɑnnu nbɑ k i sɑɑ lɑ Yennu nbɑ tie Yen-yenml nɑ pɑku. Nlee k i mun sɑɑ fit tien’n yɑdɑ?
43005045	I dɑɑ duki nɑn n sɑɑ tɑɑl’i n Bɑɑ buol. Muois tie wun nbɑ sɑɑ tɑɑl’i. Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ k i dɑɑn u po nɑ.
43005046	I setk i bo i tien Muois diɑni yɑdɑ, i bo sɑɑ tien’n yɑdɑ wɑɑ mun, k mɑɑn u din diɑn pɑk n po e.
43005047	Ŋɑɑn yɑɑ k tien wɑɑ din diɑn lin nbɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ nɑ, nlee k i ji sɑɑ tien n mɑɑn yɑdɑ?»
43006001	L puolpo k Yiesu ŋmɑt puot Gɑɑliile mɔkgbenŋl nbɑ k b biɑ yi’l Tiibeliɑt mɔkgbenŋl nɑ puotl.
43006002	K nibulciɑɔnŋ din wɑɑ u puolpo, k mɑɑn b din lɑ u bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k u din tuun k te k bɑɑtb pɑɑk nɑ.
43006003	K Yiesu din duo juɑl pɑɑk k sɑɑ kɑl nɑn u puolpoweitieb.
43006004	L yuo k suɑ k Juifnbɑ yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm pel nɑ.
43006005	Yiesu nbɑ din kɑl mɑnŋ nɑ, k u tɑn got lɑ k nibulciɑɔnŋ bɑɑt u penŋ. K u tɑn boi Fiiliip ɑ: «T sɑɑ lɑ jiet lee k dɑɑ, k dinn niib nɑ kul i?»
43006006	U din boi nnɑ mɑnŋ k luon wun bikn Fiiliip e, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ ŋɑnin ponŋ din mi wɑɑ sɑɑ tun lin nbɑ e wɑɑ.
43006007	K Fiiliip jiin ɑ: «T i yɑɑ t dɑɑ pɑɑnu k tul niib nɑ, l sɑɑ fit di nɑn denienbɑ kobi ŋɑnle (200) nɑ wɑɑ, k suɑ kul n fit lɑ wɑɑn.»
43006008	K u puolpoweitelieb ni yenɔ nbɑ k b yi u sɑnn Andle, wun nbɑ din tie Siimɔn Piɑl ninjɑ nɑ, yet Yiesu ɑ:
43006009	«Bisiɑk e be nnɑ k mɔk pɑɑni ŋɑnŋmu nɑn jɑni ŋɑnle. Ŋɑɑn l sɑɑ tien nlee k jɑnŋ nɑn nibul nɑ kul i?»
43006010	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k niib mɑnŋ n kɑl.» Pɑɑnu din be k mɔk mɔpɑɑɔnŋ lenŋ, k jɑb nɑ din kɑl, k b din tie nɑn tusɑ ŋɑnŋmu na.
43006011	K Yiesu jii pɑɑnu nɑ, k tul Yennu niipuouk, ŋɑɑn te k b tol niib nbɑ kɑl mɑnŋ, k u biɑ jii jɑni nɑ k tien nnɑ, k b kul ɑ din dii k sɑɑ jɑnŋ bɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ.
43006012	Bɑɑ gbuo yuo nbɑ, k u yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ bin lɑkn jiet nbɑ tenn nɑ, ɑ k l dɑɑ biil.
43006013	K b lɑkn pɑɑni ŋɑnŋmu bulɑ nbɑ k nibul nɑ dii ŋɑɑn tenn nɑ, k gbien kpɑncubt piik nɑn ŋɑnle.
43006014	Niib mɑnŋ nbɑ lɑ bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnn nbɑ k Yiesu tun nɑ, k b yet ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e setk, nilɔ nɑ e tie Yennu sɔkni nbɑ din tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑ.»
43006015	K Yiesu ji bɑnn nɑn b yɑɑ bin suol’ɔ k din’ɔ nɑɑn e. L pɑɑk e te k u nyik’b ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt juɑl pɑɑk u kuukuɑ, k sɑɑ be.
43006016	Dɑɑjuouk nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl, k Yiesu puolpoweitieb sik sɑɑn mɔkgbenŋl ni,
43006017	k sɑɑn kuɑ bulgbetl k kɑn sɑɑ, k sɑɑ puotl mɔkgbenŋl nɑ, k tuok Kɑpelnɑunm. L yuo nɑ din tie nyiɑɔk o, k Yiesu dɑɑ k bɑɑl b buol.
43006018	K wonpɑɑluk tɑn fikt k dɑ nyun nɑ pɑɑk.
43006019	Yuo nbɑ k u puolpoweitieb kɑn sɑɑn nɑn kiiluomiɑtɑ ŋɑnŋmu ɑmi ŋɑnluob nɑ, k b lɑ Yiesu sonm nyun pɑɑk k tuokt bulgbetl mɑnŋ, k jɑŋmɑɑni ji suol’b.
43006020	K Yiesu yet’b: «I dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni mɑn. Min e.»
43006021	Ŋɑnn e, k b luon bin jii’u k kuɑn’ɔ bulgbetl nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn k l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k bulgbetl sie bɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn nbɑ nɑ gbingbɑnn.
43006022	Lɑɑ yent yuo nbɑ nɑ, niib nbɑ din biɑl mɔk-puotl po nɑ, lɑ nɑn bulgbetyenn kuɑ won be. B mi nɑn Yiesu won k kuɑ bulgbetl nɑn u puolpoweitieb ŋɑɑn k ŋɑnm e won fiil k sɑɑn b kuukuɑ.
43006023	Bulgbetliɑ biɑ nyii Tiibeliɑt k bɑɑt k pel siɑn nbɑ niib won dii jiet nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ won tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk nɑ.
43006024	Nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ nbɑ lɑ nɑn Yiesu kɑɑ lenŋ nɑ, k u puolpoweitieb biɑ kɑɑ nɑ, k b sɑɑn kuɑ bulgbetɑ nɑ ni, k sɑɑn Kɑpelnɑunm, ɑ bin sɑɑ lon’mɔ.
43006025	Niib nɑ nbɑ din puot mɔkgbenŋl mɑnŋ nɑ, k b lɑ Yiesu, k boi’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, ɑ bɑɑl nnɑ nlee yuo e?»
43006026	K Yiesu yet’b: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, mɑɑ won tul’i jiet k i dii k gbuo nɑ e, ŋɑnn e te k i luon’n mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn l k tie yɑɑ lɑ n bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nɑ kɑɑ.
43006027	I dɑɑ tuun tuonn jiet nbɑ sɑɑ fit biil pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ii tuun tuonn jiet nbɑ tien niib mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu pɑɑk. Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ sɑɑ tul’i l jebuolu, k mɑɑn u Bɑɑ Yennu dɔk’ɔ u dɔuk k l wɑnn nɑn Bijɑ mɑnŋ mɔk u Bɑɑ yiikuo.»
43006028	Ŋɑnn e k b boi’ɔ ɑ: «T sɑɑ tien nlee k fit tun tuonɑ nbɑ k Yennu luon nɑ?»
43006029	K Yiesu jiin’m ɑ: «Tuonn nɑ e k Yennu luon k yii tuun, ɑ yin tien wun nbɑ k u tun’ɔ nɑ yɑdɑ.»
43006030	K b biɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnlɑnn po e k ɑ sɑɑ tun k wɑnn’t, k tin lɑ k tien’ɑ yɑdɑ? Tuonlɑnn po e k ɑ sɑɑ tun i?
43006031	T yejɑnm nbɑ din be muuk ni yuo nbɑ nɑ, b din tuu di jiet nbɑ k b yi’l mɑnn nɑ, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ɑ: ‹U din tien’m pɑɑnu nbɑ nyi Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ ɑ bii di.› »
43006032	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, l k tie Muois kɑɑ tul’i pɑɑnu mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn n Bɑɑ e tie wun nbɑ tul’i mɔmɔnm pɑɑnu nbɑ nyi Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ.
43006033	Pɑɑnu nbɑ k Yennu jii tien’i mɑnŋ, ŋɑnn e tie wun nbɑ nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k tien tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb mɑnfuol.»
43006034	K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, ii tien’t pɑɑnu nɑ dɑɑl kul.»
43006035	K u yet’b ɑ: «Min e tie mɑnfuol pɑɑnu mɑnŋ. Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ bɑɑl n buol ni, kon kɑn mi k suol l dɑɑnɔ, k wun nbɑ mun tien’n yɑdɑ, nyun-nyuklu kɑn mi k suol’ɔ.
43006036	«Ŋɑɑn n ponŋ yet’i nɑn i lɑ’n ɑ, ŋɑɑn k k tien’n yɑdɑ.
43006037	Wun nbɑ kul k n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ jii’u k tul’n nɑ, sɑɑ bɑɑl n buol ni, k n kɑn mi bel wun nbɑ bɑɑl n buol ni,
43006038	k mɑɑn n nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k sik nɑ mɑɑ n tun wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ yɑnbuɑtuonn e, ŋɑɑn l k tie n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ yɑnbuɑt kɑɑ.
43006039	Wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ lonm tie nnɑ e, ɑ n dɑɑ buont bin nbɑ k u tul’n nɑ nɑn yenɔ kuukuɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn tɑn fiin’m kuun ni tingbounŋ cincɑɑtdɑɑl.
43006040	Nnɑ e k n Bɑɑ Yennu luon, ɑ wun nbɑ lɑ u Bijɑ k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, u sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k n tɑn sɑɑ fiin’m kuun ni tingbounŋ cincɑɑtdɑɑl.»
43006041	Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ mɑnŋ ji buln buln nɑn lieb, ɑ k mɑɑn wɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ ŋuɑ e tie pɑɑnu nbɑ nyii Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ pɑɑk.
43006042	K b boi lieb ɑ: «U k tie Yiesu wun nbɑ tie Suosiɑf bijɑ nɑ kɑɑ nɑ ɑɑ? T mi u bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ. Nlee k u yɑɑ ɑ u nyii Yendɔunŋ ni?»
43006043	K Yiesu jiin k yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ buln nɑn lieb mɑn.
43006044	Suɑ kɑn fit k bɑɑl n buol ni k tien n yuɑ, k l k tie k Bɑɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ tun’n nɑ kɑɑ te k u bɑɑl, k n tɑn sɑɑ fiin l dɑɑnɔ kuun ni tingbounŋ cincɑɑtdɑɑl.
43006045	Yennu sɔkniinbɑ din diɑn ɑ: ‹Yennu sɑɑ tumi suɑ kul.› Bin nbɑ kul gbiintl Bɑɑ mɑnŋ k biɑ gbiɑ, ŋɑnm e sɑɑ bɑɑl n penŋ.
43006046	L k tie suɑ mi lɑ Bɑɑ mɑnŋ sie wun nbɑ nyii u buol ni, ŋuɑ kuukuɑ e lɑ’u.
43006047	«Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien’n yɑdɑ, ŋuɑ e mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
43006048	Min e tie mɑnfuol pɑɑnu nɑ.
43006049	Yuo nbɑ k i yejɑnm din tuu be muuk ni nɑ, b din tuu di mɑnn mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn b kpo wɑɑ.
43006050	Ŋɑɑn pɑɑnu nbɑ nyi Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ be nnɑ, k wun nbɑ dii’l, u kɑn kpo.
43006051	Min e tie mɑnfuol pɑɑnu mɑnŋ nbɑ nyii Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ k sik. L i tie k suɑ dii pɑɑnu mɑnŋ, u sii be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Pɑɑnu nbɑ k n sɑɑ tul tie n gbɑnɑnt e, k n tɑn sɑɑ tul’l ɑ tingbounŋ ŋɑɑtieb n lɑ mɑnfuol.»
43006052	Ŋɑnn e k mɔniɑɔk fiil Suifnbɑ mɑnŋ sinsuuk ni, k b boi b lieb: «Nlee k juɑ nɑ sɑɑ tul’t u gbɑnɑnt k tin di i?»
43006053	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, sie k i ŋmɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ gbɑnɑnt, k biɑ nyuu u sɔn. Nnɑ e kɑɑ, i kii mɔk mɑnfuol mɑnŋ i ni.
43006054	K dɑɑnɔ nbɑ ŋmɑn n gbɑnɑnt k biɑ nyuu n sɔn, u mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k n tɑn sɑɑ fiin’ɔ kuun ni tingbounŋ cincɑɑtdɑɑl.
43006055	K mɑɑn n gbɑnɑnt tie jiet nɑn bɑlmɔni, k n sɔn mun tie dɑɑn nɑn bɑlmɔni.
43006056	Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ ŋmɑn n gbɑnɑnt, k biɑ nyuu n sɔn, ŋuɑ e be n ni, k n mun be u ni.
43006057	«Bɑɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ yen mɑnfuol nɑ tun’n, k l pɑɑk k n mun mɔk mɑnfuol, nnɑ e mun, wun nbɑ ŋmɑn n gbɑnɑnt nɑ, n pɑɑk k u sii mɔk mɑnfuol mɑnŋ.
43006058	Nɑ e tie pɑɑnu nbɑ nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k sik. L k nɑɑn nɑn lin nbɑ k i yejɑnm din di muuk ni k biɑ kpo nɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ di pɑɑnu mɑnŋ sii be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.»
43006059	Yiesu e din pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ, wɑɑ dɑɑ din be Kɑpelnɑunm, Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni, k tumi niib nɑ.
43006060	Yiesu puolpoweitieb bonciɑnn nbɑ din gbɑt u wɑnnu mɑnŋ, k b yien b lieb ɑ: «Wɑnnu nɑ pɑɑl bonciɑnn. Ŋmee sɑɑ fit gɑɑl’l i?»
43006061	Yiesu din bɑnn nɑn u puolpoweitieb nɑ mɔk bunbulmi u wɑnnu mɑnŋ pɑɑk. L pɑɑk, k u boi’b ɑ: «Mɑɑn mɑnŋ kpɑɑ i kpiɑni ee?
43006062	L i tie k i lɑ Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ do Yendɔunŋ ni siɑn nbɑ k u din tuu be nɑ, i ji sii duki nlee?
43006063	Foŋɑnm e tien niib mɑnfuol. Gbɑnɑnt nɑ tie yɑnn e. Mɑɑn nbɑ k n pɑk’i nɑ e tie Foŋɑnm nɑn mɑnfuol.
43006064	Ŋɑɑn i siɑb lek k tien’n yɑdɑ.» Yiesu din pɑk’b lin nbɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn u ponŋ mi sinsinn bin nbɑ tɑn kɑn tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, nɑn wun nbɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ kuɑt’ɔ.
43006065	K u biɑ ŋɑnm yet ɑ: «L pɑɑk e te k n yien’i ɑ suɑ kɑn fit bɑɑl n buol ni, sie k Bɑɑ mɑnŋ e cɑb’ɔ.»
43006066	L yuo nɑ k ji sɑɑ, k u puolpoweitieb bonciɑnn ji din ŋmɑt puol, k ji k tɔki nɑn’ɔ.
43006067	Ŋɑnn e k u din boi u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nbɑ nɑ ɑ: «K i mun sɑɑ nyik’n ɑɑ?»
43006068	K Siimɔn Piɑl jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, k t mun ji sɑɑ nyik’ɑ ŋɑɑn sɑɑn ŋmee buol i? Fin e mɔk mɑɑn nbɑ tien niib mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
43006069	T tien’ɑ yɑdɑ wɑɑ k mi nɑn fin e tie Yennu niŋɑnɔ.»
43006070	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Yinm jɑb piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ, min kɑɑ lukt’i ni ii? Ŋɑɑn k i ni yenɔ tie Sɑɑtɑn yuɑ.»
43006071	(U din yien Suudɑ wun nbɑ tie Siimɔn Iskɑɑliɑɔt bijɑ nɑ po e. Ŋuɑ e din tie u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ ni yenɔ, ŋɑɑn lek yɑɑ wun kuɑt’ɔ.)
43007001	L kul nɑ puolpo e k Yiesu ji din be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni, ŋɑɑn lin lenŋ digbɑnɑ ni. U din k luon wuu lin Suude tinŋ ni, k mɑɑn Suifnbɑ yudɑnm din luon bin kpi’u.
43007002	Suifnbɑ jɑɑnm nbɑ k b yi’l lɑnbont jɑɑnm nɑ tɑn pel.
43007003	K Yiesu ninjɑnm yet’ɔ ɑ: «Nyikn nnɑ, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn Suude tinŋ ni, k ɑ puolpoweitieb n lɑ tuonɑ nbɑ k ɑ tuun nɑ.
43007004	L i tie k suɑ luon wun wɑnn niib wɑɑ tie wun nbɑ, l k ŋɑn k wun bɔl tuonɑ nbɑ k u tuun. K mɑɑn fɑɑ tuun tuonɑ mɑnŋ nɑ, l ŋɑn fɑn wɑnn niib tuonɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑnu ni.»
43007005	(U ninjɑnm nɑ lek din k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.)
43007006	K Yiesu jiin’m ɑ: «N yuo dɑɑ k bɑɑl, ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin sɑɑ fit sɑɑn yuo nbɑ kul k i luon.
43007007	Tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb kɑn fit nɑn’i, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin b nɑn’n, k mɑɑn n yien’m nɑn b tuonɑ bi.
43007008	Tɔn, yinm i sɑɑ jɑɑnm mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin dɑɑ k sɑɑ, k mɑɑn n sinsɑɑn-yuo dɑɑ k bɑɑl.»
43007009	Wɑɑ wɑnn’b nnɑ k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k u biɑl Gɑɑliile.
43007010	Yiesu ninjɑnm nɑ nbɑ din sɑɑn jɑɑnm nɑ, k l puolpo k Yiesu mun tɑn wei k sɑɑn. U din k sɑɑn pieee pieee kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u din bɔl e k sɑɑn.
43007011	K Suifnbɑ yudɑnm din lin k luon’ɔ jɑɑnm mɑnŋ ni, k boi niib ɑ: «U be lee?»
43007012	K niib bonciɑnn nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ lɔkn k piɑk bonciɑnn k jikt sɑɑ u po, k siɑb yɑɑ ɑ: «U tie niŋɑnɔ e,» k lieb yɑɑ ɑ: «Aɑi, u kpɑnn niib nɑ e,»
43007013	ŋɑɑn suɑ din k pɑk u po pɑɑnu ni, k mɑɑn b tiin Suifnbɑ yudɑnm jɑŋmɑɑni e.
43007014	K jɑɑnm nɑ yuo sinsuuk ni, k Yiesu sɑɑn kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k piin k tumi niib.
43007015	K l tien Suifnbɑ bɑktnɔunŋ, k b boi ɑ: «Nlee k nilɔ nɑ mɑntk mɔk yɑn nnɑ, ŋɑɑn k k kuɑ t sɑkul i?»
43007016	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Mɑɑ wɑnt wɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, l k tie n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ wɑnnu kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l nyii Yennu wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ buol e.
43007017	Wun nbɑ luon wun tun Yennu yɑnbuɑtuonɑ, ŋuɑ e sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn lin nbɑ k n piɑk k wɑnt nɑ nyii Yennu buol ɑmi n buol e.
43007018	Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ piɑk u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ wɑnnu, ŋuɑ luon yudɑnt k tien u mɔnŋ e. Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ luon ɑ wun nbɑ tun’ɔ nɑ n lɑ yudɑnt, ŋuɑ e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ piɑk mɔmɔnm k fɑɑk kɑɑ u ni.
43007019	«Muois kɑɑ din tul’i t senni ii? Ŋɑɑn i suɑ k diɑ l senni mɑnŋ. K bee k i luon k i kpi’n i?»
43007020	K niib nbɑ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Nɑlnbiiuk be ɑ ni. Ŋmee yɑɑ wun kpi’ɑ ni?»
43007021	K Yiesu jiin yet’b ɑ: «N tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnyenn k l tien’i kul ɑ bɑktnɔunŋ.
43007022	K mɑɑn Muois nbɑ din tul’i punpotu sennu nɑ pɑɑk (ŋɑɑn Muois kɑɑ din piin, i yejɑnm e din piin) k i sɑɑk k poli punɑ Fuondɑɑl.
43007023	Tɔn, l i tie k i pot bonjɑbik Fuondɑɑl, ɑ i dɑɑ biil Muois senni e, nlee k i donn wutuol n pɑɑk ɑ mɑɑ te k bɑɑtɔ pɑɑk Fuondɑɑl nɑ?
43007024	Dɑɑ goli nilɔ nɑn-yel po k bu u buut, ŋɑɑn i tuu bu nɑn senni nbɑ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.»
43007025	Ŋɑnn e k Selusɑɑlenm nisiɑb boi b lieb ɑ: «Juɑ nbɑ nɑ kɑɑ, k b yɑbi ɑ bin kpi’u nɑ ɑɑ?
43007026	Gotl mɑn, u piɑk pɑɑnu ni, k suɑ mun biɑ k piɑk siɑl. T yudɑnm nɔk sii bɑnn ɑ ŋuɑ e tie Klistu nɑ ɑmi?
43007027	Ŋɑɑn t mi juɑ nɑ nbɑ nyii siɑn nbɑ. Klistu nɑ i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, suɑ kɑn fit bɑnn wɑɑ nyii siɑn.»
43007028	Yiesu nbɑ tumi niib nɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni nɑ, k u tɑn pɑk sɑnpɑɑpo k yet’b ɑ: «I mi min k biɑ mi mɑɑ nyii siɑn. N k bɑɑl n mɔnŋ bɑɑlu kɑɑ. Ŋɑɑn dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tun’n nɑ, ŋuɑ e mɔk bɑlmɔni kul, k i k mi’u,
43007029	ŋɑɑn min mi’u, k mɑɑn n tuu be u buol ni e, k ŋuɑ e tɑn tun’n nnɑ.»
43007030	Ŋɑnn e k b din yɑbi ɑ bin suol’ɔ, ŋɑɑn k suɑ k suol’ɔ, k mɑɑn u suolu yuo dɑɑ din k bɑɑl.
43007031	Ŋɑɑn k nibul nɑ ni niib bonciɑnn din tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, k boi b lieb ɑ: «Klistu nɑ i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, u sii tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ bonciɑnn k gɑl juɑ nɑ yɑl ɑɑ?»
43007032	K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nbɑ din gbɑt niib nbɑ lɔkn lɔkn k piɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ Yiesu po nɑ, k ŋɑnm nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm din tun Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk sejenm ɑ bin sɑɑn k sɑɑ suol Yiesu.
43007033	K Yiesu din yet nibul nɑ ɑ: «N sii be nɑn’i yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ e, k l puolpo k n ŋmɑt k sɑɑn wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ penŋ.
43007034	I tɑn sɑɑ lon n buol, ŋɑɑn i kɑn lɑ’n, k mɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k n tɑn sii be nɑ, i kɑn fit bɑɑl lenŋ.»
43007035	K Suifnbɑ nɑ boi b lieb ɑ: «U yɑɑ wun tɑn sɑɑn lee, k t kɑn lɑ’u? U yɑɑ wun tɑn sɑɑn Glek doi ni siɑn nbɑ k Suifnbɑ be nɑ, kii sɑɑ kii wɑnt Glek tieb nɑ ɑmi ii?
43007036	Wɑɑ yet ɑ t tɑn sɑɑ lon u buol ŋɑɑn kɑn lɑ’u, ɑ k biɑ tɑn kɑn fit sɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k u sii be nɑ, l pɑɑk tie bee?»
43007037	Tɔn, k jɑɑnm mɑnŋ gbennu dɑɑl din tie dɑjɑɑnn e. L dɑɑl mɑnŋ e k Yiesu fiil set k pɑk sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Wun nbɑ k nyun-nyuklu gbɑt’ɔ, wun bɑɑl n buol ni k tɑn nyu,
43007038	k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹Wun nbɑ tien’n yɑdɑ nɑ, mɑnfuol nyun sii tɔ nyunkpɑnɑ e k nyi u pɑl ni.› »
43007039	Yiesu nbɑ din piɑk nɑ, l din wɑnt Foŋɑnm po e, k bin nbɑ din tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ din tɑn sɑɑ lɑ Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ. L yuo nɑ dinn, Yennu dɑɑ din k tul niib Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn u dɑɑ din k donn Yiesu k tul’ɔ u yentsɑɑkɑl.
43007040	Niib bonciɑnn nbɑ din be nigbounŋ nɑ ni k gbɑt k u yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b yet ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ set tie Yennu sɔkni nɑn bɑlmɔni e,»
43007041	k siɑb yɑɑ ɑ: «U tie Klistu e,» k lieb mun boi ɑ: «Nlee k Klistu sɑɑ nyi Gɑɑliile?
43007042	Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk k wɑnn ɑ Klistu nɑ tɑn sii tie Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn ee? K b biɑ tɑn sɑɑ mɑl’ɔ Betlehenm duo nbɑ din tie ŋuɑ Dɑɑfiid duo nɑ ni ee?»
43007043	K niib nɑ ji suol bɔkt k mɑɑn Yiesu pɑɑk.
43007044	K siɑb biɑ luon bin suol’ɔ, ŋɑɑn b ni suɑ k suol’ɔ.
43007045	L puolpo e k sejenm nɑ ji ŋmɑt Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ buol ni, k b boi’b ɑ: «Bee tien k i k jen nɑn’ɔ?»
43007046	K sejenm nɑ jiin yet’b ɑ: «Suɑ dɑɑ k mi k pɑk mɑɑn nɑn juɑ nɑ mɑbuolu nbɑ k u piɑk nɑ.»
43007047	K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ boi’b ɑ: «K i mun biɑ nyik k u kpɑnn’i ni ii?
43007048	I tɑn mi lɑ k t yudɑnm nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ suɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ ɑɑ?
43007049	Ŋɑɑn nigbounŋ nɑ nbɑ k mi Yennu senni nɑ, mɔpol be b pɑɑk.»
43007050	K yudɑnm mɑnŋ ni yenɔ e din tie Niikodenm, wun din sɑɑn ɑ wun sɑɑ lɑ Yiesu nɑ, k u yet’b ɑ:
43007051	«T senni k cɑb’t ɑ tin bu nilɔ buut k biil’ɔ, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ k gbɑt u mɔb ni k bɑnn u biit.»
43007052	K b boi’ɔ: «A mun tie Gɑɑliile nilɔ ee? Gotl Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni. A sɑɑ lɑ nɑn Yennu sɔkni k mi nyii Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni.»
43007053	L puolpo e k suɑ kul kun.
43008001	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu din duo Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk pɑɑk.
43008002	K l yent sɑn-nyɑpob ni, k u ŋmɑt kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k niib bonciɑnn tikl bɑɑl kuɑ lint’ɔ, k u kɑl k tumi’b.
43008003	Ŋɑnn e k senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ bɑɑl nɑn puo nbɑ tun boncuncontuonn, k te k u set Yiesu tuɑnn po,
43008004	ŋɑɑn yet Yiesu ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, t lɑ puo nɑ, k u tuun boncuncontuonn e, k t suol’ɔ l yuo nɑ.
43008005	T senni ni, Muois din senn ɑ l puobuolu ŋɑn k bin jɑɑt’ɔ tɑnɑ e k kpi’u. Fin ŋɑnin sɑɑ yet ɑ bee?»
43008006	B din yet nnɑ, k luon bin kpɑl Yiesu e, k ji fit tɑɑl’ɔ. K Yiesu tibn ŋɑɑn jii u niibil k diɑn tinŋ ni.
43008007	Bɑɑ biɑ lek sie k boi’ɔ buboit yuo nbɑ nɑ, k u tibt k yet’b ɑ: «Wun nbɑ k mi k tun biit, l dɑɑnɔ n sint jɑɑ’u tɑnsinsinn,»
43008008	ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm tibn k diɑn tinŋ ni.
43008009	Bɑɑ gbɑt k u yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b piin yɑt yenɔ yenɔ, k nikpelɑ nɑ dɔnŋ yɑt, ŋɑɑn k Yiesu biɑl, ŋuɑ nɑn puo nɑ, k u biɑ dɑɑ sie u tuɑnn po.
43008010	K u tibt boi’ɔ: «Puo, b sɑɑn lee? Suɑ k biɑl ɑ wun bu ɑ buut biil’ɑ ni ii?»
43008011	K u jiin ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, suɑ k biɑl.» K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «N mun kɑn bu ɑ buut k biil’ɑ. Ii kun. A ji dɑɑ mi k tuun biit.»
43008012	Yiesu biɑ ŋɑnm piɑk nɑn niib Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, ɑ: «Min e tie tingbounŋ nɑ yentu, k dɑɑnɔ nbɑ wɑɑ’n, ŋuɑ ji kɑn mi sonm bunbɔnn ni ŋɑɑn u sii mɔk yentu nbɑ tien niib mɑnfuol.»
43008013	K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ biɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fɑɑ piɑk k wɑnt ɑ mɔnŋ po nɑ, l tie yɑnn e.»
43008014	K Yiesu jiin yet’b: «Mi i lek i piɑk k wɑnt n mɔnŋ po i e, ŋɑɑn mɑɑ yet lin nbɑ, l tie mɔni e, k mɑɑn min mi mɑɑ nyii siɑn nbɑ, k biɑ mi mɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn nbɑ. Yinm ŋɑnin k mi mɑɑ nyii siɑn. I biɑ k mi mɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn.
43008015	Yinm goli nilɔ nɑn-yel po e k bu u buut, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin k bu suɑ buut.
43008016	Mi i ponŋ i yɑɑ n bu nilɔ buut i e, n sɑɑ bu u buut nɑn bɑlmɔni e, k mɑɑn n k bu buut n kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n Bɑɑ nbɑ tun’n nɑ e be nɑn’n.
43008017	Tɔn, l ponŋ diɑn i senni ni ɑ niib bɑnle siɑlɑ i jɑnŋ nɑn liel, ŋɑnn i tie bɑlmɔni.
43008018	N piɑk wɑnt n mɔnŋ po, k n Bɑɑ wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ mun biɑ piɑk wɑnt n po nnɑ e.»
43008019	K b boi’ɔ ɑ: «A Bɑɑ mɑnŋ be lee?» K Yiesu pɑk jiin’m ɑ: «I k mi’n, k tɑn boi n Bɑɑ. I i bo i mi’n i e, i mun biɑ bo sii mi n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ.»
43008020	Yiesu din pɑk mɑɑn nɑ yuo nbɑ k u din tumi niib, k b din be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni siɑn nbɑ k b sent Yennu piini likli lɑkl nɑ, ŋɑɑn suɑ k suol’ɔ, k mɑɑn u suolu yuo dɑɑ k bɑɑl.
43008021	K Yiesu biɑ ŋɑnm pɑk yet’b ɑ: «N sɑɑ yɑɑt ɑ, k i tɑn sɑɑ lon’n, ŋɑɑn i tɑn sɑɑ kpo i biit ni. I biɑ tɑn kɑn fit sɑɑn mɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn.»
43008022	Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ nɑ yet ɑ: «U yɑɑ wun kpi u mɔnŋ ee? Ŋɑnn e te k u yɑɑ ɑ t kɑn fit sɑɑn wɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn ii?»
43008023	K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Yinm tie tinŋ nnɑ yɑb e, ŋɑɑn min tie sɑnpɑɑpo yuɑ e. Yinm nyii tingbounŋ nɑ ni e, ŋɑɑn min k nyii tingbounŋ nɑ ni kɑɑ.
43008024	L pɑɑk e te k n yet’i mɑɑ i sɑɑ kpo i biit ni. L i tie k i k tien yɑdɑ nɑn n tie mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ nɑ, i set sɑɑ kpo i biit ni.»
43008025	K b boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin ŋmee?» K u jiin’m ɑ: «Pinpiik ni n din yet’i mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ wɑɑ.
43008026	N bo sii fit piɑk mɑɑn bonciɑnn k biil’i, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ e tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ, k n piɑk yien tingbounŋ nɑ niib lin nbɑ k n gbiɑ u buol nɑ.»
43008027	Niib nɑ din k mi nɑn u piɑk u Bɑɑ po e.
43008028	L pɑɑk k Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Yuo nbɑ k i sɑɑ jii Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k donn’ɔ sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ, l yuo e k i tɑn sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn n tie mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ, k i biɑ sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn n k tuun siɑl nɑn n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ yiikuo, ŋɑɑn n biɑ yien lin nbɑ k n Bɑɑ wɑnn’n ɑ n tɑn yet e.
43008029	K wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ e be nɑn’n. U k nyikt n kuukuɑ, k mɑɑn yuo kul n tuun lin nbɑ gbuot u nunm e.»
43008030	Niib bonciɑnn nbɑ din gbɑt Yiesu nbɑ pɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.
43008031	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet Suifnbɑ nbɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ: «L i tie k i sɑɑk n mɑɑn, i set tie n puolpoweitieb nɑn bɑlmɔni e,
43008032	k i biɑ sɑɑ bɑnn bɑlmɔni, k bɑlmɔni mɑnŋ sɑɑ nyinn’i dɑɑbs ni.»
43008033	K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «T tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ e, k t k mi k tien suɑ dɑɑbɑ. Nlee k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ t tɑn sɑɑ nyi dɑɑbs ni?»
43008034	K Yiesu jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, suɑ kul nbɑ tuun biit, u tie biit dɑɑbl e.
43008035	Dɑɑbl k tie ŋɑɑk yuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑk bik ŋɑnin tie ŋɑɑk yuɑ e yuo kul.
43008036	L i tie Bijɑ nɑ nyint’i dɑɑbs ni e, i set sɑɑ nyi dɑɑbs ni nɑn bɑlmɔni wɑɑ.
43008037	N mi nɑn i tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ e, ŋɑɑn k i lek yɑbi ɑ i kpi’n, k mɑɑn n mɑɑn mɑnŋ k kuɑ i tubɑ ni.
43008038	Mɑɑ tuu be n Bɑɑ penŋ k lɑɑt lin nbɑ, ŋɑnn e k n piɑk, ŋɑɑn yinm tuun lin nbɑ k i bɑɑ yet’i ɑ yii tuun nɑ e.»
43008039	K b jiin’ɔ yɑɑ ɑ: «T bɑɑ tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm e.» K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «L i tie k i bo tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm wɑɑs nɑn mɔni e, i bo sii tuun Ablɑɑhɑɑnm tuonbuolu nɑ e,
43008040	ŋɑɑn k mɔtɑɑnɑ k i yɑbi ɑ i kpi’n, nɑn mɑɑ tie nilɔ nbɑ yien’i bɑlmɔni nbɑ k n gbɑt Yennu penŋ nɑ. Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din k tien nnɑ.
43008041	Ŋɑɑn yinm tuun i bɑɑ nbɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ e.» K b jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Tinm k tie kpen-k-ŋmiɑ kɑɑ. T mɔk bɑɑ yenɔ kuɑ e, k ŋuɑ e tie Yennu.»
43008042	K Yiesu yet’b: «L i bo i tie k Yennu mɔnŋ tie i bɑɑ, i bo sii luon’n ɑ, k mɑɑn n nyii ŋuɑ Yennu penŋ e k bɑɑl nnɑ. N biɑ k bɑɑl nɑn n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ yiikuo kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ e tun’n.
43008043	Bee tien k i k bɑnn n mɑɑn nɑ pɑɑk i? K mɑɑn yɑɑ k fit gbɑt n mɑɑn mɑnŋ nɑ.
43008044	I tie i bɑɑ Sɑɑtɑn wɑɑs e, k luon k i tuun i bɑɑ mɑnŋ yɑnbuɑtuonɑ. Sinsinn u ponŋ din tie nikpiiluk o, k biɑ fɔk nɑn bɑlmɔni, k mɑɑn bɑlmɔni kɑɑ u ni nɑn wɑɑn ɑ. U i fɑɑl fɑɑk yuo nbɑ, l ponŋ tie u binbenŋ e, k mɑɑn wɑɑ tie fɑɑk dɑɑnɔ nɑ. Fɑi kul nyi u buol e.
43008045	Ŋɑɑn mɑɑ yien’i bɑlmɔni nɑ e te k i k tien’n yɑdɑ.
43008046	I ŋmee sɑɑ fit wɑnn n biit i? Mi i yet’i bɑlmɔni i e, bee tien k i k tien’n yɑdɑ?
43008047	Wun nbɑ tie Yennu yuɑ, ŋuɑ e gbiintl lin nbɑ k Yennu piɑk, ŋɑɑn i k tie Yennu yɑb. Ŋɑnn e tien k i k gbiintl’l.»
43008048	Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ nɑ jiin k yet Yiesu ɑ: «Tɑɑ yet k yɑɑ ɑ tie Sɑɑmɑɑli nilɔ, k nɑlnbiiuk biɑ be ɑ ni nɑ, l k tokn ii?»
43008049	K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Nɑlnbiiuk kɑɑ n ni. Min bɑɑkt n Bɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k yinm ŋɑnin siɑn’n.
43008050	Ŋɑɑn n k luon nibɑɑkl k tien n mɔnŋ. Yenɔ e be k u luon bin tien’n nibɑɑkl, k ŋuɑ e tie buut dɑɑnɔ.
43008051	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ sɑɑk n mɑɑn, u kɑn mi k kpo.»
43008052	K Suifnbɑ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ t set bɑnn nɑn nɑlnbiiuk be ɑ ni. Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din kpo wɑɑ, k Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mun din kpo wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ dɑɑnɔ nbɑ sɑɑk ɑ mɑɑn kɑn mi k kpo.
43008053	T cɑnbɑɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nbɑ din kpo nɑ, ɑ duki mi ɑ ɑ cie’u ee? Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mun biɑ din kpo wɑɑ. Fin duki mi ɑ ɑ tie ŋmee?»
43008054	K Yiesu jiin’m ɑ: «Mi i bo i dontl n mɔnŋ i e, l bo sii tie yɑnn e. Wun nbɑ dontl’n tie n Bɑɑ e. ŋuɑ e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k i yɑɑ ɑ u tie i Yennu nɑ.
43008055	I k mi’u, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin mi’u. L i bo i tie k n yɑɑ ɑ n k mi’u, n bo sɑɑ tien fɑɑk dɑɑnɔ nɑn yinm nɑ wɑɑ. Ŋɑɑn n mi’u, k biɑ sɑɑk u mɑɑn.
43008056	I cɑnbɑɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn, k mɑɑn u yɑɑ wun tɑn lɑ yuo nbɑ k n sɑɑ sik tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k u set tɑn lɑ l yuo mɑnŋ ɑ, k l mɑnŋ’ɔ.»
43008057	K Suifnbɑ nɑ boi’ɔ: «A dɑɑ k bɑɑl binɑ piinŋmu, ŋɑɑn tɑn lɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm ii?»
43008058	K Yiesu jiin yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, bɑɑ din tɑn mɑɑl Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑ, ŋɑɑn suɑ k N Tie e.»
43008059	Ŋɑnn e k b ji tɔki tɑnɑ ɑ bin jɑɑt’ɔ k kpi’u, k u bɔl k nyii Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni.
43009001	L puolpo e k Yiesu din gɑɑl sɑɑ k tɑn lɑ juɑnŋ nnɑ, k u tie juɑnŋ u mɑɑlu ni wɑɑ.
43009002	K u puolpoweitieb boi’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, ŋmee biit e te k b mɑl juɑ nɑ juɑnŋ i? L dɑɑ tie u mɔnŋ biit ɑmi u dɑnm e?»
43009003	K u jiin’m ɑ: «U biit pɑɑk kɑɑ te k u juɑn. L mun biɑ k tie u dɑnm biit pɑɑk kɑɑ. U juɑn ɑ niib n lɑ Yennu tuonɑ u ni e.
43009004	Yuo nbɑ k yentu dɑɑ be nɑ, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k tii tuun wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ tuonɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn nyiɑɔk bɑɑt, yuo nbɑ k suɑ kɑn fit tun tuonn.
43009005	Mɑɑ dɑɑ be tingbounŋ nnɑ, n tie tingbounŋ nɑ niib yentu e.»
43009006	Wɑɑ yet nnɑ mɑnŋ puolpo e k u siil mɔsɑnt tinŋ ni, ŋɑɑn buun tɑnt, k pɔl juɑnŋ nɑ ninbinɑ pɑɑk,
43009007	K yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ Siiloe biɑɔnŋ ni k sɑɑ yibl.» (Siiloe pɑɑk tie «t tun suɑ.») Ŋɑnn e k u sɑɑn k sɑɑ yibl, k nyuɑnt k kun.
43009008	Ŋɑnn e k u kuɑnɑnlieb nɑn niib nbɑ tuu lɑɑt’ɔ k u mei likli nɑ boi b lieb ɑ: «Jɑjuɑnŋ nbɑ tuu mei nɑ kɑɑ nɑ ɑɑ?»
43009009	K siɑb yɑɑ ɑ: «Ŋuɑ e,» k lieb yɑɑ ɑ: «Aɑi, l k tie ŋuɑ kɑɑ. U nɑɑn’ɔ e.» K juɑ mɑnŋ tiɑɔnŋ yet ɑ: «Min e nɑ.»
43009010	K b boi’ɔ ɑ: «L tien nlee k ɑ ninbinɑ tɑn nyuɑnt i?»
43009011	K u jiin’m ɑ: «Juɑ nbɑ k b yi’u Yiesu nɑ, ŋuɑ e buun tɑnt k jii k pɔl n ninbinɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn yet’n ɑ mii sɑɑ Siiloe biɑɔnŋ ni k sɑɑ yibl. Ŋɑnn e k n sɑɑn k sɑɑ yibl k nyuɑnt.»
43009012	K b boi’ɔ ɑ: «U be lee?» K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «N k mi.»
43009013	Jɑjuɑnŋ nɑ kuɑnɑnlieb nɑn niib nbɑ tuu lɑɑt’ɔ nɑ jii’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ buol.
43009014	Dɑɑl nbɑ k Yiesu din buun tɑnt k nyuɑnt juɑnŋ nɑ, l dɑɑl din tie Fuondɑɑl e.
43009015	K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ biɑ ŋɑnm boi juɑ nɑ, ɑ u tien nlee k nyuɑnt i? K u yet’b ɑ: «Yiesu e buun tɑnt, k jii k pɔl n ninbinɑ pɑɑk, k n yibl k nyuɑnt.»
43009016	K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb yet ɑ: «Yiesu k nyii Yennu buol ni kɑɑ, k mɑɑn u k sɑk Fuondɑɑl sennu.» K b siɑb mun boi ɑ: «Nlee k biitdɑɑnɔ sii fit tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nɑ buolu?» K bɔktu bɑɑl Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ sinsuuk ni.
43009017	L pɑɑk k b biɑ boi juɑ nɑ ɑ: «A sɑɑ pɑk ɑ bee k jiin wun nbɑ nyuɑnt ɑ ninbinɑ nɑ po?» K u biɑ pɑk jiin’m ɑ: «U tie Yennu sɔkni e.»
43009018	Ŋɑɑn k l pɑɑl nɑn Suifnbɑ yudɑnm n tien yɑdɑ nɑn b mɑl’ɔ juɑnŋ e ŋɑɑn k u tɑn nyuɑnt. K b yɑɑ sie k b yiin juɑnŋ nɑ dɑnm,
43009019	k tɑn boi’b ɑ: «U tie i bijɑ ee? I set yɑɑ ɑ i mɑl’ɔ juɑnŋ ee? K l tien nlee k u ji nyuɑnt mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ?»
43009020	K b jiin yet’b ɑ: «T mi nɑn u tie t bijɑ ŋɑnin e, k t biɑ mi nɑn t mɑl’ɔ juɑnŋ e.
43009021	Ŋɑɑn t k mi lɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ k u tɑn nyuɑnt, k t biɑ k mi wun nbɑ nyuɑnt’ɔ. U mɔnŋ ji k tie bik kɑɑ. Boin’mɔ mɑn. U sɑɑ fit pɑk u mɔnŋ pɑɑk ɑ.»
43009022	U dɑnm din yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn b tiin Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn yudɑnm mɑnŋ ponŋ tɑɑn mɔb k yet ɑ wun nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ Yiesu e tie Klistu nɑ, sie k b nyinn’ɔ b Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni.
43009023	L pɑɑk te k u dɑnm din yɑɑ ɑ u k tie bik kɑɑ, ɑ b mɔnŋ n boi’ɔ.
43009024	K l tɑɑl munle ni e k b biɑ ŋɑnm yiin juɑ nbɑ tuu tie juɑnŋ ŋɑɑn tɑn nyuɑnt nɑ, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yennu tuɑnn, pɑkn mɔni e. T mi nɑn Yiesu tie biitdɑɑnɔ e.»
43009025	K juɑ nɑ yet’b ɑ: «Wɑɑ tie biitdɑɑnɔ, ɑmi wɑɑ k tie, n k mi. Ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin mi bon-yenn e: n tuu tie juɑnŋ e, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ n ji nyuɑnt ɑ.»
43009026	K b ŋɑnm biɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «U tien nlee k nyuɑnt’ɑ ni?»
43009027	K u jiin’m ɑ: «N ponŋ yet’i wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k i k gbɑt. Bee k i jin luon k n yet’i ni? I mun luon k i tien u puolpoweitieb ee?»
43009028	Ŋɑnn e k b suki’ɔ, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie nilɔ mɑnŋ puolpoweituɑ, ŋɑɑn tinm ŋɑnin tie Muois puolpoweitieb e.
43009029	T mi nɑn Yennu din pɑk nɑn Muois, ŋɑɑn nilɔ nɑ ŋɑnin, t k mi wɑɑ nyii siɑn.»
43009030	K juɑ nɑ yet’b ɑ: «lin nbɑ tie pɑluk o nɑ: i k mi wɑɑ nyii siɑn, ŋɑɑn k u yen nyuɑnt n ninbinɑ wɑɑ.
43009031	T mi nɑn Yennu k gbiin biitdɑnm, ŋɑɑn u gbiɑ dɑnm nbɑ jiɑntl’ɔ k tuun wɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ e.
43009032	Lɑɑ nyii dulnyɑ piinu ni wɑɑ, t dɑɑ k mi gbɑt ɑ suɑ nyuɑnt wun nbɑ k b mɑl’ɔ juɑnŋ.
43009033	L i bo i tie k juɑ mɑnŋ k nyii Yennu penŋ, u bo kɑn fit tun siɑl.»
43009034	K b jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin nbɑ k b mɑl’ɑ nɑn biit nɑ po, ɑ tie ŋmee k wɑnt tinm i?» ŋɑɑn bel nyinn’ɔ nɑn-yel.
43009035	Yiesu nbɑ gbɑt ɑ b bel’ɔ nɑ, k u tɑn lon’mɔ k lɑ’u, k boi’ɔ ɑ: «A tien Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ yɑdɑ ɑɑ?»
43009036	K u jiin boi’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, ŋmee tie nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ? Yetl’n wɑɑ tie wun nbɑ, k n tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.»
43009037	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «A ponŋ lɑ’u wɑɑ. Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ piɑk nɑn’ɑ nɑ.»
43009038	K juɑ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, n tien’ɑ yɑdɑ wɑɑ,» ŋɑɑn gbɑɑn u tuɑnn k puki’ɔ.
43009039	K Yiesu yet ɑ: «N bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni ɑ n bu niib buut, ɑ k juɑni n nyuɑnt k bin nbɑ nyuɑn n juɑn.»
43009040	K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ gbɑt k u yet nnɑ, k b boi’ɔ ɑ: «A yɑɑ ɑ t mun tie juɑni ee?»
43009041	K u jiin’m ɑ: «L i bo i tie k i tie juɑni e, i bo kii mɔk biit, ŋɑɑn yɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ i nyuɑn nɑ, i mɔk biit.»
43010001	K Yiesu biɑ yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, nilɔ nbɑ k tɔkn peluok tɑnmɔb k kuɑ, ŋɑɑn duo juonn k kuɑ, l dɑɑnɔ e tie nɑn-yukɔ nɑn fɑt-tuɑ.
43010002	Ŋɑɑn nilɔ nbɑ tɔkn peluok nɑ tɑnmɔb k kuɑ, l dɑɑnɔ e tie pei mɑnŋ kpɑɑlk.
43010003	U i tɑnŋ i bɑɑt ɑ wun kuɑ, tɑnmɔguulɔ nɑ sɑɑ luot e, wun kuɑ, k u yi u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ pei nɑ sɑnɑ, k b gbiɑ u mɔb, k u nyint’b.
43010004	U i nyinn u mɔnŋ pei kul yuo nbɑ, u tuu gɑl b tuɑnn e, k b wɑɑ u puol, k mɑɑn b mi u kunkɔl.
43010005	Ŋɑɑn b kɑn wei sɑɑmɔ ŋɑnin. B sɑɑ ciɑl, k mɑɑn b k mi u kunkɔl.»
43010006	Yiesu din puɑ’b kpɑnjɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn k b k bɑnn l pɑɑk.
43010007	L pɑɑk, k u biɑ ŋɑnm k yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, min e tie peluok nɑ tɑnmɔb.
43010008	Bin nbɑ kul liit’n k bɑɑl nɑ tie nɑn-yukb e nɑn fɑt-tieb, ŋɑɑn pei nɑ k gbiɑ b mɔb.
43010009	Min e tie tɑnmɔb nɑ, k dɑɑnɔ nbɑ wei’n k kuɑ, ŋuɑ e sɑɑ lɑ fielu, k sii tun gɑɑl kuɑ, k ŋmɑt nyi, k lɑɑt jeŋɑnt.
43010010	Nɑn-yukɔ bɑɑt ɑ wun jɑn k kpi k biil kuukuɑ e. Min e bɑɑl ɑ niib n lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ tie mɑnfuol nɑn bɑlmɔni.
43010011	«Min e tie pekpɑɑŋɑnŋ, k pekpɑɑŋɑnŋ e kpenn u pei pɑɑk.
43010012	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ kpɑɑl pei likli pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn k k tie pekpɑɑlk nɑn mɔni, k biɑ k yen pei nɑ, l i tie k u lɑ k kinkɑtl tɑn bɑɑt yuo nbɑ, sie k u ciɑl ŋɑɑn nyik pei nɑ, k kinkɑtl n ji bɑɑl k suol’b, k pelei nɑ n yɑt.
43010013	U tuu ciɑl e, k mɑɑn u kpɑɑl pei nɑ likli pɑɑk e, k u bɑkɑ kɑɑ pei nɑ ni.
43010014	Min e tie pekpɑɑŋɑnŋ. N Bɑɑ nbɑ mi’n, k n mun mi’u nɑ, l mun biɑ tie nnɑ e k n mi n pei, k b mun mi’n, k n sɑɑ yit n mɑnfuol sɑlk b pɑɑk.
43010016	Pelei be k tie n yɑb, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm k tie peluok mɑnŋ ni yɑb. Sie k n bɑɑl nɑn ŋɑnm mun biɑk, k b sɑɑ gbɑt n kunkɔl, k b kul ji sii tie pebuolyenŋ, k mɔk pekpɑɑyenŋ kuɑ.
43010017	«Ŋɑnn e k n Bɑɑ luon’n, k mɑɑn n yɑɑ n nyinn n mɑnfuol, k l puolpo k n biɑ sɑɑ ŋɑnm lɑ n mɑnfuol mɑnŋ.
43010018	Suɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ nyinn n mɑnfuol mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ e yɑɑ n nyinn’l, k mɑɑn n mɔk yiikuo k sɑɑ nyinn’l, k biɑ mɔk yiikuo k tɑn sɑɑ lɑ’l. Nnɑ e k n Bɑɑ yet’n ɑ n tun.»
43010019	Wɑɑ yet nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm biɑ ŋɑnm bɔkt,
43010020	k b bonciɑnn yɑɑ ɑ: «Nɑlnbiiuk be u ni, k wɑɑtuk biɑ mɔk’ɔ. Bee tien k i gbiintl u mɑɑn i?»
43010021	K lieb mun yɑɑ ɑ: «Nilɔ nbɑ k nɑlnbiiuk be u ni nɑ kii piɑk nnɑ. Nɑlnbiiuk sɑɑ fit nyuɑnt juɑnŋ ii?»
43010022	L puolpo e wɑɑ k b tɑn mɔk b jɑɑnm nbɑ k b tien Yennu niipuouk b jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nbɑ be Selusɑɑlenm nɑ pɑɑk nɑ. Jɑɑnm mɑnŋ din be Selusɑɑlenm e. L yuo din tie wonfufuk yuo e,
43010023	k Yiesu din sonm lin bɑlntl nbɑ k b yi’l Sɑɑlomɔn bɑlntl nɑ ni, k l din be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni.
43010024	K Suifnbɑ yudɑnm din bɑɑl k tikl k lint’ɔ, ŋɑɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «A yɑɑ lin wei nlee wɑɑ, k tin tɑn bɑnn nɑn ɑ tie Klistu? L i tie k ɑ tie ŋuɑ i e, fɑn yet’t bɑlmɔni.»
43010025	K Yiesu jiin’m ɑ: «N ponŋ dɑɑn yet’i wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k i k tien’n yɑdɑ. Tuonɑ nbɑ k n tuun nɑn n Bɑɑ yiikuo nɑ ni, ŋɑnn i wɑnt mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ.
43010026	I k tien’n yɑdɑ, k mɑɑn yɑɑ k tie n pei nɑ pɑɑk.
43010027	N pei gbiintl n kunkɔl, k n mi’b, k b wɑɑ’n,
43010028	k n tien’m mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k b kɑn mi k kpo, k suɑ biɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ fit fɑt’b n nuu ni.
43010029	N Bɑɑ nbɑ jii’b k tien’m n nuu ni nɑ, ŋuɑ e cie suɑ kul k suɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ fit fɑt’b n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ nuu ni.
43010030	Min nɑn n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ tie yonm e.»
43010031	L yuo nɑ k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ tɔki tɑnɑ biɑk, ɑ bin jɑɑt’ɔ k kpi’u.
43010032	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «I ponŋ lɑ k n tun tuonŋɑnɑ bonciɑnn, nbɑ k n Bɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ n tun nɑ, k tuonŋɑnɑ mɑnŋ ni, lɑnn pɑɑk e te k i ji yɑɑ i jɑɑt’n tɑnɑ ɑ?»
43010033	K b jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «T k luon k tin jɑɑt’ɑ tɑnɑ tuonŋɑnsiɑl pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn fɑɑ piɑk k biil Yennu nɑ pɑɑk. A kpɑn tie nilɔ e, ŋɑɑn yi ɑ mɔnŋ Yennu.»
43010034	K Yiesu jiin boi’b ɑ: «L k diɑn i senni ni ɑ Yennu yet ɑ: ‹I tie yenni ee?
43010035	(k t mi nɑn Yennu kɑn fɑɑl fɑɑk fɑb ɑ, k mɑɑn Yennu yi bin nbɑ k u tul’b u mɑɑn nɑ yenni e).›
43010036	Ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin, Yennu lukt’n k tun’n tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k nlee k i sɑɑ fit yet ɑ n piɑk biil Yennu e mɑɑ yet ɑ n tie Yennu Bijɑ e nɑ?
43010037	L i tie k n k tuun n Bɑɑ nɑ tuonɑ i e, ŋɑnn i dɑɑ tie’n yɑdɑ.
43010038	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k n tuun ŋuɑ Yennu tuonɑ mɑnŋ i e, l i lek i tie k i k tien’n yɑdɑ, ŋɑɑn yin tien n tuonɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ. Ŋɑnn e, k i sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑn n Bɑɑ be n ni, k n mun biɑ be u ni.»
43010039	Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ nɑ tɑn yɑɑ bin suol’ɔ biɑk, k u buut nyii,
43010040	k ŋmɑt puot Suulden kpenpuotl, k sɑɑ be siɑn nbɑ k Sɑn din tuu wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ.
43010041	K niib bonciɑnn din bɑɑl Yiesu penŋ, k din piɑk nɑn b lieb ɑ: «Sɑn ŋɑnin din k tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnsiɑl, ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ kul k u din piɑk k jikt sɑɑ juɑ mɑnŋ po, l tie bɑlmɔni e.»
43010042	K niib bonciɑnn din tien Yiesu yɑdɑ lenŋ.
43011001	Tɔn, jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be Betɑɑni, k u sɑnn yi Lɑɑsɑɑl, k u din tɑn yiɑl. Betɑɑni din tie Mɑɑli nɑn u niipuo Mɑɑlt duo e.
43011002	Mɑɑli e din tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ but tulɑɑli Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu tɑɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn jii u yut k fiɑl fiɑl nɑ. Ŋuɑ Mɑɑli ninjɑ Lɑɑsɑɑl e din yiɑl. Wɑɑ din tɑn yiɑl nɑ,
43011003	k u niipuob tun tuomi ɑ wun sɑɑn k sɑɑ yet Yiesu ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ nɑɑsin-yuɑk nbɑ k ɑ mɑntk luon’ɔ nɑ yiɑl e.»
43011004	Yiesu nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ k u yet u puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ: «Lɑɑsɑɑl nbɑ yiɑl nɑ, yiɑlu mɑnŋ k tie u mɑnfuol telk kɑɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie lin nbɑ k niib sɑɑ dont Yennu sɑnn l pɑɑk e, ɑ Yennu Bijɑ mun n lɑ dontl biɑk.»
43011005	Tɔn, Yiesu din luon Mɑɑlt nɑn Mɑɑli nɑn Lɑɑsɑɑl.
43011006	Wɑɑ gbɑt ɑ Lɑɑsɑɑl yiɑl nɑ, ŋɑɑn u din tien dɑɑ ŋɑnle k dɑɑ be lenŋ.
43011007	L puolpo e k u din tɑn yet u puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin ŋmɑt sɑɑn Suude.»
43011008	K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, dɑɑ ŋɑnlele nɑ, k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ dɑɑn yɑɑ bin jɑɑt’ɑ tɑnɑ, k ɑ biɑ yɑɑ ɑ t ŋmɑt lenŋ ii?»
43011009	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Yentu tuu be yendopo mɔkmɔk nɑn yenbɑɑpo e. L i tie k nilɔ sonm yennu ni, u kɑn gbiɑt, k mɑɑn u lɑɑt tingbounŋ nɑ yentu nɑ.
43011010	Ŋɑɑn u i sonm nyiɑɔk, u gbiɑtl e, k mɑɑn yentu kɑɑ u ni.»
43011011	Yiesu din yet nnɑ e, ŋɑɑn biɑ yet ɑ: «T yuɑk Lɑɑsɑɑl guɑnt e, ŋɑɑn n sɑɑ sɑɑn fiin’ɔ wɑɑ.»
43011012	K u puolpoweitieb nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l i tie k u guɑnt i e, u sɑɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ wɑɑ.»
43011013	Yiesu din wɑnt k l tie ɑ Lɑɑsɑɑl kpo e, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm din mi ɑ u wɑnt ɑ Lɑɑsɑɑl guɑnt e.
43011014	L pɑɑk din te k u yet’b gbenn ɑ: «Lɑɑsɑɑl kpo wɑɑ,
43011015	ŋɑɑn i pɑɑk n mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn mɑɑ dɑɑn kɑɑ u buol ni nɑ, k mɑɑn ŋɑnn e sɑɑ te k i ji fit tien’n yɑdɑ. Ŋɑɑnt tin sɑɑn u penŋ mɑn.»
43011016	K Tuomɑ, wun nbɑ k b yi’u Jɑɑk nɑ, yet u lieb ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k t mun n sɑɑn mɑn. L i sii tie kuun, tinm nɑn ŋuɑ n kpo.»
43011017	Yiesu nbɑ din tɑn bɑɑl lenŋ yuo nbɑ k suɑ bɑɑ pii Lɑɑsɑɑl, l dɑɑ ŋɑnnɑ e nɑ.
43011018	Betɑɑni din k fɔk nɑn Selusɑɑlenm. L fɔknt din tie nɑn kiiluomiɑtɑ ŋɑntɑ nɑ e.
43011019	L pɑɑk din tien k Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn din bɑɑl Mɑɑlt nɑn Mɑɑli penŋ, ɑ bin mɑɑn b pɑlɑ, k mɑɑn b ninjɑ nɑ kuun pɑɑk.
43011020	Mɑɑlt nbɑ tɑn gbɑt ɑ Yiesu bɑɑt yuo nbɑ, k u nyii cet’ɔ, ŋɑɑn k Mɑɑli ŋɑnin biɑl be ŋɑɑk ni.
43011021	K Mɑɑlt yet Yiesu: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l i tie k ɑ dɑɑn bo be nnɑ nɑ, n ninjɑ nɑ dɑɑn bo kɑn kpo.
43011022	Ŋɑɑn n mi nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, l i tie k ɑ miɑl Yennu lin nbɑ kul po, u sɑɑ tul’ɑ wɑɑ.»
43011023	K u yet’ɔ: «A ninjɑ sɑɑ fiil kuun ni wɑɑ.»
43011024	K Mɑɑlt jiin’ɔ: «N mi nɑn u tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni dulnyɑ cincɑɑtdɑɑl, dɑɑl nbɑ k kpienm tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni nɑ.»
43011025	K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «Min e tie kuun fiilu k tie mɑnfuol. Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien’n yɑdɑ, ŋuɑ e sii mɔk mɑnfuol, u lek i kpo,
43011026	k dɑɑnɔ kul nbɑ mɔk mɑnfuol k tien’n yɑdɑ, u kɑn mi k kpo. A tien yɑdɑ nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ ɑɑ?»
43011027	K u jiin ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, nnn, n tien yɑdɑ nɑn fin e tie Klistu nɑ, Yennu Bijɑ nbɑ bɑɑt tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑ.»
43011028	Mɑɑlt nbɑ yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt k sɑɑ yiin u niipuo Mɑɑli suon nnɑ, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ nɑ be nnɑ wɑɑ, k yi’ɑ.»
43011029	Mɑɑli nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k u fiil yiɑn yiɑn, k sɑɑn u buol ni.
43011030	K Yiesu din dɑɑ k bɑɑl digbɑnbik mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ be siɑn nbɑ k Mɑɑlt cet’ɔ nɑ e.
43011031	K Suifnbɑ nbɑ be nɑn Mɑɑli ŋɑɑk ni k mɑɑnt u pɑl nɑ, bɑɑ lɑ k u nyii yiɑn yiɑn nɑ, k b mun wei nyii, k mɑɑn b mi ɑ u sɑɑ kɑɑɔk buol e ɑ wun sɑɑ bui kumɔni.
43011032	Mɑɑli nbɑ bɑɑl Yiesu buol k lɑ’u yuo nbɑ, k u gbɑɑn u tuɑnn, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l i tie k ɑ dɑɑn bo be nnɑ nɑ, n ninjɑ nɑ dɑɑn bo kɑn kpo.»
43011033	K Yiesu lɑ k u mɔ, k Suifnbɑ nbɑ wei’ɔ k bɑɑl nɑ, k b mun mɔ, k ninbɑɑɔk suol’ɔ bonciɑnn, k u kuli u pɑl ni.
43011034	K u boi’b «I pii’u liɑ po e?» K b yet’ɔ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, bɑɑt k tɑn got.»
43011035	K Yiesu sikn nyin-nyuut.
43011036	K Suifnbɑ nɑ yet ɑ: «Gotl mɑn, wɑɑ jiɑ luon Lɑɑsɑɑl biɑnŋ nbɑ.»
43011037	K siɑb yɑɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ nyuɑnt juɑnŋ nɑ, u dɑɑn bo kɑn fit te k Lɑɑsɑɑl dɑɑ kpenn ii?»
43011038	K Yiesu pɑl biɑ ŋɑnm biil bonciɑnn, k u bɑɑl kɑɑɔk nɑ buol ni. Kɑɑɔk nɑ din tie tɑnfiɑɔk o, k kɑtɑnu bii l mɔb.
43011039	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Biitl kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ mɑn.» K Mɑɑlt wun nbɑ tie kpiemɔ nɑ niipuo, yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l sii pɔi hei, k mɑɑn bɑɑ pii’u, l dɑɑ ŋɑnnɑ e nɑ.»
43011040	K Yiesu boi’ɔ: «N bo k yet’ɑ ɑ l i tie k ɑ tien’n yɑdɑ, ɑ sɑɑ lɑ Yennu yudɑnt ɑɑ?»
43011041	Ŋɑnn e k b biit kɑɑɔk nɑ. K Yiesu gokt sɑnpɑɑpo, ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «N Bɑɑ, n tien’ɑ niipuouk nɑn fɑɑ sɑk n miɑlu nɑ.
43011042	N mi nɑn yuo kul ɑ sɑɑk n miɑlu, ŋɑɑn mɑɑ yet nnɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn n luon k nibul nbɑ be nnɑ nɑ n gbɑt k tien yɑdɑ nɑn fin e tun’n.»
43011043	Wɑɑ yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn yiin sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Lɑɑsɑɑl, nyimin nɑ.»
43011044	K kpiemɔ nɑ nyii, k u tɑɑ nɑn u nii k l fin fin nɑn kɑtinŋ, k cincenn buob u nunm po. K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Fintl kɑtinŋ mɑnŋ k ŋɑɑ’u.»
43011045	Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn nbɑ din bɑɑl ɑ bin fuont Mɑɑli nɑ, lɑ lin nbɑ k Yiesu tun, k b tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.
43011046	Ŋɑɑn b siɑb sɑɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ penŋ, k sɑɑ yet’b lin nbɑ k Yiesu tun.
43011047	L pɑɑk k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ mɑnŋ nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm yiin tintɑɑnkɑɑnu, k b tikl, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «T sɑɑ tien nlee? K mɑɑn juɑ mɑnŋ tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ bonciɑnn.
43011048	T i ŋɑɑn k u ŋɑnmt k tuun nnɑ k puki, suɑ kul sɑɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ wɑɑ, k Luonm tieb n bɑɑl k yiel Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ, ŋɑɑn biɑ buont t niib.»
43011049	K b yenɔ, wun nbɑ yi Kɑɑyiif, k tie Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ l binn ni nɑ, yet’b ɑ: «Yinm ŋɑnin k mi siɑl.
43011050	I k mi nɑn l ŋɑn k niyenɔ kuɑ n gɑɑl niib nɑ kul ɑ pɑɑk k kpo, k gɑl k t niib kul n buont ii?»
43011051	U din k pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ nɑn u mɔnŋ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ din tie Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ binn mɑnŋ ni nɑ, k Yennu te k u pɑk bunt buntl, ɑ Yiesu tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl Suifnbɑ nɑ pɑɑk k kpo,
43011052	k l k tie Suifnbɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl b pɑɑk k kpo, ŋɑɑn nɑn bin nbɑ kul tie Yennu niib k yɑt be tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑ e k u sɑɑ gɑɑl b pɑɑk k kpo, ɑ bin tɑɑn nɑn lieb yonm.
43011053	K l dɑɑl mɑnŋ k jii sɑɑ k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ lol suol ɑ bin kpi Yiesu.
43011054	L pɑɑk k u ji din k sonm pɑɑnu ni Suifnbɑ sinsuuk ni, ŋɑɑn k tɑn yɑɑt sɑɑn duo nbɑ k b yi Eflɑiinm, k l kpiɑ nɑn pɑɑnpieonŋ nɑ, k ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb ji be lenŋ.
43011055	Suifnbɑ yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm nbɑ tɑn pel nɑ, k niib bonciɑnn nyii digbɑnɑ k bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm, ɑ bin sɑɑ mɑnn mɑlunŋ k ŋɑnm b mɔnŋ.
43011056	K niib nɑ din luon Yiesu. Bɑɑ tikl Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni yuo nbɑ, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «I duki nlee? U mɑntk kɑn bɑɑl jɑɑnm nɑ ɑmi?»
43011057	K Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ tul mɔb ɑ: «Wun nbɑ mi u buol, wun bɑɑl k tɑn ŋmɑɑ t tɑɑl k tin suol’ɔ.»
43012001	Tɔn, dɑɑ ŋɑnluob din tɑn biɑl nɑn yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm n di, k Yiesu bɑɑl Betɑɑni, duo nbɑ k Lɑɑsɑɑl be nɑ. Ŋuɑ e k Yiesu din fiin’ɔ kuun ni nɑ.
43012002	Lenŋ e k b din tien jiet, k Mɑɑlt jii k tul’b, k Lɑɑsɑɑl din tie b ni yenɔ nbɑ din kɑl k di nɑn’m.
43012003	K Mɑɑli jii tulɑɑli liitjinn, lin nbɑ yɑɑ dɑɑɔk pɑɑl bonciɑnn. B din jii fɑɑt nbɑ k b yi’l nɑlt e k tien tulɑɑli mɑnŋ, k u jii’l k but Yiesu tɑɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn suol u mɔnŋ yut k fiɑl fiɑl, k ŋɑɑk nɑ ji nubl nɑn tulɑɑli nɑ gbinm.
43012004	K Yiesu puolpoweitɔyenɔ, wun nbɑ k b yi’u Suudɑ Iskɑɑliɑɔt, (ŋuɑ e din tie wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun tɑn kuɑt Yiesu nɑ,) k u yet ɑ:
43012005	«Bee tien k b bo k kɔi tulɑɑli mɑnŋ denienbɑ kobi ŋɑntɑ (300) k jii l likli k tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm i?»
43012006	Wɑɑ din yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, l din k tie ɑ u bɑkɑ be tɑlɑs-dɑnm nɑ ni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u din tie nɑn-yukɔ e. ŋuɑ e din tie wun nbɑ diɑ likli pɑkl k tuu jɑɑn.
43012007	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt’ɔ. U tien nnɑ k l tie n kuun siil tienu e.
43012008	Tɑlɑs-dɑnm e sii tun be nɑn’i yuo kul ɑ, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin kii tun be nnɑ kɑɑ.»
43012009	Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn gbɑt ɑ Yiesu be Betɑɑni, k b sɑɑn lenŋ. B din k sɑɑn Yiesu pɑɑk kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn b din luon k bin sɑɑ lɑ Lɑɑsɑɑl e mun, wun nbɑ k Yiesu fiin’ɔ kuun ni nɑ.
43012010	L pɑɑk e tien k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm din loln lolɑ ɑ bin kpi Lɑɑsɑɑl mun biɑk,
43012011	k mɑɑn u kuun fiilu pɑɑk e k Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn din nyik Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn wei Yiesu k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.
43012012	L yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk o k nibulciɑɔnŋ nbɑ bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm ɑ bin di yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm nɑ gbɑt ɑ Yiesu bɑɑt.
43012013	K b ji ŋɑt biɑbfɑɑt k cet ɑ bin tuok’ɔ, k yikn wuyikni sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ k yɑɑ ɑ: «Hosɑnɑ, Yennu yetŋɑnm ii be dɑɑnɔ nbɑ bɑɑt nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu sɑnn ni nɑ pɑɑk. Yennu n yɑt u yetŋɑnm Islɑɑeltieb Kpɑnbɑl pɑɑk.»
43012014	K Yiesu din lɑ bonbik e k jɑk k bɑɑt, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ
43012015	ɑ: « Siiɔn duo tieb, i dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. Gotl mɑn, i Kpɑnbɑl e jɑk bonbik k bɑɑt nɑ.»
43012016	K u puolpoweitieb din dɑɑ k bɑnn lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk l yuo mɑnŋ. Ŋɑɑn Yiesu nbɑ din tɑn lɑ dontl nɑ, l yuo e k b ji din tiɑl nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni k jikt sɑɑ u po e, k biɑ tiɑl nɑn niib nɑ mun set din tien’ɔ nnɑ e.
43012017	Nibulciɑɔnŋ nbɑ din be nɑn Yiesu yuo nbɑ k u yiin Lɑɑsɑɑl ɑ wun nyi kɑɑɔk ni ŋɑɑn fiin’ɔ kuun ni nɑ, k din muɑntl lin nbɑ k b lɑ nɑ.
43012018	L pɑɑk e te k niib bonciɑnn din cet’ɔ, k mɑɑn bɑɑ gbɑt k u tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnn mɑnŋ nɑ pɑɑk.
43012019	Ŋɑnn e k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ yien b lieb ɑ: «Gotl mɑn. T ji kɑn fit tun siɑl. I k lɑ ɑɑ? Tingbounŋ nɑ niib kul ɑ wɑɑ’u e.»
43012020	Niib nbɑ din sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm ɑ bin sɑɑ di yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm nɑ, k Glek siɑb din be b ni,
43012021	k b tɑn sɑɑn Fiiliip penŋ, wun nbɑ nyii Betsɑidɑ nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni nɑ, k b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, t luon k t lɑ Yiesu.»
43012022	K Fiiliip sɑɑn k sɑɑ yet Andle, k Andle nɑn Fiiliip ji sɑɑn k yet Yiesu.
43012023	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Yuo nbɑ k Yennu sɑɑ donn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ bɑɑl nɑ.
43012024	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, l i tie k b k bul dibinn tinŋ ni, l kɑn kpo. L sii tie dibin-yenml e. Ŋɑɑn l i tie k b bul’l k l kpo, l sɑɑ pɑ e k nɑn dii bonciɑnn.
43012025	Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ deki u mɑnfuol tɑn sɑɑ kɔnŋ’l e, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ yit u mɑnfuol sɑlk tingbounŋ nɑ ni, u sii diɑ’l k l tɑn sii tie mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu e.
43012026	Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ luon wuu tuun n tuonn, sie k u wɑɑ’n, k mɑɑ tɑn sii be siɑn nbɑ, k n tuontunnɔ mun tɑn sii be lenŋ. N Bɑɑ sɑɑ donn dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tuun n tuonn.»
43012027	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet ɑ: «N mɔk pɑlbiil bonciɑnn. N sɑɑ pɑk bee? N sɑɑ yet ɑ: ‹N Bɑɑ, nyint’n lin nbɑ bɑɑt n pɑɑk nɑ ni ɑmi ii?› Aɑi, k mɑɑn ŋɑnn e te k n bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni k di fɑlɑ mɑnŋ.
43012028	N Bɑɑ, ŋɑɑnt k ɑ sɑnn n lɑ dontl.» Ŋɑnn e k kunkɔl pɑk sɑnpɑɑpo ɑ: «N sɑnn ponŋ lɑ dontl ɑ, k biɑ sɑɑ ŋɑnm lɑ dontl k pukn.»
43012029	Niib bonciɑnn nbɑ din sie lenŋ nɑ din gbɑt kunkɔl mɑnŋ, k b yɑɑ ɑ: «L tie sɑtiɑni e,» k siɑb yɑɑ ɑ: « Mɑlɑkɑ e piɑk nɑn’ɔ.»
43012030	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «L k tie n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ pɑɑk kɑɑ k kunkɔl mɑnŋ pɑk nɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie i tiɑɔnŋ pɑɑk e.
43012031	Yuo nbɑ k Yennu yɑɑ wun tɑn bu tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb buut nɑ, l yuo bɑɑt, k u biɑ sɑɑ bel wun nbɑ tie tingbounŋ nɑ bɑt.
43012032	B i tɑnŋ i jii’n k donn’n sɑnpɑɑpo yuo nbɑ, n sɑɑ te k niib kul n bɑɑl n buol.»
43012033	U mɑɑn nɑ din wɑnt wɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ kpo biɑnŋ nbɑ e.
43012034	K nibul nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «T senni ni wɑnt’t ɑ Klistu nɑ sii mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Nlee k ɑ yet ɑ b sɑɑ jii Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ k donn’ɔ? Ŋmee tie Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mɑnŋ i?»
43012035	K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «Yentu nɑ sii be i buol wɑɑnm-nnɑ e. L pɑɑk, ii sonm mɑn yentu mɑnŋ ni, lɑɑ dɑɑ be nɑ, k bunbɔnn dɑɑ bɑɑt’i, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ sonm bunbɔnn ni, u k mi wɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn nbɑ po.
43012036	Tient yentu nɑ yɑdɑ mɑn, lɑɑ dɑɑ be i sinsuuk ni nɑ k kpɑnt yentu wɑɑs e.» Yiesu nbɑ din yet nnɑ mɑnŋ puolpo e, ŋɑɑn k u nyii niib nɑ ni, k sɑɑn bɔl.
43012037	U lek din tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ bonciɑnn b nunm ni, ŋɑɑn b din k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ,
43012038	ɑ Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi mɑɑn nɑ n ji fit gbie nɑn lɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ŋmee gɑɑl t mɑɑn i? ŋmee k Yennu jii u pɑnŋ k fiit wɑnn’ɔ?»
43012039	B din k fit tien yɑdɑ, k mɑɑn Esɑɑyi biɑ din yet ɑ:
43012040	«Yennu e tien’m juɑni, k biɑ te k b gbɑl bɑnnu, ɑ k b ninbinɑ dɑɑ lɑɑt, k b yɑn ni dɑɑ bɑnt l pɑɑk, k b dɑɑ fit bɑɑt n buol ni, k mɑn teb’b.»
43012041	Esɑɑyi din yet nnɑ, k mɑɑn u din lɑ Yiesu yudɑnt e, k din piɑk u po.
43012042	Ŋɑɑn k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm bonciɑnn gbɑɑ din tien Yiesu yɑdɑ, ŋɑɑn b k nyinn b mɔnŋ pɑɑnu ni ɑ b tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, k mɑɑn b tiin jɑŋmɑɑni ɑ Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ sɑɑ nyinn’b Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni,
43012043	k mɑɑn b din luon niib n pɑk’b e, k gɑl Yennu n pɑk’b.
43012044	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu tɑn pɑk sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien’n yɑdɑ, u k tien min kuukuɑ kɑɑ yɑdɑ, ŋɑɑn u mun tien wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ e yɑdɑ.
43012045	Wun nbɑ lɑɑt’n, u lɑɑt wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ e mun.
43012046	N bɑɑl tingbounŋ ni nɑ mɑɑ mii tei yentl niib e, k dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien’n yɑdɑ, u kɑn biɑl bunbɔnn ni.
43012047	K biɑ jen ɑ, wun nbɑ gbɑt n mɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn k k sɑk, min kɑɑ sɑɑ bu u buut k biil’ɔ, k mɑɑn n k bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni mɑɑ n tɑn bu u buut k biil’ɔ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n bɑɑl mɑɑ n tɑn fiel dulnyɑ e.
43012048	K wun nbɑ yien’n k k sɑɑk n mɑɑn nɑ, lenŋ e k u sɑɑ lɑ lin nbɑ sɑɑ bu k biil’ɔ. Mɑɑn nbɑ k n pɑk nɑ tɑn sɑɑ bu nɑn’ɔ dulnyɑ cincɑɑtdɑɑl.
43012049	N k piɑk nɑn n tiɑɔnŋ yiikuo kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n Bɑɑ nbɑ tun’n nɑ yet’n mɑɑ sɑɑ pɑk lin nbɑ nɑn mɑɑ sɑɑ wɑnn lin nbɑ.
43012050	N mi nɑn lin nbɑ k u wɑnn’n tien niib mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu e. Ŋɑnn, lin nbɑ k n piɑk nɑ, l tie lin nbɑ k n Bɑɑ wɑnn’n e.»
43013001	Yuo nbɑ k yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm ji din k fɔk, k Yiesu din mi nɑn yuo nɑ e k u sɑɑ nyi tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k ŋmɑt u Bɑɑ penŋ. U din luon u tiɑɔnŋ puolpoweitieb nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k biɑ din luon’m nɑn wɑɑ tɑn gbenn u tuonɑ.
43013002	L yuo nɑ k ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb din di jiet, k Sɑɑtɑn ponŋ din dɔnŋ k te k Suudɑ Iskɑɑliɑɔt wun nbɑ tie Siimɔn bik nɑ dukn ɑ u sɑɑ kuɑt Yiesu.
43013003	Ŋɑɑn Yiesu ŋɑnin din mi nɑn u Bɑɑ tul’ɔ bont kul u nuu ni wɑɑ, k biɑ din mi nɑn u nyii u Bɑɑ penŋ e, k biɑ sɑɑ ŋmɑt u penŋ ɑ.
43013004	Ŋɑnn e k u fiil jiet pɑɑk, k liɑt u liɑtfuouk k bil, ŋɑɑn jii nunfiɑnŋ, k gbɑb u siɑk ni,
43013005	ŋɑɑn jii nyun k wɑt tien tɑtlɑɑɔk ni, k piin fobtl u puolpoweitieb tɑɑ, ŋɑɑn tuu suol nunfiɑnŋ nbɑ k u gbɑb nɑ k fiɑl b tɑɑ.
43013006	K u tɑn bɑɑl Siimɔn Piɑl penŋ. K Piɑl boi’ɔ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ yɑɑ ɑ fobt n tɑɑ e mun ii?»
43013007	K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ, ɑ dɑɑ k bɑnn mɑɑ tuun lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn l i yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, ɑ sɑɑ bɑnn ɑ.»
43013008	K Piɑl yet’ɔ: «Min ŋɑnin ponŋ, ɑ kɑn mi k fobt n tɑɑ fɑb ɑ.» K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Mi i kii fobt ɑ tɑɑ, min nɑn fin sɑɑ jiɑl muɑnu e.»
43013009	Ŋɑnn e jik k Siimɔn Piɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, dɑɑ fobtl n tɑɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn fobtl n nii nɑn n yul kul ɑ.»
43013010	K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ ponŋ wul nyun, l dɑɑnɔ ji k mɔk jɑknt. L pɑɑk, l k kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn wun ŋɑnm k wul biɑk, sie k wun fobt u tɑɑ e. I ji k mɔk jɑknt, ŋɑɑn l k tie i kul ɑ kɑɑ.»
43013011	Yiesu ponŋ din mi wun nbɑ sɑɑ kuɑt’ɔ nɑ. L pɑɑk e te k u din yet yɑɑ ɑ: «L k tie i kul ɑ kɑɑ k mɔk jɑknt.»
43013012	Yiesu nbɑ fobt b tɑɑ k gbenn yuo nbɑ nɑ, k u ji jii u liɑtfuouk nɑ k liɑ, ŋɑɑn jen kɑl jiet nɑ buol, ŋɑɑn boi’b ɑ: «I mi mɑɑ tun lin nbɑ k tul’i nɑ pɑɑk ii?
43013013	I yi’n ɑ n tie i Wɑntuɑ e, ɑ nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ, k i mɔk mɔni, k mɑɑn n set tie nnɑ e.
43013014	Tɔn, k min nbɑ tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑn Wɑntuɑ, ŋɑɑn tɑn fobt i tɑɑ nɑ, l mun ŋɑn k ii fobtl i lieb tɑɑ,
43013015	k mɑɑn n wɑnn’i nyinn e nɑ, k ii mun i tuun nnɑ mɑn nɑn mɑɑ tun biɑnŋ nbɑ k tul’i nɑ.
43013016	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, tuontunnɔ k cie u dɑɑnɔ, k tuomu mun k cie wun nbɑ tun’ɔ nɑ.
43013017	Mɔtɑɑnɑ l i tie k i ji mi lin nbɑ nɑ, pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e l i tie k i tuun nnɑ.»
43013018	«N k piɑk i kul ɑ po kɑɑ. N mi yinm nbɑ k n gɑnn’i nɑ pɑlɑ ni. Ŋɑɑn l tie k lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni n gbie ɑ: ‹Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k min nɑn ŋuɑ lɑkn di pɑɑnu nɑ, ŋuɑ e yɑɑ wun kuɑt’n.› Sie k diɑni nɑ fɑbl tien mɔni k gbien.
43013019	N yien’i lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ, k suɑ l dɑɑ k tien, k l i tei tien gbenn yuo nbɑ, k yin tien yɑdɑ nɑn n set tie mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ e.
43013020	«Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ gɑɑl n tuomu, u gɑɑl min e, k wun nbɑ gɑɑl min nɑ, u gɑɑl wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ mun e.»
43013021	Yiesu nbɑ din yet nnɑ puolpo e, k pɑlbiil bɑɑl’ɔ bonciɑnn, k u yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, i ni yenɔ sɑɑ kuɑt’n ɑ.»
43013022	K l ŋmɑt b yɑn, nɑn wɑɑ yien wun nbɑ i e, k b jiɑntl goli b lieb.
43013023	B ni yenɔ nbɑ k Yiesu mɑntk din luon’ɔ nɑ kɑl kpiɑ’u.
43013024	K Siimɔn Piɑl kɑbint’ɔ, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Boin’mɔ k lɑɑn u yien ŋmɑ po e.»
43013025	K u puolpoweituɑ mɑnŋ dɔnn nɑkn’ɔ, k boi’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l tie ŋmee?»
43013026	K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Mi i tei ŋmit pɑɑnu k tun suk kpint ni k tul wun nbɑ, yin bɑnn nɑn l dɑɑnɔ e nɑ.» Ŋɑnn e k u ŋmit pɑɑnu nɑ k suk kpint ni, k jii k tul Suudɑ wun nbɑ tie Siimɔn Iskɑɑliɑɔt bijɑ nɑ.
43013027	Suudɑ nbɑ din gɑɑl pɑɑnu mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ nɑ, k Sɑɑtɑn kuɑ u ni. K Yiesu ji yet’ɔ: «Tient fɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ tien lin nbɑ yiɑn yiɑn.»
43013028	Ŋɑɑn b suɑ din k bɑnn lin nbɑ k Yiesu pɑk’ɔ nɑ pɑɑk.
43013029	K mɑɑn Suudɑ nbɑ din tuu diɑ likli pɑkl nɑ, b siɑb din duki mi ɑ Yiesu tun’ɔ ɑ wun sɑɑn sɑɑ dɑɑ jɑɑnm nɑ jiet e, ɑmi u yet’ɔ ɑ wun sɑɑn tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm e likli.
43013030	Suudɑ nbɑ din gɑɑl pɑɑnu nɑ yuo nbɑ nɑ, l tonton nɑ k u fiil nyii. L din tie nyiɑɔk o.
43013031	Suudɑ nbɑ din nyii nɑ puolpo, k Yiesu yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ e k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ sɑɑ lɑ dontl, k n ni e Yennu mun sɑɑ lɑ dontl biɑk.
43013032	L i tie k Yennu lɑ dontl u ni, l kɑn wei i k u mun sɑɑ te k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ n lɑ dontl u ni.
43013033	«N wɑɑs, n ji kɑn wei nɑn’i bonciɑnn. I tɑn sɑɑ lon’n, ŋɑɑn n sɑɑ wɑnn’i nɑn mɑɑ yet Suifnbɑ yudɑnm biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ɑ i kɑn fit bɑɑl siɑn nbɑ k n sɑɑ nɑ.»
43013034	«Mɔtɑɑnɑ n tien’i senpɑɑnu e, ɑ ii luon i lieb mɑn. Mɑɑ luon’i biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ii mun i luon i lieb nnɑ.
43013035	L i tie k i luon i lieb, suɑ kul sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn i tie n puolpoweitieb e.»
43013036	Ŋɑnn e k Siimɔn Piɑl boi’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ yɑɑ ɑ tɑn sɑɑn lee?» K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ sɑɑn siɑn nbɑ, i kɑn fit wei mɔtɑɑnɑ, ŋɑɑn l puolpo i sɑɑ wei’n ɑ.»
43013037	K Piɑl biɑ boi’ɔ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, bee tien k n kɑn fit wei’ɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ? Min ŋɑnin ponŋ tien siil nɑn k n gɑɑl ɑ pɑɑk k kpo.»
43013038	K Yiesu boi’ɔ ɑ: «A set tien siil nɑn mɔni nɑn k ɑ gɑɑl n pɑɑk k kpo oo? Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’ɑ nɑ, kojouk dɑɑ tɑn kɑn bui dɑɑnn, k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ noi tɑɑl muntɑ ɑ ɑ k mi’n.»
43014001	«I dɑɑ te k i yɑn put. Tient Yennu yɑdɑ, k mun tien’n yɑdɑ.
43014002	Diet bonciɑnn be n Bɑɑ ŋɑɑk ni. L i bo i kii tie bɑlmɔni, n bo kɑn yet’i ni, k mɑɑn n kun ɑ sɑɑ tien i diet mɑnŋ siil e.
43014003	K mi i kun k sɑɑ tien i diet nɑ siil k gbenn, n biɑ sɑɑ jen ɑ k tɑn jii’i, k i mun tɑn sii be siɑn nbɑ k n tɑn sii be nɑ.
43014004	I mi mɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn nbɑ, k biɑ mi l sɔnu.»
43014005	K Tuomɑ boi’ɔ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, t k mi fɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn. Nlee k t sɑɑ bɑnn l sɔnu?»
43014006	K Yiesu jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Min e tie sɔnu nɑ, k biɑ tie mɔmɔnm, k biɑ tie mɑnfuol. Suɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ bɑɑl n Bɑɑ buol ni, k l k tie k u sint bɑɑl’n.
43014007	L i bo i tie k i mi’n, i biɑ bo sii mi n Bɑɑ nɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ k jikt sɑɑ, i ji mi’u k biɑ lɑɑt’ɔ.»
43014008	K Fiiliip yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, wɑnt’t ɑ Bɑɑ mɑnŋ, k t pɑlɑ n pɑɑk.»
43014009	K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Fiiliip, n ponŋ be nɑn’i k l wei wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k ɑ dɑɑ k mi’n ii? Wun nbɑ lɑ’n, u set lɑ n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ e nɑ. K bee k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ n wɑnn’i n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ i?
43014010	A k tien yɑdɑ nɑn n be n Bɑɑ ni e, k n Bɑɑ mun be n ni ii? Mɑɑn nbɑ k n pɑk k tul’i nɑ, l k nyii n ni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l nyii n Bɑɑ Yennu buol e. Ŋuɑ e be n ni k tuun u tuonɑ mɑnŋ.
43014011	Tient’n yɑdɑ nɑn n be n Bɑɑ ni, k n Bɑɑ mun be n ni. L i kii tie nnɑ biɑk, yin tien yɑdɑ tuonɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
43014012	«Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien’n yɑdɑ, u sii tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nɑn mɑɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k u bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ mɑnŋ gbɑɑ sɑɑ gɑl n yɑl ɑ, k mɑɑn n sɑɑ n Bɑɑ buol e.
43014013	K lin nbɑ kul k i sii mei’ɔ l po n sɑnn ni, n sɑɑ tun’ɑ, ɑ k ŋuɑ Yennu n lɑ dontl n pɑɑk.
43014014	K l i tie k i mei’ɔ lin nbɑ kul po n sɑnn ni, n sɑɑ tun ɑ.»
43014015	«L i tie k i luon’n, i sii sɑɑk n mɔb,
43014016	k n sɑɑ miɑl n Bɑɑ k u sɑɑ tul’i sonmtɔluɑ, k u sii be nɑn’i yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
43014017	Ŋuɑ e tie Foŋɑnm nbɑ wɑnt bɑlmɔni. Tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb k fit gɑɑl’ɔ, k mɑɑn b k lɑɑt’ɔ, k biɑ k mi’u, ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin mi’u, k mɑɑn u be nɑn’i, k biɑ sii be i ni.
43014018	«N kɑn nyik’i, k i tie kpiebi. N sɑɑ jen i penŋ nɑ.
43014019	K l i yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb ji kɑn lɑ’n, ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin biɑ sɑɑ lɑ’n ɑ. Mɑɑ mɔk mɑnfuol nɑ, k i mun sii mɔk mɑnfuol.
43014020	L dɑɑl i bɑɑl, i tɑn sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn n be n Bɑɑ ni e, k i mun biɑ be n ni, k n mun be i ni.
43014021	«Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ mɔk n senni k biɑ sɑɑk’l, l dɑɑnɔ e luon’n. N Bɑɑ Yennu sii luon wun nbɑ luon’n, k n mun sii luon’ɔ, k sɑɑ fiit n mɔnŋ k wɑnn’ɔ.»
43014022	K Suudɑ, (l k tie Suudɑ Iskɑɑliɑɔt kɑɑ) boi’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, bee tien k ɑ sɑɑ fiit ɑ mɔnŋ k wɑnn’t, ŋɑɑn kɑn fiit ɑ mɔnŋ k tul tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb i?»
43014023	K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ luon’n, u sii sɑɑk n mɑɑn, k n Bɑɑ sii luon’ɔ, k min nɑn n Bɑɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl u buol k sii tun be u ni.
43014024	Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k luon’n, u k sɑɑk n mɑɑn, k yɑɑ gbɑt mɑɑn nbɑ nɑ, l k tie n yɑl kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie n Bɑɑ nbɑ tun’n nɑ yɑl e.
43014025	«N yien’i mɑɑn nbɑ nɑ, mɑɑ dɑɑ be nɑn’i nɑ,
43014026	ŋɑɑn k n Bɑɑ sɑɑ tun sonmtuɑ i buol, n sɑnn ni. L sonmtuɑ e tie Foŋɑnm nɑ. Ŋuɑ e sɑɑ wɑnn’i mɑɑn kul, k biɑ sɑɑ tiɑl’i lin nbɑ kul k n ponŋ yet’i.
43014027	«N tien’i mɑnu e. N pi’i piini nbɑ tie n mɑnu e. N k tul’i nɑn tingbounŋ ŋɑɑtieb nbɑ tuu tul b lieb bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ kɑɑ. I dɑɑ mɔk pɑlbiil. I biɑ dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni.
43014028	I ponŋ gbɑt k n yet’i ɑ: ‹N yɑɑtl e, ŋɑɑn n biɑ sɑɑ jen i buol ni nɑ.› L i tie k i luon’n i e, i sii mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn mɑɑ sɑɑ n Bɑɑ Yennu buol ni nɑ, k mɑɑn n Bɑɑ cie’n.
43014029	«N yien’i lin nbɑ nɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ, k suɑ l dɑɑ k tien, k yuo nbɑ k l tɑn sɑɑ tien e wɑɑ, k yin tien yɑdɑ.
43014030	N kɑn pɑk nɑn’i k wei, k mɑɑn tingbounŋ nɑ yudɑɑnɔ bɑɑt. U k mɔk n yiikuo,
43014031	ŋɑɑn l tie k tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb n bɑnn nɑn n luon n Bɑɑ nɑn mɔni, k n mun tuun lin nbɑ k u yet’n ɑ n tun. «Fiit mɑn k tin yɑɑt mɑn.»
43015001	«Min e tie bɑlmɔni tiik nbɑ k b yi fiinyɑ nɑ, k n Bɑɑ Yennu tie l ŋɑnmtuɑ,
43015002	k u tuu cuɑ yiini kul nbɑ gɑɑ n pɑɑk ŋɑɑn k k luon luɑnɑ nɑ. Ŋɑɑn yiini kul nbɑ ŋɑnin luon luɑnɑ nɑ, u tuu gbɑt gbɑt ŋɑnn e, k lin ŋɑnm k lon luɑnɑ bonciɑnn.
43015003	Mɔtɑɑnɑ, yinm e tie niŋɑnm, mɑɑn nbɑ k n pɑk k tul’i nɑ pɑɑk.
43015004	Ii gɑɑ n pɑɑk mɑn, k n sii be i ni. Tiik yiinu kɑn fit lon luɑnɑ u kuukuɑ, sie k u gɑɑ tiik pɑɑk. I mun kɑn fit lon luɑnɑ, sie k i gɑɑ n pɑɑk.
43015005	«Min e tie tiik mɑnŋ, k yinm e tie l yiini. Wun nbɑ gɑɑ n pɑɑk, k n mun be u ni, ŋuɑ e sii luon luɑnɑ bonciɑnn, k mɑɑn mi i kɑɑ i ni, i kɑn fit tun siɑl.
43015006	Wun nbɑ k gɑɑ n pɑɑk, u nɑɑn nɑn tiik yiinu nbɑ k b cuɑ’l k lu k l kuol nɑ e. L tiik yiinbuolu e k b tuu tikl k juo muu nɑ.
43015007	L i tie k i tun gɑɑ n pɑɑk, k n mɑɑn nɑ be i ni, miɑt lin nbɑ kul k i luon, k i sɑɑ lɑ wɑɑ.
43015008	L i tie k i luon luɑnɑ bonciɑnn, ŋɑnn e sɑɑ wɑnn nɑn i set tie n puolpoweitieb nɑn bɑlmɔni, k n Bɑɑ sɑɑ lɑ dontl.
43015009	«N Bɑɑ nbɑ luon’n biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, n mun luon’i l biɑnŋ e. Ii gɑɑ n pɑɑk, k n lonm sii be i ni.
43015010	L i tie k i sɑɑk n mɔb, n lonm sii be i ni, nɑn mɑɑ sɑɑk n Bɑɑ mɔb, k u lonm mun be n ni nɑ.»
43015011	«N pɑk nɑ k tul’i, ɑ n pɑlpienn i be i ni e, k i pɑlpienn n gbie.
43015012	Nɑ e tie n senni k n senn k tul’i, mɑɑ ii luon i lieb nɑn mɑɑ luon yinm biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
43015013	Lonjɑɑnsiɑl kɑɑ k gɑl nilɔ n sɑk k gɑɑl u yuɑsnbɑ pɑɑk k kpo.
43015014	«L i tie k i tuun mɑɑ yien’i biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, i tie n yuɑsnbɑ e.
43015015	N ji kɑn yiin’i tuontunnɑ, k mɑɑn tuontunnɔ k mi u Yonmdɑɑnɔ dudukt. Mɑɑ yi’i n yuɑsnbɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn lɑbɑɑl kul nbɑ k n gbɑt n Bɑɑ penŋ nɑ, ŋɑnn e k n wɑnn’i.
43015016	Yinm kɑɑ gɑnn’n, ŋɑɑn min e gɑnn’i, k tul’i tuonɑ mɑɑ ii sɑɑ kii luon luɑnɑ bonciɑnn, luɑnɑ nbɑ sii be mɔkmɔk nɑn mɔkmɔk, ɑ n Bɑɑ Yennu n tul’i lin nbɑ k i miɑl’ɔ n sɑnn ni.
43015017	Lin nbɑ nɑ e k n pɑk senn k tul’i, mɑɑ ii luon i lieb mɑn.
43015018	«Tɔn, l i tɑnŋ i tie k tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb nɑn’i, yin bɑnn nɑn b ponŋ nɑn min e wɑɑ.
43015019	L i bo i tie k i tie tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑk niib i e, tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb bo sii luon’i nɑn bɑɑ luon b mɔnŋ niib biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e. Ŋɑɑn n gɑnn’i k nyinn’i tingbounŋ nɑ niib ni wɑɑ, k i ji k tie tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb yɑb. L pɑɑk e tien k b nɑn’i.
43015020	Ii tiɑn mɑɑn nbɑ k n pɑk’i nɑ mɑn, ɑ: ‹Tuontunnɔ kɑɑ k cie u cɑnbɑɑ.› B i muks’n, b mun sɑɑ muks’i wɑɑ, k b i sɑk n mɑɑn, b mun biɑ sɑɑ sɑk i mɑɑn ɑ.
43015021	B set sɑɑ muks’i n sɑnn pɑɑk k mɑɑn b k mi wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ.
43015022	«Mi ii dinŋ ii kii sik k tɑn pɑk k tul’b, b bo kii mɔk biit, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ sɔnsɑu ji kɑɑ k b sɑɑ fit bɔl b biit.
43015023	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ nɑn’n, u nɑn n Bɑɑ e mun.
43015024	Mi i bo kii tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k suɑ dɑɑ k mi tun nɑ b buol ni, b biɑ bo kii mɔk biit, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ b lɑ bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn nɑn min nɑn n Bɑɑ.
43015025	Ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ nɑ tien ɑ lin gbie lin nbɑ diɑn b senni ni ɑ: ‹B nɑn’n, ŋɑɑn k l k mɔk pɑɑk.›
43015026	«N sɑɑ tun sonmtuɑ i penŋ, wun nbɑ tie Foŋɑnm k wɑnt bɑlmɔni nɑ. U nyi n Bɑɑ buol e k sii piɑk n po.
43015027	K i mun sii tie n siɑlɑ, k mɑɑn i ponŋ tun be nɑn’n, lɑɑ din nyii yuo nbɑ k n din piin k tuun n tuonn nɑ.
43016001	«N wɑnt’i lin nbɑ nɑ ɑ i dɑɑ buol i yɑdɑ ni e.
43016002	B tɑn sɑɑ yuɑ nyinn’i Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni. K yuo bɑɑt k wun nbɑ tɑn kpi’i, u sii duki mi ɑ u tuun nnɑ k tien Yennu e.
43016003	B tɑn sɑɑ tun lin nbɑ nɑ k tul’i wɑɑ, k mɑɑn b din k mi n Bɑɑ k biɑ k mi’n.
43016004	Ŋɑɑn n yien’i lin nbɑ nɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ, ɑ l yuo i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, k yin ji fit tiɑl n mɑɑn nbɑ k n pɑk’i nɑ.» «N din k yet’i lin nbɑ nɑ sinsinn, k mɑɑn min nɑn yinm e tuu be.
43016005	Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ n sɑɑ wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ penŋ e. Ŋɑɑn i suɑ k boi’n k lɑɑn n sɑɑ lee.
43016006	Ŋɑɑn mɑɑ yien’i lin nbɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ pɑɑk, k i ji mɔk pɑlbiil bonciɑnn.
43016007	N yien’i bɑlmɔni e, nɑn l ŋɑn i po nɑn k n yɑɑt sɑɑn, k mɑɑn mi i kii sɑɑn, sonmtuɑ nɑ kɑn bɑɑl i penŋ. Ŋɑɑn mi i tɑnŋ i sɑɑn, n sɑɑ tun’ɔ i penŋ nɑ.
43016008	«U i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, u sɑɑ wɑnn tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb ɑ b kpɑnn b mɔnŋ e k jiin biit po, k biɑ kpɑnn b mɔnŋ k jiin lin nbɑ ŋɑn po, k biɑ kpɑnn b mɔnŋ k jiin Yennu bɑlbunu po.
43016009	U sɑɑ wɑnn’b ɑ b kpɑnn b mɔnŋ e k jiin biit po, k mɑɑn b k tien’n yɑdɑ.
43016010	U sɑɑ wɑnn’b ɑ b kpɑnn b mɔnŋ k jiin lin nbɑ ŋɑn po, k mɑɑn n ji sɑɑ n Bɑɑ penŋ e k i ji kɑn lɑ’n.
43016011	U sɑɑ wɑnn’b ɑ b kpɑnn b mɔnŋ e k jiin Yennu bɑlbunu po, k mɑɑn u ponŋ bu tingbounŋ nɑ yudɑɑnɔ buut k biil’ɔ wɑɑ.
43016012	«Mɑɑn be bonciɑnn k n bo sɑɑ pɑk’i, ŋɑɑn i kɑn fit gɑɑl’l mɔtɑɑnɑ.
43016013	Foŋɑnm nbɑ wɑnt bɑlmɔni nɑ, u i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, u sɑɑ wɑnn’i bɑlmɔni kul wɑnnu wɑɑ. K mɑɑn u tɑn kii piɑk u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ po kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u tɑn sii wɑnt’i lin nbɑ k u gbiɑ, k biɑ sii yien’i lin nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ tien nɑ.
43016014	U sii dont n sɑnn, k mɑɑn u tɑn sii jikt lin nbɑ kul tie n yɑl e k wɑnt’i.
43016015	Lin nbɑ kul k n Bɑɑ mɔk tie n yɑl e. Ŋɑnn e te k n yet ɑ u sii jikt lin nbɑ tie n yɑl e k wɑnt’i.»
43016016	«L i yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ i ji kɑn lɑ’n, ŋɑɑn l i biɑ kii yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, i biɑ sɑɑ lɑ’n ɑ.»
43016017	K u puolpoweitesiɑb boi b lieb ɑ: «Lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk tie bee? K u yɑɑ ɑ l i yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, ɑ t kɑn lɑ’u, ɑ ŋɑɑn l i biɑ kii yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, ɑ t sɑɑ lɑ’u wɑɑ. K u biɑ yɑɑ ɑ k mɑɑn u sɑɑ u Bɑɑ penŋ e.
43016018	‹L i yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ› pɑɑk tie bee? T k mi wɑɑ piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.»
43016019	K Yiesu bɑnn nɑn b yɑɑ bin boi’ɔ buboit e. L pɑɑk e te k u boi’b ɑ: «Mɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ l i yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ i kɑn lɑ’n, k biɑ yɑɑ ɑ l i biɑ yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ i sɑɑ lɑ’n ɑ nɑ, i boi i lieb e ɑ i bɑnn l pɑɑk ii?
43016020	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, i tɑn sii fɑbn k mɔ, ŋɑɑn tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb ŋɑnin tɑn sii mɔk pɑlpienn e. I sii mɔk pɑlbiil, ŋɑɑn l puolpo k i pɑlbiil mɑnŋ tɑn sɑɑ tunn k tien pɑlpienn.
43016021	«L tie nɑn puo nbɑ tuu yɑɑ wun mɑl, k mɔk pɑlbiil nɑ e, k mɑɑn u fɑlɑ yuo bɑɑl ɑ, ŋɑɑn u i tɑnŋ i mɑl bik yuo nbɑ, u ji tuu tɑnm u fɑlɑ nɑ po e, ŋɑɑn ji mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn wɑɑ mɑl bik tingbounŋ ni nɑ pɑɑk.
43016022	L tɑn sii tie i mun nnɑ e. Mɔtɑɑnɑ yɑɑ mɔk pɑlbiil nɑ, ŋɑɑn n biɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ’i wɑɑ, k i pɑlɑ tɑn sɑɑ penn bonciɑnn, k suɑ kɑɑ k tɑn sɑɑ nyinn pɑlpienn mɑnŋ i ni.
43016023	«L yuo i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, i tɑn kɑn boi’n buboit. Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, lin nbɑ kul k i mei n Bɑɑ nɑn n sɑnn ni, u sɑɑ tul’i wɑɑ.
43016024	Ŋɑɑn nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, i dɑɑ k mi miɑl’ɔ bonsiɑl nɑn n sɑnn ni. Ii mei’ɔ mɑn, k i sɑɑ lɑ, k ji fit lɑ pɑlpienn k sɑɑ yɑkl.»
43016025	«N ponŋ tuu puɑn’i kpɑnjɑn e, ŋɑɑn yuo bɑɑt k n ji tɑn kii puɑn’i kpɑnjɑn, ŋɑɑn n tɑn sii piɑk k yentl i nunm po e k jikt sɑɑ n Bɑɑ Yennu po.
43016026	Ŋɑɑn l yuo i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, i tuu sii mei’ɔ n sɑnn ni. N k yɑɑ ɑ n tɑn sii mei’ɔ k tien’i kɑɑ,
43016027	k mɑɑn n Bɑɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ luon’i, yɑɑ mun luon’n k tien yɑdɑ nɑn n nyii n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ buol ni nɑ pɑɑk.
43016028	N din nyii n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ penŋ e k sik tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k mɔtɑɑnɑ n ji nyikt tingbounŋ mɑnŋ e nɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt u penŋ.»
43016029	Ŋɑnn e k u puolpoweitieb nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ ɑ ji kpɑn piɑk yentl t nunm po e nɑ. A ji k puɑn’t kpɑnjɑn kɑɑ.
43016030	Mɔtɑɑnɑ t ji bɑnn nɑn ɑ mi bonsiɑl kul, k l k tie k suɑ n boi’ɑ buboit kɑɑ wɑɑ. K l pɑɑk e tien k t tien yɑdɑ nɑn ɑ nyii Yennu penŋ e.»
43016031	K Yiesu jiin’m ɑ: «I ji tien’n yɑdɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ wɑɑ ɑɑ?
43016032	Tɔn, yuo bɑɑt, k l ponŋ bɑɑl ɑ, k i kul tɑn sɑɑ yɑt kun. I tɑn sɑɑ nyik’n, k n be n kuukuɑ, ŋɑɑn n kii be n kuukuɑ kɑɑ, k mɑɑn n Bɑɑ be nɑn’n.
43016033	N yien’i lin nbɑ nɑ ɑ yin lɑ mɑnu e, yɑɑ gɑɑ n pɑɑk nɑ. I tɑn sii di fɑlɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni. Ŋɑɑn ii mɔk pɑlcienn mɑn. N nyɑnn tingbounŋ nɑ wɑɑ.»
43017001	Yiesu nbɑ din pɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn gokt got sɑnpɑɑpo, k yet ɑ: «N Bɑɑ, yuo mɑnŋ bɑɑl nɑ. Ŋɑɑnt k ɑ Bijɑ n lɑ dontl, k ji fit te k ɑ mun n lɑ dontl,
43017002	k mɑɑn fin e tul’ɔ yiikuo niib kul pɑɑk, ɑ wun ji fit tul niib kul nbɑ k ɑ tul’ɔ mɑnŋ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
43017003	K mɑnfuol mɑnŋ e tie lin nbɑ sɑɑ te k niib n bɑnn fin nbɑ tie Yennu nɑn bɑlmɔni, k suɑ kɑɑ, nɑn Yiesu Klistu nbɑ k ɑ tun’ɔ nɑ.
43017004	Tuonɑ nbɑ k ɑ tul’n, ɑ n tun nɑ, n ji tun k gbenn ɑ, k donn ɑ sɑnn tingbounŋ nɑ ni.
43017005	N Bɑɑ, tuln’min yudɑnt mɔtɑɑnɑ, yudɑnt nbɑ k n din mɔk, yuo nbɑ k n din be ɑ buol ni k suɑ k ɑ dɑɑ din k nɑn dulnyɑ nɑ.
43017006	«Niib nbɑ k ɑ din gɑnn’b tingbounŋ nɑ ni k tul’n nɑ, n te k b bɑnn’ɑ wɑɑ. B din tie ɑ yɑb e, k ɑ din jii’b k tul’n, k b mun sɑk ɑ mɑɑn ɑ.
43017007	K mɔtɑɑnɑ b mi nɑn bonsiɑl kul nbɑ k ɑ tul’n nɑ, l nyii ɑ buol e,
43017008	k mɑɑn n pɑk’b mɑɑn nbɑ k ɑ tul’n nɑ wɑɑ, k b mun gɑɑl ɑ. B mi nɑn n set nyii ɑ penŋ e nɑn mɔni, k b tien yɑdɑ nɑn fin e tun’n.
43017009	«Tɔn, mɔtɑɑnɑ n ji mei’ɑ b pɑɑk e nɑ. N k mei’ɑ tingbounŋ nɑ niib kul pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ n mei’ɑ bin nbɑ k ɑ tul’n nɑ pɑɑk e, k mɑɑn b tie ɑ yɑb e.
43017010	N yɑb kul tie ɑ yɑb e, k ɑ yɑb kul mun tie n yɑb, k b ni e k n lɑɑt yudɑnt.
43017011	N ji k be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm ŋɑnin dɑɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni e. N bɑɑt ɑ buol ni e. N Bɑɑ, Ŋɑnɔ nɑ, i diɑ’b fɑnu nɑn ɑ sɑnn ni, sɑnn nbɑ k ɑ din pul’n nɑ, ɑ bin ji fit tɑɑn yonm nɑn min nɑn fin nbɑ kpɑn tie yonm nɑ.
43017012	Mɑɑ dɑɑ be nɑn’m nɑ, n diɑ’b fɑnu nɑn ɑ sɑnn nbɑ k ɑ din pul’n nɑ ni. N guu’b k b ni suɑ k bot, sie wun nbɑ din sɑɑ bot ɑ k lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ n gbie e.
43017013	Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ n bɑɑt ɑ penŋ e, k mɑɑ dɑɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑ, n piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ k tien’m, ɑ bin ji fit lɑ n pɑlpienn nɑ k sɑɑ yɑkl.
43017014	«N pɑk ɑ mɑɑn nɑ tul’b ɑ, k tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb nɑn’m, k mɑɑn b k tie tingbounŋ nɑ ni yɑb, nɑn mɑɑ mun k tie tingbounŋ nɑ ni yuɑ nɑ.
43017015	N k mei’ɑ mɑɑ ɑ nyinn’b tingbounŋ nɑ ni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n mei’ɑ fɑn guul’b fɑnu, k Klistu dɑtɑɑk dɑɑ bɑɑt k biil’b.
43017016	B k tie tingbounŋ nɑ yɑb, nɑn mɑɑ mun k tie tingbounŋ nɑ yuɑ nɑ.
43017017	«Ŋɑɑnt k bii tie ɑ yɑb nɑn bɑlmɔni, k mɑɑn ɑ mɑɑn tie bɑlmɔni e.
43017018	Fɑɑ din tun’n tingbounŋ nɑ ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, nnɑ e k n mun tun’m tingbounŋ nɑ ni.
43017019	K b pɑɑk e k n jikt n mɔnŋ k tien’ɑ nɑ, ɑ bin ji fit tien ɑ tiɑɔnŋ yɑb nɑn bɑlmɔni.
43017020	«N k mei’ɑ k tien ŋɑnm kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n biɑ mei’ɑ k tien bin nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ tien’n yɑdɑ b muɑnti pɑɑk e wɑɑ,
43017021	ɑ b kul n tɑɑn yonm. N Bɑɑ, ŋɑɑnt k bii be t ni, nɑn fɑɑ be n ni k n mun be ɑ ni nɑ, ɑ k tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb n tien yɑdɑ nɑn fin e tun’n.
43017022	N tul’b yudɑnt nbɑ k ɑ tul’n nɑ, ɑ b kul n tɑɑn yonm nɑn min nɑn fin nbɑ tɑɑn yonm biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
43017023	N be b ni, k ɑ mun be n ni, ɑ k bin tɑɑn yonm dede k tingbounŋ ŋɑɑtieb n fit bɑnn nɑn fin e tun’n, k ɑ mun luon’m nɑn fɑɑ luon’n biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
43017024	«N luon k bin nbɑ k ɑ tul’n nɑ i be mɑɑ tɑn sii be siɑn nbɑ k bin lɑ n yudɑnt nbɑ k ɑ din tul’n k suɑ k ɑ dɑɑ k nɑn dulnyɑ nɑ.
43017025	N Bɑɑ, fin nbɑ tie Ŋɑnɔ nɑ, tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb k mi’ɑ ni, ŋɑɑn n mi’ɑ, k bin nbɑ be nɑn’n mi nɑn fin e tun’n.
43017026	N te k b bɑnn’ɑ k n biɑ sɑɑ te k b ŋɑnm bɑnn’ɑ, ɑ k lonm nbɑ k ɑ mɔk nɑn’n nɑ ii be b ni k n mun sii be b ni.»
43018001	Yiesu nbɑ din pɑk k gbenn nɑ puolpo, k ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb yɑɑt sɑɑ, k sɑɑ puot kpenu nbɑ k b yi Seedlɔn nɑ. Gungounŋ nnɑ din be lenŋ, k b din be gungounŋ mɑnŋ ni.
43018002	Tɔn, Suudɑ wun nbɑ kuɑt Yiesu nɑ din tuu mi gungounŋ mɑnŋ buol, k mɑɑn yuo kul Yiesu din tuu sɑɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb lenŋ e.
43018003	Ŋɑnn e k Suudɑ tɑn bɑɑl gungounŋ mɑnŋ ni nɑn sejenm bonciɑnn, nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ tuontunnɑ, k b din diɑ jɑtiɑt nɑn fitɑ nɑn mulɑnbɑɑbi.
43018004	Yiesu ŋɑnin din mi bonsiɑl kul nbɑ yɑɑ lin tien’ɔ, ŋɑnn e k u nyii tuɑnn, k boi’b ɑ: «I luon ŋmee?»
43018005	K b jiin ɑ: «Yiesu nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ.» K u yet’b ɑ: «Min e nɑ.» K Suudɑ, wun nbɑ nyii u puol nɑ, k u sie lenŋ nɑn’m.
43018006	Yiesu nbɑ ŋɑnin yɑɑ ɑ: «Min e nɑ» yuo nbɑ, k b ji ŋmɑt potuntunɑ, k bɑɑ bɑɑ tinŋ ni.
43018007	K Yiesu ŋɑnm boi’b ɑ: «I luon ŋmee?» K b biɑ yɑɑ ɑ: «Yiesu nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ.»
43018008	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «N ponŋ yet’i ɑ min e nɑ. L i tie k i luon’n i e, yin ŋɑɑn k bin nbɑ be nnɑ nɑ k bin yɑɑt ɑ.»
43018009	Nnɑ e k lin nbɑ k u yet ɑ: «Fɑɑ tul’n bin nbɑ kul nɑ, b suɑ k bot,» k lin fit tien mɔni.
43018010	L yuo mɑnŋ k Siimɔn Piɑl din diɑ juk-bɑnjiɑk k nuɑt, k cuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ tuontunnɔ niidiitu po tubl k pot. Tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ sɑnn din yi Mɑɑlkus.
43018011	K Yiesu yet Piɑl ɑ: «Jiin ɑ juk-bɑnjiɑk mɑnŋ k jiin nuɑn. A duki nɑn wɑhɑlɑ kɔp nbɑ k n Bɑɑ tul’n nɑ, n kɑn nyu lenŋ ii?» Ann penŋ
43018012	Ŋɑnn e jik k sejenm nɑn b yudɑɑnɔ nɑn Suifnbɑ yudɑnm tuontunnɑ nɑ suol Yiesu, k lol’ɔ,
43018013	k jii’u k dɑɑ sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Ann buol sinsinn. Ann din tie Kɑɑyiif diɑnjuɑ e, k Kɑɑyiif din tie Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ e l binn ni.
43018014	Kɑɑyiif mɑnŋ e dɑɑn yet Suifnbɑ yudɑnm ɑ l i tie k niyenɔ kuɑ gɑɑl niib kul pɑɑk k kpo, l sɔ.
43018015	Bɑɑ din sɑɑn nɑn Yiesu yuo nbɑ, k Siimɔn Piɑl nɑn Yiesu puolpoweitɔluɑ wɑɑ. K puolpoweituɑ mɑnŋ din tie suɑ nbɑ k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ mi’u e. L pɑɑk, k u din fit kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ nɑ ŋɑɑdundounŋ ni, siɑn nbɑ k Yiesu be nɑ.
43018016	Ŋɑɑn k Piɑl ŋɑnin biɑl sie nɑn-yel po yɑnŋl tɑnmɔb ni, k puolpoweitɔluɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ din mi’u nɑ, k u ŋmɑt yɑnŋl tɑnmɔb nɑ ni, k pɑk nɑn sɑpɑɑmɔ nbɑ guu tɑnmɔb nɑ, k kuɑn Piɑl dundounŋ ni.
43018017	K sɑpɑɑmɔ mɑnŋ boi Piɑl: «A k tie juɑ nɑ puolpoweitɔyenɔ kɑɑ ɑɑ?» K Piɑl jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Aɑi. N k tie u puolpoweitɔyenɔ kɑɑ.»
43018018	Wɑɑt din be l yuo, k tuontunnɑ nɑ nɑn sejenm nɑ juo sɑnkuɑnɑ muu, k sie k nɑni, k Piɑl tɑn sɑɑn tɑɑn’m k b nɑni.
43018019	Ŋɑnn e k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ nɑ boi Yiesu u puolpoweitieb nɑn u wɑnnu nɑ po.
43018020	K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «N ponŋ tuu piɑk yienin ni k tien suɑ kul. Yuo kul n tuu wɑnt niib Yennu mɑɑn Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, siɑn nbɑ k Suifnbɑ kul tuu bɑɑt lɑknt nɑ. N k pɑk siɑl wuol ni.
43018021	Bee tien k ɑ boi’n nnɑ? Boin bin nbɑ gbɑt lin nbɑ k n tuu yien’m nɑ. Ŋɑnm mi mɑɑ tuu yien lin nbɑ.»
43018022	Yiesu nbɑ yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, k sejenm nɑ yenɔ peb’ɔ tɑnpɑk, ŋɑɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Nnɑ e k ɑ sɑɑ pɑk jiin Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ?»
43018023	K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «Mi i pɑk bonbisiɑl i e, fɑn yet suɑ kul lɑɑ tie lin nbɑ. Ŋɑɑn mi i pɑk lin nbɑ tokn i e, bee tien k ɑ ji peb’n i?»
43018024	L yuo e k Ann te k b jii Yiesu k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Kɑɑyiif wun nbɑ tie Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ nɑ penŋ, k Yiesu biɑ lek dɑɑ lol nɑn ŋmiit.
43018025	Piɑl nbɑ din sie k nɑni muu nɑ, lenŋ mɑnŋ k b boi’ɔ ɑ: «A k tie u puolpoweitɔyenɔ kɑɑ ɑɑ?» K Piɑl noi, k yet’b ɑ: «Aɑi, n k tie u puolpoweitɔyenɔ kɑɑ.»
43018026	K Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ tuontun-yenɔ nbɑ k u ninjɑ tie wun nbɑ k Piɑl cuɑ u tubl k pot nɑ, k u boi’ɔ ɑ: «N k lɑ’ɑ nɑn Yiesu, gungounŋ nɑ ni ii?»
43018027	K Piɑl biɑ noi. L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni nɑ k kojouk bui.
43018028	L puolpo k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nyii nɑn Yiesu Kɑɑyiif ŋɑɑk ni k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Luonmtieb kpɑnbɑl ŋɑɑk ni. L din tie sɑn-nyɑpob ni e. Ŋɑɑn Suifnbɑ yudɑnm mɑnŋ k luon bin kuɑ ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni k mɑɑn b din k luon bin kuɑn b mɔnŋ jɑknt ni ɑ bin fit k di yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm jiet.
43018029	L pɑɑk k Piilɑɑt nyii nɑn-yel k tuok’b, k boi’b ɑ: «I tɑɑl juɑ nɑ biɑ pɑɑk e?»
43018030	K b yɑɑ ɑ: «Wuu bo i kii tun bonbiil, t bo kɑn bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ ɑ buol nnɑ.»
43018031	K Piilɑɑt yet’b: «I mɔnŋ mɔnŋ n jii’u k bu nɑn’ɔ i senni nbɑ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ.» K Suifnbɑ yudɑnm mɑnŋ yɑɑ ɑ: «T k mɔk yiikuo nɑn tin kpi nilɔ.»
43018032	L din set tɑn tie nnɑ e, ɑ Yiesu nbɑ din yɑɑ ɑ kubuolu nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ kpo nɑ, n ji fit gbie.
43018033	K Piilɑɑt ŋmɑt k kuɑ ŋɑɑk nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn yiin Yiesu, k boi’ɔ ɑ: «A tie Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl ee?»
43018034	K Yiesu jiin k boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e dɑɑ boi’n buboit nɑ ɑmi siɑb e yet’ɑ n po oo?»
43018035	K Piilɑɑt yet’ɔ: «N mun tie Suifnbɑ buolu ni nilɔ ee? A mɔnŋ mɔnŋ niib nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm e jii’ɑ k tɑn tul’n. A jiɑ biil bee?»
43018036	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «N nɑɑn k tie tingbounŋ nɑ ni yɑl kɑɑ. N nɑɑn i bo i tie tingbounŋ nnɑ yɑl i e, n sejenm bo sɑɑ kɔn n pɑɑk, k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm bo kɑn suol’n. Aɑi, n nɑɑn k tie tingbounŋ nnɑ nɑɑn.»
43018037	K Piilɑɑt boi’ɔ ɑ: «A set tie Kpɑnbɑl e ŋɑnin ii?» K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Nnn, fin e yien ɑ n tie Kpɑnbɑl. B din mɑl’n ɑ n wɑnn niib bɑlmɔni e. K l pɑɑk e, k n din bɑɑl dulnyɑ nɑ ni k suɑ kul nbɑ wɑɑ bɑlmɔni mɑnŋ gbiɑ n mɑɑn.»
43018038	K Piilɑɑt boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni tie bee?» Wɑɑ yet nnɑ puolpo k u ŋmɑt nyii nɑn-yel Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ buol k yet’b ɑ: «N k lɑ juɑ nɑ biit k sɑɑ biil’ɔ.
43018039	Ŋɑɑn i mɔk siɑl k tuu tie binn kul ni, k n tuu nyinn dɑnsɑlyenɔ yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm yuo k tul’i. I luon k n nyinn Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl nɑ k tul’i ni ii?»
43018040	K b tiɑn tintiɑni k yɑɑ ɑ: «T k luon juɑ nɑ kɑɑ. T luon Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs e, k ɑ nyinn’ɔ k tul’t.» Ŋɑɑn k Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs mɑnŋ din tie fɑt-tuɑ e.
43019001	L yuo nɑ k Piilɑɑt te k b buo Yiesu gbɑnn.
43019002	K sejenm nɑ luu kunkoni foklk k yiln’mɔ, ŋɑɑn lɑnn’ɔ bɑɑnmunŋ nnɑ,
43019003	k nyi bɑɑt k gbɑɑ u tuɑnn, k yien ɑ: « Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl, t fuont’ɑ,» ŋɑɑn pebt’ɔ tɑnpɑki.
43019004	Ŋɑnn e k Piilɑɑt biɑ ŋɑnm k dɑɑ nyii nɑn-yel k yet yudɑnm nɑ: «Gotl mɑn, n bɑɑt nɑn’ɔ i buol, k yin bɑnn nɑn n k lɑ u biit.»
43019005	Ŋɑnn e, k Yiesu bɑɑl nɑn-yel po, k yil kunkoni foklk nɑ nɑn bɑɑnmunŋ nɑ, k Piilɑɑt yet’b ɑ: «Gotl mɑn, juɑ mɑnŋ e nɑ.»
43019006	Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn b sejenm nbɑ lɑ’u nɑ, k b tiɑn tintiɑni, k yɑɑ ɑ: «Kpɑɑn’mɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk. Kpɑɑn’mɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.» K Piilɑɑt yet’b ɑ: «Yinm jii’mɔ mɑn k kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk i mɔnŋ, k mɑɑn min k lɑ u biit.»
43019007	K Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ jiin yɑɑ ɑ: «T mɔk sensɑu, k senni mɑnŋ wɑnt nɑn u kpɑn lek tie wun kpo e, k mɑɑn u yɑɑ ɑ u tie Yennu Bijɑ e.»
43019008	Piilɑɑt nbɑ din gbɑt nnɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni biɑ ŋɑnm suol’ɔ bonciɑnn,
43019009	k u ŋmɑt kuɑ ŋɑɑn yiin Yiesu, k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «A nyii lee?» Ŋɑɑn Yiesu din k jiin’ɔ siɑl.
43019010	Ŋɑnn e, k Piilɑɑt boi’ɔ ɑ: «A kɑn pɑk jiin’n ii? A k mi nɑn n mɔk yiikuo k sɑɑ ŋɑɑ’ɑ, k biɑ mɔk yiikuo k sɑɑ kpɑɑ’ɑ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk ii?»
43019011	K Yiesu ji jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Yennu i bo i kii cɑb’ɑ yiikuo, ɑ bo kii mɔk n yiikuo. L pɑɑk, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ suol’n k jiin kubn’ɑ nɑ, u biit yɑb bonciɑnn k gɑl ɑ yɑl ɑ.»
43019012	L yuo k ji sɑɑ, Piilɑɑt din yiɑb luon wun ŋɑɑ Yiesu, ŋɑɑn k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ yɑki kpɑyɑkt k yɑɑ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ ŋɑɑ’u, ŋɑnn ɑ ji k tie Luonm kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Sesɑɑl yuɑk kɑɑ, k mɑɑn dɑɑnɔ nbɑ pul u mɔnŋ Kpɑnbɑl, u tie kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ nɑ dɑtɑɑk e.»
43019013	Piilɑɑt nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ, k u nyii nɑn Yiesu nɑn-yel po, k kɑl u buut kɑɑnu pɑɑk, k b yi’l Binbintl. (Suifnbɑ mɑɑn ni, b yi’l Gɑɑbɑɑtɑ nɑ.)
43019014	L din tie yensuuk po e, k l sɑɑ yent k yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm n di. K Piilɑɑt yet Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ ɑ: «I Kpɑnbɑl i nɑ.»
43019015	K b yɑki kpɑyɑkt k yɑɑ ɑ: «Kpin’mɔ. Kpin’mɔ. Kpɑɑn’mɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.» K Piilɑɑt boi’b: «I luon k n kpɑɑ i Kpɑnbɑl dɑpunpunn pɑɑk ii?» K Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑ jiin ɑ: «T k mɔk kpɑnbɑlsuɑ sie Luonm kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Sesɑɑl kuukuɑ.»
43019016	K Piilɑɑt ji cɑb ɑ bin kpɑɑ Yiesu dɑpunpunn pɑɑk. Ŋɑnn e k sejenm ji gɑɑl Yiesu,
43019017	k u jii u tiɑɔnŋ kuun dɑpunpunn k nyii duo nɑ kpinŋ, k sɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k b yi’l «Yukpɑbuk» nɑ. (Suifnbɑ mɑɑn ni, b yi ŋɑnn e «Golgotɑ» nɑ.)
43019018	Lenŋ e k b kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk, k biɑ kpɑɑ niib bɑnle dɑpunpunɑ pɑɑk k pukn Yiesu po, k yenɔ be u ciɑnu k luɑ mun be u ciɑnu, ŋɑɑn k Yiesu be sinsuuk ni.
43019019	K Piilɑɑt diɑn diɑni k b tɑbn Yiesu dɑpunpunn nɑ yul pɑɑk, k l yɑɑ ɑ: «Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ Yiesu wun nbɑ tie Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl i nɑ.»
43019020	K Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn din lii diɑni mɑnŋ ɑ, k mɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k b din kpɑɑ Yiesu dɑpunpunn pɑɑk nɑ, l din k fɔk nɑn Selusɑɑlenm. Diɑni nɑ, l din diɑn Suifnbɑ nɑn Luonm tieb nɑn Glek tieb mɑɑn ni e.
43019021	Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm sɑɑn k yet Piilɑɑt ɑ: «Dɑɑ dɑ ɑ: ‹Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl i nɑ,› ŋɑɑn diɑnt ɑ: ‹Juɑ nɑ yɑɑ ɑ u tie Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl e.› »
43019022	K Piilɑɑt jiin ɑ: «Mɑɑ sɑt diɑn lin nbɑ, n diɑn e.»
43019023	Sejenm nbɑ kpɑɑ Yiesu nɑ puolpo e, k b jii u tiɑt k cent’l tɑɑl munnɑ, k sejenm nɑ kul din gɑɑl tol. L puolpo e biɑk k b jii u liɑtfuouk, lin nbɑ k b luu’l bonmunn, k l k mɔk nyɑlmu nɑ,
43019024	k b yet b lieb ɑ: «I dɑɑ pɑt. Ŋɑɑnt k t tɔ tiɑtiɑ k lɑɑn wun nbɑ sɑɑ yent’l.» L din tien nnɑ, ɑ Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ din yet nnɑ, lin ji fit gbie ɑ: «B cent n tiɑt, k biɑ tɔ tiɑtiɑ n liɑtfuouk pɑɑk.» Nnɑ e k sejenm nɑ set din tun.
43019025	K Yiesu nɑɑ din sie kpiɑ u dɑpunpunn nɑ, ŋuɑ nɑn u niipuo, k b yi’u Mɑɑli wun nbɑ tie Klopɑs ŋɑɑpuo, nɑn Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli, k b lɑkn sie lenŋ.
43019026	K Yiesu lɑ u nɑɑ, k biɑ lɑ u puolpoweituɑ nbɑ k u mɑntk luon’ɔ nɑ, k u mun sie lenŋ, k Yiesu yet u nɑɑ ɑ: «N nɑɑ, ɑ bijɑ i nɑ jik,»
43019027	k biɑ yet u puolpoweituɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «A mun, ɑ nɑɑ i nɑ jik.» Lɑɑ din nyii l yuo nɑ k u puolpoweituɑ nɑ ji din jii Yiesu nɑɑ k kun nɑn’ɔ u ŋɑɑk ni.
43019028	L puolpo e, Yiesu din mi nɑn bonsiɑl kul nbɑ k u din tuun nɑ, l ji gbenn ɑ, k u yet ɑ: «Nyun-nyuklu mɔk’n,» ɑ lin gbien lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ.
43019029	Ŋmɑnŋ din sie nɑn dɑmiituk lenŋ, k b jii sɑɑpo k tun dɑmiituk mɑnŋ ni, k jii tiik nbɑ k b yi iisɔp nɑ dɑɑɔk k fin sɑɑpo nɑ, k tien u mɔb ni,
43019030	k u fuɑnt k nɑk, k yet ɑ: «L gbenn ɑ,» ŋɑɑn tibn k jii u siek k tul Yennu ŋɑɑn kpo.
43019031	L din tie ɑlsumɑ dɑɑl e, k Suifnbɑ din k luon niib nɑ i be dɑpunpunɑ pɑɑk Fuondɑɑl, k mɑɑn Fuondɑɑl mɑnŋ din tie dɑjɑɑnn e. Ŋɑnn e k b din boi Piilɑɑt ɑ wun cɑb’b k bin kɔnn kɔnn b tɑɑ k kpɑɑt’b.
43019032	L pɑɑk, k sejenm nɑ sɑɑn k sɑɑ kɔnn bin nbɑ k b libn kpɑɑ’b nɑn Yiesu nɑ tɑɑ,
43019033	ŋɑɑn bɑɑ bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni, k suɑ k u ponŋ kpo nɑ, b din k kɔnn u tɑɑ.
43019034	Ŋɑɑn k sejenm yenɔ jii kpɑnn k ŋmuu Yiesu lokl ni. L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k sɔn nɑn nyun ji nyi.
43019035	Wun nbɑ diɑn lin nbɑ nɑ tie siɑlɑ e k u siɑlɑ tie mɔni, k u mun mi nɑn u piɑk mɔni e ɑ yin mun tien yɑdɑ.
43019036	Lin nbɑ nɑ kul din tien ɑ lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni n gbie ɑ: «B kɑn yiel u kpɑbɑ nɑn yenn kuɑ wɑɑ.»
43019037	K l biɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Niib tɑn sii goli bɑɑ ŋmuu wun nbɑ kpɑnn nɑ.»
43019038	L puolpo e k Suosiɑf, wun nbɑ tie Aliimɑɑte nilɔ nɑ, sɑɑn Piilɑɑt buol ni, k sɑɑ miɑl’ɔ Yiesu gbɑnɑnt. Suosiɑf din tie Yiesu puolpoweituɑ e, ŋɑɑn u din wɑɑ’u wuol ni e, k mɑɑn u din tiin Suifnbɑ yudɑnm e jɑŋmɑɑni. K Piilɑɑt cɑb’ɔ, k u sɑɑn k sɑɑ kpɑɑt Yiesu k jii’u.
43019039	K Niikodenm mun bɑɑl, wun nbɑ din ponŋ mi k bɑɑl Yiesu penŋ nyiɑɔk nɑ, k diɑ tulɑɑli k l tie nɑn cilu piintɑ nɑ. (B din jii bonsiɑl nbɑ k b yi’l miil nɑn bonsiɑl nbɑ k b yi’l ɑlos k ŋmɑt k tien tulɑɑli mɑnŋ.)
43019040	Ŋɑnn e, k b jii Yiesu k pɔbn’ɔ cincenŋɑnɑ ni nɑn tulɑɑli nɑ, nɑn Suifnbɑ kupiinu kɑɑl nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
43019041	Bɑɑ din kpɑɑ Yiesu siɑn nbɑ nɑ, kpɑɑb din be lenŋ, k kɑpɑɑɔnŋ ponŋ be lenŋ, k b dɑɑ din k pii suɑ kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ ni.
43019042	Suifnbɑ Fuondɑɑl nbɑ pel nɑ, k kɑɑɔk nɑ biɑ k fɔk nɑ, k b bil Yiesu lenŋ.
43020001	K Suifnbɑ Fuondɑɑl tɑn gɑl, ŋɑɑn k lɑsl dɑɑl sɑn-nyɑpob ni e k suɑ l yuo dɑɑ bɔn, k Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli sɑɑn Yiesu kɑɑɔk buol, k lɑ k b bilnt kɑtɑnu kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ mɔb buol ɑ,
43020002	k u ciɑl sɑɑn Siimɔn Piɑl nɑn Yiesu puolpoweitɔluɑ nbɑ k Yiesu mɑntk luon’ɔ nɑ penŋ, k yet’b ɑ: «B piit Yonmdɑɑnɔ kɑɑɔk nɑ ni wɑɑ, k t k mi bɑɑ bil’ɔ siɑn nbɑ.»
43020003	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl nɑn Yiesu puolpoweitɔluɑ nɑ nyii k ciɑl sɑɑn kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ buol ni,
43020004	k b bɑnle tiin k sɑɑ ŋɑɑn Yiesu puolpoweitɔluɑ nɑ ciɑl pɑɑk Piɑl, k sɑɑ dɔnŋ bɑɑl kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ buol sinsinn,
43020005	ŋɑɑn k k kuɑ. U din tibn e k lɑ kɑtinŋ.
43020006	K Siimɔn Piɑl tɑn yuɑnt k bɑɑl k kuɑ, k lɑ k kɑtinŋ nɑ duɑ lenŋ,
43020007	k biɑ lɑ cincenbik nbɑ k b dɑɑn fin Yiesu yul nɑ, k ŋɑnn fin l biɑnŋ k duɑ l kuukuɑ.
43020008	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu puolpoweitɔluɑ nbɑ din dɔnŋ k bɑɑl nɑ, mun kuɑ k ji lɑ k biɑ tien puo nɑ mɑɑn mɑnŋ yɑdɑ.
43020009	(Ŋɑɑn b dɑɑ din k gbɑt lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ l tie k Yiesu n fiil kuun ni.)
43020010	K Yiesu puolpoweitieb bɑnle mɑnŋ ŋmɑt k kun.
43020011	Ŋɑɑn Mɑɑli din biɑl e sie kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ nɑn-yel po k mɔ, k tɑn tibn k got kɑɑɔk nɑ ni,
43020012	k lɑ mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑnle, k b liɑ tɑpieni, k yenɔ kɑl siɑn nbɑ po k b dɑɑn bil Yiesu nɑ l yul po, k luɑ nɑ mun kɑl l tɑɑ po.
43020013	K b boi’ɔ ɑ: «Puo nɑ, bee k ɑ mɔ?» K u jiin ɑ: «B piit n Yonmdɑɑnɔ e, k n k mi bɑɑ bil’ɔ siɑn.»
43020014	Wɑɑ yet nnɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑnt lɑ k Yiesu sie, ŋɑɑn k u k mi ɑ Yiesu e nɑ.
43020015	K Yiesu boi’ɔ: «Puo nɑ, bee k ɑ mɔ? A goli luon ŋmee?» Mɑɑli ŋɑnin din mi ɑ u tie gungounŋ nɑ tuontunnɔ e, k u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, l i tie k fin i e i jii’u, fɑn yet’n fɑɑ bil’ɔ siɑn, k n sɑɑn k sɑɑ jii’u.»
43020016	K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Mɑɑli.» K u ŋmɑnt k tokn’ɔ, k jiin’ɔ Suifnbɑ mɑɑn ni ɑ: «Lɑɑbuuni.» (L pɑɑk tie ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ.»)
43020017	K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «Ji dɑɑ diɑ’n, k mɑɑn n dɑɑ k duo n Bɑɑ buol ni. Ŋɑɑn i sɑɑ n nɑɑ wɑɑs penŋ, k sɑɑ yet’b ɑ, n sɑɑ do wun nbɑ tie n Bɑɑ nɑn i Bɑɑ nɑ penŋ ɑ, wun nbɑ tie n Yennu nɑn i Yennu nɑ.»
43020018	K Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli, ŋmɑt Yiesu puolpoweitieb penŋ k sɑɑ yet’b ɑ: «N lɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ wɑɑ,» ŋɑɑn yet’b wɑɑ yet’ɔ lin nbɑ nɑ.
43020019	Lɑsl dɑɑl mɑnŋ dɑɑjuouk o, k Yiesu puolpoweitieb nɑ tɑn lɑkn lieb k be dieok ni, ŋɑɑn kpɑl gɑnn, k mɑɑn b tiin Suifnbɑ yudɑnm jɑŋmɑɑni e, k tɑn suɑ k Yiesu sie b sinsuuk ni, k fuont’b ɑ: «Mɑnu i be i pɑɑk.»
43020020	Wɑɑ yet nnɑ puolpo e, k u wɑnn’b u niipɑnt ni fɔnɑ nɑn u lokl ni fɔnn nɑ. U puolpoweitieb nbɑ lɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ, k b ji mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn.
43020021	K Yiesu biɑ ŋɑnm fuont’b ɑ: «Mɑnu i be i pɑɑk. N Bɑɑ nbɑ tun’n biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, n mun yɑɑ n tun’i l biɑnŋ e.»
43020022	L puolpo e k u pebl wɑn b pɑɑk k yet’b ɑ: «Gɑɑt Foŋɑnm mɑn.
43020023	L i tie k i nyik cɑb suɑ biit, u set lɑ nyikcɑbu biit mɑnŋ pɑɑk ɑ, ŋɑɑn l i tie k i k nyik cɑb suɑ biit, u k lɑ nyikcɑbu.»
43020024	Tɔn, k u puolpoweitɔyenɔ Tuomɑ, wun nbɑ k b din yi’u Jɑɑk nɑ, ŋuɑ din kɑɑ yuo nbɑ k Yiesu bɑɑl b ni nɑ.
43020025	Ŋɑnn e, k u puolpoweitelieb nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «T lɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ.» K Tuomɑ yet’b ɑ: «Min ŋɑnin, l i kii tie k n tɑn lɑ’u nɑn u niipɑnt ni fɔnɑ nɑ, k jii n niibil k tun siɑn nbɑ k b kpɑɑ kpɑi nɑ, k biɑ jii n nuu k tun u lokl nɑ ni i kɑɑ, n kɑn tien yɑdɑ.»
43020026	L dɑɑ ŋɑnniin puolpo e k Yiesu puolpoweitieb nɑ biɑ tɑn lɑkn lieb k be dieok ni, k Tuomɑ ji be b ni. B lek kpɑl gɑnn, ŋɑɑn k Yiesu tɑn bɑɑl sie b sinsuuk ni, k fuont’b ɑ: «Mɑnu i be i pɑɑk,»
43020027	ŋɑɑn yet Tuomɑ ɑ: «Jiin ɑ niibil k tun n niipɑnt ni, ŋɑɑn biɑ tɑnt ɑ nuu k tun n lokl ni, k ji dɑɑ bils, ŋɑɑn tien’n yɑdɑ.»
43020028	K Tuomɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie n Yonmdɑɑnɔ k biɑ tie n Yennu.»
43020029	K Yiesu boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fɑɑ ji lɑ’n nɑ pɑɑk e k ɑ tien’n yɑdɑ ɑɑ? Bin nbɑ k lɑɑt’n ŋɑɑn tien’n yɑdɑ nɑ, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e.»
43020030	K Yiesu din tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ bonciɑnn k pukn u puolpoweitieb penŋ, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnn k diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni.
43020031	Ŋɑɑn bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ diɑn k be nnɑ nɑ, b diɑn ɑ yin tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yiesu e tie Klistu, Yennu Bijɑ nɑ, ɑ l i tie k i tien yɑdɑ yin lɑ mɑnfuol u sɑnn ni.
43021001	L puolpo e k Yiesu ŋɑnm dɔkt k wɑnn u mɔnŋ k tul u puolpoweitieb, mɔkgbenŋl nbɑ k b yi’l Tiibeliɑt nɑ kpinŋ. Wɑɑ dɔkt biɑnŋ nbɑ e nɑ:
43021002	Siimɔn Piɑl nɑn Tuomɑ (wun nbɑ k b din yi’u Jɑɑk nɑ) nɑn Nɑɑtɑɑniɑl (ŋuɑ e din nyii Kɑɑnɑ nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni nɑ), nɑn Sebede wɑɑs, nɑn Yiesu puolpoweitelieb bɑnle din lɑkn be lenŋ.
