43021003	K Siimɔn Piɑl tɑn yet u lieb ɑ: «N sɑɑ sik k suol jɑni wɑɑ.» K b yet’ɔ: «T sɑɑ ciɑn’ɑ.» K b sɑɑn kuɑ bulgbetl ni, ŋɑɑn l nyiɑɔk mɑnŋ b din k fit suol siɑl.
43021004	L din tɑn yent sɑn-nyɑpob ni e k Yiesu sie nyunkpinŋ, ŋɑɑn k u puolpoweitieb k mi ɑ ŋuɑ e.
43021005	K u yiin’m boi’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑjɑb, i suol siɑl ii?» K b jiin ɑ: «Aɑi.»
43021006	K u yet’b: «Lun i jɑnlɑɑɔnŋ i niidiitu po, k i sɑɑ suol jɑni.» K b lu b jɑnlɑɑɔnŋ nɑ, k ji gbɑl donnu, k mɑɑn jɑni nbɑ k b suol nɑ kpiɑtu din pɑɑk ɑ.
43021007	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu puolpoweituɑ nbɑ k u mɑntk luon’ɔ nɑ yet Piɑl ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ e.» Siimɔn Piɑl nbɑ gbɑt ɑ u tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ e nɑ, k u liɑ u liɑtfuouk nbɑ k u ponŋ liɑt bil nɑ, ŋɑɑn yukl sik nyun ni.
43021008	Lenŋ din k fɔk nɑn nyunkpinŋ nɑ, k l fɔknt din tie nɑn miɑtɑ kobk nɑ, k Yiesu puolpoweitelieb ji kɑn bulgbetl nɑ k l dɑɑl jɑnlɑɑɔnŋ nɑ, k l gbie nɑn jɑni, k bɑɑl nyunkpinŋ nɑ.
43021009	Bɑɑ nyii bulgbetl nɑ ni yuo nbɑ k b lɑ sɑnkuɑnɑ muu, k jɑnŋ nɑn pɑɑnu pɑɑ l pɑɑk k biet.
43021010	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Jiin jɑni nbɑ k i suol nɑ siɑl, k bɑɑl nɑn’n nnɑ.»
43021011	K Siimɔn Piɑl kuɑ bulgbetl nɑ ni, k dɑt jɑnlɑɑɔnŋ nɑ k duo nɑn’n kunkonn, k l gbie nɑn jɑngbenŋɑ, k b kɑn, k l tie jɑni kobk nɑn piinŋmu nɑn ŋɑntɑ. L din yɑb bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn jɑnlɑɑɔnŋ nɑ lek k pɑt.
43021012	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Sɑɑ nɑ mɑn k tɑn ŋmɑn.» Ŋɑɑn nɑn b yenɔ kuɑ wɑɑ lek k mɔk pɑl nɑn wun boi’ɔ ɑ u tie ŋmee, k mɑɑn b mi nɑn u tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ e.
43021013	K Yiesu jii pɑɑnu nɑ k tul’b, k biɑ jii jɑnŋ nɑ k tul’b.
43021014	Lin nbɑ nɑ e din tie tɑɑl muntɑ ni k Yiesu jii u mɔnŋ k wɑnn u puolpoweitieb, Yennu nbɑ din fiin’ɔ kuun ni nɑ puolpo.
43021015	Bɑɑ din dii jiet mɑnŋ puolpo e, k Yiesu boi Siimɔn Piɑl ɑ: «Siimɔn, fin nbɑ tie Sɑn bik, ɑ luon’n k gɑl bin nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ ɑɑ?» K u jiin ɑ: «Nnn, Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ mi nɑn n luon’ɑ.» K u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii goli n pebis.»
43021016	K tɑɑl munle ni k Yiesu boi Siimɔn Piɑl ɑ: «Siimɔn, fin nbɑ tie Sɑn bik, ɑ luon’n ii?» K u jiin ɑ: «Nnn, Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ mi nɑn n luon’ɑ.» K u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii kpɑɑl n pei.»
43021017	K tɑɑl muntɑ ni biɑk k Yiesu boi’ɔ ɑ: «Siimɔn, fin nbɑ tie Sɑn bik, ɑ luon’n ii?» K Piɑl pɑl ni ji biil, k mɑɑn Yiesu nbɑ boi’ɔ tɑɑl muntɑ ni ɑ: «A luon’n ii?» nɑ. K u yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ mi bonsiɑl kul. A mi nɑn n luon’ɑ.» K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «Ii goli n pei.
43021018	Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’ɑ nɑ, fɑɑ din dɑɑ tie nɑɑsimɔ nɑ, ɑ din tuu liɑ ɑ tiɑt ɑ tiɑɔnŋ o, k sɑɑ siɑn nbɑ po k ɑ luon, ŋɑɑn ɑ i tɑnŋ i kpet yuo nbɑ, ɑ sɑɑ tɑnt ɑ nii, k suɑ sɑɑ lɑnn’ɑ tiɑt, k jii’ɑ k ɑ sɑɑn siɑn nbɑ po k ɑ k luon.»
43021019	Yiesu nbɑ yet lin nbɑ mɑnŋ, l din wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ k Piɑl tɑn sɑɑ kpo k te k Yennu sɑnn n lɑ dontl. L puolpo k Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii wɑɑ’n.»
43021020	K Piɑl tɑn jiɑnt k lɑ Yiesu puolpoweitɔluɑ nbɑ k u mɑntk luon’ɔ nɑ, k u wɑɑ. (Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ din kɑl k kpiɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ k b din lɑkn di jiet nɑ, k u din dɔnn k nɑkn’ɔ k boi’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋmee yɑɑ wun tɑn kuɑt’ɑ mɑnŋ nɑ?»)
43021021	Piɑl nbɑ lɑ’u yuo nbɑ nɑ, k u boi Yiesu ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ŋɑɑn k juɑ nɑ ŋɑnin i? Bee tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl’ɔ?»
43021022	K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Mi i luon k wuu be nɑn mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ jen, l k lɑ’ɑ ni. Fin, ii wɑɑ’n.»
43021023	L pɑɑk e tien k Yiesu puolpoweitieb din yien ɑ Yiesu puolpoweituɑ mɑnŋ kɑn kpo. Ŋɑɑn Yiesu ŋɑnin din k pɑk yɑɑ ɑ u kɑn kpo kɑɑ. U din yet ɑ: «Mi i luon wuu be nɑn mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ jen, l k lɑ’ɑ ni.»
43021024	Tɔn, Yiesu puolpoweituɑ mɑnŋ e tie wun nbɑ tie siɑlɑ mɑnŋ, k jiin lin nbɑ nɑ po, k biɑ diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk ni, k t mi nɑn u siɑlɑ mɑnŋ tie bɑlmɔni e.
43021025	Bonɑ bonciɑnn din be k Yiesu din tun k pukn. B i bo i diɑn lin nbɑ kul k u din tun mɑnŋ, n dukn nɑn kɑdɑɑt nbɑ k b bo sɑɑ diɑn nɑ bo kɑn lɑ yiɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni kii be.
44001001	Cɑnbɑɑ Teofiil: N sinsinn diɑni nɑ ni, n din diɑn lin nbɑ kul k Yiesu din piin k tuun nɑn lin nbɑ k u din wɑnt niib nɑ, u tuonn pinpiin-yuo nɑ ni,
44001002	mɔkmɔk nɑn Yennu nbɑ din tɑn donn’ɔ Yendɔunŋ ni. Ŋɑɑn sinsinn dɑɑnn, wɑɑ din dɑɑ k duo nɑ, Foŋɑnm yiikuo ni e k u din wɑnn wɑɑ din gɑnn bin nbɑ k tien’m u tuomiinbɑ nɑ, bɑɑ sii tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ.
44001003	U kuun puolpo e k u din jii dɑɑ piinnɑ k wɑnt’b nɑn u set be, bɑnnu nbɑ k bilsuk kɑɑ nɑn u set jen u mɑnfuol ni wɑɑ, k b din tuu tun lɑɑt’ɔ, k u piɑk nɑn’m k jikt sɑɑ Yennu nɑɑn po.
44001004	Yosɑu yɑɑnn k u din tɑn lɑkn be nɑn’m k di jiet, k din tɑn tul’b mɔb ɑ: «I dɑɑ nyi Selusɑɑlenm, ŋɑɑn kii be kii guu piini nbɑ k n Bɑɑ senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul’i nɑ, mɑɑ din ponŋ yet’i lin nbɑ po nɑ.
44001005	Sɑn din wuul niib nɑn nyun e, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnlele nɑ ni Yennu sɑɑ wuul’i Foŋɑnm ni.»
44001006	Tuomiinbɑ nbɑ din lɑkn nɑn Yiesu yuo nbɑ, k b din tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, yuo nbɑ nɑ e k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ fɑt tinm Islɑɑeltieb yent k jiin’t ɑmi nlee?»
44001007	K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «L k lɑ’i nɑn k i bɑnn jinjɑnŋyuo nbɑ k n Bɑɑ senn yɑɑ lin tɑn tien. Ŋuɑ e mɔk u mɔnŋ yiikuo k senn l yuo.
44001008	Ŋɑɑn yuo nbɑ k Foŋɑnm sɑɑ sik i pɑɑk, i sɑɑ lɑ yiikuo, k tɑn sii tie n siɑlɑɑdɑnm Selusɑɑlenm, nɑn Suude tinŋ kul ni, nɑn Sɑɑmɑɑli tinŋ ni, nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ lokl kul po.»
44001009	Wɑɑ pɑk mɑɑn mɑnŋ k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k b lɑ k u do sɑnpɑɑpo, k b goli’ɔ, k sɑnpɑgbɑnn sɑɑ dɔkn u pɑɑk k u bot, k b ji k lɑ’u.
44001010	Bɑɑ lek biɑ sie k kpɑɑ b ninbinɑ k goli sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ, l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k suɑ jɑb bɑnle sie k liɑ tɑpieni,
44001011	k boi’b ɑ: «Yinm Gɑɑliile tieb, bee k i sie nnɑ k goli sɑnpɑɑpo nnɑ? Yiesu nɑ nbɑ nyii i buol ni k duo Yendɔunŋ ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, u biɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi Yendɔunŋ mɑnŋ ni k jen sik nɑn yɑɑ goli’ɔ k u do sɑnpɑɑpo biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e.»
44001012	L yuo nɑ k Yiesu tuomiinbɑ nɑ nyii Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk nɑ pɑɑk k ŋmɑt Selusɑɑlenm. Lenŋ mɑnŋ nɑn Selusɑɑlenm din fɔk nɑn Fuondɑɑl sɔnu nɑ e.
44001013	Bɑɑ bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm yuo nbɑ k b sɑɑn kuɑ ŋɑɑk nbɑ k b tuu be nɑ ni k duo dituɑtuk pɑɑk. Bin nbɑ din kuɑ mɑnŋ din tie Piɑl nɑn Sɑn nɑn Sɑɑk nɑn Andle nɑn Fiiliip nɑn Tuomɑ nɑn Bɑɑltelemi nɑn Mɑɑtieo nɑn Sɑɑk wun nbɑ din tie Alfe bijɑ, nɑn Siimɔn wun nbɑ yɑɑ ninbinn din mɔn nɑn k Suifnbɑ n yent b mɔnŋ nɑ, nɑn Suud wun nbɑ tie suɑ nnɑ k b yi’u Sɑɑk nɑ bijɑ,
44001014	k b kul ɑ tuu tun lɑknt nɑn b lieb k din pukn puosiɑb nɑn Yiesu nɑɑ, Mɑɑli, nɑn Yiesu ninjɑnm, k b mei Yennu nɑn dudukyent kuukuɑ k k nɑk.
44001015	Ŋɑnn e k dɑsiɑl nnɑ, k bin nbɑ din tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ nɑn kobk nɑn piinle nɑ tɑɑn tikl kɑl, k Piɑl tɑn fiil k set k yet ɑ:
44001016	«N nɑɑ wɑɑs, lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm din te k Dɑɑfiid din sint yet k jikt sɑɑ Suudɑ nbɑ dɑɑn wɑnn niib k b suol Yiesu nɑ po, k l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k lin tɑn tun nnɑ k gbie.
44001017	Suudɑ din tie t ni yenɔ k biɑ tuun tuonn nbɑ k t tuun.»
44001018	(Suudɑ nbɑ din kɔi Yiesu k gɑɑl likli nbɑ nɑ e, k u jii k dɑɑ kpɑɑb, l kpɑɑb ni e k u din jɔnn u mɔnŋ k bɑɑ k put puol, k u nuɑt kul nyii.
44001019	K Selusɑɑlenmtieb kul gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k pul kpɑɑb mɑnŋ sɑnn b mɔnŋ mɑɑn ni ɑ Akeldɑmɑ, k l pɑɑk tie «Sɔn Kpɑɑb.»)
44001020	«Tɔn, l diɑn yɑni kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹Ŋɑɑnt k u ŋɑɑk n set lɑngbounŋ k suɑ dɑɑ kuɑ lenŋ.› K l biɑ diɑn ɑ: ‹L ŋɑn k suɑ n gɑɑl u tuonn yiɑl nɑ.›
44001021	«L pɑɑk ɑmi l tie k tin gɑnn niyenɔ e k pukn’ɔ t po, ɑ wuu mun i tie Yiesu kuun fiilu siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ, k l ŋɑn k wuu tie tinm nbɑ din tuu tun lin nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu yuo nbɑ k Sɑn din wul’ɔ Yennu nyunwulu mɔkmɔk k tɑn bɑɑl yuo nbɑ k Yiesu nyii t buol ni k duo Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ ni yenɔ.»
44001023	Ŋɑnn e k b gɑnn jɑb bɑnle k b tie Suosiɑf wun nbɑ k b din yi’u Bɑɑlsɑɑbɑɑs nɑ (b biɑ din yi ŋuɑ e Sustus nɑ), nɑn Mɑɑtiɑs,
44001024	ŋɑɑn ji miɑl Yennu ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, fin nbɑ mi suɑ kul pɑl ni, wɑnt’t jɑb bɑnle nɑ ni, wun nbɑ k ɑ gɑnn,
44001025	k wun tien tuomi k gɑɑl tuonn nɑ yiɑl nbɑ k Suudɑ nyik ŋɑɑn sɑɑn sɑɑ be siɑn nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn’ɔ nɑ.»
44001026	L puolpo k b tɔ tiɑtiɑ, ɑ bin gɑnn b bɑnle mɑnŋ ni yenɔ, k Mɑɑtiɑs dii, k b jii’u k pukn’ɔ tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn yenɔ kuɑ nɑ ni.
44002001	Tɔn, jɑɑnm nbɑ k b yi’l Pɑntekuot dɑɑl e bɑɑl, k dɑɑl mɑnŋ e k Yiesuweilɑ kul ɑ lɑkn tɑɑn lieb boyenn kuɑ ni.
44002002	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k fuut nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k fu nɑɑn nɑn wonpɑɑluk o dɑ nɑ, k bɑɑl sik k gbie ŋɑɑk nbɑ k b kɑl nɑ ni.
44002003	K b lɑ k siɑl nɑɑn nɑn mupieunŋ nɑ, k yɑt k tuɑ tuɑ suɑ kul pɑɑk
44002004	k Foŋɑnm gbie k yent suɑ kul ni, k b piin piɑk mɑbuolu buolu nbɑ k Foŋɑnm yɑɑ bii piɑk nɑ.
44002005	K Suifnbɑ nbɑ tie yentinnɑ mun din be Selusɑɑlenm l yuo, bin nbɑ nyii tini kul po tingbounŋ nɑ ni k bɑɑl lenŋ.
44002006	Bɑɑ gbɑt fuut mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k nibul tikl lenŋ, k l tien’m yɑɑl-lituk, k mɑɑn Yiesuweilɑ mɑnŋ piɑk bɑlgɑni suɑ kul mɑɑn ni k u gbiɑ.
44002007	K l tien’m bɑktnɔunŋ nɑn yɑɑl-lituk, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «Niib nɑ kul nbɑ piɑk nɑ k tie Gɑɑliile tieb kɑɑ ɑɑ?
44002008	K l tien nlee k t kul ɑ tɑn jiɑ gbiɑ k b piɑk t mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mɑɑn nnɑ?
44002009	T siɑb nyii Pɑlt nɑn Medi nɑn Elɑnm nɑn Mesopotɑɑmi nɑn Suude nɑn Kɑɑpɑɑdos nɑn Pɔn nɑn Asii,
44002010	nɑn Fliiji nɑn Pɑnfiili nɑn Ejipt, nɑn Liibi yɑkɑ po siɑn nbɑ kpiɑ nɑn Siilenn, duo nbɑ kpiɑ nɑn Liibi nɑ, k t ni yenm mun biɑ nyii Luonm,
44002011	k t siɑb tie Suifnbɑ, k lieb mun tie buolgɑnu nbɑ din lebt b jɑɑnti k wɑɑ Suifnbɑ Yennu, k t yenm mun biɑ nyii Klet nɑn Alɑɑbi, ŋɑɑn k t kul ɑ lek gbiɑ k b piɑk t mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mɑɑn ni, k piɑk dont Yennu sɑnn nɑn u bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k u tun.»
44002012	K l bɑkt ŋɑɑn yɑɑl lit’b k ŋmɑt b yɑn k b boi b lieb ɑ: «Lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk tie bee?»
44002013	Ŋɑɑn k siɑb mun biɑ lɑɑ k sɑlkt Yiesuweilɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «B nyuu dɑɑn e k yib.»
44002014	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl nɑn u tuomiinbɑ lieb piik nɑn yenɔ kuɑ nɑ fiil k set nibul nɑ tuɑnn po, k Piɑl pɑk sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Yinm Suifnbɑ, nɑn yinm nbɑ kul be Selusɑɑlenm nɑ, gbiintl mɑn fɑnu mɑɑ yɑɑ n pɑk’i lin nbɑ nɑ, k gbɑt l pɑɑk.
44002015	Yɑɑ duki nɑn jɑb nɑ yib e nɑ, ŋɑɑn b k yib kɑɑ, k mɑɑn l dɑɑ tie sɑn-nyɑyendɑnn e.
44002016	Lin nbɑ tien nɑ tie lin nbɑ k Yennu sɔkni Suoel din yet k yɑɑ l tɑn sɑɑ tien nɑ e nɑ, ɑ:
44002017	‹Yennu yet ɑ: Dulnyɑ juontu yuo n tɑn sɑɑ tun nnɑ e: n tɑn sii siknt n Siek suɑ kul pɑɑk k i bonjɑbis nɑn i sɑpɑɑnbis tɑn sii sɔknt n mɑɑn k i nɑɑsinm mun tɑn sii lɑɑt yelntu, k i jɑkpelɑ tɑn sii dɑmi dɑmiit.
44002018	K l yuo mɑnŋ n tɑn sii siknt n Siek mɑnŋ n tuontunnɑ nbɑ tie jɑb nɑn bin nbɑ tie puob pɑɑk k b mun biɑ tɑn sii sɔknt n mɑɑn.
44002019	N tɑn sii tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ sɑnpɑɑpo, nɑn bɑktnɔunŋ nyinɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k sɔn nɑn muu nɑn munyuuk tɑn sii be,
44002020	k yennu tɑn sɑɑ kpint k bɔnn, k ŋmɑɑlk mun tɑn sɑɑ kpint k mɔnn nɑn sɔn nɑ, k l puolpo n dɑɑl sɑɑ bɑɑl k l sii tie dɑjɑɑnn e,
44002021	k suɑ kul nbɑ tɑn boi min Yonmdɑɑnɔ po, n sɑɑ fiel’ɔ wɑɑ.› »
44002022	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl biɑ ŋɑnm yet ɑ: «Yinm Islɑɑeltieb, gbiintl mɑn lin nbɑ k n yɑɑ n yet’i k jikt sɑɑ Yiesu nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ po. I mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mi nɑn Yennu te k u tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nɑn nyinɑ i ni, k l set wɑnt nɑn mɔni nɑn Yennu e tun’ɔ.
44002023	Yennu mi lin nbɑ yɑɑ lin tɑn tien, k l pɑɑk k u dɔnŋ lol lol k kubn’ɔ i nuu ni, k i te k biitdɑnm kpɑɑ tɑbn’ɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk k kpii’u, k l wɑnt nɑn yinm e set kpii’u.
44002024	«Wɑɑ dɑɑn kpo k dɑɑ be kuun nii ni nɑ, k Yennu fɑt’ɔ k fiin’ɔ kuun ni, k mɑɑn kuun k fit diɑ’u.
44002025	K mɑɑn Dɑɑfiid din yet k jikt sɑɑ Yiesu po k yɑɑ ɑ: ‹N din tun lɑɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ n tuɑnn ni, k mɑɑn u be n niidiitu po, ɑ n dɑɑ jekl.
44002026	L pɑɑk, n mɔk pɑlpienn k piɑk pɑlpienn mɑɑn. Mi i lek i tɑnŋ i kpo gbɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n sii mɔk dindɑnn,
44002027	k mɑɑn ɑ tɑn kɑn nyik n siek k lin kpɑkn kpientinŋ ni. A kɑn ŋɑɑ k min ɑ Niŋɑnɔ gbɑnɑnt n tɑn bɑt,
44002028	k ɑ biɑ te k n bɑnn sɔni nbɑ bɑɑt mɑnfuol ni, k mɑɑ sii be ɑ tuɑnn ni n sii mɔk pɑlpienn nbɑ kɑɑ pɑɑk.› »
44002029	K Piɑl biɑ ŋɑnm yet yɑɑ ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n sɑɑ fit wɑnn’i nɑn bɑlmɔni k jikt sɑɑ t yejɑsɑɑkuɑ Dɑɑfiid po. U din kpo k b pii’u, k u kɑɑɔk dɑɑ be t buol nnɑ nɑ.
44002030	Ŋɑɑn u din tie Yennu sɔkni e, k din mi nɑn Yennu senn mɔsonn k tul’ɔ, k yet yɑɑ ɑ, u tɑn sɑɑ jii u yɑɑbuonn yenɔ kuɑ k din’ɔ u mɔnŋ nɑɑn.
44002031	Dɑɑfiid din mi lin nbɑ k Yennu yɑɑ wun tɑn tien. L pɑɑk, k u din pɑk Klistu kuun fiilu po, k yet ɑ Yennu Nigɑnntuɑ tɑn kɑn kpɑkn kpientinŋ, k u gbɑnɑnt biɑ kɑn bɑt.»
44002032	«Yiesu nbɑ nɑ e k Yennu dɑɑn fiin’ɔ kuun ni, k t kul ɑ nɑ mun tie u kuun fiilu mɑnŋ siɑlɑɑdɑnm.
44002033	K Yennu biɑ donn’ɔ ɑ wun kɑl u niidiitu po. Wɑɑ kɑl nɑ k u gɑɑl Foŋɑnm nbɑ k u Bɑɑ din senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul’ɔ nɑ, k mɔtɑɑnɑ k u yɑt Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ t pɑɑk k ŋɑnn e k i gbiɑ k biɑ lɑɑt lin nbɑ tuun t ni nɑ.
44002034	K mɑɑn Dɑɑfiid din k duo Yendɔunŋ ni u tiɑɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn u din yet ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu yet n Yonmdɑɑnɔ ɑ Kɑln n niidiitu po
44002035	mɔkmɔk nɑn mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ jii ɑ dɑtɑi k tien’m ɑ tɑɑkpɑktɑ.› »
44002036	K Piɑl biɑ yet ɑ: «Tɔn, l ŋɑn k Islɑɑeltieb kul n bɑnn nɑn l tie Yiesu nɑ e, wun nbɑ k i dɑɑn te k b kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk k kpii’u nɑ, ŋuɑ e k Yennu wɑnn nɑn u tie Klistu k biɑ tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ biɑk.»
44002037	Niib nɑ nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b pɑlɑ ni biil bonciɑnn, k b boi Piɑl nɑn u lieb nɑ ɑ: «T nɑɑ wɑɑs, k t sɑɑ tien nlee?»
44002038	K Piɑl yet’b ɑ: «Sie k i kul ɑ n mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, k tin wul’i Yennu nyunwulu Yiesu Klistu sɑnn ni, k Yennu n nyik i biit k cɑb’i, k sɑɑ tul’i u piini nbɑ tie Foŋɑnm nɑ,
44002039	k mɑɑn u ponŋ din senn mɔsonn k tul yinm nɑn i wɑɑs nɑn bin nbɑ kul be bɑnfɔkl k yɑb bonciɑnn k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu tɑn sɑɑ yiin’m nɑ.»
44002040	L puolpo e k Piɑl pɑk mɑɑn bonciɑnn k kpɑɑn’m k biɑ cie b pɑlɑ ɑ: «Nyint i mɔnŋ mɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ nibiit nɑ sinsuuk ni.»
44002041	Bin nbɑ din sɑk u mɑɑn mɑnŋ k b wul’b Yennu nyunwulu l dɑɑl nɑ, din tie nɑn niib tusɑ ŋɑntɑ nɑ k pukn Klistuweilɑ po.
44002042	K b ŋɑnmt k lek tumi k bɑnt tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ wɑnnu, k jii b yuo k tɑɑn diɑ lieb nɑn mɔtɑɑɔk, k lɑknt k centl pɑɑnu, k biɑ tiki mei Yennu
44002043	K jijiet ji din mɔk suɑ kul, k mɑɑn tuomiinbɑ nɑ tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ bonciɑnn.
44002044	K Yiesuweilɑ mɑnŋ kul ɑ biɑ lek diɑ lieb nɑn mɔtɑɑɔk, k centl b bonɑ kul k tien b lieb,
44002045	k tuu kɔi bɑɑ mɔk lin nbɑ k jikt l likli k tuol b lieb, k jɑnŋt nɑn suɑ kul nbɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ.
44002046	Dɑɑl kul b biɑ lek tuu tɑɑn lieb e Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k b lɑknt bɑɑ jedikpɑguul b mɔnŋ ŋei ni, k sɑɑ di jiet nɑn lieb nɑn pɑlpienn, k ninfɔksɑi kɑɑ nɑn b lieb.
44002047	K yuo kul k b pɑk Yennu, k suɑ kul pɑl mei b pɑɑk. K dɑɑl kul k Yonmdɑɑnɔ biɑ ŋɑnmt k te k niib lɑɑt fielu k puki b pɑɑk.
44003001	Dɑsiɑl yenlekl dinn k Piɑl nɑn Sɑn din tɑn sɑɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni Yenmiɑlyuo.
44003002	Ŋɑnn e k b sɑɑ yɑɑ bin kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk tɑnmɔb nbɑ k b din yi Tɑnmɔŋɑnŋ nɑ, k lɑ jɑsuɑ nnɑ k u kɑl lenŋ, k ponŋ tie wɔbk u mɑɑlu ni wɑɑ, k dɑɑl yejɑ ŋɑɑk kul k b din tuu jii’u k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ tɑnmɔb mɑnŋ buol ni, ɑ wuu mei likli niib nbɑ bɑɑt Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk mɑnŋ ni nɑ.
44003003	Yuo nbɑ k u lɑ Piɑl nɑn Sɑn k b yɑɑ bin kuɑ nɑ, k u miɑl’b likli.
44003004	K b jiɑnt k goli’ɔ silll, k Piɑl tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii goli’t.»
44003005	Ŋɑnn e k u ji nul u ninbinɑ k goli’b, k dɑɑn nɑn u sɑɑ gɑɑl siɑl e b penŋ.
44003006	Ŋɑɑn k Piɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «N lek k mɔk likli k biɑ k mɔk sɑlmɑ k sɑɑ tul’ɑ ni, ŋɑɑn mɑɑ mɔk lin nbɑ e k n yɑɑ n tul’ɑ. Mi i tul’ɑ mɔb Yiesu Klistu nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ sɑnn ni, fiit kii sonm,»
44003007	ŋɑɑn suol u niidiitu k fiin’ɔ. L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k juɑ nɑ tɑɑ kɑkt yiɑn ɑ,
44003008	k u tɑb k fiil set, k ji piin sonm k lin, k tɑn wei’b k kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk mɑnŋ ni, k yuuk k mobt nɑn pɑlpienn, k pɑk Yennu.
44003009	K niib kul lɑ’u k u sonm k pɑk Yennu.
44003010	Bɑɑ ji din bɑnn nɑn ŋuɑ e tie miɑtɔ nbɑ tuu kɑɑl k mei niib likli Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk tɑnmɔb nbɑ k b yi’l Tɑnmɔŋɑnŋ nnɑ, k l ji yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b nɑn lin nbɑ tien k tul’ɔ nɑ pɑɑk.
44003011	K wɔbk mɑnŋ puul wɔb Piɑl nɑn Sɑn, k l tien niib nɑ kul ɑ bɑktnɔunŋ bonciɑnn, k b ciɑl sɑɑn lɑkn b buol ni. Bɑɑ lɑkn siɑn nɑ k b yi’l Sɑɑlomɔn bɑlntl.
44003012	Piɑl nbɑ lɑ niib nɑ yuo nbɑ k u yet ɑ: «Yinm Islɑɑeltieb, bee k l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’i ni i? K bee k i bɑli tinm nnɑ ɑ? Tɑɑ te k jɑwɔbk nɑ fiil sonm nɑ, i duki mi ɑ l tie t mɔnŋ yiikuo ɑmi t mɔnŋ yentinu pɑɑk e?
44003013	Yennu nbɑ tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑn Isɑɑk nɑn Sɑɑkɔb nɑn t yejɑlieb Yennu nɑ, ŋuɑ e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ donn u tuontunnɔ Yiesu k tul’ɔ u mɔnŋ yudɑnt. Yiesu mɑnŋ e k i jii’u k tien’ɔ t yudɑnm nii ni ɑ bin kpi’u nɑ, k Piilɑɑt din ponŋ bikn sinsinn ɑ wun ŋɑɑ’u, ŋɑɑn k i yet’ɔ Piilɑɑt buol ni.
44003014	Ŋuɑ e lek tie Yennu nilɔ, k biɑ jen ɑ tie Niŋɑnɔ, ŋɑɑn k i lek yet’ɔ, ŋɑɑn biɑ miɑl Piilɑɑt ɑ wun nyinn nikpiiluk k tul’i.
44003015	Yinm e te k b kpii Mɑnfotultuɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn k Yennu fiin’ɔ kuun ni, k tinm e tie lin nbɑ nɑ siɑlɑɑdɑnm.
44003016	Wɔbk nɑ tie wun nbɑ k i ponŋ tuu mi’u k biɑ lɑɑt’ɔ e, ŋɑɑn k u tɑn pɑɑk nɑ, k mɑɑn wɑɑ tien Yiesu mɑnŋ sɑnn yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk. Wɑɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e te k u pɑɑk cɑin k sie i nunm nnɑ.
44003017	«Tɔn, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, n mi nɑn yinm nɑn i yudɑnm nbɑ dɑɑn te k b kpii Yiesu nɑ, i dɑɑn k bɑnn yɑɑ tun lin nbɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
44003018	Ŋɑɑn nnɑ e k Yennu tɑn te k lin nbɑ k u din pɑk k tul u sɔkniinbɑ kul, k b mun pɑk tul niib nɑ n tɑn tien mɔni, ɑ l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k u Klistu n lek di fɑlɑ.
44003019	«L pɑɑk, i mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ mɑn kii wɑɑ Yennu sɔnu, k wun nyik cɑb i biit,
44003020	k u sɑɑ tul’i fuon k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ tun Yiesu Klistu i buol ni, wun nbɑ k u ponŋ lukt’ɔ k tul’i nɑ,
44003021	ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ Yiesu mɑnŋ lek dɑɑ sii be Yendɔunŋ ni, nɑn Yennu nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ ŋɑnm bonɑ kul ɑ, nɑn wɑɑ din te k u sɔknŋɑnm nbɑ din be yɑɑyuo ni nɑ nbɑ din yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
44003022	«Muois mun din yet ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu sɑɑ tul’i u sɔkniisuɑ, nɑn mɑɑ tie sɔkni biɑnŋ nbɑ k u sii tie i mɔnŋ nilɔ. Gbiintl’ɔ mɑn k tun lin nbɑ kul k u sɑɑ pɑk tul’i.
44003023	Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k gbɑt sɔkni mɑnŋ mɑɑn, Yennu sɑɑ nyinn l dɑɑnɔ i sinsuuk ni k wun kpo.›
44003024	« Yennu sɔkni Sɑɑmuel nɑn sɔkniinbɑ kul nbɑ din wei u pɑɑk nɑ, din piɑk k jikt sɑɑ lin nbɑ yɑɑ lin tɑn tien t yuo nɑ ni po.
44003025	Yennu mɔsonn nbɑ k u din senn k tul u sɔkniinbɑ mɑnŋ, l mɔsonn tie i yɑl e, k lol nbɑ k u din lol nɑn t yejɑnm nɑ, yuo nbɑ k u din yet Ablɑɑhɑɑnm ɑ: ‹A yɑɑbuonyenɔ ni e k tingbounŋ nɑ tieb kul ɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ n yetŋɑnm,› k l lol mun biɑ tie i yɑl e.
44003026	Yennu nbɑ din lukt u Tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ nɑ, k u tun’ɔ i buol ni sinsinn, ɑ yin lɑ yetŋɑnm k mɑɑn wɑɑ nyinn’i biit sɔni ni nɑ pɑɑk.»
44004001	Yuo nbɑ k Piɑl nɑn Sɑn dɑɑ din sie k piɑk tien niib mɑnŋ nɑ, k Yennu mɑnntieb nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑn Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ kpil bɑɑl Piɑlnbɑ buol ni.
44004002	B wutuol duo nɑn Piɑl nɑn Sɑn, ɑ b wɑnt niib ɑ Yiesu dɑɑn fiil kuun ni k l wɑnt nɑn kpienm tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni k jen b mɑnfuol ni biɑk.
44004003	Ŋɑnn e k b suol’b k kuɑn’m dɑnsɑlk ɑ lin yent ɑ, k mɑɑn yuo ponŋ gɑl ɑ.
44004004	Ŋɑɑn k niib bonciɑnn nbɑ din gbɑt Piɑl mɑɑn mɑnŋ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ, k jɑb nbɑ tien u weilɑ nɑ din tien nɑn tusɑ ŋɑnŋmu nɑ.
44004005	Lɑɑ tɑn yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni, k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑn sɑɑkɑb nɑn senniwɑntieb lɑkn b tituk kɑɑnu ni Selusɑɑlenm,
44004006	k b lɑkn nɑn juɑ nbɑ tie Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ k b yi’u Ann nɑ, nɑn Kɑɑyiif, nɑn Sɑn nɑn Aleksɑndl nɑn mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ ŋɑɑtelieb,
44004007	k te k Piɑl nɑn Sɑn fiil k set b sinsuuk ni, ŋɑɑn k b boi’b ɑ: «Pɑnbuolbee k i mɔk i? K ŋmee sɑnn ni e k i fiin wɔbk nbɑ nɑ?»
44004008	Ŋɑnn e k Foŋɑnm fiil Piɑl ni, k u yet’b ɑ: «Yinm cɑnbɑɑnbɑ nɑn sɑɑkɑb, gbiintl mɑn.
44004009	L i tie k i boi’t dinnɑ nɑ k jikt sɑɑ tuonŋɑnn nbɑ k t tun k tul wɔbk nɑ nɑn wɑɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ nɑ pɑɑk i e,
44004010	ŋɑnn l ŋɑn k i kul ɑ n bɑnn, k Islɑɑeltieb kul n mun bɑnn nɑn Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ Yiesu Klistu sɑnn pɑɑk e, k juɑ mɑnŋ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ, k sie i nunm ni nɑ. L Yiesu e k i dɑɑn kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk k kpii’u nɑ, ŋɑɑn k Yennu fiin’ɔ kuun ni nɑ.
44004011	Ŋuɑ e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk piɑk u po nɑ, ɑ: ‹Tɑnn nbɑ k yinm tɑnmɑɑlɑ yet’ɔ nɑ, ŋɑnn e set tie tɑnn nbɑ te k ŋɑɑk mɔk pɑnŋ.›
44004012	K suɑ sɑnn ji kɑɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni k Yennu tul niib ɑ bin lɑ fielu, sie Yiesu kuukuɑ.»
44004013	Tituk niib mɑnŋ nbɑ din lɑ Piɑl nɑn Sɑn pɑlcienn nbɑ k b mɔk nɑ, k biɑ bɑnn nɑn Piɑl nɑn Sɑn tie dɑnm nbɑ k mi kɑdɑɑɔk bonŋɑnn k k tie nijɑɑnɑ nɑ, l din yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b e, k b ji bɑnn nɑn b tuu tie Yiesu wei-nɑn-lieb e.
44004014	Ŋɑɑn bɑɑ lɑ juɑ nbɑ k b won te k u pɑɑk nɑ, k u sie Piɑl nɑn Sɑn buol ni nɑ, b ji din k mɔk mɔb nbɑ sɑɑ pɑk k jiin.
44004015	Ŋɑnn e k tituk niib din ŋɑɑn k b nyii b lɑknu dieok mɑnŋ ni dɑɑnn, ŋɑɑn k b biɑl fɑɑ nɑn b lieb lɑbɑɑl,
44004016	k boi b lieb, ɑ: «T sɑɑ tien jɑb nɑ nlee nɑ? K mɑɑn suɑ kul nbɑ be Selusɑɑlenm ponŋ mi yɑɑl-lituk tuonn nbɑ k b tun mɑnŋ nɑ. L pɑɑk nnɑ t ji kɑn fit noi,
44004017	ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin potn k tul’b, k b ji dɑɑ mi k yi Yiesu sɑnn k tien niib ni, k lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ ji dɑɑ biɑ yɑt k sɑɑ niib ni.»
44004018	Ŋɑnn e k b yiin’m, ɑ bin ŋɑnm kuɑ, k tɑn potn k tul’b ɑ b dɑɑ mi k piɑk ɑmi k tumi niib Yiesu sɑnn ni jik.
44004019	K Piɑl nɑn Sɑn jiin k yet’b ɑ: «I mɔnŋ mɔnŋ n got lɑɑn lɑnn e tokn Yennu buol ni. L ŋɑn k t ji sɑk i mɔb ŋɑɑn nyik Yennu mɔb ɑmi nlee?
44004020	k mɑɑn tinm kɑn fit k nyik pinpɑɔk lin nbɑ po k t lɑ k biɑ gbɑt.»
44004021	K tituk niib mɑnŋ lek potn k tul’b nɑn ninmɔnjɑl, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑ’b yɑnn ɑ bii sɑɑ, k mɑɑn b k lɑ sɔnsɑu nbɑ k b sɑɑ dɑt b tubɑ, k mɑɑn niib nɑ din piɑk Yennu lin nbɑ din tien nɑ pɑɑk,
44004022	k mɑɑn juɑ nbɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ bɑktnɔunŋ tuonn nɑ pɑɑk nɑ binɑ din gɑl nɑn binɑ piinnɑ nɑ wɑɑ.
44004023	Bɑɑ ŋɑɑ Piɑl nɑn Sɑn yuo nbɑ, k b ŋmɑt b lieb penŋ, k sɑɑ yet’b lin nbɑ k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn sɑɑkɑb mɑnŋ pɑk’b.
44004024	Bɑɑ mun gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ k b kul tɑɑn lieb nɑn dudukyent kuukuɑ, k mei Yennu ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ, fin e din nɑn sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ nɑ, nɑn mɔkgbenŋɑ nɑn lin nbɑ kul be lenŋ,
44004025	k Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ ni e k ɑ din pɑk ɑ tuontunnɔ Dɑɑfiid nbɑ tie t yejɑ nɑ mɔb ni ɑ: ‹Bee te k bin nbɑ k tie Islɑɑeltieb nɑ tuun nɑn jɑpɑɑt i? Bee te k b loln lol yɑnɑ ɑ?
44004026	Tingbounŋ nɑ kpɑnbɑlɑ nɑn yudɑnm tɑɑn lieb k tuok ɑ bin kɔn nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu nɑn u Klistu nɑ.›
44004027	«L tie bɑlmɔni e nɑn Heluod nɑn Pɔns Piilɑɑt nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Islɑɑeltieb nɑ nɑn Islɑɑeltieb dɑɑn set lɑkn duo nɑ ni, k lol lolɑ ɑ bin kpi ɑ tuontunŋɑnɔ Yiesu, wun nbɑ k ɑ din gɑnn k senn’ɔ nɑ.
44004028	Ŋɑnn e k b lɑkn, ɑ bin tun lin nbɑ kul k ɑ ponŋ din dukn ɑ yiikuo nɑn ɑ yɑnbuɑt, k yɑɑ l tɑn sɑɑ tien nɑ.
44004029	Tɔn, mɔtɑɑnɑ, Yonmdɑɑnɔ, gbiintl niib nɑ nbɑ fuɑ kɔnfuɑt nɑn ninmɔnn t pɑɑk nɑ, k ŋɑɑn k tinm nbɑ tie ɑ tuontunnɑ nɑ i piɑk ɑ mɑɑn nɑn pɑlcienn bonciɑnn.
44004030	Tɑntl ɑ nuu k te k bɑɑtb n pɑɑk k bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ i tuun ɑ tuontunŋɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn ni.»
44004031	K bin nbɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ nbɑ gbenn Yenmiɑlu nɑ yuo nbɑ, k siɑn nbɑ po k b tikl nɑ ji jek, k b kul ɑ gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm, k ji piin piɑk Yennu mɑɑn nɑn pɑlcienn.
44004032	L yuo nɑ k Yiesuweilɑ mɑnŋ kul ɑ tɑɑn lieb nɑn dudukyent kuukuɑ. B suɑ din k yɑɑ ɑ u yen siɑl u mɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn b din centl b bonɑ k tien b lieb e.
44004033	L yuo nɑ jik k tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ din nyint Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu kuun fiilu siɑlɑ nɑn yiikuo bonciɑnn, k Yennu yetŋɑnm bonciɑnn din be b kul ni.
44004034	K lin nbɑ nɑ suɑ din kɑɑ b ni k pɔt siɑl, k mɑɑn bin nbɑ din mɔk b mɔnŋ mɔnŋ kpɑɑnt nɑn b ŋei din tuu kɔi e, k gɑɑl l likli k bɑɑl nɑn’n,
44004035	k tɑn tien tuomiinbɑ nɑ, k b centl k tien b lieb nɑn bɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ.
44004036	K jɑsuɑ din be lenŋ k u sɑnn yi Suosiɑf, k u din tie Liefi buolu ni nilɔ, k b din mɑl’ɔ Siipl, k tuomiinbɑ nɑ din yi’u Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs (k l pɑɑk tie wun nbɑ cien pɑlɑ nɑ),
44004037	k u din tɑn kɔi u kpɑɑb, k gɑɑl l likli k bɑɑl nɑn’n, k tɑn tul tuomiinbɑ nɑ.
44005001	Jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be k u sɑnn yi Anɑɑniɑs, k u ŋɑɑpuo sɑnn mun din yi Sɑɑfiilɑ, k u mun din tɑn kɔi u kpɑɑb k gɑɑl l likli,
44005002	ŋɑɑn pɑɑt likli mɑnŋ pɑɑk k bɔl k u ŋɑɑpuo mi l po, ŋɑɑn jii lin nbɑ tenn nɑ, k bɑɑl nɑn’n k tɑn tul tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ.
44005003	K Piɑl boi’ɔ ɑ: «Anɑɑniɑs, ɑ tien nlee k Sɑɑtɑn kuɑ yent’ɑ, k ɑ fɑɑl fɑɑk k luon k ɑ kpɑnn Foŋɑnm, k pɑɑt likli nbɑ k ɑ dɑɑn kɔi ɑ kpɑɑb nɑ pɑɑk i?
44005004	Fɑɑ dɑɑn dɑɑ k kɔi ɑ kpɑɑb mɑnŋ nɑ, l dɑɑn k tie ɑ yɑl kɑɑ ɑɑ? K fɑɑ biɑ dɑɑn kɔi’l nɑ, l likli mɑnŋ biɑ dɑɑn k be ɑ yent ni kɑɑ ɑɑ? K bee tien k ɑ dukn ɑ pɑl ni k tun lin nbɑ nɑ? A k fɑɑl fɑɑk mɑnŋ k pɑɑn nilɔ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ fɑɑl k pɑɑn Yennu e.»
44005005	Anɑɑniɑs nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k u bɑɑ k kpo l yuo nɑ. K jɑŋmɑɑnciɑɔnŋ kuɑ bin nbɑ kul gbɑt u kuun mɑnŋ po.
44005006	K nɑɑsinm fiil k jii’u k pɔbn’ɔ cincenn ni, k nyii nɑn’ɔ k sɑɑ pii’u.
44005007	Ŋɑnn e k l yɑnn nɑn kut muntɑ nnɑ nɑ, k u ŋɑɑpuo bɑɑl k kuɑ, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ k bɑnn lin nbɑ tien.
44005008	K Piɑl biɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «Yetl’n, l set tie bɑlmɔni e nɑn fin nɑn ɑ sɔlɔ kpɑɑb likli nbɑ k i gɑɑl nɑ kul i nɑ ɑɑ?» K u jiin ɑ: «Nnn, l kul i nɑ.»
44005009	K Piɑl boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bee k fin nɑn ɑ sɔlɔ tɑɑn mɔb, k lol lol ɑ i bikn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Foŋɑnm i? Tɔn, nɑɑsinm nbɑ jii ɑ sɔlɔ k sɑɑn k sɑɑ pii’u nɑ, ŋɑnm e kuɑ tɑnmɔb nnɑ, k b mun biɑ sɑɑ jii’ɑ nnɑ e.»
44005010	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni, k u bɑɑ k kpo, k nɑɑsinm nɑ kuɑ k lɑ k u kpo wɑɑ, k b biɑ jii’u k nyii nɑn’ɔ k sɑɑ pii’u k kpiɑn’ɔ nɑn u sɔlɔ.
44005011	L yuo nɑ k jɑŋmɑɑnciɑɔnŋ suol Yiesuweilɑ kul nɑn bin nbɑ kul gbɑt mɑɑn mɑnŋ po.
44005012	L yuo nɑ k tuomiinbɑ nɑ tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ niib nɑ ni bonciɑnn. K Yiesuweilɑ kul ɑ tuu tɑɑn lieb Sɑɑlomɔn bɑlntl buol.
44005013	Bin nbɑ k tie Yiesuweilɑ nɑ din k mɔk pɑl nbɑ k b sɑɑ lɑkn nɑn’m, ŋɑɑn niib din piɑk dont Yiesuweilɑ nɑ bonciɑnn.
44005014	Jɑb nɑn puob bonciɑnn din tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑdɑ k pukn Yiesuweilɑ nɑ po.
44005015	Ŋɑnn e k niib din nyi nɑn bɑɑtb, k duɑnt’b liɑni nɑn dunduɑni pɑɑk sɑnjokpini ni, ɑ Piɑl i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl k gɑɑl yuo nbɑ, k u yun-yunŋ n lek bɑɑ b pɑɑk.
44005016	K niib nbɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm digbɑnbis ni mun jikt bɑɑtb, nɑn bin nbɑ k nɑlnbiit dɑɑmi’b nɑ, k bɑɑt nɑn’m, k b kul ɑ din lɑɑt lɑɑfiɑ.
44005017	L pɑɑk, k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ nɑn u wei-nɑn-lieb kul, bin nbɑ tie Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ nɑ, din fiin punponn bonciɑnn nɑn tuomiinbɑ nɑ, k din te k b sɑɑn
44005018	k sɑɑ suol tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ k kuɑn’m dɑnsɑlk.
44005019	Ŋɑɑn l nyiɑɔk mɑnŋ e k Yennu mɑlɑkɑ sik k luot dɑnsɑlk tɑnmɔi, k nyinn tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ:
44005020	«Ii sɑɑ mɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k sɑɑ set, ŋɑɑn muɑnt k tul niib mɑɑn nbɑ tien niib mɑnfuol nɑ kul ɑ.»
44005021	Bɑɑ gbɑt u mɑɑn mɑnŋ, k b sɑɑn k sɑɑ kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk mɑnŋ ni, sɑn-nyɑpob ni, k ji piin k wɑnt niib mɑɑn mɑnŋ. K Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ nɑn u wei-nɑn-lieb nɑ din yiin Islɑɑeltieb yudɑnm kul ɑ, k lɑk’m tituk kɑɑnu, k b tɑn tun sejenm ɑ bin nyinn tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ dɑnsɑlk ni k bɑɑl nɑn’m nɑ.
44005022	Ŋɑɑn b sɑɑn dɑnsɑlk mɑnŋ ni k sɑɑ got k k lɑ’b k ŋmɑt tituk mɑnŋ ni k sɑɑ yet’b ɑ:
44005023	«Tɑɑ bɑɑl dɑnsɑlk ni yuo nbɑ, t lɑ k tɑnmɔi kpɑl e kenkenken ɑ, k dɑnsɑlguulɑ nɑ be tɑnmɔi ni k guu, k t luot tɑnmɔi nɑ, ŋɑɑn k k lɑ suɑ dɑnsɑldieok mɑnŋ ni.»
44005024	Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k l tien’m yɑɑl-lituk nɑn tuomiinbɑ nɑ botu mɑnŋ pɑɑk k b ji bils lin nbɑ sɑɑ tien,
44005025	k tɑn suɑ k jɑsuɑ nnɑ kuɑ, k yet’b ɑ: «Gotl mɑn, jɑb nbɑ k i won kuɑn’m dɑnsɑlk wonn nɑ, b sie Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k tumi niib.»
44005026	L yuo nɑ k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ jii u jɑb, k b sɑɑn k sɑɑ nyinn tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ k jen nɑn’m, ŋɑɑn b k nyinn’b nɑn pɑnŋ kɑɑ, k mɑɑn b tiin jɑŋmɑɑni ɑ niib nɑ tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn jɑɑt’b tɑnɑ.
44005027	Bɑɑ bɑɑl nɑn’m yuo nbɑ, k b te k b sɑɑn set tituk niib nɑ sinsuuk ni, k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ piin k boi’b buboit,
44005028	k yet’b ɑ: «T dɑɑn tul’i mɔb nɑn ninmɔnn, k yɑɑ ɑ i dɑɑ wɑnt niib wɑnnu juɑ mɑnŋ sɑnn ni, ŋɑɑn i tun bee nɑ? I jii i wɑnnu mɑnŋ k yɑt Selusɑɑlenm kul po, k ji luon ɑ i tien’t Yiesu kpiilɑ.»
44005029	K Piɑl nɑn tuomiinbɑ lieb nɑ jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Sie k tii lek ii sɑɑk Yennu mɔb k gɑl nilɔ mɔb.
44005030	Yiesu mɑnŋ e k i dɑɑn ponŋ kpɑɑ tɑbn’ɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk k kpii’u nɑ, ŋɑɑn Yennu nbɑ tie t yejɑnm Yennu nɑ, ŋuɑ e fiin Yiesu kuun ni,
44005031	k jii’u donn’ɔ k kɑɑn’ɔ u niidiitu po, k tien’ɔ Yudɑɑnɔ nɑn Fietuɑ, ɑ k Islɑɑeltieb n lɑ yɑɑk k fit mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, k biɑ fit lɑ nyikcɑbu.
44005032	Tinm nɑn Foŋɑnm e tie Yiesu kuun fiilu mɑnŋ siɑlɑɑdɑnm, k Yennu jii u Siek mɑnŋ k tul wun nbɑ sɑɑk u mɔb.»
44005033	Yudɑnm mɑnŋ nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b wutuol fiil bonciɑnn, k b ji yɑɑ bin kpi tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ.
44005034	Ŋɑɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnsuɑ nnɑ din be, k u sɑnn yi Gɑɑmɑɑliɑl, k u din tie senniwɑntuɑ e, k niib kul din tie’u nibɑɑkl, k u din fiil k set tituk kɑɑnu dɑnm sinsuuk ni k yet ɑ bin nyinn tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ nɑn-yel po wɑɑn.
44005035	Ŋɑnn e k u yet’b ɑ: «Islɑɑeltieb, ii mi mɑn nɑn yɑɑ yɑɑ i tien niib nɑ lin nbɑ nɑ fɑn.
44005036	Siɑn yuo nbɑ din gɑl, k Teudɑɑs din wɑnt u mɔnŋ nɑn u tie nijɑɑnsuɑ e k niib nɑn kobi ŋɑnnɑ nɑ din tie u puolpo juɑmu, ŋɑɑn niib nbɑ din tɑn kpii’u nɑ, u juɑmu nɑ kul ɑ din yɑt e, k u jɑgbeln nɑ gbenn.
44005037	Ŋɑnn tɑn gɑl nnɑ, k Suudɑ, wun nbɑ din tie Gɑɑliile nilɔ mun din nyii k set nikɑnt yuo nɑ, k wɑnt u mɔnŋ, k din tunn niib bonciɑnn yɑn k b wɑɑ’u, k b mun din tɑn kpii’u, k u juɑmu nɑ kul yɑt.
44005038	Mɔtɑɑnɑ lɑɑ, kpɑn ŋɑɑnt jɑb mɑnŋ mɑn k dɑɑ tie’b siɑl, k l i tie k b dudukt nɑn b tuonɑ nɑ i tie nisɑɑlk yɑl i e, l tɑn sɑɑ gbenn ɑ.
44005039	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k l tie Yennu yɑl i e, i kɑn fit k nyɑnn’b. I sɑɑ lɑ k i mɑnn kpet k kɔn nɑn Yennu e gbɑɑ.» Ŋɑnn e k tituk niib mɑnŋ ji sɑk Gɑɑmɑɑliɑl mɔb nɑ,
44005040	k yiin tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ k kuɑn’m, k te k b buo’b gbɑnn, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑ’b, ŋɑɑn tul’b mɔb ɑ: «Ii mi mɑn k i ji kii piɑk Yiesu sɑnn mɑnŋ ni.»
44005041	Ŋɑnn mɑnŋ e k tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ nyii tituk kɑɑnu nɑ ni nɑn pɑlpienn, Yennu nbɑ lɑ k b jɑnŋ nɑn fei dinu, Yiesu sɑnn pɑɑk nɑ.
44005042	K dɑɑl kul k b sɑɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, ŋɑɑn biɑ lin niib ŋei ni, k wɑnt niib ɑ Yiesu tie Klistu e k biɑ muɑntl u lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ, k k nyikt.
44006001	L yuo nɑ k Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ ŋɑnmt yɑbtl k puki nɑ, k bunbulmi tɑn bɑɑl Suifnbɑ nbɑ piɑk Glek mɑɑn nɑn Suifnbɑ nbɑ piɑk b mɔnŋ mɑɑn nɑ sinsuuk ni, k mɑɑn bin nbɑ piɑk Glek mɑɑn nɑ din yet ɑ b i tuol jiet dɑɑl kul, b pɑkɔi k lɑɑt b tolɑ nɑn lieb nɑ.
44006002	Ŋɑnn e k tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ yiin Yiesuweilɑ mɑnŋ kul ɑ, k tɑn yet’b ɑ: «L k ŋɑn k tin nyik Yennu mɑɑn muɑntu ŋɑɑn biɑl jiet tolu ni.
44006003	L pɑɑk, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, gotl k gɑnn jɑb bɑnlole i sinsuuk ni, bin nbɑ k i mi nɑn b gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm nɑn yɑnfɑntl, k tin tien’m tuonɑ nɑ yudɑnm,
44006004	ŋɑɑn k tinm n jii t mɔnŋ yuo k tien Yenmiɑlu ni, nɑn Yennu mɑɑn wɑnnu ni, k dɑɑ nɑk.»
44006005	K mɔtɑɑɔk niib nɑ kul ji din mɔk pɑlpienn tuomiinbɑ mɑɑn mɑnŋ pɑɑk. Ŋɑnn e k b gɑnn Etiɑnn, wun nbɑ mɑntk gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm nɑn yɑdɑ nɑ, nɑn Fiiliip, nɑn Pluokɔl, nɑn Niikɑɑnɔl, nɑn Tiimɔn, nɑn Pɑɑlmenɑɑs, nɑn Niikolɑ, wun nbɑ din nyii Antiɑɔs. Sinsinn u din k tie Suif nilɔ, ŋɑɑn siɑn yuo u din kpint u jɑɑnti k wɑɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti, ŋɑɑn k mɔtɑɑnɑ k u ji tie Yiesuweilɔ.
44006006	Mɔtɑɑɔk niib nɑ nbɑ lukt’b yuo nbɑ, k b te k b sɑɑn set tuomiinbɑ nɑ tuɑnn po, k tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ miɑl Yennu k tul’b ŋɑɑn jii b nii k yii b pɑɑk.
44006007	L puolpo e k Yennu mɑɑn ŋɑnmt k yɑt kuɑ niib ni, k Yiesuweilɑ mun biɑ yɑbtl k puki bonciɑnn Selusɑɑlenm, k Yennu mɑnntieb bonciɑnn sɑk Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.
44006008	Etiɑnn nbɑ din gbie nɑn Yennu yetŋɑnm nɑn u yiikuo bonciɑnn nɑ, din tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ niib nɑ sinsuuk ni.
44006009	Ŋɑɑn nisiɑb din k sɑk’ɔ. Bin nbɑ din noi nɑn Etiɑnn mɑnŋ din tie Suifnbɑ nbɑ din tie dɑɑbɑ, k b ŋɑɑ’b b dɑɑbs ni, k b nyii Siilenn nɑn Aleksɑndli nɑn Siiliisi nɑn Asii ni e. B mun din mɔk b mɔnŋ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok o.
44006010	Ŋɑɑn Foŋɑnm din tul Etiɑnn yɑnfɑntl bonciɑnn, k b k fit nyɑnn’ɔ nɑn u mɑɑn mɑnŋ.
44006011	Bɑɑ din k fit nyɑnn’ɔ nɑ, k b din kuɑ nisiɑb ɑ bin yet ɑ nnɑ: «T gbɑt k u piɑk bonbilɑnkɑnt k biil Muois nɑn Yennu.»
44006012	Bɑɑ yet nnɑ mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k niib nɑ nɑn sɑɑkɑb nɑn senniwɑntieb wutuol duo, k b fiil k suol’ɔ, k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ b yudɑnm tituk buol ni,
44006013	k b tɑn bɑɑl nɑn nisiɑb nnɑ biɑk ɑ bin fɑɑl fɑɑk, k yet ɑ: «Yuo kul juɑ nɑ tun piɑk k biil Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk mɑnŋ, nɑn Muois senni nɑ e,
44006014	k mɑɑn t gbɑt k u yet ɑ Yiesu nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ sɑɑ bet Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ, ɑ ŋɑɑn lebt Muois kɑɑl nbɑ k u din senn nɑ.»
44006015	Bin nbɑ kul din lɑkn kɑl tituk mɑnŋ ni din kpɑɑ b ninbinɑ k goli Etiɑnn, k tɑn lɑ k u nunpo lebt k ji nɑɑn nɑn mɑlɑkɑ nunpo nɑ.
44007001	Ŋɑnn e k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ boi Etiɑnn ɑ: «L set tie mɔni ee?»
44007002	K Etiɑnn yɑɑ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑnbɑ nɑn n nɑɑ wɑɑs, gbiintl mɑn. Yuo nbɑ k t yejɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din be Mesopotɑɑmi yɑkl po, l yuo k u din dɑɑ k sɑɑn Hɑlɑn nɑ, k Yennu nbɑ be yudɑnt ni nɑ dɔkt u pɑɑk
44007003	k yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Fiit k nyik ɑ tinŋ nɑn ɑ niib, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k n sɑɑ wɑnn’ɑ nɑ.›
44007004	Ŋɑnn e k u fiil k nyik Sɑldeen tinŋ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn k sɑɑ kɑl Hɑlɑn duo ni. U bɑɑ kuun puolpo e, k Yennu biɑ te k u fiil, k bɑɑl tinŋ nbɑ k i be nɑ ni.
44007005	Ŋɑɑn Yennu dɑɑ din k tul’ɔ tinŋ nɑ nɑn bonmintk ɑ, ɑ wun yent ŋɑɑn senn mɔsonn ɑ u tɑn sɑɑ tul’ɔ tinŋ nnɑ, k ŋuɑ nɑn u yɑɑbuonɑ i yen. Ŋɑɑn l yuo nɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm dɑɑ din k mɔk bik.
44007006	Nnɑ e k Yennu din yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹A yɑɑbuonɑ tɑn sɑɑ sɑɑn k be tingɑnŋ ni e wɑɑ, k tɑn sii tie dɑɑbɑ lenŋ, k b tɑn sɑɑ lɑ muksuk lenŋ bonciɑnn, k tɑn jɑnŋ binɑ kobiinnɑ.
44007007	Ŋɑɑn tinŋ mɑnŋ niib nbɑ k b sii tuun k tien’m nɑ, n tɑn sɑɑ dɑt b tubɑ, k l puolpo, ɑ yɑɑbuonɑ mɑnŋ tɑn sɑɑ nyi tinŋ mɑnŋ ni, k bɑɑl tinŋ nɑ ni, k jiɑnt’n.›
44007008	«L puolpo k Yennu lol lol k tul Ablɑɑhɑɑnm, k biɑ din wɑnn’ɔ lol mɑnŋ nyinn, ɑ ŋuɑ nɑn u yɑɑbuonɑ i poli punɑ. K Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din tɑn mɑl Isɑɑk, k l dɑɑ ŋɑnniin dɑɑl k u pot’ɔ, k Isɑɑk mun din tɑn pot u bijɑ Sɑɑkɔb, k Sɑɑkɔb mun din tɑn pot u bonjɑi piik nɑn bɑnle bin nbɑ tie t yejɑsɑɑkɑb.
44007009	K Sɑɑkɔb wɑɑs mɑnŋ din tɑn mɔk punponn nɑn b wɑɑlɔ Suosiɑf, k din tɑn suol’ɔ k kɔi’ɔ, k nisiɑb dɑɑ’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Ejipt tinŋ ni, ŋɑɑn Yennu din be nɑn’ɔ,
44007010	k din nyinn’ɔ fɑlɑ kul ɑ ni, k biɑ tul’ɔ yɑn k te k Ejipt kpɑnbɑl Fɑɑlɑɑɔn niɑn’ɔ k jii’u tien’ɔ yudɑɑnɔ Ejipt tinŋ ni, k biɑ te k u tie yudɑɑnɔ u ŋɑɑk ni.
44007011	«L puolpo k kon tɑn bɑɑ Ejipt tinŋ nɑn Kɑɑnɑɑn tinŋ ni kul ɑ, k kon suol niib bonbiil, k t yejɑnm kɔnŋ jiet.
44007012	Sɑɑkɔb nbɑ din gbɑt ɑ dii be Ejipt yuo nbɑ, k u tun u wɑɑs nbɑ tie t yejɑnm lenŋ. Ŋɑnn i din tie b sinsinn sɑɑnu.
44007013	«B sɑɑnu tɑɑl munle ni e, k Suosiɑf ji din te k u nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑ bɑnn’ɔ. Ŋɑnn e k Fɑɑlɑɑɔn ji din bɑnn Suosiɑf buolu.
44007014	K Suosiɑf ji din tun’m ɑ bin ŋmɑt kun u cɑnbɑɑ Sɑɑkɔb buol, k sɑɑ jii ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb kul k jen nɑn’m Ejipt nɑ, k b din tie niib piinlole nɑn bɑnŋmu.
44007015	«Ŋɑnn e k Sɑɑkɔb nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb mɑnŋ fiil sɑɑn Ejipt k sɑɑ kɑl, k l puolpo, ŋuɑ nɑn u wɑɑs din tɑn kpo gbenn lenŋ
44007016	k b jii b gbɑnɑnt k sɑɑn nɑn’m Siisenm k sɑɑ pii’b kɑɑɔk nbɑ k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm ponŋ din dɑɑ nɑn likli Hemɔl nibuolu buol ni nɑ.
44007017	«Yuo nbɑ din tɑn pel nɑn Yennu n gbien u mɔsonn nbɑ k u din senn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑ, l yuo mɑnŋ, t niib nbɑ be Ejipt nɑ ji yɑbt bonciɑnn.
44007018	L puolpo e k suɑ din dii Ejipt nɑɑn, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ din k mi Suosiɑf.
44007019	K kpɑnbɑl mɑnŋ din diɑ t bɑɑ nbɑ diɑbiiuk, k din tuu ton nɑn’m bonciɑnn, k biɑ din tuu miɑ’b ɑ bin nyinn b sɑnpɑnti b ŋei ni k lu’b k bin kpo.
44007020	«Ŋɑnn e k b din mɑl Muois, k u fɑn bonciɑnn, k Yennu biɑ din luon’ɔ, k u be u bɑɑ ŋɑɑk ŋmɑɑli ŋɑntɑ.
44007021	U bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ nbɑ din tɑn nyinn’ɔ ŋɑɑk ni yuo nbɑ, k kpɑnbɑl nɑ sɑpɑɑmɔ din lɑ’u, k gɑɑl’ɔ k jii’u k wubi’ɔ, k u ji tie nɑn u mɔnŋ bik nɑ.
44007022	Nnɑ e k b din tumi ŋuɑ Muois, yɑn kul nbɑ k Ejipt-tieb mɔk, k u mɑɑn nɑn tuonɑ din mɔk pɑnŋ.
44007023	«Muois nbɑ din tɑn lɑ binɑ piinnɑ yuo nbɑ, k dɑsiɑl k u tɑn dukn ɑ wun gɔn u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ buolu Islɑɑeltieb,
44007024	k tɑn lɑ k Ejipt nilɔ buo Islɑɑeltieb ni yenɔ, k u bɑɑl ɑ wun fɑt’ɔ, k tɑn kpii Ejipt nilɔ mɑnŋ.
44007025	U din mi ɑ u nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑ sɑɑ bɑnn ɑ Yennu tɑn sɑɑ te k ŋuɑ e n nyinn’b dɑɑbs ni, ŋɑɑn b din k bɑnn nnɑ.
44007026	K l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k u biɑ lɑ Islɑɑeltieb bɑnle k b kɔn k u luon k wun tɑɑn’m k bin mɑnŋ nɑn b lieb, k yet’b ɑ: ‹Gotl mɑn i tie nɑɑ wɑɑs e, k bee tien k i buo i lieb k tien i lieb dɑni i?›
44007027	K wun nbɑ tul u luɑ dɑnŋ nɑ pii Muois, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Ŋmee lukt’ɑ ɑ ɑ tien t yudɑɑnɔ ɑmi t bɑlbuulɔ.
44007028	A yɑɑn luon k ɑ kpi’n nɑn fɑɑ won kpii Ejipt nilɔ nɑ ɑmi ii?›
44007029	Muois nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k u ciɑl nyii Ejipt tinŋ ni, k bɑɑl Mɑɑdiɑn tinŋ ni k be lenŋ, k mɑl bonjɑi bɑnle.
44007030	«Binɑ piinnɑ nbɑ din tɑn gɑl, k u din tɑn sɑɑn muuk ni dɑsiɑl k sɑɑ bɑɑl Siinɑi juɑl buol ni, k lɑ mupieunŋ, k l di k leni kunkonjɑgotuk pɑɑk k mɑlɑkɑ dɔkt muu mɑnŋ ni.
44007031	«Muois nbɑ din lɑ nnɑ mɑnŋ k l tien’ɔ yɑɑl-lituk, k u cɑt nɑkn ɑ wun ŋɑnm got k ji gbɑt k Yonmdɑɑnɔ kunkɔl k u yien’ɔ k yɑɑ ɑ:
44007032	‹Min e tie ɑ yejɑnm Yennu, Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑn Isɑɑk nɑn Sɑɑkɔb Yennu.› Muois nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni ji kuɑ’u, k u ji sie k jekl k ji k mɔk pɑl nɑn wun got.
44007033	K Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Pitl ɑ tɑɑsɑɑt nbɑ k ɑ pil nɑ, k mɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k ɑ sie nɑ tie tinŋɑnŋ e.
44007034	Tɔn, n got k lɑ Ejipt-tieb nbɑ dint n mɔnŋ niib fɑlciɑɔnŋ Ejipt tinŋ ni biɑnŋ nbɑ, k n gbiɑ b fɑbni. Ŋɑnn e k n sik mɑɑ n fɑt nyinn’b. Bɑɑt mɔtɑɑnɑ k n sɑɑ tun’ɑ Ejipt tinŋ ni.› »
44007035	«Muois nbɑ nɑ e k Islɑɑeltieb din yet’ɔ nɑ, k b din yet’ɔ k yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Ŋmee lukt’ɑ ɑ ɑ tien t yudɑɑnɔ ɑmi t bɑlbuulɔ?› ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ nɑ e k Yennu mun din lukt’ɔ ɑ wuu tie b yudɑɑnɔ nɑn b fɑt-tuɑ biɑk, k ŋuɑ Yennu din te k mɑlɑkɑ pɑk nɑn’ɔ ŋɑɑn tun’ɔ. Mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ e k Muois din lɑ’u kunkonjɑgotuk pɑɑk muu nɑ ni nɑ.
44007036	Ŋuɑ Muois e din tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ din nyinn’b Ejipt tinŋ nnɑ, k din biɑ tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ Ejipt tinŋ ni, nɑn bɑɑ biɑ din sɑɑ puot Mɔkmunŋ nɑ, nɑn bɑɑ biɑ din be pɑɑnpieonŋ ni binɑ piinnɑ nɑ.
44007037	«L Muois e din yet Islɑɑeltieb ɑ: ‹Yennu tɑn sɑɑ tun sɔkniisuɑ i buol ni nɑn wɑɑ tun’n biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k u sii tie i buolu ni yenɔ.›
44007038	Muois mɑnŋ e din be nɑn t niib lɑknu ni, pɑɑnpieonŋ ni nɑ. Lenŋ e k u din tɑn duo Siinɑi juɑl pɑɑk k sɑɑ be nɑn Yennu mɑlɑkɑ, k mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ din piɑk k tien Muois, ɑ Muois n sɔkn tul t yejɑnm. L yuo e k Muois din gɑɑl Yennu mɑnfuol mɑɑn k tul t yejɑnm nɑn tinm.
44007039	«Ŋɑɑn t yejɑnm din k luon k bin sɑk’ɔ. L pɑɑk, k b din yet’ɔ, k mɑɑn b yɑn tunn Ejipt ɑ.
44007040	B din yet Aɑlɔn ɑ wun mɑɑ pɑtɑ, k b i tie b ŋmɑkt dɑnm k bii wɑɑ’b, k biɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Ŋɑɑn Muois ŋɑnin, wun nbɑ nyinn’t Ejipt nɑ, t k mi lin nbɑ tien’ɔ.›
44007041	Ŋɑnn e k b mɑɑ pɑtl k nɑn’ɔ nɑɑjɑbik, k mɑnn mɑlunŋ l pɑɑk k tien jɑɑnm lin nbɑ k b mɑɑ nɑn b mɔnŋ nii nɑ pɑɑk.
44007042	«L pɑɑk, k Yennu ji k goli’b ŋɑɑn cɑb’b, k b ji jiɑntl ŋmɑɑbilɑ, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ Yennu sɔkniinbɑ kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ, ɑ Yennu yet ɑ: ‹Islɑɑeltieb, yɑɑ din kpi bonkobt k mɑnn mɑlunŋ muuk ni binɑ piinnɑ nɑ, i din mɑnn mɑlunŋ mɑnŋ k tien min ee?
44007043	I din tuu jikt pɑtl Molɔk lɑnbounŋ o, k biɑ din tuu jikt ŋmɑɑbil Liefɑn nɑɔnŋ o, k l tie pɑtl, k i jiɑntl’l. L pɑɑk, n sɑɑ bel’i i tinŋ ni k sɑɑn nɑn’i siɑn nbɑ fɔk k gɑl Bɑɑbiilonn.› »
44007044	Etiɑnn biɑ piɑk k yɑɑ ɑ: «T yejɑnm din fɑɑ Yennu lɑnbounŋ muuk ni, k l tie siɑlɑ nɑn Yennu din lol lol nɑn b yejɑnm k l lɑnbounŋ ni, Yennu nbɑ din diɑn u senni nbɑ tɑnpɑtlɑi ŋɑnle pɑɑk nɑ din be l ni. Yennu e din wɑnn Muois, bɑɑ sii fɑɑ lɑnbounŋ mɑnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ, k b fɑɑ. L din tie nɑn Muois nbɑ din lɑ lin nbɑ nɑ e.
44007045	L puolpo, k t yejɑnm ji din tɑn jii lɑnbounŋ mɑnŋ k tul b wɑɑs, k b gɑɑl k mun jikt k sɑɑ nɑn’n, yuo nbɑ k Suosue din tie b yudɑɑnɔ nɑ, k din bɑɑl nnɑ yuo nbɑ k b din fɑt tinŋ k Yennu din bel nibuolgɑni nbɑ din yen’n l yuo nɑ, k l din biɑl tinŋ nɑ ni dik dik nɑn Dɑɑfiid yuo mun.
44007046	Dɑɑfiid mɑnŋ din gbuot Yennu nunm, k din tɑn miɑl Yennu ɑ wun cɑb’ɔ k wun mɑɑ ŋɑɑk k tul Sɑɑkɔb Yennu nɑ.
44007047	Ŋɑɑn Sɑɑlomɔn e din tɑn mɑɑ ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ.
44007048	«Ŋɑɑn t mi nɑn Yɑbnt Yennu k kɑɑl ŋei nbɑ k niib mɑɑ ni kɑɑ. L tie nɑn Yennu sɔkni nbɑ din yet ɑ:
44007049	‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet ɑ Sɑnpɑɑk tie n nɑɑngbounŋ o, k tingbounŋ nɑ mun tie n tɑɑkpɑktl. Ŋɑbuolbee k i sɑɑ fit mɑɑ k tul’n i? Liɑ buol e k n sɑɑ fit kuɑ lenŋ i?
44007050	Min kɑɑ din nɑn bonɑ nɑ kul ii?› »
44007051	Etiɑnn biɑ piɑk k yɑɑ ɑ: «I mɑntk tie nigbɑbɑ hei, k i dudukt biɑ fɔk nɑn Yennu bonciɑnn, k i tubɑ k gbiɑ Yennu mɑɑn i k i yet Foŋɑnm tuonɑ. I nɑɑn nɑn i yejɑnm nɑ e.
44007052	Yennu sɔkni lɑnɔ po e k i yejɑnm din k muks’ɔ? B biɑ din kpii bin nbɑ din ponŋ sɔknt ɑ Niŋɑnɔ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ wɑɑ. Tɔn, k mɔtɑɑnɑ yinm e tie dɑnm nbɑ nyii u puol k biɑ tie u kpiilɑ.
44007053	Yinm e biɑ tie dɑnm nbɑ din gɑɑl Yennu senni nbɑ k i din gɑɑl mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nuu ni, ŋɑɑn biɑ lek k sɑk’l nɑ.»
44007054	K Suifnbɑ yudɑnm, sɑɑkɑb nɑn senniwɑntieb nɑ nbɑ gbiint Etiɑnn mɑɑn mɑnŋ k b donn wutuol bonbiil ŋɑɑn gbɑb mɔgbɑbɑ.
44007055	Ŋɑɑn Foŋɑnm fiil Etiɑnn ni, k u yɑɑt k got Yendɔunŋ ni, k lɑ Yennu yentsɑɑkɑl, k Yiesu sie ŋuɑ Yennu niidiitu po,
44007056	k u yet ɑ: «Gotl, n lɑ k sɑnpɑɑpo luot k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ sie Yennu niidiitu po.»
44007057	Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm, sɑɑkɑb nɑn senniwɑntieb nɑ yikn sɑnpɑɑpo, ŋɑɑn pii b tubɑ, k b kul ɑ tɑn lɑkn wuul bɑɑl k kpil’ɔ,
44007058	k bel’ɔ k nyinn’ɔ duo mɑnŋ ni, k piin k jɑɑt Etiɑnn tɑnɑ ɑ bin kpi’u, k siɑlɑɑdɑnm jii bin nbɑ jɑɑt tɑnɑ nɑ liɑtfɔkt k bil nɑɑsimɔ nbɑ k b yi’u Sɔul nɑ buol ni, ɑ wuu guu.
44007059	B din jɑɑt’ɔ e dik dik dik, k u din tɑn miɑl ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu, gɑɑt n siek nɑ,»
44007060	ŋɑɑn gbɑɑn k yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, dɑɑ jikt b biit nɑ k biil’b.» U yet nnɑ e ŋɑɑn ji kpo.
44008001	K Sɔul din sɑk bɑɑ din sɑk ɑ bin kpi’u. L dɑɑl mɑnŋ e k muksbiil din bɑɑl Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm nɑ pɑɑk k b kul ɑ din nyii yɑt k sɑɑn Suude nɑn Sɑɑmɑɑli yɑkɑ po, ŋɑɑn nyik tuomiinbɑ nɑ kuukuɑ lenŋ.
44008002	K yentinsiɑb din jii Etiɑnn, k sɑɑn sɑɑ pii’u, ŋɑɑn mɔ yikn k fɑbn bonciɑnn u pɑɑk.
44008003	K Sɔul ŋɑnin din luon wun biil Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib e, k din lin kuɑ ŋɑɑk ŋɑɑk, k so Yiesuweilɑ, jɑb nɑn puob, k nyint’b k sɑɑ kuɑnt’b dɑnsɑli.
44008004	Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ din nyii k yɑt nɑ ji din sɑɑ lokl kul po e k muɑntl Yiesu mɑɑn mɑnŋ,
44008005	k Fiiliip nyii k sik Sɑɑmɑɑli tinŋ digbɑnsɑɑkɑl ni, k sɑɑ muɑnt Klistu po k tul lenŋ niib.
44008006	Nibulciɑɔnŋ nbɑ gbɑt Fiiliip mɑɑn k biɑ lɑ bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ nbɑ k u tuun nɑ, k b mɑntk gbiintl u mɑɑn mɑnŋ fɑnu nɑn dudukyent.
44008007	Nɑlnbiit din nyii bɑɑtb bonciɑnn ni k yikn sɑnpɑɑpo, k gbɑnɑnkpienɑ nɑn wɔbi bonciɑnn biɑ din pɑɑk. K nigbounŋ nɑ mun din tikl k gbiint Fiiliip muɑnti mɑnŋ, k biɑ lɑ nɑn u bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ nbɑ k u tuun. U din nyinn nɑlnbiit niib bonciɑnn ni, k b yikn sɑnpɑɑpo k nyi, k u biɑ te k gbɑnɑnkpienɑ dɑnm nɑn wɔbi bonciɑnn pɑɑk. L pɑɑk din tien k b mɑntk gbiintl u mɑɑn fɑnu nɑn dudukyent.
44008008	K pɑlpienn din be duo mɑnŋ ni bonciɑnn.
44008009	Jɑsuɑ nnɑ ponŋ din be duo mɑnŋ ni, k u sɑnn din yi Siimɔn, k u tuu tɑn diɑ u linŋin k tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ, k l din bɑktl niib kul nbɑ be duo mɑnŋ yɑkl po, k u din yi u mɔnŋ ɑ u tie nijɑɑnn e.
44008010	Niib kul nbɑ din tie nijɑɑnɑ nɑn tɑli din bɑɑkt’ɔ, k b din tuu yɑɑ ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ tie Yennu yiikuo e, lin nbɑ k b yi’l Yiikuociɑɔnŋ nɑ.»
44008011	B din gbiintl u mɑɑn mɑnŋ fɑnu fɑnu k mɑɑn u din tuu te k l bɑktl’b nɑn u bɑktnɔunŋ k l wei wɑɑ.
44008012	Ŋɑɑn bɑɑ din tien yɑdɑ nɑn lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ k Fiiliip din muɑntl k jikt sɑɑ Yennu nɑɑn nɑn Yiesu sɑnn po nɑ, k jɑb nɑn puob din te k b wul’b Yennu nyunwulu.
44008013	Siimɔn mɔnŋ mun din tien Fiiliip mɑɑn yɑdɑ, k u wul’ɔ. K u tien Fiiliip wei-nɑn-luɑ, k lɑɑt bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k u tuun nɑ, k l tuu yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’ɔ.
44008014	K tuomiinbɑ nbɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm gbɑt ɑ Sɑɑmɑɑliitieb gɑɑl Yennu mɑɑn mɑnŋ, k b din tun Piɑl nɑn Sɑn.
44008015	Bɑɑ bɑɑl Sɑɑmɑɑli yuo nbɑ nɑ, k b miɑl Yennu bin nbɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ bin gɑɑl Foŋɑnm,
44008016	k mɑɑn Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ dɑɑ din k sik b suɑ ni. B kpɑn din gɑɑl Yennu nyunwulu Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn ni kuukuɑ e.
44008017	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl nɑn Sɑn yii b nii b pɑɑk k b gɑɑl Foŋɑnm.
44008018	Siimɔn nbɑ din lɑ k tuomiinbɑ nɑ nbɑ yiin b nii niib pɑɑk k Yennu tul’b Foŋɑnm nɑ, k u yɑɑ ɑ wun tul tuomiinbɑ nɑ likli,
44008019	ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Cɑbn’n mun yiikuo nɑ mɑn k n mun tuu yii n nii suɑ pɑɑk k wun gɑɑl Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ.»
44008020	Ŋɑɑn k Piɑl yet’ɔ yɑɑ ɑ: «A sɑɑ kpo yiɑk e nɑn ɑ likli mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn ɑ duki mi ɑ ɑ sɑɑ gɑɑl Yennu piini nɑn likli e.
44008021	A lek kɑn tun siɑl t tuonn nɑ ni, k mɑɑn ɑ pɑl k be fɑnu nɑn Yennu
44008022	Mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ kii mei Yonmdɑɑnɔ k pɑsiɑl i u sɑɑ nyik cɑb’ɑ nɑn ɑ dudukbiit mɑnŋ,
44008023	k mɑɑn n lɑ nɑn ɑ gbie nɑn nuɑntont e, k biit kun’ɑ wɑɑ.»
44008024	Ŋɑnn e k Siimɔn jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Miɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ k tul’n mɑn k lin nbɑ k i yet nɑ dɑɑ bɑɑt n pɑɑk.»
44008025	Piɑl nɑn Sɑn din pɑk siɑlɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ po k tul niib, k biɑ muɑnt u mɑɑn ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt k sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm. Bɑɑ din sɑɑ nɑ e, k b din muɑntl Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn Sɑɑmɑɑli digbɑnbis bonciɑnn ni.
44008026	Ŋɑnn e k Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑlɑkɑ tɑn bɑɑl yet Fiiliip ɑ: «Fiit sɑɑn gɑnŋ po k tɔkn sɔnu nbɑ nyi Selusɑɑlenm k siik Gɑɑsɑ nɑ.» L sɔnu pɑɑk din k pɑ siɑl.
44008027	K Fiiliip fiil k sɑɑ k sɑɑ cet Etiopi kɑlɑcijɑɑnn nnɑ k u din tie nijɑɑnn k biɑ tie likli kɑlɑcinbɑ yudɑɑnɔ Etiopi puo nbɑ din tie kpɑnbɑl k b yi’u Kɑndɑɑs nɑ buol ni. Kɑlɑcijɑɑnn nɑ ponŋ din sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm k sɑɑ jiɑnt Yennu,
44008028	k ji kun k kɑl u toluk ni k tɑɑni dɑɑl’ɔ, k u lii Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi kɑdɑɑɔk ni. Wɑɑ din kɑl k sɑɑ yuo nbɑ, k u lii Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi kɑdɑɑɔk ni.
44008029	Foŋɑnm yet Fiiliip ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ nɑkn toluk nɑ.»
44008030	K u ciɑl sɑɑn nɑkn lenŋ, k gbɑt k juɑ nɑ lii Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi kɑdɑɑɔk ni, k u boi’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, ɑ bɑnn lin nbɑ k ɑ lii nɑ pɑɑk ii?»
44008031	K u jiin ɑ: «Nlee k n sɑɑ bɑnn l pɑɑk, k l k tie k suɑ wɑnn’n kɑɑ?» K u bɑln Fiiliip ɑ wun kuɑ toluk nɑ k kɑl nɑn’ɔ.
44008032	Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk mɑɑn nbɑ k kɑlɑcijɑɑnn mɑnŋ din lii nɑ, ŋɑnn i nɑ ɑ: «U din tie nɑn pieok nbɑ k b sɑɑ ɑ bin sɑɑ kpi’u nɑ e, k u ŋmin nɑn pebik nbɑ k b tuu pot pot u kobt k u ŋmin nɑ, k u k yɑɑt u mɔb
44008033	U din sikn u mɔnŋ, k b yet bin bu u buut bonŋɑnn. Ŋmee sɑɑ fit pɑk siɑl k jiin u yɑɑbuonɑ po? K mɑɑn b gbenn u mɑnfuol tingbounŋ nnɑ wɑɑ.»
44008034	K kɑlɑcijɑɑnn nɑ boi Fiiliip ɑ: «Yetl’n, ŋmee k sɔkni nɑ yien nɑ? U yien u mɔnŋ ɑmi suɑ ee?»
44008035	K Fiiliip piin siɑn nbɑ k kɑlɑcijɑɑnn mɑnŋ lii nɑ k sɑɑ, k piɑk Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn.
44008036	Bɑɑ tɔk sɔnu mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k b lɑ nyun nnɑ duɑ, k kɑlɑcijɑɑnn nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Gotl, nyun e nɑ. Bee yɑɑ lin tien k ɑ kɑn wul’n Yennu nyunwulu?»
44008037	K Fiiliip yet’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑn ɑ pɑl kul ɑ, n sɑɑ wul’ɑ wɑɑ.» K u jiin ɑ: «N tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yiesu Klistu tie Yennu Bijɑ e.»
44008038	K kɑlɑcijɑɑnn mɑnŋ te k tɑɑni nɑ set, k ŋuɑ nɑn Fiiliip sik nyun nɑ ni, k Fiiliip wul’ɔ Yennu nyunwulu.
44008039	B tɑn nyii nyun nɑ ni k duo, k Foŋɑnm jii Fiiliip k yɑɑt nɑn’ɔ, k kɑlɑcijɑɑnn nɑ ji k lɑ’u, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm suol u sɔnu k kun nɑn pɑlpienn.
44008040	K Fiiliip ji din sɑɑ be Asot ɑ, k din lin digbɑnɑ kul k muɑntl Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn mɔkmɔk nɑn wɑɑ din tɑn bɑɑl Sesɑɑle.
44009001	Tɔn, Sɔul lek biɑ din fuɑ kɔnfuɑt, k yien ɑ u sii dint Yonmdɑɑnɔ puolpoweitieb biɑk nɑn u yɑɑ wun kpi’b nɑ e, k tɑn sɑɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ buol ni,
44009002	ɑ wun gɑɑl kɑdɑɑt, ɑ k sɑɑn Dɑɑmɑɑs k sɑɑ wɑnn Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet yudɑnm, ɑ u sɑɑ lɑ wun nbɑ wɑɑ Yiesu sɔnu mɑnŋ, juɑ ɑmi puo, sie wun suol’b k lol’b k jen nɑn’m Selusɑɑlenm.
44009003	Tɔn, wɑɑ ji din sɑɑ yuo nbɑ e k sɑɑ pel Dɑɑmɑɑs, k yentu nyii sɑnpɑɑpo, k sik yent lint’ɔ.
44009004	K u bɑɑ tinŋ ni, k gbɑt k kunkɔl yi’u ɑ: «Sɔul, Sɔul, bee k ɑ muksl’n i?»
44009005	K u boi ɑ: «A tie ŋmee e?» K kunkɔl nɑ jiin ɑ: «Min Yiesu e, k ɑ muksl’n.
44009006	Ŋɑɑn fiit k sɑɑn duo nɑ ni, k b sɑɑ sɑɑ yet’ɑ fɑɑ ji sɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ.»
44009007	L yuo nɑ, jɑb nbɑ din ciɑnt Sɔul nɑ ji biɑl set silinmm. B din gbiɑ kunkɔl nɑ ŋɑnin, ŋɑɑn k lɑɑt suɑ.
44009008	K Sɔul tɑn fiil tinŋ ni, k munt u nuni, ŋɑɑn k k lɑɑt. Ŋɑnn e k b dɑt u nuu k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Dɑɑmɑɑs.
44009009	Dɑmunjɑɑ ŋɑntɑ k u k fit lɑɑt. L dɑɑ mɑnŋ ni u din k dii ɑmi k nyuu siɑl.
44009010	K Yiesuweisuɑ din be Dɑɑmɑɑs mɑnŋ, k u sɑnn yi Anɑɑniɑs, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ yiin’ɔ yelntu ni ɑ: «Anɑɑniɑs.» K u jiin ɑ: «Min e nɑ, Yonmdɑɑnɔ.»
44009011	K Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fiit k sɑɑn tɔkn sɔnu nbɑ yi Sɔnsunsonn nɑ k sɑɑ kuɑ Suudɑ ŋɑɑk ni, k boi juɑ nbɑ nyii Tɑɑls k u sɑnn yi Sɔul nɑ po. U mei Yennu e mɔtɑɑnɑ,
44009012	k u lɑ jɑsuɑ yelntu ni, k u sɑnn yi Anɑɑniɑs, k u kuɑ k jii u nii k yii u pɑɑk ɑ wuu jik ii lɑɑt.»
44009013	K Anɑɑniɑs jiin ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, niib bonciɑnn e piɑk juɑ nɑ po, k jikt sɑɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ kul k u tuun bonbiil k tien ɑ mɔnŋ niib Selusɑɑlenm.
44009014	U dɑɑn gɑɑl yiikuo mɑnntieb yudɑnm buol ni, k bɑɑl nnɑ, ɑ wun suol wun nbɑ kul yi ɑ sɑnn.»
44009015	Ŋɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin i sɑɑ wɑɑ. Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ k n lukt’ɔ ɑ wuu tuun n tuonn, k te k buolgɑnu nɑn b kpɑnbɑlɑ nɑn Islɑɑeltieb n bɑnn n sɑnn,
44009016	k n mɔnŋ sɑɑ wɑnn’ɔ muksuk nbɑ kul k u sɑɑ di n pɑɑk.»
44009017	Ŋɑnn e k Anɑɑniɑs sɑɑn kuɑ ŋɑɑk nɑ ni, k yii u nii Sɔul pɑɑk ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «N nɑɑ bik Sɔul, Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu e tun’n. Ŋuɑ e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k ɑ dɑɑn bɑɑt nnɑ k tɑn lɑ’u sɔnu pɑɑk nɑ, k u tun’n ɑ n tɑn te k ɑ i jik i lɑɑt k biɑ gbie yent nɑn Foŋɑnm.»
44009018	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k siɑl tɑbt u ninbinɑ ni k bɑɑ, k nɑɑn nɑn jɑnwɔkɑ nɑ, k u ji lɑɑt jik, k fiil set, k b wul’ɔ Yennu nyunwulu.
44009019	Ŋɑnn e k u dii jiet k pɑnŋ jen. Sɔul din lɑkn be nɑn Yiesuweilɑ nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnle nɑ Dɑɑmɑɑs,
44009020	k din sɑɑn yiɑn ɑ, Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, k muɑntl Yiesu po, ɑ Yiesu kpɑn set tie Yennu Bijɑ e.
44009021	Bin nbɑ kul din gbɑt u muɑnti mɑnŋ, l din tien’m yɑɑl-lituk o, k b boi ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ kɑɑ dɑɑn muks bin nbɑ yi Yiesu sɑnn Selusɑɑlenm nɑ ɑɑ? U yɑɑn k bɑɑl ɑ wun suol k lol Yiesuweilɑ, k ŋmɑt nɑn’m k sɑɑ tul’b Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm kɑɑ nɑ ɑɑ?»
44009022	Ŋɑɑn k Sɔul muɑnti mɑnŋ biɑ lek ŋɑnmt k puki nɑn yiikuo, k Suifnbɑ nbɑ be Dɑɑmɑɑs nɑ k fit jiin’ɔ siɑl, yuo nbɑ k u wɑnt nɑn Yiesu e set tie Klistu k bilsuk kɑɑ nɑ.
44009023	K dɑɑ bonciɑnn tɑn gɑl, k Suifnbɑ nɑ lɑkn lieb k lol lol ɑ bin kpi Sɔul,
44009024	ŋɑɑn suɑ tɑn kumi’ɔ bɑɑ loln u pɑɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ. Yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk k b din guu duo mɑnŋ tɑnmɔi e bonŋɑnn ɑ bin kpi’u, K suɑ tɑn kumi’ɔ bɑɑ loln u pɑɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ,
44009025	ŋɑɑn nyɑyeunŋ k u wei-nɑn-lieb tɑn jii’u k tien’ɔ cibuk ni, k nyinn’ɔ duo mɑnŋ juonfɔnn ni, k sikn’ɔ tinŋ ni.
44009026	Sɔul nbɑ din bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm, u din yɑbl u mɔnŋ pɑɑk ɑ wun lɑkn nɑn Yiesuweilɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn k b k tien yɑdɑ nɑn u ji tie Yiesuweilɔ e, k tiin’ɔ jɑŋmɑɑni.
44009027	K Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs din tɑn bɑɑl u sonml, k jii’u k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ tuomiinbɑ nɑ buol ni, k kɑt wɑnn’b biɑnŋ nbɑ k Sɔul dɑɑn lɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɔnu ni, nɑn wɑɑ pɑk nɑn’ɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ. U biɑ din ŋɑnm k wɑnn’b Sɔul nbɑ din muɑntl Yiesu po nɑn pɑlcienn Dɑɑmɑɑs biɑnŋ nbɑ.
44009028	Ŋɑnn e k Sɔul din lɑkn be nɑn’m, k b din kɑk k lin Selusɑɑlenm kul po, k muɑntl Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn ni nɑn pɑlcienn.
44009029	U biɑ din piɑk nɑn Suifnbɑ nbɑ piɑk Glek mɑɑn nɑ k jikt sɑɑ Yiesu po, ŋɑɑn b din noi nɑn’ɔ, k kol ɑ bin kpi’u.
44009030	Ŋɑɑn yuo nbɑ k Yiesuweilɑ bɑnn nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b jii Sɔul k sik nɑn’ɔ Sesɑɑle, k te k u sɑɑn Tɑɑls.
44009031	Ŋɑnn e k Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be Suude nɑn Gɑɑliile nɑn Sɑɑmɑɑli nɑ ji k lɑɑt muksuk u, k ŋɑnmt k tumi Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn, k tie yentinnɑ, k Foŋɑnm sonml ni k b puki.
44009032	L puolpo e k Piɑl din yek lin siɑl kul po, k biɑ din tɑn sik ɑ wun gɔn Yennu niib nbɑ be Liidɑ nɑ.
44009033	Lenŋ e k u din sɑɑ lɑ jɑsuɑ nnɑ, k u sɑnn yi Ene, k u din ponŋ tie gbɑnɑnkpienn dɑɑnɔ e, k din k fit fi u duɑnu ni teee nɑn binɑ ŋɑnniin.
44009034	K Piɑl tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ene, Yiesu Klistu te k ɑ pɑɑk ɑ. Fiit k ŋɑnm ɑ duɑnu.» L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u fiil.
44009035	Liidɑ nɑn Sɑɑlɔn doi niib kul nbɑ din lɑ’u k u pɑɑk nɑ, k b kpɑnt tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑb.
44009036	Puosuɑ mun din be Sope, k u sɑnn yi Tɑɑbiitɑ, ŋɑɑn Glek mɑɑn ni, b din yi’u Dɔlkɑɑs, k l pɑɑk tie pɑmɔnɔ. U din tie Yiesuweilɔ e, k din tuun tuonŋɑnɑ bonciɑnn k tien niib, k biɑ din sonmt tɑlɑs-dɑnm.
44009037	L yuo nɑ dinn k yiɑlu din suol’ɔ k u kpo, k b din jii’u k wul’ɔ, ŋɑɑn jii’u duo nɑn’ɔ dituɑtuk ni k bil’ɔ.
44009038	Sope mun din k fɔk nɑn Liidɑ sɑɑn, k Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ din be Sope din gbɑt nɑn Piɑl be Liidɑ, k b tun jɑb bɑnle u buol ni ɑ bin yet’ɔ ɑ: «T bɑln’mɑ. Kɑkt bɑɑl yiɑn yiɑn nɑ.»
44009039	K u fiil k b jen nɑn’ɔ. Wɑɑ bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, k b jii’u k duo nɑn’ɔ dituɑtuk mɑnŋ ni. K pɑkɔi din be dieok nɑ ni, k b kul ŋɑɑ lint Piɑl ɑ, ŋɑɑn mɔ, k jikt b liɑtɑ nɑn b cincenɑ k wɑnt’ɔ, k yien ɑ: «Dɔlkɑɑs nbɑ tuu be u mɑnfuol ni k nyɑl lin nbɑ k tien’t e nɑ.»
44009040	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl nyinn b kul ɑ dieok nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn gbɑɑn tinŋ ni, k miɑl Yennu ŋɑɑn tɑn ŋmɑnt kpiemɔ nɑ pɑɑk k yiin ɑ: «Tɑɑbiitɑ, fiit.» K u munt u nuni k lɑ Piɑl, k ji fiil k kɑl.
44009041	K Piɑl dɔnn k suol u nuu k fiin senn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn yiin Yennu niib nɑn pɑkɔi nɑ, k tɑn jii’u k wɑnn’b nɑn u jen u mɑnfuol ni wɑɑ.
44009042	K l lɑbɑɑl din yɑt sɑɑn Sope kul po, k niib bonciɑnn din tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑdɑ.
44009043	K Piɑl ji din biɑl be Sope dɑɑ bonciɑnn, k din be jɑsuɑ nbɑ tie gbɑnfebltuɑ nɑ ŋɑɑk ni e, k b yi’u Siimɔn.
44010001	Tɔn, jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be Sesɑɑle, k u sɑnn yi Kɔlnɑi. U din tie sejenm yudɑɑnsuɑ e u pɑɑbu ni. K l pɑɑbu k b yi Itɑɑli pɑɑbu.
44010002	U din tie Yenjiɑnt-tuɑ e, k ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb kul ɑ din jiɑntl Yennu. U din sonmt Suifnbɑ ni tɑlɑs-dɑnm bonciɑnn, k biɑ din mei Yennu yuo kul.
44010003	L din tɑn tie nɑn yenlekl kut muntɑ yuo nɑ e, k u lɑ Yennu mɑlɑkɑ yelntu ni pieee, k u kuɑ u dieok ni k tɑn yiin ɑ: «Kɔlnɑi.»
44010004	Kɔlnɑi nbɑ din got lɑ mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ nɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol’ɔ, k u yet ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, bee?» K mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ jiin ɑ: «Yennu gɑɑl ɑ miɑlu wɑɑ, k biɑ gɑɑl ɑ ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ tuonɑ nbɑ k ɑ tuun k tien tɑlɑs-dɑnm, k biɑ tiɑn ɑ po.
44010005	Mɔtɑɑnɑ, tumn nisiɑb Sope, k bin sɑɑ yiin jɑsuɑ nbɑ k b yi’u Siimɔn, k u sɑnn biɑ tie Piɑl nɑ.
44010006	U tie sɑɑmɔ e k be gbɑnfebltuɑ nbɑ k b yi’u Siimɔn nɑ ŋɑɑk ni, k u ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ kpiɑ nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nɑ.»
44010007	Mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ din pɑk nɑn’ɔ nɑ ji din yɑɑt, k Kɔlnɑi ji yiin u ŋɑɑtuontunnɑ bɑnle nɑn sejesuɑ nnɑ, wun nbɑ din tie Yenjiɑnt-tuɑ, k tie u kpɑɑkyenɔ nɑ.
44010008	Wɑɑ yet’b lin nbɑ kul tien mɑnŋ puolpo e, k u tun’m Sope.
44010009	Lɑɑ yent, k b sɑɑ, k sɑɑ pel Sope. L yuo nɑ k Piɑl mun duo dituɑtuk pɑɑk yensuuk ni, ɑ wun miɑl Yennu
44010010	K kon din tɑn gbɑt’ɔ, k u ji luon wun di jiet, k b dɑɑ tie jiet siil, k u lɑ yelntu.
44010011	U lɑ k sɑnpɑɑpo luot k bonsiɑl nnɑ nɑɑn cincenn k nyii sɑnpɑɑpo, k siɑl diɑ l mɔgbɑnɑ ŋɑnnɑ k siknt tinŋ ni,
44010012	k u lɑ bonkobt, bonfulinkɑ, nɑn bon-yuyukt buolu kul,
44010013	k u gbɑt kunkɔl yiin ɑ: «Piɑl, fiit k kpi’b k ŋmɑn.»
44010014	Ŋɑɑn k Piɑl jiin ɑ: «O, O, O, Yonmdɑɑnɔ, nnɑ kɑɑ. N k mi dii t kuɑt.»
44010015	K kunkɔl nɑ biɑ ŋɑnm yet’ɔ ɑ: «Lin nbɑ k Yennu kpint’l ɑ l k kuɑ, dɑɑ yien ɑ l kuɑ.»
44010016	L din tien nnɑ k sɑɑ jɑnŋ tɑɑl muntɑ, k b jiin bont mɑnŋ sɑnpɑɑpo.
44010017	Piɑl nbɑ duki yelntu nɑ pɑɑk po nɑ, k suɑ Kɔlnɑi tuomi nɑ boi Siimɔn ŋɑɑk nbɑ be siɑn nbɑ po, k b bɑɑl ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ tɑnmɔb ni, k set,
44010018	ŋɑɑn yiin k boi ɑ: «Suɑ be nnɑ, k u sɑnn tie Siimɔn k b biɑ yi’u Piɑl ii?»
44010019	Piɑl nbɑ lek kol ɑ wun bɑnn yelntu mɑnŋ pɑɑk nɑ, k Foŋɑnm yet’ɔ ɑ: «Gotl, jɑb bɑntɑ be nnɑ k luon’ɑ.
44010020	L pɑɑk, fiit k sik, k dɑɑ bils nɑn ɑ sɑɑn nɑn’m, k mɑɑn min e tun’m.»
44010021	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl sik, k yet jɑb nɑ ɑ: «Min e k i luon nɑ. Bee tien k i bɑɑl i?»
44010022	K b jiin ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ Kɔlnɑi e tun’t. U tie sejenm yudɑɑnɔ e, k u tie nibulcimɔ e biɑk, k jiɑntl Yennu k Suifnbɑ kul tien’ɔ nibɑɑkl. Tɔn, Yennu mɑlɑkɑ won bɑɑl yet’ɔ ɑ wun yiin’ɑ k ɑ bɑɑl u ŋɑɑk ni, k wun tɑn gbɑt lin nbɑ k ɑ sɑɑ pɑk k tul’ɔ.»
44010023	K Piɑl fɑn yiin jɑb nɑ k kuɑn’m, ɑ bii be k sɑn-nyiɑɔk n yent ɑ. K l tɑn yent k u tien siil, k b sɑɑ, k Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ din be Sope nɑ, k b siɑb ciɑn’ɔ.
44010024	L dɑɑl din tɑn bɔnn yent e, k b bɑɑl Sesɑɑle, ŋɑɑn suɑ k Kɔlnɑi ponŋ yiin u nɑɑtɑɑni nɑn u yuɑsnbɑ, k b kul ji kɑl guu Piɑl bɑɑlu.
44010025	Piɑl nbɑ din tɑn bɑɑl ɑ wun kuɑ yuo nbɑ, k Kɔlnɑi cet’ɔ tɑnmɔb ni, k gbɑɑn, k puki’ɔ.
44010026	Ŋɑɑn Piɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fiit, k mɑɑn n tie nifosɑɑlk e,» ŋɑɑn fiin’ɔ senn’ɔ.
44010027	Wɑɑ din piɑk nɑn Kɔlnɑi ŋɑɑn kuɑ ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni nɑ, k u lɑ niib bonciɑnn tikl k guu’u.
44010028	K u yet’b ɑ: «I mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mun mi nɑn tinm Suifnbɑ sennu k cɑb’t nɑn tin sɑɑn gɔn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ, ɑmi k tɑɑn nɑn’m, ŋɑɑn Yennu wɑnn’n ɑ n dɑɑ yien nisuɑ, wɑɑ k tie Suif nɑ pɑɑk.
44010029	L pɑɑk, fɑɑ yiin’n nɑ, n bɑɑl, k k bils. Ŋɑnn e k n boi’ɑ mɑɑ n lɑɑn bee tien k ɑ tun k yiin’n i?»
44010030	K Kɔlnɑi yet’ɔ ɑ: «L dɑɑn tie nnɑ yuo e dinnɑ dɑɑl, k n dɑɑn mei Yennu n ŋɑɑk ni kut muntɑ yuo yenlekl. L yuo nɑ k n lɑ k nisuɑ nnɑ sie k liɑ liɑtfuouk nbɑ nyili n tuɑnn po,
44010031	k yet ɑ: ‹Kɔlnɑi, Yennu gbɑt ɑ miɑlu wɑɑ, k biɑ tiɑn ɑ ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ tuonɑ po.
44010032	L pɑɑk, tumn suɑ Sope, k wun sɑɑ yiin wun nbɑ k b yi’u Siimɔn, k u sɑnn biɑ tie Piɑl nɑ. U tie sɑɑmɔ e, k be gbɑnfebltuɑ Siimɔn ŋɑɑk nbɑ kpiɑ nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nɑ.›
44010033	K l pɑɑk e, k n dɑɑn tun ɑ po yiɑn ɑ nɑ, k ɑ mun tien bonŋɑnn k bɑɑl nɑ. Mɔtɑɑnɑ, t kul ɑ be Yennu tuɑnn, k ji guu ɑ t gbɑt lin nbɑ kul k Yonmdɑɑnɔ tul’ɑ mɔb ɑ ɑ pɑk tul’t nɑ.»
44010034	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl piin pɑku k yɑɑ ɑ: «N ji bɑnn nɑn l tie mɔni e nɑn Yennu set k mɔk luktn,
44010035	ŋɑɑn nibuolu kul ni, dɑɑnsuɑ nbɑ tien’ɔ bɑɑkl, k biɑ tuun wɑɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ, ŋuɑ e gbuot Yennu nunm.
44010036	I mi nɑn Yennu din tul Islɑɑeltieb u mɑɑn nbɑ wɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ po, ɑ Yiesu Klistu ni e k tinm nɑn Yennu mɑnŋ nɑn lieb. Ŋuɑ Yiesu Klistu e tie t kul Yonmdɑɑnɔ.
44010037	I ponŋ mi lin nbɑ din tien Gɑɑliile nɑn Suude tini kul ni, Sɑn nbɑ din muɑnt Yennu mɑɑn k wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ puolpo.
44010038	I mi biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu din tul Yiesu, Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ, Foŋɑnm nɑn yiikuo nɑ. I biɑ mi biɑnŋ nbɑ k u din lin k tuun tuonŋɑnɑ, k biɑ te k bin nbɑ kul be pol yiikuo k yiɑl nɑ lɑ pɑɑku, k mɑɑn Yennu be nɑn’ɔ.
44010039	K t lɑ tuonɑ kul nbɑ k u tun Suifnbɑ tingbounŋ ni nɑn Selusɑɑlenm, k t tie u siɑlɑɑdɑnm. K b kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk k u kpo,
44010040	ŋɑɑn k Yennu din fiin’ɔ kuun ni dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl, k te k t lɑɑt’ɔ.
44010041	Ŋɑɑn niib kul kɑɑ wɑɑ din lɑɑt’ɔ. L din tie tinm nbɑ k Yennu ponŋ din lukt’t ɑ tii tie u siɑlɑɑdɑnm nɑ e din lɑɑt’ɔ, k biɑ din tuu di k nyu nɑn’ɔ u kuun fiilu puolpo mɑnŋ.
44010042	K u tul’t mɔb ɑ tii muɑntl kii tien niib ɑ Yiesu e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k Yennu nyinn senn’ɔ ɑ u tie fuotb nɑn kpienm bɑlbuulɔ.
44010043	Yennu sɔkniinbɑ kul din tuu piɑk u po, k yien ɑ suɑ kul nbɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ, sɑɑ lɑ nyikcɑbu Yiesu mɑnŋ sɑnn ni.»
44010044	Piɑl nbɑ din dɑɑ piɑk nɑ, k Foŋɑnm sik kuɑ bin nbɑ kul din gbiintl mɑɑn mɑnŋ ni.
44010045	K Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ tie Suifnbɑ k nyii Sope k ciɑn Piɑl nɑ, k l tien’m bɑktnɔunŋ nɑn Yennu nbɑ jii u piini nbɑ tie u Foŋɑnm, k tul bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ mun nɑ,
44010046	k mɑɑn b gbiɑ k b piɑk bɑlgɑni k dont Yennu sɑnn. Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl yet ɑ:
44010047	«Niib nɑ gɑɑl Foŋɑnm, nɑn tɑɑ mun din gɑɑl nɑ e. Suɑ be nnɑ k sɑɑ bel’t ɑ t dɑɑ wuul’b Yennu nyunwulu uu?»
44010048	ŋɑɑn tul mɔb ɑ bin wul’b Yennu nyunwulu Yiesu Klistu sɑnn ni. Ŋɑnn e k b din guɑl Piɑl ɑ wun biɑl nɑn’m nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnle nnɑ, k u biɑl.
44011001	L yuo nɑ k tuomiinbɑ nɑn Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be Suude lokl kul po nɑ din gbɑt ɑ bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ mun tɑn gɑɑl Yennu mɑɑn.
44011002	L pɑɑk, Piɑl nbɑ din tɑn duo Selusɑɑlenm nɑ, k Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ pot punɑ nɑ yɑki nɑn’ɔ, k yien’ɔ ɑ:
44011003	«A dɑɑn sɑɑn bin nbɑ tie punjuot ŋɑɑk ni, k biɑ tɑɑn dii nɑn’m ɑ gbɑɑ.»
44011004	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl piin l pinpiik, k kɑt wɑnn’b lin nbɑ kul din tien ɑ:
44011005	«N dɑɑn be Sope k mei Yennu e k tɑn lɑ yelntu, k bonsiɑl nnɑ nɑɑn nɑn cincengbenŋl k l nyii sɑnpɑɑpo, k siɑl diɑ l mɔgbɑnɑ ŋɑnnɑ k siknt n buol ni.
44011006	K n duɑnt l nuɑk ni, k lɑ bonkobt, bonsusuot, bonfulnkɑ nɑn bon-yuyukt buolu kul ɑ.
44011007	Ŋɑnn e k n gbɑt k kunkɔl yet ɑ: ‹Piɑl, fiit, k kpi’b k ŋmɑn.›
44011008	Mɑɑ: ‹O, O, O, Yonmdɑɑnɔ, nnɑ kɑɑ. N ponŋ k mi dii t kuɑt.›
44011009	K kunkɔl nɑ biɑ ŋɑnm k yet Yendɔunŋ ni ɑ: ‹Lin nbɑ k Yennu kpint’l ɑ l k kuɑ, dɑɑ yien ɑ l kuɑ.›
44011010	L dɑɑn tien nnɑ k sɑɑ jɑnŋ tɑɑl muntɑ, k l ŋmɑt duo sɑnpɑɑpo.
44011011	«L tonton nɑ k Sesɑɑle jɑb bɑntɑ nbɑ k b dɑɑn tun’m n penŋ nɑ bɑɑl ŋɑɑk nbɑ k n be nɑ ni.
44011012	Ŋɑnn e k Foŋɑnm yet’n ɑ n sɑɑn nɑn’m k dɑɑ bils. K Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be Sope nɑ, b ni bɑnluob nbɑ be nnɑ nɑ mun ciɑn’n k sɑɑn Sesɑɑle, k t kul ɑ bɑɑl kuɑ Kɔlnɑi ŋɑɑk ni.
44011013	K u yet’t biɑnŋ nbɑ k u lɑ k mɑlɑkɑ bɑɑl set u ŋɑɑk ni k yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Tumn suɑ Sope, k wun sɑɑ yiin juɑ nbɑ k b yi’u Siimɔn, k u sɑnn biɑ tie Piɑl nɑ,
44011014	k u sɑɑ pɑk mɑɑn k tul’ɑ, k fin nɑn ɑ ŋɑɑtieb kul ɑ n lɑ fielu.›
44011015	«Tɔn, mɑɑ piin mɑɑn pɑku yuo nbɑ, k Foŋɑnm sik kuɑ b ni nɑn wɑɑ din sik kuɑ t ni l pinpiik ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
44011016	Ŋɑnn e k n tiɑl Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ din yet ɑ: ‹Sɑn ŋɑnin din wuul niib nɑn nyun e, ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin sɑɑ gbie yent nɑn Foŋɑnm e.›
44011017	Tɔn, l i tie k Yennu set pi’b u Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ nɑn wɑɑ mun din pi tinm nbɑ tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu yɑdɑ nɑ i e, k ŋɑnn, n tie ŋmee k sɑɑ yet Yennu nbɑ luon wun tun lin nbɑ?»
44011018	Bɑɑ din gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k b ji nyik b kpɑyɑkt nɑ, ŋɑɑn donn Yennu sɑnn, k yien ɑ: «Yennu te bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ mun fit mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ k lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.»
44011019	Tɔn, muksuk nbɑ din bɑɑl Etiɑnn kpinu puolpo nɑ din te k Yiesuweilɑ fiil Selusɑɑlenm k yɑt, k b siɑb din yɑɑt k sɑɑn Feniisi, nɑn Siipl, nɑn Antiɑɔs, k din muɑntl Yiesu mɑɑn k tien Suifnbɑ kuukuɑ.
44011020	Ŋɑɑn Yiesuweilɑ siɑb nbɑ din tie Siipltieb, nɑn Siilenntieb nɑ, sɑɑn Antiɑɔs, k sɑɑ muɑntl Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn k tien bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ,
44011021	k Yonmdɑɑnɔ yiikuo din be nɑn’m, k niib bonciɑnn din tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑdɑ k wɑɑ’u.
44011022	K Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm nɑ gbɑt lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ, k tun Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs ɑ wun sɑɑn Antiɑɔs.
44011023	Wɑɑ din sɑɑ bɑɑl lenŋ yuo nbɑ k lɑ Yennu nbɑ tul’b yetŋɑnm biɑnŋ nbɑ, k u lɑ pɑlpienn bonciɑnn, k din cie b pɑlɑ, k kpɑɑn b kul kpɑɑni ɑ bin jii b mɔnŋ k tul Yonmdɑɑnɔ fɑnnu.
44011024	Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs din tie niŋɑnɔ e, k mɑntk gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm nɑn yɑdɑ, k nigbounŋ bonciɑnn din tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu yɑdɑ k tien u weilɑ.
44011025	Ŋɑnn e k Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs din sɑɑn Tɑɑls, ɑ wun sɑɑ lon Sɔul.
44011026	Wɑɑ sɑɑ lɑ’u yuo nbɑ k u jen nɑn’ɔ Antiɑɔs, k b din jii binn munn k tɑɑn nɑn Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib, k wɑnt niib bonciɑnn Yennu mɑɑn. L din tie Antiɑɔs e k b din sint k pul Yiesuweilɑ ɑ: «Klistuyɑb.»
44011027	L yuo dinn e k Yennu sɔkniinbɑ siɑb din nyii Selusɑɑlenm k sik Antiɑɔs.
44011028	B yenɔ sɑnn din yi Agɑɑbuus, k Foŋɑnm ni e k u din fiil k set, k yet ɑ kon bonciɑnn tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑ tingbounŋ nɑ kul po, k kon mɑnŋ din set tɑn bɑɑ yuo nbɑ k Kluod din tie kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ nɑ.
44011029	Yuo nbɑ k Yiesuweilɑ din gbɑt ɑ kon yɑɑ lin bɑɑ nɑ, k b din dukn dudukt ɑ b sɑɑ tul sonml, k wun nbɑ fit nyɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ lek, wun tul Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be Suude nɑ.
44011030	K b din tien nnɑ, k tun Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Sɔul nɑn likli nɑ, ɑ bin sɑɑ tul Yiesuweilɑ sɑɑkɑb Suude tinŋ ni.
44012001	L yuo nɑ dinn k kpɑnbɑl Heluod din jɑk Yiesuweilɑ siɑb nɑn muksuk,
44012002	k din te k b kpii Sɑn ninjɑ Sɑɑk nɑn juk-bɑnjiɑk.
44012003	Kpɑnbɑl Heluod nbɑ bɑnn nɑn wɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ te k Suifnbɑ pɑlɑ penn nɑ, k u biɑ lek ŋɑnmt k tie nnɑ, k tɑn suol Piɑl, yosɑu nbɑ k b din mɔk jɑɑnm k di pɑɑnu nbɑ kɑɑ dɑtinŋ nɑ.
44012004	Wɑɑ suol Piɑl yuo nbɑ k u kuɑn’ɔ dɑnsɑlk, k tul’ɔ dɑnsɑlguulɑ. B din tie pɑɑbu munnɑ e k guu’u, k pɑɑbyenn kul ni guulɑ bɑnɑ e guu’u, k Heluod din duki ɑ jɑɑnm mɑnŋ puolpo e wɑɑ, k u sɑɑ nyinn Piɑl ɑ bin n bu u buut niib ni.
44012005	K Piɑl dɑɑ be dɑnsɑlk ni, ŋɑɑn k Yiesuweilɑ pɑɑ Yenmiɑlu pɑɑk u po nɑn ninmɔnn.
44012006	Tɔn, k Heluod din duki nɑn l i yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, u sɑɑ nyinn Piɑl k kpi’u, k l dɑɑl nyiɑɔk mɑnŋ k Piɑl lol nɑn jɑlt ŋɑnle, k guɑnt guulɑ bɑnle nɑ sinsuuk ni, k guulɑ mɑnŋ siɑb mun din guu dɑnsɑlk dieok nɑ tɑnmɔb.
44012007	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑlɑkɑ dɔkt, k yentu yent dɑnsɑlk dieok nɑ ni, k u sik k pɑɑpɑɑ Piɑl lokl ni k fiin’ɔ, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fiit yiɑn yiɑn.» K u fiil. Wɑɑ fiil yuo nbɑ, k jɑlt nɑ pit u nii ni k bɑɑ.
44012008	K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ yet’ɔ: «Bobnt ɑ gbɑnn, k pil ɑ tɑɑsɑɑt.» K Piɑl tien nnɑ. K u biɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Gbɑbn ɑ cincenn kii wɑɑ’n.»
44012009	K u bobn u gbɑnn k wɑɑ’u, k b nyii dɑnsɑlk dieok nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn Piɑl din k bɑnn nɑn mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ mɑnŋ, ɑ l tie mɔni e. U din mi ɑ u lɑɑt yelntu e.
44012010	K b din bɑɑl gɑl sinsinn guulɑ nɑ buol ni, k biɑ tɑn bɑɑl gɑl lieb nɑ buol, k ji sɑɑ bɑɑl kutgɑnjuontk nɑ ni, k gɑnn mɑnŋ luot l tiɑɔnŋ k tul’b, k b nyii nɑn-yel, k tɔkn sɔnu k sɑɑ, k mɑlɑkɑ nɑ tɑɑn lil bot ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ.
44012011	Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl ji yelnt bɑnn, k yet ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ e k n ji dɑɑ bɑnn nɑn l set tie mɔni e nɑn Yennu tun u mɑlɑkɑ k u bɑɑl nyinn’n Heluod nuu ni, k biɑ nyinn’n nɑn Suifnbɑ nbɑ duki ɑ bin tun’n biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ni.»
44012012	Wɑɑ bɑnn u mɔnŋ po nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ, k u sɑɑn Sɑn, wun nbɑ k b yi’u Mɑɑlk nɑ, nɑɑ Mɑɑli ŋɑɑk ni, k niib bonciɑnn ponŋ tikl lenŋ k mei Yennu.
44012013	K Piɑl kpɑɑ kpɑɑ nɑn-yel po gɑnn, k sɑpɑɑntuontunnɔ, wun nbɑ sɑnn yi Luodɑ nɑ, bɑɑl gɑnn mɑnŋ penŋ ɑ wun gbiint,
44012014	k ji bɑnn Piɑl kunkɔl, k ciɑl ŋmɑt nɑn pɑlpienn niib nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn tɑɑn ji k luot gɑnn nɑ, k yet’b ɑ: «Piɑl be nɑn-yel po.»
44012015	K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑɑtuk o mɔk’ɑ.» Ŋɑɑn k u biɑ ŋɑnmt lek yien ɑ u be, k b yɑɑ ɑ: «L tie u mɑlɑkɑ e.»
44012016	K Piɑl biɑ lek sie k kpɑɑn gɑnn nɑ, k b tɑn luot gɑnn mɑnŋ k lɑ’u, k l ji yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b.
44012017	K u donn nuu ɑ bin ŋmin, ŋɑɑn wɑnn’b biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ nyinn’ɔ dɑnsɑlk ni, k yet’b ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ mɑn k sɑɑ yet Sɑɑk nɑn Yiesuweilɑ lieb lin nbɑ nɑ po.» L puolpo k u nyik’b ŋɑɑn yɑɑt sɑɑn siɑl po.
44012018	Ŋɑnn e k l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k mukl muk dɑnsɑlguulɑ nɑ k l k jeln, k mɑɑn b k mi Piɑl nbɑ ji be siɑn.
44012019	K Heluod tul mɔb ɑ bin lon u buol, k b lon’ɔ k k lɑ’u, k u boi guulɑ mɑnŋ buboit, ŋɑɑn tul mɔb ɑ bin kpi’b. L puolpo e k Heluod din nyii Suude k sik Sesɑɑle, k yɑnn lenŋ wɑɑn ɑ.
44012020	Heluod wutuol din duo bonciɑnn Tiil nɑn Siidɔn tieb pɑɑk. B din tuu lɑɑt jiet Heluod yent ni. L pɑɑk, k b lɑkn lieb ɑ bin sɑɑn lɑ’u. Sinsinn bɑɑ bɑɑl k lɑ Blɑstus, wun nbɑ tie Heluod kɑlɑcigbenŋl nbɑ goli kpɑnbɑl nɑ dieok pɑɑk nɑ, k b mɑlk b mɔb k mɑnŋ nɑn’ɔ, k b tɑn sɑɑn Heluod buol ni k sɑɑ duo’u sindɑnt.
44012021	Ŋɑnn e k Heluod din tɑn senn dɑɑl, k tɑn liɑ u kpɑnbɑl liɑtgbenŋɑ, k nyii kɑl u nɑɑngbounŋ pɑɑk ŋɑɑn pɑk tul niib nɑ,
44012022	k niib nɑ wuus ɑ: «Nilɔ kunkɔl kɑɑ nɑ. U tie yensuɑ e.»
44012023	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu mɑlɑkɑ fɑɑ’u k mɑɑn u din k tien Yennu dontl mɑnŋ, k nɑnwubɑ kuɑ muɑ’u k u kpo.
44012024	K Yennu mɑɑn ŋɑnmt yɑt k kuɑ niib ni.
44012025	Yuo nbɑ k Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Sɔul din gbenn b tuonɑ nbɑ k b sɑɑn k tun nɑ, k b ji jii Sɑn, wun nbɑ k b biɑ yi’u Mɑɑlk nɑ, k nyii Selusɑɑlenm k ŋmɑt k kun Antiɑɔs.
44013001	Antiɑɔs duo ni e k Yennu sɔkniinbɑ siɑb nɑn wɑntesiɑb din be Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nɑ ni. Ŋɑnm e din tie Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Siimeɔn (wun nbɑ k b din yi’u Jɑbɔnŋ nɑ), nɑn Lusius, wun nbɑ din nyii Siilenn nɑ, nɑn Mɑɑnɑenn (b din lɑkn wubi Mɑɑnɑenn nɑn kpɑnbɑl Heluod e b bisn ni), nɑn Sɔul.
44013002	K dɑsiɑl k b dɑɑ din be k jiɑntl Yonmdɑɑnɔ k loln mɔi, k Foŋɑnm tɑn yet’b ɑ: «Nyint Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Sɔul, k bin tun tuonn nbɑ k n yiin’m ɑ bin tun nɑ.» K b nyinn’b.
44013003	L puolpo k b biɑ lol mɔi k miɑl Yennu k yii nii b pɑɑk ŋɑɑn cɑb’b.
44013004	Yuo nbɑ k Foŋɑnm din tun Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Sɔul k b din sik Selusi k kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ, k sɑɑ bɑɑl Sɑɑlɑɑmiinn nbɑ din be Siipl tinŋ ni nɑ,
44013005	k nyii ŋɑlunŋ ni lenŋ, k sɑɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, k muɑntl Yennu mɑɑn k tien’m. K Sɑn-Mɑɑlk din tie b kpɑɑkl k be nɑn’m.
44013006	L puolpo e k b din nyii Sɑɑlɑɑmiinn, k gɑɑl tinŋ mɑnŋ doi kul ni, k sɑɑ bɑɑl Pɑɑfuos. Lenŋ e k b din lɑ nyɔkluulsuɑ, k u sɑnn yi Bɑɑl-yiesu, k u din tie Suif nilɔ nbɑ kpɑnn ɑ u tie Yennu sɔkni
44013007	U din be Siipl tinŋ ni yudɑɑnɔ buol e, k yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ sɑnn din yi Seljius Pɔulus, k u din tie yɑndɑɑnɔ e, k din yiin Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Sɔul ɑ bin tɑn pɑk Yennu mɑɑn k wun gbɑt.
44013008	Ŋɑɑn k nyɔkluulɔ mɑnŋ, wun nbɑ sɑnn din yi Eliimɑɑs, Glek mɑɑn ni nɑ, k u k sɑk’b ŋɑɑn kol ɑ wun tiɑ yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ k u dɑɑ tie Yiesu yɑdɑ.
44013009	Ŋɑnn e k Foŋɑnm fiil Sɔul ni, wun nbɑ sɑnn mun din yi Pɔul nɑ, k u got nyɔkluulɔ nɑ silll, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ:
44013010	«Fin e tie pol bijɑ, k biɑ tie tuonŋɑnɑ kul dɑtɑɑk. Fin nibiiuk nbɑ gbie nɑn kpinkpɑnni nɑ. A kɑn bɑn nyik fɑɑ tuu jii Yennu bɑlmɔni k kpintl’l fɑɑk nɑ ɑɑ?
44013011	Tɔn, Yennu nuu sɑɑ pɑɑ’ɑ k ɑ juɑn k kɑn lɑ yentu k lin yɑnn ɑ.» L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni, k wunn nbɑ bɔn bɑɑ u ninbinɑ ni, k u ji sonm k tuln, k luon suɑ n suol u nuu k dɑt’ɔ.
44013012	K yudɑɑnɔ nɑ nbɑ lɑ lin nbɑ tien nɑ, k u tien Yiesu yɑdɑ, k mɑɑn u yɑn din kuɑ nɑn lin nbɑ k u ji bɑnn k jikt sɑɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ po nɑ.
44013013	L puolpo e jik k Pɔul nɑn u wei-nɑn-lieb kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ, k nyii Pɑɑfuos k sɑɑn Pelj nbɑ din be Pɑnfiili tinŋ ni nɑ. Lenŋ e k Sɑn-Mɑɑlk din nyik’b ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm.
44013014	K b sɑɑ tuɑt k nyii Pelj, k bɑɑl Antiɑɔs nbɑ din be Piisiidi tinŋ ni nɑ. K Fuondɑɑl k b sɑɑn kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni k kɑl,
44013015	k lɑ k b lii Muois senni ni nɑn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ diɑni ni, k Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok mɑnŋ ni sɑɑkɑb yet’b ɑ bin yet Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs ɑ: «T nɑɑ wɑɑs, l i tie k i mɔk lɑbɑŋɑnn nbɑ i e k sɑɑ pɑk k tul’t, yin pɑk.»
44013016	K Pɔul fiil k set k donn nuu ŋɑɑn piin pɑku, k yɑɑ ɑ: «Yinm Islɑɑeltieb nɑn yinm nbɑ kul be k jiɑntl Yennu nɑ, gbiintl mɑn.
44013017	Islɑɑeltieb Yennu din lukt t yejɑnm k te k b yɑbt bonciɑnn, yuo nbɑ k b dɑɑ din tie sɑɑnm k be Ejipt tinŋ nnɑ, k ŋuɑ Yennu din jii u yiikuo k nyinn’b lenŋ.
44013018	K bɑɑ din be muuk ni binɑ piinnɑ k u lek suol u yɑn nɑn’m.
44013019	Ŋɑɑn l puolpo k u biil nibuolu munlole nbɑ din be Kɑɑnɑɑn tinŋ nnɑ, ŋɑɑn te k u mɔnŋ niib Islɑɑeltieb yent tinŋ mɑnŋ.
44013020	K lin nbɑ nɑ kul din wei binɑ kobiinnɑ nɑn piinŋmu. «Yuo nbɑ k b din yent tinŋ mɑnŋ nɑ, k u din tul’b yudɑnm ɑ bii bu b mɑɑn dɑɑnn nɑn yuo nbɑ k Yennu sɔkni Sɑɑmuel tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl.
44013021	K l puolpo, b biɑ din tɑn boi Yennu ɑ wun tul’b kpɑnbɑl. Ŋɑnn e k Yennu din lukt Sɔul, wun nbɑ din tie Kiis bijɑ, Bensɑɑmen buolu ni nilɔ nɑ, ɑ wuu tie b kpɑnbɑl, k u din dii nɑɑn mɑnŋ binɑ piinnɑ.
44013022	K Yennu din tɑn liɑt’ɔ u nɑɑn ni, ŋɑɑn dinn Dɑɑfiid ɑ wuu tie b kpɑnbɑl jik. Nnɑ e k Yennu din pɑk Dɑɑfiid po ɑ: ‹N bɑnn nɑn Dɑɑfiid, wun nbɑ tie Sese bijɑ nɑ, mɑntk gbuot n nunm, k u sɑɑ tun lin nbɑ kul k n luon nɑ.›
44013023	«Juɑ nɑ yɑɑbuonɑ ni e, k Yennu din nyinn t Fietuɑ Yiesu, k tien’ɔ Islɑɑeltieb ni, nɑn wɑɑ din senn mɔsonn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
44013024	Ŋɑɑn Sɑn wun nbɑ din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ e din dɔnŋ bɑɑlu k din muɑntl tien Islɑɑeltieb kul ɑ, ɑ bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, k wun wul’b Yennu nyunwulu.
44013025	U tuonn nbɑ ji din tɑn gbent nɑ, k u boi’b ɑ: ‹I duki mi ɑ n tie ŋmee? N k tie wun nbɑ k i guu’u k u sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ kɑɑ. Gotl mɑn, ŋuɑ e yɑɑ wun tɑn bɑɑl n puolpo, k n kii ŋɑn nɑn k n pit u tɑɑsɑɑt.› »
44013026	Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul biɑ yɑɑ ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, yinm nbɑ tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ, nɑn i kul nbɑ be nnɑ k jiɑntl Yennu nɑ, mɑɑn nbɑ k Yennu tul’t k l wɑnt fielu mɑnŋ po nɑ, l bɑɑl t buol ɑ.
44013027	Niib nɑ nbɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm, nɑn b yudɑnm nɑ, b din k mi Yiesu nbɑ tie wun nbɑ, k biɑ k bɑnn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn nbɑ k b tuu lii Fuondɑɑl kul nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn bɑɑ din bu u buut k yɑɑ u ŋɑn nɑn kuun e nɑ, b din gbien Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mɔi mɑnŋ ɑ.
44013028	B din k lɑ u bisiɑt nbɑ tie lin nbɑ k b yɑɑ bin kpi’u, ŋɑɑn lek biɑ yɑɑ ɑ Piilɑɑt n kpi’u.
44013029	Bɑɑ din tien Yiesu lin nbɑ nɑ kul gbenn nɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ din wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l yuo k b kpɑɑt’ɔ dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk k sikn’ɔ k pii’u kɑɑɔk ni,
44013030	ŋɑɑn k Yennu fiin’ɔ kuun ni.
44013031	Dɑɑ bonciɑnn ni k Yiesu din jii u mɔnŋ k wɑnn nɑn u be mɑnfuol ni k tul bin nbɑ din tuu tɔki nɑn’ɔ k nyi Gɑɑliile, k lin tieee k tɑn gbenn k bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm nɑ. B ji tie u siɑlɑɑdɑnm mɔtɑɑnɑ k tien t niib.
44013032	«T mɔnŋ mɔnŋ e bɑɑl nɑn lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ. Mɔsonn nbɑ k Yennu din senn k tul t yejɑnm nɑ,
44013033	wɑɑ din fiin Yiesu kuun ni nɑ, u ji gbien mɔsonn mɑnŋ. Nnɑ e k l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni, yɑni nbɑ tie munle nɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nuɑk ni, ɑ ŋuɑ Yennu yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Fin e tie n Bijɑ, k lɑɑ jii dinnɑ k sɑɑ n tie ɑ Bɑɑ e.›
44013034	Yennu din yet ɑ u sɑɑ fiin’ɔ kuun ni k u gbɑnɑnt dɑɑ bɑt, k yet ɑ: ‹Mɔsonɑ nbɑ k n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ din senn, k yɑɑ ɑ n sɑɑ tul Dɑɑfiid nɑ, sie k n set gbenn tul’ɑ.›
44013035	Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni siɑl buol l yet ɑ: ‹A kɑn sɑk k ɑ Niŋɑnɔ gbɑnɑnt n kpɑkn kɑɑɔk ni k bɑt.›
44013036	Tɔn, Dɑɑfiid din tun lin nbɑ k Yennu din luon nɑ, k l puolpo k u din tɑn kpo, k b pii’u u yejɑnm kɑɑɔk ni, k u gbɑnɑnt bɑt.
44013037	Ŋɑɑn Yennu nbɑ din fiin Yiesu kuun ni nɑ, ŋuɑ yɑɑ gbɑnɑnt k bɑt kɑɑɔk ni.
44013038	«L pɑɑk ɑmi, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, n luon k i bɑnn nɑn Yiesu nbɑ din tun lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk e k Yennu nyikt cɑbt i biit.
44013039	Yiesu pɑɑk e k Yennu ji yet ɑ wun nbɑ kul tien yɑdɑ nɑ tie niŋɑnɔ bonɑ kul ni bɑnnu nbɑ k Muois senni din k fit tun k tul’i ni.
44013040	«L pɑɑk, suot i mɔnŋ mɑn k dɑɑ te k Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nbɑ din yet lin nbɑ nɑ k lin tɑn di’i ni. Nnɑ e k Yennu din yet ɑ:
44013041	‹Gotl mɑn yinm jɑpɑdɑnm nɑ, ŋɑɑnt k lin bɑkt’i k yin bot. K mɑɑn n sɑɑ tun siɑl i yuo nɑ gbɑɑ, k suɑ i lek i yet’i l po i e, i kɑn mi k tien yɑdɑ.› »
44013042	Bɑɑ gbenn lɑknu yuo nbɑ, k Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs din nyii Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok nɑ ni, k niib nɑ bɑln’m ɑ bin ŋɑnm jen Fuondɑɑl nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ, k tɑn wɑnn’b lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ biɑk.
44013043	K Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn, nɑn buolgɑnu bonciɑnn, bin nbɑ din lebt b jɑɑnti k wɑɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti nɑ, k b kul ɑ ji din wɑɑ Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs, k b piɑk nɑn’m k kpɑɑn’m ɑ bin yɑbl k biɑl fɑnu Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ ni.
44013044	K fuondɑliel nbɑ din tɑn bɑɑl, l din biɑl wɑɑnm-nnɑ e nɑn duo nɑ ni suɑ kul n lɑkn k gbɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn.
44013045	Suifnbɑ nbɑ din lɑ nigbounŋ tiki nɑ, k b fiin punponn, k piɑk biil Pɔul wɑnnu, k biɑ suki’ɔ.
44013046	Ŋɑɑn k Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs lek biɑ yien nɑn pɑlcienn ɑ: «L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e nɑn k tin sint pɑk Yennu mɑɑn k tul yinm. Ŋɑɑn yɑɑ yet mɑɑn mɑnŋ, k biɑ dukn nɑn i k ŋɑn nɑn i lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ, l pɑɑk e te k t ji sɑɑ bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ ni nɑ,
44013047	k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ tul’t mɔb ɑ nnɑ: ‹Min e lukt’ɑ ɑ fii tie yentu, k tul bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ, ɑ fii bɑɑt nɑn fielu kii tien tingbounŋ nɑ lokl kul po.› »
44013048	Tɔn, bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ din gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b ji mɔk pɑlpienn, k piɑk Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn K bin nbɑ k Yennu lukt’b ɑ bin lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ tien yɑdɑ.
44013049	K Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn mɑnŋ yɑt tinŋ nɑ lokl kul po.
44013050	L yuo nɑ k Suifnbɑ nɑ din fiin Antiɑɔs nɑ yudɑnm, nɑn puojɑɑnɑ nbɑ din tie yentinnɑ nɑ, wutuol, k b jɑk Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs muksuk, k bel’b nyinn’b b yent ni.
44013051	Ŋɑnn e k tuomiinbɑ nɑ din pit pit tɑɑpɑnt ni tɑnt k lu ŋɑɑn yɑɑt sɑɑn Ikoniunm.
44013052	K Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ din biɑl Antiɑɔs nɑ mɑntk din gbie nɑn pɑlpienn nɑn Foŋɑnm.
44014001	Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nbɑ din bɑɑl Ikoniunm, k b sɑɑn Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni, k pɑk bɑnnu nbɑ te k Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn tien yɑdɑ.
44014002	Ŋɑɑn k Suifnbɑ nbɑ din tie nikɑngbɑtɑ din te k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ mɔk dudukbiit k jikt sɑɑ Yiesuweilɑ po.
44014003	K Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑ ji din jii yuo bonciɑnn k be lenŋ, k ŋɑnmt piɑk nɑn pɑlcienn k jikt sɑɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ po, k u cɑb’b ɑ bii fit kii tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ, k l din wɑnt nɑn bɑɑ piɑk u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ po nɑ, l mɑɑn mɑnŋ set nyii u buol e.
44014004	K duo nɑ niib din bɔkt, k siɑb din sie Suifnbɑ puol, k lieb nɑ mun sie tuomiinbɑ nɑ puol.
44014005	Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ nɑn buolgɑnu nɑ lɑkn lieb nɑn b duo mɑnŋ yudɑnm, k duki ɑ bin tien tuomiinbɑ biɑsn k jɑɑt’b tɑnɑ,
44014006	k bɑɑ ji tɑn bɑnn nɑn b yɑɑ bin jɑɑt’b tɑnɑ nɑ, k b ciɑl sɑɑn Liistl nɑn Delb, nɑn digbɑnbis nbɑ kpiɑ kpiɑ, Liikɑoni yent ni.
44014007	Bɑɑ din sɑɑ bɑɑl lenŋ yuo nbɑ mɑnŋ, k b muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn.
44014008	K jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be Liistl k tie wɔbk. B din mɑl’ɔ k u tie wɔbk e, k k mi sonm,
44014009	k u gbiintl Pɔul muɑnti nɑ. K Pɔul got’ɔ silll, k tɑn bɑnn nɑn u mɔk yɑdɑ nbɑ sɑɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ wɑɑ,
44014010	k u yet’ɔ sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Fiit k set ɑ tɑɑ pɑɑk.» K u tɑb nɑɑt k fiil k ji sonm.
44014011	Nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ nbɑ din lɑ Pɔul nbɑ tun lin nbɑ mɑnŋ nɑ, k b ji piin yikn b mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mɑɑn ni ɑ: «T yenni sik t buol ni k kpint k nɑɑn nɑn nisɑɑli nɑ.»
44014012	K b tɑɑn yi Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs sɑnn ɑ Suus, k Pɔul mun k b yi’u ɑ Helmes, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ din tie bɑlpɑklɔ.
44014013	K b yennu Suus mɑnntuɑ nyii pociɑnfiek ni, (puociɑnfiek mɑnŋ din sie duo nɑ tuɑnn po e,) k u tɑn bɑɑl nɑn nɑɑjɑi nɑn tipuut duo nɑ tɑnmɔb ni, k ŋuɑ nɑn nibul nɑ tikl ɑ bin mɑnn mɑlunŋ k tul tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ.
44014014	Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Pɔul nbɑ din gbɑt nnɑ, k b pɑlɑ biil, k b pɑt pɑt b liɑtfɔkt, k ciɑl kuɑ nibul nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn yikn ɑ:
44014015	«Bee k i tie nnɑ? T mun tie nisɑɑli e nɑn yinm nɑ. T muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn, k yien’i ɑ yin nyik bon-yɑnɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn kii wɑɑ Yennu nbɑ fo nɑ wun nbɑ din nɑn sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nɑn lin nbɑ kul be l ni.
44014016	Yɑɑyuo ni e wɑɑ k u din ŋɑɑn k nibuolu kul din tuun b yɑmɑ ni mɔkmɔk nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ.
44014017	Ŋɑɑn yuo kul u tuun bonŋɑnɑ. U te k sɑɑk nyi sɑnpɑɑpo k bɑɑ k tien’i, k biɑ tien’i dii dijɑɑn-yuo, k gbuont’i jiet, k i lɑɑt pɑlpienn.»
44014018	Tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ din pɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn l lek din pɑɑl nɑn bin tiɑ nigbounŋ mɑnŋ k b dɑɑ mɑnn mɑlunŋ k tien’m.
44014019	L puolpo e k Suifnbɑ siɑb din nyii Antiɑɔs nbɑ be Piisiidi tinŋ ni, nɑn Ikoniunm, k bɑɑl k pɑk tunn nigbounŋ nɑ yɑn. Ŋɑnn e k nibul nɑ jɑɑt Pɔul tɑnɑ, k ji fuul’ɔ nyinn’ɔ duo nɑ ni, k mɑɑn b mi ɑ u kpo e.
44014020	Ŋɑɑn Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ bɑɑl k set lint’ɔ, k u tɑn fiil, k ŋɑnm nɑn ŋuɑ ŋmɑt duo nɑ ni biɑk. K l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs fiil k sɑɑn Delb.
44014021	K b sɑɑn k sɑɑ muɑnt Yiesu bɑlŋɑnni Delb, k dɑk niib bonciɑnn, k b tien Yiesuweilɑ. L puolpo k b ŋmɑt sɑɑ Liistl nɑn Ikoniunm nɑn Antiɑɔs nbɑ be Piisiidi tinŋ ni nɑ.
44014022	B cien Yiesuweilɑ pɑlɑ doi mɑnŋ ni, k yien’m ɑ bii kpɑnŋ i diɑ b yɑdɑ mɑnŋ nnɑ, k wɑnt’b ɑ: «Sie k t fɑbl k dii fɑlɑ bonciɑnn ɑ k tɑn kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni.»
44014023	K jiɑnti kul ni k b tuu lukt Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib sɑɑkɑb, k din mei Yennu k loln mɔi, k jikt Yiesuweilɑ nɑn b sɑɑkɑb nɑ k kubnt’b Yonmdɑɑnɔ nuu ni, wun nbɑ k b ponŋ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ.
44014024	Bɑɑ din gɑl Piisiidi tinŋ ni nɑ puolpo e, k b bɑɑl Pelj nbɑ be Pɑnfiili tinŋ ni nɑ,
44014025	k din pɑk Yiesu mɑɑn lenŋ k ji fit yen sik Atɑɑli.
44014026	Lenŋ e k b din kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ ni, k ŋmɑt sɑɑn Antiɑɔs, siɑn nbɑ k Yiesuweilɑ din miɑl Yennu ninbɑtinu po ɑ wun sonm’b b tuonn ni. K mɔtɑɑnɑ b tun tuonn mɑnŋ k gbenn ɑ.
44014027	Bɑɑ bɑɑl Antiɑɔs mɑnŋ ni nɑ, k b tikl Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nɑ, k tɑn yet’b lin nbɑ kul k Yennu tun nɑn’m, nɑn wɑɑ luot sɔnu biɑnŋ nbɑ k tul bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ ɑ bin tien Yiesu yɑdɑ k tien u weilɑ.
44014028	Ŋɑɑn k b ji din biɑl lenŋ k wei bonciɑnn nɑn Yiesuweilɑ mɑnŋ.
44015001	L yuo nɑ k nisiɑb nnɑ din nyii Suude k sik Antiɑɔs, k tɑn wɑnt Yiesuweilɑ nɑ ɑ: «L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k i pot i punɑ, nɑn Muois senni nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Ŋɑnn i kɑɑ, Yennu kɑn fiel’i.»
44015002	K Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn ŋɑnm noi nɑn lieb bonciɑnn nɑn ninmɔnn, k Yiesuweilɑ nɑ tɑn dukn k nyinn Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn b ni siɑb, ɑ bin sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm, k sɑɑ lɑ tuomiinbɑ nɑ nɑn Yiesuweilɑ sɑɑkɑb, mɑɑn mɑnŋ po.
44015003	Tɔn, k Antiɑɔs Klistuyɑb nɑ tul’b sɔnu k biɑ cɑb’b sɔnu, k b sɑɑ k sɑɑ gɑl Feniisi nɑn Sɑɑmɑɑli yɑkɑ po, k muɑntl bɑnnu nbɑ k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ siɑb nyik b bonkpelɑ ŋɑɑn tien Yiesu yɑdɑ, k lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ din tul Yiesuweilɑ kul pɑlpienn k sɑɑ yɑkl.
44015004	Bɑɑ bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm yuo nbɑ, k Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nɑn b sɑɑkɑb nɑn tuomiinbɑ nɑ din gɑɑl’b sɑɑɔnŋ. Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs yet’b lin nbɑ kul k Yennu tun nɑn’m.
44015005	Ŋɑɑn k Yiesuweilɑ nɑ siɑb nbɑ tie Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ fiil set, k yet ɑ: «L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ n pot b punɑ, ŋɑɑn biɑ diɑ Muois senni.»
44015006	L pɑɑk, k tuomiinbɑ nɑn sɑɑkɑb nɑ lɑkn lieb, ɑ bin dukn mɑɑn mɑnŋ po.
44015007	Ŋɑnn e k b din pɑk wei nɑn lieb, k Piɑl tɑn fiil k yet ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, i mi nɑn yuo nbɑ din gɑl nɑ, Yennu din lukt’n ɑ n muɑnt Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn k tul bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ, ɑ bin gbɑt’l k biɑ tien yɑdɑ.
44015008	K Yennu nbɑ mi nisɑɑlk pɑl ni nɑ, ŋuɑ e din tul’b Foŋɑnm nɑn wɑɑ kpɑn din tul’t nɑ, k l wɑnn nɑn u mun gɑɑl’b.
44015009	U k mɔk luktn tinm nɑn ŋɑnm sinsuuk ni k mɑɑn u wuul b pɑlɑ ni, bɑɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
44015010	L pɑɑk, bee k i luon k i bikn Yennu, yɑɑ luon k i te k buolgɑnu nbɑ tie Yiesuweilɑ nɑ n diɑ senni nbɑ k tinm nɑn t yejɑnm din k fit diɑ gbɑɑ?
44015011	Ŋɑɑn t tien yɑdɑ nɑn t lɑ fielu Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk nɑn bɑɑ mun lɑ’l bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.»
44015012	Ŋɑnn e k Yiesuweilɑ nɑ kul ɑ din ŋmin, ŋɑɑn ji gbiintl Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Pɔul, k b yien’m bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k Yennu din tun nɑn’m bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ sinsuuk ni.
44015013	Bɑɑ yet’b gbenn yuo nbɑ, k Sɑɑk yet’b ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, gbiintl’n mɑn.
44015014	Siimɔn yet’t biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu sint tin bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ ninbɑtinu, k nyinn niib b ni ɑ bii tie u mɔnŋ niib.
44015015	K Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn mun biɑ din pɑk nnɑ e, k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ:
44015016	‹L puolpo, n sɑɑ jen k ŋɑnm mɑɑ Dɑɑfiid ŋɑɑk nbɑ din bɑɑ nɑ, n sɑɑ ŋɑnm mɑɑ l dikpinɑ k fiin senn’l,
44015017	ɑ niib kul nbɑ tenn n fit got Yonmdɑɑnɔ, nnn, bin nbɑ kul k n yiin’m ɑ bii tie n yɑb.
