44015018	Nnɑ e k Yonmdɑɑnɔ, wun nbɑ te k b bɑnn lin nbɑ nɑ yɑɑyuo ni wɑɑ yet.› »
44015019	K Sɑɑk biɑ yet k pukn ɑ: «L tien n dudukt ni nɑn t dɑɑ jikt lin nbɑ pɑɑl k tien bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ nba nyik b bonkpelɑ k wɑɑ Yennu sɔnu nɑ pɑɑk.
44015020	Ŋɑɑn l ŋɑn k tin diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk o, k yet’b k b dɑɑ di lin nbɑ k b ponŋ mɑnn pɑtɑ, k biɑ yet’b ɑ bii so b mɔnŋ nɑn boncuncontuonɑ, k puob nɑn jɑb dɑɑ dua nɑn lieb yɑnɑ yɑnɑ k biɑ dɑɑ ŋmɑn bonkobuk nbɑ k b ŋmɑkl kpii, k biɑ dɑɑ di sɔn.
44015021	K mɑɑn yɑɑyuo ni k tɑn tuu dinnɑ b muɑntl Muois senni digbɑnɑ kul ni, k Fuondɑɑl kul b tuu lii senni mɑnŋ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni.»
44015022	Ŋɑnn e k tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ nɑn sɑɑkɑb nɑ nɑn Yiesuweilɑ nɑ kul ɑ dukn k nyinn nisiɑb b ni, ɑ bin tun ŋɑnm nɑn Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs, ɑ bin sɑɑn Antiɑɔs. Ŋɑnm e din tie Suud, wun nbɑ sɑnn din yi Bɑɑlsɑɑbɑɑs nɑ, nɑn Siilɑɑs. Jɑb bɑnle mɑnŋ din tie Yiesuweilɑ yudɑnm nɑ yenm e.
44015023	K b din tun’m nɑn kɑdɑɑɔk k diɑn ɑ: «Tinm tuomiinbɑ nɑn Yiesuweilɑ sɑɑkɑb nbɑ tie i nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑ, dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k fuont yinm t nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ k be Antiɑɔs nɑn Siili nɑn Siiliisi.
44015024	T gbɑt k t nisiɑb bɑɑl i penŋ, k piɑk’i bɑlsɑi k l dɑɑmi’i k ŋmɑt i yɑn ŋɑɑn t mun k wɑnn’b siɑl ɑ bin tɑn tien nnɑ,
44015025	k l pɑɑk e te k t tɑɑn lieb k suol k lukt nisiɑb t sinsuuk ni, k tuun’m i buol nnɑ, k ŋɑnm nɑn t yuɑsnbɑ, Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Pɔul e sɑɑ,
44015026	bin nbɑ yit b mɔnŋ sɑlk Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk.
44015027	L pɑɑk k t tun Suud nɑn Siilɑɑs ɑ bin wɑnn’i b mɔb ni ɑ lin nbɑ k t diɑn nɑ tie bɑlmɔni.
44015028	K mɑɑn Foŋɑnm nɑn tinm kul dukn nɑn l k ŋɑn k t jinn’i jik-kpiɑsl k gɑl lin nbɑ kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k t diɑn t kɑdɑɑɔk ni,
44015029	ɑ i dɑɑ di jiet nbɑ k b mɑnn pɑtɑ, k biɑ dɑɑ di sɔn, k biɑ dɑɑ ŋmɑn bonkobuk nbɑ k b ŋmɑkl kpii, ŋɑɑn kii so i mɔnŋ nɑn boncuncontuonɑ, k puob nɑn jɑb dɑɑ duɑ nɑn lieb yɑnɑ yɑnɑ. L i tie k i diɑ i mɔnŋ nnɑ, l sii ŋɑn i po. L kul i nɑ.»
44015030	Ŋɑnn e k b tun’m, k b sik Antiɑɔs, k sɑɑ lɑkn tɑɑn Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nɑ kul ɑ, k tul’b kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ.
44015031	Niib nɑ nbɑ lii kɑdɑɑɔk mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k b lɑ pɑlpienn nɑn b kpɑɑni mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
44015032	K Suud nɑn Siilɑɑs, bin nbɑ din tie sɔkniinbɑ nɑ, din wei nɑn’m k yet’b Yennu mɑɑn bonciɑnn k cien Yiesuweilɑ mɑnŋ pɑlɑ k tot’b.
44015033	B weiu mɑnŋ puolpo e, k Yiesuweilɑ nɑ cɑb’b ɑ bii ŋmɑt bin nbɑ tun’m nɑ buol ni nɑn mɑnu.
44015034	(Ŋɑɑn Siilɑɑs ŋɑnin din dukn ɑ wun biɑl Antiɑɔs e.)
44015035	Ŋɑɑn Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs biɑ din wei Antiɑɔs, k ŋɑnm nɑn lieb tumi niib k muɑntl Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn.
44015036	L din yɑnn wɑɑn k Pɔul yet Bɑlnɑɑbɑɑs ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k tin ŋmɑt k sɑɑn gɔn t nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ be digbɑnɑ kul nbɑ k t din sɑɑn k sɑɑ muɑnt Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn nɑ, k lɑɑn bɑɑ be biɑnŋ nbɑ.»
44015037	K Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs luon bin jii Sɑn-Mɑɑlk,
44015038	ŋɑɑn Pɔul din k sɑk ɑ bin jii’u, k mɑɑn u din tɑn nyik k k tuun nɑn’m yuo nbɑ k b din tɑn bɑɑl Pɑnfiili yiɑl ni.
44015039	K mɔniɑɔk din fiil Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs sinsuuk ni, k b bɔkt lieb. K Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs din jii Sɑn-Mɑɑlk, k b kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ k sɑɑn Siipl.
44015040	K Pɔul mun din lukt Siilɑɑs, k Yiesuweilɑ nɑ din jii’b k tien’m Yonmdɑɑnɔ ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ ni.
44015041	Pɔul din sɑɑn, k sɑɑ gɑl Siili nɑn Siiliisi yɑkɑ po, k cien Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib pɑlɑ doi nɑ ni.
44016001	L puolpo e k Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs din tɑn bɑɑl Delb nɑn Liistl, k lɑ Yiesuweitɔsuɑ, k u sɑnn yi Tiimuote, k u be lenŋ. U nɑɑ din tie Suif nilɔ nbɑ tie Klistuyuɑ e, k u bɑɑ din tie Glek nilɔ.
44016002	Yiesuweilɑ kul nbɑ din be Liistl nɑn Ikoniunm nɑ din pɑk Tiimuote po bonŋɑnn.
44016003	K Pɔul din luon wun jii’u k bii sɑɑ sɔni. Ŋɑɑn Suifnbɑ nbɑ din be digbɑnn kul yɑkl nɑ ni kul din mi nɑn Tiimuote bɑɑ tie Glek nilɔ e. L pɑɑk, k Pɔul din pot Tiimuote punn.
44016004	K b din sɑɑ doi ni, k muɑntl kpɑɑni nbɑ k tuomiinbɑ nɑ nɑn sɑɑkɑb din diɑn Selusɑɑlenm nɑ.
44016005	K lin nbɑ nɑ cie Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib mɑnŋ pɑlɑ b yɑdɑ ni, k b kɑnn puki dɑɑl kul.
44016006	B din luon bin sɑɑn muɑnt Yennu mɑɑn Asii tinŋ ni e, ŋɑɑn Foŋɑnm din k sɑk. Ŋɑnn e k b gɑl sɑɑn Fliiji nɑn Gɑɑlɑɑti yɑkɑ po.
44016007	Bɑɑ din tɑn bɑɑl Miisi yɑkl telk pɑɑk k b kot ɑ bin sɑɑn Biitiini yɑkl po, ŋɑɑn k Yiesu Siek din k sɑk ɑ bin sɑɑn.
44016008	Ŋɑnn e k b din gɑl Miisi yɑkl po, k sik Tloɑs.
44016009	Lenŋ e k Pɔul din lɑ yelntu nyiɑɔk, k u lɑ k Mɑɑseduɑnn juɑ, k u bɑɑl sie k bɑln’mɔ ɑ: «Puotl mɔkgbenŋl nɑ k bɑɑl Mɑɑseduɑnn yɑkl po nɑ, k tɑn sonm’t.»
44016010	Pɔul nbɑ lɑ yelntu mɑnŋ nɑ, l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k t tien siil ɑ tin sɑɑn Mɑɑseduɑnn, k mɑɑn t ji din lɑ nɑn Yennu yien’t ɑ tin sɑɑn kii sɑɑ i muɑntl Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn kii tien niib nɑ lenŋ.
44016011	Ŋɑnn e k t biɑ kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ, k nyii Tloɑs, k tɔkn bɑɑl Sɑɑmuotlɑɑs, k l yent k t bɑɑl Neɑpoliis. Lenŋ e k t nyik ŋɑlunŋ nɑ,
44016012	ŋɑɑn tuɑt k gɑl bɑɑl Fiiliip, duo nbɑ tie digbɑnsɑɑkɑl Mɑɑseduɑnn yent ni nɑ. Duo mɑnŋ din tie Luonmtieb yent e. T din be duo mɑnŋ ni k l mɑnn nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnŋɑ nɑ wɑɑ.
44016013	K Fuondɑɑl k t nyii sik duo mɑnŋ kpenu ni. T din mi ɑ Suifnbɑ Yenmiɑlu buol tie lenŋ e, k t bɑɑl kɑl k pɑk nɑn puob nbɑ tikl lenŋ nɑ.
44016014	Puob nbɑ din gbɑt t mɑɑn mɑnŋ, b yenɔ sɑnn din tie Liidi. U din nyii Tiɑtiil e k din tie cincenmunŋ nbɑ k l dɑɑɔk pɑɑl nɑ kuɑt-tuɑ, k biɑ din jiɑntl Yennu. K Yonmdɑɑnɔ din luot u pɑl ni ɑ wun gbiint Pɔul mɑɑn nbɑ k u piɑk nɑ fɑnu.
44016015	K t din wul ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb Yennu nyunwulu, k u din guɑl’t, k yet ɑ: «L i tie k i gɑɑl ɑ n set tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑdɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni e, yin bɑɑl kii be n ŋɑɑk ni.» Ŋɑnn e k u mɑbn’t k t bɑɑl kuɑ be.
44016016	Dɑsiɑl k t tɑn ŋmɑt sɑɑ Yenmiɑlu buol nɑ, k sɑpɑɑndɑɑbl nnɑ din mɔk u yonmdɑnm, k tɑn cet’t. K nɑlnbiiuk din be u ni k yent’ɔ, k nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ din tien’ɔ nin-nyuɑntuɑ. U nin-nyuɑnsn mɑnŋ ni, u din lɑɑt likli bonciɑnn k tien u dɑnm nɑ.
44016017	K u din wɑɑ tinm nɑn Pɔul k tiɑn sɑnpɑɑpo ɑ: «Jɑb nɑ tie Yɑbnt Yennu tuontunnɑ e. B muɑntl k wɑnt’i fielu sɔnu.»
44016018	U din tiɑn k yikn nnɑ k l mɑnn nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnŋɑ nɑ wɑɑ. Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul ji din tɑn miɑt nɑn u yikni mɑnŋ, k jiɑnt k yet nɑlnbiiuk nbɑ be sɑpɑɑmɔ mɑnŋ ni nɑ ɑ: «Yiesu Klistu sɑnn ni, n tul’ɑ mɔb, nyin u ni.» L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k nɑlnbiiuk nɑ nyii u ni.
44016019	U yonmdɑnm nbɑ bɑnn nɑn b liklomu sɔnu nɑ gbenn i nɑ, k b suol Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs, k dɑt’b bɑɑl nɑn’m b yudɑnm linlɑknbuol ni.
44016020	Bɑɑ bɑɑl nɑn’m Luonmtieb bɑlbuulɑ buol ni yuo nbɑ, k b yet ɑ: «Niib nɑ tie Suifnbɑ e, k bɑɑt nɑn ŋmɑtl bonciɑnn t duo pɑɑk
44016021	k wɑnt’t b kɑɑ nbɑ k t senni k cɑb’t ɑ tin gɑɑl, k mɑɑn t tie Luonmtieb e.»
44016022	Ŋɑnn e k nibul nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ mun jɑk’b k kpil’b. K bɑlbuulɑ nɑ te k b suol Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs tiɑt k fɔb k liɑt liɑt, ŋɑɑn k buo’b lɑnbɑnn.
44016023	Bɑɑ buo’b bonciɑnn k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k b ji jii’b sɑɑn kuɑn’m dɑnsɑlk, ŋɑɑn yet dɑnsɑlguulɔ nɑ ɑ wun kpɑl’b kenkenken ɑ.
44016024	Wɑɑ gbɑt b mɔb mɑnŋ, k u mun jii’b k kuɑn’m dɑnsɑlk dieok mɑnŋ ni pib pib ɑ, ŋɑɑn bɑɑn’m dɑɑt bɑɑnɑ.
44016025	K l din tɑn tie nɑn tɑnsuuni nɑ, k Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs din tɑn mei Yennu k yiin yɑni k piɑk’ɔ, k dɑnsɑl-lei nɑ ji gbiintl’b.
44016026	Yiɑn ɑ k tinŋ jek bonciɑnn k ŋɑk dɑnsɑlk nɑ fiɑkɑ. L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k tɑnmɔi luot, k jɑlt nɑn bɑɑnɑ yɑbt dɑnsɑli nɑ kul nii nɑn b tɑɑ ni, k bɑɑ bɑɑ.
44016027	L yuo nɑ k dɑnsɑlguulɔ nɑ fiil guɑn ni, k lɑ dɑnsɑlk dieok tɑnmɔi k l luot yɑɑ yɑɑ, k u dukn mi ɑ dɑnsɑli mɑnŋ kul nyii e, k l pɑɑk k u nuɑt u juk-bɑnjiɑk k luon wun kpi u mɔnŋ.
44016028	K Pɔul tiɑn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑ tie ɑ mɔnŋ dɑnŋ, k mɑɑn t kul be.»
44016029	Ŋɑnn e k guulɔ nɑ yɑɑ ɑ bin tuo muu, ŋɑɑn fɑɑl kuɑ dɑnsɑli dieok mɑnŋ ni, k gbɑɑn wuok k jekl Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs tuɑnn,
44016030	k tɑn fiil nyinn’b, ŋɑɑn boi’b ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑnbɑ, n sɑɑ tien nlee k Yennu n fiel’n i?»
44016031	K b jiin ɑ: «Tient Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu yɑdɑ, k fin nɑn ŋɑɑtieb kul ɑ sɑɑ lɑ fielu,»
44016032	ŋɑɑn pɑk Yennu mɑɑn k tul ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb kul ɑ.
44016033	L yuo mɑnŋ nyiɑɔk nɑ, k u jii’b k wuul b fiɑt nɑ. L puolpo e k b wul ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb nɑ kul ɑ Yennu nyunwulu.
44016034	K u biɑ tɑn jii Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs k sɑɑn nɑn’m u ŋɑɑk ni, k sɑɑ tul’b jiet k b dii. K ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb ji mɔk pɑlpienn k l sɑɑ yɑkl, k mɑɑn bɑɑ tien Yennu yɑdɑ k kpint k tien Yiesuweilɑ nɑ pɑɑk
44016035	L din yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk o, k Luonmtieb bɑlbuulɑ nɑ din tun sejenm dɑnsɑlguulɔ nɑ buol ni ɑ bin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑn jɑb mɑnŋ k bin sɑɑn.»
44016036	K dɑnsɑlguulɔ nɑ yet Pɔul ɑ: «Bɑlbuulɑ nɑ tun sejenm ɑ n te k fin nɑn Siilɑɑs n nyi. L pɑɑk nɑ, ii nyi mɑn kii sɑɑ nɑn lɑɑfiɑ.»
44016037	K Pɔul jiɑnt yet sejenm nɑ: «B dɑɑ k bu t buut, ŋɑɑn won buo’t lɑnbɑnn niwol ni, ŋɑɑn k t tie Luonmtieb e, k i bɑlbuulɑ biɑ won tɑɑn jii’t k lu’t dɑnsɑlk ni, k mɔtɑɑnɑ k b ji luon bin bɔl nyinn’t ii? Wɑɑ. L kɑn tien. Ŋɑɑnt k bɑlbuulɑ mɑnŋ n bɑɑl b mɔnŋ k tɑn nyinn’t.»
44016038	K sejenm nɑ ŋmɑt k sɑɑ yet bɑlbuulɑ mɑnŋ Pɔul nbɑ pɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Bɑlbuulɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ ji bɑnn nɑn Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs tie bin nbɑ k Luonmtieb cɑb’b b yiikuo nɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni ji suol’b.
44016039	L pɑɑk, k b bɑɑl Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs penŋ, k tɑn tien’m gɑfɑlɑ, ŋɑɑn nyinn’b dɑnsɑlk nɑ ni, k bɑln’m ɑ bin lek nyi b duo ni.
44016040	K Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs nbɑ siet lenŋ nɑ, k b sɑɑn Liidi ŋɑɑk. Bɑɑ din sɑɑ lɑ Yiesuweilɑ lenŋ nɑ, k b cie b pɑlɑ, ŋɑɑn yɑɑt.
44017001	Tɔn, k b ji din sɑɑ k sɑɑ gɑl Amfiipoliis nɑn Apoloni, k bɑɑl Tesɑɑluoniik. Lenŋ e k Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok din be.
44017002	K Pɔul din tɑn sɑɑn kuɑ lenŋ, nɑn wɑɑ din tuu kuɑ k tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. U din jii fuondɑɑ ŋɑntɑ e k kuɑ lenŋ, k piɑk Yennu mɑɑn nɑn niib nbɑ be nɑ,
44017003	k wɑnn’b ɑ Yennu mɑɑn nbɑ wɑnt bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk e nɑ, Klistu din sɑɑ bɑɑl k di fɑlɑ, k kpo, k biɑ fiil kuun ni k jen u mɑnfuol ni. Pɔul din yet’b ɑ: «Yiesu nbɑ nɑ e k n piɑk’i u po, ŋuɑ e tie Klistu mɑnŋ.»
44017004	K u din tɑn pɑk tunn b siɑb yɑn k b ji bɑɑl tɑɑn ŋuɑ nɑn Siilɑɑs po k wɑɑ’b. K Gleknbɑ bonciɑnn nbɑ jiɑntl Yennu nɑ, nɑn puojɑɑnɑ bonciɑnn, k b mun pukn b po k wɑɑ Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs.
44017005	Ŋɑɑn Suifnbɑ donn punponn, k lin k tikl niyin-yekɑ nbɑ be nɑ, k tɑɑnm, k te k b muk duo nɑ, k tɑn bɑɑl kpil Sɑɑsɔn ŋɑɑk, k luon Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs buol, ɑ bin nyinn’b niib ni.
44017006	Bɑɑ k lɑ’b yuo nbɑ, k b suol Sɑɑsɔn nɑn Yiesuweisiɑb, k dɑt’b bɑɑl nɑn’m duo nɑ yudɑnm buol, ŋɑɑn tiɑn yien ɑ: «Niib nɑ lin lɑbi tingbounŋ nɑ k te k mukl muk niib, k mɔtɑɑnɑ k b tɑn bɑɑl t duo nɑ,
44017007	k Sɑɑsɔn gɑɑl’b u ŋɑɑk ni, k b lin k wɑnt niib bɑlsɑɑni k biil t kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ senni, k yɑɑ ɑ Kpɑnbɑl-luɑ e mun be, ɑ k b yi’u Yiesu.»
44017008	Bɑɑ yet nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k l dɑɑmi nibul nɑ nɑn yudɑnm nɑ pɑlɑ ni bonciɑnn.
44017009	K yudɑnm nɑ te k Sɑɑsɔn-nbɑ pɑ likli ŋɑɑn k b ŋɑɑ’b.
44017010	Nyiɑɔk nbɑ tɑn bɔnn yuo nbɑ, k Yiesuweilɑ tun Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs ɑ bin sɑɑn Beele. Bɑɑ bɑɑl lenŋ yuo nbɑ k b kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni.
44017011	Lenŋ niib din mɑn k gɑl Tesɑɑluoniiktieb. B din gɑɑl Yennu mɑɑn nɑ nɑn b pɑlɑ kul, k lii Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk dɑɑl kul, ɑ bin lɑɑn Pɔul nbɑ piɑk lin nbɑ mɑnŋ, ɑ l set tie mɔni ɑmi nlee.
44017012	Ŋɑnn e k siɑb bonciɑnn tien yɑdɑ, k Glek puojɑɑnɑ bonciɑnn nɑn Glek jɑb bonciɑnn mun din tien yɑdɑ.
44017013	Ŋɑɑn Suifnbɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ din be Tesɑɑluoniik nɑ din gbɑt ɑ Pɔul biɑ muɑntl Yennu mɑɑn Beele, k b bɑɑl lenŋ, k fiin nibul nɑ wutuol, ɑ bin kpil’ɔ.
44017014	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Yiesuweilɑ nɑ te k Pɔul nɑn bin nbɑ ciɑnt’ɔ nɑ nyii k tɔkn sɔnu k bɑɑl mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn k Siilɑɑs nɑn Tiimuote ŋɑnin din biɑl Beele.
44017015	Niib nbɑ din ciɑnt Pɔul nɑ din sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ nɑn Atenn e wɑɑ, k b tɑn yɑɑ bin ŋmɑt kun, k Pɔul yet’b ɑ bin sɑɑ yet Siilɑɑs nɑn Tiimuote ɑ bin yɑbl k bɑɑl yiɑn yiɑn nɑ. K niib nɑ ji din ŋmɑt kun Beele.
44017016	Pɔul nbɑ din dɑɑ be Atenn k guu Siilɑɑs nɑn Tiimuote nɑ, k u lɑ k pɑtɑ gbie nɑn duo nɑ, k l din biil u pɑl ni bonciɑnn.
44017017	K u tuu kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni k fɑɑ lɑbɑɑl nɑn Suifnbɑ nɑn buolgɑnu nbɑ jiɑntl Yennu nɑ. K u biɑ din tuu sɑɑn b linlɑknbuol ni dɑɑ kul, k sɑɑ fɑɑ nɑn bin nbɑ bɑɑt lenŋ nɑ lɑbɑɑl.
44017018	K sɑɑkɑyɑndɑɑnsiɑb nnɑ din be, k b yi b yenm Epiikuuliɑnbɑ, k lieb mun Stoisiɑnbɑ, k b mun tɑn bɑɑl k fɑɑ lɑbɑɑl nɑn Pɔul. K b siɑb tɑn pɑk nɑn b lieb ɑ: «Bɑlfuouk dɑɑnɔ nbɑ wɑnt u mɔnŋ nɑ mun yien bee nɑ?» K b yenm mun yɑɑ ɑ: «L tɑɑn tie nɑn u piɑk digbɑngɑnɑ yenni po e nɑ.» B din yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn Pɔul muɑntl Yiesu po nɑn u kuun fiilu po.
44017019	Ŋɑnn e k b jii Pɔul k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ b sɑɑkɑb tintɑɑnkɑɑnu buol nbɑ k b din yi Aleopɑɑj nɑ, ŋɑɑn din boi Pɔul ɑ: «T sɑɑ fit bɑnn tumiipɑɑnu nbɑ k ɑ wɑnt nɑ ɑɑ?
44017020	K mɑɑn ɑ piɑk bɑlyeni, k l tie bɑlsɑɑni e t penŋ, k t luon k tin bɑnn l pɑɑk.»
44017021	(Atenn niib kul nɑn bin nbɑ din nyii tingɑni k bɑɑl k be nɑ, k b tuu jii b yuo k fɑɑ lɑbɑɑl, k biɑ gbiintl bɑlsɑɑni nbɑ juont bɑɑl nɑ.)
44017022	Tɔn, k Pɔul fiil b tintɑɑnkɑɑnu mɑnŋ ni, k set b tuɑnn, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Atenntieb, n lɑ i benu kul ni k i luon i pɑtɑ bonciɑnn,
44017023	k mɑɑn mɑɑ kɑk k lin i duo nɑ, n got i pɑtɑ, k biɑ lɑ binbintl k l diɑn l pɑɑk ɑ: ‹Yennu nbɑ k t k mi’u.› N luon k n wɑnn’i wun nbɑ k i puki k tien’ɔ ŋɑɑn k mi’u nɑ.
44017024	Yennu mɑnŋ, ŋuɑ e din nɑn dulnyɑ nɑn bont kul nbɑ be l ni. Ŋuɑ e tie sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ Yonmdɑɑnɔ, k k tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ be puociɑnfei nbɑ k niib mɑɑ ni kɑɑ.
44017025	K nisɑɑlk kɑn fit tun siɑl nɑn u nuu k tul’ɔ k lin pukn’ɔ siɑl, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien nisɑɑli kul mɑnfuol nɑn bonɑ kul.
44017026	Ŋuɑ e mun te k nibuolu kul nyii yejɑ yenɔ kuɑ ni, k biɑ te k b be tingbounŋ nɑ kul ni, k u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ din senn yuo nbɑ k nibuolu kul sii be, k biɑ tien b binbeboɑ teli.
44017027	U din tien nnɑ mɑnŋ ɑ bin lon’mɔ, ɑ k pɑsiɑl i bin tuln k tɑn nɑkn bɑnn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ Yennu set k fɔk nɑn t suɑ.
44017028	Nisuɑ din yet ɑ: ‹L tie Yennu pɑɑk e k t be k fo k tuun.› I yɑndɑnm pinpɑkt mun biɑ lek wɑnt nnɑ mɑnŋ e ɑ: ‹T biɑ tie Yennu wɑɑs e.›
44017029	Tɔn, tinm nbɑ tie Yennu wɑɑs nɑ, l k ŋɑn k tin dukn nɑn Yennu tie nɑn siɑl ɑ bonninnɑɔnŋ nbɑ tie sɑlmɑ ɑmi tɑnn nbɑ k nilɔ ŋɑnm’l nɑn u yɑn ɑmi u dudukt ni.
44017030	Yuo nbɑ gɑl nɑ, Yennu din k ŋmɑnn niib tubɑ nɑn bɑɑ din jɑnŋ nɑn tubdɑtu bɑnnu nbɑ, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ u yet suɑ kul, ɑ wun mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ,
44017031	k mɑɑn ŋuɑ Yennu ponŋ senn dɑɑl nbɑ k u sɑɑ bu tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb kul buut cib cib. U sɑɑ te k suɑ nbɑ k u lukt’ɔ nɑ n bu buut mɑnŋ, k u set fiin’ɔ kuun ni, k l tie nyinn k tul suɑ kul, ɑ u set sɑɑ tun wɑɑ senn lin nbɑ nɑ.»
44017032	Bɑɑ gbɑt k Pɔul pɑk kuun fiilu po nɑ, k siɑb lɑɑ k sɑlkt’ɔ, ŋɑɑn k siɑb mun yɑɑ ɑ: «T luon k tin ŋɑnm gbiint lin nbɑ k ɑ sɑɑ pɑk nɑ e.»
44017033	Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul din nyii ŋɑɑn nyik’b.
44017034	Ŋɑɑn siɑb mun din tɑɑ u po k tien yɑdɑ. K b ni mɑnŋ, Deniis din be. Ŋuɑ e din tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ din tuu be Aleopɑɑj tintɑɑnkɑɑnu ni. K puosuɑ mun din be b ni, k u sɑnn yi Dɑmɑlis. K lieb mun din be k pukn’m.
44018001	L puolpo e k Pɔul din nyii Atenn k sɑɑn Kuolent.
44018002	Lenŋ e k u din sɑɑ lɑ Suif nisuɑ, k u sɑnn yi Akiilɑɑs, wun nbɑ k b din mɑl’ɔ Pɔn, k ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑpuo Pliisiil nyii Itɑɑli k bɑɑl Kuolent, k mɑɑn kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Kluod din tul mɔb ɑ Suifnbɑ kul n nyi Luonm. Bɑɑ be Kuolent nɑ, l dɑɑ k wei, k Pɔul din tɑn bɑɑl b ŋɑɑk ni,
44018003	ɑ wuu be nɑn’m, k mɑɑn b kul din jikit bonkobt gbɑnt e tie ŋei.
44018004	K Fuondɑɑl kul, u tuu kuɑ yenjiɑntu dieok ni, k gbɑɑ ɑ Suifnbɑ nɑn Gleknbɑ n gbɑt l pɑɑk kii wɑɑ Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn.
44018005	Siilɑɑs nɑn Tiimuote nbɑ din tɑn nyii Mɑɑseduɑnn k bɑɑl yuo nbɑ nɑ, k Pɔul ji din jii u yuo kul k muɑntl Yiesu mɑɑn k tien Suifnbɑ nɑ, k din wɑnt nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ Yiesu e tie Klistu nɑ.
44018006	Ŋɑɑn k b lek din k sɑk mɑɑn mɑnŋ, k suki’ɔ. Ŋɑnn e k u din pit pit u nii nɑn u tɑɑ, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «L i tie k i tɑn kɔnŋ i mɑnfuol i e, l jii i mɔnŋ mɔnŋ yulɑ pɑɑk e. N nuu kɑɑ jik. Lɑɑ jii dinnɑ k sɑɑ, sie k n nyik ŋɑɑn wɑnn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ Yiesu mɑɑn mɑnŋ.»
44018007	Ŋɑnn e k u nyik’b ŋɑɑn sɑɑn sɑɑ be suɑ ŋɑɑk ni, k b yi’u Tiitius Sustus. K u din jiɑntl Yennu. U ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ din kpiɑ nɑn Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok o.
44018008	K Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok mɑnŋ yudɑɑnɔ Kliispus nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb kul tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑdɑ, k Kuolent-tieb bonciɑnn mun din gbiintl Pɔul mɑɑn k tien yɑdɑ k b wul’b Yennu nyunwulu.
44018009	Nyɑyeunŋ o dinn k Pɔul din tɑn lɑ yelntu. K u yelntu mɑnŋ ni k Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni, ŋɑɑn kii muɑntl n mɑɑn mɑnŋ k dɑɑ nyikt,
44018010	k mɑɑn n be nɑn’ɑ, k suɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ kpil’ɑ k tien’ɑ dɑnŋ, k mɑɑn niib bonciɑnn be duo nɑ ni k tie n yɑb.»
44018011	L pɑɑk, Pɔul din be lenŋ binn nɑn ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnluob, k din wɑnt niib Yennu mɑɑn.
44018012	Tɔn, yuo nbɑ k Gɑɑliɔn din tie Akɑɑyi tinŋ nɑ yudɑɑnɔ, k Suifnbɑ din tɑn tɑɑn lieb k lek Pɔul k suol’ɔ, k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ buut buol,
44018013	k sɑɑ yet ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ tumi niib biɑnŋ nbɑ k b sii jiɑntl Yennu k l k tɑɑ nɑn t senni.»
44018014	Pɔul nbɑ din yɑɑ wun pɑk yuo nbɑ, k Gɑɑliɔn yet Suifnbɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «Yinm Suifnbɑ, l i tie k u kpii nilɔ kuo u tun biit nbɑ gbenŋ, l bo sii ŋɑn k i di suklu k gbiint,
44018015	ŋɑɑn lɑɑ tie mɑɑn nbɑ jii k jiin i mɔnŋ mɑɑn nɑn i sɑnɑ, nɑn i mɔnŋ senni nɑ i e, i mɔnŋ mɔnŋ n got l ni. N k sɑk ɑ n sɑɑ bu l mɑbuolu.»
44018016	Ŋɑnn e k u bel nyinn’b buut buol mɑnŋ.
44018017	K b suol Sositenn wun nbɑ tie Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok yudɑɑnɔ k tɑn buo’u buut mɑnŋ buol ni, ŋɑɑn k Gɑɑliɔn bɑkɑ tɑɑn kɑɑ b po.
44018018	K Pɔul din dɑɑ biɑl Kuolent ŋmɑɑli bonciɑnn. Ŋɑnn e k u din tɑn cɑb Yiesuweilɑ, ŋɑɑn kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ k sɑɑn Siili tinŋ ni k Pliisiil nɑn u sɔlɔ Akiilɑɑs din ciɑn’ɔ. Wɑɑ din tɑn yɑɑ wun kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ nɑ, u din be Senkle k te k b kuol u yut mɔsonn nbɑ k u din senn nɑ pɑɑk.
44018019	Ŋɑnn e k b din bɑɑl Efes. Lenŋ e k Pɔul din nyik Pliisiil nɑn Akiilɑɑs ŋɑɑn gɑl sɑɑn Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni, k fɑɑ lɑbɑɑl nɑn Suifnbɑ,
44018020	k b tɑn miɑl’ɔ ɑ wun biɑl nɑn’m k wei ŋɑɑn k u k sɑk.
44018021	Wɑɑ din yɑɑ wun cɑb’b k sɑɑn nɑ, k u yet’b ɑ: «L i tie k Yennu sɑk i e, n biɑ sɑɑ jen i buol nnɑ,» ŋɑɑn biɑ jin kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ k sɑɑn.
44018022	Wɑɑ tɑn bɑɑl Sesɑɑle yuo nbɑ k u tuɑt gɑl Selusɑɑlenm k sɑɑ fuont Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib ŋɑɑn gɑl sik Antiɑɔs biɑk,
44018023	k sɑɑ wei lenŋ, k biɑ tɑn nyii lenŋ k sɑɑ Gɑɑlɑɑti nɑn Fliiji yɑkɑ po, k sɑɑ cien Yiesuweilɑ kul pɑlɑ.
44018024	Ŋɑnn e k Suif jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be, k u sɑnn yi Apuoluos, k b din mɑl’ɔ Aleksɑndli, k u din tɑn bɑɑl Efes. U din tie wun nbɑ mi mɑɑn e, k din mi Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk fɑnu.
44018025	B din ponŋ wɑnn’ɔ Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɔnu e wɑɑ, k u tɑn bɑɑl k din piɑk wɑnt Yiesu po bonŋɑnn nɑn ninmɔnn, ŋɑɑn u din mi Sɑn nbɑ din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu biɑnŋ nbɑ kuukuɑ e.
44018026	K u din piin piɑk Yennu mɑɑn nɑn pɑlcienn, Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni, k Pliisiil nɑn u sɔlɔ Akiilɑɑs nbɑ gbɑt u mɑɑn mɑnŋ nɑ, k b tɑn jii’u k fiit Yennu sɔnu bonciɑnn fɑnu k wɑnn’ɔ.
44018027	L puolpo e k Apuoluos dukn ɑ wun sɑɑn Akɑɑyi. K Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ din be Efes nɑ sonm’ɔ, k diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk k tul Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be Akɑɑyi nɑ, ɑ u i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, bin gɑɑl’ɔ sɑɑɔnŋ. Wɑɑ tɑn bɑɑl lenŋ yuo nbɑ, k u set tot bin nbɑ tien yɑdɑ Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk,
44018028	k mɑɑn ŋuɑ nɑn Suifnbɑ nbɑ din tɑn noi nɑn lieb, k u din jikt Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk, k wɑnt’b ɑ Yiesu e set tie Klistu k din pɑk nɑn pɑnŋ k nyɑnn’b niwol ni.
44019001	Apuoluos nbɑ din dɑɑ be Kuolent nɑ, k Pɔul ŋɑnin din gɑl yɑkl nbɑ mɔk juɑt nɑ k sɑɑn Efes. Lenŋ e k u din sɑɑ lɑ Yiesuweisiɑb,
44019002	k boi’b ɑ: «Yɑɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ k wɑɑ’u nɑ, i mi k gɑɑl Foŋɑnm ii?» K b jiin ɑ: «Aɑi. T ponŋ tɑɑn k mi k gbɑt ɑ Foŋɑnm be kɑɑ wɑɑ gbɑɑ.»
44019003	K Pɔul boi’b ɑ: «K ŋɑnn, b wul’i wulbuol-lɑnu po e?» K b jiin ɑ: «B wul’t nɑn Sɑn nbɑ din wuul niib biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e.»
44019004	K Pɔul yet’b ɑ: «Sɑn din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu, k l wɑnt ɑ bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, ŋɑɑn yien’m ɑ bin tien wun nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ yɑdɑ, k ŋuɑ e tie Yiesu.»
44019005	Bɑɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k b ji wul’b Yennu nyunwulu Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn ni.
44019006	K Pɔul jii u nii ŋɑɑn yii b pɑɑk k Foŋɑnm sik kuɑ b ni, k b ji piɑk bɑlgɑni, k biɑ piɑk sɔknt Yennu mɑɑn.
44019007	Jɑb mɑnŋ din tie nɑn piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ e.
44019008	L din tie ŋmɑɑli ŋɑntɑ e k Pɔul ji din sɑɑn Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni, k fɑɑ lɑbɑɑl nɑn niib nɑn pɑlcienn, k yɑbi u mɔnŋ ɑ wun kpint b yɑn k jikt sɑɑ Yennu nɑɑn po.
44019009	Ŋɑɑn niib nɑ siɑb din tie tubkɑngbɑtɑ dɑnm e, k din k sɑk mɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn piɑk bɑlbiit nibul nɑ ni, k biil Yonmdɑɑnɔ weiu sɔnu. Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul nyik’b, ŋɑɑn jii Yiesuweilɑ nɑ k sɑɑn nɑn’m Tiilɑɑnus sɑkul dieok ni, k dɑɑl kul jik k u fɑɑ lɑbɑɑl nɑn niib lenŋ.
44019010	L din jii nnɑ k bɑɑl binɑ ŋɑnle. K niib kul ɑ nbɑ din be Asii tinŋ ni k tie Suifnbɑ, nɑn nilieb kul ɑ, din gbɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn mɑnŋ ɑ.
44019011	L yuo nɑ k Yennu din te k Pɔul tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ be l kuɑ.
44019012	Nnɑ e k niib din tuu jii cincenɑ nɑn nunfiɑni nbɑ sii Pɔul gbɑnɑnt nɑ, k sɑɑn tul b bɑɑtb k b yiɑli nɑ nyik’b k nɑlnbiit nyi b ni.
44019013	L yuo nɑ k Suif nisiɑb din be, k din tuu lin k nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni, k b biɑ din tuu bikn ɑ bin jii Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn kii nyint nɑlnbiit, k b din biel nɑlnbiit nɑ ɑ: «Min e tul’i mɔb Yiesu sɑnn ni, wun nbɑ k Pɔul muɑntl u mɑɑn nɑ, nyimin mɑn.»
44019014	Bin nbɑ din tuun nnɑ mɑnŋ din tie jɑb bɑnlole nbɑ din tie Suifnbɑ Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnsuɑ Sefɑ wɑɑs e.
44019015	Ŋɑɑn nɑlnbiiuk jiin k yet’b ɑ: «N mi Yiesu, k biɑ mi Pɔul po, ŋɑɑn k yinm mun, i tie ŋmee?»
44019016	K juɑ nbɑ k nɑlnbiiuk nɑ din be u ni nɑ yukl k tɑn cib’b bii, nɑn pɑnŋ, k nyɑnn’b, k tul’b dɑni, k biɑ pɑt pɑt b tiɑt, k b kul ɑ ciɑl gbɑnɑnbilɑ, k nyii u ŋɑɑk ni.
44019017	Yuo nbɑ k Suifnbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ kul ɑ nbɑ be Efes nɑ gbɑt nnɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni ji suol b kul ɑ, k b bɑɑk Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn bonciɑnn.
44019018	Ŋɑnn e k bin nbɑ din tɑn tien yɑdɑ nɑ bonciɑnn pɑk kɑt b nɔi ni biit, niib ni, k wɑnn lin nbɑ k b tuu tuun.
44019019	K linŋin dɑnm bonciɑnn ji tikl b kɑdɑɑt nɑn b sɑbɑ k bɑɑl nɑn’n, k tɑn juo muu niib kul nuni ni, k b kɑn kɑdɑɑt nɑ yɑbnt likli, k l tie likli kut binɑ tusɑ piinŋmu.
44019020	Ŋɑnn e din te k Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn ji din ŋɑnmt yɑt k kuɑ niib ni, k puki nɑn pɑnŋ.
44019021	L puolpo k Pɔul dukn ɑ u sɑɑ gɑɑl Mɑɑseduɑnn nɑn Akɑɑyi po e, k sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm, k yet ɑ: «L puolpo, l tie k n sɑɑn Luonm.»
44019022	L pɑɑk, k u tun Tiimuote nɑn Elɑst, u sonmtieb ni bɑnle, ɑ bin gɑl u tuɑnn po k sɑɑn Mɑɑseduɑnn, ŋɑɑn k u din biɑl Asii tinŋ ni.
44019023	L yuo mɑnŋ dɑɑmuk bonbiil din fiil k jikt sɑɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ weiu po.
44019024	K jɑsuɑ nnɑ mun din be k u sɑnn yi Demetlius, k u tuu jikt likli kut k din mɑɑ b yennu nbɑ k b yi’u Altemiis nɑ puociɑnfei, l bonninnɑnɑ, k l tie pɑtɑ, k u kɔi, k din jii niib k b tuun u tuonɑ, k b lɑɑt likli bonciɑnn.
44019025	Ŋɑnn e k u tɑn yiin’m k tɑɑn b kul ɑ, k biɑ tɑɑn bin nbɑ kul kul tuun l tuonbuolu nɑ, k tɑn yet’b ɑ: «N ninjɑnm, i mi nɑn t nyuɑt nyi t tuonɑ nɑ ni e.
44019026	I mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mun ponŋ gbɑt k biɑ lɑ Pɔul nbɑ yien lin nbɑ nɑ. U yɑɑ ɑ nilɔ nbɑ mɑɑ yenni nɑn u nii, ɑ ŋɑnn k tie yenni kɑɑ, k u mɑɑn nɑ tunn niib bonciɑnn yɑn Efes nnɑ k sɑɑn pel lin gbenn Asii doi kul ɑ.
44019027	Pɑsiɑl k t tuonɑ nɑ sɑnn tɑn sɑɑ kpet mɑnn biil, k biɑ jen ɑ, k t yɑbnt yennu Altemiis puociɑnfiek tɑn sɑɑ kpet mɑnn k tien yɑnn, k biɑ jen ɑ, k t yennu Altemiis nibɑɑkl tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn k wɑɑb, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k suɑ kul nbɑ be Asii tinŋ ni nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ kul ɑ jiɑntl’ɔ nɑ.»
44019028	Nibul nɑ nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k b wutuol fiil, k b tiɑn tintiɑni, k yɑɑ ɑ: «Tinm Efestieb yennu Altemiis tie yɑbnt yennu e.»
44019029	K duo nɑ kul muk. K b suol Gɑius nɑn Aliistɑɑlk k ciɑl sɑɑn kuɑ nɑn’m nibul ni. Jɑb bɑnle mɑnŋ din tie Mɑɑseduɑnn niib, bin nbɑ k Pɔul tuu tɔki nɑn’m nɑ.
44019030	K Pɔul luon k wun kuɑ niib nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn k Yiesuweilɑ k sɑk ɑ wun kuɑ.
44019031	K duo nɑ yudɑnm ni siɑb nbɑ din tie Pɔul yuɑsnbɑ din tun tuomi ɑ Pɔul n di suklu, k dɑɑ kuɑ nibul mɑnŋ ni.
44019032	L yuo nɑ, nibul mɑnŋ ni, siɑb din tiɑn tintiɑni, k yɑki kpɑyɑkt jiɑk jiɑk, k niib nbɑ tikl nɑ yɑn ŋmɑt sɑɑ gɑl, k mɑɑn b bonciɑnn din k bɑnn b lɑknu mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
44019033	Tɔn, k Suifnbɑ nyinn jɑsuɑ nbɑ k b yi’u Aleksɑndl, k senn’ɔ b tuɑnn, ɑ wun pɑk b pɑɑk k tul’b. K Aleksɑndl donn nuu sɑnpɑɑpo, ŋɑɑn ji luon wun pɑk tul nibul nɑ k nyinn Suifnbɑ mɔniɑɔk mɑnŋ ni.
44019034	Ŋɑɑn bɑɑ tɑn bɑnn nɑn u tie Suif nilɔ nɑ, k b kul ji tiɑn tintiɑni, k yien ɑ: «Tinm Efestieb yennu Altemiis tie yɑbnt yennu e.» K b kul tiɑn nnɑ k wei bonciɑnn.
44019035	L juontu k duo mɑnŋ sɑɑkuɑ te k nibul nɑ ŋmin, ŋɑɑn k u yet’b ɑ: «Yinm Efestieb, suɑ kɑɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni k k mi nɑn Efestieb e guu k goli yɑbnt Altemiis puociɑnfiek, ŋɑɑn mun guu k goli Altemiis ninnɑɔnŋ nbɑ nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k tɑn bɑɑ nɑ.
44019036	Suɑ biɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ fit noi lin nbɑ nɑ. L pɑɑk, l ŋɑn k i di suklu, k dɑɑ tie jɑti.
44019037	I bɑɑl nɑn niib nɑ nnɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn k b k jɑn t pɑtɑ bont. B biɑ k piɑk k suki’i biil t yennu.
44019038	L i tie k Demetlius nɑn u tuontunlieb mɔk mɑɑn nɑn suɑ i e, ŋɑnn buut buol ponŋ be k mɔk l dɑɑ, k buut dɑnm mun biɑ be. Ŋɑɑnt bin sɑɑn kii sɑɑ i puotl b lieb lenŋ.
44019039	L i tie k i mɔk bɑlsɑi k sɑɑ pukn, l ŋɑn k yin sɑɑn yudɑnm buol.
44019040	Setk nɑn mɔni, pɑsiɑl Luonmtieb tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn lɑ t biit, k yet ɑ t tie doyieltieb e, k jikt sɑɑ lin nbɑ tien dinnɑ nɑ po, k l k mɔk pɑɑk, k t mun biɑ kɑn fit wɑnn l pɑɑk k jikt sɑɑ dɑɑmuk nɑ po.»
44019041	U yet nnɑ e, ŋɑɑn ji yɑt niib nɑ.
44020001	L kpikpiluk puolpo e, k Pɔul ji din yiin Yiesuweilɑ nɑ, k tɑn cie b pɑlɑ, ŋɑɑn ji cɑb’b, k yɑɑt k sɑɑn Mɑɑseduɑnn tinŋ ni,
44020002	k din lin Mɑɑseduɑnn tinŋ yɑkɑ po, k biɑ pɑk Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ Yennu mɑɑn bonciɑnn k kuɑnt’b pɑlɑ, ŋɑɑn gɑl sɑɑn Gleknbɑ tinŋ ni.
44020003	U ji be lenŋ k sɑɑ jɑnŋ ŋmɑɑli ŋɑntɑ, k l puolpo, k u ji tie siil ɑ wun kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ k sɑɑn Siili, ŋɑɑn tɑn bɑnn nɑn Suifnbɑ loln lolɑ k guu’u. L pɑɑk k u dukn ɑ l ŋɑn wun ŋmɑt k sɑɑn gɑl Mɑɑseduɑnn tinŋ ni.
44020004	Piilus bik Suopɑɑtel, wun nbɑ nyii Beele nɑ, nɑn Aliistɑɑlk nɑn Sekundus, bin nbɑ nyii Tesɑɑluoniik nɑ, nɑn Gɑius, wun nbɑ nyii Delb nɑ, nɑn Tiikiik nɑn Tlofiinm, bin nbɑ nyii Asii tinŋ ni nɑ, nɑn Tiimuote, ŋɑnm e din sɑɑn nɑn Pɔul.
44020005	K b gɑl tuɑnn k ji sɑɑ guu’t Tloɑs.
44020006	Jɑɑnm nbɑ k b din tuu di pɑɑnu nbɑ kɑɑ dɑtinŋ nɑ dinu puolpo e, k t ji din kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ, k nyii Fiiliip, k sɑɑ Tloɑs. K dɑɑ ŋɑnŋmu dɑɑl k t bɑɑl b buol Tloɑs, k biɑl lenŋ k jɑnŋ dɑɑ ŋɑnlole.
44020007	Tɔn, k Fuondɑɑl dɑɑjuouk k t tikl lieb, k tɑɑn nɑn Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ, ɑ t di Yiesu mɔtɑɑɔk dinu. K Pɔul piɑk nɑn niib nɑ dik dik dik nɑn tɑnsuuni, k mɑɑn lɑɑ sɑɑ yent k wun gɑl nɑ pɑɑk.
44020008	T din tikl dituɑtuk nnɑ ni e, k b din juo fitɑ bonciɑnn lenŋ.
44020009	Nɑɑsinsuɑ nnɑ mun din be k u sɑnn yi Eotiik, k u din kɑl dituɑtuk nɑ tɑkɑlbonn pɑɑk, k Pɔul piɑk mɔkmɔk, k u kɑl tikntl, k ji tɑn guɑn k libt nyii dituɑtuk muntɑ nɑ ni, k tɑn bɑɑ tinŋ ni, k b sik jii’u, k suɑ k u kpo wɑɑ.
44020010	K Pɔul nyii dituɑtuk nɑ ni, k sonm sik tɑn fɑbn u pɑɑk k diɑ’u, ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «I dɑɑ te k i pɑlɑ biil. U fo.»
44020011	L puolpo k u ŋmɑt k duo dituɑtuk nɑ ni, k sɑɑ dii jiet. L puolpo biɑk k u piɑk nɑn lɑɑ tɑn yent k u ji nyik’b, ŋɑɑn yɑɑn yɑɑt gɑl.
44020012	Ŋɑɑn k b ji jii nɑɑsimɔ nɑ ŋɑnin, k u mɔk mɑnfuol, k b kun nɑn’ɔ nɑn pɑlpienn, k l k tie wɑɑnm-nnɑ.
44020013	L puolpo k t biɑ kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ, k dɔnŋ gɑl sɑɑn Asuos. Lenŋ e k t din yɑɑ t jii Pɔul, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ din yet’t ɑ tin cet’ɔ, k mɑɑn u din luon wun sonm tɑɑtinŋ e k bɑɑl lenŋ.
44020014	Wɑɑ din bɑɑl Asuos yuo nbɑ, k u lɑ’t, k t ji jii’u k kuɑn’ɔ ŋɑlunŋ nɑ ni, k sɑɑn Miitiilenn.
44020015	K t biɑ tɑn tuɑt lenŋ k l yent k t bɑɑl Kio. K l biɑ yent k t bɑɑl Sɑɑmuos, k dɑɑl nbɑ wɑɑ nɑ k t bɑɑl Miile.
44020016	Pɔul din k luon ɑ wun sɑɑn Efes, k mɑɑn u din k luon k wun wei Asii tinŋ ni, ŋɑɑn u din luon yiɑn yiɑn, k mɑɑn u din luon ɑ l i sɑɑ fit, wun bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm dɑjɑɑnn nbɑ k b yi Pɑntekuot nɑ.
44020017	Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul din tun tuomi ɑ bin nyi Miile duo ni, ɑ k sɑɑn Efes k sɑɑ yiin Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib sɑɑkɑb nɑ.
44020018	Bɑɑ bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, k u yet’b ɑ: «I mi n binbenŋ nbɑ tuu be biɑnŋ nbɑ, mɑɑ din sint bɑɑl Asii tinŋ nnɑ k jikt sɑɑ.
44020019	N din tuun Yennu tuonɑ nɑn sikn-n-mɔnŋ bonciɑnn, nɑn nyin-nyuut, k biɑ lɑ biknu Suifnbɑ lolɑ pɑɑk.
44020020	I biɑ mi nɑn mɑɑ din muɑntl Yennu mɑɑn k biɑ wɑnt niib ni nɑn i ŋei ni nɑ, n din pɑk’i lin nbɑ kul sɑɑ sonm’i, k k nyik k biɑ k tenn siɑl.
44020021	N kpɑɑn Suifnbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ kul ɑ bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ kii wɑɑ Yennu sɔnu, k tien t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu yɑdɑ.
44020022	«Tɔn, k mɔtɑɑnɑ Foŋɑnm e mɑb’n k n yɑɑ n sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm, ŋɑɑn n k mi lin nbɑ sɑɑ sɑɑ tien’n lenŋ.
44020023	Ŋɑɑn mɑɑ mi lin nbɑ kuukuɑ tie nnɑ e. Mɑɑ lin duo kul nɑ ni, Foŋɑnm e tuu wɑnt’n nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ dɑnsɑlk nɑn fɑlɑ tɑn sii tie n yɑl e.
44020024	Ŋɑɑn n k yi n mɑnfuol k l tie siɑl, k mɑɑn min ŋɑnin luon k n tun tuonɑ nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu tul’n nɑ e k gbenn k l tuonɑ tie k mii muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ wɑnt Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ po e.
44020025	«N din lin i kul ɑ sinsuuk ni, k muɑntl Yennu nɑɑn lɑbɑɑl. Tɔn, k mɔtɑɑnɑ, n mi nɑn i ji kɑn mi k lɑ’n biɑk.
44020026	L pɑɑk e te k n yet’i dinnɑ dɑɑl nɑ, ɑhuo, wun nbɑ kɔnŋ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ, n nuu kɑɑ lenŋ jik,
44020027	k mɑɑn n k mi k fɔlnt k ŋmɑt puolpo nɑn k n muɑnt Yennu nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ kul k wɑnn’i.
44020028	L pɑɑk, i diɑ i mɔnŋ mɑn bonŋɑnn, nɑn Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ k Foŋɑnm kubn i nuu ni ɑ yii tie b yudɑnm kii goli’b. Ii guu Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ k Yennu te k b tie u yɑb u Bijɑ kuun pɑɑk.
44020029	N mi nɑn mi i kɑɑ, nibiit tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl i sinsuuk ni, k biil Yiesuweilɑ siɑb, nɑn kinkɑtɑ nbɑ tuu so pei biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
44020030	Nisiɑb tɑn sɑɑ nyi i mɔnŋ mɔnŋ sinsuuk ni gbɑɑ, k fɑ fɑi k jiin bɑlmɔni wɑnnu po, ɑ bin tunn Yiesuweilɑ yɑn k te k bii wɑɑ’b.
44020031	L pɑɑk, ii guu mɑn k dɑɑ tɑnmt mɑɑ din kpɑɑn i kul nɑn nyin-nyuut, k k nyik yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk, k tɑn jɑnŋ binɑ ŋɑntɑ nɑ ni.
44020032	«Mɔtɑɑnɑ, n jikt’i k tie’i Yennu nuu ni, k biɑ mi nɑn yɑɑ bɑnn u mɑɑn nbɑ wɑnt u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ po, l mɑɑn mɑnŋ sɑɑ fit cie i pɑlɑ, k biɑ tul’i fɑɑl nbɑ tie bin nbɑ kul tie u yɑb nɑ yɑl.
44020033	N din k luon suɑ likli ɑmi u sɑlmɑ ɑmi u tiɑt.
44020034	I mɔnŋ biɑ mi nɑn n din diɑ n nii nɑ e k tuun, k min nɑn n wei-nɑn-lieb di k biɑ gbɑb.
44020035	Mɑɑ din tuun nnɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk e wɑnt nɑn sie k tii tuun bonciɑnn k fit k sonm tɑlɑs-dɑnm, k dɑɑ tɑnmt Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ din yet lin nbɑ nɑ ɑ: ‹Pɑlpienn sii tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ piin piini yɑl e, k gɑl wun nbɑ gɑɑn.› »
44020036	Pɔul nbɑ gbenn mɑɑn mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k b kul ɑ lɑkn gbɑɑn k miɑl Yennu.
44020037	Mɔni suol’b, k b kul ɑ mɔ, ŋɑɑn jii b nii k kokn kokn Pɔul.
44020038	B pɑlɑ mɑntk din biil nɑn wɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ b ji kɑn lɑ’u nɑ pɑɑk. Ŋɑnn e k b din ciɑn’ɔ k u kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ.
44021001	Tɑɑ din tɑt nyik Yiesuweilɑ sɑɑkɑb mɑnŋ nɑ, k t tɔkn bɑɑl Kuos, k l yent k t bɑɑl Luod, k biɑ nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn Pɑɑtɑɑlɑ.
44021002	Lenŋ e k t din lɑ ŋɑlunŋ nbɑ sɑɑ Feniisi tinŋ ni. Ŋɑnn e k t kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ k sɑɑ.
44021003	Tɑɑ tɑn lɑ duo nbɑ k nyun lint k b yi Siipl yuo nbɑ nɑ, k t gɑɑl t gɑnŋ po, k tɑn bɑɑl Siili tinŋ ni, k nyii ŋɑlunŋ nɑ ni, duo nbɑ k b yi Tiil nɑ ni, k ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ dɑnm din yɑɑ bin nyinn tiɑt lenŋ.
44021004	Lenŋ e k t din lɑ Yiesuweilɑ, k ji biɑl be b buol ni k sɑɑ jɑnŋ dɑɑ ŋɑnlole, k Foŋɑnm din te k b yet Pɔul ɑ u ji dɑɑ sɑɑ Selusɑɑlenm.
44021005	Dɑɑ ŋɑnlole nbɑ tɑn gɑl yuo nbɑ nɑ, k ŋɑnm nɑn b puob nɑn b wɑɑs din ciɑn’t, k sɑɑ nyii duo nɑ ni, k diɑn’t, k t kul ɑ gbɑɑn mɔk-kpinŋ k miɑl Yennu.
44021006	L puolpo k t cɑb lieb, ŋɑɑn yɑɑn kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ k sɑɑ, k b mun ŋmɑt k kun.
44021007	Ŋɑnn e k t nyii Tiil k bɑɑl Tolemɑiis. Lenŋ e k t sɑɑn fuont Yiesuweilɑ, ŋɑɑn biɑl b buol ni dɑyenn kuukuɑ.
44021008	L yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk k t nyii Tolemɑiis k bɑɑl Sesɑɑle k sɑɑn kuɑ Fiiliip ŋɑɑk ni, wun nbɑ muɑntl Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ, k be. U din tie jɑb bɑnlole nbɑ k b din lukt’b Selusɑɑlenm nɑ yenɔ e.
44021009	U din mɔk sɑpɑɑnmunɑ bɑnnɑ, k b mun din tie bin nbɑ sɔknt Yennu mɑɑn.
44021010	T din be lenŋ k tien nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnŋɑ nɑ wɑɑ, k Yennu sɔkni, wun nbɑ k b yi’u Agɑɑbuus, nɑ din nyii Suude k sik,
44021011	k bɑɑl t buol ni, k tɑn jii Pɔul gbɑnn, k lol u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ tɑɑ nɑn u nii, ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «Foŋɑnm nbɑ yɑɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ e nɑ, ɑ Suifnbɑ nbɑ be Selusɑɑlenm nɑ tɑn sɑɑ lol gbɑnn nɑ dɑɑnɔ nɑ nnɑ e, ŋɑɑn jii’u k kubn’ɔ bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ nuu ni.»
44021012	Tɑɑ ji din gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k tinm nɑn Sesɑɑle duo ni Yiesuweilɑ kul ɑ bɑln Pɔul ɑ u ji dɑɑ sɑɑ Selusɑɑlenm.
44021013	Ŋɑɑn k u ji din jiin ɑ: «Bee tien k i mɔ k luon k i biil n pɑl i? N k tien siil nɑn bɑɑ sɑɑ lol’n Selusɑɑlenm nɑ pɑɑk kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n ponŋ tien siil nɑn k n kpo Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn pɑɑk.»
44021014	Tɑɑ gbɑl nɑn tin tunn u yɑn nɑ, k t ji nyik ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ, n tun.»
44021015	T weiu mɑnŋ puolpo e, k t ji din tien siil k sɑɑ Selusɑɑlenm.
44021016	K Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be Sesɑɑle nɑ, k b siɑb mun din wei’t k sɑɑn. Ŋɑnn e k b din jii’t, k t sɑɑn Minɑɑsɔn ŋɑɑk ni. Minɑɑsɔn mɑnŋ ponŋ din tie Yiesuweikpel e k din tie Siipl nilɔ.
44021017	Tɑɑ din bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm yuo nbɑ, k lenŋ Yiesuweilɑ gɑɑl’t nɑn pɑlpienn bonciɑnn.
44021018	K l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k tinm nɑn Pɔul sɑɑn ɑ t sɑɑ fuont Sɑɑk. Yiesuweilɑ sɑɑkɑb kul ɑ mun din be lenŋ l yuo.
44021019	Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul fuont’b, ŋɑɑn kɑt wɑnn’b lin nbɑ kul k Yennu tun k tul bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ, ŋuɑ Pɔul nbɑ din tun lin nbɑ kul Yiesu sɑnn ni nɑ pɑɑk.
44021020	Bɑɑ ji din gbɑt u mɑɑn mɑnŋ nɑ, k b kul ɑ pɑk Yennu k yet Pɔul ɑ: «T nɑɑ bik, ɑ mi Suifnbɑ nbɑ tie tusɑ tusɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ k tien Yiesu yɑdɑ, k b kul ɑ biɑ diɑ Muois senni kenkenken.
44021021	Siɑb kumi’b ɑ ɑ wɑnt Suifnbɑ kul ɑ nbɑ be buolgɑnu tini ni ɑ bin yet Muois senni, k biɑ yien’m ɑ b dɑɑ poli b wɑɑs punɑ, k biɑ yet’b ɑ b dɑɑ wɑɑ Suifnbɑ kɑɑl.
44021022	K t sɑɑ tien nlee nɑ? K mɑɑn b lek sɑɑ gbɑt nɑn ɑ bɑɑl nɑ.
44021023	L pɑɑk, t i yet’ɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ, fɑn tun l biɑnŋ. Jɑb bɑnnɑ e be nnɑ k pol pol nɑn Yennu.
44021024	Tɔn, fin nɑn ŋɑnm i sɑɑ k sɑɑ ŋɑnm i mɔnŋ, k fɑn pɑ b likli ɑ bin fit kuol b yut, k suɑ kul n fit ŋɑnm bɑnn nɑn mɑɑn nbɑ k b tuu piɑk ɑ po nɑ, l set k tie mɔni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ mɔnŋ ponŋ wɑɑ Muois senni mɑnŋ nɑn l sɔnu.
44021025	Bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ ŋɑɑn tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ ŋɑnin, t ponŋ diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk k tul’b, k wɑnn’b tɑɑ din juont bɑnnu nbɑ ɑ b dɑɑ mi k di jiet nbɑ k b mɑnn pɑtl, ɑmi k ŋmɑn sɔn, ɑmi bonkobuk nbɑ k b ŋmɑkl k kpii, ŋɑɑn biɑ suol b mɔnŋ nɑn boncuncontuonɑ.»
44021026	Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul din jii jɑb mɑnŋ, k l tɑn yent, k ŋuɑ nɑn ŋɑnm din ŋɑnm b mɔnŋ. L puolpo k Pɔul din sɑɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k wɑnn dɑɑl nbɑ k ŋɑnmu mɑnŋ sɑɑ gbenn k suɑ kul sɑɑ nɑn piini k pi u mɔnŋ pɑɑk.
44021027	Dɑɑ ŋɑnlole dɑɑl nbɑ tɑn pel yuo nbɑ, k Suifnbɑ nbɑ nyii Asii k bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm k be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni nɑ, k b tɑn lɑ Pɔul, k te k niib nɑ kul fiil jil jil jil, k suol’ɔ,
44021028	ŋɑɑn biɑ tiɑn tintiɑni ɑ: «Suifnbɑ, sonm’t mɑn. Ŋuɑ e tie nilɔ nbɑ lin lokl kul po, k wɑnt niib k biil’b nɑn Suifnbɑ nɑn Muois senni nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ, k biɑ tɑn bɑɑl nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ gbɑɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni, k tɑn biil buol nbɑ tie Yennu tiɑɔnŋ yɑl nɑ.»
44021029	(B yet nnɑ k mɑɑn b din dɔnŋ lɑ Pɔul nɑn Tlofiinm, wun nbɑ din tie Efes nilɔ nɑ, k b be duo nɑ ni, k b dukn k mi ɑ Pɔul kuɑ nɑn’ɔ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni e.)
44021030	L pɑɑk, k duo nɑ niib kul din fiil, k niib kul ɑ ciɑl, k bɑɑl kpil Pɔul, k suol’ɔ k piit nyinn’ɔ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni. L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni nɑ, k siɑb luon ŋɑɑk nɑ tɑnmɔi.
44021031	B ji yɑɑ bin kpi Pɔul. L yuo nɑ k Luonmtieb sejenm yudɑɑnɔ ji gbɑt ɑ Selusɑɑlenmtieb kul ɑ fiil jil jil jil.
44021032	K u kɑkt yiɑn ɑ, k jii sejenm nɑn b sɑɑkɑb, k b fɑɑl sik nibul nɑ ni. Niib nɑ nbɑ lɑ’u nɑn sejenm nɑ yuo nbɑ, k b ji nyik Pɔul buot.
44021033	K sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ sɑɑn suol Pɔul, ŋɑɑn tul mɔb ɑ bin bɑɑn’ɔ jɑlt ŋɑnle, ŋɑɑn boi Pɔul nbɑ tie wun nbɑ nɑn wɑɑ biil lin nbɑ nɑ.
44021034	K nibul nɑ ni, siɑb tiɑn Pɔul pɑɑk jiɑk jiɑk. B bɑlŋmɑtuk mɑnŋ pɑɑk k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ k fit bɑnn l pɑɑk bonŋɑnn. L pɑɑk, k u tul mɔb ɑ bin jii’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ kɑnŋ ni.
44021035	Bɑɑ bɑɑl kɑnŋ nɑ tɑnmɔb tɑɑŋmɑɑtɑ pɑɑk nɑ, k sejenm nɑ jii’u sɑnpɑɑpo, k mɑɑn nigbounŋ nbɑ din luon bin kpi’u nɑ pɑɑk.
44021036	B ji din wɑɑ b puol k tiɑn tintiɑni ɑ: «Kpin’mɔ mɑn.»
44021037	Sejenm mɑnŋ nbɑ ji din yɑɑ bin kuɑ nɑn’ɔ kɑnŋ ni nɑ, k u boi sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ ɑ: «A sɑɑ sɑk k n pɑk siɑl k tul’ɑ nii?» K u jiin boi’ɔ ɑ: «A gbiɑ Glek mɑɑn ii?
44021038	Fin kɑɑ tie Ejipt nilɔ nbɑ k dɑɑ ŋɑnle nnɑ nbɑ gɑl nɑ ni k u te k niib bɑɑl nɑn kunkɔnn duo nɑ pɑɑk, k u jii nifokpiilt tusɑ ŋɑnnɑ, k sɑɑn nɑn’m k dɑɑn be muuk ni nɑ ɑɑ?»
44021039	K Pɔul jiin ɑ: «N tie Suif nilɔ e, k b mɑl’n Tɑɑls nbɑ be Siiliisi yɑkl ni e, k n tie digbɑngbenŋl ni nilɔ e. N bɑln’mɑ e, ŋɑɑnt k n pɑk k tul niib nɑ.»
44021040	Sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ cɑb’ɔ mɔb, k Pɔul ŋmɑnt k set tɑnmɔb tɑɑŋmɑɑtɑ nɑ pɑɑk ŋɑɑn ŋɑk u nuu k tul niib nɑ, ɑ bin ŋmin. Bɑɑ ŋmin yuo nbɑ, k u pɑk nɑn’m Suifnbɑ mɑɑn ni, k yet ɑ:
44022001	«Cɑnbɑɑnbɑ nɑn n nɑɑ wɑɑs, gbiintl mɑn lin nbɑ k n yɑɑ n wɑnn’i k jiin n mɔnŋ po.»
44022002	Bɑɑ gbɑt k u piɑk Suifnbɑ mɑɑn ni nɑ, k b ji ŋmin suon nnɑ. K u piɑk k sɑɑ ɑ:
44022003	«N tie Suif nilɔ e, ŋɑɑn k b mɑl’n Tɑɑls nbɑ be Siiliisi yɑkl ni, ŋɑɑn k n tɑn ŋmɑnt nilɔ Selusɑɑlenm nnɑ. K n wɑntuɑ din tie Gɑɑmɑɑliɑl e, k u din wɑnt’n t yejɑnm senni cib cib, k n lek din wɑɑ Yennu nɑn ninmɔnn, nɑn i kul nbɑ wɑɑ’u dinnɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
44022004	N din muksl bin nbɑ wɑɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɔnu, k biɑ din kpi’b gbɑɑ. N din so jɑb nɑn puob k kuɑnt’b dɑnsɑli.
44022005	Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ nɑn t yudɑnm kul sɑɑ fit k tien n siɑlɑ lin nbɑ k n piɑk nɑ pɑɑk nɑn l set tie bɑlmɔni e. N din tɑn sɑɑn gɑɑl kɑdɑɑt b penŋ k tul Suifnbɑ nbɑ be Dɑɑmɑɑs nɑ, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn lenŋ mɑɑ n sɑɑ suol niib nbɑ wɑɑ Yiesu sɔnu nɑ, k jen nɑn’m Selusɑɑlenm nnɑ, k bin dɑt b tubɑ.
44022006	«Tɔn, k dɑɑsiɑl k n din tɑn sɑɑ k sɑɑ pel Dɑɑmɑɑs yensuuk ni, min tɑɑn tɑɑntl suɑ k yentsɑɑkɑl nyiknt sɑnpɑgbɑnn ni, k sik yent k lint’n ɑ.
44022007	K n bɑɑ tinŋ ni, k gbɑt kunkɔl yi ɑ: ‹Sɔul, Sɔul, bee k ɑ muksl’n i?›
44022008	K n jiin k boi mɑɑ: ‹A tie ŋmee?› K u yet’n ɑ: ‹Min, Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ Yiesu e, k ɑ muksl’n mɑnŋ.›
44022009	Niib nbɑ din ciɑnt’n nɑ ŋɑnin din lɑ yentu nɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm din k gbɑt kunkɔl nbɑ piɑk nɑn’n nɑ ŋɑnin.
44022010	«Ŋɑnn e k n boi’ɔ: ‹N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, n sɑɑ tien nlee?› K Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet’n ɑ: ‹Fiit kii sɑɑ Dɑɑmɑɑs, k b sɑɑ sɑɑ wɑnn’ɑ lin nbɑ kul k Yennu nyinn ɑ ɑ tun.›
44022011	Tɔn, n din juɑn ɑ, k mɑɑn yentu nbɑ din yent k nyɔkt n ninbinɑ ni nɑ pɑɑk, k n tɔk-nɑn-lieb nɑ ji din dɑt n nuu k sɑɑn nɑn’n Dɑɑmɑɑs.
44022012	«Lenŋ e k jɑsuɑ din be k b yi’u Anɑɑniɑs, k u din tie nipiemɔ, k biɑ din diɑ Muois senni fɑnu, k Suifnbɑ kul ɑ nbɑ be Dɑɑmɑɑs nɑ din tien’ɔ nibɑɑkl bonciɑnn.
44022013	U din bɑɑl n penŋ k set, k yet’n ɑ: ‹N nɑɑ bik Sɔul, nyuɑntl.› L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni nɑ k n nyuɑnt k lɑ’u.
44022014	K u yet’n ɑ: ‹Yennu nbɑ tie t yejɑnm Yennu nɑ ponŋ din lukt’ɑ, ɑ fɑn bɑnn u yɑnbuɑtuonɑ, k biɑ lɑ niŋɑnɔ Klistu, k biɑ gbɑt mɔbonɑ u tiɑɔnŋ mɔb ni,
44022015	k mɑɑn u luon fin e n tien u siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ, kii piɑk kii tien suɑ kul fɑɑ lɑ lin nbɑ k biɑ gbɑt lin nbɑ.
44022016	L pɑɑk, k ɑ ji kɑl k guu biɑ? Fiit, k wul Yennu nyunwulu k wuul ɑ biit kii yi u sɑnn.›
44022017	«Tɔn, k n ji din ŋmɑt Selusɑɑlenm, k mɑɑ din be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k mei Yennu nɑ k n lɑ yelntu.
44022018	K n yelntu mɑnŋ ni, k n lɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ, k u yet’n ɑ: ‹Kɑktl k nyi Selusɑɑlenm yiɑn yiɑn, k mɑɑn Selusɑɑlenmtieb kɑn gɑɑl lin nbɑ k ɑ piɑk k jiin n po nɑ.›
44022019	K n jiin ɑ: ‹N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, b ponŋ tuu mi nɑn min e tuu lin kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, k so niib nbɑ tien’ɑ yɑdɑ nɑ, k buo’b kuɑnt’b dɑnsɑli.
44022020	K biɑ jen ɑ, bɑɑ din yɑɑ bin kpi ɑ siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ Etiɑnn nɑ, n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mun din be lenŋ, k din tɑɑ b po. Min e biɑ din diɑ niib nbɑ din kpii’u nɑ tiɑt.›
44022021	K Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet’n ɑ: ‹Fin i sɑɑ wɑɑ, min e yɑɑ n tun’ɑ niib nbɑ be bɑnfɔkl k k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ tini ni.› »
44022022	Tɔn, Pɔul nbɑ piɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ, k niib nɑ lek k gbiint wɑɑ pɑk lin nbɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ tɑn pɑk juont k b ji k sɑk, k tiɑn tintiɑni sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ k ŋɑn nɑn wuu be tingbounŋ nɑ ni. Yinm tɑɑn lek kpin’mɔ mɑn.»
44022023	K b yikn wuyikni k tiɑn, ŋɑɑn liɑtl b tiɑt k pɑt ŋɑkn, ŋɑɑn wo tɑnt k yɑln sɑnpɑɑpo, b wutuol nbɑ duo nɑ pɑɑk
44022024	Ŋɑnn e k Luonmtieb sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ tul mɔb ɑ bin jii Pɔul k kuɑ nɑn’ɔ kɑnŋ nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn biɑ yet’b ɑ bin buo’u, k wun bɑnn biit nbɑ k u tun k Suifnbɑ tiɑn tintiɑni mɑnŋ.
44022025	K b lol’ɔ, ŋɑɑn ji yɑɑ bin buo’u. Ŋɑnn e k u boi sejenm sɑɑkɑbik nbɑ sie lenŋ nɑ ɑ: «Senni cɑb ɑ ɑ buo Luonm nilɔ k suɑ i dɑɑ k bu u buut ii?»
44022026	Sejenm sɑɑkuɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k u sɑɑn b yudɑɑnɔ nɑ penŋ, k sɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «A sɑɑ tien nlee? U mɔk yiikuo nɑn Luonm nilɔ nɑ e.»
44022027	K sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ mun fiil, k tɑn bɑɑl boi Pɔul ɑ: «Yetl’n, Luonmtieb set tul’ɑ b yiikuo ee?» K Pɔul jiin ɑ: «Nnn.»
44022028	K sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Min ŋɑnin din pɑ likli sɑɑn e wɑɑ k b cɑb’n yiikuo mɑnŋ.» K Pɔul yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin, bɑɑ mɑl’n, b ponŋ cɑb’n yiikuo mɑnŋ ɑ.»
44022029	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni nɑ, k sejenm nbɑ bo luon k bin boi Pɔul buot buboit nɑ, ji fuln, k ŋmɑt potuntunɑ jik, k jɑŋmɑɑni ji suol sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ, nɑn wɑɑ lɑ k u lol Pɔul nbɑ k Luonmtieb cɑb’ɔ b yiikuo nɑ jɑlt.
44022030	Ŋɑnn e k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ lek yɑbi ɑ wun bɑnn mɑɑn nbɑ k Suifnbɑ tɑɑl Pɔul nɑ pɑɑk cib cib. K l ji tɑn yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k u te k b lot’ɔ, ŋɑɑn biɑ tul mɔb ɑ Suifnbɑ mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑ nɑn b tituk kɑɑnu dɑnm kul ɑ n tikl nɑ, ŋɑɑn te k Pɔul bɑɑl set b tuɑnn po.
44023001	Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul got tituk kɑɑnu dɑnm mɑnŋ silll, k tɑn yet ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, mɑɑ din be biɑnŋ nbɑ k tɑn tuu mɔtɑɑnɑ, n mi nɑn l fɑn nɑn Yennu.»
44023002	Wɑɑ yet nnɑ, k mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ Anɑɑniɑs yet bin nbɑ sie k kpiɑ Pɔul nɑ ɑ bin fɑɑ Pɔul mɔb pɑɑk.
44023003	K Pɔul yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yennu sɑɑ fɑɑ fin kpinkpɑnni dɑɑnɔ nɑ wɑɑ. A kɑl lenŋ k bu n buut nɑn t senni nbɑ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn fɑɑ yɑɑ bin buo’n nɑ, ɑ mɔnŋ biil senni mɑnŋ ɑ.»
44023004	K bin nbɑ sie k kpiɑ Pɔul nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «A tɑn suki Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ ɔɔ?»
44023005	K u jiin ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n k mi nɑn u tie mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ e. L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹L k ŋɑn k ɑ pɑk bɑlbiiuk k jiin ɑ yudɑɑnɔ po.› »
44023006	Tɔn, Pɔul nbɑ ji bɑnn nɑn tituk kɑɑnu mɑnŋ siɑb tie Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ, k lieb mun tie Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ, k u yet sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ niib nɑ ni ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n tie Fɑɑliisiɑn e, Fɑɑliisiɑn bik e tie’n. K n mɔk dindɑnn nɑn kpienm tɑn sɑɑ fiil ɑ. L pɑɑk e te k b bu n buut nɑ.»
44023007	Wɑɑ pɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k mɔniɑɔk ji fiil Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ mɑnŋ sinsuuk ni, k tintɑɑnu tɑn bɔkt.
44023008	(Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ nɑ yɑɑ ɑ kpienm fiilu kɑɑ, k mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ kɑɑ, k sei biɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ ŋɑnin tien l kul ɑ yɑdɑ wɑɑ.)
44023009	Ŋɑnn e k b tintiɑni nɑ ŋɑnmt k do k puki, k senniwɑntieb nɑ siɑb, bin nbɑ tie Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ, fiil pɑk nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ: «T k lɑ juɑ nɑ biit. Pɑsiɑl siek ɑmi mɑlɑkɑ e pɑk tul’ɔ.»
44023010	K mɔniɑɔk nɑ din ŋɑnm k fiil bonciɑnn, k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ mi ɑ b tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn kpet k dɑt Pɔul k pɑt pɑt’ɔ. L pɑɑk, k u tul mɔb ɑ sejenm n sɑɑn k sɑɑ nyinn Pɔul tituk kɑɑnu dɑnm mɑnŋ ni, k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ kɑnŋ nɑ ni.
44023011	L puolpo k nyiɑɔk tɑn bɔnn, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑl Pɔul penŋ, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii mɔk pɑlcienn. A ponŋ tul’n siɑlɑ Selusɑɑlenm ɑ, k l biɑ kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e nɑn k ɑ biɑ tun Luonm duo ni nnɑ.»
44023012	L din tɑn yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k Suifnbɑ tikl, k kɑl lol lol, ŋɑɑn biɑ pol pol, ɑ b kɑn di siɑl i ɑmi k nyu siɑl, sie k bin tɑn kpi Pɔul ɑ.
44023013	Bin nbɑ din lol lol mɑnŋ din yɑb gɑl nɑn niib piinnɑ nɑ.
44023014	Ŋɑnn e k b fiil sɑɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn sɑɑkɑb buol k yet’b ɑ: «T pol pol nbɑ pɑɑl e, ɑ t kɑn di siɑl ɑmi k nyu siɑl, sie k tin tɑn kpii Pɔul ɑ.
44023015	L pɑɑk, yinm nɑn tituk kɑɑnu dɑnm nɑ n tun tuomi Luonmtieb sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ penŋ, k wun nyinn Pɔul k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ i buol nnɑ, k lii tie nɑn i luon k i boi’ɔ buboit e, k bɑnn u mɑɑn mɑnŋ po cib cib nɑ. T dɑɑn tien siil, ɑ tin kpi’u k suɑ u dɑɑ k bɑɑl nnɑ»
44023016	Ŋɑɑn k Pɔul niipuo bijɑ mun gbɑt b lolɑ mɑnŋ, k sɑɑn kɑnŋ nɑ ni, k sɑɑ yet Pɔul l bɑnnu.
44023017	Pɔul nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k u yiin sejenm sɑɑkɑyenɔ, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Jiin nɑɑsimɔ nɑ, k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ ɑ yudɑɑnɔ penŋ, k mɑɑn u mɔk siɑl e k yɑɑ wun yet’ɔ.»
44023018	K sejenm sɑɑkɑyenɔ nɑ jii’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ b yudɑɑnɔ nɑ penŋ, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Pɔul, wun nbɑ k t diɑ’u dɑnsɑlk nɑ, yet ɑ n bɑɑl nɑn nɑɑsimɔ nɑ ɑ penŋ, k mɑɑn u mɔk siɑl e k luon k wun yet’ɑ.»
44023019	K sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ suol u nuu suon nnɑ, k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ kpinŋ, k sɑɑ boi’ɔ: «A mɔk bɑl-lɑni e k luon k ɑ yet’n ii?»
44023020	K u yet’ɔ ɑ: « Suifnbɑ tɑɑn mɔb k luon k bin won boi’ɑ wonn k ɑ nyinn Pɔul k sik nɑn’ɔ b tituk ni, k lii tie nɑn b luon k bin bo boi’ɔ buboit e, k bɑnn u po cib cib nɑ.
44023021	Ŋɑɑn ɑ dɑɑ fiin b po, k mɑɑn Suifnbɑ siɑb yɑb, k gɑl nɑn jɑb piinnɑ nɑ wɑɑ, bin nbɑ sɑɑ bɔl k guu ɑ bin kpi’u. B kul ɑ pol pol e, k yɑɑ ɑ b kɑn di jiet ɑmi k nyu siɑl, sie k bin tɑn kpi’u wɑɑ. B kpɑn tien siil e wɑɑ ŋɑɑn ji guu ɑ mɔb.»
44023022	Ŋɑnn e k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ yet nɑɑsimɔ nɑ ɑ: «I mi k ɑ yet suɑ nɑn ɑ kumi’n l lɑbɑɑl,» ŋɑɑn te k u ŋmɑt.
44023023	Ŋɑnn e k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ yiin u sɑɑkɑb nɑ ni bɑnle k tɑn yet’b ɑ: «Jiin mɑn sejenm kobiinle, nɑn tɑnjɑklɑ piinlole, ŋɑɑn jii kpɑntuɑlɑ kobiinle mun k tien siil k sɑɑn Sesɑɑle. Ii nyi gɔtonm yuo nyiɑɔk nɑ, k sɑɑn.
44023024	Jiin tɑɑnm k tul Pɔul k wun jɑk, ŋɑɑn tenn tɑɑnlei kii diɑ, kii sɑɑ nɑn’ɔ suon nnɑ, k sɑɑ bɑɑl yudɑɑnɔ Feliiks penŋ, k u dɑɑ lɑɑt dɑnŋ,»
44023025	k u diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk k tul’b, k l wɑnt ɑ nnɑ:
44023026	«Min Kluod Liisiɑs e diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ, k tien Cɑnbɑɑ yudɑɑnɔ Feliiks, n fuont’ɑ.
44023027	«Suifnbɑ e dɑɑn suol juɑ nɑ, k dɑɑn bo sɑɑ kpi’u wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k n gbɑt ɑ u tie Luonm nilɔ e. L pɑɑk, k n jii sejenm, k sɑɑn k sɑɑ fɑt’ɔ.
44023028	N dɑɑn luon k n bɑnn lin nbɑ pɑɑk e k b tɑɑl’ɔ mɑnŋ. L pɑɑk, k n jii’u k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ b tituk kɑɑnu dɑnm buol,
44023029	k tɑn bɑnn nɑn l tie b mɔnŋ senni pɑɑk e k b tɑɑl’ɔ mɑnŋ. Ŋɑɑn l k tie bisiɑt kɑɑ k l bo jɑnŋ nɑn u kuun, ɑmi dɑnsɑlkuɑnu.
44023030	«Ŋɑnn e k b bo kumi’n ɑ Suifnbɑ loln lolɑ ɑ bin kpi’u. L pɑɑk, k n yɑɑ ɑ sejenm n jii’u k bɑɑl ɑ penŋ yiɑn yiɑn, ŋɑɑn k n biɑ yet bin nbɑ tɑɑl’ɔ mɑnŋ, ɑ bin bɑɑl ɑ buol, k tɑn wɑnn’ɑ lin nbɑ k b tɑɑl’ɔ l pɑɑk nɑ.»
44023031	Ŋɑnn e k sejenm nɑ jii Pɔul nɑn b yudɑɑnɔ nbɑ tul’b mɔb biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k sɑɑ nɑn’ɔ, k sɑɑ bɑɑl duo nbɑ yi Antiipɑɑtliis nɑ, l nyiɑɔk mɑnŋ.
44023032	K l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k sejenm nbɑ sonm tɑɑtinŋ nɑ ji ŋmɑt kun Selusɑɑlenm, kɑnŋ nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn cɑb tɑnjɑklɑ nɑ ɑ bin sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ.
44023033	K b jii’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Sesɑɑle, k sɑɑ jii kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tul yudɑɑnɔ Feliiks nɑ, ŋɑɑn biɑ jii Pɔul k kubn’ɔ.
44023034	K yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ gɑɑl kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k lii, ŋɑɑn boi Pɔul ɑ u nyii tinlɑnŋ e? Wɑɑ bɑnn nɑn Pɔul nyii Siiliisi nɑ,
44023035	k u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Bin nbɑ tɑɑl’ɔ mɑnŋ i bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, n sɑɑ bu ɑ buut.» Ŋɑnn e k u tul mɔb ɑ guutieb ii diɑ’u kpɑnbɑl Heluod ŋɑɑk ni.
44024001	Tɔn, k dɑɑ ŋɑnŋmu tɑn gɑl, k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ Anɑɑniɑs, nɑn sɑɑkɑb, nɑn lɔyɑ wun nbɑ k b yi’u Teltulus nɑ, tɑn bɑɑl Sesɑɑle k sɑɑn yudɑɑnɔ Feliiks buol ni, k wɑnn’ɔ bɑɑ tɑɑl Pɔul lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
44024002	B yiin Pɔul k u bɑɑl b tuɑnn k Teltulus piin k tɑɑl’ɔ k yien ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ Feliiks, ɑ pɑɑk e te k t tinŋ nɑ mei, nɑn ɑ minu pɑɑk te k duo nɑ ŋɑn.
44024003	Siɑl kul po t mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ yuo kul ɑ, k t tien’ɑ niipuouk bonciɑnn.
44024004	N k mɑntk luon k n biil ɑ yuo, ŋɑɑn n bɑln’mɑ e k ɑ di suklu k gbiint t mɑɑn nɑ wɑɑn.
44024005	«T lɑ k juɑ nɑ biil bonɑ bonciɑnn, k biɑ jen ɑ, k u tuk Suifnbɑ b sinsuuk ni, tingbounŋ nɑ kul ni. Ŋuɑ e biɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlienbɑ yudɑɑnɔ gbɑɑ,
44024006	k u dɑɑn luon k wun kuɑn jɑknt Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni. Ŋɑnn e te k t suol’ɔ k t dɑɑn bo luon ɑ tin bu u buut e nɑn t senni nbɑ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ,
44024007	ŋɑɑn k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ Liisiɑs bɑɑl, k tɑn kpil t niib nɑn pɑnŋ k fɑt’ɔ t penŋ.
44024008	L puolpo e k Cɑnbɑɑ Liisiɑs mɑnŋ biɑ tul mɔb ɑ bin nbɑ tɑɑl’ɔ mɑnŋ n bɑɑl ɑ buol nnɑ. A mɔnŋ sɑɑ fit boi’ɔ buboit k lɑ nɑn tɑɑ tɑɑl’ɔ lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, l tie bɑlmɔni e.»
44024009	Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ wɑnn bɑɑ tɑɑl’ɔ lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk nɑ k yɑɑ ɑ l tie mɔni.
44024010	L yuo nɑ k yudɑɑnɔ nɑ wɑnn Pɔul nuu ɑ wun pɑk. K Pɔul yet ɑ: «N mi nɑn fɑɑ tien tinm Suifnbɑ nɑ bɑlbuulɔ, l dii binɑ bonciɑnn. L pɑɑk, l tien’n pɑlpienn nɑn mɑɑ yɑɑ n pɑk n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ pɑɑk ɑ buol nnɑ.
44024011	«L i tie k ɑ luon, ɑ sɑɑ boi k bɑnn nɑn l k gɑl nɑn dɑɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle nnɑ k n dɑɑn duo Selusɑɑlenm, mɑɑ n sɑɑ jiɑnt Yennu.
44024012	K Suifnbɑ dɑɑn k lɑ k n noi mɔnɔsiɑɔk nɑn suɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, ɑmi k tiki niib k fiint b wutuol Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, ɑmi duo mɑnŋ ni biɑk.
44024013	B biɑ kɑn fit k wɑnn lin nbɑ k bilsuk kɑɑ, k b tɑɑl’n mɑnŋ.
44024014	«Min yien’ɑ e nɑn mɑɑ wɑɑ sɔnu nbɑ k Suifnbɑ yien ɑ l sɔnu tie fɑɑk sɔnu nɑ, ŋɑɑn min lek jiɑntl t yejɑnm Yennu e. Lin nbɑ diɑn Muois senni kɑdɑɑt nɑn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ kɑdɑɑt ni nɑ, n tien l kul ɑ yɑdɑ,
44024015	k mɔk dindɑnn nɑn niib nɑ mun biɑ mɔk l dindɑnn buolu nnɑ e, nɑn Yennu tɑn sɑɑ fiin bin nbɑ tie niŋɑnm nɑn bin nbɑ tie nibiit kul kuun ni.
44024016	K l pɑɑk, n yɑbi n mɔnŋ yuo kul, mɑɑ n tun lin nbɑ tuok sɔnu, Yennu nɑn nisɑɑlk buol ni.
44024017	«Tɔn, mɑɑ din nyii Selusɑɑlenm, l din wei bonciɑnn nɑ, k n ji tɑn ŋmɑt lenŋ mɑɑ n tul n niib likli, ŋɑɑn biɑ pi Yennu piini.
44024018	Tɔn, sinsinn, mɑɑ dɑɑn ŋɑnm n mɔnŋ k gbenn nɑ, k n dɑɑ be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k dɑɑ pi piini mɑnŋ, k b kuɑ k lɑ’n lenŋ. Niib bonciɑnn kɑɑ dɑɑn ciɑn’n, k fuut mun biɑ dɑɑn kɑɑ.
44024019	Ŋɑɑn k Suifnbɑ nbɑ dɑɑn nyii Asii tinŋ ni nɑ ŋɑnin dɑɑn be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni. L i bo i tie k b lɑ n biit, l bo kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k bin bo bɑɑl k tɑɑl’n.
44024020	Ŋɑnn i kɑɑ, fɑn ŋɑɑn k niib nbɑ be nnɑ nɑ n wɑnn biit nbɑ k b dɑɑn lɑ k n tun, mɑɑ dɑɑn sie b tituk kɑɑnu ni yuo nbɑ nɑ.
44024021	B dɑɑn k lɑ n biit, sie bon-yenn kuukuɑ nbɑ k n dɑɑn yet b sinsuuk ni, lin nbɑ k b k luon, k n yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Buut nbɑ k i bu nɑn’n nɑ tie mɑɑ yet yɑɑ ɑ kpienm fiilu be nɑ pɑɑk e.› »
44024022	Feliiks nbɑ ŋɑnin mi Yiesu weiu po bonŋɑnn nɑ, k u nyik mɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn yɑɑ ɑ: «Sejenm yudɑɑnɔ Liisiɑs i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, n sɑɑ got i mɑɑn mɑnŋ po,»
44024023	ŋɑɑn yet u sejenm sɑɑkɑyenɔ ɑ u guu Pɔul, k wuu be u yɑmɑ ni, k biɑ cɑb Pɔul yuɑsnbɑ ɑ b i tien’ɔ lin nbɑ k u luon.
44024024	Ŋɑnn e k dɑɑ ŋɑnŋɑ nnɑ tɑn gɑl, k Feliiks tɑn bɑɑl u buut buol nɑn u ŋɑɑpuo Dlusiil, k u tie Suif, k Feliiks te k b yiin Pɔul k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ. K ŋuɑ Feliiks gbiintl, k Pɔul piɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ k nilɔ sɑɑ tien Yiesu Klistu yɑdɑ.
44024025	Tɔn, Pɔul nbɑ piɑk k wɑnt yentinu nɑn mɔnŋdiɑnu nɑn buut dɑɑl bɑɑlu po yuo nbɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni ji suol Feliiks, k u yet ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ, ii dɑɑ kii sɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l i tie k n lɑ yɑɑk, n biɑ sɑɑ ŋɑnm yiin’ɑ.»
44024026	Feliiks biɑ lek din luon nɑn Pɔul tɑn sɑɑ tul’ɔ likli e. L pɑɑk e te k u din tuu tun k yi Pɔul k piɑk nɑn’ɔ.
44024027	Tɔn, l din tie nnɑ e k sɑɑ jɑnŋ binɑ ŋɑnle k l puolpo k Polsius Festus mun gɑɑl Feliiks setu k gɑɑl yudɑnt mɑnŋ. Feliiks din yɑɑ wun penn Suifnbɑ pɑlɑ, k ŋɑɑn k Pɔul be dɑnsɑlk ni.
44025001	Yudɑɑnɔ Festus nbɑ bɑɑl Sesɑɑle, l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k u nyii lenŋ k duo Selusɑɑlenm.
44025002	Lenŋ e k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn Suifnbɑ yudɑnm bɑɑl Festus penŋ k pɑk pɑɑn Pɔul mɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn miɑl Festus
44025003	ɑ wun te k b pɑlɑ i mei, k te k Pɔul n bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm, k mɑɑn b din lol lol ɑ bin bɔl k lɑɑ k tɑn kpi Pɔul sɔnu ni.
44025004	Ŋɑɑn Festus jiin ɑ: «Pɔul be dɑnsɑlk ni Sesɑɑle, k n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ lek sɑɑ ŋmɑt k sɑɑn lenŋ dɑɑ ŋɑnlele nɑ wɑɑ.
44025005	L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt mɑn k i yudɑnm n wei’n, k tin sik Sesɑɑle. L i tie k juɑ nɑ tun bonbiil i e, bin tɑɑl’ɔ.»
44025006	Festus din dii nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnniin ɑmi dɑɑ piik nɑ k be nɑn’m, k tɑn fit k ŋmɑt Sesɑɑle, k l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni, k u ji kɑl u buut pɑɑk k te k b nyinn Pɔul k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ.
44025007	Pɔul nbɑ bɑɑl yuo nbɑ nɑ, k Suifnbɑ nbɑ nyii Selusɑɑlenm nɑ, fiil k ŋɑɑ lint Pɔul k tɑɑl’ɔ bonbiil, ŋɑɑn biɑ lek k fit wɑnn nɑn l tie mɔni e.
44025008	Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul pɑk u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ pɑɑk k yet ɑ: «N k tun k biil Suifnbɑ senni ni. N biɑ k tun k biil Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk siɑl, ɑmi Luonmtieb kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Sesɑɑl.»
44025009	Ŋɑɑn k Festus luon k wun penn Suifnbɑ pɑlɑ. L pɑɑk, k u boi Pɔul ɑ: «A sɑɑ sɑk k ɑ sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm, k n sɑɑ bu ɑ buut lenŋ ii?»
44025010	K Pɔul jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «N kpɑn dɑɑ sie Luonm yent kul ni kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ buut bunbubuol e nɑ. Ŋɑnn i ŋɑn nɑn k ɑ bu n buut. N k tun Suifnbɑ bisiɑt, k ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mun biɑ mi nnɑ.
44025011	Mi i bo i mɔk biit i e, k tun lin nbɑ jɑnŋ nɑn kuun, n kɑn yet ɑ n fit nyi kuun ni. Ŋɑɑn l i tie k b tɑɑl’n yɑnn i e, suɑ kɑn fit jii’n k kubn’n b nuu ni. Ŋɑɑn sie k n gɑɑn n mɑɑn mɑnŋ Luonm yent kul kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Sesɑɑl buol.»
44025012	Ŋɑnn e k Festus pɑk nɑn u sɑɑkɑb mɑɑn mɑnŋ po, ŋɑɑn yet Pɔul ɑ: «A gɑɑn ɑ mɑɑn Luonm yent kul kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Sesɑɑl buol ɑ. L pɑɑk, ɑ set sɑɑ sɑɑn ɑ.»
44025013	Dɑɑ ŋɑnle nnɑ nbɑ gɑl, k kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑpuo Beleniis tɑn bɑɑl Sesɑɑle ɑ bin fuont yudɑɑnɔ Festus.
44025014	Bɑɑ din sɑɑ tien lenŋ dɑɑ ŋɑnŋɑ nɑ, k Festus tɑn wɑnn kpɑnbɑl nɑ, Pɔul mɑɑn nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ, k yet ɑ: «Feliiks dɑɑn yɑɑt, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑn suɑ dɑnsɑlk ni.
44025015	Mɑɑ dɑɑn sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm yuo nbɑ nɑ, k Suifnbɑ sɑɑkɑb nɑn jɑɑnti yudɑnm dɑɑn puot’ɔ, k yɑɑ ɑ n bu u mɑɑn mɑnŋ k kpi’u.
44025016	K n mun jiin k yet’b ɑ: ‹Tinm Luonmtieb yɑɑ buol ni ŋɑnin, l k tie t kɑɑl kɑɑ k tin cɑb ɑ bin kpi wun nbɑ k b tɑɑl’ɔ nɑ k suɑ ŋuɑ nɑn bin nbɑ tɑɑl’ɔ nɑ dɑɑ k tuok lieb k u lɑ yɑɑk k pɑk u mɔnŋ pɑɑk.›
44025017	«L pɑɑk, b kul ɑ nbɑ dɑɑn tɑn bɑɑl nnɑ yuo nbɑ, n k tɑɑntl, k l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni k n kɑl n buut pɑɑk ŋɑɑn tul mɔb k b kuɑ nɑn Pɔul.
44025018	«Bin nbɑ tɑɑl’ɔ nɑ fiil k set, ŋɑɑn b k tɑɑl’ɔ nɑn mɑɑ dɑɑn bo duki mi ɑ b sɑɑ tɑɑl’ɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
44025019	Ŋɑɑn b kpɑn noi mɔniɑɔk k jikt sɑɑ b mɔnŋ mɔnŋ Yenjiɑntu po, nɑn jɑsuɑ nbɑ din kpo, k u sɑnn yi Yiesu nɑ, wun nbɑ k Pɔul lek yien yɑɑ ɑ u be u mɑnfuol ni nɑ.
44025020	«K l mɑɑn jɑl’n. L pɑɑk, k n boi Pɔul ɑ u sii luon wun sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm k n sɑɑ bu u mɑɑn lenŋ ii?
44025021	K u yet ɑ bii diɑ’u dɑnsɑlk ni mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k b tɑn sɑɑ sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ buol, k wun sɑɑ jiɑl u mɑɑn mɑnŋ. Ŋɑnn e k n tul mɔb mɑɑ bii guu’u, mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k n tɑn sɑɑ fit tun’ɔ kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ penŋ.»
44025022	K kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ yet Festus ɑ: «N mɔnŋ mɔnŋ luon k n gbɑt nilɔ mɑnŋ mɔb ni.» K Festus jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Wonn e wɑɑ k ɑ won sɑɑ gbɑt u mɔb ni.»
44025023	K l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni, k kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑpuo Beleniis muk mukt bonciɑnn, k sejenm yudɑnm nɑn duo nɑ yudɑnm wei b puol k bɑɑl kuɑ buut dieok nɑ ni, k yudɑɑnɔ Festus ji tun tuomi ɑ bin jii Pɔul k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ nɑ.
44025024	Ŋɑnn e k Festus yet ɑ: «Kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ nɑn yinm nbɑ kul be nnɑ nɑ, i lɑ juɑ nɑ nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ! Suifnbɑ nbɑ be nnɑ nɑ nɑn bin nbɑ kul be Selusɑɑlenm bɑɑl n buol nnɑ k tɑɑl’ɔ, k yɑki kpɑyɑkt nɑn’n, k yɑɑ ɑ l k ŋɑn k wuu be.
44025025	Min ŋɑnin lɑ k u k tun bisiɑt nbɑ k l jɑnŋ nɑn kuun, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ ponŋ yɑɑ ɑ u luon k wun gɑɑn u mɑɑn mɑnŋ kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ penŋ nɑ e, k n dukn mɑɑ n te k wun sɑɑn.
44025026	Ŋɑɑn n k mi mɑɑ sɑɑ diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk k tul kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ nɑ k pɑk’ɔ lin nbɑ k sɑɑn gɑɑn u po. Ŋɑnn e te k n bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ i kul nunm nnɑ, ŋɑɑn l mɑntk kpɑɑ fin kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ e. L pɑɑk, u buboit fiitu puolpo, n sii mɔk mɑɑn nbɑ k n sɑɑ fit k diɑn,
44025027	k mɑɑn l kɑɑ pɑɑk nɑn k n te k dɑnsɑlk n sɑɑn kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ penŋ, ŋɑɑn k n kɑn fit wɑnn wɑɑ biil lin nbɑ.»
44026001	L yuo nɑ k kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ yet Pɔul ɑ: «N cɑb’ɑ mɔb. Pɑkn nyinn ɑ mɔnŋ.» K Pɔul tɑnt u nuu sɑnpɑɑpo ɑ wun pɑk k nyinn u mɔnŋ, k yet ɑ:
44026002	«Kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ, l mɑnŋ’n bonciɑnn nɑn mɑɑ sie ɑ tuɑnn ni dinnɑ, k yɑɑ n pɑk k nyinn n mɔnŋ, k jikt sɑɑ lin nbɑ kul k Suifnbɑ tɑɑl’n nɑ po.
44026003	K biɑ jen ɑ, n mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn nɑn mɑɑ sie ɑ tuɑnn ni nɑ, nɑn fɑɑ tie bɑntuɑ, k mi Suifnbɑ kɑɑl nɑn b mɔniɑɔk nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ kul nɑ. L pɑɑk, cɑnbɑɑ, n bɑln’mɑ e, di’n suklu k gbiint mɑɑ yɑɑ n pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ.
44026004	«Mɑɑ fiil n bisn ni wɑɑ nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, Suifnbɑ kul ɑ mi mɑɑ din tuu be biɑnŋ nbɑ n tinŋ ni nɑn Selusɑɑlenm biɑk.
44026005	B ponŋ mi’n k l fɔk. L i tie k b luon, b sɑɑ fit wɑnn nɑn n tuu wɑɑ Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ Yenjiɑntu sɔnu nbɑ mɑntk pɑɑl nɑ e.
44026006	K mɔtɑɑnɑ n ji sie k b bu n buut nɑ, mɑɑ mɔk dindɑnn nɑn mɔsonn nbɑ k Yennu din senn k tul t yejɑnm nɑ.
44026007	L mɔsonn mɑnŋ pɑɑk e k tinm Suifnbɑ buolu piik nɑn munle tuu mɔk dindɑnn k duki nɑn t tɑn sɑɑ lɑ. L pɑɑk te k b jiɑntl Yennu nɑn ninmɔnn yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk nɑ. Cɑnbɑɑ Agliipɑ, l dindɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk e lɑɑ, k Suifnbɑ tɑɑl’n nɑ.
44026008	Bee k l pɑɑl i pɑɑk nɑn k i tien yɑdɑ ɑ Yennu fiint kpienm i?
44026009	«Sinsinn, n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ din dukn nɑn l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e nɑn k n tun bonsiɑl kul k biil Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ Yiesu sɑnn.
44026010	Nnɑ e k n din tuun Selusɑɑlenm. Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm din tuu cɑb’n yiikuo k n so Yennu niib k kuɑnt’b dɑnsɑli. Bɑɑ din tuu bu b mɑɑn k tɑn gbenn k cɑb ɑ bin kpi’b nɑ, n mɔnŋ mun din tuu be bin nbɑ din tuu cɑb ɑ bin kpi’b nɑ kɑnn ni.
44026011	«Yuo kul n din tuu tun k muksl’b Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet kul ni, k din tuu luon k bii noi ɑ b k wɑɑ Yiesu. N din mɑntk donn wutuol bonciɑnn b pɑɑk k l sɑɑ yɑkl ɑ. L pɑɑk, k n biɑ lek din tuu sɑɑ doi nbɑ be tingɑni ni, k sɑɑ muksl’b biɑk.»
44026012	«Nnɑ e k n din sɑɑ Dɑɑmɑɑs siɑn yuo. Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm e din ponŋ cɑb’n yiikuo, k biɑ tul’n mɔb ɑ n tun nnɑ.
44026013	«Tɔn, Cɑnbɑɑ Agliipɑ, l din tie yensuuk ni e k n be sɔnu pɑɑk k sɑɑ, k tɑn lɑ k yentu nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k yien gɑl yennu k yent nyɔkt k lint min nɑn n tɔk-nɑn-lieb nɑ.
44026014	K t kul ɑ bɑɑ tinŋ ni, k n gbɑt k kunkɔl pɑk Suifnbɑ mɑɑn ni, k yin ɑ: ‹Sɔul, Sɔul, bee k ɑ muksl’n i? Fɑɑ tuu yien’n nɑ, l pɑɑk e te k l pɑɑl ɑ pɑɑk nɑn bonkobuk nbɑ tuu yien u dɑɑnɔ mɔb k u buo’u lɑnbɑnn nɑ.›
44026015	«K n jiin k boi ɑ: ‹A tie ŋmee?› K Yonmdɑɑnɔ jiin ɑ: ‹Min, Yiesu e, k ɑ muksl’n mɑnŋ.
44026016	Ŋɑɑn fiit k set. N nyinn fin e, ɑ ɑ tien n tuontunnɔ. L pɑɑk te k n dɔkt ɑ pɑɑk. Tient niib siɑlɑ k wɑnn’b fɑɑ lɑ’n biɑnŋ nbɑ dinnɑ, nɑn lin nbɑ k n sii fiitl wɑnt’ɑ yuo nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl.
44026017	Mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ tun’ɑ siɑn nbɑ nɑ, n biɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyinn’ɑ dɑɑl ni Suifnbɑ nɑn nilieb nii ni.
44026018	Fin e tie wun nbɑ sɑɑ yent b nunm po, k bin nyi bunbɔnn ni k kuɑ yentu ni, k biɑ nyinn’b Sɑɑtɑn yiikuo ni k bin kuɑ Yennu yiikuo ni, ɑ bin lɑ nyikcɑbu k biɑ lɑ yiɑl bin nbɑ tie Yennu niib b yɑdɑ pɑɑk nɑ sinsuuk ni.› »
44026019	«L pɑɑk, Cɑnbɑɑ Agliipɑ, n din k yet Yendɔunŋ ni yelntu mɑnŋ.
44026020	Sinsinn n din sɑɑn Dɑɑmɑɑstieb penŋ e, k l puolpo k n din sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenmtieb nɑn bin nbɑ be Suude tinŋ ni doi kul po nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ buol. N din muɑnt ɑ b kul n mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ kii wɑɑ Yennu sɔnu, kii tuun lin nbɑ wɑnn nɑn b set mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ nɑn mɔni.
44026021	«L din tie lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk e, k Suifnbɑ din suol’n, mɑɑ dɑɑ din be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni nɑ, k b din luon k bin kpi’n.
44026022	Ŋɑɑn lɑɑ jii sɑɑ k tɑn tuu dinnɑ, k Yennu guu’n, k n ji be k sie k muɑntl u mɑɑn k tien tɑli nɑn pɑɑlb kul ɑ nɑ. N k pukn siɑl Muois nɑn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nbɑ din wɑnn lin nbɑ k l sɑɑ tien nɑ pɑɑk
44026023	ɑ Klistu tɑn sɑɑ fɑbl k kpo, k ŋuɑ e biɑ tɑn sii tie sinsinn dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni, k l pɑɑk, k u biɑ tɑn sɑɑ muɑnt k tul Suifnbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ mun biɑk, k yien’m mɑɑn nbɑ tɑn sii yentl b nunm po.»
44026024	Pɔul nbɑ din piɑk ɑ wun nyinn u mɔnŋ nɑ, ŋɑnn e k Festus tiɑn u pɑɑk ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «Pɔul, ɑ wɑɑt ɑ. A bɑnciɑɔnŋ pɑɑk e te k ɑ wɑɑt.»
44026025	K Pɔul jiin ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ Festus, n k wɑɑt kɑɑ. Mɑɑn nbɑ k n piɑk nɑ, l tie bɑlmɔni e, k biɑ mɔk pɑɑk.
44026026	Cɑnbɑɑ Agliipɑ, n mɔk pɑlcienn k sɑɑ pɑk k tul’ɑ, k mɑɑn ɑ mɔnŋ mi lin nbɑ nɑ po. N biɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑn mɑɑn mɑnŋ k bɔl ɑ buol, k mɑɑn lin nbɑ din tien mɑnŋ, l din k bɔl kɑɑ.
44026027	Cɑnbɑɑ Agliipɑ, ɑ tien Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn yɑdɑ wɑɑ ɑɑ? N lek mi nɑn ɑ tien yɑdɑ wɑɑ.»
44026028	K kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ jiin Pɔul ɑ: «Fin duki mi ɑ ɑ pinpɑɔk mintk nɑ sɑɑ fit dɑk’n k n tien Klistuweilɔ wɑɑ ɑɑ?»
44026029	K Pɔul jiin ɑ: «N pinpɑɔk i fɔk ɑmi lɑɑ k fɔk, min yɑɑ Yenmiɑlu tie k fin nɑn niib kul ɑ nbɑ gbiintl n mɑɑn nɑ dinnɑ nɑ, n tien Yiesuweilɑ nɑn mɑɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn jɑlt nbɑ nɑ kuukuɑ e k i kii mɔk.»
44026030	Ŋɑnn e k kpɑnbɑl nɑ nɑn yudɑɑnɔ nɑ nɑn Beleniis, nɑn bin nbɑ kul kɑl lenŋ nɑ kul fiil k nyii.
44026031	Bɑɑ yɑɑ bin ji yɑt yuo nbɑ, k b ji yien b lieb ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ tɑɑn k tun biit k l jɑnŋ nɑn bin kpi’u, ɑmi k kuɑn’ɔ dɑnsɑlk.»
44026032	K kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ yet Festus ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ i dɑɑn bo i kii miɑl ɑ u sɑɑ gɑɑn u mɑɑn nɑ kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Sesɑɑl penŋ, t bo sɑɑ fit ŋɑɑ’u wɑɑ.»
44027001	Bɑɑ ji din tɑn senn ɑ tin sɑɑn Luonm, Itɑɑli tinŋ ni, k b jii Pɔul nɑn dɑnsɑl-lei, k tul’b Luonmtieb sejenm sɑɑkuɑ nnɑ, k u sɑnn yi Sulius, k u be sejenm pɑɑbu nbɑ k b yi Kpɑnbɑlɑ Yudɑɑnɔ Pɑɑbu nɑ.
44027002	T kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ nbɑ nyii Adlɑmiit, k mɑɑn ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ ponŋ tien siil nɑn wun nyi Sesɑɑle k sɑɑn Asii tinŋ ni digbɑnɑ nbɑ kuok mɔkl nɑ kpinŋ. Mɑɑseduɑnn nilɔ Aliistɑɑlk nbɑ nyii Tesɑɑluoniik nɑ din ciɑn’t.
44027003	L tɑn yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni, k t bɑɑl Siidɔn, k sejenm sɑɑkuɑ Sulius din diɑ Pɔul fɑnu, k din cɑb’ɔ ɑ wun sɑɑn k sɑɑ cɑn u yuɑsnbɑ nbɑ be duo mɑnŋ ninŋ nɑ sɑɑɔnŋ.
44027004	K t tɑn nyii lenŋ k yɑɑt sɑɑ, k wounŋ fukt k dɑ tuokt’t, k t pek kpiɑn Siipl tinŋ po k sɑɑ, k tinŋ mɑnŋ tiɑ wounŋ nɑ k tul’t.
44027005	Tɑɑ puot mɔkgbenŋl nɑ yuo nbɑ nɑ, k t tɑn pel Siiliisi nɑn Pɑnfiili tini po, k ji bɑɑl Miilɑ, Liisi tinŋ ni nɑ.
44027006	Lenŋ e k sejenm sɑɑkuɑ nɑ lɑ ŋɑlunŋ nbɑ nyii Aleksɑndli k sɑɑ Itɑɑli tinŋ ni, k u te k t luɑl k kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ.
44027007	T din jii dɑɑ bonciɑnn k k fit sɑɑ yiɑn yiɑn, k t din lɑ fɑlɑ k tɑn bɑɑl Siniit duo nɑ tuɑnn. Wounŋ nɑ biɑ lek k nyik k tin sɑɑn tɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn nbɑ po nɑ. L pɑɑk, t din bɔkn, k gɑɑl Klet tinŋ mɑnŋ po e. L po mɑnŋ e k wounŋ din k pɑɑl, k t tɑn kpiɑn nɑn Sɑlmɔne, Klet tinŋ ni, k gɑl.
44027008	Tɑɑ din sɑɑ nɑ, l din pɑɑl bonciɑnn nɑn tɑɑ tɑn bɑɑl Klet duo nbɑ k b yi Setŋɑnu nɑ. Lenŋ din k fɔk nɑn Lɑɑse duo.
44027009	T ponŋ din biil yuo bonciɑnn. Suifnbɑ mɔlolu dɑgbenŋl ji din ponŋ gɑl ɑ, k yuo nbɑ k ninbɔnŋ tuu tɑn bɑɑl mɔkgbenŋl pɑɑk nɑ tɑn bɑɑl. L pɑɑk, k Pɔul kpɑɑn’m k yet’b ɑ:
44027010	«N yuɑsnbɑ, n mi nɑn t sɔnu nɑ ni, ninbɔnŋ sɑɑ dɑɑmi’t bonciɑnn, k l k tie tiɑt nbɑ be ŋɑlunŋ nɑ ni, ɑmi ŋɑlunŋ nɑ kuukuɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn nɑn t mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mɑnfuol gbɑɑ sii be ninbɔnŋ mɑnŋ ni.»
44027011	Ŋɑɑn sejenm sɑɑkuɑ nɑ bɑkɑ din tɑɑn kɑɑ nɑn lin nbɑ k Pɔul pɑk nɑ po, ŋɑɑn fiin wun nbɑ kɑn ŋɑlunŋ nɑn l dɑɑnɔ nɑ po e.
44027012	Ŋɑɑn ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ nbɑ din set duo nbɑ nɑ din k fɑn nɑn tin set lenŋ wonfufuk yuo. L pɑɑk, k b bonciɑnn ji din yɑɑ ɑ bin ŋɑɑn k bin fiil lenŋ k sɑɑn, ɑ pɑsiɑl b tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl Feniigs. Lenŋ din tie Klet tinŋ duo e, k ŋɑlunŋ sinsetbuol be lenŋ k tuok yenbɑɑpo, k b luon bii be lenŋ wonfufuk yuo.
44027013	L yuo nɑ k b lɑ gɑnŋ po nɑ wounŋ ji dɑ wɑɑn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, k b ji dukn ɑ pɑsiɑl l sii tie wonŋɑnŋ o, lin nbɑ sɑɑ te k bin fit nyɑnn bɑɑ duki biɑnŋ nbɑ, k l yuo nɑ, k b ji fiil k dɑt kutkpiɑtl nbɑ so ŋɑlunŋ k sent nɑ, k yɑɑn jɑk b sɔnu k sɑɑ, k buɑk Klet mɔk-kpinŋ.
44027014	L k wei k wonpɑɑluk nbɑ nyi yendopo nɑ fikt tinŋ nɑ ni, k dɑ siik mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni,
44027015	k fuɑn ŋɑlunŋ nɑ k l din pɑɑl bonciɑnn nɑn tin fit kɑn’n wounŋ nɑ ni, k t goli k l sɑɑ,
44027016	k l jii’t, k t sɑɑ bɑɑl k gɑl tinŋ nbɑ k nyun lint’l k b yi’l Kuodɑ nɑ. Tɑɑ gɑɑl kpiɑnt yuo nbɑ k tinbik mɑnŋ guɑl wounŋ nɑ k u bɑlk, k t ji gbɑɑ gbɑɑ sɑɑ guɑl bulgbetl nbɑ tuuk ŋɑlunŋ nɑ pɑɑk nɑ,
44027017	k b ji dɑt bulgbetl nɑ k kuɑn’n ŋɑlunŋ nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn biɑ lol ŋɑlunŋ nɑ nɑn ŋmiit kenken k lint. B din tiin jɑŋmɑɑni, k mi ɑ b tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn kpet k kpiɑn Liibi tinŋ ni, siɑn nbɑ k nyun k sumi nɑ. Lenŋ din tie ninbɔnŋ buol e. Ŋɑnn e k b sikn ŋɑlunŋ nɑ cincenn k ji ŋɑɑn k wounŋ nɑ yɑɑn jii’b k sɑɑ nɑn’m.
44027018	Wonpɑɑluk nbɑ mɑntk din dɑ nɑ, k l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni, k b piin k nyinn bonkuɑdkɑlɑ ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ ni,
44027019	k l sɑn-nyɑfɑnnuk jik, k b jii b mɔnŋ nii k nyinn nyinn ŋɑlunŋ tiɑt nbɑ be ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ ni nɑ, k lu lu mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni.
44027020	L din jii dɑɑ bonciɑnn k sɑnpɑgbɑnɑ dɔkn sɑnpɑɑpo, k t k fit lɑ yennu ɑmi ŋmɑɑbilɑ gbɑɑ, k wounŋ nɑ lek biɑ dɑ nɑn pɑnŋ. Tɑɑ din mɔk dindɑnn k duki mi ɑ t sɑɑ lɑ fielu nɑ, k l kul nyii peb.
44027021	L din wei bonciɑnn k b k dii, k Pɔul tɑn fiil set k yet ɑ: «N yuɑsnbɑ, i dɑɑn i bo i sɑk n mɔb k biɑl Klet tinŋ ni, l dɑɑn bo sii ŋɑn. I bo tɑn kii lɑɑt ninbɔnŋ k di fɑlɑ nɑ buolu.
44027022	Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, ii sɑɑk n mɔb kii mɔk pɑlcienn mɑn. I suɑ nɑn yenɔ kuukuɑ wɑɑ kɑn kpo gbɑɑ, ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ e nɔk sɑɑ biil.
44027023	K mɑɑn Yennu nbɑ k n tie u yuɑ k jiɑntl’ɔ nɑ, u mɑlɑkɑ won sik n pɑɑk nyiɑɔk nɑ,
44027024	k tɑn yet’n ɑ: ‹Pɔul, dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. Sie k b tɑn jii’ɑ k sɑɑn nɑn’ɑ kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Sesɑɑl nɑ penŋ. A pɑɑk k Yennu yɑɑ wun fiel niib kul nbɑ be nɑn’ɑ ŋɑlunŋ nɑ ni.›
44027025	L pɑɑk, n yuɑsnbɑ, ii mɔk pɑlcienn mɑn k mɑɑn n tien Yennu yɑdɑ nɑn l kpɑn sii tie nɑn wɑɑ yet’n nɑ e.
44027026	Ŋɑɑn wounŋ lek sɑɑ tut’t nɑn pɑnŋ, k dɑɑmi’t, k te k tin bɑɑl tinbisiɑk pɑɑk »
44027027	Lɑɑ din tɑn tien nyɑtunmunɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnnɑ yuo nbɑ, k wounŋ nɑ biɑ lek dɑ k sɑɑ nɑn’t mɔkgbenŋl nbɑ k b yi’l Adliɑtiik nɑ pɑɑk k tɑnsuuni k ŋɑlnkɑnnɑ nɑ ji duki mi ɑ t pel tinŋ e.
44027028	Ŋɑnn e k b jii bonbikn-kɑl, ɑ bin bikn k lɑɑn l sumi ɑmi l k sumi, k b ji bikn k suɑ k l sunmiu tie miɑtɑ piintɑ nɑn ŋɑnlole. K l yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, k b yɑɑn bikn, k suɑ k l sunmiu ji tie miɑtɑ piinle nɑn ŋɑnniin.
44027029	K jɑŋmɑɑni kuɑ’b, k mɑɑn b duki mi ɑ b ŋɑlunŋ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn kpet k do tɑnɑ pɑɑk. L pɑɑk, k b ji jii kutkpiɑtɑ ŋɑnnɑ nbɑ so ŋɑlunŋ k sent nɑ, k lu nyun ni, k gɑɑn gɑɑn ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ puolpo, ŋɑɑn lek ji miɑl Yennu ɑ lin yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk.
44027030	Ŋɑnn e k ŋɑlnkɑnnɑ nɑ ji luon bin bot ŋɑɑn nyik ŋɑlunŋ nɑ. K b siknt bulgbetl nɑ nyun pɑɑk ŋɑɑn ji tie sel k l tie nɑn b yɑɑ bin sikn kutkpiɑtɑ ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ tuɑnn po e nɑ.
44027031	Ŋɑɑn k Pɔul yet sejenm sɑɑkuɑ nɑ nɑn sejenm mɑnŋ ɑ: «Ŋɑlunŋ kɑnnɑ nɑ i kɑɑ ŋɑlunŋ nɑ ni, i suɑ kɑn lɑ fielu.»
44027032	Ŋɑnn e k sejenm nɑ pot pot ŋmiit nbɑ k b lol lol bulgbetl mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn te k l bɑɑ nyun ni.
44027033	Tɔn, k l yɑɑn tɑn pel yentu, k Pɔul yet b kul ɑ ɑ bin di jiet, k yet ɑ: «Dinnɑ l puki dɑɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnnɑ e nɑ k i mɔk jɑŋmɑɑni k dɑɑ k dii siɑl.
44027034	L pɑɑk, n bɑln’mi e k yi lek di jiet, k mɑɑn l tie lin nbɑ sɑɑ te k i fɑt i mɔnŋ e. Nɑn suɑ yukobuk ɑ kɑn bot.»
44027035	Pɔul nbɑ pɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn jii pɑɑnu k tul Yennu niipuouk b nuni ni, ŋɑɑn ji ŋmit dii.
44027036	Ŋɑnn e k b pɑlɑ ji cie, k b kul ɑ jɑk jiet nɑ k di.
44027037	T kul ɑ kɑnn din tie niib kobiinle nɑn piinlole nɑn bɑnluob o.
44027038	Suɑ kul nbɑ din dii jiet nɑ k jɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k b jii ble nbɑ din tenn ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ ni nɑ k lu mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni ɑ ŋɑlunŋ nɑ n fukt.
44027039	Lɑɑ tɑn yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k ŋɑlnkɑnnɑ nɑ lɑ tinŋ nɑ, k ji k bɑnn, ŋɑɑn lɑ lɔtuk nnɑ mɔkgbenŋl nɑ kpinŋ, k l mɔk gbingbɑnŋɑnn k b bikn ɑ l i sɑɑ fit, bin te k ŋɑlunŋ nɑ n sɑɑn kuɑ lenŋ k do gbingbɑnn nɑ.
44027040	Ŋɑnn e k b ji din pot ŋmiit nɑ, k kutkpiɑtɑ mɑnŋ bɑɑ nyun ni, ŋɑɑn biɑ lot ŋmiit nbɑ lol dɑɑt nbɑ k b diɑ k kɑn ŋɑlunŋ nɑ, k ji fit donn cincenn ŋɑlunŋ nunm po, ɑ wounŋ i dɑ kii sɑɑ nɑn’m. Ŋɑnn e k b tɑn pel gbingbɑnn,
44027041	k ŋɑlunŋ nɑ tuɑnn po fel tinŋ ni. L tuɑnn po nɑ nbɑ fel tinŋ ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k ŋɑlunŋ nɑ gbɑl sɑɑnu, k nyunpɑnɑ ji liɑ l puolpo nɑn pɑnŋ k jint’l.
44027042	Tɔn, k sejenm nɑ ji luon bin kpi dɑnsɑlkuɑlɑ nɑ kul, ɑ nnɑ e kɑɑ, pɑsiɑl b tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn k duk puot k ciɑl.
44027043	Ŋɑɑn sejenm mɑnŋ sɑɑkuɑ nɑ ŋɑnin luon k wun fiel Pɔul. L pɑɑk, k u tiɑ’b ɑ b dɑɑ kpi’b, ŋɑɑn tul mɔb ɑ suɑ kul nbɑ mi nyunduku, bin yukl bɑɑ nyun nɑ ni sinsinn k duk puot.
44027044	Ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ biɑl k k mi duku nɑ n mun suol suol dɑɑt ɑmi ŋɑln-yɑkɑ k wɔb k duk puot. B kul ɑ ji din tien nnɑ e k fiel b mɔnŋ.
44028001	Tɑɑ din tɑn nyii ninbɔnŋ ni nɑ, k t bɑnn nɑn tinŋ nbɑ k nyun lint nɑ sɑnn yi Mɑɑlt.
44028002	Lenŋ niib din gɑɑl’t bonŋɑnn. Sɑɑk nbɑ din bɑɑ nɑ, k wɑɑt be bonciɑnn, k b juo mugɑnn k tul’t ɑ t nɑni.
44028003	K Pɔul tɑn tikl dɑgingɑni bonciɑnn k kpɑb nɑn wɑɑɔk, k tien muu nɑ ni, k muu nɑ tonu tɑn gbɑt wɑɑɔk nɑ, k u nyii k jokl Pɔul nuu.
44028004	Lenŋ niib nbɑ lɑ k wɑɑɔk nɑ juɑn Pɔul nuu pɑɑk nɑ, k b ji yien b lieb ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ kpɑn tie nikpiiluk o. Wɑɑ lek fɑt u mɔnŋ mɔkgbenŋl nnɑ, ŋɑɑn yennu ŋɑnin kɑn nyik’ɔ k wuu be u mɑnfuol ni.»
44028005	K Pɔul ŋɑk u nuu, k wɑɑɔk nɑ bɑɑ muu nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn k Pɔul k lɑ dɑnŋ nɑn wɑɑn ɑ.
44028006	B ji dɑɑn ɑ bin lɑɑn u siɑl po sɑɑ mɔl, ɑmi u tɑn sɑɑ kpil bɑɑ k kpo. Bɑɑ ji dɑɑn dɑɑn k tɑn guo k k lɑ siɑl tien’ɔ nɑ, k b lebt b dudukt mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn yɑɑ ɑ u tie yensɑu e.
44028007	Lenŋ biɑ din k fɔk nɑn Publius kpɑɑnt nbɑ be nɑ. Ŋuɑ e biɑ din tie tinŋ mɑnŋ ni bɑt, k u din gɑɑl’t sɑɑɔnŋ k sɑɑ jɑnŋ dɑmunjɑɑ ŋɑntɑ.
44028008	K Publius bɑɑ mun din duɑ yiɑl gbɑnɑntounŋ nɑn nɔniikɑk ni, k Pɔul tɑn kuɑ u dieok ni, k miɑl Yennu k yii u nii u pɑɑk k te k juɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
44028009	Wɑɑ din te k u pɑɑk nɑ, k bɑɑt-lieb nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ kul ɑ din bɑɑl, k u tɑn te k b mun pɑɑk.
44028010	B cɔln’t bonciɑnn, tɑɑ biɑ din tɑn fi ɑ tin kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ yuo nbɑ, k b bɑɑl nɑn lin nbɑ k t tɑn sii luon sɔnu ni, k kuɑn ŋɑlunŋ ni k tul’t.
44028011	T benu lenŋ ŋmɑɑli ŋɑntɑ puolpo e wɑɑ, k t din kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ nbɑ din nyii Aleksɑndli k din bɑɑl Mɑɑlt k be wonfufuk piinu nɑn gbennu, k b yi ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ Yenjɑɑsnbɑ. K l fiil sɑɑ,
44028012	k yɑɑn tɑn bɑɑl duo nbɑ k b yi Siilɑɑkuus nɑ, k biɑl lenŋ dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ,
44028013	k tɑn tuɑt gɑl bɑɑl Legio duo ni, k l tɑn yent k wounŋ yɑɑn jɑk dɑnu, k nyii gɑnŋ po k tut’t, k t jii dɑɑ ŋɑnle k yɑɑn bɑɑl Puusɔl duo ni.
44028014	Lenŋ e k t lɑ Yiesuweisiɑb, k b guɑl’t ɑ tii be nɑn’m k jɑnŋ dɑɑ ŋɑnlole, k t be nɑn’m, k tɑn nyii lenŋ k sɑɑ Luonm duo ni.
44028015	Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be Luonm duo ni nɑ nbɑ gbɑt t po nɑ, k b fiil bɑɑl cet’t digbɑnbik nbɑ k b yi’l Apius dɑɑk ni, k siɑb mun cet’t digbɑnbik nbɑ k b yi’l Sɑɑnm-ŋei-Ŋɑntɑ nbɑ kpiɑ Luonm duo nɑ. Pɔul nbɑ lɑ’b yuo nbɑ, k l tul’ɔ pɑlcienn, k u tul Yennu niipuouk.
44028016	Tɑɑ din bɑɑl Luonm nɑ, k b sɑk cɑb Pɔul k u be u yul po ŋɑɑk, k b te k seje guu’u.
44028017	Tɔn, l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl e k Pɔul yiin Suifnbɑ yudɑnm lɑknu. Bɑɑ tikl lieb yuo nbɑ, k u yet’b ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n lek k tun bonbisiɑl k biil t niib ɑmi t yejɑnm kɑɑl, ŋɑɑn b din suol’n Selusɑɑlenm e k kubn’n Luonmtieb nuu ni.
44028018	B boi’n buboit, k tɑn luon k bin nyik’n, k mɑɑn b k lɑ mɑɑ tun bonbisiɑl nbɑ jɑnŋ nɑn bin kpi’n.
44028019	Ŋɑɑn Suifnbɑ nbɑ din k sɑk ɑ bin nyik’n nɑ, l din tie k n gɑɑl mɑɑn Luonm yent kul kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ penŋ e, ŋɑɑn l din k tie ɑ n luon k n tɑɑl n buolu kɑɑ.
44028020	«L pɑɑk e te k n yiin’i mɑɑ n tɑn lɑ’i ŋɑɑn yet’i lɑbɑɑl nɑ po. Mɑɑ muɑntl wun nbɑ k Suifnbɑ dɑɑn dindɑnn nɑ po e, ŋɑnn e te k b bɑɑn’n jɑlt nɑ.»
44028021	K b yet’ɔ yɑɑ: «T k lɑ kɑdɑɑt k l nyii Suude k bɑɑl k l wɑnt ɑ po, ɑmi t suɑ biɑ k nyii lenŋ k bɑɑl nɑn lɑbɑsiɑl, ɑmi suɑ mun biɑ k pɑk bonbisiɑl k sɑɑn gɑɑn ɑ po biɑk.
44028022	Ŋɑɑn t sii luon k tin bɑnn ɑ dudukt, k mɑɑn t ponŋ mi nɑn siɑl po kul ɑ, niib bonciɑnn piɑk k biil jɑɑnti nbɑ k ɑ jiɑntl nɑ.»
44028023	L pɑɑk, k b senn dɑɑl, k bin nbɑ bɑɑl din yɑb k cie bin nbɑ din bɑɑl sinsinn nɑ, k b bɑɑl siɑn nbɑ k Pɔul din be nɑ k u kɑt wɑnn’b Yennu nɑɑn po, sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni mɔkmɔk nɑn dɑɑjuouk, k wɑnt’b Yiesu mɑɑn nbɑ be Muois senni ni nɑn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ diɑni ni biɑnŋ nbɑ, k yɑbi ɑ wun tunn niib nɑ yɑn k jiin Yiesu po.
44028024	B siɑb yɑn din tunn k kuɑ Yiesu po, u mɑɑn mɑnŋ pɑɑk ɑ, ŋɑɑn k lieb mun k tien yɑdɑ.
44028025	K b jɑk lieb nɑn mɔniɑɔk, ŋɑɑn yɑɑ bin yɑt sɑɑn, k mɑɑn Pɔul din ŋɑnm yet mɔbon-yenn kuɑ ɑ: «Yuo nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nbɑ din te k u sɔkni Esɑɑyi nbɑ din pɑk tul t yejɑnm nɑ, u din pɑk mɔni e,
44028026	k din yet yɑɑ nnɑ: ‹I sɑɑ k sɑɑ yet niib nɑ ɑ i tɑn sɑɑ gbiint k gbiint, ŋɑɑn lek kɑn gbɑt l pɑɑk. ɑ k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ got k got ŋɑɑn biɑ lek kɑn lɑ,
44028027	k mɑɑn niib nɑ ji tie yɑnkpienɑ e, k kpɑɑ b tubɑ k biɑ mun b ninbinɑ b i kii tien nnɑ, b sɑɑ gbɑt e k bɑnn l pɑɑk k gɑɑl n mɑɑn k wei’n k mɑn fiel’b.› »
44028028	K Pɔul biɑ ŋɑnm yet ɑ: «Yennu tul u lɑbɑmɑnn ɑ niib nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ n lɑ fielu e.»
44028029	Pɔul nbɑ din pɑk nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k Suifnbɑ ji din yɑt sɑɑ, ŋɑɑn jɑk lieb nɑn mɔniɑɔk bonciɑnn.
44028030	Pɔul nbɑ din be ŋɑɑk nbɑ nɑ ni, u din pɑ likli ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ pɑɑk ŋɑɑn din be lenŋ binɑ ŋɑnle. Nilɔ nbɑ kul tɑn bɑɑl u buol, u tuu gɑɑl’ɔ bonŋɑnn.
44028031	K u biɑ din tuu muɑntl Yennu nɑɑn po, k biɑ wɑnt niib Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu po, k din tuu piɑk u yɑmɑ ni nɑn pɑlcienn.
45001001	Min Pɔul, wun nbɑ tie Yiesu Klistu tuontunnɔ, k u yiin’n ɑ n tien u tuomi k Yennu lukt’n ɑ n muɑnt u lɑbɑmɑnn.
45001002	Yennu ponŋ din dɔnŋ senn u mɔsonn lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ po e wɑɑ, k u sɔkniinbɑ din muɑntl u mɔsonn mɑnŋ, k l diɑn u tiɑɔnŋ lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni.
45001003	Lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ wɑnt u Bijɑ po e. Wɑɑ tien nisɑɑlk nɑ, b din mɑl’ɔ k u tie Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn e.
45001004	Foŋɑnm din wɑnn nɑn yiikuo nɑn u set tie Yennu Bijɑ u kuun fiilu ni. Ŋuɑ e tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu.
45001005	Ŋuɑ pɑɑk e k Yennu ninbɑtinu be t pɑɑk k te k t tie u tuomiinbɑ ɑ tin jii u sɑnn k sɑɑn nibuolu kul buol ni, k te k bii sɑɑk u mɔb kii tie’u yɑdɑ,
45001006	k i mun be dɑɑnsiɑb nbɑ k Yennu yiin’m ɑ bii tie Yiesu Klistuyɑb nɑ kɑnn ni.
45001007	N dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien yinm nbɑ be Luonm duo ni, yinm nbɑ k Yennu luon’i k yiin’i ɑ i tien u mɔnŋ niib nɑ. T Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu i mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’i k biɑ tul’i mɑnu.
45001008	Sinsinn, n tien Yennu niipuouk, Yiesu Klistu sɑnn ni, i kul ɑ pɑɑk, k mɑɑn tingbounŋ nɑ tieb kul gbiɑ i yɑdɑ po.
45001009	N wɑɑ Yennu nɑn n pɑl kul, k muɑntl u Bijɑ lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ. Ŋuɑ e tie n siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ k mi nɑn yuo kul n duki i kul ɑ po,
45001010	k mei’ɔ i pɑɑk yuo kul. N mei’ɔ ɑ l i tie u lonm i e l ji kɑn wei k n sɑɑ bɑɑl i buol,
45001011	k mɑɑn n mɑntk luon k n lɑ’i k fit sonm’i k yin gɑɑl Foŋɑnm piinsiɑl nbɑ sɑɑ te k i mɔk pɑnŋ u sɔnu ni.
45001012	K biɑ jen ɑ, n luon k mii be i sinsuuk ni ɑ tin cie lieb pɑlɑ, tɑɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
45001013	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n luon yin bɑnn nɑn n yɑbl nɑn tɑɑl munŋɑ nɑ wɑɑ, ɑ n bɑɑl k tɑn gɔn’i, ŋɑɑn k siɑl guɑl’n mɔkmɔk nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ k n k fit gɔn’i ni. N luon k n tuonn n tun siɑl i sinsuuk ni nɑn lɑɑ din tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nilieb sinsuuk ni nɑ.
45001014	L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k n sɑɑn niib kul buol ni, bin nbɑ mɔk nin-yentl nɑn bin nbɑ k mɔk nin-yentl, bin nbɑ mi kɑdɑɑɔk nɑn bin nbɑ k mi kɑdɑɑɔk.
45001015	L pɑɑk, k n ninbinn mɔn bonciɑnn ɑ n muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ k tul yinm nbɑ be Luonm duo ni nɑ.
45001016	Fei k mɔk’n nɑn k n muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn l tie Yennu yiikuo nbɑ fiel wun nbɑ kul tien yɑdɑ nɑ e. Sinsinn l tie Suifnbɑ yɑl e, k mun biɑ tie bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ kul yɑl.
45001017	Lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu yet ɑ nilɔ tie niŋɑnɔ u tuɑnn e. L tie yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e. L kul e nɑ, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Wun nbɑ tien niŋɑnɔ Yennu buol, u yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk, l dɑɑnɔ sii mɔk mɔmɔnm mɑnfuol.»
45001018	Yennu wɑnn nifosɑɑli ɑ u donn wutuol b pɑɑk, k mɑɑn b tuun biit k k wɑɑ u sɔnu, k b biit sɔni mɑnŋ te k niib k bɑnt u bɑlmɔni.
45001019	Yennu donn wutuol, k mɑɑn nifosɑɑlk nbɑ sii fit mi lin nbɑ k jiin u po nɑ, ŋɑnn e fiit k be pɑɑnu ni, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ Yennu mɔnŋ mɔnŋ e fiit’l k wɑnn’b.
45001020	Yuo nbɑ k Yennu din nɑn dulnyɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, u nɑɑmi mɑnŋ ni k b bɑnn u ŋɑnt nbɑ k nifosɑɑlk ninbinn k fit lɑɑt nɑ: ŋɑnn e tie u yiikuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, nɑn wɑɑ tie Yennu bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ. L pɑɑk, k b ji k mɔk leku Yennu tuɑnn k sɑɑ yet ɑ b k mi b biit.
45001021	B mi Yennu, ŋɑɑn b k tien’ɔ bɑɑkl nbɑ k u yen nɑ, k biɑ k tien’ɔ niipuouk. B mɔk jɑt-dudukt, k b dudukt be bunbɔnn ni.
45001022	B yɑɑ ɑ b mɔk yɑn e, ŋɑɑn tie wɑɑtb.
45001023	Bɑɑ bo sii jiɑntl Yennu nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ, b k sɑk, ŋɑɑn jiɑntl pɑtɑ nbɑ k niib nɑn’m k l nɑɑn nifosɑɑli nbɑ sɑɑ fit kpo nɑ, ɑmi nuɑni, ɑmi bonkobt, ɑmi bonfulinkɑ nbɑ fuln tinŋ ni.
45001024	L pɑɑk, k Yennu nyik’b, ɑ bii tuun biit nbɑ k b pɑlɑ luon, k b dint b mɔnŋ fei b gbɑnɑnt tuonɑ ni nɑn b lieb.
45001025	B jii lin nbɑ tie bɑlmɔni k jikt sɑɑ Yennu po nɑ k lu, ŋɑɑn sɑk fɑɑk, k lebt k jiɑntl lin nbɑ k Yennu nɑn, ŋɑɑn nyik Yennu mɔnŋ mɔnŋ, wun nbɑ yen pɑku kul mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Amenn.
45001026	L pɑɑk, k Yennu nyik’b ɑ bii tuun b mɔnŋ lonbiiuk nbɑ mɔk fei, k b puob nyik bii duɑ nɑn jɑb ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt k duɑ nɑn b lieb.
45001027	Nnɑ e mun k jɑb nyik bii duɑ nɑn puob ŋɑɑn k b niɑɔnŋ be b lieb ni bonciɑnn. Jɑb tie bonsiɑ nbɑ mɔk fei nɑn jɑlieb. L pɑɑk, k b lɑ tubdɑtu b gbɑnɑnt ni k l jɑnŋ nɑn b biit.
45001028	Nifosɑɑli nbɑ din k luon k bin bɑnn Yennu, l pɑɑk e k Yennu nyik’b nɑn b dudukbiit, k b tuun tuonɑ nbɑ bi bonciɑnn.
45001029	K biit kul be b ni, k b gbie nɑn biit nɑn niɑnciɑɔnŋ nɑn tonu nɑn nikpinu nɑn kunkɔnɑ nɑn fɑi nɑn dudukbiit, k biɑ tie sɑnjɑɑnjɑnnɑ,
45001030	k piɑk biil b lieb, k tie Yennu dɑtɑi, k suki b lieb k mɔk gɑluk k dont b mɔnŋ, k biɑ ŋɑmi duki dudukbiit sɔni, k k sɑɑk b bɑɑnbɑ nɑn b nɑɑnbɑ mɔi.
45001031	B biɑ k mɔk yɑnsiɑn b ni. B k wɑɑ b mɔsonɑ biɑk. B k mɔk lonm nɑn b lieb k biɑ k tiin lieb ninbɑɑɔk.
45001032	B mi nɑn Yennu sennu wɑnn nɑn bin nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ nɑ buolu, b nyuɑt tie kuun e, ŋɑɑn b lek kpɑn tuun ŋɑnn e, k biɑ tɑɑ bin nbɑ tuun l tuonbuolu nɑ po.
45002001	L pɑɑk, fin nbɑ bu ɑ luɑ buut nɑ, suklu kɑɑ ɑ pɑɑk, k mɑɑn fɑɑ bu ɑ luɑ buut nɑ, ɑ mun bu ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ buut e k mɑɑn ɑ mun tuun nnɑ e.
45002002	T mi nɑn Yennu nbɑ bu bin nbɑ tuun nnɑ nɑ buut nɑ, u buut bunu nɑ tuok.
45002003	Fin nbɑ tie nifosɑɑlk k wɑnt lieb biit, bɑɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ, ŋɑɑn mun tuun nnɑ nɑ, ɑ duki nɑn Yennu kɑn dɑt ɑ tubl ii?
45002004	Ami ɑ sɑlkt lonciɑɔnŋ nɑn suklu bonciɑnn nbɑ k Yennu mɔk nɑn’t nɑ ɑmi nlee? A k mi nɑn Yennu mɔk bulcint nɑn’ɑ ɑ wun te k ɑ mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ ee?
45002005	Ŋɑɑn ɑ pɑl wɑki k ɑ lek k sɑk nɑn fɑn mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ nɑ, l pɑɑk, ɑ puki ɑ mɔnŋ fɑlɑ nbɑ k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ dɑɑl nbɑ k Yennu wutuol nɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi pɑɑnu, k u tɑn sɑɑ bu niib buut nɑn bɑlmɔni,
45002006	k tul suɑ kul u tuonɑ nyuɑt nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
45002007	Bin nbɑ ninbinɑ mɔn nɑn bii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ k lɑ pɑku nɑn bɑɑkl nɑn mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ, ŋɑnm e k Yennu sɑɑ tul’b mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu mɑnŋ.
45002008	Ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ mɔk kunkɔnɑ, k k sɑk lin nbɑ tie bɑlmɔni nɑ, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ bonbiil sɔnu, ŋɑnm e k Yennu wutuol sɑɑ do b pɑɑk k wun bu b buut.
45002009	U sɑɑ jii fɑlɑ nɑn muksuk k tul nisɑɑli kul nbɑ tuun biit nɑ. Suifnbɑ nɑ e sɑɑ lɑ l tubdɑtu sinsinn, k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ n juont.
45002010	Ŋɑɑn Yennu sɑɑ jii pɑku nɑn bɑɑkl nɑn mɑnu k tul bin nbɑ kul tuun bonŋɑnn nɑ. Suifnbɑ sɑɑ gɑl sinsinn, k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ n juont,
45002011	k mɑɑn Yennu k mɔk ningɑnni.
45002012	Bin nbɑ kul k mi Yennu senni k tuun biit, b lek sɑɑ kpo b biit tumu nɑ pɑɑk ɑ, ŋɑɑn l k tie bɑɑ k diɑ senni nɑ pɑɑk nɑ kɑɑ. Bin nbɑ kul mɔk Yennu senni nɑ, ŋɑɑn tuun biit, Yennu tɑn sɑɑ jii senni mɑnŋ e k bu nɑn’m.
45002013	K mɑɑn l k tie ɑ bin nbɑ gbiɑ senni nɑ kɑɑ tie niŋɑnm Yennu buol, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ set tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ k senni nɑ wɑnn nɑ, ŋɑnm e tie niŋɑnm u buol.
45002014	Bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ, b k mɔk senni nɑ, ŋɑɑn b i tuun senni nɑ nbɑ wɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑn b tiɑɔnŋ yɑn i e, b mɔk b tiɑɔnŋ senni b pɑlɑ ni, nɑn bɑɑ lek k mɔk senni mɑnŋ nɑ.
45002015	Ŋɑnn e wɑnt nɑn senni nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ diɑn b pɑlɑ ni, k b yɑngɑnm mun wɑnt’b lin nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn lin nbɑ k ŋɑn, k mɑɑn yuo nɑn yuo b dudukt tuu tɑn sɑk b tuon-yenɑ nɑn l ŋɑn, ŋɑɑn yosɑu mun b dudukt n biɑ yet b tuonliɑ pɑɑk nɑn l k ŋɑn.
45002016	Tɔn, l tɑn sii tie nnɑ e dɑɑl mɑnŋ dɑɑl nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ te k Yiesu Klistu n bu nisɑɑli wuol ni dudukt buut, nɑn mɑɑ muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
45002017	Gotl, ɑ yi ɑ mɔnŋ Suif e k mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnu fɑɑ mɔk senni nɑ pɑɑk k yi ɑ mɔnŋ Yennu yuɑ.
45002018	A mi lin nbɑ k Yennu luon fii tuun k senni wɑnn’ɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ k ɑ sɑɑ lukt lin nbɑ ŋɑn.
45002019	A tien yɑdɑ nɑn ɑ fit wɑnt juɑni sɔnu, k biɑ tie yentu k tul bin nbɑ be bunbɔnn ni nɑ.
45002020	A dukn nɑn ɑ fit kpɑɑn jɑtt nɑ kpɑɑni k biɑ tumi wɑɑs k mɑɑn ɑ mi nɑn ɑ mɔk minu kul nɑn bɑlmɔni kul, senni mɑnŋ ni.
45002021	A wɑnt lieb wɑnnu, ŋɑɑn bee k ɑ k wɑnt ɑ mɔnŋ i? A wɑnt lieb ɑ nɑn-yuk k ŋɑn, ŋɑɑn bee te k fin jɑɑn i?
45002022	Fin nbɑ wɑnt niib ɑ b dɑɑ tuun boncuncontuonɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn, ɑ biɑ conm ii? Fin nbɑ sɑlkt pɑtɑ mɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn bee te k ɑ jɑɑn puokpeli ni bonɑ?
45002023	Fin nbɑ fuɑ bɑlɑ senni mɑnŋ pɑɑk nɑ, ɑ yien senni mɑnŋ k dint Yennu fei,
45002024	nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Yinm Suifnbɑ pɑɑk e k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ piɑk k suki Yennu.»
45002025	L i tie k ɑ sɑk Yennu senni, ɑ punpotu mɔk nyuɑt, ŋɑɑn l i tie k ɑ k sɑk senni nɑ, l nɑɑn nɑn ɑ k pot nɑ e.
45002026	L pɑɑk, l i tie k wun nbɑ k pot nɑ sɑk senni e, Yennu kɑn gɑɑl’ɔ nɑn wun nbɑ pot nɑ ɑɑ?
45002027	Wun nbɑ k pot punn, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ senni nɑ, ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ bu fin nbɑ k sɑɑk senni ŋɑɑn biɑ mɔk senni k l diɑn senni kɑdɑɑɔk ni k biɑ pot punn nɑ buut.
45002028	Nilɔ nbɑ tie Suif pɑɑnu ni kuukuɑ, u k tie Suif nɑn mɔni. Punpotu nɑn mɔni mun k tie punpotu nbɑ niib goli nɑ kɑɑ.
45002029	Bɑlmɔni Suif tie wun nbɑ tie Suif u pɑl ni e. Punpotu nɑn mɔni mun be pɑl ni e, k l punpotu tie Foŋɑnm tuonn e k k tie senni nbɑ diɑn senni kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ. L dɑɑnɔ pɑku k nyii nisɑɑli buol kɑɑ, l nyii Yennu buol e.
45003001	L i tie k nilɔ i tie Suif, l mɔk nyɔlɑnt e? Punpotu mɔk nyuɑt ii?
45003002	L mɔk nyuɑt bonciɑnn. Sinsinn tie Yennu din jii u mɔbonɑ nɑ k guun Suifnbɑ e.
45003003	B siɑb ii dinŋ ii kii wɑɑ Yennu sɔnu nɑn bɑlmɔni e, l wɑnt nɑn Yennu ji kii tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ bɑɑ k wɑɑ’u nɑ pɑɑk ii?
