45003004	Aɑi, l k wɑnt nnɑ kɑɑ. Niib kul i bo i tie fɑi dɑnm, ŋɑɑn Yennu ŋɑnin tie bɑlmɔnpɑklɔ e, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ piɑk, b sɑɑ lɑ k ɑ mɔk mɔni, k b i bu ɑ buut, ɑ biɑ di mɔni e.»
45003005	Ŋɑɑn t biit i fiit wɑnn nɑn Yennu mɔk mɔni, bee k t sɑɑ yet i? Wɑɑ dɑt t tubɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k t ji sɑɑ yet ɑ u k mɔk mɔni ii? (Nisɑɑlk dudukt e k n yet nnɑ.)
45003006	Aɑi, n kɑn yet nnɑ kɑɑ. Yennu i kii mɔk mɔni, u bo kɑn fit kii bu tingbounŋ nɑ niib buut.
45003007	Tɔn, n fɑɑk nɑ i wɑnt nɑn Yennu mɔk mɔni k biɑ pukn’ɔ dontl, bee tien k u sɑɑ dɑt n tubl ɑ n tie biitdɑɑnɔ?
45003008	Bee k t ji kɑn yet ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k tin tun biit ɑ bonŋɑnn n tɑn bɑɑl,» ii? Setk nɑn mɔni, nisiɑb luon bin pɑk bonbiil k jiin n po k b tɑɑl’n ɑ n yet nnɑ. Yennu sɑɑ dɑt b tubɑ nɑn lɑɑ jɑnŋ nɑn’m biɑnŋ nbɑ e.
45003009	K l tie nlee? Tinm nbɑ tie Suifnbɑ nɑ, t binbenŋ cie bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ binbenŋ ɑmi? Aɑi, nɑn wɑɑn ɑ. N ponŋ dɔnŋ wɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ k Suifnbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ kul be biit yiikuo ni,
45003010	nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Suɑ kɑɑ k tie niŋɑnɔ, ɑɑi, nɑn yenɔ kuɑ wɑɑ.
45003011	Suɑ kɑɑ k mɔk minu, suɑ kɑɑ k kpɑɑn Yennu.
45003012	Suɑ kul kpet sɔnu nbɑ ŋɑn nɑ wɑɑ, k b kul bot ɑ. Suɑ kɑɑ k tuun bonŋɑnn, suɑ kɑɑ nɑn yenɔ kuɑ wɑɑ gbɑɑ.
45003013	B mɔi yɑɑ nɑn kɑyɑɑnt nɑ e, k fɑi nyi b jelmɑ ni, k lin nbɑ nyi b mɔi ni tie wɑɑɔk lɔbi e.
45003014	Mɔpolɑ nɑn mɑbiit kuukuɑ e nyi b mɔi ni.
45003015	K b tien siil nɑn nikpinu,
45003016	k siɑn nbɑ kul k b gɑl, pɑlbiil tuu tɑn bɑɑl lenŋ e.
45003017	B k mi sɔnu nbɑ k b sɑɑ tɔkn k lin bɑɑl nɑn mɑnu.
45003018	B binbenŋ ni, b k tiin Yennu.»
45003019	Tɔn, t mi nɑn Yennu senni i yet lin nbɑ, l yien k tien bin nbɑ be l yiikuo ni. L pɑɑk e k niib kul sii muu b mɔi, k tingbounŋ nɑ tieb kul be Yennu buut ni, k u tuɑnn suɑ kɑɑ k mɔk mɔni.
45003020	Suɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ fit tien niŋɑnɔ Yennu tuɑnn, wɑɑ wei senni nɑ nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn senni nɑ pɑɑk e te k nifosɑɑlk bɑnn nɑn u tuun biit.
45003021	Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, Yennu wɑnn’t bɑnnu nbɑ k u tien’t niŋɑnm u buol ni, k l k tie senni nɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ. Muois senni nɑ nɑn sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn nɑ wɑnt ŋɑnn e.
45003022	Yennu te k nisɑɑli kul nbɑ tien Yiesu Klistu yɑdɑ nɑ e tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn. L tie nɑ e k tul bin nbɑ kul nbɑ tien Yiesu Klistu yɑdɑ nɑ,
45003023	k mɑɑn nifosɑɑli kul tun biit k fɔk nɑn dontl nbɑ k Yennu luon wun tul’b nɑ.
45003024	Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk e k u yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn. L tie piini e, k mɑɑn Yiesu Klistu pɑ b pɑɑk k nyinn’b biit dɑɑbs ni.
45003025	Yennu e din luon k Yiesu n muɑn u sɔn k lii tie mɑlunŋ, k mɑlunŋ pɑɑk, k Yiesu n gɑɑl biit nyikcɑbu k tul bin nbɑ kul tien’ɔ yɑdɑ. Nnɑ e k Yennu din luon wun wɑnn bɑnnu nbɑ k u tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ: siɑn yuo u din mɔk suklu. U din k dɑt nisɑɑli tubɑ b biit pɑɑk.
45003026	Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ u wɑnn bɑnnu nbɑ k u te k nisɑɑli tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn k mɑɑn u luon wuu tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ kii biɑ kii te k nisɑɑli i tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn bɑɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
45003027	L pɑɑk, siɑl be k t mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnt nɑn’n ii? Aɑi, siɑl kɑɑ. Bee pɑɑk e? L tie bɑɑ wɑɑ senni nbɑ wɑnn lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk ee? Aɑi, ŋɑɑn bɑɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e k pɑlbifɑɑnt kɑɑ.
45003028	T duki k yien ɑ nisɑɑlk yɑdɑ tienu pɑɑk e k Yennu yet ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ, k l k tie ɑ wɑɑ wɑɑ senni nɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ.
45003029	Yennu tie Suifnbɑ kuukuɑ Yennu ee? U k tie bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ Yennu mun ii? Nnn, u biɑ tie bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ Yennu e,
45003030	k mɑɑn Yen-yenɔ kuɑ e be k sɑɑ yet ɑ Suifnbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ, k b kul n tien niŋɑnm u tuɑnn b yɑdɑ tienu pɑɑk.
45003031	Tɔn, tɑɑ yet ɑ nifosɑɑlk lɑɑt fielu u yɑdɑ tienu ni e nɑ, ŋɑnn e te k senni nɑ tie yɑnn ii? Aɑi, l k tie nnɑ kɑɑ. T lek sie senni nɑ po e.
45004001	Tɔn, t sɑɑ yet ɑ bee k jikt sɑɑ t yejɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm po? U din lɑ bee?
45004002	Wɑɑ din wɑɑ senni nɑ ii dinŋ ii te k Yennu yet ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ u tuɑnn, u bo sii mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnt, ŋɑɑn u kii mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnt Yennu tuɑnn.
45004003	L diɑn nlee Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni? L yet ɑ: «Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din tien Yennu yɑdɑ e, k u yɑdɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk e k Yennu tien’ɔ niŋɑnɔ u tuɑnn.»
45004004	L i tie k nilɔ tuun tuonɑ, u nyuɑt kii tie piini kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l sii tie pɑɑɔk o.
45004005	Ŋɑɑn nilɔ nbɑ k tien senni weiu nɑ yɑdɑ, ŋɑɑn tien Yennu yɑdɑ, Yennu sɑɑ jii l dɑɑnɔ k u tie niŋɑnɔ u tuɑnn. L dɑɑnɔ yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k Yennu sɑɑ jii’u.
45004006	Nnɑ e k Dɑɑfiid din yet ɑ dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k Yennu jii’u k u tie niŋɑnɔ u tuɑnn k l k tie ɑ u tuonɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ, l dɑɑnɔ mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn.
45004007	Dɑɑfiid din yet ɑ: «Dɑnm nbɑ k Yennu nyik b biit k cɑb’b k piin b biit nɑ, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e.
45004008	Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k Yennu k tiɑn u biit po, pɑlpienn tie u yɑl e.»
45004009	L pɑlpienn mɑnŋ tie bin nbɑ pot nɑ kuukuɑ yɑl ɑmi ii? Kuo l mun biɑ tie bin nbɑ k pot nɑ yɑl e? T ponŋ bo yet ɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din tien Yennu yɑdɑ e, k u yɑdɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk e k Yennu jii’u k u tie niŋɑnɔ u tuɑnn.
45004010	Nlee yuo e k Yennu din jii’u nnɑ? Yennu ponŋ din yi’u niŋɑnɔ e wɑɑ, k u tɑn pot ɑmi u din pot e wɑɑ, k Yennu yi’u niŋɑnɔ? Aɑi, Yennu ponŋ din yi’u niŋɑnɔ e wɑɑ, k u tɑn pot.
45004011	U din pot ɑ, ŋɑɑn u potu mɑnŋ tie siɑlɑ nbɑ wɑnt nɑn u yɑdɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk e k Yennu ponŋ din jii’u k u tie niŋɑnɔ. L puolpo e wɑɑ, k u ji tɑn pot. L pɑɑk, bin nbɑ kul tie Yennu yɑdɑ ŋɑɑn k k pot nɑ, Ablɑɑhɑɑnm tie b bɑɑ e. Bɑɑ tie Yennu yɑdɑ pɑɑk e, k Yennu yi’b niŋɑnm.
45004012	Ablɑɑhɑɑnm tie bin nbɑ pot nɑ mun yɑɑ bɑɑ e. L k tie ɑ bɑɑ pot nɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn bɑɑ biɑ wɑɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ k t bɑɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din tien Yennu yɑdɑ nɑ, l puolpo e wɑɑ k u din tɑn pot. B yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm tie b bɑɑ.
45004013	Yennu din senn mɔsonn k tul Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑn u yɑɑbuonɑ ɑ tingbounŋ nɑ tɑn sii tie b yɑl e. L din k tie nɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nbɑ wɑɑ senni nɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ k Yennu senn mɔsonn mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn Yennu nbɑ din jii Ablɑɑhɑɑnm k u tie niŋɑnɔ ŋuɑ Yennu tuɑnn u yɑdɑ pɑɑk nɑ, pɑɑk e k Yennu din senn mɔsonn mɑnŋ.
45004014	L i bo i tie k Yennu mɔsonn nɑ tie bin nbɑ diɑ senni mɑnŋ yɑl i e, ŋɑnn ŋɑnin, nilɔ yɑdɑ bo sii tie yɑnn e, k Yennu mɔsonn bo kii mɔk nyuɑt,
45004015	k mɑɑn senni e bɑɑt nɑn Yennu wutuol ŋɑɑn senni i kɑɑ, mɔyetuk biɑ sii kɑɑ.
45004016	L pɑɑk, Yennu mɔsonn sie yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e, ɑ lii tie piini nbɑ nyii Yennu buol kii biɑ kii tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ kul yɑl. L k tie bin nbɑ wɑɑ senni nɑ kuukuɑ yɑl kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ kul tien Yennu yɑdɑ nɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nbɑ din tien biɑnŋ nbɑ. Ablɑɑhɑɑnm e tie t kul ɑ bɑɑ,
45004017	nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni k u yet Ablɑɑhɑɑnm ɑ: «N tien’ɑ nibuolu bonciɑnn bɑɑ e.» L pɑɑk, Ablɑɑhɑɑnm tie t bɑɑ e Yennu buol, wun nbɑ k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ. Ŋuɑ e te k kpienm lɑɑt mɑnfuol, k biɑ piɑk lin nbɑ dɑɑ k be po nɑn l set be.
45004018	Siɑl din k wɑnt nɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm ii mɔk dindɑnn ŋɑɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm lek ji din mɔk dindɑnn k biɑ tien yɑdɑ, k u din tien nibuolu bonciɑnn bɑɑ, nɑn Yennu nbɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «A yɑɑbuonɑ tɑn sɑɑ pɔt bonciɑnn.»
45004019	Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din lɑ nɑn binɑ kobk nɑ, k din mi nɑn u gbɑnɑnt kpet ɑ, k u ŋɑɑpuo Sɑɑlɑ biɑ din tie puokɑnmɑtl e, ŋɑɑn nɑn l kul ɑ gbɑɑ, Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑdɑ din k wɑt.
45004020	U mɑntk din tien Yennu yɑdɑ, u din k mɔk bilsuk nɑn Yennu mɔsonn nɑ, u yɑdɑ e din te k u pɑl cie, k u din piɑk Yennu.
45004021	U mɑntk din mi k k bils nɑn Yennu mɔk yiikuo k set sɑɑ fit tun lin nbɑ k u senn nɑ.
45004022	L pɑɑk, k: «Yennu jii’u k u tie niŋɑnɔ,» k mɑɑn u tien Yennu yɑdɑ.
45004023	Ŋɑɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm kuukuɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ k l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Yennu jii’u k u tie niŋɑnɔ,»
45004024	ŋɑɑn l diɑn k tien tinm nbɑ k Yennu sɑɑ gɑɑl’t mun k t tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn, k mɑɑn tɑɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, ŋuɑ Yennu wun nbɑ fiin t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu kuun ni nɑ.
45004025	Ŋuɑ e din jii Yiesu k cɑb k u kpo t biit pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn biɑ fiin’ɔ kuun ni, ɑ wun te k tii tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn.
45005001	L pɑɑk, Yennu nbɑ jii’t k t tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn t yɑdɑ pɑɑk nɑ e, k mɑnu ji be tinm nɑn Yennu sinsuuk ni t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk.
45005002	Yiesu ni e k t fit cɑt nɑkn Yennu k lɑ u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ t yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk k ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ mɑnŋ ni k t be k wɑki. T ji mɔk pɑlpienn nbɑ kɑɑ pɑɑk k mɑɑn t mɔk dindɑnn nɑn t tɑn sii mɔk Yennu yudɑnt.
45005003	Nɑn l kul nɑ, t biɑ mɔk pɑlpienn t fɑldinu ni, k mɑɑn t mi nɑn fɑldinu bɑɑt nɑn gbɑnkul e,
45005004	k gbɑnkul mun bɑɑt nɑn pɑlcienn, k pɑlcienn mɑnŋ mun bɑɑt nɑn dindɑnn,
45005005	k dindɑnn mɑnŋ ni t tɑn kɑn di fei, k mɑɑn Yennu jii lonm nbɑ k u mɔk nɑ k tien t pɑlɑ ni, Foŋɑnm nbɑ k u tul’t nɑ ni.
45005006	Setk nɑn mɔni, yuo nbɑ k t dɑɑ din k mɔk sonml nɑ, Klistu din gɑɑl biitdɑnm pɑɑk k kpo, k l tie yuo nbɑ k Yennu din senn e.
45005007	L pɑɑl nɑn nilɔ n gɑɑl nipiemɔ pɑɑk k kpo, ŋɑɑn pɑsiɑl ɑ sɑɑ lɑ suɑ wun gɑɑl niŋɑnɔ pɑɑk k kpo,
45005008	ŋɑɑn Yennu wɑnn nɑn u set luon’t bonciɑnn k mɑɑn tɑɑ din tie biitdɑnm nɑ Klistu din gɑɑl t pɑɑk k kpo.
45005009	L i tie k Yennu yet ɑ t tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn, Yiesu sɔn pɑɑk i e, nnɑ e mun k Yiesu mun sɑɑ fɑt’t Yennu wutociɑɔnŋ nɑ ni wɑɑ.
45005010	T din tuu tie Yennu dɑtɑi e, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ jik, l ji ŋɑnm tinm nɑn ŋuɑ sinsuuk ni, bilsuk ji kɑɑ nɑn u sɑɑ fiel’t, k mɑɑn u Bijɑ nɑ kuun pɑɑk, k mɔtɑɑnɑ lɑɑ ŋɑnm tinm nɑn Yennu sinsuuk ni nɑ, u ji sɑɑ fiel’t Yiesu mɑnfuol pɑɑk ɑ.
45005011	Ŋɑɑn l kul kɑɑ nɑ. T biɑ mɔk pɑlpienn Yennu nbɑ sonm’t bonciɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu ŋɑnm tinm nɑn ŋuɑ sinsuuk ni.
45005012	Tɔn, niyenɔ kuɑ e din te k biit bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k u biit nɑ pɑɑk e te k kuun be. L pɑɑk e te k kuun kpi niib kul, k mɑɑn nisɑɑlk kul tun biit ɑ.
45005013	Biit din be tingbounŋ nɑ ni e wɑɑ k Yennu din tɑn tul Muois senni nɑ, ŋɑɑn senni i kɑɑ, suɑ kɑn tɑɑl nilɔ k yet ɑ u biil senni mɑnŋ.
45005014	Lɑɑ nyii Adɑn yuo ni k tɑn tuu Muois yuo, k kuun mɔk yiikuo suɑ kul pɑɑk, k kpi dɑnm kul nɑn bin nbɑ din k biil Yennu sennu nɑn Adɑn nbɑ din biil bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ. Tɔn, Adɑn din tie wun nbɑ din yɑɑ wun wei puol nɑ ninnɑɔnŋ o.
45005015	Ŋɑɑn b bɑnle nɑ k jɑn, k mɑɑn Yennu piini nbɑ k u pi’t yɑnn nɑ k tie nɑn Adɑn biit nɑ kɑɑ. L tie mɔni e nɑn niib bonciɑnn kpo niyenɔ kuɑ biit pɑɑk e, ŋɑɑn Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ yɑb, k u piini nbɑ k u tien niib bonciɑnn yɑnn k l nyii niyenɔ kuɑ ni, wun nbɑ tie Yiesu Klistu nɑ mun biɑ cie nnɑ.
45005016	Bɔktu be Yennu piini nɑn niyenɔ kuɑ Adɑn biit sinsuuk ni, k mɑɑn niyenɔ kuɑ Adɑn biit mɑnŋ puolpo e k Yennu din bu u buut k yet ɑ u biit mɑnŋ ŋɑn nɑn tubdɑtu, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ Yiesu piini nbɑ k u pi’t yɑnn nɑ tie nyikcɑbu, biit bonciɑnn puolpo e.
45005017	Niyenɔ kuɑ mɑnŋ biit pɑɑk e k kuun kpi suɑ kul, k l nyii niyenɔ mɑnŋ buol e, ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ wei niyenɔ kuɑ Yiesu Klistu tuonn nɑ gɑl nnɑ wɑɑ. Niib kul nbɑ lɑ Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nbɑ yɑb, nɑn u piini nbɑ tie nyikcɑbu piini nɑ, b sɑɑ di nɑɑn kii mɔk mɑnfuol Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk.
45005018	Ŋɑnn e k niyenɔ kuɑ mɑnŋ biit pɑɑk e te k suɑ kul ŋɑn nɑn tubdɑtu, nnɑ e mun, niyenɔ kuɑ tuonŋɑnn pɑɑk e te k Yennu yi niib niŋɑnm k b lɑ mɑnfuol.
45005019	Niyenɔ kuɑ nbɑ k b yi’u Adɑn nɑ mɔyetuk pɑɑk e te k niib bonciɑnn tien biitdɑnm. L mun tie nnɑ e nɑn niyenɔ kuɑ nbɑ k b yi’u Klistu nɑ mɔsɑku pɑɑk k niib bonciɑnn tien niŋɑnm Yennu buol.
45005020	Senni nɑ bɑɑl ɑ lin te k biit n yɑbt, ŋɑɑn k biit nbɑ din yɑbt nɑ, Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ mun din yɑbt k gɑl nnɑ.
45005021	L pɑɑk, biit nbɑ din te k nisɑɑli kpenn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, nnɑ e mun k Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk te k u yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u buol, k tul’b mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk.
45006001	L pɑɑk, t sɑɑ yet nlee? T biɑ sii be t biit tumu ni e k Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ n pukn ɑmi ii?
45006002	Aɑi, ŋɑnn kɑɑ. L tie nɑn t kpo nɑ e, k l pɑɑk biit k mɔk t yiikuo. Nlee k t sɑɑ biɑl biit tumu ni?
45006003	I k bɑn nɑn bɑɑ din wul’t Yennu nyunwulu, ɑ lin tɑɑn tinm nɑn Yiesu Klistu nɑ, l wulu biɑ din tɑɑn tinm nɑn Yiesu Klistu u kuun ni ee?
45006004	L pɑɑk, t din kpo e nɑn Klistu k b lɑkn pii’t nɑn’ɔ Yennu nyunwulu ni, k u Bɑɑ nbɑ din jii u bɑktnɔunŋ yiikuo k fiin’ɔ kuun ni nɑ, nnɑ e k t mun fiil ɑ tii be mɑnfopɑɑnn ni.
45006005	L i tie k tinm nɑn Klistu lɑkn kpo, nnɑ e biɑk k t biɑ sɑɑ lɑkn k fiil kuun ni nɑn wɑɑ din fiil biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
45006006	T mi nɑn t binbenkpelk nɑ lɑkn k kpo nɑn Yiesu u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk, ɑ t biit binbenŋ nɑ ji dɑɑ mɔk yiikuo, k t ji kii be biit dɑbs ni,
45006007	k mɑɑn wun nbɑ kpo nɑ ji k be biit dɑbs ni.
45006008	L i tie k t kpo nɑn Klistu nɑ, t tien yɑdɑ nɑn t sii be mɑnfuol ni nɑn’ɔ.
45006009	T mi nɑn Yennu nbɑ din fiin Klistu kuun ni nɑ, k u ji kɑn mi kpo. Kuun k mɔk u yiikuo.
45006010	Yiesu nbɑ din kpo nɑ, u din kpo t biit pɑɑk e tɑɑl yonm kuɑ, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ ji be u mɑnfuol ni nɑ, u be k tien Yennu e.
45006011	Nnɑ e mun, i jii i mɔnŋ k lii nɑɑn nɑn i kpo nɑ k biit ji k mɔk i yiikuo, ŋɑɑn, Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk, i ji be i mɑnfuol ni k tien Yennu.
45006012	L pɑɑk, i dɑɑ cɑbt k biit n yent i gbɑnɑnt nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ kpo wɑɑ nɑ, k te k i tuun gbɑnɑnt mɑnŋ lonm.
45006013	Dɑɑ cɑbt biit k l mɔk i gbɑnɑnt yɑɑk k tuun nɑn’n bonbiil, ŋɑɑn jiin i mɔnŋ k tul Yennu, ŋɑɑn kii tie nɑn i nyii kuun ni e k kuɑ mɑnfuol ni nɑ. Jiin i gbɑnɑnt kul k tul Yennu ɑ lii tuun lin nbɑ tuok.
45006014	K mɑɑn, senni nbɑ ji k yen’i, ŋɑɑn Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ e yen’i nɑ, l k ŋɑn k biit i mɔk i yɑɑk.
45006015	Tɔn, senni nɑ nbɑ k yen’t nɑ, i ŋɑɑn k Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ e i yen’t, t sɑɑ biɑl biit tumu ni ɑmi ii? Aɑi, t kɑn tien nnɑ kɑɑ.
45006016	I mi nɑn l i tie k i jii i mɔnŋ k tul suɑ ɑ yin sɑk u mɔb i e, i set tie wun nbɑ k sɑɑk u mɔb nɑ dɑɑbɑ e. I i sɑk k tuun biit, i tie biit dɑɑbɑ e, k l juontu tie kuun e. Ŋɑɑn i i sɑk Yennu mɔb, i tie mɔsɑkdɑnm e, k ŋɑnn e sɑɑ te k i tie niŋɑnm Yennu buol.
45006017	Siɑn yuo, biit din mɔk i yiikuo, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ i mɑntk sɑɑk bɑlmɔni wɑnnu nbɑ k b din wɑnt’i nɑ nɑn i pɑlɑ kul. L pɑɑk, k n tien Yennu niipuouk.
45006018	Mɔtɑɑnɑ i ji k tie biit dɑɑbɑ, ŋɑɑn i ji tie dɑɑbɑ k tul lin nbɑ tuok nɑ tumu e.
45006019	Yinm nisɑɑli nbɑ k fit bɑnt Yennu mɑɑn yiɑn nɑ pɑɑk e k n yɑɑ n pɑk nisɑɑlk yɑn k wɑnn’i u lɑbɑɑl. Yɑɑ din jii i mɔnŋ k tien biit dɑɑbɑ k l nɔb nɑ, mɔtɑɑnɑ jiin mɑn i mɔnŋ kii tuun yentinu tuonɑ kii tie niŋɑnm.
45006020	Yɑɑ din tuu tie biit dɑɑbɑ nɑ, i din k tie lin nbɑ tuok nɑ dɑɑbɑ.
45006021	Tuonɑ nbɑ k i din tuun k l mɔk’i fei mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ, l din mɔk nyɔlɑnt e k tul’i ni? L tuonbuolu bɑɑt nɑn kuun e.
45006022	Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ i ji nyii biit dɑɑbs ni wɑɑ k ji tie Yennu dɑɑbɑ e. L pɑɑk, yɑɑ tuun lin nbɑ kul, i gbuot Yennu nunm e k mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Ŋɑnn e tie i nyuɑt.
45006023	K mɑɑn biit nyuɑt tie kuun e, ŋɑɑn Yennu piini nbɑ k u tien’t yɑnn nɑ tie mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu e, t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk.
45007001	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, i kul mi senni nɑ po, l pɑɑk, i sɑɑ fit suol mɑɑ yɑɑ n yet lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk ɑ. Senni nɑ mɔk wun nbɑ be u mɑnfuol ni nɑ kuukuɑ yiikuo e.
45007002	L tie nɑn puo nɑn u sɔlɔ sinsuuk ni nɑ e. Senni nɑ nuɑk ni, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn puo n tɑɑn nɑn u sɔlɔ yuo nbɑ k u sɔlɔ dɑɑ be u mɑnfuol ni, ŋɑɑn u sɔlɔ nɑ i tɑnŋ i kpo yuo nbɑ, senni nɑ ji k mɔk puo nɑ yiikuo.
45007003	L pɑɑk, l i tie k u kun jɑluɑ k suɑ u sɔlɔ dɑɑ be u mɑnfuol ni, b sii yi’u puocunconn e. Ŋɑɑn l i tie k u sɔlɔ kpo i e, Yennu senni ji k mɔk u yiikuo, k u sɑɑ fit kun jɑluɑ ŋɑɑn k b kɑn fit k yiin’ɔ puocunconn.
45007004	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, l mun tie nnɑ e k tul’i. I kpo e k senni ji k mɔk i yiikuo, k yɑɑ tie Klistu gbɑnɑnt bɔkl nɑ, i tie suɑ yɑb e. Mɔtɑɑnɑ, i gɑɑ nɑn nisuɑ e, wun nbɑ fiil kuun ni nɑ, ɑ yii tuun lin nbɑ mɔk nyuɑt k tul Yennu.
45007005	Yuo nbɑ k t din tuun t gbɑnɑnt lonm nɑ e, senni nɑ te k t mɔk niɑnbiiuk k l tuun t gbɑnɑnt ni. Niɑnbiiuk mɑnŋ e din te k t tuonɑ juontl nɑn kuun.
45007006	Mɔtɑɑnɑ ŋɑnin, senni nɑ k diɑ’t k mɑɑn t din kpo e k senni nɑ ji k mɔk t yiikuo. L pɑɑk, t ji fit tuun k tien Yennu nɑn binbenpɑɑnŋ nbɑ nyii Foŋɑnm buol ni. T ji k tuun nɑn binbenkpelk nbɑ k senni nbɑ diɑn lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni mɔk l yiikuo nɑ kɑɑ.
45007007	L pɑɑk, t sɑɑ yet ɑ nlee? T sɑɑ yet ɑ senni tie lin nbɑ bɑɑt nɑn biit ɑmi? T kɑn yet nnɑ kɑɑ. Senni nɑ i bo i kɑɑ, n bo kɑn bɑnn biit nbɑ tie lin nbɑ. Senni nɑ i bo i kii wɑnn’n ɑ: ɑ dɑɑ mɔk niɑɔnŋ nɑn ɑ luɑ bonɑ, n bo kɑn bɑnn niɑɔnŋ nbɑ tie lin nbɑ,
45007008	ŋɑɑn k biit lɑ yiikuo sennu mɑnŋ nɑ ni, k te k niɑnbuolu buolu bonciɑnn fiil n pɑl ni. Senni nɑ i bo i kɑɑ, biit bo sii tie bonkpienn e.
45007009	Yuo nbɑ k n din k mi senni mɑnŋ nɑ, n din mɔk mɑnfuol e, ŋɑɑn mɑɑ tɑn bɑnn sennu mɑnŋ, k biit fiil, k n kpo.
45007010	Sennu nbɑ bo sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑn mɑnfuol nɑ, k l bɑɑl nɑn kuun,
45007011	k mɑɑn biit lɑ u sɔnu senni nɑ ni e k kpɑnn’n, k lenŋ e k l kpii’n.
45007012	Senni nɑ tiɑɔnŋ nyii Yennu buol k sennu mɑnŋ mun nyii Yennu buol e, k tuok k biɑ ŋɑn.
45007013	Tɔn, l wɑnt nɑn lin nbɑ ŋɑn e kpɑnt tien lin nbɑ bɑɑl nɑn kuun k tul’n ɑmi? Aɑi, l k wɑnt nnɑ kɑɑ. Biit nɑ e jii lin nbɑ ŋɑn nɑ k bɑɑl nɑn kuun tul’n, ɑ lin wɑnn biit nbɑ tie lin nbɑ. Ŋɑnn e, sennu mɑnŋ ni k t ji bɑnn nɑn biit tie bonbilɑnkɑnt e.
45007014	T mi nɑn senni nyii Yennu buol e, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin tie nisɑɑlk e, k b kɔi’n k n tie nɑn biit dɑɑbl nɑ.
45007015	Lin nbɑ k n tuun nɑ, n k mi l pɑɑk, k mɑɑn n k tuun lin nbɑ k n luon, ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ k n nɑn nɑ, ŋɑnn e k n tuun.
45007016	Mi i tun lin nbɑ k n bo k luon k n tun nɑ, l wɑnt nɑn n sɑk nɑn senni mɑnŋ ŋɑn e.
45007017	L pɑɑk, l k tie n mɔnŋ kɑɑ tuun’l, ŋɑɑn l tie biit nbɑ be n ni nɑ.
45007018	N mi nɑn bonŋɑnsiɑl kɑɑ n ni, k l wɑnt nɑn n biit binbenŋ ni, k mɑɑn n luon k n tun lin nbɑ ŋɑn, ŋɑɑn n kɑn fit k tuun’l.
45007019	Mɑɑ luon k n tun bonŋɑnn nbɑ nɑ, n k tuun’l, ŋɑɑn bonbiil nbɑ k n k luon k n tun nɑ, ŋɑnn e k n tuun.
45007020	L i tie k n tuun lin nbɑ k n k luon mii tuun, l ji k tie min kɑɑ tuun, ŋɑɑn l tie biit nbɑ be n ni nɑ e tuun.
45007021	N lɑ k sennsiɑl be n ni yuo kul ɑ. Mi i yɑɑ n tun lin nbɑ ŋɑn, ŋɑɑn bonbiil biɑ lek tuu be nɑn’n.
45007022	K mɑɑn n ni, n pɑl pien Yennu senni nɑ pɑɑk,
45007023	ŋɑɑn k n lɑɑt sennsiɑl nbɑ tuun n gbɑnɑnt ni, k l kɔn nɑn senni nbɑ k n yɑn luon nɑ. Sennliel nbɑ bɑɑt nɑn biit nɑ tuun n gbɑnɑnt ni k lol’n nɑn dɑnsɑlk nɑ.
45007024	Abɑ, n tie yɑnbɔndɑɑnɔ e. Ŋmee sɑɑ fɑt’n k nyinn’n gbɑnɑnt nbɑ sɑɑ nɑn’n kuun ni nɑ?
45007025	Yennu yien niipuouk t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu ni. L pɑɑk, n mɔnŋ wɑɑ Yennu senni nɑ n yɑn ni, ŋɑɑn k n nifosɑɑlk binbenŋ ni n tie sennliel nbɑ bɑɑt nɑn biit nɑ dɑɑbl e.
45008001	Tɔn, mɔtɑɑnɑ Yennu kɑn bu k biil bin nbɑ be Yiesu Klistu ni,
45008002	k mɑɑn mɑɑ tɑɑn nɑn Yiesu Klistu nɑ, Foŋɑnm senni nbɑ tien mɑnfuol nɑ, fɑt’n biit nɑn kuun senni ni wɑɑ.
45008003	Senni nɑ k fit tun nnɑ, k mɑɑn tinm nisɑɑli k fit diɑ’l fɑnu. Ŋɑnn e k Yennu din tun u mɔnŋ Bijɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ɑ wun gɑɑl binbenŋ nbɑ nɑɑn nɑn tinm biitdɑnm binbenŋ nɑ, k tɑn gɑɑl t pɑɑk k kpo t biit pɑɑk. K u kuun mɑnŋ pɑɑk, Yennu biil biit nbɑ be tinm nisɑɑli pɑlɑ ni nɑ pɑnŋ.
45008004	Yennu din tun nnɑ, ɑ senni nbɑ boi’t lin nbɑ nɑ, n tun t ni, tinm nbɑ ji k tuun t tiɑɔnŋ gbɑnɑnt lonm, ŋɑɑn tuun Foŋɑnm nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.
45008005	Bin nbɑ wɑɑ b tiɑɔnŋ nisɑɑlk binbenŋ nɑ jiit b dudukt k tie binbenŋ mɑnŋ ni, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ wɑɑ Foŋɑnm nɑ jiit b dudukt k tie lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm luon nɑ ni e.
45008006	Dudukt nbɑ wɑɑ nisɑɑlk binbenŋ nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ, juontl nɑn kuun e, ŋɑɑn dudukt nbɑ wɑɑ Foŋɑnm nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ, juontl nɑn mɑnfuol nɑn mɑnu e.
45008007	Wun nbɑ yɑɑ dudukt be nisɑɑlk binbenŋ yiikuo ni, l dɑɑnɔ tie Yennu dɑtɑɑk, k k sɑɑk Yennu senni, k set kɑn fit k sɑk’l.
45008008	Bin nbɑ be b nisɑɑlk binbenŋ ni nɑ kɑn fit penn Yennu pɑl.
45008009	Foŋɑnm i set be i ni, i k wɑɑ nisɑɑlk binbenŋ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn i wɑɑ Foŋɑnm nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ e. Wun nbɑ k mɔk Klistu Siek mɑnŋ u ni, l dɑɑnɔ k tie Klistuyuɑ.
45008010	I gbɑnɑnt nbɑ lek sɑɑ kpo biit pɑɑk nɑ, ŋɑɑn Yiesu i be i ni, Foŋɑnm tien’i mɑnfuol, k mɑɑn Yennu yet ɑ i tie niŋɑnm e u buol.
45008011	L i tie k Yennu Siek nbɑ fiin Yiesu kuun ni nɑ be i ni, ŋuɑ nbɑ fiin Yiesu Klistu kuun ni nɑ sɑɑ tul i gbɑnɑnt nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ kpo wɑɑ nɑ mɑnfuol, Siek nbɑ be i ni nɑ pɑɑk.
45008012	L pɑɑk, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, l luon k t mɑbn t mɔnŋ k dɑɑ wɑɑ nisɑɑlk binbenŋ nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ.
45008013	K mɑɑn, l i tie k i wɑɑ nisɑɑlk binbenŋ, i sɑɑ kpo wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l i tie k i jii Foŋɑnm yiikuo k kpi i gbɑnɑnt biit, i sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol ɑ.
45008014	Bin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm ŋmɑktl’b sɔnu nɑ, ŋɑnm e tie Yennu wɑɑs.
45008015	K mɑɑn Foŋɑnm nbɑ k u tul’i nɑ, u k te k i tie dɑɑbɑ nɑn jɑŋmɑɑndɑnm kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u te k i tie Yennu wɑɑs e, k yi Yennu ɑ: «Abbɑ! n Bɑɑ.»
45008016	Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ e te k t mɔnŋ sei mi bonŋɑnn nɑn t tie Yennu wɑɑs.
45008017	Tɑɑ set tie u wɑɑs nɑ pɑɑk, t sɑɑ lɑ u bonŋɑnɑ nbɑ k u bil k guun u niib nɑ wɑɑ. T biɑ sɑɑ lɑkn nɑn Klistu k gɑɑl’l ɑ, k mɑɑn l i tie k tinm nɑn Klistu libn dii fɑlɑ, tinm nɑn ŋuɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ libn lɑ yudɑnt ɑ.
45008018	N mi nɑn fɑlɑ nbɑ k t di mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ, l kɑn fit yekn nɑn yudɑnt nbɑ k Yennu sɑɑ wɑnn’t nɑ.
45008019	Dulnyɑ bonɑ kul nbɑ k Yennu nɑn nɑ, guu nɑn ninmɔnn e nɑn yuo nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ nyinn u wɑɑs yienin ni,
45008020	k mɑɑn dulnyɑ bonɑ kul din biil ɑ, k ji k mɔk nyuɑt, l din k tun l tiɑɔnŋ kɑɑ, l din tie Yennu lonm e k l tien nnɑ, ŋɑɑn k dindɑnn biɑ lek be dulnyɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
45008021	Dɑsiɑl be k dulnyɑ bonɑ mɑnŋ tɑn sɑɑ nyi kuun dɑɑbs ni, k kuun ji kɑn diɑ’l, k l mun tɑn sii yen l mɔnŋ nɑn Yennu wɑɑs nbɑ sii yen b mɔnŋ nɑn yudɑnt bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ e.
45008022	T mi nɑn l yiɑl dulnyɑ bonɑ mɑnŋ k tɑn tuu mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑn puo nbɑ tuu mɔ mɑtyiɑlu k kuli biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
45008023	L k tie dulnyɑ bonɑ nɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ k l yiɑl, ŋɑɑn tinm nbɑ mɔk Foŋɑnm nbɑ tie Yennu sinsinn piini nɑ mun kuli e t pɑlɑ ni, k guu yuo nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ te k t tien u wɑɑs, k te k t gbɑnɑnt n nyi dɑɑbs ni.
45008024	Tɑɑ lɑ fielu nɑ e k t mɔk dindɑnn nɑ. Tɔn, nilɔ i lɑ lin nbɑ k u bo mɔk dindɑnn l pɑɑk nɑ, ŋɑnn ŋɑnin, l ji k tie dindɑnn. Ŋmee ji sii mɔk dindɑnn nɑn lin nbɑ k u ponŋ lɑ’l pɑɑk i?
45008025	Ŋɑɑn t i mɔk dindɑnn nɑn lin nbɑ k t k lɑɑt pɑɑk, ŋɑnn ŋɑnin, t ji tuu guu nɑn suklu e.
45008026	Nnɑ e mun k Foŋɑnm nɑ bɑɑl ɑ wun sonm tinm nbɑ k mɔk pɑnŋ nɑ k mɑɑn t k mi biɑnŋ nbɑ k t sii mei Yennu. Ŋɑɑn Foŋɑnm mɔnŋ e mei Yennu k tien’t k kuli bɑnnu nbɑ k t mɔbonɑ kɑn fit wɑnn l pɑɑk.
45008027	K Yennu nbɑ lɑɑt nisɑɑlk pɑl ni mi Foŋɑnm nɑ dudukt nbɑ tie, k mɑɑn Foŋɑnm nɑ mei Yennu u tiɑɔnŋ niib pɑɑk, k l wɑɑ nɑn ŋuɑ Yennu nbɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
45008028	Bin nbɑ k Yennu yiin’m nɑ, u mɔk lin nbɑ pɑɑk k u yinm e, k b mɔk lonm nɑn’ɔ, k t mi nɑn lin nbɑ kul tuun nɑ, u te k l tien bonŋɑnn k tien ŋɑnm e.
45008029	U ponŋ din senn nɑn bin nbɑ k u lukt’b nɑ, ɑ bii tie nɑn u Bijɑ nɑ, k u Bijɑ nɑ n tien Bikpelk, wɑɑs bonciɑnn sinsuuk ni.
45008030	K Yennu yiin bin nbɑ k u senn nɑ, k bin nbɑ k u yiin’m nɑ k u yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u buol, k bin nbɑ k u yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u buol nɑ, k u donn’b.
45008031	T i got lin nbɑ nɑ kul, t sɑɑ yet ɑ nlee? L i tie k Yennu be t po, ŋmee ji be k sɑɑ biil’t i?
45008032	Yennu nbɑ k minn’t u mɔnŋ Bijɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn jii’u k tul t kul nɑ, nlee k u ji kɑn tul’t lin nbɑ kul biɑl i?
45008033	Ŋmee sɑɑ tɑɑl bin nbɑ k Yennu lukt’b nɑ? Ŋuɑ Yennu e yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u buol.
45008034	Ŋmee be k sɑɑ bu b buut k biil’b i? Suɑ kɑɑ, k mɑɑn Yiesu Klistu nbɑ din kpo k fiil kuun ni k biɑ be Yennu niidiitu po k tie t sindɑntinnɔ nɑ.
45008035	Ŋmee sɑɑ fit nyinn’t Yiesu Klistu lonm ni? T fɑlɑ ɑmi mɑɑn ɑmi muksuk ɑmi kon ɑmi nɑmu ɑmi bonbiil ɑmi kuun e? Aɑi.
45008036	L tie nɑn lɑɑ diɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ ɑ: «A pɑɑk e k t be kuun fɑlɑ ni sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni wɑɑ k tɑn tuu dɑɑjuouk, k t tie nɑn pei nbɑ k b tuu tie siil ɑ bin kpi’b nɑ e.»
45008037	Ŋɑɑn bonɑ kul ni t mɔk nyɑnnu kul, wun nbɑ mɔk lonm nɑn’t nɑ pɑɑk.
45008038	K mɑɑn, n mi fɑnu nɑn siɑl kɑɑ k sɑɑ fit bɔkt tinm nɑn Klistu lonm, kuun ɑmi mɑnfuol ɑmi mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ ɑmi nɑlnbiit ɑmi lin nbɑ tie mɔtɑɑnɑ ɑmi lin nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ tien ɑmi
45008039	lin nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo ɑmi tinpuɑl ni ɑmi. Siɑl kɑɑ nɑɔnŋ kul ni k sɑɑ fit bɔkt tinm nɑn Yennu lonm nbɑ k t lɑ t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu ni nɑ.
45009001	N piɑk bɑlmɔni e. N tie Klistuyuɑ e, n k fɑ fɑɑk. Foŋɑnm e ŋmɑktl n dudukt k u tie siɑlɑ nɑn n piɑk mɔni.
45009002	N mɔk pɑlbiil bonciɑnn k l yiɑl’n yuo kul,
45009003	n mɔnŋ nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ tie n buolu nɑ pɑɑk. L i bo i sɑɑ fit k n set n niib pɑɑk k Yennu n biil’n k bɔkt min nɑn Klistu, n bo sɑɑ sɑk nnɑ wɑɑ.
45009004	Ŋɑnm e tie Islɑɑeltieb, k Yennu din tien’m u wɑɑs, k din be nɑn’m nɑn yudɑnt, k tul’b lolɑ, k tul’b senni, k tul’b jɑɑnti, k biɑ tul’b mɔsonɑ.
45009005	B yejɑnm din tie nijɑɑnɑ e k Klistu nbɑ din kpɑnt nisɑɑlk nɑ, u din tie b buolu ni yenɔ e. Ŋuɑ e tie Yennu nbɑ yen bont kul nɑ, u sɑɑ lɑ pɑku k l kii mɔk gbennu. Amenn.
45009006	N k yien ɑ Yennu mɔsonn nɑ ji kɑn tun kɑɑ, k mɑɑn Islɑɑel yɑɑbuonɑ kul kɑɑ tie Islɑɑeltieb nɑn bɑlmɔni.
45009007	Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ kul kɑɑ mun tie u yɑɑbuonɑ nɑn mɔni, k mɑɑn Yennu din yet Ablɑɑhɑɑnm ɑ: «Isɑɑk buolu tɑn sii tie ɑ yɑɑbuonɑ e.»
45009008	L pɑɑk, bin nbɑ k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm mɑl’b nifosɑɑlk mɑɑlu nɑ k tie Yennu wɑɑs, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ tie Yennu mɔsonn mɑɑlu wɑɑs nɑ, ŋɑnm e set tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm wɑɑs nɑn mɔni.
45009009	Yennu mɔsonn nɑ din tie ɑ: «Yuo nbɑ k n tɑn sɑɑ jen nɑ, l yuo e k Sɑɑlɑ sɑɑ mɑl bonjɑk.»
45009010	Ŋɑɑn l kul kɑɑ nɑ. T yɑɑ Lebekɑ din mɑl wɑɑs bɑnle k b tɑɑ bɑɑ, wun nbɑ tie t yejɑ Isɑɑk.
45009011	Yuo nbɑ k b dɑɑ din k mɑl’b k b k tun lin nbɑ ŋɑn ɑmi lin nbɑ b nɑ, k Yennu din yet ɑ bikpelk nɑ tɑn sii tie wɑɑlɔ po nɑ jiɑmɔ. Yennu din yet nnɑ ɑ wɑɑ lol lin nbɑ nɑ n sɑɑn tuɑnn. Wɑɑ lol lin nbɑ tie wun lukt niib e, k l pɑɑk, l k tie b tuonɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ k b tie u niib, ŋɑɑn l tie wɑɑ lol bɑnnu nbɑ k lukt’b nɑ e.
45009013	L tie nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «N din mɔk lonm nɑn Sɑɑkɔb ŋɑɑn nɑn Esɑɑu.»
45009014	K t ji sɑɑ yet ɑ bee? T sɑɑ yet ɑ Yennu k tun lin nbɑ tuok ɑmi? Aɑi, t kɑn yet nnɑ kɑɑ.
45009015	Yennu din yet Muois ɑ: «Bin nbɑ k n luon k n tin’m ninbɑɑɔk nɑ, ŋɑnm e k n sɑɑ tin’m ninbɑɑɔk. Bin nbɑ k n luon k mii mɔk lonm nɑn suklu b pɑɑk nɑ, ŋɑnm e k n sii mɔk lonm nɑn suklu b pɑɑk.»
45009016	L pɑɑk, l k tie nisɑɑlk nbɑ luon lin nbɑ ɑmi u tuonɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie Yennu ninbɑɑɔk pɑɑk e.
45009017	L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni k tul Fɑɑlɑɑɔn ɑ: «Min Yennu dinn’ɑ nɑɑn lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk e, ɑ n jii’ɑ k wɑnn’ɑ n yiikuo, k te k n sɑnn n muɑnt lin tingbounŋ nɑ kul.»
45009018	L pɑɑk, bin nbɑ k Yennu luon k wun tin’m ninbɑɑɔk nɑ, ŋɑnm e k u tiin’m ninbɑɑɔk, k biɑ tien siɑb nikɑngbɑtɑ nɑn wɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ.
45009019	Tɔn, pɑsiɑl k i yenɔ n boi’n ɑ: «L i tie nnɑ i e, nlee k Yennu lɑɑt nisɑɑlk biit i? Ŋmee sɑɑ fit k yet lin nbɑ k Yennu senn i?»
45009020	Ŋɑɑn n yuɑk, ɑ tie ŋmee k sɑɑ pɑk jiin Yennu? Bobl kɑn fit boi bobmɑɑlɔ ɑ: «Bee k ɑ mɑɑ’n k n tie nnɑ?»
45009021	Bobmɑɑlɔ mɔk yiikuo k sɑɑ jii yɔuk bul k mɑɑ bobl nbɑ ŋɑn k tul kpɑnbɑl nɑn bobl nbɑ tie tɑlɑs-dɑnm yɑl.
45009022	Tɔn, Yennu din tun k luon wun wɑnn u wutuol k niib kul ɑ n bɑnn u yiikuo. Ŋɑɑn u din mɔk suklu nɑn bin nbɑ k u wutuol sɑɑ bɑɑl b pɑɑk k l bo jɑnŋ nɑn wun biil’b nɑ.
45009023	Yennu din luon wun wɑnn’t u yudɑnt nbɑ yɑb bɑnnu nbɑ, tinm nbɑ k u tin’t ninbɑɑɔk nɑ, tinm nbɑ k u ponŋ din lukt’t ɑ tin gɑɑl u yudɑnt nɑ.
45009024	Tinm e tie bin nbɑ k u din yiin’t nɑ, k u k yiin’t Suifnbɑ sinsuuk ni kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ mun biɑ pukn lenŋ.
45009025	L tie nɑn Ose nbɑ din diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ, ɑ Yennu yet ɑ: «Niib nbɑ din k tie n niib nɑ, ŋɑnm e k n sɑɑ jii’b k bii tie n niib, k buolu nbɑ k n din k luon nɑ, ŋɑnm e k n sɑɑ yiin’m buolu nbɑ k n luon’m.
45009026	k siɑn nbɑ k b din yet’b ɑ b k tie n niib nɑ, lenŋ e biɑk k b sɑɑ yiin’m: ‹Yennu nbɑ fo nɑ wɑɑs.› »
45009027	Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi din yikn sɑnpɑɑpo k wɑnn Islɑɑeltieb po k yet ɑ: «Islɑɑeltieb i lek i yɑb nɑn mɔkgbenŋl tɑnbiini nɑ, ŋɑɑn b wɑɑnm-nnɑ e sɑɑ lɑ fielu,
45009028	k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑɑ tien k tul tingbounŋ nɑ niib nɑn wɑɑ yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ yiɑn yiɑn k gbenn.»
45009029	L tie nɑn Esɑɑyi nbɑ ponŋ din yet nɑ e ɑ: «T Yɑbnt Yonmdɑɑnɔ i bo i kii ten’t wɑɑs, l bo tɑn sɑɑ tun k tul’t nɑn lɑɑ din tun k tul Suodonm duo ni niib biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k t bo sii tie nɑn Guomuɔl duo ni niib nɑ e.»
45009030	Tɔn, t sɑɑ yet nlee? Bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ din k kol ɑ bin tien niŋɑnm Yennu buol, ŋɑɑn k Yennu yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn, b yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk,
45009031	ŋɑɑn Islɑɑeltieb nbɑ din kol ɑ bin lɑ senni nbɑ sɑɑ te k Yennu yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn nɑ, k b ji kɔnŋ’l.
45009032	Bee k b din kɔnŋ i? B din k kol ɑ Yennu n yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn b yɑdɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn b din kol ɑ wun yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn b tuonɑ pɑɑk e. B gbiɑt tɑngbiɑtkɑl e k bɑɑ,
45009033	tɑnn nbɑ k b diɑn l po Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Gotl, min Yennu bil tɑnn Siiɔn duo ni, lin nbɑ sɑɑ te k niib n gbiɑt k bɑɑ. L tie tɑnjɑgbounŋ o, k b sɑɑ bilnt l pɑɑk k bɑɑ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, u kɑn di fei.»
45010001	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n luon nɑn n pɑl kul k mei Yennu ɑ wun fiel n mɔnŋ buolu, Suifnbɑ.
45010002	N mi k tien siɑlɑ nɑn b wɑɑ Yennu nɑn ninmɔnn, ŋɑɑn b ninmɔnn mɑnŋ k yent.
45010003	B k mi sɔnu nbɑ te k Yennu yet ɑ niib tie niŋɑnm u buol, ŋɑɑn luon b mɔnŋ sɔnu, k l pɑɑk, b k jii b mɔnŋ k lol nɑn Yennu sɔnu nɑ.
45010004	K mɑɑn, Yiesu tun k gbien Muois senni nɑ wɑɑ. K mɔtɑɑnɑ, Yennu yi bin nbɑ tien Klistu yɑdɑ nɑ niŋɑnm u buol ni.
45010005	Muois din diɑn k jiin bɑnnu nbɑ k nilɔ sii tie niŋɑnɔ senni weiu ni ɑ: «Wun nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ k senni nɑ senn nɑ, u sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol l pɑɑk ɑ.»
45010006	Ŋɑɑn nɑ e tie bɑɑ yet lin nbɑ k jikt sɑɑ bɑnnu nbɑ k Yennu yet ɑ niib tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn b yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk nɑ ɑ: «A dɑɑ duki ɑ pɑl ni ɑ: ‹Ŋmee tɑn sɑɑ do Yendɔunŋ ni?› » (L pɑɑk tie ɑ: «Ŋmee sɑɑ do Yendɔunŋ ni k te k Klistu n sik i?»)
45010007	«A biɑ dɑɑ boi ɑ: ‹Ŋmee tɑn sɑɑ sik tinpuɑl ni?› » (L pɑɑk tie ɑ: «Ŋmee sɑɑ sik k te k Klistu n fiil kuun ni?»)
45010008	Yennu yet ɑ bee? L yet ɑ: «Mɑɑn nɑ kpiɑ’ɑ. L be ɑ mɔb ni nɑn ɑ pɑl ni.» Lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ tie yɑdɑ lɑbɑɑl nbɑ k t muɑntl nɑ.
45010009	L i tie k ɑ set pɑk k sɑt nyinn ɑ mɔb ni k yet ɑ: «Yiesu tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ,» k biɑ tien yɑdɑ ɑ pɑl ni nɑn Yennu set fiin’ɔ kuun ni, ɑ sɑɑ lɑ fielu wɑɑ.
45010010	K mɑɑn nilɔ set tien Yiesu yɑdɑ e u pɑl ni, k Yennu yet ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ u tuɑnn, k l set nyii u mɔb ni e k u yet nnɑ, k l pɑɑk e k u lɑ fielu.
45010011	L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, u kɑn mi di fei.»
45010012	Bɔktu kɑɑ Suifnbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ sinsuuk ni, Yennu kuukuɑ nɑ e tie b kul Yonmdɑɑnɔ, k bin nbɑ kul mei’ɔ, u sonmt’b nɑn bulcintuk.
45010013	K mɑɑn, l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Wun nbɑ kul mei Yonmdɑɑnɔ sonml po, u sɑɑ lɑ fielu.»
45010014	Tɔn, niib i kii tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, b sɑɑ tien nlee k miɑl’ɔ sonml po? K b i kii gbɑt lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ, b sɑɑ tien nlee k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ? K b i kii muɑnt u lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ, nlee k niib sɑɑ gbɑt u po?
45010015	K b i kii tun tuomiinbɑ, nlee k lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ sɑɑ muɑnt i? L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Bin nbɑ lin k muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ, b bɑɑlu ŋɑn bonciɑnn.»
45010016	Ŋɑɑn niib kul kɑɑ sɑk lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn Esɑɑyi yet ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ŋmee tien yɑdɑ nɑn t lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ?»
45010017	L pɑɑk, nilɔ i gbiɑ lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ, l bɑɑt nɑn yɑdɑ e, k lɑbɑmɑnn nyi niib nbɑ muɑntl Klistu mɑɑn nɑ ni e.
45010018	Ŋɑɑn n boi k lɑɑn niib k gbɑt lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ ɑmi? Mɔmɔnm, b gbɑt ɑ. L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Niib gbɑt b kunkɔlɑ tingbounŋ lokl kul po, k b mɑɑn yɑt nɑn dulnyɑ kul.»
45010019	N yɑɑ n ŋɑnm k boi e k lɑɑn Islɑɑeltieb din k bɑnn l pɑɑk ɑmi? Muois tiɑɔnŋ o din dɔnŋ jiin sinsinn, ɑ Yennu din yet Islɑɑeltieb ɑ: «N sɑɑ te k i mɔk funfunn nɑn niib nbɑ k mɔk buolu nɑ pɑɑk, k te k i wutuol n do buolu nbɑ tie jɑtt nɑ pɑɑk.»
45010020	K Esɑɑyi mɔk pɑl k yet ɑ Yennu yɑɑ ɑ: «Niib nbɑ k fiin n po nɑ, b tɑn lɑ’n ɑ, k niib nbɑ k boi n po nɑ, k n jii n mɔnŋ k fiit wɑnn’b.»
45010021	Ŋɑɑn k u yet Islɑɑeltieb po ɑ: «N tɑnt n nuu yennu ni nɑn nyiɑɔk ɑ n gɑɑl’b, ŋɑɑn k b tie tubkɑngbɑtɑ k k sɑɑk n mɔb.»
45011001	L pɑɑk, n luon k n boi k lɑɑn i duki ɑ Yennu yet u mɔnŋ niib ɑmi? Aɑi, u k yet’b kɑɑ. N mɔnŋ tie Islɑɑel nilɔ e, k tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonn, k nyii Bensɑɑmen nɑɑkuuk ni.
45011002	Yennu k lu u niib nbɑ k u dɔnŋ lukt’b nɑ. I mi lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni k wɑnt Elii nbɑ din yien Yennu, Islɑɑeltieb biit po biɑnŋ nbɑ ɑ:
45011003	«N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, b kpii ɑ sɔkniinbɑ kul ɑ, k biil ɑ binbintɑ nɑ. N kuukuɑ e biɑl, k b kol ɑ bin kpi’n.»
45011004	Yennu din jiin ɑ biɑ? Yennu din jiin ɑ: «N mɔk niib tusɑ ŋɑnlole bin nbɑ dɑɑ k mi gbɑɑn jiɑnt Bɑɑl nɑ.»
45011005	L tie nnɑ e mɔtɑɑnɑ. Niib wɑɑnm-nnɑ e dɑɑ be k Yennu lukt’b u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk.
45011006	Yennu i lukt niib, u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk e, k u lukt’b, k l k tie b tuonɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ. Yennu i bo i lukt niib b tuonɑ pɑɑk i e, u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ bo kii tie bɑlmɔni ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ kɑɑ.
45011007	Tɔn, t sɑɑ yet ɑ biɑ? L wɑnt nɑn Islɑɑeltieb k lɑ bɑɑ luon lin nbɑ. Bin nbɑ k Yennu lukt’b nɑ kuukuɑ nɑ lɑ’l, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ biɑl nɑ tien tubkɑngbɑtɑ dɑnm e.
45011008	L tie nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Yennu din te k b yɑn lib, k te k b ninbinɑ k lɑɑt, k te k b tubɑ k gbiɑ k tɑn tuu dinnɑ.»
45011009	K Dɑɑfiid yet Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Yennu n te k b jɑɑnm i tie bɑluk k tul’b, ɑ bii bɑɑ kii lɑɑt tubdɑtu,
45011010	k te k b ninbinɑ n juɑn, k b dɑɑ lɑɑt, k b sii buɑ k b sɑi ni kɑn nɑɑt i »
45011011	N boi biɑk k lɑɑn Islɑɑeltieb din gbiɑt k bɑɑ k ji k fit fiil ɑmi? Aɑi, l k tie nnɑ kɑɑ. Bɑɑ tun biit nɑ pɑɑk, k Yennu fiel bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ. Yennu tun nnɑ ɑ ŋɑnm Suifnbɑ nɑ i mɔk funfunn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
45011012	L i tie k Suifnbɑ biit te k tingbounŋ tieb lɑ piisn, k bɑɑ k tien yɑdɑ nɑ te k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ lɑ bonŋɑnn, nlee k bonŋɑnn kɑn yɑbt dulnyɑ ni l i tie k b ŋmɑt k lebt b binbenŋ i?
45011013	N piɑk k tien yinm nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ e: Yennu nbɑ te k n tie tuomi i buol ni nɑ, n sii mɔk yugontl n tuonn mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
45011014	Mi i bo i sɑɑ fit te k n mɔnŋ buolu niib i mɔk funfunn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, pɑsiɑl ŋɑnn e sɑɑ te k b siɑb n lɑ fielu.
45011015	Yennu nbɑ din yet Suifnbɑ nɑ, l din te k l ji mɑn tingbounŋ nɑ niib nɑn Yennu sinsuuk ni. Yennu i ŋmɑnt k gɑɑl’b k b tie u niib, l ji sii tie nlee? L set sii tie bɑlmɔni e nɑn bi fiil kuun ni k jen mɑnfuol ni wɑɑ.
45011016	L i tie k b buun pɑɑnu yon, k bɔkt sinsinn yɑl k tien pɑɑnu k l tie Yennu yɑl, lin nbɑ ten nɑ mun biɑ tie Yennu yɑl e. L i tie k tiik jiinɑ tie Yennu yɑl i e, l yiini nɑ mun biɑ tie u yɑl e.
45011017	Suifnbɑ nɑ tie nɑn ŋɑɑk ni tiik nbɑ k b yi oliifie nbɑ ŋɑn nɑ e, k b kɔnn tiik nɑ yiinsiɑ. Fin nbɑ k tie Suif nɑ, ɑ tie nɑn muuk ni oliifie yiinu nɑ e k b tukn’ɑ b yiɑl ni ŋɑɑk ni oliifie pɑɑk, k mɔtɑɑnɑ ɑ gɑɑn bonŋɑnn nbɑ nyi ŋɑɑk ni oliifie nɑ jiinɑ nɑ ni e.
45011018	L pɑɑk, ɑ dɑɑ mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnt nɑn sinsinn yiini nɑ. Dɑɑ mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnt, k mɑɑn ɑ tie yiinu kuukuɑ e. Jiinɑ nɑ e diɑ’ɑ, fin kɑɑ diɑ jiinɑ.
45011019	A sɑɑ jiin k yet ɑ: «Mɔni e, b kɔnn yiini nɑ ɑ bin tukn’n yiini nɑ yiɑl ni e.»
45011020	L set tie mɔni e. Bɑɑ k tien yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e k b kɔnn’b, k fin nbɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e k b jii’ɑ tukn’ɑ l pɑɑk. Ŋɑnn, ɑ ji dɑɑ mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnt dudukt l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn kii mɔk jɑŋmɑɑni.
45011021	L i tie k Yennu k ŋɑɑn k tiik nɑ tiɑɔnŋ yiini nbɑ tie Suifnbɑ nɑ n biɑl, i dɑɑ duki nɑn u sɑɑ ŋɑɑn k i biɑl.
45011022	Gotl Yennu nbɑ mɔk bulcint ŋɑɑn biɑ mɔk ninkuoni biɑnŋ nbɑ. U mɔk ninkuoni k tul bin nbɑ bɑɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn u wɑnn’ɑ u bulcint. Ŋɑɑn l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k ɑ biɑl u bulcint ni. Nnɑ i kɑɑ, u sɑɑ kɔnn’ɑ nɑn yiinu nɑ e.
45011023	Suifnbɑ i nyik bɑɑ k tien yɑdɑ bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, Yennu sɑɑ jiin tukn’m siɑn k b din tuu be, k mɑɑn u sɑɑ fit k tun nnɑ.
45011024	Fin nbɑ k tie Suif nɑ tie nɑn muuk ni oliifie yiinu nɑ e, k Yennu kɔnn’l k tukn nɑn ŋɑɑk ni oliifie nɑ, ŋɑɑn b tuu k tie nnɑ. L k pɑɑl k wun jii yiini nbɑ k u kɔnn ŋɑɑk ni oliifie nɑ ni, k biɑ tukn nɑn l mɔnŋ oliifie nɑ biɑk.
45011025	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n luon k yin bɑnn wuol ni lɑbɑɑl, ɑ i dɑɑ duki nɑn i tie yɑndɑnm e. L tie ɑ Suifnbɑ siɑb tie kɑngbɑtɑ e, k l sii be nnɑ e k tɑn bɑɑl yuo nbɑ k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ kul nbɑ k Yennu lukt’b nɑ, bin tɑn tien Yiesu yɑb.
45011026	Nnɑ e k Islɑɑel kul sɑɑ lɑ fielu, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ Yennu yet ɑ: «Fietuɑ sɑɑ nyi Siiɔn duo ni e, k bɑɑl k tɑn nyinn mɔyetuk Sɑɑkɔb yɑɑbuonɑ sinsuuk ni.
45011027	Ŋɑnn e tie lol nbɑ k n sɑɑ lol k tul’b, yuo nbɑ k n sɑɑ nyinn b biit.»
45011028	L i tie k t got Suifnbɑ nbɑ yet Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn bɑnnu nbɑ, b tie Yennu dɑtɑi, ɑ lin bɑɑl nɑn bonŋɑnn k tul’i. Ŋɑɑn l i tie k t biɑ got Yennu nbɑ din lukt’b bɑnnu nbɑ, b tie bin nbɑ k Yennu luon’m, b yejɑnm pɑɑk e,
45011029	k mɑɑn Yennu k gɑɑn lin nbɑ k u tul k biɑ k lebtl u dudukt bin nbɑ k u yiin’m nɑ pɑɑk.
45011030	Siɑn-yuo ni, i din k cɔln Yennu, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ i bɑnn Yennu ninbɑtinu k mɑɑn Suifnbɑ din k cɔln’mɔ.
45011031	Nnɑ e biɑk k mɔtɑɑnɑ k b k cɔln ɑ yin fit k lɑ Yennu ninbɑtinu mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn bɑɑ k cɔln nɑ biɑ sɑɑ te k bin lɑ ninbɑtinu mɑnŋ.
45011032	K mɑɑn Yennu tien niib kul mɔyetuk dɑɑbɑ ɑ wun fit k wɑnn b kul u ninbɑtinu.
45011033	Yennu mɔktuk set k mɔk gbennu! K u yɑn nɑn u bɑnnu sumi hɑli! Ŋmee sɑɑ fit bɑnn Yennu nbɑ lol lin nbɑ? Ŋmee sɑɑ fit bɑnn u sɔni?
45011034	L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Ŋmee mi Yennu dudukt i? Ŋmee sɑɑ kpɑɑn’ɔ?
45011035	Ŋmee mi k tul Yennu siɑl sinsinn ɑ, ŋɑɑn ji tɑn luon wun pɑ l pɑɑk i?»
45011036	Yennu e din nɑn bonsiɑl kul, k u pɑɑk e k l kul be k tie u yɑl. Yudɑnt tie Yennu yɑl e nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Amenn.
45012001	L pɑɑk, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, Yennu ninbɑtinu pɑɑk e te k n boi’i ɑ yin jii i gbɑnɑnt k tul’ɔ, k lii tie mɑnnu nbɑ fo, kii wɑɑ ŋuɑ kuukuɑ, k l sɑɑ mɑnŋ’ɔ. Ŋɑnn e tie Yenjiɑntu nɑn bɑlmɔni.
45012002	I dɑɑ te k i binbenŋ tie nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ niib binbenŋ nɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑnt k Yennu n lebt i dudukt nɑn bɑlmɔni, kii ŋɑnm i binbenŋ fɑnu. Ŋɑnn e k i sɑɑ bɑnn Yennu yɑnbuɑt nbɑ tie bɑnnu nbɑ, k ŋɑnn e tie lin nbɑ ŋɑn, lin nbɑ gbuot u nunm nɑn lin nbɑ tie dede.
45012003	Yennu nbɑ tin’n ninbɑɑɔk nɑ pɑɑk e, k n yien i kul, ɑ i dɑɑ duki i mɔnŋ po k l gɑl yɑɑ set tie bɑnnu nbɑ, ŋɑɑn ii duki i mɔnŋ po nɑn sikn-n-mɔnŋ, k i ni suɑ kul i duki u mɔnŋ po nɑn Yennu nbɑ tul’ɔ yɑdɑ bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.
45012004	Tɔn, nilɔ gbɑnɑnt mɔk pɑɑk pɑɑk e, ŋɑɑn k bɔkl kul mɔk u tuonn, ŋɑɑn tɑɑn k tie gbɑnɑn-yent kuɑ.
45012005	L mun biɑ tie nnɑ e, nɑn tɑɑ yɑb bonciɑnn nɑ, t kul tɑɑn k tie gbɑnɑn-yent e tɑɑ be Klistu ni nɑ, k t kul ɑ nɑ gbɑnɑnt tɑɑn tɑɑn k tukn k ji tien gbɑnɑn-yent ɑ.
45012006	T kul ɑ mɔk piini nɑn Yennu nbɑ tin’t ninbɑɑɔk bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ e, k l k tɑɑ tɑɑ. Yenɔ piini i tie wuu sɔknt Yennu mɑɑn nɑ i e, l ŋɑn wun tun nɑn wɑɑ mɔk yɑdɑ bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.
45012007	Luɑ piini i tie wun sonm lieb i e, l ŋɑn wun sonm’b. Luɑ i tie wɑntuɑ, l ŋɑn wun wɑnn lieb tumiu.
45012008	Luɑ piini i tie wuu kpɑɑn u lieb kpɑɑni e, wuu kpɑɑn’m. Luɑ piini i tie wuu pi piini, wuu pi piini nɑn bulcint. Luɑ piini i tie wuu mɔk yiikuo, wuu tuun yiikuo tuonn mɑnŋ bonŋɑnn. Luɑ piini i tie wuu tiin niib ninbɑɑɔk u e, wuu tiin’m ninbɑɑɔk nɑn pɑlpienn.
45012009	Ŋɑɑnt k lonm i tie bɑlmɔni lonm. Ii nɑn biit mɑn, ŋɑɑn suol lin nbɑ ŋɑn.
45012010	Ii luon lieb mɑn bonŋɑnn nɑn nilɔ nɑn u nɑɑ bik nbɑ tuu luon lieb biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k kot kii bɑɑkt lieb,
45012011	kii tie nikɑkti, k dɑɑ tiin gbɑn-nyɑkl, ŋɑɑn kii tuun Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuonɑ nɑn i pɑlɑ kul ɑ.
45012012	Ii mɔk pɑlpienn i dindɑnn pɑɑk mɑn, kii mɔk mintl i fɑldinu sinsuuk ni, ŋɑɑn kii mei Yennu yuo kul.
45012013	Pɑɑtl mɑn lin nbɑ k i mɔk nɑ k tul Yennu niib nbɑ k mɔk, kii gɑɑn sɑɑnm kii cɑntl’b i ŋei ni.
45012014	Bin nbɑ muks’i, yin jiin’m ɑ: «Yennu yetŋɑnm ii be i pɑɑk.» Mɔmɔnm, ii jiin’m nnɑ. I dɑɑ tien’m mɔpol gbɑɑ.
45012015	Wun nbɑ mɔk pɑlpienn, ii mun i mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn’ɔ mun, k wun nbɑ mun mɔk pɑlbiil, ii mun i mɔk pɑlbiil nɑn’ɔ mun.
45012016	Ii mɔk mɑn dudukyenn kuɑ k dɑɑ mɔk dont-n-mɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn kii sɑɑk tuonɑ nbɑ k mɔk dont-n-mɔnŋ, k dɑɑ duki nɑn i mɔk nin-yentl.
45012017	I dɑɑ tuun biit k jiint biit pɑɑk. Kotl i mɔnŋ kii tuun lin nbɑ k niib kul sɑɑ lɑ k l ŋɑn.
45012018	I yɑbl i mɔnŋ pɑɑk mɑn l i tie k l sɑɑ fit kii be bɑnnu nbɑ k mɑnu sii be yinm nɑn niib sinsuuk ni.
45012019	N yɔnimɔni, i kpɑn dɑɑ tuun biit k jiint biit pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑnt k Yennu wutuol n tun, k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni, ɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet ɑ: «Min kuukuɑ e mɔk yiikuo nbɑ sɑɑ dɑt niib tubɑ. Min e sɑɑ pɑ biit mɑnŋ pɑnn.»
45012020	L biɑ diɑn ɑ: «A dɑtɑɑk i mɔ kon, fɑn din’ɔ, nyun-nyuklu i suol’ɔ, fɑn tul’ɔ nyun wun nyu, k fi i tie nnɑ, ɑ dint’ɔ fei e.»
45012021	Dɑɑ ŋɑɑnt k biit n nyɑnn’ɑ ni, ŋɑɑn jii tuonŋɑnɑ k nyɑnn biit.
45013001	L tie k nilɔ kul n sɑk yudɑnm mɔi, k mɑɑn suɑ k mɔk u mɔnŋ yiikuo k l k nyii Yennu buol. Yennu e te k bin nbɑ mɔk yiikuo nɑ mɔk yiikuo.
45013002	Wun nbɑ k sɑɑk yudɑnm senni nɑ, l wɑnt nɑn u biɑ k sɑɑk lin nbɑ k Yennu senn nɑ, bin nbɑ kul tuun nnɑ, b bɑɑt nɑn tubdɑtu e b mɔnŋ pɑɑk.
45013003	Bin nbɑ tuun tuonbiit nɑ e tiin yudɑnm jɑŋmɑɑni, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn, b k tiin yudɑnm jɑŋmɑɑni. Fi i kii luon fii tiin yudɑɑnɔ, l ŋɑn fii tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn, k wun pɑk’ɑ,
45013004	K mɑɑn u tie Yennu tuontunnɔ e k tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn k tien’ɑ. Ŋɑɑn fi i tuun bonbiil, fii tiin’ɔ, k mɑɑn u k mɔk yiikuo nbɑ k u sɑɑ dɑt ɑ tubl yɑnn. U tie Yennu tuontunnɔ e k sie Yennu pɑɑk k dɑɑl wun nbɑ tuun biit nɑ tubɑ.
45013005	L pɑɑk, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k ɑ gɑɑl yudɑnm mɔi, k l k tie ɑ mɑntk tiin tubdɑtu nɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ mi ɑ pɑl ni nɑn l tie lin nbɑ ŋɑn e.
45013006	L pɑɑk e te k t pɑ lɑnpo, k mɑɑn Yennu e senn yudɑnm nɑ, ɑ yuo kul bin jii’l k diɑ tingbounŋ nɑ bonŋɑnn.
45013007	L pɑɑk, tuln’m lin nbɑ tie b yɑl. L i jɑnŋ nɑn bin gɑɑl niib lɑnpo, ɑmi lin nbɑ k i mɔk pɑɑk lɑnpo, yin pɑ k tul’b. L i jɑnŋ nɑn k i bɑɑk nilɔ, yin bɑɑk’ɔ. L i biɑ kii jɑnŋ nɑn i cɔln nilɔ, yin cɔln’mɔ.
45013008	Dɑɑ mɔk suɑ pɑnn. Yɑɑ sii mɔk pɑnn nbɑ tie ii luon mɑn i lieb. Wun nbɑ luon u luɑ, l dɑɑnɔ gbien Yennu senni nɑ kul ɑ.
45013009	Yennu senni nɑ yet ɑ: «Dɑɑ conm. Dɑɑ kpi ɑ luɑ. Dɑɑ jɑɑn. Dɑɑ mɔk niɑɔnŋ ɑ luɑ bont pɑɑk.» Senni nbɑ nɑ nɑn lin nbɑ biɑl nɑ kul tɑɑn k wɑnt nɑn: «I luon ɑ luɑ nɑn fɑɑ luon ɑ mɔnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.»
45013010	K fi i luon ɑ luɑ, ɑ kɑn tun bonbiil k tul’ɔ. Ŋɑnn e niib lomu tie Yennu senni gbienu.
45013011	Ii tie nnɑ mɑn k mɑɑn yɑɑ mi yuo nɑ nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Yuo nɑ bɑɑl ɑ, k i sɑɑ fiil i guɑn ni, k mɑɑn t fielu dɑɑl pel ɑ, k k fɔk nɑn lɑɑ din fɔk biɑnŋ nbɑ yuo nbɑ k t din sint tien yɑdɑ nɑ.
45013012	Nyiɑɔk gɑl ɑ, k yennu ni e bɑɑt. Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin lu tuonɑ nbɑ tuun bunbɔnn ni ŋɑɑn jii jɑtiɑt nbɑ k t sɑɑ fit kɔn nɑn’n yieonŋ ni.
45013013	L luon k tin diɑ t mɔnŋ fɑnu nɑn lɑɑ luon tii be yieonŋ ni yennu ni bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ. T suol t mɔnŋ nɑn boncuncontuonɑ, nɑn dɑyibu, nɑn kunkɔnɑ nɑn funfunn.
45013014	I jii Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu binbenŋ k lii tie i yɑl, k dɑɑ ŋɑɑnt k gbɑnɑnt lonbiit n te k i tuun biit.
45014001	Gɑɑt mɑn yɑdɑ-kɑnpuɑnɑ dɑnm nɑ, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ noi nɑn’m mɔniɑɔk b dudukt po.
45014002	Suɑ yɑdɑ e te k u di jiet kul, ŋɑɑn k wun nbɑ yɑdɑ k pɑɑl nɑ mun kuɑ nɑnt ŋmɑmu.
45014003	Wun nbɑ di jiet kul ɑ nɑ dɑɑ goli wun nbɑ kuɑ jesiɑt nɑ yɑnn, k wun nbɑ mun kuɑ jesiɑt nɑ dɑɑ biil wun nbɑ di jiet kul nɑ sɑnn, k mɑɑn Yennu gɑɑl’ɔ wɑɑ.
45014004	A tie ŋmee k sɑɑ biil suɑ tuontunnɔ? U mɔnŋ yudɑɑnɔ nɑ e sɑɑ yet wɑɑ dii nɑn wɑɑ bɑɑ, k u set sɑɑ di wɑɑ k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɔk pɑnŋ nbɑ sɑɑ te k wun di.
45014005	Tɔn, nisiɑb mun duki ɑ dɑyenɑ cie dɑliɑ, k siɑb mun jii dɑɑ kul k l jɑn e. Suɑ kul yɑn ii pɑɑl nɑn wɑɑ tien lin nbɑ yɑdɑ.
45014006	Wun nbɑ duki ɑ dɑyenɑ cie dɑliɑ nɑ, u tie nnɑ k tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑkl e, k wun nbɑ mun di jiet kul nɑ, u tie nnɑ e k tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑkl mun, k mɑɑn u tien Yennu niipuouk jiet nɑ pɑɑk, k wun nbɑ mun kuɑ jesiɑt nɑ mun tie nnɑ e k tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑkl, k mun biɑ tien Yennu niipuouk.
45014007	Suɑ kɑɑ k be k fo u yul pɑɑk, ɑmi k kpenn u mɔnŋ lonm kuun.
45014008	T i fo, t fo k dont Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn e. T i mun i biɑ kii kpo, t kpo Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn ni e. Tɔn, t i fo ɑmi t i sɑɑ kpo i e, t tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑb e.
45014009	K mɑɑn Klistu din kpo k biɑ fiil kuun ni ɑ wun tien fuotb nɑn kpienm Yonmdɑɑnɔ.
45014010	Fin, ɑ mun tie ŋmee k sɑɑ wɑnn ɑ nɑɑbik nɑn wɑɑ tien lin nbɑ ŋɑn kuo l k ŋɑn i? Bee tien k ɑ sɑlkt ɑ nɑɑ bik i? T kul tɑn sɑɑ set Yennu tuɑnn k wun bu t buut.
45014011	L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Min, Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ fo nɑ, n yien’i nɑn buolu kul sɑɑ gbɑɑn n tuɑnn, k suɑ kul sɑɑ yet u mɔb ni, ɑ n set tie Yennu.»
45014012	L pɑɑk, suɑ kul tɑn sɑɑ fiit u mɔnŋ k tul Yennu.
45014013	L pɑɑk, t dɑɑ duki nɑn t sɑɑ fit yet nɑn lin nbɑ k t lieb tuun nɑ ŋɑn kuo l k ŋɑn. Lin nbɑ ŋɑn tie k i lol i mɔnŋ pɑl ni, nɑn i kɑn te k i nɑɑ bik n gbiɑt kuo k bɑɑ.
45014014	Mɑɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e te k n bɑnn nɑn jiet kɑɑ k kuɑ. Ŋɑɑn suɑ i dukn nɑn jesiɑt kuɑ l kuɑ u buol e.
45014015	Fi i te k ɑ nɑɑ bik pɑl biil jiet nbɑ k ɑ di nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑnn ŋɑnin ɑ ji k tuun lonm tuonɑ kɑɑ. Nilɔ nbɑ k Klistu din gɑɑl u pɑɑk k kpo nɑ, ɑ dɑɑ te k wun nyik Yennu sɔnu ɑ jiet dinu pɑɑk.
45014016	A dɑɑ te k niib n pɑk k biil lin nbɑ k ɑ duki nɑn l ŋɑn.
45014017	K mɑɑn Yennu nɑɑn lɑbɑɑl k tie jiet-dinu ɑmi nyunu lɑbɑɑl kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie Yennu nbɑ luon k tii tuun bɑnnu nbɑ, nɑn mɑnu nɑn pɑlpienn nbɑ k Foŋɑnm tul’t nɑ lɑbɑɑl.
45014018	K mɑɑn wun nbɑ wɑɑ Klistu nnɑ, Yennu sii mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn l dɑɑnɔ, k niib biɑ sii tie’u bɑɑkl.
45014019	L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin yɑbl k tun lin nbɑ bɑɑt nɑn mɑnu, nɑn lin nbɑ sɑɑ sonm t kul t yɑdɑ ni.
45014020	Ii mi k ɑ biil Yennu tuonɑ, jiet pɑɑk. Jiet kul ŋɑn e, ŋɑɑn l k ŋɑn k ɑ di jiet nbɑ sɑɑ te k ɑ nɑɑ bik yɑdɑ n bɑɑ.
45014021	Lin nbɑ ŋɑn tie k ɑ nyik lin nbɑ kul sɑɑ te k ɑ nɑɑ bik n bɑɑ, l i lek i tie nɑnt ŋmɑmu ɑmi dɑɑn nyunu.
45014022	Fɑɑ tien yɑdɑ k jikt sɑɑ jiet dinu po biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑnt k lii be fin nɑn Yennu sinsuuk ni. Wun nbɑ tun lin nbɑ k u dukn nɑn l ŋɑn, k k mɔk bilsuk l pɑɑk, pɑlpienn tie u yɑl e.
45014023	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ mɔk bilsuk lin nbɑ k u di nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn dii, u mɔk biit, k mɑɑn u k di’l nɑn yɑdɑ. Nilɔ i kii tien yɑdɑ nɑn tuonsiɑl ŋɑn, ŋɑɑn tɑn tuun tuonn mɑnŋ, l tie biit e.
45015001	Tinm nbɑ k t yɑdɑ cie nɑ, l ŋɑn k tii mɔk suklu k sonm t lieb nbɑ yɑdɑ dɑɑ k cie nɑ, k dɑɑ tuun t mɔnŋ lonm kuukuɑ kɑɑ.
45015002	Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k t kul n yɑbl kii tuun lin nbɑ sɑɑ penn t luɑ pɑl, k lii tie bonŋɑnn k tul’ɔ, k wun fit kii wɑɑ Yiesu Klistu sɔnu fɑnu.
45015003	K mɑɑn ŋuɑ Klistu din k luon wun tun u mɔnŋ lonm kuukuɑ kɑɑ, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Bin nbɑ suki fin nɑ, b sukt mɑnŋ bɑɑ n pɑɑk e.»
45015004	Lin nbɑ kul diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ, l diɑn k tul’t ɑ tii tumi e. U mɑɑn mɑnŋ tien’t suklu, k biɑ kuɑnt’t pɑlɑ, ɑ tii mɔk dindɑnn.
45015005	Yennu, wun nbɑ k suklu nɑn pɑlcienn nyi u ni, n te k i fit kii be nɑn lieb nɑn mɑnu nɑn Yiesu Klistu nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ,
45015006	k i kul ɑ sii mɔk dudukyenn kuɑ nɑn moyenm k dont Yennu nbɑ tie t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu Bɑɑ nɑ. Suifnbɑ sɑɑ gbɑt Yennu lɑbɑmɑnn
45015007	Ii gɑɑn lieb mɑn nɑn Klistu nbɑ gɑɑl’i nɑ, k Yennu sɑnn n lɑ pɑku.
45015008	K mɑɑn n yien’i ɑ Klistu din kpint u mɔnŋ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ tuontunnɔ e, ɑ wun gbien mɔsonɑ nbɑ k Yennu senn k tul b yejɑnm nbɑ din tie nijɑɑnɑ nɑ k nnɑ e k u wɑnn nɑn Yennu set tie mɔmɔnm dɑɑnɔ e,
45015009	k te k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ ii dont Yennu sɑnn u ninbɑtinu pɑɑk, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «N sɑɑ dont ɑ sɑnn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ buol, k yin yɑni k pɑk’ɑ.»
45015010	L biɑ diɑn k yet ɑ: «Yinm nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ, ii mɔk mɑn pɑlpienn, yinm nɑn Yennu niib.»
45015011	L biɑ diɑn ɑ: «Yinm nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ, pɑkn mɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu. Nibuolu kul, ii pɑk’ɔ mɑn.»
45015012	Esɑɑyi mun din diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Jese yɑɑbuonn tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl, k u sii mɔk yiikuo, k tɑn sii tie bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ yudɑɑnɔ, k b dindɑnn sii be u ni.»
45015013	Yennu nbɑ tul’i dindɑnn nɑ, n tul’i mɑnu nɑn pɑlpienn bonciɑnn yɑɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk k Foŋɑnm n te k i dindɑnn nɑ n ŋɑnm yɑbt.
45015014	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n mi n pɑl ni nɑn i pɑlɑ gbien nɑn dudukŋɑnt, k i mɔk minu k sɑɑ fit k kpɑɑn i lieb.
45015015	Mɑɑ dɑ bon-yenɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni nɑ, n dɑ nɑn pɑlcienn ɑ n tiɑl’i lin nbɑ k i ponŋ mi l po nɑ. N dɑ nnɑ k mɑɑn Yennu tin’n ninbɑɑɔk
45015016	k te k n tie Yiesu Klistu tuontunnɔ, k tul bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ. Mɑɑ muɑntl Yennu lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ, n tuun Yennu tuonn e, ɑ bin nbɑ k tie Suif nbɑ i tie mɑnnu nbɑ pent Yennu pɑl, k Foŋɑnm ni b jɑnŋ nɑn bii tie Yennu tiɑɔnŋ niib.
45015017	Mɑɑ tɑɑ nɑn Yiesu Klistu nɑ, n sɑɑ fit kii mɔk yugontl tuonn nbɑ k n tuun k tien Yennu nɑ pɑɑk.
45015018	K mɑɑn l i tie k n luon mɑn pɑk siɑl po i e, l tie lin nbɑ k Klistu te k n tun, k fit te bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ n sɑk Yennu mɔb. N mɑɑn nɑn n bontitiet
45015019	nɑn bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ nɑn nyinɑ nɑn Foŋɑnm pɑnŋ e te k b sɑk Yennu mɔb. Nnɑ e k n muɑnt Klistu lɑbɑmɑnn siɑn nbɑ kul, lɑɑ nyii Selusɑɑlenm k sɑɑ tuu Iiliili.
45015020	Ŋɑnn e k n lol mɑɑ n muɑnt Klistu lɑbɑmɑnn k tul bin nbɑ k mi gbɑt nɑ kuukuɑ e, k dɑɑ wɑk luɑ fiɑkl pɑɑk,
45015021	k mɑɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk wɑnt nɑn: «Bin nbɑ k b k muɑnt u mɑɑn k tul’b nɑ, b sɑɑ lɑ’l, k bin nbɑ mun biɑ k gbɑt’l tɑn sɑɑ gbɑt l pɑɑk.»
45015022	L pɑɑk, bonɑ bonciɑnn tuu guɑl n sɔnu k n k fit bɑɑt k gɔnt’i ni.
45015023	Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ e k n ji dɑɑ gbenn n tuonɑ nbɑ be yɑkɑ nɑ ni, k mɑɑ ponŋ setk tuu luon binɑ bonciɑnn k n gɔn’i nɑ,
45015024	mɔtɑɑnɑ n sɑɑ gɔn’i wɑɑ, k n gɔnu mɑnŋ puolpo wɑɑnm-nnɑ, n sii luon k yin sonm’n k n sɑɑn Espɑnyɑ tinŋ ni.
45015025	Ŋɑɑn sinsinn n sɑɑ sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm, Yennu niib nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ sonml pɑɑk e wɑɑ,
45015026	k mɑɑn Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be Mɑɑseduɑnn nɑn Akɑɑyi tini ni nɑ, lol ɑ bin lɑkn likli k tul Yennu niib nbɑ tie nɑndɑnm k be Selusɑɑlenm nɑ.
45015027	L tie mɔni e nɑn b mɔnŋ lonm e k b tul’b piini nɑ. Setk nɑn mɔni, ŋɑnm nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ ŋɑɑn din lɑ siek jiet Suifnbɑ buol ni nɑ, l ŋɑn k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ n sonm Suifnbɑ b gbɑnɑnt ni nɑn b piini ni mun.
45015028	Mi i gbenn tuonn mɑnŋ k tul’b piini mɑnŋ, n sɑɑ nyi lenŋ k tuɑt gɑl i buol k sɑɑn Espɑnyɑ tinŋ ni wɑɑ.
45015029	N mi nɑn mi i bɑɑl i buol, n sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑn Klistu yetŋɑnm k tul’i
45015030	Tɔn, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu sɑnn pɑɑk nɑn Foŋɑnm lonm pɑɑk, n mei’i, ii mei Yennu nɑn ninmɔnn n pɑɑk k sonm’n,
45015031	k wuu guun k Suude tinŋ ni niib nbɑ k tien Yiesu Klistu yɑdɑ nɑ, k b dɑɑ tie’n bonbiil, kii biɑ kii mei’ɔ k tuonn nbɑ k n sɑɑ tun k tul Yennu niib nbɑ be Selusɑɑlenm ni n penn b pɑlɑ.
45015032	Nnɑ e mun, l i tie k Yennu sɑk, n sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑn pɑlpienn, k tɑn foi wɑɑn i buol.
45015033	Yennu nbɑ tien’t mɑnu nɑ ii be nɑn’i. Amenn.
45016001	Tɔn, n luon k n wɑnn’i t niipuo Fiebe po. U be Senkle duo ni k sonmt Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib lenŋ.
45016002	Yin gɑɑl’ɔ Yonmdɑɑnɔ Klistu sɑnn pɑɑk nɑn Yennu niib nbɑ bo sii gɑɑn b lieb biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k sonm’ɔ nɑn wɑɑ luon lin nbɑ i buol, k mɑɑn u mun tuu sonmt niib bonciɑnn, nɑn n mɔnŋ.
45016003	Fuont Pliisiil nɑn Akiilɑɑs bin nbɑ tie n tuontunlieb Yiesu Klistu tuonɑ ni nɑ.
45016004	B yit b mɔnŋ sɑlk k fit fɑt n mɑnfuol. L k tie n kuukuɑ kɑɑ tien’m niipuouk, ŋɑɑn min nɑn Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ, b mun biɑ tien’m niipuouk bonciɑnn.
45016005	I biɑ sɑɑ fuont Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ lɑki k jiɑntl Yennu b ŋɑɑk ni nɑ. Fuont n yɔŋɑnŋ Epɑinet wun nbɑ din tie sinsinn nilɔ nbɑ be Asii tinŋ ni k din tie Klistuyuɑ nɑ.
45016006	Fuont Mɑɑli wun nbɑ din tuu tuun bonciɑnn k tien’i nɑ.
45016007	Fuont Antloniikus nɑn Juniɑs bin nbɑ tie n ninjɑnm, k min nɑn ŋɑnm din lɑkn kuɑ dɑnsɑlk nɑ. Tuomiinbɑ bɑɑk’b bonciɑnn, k b din sint tien Klistuyɑb k n tɑn wei nɑ.
45016008	Fuont n yɔŋɑnŋ Anpliɑtus wun nbɑ k n luon’ɔ Yonmdɑɑnɔ ni nɑ.
45016009	Fuont Ulben wun nbɑ tie t tuontunluɑ Klistu tuonɑ ni nɑ, k fuont n yɔŋɑnŋ Sitɑɑkiis mun biɑk.
45016010	Fuont Apeles wun nbɑ din lɑ biknu ŋɑɑn lek biɑ dɑɑ wɑɑ Klistu nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ, k fuont Aliistuobuul ŋɑɑtieb.
45016011	Fuont n ninjɑ nbɑ k b yi’u Heluodiɔn nɑ, k fuont Nɑlsiis ŋɑɑtieb nbɑ tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑdɑ nɑ.
45016012	Fuont Tliifenn nɑn Tliifos puob nbɑ tuun Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuonɑ nɑ. Fuont n yɔŋɑnŋ Pelsiit puo nbɑ mun biɑ tun Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuonɑ bonciɑnn nɑ.
45016013	Fuont Lufus wun nbɑ mɑntk wɑɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɔnu bonŋɑnn nɑ, k biɑ fuont u nɑɑ wun nbɑ luon’n nɑn wɑɑ luon u mɔnŋ bik biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
45016014	Fuont Asinkliit nɑn Flegɔn nɑn Helmes nɑn Pɑɑtluobɑɑs nɑn Helmɑɑs nɑn Klistu niib kul nbɑ be nɑn’m nɑ.
45016015	Fuont Fiilolok nɑn Suli nɑn Nele nɑn u niipuo, nɑn Oliinpɑs nɑn Yennu niib kul nbɑ be nɑn’m nɑ.
45016016	Ii fuont lieb kii kpɑmi mɑn. Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be siɑl kul po fuont’i.
45016017	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n kpɑɑn’i e, ii mi mɑn bin nbɑ bɔktl Yiesu niib ŋɑɑn dɔk’b u sɔnu ni k sɑɑk wɑnnu nbɑ k i gɑɑl nɑ. Lɔktl’b mɑn.
45016018	L nibuolu k wɑɑ t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Klistu, ŋɑɑn b wɑɑ b mɔnŋ puol e. B jikt mɔmɑnt e k kpɑnn bin nbɑ yɑɑ dudukt k cie nɑ.
45016019	Suɑ kul gbɑt i mɔsɑku po, k lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk e k n mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn’i. Ŋɑɑn n luon k yii mɔk yɑn k sɑɑn jiin lin nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn lin nbɑ k mɔk jɑknt nɑ po, k dɑɑ sɑɑk bonbiil.
45016020	L kɑn wei k Yennu nbɑ tien’t mɑnu nɑ sɑɑ te k yin fiil ŋmɑɑ Sɑɑtɑn yul pɑɑk. T Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’i.
45016021	N tuontunluɑ Tiimuote fuont’i, k n ninjɑnm Lusius nɑn Sɑɑsɔn nɑn Suosiipɑɑtl mun biɑ fuont’i.
45016022	Min Teltius nbɑ dɑ lin nbɑ k Pɔul pɑk kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni nɑ fuont’i Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn ni.
45016023	Gɑius wun nbɑ gɑɑl min Pɔul nɑn Klistuyɑb kul u ŋɑɑk ni nɑ, u mun fuont’i. Elɑst, wun nbɑ tie duo nɑ likguutuɑ nɑ, ŋuɑ nɑn t nɑɑ bik Kɑltus mun fuont’i.
45016024	T Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu i mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’i.
45016025	Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin dont Yennu sɑnn. Ŋuɑ e te k i set wɑɑ’u fɑnu nɑn mɑɑ muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn k jiin Yiesu Klistu po nɑ pɑɑk. Ŋuɑ e fiit wuol ni mɑɑn nbɑ din bɔl binɑ binɑ nɑ.
45016026	Ŋuɑ Yennu sɔkniinbɑ gɑɑl k diɑn lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni k l fiit wuol ni, k Yennu nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ tul mɔb ɑ buolu kul nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ n bɑnn’l, k niib kul n fit k tien yɑdɑ k sɑk u mɔb.
45016027	Ŋuɑ Yennu kuukuɑ e tie yɑndɑɑnɔ nɑ. Niib kul n pɑk’ɔ mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, Yiesu Klistu sɑnn ni. Amenn.
46001001	Min Pɔul nbɑ k Yennu yiin’n u tiɑɔnŋ lonm pɑɑk ɑ n tien Yiesu Klistu tuomi nɑ, nɑn t nɑɑ bik Sositenn dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ
46001002	k tien Yennu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be Kuolent duo ni. T dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk mɑnŋ k tien yinm nbɑ kul k Yennu yiin’i Yiesu Klistu ni, ɑ i tien u tiɑɔnŋ niib k tɑɑn nɑn bin nbɑ kul jiɑntl t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu. Ŋuɑ e tie b Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ.
46001003	T Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu nɑ ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’i k biɑ tul’i mɑnu.
46001004	N tien Yennu niipuouk yuo kul i pɑɑk nɑn wɑɑ tin’i ninbɑɑɔk Yiesu Klistu ni nɑ.
46001005	Yɑɑ tɑɑn nɑn Klistu nɑ pɑɑk, i lɑ piini kul mɑntk mɑɑn nɑn minu piini.
46001006	Klistu siɑlɑ nbɑ k t din tien nɑ, i gɑɑl’l fɑnu wɑɑ.
46001007	L pɑɑk Yennu piini nɑn yenn kuɑ dɑɑ puɑl’i, yinm nbɑ guu yuo nbɑ k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu tɑn sɑɑ jen nɑ.
46001008	Ŋuɑ e sɑɑ tul’i pɑnŋ nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu jenu dɑɑl mɑnŋ k suɑ tɑn dɑɑ fit tɑɑl’i.
46001009	Yennu i yɑɑ u sɑɑ tun lin nbɑ, u tuun ŋɑnn e. Ŋuɑ e yiin’i ɑ yinm nɑn u Bijɑ t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu i mɔk mɔtɑɑɔk nɑn lieb.
46001010	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n bɑln’mi e, t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu sɑnn ni, ɑ yin tɑɑn mɔb, k bɔktu dɑɑ be i sinsuuk ni, k yii tɑɑ mɔyenm kuɑ nɑn dudukyenn kuɑ.
46001011	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, Kloe ŋɑɑtesiɑb yet’n ɑ i mɔk mɔniɑɔk nɑn lieb i sinsuuk ni.
46001012	Lin nbɑ k n yien nɑ tie ɑ i yenɔ yɑɑ ɑ u tie Pɔul yuɑ e, k luɑ mun yɑɑ ɑ u tie Apuoluos yuɑ e, k luɑ mun biɑ yɑɑ ɑ u tie Piɑl yuɑ e, k luɑ mun biɑ yɑɑ ɑ u tie Klistuyuɑ e.
46001013	Klistu mɑnŋ bɔkt bɔkt ee? B din kpɑɑ Pɔul dɑpunpunn pɑɑk i pɑɑk ii? B wul’i Yennu nyunwulu Pɔul sɑnn ni ee?
46001014	N tien Yennu niipuouk nɑn mɑɑ k wul i suɑ Yennu nyunwulu nɑ, sie Kliispus nɑn Gɑius.
46001015	L pɑɑk, suɑ kɑn fit yet ɑ b wul’ɔ Yennu nyunwulu n sɑnn ni.
46001016	(L tie mɔni e, n biɑ wul Sitefɑɑnɑɑs ŋɑɑtieb Yennu nyunwulu e, ŋɑɑn n ji k tiɑn mɑɑ wul wun nbɑ k pukn.)
46001017	K mɑɑn Klistu k tun’n ɑ n tɑn wul niib Yennu nyunwulu kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u tun’n ɑ n tɑn muɑnt u lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ e k tul niib. L k tie ɑ n jikt nisɑɑlk minu kɑɑ k yien’m. Mi i bo i tuun nnɑ, l bo sɑɑ te k Klistu dɑpunpunn pɑɑk kuun nɑ ji k mɔk yiikuo.
46001018	Klistu kuun dɑpunpunn pɑɑk lɑbɑɑl nɑ tie jɑtmɑɑn k tul bin nbɑ buol Yennu sɔnu ni, ŋɑɑn l tie Yennu yiikuo k tul tinm nbɑ wɑɑ fielu sɔnu nɑ.
46001019	L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ u yet ɑ: «N sɑɑ biil yɑndɑnm minu nɑ k te k bɑntieb bɑnnu nɑ n biɑl yɑnn.»
46001020	Tɔn, k tingbounŋ nɑ yɑndɑnm nɑn bin nbɑ mi kɑdɑɑɔk fɑnu nɑn mɔnɔdɑnm nɑ sɑɑ pɑɑk bee? Yennu sɑɑ wɑnn nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ ni yɑn tie jɑti e.
46001021	K mɑɑn Yennu nbɑ mɔk yɑn nɑ te k tingbounŋ nɑ tieb yɑn kɑn fit te k niib n bɑnn’ɔ. L pɑɑk, k u te k bin nbɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ lɑɑt fielu, lɑbɑɑl nbɑ k t muɑntl k tien niib, k niib duki nɑn l tie jɑti lɑbɑɑl nɑ pɑɑk.
46001022	Suifnbɑ luon bin lɑ bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ e wɑɑ, k Gleknbɑ mun luon yɑn,
46001023	ŋɑɑn tinm ŋɑnin muɑntl k wɑnt’b ɑ Klistu din kpo dɑpunpunn pɑɑk e, k mɑɑn mɑnŋ mɔk fei Suifnbɑ nunm ni, k biɑ tie jɑtmɑɑn k tien bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ.
46001024	Ŋɑɑn Suifnbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nbɑ k Yennu lukt’b nɑ ŋɑnin mi nɑn Klistu kuun lɑbɑɑl nɑ tie Yennu yiikuo nɑn u yɑn e.
46001025	Lin nbɑ k Yennu tun k nisɑɑlk jii’l k l tie jɑti nɑ, l mɔk yɑn k gɑl nisɑɑlk yɑn, k lin nbɑ k Yennu tien k nisɑɑlk duki ɑ l k mɔk pɑnŋ nɑ, ŋɑɑn l mɔk pɑnŋ k gɑl nisɑɑlk yɑl.
46001026	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, duknt mɑn yɑɑ din tie biɑnŋ nbɑ yuo nbɑ k Yennu din yiin’i nɑ. I sinsuuk ni, i wɑɑnm-nnɑ e din mɔk yɑn, k i wɑɑnm-nnɑ e din mɔk yiikuo, k i wɑɑnm-nnɑ e din tie nijɑɑnɑ wɑɑs.
46001027	Ŋɑɑn Yennu e lukt jɑtbont tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ɑ wun te k yɑndɑnm n di fei, k biɑ lukt lin nbɑ k mɔk pɑnŋ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ɑ wun te k pɑnŋ dɑnm n di fei.
46001028	Yennu e lukt lin nbɑ k tingbounŋ nɑ ni niib duki nɑn l k mɔk nyuɑt nɑ, lin nbɑ k b duki nɑn l k ŋɑn nɑ, k biɑ k tie siɑl nɑ, ɑ wun biil lin nbɑ k tingbounŋ nɑ ni niib duki nɑn l mɔk nyuɑt nɑ.
46001029	U tien nnɑ e ɑ suɑ dɑɑ fuɑ bɑlɑ u buol.
46001030	Ŋuɑ Yennu e tɑɑn’i nɑn Yiesu Klistu k Klistu mɑnŋ tien’t yɑn. U pɑɑk e k Yennu yet ɑ t tie niŋɑnm u buol k te k t tie u tiɑɔnŋ niib k biɑ nyinn’t t biit dɑɑbs ni.
46001031	L pɑɑk, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Wun nbɑ fuɑ bɑlɑ, wuu fuɑ bɑlɑ mɑnŋ Yonmdɑɑnɔ pɑɑk »
46002001	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, mɑɑ din bɑɑl i buol ni nɑ, n din k muɑntl Yennu mɑɑn nɑ k tien’i nɑn mɔbonpɑɑlɑ ɑmi minu nbɑ gɑl’i kɑɑ.
46002002	K mɑɑn, mɑɑ din be nɑn’i nɑ, n din k lol k n bɑnn siɑl sie Yiesu Klistu, wun nbɑ k b din kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk nɑ kuɑ.
46002003	L pɑɑk, k n din bɑɑl i buol ni k tie tɑtmɔ, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol’n k n jekl.
46002004	N din k tumi’i k biɑ din k muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn nɑn minu nbɑ sɑɑ mɑnŋ niib kɑɑ wɑɑ k bin sɑk’l, ŋɑɑn n din pɑk e k Foŋɑnm nɑ wɑnn u yiikuo,
46002005	ɑ yɑɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ, l k tie nisɑɑlk yɑn pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie Yennu yiikuo pɑɑk e.
46002006	Mɔmɔnm, n muɑntl nɑn yɑn e k tien bin nbɑ k b yɑdɑ cie Klistuyɑb ni nɑ. Ŋɑɑn l k tie tingbounŋ nɑ niib yɑn ɑmi tingbounŋ nɑ pɑnŋ dɑnm nbɑ k b pɑni sɑɑ tien yɑnn nɑ kɑɑ.
46002007	Yɑn nbɑ k n piɑk l po nɑ tie Yennu wuol ni yɑn nbɑ wuon k nilɔ k mi, lin nbɑ k Yennu din ponŋ dɔnŋ lukt ɑ wun don’t, k suɑ k dulnyɑ dɑɑ din k nɑn nɑ.
46002008	Tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑyudɑnm ni suɑ kɑɑ k mi yɑn nɑ. B i din i bo i mi’l, b din bo kɑn kpɑɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ wun nbɑ yen yudɑnt kul ɑ nɑ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk,
46002009	ŋɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Lin nbɑ k nilɔ k lɑ, k biɑ k gbɑt, k biɑ k dukn l po nɑ, ŋɑnn e k Yennu tien siil k guun bin nbɑ luon’ɔ nɑ.»
46002010	Ŋɑɑn k Yennu te k t bɑnn’l Foŋɑnm ni, k mɑɑn Foŋɑnm nɑ mi bont kul nɑn Yennu wuol ni mɑɑn gbɑɑ.
46002011	Nifosɑɑlk siek nbɑ be u ni nɑ kuukuɑ e mi nifosɑɑlk dudukt. Nnɑ e mun suɑ k mi Yennu dudukt sie u Siek nɑ kuukuɑ.
46002012	Siek nbɑ k t gɑɑl nɑ, l k tie tingbounŋ nɑ siek kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie Yennu Siek nbɑ sɑɑ te k tin bɑnn piini nbɑ k u tul’t e.
46002013	L pɑɑk e k t piɑk nɑn mɔbonɑ nbɑ k tie nisɑɑlk yɑn wɑnnu, ŋɑɑn t piɑk mɔbonɑ nbɑ k Yennu Siek wɑnt’t, k biɑ wɑnt Yennu bɑlmɔni nɑ k tien niib nbɑ k u Siek be b ni nɑ,
46002014	ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ k mɔk Yennu Siek mɑnŋ, l dɑɑnɔ k gɑɑn lin nbɑ nyii Siek mɑnŋ buol, k mɑɑn l sii tie jɑti e k tul’ɔ, k u kɑn fit bɑnn l pɑɑk, k mɑɑn l bɑnnu nyi Siek mɑnŋ buol ni e.
46002015	Wun nbɑ mɔk Yennu Siek nɑ sɑɑ fit bu bonn kul buut, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ ŋɑnin suɑ kɑn fit bu u buut.
46002016	nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Ŋmee sɑɑ fit bɑnn Yonmdɑɑnɔ dudukt i? Ŋmee sɑɑ fit kpɑɑn’ɔ?» Ŋɑɑn tinm ŋɑnin mɔk Klistu dudukt.
46003001	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, l tie mɔni e, n din k fit pɑk k tul’i nɑn mɑɑ din bo sɑɑ pɑk k tul niib nbɑ mɔk Siek nɑ. N din pɑk k tul’i nɑn mɑɑ bo sɑɑ pɑk k tul tingbounŋ nɑ tieb nɑ e, k i binbenŋ biɑ tie nɑn wɑɑs binbenŋ nɑ e Klistu sɔnu ni.
46003002	N muɑnt’i biin e, k l k tie jekpɑklɑ kɑɑ, k mɑɑn i k jɑnŋ nɑn’n. Nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ i biɑ lek dɑɑ k jɑnŋ nɑn’n,
46003003	k mɑɑn i binbenŋ biɑ dɑɑ tie nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ niib binbenŋ nɑ e. Funfunn nɑn mɔniɑɔk i be i sinsuuk ni, i k wɑɑ tingbounŋ nɑ tieb binbenŋ kɑɑ ɑɑ?
46003004	Suɑ i yet ɑ u tie Pɔul yuɑ e, k luɑ mun yet ɑ u tie Apuoluos yuɑ e, ŋɑnn i k tuun nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ tieb binbenŋ nɑ kɑɑ ɑɑ?
46003005	Setk nɑn mɔni, ŋmee tie Apuoluos k ŋmee mun tie Pɔul i? T kpɑn tie Yennu tuontunnɑ nbɑ din wɑnn’i bɑnnu nbɑ k i sɑɑ tɔkn k tien Yiesu yɑdɑ e. T kul nɑ tuun tuonɑ nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ tul’t ɑ tii tuun e.
46003006	Min din bul bonbuoli e k Apuoluos mun mɑɑnt nyun, ŋɑɑn Yennu e te k l piɑ k kpɑɑt.
46003007	Wun nbɑ bul nɑn wun nbɑ mɑɑnt nyun ŋɑnin tie yɑnn e, ŋɑɑn Yennu k tie yɑnn, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ e te k l kpɑɑt.
46003008	Bɔktu kɑɑ wun nbɑ buul nɑn wun nbɑ mɑɑnt nyun nɑ sinsuuk ni. Yennu e sɑɑ tul’b nyuɑt bɑɑ tun lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
46003009	T lɑkn tie Yennu tuontunnɑ e. I tie Yennu kpɑɑb nɑ e, k biɑ tie Yennu ŋɑɑk nɑ.
46003010	Yennu nbɑ mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’n nɑ, k n tie nɑn tɑnmɑɑŋɑnɔ nɑ, k fɔkn fiɑkl, k suɑ mun mɑɑ k tuɑnt l pɑɑk. Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ kul mɑɑ k tuɑnt l pɑɑk wun suol u mɔnŋ.
46003011	K mɑɑn fiɑkl ponŋ be. Ŋɑnn e tie Yiesu Klistu, k fiɑksiɑl ji kɑɑ k suɑ ji sɑɑ fit piin.
46003012	Siɑb sɑɑ jii sɑlmɑ e, ɑmi likli kut, ɑmi tɑncincienɑ, k mɑɑ fiɑkl mɑnŋ pɑɑk. k siɑb mun sɑɑ jii dɑɑt e, ɑmi muɑt, ɑmi kɑkɑ, k cɑɑn fiɑkl mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
46003013	Ŋɑɑn dulnyɑ cincɑɑtdɑɑl mɑnŋ ni e, k suɑ kul tuonɑ nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi pɑɑnu. Muu e tɑn sɑɑ fiit wɑnn’l, k bikn suɑ kul tuonɑ k wɑnn lɑɑ tɑn sii tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
46003014	L i kii dii lin nbɑ k nilɔ mɑɑ tuɑn fiɑkl mɑnŋ pɑɑk nɑ, ŋɑnn ŋɑnin u sɑɑ lɑ nyuɑt ɑ.
46003015	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ yɑl dii muu, u sɑɑ kɔnŋ l nyuɑt ɑ, ŋɑɑn u mɔnŋ ŋɑnin sɑɑ lɑ fielu wɑɑ, k l sii tie nɑn u ciɑl e k nyii muu ni nɑ.
46003016	I k mi nɑn i tie Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk e, k Foŋɑnm be i ni ii?
46003017	L pɑɑk, wun nbɑ biil Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk, Yennu mun sɑɑ biil l dɑɑnɔ wɑɑ, k mɑɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk tie u tiɑɔnŋ tiɑɔnŋ yɑl e, k yinm e tie u jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk mɑnŋ.
46003018	Suɑ dɑɑ kpɑnn u mɔnŋ. Suɑ i be i sinsuuk ni k duki nɑn u mɔk yɑn tingbounŋ niib nunm ni, l ŋɑn wun kpɑnt u mɔnŋ wɑɑtɔ kii mɔk yɑn nɑn bɑlmɔni.
46003019	Lin nbɑ k tingbounŋ nɑ tieb dukn k l tie yɑn nɑ, l tie jɑti e Yennu buol nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Yennu so yɑndɑnm b yɑn nbɑ tie bɑluk nɑ ni,»
46003020	k biɑ diɑn liel buol ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ mi nɑn yɑndɑnm dudukt tie yɑnn e.»
46003021	L pɑɑk, suɑ dɑɑ mɔk dont-n-mɔnŋ nisɑɑlk pɑɑk. Bonsiɑl kul tie i yɑl e.
46003022	Min Pɔul nɑn Apuoluos nɑn Piɑl nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ, nɑn mɑnfuol nɑn kuun, nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ, yinm e yen lin nbɑ nɑ kul ɑ,
46003023	k Klistu mun yen’i, k Yennu mun yen Klistu.
46004001	Ŋɑnn ɑmi, i jii’t k tii tie Klistu tuontunnɑ nbɑ k Yennu jii’t k guun’t u wuol ni mɑɑn nɑ.
46004002	Tɔn, lin nbɑ tie mɑjɑɑnn k tul tuontunnɔ tie nnɑ e, l ŋɑn k tuontunnɔ i tuun nɑn bɑlmɔni.
46004003	L i tie k i bu n buut nɑn nifosɑɑli nbɑ tuu bu b lieb buut nɑ, n bɑkɑ kɑɑ. N mɔnŋ gbɑɑ k bu n mɔnŋ buut.
46004004	N nuɑk ni yien e, ŋɑɑn l k wɑnt ɑ n k tuun biit. Yonmdɑɑnɔ e tie wun nbɑ bu n buut.
46004005	L pɑɑk, i dɑɑ bu suɑ buut, k suɑ yuo nbɑ k Yennu senn nɑ dɑɑ k bɑɑl. Ii guu mɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑlu, k ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ jii lin nbɑ be bunbɔnn ni k fiit wɑnn’l pɑɑnu ni, k tɑn sɑɑ fiit pɑlɑ ni mɑɑn k wɑnn pɑɑnu ni, k l yuo nɑ k suɑ kul tɑn sɑɑ lɑ u pɑku nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ Yennu buol.
46004006	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, i pɑɑk e k n bikn lin nbɑ nɑ kul k tul n mɔnŋ nɑn Apuoluos, ɑ i tumi t buol k gbɑt bɑljouk pɑɑk nbɑ yet ɑ: «A dɑɑ gɑɑl lin nbɑ k b diɑn.» Nnɑ e mun k i kɑn dont i mɔnŋ yenɔ kuɑ pɑɑk k gɑl u luɑ.
46004007	Ŋmee tul’ɑ sɑɑkɑt ɑ lieb ni? Yennu kɑɑ tul’ɑ lin nbɑ kul k ɑ mɔk nɑ ɑɑ? Tɔn, lɑɑ tie bɑnnu nbɑ, bee tien k ɑ dont ɑ mɔnŋ, k l tie nɑn lin nbɑ k ɑ mɔk mɑnŋ k tie piini kɑɑ nɑ?
46004008	I ponŋ mɔk lin nbɑ kul k i luon. I ponŋ tie mɔktɑ e. I tie kpɑnbɑlɑ e, ŋɑɑn tinm k tie’l kɑɑ. N ponŋ luon yin set tien kpɑnbɑlɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni, k tinm nɑn yinm n tɑɑn tien kpɑnbɑlɑ.
46004009	Min yɑɑ buol n dukn nɑn Yennu lukt tinm nbɑ tie tuomiinbɑ nɑ k t tie tɑli e, k tie nɑn niib nbɑ k b sɑɑ bu b buut k yɑɑ b ŋɑn nɑn kuun e nɑ. Mɔni e t ji tie dulnyɑ ni ninbɑlsin e, k tul niib nɑn mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ.
46004010	T tie wɑɑtb e Klistu pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn yɑɑ tɑɑn nɑn Klistu nɑ pɑɑk, i tie yɑndɑnm e. T k mɔk pɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin mɔk pɑnŋ. Niib sɑlkt tinm ŋɑɑn tien’i nibɑɑkl.
46004011	Lɑɑ nyii siɑn-yuo wɑɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, t lin nɑn kon e nɑn nyun-nyuklu, k liɑ tɑciɑt, k b buo’t, k t lin yilb k kɑɑ binbebuol.
46004012	T ninŋi e k t tuun k di k tɑn bɑk. Bii sukl’t, t tuu yɑt yetŋɑnm e. Bii dinn’t biɑk, t tuu gɑɑl e.
46004013	B i pɑk biil t sɑnɑ, t tuu pɑk jiin’m nɑn lonm e. T kpɑnt tɑli e, k tie nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ tɑnpenn pɑɑk muɑt nɑ, k biɑ tie nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ jɑknt nɑ k tɑn tuu mɔtɑɑnɑ.
46004014	N k dɑ nɑ k tien’i ɑ n dinn’i fei kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n kpɑɑn’i e, nɑn yɑɑ tie n wɑlonkɑi nɑ,
46004015	k mɑɑn l i tie k i lek mɔk wɑntieb tusɑ piik Klistu ni, i k mɔk bɑɑnbɑ bonciɑnn, k mɑɑn Yiesu Klistu ni e k n mɑl’i lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ k n wɑnn’i nɑ pɑɑk.
46004016	Ŋɑnn, n bɑln’mi e, ii wɑɑ n binbenŋ mɑn.
46004017	Lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk e k n tuun Tiimuote i buol, wun nbɑ tie n bilonkɑk k tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ Yonmdɑɑnɔ ni. U sɑɑ tiɑl’i mɑɑ be biɑnŋ nbɑ Klistu ni, k l tɑɑ nɑn mɑɑ lin k wɑnt Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib biɑnŋ nbɑ, siɑn nbɑ kul.
46004018	Siɑb mɔk dont-n-mɔnŋ e i sinsuuk ni, k duki ɑ n kɑn bɑɑl k gɔn’i ni.
46004019	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k Yonmdɑɑnɔ luon, l kɑn wei k n sɑɑ gɔn’i. L yuo nɑ, n kɑn bɑnn dont-n-mɔnŋ dɑnm nɑ nbɑ pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn b set mɔk pɑnŋ ɑmi b k mɔk.
46004020	K mɑɑn Yennu nɑɑn k tie mɔbonɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie yiikuo e.
46004021	I luon lɑnn e? I luon k n bɑɑl nɑn lɑnbɑnn ɑmi n bɑɑl suon nnɑ e nɑn lonm u?
46005001	L set tie mɔni e k b yien ɑ boncunconsn be i sinsuuk ni, k l tie lin nbɑ k bin nbɑ k wɑɑ Yiesu Klistu nɑ mɔnŋ set kɑn tun. N gbɑt ɑ suɑ be i sinsuuk ni k duɑ nɑn u bɑɑ puo,
46005002	K i biɑ mɔk jɑpɑɑt l pɑɑk. Ŋɑɑn l bo ŋɑn k i pɑlɑ n biil k yin nyinn l dɑɑnɔ i sinsuuk ni.
46005003	Mɑɑ lek be bɑnfɔkl nɑn’i nɑ, ŋɑɑn n be nɑn’i n dudukt ni, k n ponŋ bu dɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ buut nɑn mɑɑ bo sii be nɑn’i bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ e.
46005004	Yuo nbɑ k i tɑn lɑkn be t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn ni, k n mun be nɑn’i n dudukt ni, k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu yiikuo be t pɑɑk nɑ,
46005005	yin jii dɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ k tien’ɔ Sɑɑtɑn nuu ni ɑ k dɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ nisɑɑlk binbenŋ n kpo, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑlu dɑɑl mɑnŋ u siek tɑn sɑɑ lɑ fielu.
46005006	I dont-n-mɔnŋ mɑnŋ k ŋɑn. I k mi ɑ dɑtinŋ wɑɑnm-nnɑ e te k pɑɑnu yon kul fuutl piil ii?
46005007	Ŋɑnn yin lu dɑtinkpel nbɑ tie i biit, k ji dɑɑ mɔk jɑknt. I ji sii tie nɑn yon nbɑ k dɑtinŋ kɑɑ lenŋ nɑn yɑɑ set be bɑnnu nbɑ, k mɑɑn b ponŋ kpii t Yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm pebik nbɑ tie Klistu nɑ wɑɑ.
46005008	L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt tin di jɑɑnm nɑn pɑɑnu nbɑ k mɔk dɑtinŋ, pɑɑnu nbɑ k mɔk jɑknt k biɑ tie bɑlmɔni yɑl nɑ, ŋɑɑn nyik dɑtinkpel nbɑ tie biit nɑn bonbiil yɑl nɑ.
46005009	N ponŋ diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk k tul’i k yet ɑ i dɑɑ wɑɑ boncunconɑ nɑ.
46005010	L k tie ɑ n yɑɑ ɑ i nyinn i mɔnŋ tingbounŋ nɑ boncunconɑ, ɑmi niɑnciɑɔnŋ dɑnm, ɑmi nɑn-yuki, ɑmi pɑtmɑnnɑ ni kɑɑ. L i tie k i luon k yin lɔkt’b, sie k i nyii tingbounŋ nɑ ni.
46005011	N diɑn k yet’i ɑ i dɑɑ tɔk nɑn dɑɑnɔ nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ ŋuɑ wɑɑ Klistu e ŋɑɑn tuun boncuncontuonɑ, ɑmi k mɔk niɑnciɑɔnŋ, ɑmi k mɑnn pɑtɑ, ɑmi k mɔk sɑnjɑɑɔnŋ, ɑmi k tie dɑnyuyukpienn, ɑmi k tie nɑn-yukɔ nɑ. I dɑɑ kɑɑl nɑn l nilɔ k di jiet gbɑɑ.
46005012	L k tie n tuonn kɑɑ k n sii bu bin nbɑ k tie Klistuyɑb nɑ buut. Yennu e sɑɑ bu b buut, ŋɑɑn k i lieb nbɑ tie Klistuyɑb nɑ mun, i kɑn bu b buut ii?
46005013	L ponŋ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «I bel biitdɑɑnɔ nɑ k nyinn’ɔ i sinsuuk ni.»
46006001	L i tie k i yenɔ mɔk mɑɑn nɑn u luɑ nbɑ wɑɑ Klistu, nlee k u sɑɑ jii’l k sɑɑn nɑn’n bin nbɑ k wɑɑ Klistu nɑ buut dɑɑnɔ buol, ŋɑɑn kɑn sɑɑn nɑn’n Yennu niib buol i?
46006002	I k mi ɑ Yennu niib tɑn sɑɑ bu tingbounŋ nɑ tieb buut ii? K l i tie k i tɑn sɑɑ bu tingbounŋ nɑ tieb buut, ŋɑnn i kɑn fit k bu bɑlbisbis mɔtɑɑnɑ ɑɑ?
46006003	I k mi nɑn t tɑn sɑɑ bu mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ buut ii? Nlee k i kɑn fit bu mɔtɑɑnɑ binbenŋ nɑ mɑɑn i?
46006004	L pɑɑk, l i tie k i mɔk mɑɑn nɑ buolu, bee k i jikt k sɑɑ nɑn’n bin nbɑ k tie siɑl i Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib ni nɑ buol i?
46006005	N yet nnɑ ɑ n din’i fei e. Mɔniɑɔk i bɑɑl yinm Klistu niib sinsuuk ni, suɑ kɑɑ i sinsuuk ni k mɔk yɑn nbɑ sɑɑ fit ŋɑnm mɑɑn mɑnŋ ii?
46006006	Ŋɑɑn k i nɑɑwɑyenɔ sɑɑ nɑn u luɑ k b bu b buut bɑlbuulɔ nbɑ k tien Klistu yɑdɑ nɑ buol ii?
46006007	Yɑɑ lek mɔk mɑɑn nɑn i nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑ gbɑɑ, l wɑnn nɑn i ji bot e Yiesu sɔnu ni cɑin. A nɑɑ bik i tun k biil’ɑ, k dii suklu, l k sɔ ɑɑ? A nɑɑ bik i jɑn’ɑ, k ɑ nyik’ɔ, l k sɔ ɑɑ?
46006008	Ŋɑɑn yinm e tuun lieb biit k jɑɑn lieb, k biɑ lek tie nnɑ k tien i lieb nbɑ tie Klistuweilɑ nɑ gbɑɑ.
46006009	I k mi nɑn bin nbɑ tuun bonbiil nɑ tɑn kɑn lɑ yiɑl Yennu nɑɑn ni ii? I dɑɑ kpɑnn i mɔnŋ. Bin nbɑ tie juonbɑɑlt ɑmi pɑtmɑnnɑ ɑmi boncunconɑ ɑmi jɑb nbɑ mɔk niɑɔnŋ k duɑ nɑn b jɑlieb
46006010	ɑmi nɑn-yuki ɑmi niɑnciɑɔnŋ dɑnm ɑmi dɑnyuyukpienɑ ɑmi sɑnjɑɑnjɑnnɑ ɑmi fɑt-tieb, bin nbɑ nɑ kul tɑn kɑn lɑ yiɑl Yennu nɑɑn ni.
46006011	I siɑb din tie nnɑ e, ŋɑɑn k Yennu wuul i biit nɑ k senn’i k i tie u niib k u biɑ yet ɑ i tie niŋɑnm Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu sɑnn ni nɑn t Yennu Siek yiikuo ni.
46006012	I siɑb yien ɑ: «Bont kul ɑ k kuɑ n buol ni.» L tie mɔni e, ŋɑɑn bont kul kɑɑ ŋɑn k tul’ɑ ni. N sɑɑ fit yɑɑ ɑ bont kul k kuɑ n buol ni, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin kɑn sɑk k tie bonsiɑl dɑɑbl.
46006013	I siɑb yien ɑ: «Jiet tie puol yɑl e, k puol mun tie jiet yɑl.» Mɔni e, ŋɑɑn Yennu sɑɑ biil l ŋɑnle nɑ kul. Yennu k nɑn t gbɑnɑnt ɑ t jii’l kii conm, ŋɑɑn ɑ t jii’l k lii tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑl, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ e yen t gbɑnɑnt nɑ.
46006014	Yennu e din fiin Yonmdɑɑnɔ kuun ni, k mun biɑ tɑn sɑɑ jii u yiikuo k fiin’t.
46006015	I k mi nɑn i gbɑnɑnt nɑ gɑɑ nɑn Klistu gbɑnɑnt e? Ŋɑnn, nlee k n sɑɑ jii Klistu gbɑnɑnbɔkyenn k gɑɑn nɑn puocunconna? Aɑi, l kɑn fit.
46006016	Ami, i k mi nɑn wun nbɑ jii u mɔnŋ k tɑɑn nɑn puocunconn, ŋuɑ nɑn l puo ŋɑnin tɑɑn gbɑnɑn-yent kuɑ wɑɑ ɑɑ? K mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Juɑ nɑn u puo sɑɑ tɑɑn k tie gbɑnɑn-yent kuɑ e.»
46006017	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tɑɑn u mɔnŋ nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ, Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑn l dɑɑnɔ tɑɑn k tie seyenŋ kuɑ e.
46006018	Lɔktl mɑn boncuncontuonɑ. Tuonbiit kul nbɑ biɑl, l k tuun gbɑnɑnt ni, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ conm ŋɑnin biil u mɔnŋ gbɑnɑnt e.
46006019	I k mi nɑn i gbɑnɑnt nɑ tie Foŋɑnm nbɑ k i gɑɑl Yennu buol nɑ dieok o, k u be i ni ii? I k yen i mɔnŋ i tiɑɔnŋ kɑɑ.
46006020	Yennu e dɑɑ’i, k u pɑ i pɑɑk ɑ. L pɑɑk, i jii i gbɑnɑnt kii tuun lin nbɑ sii dont u sɑnn.
46007001	N yɑɑ n jiin i buboit nbɑ k i dɑɑn diɑn tul’n nɑ e. L i tie k juɑ k kuɑn puo, l ŋɑn.
46007002	Ŋɑɑn boncuncontuonɑ nbɑ yɑbt nɑ pɑɑk, l ŋɑn k juɑ kul ii mɔk u mɔnŋ puo, k puo kul ii mun i mɔk u mɔnŋ sɔlɔ.
46007003	L ŋɑn k juɑ n jii u mɔnŋ k cɑb u puo, k puo mun n jii u mɔnŋ k cɑb u sɔlɔ.
46007004	Puo k yen u mɔnŋ gbɑnɑnt, u sɔlɔ e yen’n. Juɑ mun k yen u mɔnŋ gbɑnɑnt, u puo e yen’n.
46007005	I dɑɑ wuun lieb i gbɑnɑnt lonm, l i kii tie yuo nbɑ k i tɑn tɑɑn mɔyenm kuɑ k yɑɑ yin miɑl Yennu yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ i kɑɑ. Ŋɑɑn k l puolpo k yin biɑ tɑɑn lieb, k Sɑɑtɑn dɑɑ biknt’i k nyɑni’i, yɑɑ kɑn fit suol i mɔnŋ nɑ pɑɑk.
46007006	N yien’i lin nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn l k tie sennu kɑɑ.
46007007	Setk nɑn mɔni n bo luon k suɑ kul i be, nɑn mɑɑ be biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e, ŋɑɑn suɑ kul nɑn u piini e k l nyii Yennu buol jiɑk jiɑk.
46007008	Gotl lin nbɑ k n yien k tien jɑkpɑkɑ nɑn pɑkɔi. L bo sii ŋɑn k i be i kuɑ, nɑn mɑɑ be biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
46007009	Ŋɑɑn b i kii fit so b mɔnŋ, ŋɑnn bin kuɑn puob, k puob mun n kun jɑb, k mɑɑn l sɔ nɑn yɑɑ sii mɔk l niɑɔnŋ k i pɑlɑ kɑb ŋɑɑn k i kɑn lɑ nɑ.
46007010	Jɑb nɑn puob nbɑ be nɑn lieb nɑ, n sent senni e k tien’i, l k tie min kɑɑ sent, ŋɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ e sent, ɑ puo dɑɑ mi nyikt u sɔlɔ.
46007011	Ŋɑɑn, l i tie k u nyik u sɔlɔ, wun biɑl u kuukuɑ ɑmi wun di sindɑnt k ŋmɑt ɑ sɔlkpelɔ nɑ buol. Juɑ i mun i mi wun yet u ŋɑɑpuo.
46007012	Bin nbɑ biɑl nɑ e, k min yien, Yonmdɑɑnɔ kɑɑ yet ɑ Klistuweilɔ i mɔk puo, k puo nɑ k tie Klistuweilɔ, ŋɑɑn k l tie puo mɑnŋ lonm u e, ɑ wuu be u buol ni, juɑ nɑ dɑɑ yien’ɔ.
46007013	Puo nbɑ tie Klistuweilɔ mun i mɔk sɔlɔ nbɑ k tie Klistuweilɔ, ŋɑɑn k l tie juɑ mɑnŋ lonm u e ɑ wuu diɑ’u, puo mɑnŋ dɑɑ yɑɑtl ŋɑɑn nyikt u sɔlɔ nɑ.
46007014	Juɑ nbɑ k tie Klistuweilɔ, ŋɑɑn k u ŋɑɑpuo tie Klistuweilɔ nɑ, puo mɑnŋ pɑɑk e tien k juɑ nɑ tɑn sii tie Yennu yuɑ, k puo nbɑ k tie Klistuweilɔ nɑ mun, ŋɑɑn k u sɔlɔ tie Klistuweilɔ nɑ, juɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk e tien k puo nɑ tɑn sii tie Yennu yuɑ. L i bo i kii tie nnɑ, b wɑɑs bo kii tie Yennu yɑb, ŋɑɑn lɑɑ tie nnɑ nɑ pɑɑk, b wɑɑs mɑnŋ mun tɑn sii tie Yennu yɑb e.
46007015	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ k tie Klistuweilɔ i luon wun yet u luɑ, Klistuweilɔ n ŋɑɑn’ɔ k wuu sɑɑ. Ŋɑnn ŋɑnin, senni ji k so wun nbɑ tie Klistuweilɔ mɑnŋ. Yennu e yiin’t ɑ tii be nɑn mɑnu.
46007016	Fin puo, ɑ tien nlee bɑnn nɑn ɑ sɑɑ fiel ɑ sɔlɔ? K fin puodɑɑnɔ, ɑ tien nlee bɑnn nɑn ɑ sɑɑ fiel ɑ puo?
46007017	Ŋɑnn ŋɑnin, suɑ kul ii tuun nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ tul’ɔ piini bɑnnu nbɑ kii biɑ kii be bɑnnu nbɑ k u din be yuo nbɑ k Yennu din yiin’ɔ nɑ.
46007018	Wun nbɑ dɔnŋ pot u punn ɑ k Yennu tɑn yiin’ɔ, ŋɑɑnt k wun diɑ nnɑ, k wun nbɑ mun k pot yuo nbɑ k Yennu yiin’ɔ nɑ, u dɑɑ poli.
46007019	Wun nbɑ pot nɑn wun nbɑ k pot, l k tie lin nbɑ siɑn. Lin nbɑ mɑntk tie bɑlkpɑnn tie i diɑ Yennu senni.
46007020	Suɑ kul ii be binbenŋ nbɑ ni k u ponŋ tuu be wɑɑ, k Yennu tɑn yiin’ɔ nɑ.
46007021	A ii dinŋ ii tie dɑɑbl i e yuo nbɑ k Yennu din yiin’ɑ nɑ ɑɑ? A dɑɑ te k l dɑɑmi’ɑ ni, ŋɑɑn fi i sɑɑ lɑ yɑɑk k nyinn ɑ mɔnŋ dɑɑbs ni, fɑn tien nnɑ.
46007022	Wun nbɑ ponŋ tie dɑɑbl yuo nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ yiin’ɔ nɑ, u ji tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ yuɑ e k ji k tie dɑɑbl u buol ni. Nnɑ e mun, l i tie k wun nbɑ tuu yen u mɔnŋ ɑ, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ tɑn yiin’ɔ, u ji tie Klistu dɑɑbl e.
46007023	Yennu dɑɑ’i e. L pɑɑk, i dɑɑ tie niib dɑɑbɑ.
46007024	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, l ŋɑn k suɑ kul ii be Yennu buol nɑn wɑɑ din tuu be binbenŋ nbɑ ni yuo nbɑ k Yennu yiin’ɔ nɑ.
46007025	Mɔtɑɑnɑ, n ji piɑk k tien bin nbɑ dɑɑ k kuɑn puob ɑmi k dɑɑ k kun jɑb nɑ e. N k mɔk sennu nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ senn, ŋɑɑn n wɑnt’i n dudukt e, mɑɑ tie nilɔ nbɑ k i sɑɑ fit gɑɑl u mɔb Yonmdɑɑnɔ ninbɑtinu pɑɑk nɑ.
46007026	Mɔtɑɑnɑ cicɑkn nɑ pɑɑk, n dukn nɑn l ŋɑn k nilɔ i be biɑnŋ nbɑ k u tuu be nɑ.
46007027	A mɔk puo oo? A dɑɑ luon sɔnu nbɑ k ɑ sɑɑ bel’ɔ. A dɑɑ k kuɑn puo oo? A ji dɑɑ luon sɔnu nbɑ k ɑ sɑɑ kuɑn puo.
46007028	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k ɑ kuɑn puo, ɑ k mɔk biit. Sɑpɑɑmɔ i mun i kun juɑ, u k tun biit. Ŋɑɑn n luon k n nyinn’i muksuk nbɑ k bin nbɑ mɔk puob nɑn bin nbɑ mɔk sɔlb sɑɑ lɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni e.
46007029	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n luon k n wɑnn’i nɑn yuo nɑ k yɑb. L pɑɑk, mɔtɑɑnɑ l ŋɑn k bin nbɑ mɔk puob ii be nɑn b k kuɑn puob nɑ,
46007030	k bin nbɑ mɔ, bii be nɑn b k mɔk pɑlbiil nɑ, k bin nbɑ mɔk pɑlpienn bii be nɑn b k mɔk pɑlpienn nɑ, k bin nbɑ dɑɑ siɑl, bii be nɑn lin nbɑ k b dɑɑ nɑ k tie b yɑl.
46007031	k bin nbɑ di tingbounŋ nɑ mɑnu, l ŋɑn k bii be nɑn b bɑkɑ kɑɑ lenŋ nɑ. K mɑɑn tingbounŋ nɑ nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ, l sɑɑ gɑl ɑ.
46007032	N k luon k siɑl n dɑɑmi’i ni. Jɑkpɑkl bɑkɑ be Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuonɑ ni e, k u goli wɑɑ sɑɑ tun lin nbɑ k penn Yonmdɑɑnɔ pɑl,
46007033	ŋɑɑn puokuɑntuɑ ŋɑnin bɑkɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ bonɑ ni e, k u goli wɑɑ sɑɑ tun biɑnŋ nbɑ k penn u ŋɑɑpuo pɑl.
46007034	L pɑɑk, u niɑɔnŋ bɔkt munle e. Puokɑlɑnkɑɑnn ɑmi sɑpɑɑmɔ bɑkɑ mun be Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuonɑ ni e nɑn wɑɑ sɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ k u gbɑnɑnt nɑn u siek ii tɑnŋ ii tie Yennu yɑl fɑnu, ŋɑɑn puo nbɑ kun juɑ ŋɑnin bɑkɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ bonɑ ni e, k u goli wɑɑ sɑɑ tun lin nbɑ k penn u sɔlɔ pɑl.
46007035	N piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ i mɔnŋ sonml pɑɑk e, k l k tie ɑ n yɑɑ n mɑb’i kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n luon yii be fɑnu, k jii i mɔnŋ kul k pet tul Yonmdɑɑnɔ.
46007036	Juɑ i mɔk sɑlkpenŋ k u tɑn biel puo, k juɑ nɑ mɔk dudukt u po k kɑn fit suol u mɔnŋ, k duki nɑn l ŋɑn k wun kuɑn’ɔ, ŋɑɑnt k wun tun biɑnŋ nbɑ k u luon. L ŋɑn k wun kuɑn’ɔ. U k mɔk biit.
46007037	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ pɑl cie, k u mi nɑn siɑl kɑn dɑɑmi’ɔ, k u sɑɑ fit suol u mɔnŋ niɑɔnŋ, k dukn u pɑl ni ɑ u kɑn kuɑn u sɑlkpenŋ, ŋɑnn mun ŋɑn.
46007038	Ŋɑnn, wun nbɑ kuɑn u sɑlkpenŋ, l ŋɑn, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ mun k kuɑn u sɑlkpenŋ, u tun lin nbɑ ŋɑn k gɑl wun nbɑ kuɑn nɑ wɑɑ.
46007039	Puo nbɑ mɔk u sɔlɔ k u dɑɑ be u mɑnfuol ni, u k yen u mɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn u sɔlɔ i kpo, u ji mɔk yiikuo nbɑ k sɑɑ kun wun nbɑ k u luon, ŋɑɑn l ŋɑn k u juɑ mɑnŋ ii tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ yuɑ.
46007040	Ŋɑɑn min yɑɑ buol ŋɑnin n dukn nɑn l i tie k u be k k kun juɑ, l sii mɑn’ɔ k gɑl nɑn wɑɑ bo sɑɑ kun juɑ. Nnɑ e k n dukn, k n mun mi nɑn n mɔnŋ mɔk Yennu Siek.
46008001	Tɔn, ŋɑɑnt tin got pɑtɑ nɑnt lɑbɑɑl. L tie mɔni nɑn t kul mɔk minu, ŋɑɑn minu te k nilɔ dont u mɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn lonm ŋɑnin sonmt nilɔ e Klistu wɑɑnu ni.
46008002	Wun nbɑ duki nɑn u mi siɑl, l dɑɑnɔ dɑɑ k mi nɑn wɑɑ bo sii mi nɑ.
46008003	Ŋɑɑn dɑɑnɔ nbɑ luon Yennu, ŋuɑ e k Yennu mi’u.
46008004	Tɔn, k jikt sɑɑ pɑtɑ nɑnt ŋmɑmu po, t mi nɑn pɑtl tie bont nbɑ k fo, k biɑ mi nɑn Yen-yenɔ kuɑ e be.
46008005	Pɑtɑ i lek i ji kii be gbɑɑ, k be sɑnpɑɑpo ɑmi tingbounŋ nnɑ, (k mɑɑn pɑtɑ bonciɑnn nɑn yonmdɑnm nbɑ k niib jiɑntl nɑ bonciɑnn be),
46008006	ŋɑɑn tinm yɑɑ buol ni ŋɑnin, Yen-yenɔ kuɑ e be, k ŋuɑ e tie Bɑɑ nbɑ din nɑn bonsiɑl kul, k u pɑɑk e k t fo, k Yomdɑɑn-yenɔ kuɑ e be, wun nbɑ tie Yiesu Klistu. Ŋuɑ e te k bonsiɑl kul be, k u pɑɑk e biɑk k t fo.
46008007	Ŋɑɑn suɑ kul kɑɑ mi l bɑlmɔni. Nisiɑb mɑntk mɑɑn pɑtmɑnnu bonciɑnn. L pɑɑk te k nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, b i ŋmɑn nɑnt mɑnŋ i e, b duki ɑ l tie pɑtɑ nɑnt e. B dudukt k pɑɑl, k b duki ɑ l mɔk biit.
46008008	Ŋɑɑn jiet kɑɑ sɑɑ te k t nɑki Yennu. T i kii dii, siɑl k puɑl’t. T i biɑ kii dii, l biɑ k pukn’t siɑl.
46008009	Ii mi mɑn, pɑsiɑl yin tɑn jii i yiikuo nɑ k lin kpɑnt lin nbɑ te k bin nbɑ yɑɑ yɑdɑ wɑɑl nɑ n gbiɑt k bɑɑ.
46008010	K wun nbɑ yɑdɑ wɑɑl i lɑ fin nbɑ mɔk bɑnnu nɑ, k ɑ be puociɑnfiek ni k di, l kɑn te k ŋuɑ mun n di pɑtɑ jiet ii?
46008011	Fin nbɑ tie bɑntuɑ nɑ, ɑ bɑnnu nɑ sɑɑ biil ɑ nɑɑ bik nbɑ yɑdɑ k pɑɑl nɑ, wun nbɑ k Klistu din gɑɑl u pɑɑk k kpo nɑ.
46008012	Fi i tie nnɑ k tuun biit k tien ɑ nɑɑ wɑɑs, k biil b dudukt nbɑ k cie nɑ, l wɑnt nɑn ɑ tuun biit k tien Klistu e.
46008013	Ŋɑnn, l i tie lin nbɑ k n di nɑ pɑɑk i e te k n nɑɑ bik bɑɑ biit ni, ŋɑnn n ji kɑn bɑn ŋmɑn pɑtl nɑnt, k nnɑ e k n kɑn te k wun bɑɑ.
46009001	N k yen n mɔnŋ ii? N k tie tuomi kɑɑ ɑɑ? N din k lɑ t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu uu? N tuonɑ nbɑ k n tuun k tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ k i mun tie Klistuyɑb ii?
46009002	Siɑb i kii sɑk ɑ n tie tuomi, ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs yin sɑk, k mɑɑn yɑɑ tɑɑn nɑn Klistu nɑ, ŋɑnn e tie nyinn nɑn n set tie tuomi e.
46009003	Niib i piɑk k biil n sɑnn, n sɑɑ jiin nnɑ e k nyi lenŋ.
46009004	T k mɔk yiikuo nbɑ k t sii di k nyu t tuonn nɑ pɑɑk ii?
46009005	T biɑ k mɔk yiikuo nbɑ k sɑɑ jii puo nbɑ tie Klistuyuɑ kii lin nɑn’ɔ, nɑn tuomiinbɑ siɑb nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ ninjɑnm nɑn Piɑl nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ɑɑ?
46009006	Kuo, i duki ɑ l tie min nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs kuukuɑ e sii tuun tuonn k dint t mɔnŋ ii?
46009007	Seje lɑnnɔ e tuun tuonn ŋɑɑn pɑ u mɔnŋ i? K ŋmee sii ko tilonti nbɑ k b yi fiinyɑnbɑ nɑ ni ŋɑɑn kɑn di l luɑnɑ? Ami ŋmee sii kpɑɑl bonkobt ŋɑɑn kɑn nyu b biin i?
46009008	I dɑɑ duki nɑn n bikn nɑn nisɑɑlk binbenŋ kɑɑ k yet nnɑ. K mɑɑn Muois senni nɑ mun biɑ yet ŋɑnn e.
46009009	L diɑn Muois senni nɑ ni ɑ: «Nɑɑb i ŋmɑɑn dii k pini dibin, fɑɑ dɑɑ bobnt u mɔb » Yennu bɑkɑ be nei ni ee?
46009010	Ami u k mɑntk yien tinm kɑɑ ɑɑ? Mɔmɔnm, l diɑn k tien tinm e. Wun nbɑ ko nɑn wun nbɑ buo tun nnɑ e k mɔk dindɑnn, k tɑn sɑɑ cent dii mɑnŋ.
46009011	T din bul lin nbɑ tie siek yɑl i sinsuuk ni, k mɔtɑɑnɑ t i luon tin jɑɑn lin nbɑ k i mɔk nɑ siɑl i e, l k ŋɑn ii?
46009012	Siɑb i mɔk yiikuo k sɑɑ gɑɑl bonɑ i buol, k tinm ŋɑnin k mɔk l yiikuo k cie ŋɑnm ii? Ŋɑɑn t k jii yiikuo nɑ k tun nɑn’n tuonn, ŋɑɑn t di fɑlɑ bonsiɑl kul ni, k mɑɑn t k luon k tin te k Klistu lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ n jil puol.
46009013	I ponŋ mi nɑn bin nbɑ tuun Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni nɑ, b jiet nyi b tuonn mɑnŋ ni e, k bin nbɑ mɑnn mɑlunŋ k tien Yennu, binbintl pɑɑk nɑ mun gɑɑn b yɑl lenŋ e.
46009014	Nnɑ e mun k Yonmdɑɑnɔ tul mɔb ɑ bin nbɑ muɑntl u lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ, b jiet mun sii nyi lenŋ e.
46009015	Ŋɑɑn n k jii yiikuo nɑ k tun nɑn tuonn, k biɑ k dɑ nɑ ɑ i tul’n siɑl. Mi i kpo, l sɔ nɑn suɑ n te k n yudɑnt n ŋmɑt puol.
46009016	L k tie ɑ n mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnt mɑɑ muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ, k mɑɑn l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k n muɑnt’l. Mi i kii muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ, bonbiil sii tie n yɑl e.
46009017	Mi i bo i lukt tuonn mɑnŋ n tiɑɔnŋ u e, n bo sɑɑ lɑ nyuɑt, ŋɑɑn min kɑɑ lukt n mɔnŋ, l tie Yennu e guun’n tuonn mɑnŋ.
46009018	Lɑnn e tie n nyuɑt i? N nyuɑt tie mɑɑ fit k muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ yɑnn nɑ e, k k jii yiikuo nbɑ k n mɔk’l lɑbɑmɑnn muɑntu ni nɑ k gɑɑn siɑl.
