54003011	Nnɑ e mun, b puob sii tie bin nbɑ jɑnŋ nɑn niib n bɑɑk’b, k dɑɑ tie bonbiil-pɑklɑ, ŋɑɑn kii be suon nnɑ kii tie bin nbɑ luon bɑlmɔni e.
54003012	L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k jɑɑnti niib sonmtuɑ i mɔk puo yenɔ kuɑ, k biɑ fit diɑ u wɑɑs nɑn u ŋɑɑk niib fɑnu.
54003013	B i tuun b tuonɑ fɑnu b sii mɔk nibɑɑkl k biɑ k mɔk bilsuk yuo nbɑ k b wɑnt niib bɑɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.
54003014	Mɑɑ dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ tien’ɑ nɑ, n mɔk dindɑnn nɑn mɑn bɑɑl mɔtɑɑnɑ k lɑ’ɑ,
54003015	ŋɑɑn l i wei k n k bɑɑl, kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ sɑɑ te k ɑ sii mi niib nbɑ sii diɑ b mɔnŋ bɑnnu nbɑ Yennu ŋɑɑtieb sinsuuk ni. N piɑk mɑnfodɑɑnɔ Yennu mɔtɑɑɔk niib po e. Ŋuɑ guu’b k biɑ tie fiɑkl nbɑ k bɑlmɔni set l pɑɑk nɑ.
54003016	Nn, l tie mɔni e, bɑktnɔunŋ minu nbɑ k yɑdɑ tien tinm nɑ yɑb: Klistu din bɑɑl k tie nisɑɑlk e, k tie bɑlmɔndɑɑnɔ, Foŋɑnm e din wɑnn nnɑ. Mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ din lɑ’u wɑɑ, k niib din muɑnt u lɑbɑɑl k tul nibuolu kul, k b tien’ɔ yɑdɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k Yendɔunŋ ni k Yennu tul’ɔ yudɑnt.
54004001	Tɔn, Foŋɑnm pɑk k yent’t ɑ: dɑjuonti dɑɑ ni, nisiɑb sɑɑ nyik b yɑdɑ nɑn Klistu nɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn sɑk wɑɑ nɑlnbiit nbɑ kpɑnn’b nɑ, k biɑ wɑɑ nɑlnbiit wɑnnu.
54004002	L dɑnm bot kpinkpɑni dɑnm mɑnŋ pɑɑk ɑ. K kpinkpɑni dɑnm mɑnŋ yɑn ni ji kpo k kɑb nɑn bɑɑ tuu jii kut-tont k fiɑ bonn nɑ.
54004003	L nibuolu wɑnt, ɑ jɑkunt nɑn puokuɑnt k ŋɑn, ɑ k jesiɑt biɑ k ŋɑn nɑn dinu. Ŋɑɑn tinm nbɑ tien Klistu yɑdɑ k biɑ mi l bɑlmɔni nɑ, mi nɑn Yennu din nɑn jebuolu kul ɑ, ɑ niib n tuu tul’ɔ niipuouk l pɑɑk e ŋɑɑn di.
54004004	Bonsiɑl kul nbɑ k Yennu din nɑn nɑ ŋɑn. T tuu tul’ɔ niipuouk l pɑɑk ŋɑɑn gɑɑl’l, k dɑɑ yien siɑl,
54004005	k mɑɑn Yennu mɑɑn nɑn yenmiɑlu pɑɑk e te k l ŋɑn Yennu buol ni.
54004006	L i tie k ɑ jii wɑnnu nbɑ nɑ k tul t nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑ, ɑ sii tie Klistu tuontunŋɑnɔ nbɑ dint u mɔnŋ nɑn Klistu lɑbɑmɑnn mɔbonɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni wɑnnu nbɑ k ɑ wɑɑ fɑnu nɑ e.
54004007	Ŋɑɑn yet fɑɑk lɑbɑɑl nbɑ sɑɑ te k ɑ yɑdɑ n bɑɑ. Yɑbt ɑ mɔnŋ pɑɑk kii be bɑnnu nbɑ sii gbuot Yennu nunm.
54004008	Lin nbɑ k nilɔ tuun k be lɑɑfiɑ ni mɔk nyuɑt wɑɑnm-nnɑ e, ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ k u tuun k be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuo Yennu nunm nɑ mɔk nyuɑt bonɑ kul ni, k sonmt’ɔ mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ.
54004009	Lin nbɑ nɑ tie bɑlmɔni e, k l ŋɑn nɑn niib kul n gɑɑl’l.
54004010	L pɑɑk e te k t gbɑɑ k tuun nɑn ninmɔnn k mɑɑn t mɔk dindɑnn Yennu nbɑ fo ni, wun nbɑ tie suɑ kul Fietuɑ, k u set sɑɑ tul bin nbɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ fielu wɑɑ.
54004011	Wɑnt’b k kpɑɑn’m lin nbɑ nɑ kul ɑ.
54004012	Dɑɑ te k suɑ n siɑn’ɑ k mɑɑn fɑɑ pɔ nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn te k ɑ pinpɑɔk nɑn ɑ binbenŋɑnŋ, nɑn ɑ lonm, nɑn ɑ yɑdɑ, nɑn fɑɑ wei Yennu senni bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, n wɑnn Klistuweilɑ bɑɑ bo sii be biɑnŋ nbɑ.
54004013	Jiin ɑ yuo k lii Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk k tul’b k biɑ wɑnn’b l pɑɑk, kii muɑntl Klistu mɑɑn mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k n tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl.
54004014	Dɑɑ tɑnmt Foŋɑnm piini nbɑ be ɑ ni k ɑ din gɑɑl’l sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn pɑɑk yuo nbɑ k sɑɑkɑb din yii b nii ɑ pɑɑk nɑ.
54004015	Ii tuun lin nbɑ nɑ nɑn ninmɔnn, k suɑ kul n lɑ ɑ puknu.
54004016	Ii mi ɑ mɔnŋ nɑn ɑ wɑnnu po. Ii wɑki l kul ni. Setk nɑn mɔni, ɑ i tuun nnɑ ɑ sɑɑ lɑ fielu ɑ mɔnŋ k bin nbɑ gbiintl ɑ mɑɑn nɑ mun sɑɑ lɑ fielu wɑɑ.
54005001	L i tie k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ tɑɑl jɑkpelsuɑ, ɑ dɑɑ yɑki nɑn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn pɑk tul’ɔ nɑn ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ bɑɑ nɑ. Ii be nɑn nɑɑsinm nɑn ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑ,
54005002	kii be nɑn puokpelɑ nɑn b tie ɑ nɑɑnbɑ e nɑ, kii be nɑn puopɑɑni nɑn b tie ɑ niipuob e nɑ, kii be nɑn b kul ɑ bɑnnu nbɑ k suɑ kɑn fit tɑɑl’ɑ nɑn wɑɑn ɑ.
54005003	Ii tien pɑkɔi nbɑ be b kuukuɑ nɑ nibɑɑkl,
54005004	ŋɑɑn pɑkɔsuɑ nbɑ mɔk wɑɑs ɑmi yɑɑbuonɑ, u wɑɑs ɑmi u yɑɑbuonɑ n tun tuonŋɑnɑ nbɑ k b yɑdɑ nɑn Klistu wɑnn’b nɑ sinsinn k tul b mɔnŋ ŋei ni. Nnɑ e k b dɑnm mun sɑɑ di b niwubt nyuɑt, k mɑɑn lin nbɑ k Yennu luon e nɑ.
54005005	Ŋɑɑn mɔmɔnm pɑkuɑk nbɑ kɑɑ suɑ nɑ, u dindɑnn be Yennu ni, k u mei Yennu sonml po yennu ni nɑn nyiɑɔk.
54005006	Ŋɑɑn pɑkuɑk nbɑ tuun gbɑnɑnt lonm, u ponŋ kpo e wɑɑ ŋɑɑn dɑɑ be mɑnŋ.
54005007	Tuln niib wɑnnu nɑ; k suɑ dɑɑ fit tɑɑl’b.
54005008	Wun nbɑ k goli u nikpiinm, ɑmi lin nbɑ mɑntk gɑl tie u kii fiin u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ŋɑɑk niib po, l dɑɑnɔ ji yet u yɑdɑ wɑɑ, k wun nbɑ k tien Klistu yɑdɑ sɔ’u.
54005009	A dɑɑ kɑɑn pɑkuɑk nbɑ dɑɑ k kpet gɑl binɑ piinluob nɑ k kuɑnt pɑkɔi kɑnn ni. K biɑ jen ɑ, l ŋɑn k wuu tie puo nbɑ mi k kun jɑyenɔ kuɑ e,
54005010	kii mɔk sɑnŋɑnn u tuonŋɑnɑ pɑɑk, kii tie wun nbɑ wubl u wɑɑs fɑnu, k tuu gɑɑn sɑɑnm u ŋɑɑk ni, k tuu wu Klistuyɑb tɑɑ, k tuu sonmt tɑlɑs-dɑnm, k tuu tuun tuonŋɑnɑ buolu kul.
54005011	Ŋɑɑn ɑ dɑɑ puki puopɑɑni nbɑ tie pɑkɔi b kɑnn ni, k mɑɑn b gbɑnɑnt lonm i nyɑnn b Klistuweiu, b tuu luon bin kun jɑb e,
54005012	k ji pot b mɔsonn nbɑ k b din senn tul’ɔ sinsinn nɑ, k ji kuɑ biit ni l pɑɑk.
54005013	Lin nbɑ pukn, bɑɑ k mɔk tuonn nɑ, k b lin k luɑn ŋei, l k tie bɑɑ k mɔk tuonn kuukuɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn b biɑ lin k piɑk mɑyɑnɑ k kuɑ lin nbɑ k lɑ’b ni, k piɑk bɑlkpiennɑ.
54005014	L pɑɑk, min bo sii luon k puopɑɑni nbɑ tie pɑkɔi nɑ n kun jɑb e k mɑl wɑɑs, k got b ŋei fɑnu, k t dɑtɑi dɑɑ lɑɑt yɑɑk k piɑk biit jiint t po,
54005015	k mɑɑn pɑkɔsiɑb ponŋ tunn wɑɑ Sɑɑtɑn e.
54005016	Ŋɑɑn puosuɑ nbɑ tie Klistuweilɔ k pɑkɔi be u ŋɑɑk ni, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e nɑn wun got’b fɑnu, k dɑɑ jikt’b k jint Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib, k Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib n fit got pɑkɔi nbɑ be k k mɔk dɑnm nɑ.
54005017	Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib sɑɑkɑb nbɑ diɑ’b fɑnu nɑ ŋɑn nɑn nibɑɑkl bonciɑnn, k bin nbɑ muɑntl Klistu lɑbɑɑl k wɑnt’b l pɑɑk, ŋɑnm e mɑntk ŋɑn nɑn nibɑɑkl,
54005018	k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Nɑɑb i tuun dijɑɑn-yuo, fɑɑ dɑɑ bobnt u mɔb,» k biɑ diɑn ɑ: «Tuontunnɔ ŋɑn k wun gɑɑl u pɑɑɔk.»
54005019	A dɑɑ ŋɑɑnt k b tɑɑl sɑɑkɑsuɑ, sie k b tie niib bɑnle ɑmi bɑntɑ.
54005020	Bin nbɑ tuun biit nɑ, ii yɑki nɑn’m, niib ni, k bin nbɑ biɑl nɑ n tin jɑŋmɑɑni.
54005021	Yennu tuɑnn nɑn Yiesu Klistu tuɑnn nɑn mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ tuɑnn po k n yien’ɑ nɑn ninmɔnn, ɑ fɑn sɑk wɑnnu nɑ k dɑɑ mɔk ningɑnsɑi ɑmi luktn k tien nisuɑ bonsiɑl kul ni.
54005022	A dɑɑ yiin ɑ nii suɑ pɑɑk yiɑn yiɑn, ɑ wuu tuun tuonsiɑl Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib sinsuuk ni. A dɑɑ kuɑnt ɑ nuu niib tuonbiit tumu ni, ŋɑɑn i diɑ ɑ mɔnŋ bɑnnu nbɑ k b k fit tɑɑl’ɑ l pɑɑk.
54005023	A lɑɑfiɑ nbɑ k jɑnŋt’ɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ dɑɑ nyu nyun kuukuɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ tuu nyu dɑmunŋ wɑɑn k lin sonm ɑ nuɑk ni.
54005024	Nisiɑb tuonbiit ponŋ duɑ pɑɑnu ni e yuo nbɑ k b dɑɑ k bu b buut, ŋɑɑn k nisiɑb tuonbiit mun sɑɑ nyi pɑɑnu b buut bunu puolpo e.
54005025	Tuonŋɑnɑ mun biɑ tie nnɑ e, l yenn-nbɑ nyii pɑɑnu wɑɑ, k lin nbɑ lek k nyii pɑɑnu ni, ŋɑɑn l kɑn fit bɔl.
54006001	L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs ɑ bin nbɑ kul tie dɑɑbɑ nɑ ii tien b yonmdɑnm bɑɑkciɑɔnŋ, k suɑ dɑɑ piɑk biil Yennu sɑnn nɑn t tuntl.
54006002	Bin nbɑ k b yonmdɑnm tie Klistuweilɑ nɑ dɑɑ fiɑkt b yonmdɑnm mɑnŋ, bɑɑ yi’b b nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k ŋɑnm e n mɑntk tun fɑnu, k mɑɑn b yonmdɑnm nbɑ gɑɑn b tuonɑ nyuɑt nɑ tien Klistu yɑdɑ, k Yennu luon’m. I wɑnt’b kii kpɑɑn’m lɑbɑɑl nɑ po.
54006003	Suɑ i wɑnt wɑngɑnu k k wei t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu mɔbonɑ nɑn Yennu sɔnu wɑnnu nɑ,
54006004	u mɔk jɑpɑɑt bonciɑnn e k k bɑn siɑl. K mɔniɑɔk nɑn kunkɔnɑ tie nɑn yiɑlu nɑ k wɑɑ’u, k l bɑɑt nɑn funfunn, nɑn kunkɔnɑ, nɑn nisukt, nɑn mɑbiit,
54006005	nɑn mɔniɑɔk yuo kul, ɑ nibiit nbɑ k b dudukt k sonm fɑnu k b k mɔk bɑlmɔni nɑ sinsuuk ni nɑ. B duki nɑn Yennu sɔnu tie sɔnu nbɑ sɑɑ te k nilɔ n tien mɔktɔ e.
54006006	L i tie k nilɔ nunm gbuo wɑɑ mɔk lin nbɑ, u yɑdɑ nɑn Yennu set tie mɔktuk k tul’ɔ.
54006007	T din k bɑɑl nɑn siɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k t biɑ tɑn kɑn nyi nɑn bonsiɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni,
54006008	ŋɑɑn t i mɔk jiet nɑn tiɑt, l ŋɑn k t nunm n gbuo’l.
54006009	Bin nbɑ luon b i tie mɔktɑ, ŋɑnm e bɑɑ jinjɑnmi ni, nɑn bɑlt ni, nɑn jɑti nɑn dudukbiit nbɑ biil niib k bɑɑnt’b yɑnn nɑ ni,
54006010	k mɑɑn likli lonm e tie bonbiil kul jiinn. Nisiɑb ponŋ jii b mɔnŋ k tien liklonbiiuk nɑ ni. L pɑɑk, k b ji k tien Klistu yɑdɑ. Ŋɑnn e te k b lɑɑt pɑlbibuolu buolu.
54006011	Ŋɑɑn fin nbɑ tie Yennu nilɔ nɑ, l ŋɑn k ɑ ciɑl nyi lin nbɑ nɑ nbɑ kul ɑ ni, ŋɑɑn kii luon fii tie niŋɑnɔ Yennu buol ni, kii be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ ni, kii mɔk yɑdɑ nɑn lonm nɑn suklu, kii be suon nnɑ.
54006012	A yɑdɑ pɑɑk kɔnin kunkɔnŋɑnn, k suol mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nbɑ k Yennu din yiin’ɑ ɑ fɑn gɑɑl yuo nbɑ k ɑ din nyinn ɑ mɔnŋ siɑlŋɑnn niib bonciɑnn nunm ni nɑ.
54006013	Mɑɑ be Yennu nbɑ tien bonsiɑl kul mɑnfuol nɑ tuɑnn, k be Yiesu Klistu nbɑ din nyinn u mɔnŋ yɑdɑ siɑlŋɑnn, Pɔns Piilɑɑt nunm ni nɑ tuɑnn, n kpɑɑn’ɑ
54006014	ɑ fii diɑ wɑnnu nɑ bɑnnu nbɑ k suɑ k fit tɑɑl’ɑ l pɑɑk mɔkmɔk nɑn dɑɑl nbɑ k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu nɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɔkt.
54006015	Yennu nbɑ k t piɑk’ɔ nɑ, wun nbɑ tie Yudɑɑnɔ, k biɑ tie kpɑnbɑlɑ kul Kpɑnbɑl, k biɑ tie yonmdɑnm kul Yonmdɑɑnɔ. Ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ te k wun dɔkt yuo nbɑ jɑnŋ.
54006016	Ŋuɑ kuukuɑ e kɑn kpo. U be yentciɑɔnŋ nbɑ k nilɔ kɑn fit nɑkn ni. Ŋuɑ e k nisuɑ dɑɑ k mi lɑ’u ɑmi k sɑɑ fit lɑ’u. Ŋuɑ e yen bɑɑkl nɑn yiikuo yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Amenn.
54006017	A kpɑɑn tingbounŋ nɑ mɔktɑ nɑ, ɑ b dɑɑ mɔk dont-n-mɔnŋ ɑmi bin tien b dindɑnn mɔktuk nbɑ tie wounŋ nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn bin tien b dindɑnn kul Yennu ni, wun nbɑ tul’t bonsiɑl kul, ɑ t gɑɑl kii mɔk pɑlpienn.
54006018	A kpɑɑn’m, ɑ bii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ, k b tuonŋɑnɑ mɑnŋ ii yɑb, k b nii i yɑɑ nɑn piini tulu.
54006019	Nnɑ e k b sii mɔk mɔktuk yuo nbɑ bɑɑt k sɑɑ fit lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ tie bɑlmɔni mɑnfuol.
54006020	Tiimuote, ii guu lin nbɑ k b tien ɑ nuu ni nɑ. A nyik lɑbɑfɑɑnu nbɑ k mɔk nyuɑt k biɑ k tɑɑ nɑn lɑbɑmɑnn wɑnnu nɑ, k biɑ dɑɑ gbiin lin nbɑ k b yi’l bɑnnu ŋɑɑn k l k tie bɑnnu kɑɑ.
54006021	Nisiɑb yet ɑ b mɔk bɑnnu mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn k l pɑɑk k b nyik lɑbɑmɑnn wɑnnu. Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ ii be nɑn’i.
55001001	Min Pɔul wun nbɑ tie Yiesu Klistu tuomi Yennu nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ n muɑnt mɑnfuol nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul’t nɑ Yiesu Klistu ni,
55001002	n diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien n bilonkɑk Tiimuote. Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’ɑ k biɑ tul’ɑ nyikcɑbu nɑn mɑnu.
55001003	N tien Yennu niipuouk nɑn mɑɑ tuun nɑn dudukŋɑnt nɑn n yejɑnm nbɑ din tuun bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ. N tien’ɔ niipuouk yuo kul nbɑ k n mei Yennu, yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk k biɑ tiɑn ɑ po.
55001004	N tiɑn ɑ nyin-nyuut po, k lek luon k n lɑ’ɑ kii mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn.
55001005	N tiɑn ɑ mɔmɔnm yɑdɑ po, yɑdɑ nbɑ din sint be ɑ yɑɑ Loiis nɑn ɑ nɑɑ Euniis pɑlɑ ni nɑ, k n mi nɑn l ji be ɑ pɑl ni mɔtɑɑnɑ.
55001006	L pɑɑk, k n tiɑtl’ɑ mɑɑ ɑ dɑɑ te k piini nbɑ k Yennu din tul’ɑ yuo nbɑ k n din yii n nii ɑ pɑɑk nɑ n kpo,
55001007	k mɑɑn Foŋɑnm nbɑ k Yennu tul’t nɑ k tien’t jɑŋmɑɑndɑnm, ŋɑɑn Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ tien’t pɑnŋ nɑn lonm, nɑn diɑ-n-mɔnŋ e.
55001008	L pɑɑk, din t Yonmdɑɑnɔ siɑlɑ k dɑɑ tiin fei. A biɑ dɑɑ tiin fei nɑn mɑɑ be dɑnsɑlk u pɑɑk nɑ, ŋɑɑn sɑk fɑldinu nɑn’n u lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk, nɑn Yennu nbɑ tul’ɑ pɑnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
55001009	Ŋuɑ e fiel’t k yiin’t ɑ tii tie u yɑb, k l k tie t tuonɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ ŋɑɑn u din lol k fiel’t u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk e. U din tul’t ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ mɑnŋ Yiesu Klistu ni, yuo nbɑ k u dɑɑ din k nɑn dulnyɑ nɑ.
55001010	Ŋɑɑn t Fietuɑ Yiesu Klistu bɑɑlu ni e k u fiit wɑnn’t l po, k mɑɑn Yiesu Klistu din biil kuun yiikuo, ŋɑɑn biɑ wɑnn’t ɑ lɑbɑmɑnn ni, ɑ t sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
55001011	Yennu ponŋ din yiin’n, ɑ n tien tuomi nɑn wɑntuɑ k muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ.
55001012	L pɑɑk e te k n di fɑlɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn k n k tiin fei, k mɑɑn n mi wun nbɑ k n tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, k n biɑ mi k bilsuk kɑɑ nɑn u sɑɑ fit diɑ lin nbɑ k n jii k tien u nuu ni nɑ fɑnu mɔkmɔk nɑn buut dɑɑl.
55001013	Jiin mɔmɔnm nbɑ k n din tul’ɑ nɑ, k fit bɑnn wɑnnu nbɑ ŋɑn k cie lin nbɑ nɑ, kii diɑ’l nɑn yɑdɑ nɑn lonm nbɑ k t mɔk Yiesu Klistu ni.
55001014	Foŋɑnm pɑnŋ nbɑ be t ni nɑ pɑɑk, ii diɑ lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ k u jii k tien ɑ nuu ni nɑ.
55001015	A ponŋ mi nɑn suɑ kul nbɑ be Asii nɑ nyik’n ɑ, k b siɑb e tie Fiijel nɑn Helmojenn.
55001016	Yonmdɑɑnɔ n tin Onesiifuol ŋɑɑtieb ninbɑɑɔk, k mɑɑn u dɑɑn yuɑ cien n pɑl. U dɑɑn k tin fei nɑn mɑɑ be dɑnsɑlk nɑ pɑɑk,
55001017	ŋɑɑn wɑɑ dɑɑn tɑn bɑɑl Luonm yuo nbɑ, u dɑɑn piin luon mɑɑ be siɑn e nɑn ninmɔnn nɑn wɑɑ dɑɑn tɑn lɑ n buol.
55001018	Yonmdɑɑnɔ n tin’ɔ ninbɑɑɔk dɑɑl mɑnŋ dɑɑl. A mɔnŋ mi fɑnu wɑɑ din sonm’n bonciɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ Efes duo ni.
55002001	N bik, fin ŋɑnin n jii ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nbɑ k t lɑ Yiesu Klistu buol ni nɑ kii cien ɑ pɑl.
55002002	Fɑɑ ponŋ din gbɑt wɑnnu nbɑ n penŋ niib bonciɑnn buol ni nɑ, ɑ jii’l k wɑnn nisiɑb nbɑ tie yɑdɑ dɑnm, bin nbɑ mun sɑɑ fit wɑnn nilieb mun.
55002003	A sɑk k gɑɑl fɑldinu nɑn Yiesu Klistu sejeŋɑnɔ nɑ.
55002004	Seje nbɑ luon wun penn u sɑɑkuɑ pɑl tuonn ni, ji k ŋmɑt u binbenŋ nɑn lin nbɑ k tie sejenm tuonɑ ni.
55002005	Wun nbɑ tiin puot nɑntɑɑl kɑn fit nyɑnn k gɑɑl l nyuɑt, sie k u sɑk wei puot senni kul.
55002006	L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k kpɑɑlɔ nbɑ tun nɑn ninmɔnn n gɑɑl jiet sinsinn.
55002007	Ii duki lin nbɑ k n yien’ɑ nɑ po, k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑɑ te k fɑn fit bɑnn l kul ɑ pɑɑk.
55002008	Ii tiɑn Yiesu Klistu po. U din fiil kuun ni, k din tie Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn, nɑn mɑɑ muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ.
55002009	Lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk, k n be nɑn jɑlt k di fɑlɑ nɑn biitdɑɑnɔ nɑ. Yennu mɑɑn mɑnŋ ŋɑnin k be jɑlt ni.
55002010	Ŋɑɑn Yennu nigɑnnkɑb nɑ pɑɑk k n lek di suklu fɑlɑ kul ɑ ni, ɑ bin mun lɑ fielu nbɑ be Yiesu Klistu ni, kii mɔk dontl nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ.
55002011	Bɑli nɑ e tie mɔmɔnm: «T i kpo nɑn’ɔ, t mun tɑn sii mɔk mɑnfuol nɑn’ɔ e.
55002012	T i ŋɑnmt yɑbi, t mun tɑn sɑɑ di nɑɑn nɑn’ɔ e, ŋɑɑn t i yɑɑ ɑ t k mi’u, u mun tɑn sii yɑɑ ɑ u k mi’t.
55002013	L i tie k t k cɔln u mɑɑn, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ k lebtl u mɑɑn, k mɑɑn u kɑn fit noi u mɔnŋ.»
55002014	A tiɑl ɑ niib lin nbɑ nɑ, k tul’b kpɑɑni Yennu tuɑnn ni ɑ b dɑɑ kɔn mɔbonɑ pɑɑk. Ŋɑnn k mɔk nyuɑt, ŋɑɑn l biil bin nbɑ gbiin nɑ e.
55002015	Yɑbt ɑ mɔnŋ pɑɑk k jɑnŋ nɑn Yennu n pɑk’ɑ, kii tie nɑn tuontunnɔ nbɑ k tiin fei u tuonn pɑɑk nɑ, k muɑnt bɑlmɔni mɑɑn dede.
55002016	A nyinn ɑ mɔnŋ lɑbɑfɑɑnu nbɑ k tɑɑ nɑn Yennu mɑɑn k biɑ k mɔk nyuɑt nɑ ni, k mɑɑn bin nbɑ tuun l buolu sii ŋɑnmt fɔknt b mɔnŋ nɑn Yennu e.
55002017	B wɑnnu nɑɑn nɑn nɑl-fiɑɔk nbɑ tuu di gbɑnɑnt nɑ e. B siɑb tie Hiimene nɑn Fiilet,
55002018	k b fɔknt b mɔnŋ nɑn bɑlmɔni k biɑ tuni nisiɑb yɑdɑ k yɑɑ ɑ t kuun fiilu nɑ ponŋ gɑl ɑ.
55002019	Ŋɑɑn fiɑkl nbɑ k Yennu tien dɑɑ be k biɑ k dɑnm i, k u tien dɑɔk l pɑɑk ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ mi bin nbɑ tie u yɑb,» k biɑ jen ɑ ɑ: «Wun nbɑ kul yet ɑ u tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ yuɑ n nyik bonbiil tumu.»
55002020	Jetienbonɑ buolu bonciɑnn be ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k l kul k tie kutsɔnt kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑnmɔni nɑn senni mun biɑ be. L yenn-nbɑ tie jɑɑnm yɑl k liel nbɑ k b tuun nɑn’n dɑɑ kul ɑ.
55002021	L i tie k suɑ ji nyik bonbiil tumu nbɑ k n piɑk l po nɑ, ŋɑɑn be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ, u ji nɑɑn nɑn ŋmɑnŋ nbɑ tie jɑɑnm yɑl nɑ e, k mɑɑn u tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ kuukuɑ yuɑ e k mɔk nyuɑt u buol ni, k ji ŋɑn nɑn tuonŋɑnɑ kul tumu.
55002022	Nyint ɑ mɔnŋ nipɑɑɔnŋ niɑnbiit ni, ŋɑɑn kii wɑɑ bin nbɑ k Yennu yet, ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u buol ni nɑ sɔnu, nɑn yɑdɑ sɔnu, nɑn lonm sɔnu, nɑn mɑnu. Ii tuun nnɑ nɑn bin nbɑ mei Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑn pɑlpienn nɑ.
55002023	A lɔkt jɑtmɔniɑt, k mɑɑn ɑ mi nɑn l juontl nɑn kunkɔnɑ e.
55002024	L k ŋɑn k Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuontunnɔ ii kɔn nɑn niib. L ŋɑn k wuu tie bulcimɔ e suɑ kul buol ni, kii tie wun nbɑ sɑɑ fit k tumi,
55002025	kii tie suon nnɑ yuo nbɑ k u tumi bin nbɑ noi’ɔ nɑ, k mɑɑn pɑsiɑl Yennu n tɑn tul’b yɑɑk k bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k tɑn bɑnn bɑlmɔni,
55002026	k ŋɑnm jen bɑlmɔni sɔnu ni k lɔkt Sɑɑtɑn bɑlt, k mɑɑn b ji tie u dɑɑbɑ k tuun wɑɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ.
55003001	A mi nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ dɑjuonti yuo tɑn sii pɑɑl.
55003002	Niib tɑn sii tie jɑwudɑnm e, nɑn liklonnɑ, k wɑnt b mɔnŋ, k tie jɑpɑdɑnm nɑn bin nbɑ suki Yennu, nɑn bin nbɑ k sɑɑk b dɑnm mɔi, nɑn bin nbɑ k tiɑn ŋɑnm po, nɑn bin nbɑ k tiin Yennu.
55003003	B tɑn kii mɔk lonm nɑn niib, b tɑn kii tiin niib ninbɑɑɔk, k piɑk mɑbiit k tien lieb, k b binbenŋ tie yɑnɑ yɑnɑ nnɑ, k b nɑɑn bonsusuot, k nɑn tuonŋɑnɑ.
55003004	B tɑn sii nyi lieb puoɑ e, k tie kɑɑtkɑɑtdɑnm, k dont b mɔnŋ. B tɑn sii luon bii tuun lin nbɑ mɑn k tul’b k kii mɔk lonm nɑn Yennu.
55003005	B tɑn sii diɑ Yenjiɑntu sɑnn e, ŋɑɑn k sɑɑk l yiikuo. Nyint ɑ mɔnŋ l nibuolu ni.
55003006	B siɑb e lin k doi ŋei k kpɑnn puoliini nbɑ tuu tuun tuonbiit bonciɑnn k wɑɑ b pɑlɑ niɑnbiit buolu buolu, k nyint b yɑn.
55003007	Yuo kul ɑ, l puob gbiintl niib kpɑɑni, ŋɑɑn b k mi k bɑnn bɑlmɔni.
55003008	Sɑɑnes nɑn Sɑnbles nbɑ din kɔn nɑn Muois biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l jɑbuolu mun tie nnɑ e. B kɔn nɑn bɑlmɔni, k b yɑn gbie nɑn dudukbiit, k b yɑdɑ k wɑ lɑn bɑɑ biknu ni.
55003009	Ŋɑɑn b kɑn fit kpɑnn niib k wei, k mɑɑn suɑ kul tɑn sɑɑ lɑ b jɑti nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ, nɑn bɑɑ din lɑ Sɑnes nɑn Sɑnbles jɑti nbɑ din tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
55003010	Ŋɑɑn fin ŋɑnin ponŋ mi n wɑnnu po, nɑn n binbenŋ po, nɑn n dudukt po, nɑn n yɑdɑ po, nɑn n suklu po, nɑn n lonm nɑn niib po, nɑn n gbɑnkul po.
55003011	A mi niib nbɑ muks’n biɑnŋ nbɑ, nɑn n fɑldinu. A mi lin nbɑ kul nbɑ din tien’n Antiɑɔs, nɑn Ikoniunm nɑn Liistl. A mi mɑɑ din lɑ muksbiit biɑnŋ nbɑ, ŋɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ e din fɑt’n l kul ni.
55003012	Bɑlmɔni e, niib kul nbɑ luon k bii be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm Yiesu Klistu ni nɑ, sɑɑ lɑ muksuk.
55003013	k nitont nɑn kpinkpɑnni dɑnm lek tɑn sii ŋɑnmt puki b biit e, k kpɑnn lieb, k b lieb mun sɑɑ kpɑnn’b.
55003014	Ŋɑɑn fin ŋɑnin, fii diɑ mɑɑn nbɑ k ɑ din tumi k gɑɑl k tien’l yɑdɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn ɑ ponŋ mi bin nbɑ din tie ɑ wɑntieb nɑ nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
55003015	A bisn ni wɑɑ ɑ ponŋ mi Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk. L kɑdɑɑɔk sɑɑ fit tul’ɑ yɑn k wɑnn’ɑ fɑɑ sɑɑ lɑ fielu ɑ yɑdɑ nɑn Klistu pɑɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
55003016	Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk munn tie mɑɑn nbɑ nyii Yennu mɔb ni, k l kul ɑ mɔk nyuɑt e, k wɑnt’t u po, k kpɑɑn’t, k ŋɑnmt t benu, k wɑnt’t binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ sɔnu,
55003017	ɑ nisuɑ kul nbɑ tie Yennu yuɑ nɑ binbenŋ ii ŋɑn, k wun tien siil kii fit kii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ buolu kul ɑ.
55004001	Yiesu Klistu nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ bu fuont’b nɑn kpienm buut, wun nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ jen k di nɑɑn nɑ, ŋuɑ nɑn Yennu tuɑnn po, k n yien’ɑ nɑn ninmɔnn,
55004002	ɑ fii muɑntl Yennu mɑɑn kii wɑnt niib l po, yuo ii ŋɑn kuo l kii ŋɑn i e. Fii muɑntl, kii piɑk niib b tuonbiit po, kii kpɑɑn’m, kii kuɑnt’b pɑlɑ, kii wɑnt’b mɑɑn mɑnŋ dede nɑn suklu yuo kul ɑ,
55004003	k mɑɑn yuo bɑɑt k nisiɑb tɑn kii luon bii gbiintl bɑlmɔni wɑnnu, ŋɑɑn b tɑn sii wɑɑ b tiɑɔnŋ lonm e, k tikl wɑntieb k b tɑn wɑnt’b lin nbɑ k b luon l gbiintu.
55004004	B tɑn kɑn gbiint bɑlmɔni mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn b tɑn sii luon bii gbiin lɑbɑgɑnɑ e.
55004005	Ŋɑɑn fin ŋɑnin n yɑbl k suol ɑ mɔnŋ l kul ni. Sɑkn fɑldinu. Ii tuun ɑ tuonn nbɑ tie Yennu lɑbɑmɑnn muɑntu nɑ, k tun ɑ tuonn nbɑ tie Yennu tuontunnɔ yɑl nɑ fɑnu.
55004006	Ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin, yuo bɑɑl nɑn bin jii’n k tien mɑlunŋ ɑ. N kuun yuo bɑɑl ɑ.
55004007	N gbɑɑ gbigbɑɑŋɑnɑ wɑɑ. N tin n nɑntɑɑl nɑ k gbenn ɑ. N lek diɑ bɑlmɔni wɑnnu.
55004008	Yuo nbɑ bɑɑt, n tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl nyɑnnu nyuɑt ɑ. L nyuɑt tie fielu nɑɑn foklk nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ tie bɑlbuŋɑnɔ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ tul’n bɑlbudɑɑl, k u kɑn tul min kuukuɑ, ŋɑɑn u tɑn sɑɑ tul bin nbɑ kul nbɑ luon bin lɑ u jennu nɑ.
55004009	Yɑbt k bɑɑl n penŋ yiɑn yiɑn nɑ,
55004010	k mɑɑn Demɑɑs nyik’n ɑ. U mɔk lonm nɑn tingbounŋ bonɑ, k u sɑɑn Tesɑɑluoniik ɑ. Klesens sɑɑn Gɑɑlɑɑti wɑɑ, k Tiit mun sɑɑn Dɑɑlmɑɑti wɑɑ.
55004011	Luk kuukuɑ e ji be nɑn’n. Jiin Mɑɑlk k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ nɑ, k mɑɑn u sɑɑ fit sonm’n bonciɑnn n tuonɑ ni.
55004012	N tun Tiikiik ɑ wun sɑɑn Efes.
55004013	Fi i bɑɑt yuo nbɑ, fɑn jii n liɑtfuouk nbɑ k n dɑɑn nyik Tloɑs, k l be Kɑlpus buol ni nɑ nɑ. A biɑ jii n kɑdɑpinkɑlɑ nɑn n kɑdɑgbɑnt nɑ.
55004014	Aleksɑndl wun nbɑ kul sɑɑɔk nɑ din tun’n lin nbɑ bi bonciɑnn. Yennu sɑɑ pɑ’u l pɑɑk.
55004015	Suot ɑ mɔnŋ nɑn’ɔ, k mɑɑn u kɔn nɑn lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ k t muɑntl nɑ bonciɑnn.
55004016	Sinsinn mɑɑ dɑɑn kɔn n mɔnŋ pɑɑk nɑ, suɑ dɑɑn k set n puol. B kul dɑɑn nyik’n ɑ, Yennu dɑɑ jikt’b tɑɑli.
55004017	Ŋɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ dɑɑn be nɑn’n k tul’n pɑnŋ k n dɑɑn fit muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ kul k tul bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ kul ɑ, ɑ bin gbɑt. Ŋuɑ e dɑɑn fɑt’n yɑnbɔl mɔb ni.
55004018	ŋuɑ e biɑ sɑɑ nyinn’n bonbiit kul ɑ ni, k kunn’n k kuɑn’n u nɑɑn nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑn lɑɑfiɑ. Ŋuɑ e yen dontl nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Amenn.
55004019	N jikt n fuonti k tien Pliisiil nɑn Akiilɑɑs, nɑn Onesiifuol ŋɑɑtieb.
55004020	Elɑst dɑɑn biɑl Kuolent. Tlofiinm dɑɑn kɑɑ lɑɑfiɑ k n dɑɑn nyik’ɔ Miile.
55004021	Yɑbt k bɑɑl nnɑ wɑɑ, k gbintɑnkɑɑnŋ n bɑɑl. Eobuuluus nɑn Pludɑns nɑn Liinus nɑn Kluodiɑ tien’ɑ b fuonti, k Klistuweilɑ kul ɑ biɑ fuont’ɑ.
55004022	Yonmdɑɑnɔ ii be nɑn’ɑ. Yennu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’i.
56001001	Min Pɔul, wun nbɑ tie Yennu tuontunnɔ nɑn Yiesu Klistu tuomi nɑ, min e k Yennu lukt’n k tun’n u nigɑnnkɑb buol ɑ n cie b yɑdɑ, k te bin bɑnn u bɑlmɔni lɑbɑɑl nbɑ wɑnt’t bɑnnu nbɑ k t sii mɔk binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm.
56001002	Lin nbɑ nɑ nyii dindɑnn nbɑ k t mɔk nɑn t sii mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ ni e. Yuo nbɑ k u dɑɑ din k nɑn dulnyɑ nɑ, Yennu nbɑ k fɑɑ fɑɑk nɑ din senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul’t mɑnfuol mɑnŋ.
56001003	Yuo nbɑ k u din senn nɑ nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl, k Yennu t Fietuɑ te k n bɑnn u mɑɑn. L mɑɑn e tie mɑɑn nbɑ k u yɑɑ mii muɑntl nɑ.
56001004	N dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien fin Tiit wun nbɑ tie n bimɔnŋ k t tɑɑ yɑdɑ yenn kuɑ nɑ. Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn t Fietuɑ Yiesu Klistu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’ɑ k biɑ tul’ɑ mɑnu.
56001005	N din te k ɑ biɑl Klet tinŋ ni mɑɑ ɑ ŋɑnm bonsiɑl kul nbɑ dɑɑn tenn, k biɑ kɑɑn kɑɑn Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib sɑɑkɑb duo kul ni, nɑn mɑɑ din wɑnn’ɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
56001006	L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e nɑn sɑɑkuɑ i tie wun nbɑ k b k fit tɑɑl’ɔ. L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn wuu mɔk puo yenɔ kuɑ. L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn u wɑɑs n tien Klistu yɑdɑ, k dɑɑ tie wɑɑbiit nɑn tubkɑngbɑtɑ,
56001007	k mɑɑn Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib yudɑɑnɔ sii tuun Yennu tuonɑ e. L pɑɑk, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn u dɑɑ tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k b fit tɑɑl’ɔ, k dɑɑ mɔk jɑpɑɑt, ɑmi wun nbɑ dont wutuol yiɑn yiɑn, ɑmi wun nbɑ nyu dɑɑn k yib, ɑmi wun nbɑ luon kunkɔnɑ, ɑmi wun nbɑ luon likli fɑɑk sɔni ni.
56001008	Ŋɑɑn l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k wuu mi sɑɑnm gɑɑlu, kii luon lin nbɑ ŋɑn, kii mi u mɔnŋ diɑnu, kii be fɑnu, kii tie Yennu yuɑ, kii mi mɔnŋdiɑnu.
56001009	L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k wuu diɑ bɑlmɔni lɑbɑɑl nbɑ k t din wɑnn’i nɑ fɑnu. Ŋɑn e sɑɑ te k wun fit cie niib pɑlɑ nɑn wɑnnu nbɑ tuok, k biɑ te k wun fit k wɑnn bin nbɑ k sɑɑk u wɑnnu mɑnŋ nɑ bɑlmɔni.
56001010	K mɑɑn mɔyetdɑnm bonciɑnn be, k b mɑntk be Suifnbɑ nbɑ lebt b binbenŋ nɑ sinsuuk ni e, k diɑ b jɑtmɑɑn k kpɑnn niib.
56001011	L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k fin guɑl b mɑɑn, k mɑɑn b liklonbiiuk pɑɑk k b lin wɑnt niib lin nbɑ k ŋɑn nɑn bii wɑnt, k ŋmɑt ŋɑsɑi niib kul dudukt.
56001012	Klet jɑsuɑ, wun nbɑ din tie b tiɑɔnŋ sɔkni din yet ɑ: «Klet-tieb fɑ fɑɑk yuo kul ɑ, k b nɑɑn nɑn bonkob-biit, k biɑ tie gbɑn-nyɑkdɑnm nbɑ luon diinɑ kuukuɑ.»
56001013	Wɑɑ din yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l tie bɑlmɔni e. L pɑɑk, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn k ɑ yɑki nɑn’m fɑnu, k bii mɔk bɑlmɔni yɑdɑ,
56001014	k ji dɑɑ gbiintl Suifnbɑ fɑɑk lɑbɑɑl, k biɑ dɑɑ gbiintl niib nbɑ k sɑɑk bɑlmɔni lɑbɑɑl nɑ senni.
56001015	Bonsiɑl kɑɑ k mɔk jɑknt bin nbɑ be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ buol ni, ŋɑɑn bonɑ kul mɔk jɑknt e k tul bin nbɑ tie jɑknt-dɑnm k k tien Klistu yɑdɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn b dudukt nɑn b yɑn ni kul tie jɑknt e.
56001016	B yi b mɔnŋ Yenmiilɑ e, ŋɑɑn k b tuonɑ wɑnt nɑn b k sɑk bɑnn Yennu. B tie mɔyetdɑnm nɑn nibiit e, k kɑn fit tun tuonŋɑnsiɑl.
56002001	Ŋɑɑn fin ii wɑnt lin nbɑ tɑɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni wɑnnu.
56002002	A kpɑɑn jɑkpelɑ, ɑ bii be suon nnɑ, kii be bɑnnu nbɑ k b jɑnŋ nɑn nibɑɑkl, kii diɑ b mɔnŋ, kii diɑ lɑbɑmɑnn wɑnnu fɑnu, kii mɔk lonm nɑn niib, kii mɔk gbɑnkul.
56002003	A biɑ kpɑɑn puokpelɑ, ɑ bii be bɑnnu nbɑ k niib ii mi nɑn b tie Yennu yɑb e, k dɑɑ tie sɑnjɑɑnjɑnnɑ, k biɑ dɑɑ nyu dɑɑn k yib, ŋɑɑn bii wɑnt kpɑɑni nbɑ ŋɑn.
56002004	Nnɑ e k b sɑɑ fit wɑnn puobis ɑ bii luon b sɔlb nɑn b wɑɑs,
56002005	kii piɑk bɑlmɔni, kii be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ ni, kii tuun tuonn fɑnu ŋɑɑk ni, kii mɔk bulcint, kii sɑɑk b sɔlb mɔi, ɑ suɑ dɑɑ fit piɑk bonbiil k jiint Yennu mɑɑn po.
56002006	A biɑ kpɑɑn nɑɑsinm k bii diɑ b mɔnŋ fɑnu.
56002007	Bonsiɑl kul ni, fii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ nbɑ sii wɑnt niib bɑɑ sii be biɑnŋ nbɑ. Fii wɑnt niib Klistu lɑbɑɑl nɑn ninmɔnn nɑn bɑlmɔni,
56002008	nɑn mɔbonɑ nbɑ k niib kɑn fit pɑk bonbiil k jiin l po, k bin nbɑ kɔn nɑn’ɑ nɑ ii di fei k mɑɑn b kɑn fit tɑɑl’t siɑl pɑɑk.
56002009	L ŋɑn k dɑɑbɑ ii sɑɑk b yonmdɑnm mɔi, kii pent b pɑlɑ bonsiɑl kul ni. B dɑɑ noi nɑn b yonmdɑnm mɔniɑt,
56002010	k dɑɑ jɑɑn b siɑl, ŋɑɑn kii tie dɑnm nbɑ sɑɑk b yonmdɑnm mɔi yuo kul k ŋɑn e sɑɑ te k niib n tul wɑnnu nbɑ piɑk t Fietuɑ Yennu po nɑ bɑɑkl.
56002011	K mɑɑn Yennu wɑnn u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nbɑ k niib kul fielu nyii lenŋ nɑ wɑɑ.
56002012	L ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ e wɑnn’t nɑn tin nyik binbenŋ nbɑ k gbuot Yennu nunm nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ lonbiiuk, ŋɑɑn kii be binbenŋ nbɑ wɑnt nɑn t tie bɑlmɔnpɑklɑ, k biɑ tuɑk bɑlmɔni sɔnu, k biɑ tie Yennu yɑb e.
56002013	Nnɑ e k t sii guu mɑnu nbɑ k t dɑɑn nɑ, dɑɑl nbɑ k Yiesu Klistu, wun nbɑ tie t Yenjɑɑnn nɑn t Fietuɑ nɑ, tɑn sɑɑ dɔkt yentsɑɑkɑl ni nɑ.
56002014	Ŋuɑ e din gɑɑl t pɑɑk k kpo, ɑ wun fɑt’t biit kul dɑɑbs ni, k te k tii tie niib nbɑ be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ ni, k biɑ kii tie u tiɑɔnŋ yɑb, k biɑ kii tie niib nbɑ nunm mɔn nɑn tuonŋɑnɑ tumu.
56002015	Lin nbɑ nɑ e tie lin nbɑ k ɑ sii wɑnt’b nɑ. Ii cien b pɑlɑ, kii biɑ kii kpɑɑn’m nɑn Yennu nbɑ tul’ɑ yiikuo nɑ. A dɑɑ ŋɑɑnt k b suɑ goli’ɑ yɑnn.
56003001	A tiɑl’b k bin tul b tinŋ yudɑnm nɑn yiikuo-dɑnm bɑɑkl, k sɑk b mɔi, k tien siil k tun tuonŋɑnɑ kul ɑ.
56003002	Yetl’b ɑ b dɑɑ piɑk bɑlbiit suɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn kii luon pɑlmɑɑsl, kii mɔk bulcint, kii mɔk sikn-n-mɔnŋ niib sinsuuk ni.
56003003	K mɑɑn siɑn-yuo t mɔnŋ din k mɔk yɑn, t din tie mɔyetdɑnm e, k wɑɑ sɔnu nbɑ k tuok. T din tie niɑnbiit nɑn gbɑnɑnt lonm buolu buolu dɑɑbɑ e. T binbenŋ kul din tie bonbiil nɑn niɑnbiiuk o. T din nɑn t lieb k b mun biɑ nɑn’t.
56003004	Ŋɑɑn t Fietuɑ Yennu lonm nɑn u bulcint nbɑ din tɑn fiit nyii pɑɑnu yuo nbɑ,
56003005	k u din fiel’t. L din k tie t tiɑɔnŋ tuonŋɑnɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u mɔnŋ ninbɑtinu pɑɑk e. U din jii nyun e k wul’t, k l nyun pɑɑk, k Foŋɑnm te k b ŋɑnm k mɑl’t, k tul’t mɑnfopɑɑnn.
56003006	Yennu din yɑt Foŋɑnm t pɑɑk bonciɑnn Yiesu Klistu ni.
56003007	Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk k u din tun nnɑ ɑ wun tien’t niŋɑnm u buol, k biɑ tien’t u wɑɑs nbɑ mɔk dindɑnn k t sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
56003008	Bɑli nɑ tie bɑlmɔni e. N luon k ɑ jii ɑ dudukt kul kii wɑnt’b lin nbɑ nɑ, k bin nbɑ tien Yennu yɑdɑ nɑ n jii b yuo kii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ nɑn ninmɔnn. Ŋɑnn e ŋɑn k mɔk nyuɑt k tul suɑ kul ɑ.
56003009	Ŋɑɑn nyik mɔnɔyɑnnɑ, nɑn yejɑnm sɑnɑ kɑnu, k dɑɑ kɔn nɑn lieb, k noi mɔniɑɔk senni pɑɑk, k mɑɑn lin nbɑ nɑ kul k mɔk nyuɑt k biɑ tie bon-yɑnɑ e.
56003010	Nilɔ i tie tuknɑ dɑɑnɔ, fɑn pɑk’ɔ yonm, k biɑ pɑk’ɔ munle pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn l puolpo fɑn nyik’ɔ.
56003011	A mi nɑn l nibuolu nyik sɔnu nbɑ tuok ɑ, k wɑɑ kpɑɑ tubɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k u kuɑnt u mɔnŋ muu ni.
56003012	Mi i tun Altemɑɑs ɑmi Tiikiik ɑ buol ni yuo nbɑ, fɑn yɑbl k cet’n Niikopoliis duo ni, k mɑɑn n sii be lenŋ e gbintɑnkɑɑnŋ yuo.
56003013	Yɑbt ɑ mɔnŋ k sonm Senɑɑs, wun nbɑ tie bɑlbuulɔ nɑ, nɑn Apuoluos, k bin lɑ bɑɑ luon lin nbɑ kul k fit piin b sɔnu nɑ.
56003014	L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k t niib ii mi bɑɑ sii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ bonciɑnn bɑnnu nbɑ, kii sonmt niib b fɑlɑ ni, k dɑɑ be binbenŋ nbɑ kɑɑ nyuɑt.
56003015	Bin nbɑ be n buol ni nɑ kul ɑ fuont’ɑ. A fuont bin nbɑ tien Klistu yɑdɑ k luon’t b yɑdɑ pɑɑk nɑ. Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ ii be nɑn i kul ɑ.
57001001	Min Pɔul wun nbɑ be dɑnsɑlk Yiesu Klistu sɑnn pɑɑk nɑ, nɑn t nɑɑ bik Tiimuote dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien t tuontunluɑ Fiilemɔn wun nbɑ k t luon’ɔ nɑ,
57001002	nɑn Yiesu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ lɑki lieb ɑ ŋɑɑk ni nɑ; k biɑ tien t niipuo Apiɑ nɑn t tuontunluɑ Alkiip nbɑ mun lɑɑt muksuk u tuonn nɑ pɑɑk.
57001003	T Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu n yɑt yetŋɑnm i pɑɑk k biɑ tul’i mɑnu.
57001004	N nɑɑ bik, yuo kul, n Yenmiɑlu kul ni n tiɑn ɑ po k tien Yennu niipuouk,
57001005	k mɑɑn n ponŋ gbiɑ fɑɑ tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu yɑdɑ k luon u yɑb kul biɑnŋ nbɑ.
57001006	N mei Yennu ɑ tinm nɑn fin nbɑ tɑɑn k tien Klistu yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk sɑɑ te k tin bɑnn fɑnu piisn nbɑ k t mɔk tɑɑ tɑɑ Klistu po nɑ pɑɑk.
57001007	N nɑɑ bik, ɑ lonm mɑnŋ tul’n pɑlpienn nɑn pɑlcienn k ŋɑnm cie n pɑl bonciɑnn, k mɑɑn ɑ cie Yennu niib kul pɑlɑ.
57001008	L pɑɑk, Klistu pɑɑk n bo kii mɔk jɑŋmɑɑni nɑn mɑn yet’ɑ fɑɑ sɑɑ tun lin nbɑ tuok,
57001009	ŋɑɑn lonm pɑɑk k n bɑln’mɑ, min Pɔul nbɑ tie sɑɑkuɑ k biɑ be dɑnsɑlk ni mɔtɑɑnɑ Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk nɑ,
57001010	n bɑln’mɑ k jiin Onesiinm po. U ji kpɑnt k tie n bik Klistu ni tɑɑ be dɑnsɑlk ni nɑ.
57001011	Sinsinn nɑ, u dɑɑn tuu k mɔk nyuɑt k tul’ɑ ni, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ u ji mɔk nyuɑt bonciɑnn k tien min nɑn fin kul ɑ.
57001012	Mɔtɑɑnɑ, n tuun’ɔ ɑ wun ŋmɑt ɑ buol ni; k n pɑl lonm kul ɑ be u ni.
57001013	N bo sii luon k mii diɑ’u n buol ni nnɑ nɑ k wuu tuun ɑ sienu ni kii sonmt’n mɑɑ be dɑnsɑlk ni Klistu lɑbɑmɑnn pɑɑk nɑ.
57001014	Ŋɑɑn n dɑɑn k luon k n tun siɑl k ɑ k tɑɑ n po. N k luon k n mɑb’ɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n luon k lin nbɑ kul k ɑ sɑɑ tun n nyi ɑ mɔnŋ lonm ni e.
57001015	Pɑsiɑl, Onesiinm siet ɑ buol yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ e, ŋɑɑn ɑ sɑɑ lɑ’u k wuu be ɑ buol yuo kul.
57001016	K mɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ u ji k tie dɑɑbl kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u gɑl dɑɑbl ɑ, u tie t nɑɑ bilonkɑk e. N luon’ɔ bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn ɑ sii luon’ɔ k gɑl nnɑ, k mɑɑn u tie nisɑɑlk e k biɑ tie Klistuyuɑ.
57001017	L pɑɑk, l i tie k ɑ duki ɑ n tie ɑ yuɑk i e, fɑn gɑɑl’ɔ nɑn fɑɑ bo sɑɑ gɑɑl’n biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
57001018	L i tie k u biil ɑ siɑl ɑmi u diɑ ɑ pɑnsiɑl i e, fɑn te k mɑn pɑ l pɑnn.
57001019	Nɑnn nɑ, n dɑ nɑn n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ nuu e; min Pɔul sɑɑ pɑ’ɑ. Ŋɑɑn min kɑɑ sɑɑ yet’ɑ, ɑ mɔnŋ mi nɑn ɑ diɑ n pɑnn ɑ mɑnfuol pɑɑk.
57001020	L pɑɑk, n ninjɑ, tun nnɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ pɑɑk, k duɑn n pɑl, k mɑɑn t set tie wei-nɑn-lieb e Klistu ni.
57001021	Mɑɑ dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk mɑnŋ k tien’ɑ nɑ, n k mɔk bilsuk nɑn ɑ sɑɑ sɑk tun k lin gɑl mɑɑ bɑln’mɑ lin nbɑ nɑ kul nɑ.
57001022	A biɑ sɑɑ tien dieok siil k guun’n, k mɑɑn i Yenmiɑlu pɑɑk, n mɔk dindɑnn nɑn Yennu sɑɑ te k n bɑɑl fuont’i.
57001023	Epɑɑflɑɑs wun nbɑ k min nɑn ŋuɑ be dɑnsɑlk Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk nɑ tien’ɑ u fuonti,
57001024	k n tuontunlieb, Mɑɑlk, nɑn Aliistɑɑlk, nɑn Demɑɑs, nɑn Luk, mun biɑ tien’ɑ b fuonti.
57001025	Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu n yɑt yetŋɑnm i pɑɑk.
58001001	Siɑn-yuo, Yennu din jii sɔni bonciɑnn k te k sɔkniinbɑ pɑk tul t yejɑnm k l tien tɑɑl munŋɑ wɑɑ,
58001002	ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ u jii mɑɑn k tul u Bijɑ e k u pɑk nɑn tinm. Yennu din lukt’ɔ ɑ wuu yen bonsiɑl kul k biɑ din te k u nɑn dulnyɑ kul.
58001003	Bijɑ mɑnŋ ni e k t lɑ yentsɑɑkɑl nbɑ nyii Yennu yudɑnt ni, k ŋuɑ mɑnŋ e tie Yennu mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ninnɑɔnŋ, k diɑ dulnyɑ kul nɑn u mɑɑn nbɑ mɔk yiikuo nɑ. Wɑɑ din tun lin nbɑ te k niib mɔk nyikcɑbu b biit pɑɑk nɑ puolpo, k u ji kɑl Yɑbnt Yennu niidiitu po Yendɔunŋ ni.
58001004	Bijɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ din cie mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑ, Yennu din pul’ɔ sɑnn nbɑ gbenŋ bonciɑnn k cie b yɑl.
58001005	Setk nɑn mɔni Yennu k mi yet mɑlɑksuɑ ɑ: «Fin e tie n Bijɑ, k lɑɑ nyii dinnɑ min e tie ɑ Bɑɑ.» Yennu biɑ k mi yet mɑlɑksuɑ po ɑ: «N tɑn sii tie ɑ Bɑɑ, k ɑ mun tie n Bijɑ.»
58001006	K Yennu nbɑ din tɑn yɑɑ wun tun u Bijɑkpel tingbounŋ nɑ ni yuo nbɑ, k u yet ɑ: «L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k Yennu mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ kul ɑ n jiɑnt’ɔ.»
58001007	Mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ po, Yennu din yet ɑ: «U te k u mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ tie wounŋ, k biɑ te k u tuontunnɑ tie mupienu.»
58001008	Ŋɑɑn l yet u Bijɑ nɑ po ŋɑnin ɑ: «Yennu, ɑ nɑɑn nɑ sii be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. K ɑ nɑɑn dɑnml nɑ tie bɑlmɔni dɑnml e.
58001009	A luon lin nbɑ tuok, ŋɑɑn nɑn biit, l pɑɑk te k Yennu, wunbɑ tie ɑ Yennu, nɑ lukt’ɑ, k muɑn pɑlpienn kpɑn ɑ yul pɑɑk, k nyik ɑ tɔk-nɑn-lieb ŋɑɑn lukt’ɑ.»
58001010	U biɑ yet ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, fin e din nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ pinpiik ni wɑɑ, k nɑn sɑnpɑɑk nɑn ɑ mɔnŋ nii.
58001011	Lin nbɑ nɑ kul tɑn sɑɑ gɑl ɑ, ŋɑɑn fin lek sii tun be e. Sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ tɑn sɑɑ kpet e k cɑt cɑt nɑn cincenn nɑ.
58001012	A tɑn sɑɑ pɔbn’m nɑn bɑɑɔnŋ nɑ e, k b tɑn sɑɑ lebt nɑɑn nɑn tiɑt nɑ. Ŋɑɑn fin ŋɑnin kpɑn sii tun tie yonm e k ɑ mɑnfuol nɑ kɑɑ juontu.»
58001013	Tɔn, Yennu dɑɑ k mi yet mɑlɑksuɑ ɑ: «Kɑln n niidiitu po nnɑ nɑ mɔkmɔk k mɑn tɑn jii ɑ dɑtɑi nɑ k tien’m ɑ tɑɑkpɑktɑ.»
58001014	L pɑɑk, mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ tie bee? B kul tie sei nbɑ jiɑntl Yennu e, k ŋuɑ Yennu tuun’m ɑ bii sonmt niib nbɑ sɑɑ lɑ fielu nɑ.
58002001	L pɑɑk, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k tin gbiint bɑlmɔni nbɑ k t din gbɑt nɑ fɑnu k tɑn dɑɑ buol.
58002002	Lɑbɑɑl nbɑ k mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ din muɑnt k tul t yejɑnm nɑ din tie bɑlmɔni e, k wun nbɑ din tuu k sɑk k wei’l din tuu lɑ tubdɑtu nbɑ jɑnŋ’ɔ e.
58002003	L pɑɑk, t i kii sɑk k gbiint fieljɑɑnn mɑnŋ lɑbɑɑl fɑnu, t sɑɑ tien nlee k nyi tubdɑtu ni? Yonmdɑɑnɔ tiɑɔnŋ o din dɔnŋ muɑnt fielu mɑnŋ lɑbɑɑl nɑ po, k bin nbɑ din gbɑt nɑ din wɑnn’t ɑ l set tie bɑlmɔni e.
58002004	Yennu tiɑɔnŋ din wɑnn nɑn mɑɑn mɑnŋ tie bɑlmɔni e, k din tuun bɑktnɔunŋ nɑn yɑɑl-lituk tuonɑ, k biɑ tien’m Foŋɑnm piini nɑn wɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
58002005	Dulnyɑ nbɑ bɑɑt k t pɑk l po nɑ, Yennu din k yɑɑ ɑ mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ e tie l yudɑnm.
58002006	L diɑn siɑl po Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Yennu, nisɑɑlk tie bee k ɑ duki u po, k nilɔ bik tie bee k ɑ bɑkɑ be u ni?
58002007	A din sikn’ɔ yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ buol, k biɑ te k u lɑ dontl nɑn pɑku,
58002008	k ɑ te k u mɔk yiikuo bonsiɑl kul pɑɑk.» L i tie k b yet ɑ Yennu tul nilɔ yiikuo «bonsiɑl kul pɑɑk,» l wɑnt nɑn u set mɔk yiikuo bonsiɑl kul pɑɑk k siɑl k tenn. Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ t dɑɑ k lɑ nɑn u mɔk yiikuo bonsiɑl kul pɑɑk.
58002009	Ŋɑɑn t lɑ nɑn Yennu din sikn Yiesu yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ buol, ɑ k Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk, wun kpo niib kul pɑɑk, k mɔtɑɑnɑ k t lɑ k u mɔk yudɑnt nɑn sɑnn u kuun mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
58002010	K mɑɑn Yennu nbɑ din nɑn bonsiɑl kul k biɑ diɑ l kul nɑ, wɑɑ jii u wɑɑs bonciɑnn k kuɑn’m u nɑɑn ni nɑ, l din tokn u buol ni, ɑ wun te k b fielu dɑɑnɔ Yiesu n tien b Fietuɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni u fɑlɑ dinu ni.
58002011	Yiesu, wun nbɑ wu nisɑɑli biit nɑ, nɑn bin nbɑ kul k u wuul b biit nɑ tɑɑ Bɑɑ e. L pɑɑk e k Yiesu k tiin fei nɑn wun yiin’m u nɑɑ wɑɑs.
58002012	U yet Yennu ɑ: «N tɑn sɑɑ muɑnt ɑ sɑnn n nɑɑ wɑɑs buol ni; n tɑn sɑɑ pɑk’ɑ ɑ niib tintɑɑnu ni.»
58002013	U biɑ yet ɑ: «N tɑn sii duu Yennu pɑɑk,» k biɑ yet ɑ: «Min nɑn wɑɑs nbɑ k Yennu din tul’n nɑ e be nɑ.»
58002014	Tɔn, wɑɑs mɑnŋ nbɑ tie nisɑɑli nɑ pɑɑk, Yiesu mun din tie nisɑɑlk e nɑn ŋɑnm nɑ, ɑ u kuun ni wun tɑn biil Sɑɑtɑn nbɑ diɑ kuun yiikuo nɑ,
58002015	k biɑ fɑt bin nbɑ be dɑɑbs ni b mɑnfuol kul ni, bɑɑ tiin kuun jɑŋmɑɑni nɑ pɑɑk nɑ.
58002016	Bɑlmɔni e, l k tie mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ kɑɑ k u sonmt, ŋɑɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ e k u sonmt.
58002017	Ŋɑnn e l din kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn wuu tie wɑɑs mɑnŋ ninnɑɔnŋ dede, k fit tien b mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ nbɑ mɔk ninbɑtinu k biɑ tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ, k fit jii u mɔnŋ k tien mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu, k wɑɑs nɑ n lɑ nyikcɑbu b biit pɑɑk.
58002018	K mɔtɑɑnɑ, u sɑɑ fit k sonm bin nbɑ lɑ jinjɑnmi, k mɑɑn u tiɑɔnŋ din lɑ jinjɑnmi k biɑ dii fɑlɑ wɑɑ.
58003001	N nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ tie Yennu yɑb k biɑ be bin nbɑ k Yennu lukt’b nɑ ni, ii goli mɑn Yiesu, wun nbɑ k Yennu din tun’ɔ ɑ wun tɑn tien mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ t Yenjiɑntu sɔnu ni nɑ.
58003002	Muois nbɑ din tie kɑn ŋmɑt puol, k tul Yennu ŋɑɑtieb biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, nnɑ e mun k Yiesu din tie kɑn ŋmɑt puol k tul Yennu nbɑ din lukt’ɔ nɑ.
58003003	Setk nɑn mɔni, Yiesu jɑnŋ nɑn yudɑnt k gɑl Muois nɑn ŋɑmɑɑlɔ nbɑ jɑnŋ nɑn dontl k gɑl ŋɑɑk tiɑɔnŋ nɑ.
58003004	Ŋɑɑk i tɑnŋ i sie, suɑ e senn’l, k Yennu e mɑɑ bonsiɑl kul.
58003005	Muois din tie tuontunnɔ nbɑ kɑn ŋmɑt puol e Yennu ŋɑɑtieb sinsuuk ni, k din wɑnn lin nbɑ po k Yennu din yɑɑ wun tɑn pɑk siɑn-yuo nɑ.
58003006	Klistu nbɑ tie Yennu Bijɑ nɑ, u tie wun nbɑ kɑn ŋmɑt puol e k yen Yennu ŋɑɑtieb. L i tie k t mɔk pɑlcienn nɑn yugontl t dindɑnn pɑɑk, l wɑnn nɑn tinm e tie Yennu ŋɑɑtieb mɑnŋ.
58003007	L pɑɑk, Foŋɑnm nbɑ yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ: «I i gbɑt Yennu kunkɔl dinnɑ,
58003008	i dɑɑ nyɑl i tubɑ nɑn yɑɑ din kɔn nɑn’ɔ dɑɑl nbɑ k i din bikn’ɔ pɑɑnpieonŋ ni nɑ.
58003009	Yennu yet ɑ: ‹B din lɑ mɑɑ din tun lin nbɑ kul k sɑɑ jɑnŋ binɑ piinnɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn lenŋ e k b din bikn’n.
58003010	Ŋɑnn e te k n donn wutuol niib mɑnŋ pɑɑk,› k din yet ɑ: ‹B bot b dudukt ni wɑɑ, k k mi mɑɑ luon bii tuun lin nbɑ.›
58003011	‹N din donn wutuol k pol’b mɔb ɑ B kɑn mi bɑɑl mɑɑ bo yɑɑ n tul’b fuon tinŋ nbɑ nɑ ni.› »
58003012	Tɔn, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, i mi k i suɑ n tien biitdɑɑnɔ k kɔnŋ yɑdɑ u pɑl ni k tɑn ŋmɑt puol k nyik Yennu nbɑ fo nɑ.
58003013	Ŋɑɑn ii cien i lieb pɑlɑ dɑɑl n tuu dɑɑl, yuo kul nbɑ k Yennu mɑɑn be i sinsuuk ni k «dinnɑ» i suɑ dɑɑ nyɑl u tubɑ biit nbɑ tuu kpɑnn nilɔ nɑ pɑɑk.
58003014	K mɑɑn t tie Klistu tɔk-nɑn-lieb e, l i tie k t duu u pɑɑk nɑn tɑɑ din duu u pɑɑk sinsinn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
58003015	Nnɑ e k b din diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «I i gbɑt Yennu kunkɔl dinnɑ, i dɑɑ nyɑl i tubɑ nɑn yɑɑ din yet u mɔb yuo nbɑ nɑ.
58003016	K lɑnm e din gbɑt u kunkɔl ŋɑɑn yet u mɔb i? Ŋɑnm kɑɑ din tie bin nbɑ nyii Ejipt k Muois din tie tuɑnndɑɑnɔ nɑ ɑɑ?
58003017	K lɑnm e biɑk k Yennu wutuol din duo b pɑɑk k sɑɑ jɑnŋ binɑ piinnɑ nɑ? L k tie bin nbɑ din tun biit, k b gbɑnɑnt tɑn biɑl pɑɑnpieonŋ ni nɑ kɑɑ ɑɑ?
58003018	Yennu dɑɑ din pol lɑnm e mɔb ɑ: «B kɑn mi bɑɑl mɑɑ bo yɑɑ n tul’b fuon tinŋ nbɑ nɑ ni.» L din tie bin nbɑ din kɔn nɑn’ɔ nɑ e.
58003019	Ŋɑnn t lɑ nɑn b din k fit kuɑ k mɑɑn b yɑdɑkɑɑln pɑɑk.
58004001	Yennu din senn mɔsonn k tul’t, ɑ t sɑɑ fit k kuɑ siɑn nbɑ k u tien t fuon siil nɑ wɑɑ. Ŋɑnn ii mi k i suɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɔnŋ fuon mɑnŋ.
58004002	K mɑɑn t gbɑt lɑbɑmɑnn nɑn bɑɑ mun din gbɑt’l biɑnŋ nbɑ pɑɑnpieonŋ ni, ŋɑɑn l din k tul’b nyuɑt, k mɑɑn bɑɑ din gbɑt lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ, b din k gɑɑl’l nɑn yɑdɑ.
58004003	L pɑɑk, tinm nbɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ, t sɑɑ lɑɑ fuon mɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu din pɑk l po k yet ɑ: «N wutuol e duo, k n pol mɔb ɑ: ‹B kɑn mi bɑɑl mɑɑ bo yɑɑ n tul’b fuon tinŋ nbɑ nɑ ni.› » U din tɑn yet lin nbɑ nɑ nɑ, k suɑ k u ponŋ tun u nɑɑmi tuonɑ gbenn pinpiik ni wɑɑ.
58004004	K mɑɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni siɑl po l yet l dɑɑŋɑnlole dɑɑl mɑnŋ po ɑ: «K Yennu din nyik u tuonɑ kul ɑ k foi dɑɑŋɑnlole dɑɑl.»
58004005	U biɑ yet diɑni nbɑ gɑl nɑ ni ɑ: «B kɑn mi bɑɑl mɑɑ bo yɑɑ n tul’b fuon tinŋ nbɑ nɑ ni.»
58004006	Bin nbɑ din gbɑt lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ sinsinn nɑ din k lɑ l fuon mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn b din yet Yennu mɔb. L pɑɑk, nisiɑb be k tɑn sɑɑ lɑ fuon mɑnŋ.
58004007	L pɑɑk, k Yennu biɑ senn dɑliel k yi dɑɑl mɑnŋ «dinnɑ.» K binɑ bonciɑnn din gɑl, k Yennu din te k Dɑɑfiid yet l po nɑn tɑɑ ponŋ piɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ɑ: «I i gbɑt Yennu kunkɔl dinnɑ, i dɑɑ nyɑl i tubɑ.»
58004008	K mɑɑn Suosue i bo ii dinŋ ii tul’b fuon mɑnŋ, l puolpo Yennu ji din bo kɑn pɑk dɑliel po.
58004009	L pɑɑk, fuondɑsiɑl biɑ dɑɑ be k tie Yennu niib yɑl, k nɑɑn wɑɑ din foi dɑɑŋɑnlole dɑɑl biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
58004010	K mɑɑn wun nbɑ lɑ Yennu fuon mɑnŋ nɑ, mun nyik u tuonɑ e k foi nɑn Yennu nbɑ din nyik u tuonɑ k foi biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
58004011	L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin yɑbl t mɔnŋ k lɑ fuon mɑnŋ, k t suɑ tɑn dɑɑ bɑɑ nɑn bɑɑ din yet Yennu mɔb k tɑn bɑɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
58004012	K mɑɑn Yennu mɑɑn mɑnŋ tie mɑɑn nbɑ fo e, k mɔk pɑnŋ k tuun tuonn, k biɑ di k gɑl juk-bɑnjiɑk nbɑ di mɔliemi nɑ. Yennu mɑɑn fit ŋmɑ k kuɑ bɑɑt nisɑɑlk siek nɑn u mɑnfuol buol ni, k kuɑ bɑɑt u tuktɑ nɑn u kpɑbɑ biesn ni, k kuɑ bɔktl u dudukt nɑn u pɑl ni bibikt.
58004013	Bonnɑnkɑl kul ni siɑl kɑɑ k Yennu k lɑɑt. Bonsiɑl kul duɑ yienin ni e Yennu tuɑnn k ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ k t tɑn sɑɑ wɑnn tɑɑ biil lin nbɑ. mɑnntɔ-yudɑɑn-jɑɑnn
58004014	L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tii diɑ t yɑdɑ nbɑ k t fiit wɑnn nɑ kenken, k mɑɑn t mɔk mɑnntɔ-yudɑɑn-jɑɑnn, k ŋuɑ e tie Yennu Bijɑ Yiesu, wun nbɑ ponŋ gɑl sɑɑn Yennu tiɑɔnŋ buol ni nɑ.
58004015	T mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ k tie wun nbɑ kɑn fit di fɑlɑ nɑn tinm t butunŋ ni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u mɔnŋ din lɑ biknu sɔni buolu kul ni nɑn tɑɑ mun lɑɑt biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn u lek din k tun biit.
58004016	L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tii mɔk pɑlpɑɑll k bɑɑl Yennu nbɑ mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ nɑɑngbounŋ buol ni. Lenŋ e k t sɑɑ lɑ nyikcɑbu nɑn ninbɑtinu yuo nbɑ k l sɑɑ sonmt’t nɑ.
58005001	Tɔn, b lukt mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ kul niib sinsuuk ni ɑ wuu tuun Yennu tuonn k sonm niib k biɑ gɑɑl b pɑɑk k mɑnn mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu b biit pɑɑk.
58005002	Wɑɑ mun tie butmɔ nɑ, u fit gbiɑ bin nbɑ puɑl yɑn nɑn bin nbɑ kpet sɔnu ni nɑ dudukt pɑɑk,
58005003	k u mɔnŋ nbɑ tie butmɔ nɑ pɑɑk, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k wun mɑnn mɑlunŋ u mɔnŋ biit pɑɑk nɑn wɑɑ mɑnn mɑlunŋ niib nɑ biit pɑɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
58005004	Suɑ kɑn fit pɑk u mɔnŋ k yet, ɑ u tie mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ k k gɑɑl l nibɑɑkl, sie k Yennu n lukt’ɔ nɑn wɑɑ din lukt Aɑlɔn k tien’ɔ mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
58005005	Nnɑ e mun k Klistu din k lukt u mɔnŋ k yet, ɑ u tie mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ k gɑɑl l nibɑɑkl, ŋɑɑn Yennu e din yet’ɔ ɑ: «A tie n Bijɑ e, k dinnɑ n tie ɑ Bɑɑ.»
58005006	K biɑ yet siɑl buol ɑ: «A sii tie mɑnntuɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, kii tie Melkiisedek pɑɑbu ni mɑnntuɑ.»
58005007	Tɔn, Yiesu nbɑ din be tingbounŋ nɑ ni yuo nbɑ nɑ u din mei Yennu k bɑln’mɔ, k bui nɑn nyin-nyuut Yennu nbɑ sɑɑ fit fɑt’ɔ kuun ni nɑ buol ni. K wɑɑ din bɑɑkt Yennu nɑ pɑɑk k Yennu din gbɑt u miɑlu mɑnŋ.
58005008	Wɑɑ lek din tie Yennu Bijɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn u tumi cɔlnt u fɑldinu ni.
58005009	Wɑɑ din tɑn dii fɑlɑ gbenn yuo nbɑ, bin nbɑ kul cɔln’mɔ ji din fit lɑ fielu nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu u buol ni,
58005010	k Yennu yiin’ɔ mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ, Melkiisedek pɑɑbu ni.
58005011	T bo sɑɑ pɑk bonciɑnn lin nbɑ nɑ po, ŋɑɑn l pɑɑl nɑn k t wɑnn’i, k mɑɑn i k bɑnt l pɑɑk yiɑn.
58005012	Nnɑ yuo l ji bo kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k yii tie wɑntieb, ŋɑɑn i biɑ luon k suɑ n wɑnn’i Yennu mɑɑn pinpiik ni sɔni nɑ. I luon biin e, k k luon jeŋmɑnkɑt.
58005013	Wun nbɑ dɑɑ muɑl biin tie bibunn e, k dɑɑ k mi fɑnu lin nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn lin nbɑ bi.
58005014	Ŋɑɑn jeŋmɑnkɑt tie sɑɑkɑb yɑl e, k ŋɑnm e fit bɑnt lin nbɑ tie bonbiil nɑn lin nbɑ tie bonŋɑnn, bɑɑ tuu dukn l po b pɑlɑ ni nɑ.
58006001	L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin tumi lin nbɑ tie sɑɑkɑb yɑl Klistu ni k sɑɑn tuɑnn po. Ŋɑɑn t ji dɑɑ goli sinsinn tumiu nɑ kɑɑ. T ji k ŋɑnm fɔkn fiɑkl nbɑ sɑɑ te k nilɔ n nyik tuonɑ nbɑ sɑɑ biil’ɔ nɑ kɑɑ, kuo wɑɑ sɑɑ tien Yennu yɑdɑ bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ kɑɑ.
58006002	L ji k kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k tin ŋɑnm tumi Yennu nyunwulu po, nɑn niiyiinu niib pɑɑk, nɑn kpienm fiilu po, nɑn tubdɑtu nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ po kɑɑ.
58006003	Yennu i sɑk, t sɑɑ sɑɑn tuɑnn e.
58006004	Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin got bin nbɑ ŋmɑt bɑɑ binbenbiik ni nɑ: b din lɑ Yennu yentu nɑ wɑɑ. B din lenm Yendɔunŋ ni piini k biɑ din gɑɑl Foŋɑnm ɑ.
58006005	B din luon Yennu mɑɑn nbɑ ŋɑn nɑ, k din mi dulnyɑ nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ yiikuo buolu buolu po.
58006006	Ŋɑɑn nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ kul, k b lek tɑn ŋmɑt bɑɑ binbenbiik ninŋ. L nibuolu, suɑ ji kɑn fit te k bin ŋɑnm k mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ. Bɑlmɔni, b ŋɑnmt kpɑɑn Yennu Bijɑ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk e, k tien lieb yɑɑk nbɑ k b sii suki’ɔ.
58006007	Tɔn, tinŋ nbɑ k sɑɑk tuu bɑɑ l pɑɑk k l mɑɑkt k tie jiet k tien bin nbɑ ŋɑnmt’l nɑ, Yennu e yɑt yetŋɑnm tinŋ mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
58006008	Ŋɑɑn tinŋ mɑnŋ i tie kunkoni nɑn mɔbiit, l k mɔk nyuɑt, l kɑn wei k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ pol’l mɔb. K juontu ni lin di muu.
58006009	T yɔnimɔni, tɑɑ lek piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn t k mɔk bilsuk i po. T mi nɑn i tɔk sɔnŋɑnu e, fielu sɔnu.
58006010	Yennu k tuun lin nbɑ k ŋɑn. U kɑn tɑnm i tuonn po, k biɑ kɑn tɑnm yɑɑ luon’ɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ tuonɑ nbɑ k i tun k tul’ɔ nɑn tuonɑ nbɑ k i tuun i nɑɑ wɑɑs Klistuyɑb nɑ ni.
58006011	T luon k i suɑ kul n yɑbl u mɔnŋ pɑɑk nɑn ninmɔnn e nɑn yɑɑ tuu tuun bɑnnu nbɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn l juontu, k yɑɑ mɔk dindɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l set sɑɑ tien mɔni k tul’i.
58006012	T k luon k yii tie gbɑn-nyɑkdɑnm kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn t luon k yii wɑɑ bin nbɑ mɔk yɑdɑ nɑn suklu e. Ŋɑnm e gɑɑn bonŋɑnɑ nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn nɑ.
58006013	Yennu nbɑ din senn u mɔsonn tul Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yuo nbɑ nɑ, u din lol lol, ɑ u tɑn sɑɑ tun wɑɑ din senn mɔsonn nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ. Suɑ din k be k cie Yennu tiɑɔnŋ, k l pɑɑk, u din jii u mɔnŋ sɑnn e k lol u lol mɑnŋ.
58006014	U din yet’ɔ ɑ: «L tie bɑlmɔni e, n yɑt yetŋɑnm ɑ pɑɑk k biɑ sɑɑ tul’ɑ yɑɑbuonɑ bonciɑnn.»
58006015	K Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din mɔk suklu e, k tɑn gɑɑl lin nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul’ɔ nɑ.
58006016	Nilɔ i lol lol, u tuu jii wun nbɑ gɑl’ɔ sɑnn e k lol, k lol mɑnŋ tie nyinn nbɑ kpi mɔniɑɔk kul ɑ.
58006017	Tɔn, bin nbɑ din yɑɑ bin gɑɑl Yennu nbɑ din senn mɔsonn nbɑ nɑ, u din luon wun wɑnn’b, ɑ u kɑn mi lebt u dudukt, k l pɑɑk k u din pukn u lol u mɔsonn mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
58006018	L pɑɑk, bonɑ ŋɑnle be k kɑɑ lebtu k Yennu biɑ kɑn fit fɑɑl fɑɑk l pɑɑk. Ŋɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk, tinm nbɑ lɑ gungulbuol u buol ni nɑ, t mɔk pɑlcienn nbɑ sɑɑ te k tin tin k suol dindɑnn nbɑ k Yennu din senn’t mɔsonn nɑ nɑn pɑnŋ.
58006019	Dindɑnn nbɑ k t mɔk nɑ tie nɑn mɑnfuol jɑɑntɑlk nbɑ diɑ t mɑnfuol fɑnu. L tie dindɑnn nbɑ gɑl Yendɔunŋ ni Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk cincenn nbɑ tuu juɑn k puun nɑ e, k kuɑ dieok mɑnŋ linn po.
58006020	Lenŋ e k Yiesu ponŋ din gɑɑl t pɑɑk k gɑl k tie t sɔnliitɔ, k tien t mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, Melkiisedek pɑɑbu ni.
58007001	Melkiisedek mɑnŋ din tie Sɑɑlem tinŋ kpɑnbɑl e k biɑ din tie Yɑbnt Yennu mɑnntuɑ. Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nbɑ din tɑn nyii tɔb nbɑ k u din kɔn nyɑnn kpɑnbɑlɑ nɑ, Melkiisedek din cet’ɔ k yɑt yetŋɑnm u pɑɑk,
58007002	k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din nyinn bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ wɑɑ din kɔn fɑt bont nbɑ nɑ kul ni k tul’ɔ. (Melkiisedek sɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk tie ɑ: «kpɑnbɑl nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn,» k biɑ jen ɑ u din tie Sɑɑlenm kpɑnbɑl e k l pɑɑk u mun tie «mɑnu kpɑnbɑl.»)
58007003	Lɑbɑsiɑl k be k wɑnt Melkiisedek bɑɑ po ɑmi u nɑɑ po ɑmi u yejɑnm po. Lɑbɑsiɑl kɑɑ k wɑnt u mɑlu po ɑmi u kuun po. U nɑɑn nɑn Yennu Bijɑ nɑ e. U lek biɑ tun tie Yennu mɑnntuɑ e nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
58007004	L pɑɑk, i lɑ wɑɑ din tie nijɑɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ, k mɑɑn t yejɑsɑɑkuɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm lek din tɑn nyinn wɑɑ din kɔn fɑt bont nbɑ tɔb ni nɑ bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ k tul’ɔ.
58007005	Senni din wɑnn ɑ Liefi yɑɑbuonɑ nbɑ tie mɑnntieb nɑ, ɑ bin tuu gɑɑl b niib Suifnbɑ nbɑ mɔk lin nbɑ l bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ, ŋɑɑn b niib mɑnŋ mun biɑ lek din tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ e.
58007006	Melkiisedek din k tie Liefi yɑɑbuonn kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u din gɑɑl bonɑ bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm buol, k biɑ yɑt yetŋɑnm Ablɑɑhɑɑnm pɑɑk, wun nbɑ din gɑɑl Yennu mɔsonŋɑnɑ nɑ.
58007007	Mɔniɑɔk kɑɑ nɑn nisuɑ nbɑ yɑt yetŋɑnm e tie nijɑɑnn k gɑl wun nbɑ gɑɑn yetŋɑnm mɑnŋ.
58007008	Mɑnntieb nbɑ din tuu gɑɑn niib nbɑ mɔk lin nbɑ l bonɑ bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ nɑ din tie nisɑɑli k din tuu tɑn kpo, ŋɑɑn Melkiisedek wun nbɑ din gɑɑl Ablɑɑhɑɑnm bonɑ bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ nɑ ŋɑnin be, nɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ wɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
58007009	T sɑɑ fit yet ɑ yuo nbɑ k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din nyinn u bont ni bonɑ bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ nɑ, u yɑɑbuonɑ Liefiitnbɑ, bin nbɑ din tɑn gɑɑn bonɑ bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ mɑnŋ, mun din tul b bonɑ bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm ni,
58007010	k mɑɑn Melkiisedek nbɑ din cet Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yuo nbɑ nɑ, ŋuɑ Liefi din be Ablɑɑhɑɑnm gbɑnɑnt ni.
58007011	Yennu din tul Suifnbɑ senni k wɑnn Liefiitnbɑ b mɑnnu tuonɑ nbɑ sii tie biɑnŋ nbɑ e. K Liefiitnbɑ mɑnntieb tuonɑ ii dinŋ ii fit te k nilɔ tie niŋɑnɔ Yennu buol ni, l din bo kɑn kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k mɑnntɔgɑnɔ wun nbɑ k set Aɑlɔn setu ni, ŋɑɑn sie Melkiisedek setu ni nɑ n bɑɑl.
58007012	K mɑɑn mɑnntieb yudɑnt lebtu i bɑɑl, l mun tie k senni n lebt e.
58007013	K t Yonmdɑɑnɔ, wun nbɑ k mɔbonɑ nɑ piɑk u po nɑ, nyii buolgɑnu nbɑ ni k b suɑ din k mi tun mɑnntuɑ tuonn binbintl buol ni e.
58007014	Suɑ kul ponŋ mi nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ nyii Suudɑ nibuolu ni, nibuolu nbɑ k Muois din k mi pɑk siɑl b po k jikt sɑɑ mɑnntieb po.
58007015	Gotl lin nbɑ te k t mɑntk bɑnn mɑɑn mɑnŋ pɑɑk nbɑ tie lin nbɑ. Mɑnntɔgɑnɔ nbɑ nɑɑn nɑn Melkiisedek, din tɑn bɑɑl.
58007016	Ŋuɑ e tie mɑnntuɑ, k nisɑɑlk senni ni kɑɑ k u tien l mɑnntuɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ yiikuo ni e k u tien mɑnntuɑ.
58007017	K mɑɑn b din diɑn u po Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «A tɑn sii tie mɑnntuɑ e nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, kii tie Melkiisedek pɑɑbu ni mɑnntuɑ.»
58007018	L pɑɑk, senkpelu nɑ ji din bɑkn e, k mɑɑn l din k mɔk pɑnŋ, k biɑ k mɔk nyuɑt,
58007019	k mɑɑn Muois senni mɑnŋ din k fit te k siɑl ŋɑn. Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ t ji mɔk lin nbɑ tul’t dindɑnn nbɑ cie nɑ, k l ni e k t cɑt nɑkn Yennu buol ni.
58007020	K Yennu pol k set k pukn l pɑɑk. Yennu din tuu k puol k tien mɑnntɔlieb nɑ.
58007021	Ŋɑɑn Yiesu din tien mɑnntuɑ yuo nbɑ k Yennu din tɑn pol k yet’ɔ ɑ: «A Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu senn mɔsonn k ji kɑn lebt u dudukt, k yet ɑ: ‹Fin e sii tie mɑnntuɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.› »
58007022	L pɑɑk, nnɑ e te k Yiesu tie wun nbɑ wɑnn nɑn lol nbɑ cie nɑ kɑɑ lotu.
58007023	Tɔn, yɑɑyuo ni mɑnntieb mɑnŋ din yɑb k mɑɑn b din tuu kpo e, k ji kii be b tuonn nɑ ni yuo kul.
58007024	Ŋɑɑn Yiesu ŋɑnin sii tun be k tie mɑnntuɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k u tuonɑ nɑ kɑn mi nyi u nuu ni k suɑ n gɑɑl’l.
58007025	L pɑɑk, bin nbɑ cɑt nɑkn Yennu, ŋuɑ Yiesu ni, u fit fiel’b mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k mɑɑn u lek be u mɑnfuol ni yuo kul, k mei Yennu k tien’m.
58007026	L pɑɑk, Yiesu e tie t mɑnntuɑ nbɑ jɑnŋ nɑn t sonml. Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ penn Yennu pɑl ni, k u k mɔk biit, k suɑ k fit tɑɑl’ɔ siɑl pɑɑk. Biit dɑnm be b kuɑ k u mun biɑ be u kuɑ, k Yennu donn’ɔ k kuɑn’ɔ Yendɔunŋ ni.
58007027	Mɑnntɔyudɑnlieb nɑ din tuu mɑnn mɑlunŋ dɑɑl n tuu dɑɑl b tiɑɔnŋ biit pɑɑk sinsinn, k biɑ mɑnn mɑlunŋ niib biit pɑɑk. Ŋuɑ Yiesu k tie nnɑ kɑɑ. U din jii u mɔnŋ k mɑnn mɑlunŋ yonm kuɑ e, k l jɑnŋ nɑn niib kul ɑ.
58007028	Muois senni nɑ lukt nisɑɑli k tien’m mɑnntɔyudɑnm nbɑ k tie niŋɑnm Yennu buol ni e. Ŋɑɑn, wɑɑ din tul senni mɑnŋ puolpo nɑ k Yennu din pol k yet, ɑ u Bijɑ sii tie mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
58008001	Bɑli nɑ bɑlnuɑk wɑnt nɑn t mɔk mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ nbɑ tie nnɑ mun, k kɑl Yennu nbɑ mɔk pɑnŋ kul nɑ nɑɑngbounŋ niidiitu po Yendɔunŋ ni,
58008002	k tuun mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ tuonɑ Yennu dieok ni, k dieok mɑnŋ tie bɑlmɔni jɑɑnti lɑnbounŋ nbɑ k b tien nɑn bonkobgbɑnt nɑ, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ din tien k l k tie nisɑɑlk yɑl kɑɑ.
58008003	B lukt mɑnntuɑ kul, ɑ wun jii piini k biɑ mɑnn mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu e. Nnɑ e k l mun kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k t mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ ii mɔk siɑl k tul.
58008004	L i bo i tie k u be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, u bo kii tie mɑnntuɑ fɑb ɑ, k mɑɑn mɑnntieb nbɑ tien Yennu piini, Suifnbɑ senni nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ponŋ be.
58008005	B tuun b tuonɑ jɑɑnti dieok nbɑ nɑɑn nɑn lin nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ ni e. Ŋɑnn e te k Yennu din kpɑɑn Muois yuo nbɑ k u din yɑɑ wun cɑɑn jɑɑnti lɑnbounŋ nɑ, ɑ: «A tun bonsiɑl kul k lii nɑɑn nɑn lin nbɑ k n wɑnn’ɑ juɑl pɑɑk.»
58008006	Yiesu mɑnnu tuonɑ nbɑ k Yennu tul’ɔ nɑ cie b mɑnnu tuonɑ k lol nbɑ k u tuun nɑn’n nɑ cie lolkpel nɑ k u lol mɑnŋ gɑɑ nɑn mɔsonɑ nbɑ cie nɑ e.
58008007	K mɑɑn sinsinn lol nɑ ii dinŋ ii tien dede, l ji din bo kii kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k Yennu n tul lol pukn tɑɑl munle.
58008008	Ŋɑɑn Yennu din lɑ nisɑɑli biit e, k u yet ɑ: «Min nbɑ tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ e yien’i ɑ yuo bɑɑt, k n tɑn sɑɑ lol lolpɑɑnn k tul Islɑɑeltieb nɑn Suudɑ niib.
58008009	L tɑn kii tie nɑn lol nbɑ k n din senn k tul b yejɑnm dɑɑl nbɑ k n din kub b nii k nyinn’b Ejipt tinŋ ni nɑ. B din k wei lol nbɑ k n din tul’b nɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni, k l pɑɑk, k n bɑkɑ din kɑɑ b po. Min nbɑ tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ e yien’i nɑ.
58008010	Lol nbɑ k n yɑɑ n senn k tul Islɑɑeltieb tie nɑ e. Dɑɑ nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ ni, n ji sɑɑ tɑbn n senni mɑnŋ b dudukt ni e, k diɑn tɑbn b pɑlɑ ni. N sii tie b Yennu e k b mun tie n niib.
58008011	L ji kii kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k b suɑ n wɑnn u luɑ ɑmi k yet u nɑɑ bik ɑ: ‹Fin, bɑnt Yonmdɑɑnɔ,› k mɑɑn b kul ɑ tɑn sii mi min e, lɑɑ jii bonbis k sɑɑ tuu sɑɑkɑb.
58008012	N tɑn sɑɑ nyik b biit k cɑb’b, k ji kii tiɑn b biit nɑ po.»
58008013	Yennu nbɑ piɑk lolpɑɑnn mɑnŋ po nɑ e, k sinsinn mɔlol nɑ tien lolkpel, k bonsiɑl nbɑ kpet k kokl, l k fɔk nɑn botu.
58009001	Tɔn, Yennu nbɑ din lol sinsinn lol k tul’b nɑ, u biɑ din tul’b senni nbɑ wɑnt’b bɑɑ sii jiɑntl’ɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ, nɑn bɑɑ sii jiɑntl’ɔ siɑn nbɑ tinŋ nɑ pɑɑk.
58009002	B din fɑɑ bonkobgbɑnt lɑnbounŋ o, k cincen juɑn k bɔkt’l munle. Sinsinn yɑl nbɑ k b din yi’l siɑn nbɑ ŋɑn nɑ, b din senn fitl e, k tiebul sie lenŋ, k pɑɑnu nbɑ k b tien k l tie Yennu yɑl nɑ tuɑ l pɑɑk.
58009003	K cincen nbɑ juɑn nɑ linn po mun, k b yi lenŋ siɑn nbɑ mɑntk ŋɑn.
58009004	Sɑlmɑ binbintl din be, k b jokt wubt l pɑɑk, k Yennu senni lɑkl din be k b tɑbn sɑlmɑ l kul po, k sɑlmɑ bobl din be lɑkl nɑ ni nɑn jiet nbɑ k b yi’l mɑɑnn nɑ. K Aɑlɔn pɑtu nbɑ din yinn puuk nɑ kpie lɑkl mɑnŋ ni, k tɑnɑ ŋɑnle nbɑ k b din kuol k senni diɑn l pɑɑk nɑ kpie l ni.
58009005	Selubɑnnbɑ din tuɑ lɑkl mɑnŋ pɑɑk k mɔk yudɑnt bonciɑnn k wɑnt nɑn Yennu be, k b kpinkpɑnt bɑkn siɑn nbɑ k b din mɑnn biit nyikcɑbu mɑlunŋ nɑ. Ŋɑɑn l k tie mɔtɑɑnɑ kɑɑ k t sɑɑ pɑk l po.
58009006	Bɑɑ din senn bonɑ kul ɑ nnɑ nɑ e, k mɑnntieb din tuu kuɑ Yenjiɑntu lɑnbounŋ mɑnŋ pɑk-luolu ni yuo kul k tuun Yenjiɑntu tuonɑ.
58009007	Ŋɑɑn mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ kuukuɑ e din tuu kuɑ lɑnbounŋ nɑ linn po yonm kuɑ binn nuɑk ni. U din tuu diɑ sɔn e k mɑnn mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu, u mɔnŋ biit pɑɑk, nɑn niib nbɑ din tuu kpet tun biit nɑ pɑɑk.
58009008	Nnɑ e k Foŋɑnm din wɑnt nɑn siɑn nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ dɑɑ k luot yuo nbɑ k sinsinn lɑnbounŋ mɑnŋ dɑɑ din sie nɑ.
58009009	Ŋɑnn e tie lin nbɑ wɑnn’t siɑl k jiin mɔtɑɑnɑ po. L wɑnt nɑn piini nbɑ k b din tuu tul Yennu, nɑn mɑlunŋ nbɑ k b din tuu mɑnn k tul’ɔ nɑ kul din k fit te k nilɔ nbɑ jiɑntl Yennu nnɑ nɑ tie niŋɑnɔ u buol ni.
58009010	Ŋɑnn din tuu tie jiet nɑn bon-nyu-nyuut nɑn gbɑnɑnt ŋɑnmu kuukuɑ e. Lin nbɑ nɑ kul din tie gbɑnɑnt senni e, ɑ bii wɑɑ’l mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ senn u senpɑɑnu.
58009011	Ŋɑɑn Klistu bɑɑl k tie bonŋɑnɑ nbɑ ponŋ be nɑ mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ e. U din kuɑ lɑnbounŋ nbɑ tie lɑnbonjɑɑnn k biɑ sie fɑnu, k biɑ ŋɑn nɑ ni, k l k tie lin nbɑ k nisɑɑlk tien k biɑ k tie tingbounŋ nɑ ni yɑl.
58009012	Klistu nbɑ din kuɑ siɑn nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ ni yonm kuɑ nɑ, u din k kuɑ nɑn bujɑi nɑn nɑɑjɑi sɔn kɑɑ k mɑnn mɑlunŋ, ŋɑɑn u din jii u mɔnŋ sɔn e k pɑ k gɑɑl fielu nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu k tul’t.
58009013	B din tuu jii bujɑi nɑn nɑɑjɑi sɔn e, k biɑ jii nɑɑsɑl k mɑnn k juo muu, ŋɑɑn jii l tɑnpent nɑ nɑn sɔn mɑnŋ k mii mii niib nbɑ din tuu mɔk biit k jiin b jɑɑnti senni nɑ po, ɑ lin wuul b biit nbɑ k nilɔ sɑɑ fit lɑ nɑ.
58009014	L tie k l tie mɔni i e, Klistu sɔn biɑ sii mɔk yiikuo k gɑl bonkobt sɔn nɑ. Bɑlmɔni, Foŋɑnm pɑnŋ ni, Klistu din yit u mɔnŋ sɑlk k tul Yennu, k l tie mɑlunŋ nbɑ ŋɑn. Nnɑ e k u sɑɑ wuul t pɑl nbɑ gbie nɑn tuonbiit nbɑ sɑɑ nɑn’t kuun ni nɑ. Ŋɑnn e sɑɑ te k tin fit k tun Yennu nbɑ fo nɑ tuonɑ.
58009015	L pɑɑk, Klistu e tie wun nbɑ te k lolpɑɑnn gbie, ɑ bin nbɑ k Yennu yiin’m nɑ n lɑ yetŋɑnm nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn k tul’b nɑ. Kuun nbɑ k Klistu din kpo nɑ fɑt niib biit nbɑ k b din tuun yuo nbɑ k b tuu wɑɑ lolkpel nɑ ni wɑɑ.
58009016	Tɔn, nilɔ ii diɑn u fɑdinu kɑdɑɑɔk l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k bin wɑnn nɑn wun nbɑ diɑn fɑdinu kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ kpo wɑɑ.
58009017	Yuo nbɑ k wun nbɑ diɑn fɑdinu kɑdɑɑɔk mɑnŋ dɑɑ be u mɑnfuol ni nɑ, fɑdinu kɑdɑɑɔk mɑnŋ k mɔk nyuɑt. L nyuɑt be u kuun puolpo e wɑɑ.
58009018	L pɑɑk e te k sinsinn lol nɑ din mɔk nyuɑt sɔn mɑlunŋ puolpo nɑ kuukuɑ.
58009019	Yuo nbɑ k Muois din muɑnt Yennu senni kul nɑn lɑɑ diɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ k tul niib nɑ, u din jii dufɑtlɑi k lol nɑn pekobmɔnt k pɑk nɑɑjɑi nɑn bujɑi sɔn nbɑ ŋmɑt nɑn nyun nɑ, k mii mii’l senni kɑdɑɑɔk nɑn niib mɑnŋ kul pɑɑk,
58009020	k yien’m ɑ: «Lol nbɑ k Yennu senn tul’i ɑ yin sɑk’l nɑ sɔn e nɑ.»
58009021	Muois biɑ din tuu mii sɔn mɑnŋ Yenjiɑntu lɑnbounŋ nɑ pɑɑk e, nɑn bonsiɑl kul nbɑ k b diɑ jiɑntl Yennu nɑ pɑɑk.
58009022	Bɑlmɔni e, Yennu senni wɑnnu ni, sɔn e din tuu ŋɑnm bont kul k l be fɑnu k k mɔk biit, k sɔn i kii nyii, Yennu kɑn nyik cɑb niib biit.
58009023	L pɑɑk, l din tuu kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k bin mɑnn mɑlunŋ k ŋɑnm bonɑ nbɑ tie Yendɔunŋ ni bonɑ ninnɑɔnŋ nɑ, ŋɑɑn mɑlunŋ nbɑ cie nisɑɑlk yɑl sɑɑ ŋɑnm Yendɔunŋ ni bonɑ tiɑɔnŋ.
58009024	Klistu din k kuɑ jɑɑnti buol nbɑ k nisɑɑlk ŋɑnm, k l tie Yendɔunŋ ni bont nbɑ tie l bɑlmɔni nɑ ninnɑɔnŋ nɑ ni kɑɑ. Ŋɑɑn u din sɑɑn kuɑ Yendɔunŋ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ni e, siɑn nbɑ k u be Yennu tuɑnn t pɑɑk nɑ.
58009025	Suifnbɑ mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ nɑ tuu kuɑ nɑn bonkobt sɔn buol nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ ni yonm kuɑ e binn kul nuɑk ni, ŋɑɑn Klistu ŋɑnin din k kuɑ lenŋ tɑɑl fuunu munŋɑ kɑɑ wɑɑ, k jii u mɔnŋ k mɑnn mɑlunŋ.
58009026	L ii dinŋ ii bo i tie nnɑ i e, ŋɑnn lɑɑ din nyii dulnyɑ nɑmu pinpiik ni wɑɑ, u din bo sɑɑ di fɑlɑ tɑɑl bonciɑnn. Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, yuo nbɑ ji tɑn pel juontu nɑ k u din dɔkt ɑ wun jii u mɔnŋ k mɑnn mɑlunŋ k kpien biit.
58009027	Yennu senn ɑ sie k nilɔ kul n kpo yonm kuɑ, k l puolpo Yennu n bu u buut.
58009028	Nnɑ e mun, Klistu din jii u mɔnŋ k mɑnn mɑlunŋ yonm kuɑ k nyinn nifosɑɑli bonciɑnn biit nɑ. U tɑn sɑɑ jen ɑ, ŋɑɑn l k tie u tɑn sɑɑ nyinn niib biit kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u tɑn sɑɑ tul bin nbɑ guu’u nɑ fielu.
58010001	Suifnbɑ senni nɑ k wɑnn bonɑ nbɑ tie bɑnnu nbɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni, ŋɑɑn l tie bonŋɑnɑ nbɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ ninnɑɔnŋ o. L pɑɑk, lɑɑ wɑnt bɑɑ sii mɑnn mɑlunŋ binn kul bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, l kɑn bɑn te k bin nbɑ nɑkn Yennu nɑ, ii tie niŋɑnm u buol ni.
58010002	L mɑlunŋ ii bo ii fit te k niib tie niŋɑnm Yennu buol ni e, b din bo sɑɑ mɑnn yonm kuɑ e ŋɑɑn ji nyik, k biit ji kii wɑɑ’b.
58010003	Ŋɑɑn binn n tuu binn mɑlunŋ tuonɑ nɑ kpɑn din tiɑn niib nɑ b biit po e.
58010004	K mɑɑn nɑɑjɑi nɑn bujɑi sɔn nɑ k fit nyinn biit.
58010005	L pɑɑk, Klistu nbɑ din yɑɑ wun sik tingbounŋ nɑ ni yuo nbɑ nɑ, u din yet Yennu ɑ: «A k luon bin tul’ɑ mɑlunŋ nɑn piini kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ nɑn gbɑnɑnt e k tul’n,
58010006	k biɑ k mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn mɑlunŋ nbɑ k b tie biit nyikcɑbu pɑɑk nɑ.
58010007	L pɑɑk e te k n din yet ɑ: ‹Yennu, min e nɑ, n sɑɑ tun ɑ lonm nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu kɑdɑɑɔk ni k yet n po bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.› »
58010008	Sinsinn, u din yet ɑ: «A k luon bin tul’ɑ mɑlunŋ nɑn piini, nɑn bonkobt nbɑ k b jokt muu nɑ nɑn mɑlunŋ nbɑ k b tuu mɑnn biit pɑɑk, k ɑ biɑ k mɔk pɑlpienn l pɑɑk.» Ŋɑɑn b din mɑnn l mɑlunŋ nɑn senni nbɑ wɑnn bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ e.
58010009	L puolpo k u biɑ yet ɑ: «Yennu, min e nɑ, n sɑɑ tun ɑ lonm ɑ.» L pɑɑk, k Klistu fɑɑ kpien mɑlnkpelɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn jii u mɑlunŋ nɑ k senn l setu ni.
58010010	Yiesu Klistu din tun lin nbɑ k Yennu luon wun tun nɑ, k jii u gbɑnɑnt k mɑnn mɑlunŋ yonm kuɑ k l jɑnŋ nɑn niib kul ɑ, k fɑt’t biit ni.
58010011	Mɑnntuɑ kul tuu sie e dɑɑl n tuu dɑɑl k tuun u tuonn, k tun k mɑnn mɑlnbuolyenŋ, ŋɑɑn k l kɑn fit k nyinn biit.
58010012	Ŋɑɑn Klistu ŋɑnin din mɑnn mɑlunŋ yonm kuɑ e, lin nbɑ mɔk yiikuo yuo kul biit pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt duo Yendɔunŋ ni k kɑl Yennu niidiitu po.
58010013	Lenŋ e k u be k guu mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ te k wun ŋmɑɑ u dɑtɑi.
58010014	Nnɑ e k ŋuɑ din mɑnn mɑln-yenml k te k bin nbɑ tie Yennu yɑb nɑ tien niŋɑnm Yennu buol ni nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
58010015	K Foŋɑnm mun biɑ tien’t u siɑlɑ k yet sinsinn ɑ:
58010016	«I Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet ɑ: ‹Mɑɑ yɑɑ n tul’b lol nbɑ e nɑ dɑɑl mɑnŋ puolpo. N tɑn sɑɑ tien n senni b pɑlɑ ni, k diɑn b dudukt ni.› »
58010017	L puolpo k u biɑ ŋɑnm yet ɑ: «N ji kɑn mi k tiɑl b biit nɑn b tuonbiit nɑ po jik.»
58010018	Ŋɑɑn nyikcɑbu nbɑ be nɑ, l ji k kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn bin mɑnn mɑlnsiɑɔk biit pɑɑk.
58010019	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, Yiesu sɔn pɑɑk k t mɔk pɑlcienn nɑn tin kuɑ buol nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ ni.
58010020	Yiesu e luot mɑnfuol sɔnpɑɑnu jɑɑnti dieok cincenn ni k tul’t, k ŋɑnn e tie u gbɑnɑnt.
58010021	T mɑnntɔjɑɑnn nbɑ yen Yennu ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ.
58010022	L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin cɑt nɑkn Yennu nɑn pɑlɑ nbɑ gbie nɑn bɑlmɔni kuukuɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni yɑdɑ, k dɑɑ mɔk bilsuk, k dɑɑ mɔk siɑl ɑ dudukbiit t pɑl ni, kii mɔk gbɑnɑnt nbɑ k b din wuul nɑn nyun nbɑ kɑɑ jɑknt nɑ.
58010023	Ŋɑɑnt k tii diɑ dindɑnn nbɑ k t fiit wɑnn nɑ fɑnu mɑn, k dɑɑ bils, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ din senn mɔsonn k tul’t nɑ k ŋmɑt puol.
58010024	Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tii guu lieb, kii mɔk lonm nɑn lieb, kii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ,
58010025	k dɑɑ nyikt lɑknɑ nɑn t lieb nɑn nisiɑb nbɑ nyikt lɑknu biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn tii cien t lieb pɑlɑ, k dɑɑ mɑntk yɑɑ tɑɑ ji lɑɑt k Yonmdɑɑnɔ dɑɑl mɑnŋ pel nɑ.
58010026	Tɑɑ bɑnn bɑlmɔni mɑnŋ nbɑ fiit wɑnn’t nɑ, t i biɑ kii luon k tii tuun biit i e, mɑlnsiɑɔk ji kɑɑ k sɑɑ wuul t biit mɑnŋ.
58010027	L i tie nnɑ i e, lin nbɑ ji biɑl tie tii tiin jɑŋmɑɑni e, kii guu lin nbɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl. Ŋɑnn e tie buut nɑn muciɑɔnŋ nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ biil Yennu dɑtɑi nɑ.
58010028	Wun nbɑ din tuu yet Muois senni nɑ weiu, k niib bɑnn k tien siɑlɑɑdɑnm bɑnle ɑmi bɑntɑ, b din tuu kpi’u, k ninbɑtinu kɑɑ.
58010029	L pɑɑk, nilɔ nbɑ fiɑk Yennu Bijɑ mɑnŋ k k bɑɑkt sɔn nbɑ te k Yennu lol nɑ gbie, k biɑ te k u tie Yennu yuɑ nɑ, k suki Foŋɑnm nbɑ tien ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ, biknt l dɑɑnɔ k lɑɑn u tubdɑtbiiuk nbɑ sii tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
58010030	K mɑɑn t mi wun nbɑ din yet ɑ: «Min e sɑɑ pɑ pɑnn k jiin biit.» K u biɑ yet ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ e tɑn sɑɑ bu u niib buut.»
58010031	L tie bonbilɑnkɑnt e, k suɑ n tɑn kuɑ mɑnfodɑɑnɔ Yennu wutuol ni.
58010032	Ii tiɑn mɑn yuo nbɑ gɑl nɑ lɑbɑɑl. Yennu yentu nbɑ din yent i pɑɑk yuo nbɑ, i din di fɑlɑ bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn l fɑlsiɑl din k nyɑnn’i ni.
58010033	Yenn-yuo b din tuu suki’i, k dint’i fɑlɑ biɑk niib ni, k lielyuo mun, i din tien siil nɑn yin sonm bin nbɑ k b dint’b fɑlɑ nɑ.
58010034	I din mɔk ninbɑtinu nɑn bin nbɑ be dɑnsɑli ni, k siɑn-yuo bin din tɑn fɑt i fɑɑl, ŋɑɑn k i din gɑɑl l fɑlɑ nɑn pɑlpienn, k mɑɑn i din mi nɑn i mɔk mɔktuk nbɑ ŋɑn k cie tingbounŋ ni yɑl k biɑ sii be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
58010035	L pɑɑk, i dɑɑ nyikt l dindɑnn, k mɑɑn l bɑɑt nɑn nyɔciɑɔnŋ o.
58010036	L ŋɑn k yii mɔk suklu, k fit tun Yennu nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ, k lɑ wɑɑ din senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul’t lin nbɑ nɑ.
58010037	K mɑɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ ɑ: «L tenn yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ e k wun nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl, k kɑn wei nɑn bɑɑlu.
58010038	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tie niŋɑnɔ n buol ni nɑ sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol u yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn l i tie k u ŋmɑt puol, n tɑn kii mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn’ɔ.»
58010039	Tinm k tie nɑn bin nbɑ ŋmɑt puol k bot nɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn t tie nɑn bin nbɑ tien Klistu yɑdɑ k lɑɑt fielu nɑ e.
58011001	Yɑdɑ tie, tɑɑ k mɔk bilsuk nɑn bont nbɑ k t mɔk dindɑnn l pɑɑk nɑ set be, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ k lɑ’l nɑn t ninbinn nɑ e.
58011002	Yennu din pɑk yɑɑyuo ni niib nɑ b yɑdɑ pɑɑk e.
58011003	T yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k t bɑnn nɑn Yennu din tul mɔb k dulnyɑ tien, k tɑɑ lɑɑt bonɑ nbɑ nɑ u din k jii bonsiɑl nbɑ k t lɑɑt nɑ kɑɑ k nɑn.
58011004	Abel yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k u din mɑnn mɑnnu tul Yennu k l mɑnnu ŋɑn k gɑl Kɑɑen yɑl. U yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k Yennu din yet ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ ŋuɑ Yennu buol ni, k mɑɑn Yennu tiɑɔnŋ din gɑɑl u piini nɑ wɑɑ. Abel din kpo wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k u biɑ lek dɑɑ piɑk.
58011005	Enɔk yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k u din tɑn k kpo, ŋɑɑn k Yennu din jii’u k duo nɑn’ɔ Yendɔunŋ ni, k suɑ ji k lɑ’u, k mɑɑn Yennu e ponŋ din jii’u. K l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni, ɑ yuo nbɑ k Yennu dɑɑ din k jii’u nɑ, u din penn Yennu pɑl ni wɑɑ.
58011006	Nilɔ i kii tien Yennu yɑdɑ, l dɑɑnɔ kɑn fit penn ŋuɑ Yennu pɑl ni, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ kul bɑɑt Yennu buol ni, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k l dɑɑnɔ n tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yennu set be k tien bin nbɑ kpɑɑn’ɔ nɑ nyuɑt.
58011007	Noe yɑdɑ pɑɑk e din te k u gbɑt Yennu kpɑɑni nbɑ piɑk lin nbɑ k Noe dɑɑ din k fit lɑ’l nɑn u ninbinn nɑ po. U din sɑk Yennu mɔb k kpɑɑ ŋɑlngbenŋl, k ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb kuɑ lenŋ k lɑ fielu wɑɑ. Ŋɑnn e din wɑnn nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ niib mɔk biit Yennu buol ni, ŋɑɑn k Noe yɑdɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk k Yennu din yet, ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ u buol ni.
58011008	Yɑdɑ pɑɑk e din te k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm sɑk Yennu yiini, k sɑɑn tinŋ nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn k yɑɑ ɑ u sɑɑ tul’ɔ nɑ ni. U din nyik u mɔnŋ duo e, ŋɑɑn k k mi wɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn.
58011009	U yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k u din dɑɑ tie sɑɑmɔ tinŋ nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn k yɑɑ ɑ u sɑɑ tul’ɔ nɑ ni. U din be bonkobgbɑnt lɑnbont ni e. U wɑɑs Isɑɑk nɑn Sɑɑkɔb nbɑ mun din tɑn gɑɑl Yennu mɔsonn nɑ din be l biɑnŋ e.
58011010	K mɑɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din guu, ɑ wun tɑn kuɑ duo nbɑ k Yennu din buɑn k mɑɑ k l fiɑkl wɑki hei nɑ ni e.
58011011	Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din gɑl nɑn mɑtuk ɑ, k Sɑɑlɑ mun din tie puokɑnmɑtl e, ŋɑɑn k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑdɑ pɑɑk k u din fit lɑ bik, k mɑɑn u din mi nɑn wun nbɑ din senn mɔsonn mɑnŋ nɑ k ŋmɑt puol.
58011012	L pɑɑk, Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nbɑ din tie nilɔ nbɑ ji tɑn k fɔk nɑn kuun nɑ, ŋɑɑn u kuukuɑ yɑɑbuonɑ e tɑn yɑb nɑn ŋmɑɑbilɑ nbɑ yɑb biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k biɑ yɑb nɑn mɔkgbenŋl gbingbɑnn pɑɑk tɑnbiini nbɑ yɑb k kɑɑ kɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
58011013	Niib nbɑ nɑ kul din tuu tɑn kpo nɑn b yɑdɑ ŋɑɑn dɑɑ k gɑɑl lin nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn, ɑ u sɑɑ tul u niib nɑ, ŋɑɑn b yɑdɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk, b din dɔnŋ lɑ’l bɑnfɔkl e wɑɑ k biɑ gɑɑl nɑn l tie bonŋɑnn e. B din bɑnn k sɑk nɑn b tie sɑɑnm e k tie kunsɑnnɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni.
58011014	Niib nbɑ yien lin nbɑ nɑ, fiit k wɑnt nɑn b lek dɑɑ kpɑɑn b tiɑɔnŋ duo siɑl po e.
58011015	Niib mɑnŋ ii dinŋ ii pɑbi bɑɑ ponŋ nyii duo nbɑ nɑ po i e, b din bo sɑɑ fit ŋmɑt ɑ.
58011016	Ŋɑɑn b bɑkɑ din be Yendɔunŋ ni duo nbɑ cie nɑ po e. K l pɑɑk Yennu k tiin fei nɑn bin yiin’ɔ b Yennu, k mɑɑn u ponŋ din ŋɑnm dosɑu e k guun’m.
58011017	Yuo nbɑ k Yennu din bikn’ɔ nɑ, Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑdɑ pɑɑk e biɑk, k u din jii u bijɑ Isɑɑk, ɑ wun mɑnn mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu. Ŋuɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm e k Yennu din senn’ɔ mɔsonɑ, ŋɑɑn k u biɑ wɑnn Yennu nɑn u tien siil k sɑɑ jii u bijɑyenml k tien mɑlunŋ k tul’ɔ.
58011018	Ŋɑɑn Yennu din ponŋ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Isɑɑk ni e k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ yɑɑbuonɑ nbɑ k n din senn mɔsonn, ɑ n sɑɑ tul’ɑ nɑ.»
58011019	Ŋɑɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din dukn nɑn Yennu mɔk yiikuo nbɑ sɑɑ fiin nilɔ kuun ni e. L pɑɑk e k Yennu din jiin u bik k tul’ɔ, k l nɑɑn nɑn u fiil kuun ni nɑ e.
58011020	Isɑɑk yɑdɑ pɑɑk e din te k u yɑt yetŋɑnm Sɑɑkɔb nɑn Esɑɑu pɑɑk k jiin lin nbɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ.
58011021	Yuo nbɑ k Sɑɑkɔb din yɑɑ wun kpo nɑ, u yɑdɑ pɑɑk e din te k u yɑt yetŋɑnm Suosiɑf bonjɑi nɑ pɑɑk, k din tɑn diin u pɑtu k jiɑnt Yennu.
58011022	Suosiɑf mɑnfuol nbɑ din tɑn yɑɑ lin gbenn yuo nbɑ nɑ, u yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k u din pɑk Islɑɑeltieb nyinu po Ejipt tinŋ ni, k biɑ din wɑnn’b bɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ tien u kpɑbɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ.
58011023	B yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k Muois bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ nbɑ din mɑl’ɔ yuo nbɑ nɑ, b din bɔl’ɔ k tɑn jɑnŋ ŋmɑɑli ŋɑntɑ, k mɑɑn b din lɑ k u fɑn, k b k tiin kpɑnbɑl senni nɑ jɑŋmɑɑni.
58011024	Muois nbɑ din tɑn kpɑɑt yuo nbɑ, u yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k u din k sɑk bii yi’u Fɑɑlɑɑɔn nɑ bipuo nɑ bijɑ.
58011025	U din sɑk nɑn wun di fɑlɑ nɑn Yennu niib e, ŋɑɑn k k sɑk biit pɑlpienn nbɑ tuu be yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ nɑ.
58011026	U din dukn ɑ b i suki’ɔ Klistu pɑɑk, l mɔk nyuɑt bonciɑnn k cie Ejipt tinŋ ni mɔktuk kul ɑ, k mɑɑn u ninbinn din kpɑɑ nyuɑt nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ pɑɑk e.
58011027	Ŋuɑ Muois yɑdɑ pɑɑk e din te k u nyii Ejipt, k k jie kpɑnbɑl nɑ wutuol jɑŋmɑɑni, ŋɑɑn lek sɑɑ tuɑnn k mɑɑn l nɑɑn nɑn u lɑɑt Yennu nbɑ k suɑ k lɑɑt’ɔ nɑn ninbinn nɑ.
58011028	U yɑdɑ pɑɑk e din te k u din piin yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm, k din senn senni, ɑ bin mii sɔn b ŋei tɑnmɔi pɑɑk, ɑ k kuun mɑlɑkɑ nɑ tɑn dɑɑ kpi Islɑɑeltieb bijɑkpelɑ.
58011029	Islɑɑeltieb yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k mɔkmunŋ nɑ din bɔkt k tien tinkuonŋ k tul’b k b puot, ŋɑɑn k Ejipt-tieb mun din bikn ɑ bin puot, k mɔkl mɑnŋ nyun nɑ jiin mubn k dii’b.
58011030	Islɑɑeltieb nbɑ din tɑn bɑɑl Seliiko yuo nbɑ, b yɑdɑ pɑɑk e, k b din sonm lint l juonɑ dɑɑ ŋɑnlole, k l bɑɑ.
58011031	Puocunconn nbɑ k b yi’u Lɑɑhɑɑb nɑ yɑdɑ pɑɑk e din te k Islɑɑeltieb din k kpii’u, ŋɑɑn kpii bin nbɑ din k sɑk Yennu mɔb nɑ, k mɑɑn Lɑɑhɑɑb din gɑɑl Islɑɑeltieb niib nbɑ din bɑɑl, ɑ bin diit duo mɑnŋ ni nɑ sɑɑɔnŋ.
58011032	N sɑɑ pɑk bee k pukn i? Yuo sɑɑ pɔt’n nɑn k n wɑnn’i Sedeɔn lɑbɑɑl, nɑn Bɑɑlɑɑk lɑbɑɑl, nɑn Sɑnmsɔn lɑbɑɑl, nɑn Sefte lɑbɑɑl, nɑn Dɑɑfiid lɑbɑɑl, nɑn Sɑɑmuel lɑbɑɑl, nɑn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ lɑbɑɑl.
58011033	B yɑdɑ pɑɑk k b siɑb din kɔn k nyɑnn tini, k siɑb tun lin nbɑ k Yennu luon k lɑ lin nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn nɑn u sɑɑ tul’b nɑ. K siɑb suol yɑnbɔlɑ mɔi,
58011034	k siɑb mun kpien mupieunŋ, k siɑb tin nyii juk-bɑnjɑi kuun ni. K siɑb mun din tie tɑli e ŋɑɑn din tɑn kpɑnt pɑɑlb, k siɑb mun din tuok tɑb nɑn pɑnŋ k kɔn nyɑnn dɑtɑi.
58011035	K puosiɑb din lɑ b nikpiinm nbɑ din kpo nɑ fiil kuun ni. K siɑb din be k niib buo’b k kpii’b, k b k yet Yennu weiu ɑ bin nyi kuun mɑnŋ ni, k mɑɑn b luon bin fiil kuun ni k lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ cie tingbounŋ nɑ yɑl.
58011036	K niib din dɑɑn siɑb nyɑtuk, k biɑ buo’b gbɑnn, k b bɑɑn b siɑb jɑlt, k jii’b sɑɑn kuɑn’m dɑnsɑli ni.
58011037	B din jɑɑt b siɑb tɑnɑ e, k ŋmɑ b siɑb nɑn kɑnpintɑnbɑ juki k poli’b, k b jikt juk-bɑnjɑi k kpi b siɑb, k lieb din liɑ pegbɑnt, k lieb biɑ liɑ bugbɑnt k lin nɑn nɑmu, k niib muks’b k dint’b fɑlɑ biɑk.
58011038	Tingbounŋ nɑ tieb din k jɑnŋ nɑn bii be nɑn’m. K b din lin yiek kunkuot pɑɑk nɑn juɑt ni, k lin duɑ tɑnfiɑt nɑn fɔli ni.
58011039	Bin nbɑ nɑ kul yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k Yennu din yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm, ŋɑɑn k b din k gɑɑl lin nbɑ k u din senn mɔsonn, ɑ u sɑɑ tul u niib nɑ,
58011040	k mɑɑn t pɑɑk e k u din mɑntk duki bonsiɑl nbɑ cie nɑ po, ŋɑnn e tie ɑ u sɑɑ te k tinm nɑn ŋɑnm n tɑn lɑkn kii be binbenŋ nbɑ k b mɔk nɑ ni .
58012001	Nibul nɑ kul tie siɑlɑɑdɑnm e k lint’t. L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt k tin yɑbl k fok lu lin nbɑ kul sɑɑ guɑl’t Klistu sɔnu ni, nɑn biit nbɑ sɑɑ suol’t. Ŋɑɑnt k tin di suklu k gbɑɑ gbɑɑl nbɑ yɑɑ lin bɑɑl’t nɑ.
58012002	Ŋɑɑnt k tin kpɑn kpɑɑ t ninbinɑ Yiesu pɑɑk. Ŋuɑ e k t yɑdɑ gɑɑ u pɑɑk l pinpiik ni wɑɑ nɑn l juontu ni nɑ. U din dii fɑlɑ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk nɑn suklu k k tin fei, k mɑɑn u din mi pɑlpienn nbɑ guu’u nɑ po, k mɔtɑɑnɑ u ji kɑl Yennu nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ niidiitu po. Nɑ din k te k u nyik u yɑblu, k mɑɑn pɑlpienn nbɑ din bɑɑt u pɑɑk nɑ pɑɑk, u din k dukn k l mɔk’ɔ fei nɑn wun kpo l dɑpunpunn pɑɑk, ŋɑnn e te k u ji kɑl Yennu nɑɑngbounŋ pɑɑk u niidiitu po mɔtɑɑnɑ.
58012003	Nn, ii duki mɑn Yiesu po, biitdɑnm din nɑn’ɔ e, ŋɑɑn u din sɑk k gɑɑl l kul nɑn suklu. L pɑɑk, i dɑɑ te k i pɑlɑ wɑt k i bɑɑ.
58012004	L i tie k i kɔn nɑn biit, i dɑɑ k kɔn tieee k l sɑɑ jɑnŋ nɑn kuun.
58012005	I k tiɑn Yennu nbɑ kpɑɑn’i nɑn bɑɑ nbɑ tuu kpɑɑn u wɑɑs biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ɑɑ? L diɑn ɑ: «N bijɑ, Yonmdɑɑnɔ ii ŋmɑnn ɑ tubl, fɑn gɑɑl’l nɑn pɑlpienn. L i tie k u yɑki nɑn’ɑ, ɑ dɑɑ te k ɑ pɑl ni n biil,
58012006	k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ ŋmɑni wun nbɑ k u luon’ɔ nɑ tubl, k buo dɑɑnsuɑ kul nbɑ, k u mi nɑn u tie u bijɑ.»
58012007	Yɑbt i fɑldinu pɑɑk mɑn, nɑn bɑɑ nbɑ tuu dɑt u bijɑ tubl nɑ. Tubdɑtu mɑnŋ e wɑnn nɑn Yennu set gɑɑl’i k tien’i u wɑɑs. Bijɑsuɑ be k u bɑɑ k ŋmɑni u tubl ii?
58012008	L i tie k u k dɑt i tubɑ nɑn wɑɑ tie u wɑɑs kul biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑnn l wɑnt nɑn i tie kpen-k-ŋmiɑ e, i k tie u wɑɑs kɑɑ.
58012009	T bɑɑnbɑ nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, b tuu dɑɑl t tubɑ, k t tien’m nibɑɑkl. L pɑɑk, l ŋɑn k t mɑntk sikn t mɔnŋ k tul Yennu, wun nbɑ tie t Yendɔunŋ ni Bɑɑ nɑ, k fit kii mɔk mɑnfuol.
58012010	T bɑɑnbɑ nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni din jii yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ k dɑɑl t tubɑ bɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ, ŋɑɑn Yennu ŋɑnin dɑɑl t tubɑ t mɔnŋ sonml pɑɑk e, ɑ t binbenŋ n ŋɑnm kii yien nɑn ŋuɑ Yennu binbenŋ nɑ.
58012011	Tubdɑtu yuo ton e, l k mɔk pɑlpienn, ŋɑɑn l puolpo e wɑɑ, k bin nbɑ dii tubdɑtu fɑlɑ nɑ, ji tuu lɑ l nyuɑt nbɑ tie mɑnu nɑn binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm.
58012012	L pɑɑk, i ŋɑnm donn i nii nbɑ bɑk nɑ, k ŋɑnm wɑkl i dunɑ ni,
58012013	kii tuɑk sɔnu nbɑ tuok, ɑ k wun nbɑ k u tɑɑ wɔb n lɑ lɑɑfiɑ ŋɑɑn dɑɑ kpet.
58012014	I yɑbl i mɔnŋ pɑɑk kii mɔk mɑnu yinm nɑn niib kul sinsuuk ni, kii biɑ kii mɔk binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm, k mɑɑn suɑ i kii mɔk ŋɑnn, l dɑɑnɔ tɑn kɑn lɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ.
58012015	Guut i mɔnŋ mɑn k tɑn dɑɑ kɔnŋt Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ. I suɑ dɑɑ tie nɑn penn nbɑ tuu piɑ k u suun tie lɑbt nbɑ sɑɑ fit biil niib bonciɑnn nɑ.
58012016	I suɑ dɑɑ tuun boncuncontuonɑ ɑmi k k bɑɑkt lin nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl nɑn Esɑɑu, wun nbɑ din jii u sɑɑkɑt k dɑɑ jiet k dii tɑɑl yonm nɑ.
58012017	I mi nɑn l puolpo u din tɑn luon wun gɑɑl u bɑɑ yetŋɑnm k mɔ nɑn nyin-nyuut ŋɑɑn k u bɑɑ yet, k mɑɑn Esɑɑu din k lɑ sɔnu nbɑ k u sɑɑ tien k lebt wɑɑ ponŋ din biil lin nbɑ nɑ.
58012018	Tɔn, yinm k bɑɑl juɑl nbɑ k i fit sii’l nɑn Islɑɑeltieb nbɑ din bɑɑl Siinɑi juɑl buol nɑ kɑɑ, siɑn nbɑ k mupieunŋ din di k bunbɔnn bɔnn, k wonpɑɑluk dɑ,
58012019	k kɑtkɑɑk bui, k kunkɔl pɑk lɑbɑɑl, k bɑɑ din gbɑt l kunkɔl mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, b din jɑk bɑlunŋ o, k ji k luon l kunkɔl n pɑk pukn.
58012020	K mɑɑn senni nbɑ k b gbɑt nɑ, pɑɑk b nii wɑɑ. L din yet ɑ; «Nilɔ kuo bonkobsiɑɔk ii lek i sii juɑl mɑnŋ, bin jɑɑt’ɔ tɑnɑ k kpi’u.»
58012021	L buol ni din mɔk jɑŋmɑɑni bonciɑnn, k Muois din yet ɑ: «Jɑŋmɑɑni mɔk’n, k n gbɑnu jekl.»
58012022	Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin bɑɑl juɑl nbɑ yɑɑ sɑnn yi Siiɔn, lin nbɑ tie Yennu nbɑ fo nɑ duo nbɑ tie Yendɔunŋ ni Selusɑɑlenm, siɑn nbɑ k mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ tusɑ tusɑ lɑkn nɑn pɑlpienn.
58012023	I bɑɑl tintɑɑnu buol nbɑ k l mɔtɑɑɔk niib tie Yennu wɑɑkpeli e k b sɑnɑ diɑn Yendɔunŋ ni. I bɑɑl Yennu nbɑ tie nisɑɑlk kul bɑlbuulɔ nɑ buol ni, nɑn bin nbɑ tie niŋɑnm Yennu tuɑnn k u te k b be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot u nunm nɑ sei buol ni e.
58012024	I bɑɑl Yiesu, wun nbɑ tie sindɑntinnɔ k bɑɑl nɑn Yennu lolpɑɑnn nɑ buol e. I bɑɑl Yiesu buol, k u sɔn nbɑ din nyii u ni nɑ wɑnt mɑɑn nbɑ ŋɑn k gɑl Abel sɔn.
58012025	L pɑɑk, ii mi mɑn k i yet wun nbɑ kpɑɑn’i nɑ mɔb, k mɑɑn Islɑɑeltieb nbɑ din yet wun nbɑ din kpɑɑn’m tingbounŋ nɑ ni mɔb nɑ, k u din tɑn k nyik b tubdɑtu, k t i yet wun nbɑ nyii Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ kpɑɑni nɑ, t tɑn sɑɑ tien nlee k nyi tubdɑtu ni?
58012026	L yuo nɑ, u kunkɔl din nik tingbounŋ nɑ e, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ u senn mɔsonn k yet ɑ: «N ji kɑn nik tingbounŋ nɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n ji tɑn sɑɑ nik tingbounŋ nɑ nɑn sɑnpɑɑpo e wɑɑ tɑɑl yonm kuɑ biɑk.»
58012027	Mɔbonɑ nbɑ yet ɑ: «Tɑɑl yonm kuɑ biɑk,» nɑ wɑnt nɑn bonnɑnkɑɑ kul tɑn sɑɑ nik k yɑt bot l binbebuol e, ŋɑɑn k lin nbɑ tɑn kɑn fit nik nɑ ŋɑnin n tɑn biɑl.
58012028	L pɑɑk, tɑɑ gɑɑl jiɑɔnŋ nbɑ kɑn mi k nik nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt k tii tien Yennu niipuouk mɑn, k jiɑnt’ɔ nɑn bɑɑkl nɑn jɑŋmɑɑni wɑɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ,
58012029	k mɑɑn t Yennu mɑnŋ tie nɑn mudikɑu nɑ e.
58013001	Yɑɑ tie Klistu niib nɑ pɑɑk, ii luon i lieb mɑn yuo kul.
58013002	I dɑɑ tɑnmt sɑɑnm gɑɑlu po, k mɑɑn nisiɑb din tɑn gɑɑl mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ sɑɑɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn k mi ɑ b tie mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ e.
58013003	Ii tiɑn bin nbɑ be dɑnsɑli ni nɑ po nɑn yinm nɑn ŋɑnm e lɑkn be l ni, kii tiɑn bin nbɑ lɑɑt muksuk nɑ po nɑn yinm nɑn ŋɑnm e lɑkn lɑɑt muksuk mɑnŋ nɑ.
58013004	Ii bɑɑkt i puokuɑnt nɑn i jɑkunt k dɑɑ conm, k mɑɑn Yennu tɑn sɑɑ dɑt boncunconɑ tubɑ.
58013005	Ii nyinn i niɑɔnŋ nɑn liklonm, ŋɑɑn te k i nunm n gbuo nɑn yɑɑ mɔk lin nbɑ, k mɑɑn Yennu yet ɑ: «N kɑn mi k nyik’ɑ ni; n biɑ kɑn mi k ŋɑɑn’ɑ ni.»
58013006	L pɑɑk, k t mɔk pɑlcienn k yet ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ tie n sonmtuɑ, n kɑn tin jɑŋmɑɑni, nisɑɑlk sɑɑ tien’n bee?»
58013007	Ii tiɑn mɑn i yudɑnm nbɑ din piɑk Yennu mɑɑn k tien’i nɑ po, kii duki b mɑnfuol nbɑ din tɑn juont bɑnnu nbɑ kii toki b yɑdɑ.
58013008	Yiesu Klistu nbɑ won tie biɑnŋ nbɑ wonn nɑ, u biɑ tie nnɑ e dinnɑ nɑ, k u biɑ sii tie nnɑ e nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
58013009	I dɑɑ ŋɑɑnt k wɑnnsɑɑnɑ buolu buolu n te k i bot, k i tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn tut sɔnŋɑnu mɑnŋ. L ŋɑn k Yennu ninbɑtinu n tul nilɔ pɑnŋ u pɑl ni. Jiet senni weiu kɑn tul’ɔ pɑnŋ. Nisiɑb nbɑ diɑ jiet senni nɑ k lɑɑt somsiɑl l ni.
58013010	Tɔn, bin nbɑ mɑnn mɑnnu Suifnbɑ Yenjiɑntu buol ni nɑ k mɔk yiikuo ɑ bii di lin nbɑ be t mɑnnu binbintl nɑ pɑɑk.
58013011	Suifnbɑ mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ tuu kuɑ nɑn bonkobt sɔn Yennu dieok ni, buol nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ ni, k mɑnn mɑlunŋ biit pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn juo bonkobt mɑnŋ nɑnt muu b duo nɑ kpinŋ po.
58013012	L pɑɑk, k Yiesu mun din kpo duo nɑ kpinŋ po, ɑ wun nyinn niib biit ni, u mɔnŋ sɔn pɑɑk.
58013013	L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt k tin nyi k sɑɑn u buol ni mɑn, k sɑk fedinu nɑn wɑɑ din dii fei biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
58013014	K mɑɑn duo nbɑ sɑɑ biɑl kɑɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, dosɑu nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ e k t guu’l.
58013015	Ŋɑɑnt k tii dontl Yennu sɑnn yuo kul Yiesu sɑnn ni, k lii nɑɑn nɑn mɑlunŋ nɑ k tul’ɔ, k pɑku nbɑ nyi t mɔi ni nɑ dɑɑ mɔk gbennu.
58013016	I dɑɑ nyikt tuonŋɑnɑ tumu, kii centl yɑɑ mɔk lin nbɑ nɑn i lieb, k mɑɑn l mɑnbuolu e pent Yennu pɑl ni.
58013017	Ii sɑɑk i yudɑnm mɔi k sikn i mɔnŋ k tul’b. B bɑkɑ be i benu ni, k mɑɑn b tɑn sɑɑ wɑnn Yennu b tuonɑ nbɑ k b din tuun nɑ. Ii sɑɑk b mɔi k bii fit kii tuun b tuonn nɑn pɑlpienn k pɑlbiil dɑɑ be lenŋ k mɑɑn nnɑ k mɔk nyuɑt k tul’i ni.
58013018	Ii mei Yennu mɑn t pɑɑk. T k mɔk dudukbisiɑt t tuonɑ ni, k mɑɑn t luon k tii tuun lin nbɑ tuok e yuo kul.
58013019	Ŋɑɑn n mɑntk bɑln’mi e bonciɑnn, ii mei Yennu mɑn k tul’n k wun te k n jen i buol ni mɔtɑɑnɑ.
58013020	Yennu nbɑ tien mɑnu nɑ din fiin t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu kuun ni. Ŋuɑ Yiesu e tie Pekpɑɑjɑɑnn nbɑ kpɑɑl pei k mɑɑn u din kpo, k u sɔn ŋɑnm Yennu lol nbɑ sii sie yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ.
58013021	Yennu nbɑ tien’t mɑnu nɑ n te k i fit kii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ kul, k fit tun lin nbɑ k u luon. K Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk, wun tun t ni lin nbɑ pent u pɑl. Ŋuɑ Yiesu e mɔk yudɑnt nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Amenn.
58013022	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n bɑln’mi e, i di suklu k gbiint kpɑɑni nɑ, k mɑɑn mɑɑ diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ tul’i nɑ k fɔk.
58013023	N luon k i bɑnn nɑn b nyinn t nɑɑ bik Tiimuote dɑnsɑlk ni wɑɑ. L i tie k u sɑɑ bɑɑl n buol ni mɔtɑɑnɑ, min nɑn ŋuɑ sɑɑ tɔk bɑɑl i buol ni.
58013024	I fuont i yudɑnm kul ɑ nɑn Yennu niib nɑ kul ɑ k tul’t. T nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ nyii Itɑɑli tinŋ ni nɑ fuont’i.
58013025	Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ ii be nɑn i kul.
59001001	Min Sɑɑk, wun nbɑ tie Yennu tuontunnɔ k biɑ tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu tuontunnɔ, n fuont Islɑɑel nibuolu piik nɑn bɑnle nbɑ yɑt k be tingbounŋ nɑ kul ni.
59001002	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, ii mɔk mɑn pɑlpienn yuo nbɑ k i di fɑlɑ buolu buolu nɑ,
59001003	k mɑɑn i mi nɑn l i tie k biknu bɑɑl ŋɑɑn k i lek be i yɑdɑ ni, l bɑɑt nɑn suklu e.
59001004	Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k i suklu i be fɑnu k yin fit kii tie niŋɑnm k siɑl dɑɑ puɑl’i.
59001005	L i tie k i suɑ pɔt yɑn, wun miɑl Yennu, wun nbɑ pi suɑ kul piini nɑn bulcint, k k dint suɑ fei nɑ, k u sɑɑ tul’ɔ wɑɑ.
59001006	Fii mei Yennu, fɑn tien yɑdɑ k dɑɑ mɔk bilsuk, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ mei’ɔ nɑn bilsuk nɑ, tie nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nyunpɑnɑ nbɑ k wounŋ dɑ k l fi k bɑɑ nɑ e.
59001007	L nibuolu dɑɑ duki nɑn u sɑɑ lɑ siɑl Yennu buol,
59001008	k mɑɑn u k mɔk dudukcincibl, lin nbɑ kul k u tuun nɑ ni.
59001009	L ŋɑn k t nɑɑ bik nbɑ tie tɑlk ii mɔk yugontl Yennu nbɑ donn’ɔ nɑ pɑɑk,
59001010	k t nɑɑ bik nbɑ mun tie mɔktɔ ii mun ii mɔk yugontl Yennu nbɑ sikn’ɔ nɑ pɑɑk, k mɑɑn l kɑn wei k u sɑɑ gɑl nɑn tipuuk nbɑ tuu kuol k bɑɑ nɑ.
59001011	Yennu i nyii k yekt tipuuk pɑɑk, puuk nɑ tuu kuol e k bɑɑ, k l ŋɑnt n ji biil. L mun biɑ tie nnɑ e k tul mɔktɔ. Yuo nbɑ k u duki u tuonɑ nbɑ sɑɑ sɑɑn tuɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l yuo e wun kpo.
59001012	Bin nbɑ nyɑnn jɑnmi nɑ, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e, k mɑɑn wuu nyɑnn jɑnmi gbenn yuo nbɑ, u sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn, mɑnfuol nbɑ k u din senn mɔsonn, ɑ u sɑɑ tul bin nbɑ luon’ɔ nɑ.
59001013	Suɑ i lɑ jɑnmi, u dɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ Yennu e jɑnm’ɔ. Siɑl kɑɑ k sɑɑ fit jɑnm Yennu wun tun bonbiil, k Yennu mun k jɑnmt suɑ.
59001014	Ŋɑɑn nilɔ lɑɑt jɑnmi yuo nbɑ k u mɔnŋ niɑnbiiuk dɑɑl’ɔ k so’u e.
59001015	Niɑnbiiuk i suol nilɔ, l tuu tie puol k tɑn mɑl biit, k biit mun n suol puol k mɑl kuun.
59001016	N nɑɑ wɑlonkɑi, i dɑɑ te k siɑl kpɑnn’i ni.
59001017	Bonŋɑnn kul nyii sɑnpɑɑpo e Bɑɑ buol, wun nbɑ din nɑn sɑnpɑɑpo yentu kul ɑ. Ŋuɑ ŋɑnin k lebtl nɑn sɑnpɑɑpo yentu nbɑ tuu lebtl biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. U biɑ dɑɑ tie ŋuɑ Yennu e.
59001018	U mɔnŋ lonm ni e k u tul’t mɑnfuol, u mɑɑn nbɑ tie bɑlmɔni nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ tii cie u bonninnɑnt kul ɑ.
59001019	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n luon yin bɑnn nɑ e. Ii gbiintl yiɑn, ŋɑɑn kii mi biɑnŋ nbɑ k i piɑk, k biɑ dɑɑ dont wutuol yiɑn yiɑn,
59001020	k mɑɑn nifosɑɑlk wutuol k bɑɑt nɑn binbenŋɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu luon.
59001021	L pɑɑk, ii nyik i yɑnbɔnm nɑn biit kul nbɑ be i pɑlɑ ni nɑ, ŋɑɑn sikn i mɔnŋ Yennu tuɑnn, k gɑɑl u mɑɑn nbɑ k u bul i pɑlɑ ni nɑ, k mɑɑn mɑɑn mɑnŋ e sɑɑ fit fiel’i.
59001022	I dɑɑ gbiintl mɑɑn mɑnŋ kuukuɑ k kpɑnn i mɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn kii tuun mɑɑn nbɑ wɑnn’i biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
59001023	Wun nbɑ kul gbɑt mɑɑn mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn k k tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ k l wɑnn, u tie nɑn nilɔ nbɑ tuu got k lɑ u mɔnŋ miɑnu ni nɑ e,
59001024	k mɑɑn u got k lɑ u mɔnŋ miɑnu nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn siet, k ji tuu tɑnm wɑɑ bo got k lɑ u mɔnŋ k u tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e.
59001025	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ goli sennŋɑnn nbɑ sɑɑ fit nyinn niib biit dɑɑbs ni, k k tɑnm’l, ŋɑɑn mɔk gbɑnkul k tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ k l wɑnn nɑ, pɑlpienn sii tie l dɑɑnɔ yɑl e, u tuonɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
59001026	Wun nbɑ mi nɑn u tie Yenweilɔ ŋɑɑn k k so u jeln, l dɑɑnɔ kpɑnn u mɔnŋ e, k u wɑɑnu nɑ tie yɑnn e.
59001027	Gotl lin nbɑ k Bɑɑ Yennu yet ɑ l tie Yenweiu nɑn bɑlmɔni k jɑknt kɑɑ lenŋ, wun nbɑ sonmt kpiebi nɑn pɑkɔi b fɑlɑ ni, k so u mɔnŋ, ɑ tingbounŋ nɑ bonbiil dɑɑ fit kuɑnt’ɔ biit ni.
59002001	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, yɑɑ tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu, wun nbɑ yen yudɑnt nɑ, yɑdɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ, i dɑɑ mɔk luktn.
59002002	L i tie k mɔktɔ wun nbɑ liɑ tɑŋɑnt k pil sɑlnbɑnn kuɑ i tintɑɑnu ni, k nɑndɑɑnɔ nbɑ liɑ tɑciɑt mun kuɑ,
59002003	k i tul mɔktɔ nɑ nibɑɑkl, k yet’ɔ ɑ wun kɑl tuɑnn po, ŋɑɑn yet nɑndɑɑnɔ nɑ, ɑ u sie ɑmi wun kɑl tinŋ ni,
59002004	n nɑɑ wɑɑs, l i tie k i tuun nnɑ, i tie niib nbɑ mɔk luktn nɑn i lieb, k biɑ tie nɑn bubuulɑ nbɑ mɔk dudukbiit nɑ e.
59002005	N nɑɑ wɑlonkɑi, gbiintl mɑn, Yennu e lukt bin nbɑ tie nɑndɑnm tingbounŋ nɑ niib buol, ɑ bin tien mɔktɑ b yɑdɑ ni, k tien u wɑɑs nbɑ sɑɑ di nɑɑn nbɑ k u din senn mɔsonn, ɑ u sɑɑ tul bin nbɑ luon’ɔ nɑ.
59002006	Ŋɑɑn yinm e sɑlkt nɑndɑnm. Bin nbɑ ŋmɑb’i k so’i, k sɑɑ nɑn’i buut buol nɑ, b k tie mɔktɑ kɑɑ ɑɑ?
59002007	Ŋɑnm e biɑ piɑk biil sɑnŋɑnn nbɑ k Yennu tul’i nɑ.
59002008	L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Ii luon ɑ luɑ nɑn fɑɑ luon ɑ mɔnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.» L i tie k i wɑɑ Yennu nɑɑn sennu mɑnŋ, l ŋɑn,
59002009	ŋɑɑn l i tie k i mɔk ningɑnni nɑn lieb, l tie biit e, k sennu mɑnŋ fiitl wɑnt nɑn i set tie sennu biiltieb e.
59002010	Wun nbɑ sɑk k wei senni nɑ kul, ŋɑɑn tɑn biil senni mɑnŋ yenn, l wɑnt nɑn u biil senni nɑ kul e.
59002011	Wun nbɑ yet ɑ: «Dɑɑ conm nɑ,» ŋuɑ e biɑ yet ɑ: «Dɑɑ kpi nilɔ.» L pɑɑk, l i tie k ɑ k conm, ŋɑɑn kpi, ɑ tie senni biiltuɑ e.
