59002012	Ii piɑk ŋɑɑn kii tuun nɑn niib nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ jii senni nbɑ nyint niib biit dɑɑbs ni nɑ e, k bu b buut,
59002013	k mɑɑn bin nbɑ k tin b lieb ninbɑɑɔk, Yennu sɑɑ bu b buut k kɑn tin’m ninbɑɑɔk u, ŋɑɑn k ninbɑɑɔk e nyɑni tubdɑtu.
59002014	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ yɑɑ, ɑ u mɔk yɑdɑ, ŋɑɑn ji k tuun tuonŋɑnɑ, l mɔk nyuɑt ii? U yɑdɑ mɑnŋ buolu sɑɑ fit fiel’ɔ wɑɑ ɑɑ?
59002015	L i tie k ɑ nɑɑ bik be k k lɑɑt gbɑb, k biɑ k lɑɑt di,
59002016	k ɑ ji yien’ɔ ɑ: «N nɑɑ bik, ɑ kun mɑnu wɑɑ, kii gbɑb, kii biɑ kii di,» ŋɑɑn kɑn sonm’ɔ nɑn siɑl, l mɔk nyuɑt ii?
59002017	Yɑdɑ kuukuɑ i be, ŋɑɑn tuonŋɑnɑ kɑɑ, yɑdɑ mɑnŋ tie yɑdɑkpieonŋ o.
59002018	Ŋɑɑn suɑ sɑɑ yet ɑ: «A mɔk yɑdɑ, k n tuun tuonŋɑnɑ.» N mun sɑɑ jiin ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ k tuun tuonŋɑnɑ, lɑnn po e wɑnt nɑn ɑ set mɔk yɑdɑ? Ŋɑɑn n tuonŋɑnɑ nɑ e wɑnt’ɑ nɑn min set mɔk yɑdɑ.»
59002019	A tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yen-yenɔ kuɑ e be ee? L ŋɑn. Nɑlnbiit mun tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yen-yenɔ kuɑ e be, k biɑ jekl nɑn jɑŋmɑɑni.
59002020	Fin jɑtuk nɑ. A luon k n wɑnn’ɑ bɑnnu nbɑ k ɑ sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn yɑdɑ nbɑ k mɔk tuonɑ nɑ tie yɑnn ee?
59002021	T yejɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nbɑ din jii u bik Isɑɑk k pɑɑn’ɔ binbintl pɑɑk ɑ wun kpi’u k mɑnn mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu nɑ, tuonn mɑnŋ pɑɑk, kɑɑ te k Yennu din yet ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ u buol ii?
59002022	A lɑ nɑn u yɑdɑ nɑn u tuonɑ din tɑɑn k tuun k u tuonɑ ni, yɑdɑ mɑnŋ din wɑnn l mɔnŋ ɑ l tie bɑlmɔni yɑdɑ e.
59002023	Nnɑ e k lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni din tɑn tien mɔni ɑ: «Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din tien Yennu yɑdɑ, k l pɑɑk, k Yennu yɑɑ ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ u buol,» k b din yi’u Yennu yuɑk.
59002024	I ji lɑ nɑn nilɔ tuonŋɑnɑ pɑɑk e k Yennu sɑɑ yet ɑ l dɑɑnɔ tie niŋɑnɔ u buol, k l k tie u yɑdɑ kuukuɑ pɑɑk.
59002025	L din tie nnɑ e mun k tul puocunconn nbɑ sɑnn din yi Lɑɑhɑɑb nɑ. Wɑɑ din gɑɑl tuomiinbɑ nbɑ k Islɑɑeltieb din tun’m, k biɑ wɑnn’b sɔngɑnu nbɑ k b tɔkn ŋmɑt kun nɑ, u tuonn mɑnŋ pɑɑk e k Yennu din yet, ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ u buol.
59002026	L pɑɑk, gbɑnɑnt nbɑ kɑɑ siek nɑ, tie gbɑnɑnkpieonŋ o, k yɑdɑ i mun i be k tuonŋɑnɑ kɑɑ, l mun tie yɑdɑkpieonŋ o.
59003001	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, i nisiɑb bonciɑnn dɑɑ luon bin tien wɑntieb, k mɑɑn i ponŋ mi nɑn bin nbɑ tie wɑntieb nɑ, b buut tɑn sii pɑɑl k gɑl bin nbɑ k tie wɑntieb.
59003002	T kul tuun lin nbɑ k tuok bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ k piɑk mɑbiit, l dɑɑnɔ set tie niŋɑnɔ e k sɑɑ fit suol u gbɑnɑnt kul ɑ.
59003003	T i jii gɑlkɑ k wukn tɑɑni, ɑ bii tuun tɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ, b gbɑnɑnt pɑnŋ kul be t nuu ni e.
59003004	Biɑ duknt ŋɑlint lɑbɑɑl po. B gbenŋ bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn wonpɑɑluk u dɑ, b sɑɑ e, ŋɑɑn dɑbik nnɑ e k kɑntuɑ nɑ diɑ k kɑn k b sɑɑ wɑɑ luon siɑn nbɑ.
59003005	Jeln mun tie bonbik nnɑ e, ŋɑɑn l mɔk yiikuo bonciɑnn. Gotl, musɑnpuɑlk nnɑ e tuu di fɔgbenŋl.
59003006	Jeln tie nɑn muu nɑ e. L be t gbɑnɑnt ni k mɔk biit buolu buolu kul ɑ, k sɑɑ fit biil nilɔ munn. L biɑ di nifosɑɑlk binbenŋ nɑn muu nɑ, k l muu nyii Sɑɑtɑn buol e.
59003007	Nisɑɑlk e mɔk bonkobt nɑn nuɑni nɑn wɑi nɑn nyun ni bonɑ kul yiikuo,
59003008	ŋɑɑn nisɑɑlk kɑn fit suol jeln. L tie bonbiil, k lintl yuo kul k k foi, k gbie nɑn lɔbi nbɑ bɑɑt nɑn kuun e.
59003009	Jeln nbɑ k t diɑ k piɑk dont t Bɑɑ Yennu nbɑ tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ, l jeln e k t biɑ diɑ k puol nifosɑɑli mɔi, bin nbɑ k Yennu din nɑn’m u nɑɑɔnŋ ni.
59003010	Mɔb nbɑ k pɑku nyi l ni, mɔb mɑnŋ ni e k mɔpol mun nyi. N nɑɑ wɑɑs, l i tie nnɑ i e, l k ŋɑn.
59003011	Bunbunyenn kuɑ sɑɑ fit buni nyunmɑnm nɑn nyuntonm ii?
59003012	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, tiik nbɑ k b yi fiigie nɑ sɑɑ fit lon luɑnɑ nbɑ k b yi oliifnbɑ nɑ wɑɑ? Ami fiinyɑ sɑɑ fit lon fiignbɑ wɑɑ? Nnɑ e mun, bunbunn nbɑ k nyuntonm nyi lenŋ nɑ, kɑn fit tul nyunmɑnm. Yendɔunŋ ni lɑbɑɑl
59003013	Ŋmee mɔk yɑn nɑn bɑnnu i sinsuuk ni? Ŋɑɑnt wun wɑnn nɑn u mɔk yɑn nɑn bɑnnu, u binbenŋɑnŋ ni nɑn tuonɑ nbɑ k u tuun, nɑn sikn-n-mɔnŋ nɑn yɑn ni.
59003014	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k i mɔk funfunbiiuk nɑn dont-n-mɔnŋ i pɑlɑ ni, i dɑɑ fuɑ bɑlɑ, k dɑɑ fɑ fɑɑk, k dɑɑ noi bɑlmɔni.
59003015	L yɑn k nyi Yennu buol ni kɑɑ. L tie tingbounŋ nɑ nɑn gbɑnɑnt lonm nɑn Sɑɑtɑn yɑl e,
59003016	k mɑɑn funfunn nɑn dont-n-mɔnŋ nbɑ be siɑn, dɑɑmuk nɑn biit buolu buolu kul be lenŋ e.
59003017	Ŋɑɑn yɑn nbɑ nyi sɑnpɑɑpo, l k mɔk biit. Wun nbɑ mɔk yɑn mɑnŋ, u mɔk pɑlmɑɑsl k be suon nnɑ, k gbiɑ u lieb mɑɑn pɑɑk. U mɔk ninbɑtinu bonciɑnn, k biɑ tuun tuonŋɑnɑ bonciɑnn. U k mɔk luktn, k biɑ k mɔk niilɑbndinu.
59003018	Bin nbɑ tie mɑnu dɑnm nɑ tuu bul mɑnu e niib sinsuuk ni, k tɑn jɑɑn binbenŋɑnŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm.
59004001	Bee te k i kɔn k noi nɑn lieb i? L tie i niɑnbiiuk nbɑ be i pɑlɑ ni k kɔn nɑ e.
59004002	I luon bonsiɑ, ŋɑɑn kɑn lɑ, k ji tie siil nɑn nikpinu. I mɔk funfunn i lieb bonɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn kɑn lɑ’l. L pɑɑk, k kunkɔnɑ nɑn mɔniɑt be i sinsuuk ni. I k mɔk yɑɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn i k mei Yennu l po.
59004003	I mei Yennu k k lɑɑt k mɑɑn i mei’ɔ nɑn dudukbiit k luon i mɔnŋ niɑnbiiuk yɑl.
59004004	I nyik Yennu wɑɑ, k wɑɑ bonliɑ. I k mi nɑn l i tie k i suol tingbounŋ yuɑs i e, i tie Yennu dɑtɑi ee? Wun nbɑ luon wuu tie tingbounŋ nɑ yuɑk, l dɑɑnɔ tien u mɔnŋ Yennu dɑtɑɑk e.
59004005	L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «U luon Siek nbɑ k u tien t ni nɑ bonciɑnn.»
59004006	Ŋɑɑn u biɑ mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ bonciɑnn. L pɑɑk, l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Yennu kɔn nɑn kɑlnbɑɑni dɑnm e, ŋɑɑn tiin sikn-n-mɔnŋ dɑnm nɑ ninbɑɑɔk.»
59004007	L pɑɑk, ii sɑɑk Yennu mɔmɑɑn, ŋɑɑn yet Sɑɑtɑn, k u sɑɑ ciɑl ŋɑɑn nyik’i.
59004008	Cɑtl nɑkn Yennu buol mɑn, k u mun sɑɑ nɑkn’i. Yinm biitdɑnm, wuut i nii mɑn, k yinm dudukt ŋɑnlele dɑnm, ŋɑnmt i pɑlɑ mɑn.
59004009	Ii mɔk pɑlbiil k bui nɑn nyin-nyuut i biit pɑɑk. I dɑɑ ji lɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ii mɔ mɑn, k ŋɑɑn k i pɑlpienn n kpint k tien pɑlbiil.
59004010	Siknt i mɔnŋ Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuɑnn, k u sɑɑ donn’i.
59004011	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, i dɑɑ piɑk mɑbiit lieb pɑɑk. Wun nbɑ piɑk mɑbiit u nɑɑ bik pɑɑk ɑmi bu u buut nɑ, l tie senni e k u piɑk mɑbiit l pɑɑk k bu l buut. K mɑɑn l i tie k ɑ bu senni nɑ buut i e, ɑ k tie wun nbɑ sɑɑk’l kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ tie l bɑlbuulɔ e.
59004012	Yennu kuukuɑ e mɔk yiikuo k sɑɑ fit senn senni, k biɑ sɑɑ fit bu nifosɑɑli buut. Ŋuɑ kuukuɑ e sɑɑ fit fiel nifosɑɑli ɑmi k biil’b. A mun tie ŋmee k bu ɑ luɑ buut i?
59004013	Gbiintl mɑn, yinm nbɑ tuu yien ɑ: «Dinnɑ ɑmi wonn, t sɑɑ sɑɑn digbɑnn nɑ wɑɑ, k sɑɑ di binn kii kpentl kpinkpounŋ k lɑ nyuɑt bonciɑnn.»
59004014	I k mi lin nbɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl wonn. I mɑnfuol tie bee? L tie nɑn wunn nbɑ tuu bɑɑ sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni, ŋɑɑn l i yɑnn lin yɑnt nɑ e.
59004015	L pɑɑk, l ŋɑn yin tuu yet ɑ: «L i tie k Yennu luon, t sii mɔk mɑnfuol, k tun nnɑ nɑn nnɑ.»
59004016	Ŋɑɑn i mɔk kɑlnbɑɑni k fuɑ bɑlɑ. Yɑɑ fuɑ bɑlɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l tie bonbiil e.
59004017	L pɑɑk, wun nbɑ mi tuonŋɑnɑ nbɑ k l ŋɑn nɑn wun tun, ŋɑɑn k tuun, l dɑɑnɔ mɔk biit.
59005001	Yinm goldɑnm, gbiintl mɑn. Ii mɔ mɑn kii fɑbn fɑlɑ nbɑ bɑɑt i pɑɑk nɑ pɑɑk.
59005002	I mɔktuk nɑ kul bɑt, k wobi muɑ i tiɑt ɑ.
59005003	I sɑlmɑ nɑn i likli nɑ kuɑ tintɑni wɑɑ, k tintɑni mɑnŋ wɑnt nɑn i tie biitdɑnm k l sɑɑ di i gbɑnɑnt nɑn muu nbɑ di biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. I tikl i mɔktuk mɔtɑɑnɑ, ŋɑɑn k tingbounŋ nɑ gbennu ji k fɔk.
59005004	I k pɑ bin nbɑ jɑɑn i dii i kpɑɑnt ni nɑ. Gbiintl mɑn b fɑbni. B mɔni mɑnŋ kuɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ yen bonsiɑl kul nɑ tubɑ ni wɑɑ.
59005005	Yɑɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ii be i yɑmɑ ni, k wɑɑ i gbɑnɑnt niɑɔnŋ. I dint i mɔnŋ e, ŋɑɑn i lek be nɑn nɑɑjɑkpɑnmɑ nbɑ k b sɑɑ kpi’b nɑ.
59005006	I din biil bin nbɑ k mɔk biit k kpi’b, ŋɑɑn b k kɔn nɑn’i.
59005007	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, ii di suklu mɑn kii guu Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑlu dɑɑl mɑnŋ. Gotl mɑn kpɑɑlɔ nbɑ tuu di suklu k guu kpɑfusɑɑk mɔkmɔk nɑn sɑjuontk k u jiet n ji tɑn nɑn bonŋɑnn.
59005008	L pɑɑk, ii mun ii di suklu, k cie i pɑlɑ k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑlu dɑɑl pel nɑ.
59005009	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, i dɑɑ mɔk bunbulmi i lieb pɑɑk, ɑ k Yennu dɑɑ bu i buut. Gotl mɑn, bɑlbuulɔ nɑ nɑkn k sie i tɑnmɔi ni.
59005010	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nbɑ din pɑk u sɑnn ni nɑ, gotl mɑn bɑɑ din lɑɑt fɑlɑ k mɔk suklu biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k lii tie wɑnnu k tul’i.
59005011	L nibuolu nbɑ mɔk gbɑnkul nɑ, t yi’b pɑlpienn dɑnm e. I ponŋ gbɑt Job nbɑ din tɑn mɔk gbɑnkul biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k i mi lin nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ din tun k tul’ɔ l puolpo, k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ gbie nɑn ninbɑtinu k biɑ goli nisɑɑli fɑnu.
59005012	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, lin nbɑ kpɑɑ tɑlɑs tie nɑ e: i dɑɑ puol mɔpolɑ. I dɑɑ yi sɑnpɑɑpo ɑmi tingbounŋ ɑmi bonsiɑl kul sɑnn k puol mɔpolɑ. Ŋɑɑnt k i nnn i tie i nnn, k i ɑɑi i tie ɑɑi, k Yennu tɑn dɑɑ dɑɑl i tubɑ.
59005013	Suɑ i be i ni k lɑɑt fɑlɑ, wun miɑl Yennu. Wun nbɑ mun mɔk pɑlpienn, wun yin yɑni kii piɑk Yennu.
59005014	Suɑ i be i buol k yiɑl, wun yiin Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib sɑɑkɑb k bin tɑn miɑl Yennu k suɑl’ɔ kpɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Klistu sɑnn ni k tul’ɔ.
59005015	B i mei Yennu nɑn yɑdɑ i e, k l dɑɑnɔ sɑɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑɑ te k wun pɑɑk. L i tie k u tun biit i e, Yennu sɑɑ nyik u biit mɑnŋ k cɑb’ɔ.
59005016	L pɑɑk, fiitl i biit k wɑnn lieb, k miɑl Yennu k tul lieb, ɑ yin lɑ lɑɑfiɑ. Wun nbɑ tie niŋɑnɔ Yennu tuɑnn nɑ miɑlu sii mɔk nyuɑt bonciɑnn.
59005017	Elii din tie nifosɑɑlk e nɑn tinm nɑ. U din miɑl Yennu nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ sɑɑk dɑɑ bɑɑ, k sɑɑk set din k bɑɑ tinŋ mɑnŋ ni k sɑɑ jɑnŋ binɑ ŋɑntɑ nɑn ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnluob.
59005018	L puolpo k u biɑ miɑl Yennu, k sɑɑk nyi sɑnpɑɑpo k ji bɑɑ, k tinŋ nɑn jiet fɑnu.
59005019	N nɑɑ wɑɑs, i yenɔ i kpet k nyii mɔmɔnm wɑnnu sɔnu ni, k suɑ jenn’ɔ sɔnu mɑnŋ ni,
59005020	ii tiɑn mɑn nɑn dɑɑnɔ nbɑ nyinn biitdɑɑnɔ u sɔnbiiuk nɑ ni, u fɑt’ɔ kuun ni e k te k u lɑ nyikcɑbu biit buolu buolu pɑɑk.
60001001	Min Piɑl nbɑ tie Yiesu Klistu tuomi nɑ e dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien bin nbɑ k Yennu lukt’b k b yɑt k be Pɔn nɑn Gɑɑlɑɑti nɑn Kɑpɑdos nɑn Asii nɑn Biitiini tini ni k tie sɑɑnm nɑ.
60001002	Yennu, Bɑɑ nɑ, din dɔnŋ lol k lukt’i, ɑ yii tie u yɑb Foŋɑnm yiikuo pɑɑk kii sɑɑk Yiesu Klistu mɔb k u sɔn n wuul i pɑl ni. Yennu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’i k biɑ tul’i mɑnu nbɑ kɑɑ pɑɑk.
60001003	Pɑkn mɑn Yennu nbɑ tie t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu Bɑɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn u tin’t ninbɑɑɔk bonciɑnn k tul’t mɑnfopɑɑnn Yiesu Klistu kuun fiilu pɑɑk. Lin nbɑ nɑ e te k t mɔk dindɑnn nɑn t tɑn sii mɔk mɑnfuol,
60001004	k lɑ lin nbɑ tie Yennu wɑɑs yɑl, k l sii be yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k kɑn biil, k l fɑnt biɑ kɑn siil, k l be Yendɔunŋ ni
60001005	k guu yinm nbɑ k Yennu yiikuo diɑ’i i yɑdɑ pɑɑk, ɑ yin lɑ i fielu nbɑ tien siil k sɑɑ nyi pɑɑnu dɑɑjuonti nɑ.
60001006	L pɑɑk, i ji mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn. L i lek i tie ɑ i mɔk pɑlbiil yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ k mɑɑn yɑɑ lɑ fɑlbuolu buolu nɑ pɑɑk, i mɔk pɑlpienn e.
60001007	Fɑlɑ mɑnŋ biki’i, ɑ lin lɑɑn i tien Klistu yɑdɑ fɑnu ɑmi ii? Sɑlmɑ sɑɑ fit k biil, ŋɑɑn b tuu jii’l k tien muu ni e, ɑ bin lɑɑn l ŋɑn ɑmi l k ŋɑn. L mun biɑ tie nnɑ e nɑn i yɑdɑ. I yɑdɑ ŋɑn k cie sɑlmɑ, ŋɑɑn k Yennu biki i yɑdɑ mɑnŋ. L pɑɑk, Yiesu Klistu nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɔkt, i sɑɑ lɑ sɑnn nɑn dontl nɑn yudɑnt, i yɑdɑ ŋɑnt pɑɑk.
60001008	I k mi lɑ Yiesu ŋɑɑn luon’ɔ, i biɑ k lɑɑt’ɔ mɔtɑɑnɑ, ŋɑɑn k biɑ lek tien’ɔ yɑdɑ. L pɑɑk e k i gbie nɑn pɑlpienn nbɑ yɑb k kɑɑ pɑɑk k nilɔ kɑn fit k bign.
60001009	K mɑɑn i lɑɑt lin nbɑ k i yɑdɑ tien’i k ŋɑnn e tie i sei fielu.
60001010	Fielu nɑ e k sɔkniinbɑ din luon bin bɑnn l pɑɑk nɑn ninmɔnn, k din sɔknt ɑ l tɑn sii tie yinm e k Yennu sii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’i.
60001011	Klistu Siek nbɑ din be b ni din wɑnn’b ɑ u tɑn sɑɑ lɑ fɑlɑ, k l puolpo k u biɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ dontl bonciɑnn, k b kol k luon bin bɑnn yuo nbɑ k l tɑn sɑɑ tun, k biɑ luon bin bɑnn lɑ tɑn sɑɑ tun biɑnŋ nbɑ.
60001012	K Yennu fiit wɑnn’b, ɑ b k sɔknt b mɔnŋ po kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn yinm po e k b sɔknt. Foŋɑnm nbɑ k u din tun’ɔ ɑ wun nyi Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ e mun te k bin nbɑ muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ yien’i mɑɑn mɑnŋ. Lin nbɑ nɑ e k mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ mun luon bin bɑnn l pɑɑk.
60001013	L pɑɑk, i tien i dudukt siil, k suol i mɔnŋ, kii mɔk dindɑnn nɑn bɑlmɔni, ɑ i tɑn sɑɑ lɑ ninbɑtinu nɑ yuo nbɑ k Yiesu Klistu tɑn sɑɑ nyi pɑɑnu nɑ.
60001014	Ii tie mɑn nɑn wɑɑs nbɑ sɑɑk b bɑɑ mɔb nɑ, k dɑɑ wɑɑ lonbiit nbɑ k i din wɑɑ yuo nbɑ k i din k mi Yiesu Klistu nɑ.
60001015	Yennu nbɑ yiin’i nɑ tie Ŋɑnɔ e, l pɑɑk, ii mun i tie niŋɑnm mɑn,
60001016	k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Ii tie niŋɑnm mɑn, k mɑɑn n tie Ŋɑnɔ e.»
60001017	L i tie k i mei Yennu, i yi’u Bɑɑ e, k ŋuɑ e bu niib kul buut nɑn bɑɑ tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k ningɑnni kɑɑ. L pɑɑk, yɑɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ii tiin’ɔ mɑn yuo kul.
60001018	K mɑɑn i mi nɑn Yennu nbɑ nyinn’i binbenbiiuk nbɑ kɑɑ nyuɑt nbɑ k i din gɑɑl i yejɑnm buol nɑ, u k jii bont nbɑ sɑɑ biil nɑn sɑlmɑ kuo likli nɑ kɑɑ k pɑ,
60001019	ŋɑɑn u din jii Klistu sɔn nbɑ ŋɑn nɑ e k dɑɑ’i, Yiesu nbɑ tie nɑn mɑnnu pebik nbɑ k mɔk dɑnŋ k biɑ k mɔk jɑknt nɑ.
60001020	Yennu nbɑ dɑɑ din k nɑn dulnyɑ yuo nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn k u ponŋ din lukt Klistu, k tɑn nyinn’ɔ pɑɑnu dɑɑjuonti ni k tul’i.
60001021	Klistu ni e k i tien Yennu yɑdɑ, k Yennu tie wun nbɑ din fiin’ɔ kuun ni k tul’ɔ yudɑnt. L pɑɑk, k i yɑdɑ nɑn i dindɑnn be Yennu ni.
60001022	Mɔtɑɑnɑ yɑɑ sɑɑk bɑlmɔni lɑbɑɑl k i ji nyii biit sɔnu ni, ɑ yin fit kii luon i nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ, ii luon i lieb mɑn nɑn i pɑlɑ kul ɑ.
60001023	I lɑ mɑnfopɑɑnn ɑ, k l mɑnfuol k nyii bonbuolk nbɑ kpenn ni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l nyii bonbuolk nbɑ k kpenn nɑ buol e. Yennu mɑɑn nbɑ tien’t mɑnfuol k sii be mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ e, tul’i mɑnfopɑɑnn mɑnŋ.
60001024	L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Nisɑɑli kul tie nɑn muɑt nɑ e, k b fɑnt tie nɑn tipuuk nɑ. Muɑt juɑkt k l puut suul bɑɑ,
60001025	ŋɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn nɑ ŋɑnin kɑɑ gbennu.» Mɑɑn mɑnŋ e tie lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ k b din muɑntl k tien’i nɑ.
60002001	L pɑɑk, i nyik bonbiil kul tumu mɑn, nɑn fɑɑk kul, nɑn kpinkpɑnni, nɑn funfunn, nɑn sɑnjɑɑɔnŋ.
60002002	Ii tie nɑn sɑnpɑnti nɑ mɑn, kii tun kii luon mɑnfuol biin nbɑ be Foŋɑnm buol ni nɑ, k l i tie k i nyu’l yii kpɑɑtl k tɑn lɑ fielu.
60002003	Tɔn, l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «I mi bɑnnu nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ ŋɑn.»
60002004	Bɑɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ buol ni mɑn. Ŋuɑ e tie tɑnn nbɑ fo, wun nbɑ k niib yet, ɑ u k mɔk nyuɑt, ŋɑɑn k Yennu lukt’ɔ k yet, ɑ u ŋɑn k tul’ɔ nɑ.
60002005	Ii mun i tie nɑn tɑnɑ nbɑ fo k bin jii’i k mɑɑ Foŋɑnm ŋɑɑk. K yii tie Yennu tiɑɔnŋ mɑnntieb, kii mɑnn mɑlunŋ nɑn Foŋɑnm nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ, k Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk, Yennu sɑɑ gɑɑl i mɑlunŋ ɑ.
60002006	K mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni, ɑ u yet ɑ: «Gotl, n lukt tɑnn k bil Siiɔn duo ni, k l tie tɑnn nbɑ tien fiɑkl pɑnŋ, k l biɑ ŋɑn bonciɑnn, k wun nbɑ kul tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ, u kɑn di fei.»
60002007	Tɑnn mɑnŋ mɔk nyuɑt bonciɑnn k tul yinm nbɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn l k tie nnɑ kɑɑ k tul bin nbɑ k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ. «Tɑnn nbɑ k tɑnmɑɑlɑ yet’ɔ nɑ, ŋɑnn e set tie tɑnn nbɑ tien fiɑkl pɑnŋ.»
60002008	L biɑ diɑn ɑ: «Tɑnn mɑnŋ e k niib gbiɑtl, tɑnpiiuk mɑnŋ e lubn niib.» Bɑɑ k sɑk Yennu mɑɑn pɑɑk e k b gbiɑtl nɑn wɑɑ din senn’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
60002009	Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin tie nigɑnnkɑb e, k biɑ tie mɑnntieb nbɑ tuun k tien kpɑnbɑl, k biɑ tie nibuolu nbɑ tie Yennu yɑb, k biɑ tie u tiɑɔnŋ niib, ɑ yii muɑntl u bulcint po, ŋuɑ nbɑ nyinn’i bunbɔnn ni, k bɑɑl nɑn’i u bɑktnɔunŋ yentu ni.
60002010	Siɑn-yuo i din k tie niib, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ i tie Yennu niib e. Siɑn-yuo u din k tin’i ninbɑɑɔk, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ u tin’i ninbɑɑɔk ɑ.
60002011	N yuɑsnbɑ, yɑɑ tie sɑɑnm k biɑ tie kunsɑnnɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑ, n kpɑɑn’i e ɑ yi nyik gbɑnɑnt lonbiit nbɑ kɔn nɑn i sei nɑ,
60002012	ŋɑɑn kii be bɑnnu nbɑ k tingbounŋ niib i lek i tɑɑl’i e, ŋɑɑn b sɑɑ lɑ i tuonŋɑnɑ k dont Yennu sɑnn, dɑɑl nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ.
60002013	Yonmdɑɑnɔ pɑɑk, ii sɑɑk mɑn yiikuo-dɑnm mɔi kii sɑɑk kpɑnbɑl nbɑ mɔk yiikuo kul mɔb,
60002014	nɑn senni dɑnm nbɑ k u tun’m, ɑ bin dɑt bin nbɑ tuun bonbiil nɑ tubɑ, ŋɑɑn kii pɑk bin nbɑ tuun bonŋɑnn nɑ.
60002015	K mɑɑn lin nbɑ k Yennu luon tie, ɑ i tuonŋɑnɑ n guɑl jɑtt mɑɑn nbɑ k mɔk nyuɑt nɑ e.
60002016	Ii be nɑn yent-n-mɔnŋ dɑnm nɑ mɑn, ŋɑɑn i dɑɑ diɑ i yent-n-mɔnŋ binbenŋ mɑnŋ k l tien’i yɑɑk nbɑ k i sii tuun bonbiil. Ii mɔk mɑn Yennu tuontunnɑ binbenŋ mɑn.
60002017	Ii tien suɑ kul nibɑɑkl, kii luon bin nbɑ tie i nɑɑ wɑɑs Klistu ni nɑ, kii tiin Yennu, kii tien kpɑnbɑl nbɑ mɔk yiikuo kul nɑ nibɑɑkl.
60002018	Yinm nbɑ tie dɑɑbɑ, ii sɑɑk i yudɑnm mɔi ŋɑɑn biɑ kii tien’m nibɑɑkl, k l k tie bin nbɑ tuun bonŋɑnɑ k biɑ mɔk bulcint nɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn i mun biɑ sii tuun nnɑ e kii tien tondɑnm.
60002019	L i tie k ɑ tuun bonŋɑnn ŋɑɑn k b biɑ dint’ɑ fɑlɑ, k ɑ lɑ fɑlɑ mɑnŋ nɑn suklu fɑɑ duki Yennu po nɑ, l wɑnn nɑn ɑ tuun l nbɑ ŋɑn e nɑ.
60002020	Ŋɑɑn fi i tun biit k b dɑt ɑ tubl, k ɑ gɑɑl tubdɑtu nɑ suon nnɑ, nlee k b sɑɑ pɑk’ɑ ni? Ŋɑɑn fi i tuun bonŋɑnn, ŋɑɑn di fɑlɑ l pɑɑk suon nnɑ, l tie bonŋɑnn e Yennu tuɑnn.
60002021	Ŋɑnn e tie binbenŋ nbɑ k Yennu din yiin’i, ɑ yii be lenŋ, k mɑɑn Klistu tiɑɔnŋ din dii fɑlɑ i pɑɑk, ɑ yii goli u binbenŋ kii wɑɑ u tɑɑ.
60002022	U k tun biit. Suɑ biɑ k mi gbɑt k fɑɑk nyii u mɔb ni.
60002023	Bɑɑ din suki’ɔ nɑ, u din k sukl jiin. Wɑɑ biɑ din be fɑlɑ ni, u k jiin suɑ, ŋɑɑn din jii u mɔnŋ k tien Yennu nbɑ bu niib buut fɑnu nɑ nuu ni.
60002024	Ŋuɑ Klistu mɔnŋ mɔnŋ e din jii t biit u gbɑnɑnt ni, k b kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk, ɑ t dɑɑ tie biit tuontunnɑ ŋɑɑn kii be Yennu nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ. U dɑni pɑɑk e k i lɑ lɑɑfiɑ.
60002025	I din tuu tie nɑn pebotkɑi nɑ e, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ i jen i kpɑɑltuɑ nbɑ guu i sei nɑ buol ɑ.
60003001	Puob, sɑkn mɑn i sɔlb mɔi, k b siɑb i kii tien Yennu mɑɑn nɑ yɑdɑ, ŋɑɑn pɑsiɑl b puob binbenŋɑnŋ nɑ pɑɑk, b sɑɑ tien yɑdɑ wɑɑ, l k kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn puo n yet siɑl,
60003002	k mɑɑn b sɑɑ lɑ i binbenŋ nbɑ ŋɑn, k biɑ mɔk cɔlnt bɑnnu nbɑ.
60003003	Puob, dɑɑ luon i gbɑnɑnt pɑɑk fɑnt nɑn yulolu, nɑn sɑlmɑ lɑɑni, nɑn sɑlmɑ tutuutɑ, nɑn sɑlmɑ bɑni, ɑmi nɑn tɑŋɑnt liɑnu.
60003004	Ŋɑɑn l ŋɑn k i fɑnt i be i pɑlɑ ni, k lii tie sikn-n-mɔnŋ nɑn ŋminŋminn binbenŋ nbɑ k l fɑnt kɑn biil, k biɑ mɔk nyuɑt bonciɑnn Yennu buol ni.
60003005	Nnɑ e k yɑɑyuo ni puob nbɑ din tie Yennu yɑb k b dindɑnn din be u ni nɑ, din ŋɑnmt b mɔnŋ. B din sɑɑk b sɔlb mɔi,
60003006	nɑn Sɑɑlɑ nbɑ din sɑk Ablɑɑhɑɑnm mɔb k din yi’u u Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ. Mɔtɑɑnɑ i ji tie u bonpoi e, l i tie k i tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn, k k tiin siɑl jɑŋmɑɑni.
60003007	Puosɔlb, yinm nɑn i puob binbenŋ ni, ii diɑ i puob fɑnu kii mi nɑn b tie tɑli e i buol, kii tien’m nibɑɑkl, k mɑɑn yinm nɑn ŋɑnm kul tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl Yennu piinŋɑnn nbɑ tie mɑnfuol. Ii tuun nnɑ mɑn k siɑl dɑɑ jeni i Yenmiɑlu.
60003008	Lin nbɑ biɑl nɑ tie nnɑ e: i kul ii mɔk mɑn dudukyenn, k i bɑkɑ ii be i lieb ni, kii mɔk lonm nɑn i nɑɑ wɑɑs Klistu ni, kii tiin i lieb ninbɑɑɔk, kii siknt i mɔnŋ.
60003009	I dɑɑ tuun biit k jiint biit pɑɑk. I biɑ dɑɑ suki k jiint suɑ, ŋɑɑn jiin sukt mɑnŋ nɑn yetŋɑnm, k mɑɑn Yennu din yiin’i, ɑ yin gɑɑl u yetŋɑnm e.
60003010	K mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Wun nbɑ luon k wuu be u mɑnfuol ni nɑn pɑlpienn, k biɑ luon wun tɑn lɑ dɑɑ nbɑ mɑn, sie k u nyik bonbiil pɑku, k biɑ dɑɑ fɑ fɑɑk.
60003011	L ŋɑn wun nyik bonbiil, ŋɑɑn kii tuun bonŋɑnn. L ŋɑn wun lon mɑnu sɔnu kii wɑɑ’l,
60003012	k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ kpɑɑ u ninbinɑ bin nbɑ tie niŋɑnm u buol nɑ pɑɑk e, k biɑ gbiɑ b miɑlu yuo kul ɑ, ŋɑɑn kɔn nɑn bin nbɑ tuun bonbiil.»
60003013	I nunm i mɔn nɑn bonŋɑnn tumu, suɑ be k sɑɑ tien’i bonbiil ii?
60003014	Ŋɑɑn l i lek i tie k i di fɑlɑ i tuonŋɑnɑ pɑɑk, pɑlpienn sii mɑntk tie i yɑl e. I dɑɑ tiin nisɑɑlk jɑŋmɑɑni, i biɑ dɑɑ te k siɑl dɑɑm’i ni.
60003015	Ii cɔln Yonmdɑɑnɔ Klistu i pɑlɑ ni. Yuo kul, ii tien siil k jiin wun nbɑ boi’i lin nbɑ te k i mɔk dindɑnn nɑ po.
60003016	I jiin’ɔ suon nnɑ nɑn cɔlnt k dɑɑ tuun lin nbɑ k i sɑɑ fit tɑɑl i mɔnŋ l pɑɑk, ɑ k bin nbɑ tɑɑl’i i binbenŋɑnŋ Klistu ni nɑ pɑɑk nɑ, n di fei b sukt pɑɑk.
60003017	L i tie Yennu ŋɑɑn k i lɑ fɑlɑ i tuonŋɑnɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑnn e sɔ nɑn k i lɑ fɑlɑ bonbiil tumu pɑɑk.
60003018	K mɑɑn Klistu din gɑɑl biitdɑnm kul pɑɑk k kpo yonm kuɑ e, k ŋuɑ nbɑ din tie niŋɑnɔ nɑ e din gɑɑl biitdɑnm pɑɑk k kpo, ɑ wun te yin sɑɑn Yennu buol. B din kpi’u, ŋɑɑn Foŋɑnm din te k u fiil kuun ni.
60003019	Foŋɑnm ni e k u biɑ lek din sɑɑn sei nbɑ be sɑlk nɑ buol, k sɑɑ muɑnt mɑɑn k tul’b.
60003020	Ŋɑnm e din tie niib nbɑ din k sɑk Yennu mɔb yuo nbɑ k u din guu nɑn suklu k Noe ŋɑnmt ŋɑlngbenŋl nɑ. Niib bɑnniin kuukuɑ din tɑn kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ ni, k nyun te k b lɑ fielu.
60003021	Nyun mɑnŋ tie Yennu nyunwulu ninnɑɔnŋ nbɑ fiel’i mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ e. L k tie bɑɑ tuu wuul gbɑnɑnt jɑknt nɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie mɔsonn nbɑ k i senn Yennu nbɑ wuul i pɑlɑ ni nɑ pɑɑk e. I lɑɑt fielu l ni Yiesu Klistu kuun fiilu nɑ pɑɑk e.
60003022	U din sɑɑn Yendɔunŋ ni e k be Yennu niidiitu po, k ji yen mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ kul mɔk yiikuo Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ.
60004001	L pɑɑk, Klistu nbɑ din dii fɑlɑ u gbɑnɑnt ni nɑ, ii mun ii mɔk l dudukt, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ di fɑlɑ u gbɑnɑnt ni ji k duki wɑɑ sɑɑ tun biit bɑnnu nbɑ.
60004002	L pɑɑk, lɑɑ jii mɔtɑɑnɑ k ji sɑɑ, l ŋɑn k i jii yuo nbɑ tenn tingbounŋ ni kii tuun Yennu nbɑ luon lin nbɑ, ŋɑɑn nyik nisɑɑlk lonbiit.
60004003	Yuo nbɑ gɑl, i din jii i yuo k tuun lin nbɑ k bin nbɑ k tie Klistuweilɑ luon bii tuun nɑ. I din tuun boncuncontuonɑ, k mɔk lonbiit, k nyu dɑɑn k yib, k mɔk jedicɑɑɔnŋ nɑn dɑnyucɑɑɔnŋ, k mɑnn pɑtɑ bonciɑnn.
60004004	Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, yɑɑ ji k wɑɑ bin nbɑ k tie Klistuweilɑ k k tuun l bonbiil nɑ, l bɑkt’b e, k b ji suki’i.
60004005	Ŋɑɑn b sɑɑ nyinn b tuonɑ pɑɑnu ni k tul Yennu nbɑ tien siil k sɑɑ bu fuotb nɑn kpienm buut nɑ.
60004006	Ŋɑnn e te k b din muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn k tul bin nbɑ kpo nɑ. K b bu b buut suɑ kul nɑn wɑɑ tun lin nbɑ, nɑn nisɑɑli kul nɑ. Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ k Foŋɑnm te k b sei fit k be nɑn Yennu nbɑ luon k bii be bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.
60004007	Bont kul ɑ gbennu ji k fɔk. L pɑɑk, i suol i mɔnŋ kii sub k fit kii mei Yennu.
60004008	Lin nbɑ gɑl bont kul tie, ɑ ii luon i lieb mɑn fɑnu, k mɑɑn lonm dɔknt biit bonciɑnn.
60004009	Ii gɑɑn lieb sɑɑɔnŋ mɑn k dɑɑ buln.
60004010	Yennu tul u niib piini buolu buolu, k suɑ kul n jii piini nbɑ k u lɑ Yennu buol nɑ, kii diɑ’l fɑnu kii tuun nɑn’n kii sonmt lieb.
60004011	Wun nbɑ yɑɑ piini tie wuu muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ, wuu muɑntl lin nbɑ k Yennu tien’ɔ nɑ e, k wun nbɑ yɑɑ piini tie wuu sonmt niib, wuu sonmt’b nɑn u pɑnŋ kul nbɑ k Yennu tien’ɔ nɑ, ɑ Yennu n lɑ pɑku bonsiɑl kul ni Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk. Ŋuɑ Yiesu yen pɑku nɑn pɑnŋ kul yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Amenn.
60004012	N yuɑsnbɑ, yɑɑ di fɑlgbenŋɑ nbɑ biki’i nɑ, i dɑɑ te k l bɑktl’i k l tie nɑn bonsɑɑnn nɑ i buol.
60004013	Yɑɑ di fɑlɑ nɑn Klistu nbɑ din dii fɑlɑ bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, ii mɔk pɑlpienn mɑn, k yuo nbɑ k u yudɑnt tɑn sɑɑ nyi pɑɑnu nɑ, i tɑn sɑɑ lɑ pɑlpienn nbɑ kɑɑ pɑɑk.
60004014	B i suki’i Klistu sɑnn pɑɑk, pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e, k mɑɑn Foŋɑnm nbɑ mɔk pɑnŋ bonciɑnn k biɑ tie Yennu Siek nɑ be i pɑɑk.
60004015	Ŋɑɑn suɑ fɑldinu i be nikpinu ɑmi nɑn-yuk ɑmi biit tumu ɑmi kpikpiluk tuonɑ pɑɑk, l k ŋɑn.
60004016	Ŋɑɑn fi i di fɑlɑ fɑɑ tie Klistuyuɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ dɑɑ tiin fei, ŋɑɑn dont Yennu, bɑɑ pul’ɑ Klistu sɑnn nɑ pɑɑk.
60004017	Yuo bɑɑl ɑ k Yennu sɑɑ piin k bu niib buut, k u sɑɑ bu u tiɑɔnŋ niib buut e sinsinn, k l i tie k u bu tinm nbɑ tie u niib nɑ buut sinsinn nɑ, bin nbɑ k sɑk u lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ sɑɑ juont nlee?
60004018	L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «L i pɑɑl k niŋɑnm n lɑ fielu, k biitdɑnm nɑn bin nbɑ k tiin Yennu ji sɑɑ tien nlee k lɑ fielu?»
60004019	L pɑɑk, bin nbɑ di fɑlɑ Yennu nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk nɑ, bii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ, k jii b mɔnŋ k pet tul b nɑntuɑ Yennu nbɑ tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ nɑ.
60005001	Sɑɑkɑb nbɑ be i sinsuuk ni, n kpɑɑn’i e, min nbɑ mun tie sɑɑkuɑ nɑ, k n ninbinn din lɑ Klistu nbɑ din dii fɑlɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ, k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑkn k lɑ yudɑnt nɑn’ɔ yuo nbɑ k l tɑn sɑɑ nyi pɑɑnu nɑ.
60005002	N kpɑɑn’i e, i tie Yennu niib nbɑ be i nuu ni nɑ pekpɑɑli, kii guu’b fɑnu, k l dɑɑ tie miɑl kɑɑ. Ŋɑɑn k lii tie i yɑnbuɑt e, nɑn Yennu nbɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ, k l biɑ dɑɑ tie likli pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ii kpɑnŋ i kol kii tuun.
60005003	Dɑɑ mɑntk diɑ niib nbɑ k Yennu tul’i k i guu’b nɑ nɑn ninmɔnn, ŋɑɑn te k i binbenŋɑnŋ n wɑnn’b bɑɑ sii be biɑnŋ nbɑ.
60005004	K Klistu wun nbɑ tie pekpɑɑbɑt nɑ i tɑnŋ i jen, i sɑɑ lɑ bɑktnɔunŋ nɑɑn foklk nbɑ sii tun nyili.
60005005	Nnɑ e mun, yinm nbɑ tie nɑɑsinm nɑn sɑpɑɑnm, ii sɑɑk sɑɑkɑb mɔi, k i kul ɑ n liɑ liɑtl nbɑ tie sikn-n-mɔnŋ, k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Yennu kɔn nɑn kɑlnbɑɑndɑnm e, ŋɑɑn goli bin nbɑ sikn b mɔnŋ nɑn bulcint.»
60005006	L pɑɑk, siknt i mɔnŋ mɑn Yennu nuu nbɑ mɔk pɑnŋ nɑ tinŋ po, k mɑɑn u tɑn sɑɑ donn’i yuo nbɑ k u luon.
60005007	Jiin mɑn lin nbɑ kul muks’i k tul’ɔ, k mɑɑn u bɑkɑ be i ni.
60005008	Ii diɑ i mɔnŋ mɑn kii guu fɑnu, k mɑɑn i dɑtɑɑk Sɑɑtɑn lin k biet nɑn yɑnbɔl nɑ e, k luon wun lɑ suɑ k suol ŋmɑn.
60005009	Yetl’ɔ mɑn, ŋɑɑn kii diɑ i yɑdɑ fɑnu, k mɑɑn i mi nɑn i nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ be tingbounŋ lɔkl kul po mun di fɑlɑ nɑn yɑɑ di biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e.
60005010	I fɑlɑ nɑ dinu kɑn wei, k Yennu nbɑ tin’i ninbɑɑɔk k biɑ yiin’i ɑ yin lɑ dontl nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu Klistu ni nɑ, sɑɑ ŋɑnm i binbenŋ, k cie i yɑdɑ, k pukn’i pɑnŋ, k senn’i fiɑkl nbɑ wɑki nɑ pɑɑk.
60005011	Ŋuɑ e yen yiikuo kul nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Amenn.
60005012	Siilɑɑs wun nbɑ k n mi nɑn u tie t nɑɑ bik nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ, ŋuɑ e sonm’n k n diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ k fɔk nɑ, ɑ n cie i pɑlɑ, k kpɑɑn’i, ɑ ŋɑnn e tie Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn bɑlmɔni. L pɑɑk, ii diɑ’l fɑnu mɑn.
60005013	Yiesu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be Bɑbiilonn k Yennu din lukt’b nɑn wɑɑ din lukt’i bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, fuont’i. Mɑɑlk, wun nbɑ tie n bijɑ yɑdɑ pɑɑk nɑ, mun fuont’i.
60005014	Ii fuont i lieb kii kpɑnmi mɑn. Mɑnu ii be yinm nbɑ kul tie Klistuyɑb nɑ pɑɑk.
61001001	Min Siimɔn Piɑl, wun nbɑ tie Yiesu Klistu tuontunnɔ nɑn u tuomi nɑ e dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien bin nbɑ lɑ yɑdɑ Yennu nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn t Fietuɑ Yiesu Klistu nɑ buol nɑ, k b yɑdɑ mɑnŋ mun ŋɑn k tul Yennu nɑn t yɑl nbɑ ŋɑn bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.
61001002	Yɑɑ bɑnn Yennu nɑn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu nɑ pɑɑk, ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn mɑnu ii yɑb kii be i pɑɑk.
61001003	Yennu yiikuo e tul’t lin nbɑ kul kpɑɑ tɑlɑs ɑ tii mɔk’l kii fit kii be mɑnfuol ni nɑn binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ. T lɑ l kul, Yennu nbɑ te k t bɑnn wun nbɑ yiin’t ɑ t mun ii mɔk u dontl nɑn u bulcint nɑ pɑɑk e.
61001004	Nnɑ e mun, k u din senn mɔsonjɑɑnɑ k tul’t ɑ t i lɑɑt lin nbɑ k u senn mɔsonn nɑn u sɑɑ tul’t nɑ, k fit nyi lonbiiuk nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑn l kuun ni, ŋɑɑn kii mɔk u tiɑɔnŋ binbenŋ.
61001005	Lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, i yɑbl i mɔnŋ k pukn binbenŋɑnŋ i yɑdɑ pɑɑk mɑn, k biɑ pukn Yennu bɑnnu i binbenŋɑnŋ mɑnŋ pɑɑk,
61001006	k biɑ pukn mɔnŋdiɑnu i bɑnnu mɑnŋ pɑɑk, k biɑ pukn suklu i mɔnŋdiɑnu mɑnŋ pɑɑk, k biɑ pukn binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm i suklu pɑɑk,
61001007	k biɑ pukn nɑɑtɑɑnn i binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ pɑɑk, k biɑ pukn lonm i nɑɑtɑɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
61001008	Ŋɑnn tie lin nbɑ k i bo sii mɔk, k l i tie k i mɔk’l k l yɑbt, i sɑɑ fit tun Yennu tuonn fɑnu k biɑ bɑnn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu k pukn.
61001009	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k suɑ k mɔk’l, u k nyuɑn bɑnfɔkl nɑn juɑnŋ nɑ e, k tɑnm nɑn Klistu din wuul u yɑɑyuo ni biit ɑ.
61001010	L pɑɑk, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, i yɑbl kii be binbenŋ nbɑ k Yennu din yiin’i k biɑ lukt’i ɑ i be lenŋ nɑ. K mɑɑn l i tie k i tuun nnɑ i e, i kɑn mi bɑɑ biit ni.
61001011	Nnɑ e k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl’i nɑn pɑlpienn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu jiɑɔnŋ nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ ni.
61001012	L pɑɑk, n sii tun k tiɑn’i lɑbɑɑl nɑ po e yuo kul, mɑɑ lek mi nɑn i ponŋ gbɑt’l ɑ, k mi’l fɑnu, k diɑ’l cinm nɑ.
61001013	Ŋɑɑn n dukn nɑn l ŋɑn k n ŋɑnm tiɑl’i k fiin i dudukt mɑɑ dɑɑ be n mɑnfuol ni nɑ.
61001014	K mɑɑn n mi nɑn l kɑn wei k n sɑɑ nyi n gbɑnɑnt ni nɑn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu nbɑ din yet’n nɑ.
61001015	L pɑɑk e te k n yɑɑ n yɑbl n mɔnŋ k lɑ sɔnu nbɑ k i sii tiɑn lɑbɑɑl nɑ po yuo kul ɑ n kuun puolpo.
61001016	Setk nɑn mɔni, t din k jii fɑɑk sɔnu ɑmi nisɑɑlk tiɑɔnŋ yɑn ni lɑbɑɑl kɑɑ, k wɑnn’i bɑnnu nbɑ k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ tɑn sɑɑ jen nɑn yiikuo nɑ, ŋɑɑn t din lɑ u yɑbnt nɑn t ninbinɑ e.
61001017	T din be nɑn’ɔ e, yuo nbɑ k Bɑɑ Yennu din tul’ɔ sɑnn nɑn dontl. L yuo mɑnŋ e k kunkɔl nyii Yennu nɑ yentsɑɑkɑl nbɑ gɑl yentsɑɑkɑlɑ kul nɑ buol ni k yet ɑ: «N Bilonkɑk e nɑ, wun nbɑ k n nunm gbuo’u nɑ e nɑ.»
61001018	T mɔnŋ mɔnŋ din gbɑt kunkɔl mɑnŋ k l nyii Yendɔunŋ ni, yuo nbɑ k t din be nɑn’ɔ Yennu tiɑɔnŋ juɑl pɑɑk.
61001019	Ŋɑnn e mɑntk kɑt wɑnt’t nɑn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nbɑ din pɑk Yiesu lɑbɑɑl nɑ po din tie bɑlmɔni e, k l ŋɑn k yin gbiint bɑɑ din yet lin nbɑ nɑ fɑnu. K mɑɑn mɑɑn mɑnŋ tie nɑn fitl nbɑ tien yentu bunbɔnn ni nɑ e, mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k sɑn-nyiɑɔk sɑɑ piin yentl k sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni ŋmɑɑbil n yent i pɑlɑ ni.
61001020	Ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ gɑl l kul tie nɑ e: nisɑɑlk kɑɑ k fit wɑnn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn nbɑ be Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ pɑɑk nɑn u tiɑɔnŋ pɑnŋ,
61001021	k mɑɑn sɔkniinbɑ suɑ kɑɑ k mi dukn u mɔnŋ yɑn ni k pɑk, ŋɑɑn b din piɑk Yennu tiɑɔnŋ mɑɑn e, Foŋɑnm nbɑ din wɑnt’b bɑɑ sii piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
61002001	Ŋɑɑn fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ din be Suifnbɑ sinsuuk ni siɑn-yuo k fɑɑk wɑntieb mun biɑ sii be i sinsuuk ni. B sɑɑ lon wuol ni sɔnu k fit bɑɑl nɑn fɑɑk wɑnnu nbɑ sɑɑ buon’i. B set sɑɑ yet wɑntuɑ Yiesu, wun nbɑ din fiel’b nɑ, k b sɑɑ te k Yennu n biil’b yiɑn ɑ.
61002002	Niib bonciɑnn sɑɑ wei b binbenŋ nbɑ mɔk fei nɑ. B pɑɑk k niib sɑɑ tien mɔniɑɔk nɑn bɑlmɔni sɔnu nɑ.
61002003	B sii mɔk niɑnciɑɔnŋ, k sii kpɑnn’i k ŋmɑb’i nɑn lɑbɑɑl nbɑ nyi b tiɑɔnŋ dudukt ni nɑ. L pɑɑk, l ponŋ wei wɑɑ, k b Bɑlbuulɔ tien siil, ɑ wun bu b buut k l ji kɑn wei k b biilu sɑɑ bɑɑl.
61002004	K mɑɑn Yennu din k nyik mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nbɑ din tun biit nɑ tubdɑtu. Ŋɑɑn u din lol’b jɑlt k lu’b buotuk nbɑ sumi bonciɑnn k biɑ mɔk muu nbɑ kɑn mi kpien nɑ ni, k b sii be l ni mɔkmɔk nɑn dɑɑl nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ bu b buut.
61002005	Nnɑ e biɑk, u din k nyik yɑɑyuo ni dulnyɑ niib nɑ. Ŋɑɑn u din te k nyungbiebiiuk o dii dulnyɑ mɑnŋ, k kpii bin nbɑ kul k tiin’ɔ nɑ. U din fiel Noe, wun nbɑ din muɑntl Yenweiu po, k din fiel u ŋɑɑtieb bɑnlole k pukn u pɑɑk.
61002006	Ŋuɑ Yennu biɑ din biil doi nbɑ yi Suodonm nɑn Guomuɔl, k te k b dii muu k kɑb kpɑnt tɑnpent. Lin nbɑ nɑ e tie siɑlɑ k wɑnt biitdɑnm wɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɑt b tubɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ.
61002007	U biɑ din tɑn fiel Lɔt, wun nbɑ din tie niŋɑnɔ nɑ. Biit dɑnm nbɑ din tuun b gbɑnɑnt lonbiit biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l din biil ŋuɑ Lɔt pɑl ni bonciɑnn.
61002008	Lɔt, jɑŋɑnɔ mɑnŋ, din be b duo ni e, k lɑɑt b biit, k gbiɑ bɑɑ piɑk b mɔbonbiit biɑnŋ nbɑ dɑɑ kul, k l din dɑmi’ɔ u pɑl ni bonciɑnn, k mɑɑn u din tie niŋɑnɔ e.
61002009	Ŋɑnn e k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu mi biɑnŋ nbɑ k u sɑɑ fɑt niib nbɑ tiin’ɔ, k nyinn’b muksuk ni, ŋɑɑn dɑt biitdɑnm tubɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn dɑɑl nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ bu b buut nɑ.
61002010	Bin nbɑ wɑɑ lonbiiuk nbɑ nyii b binbenbiiuk nɑ ni nɑ, k siɑn Yennu yiikuo nɑ, Yennu set sɑɑ dɑt b tubɑ. Fɑɑk wɑntieb nbɑ k n ponŋ piɑk b po nɑ, tie tubkɑngbɑtɑ dɑnm e, k b k tiin suɑ. B k cɔln bin nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni k mɔk yudɑnt nɑ, ŋɑɑn b suki’b e.
61002011	Mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ set mɔk pɑnŋ k gɑl fɑɑk wɑntieb mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn b k tɑɑl bin nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni, k biɑ k suki’b Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuɑnn.
61002012	Ŋɑɑn jɑb nɑ k mɔk dudukt; b nɑɑn nɑn muuk ni bonkob-biit nbɑ be, k niib tɑn sɑɑ suol’b k kpi’b nɑ e. B tuu suki lin nbɑ k b k gbiɑ l pɑɑk e. B tɑn sɑɑ kpi’b nɑn bɑɑ tuu kpi muuk ni bonkob-biit bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ e.
61002013	Bɑɑ tuu te k niib n lɑ fɑlɑ nɑ, b nyuɑt mun sii tie fɑlɑ e. Lin nbɑ pent b pɑlɑ ni tie bii tuun b gbɑnɑnt lonbiit yennu ni. Bɑɑ tuu be i sinsuuk ni nɑ, l mɔk fei k biɑ tie bonbiil, k mɑɑn bɑɑ di jiet nɑn’i nɑ, b tuu wɑnt b mɔnŋ b biit pɑɑk.
61002014	B goli puob e k duki boncuncontuonn po kuukuɑ. B k fit tuun biit k l jɑnŋt’b, k dɑɑk bin nbɑ k b yɑdɑ k mɔk pɑnŋ nɑ. Yuo kul b luon nyuɑt e. Setk nɑn mɔni, Yennu mɔpol be b pɑɑk.
61002015	B nyik sɔnu nbɑ tuok, ŋɑɑn bot ɑ. B wɑɑ Buosol bijɑ Bɑɑlɑɑnm nbɑ din wɑɑ sɔnu nbɑ nɑ e. U din luon biit nyuɑt e,
61002016	ŋɑɑn Yennu din kpil’ɔ u mɔyetu nɑ pɑɑk. U bonŋ set din pɑk nɑn’ɔ nɑn nisɑɑlk kunkɔl k kpil’ɔ k te k sɔkni nɑ nyik u jɑti tuonn mɑnŋ.
61002017	Niib mɑnŋ buolu tie nɑn bunbunn nbɑ kɑɑ nyun nɑ e, k b tie nɑn sɑyunŋ nbɑ k wounŋ tuu gɑɑn’ɔ nɑ e. Yennu tɑn sɑɑ jii’b k lu’b bunbɔnciɑɔnŋ ni.
61002018	B piɑk kɑlnbɑɑni mɑɑn nbɑ k mɔk nyuɑt e, k tuun nɑn b tiɑɔnŋ lonbiiuk k pii bɑlt ɑ bin suol bin nbɑ fɑt b mɔnŋ niib nbɑ tuun biit nɑ buol ni k l dɑɑ k wei nɑ.
61002019	B tuu senn mɔsonn k yet, ɑ b sii mɔk yent-n-mɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn b mɔnŋ tie b gbɑnɑnt lonm nbɑ biil’b nɑ dɑɑbɑ e k be sɔnu nbɑ sɑɑ juont nɑn kuun nɑ ni. Suɑ kul tie lin nbɑ yen’ɔ nɑ dɑɑbl.
61002020	Bin nbɑ din fit fɑt b mɔnŋ tingbounŋ nɑ biit nɑ ni, k mɑɑn b din bɑnn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu nbɑ tie t Fietuɑ nɑ e, l biit i ŋɑnm suol’b k nyɑnn’b, b juontu tɑn sii bi k gɑl b pinpiik nbɑ din tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ.
61002021	B i bo i kii mi binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm, l bo sii sɔ nɑn bɑɑ bɑnn’l ŋɑɑn ji k sɑk Yennu sennu nbɑ k b din gbɑt nɑ.
61002022	Bɑɑ tuun lin nbɑ nɑ wɑnt nɑn bɑljokt tie mɔni e ɑ: «Bɔk e tuu ŋmɑt k di u mɔnŋ siit,» k: «Duolk i wul nyun ŋɑɑn u tuu ŋmɑt k gbɑl u mɔnŋ nɑn bɑkl e.»
61003001	N yuɑsnbɑ, mɑɑ dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ k tien’i nɑ ji puki kɑdɑɑt ŋɑnle e nɑ. N diɑn l kɑdɑɑt ŋɑnle kul k tiɑl’i lɑbɑɑl nbɑ k i din gbɑt nɑ po, ɑ yii mɔk dudukŋɑnt.
61003002	N luon k yii tiɑn mɑɑn nbɑ k sɔknŋɑnm din pɑk yɑɑyuo ni nɑ, kii biɑ kii tiɑn sennu nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ, wun nbɑ tie t Fietuɑ nɑ din pɑk, k tinm nbɑ tie u tuomiinbɑ din yet’i nɑ po.
61003003	Sinsinn, n luon k yii mi nɑn nisiɑb nbɑ wɑɑ b pɑlɑ lonbiit tɑn sii be dɑɑjuonti ni, k tɑn sii sɑlkt’i,
61003004	k yien ɑ: «Yiesu Klistu nbɑ din senn mɔsonn, ɑ u tɑn sɑɑ jen nɑ, ŋuɑ liɑ ɑɑ? T bɑɑnbɑ nbɑ ponŋ din kpo wɑɑ nɑn dinnɑ, bonsiɑl kul kpɑn tie nɑn lɑɑ ponŋ tuu tie biɑnŋ nbɑ dulnyɑ pinpiik ni nɑ e.»
61003005	L niib k sɑɑk bin tiɑl nɑn Yennu din yet mɑɑn e k nɑn sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ, k u din nyinn tinŋ nɑ nyun ni k te k l be nyun nɑ sinsuuk ni,
61003006	k biɑ din te k nyungbiebiiuk din dii dulnyɑ kpel mɑnŋ k l biil.
61003007	Ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ Yennu mɑɑn mɑnŋ e biɑ lek sii diɑ sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ nbɑ be mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ te k l kul ɑ n di muu, k l dɑɑl u sɑɑ bu nitont buut k biil’b.
61003008	Bon-yenn be. I dɑɑ tɑnmt l po. Yonmdɑɑnɔ buol ni ŋɑnin, dɑyenn kuɑ tie nɑn binɑ tusl nɑ e, k binɑ tusl mun tie nɑn dɑyenn nɑ.
61003009	L kɑn wei, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑɑ tun k gbien u mɔsonn nɑ. Ŋɑɑn nisiɑb duki nɑn u tɑɑntl e. Ŋɑɑn u mɔk suklu nɑn’i e. U k luon k nisiɑb n kpo kuun nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, ŋɑɑn u luon k suɑ kul n mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ e.
61003010	Ŋɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ dɑɑl mɑnŋ bɑɑlu tɑn sii tie nɑn nɑn-yukɔ bɑɑlu nɑ e. L dɑɑl mɑnŋ, k sɑnpɑɑk sɑɑ bot nɑn fujɑɑnn, k muu nbɑ di bonciɑnn tɑn sɑɑ di sɑnpɑɑpo bonsiɑl kul, k tingbounŋ nɑ nɑn bonsiɑl kul nbɑ be lenŋ tɑn sɑɑ di muu e k gbenn.
61003011	K bont nɑ kul nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ di muu nnɑ nɑ, i dukn suɑ l ŋɑn k yii tie nibuol bee mɑn i? L ŋɑn k yii be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm kii biɑ kii tiin’ɔ,
61003012	kii guu Yennu dɑɑl mɑnŋ, k yɑbl i mɔnŋ pɑɑk k dɑɑl mɑnŋ n bɑɑl yiɑn. L dɑɑl e k sɑnpɑɑpo tɑn sɑɑ kɑb k biil, k muu nɑ tonu tɑn sɑɑ nɑnn sɑnpɑɑpo bonnɑnkɑɑ.
61003013	Ŋɑɑn t guu yuo nbɑ k sɑnpɑpɑɑnn nɑn tinpɑɑnn tɑn sii be nɑn Yennu nbɑ din senn mɔsonn nbɑ nɑ, k lin nbɑ kul tuun lenŋ sii tie nɑn Yennu nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ e.
61003014	N yuɑsnbɑ, yɑɑ guu bonɑ mɑnŋ nɑ pɑɑk, i yɑbl i mɔnŋ pɑɑk kii be binbenŋ nbɑ k Yennu luon, k dɑɑ mɔk biit u buol, k mɑnu i be yinm nɑn ŋuɑ sinsuuk ni.
61003015	T Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ di suklu nɑ, u tien niib e yɑɑk, ɑ bin lɑ fielu, nɑn t nɑɑ bilonkɑk Pɔul nbɑ mun dɑɑn diɑn kɑdɑsiɑɔk k tul’i k yet’i nɑn Yennu nbɑ tul’ɔ yɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ.
61003016	U kɑdɑɑt kul ni, u tuu diɑn k piɑk l lɑbɑɑl po e. Lɑbɑsiɑ be u kɑdɑɑt nɑ ni k pɑɑl nɑn nilɔ n bɑnn l pɑɑk, k nisiɑb nbɑ k mɔk yɑn k biɑ k mɔk yɑdɑ nbɑ wɑki nɑ, biɑ be. B jikt’l k kpint’l fɑɑk e, nɑn bɑɑ tuu kpint’l Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk mɑnŋ pɑɑk boliɑ ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Nnɑ e k b bɑɑt nɑn b tiɑɔnŋ biilu.
61003017	N yuɑsnbɑ, i ji mi b po. L pɑɑk, i guu i mɔnŋ, k dɑɑ wɑɑ biitdɑnm fɑɑk sɔni mɑnŋ, k yɑbl k dɑɑ bɑɑ.
61003018	I ŋɑɑn k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu nbɑ tie t Fietuɑ nɑ, ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ ii be i binbenŋ ni kii puki, k yin mun ŋɑɑn k yɑɑ bɑnn’ɔ bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ n pukn. Ŋuɑ e yen dontl mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Amenn.
62001001	N dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien’i, ɑ n wɑnn’i wun nbɑ k b yi’u Yennu mɑɑn nbɑ tien niib mɑnfuol nɑ po e. Mɑɑn mɑnŋ ponŋ din be dulnyɑ pinpiik ni e wɑɑ. T din gbɑt u mɑɑn, k lɑ’u nɑn t ninbinɑ, k got’ɔ nyik nyik k biɑ sii’u nɑn t nii.
62001002	Yuo nbɑ k mɑnfuol mɑnŋ din bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni, t din lɑ’u, k l pɑɑk e te k t muɑntl l siɑlɑ k tien’i, ɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nbɑ din be Bɑɑ buol ni nɑ, u ji fiit’l k wɑnn’t ɑ.
62001003	Lin nbɑ k t lɑ k biɑ gbɑt nɑ, t mun muɑntl k tien’i, ɑ yin ji fit tɑɑn nɑn’t mɔtɑɑɔk ni. Bɑlmɔni e setk, t mɔtɑɑɔk ni, t tɑɑnt nɑn Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn u Bijɑ Yiesu Klistu.
62001004	T dɑ lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ, ɑ tii mɔk pɑlpienn nbɑ kɑɑ pɑɑk e.
62001005	Tɔn, mɑɑn nbɑ k t din gbɑt ŋuɑ Yiesu Klistu buol ni k muɑntl k tien’i nɑ, l tie nnɑ e: Yennu tie yentu e, k bunbɔnn kɑɑ u ni.
62001006	K t i yɑɑ, ɑ tinm nɑn Yennu mɔk mɔtɑɑɔk, ŋɑɑn be bunbɔnn ni, ŋɑnn t fɑ fɑɑk e, t k tuun Yennu lonm.
62001007	Ŋɑɑn l i tie k t wɑɑ yentu sɔnu yuo kul, nɑn Yennu nbɑ be yentu ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑnn t mɔk mɔtɑɑɔk nɑn t lieb, k u Bijɑ Yiesu sɔn e wu t pɑlɑ ni k t ji k mɔk biit.
62001008	Tɔn, t i yɑɑ ɑ t k mɔk biit i e, ŋɑnn t kpɑnn t mɔnŋ e, k bɑlmɔni kɑɑ t ni.
62001009	Ŋɑɑn t i fiit t biit k tul Yennu, t sɑɑ fit bɑnn nɑn u tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ k tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn k sɑɑ nyik t biit k cɑb’t k biɑ sɑɑ nyinn biit buolu kul t ni.
62001010	T i yɑɑ ɑ t k tuun biit i e, ŋɑnn nnɑ t tien’ɔ fɑɑk dɑɑnɔ e nɑ, k u mɑɑn mɑnŋ kɑɑ t ni.
62002001	N wɑɑs, n k luon k yii tuun biit. L pɑɑk e te k n dɑ k tien’i nɑ, ŋɑɑn l i tie k suɑ tun biit, t mɔk sindɑntinnɔ Bɑɑ Yennu buol ni, k ŋuɑ e tie Yiesu Klistu, wun nbɑ tie niŋɑnɔ nɑ.
62002002	Ŋuɑ e ji din tien mɑlunŋ Yennu buol ni, ɑ Yennu n nyikcɑb t biit. L pɑɑk, Yennu k nyiktcɑbt t biit kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u nyiktcɑbt dulnyɑ munn biit e.
62002003	T i diɑ Yennu senni, ŋɑnn e wɑnn nɑn t set mi’u.
62002004	L i tie k suɑ yet ɑ: «N mi’u,» ŋɑɑn biɑ k diɑ u senni, l dɑɑnɔ tie fɑɑk dɑɑnɔ e, k bɑlmɔni kɑɑ u ni.
62002005	K biɑ jen ɑ, wun nbɑ cɔln u mɑɑn, ŋuɑ e set luon Yennu nɑn u yɑn kul. K biɑ jen ɑ, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ u gɑɑ u pɑɑk, sie k u binbenŋ i tie nɑn Yiesu binbenŋ nbɑ din tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Ŋɑnn e k u sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn u gɑɑ Yennu pɑɑk.
62002007	N nɑɑ wɑɑlonkɑi, n k dɑ senpɑɑnu kɑɑ k tien’i ni, ŋɑɑn l tie senkpel nbɑ k i din mɔk’l sinsinn nɑ e. Senkpel mɑnŋ tie mɑɑn nbɑ k i ponŋ mi k gbɑt nɑ e.
62002008	Ŋɑɑn n set dɑ sennpɑɑnu e k tien’i, l set sennpɑɑnu Klistu ni, k biɑ sii tie sennpɑɑnu i ni. L pɑɑk nyiɑɔk gɑɑl e, k bɑlmɔni yentu ji be.
62002009	Wun nbɑ yet, ɑ u be yentu ni, ŋɑɑn mɔk nɑnŋ nɑn u nɑɑ bik nɑ, l dɑɑnɔ set be bunbɔnn ni e.
62002010	Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ luon u nɑɑ bik nɑ be yentu ni, k siɑl kɑɑ u ni k sɑɑ te k nilɔ n bɑɑ biit ni.
62002011	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ nɑn u nɑɑ bik nɑ be bunbɔnn ni e, k u biɑ sonm lintl bunbɔnn ni e k k mi wɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn nbɑ k mɑɑn bunbɔnn nɑ e te k u juɑn.
62002012	N wɑɑs, n dɑ tien’i k mɑɑn Yennu nyik cɑb i biit Yiesu sɑnn pɑɑk ɑ.
62002013	N dɑ k tien yinm nbɑ tie wɑdɑnm k mɑɑn i mi wun nbɑ ponŋ din be pinpiik ni wɑɑ. Nipɑɑɔnŋ, n dɑ k tien’i k mɑɑn i nyɑnn Klistu dɑtɑɑk nɑ wɑɑ.
62002014	Wɑɑs, n dɑ k tien’i k mɑɑn i mi Bɑɑ. Yinm nbɑ tie wɑdɑnm, n dɑ k tien’i k mɑɑn i mi wun nbɑ ponŋ din be pinpiik ni wɑɑ. Nɑɑsinm, n dɑ k tien’i k mɑɑn i mɔk pɑnŋ k Yennu mɑɑn be i ni, k i nyɑnn Klistu dɑtɑɑk nɑ wɑɑ.
62002015	I dɑɑ luon tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb sɔnu ɑmi lin nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni. L i tie k nilɔ luon tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb sɔni i e, u k luon Bɑɑ Yennu.
62002016	Lin nbɑ k b lɑɑt tingbounŋ nɑ ni e nɑ: lonbiiuk nbɑ be suɑ kul ni, nɑn niɑn nbɑ k niib mɔk bonɑ nbɑ k b lɑɑt nɑ pɑɑk, nɑn wɑnt-n-mɔnŋ nbɑ nyi mɔktuk ni. Lin nbɑ nɑ kul k nyii Bɑɑ buol ni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie tingbounŋ yɑl e.
62002017	Tingbounŋ nɑ nɑn l lonbiit gbent e, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ k Yennu luon nɑ sii tun fo e.
62002018	N wɑɑs, dulnyɑ gbennu pel nɑ. I ponŋ mi gbɑt ɑ Klistu Dɑtɑɑk bɑɑt, k mɔtɑɑnɑ, u dɑtɑi bonciɑnn ponŋ bɑɑl nɑ. Ŋɑnn e te k t set mi nɑn dulnyɑ gbennu pel nɑ.
62002019	Klistu dɑtɑi mɑnŋ e nyii t ni, ŋɑɑn b k tie t yɑb. B i bo i tie t yɑb i e, tinm nɑn ŋɑnm bo sii lɑkn be, ŋɑɑn b nyik’t ɑ, k l wɑnt nɑn b din k tie t yɑb.
62002020	Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin, i mɔk Foŋɑnm nbɑ k Yiesu Klistu din muɑn i pɑɑk nɑ, k ŋɑnn e te k i kul ɑ mi bɑlmɔni.
62002021	Tɔn, l k tie ɑ i k mi bɑlmɔni kɑɑ te k n dɑ k tien’i nɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie yɑɑ ponŋ mi bɑlmɔni mɑnŋ nɑ pɑɑk, k i mi nɑn fɑɑk k nyi l ni.
62002022	K ŋmee tie fɑɑk dɑɑnɔ? L tie wun nbɑ yɑɑ, ɑ Yiesu k tie Klistu e. Ŋuɑ e tie Klistu dɑtɑɑk mɑnŋ, k yien Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn u Bijɑ.
62002023	Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ yet Bijɑ mɑnŋ, biɑ yet Bɑɑ Yennu e nɑ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ piɑk k yien, ɑ u tien Bijɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ wɑɑ, Bɑɑ mun be nɑn’ɔ.
62002024	Yɑɑ din sint gbɑt mɑɑn nbɑ pinpiik ni nɑ, ii diɑ nnɑ mɑn fɑnu. L i tie k i diɑ’l, i sii be Bijɑ mɑnŋ ni nɑn Bɑɑ ni.
62002025	k mɔsonn nbɑ k u senn k tul’t nɑ tie ɑ, t sii be nɑn Yennu e yuo kul.
62002026	N dɑ lin nbɑ nɑ k tien’i k ceknt’i k jikt sɑɑ niib nbɑ yɑɑ bin kpɑnn’i nɑ po e.
62002027	Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin, Yiesu sikn Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ i pɑɑk ɑ. Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ nbɑ biɑl be i ni nɑ, i ji kii luon k suɑ n wɑnn’i. K mɑɑn Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ mɔnŋ e wɑnt’i bont kul ɑ, k u wɑnnu mɑnŋ e tie bɑlmɔni wɑnnu, k fɑɑk kɑɑ lenŋ. L pɑɑk, ii sɑɑk Foŋɑnm wɑnnu nɑ kii be Klistu ni.
62002028	Tɔn, n wɑɑs, ii biɑl Klistu ni mɑn k tii mɔk pɑlcienn yuo nbɑ k u sɑɑ dɔkt t pɑɑk, k t dɑɑ di fei u buol yuo nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ jen nɑ.
62002029	I mi nɑn Klistu tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn, ŋɑɑn l mun biɑ ŋɑn k i bɑnn nɑn dɑɑnsuɑ nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn nɑ tie Yennu bik e.
62003001	Lek gotl mɑn lonbuolu nbɑ k Bɑɑ Yennu mɑntk luon’t nɑ. U lonm mɑnŋ mɑntk ji sɑɑ yɑbt e, k u yi’t u wɑɑs, k t set tie u wɑɑs e. Tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb k mi’t, k mɑɑn b k mi ŋuɑ Yennu.
62003002	N yuɑsnbɑ, mɔtɑɑnɑ t tie Yennu wɑɑs e, ŋɑɑn tɑɑ tɑn sii tie biɑnŋ nbɑ dɑɑ bɔl e. Ŋɑɑn tɑɑ mi lin nbɑ e nɑ: Klistu i tɑnŋ i dɔkt, t tɑn sii tie nɑn ŋuɑ nɑ e, k mɑɑn t sɑɑ lɑ wɑɑ set tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
62003003	Nilɔ kul nbɑ mɔk dindɑnn nɑn u jenu nɑ, k mɔk biit nɑn Yiesu nbɑ k mɔk biit biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
62003004	Dɑɑnsuɑ kul nbɑ tuun biit biil Yennu senni e. Setk nɑn mɔni, biit tie Yennu senni biilu e.
62003005	I mi nɑn Yiesu Klistu din bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ɑ wun nyinn t biit e, k biit kɑɑ u ni.
62003006	Wun nbɑ be u ni nɑ k tuun biit. Wun nbɑ tuun biit, k mi lɑ Yiesu k biɑ k mi’u.
62003007	N wɑɑs, i dɑɑ sɑɑk k suɑ n kpɑnn’i ni. Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn Yennu buol ni nɑ, mun tie niŋɑnɔ Yennu buol e nɑn Yiesu nbɑ tie Ŋɑnɔ u buol nɑ.
62003008	Wun nbɑ tuun biit, ŋuɑ e tie Sɑɑtɑn yuɑ k mɑɑn Sɑɑtɑn din piin k tuun biit tingbounŋ pinpiik ninŋ e. Yennu Bijɑ Yiesu set din bɑɑl ɑ wun biil Sɑɑtɑn tuonɑ e.
62003009	Wun nbɑ tie Yennu bik, u ji k tuun biit, k mɑɑn yiikuo nbɑ nyii Yennu buol nɑ be u ni, k mɑɑn Yennu tie u Bɑɑ. L pɑɑk k u ji kɑn fit kii tuun biit.
62003010	Dɑɑnsuɑ nbɑ k tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn k tie Yennu bik, k dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k luon u nɑɑ bik biɑ k tie Yennu bik kɑɑ. Nnɑ e k t mi bin nbɑ tie Yennu wɑɑs nɑn bin nbɑ tie Sɑɑtɑn wɑɑs.
62003011	L ŋɑn k tii mɔk lonm nɑn t lieb. Ŋɑnn e tie mɑɑn nbɑ k i din gbɑt pinpiik ni nɑ.
62003012	L k ŋɑn k tii tuun nɑn Kɑɑen nbɑ din tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Ŋuɑ din tie pol yuɑ e, k din kpii u wɑɑlɔ. Biɑ pɑɑk e te k u din kpii’u? U tiɑɔnŋ tuonɑ din bi ŋɑɑn k u wɑɑlɔ yɑl ŋɑn.
62003013	Tɔn, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, l i tie k tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb nɑn’i, i dɑɑ te k l tie’i bɑktnɔunŋ.
62003014	T mi nɑn t nyii kuun ni ŋɑɑn kuɑ mɑnfuol ni e, k mɑɑn t luon t nɑɑ wɑɑs. Wun nbɑ k mɔk lonm u pɑl ni nɑ be kuun ni e.
62003015	Wun nbɑ mun nɑn u nɑɑ bik nɑ, tie nikpiiluk o, k i mi nɑn mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu kɑɑ u ni.
62003016	Gotl mɑn, Yiesu nbɑ din gɑɑl t pɑɑk k kpo nɑ e wɑnt’t lonm nbɑ tie lin nbɑ, k l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k tii gɑɑn t nɑɑ wɑɑs pɑɑk kii kpenn.
62003017	Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ mɔk, ŋɑɑn lɑ u nɑɑ bik k u k mɔk siɑl, k u bɑkɑ kɑɑ u ni, nlee k u sɑɑ yet ɑ, Yennu lonm be u ni?
62003018	N wɑɑs, l k ŋɑn k t lonm i be t mɔi ni nɑn t mɔbonɑ ni kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k lii tie bɑlmɔni lonm nbɑ k nilɔ sɑɑ fit lɑ t tuonɑ ni.
62003019	Gotl bɑnnu nbɑ k t sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn t wɑɑ bɑlmɔni, nɑn bɑnnu nbɑ k t mɔk pɑlmɑnn Yennu buol.
62003020	L i tie k t dudukt tɑl’t, t mi nɑn Yennu cie t dudukt k biɑ mi bonsiɑl kul.
62003021	Tɔn, n yuɑsnbɑ, t dudukt i kii wɑnn’t nɑn t mɔk biit, t mɔk pɑlmɑnn Yennu buol,
62003022	k t lɑɑt lin nbɑ kul k t mei’ɔ l po k mɑɑn t sɑɑk u senni k tuun lin nbɑ pent u pɑl.
62003023	Yennu nbɑ senn lin nbɑ e nɑ: ɑ t tien u Bijɑ Yiesu Klistu yɑdɑ kii luon t lieb nɑn wɑɑ din senn’t senni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
62003024	Wun nbɑ sɑɑk Yennu senni nɑ be u ni k Yennu mun biɑ be u ni. Wɑɑ din tul’t Foŋɑnm nɑ pɑɑk k t mi nɑn u be t ni.
62004001	N yuɑsnbɑ, i dɑɑ tie nisiɑb kul nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ b mɔk Foŋɑnm nɑ mɑɑn yɑdɑ, ŋɑɑn biknt’b mɑn, k got lɑɑn sei mɑnŋ nyii Yennu buol ni ɑmi siɑl buol e? K mɑɑn fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ yɑt gbie tingbounŋ nɑ wɑɑ.
62004002	Gotl mɑn bɑnnu nbɑ k i sɑɑ fit bɑnn nɑn nilɔ mɔk Foŋɑnm. Wun nbɑ kul yet, ɑ Yiesu Klistu din kpɑnt nisɑɑlk e, ŋuɑ e mɔk Siek nbɑ nyii Yennu penŋ.
62004003	Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ kul yet ɑ lin nbɑ nɑ k tie mɔni k jiin Yiesu po nɑ, k mɔk Siek nbɑ nyii Yennu penŋ. L dɑɑnɔ siek tie Klistu Dɑtɑɑk yɑl e. I ponŋ din gbɑt nɑn Klistu Dɑtɑɑk bɑɑt, k mɔtɑɑnɑ u ponŋ set be tingbounŋ nɑ ni.
62004004	N wɑɑs, yinm tie Yennu yɑb e. I kɔn k nyɑnn fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ wɑɑ. K mɑɑn siek nbɑ be i ni nɑ mɔk pɑnŋ k gɑl siek nbɑ be niib nbɑ tie dulnyɑ nɑ yɑb ni nɑ.
62004005	Fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ nɑ e tie tingbounŋ nɑ yɑb. L pɑɑk e te k b piɑk tingbounŋ nnɑ mɑɑn, k tingbounŋ nɑ yɑb fiin b po.
62004006	Ŋɑɑn tinm ŋɑnin tie Yennu yɑb e, k bin nbɑ mi Yennu, ŋɑnm e fiin t mɑɑn po. Ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ k tie Yennu yɑb, b k fiin t mɑɑn po. Ŋɑnn e te k t bɑnt bɑlmɔni Siek nɑn fɑɑk Siek.
62004007	N yuɑsnbɑ, tii luon t lieb mɑn, k mɑɑn lonm nyii Yennu penŋ e, k wun nbɑ mɔk lonm nɑ, tie Yennu bik e k biɑ mi’u.
62004008	Wun nbɑ k mɔk lonm u k mi Yennu, k mɑɑn Yennu tie lonm e.
62004009	Gotl bɑnnu nbɑ k Yennu wɑnn’t u lonm. U din tun u Bijɑyenml tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ɑ tin lɑ mɑnfuol u pɑɑk.
62004010	Lonm nbɑ tie lonm nɑn bɑlmɔni tie nnɑ e: l k tie ɑ tinm kɑɑ din luon Yennu, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ e din luon tinm, k tun u Bijɑ, ɑ u mɑlunŋ pɑɑk tin lɑ t biit nyikcɑbu.
62004011	N yuɑsnbɑ, Yennu nbɑ luon’t biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k tii mun ii luon t lieb nnɑ.
62004012	Suɑ k mi lɑ Yennu, ŋɑɑn t i luon lieb i e, Yennu be t ni, k u lonm tuun t ni nɑn bɑlmɔni.
62004013	Gotl bɑnnu nbɑ k t mi nɑn t be Yennu ni k u biɑ be t ni. U din tul’t Foŋɑnm e.
62004014	K t din lɑ k biɑ muɑntl, ɑ Bɑɑ din tun u Bijɑ, ɑ Bijɑ mɑnŋ ii tie tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb Fietuɑ.
62004015	L i tie k suɑ yet, ɑ Yiesu tie Yennu Bijɑ, Yennu be u ni, k u mun biɑ be Yennu ni.
62004016	K t mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mun bɑnn Yennu nbɑ luon’t biɑnŋ nbɑ, k biɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑn u set luon’t. Yennu tie lonm e, k dɑɑnɔ nbɑ be lonm nɑ ni, ŋuɑ e be Yennu ni, k Yennu mun biɑ be u ni.
62004017	L i tie k lonm be t ni nɑn bɑlmɔni, t sii mɔk pɑlcienn buut dɑɑl, k mɑɑn t binbenŋ dulnyɑ ni tie nɑn Yiesu yɑl nɑ e.
62004018	T i mɔk lonm, jijiet sii kɑɑ. L i tie k lonm mɑntk be nɑn mɔni mɔni, jijiet kɑn lɑ yɑɑk kii be t ni. L i tie k nilɔ mɔk jijiet, u k mɔk lonm nɑn bɑlmɔni, k mɑɑn tubdɑtu pɑɑk e k t tuu jie.
62004019	Ŋɑɑn tinm ŋɑnin, t mɔk lonm k mɑɑn Yennu e din sint mɔk lonm nɑn tinm.
62004020	Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ u luon Yennu, ŋɑɑn biɑ nɑn u nɑɑ bik, u tie fɑɑk dɑɑnɔ e. L i tie k u k luon u nɑɑ bik nbɑ k u lɑɑt’ɔ nɑ, nlee k u sii luon Yennu nbɑ k u k lɑɑt’ɔ nɑ?
62004021	Sennu nbɑ k Klistu senn e nɑ: wun nbɑ luon Yennu, sie k u luon u nɑɑ bik.
62005001	Wun nbɑ kul tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yiesu tie Klistu nɑ, l dɑɑnɔ tie Yennu bik e. K dɑɑnɔ nbɑ luon nisuɑ, u biɑ sii luon nilɔ mɑnŋ wɑɑs e.
62005002	L i tie k t luon Yennu k tuun u senni nbɑ wɑnt bɑnnu nbɑ, ŋɑnn e wɑnt nɑn t luon u wɑɑs,
62005003	k l ii biɑ kii tie k t diɑ u senni, ŋɑnn e wɑnt nɑn t luon’ɔ, k u senni mɑnŋ k pɑɑl,
62005004	k mɑɑn Yennu wɑɑs kul sɑɑ fit nyɑnn dulnyɑ wɑɑ. Tɑɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e, k t nyɑnn dulnyɑ.
62005005	K ŋmee sɑɑ fit nyɑnn dulnyɑ? Wun nbɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yiesu tie Yennu Bijɑ kuukuɑ.
62005006	Ŋuɑ Yiesu Klistu e tie wun nbɑ din bɑɑl nɑn nyun nɑn sɔn. U din k bɑɑl nɑn nyun kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u din bɑɑl nɑn sɔn mun biɑk. K Foŋɑnm tie siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ, k mɑɑn Foŋɑnm tie bɑlmɔni e.
62005007	Tɔn, bonɑ ŋɑntɑ e be k tie siɑlɑ,
62005008	Foŋɑnm nɑn nyun nɑn sɔn, k l bonɑ ŋɑntɑ mɑnŋ kul tɑɑn tie siɑlɑ mɑnŋ.
62005009	T gɑɑn niib siɑlɑ, ŋɑɑn Yennu siɑlɑ e ŋɑn k cie niib yɑl k mɑɑn l tie siɑlɑ nbɑ k Yennu tien k jiin u Bijɑ mɑnŋ po.
62005010	Wun nbɑ tien Yennu Bijɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ, ŋuɑ e mɔk Yennu siɑlɑ mɑnŋ u pɑl ni, k wun nbɑ k tien u siɑlɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ, u tien’ɔ fɑɑk dɑɑnɔ e nɑ, k mɑɑn u k tien yɑdɑ nɑn siɑlɑ nbɑ k Yennu tien u Bijɑ po nɑ tie mɔni.
62005011	Yennu siɑlɑ mɑnŋ tie nnɑ e, u tul’t mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k mɑnfuol mɑnŋ nyi u Bijɑ Yiesu ni e.
62005012	Wun nbɑ mɔk Yennu Bijɑ nɑ, ŋuɑ e mun mɔk mɑnfuol mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ k mɔk Yennu Bijɑ mɑnŋ, u k mɔk l mɑnfuol.
62005013	N dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien yinm nbɑ tien Yennu Bijɑ sɑnn yɑdɑ, k mɑɑn n luon k i bɑnn nɑn i mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
62005014	Gotl lin nbɑ te k t mɔk pɑlcienn Yennu tuɑnn. T mi nɑn t i miɑl’ɔ lin nbɑ tɑɑ nɑn wɑɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ po, u gɑɑn t miɑlu.
62005015	K t i mi nɑn u gɑɑn t miɑlu, tɑɑ miɑl’ɔ lin nbɑ kul po nɑ, t mi nɑn t ponŋ gɑɑl lin nbɑ k t mei’ɔ l po nɑ wɑɑ.
62005016	Suɑ i lɑɑt u nɑɑ bik k u tuun biit nbɑ kɑn bɑɑl nɑn kuun, l dɑɑnɔ ii mei Yennu u pɑɑk, k Yennu sɑɑ tul biitdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ mɑnfuol. Nɑ tie mɔni k tul bin nbɑ yɑɑ biit k bɑɑt nɑn kuun. Ŋɑɑn bisiɑt be, k bɑɑt nɑn kuun, k n k yɑɑ yii mei Yennu kii tien bin nbɑ tuun l biit buolu kɑɑ.
62005017	Tuonɑ kul nbɑ k ŋɑn lek tie biit e, ŋɑɑn bisiɑt be k kɑn bɑɑl nɑn kuun.
62005018	T mi nɑn bin nbɑ tie Yennu wɑɑs ji k tuun biit, k mɑɑn Yennu Bijɑ Yiesu guu’b, k Klistu dɑtɑɑk kɑn tien’m siɑl.
62005019	K t mi nɑn tinm tie Yennu yɑb e, k tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb kul nɑ be Klistu dɑtɑɑk yiikuo ni.
62005020	T mi nɑn Yennu Bijɑ din bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k tɑn tul’t yɑn, ɑ tii bɑnt bɑlmɔni Yennu. T be u ni u Bijɑ Yiesu Klistu nɑ pɑɑk e, k ŋuɑ e tie bɑlmɔni Yennu k biɑ tie mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
62005021	N wɑɑs, I dɑɑ mɑnn pɑtɑ.
63001001	Min nbɑ tie jɑɑnti sɑɑkuɑ nɑ e, dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien puo nbɑ k Yennu lukt’ɔ nɑ, nɑn u wɑɑs. N luon’i nɑn bɑlmɔni, k l k tie min kuukuɑ kɑɑ luon’i ni, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ kul nbɑ mi bɑlmɔni nɑ, b mun biɑ luon’i,
63001002	k mɑɑn bɑlmɔni be t ni k biɑ sii tun be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
63001003	Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn u Bijɑ Yiesu Klistu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn nyikcɑbu nɑn’t, k biɑ tul’t mɑnu, ɑ tii mɔk lin nbɑ nɑ kul, bɑlmɔni nɑn lonm sɔnu ni.
63001004	N dɑɑn mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn nɑn mɑɑ dɑɑn lɑ ɑ wɑsiɑt nbɑ k b wɑɑ bɑlmɔni nbɑ k Bɑɑ Yennu senn’t nɑ.
63001005	Cɑnnɑɑ, n mei’ɑ, ŋɑɑnt k t kul i luon t lieb. Lin nbɑ nɑ k tie sennpɑɑnu kɑɑ k n diɑn’ɑ ni, ŋɑɑn l tie sennu nbɑ k t din dɔnŋ gbiɑ l po pinpiik ni.
63001006	Lonm tie tii sɑɑk Yennu senni e, k sennu nbɑ k i din dɔnŋ gbiɑ l po pinpiik ni nɑ wɑɑ, tie k i wɑɑ lonm sɔnu.
63001007	Kpinkpɑnni dɑnm bonciɑnn ponŋ bɑɑl k yɑt sɑɑn siɑl po kul tingbounŋ nɑ ni wɑɑ, bin nbɑ yɑɑ, ɑ ŋɑnm k tien yɑdɑ, ɑ b mɑl Yiesu nisɑɑlk e. Wun nbɑ tuun l buolu tie kpinkpɑnni dɑɑnɔ, k biɑ tie Yiesu dɑtɑɑk.
63001008	L pɑɑk, ii cek mɑn, k tɑn dɑɑ kɔnŋt t tuonn nyuɑt, ŋɑɑn tɑn lɑ nyuɑt nbɑ yɑb.
63001009	Dɑɑnsuɑ nbɑ k gɑɑn Yiesu Klistu wɑnnu bonŋɑnn ŋɑɑn puki u mɔnŋ yɑl, u k gɑɑl Yennu, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ sɑɑk wɑnnu mɑnŋ k k nyikt, Bɑɑ nɑn Bijɑ kul be u ni.
63001010	L i tie k dɑɑnsuɑ nbɑ bɑɑl i buol ni, k k wɑnt wɑnnu mɑnŋ, i dɑɑ gɑɑn’ɔ i ŋei ni, k biɑ tɑɑn dɑɑ yien’ɔ, ɑ u nyinu po
63001011	k mɑɑn wun nbɑ fuont’ɔ, u mɔnŋ tɑɑnt dɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ biit po e nɑ.
63001012	N mɔk mɔbonɑ bonciɑnn k luon k n diɑn k tul’i, ŋɑɑn n k luon k n diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk ni kɑɑ k tul’i ni, ŋɑɑn n mɔk dindɑnn nɑn n sɑɑ bɑɑl k gɔn’i, k tin pɑk nɑn lieb mɔi ni, k tii mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn mɔni.
63001013	A niipuo wun nbɑ k Yennu gɑnn’ɔ nɑ, u wɑɑs fuont’ɑ.
64001001	Min nbɑ tie jɑɑnti sɑɑkuɑ nɑ e, dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien n yuɑk Gɑius nbɑ k n luon’ɔ bonciɑnn nɑ.
64001002	N yɔmɔnŋ, n bo luon nɑn fii be lɑɑfiɑ ni, k ɑ bonɑ kul i ŋɑn nɑn lɑɑ ŋɑn bɑnnu nbɑ fin nɑn Yennu sinsuuk ni nɑ.
64001003	N dɑɑn lɑ pɑlpienn bonciɑnn nɑn t nɑɑ wɑsiɑt nbɑ dɑɑn bɑɑl nnɑ, k tɑn yet’n fɑɑ wɑɑ bɑlmɔni fɑnu biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, nɑn fɑɑ tuu wɑɑ’l fɑnu nɑ.
64001004	Siɑl k penn n pɑl ni k mɑntk bɑɑl mɑɑ gbɑt ɑ n wɑɑs wɑɑ bɑlmɔni nɑ.
64001005	N yuɑk, fɑɑ sonmt t nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ tie sɑɑnm biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ɑ tuun lin nbɑ k bɑlmɔni sɔnu wɑnt’ɑ.
64001006	B dɑɑn pɑk ɑ bulcint mɑnŋ po Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib sinsuuk ni. N bɑln’mɑ e, fii sonmt’b kii ŋɑnmt b sɔnu bɑnnu nbɑ sɑɑ penn Yennu pɑl.
64001007	Setk nɑn mɔni, b dɑɑn sɑɑn sɔnu Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn pɑɑk k k gɑɑl sonmsiɑl bin nbɑ k tie Klistuweilɑ nɑ buol ni.
64001008	L pɑɑk, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k tinm Klistuweilɑ ii gɑɑn l nibuolu sɑɑɔnŋ. Nnɑ e k t nuu sii be tuonn nbɑ k b tuun k tien bɑlmɔni muɑntu nɑ ni.
64001009	N ponŋ mi diɑn bɑlsɑi nnɑ k tul Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be ɑ buol ni nɑ, ŋɑɑn k Diotlef nbɑ luon wun pul u mɔnŋ nijɑɑnn nɑ yien n mɔb.
64001010	L pɑɑk, mi i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, n sɑɑ fiit lin nbɑ kul k u tun, nɑn bonbisiɑl nɑn fɑɑk nbɑ k u pɑk k jiin t po nɑ. Ŋɑɑn biit mɑnŋ nbɑ k u tun nɑ, l lek k jɑnŋ’ɔ. U biɑ tuu yet wun gɑɑl t nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ tuu tɑn bɑɑl u buol ni, k biɑ k luon k u lieb ii gɑɑn’m, k tuu bel nyinn bin nbɑ gɑɑl sɑɑnm mɑnŋ sɑɑɔnŋ nɑ Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib sinsuuk ni.
64001011	N yuɑk, dɑɑ toki suɑ biit, ŋɑɑn kii tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn. Wun nbɑ tuun bonŋɑnn, u tie Yennu yuɑ e, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tuun biit, u k mi Yennu.
64001012	Suɑ kul piɑk Demetlius, k u benu nɑ e biɑ wɑnt nɑn u wɑɑ bɑlmɔni, k t mɔnŋ mun piɑk’ɔ, k ɑ mun mi nɑn t set tie bɑlmɔni dɑnm e.
64001013	N biɑ mɔk mɑɑn bonciɑnn k luon k n pɑk k tul’ɑ, ŋɑɑn n k luon k n diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk ni kɑɑ k tul’ɑ ni.
64001014	Ŋɑɑn n mɔk dindɑnn nɑn l kɑn wei k n tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl k lɑ’ɑ, k tin tɑn pɑk nɑn lieb mɔi ni.
64001015	Mɑnu ii be ɑ pɑɑk. T yuɑsnbɑ fuont’ɑ. T yuɑsnbɑ nbɑ mun biɑ be ɑ buol ni nɑ, ɑ fuont b suɑ kul.
65001001	Min Suud wun nbɑ tie Yiesu Klistu tuontunnɔ, k biɑ tie Sɑɑk ninjɑ nɑ e dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien niib nbɑ k Bɑɑ Yennu yiin’m k luon’m, k Yiesu Klistu guu’b nɑ.
65001002	Yennu n tin’i ninbɑɑɔk k tul’i mɑnu nɑn lonm bonciɑnn.
65001003	N yuɑsnbɑ, n ninbinn dɑɑn mɔn nɑn k n diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk k tul’i k sɑɑn gɑɑn fielu nbɑ tie t kul yɑl nɑ po. Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ l ji kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k n diɑn k cie i pɑlɑ. I yɑbl i mɔnŋ kii diɑ yɑdɑ nbɑ k Yennu din tul u niib kul tɑɑl yonm kuɑ nɑ.
65001004	K mɑɑn nibiit din kuɑ i sinsuuk ni wuol ni e, k lebtl Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ lɑbɑɑl, ɑ bin bɔl b gbɑnɑnt lonbiiuk tuonɑ nɑ. B yet bin wei Yiesu Klistu, wun nbɑ kuukuɑ tie t yudɑɑnɔ nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ. L wei wɑɑ, k b tubdɑtu ponŋ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni.
65001005	Mɑɑ yɑɑ n yet’i lin nbɑ nɑ, i ponŋ gbɑt l kul ɑ, k mi’l fɑnu, ŋɑɑn n luon k n tiɑl’i l po e. Yonmdɑɑnɔ din fɑt u niib k nyinn’b dɑɑbs ni Ejipt tinŋ ni, ŋɑɑn l puolpo u din kpii bin nbɑ din k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ wɑɑ.
65001006	Ii tiɑn mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nbɑ din k diɑ yiikuo nbɑ k Yennu din tul’b nɑn l sɔnu, k biɑ din yɑɑt k nyik b binbebuol nɑ po. Yennu bɑɑn’m bɑnt nbɑ sii be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ k lu’b sɑlk buotsunsunŋ nbɑ bɔn ni, k guu dɑgbenŋl nbɑ k u sɑɑ bu b buut nɑ.
65001007	Ii biɑk kii tiɑn doi nbɑ k b yi Suodonm nɑn Guomuɔl nɑ nɑn digbɑnɑ nbɑ kpiɑ l doi nɑ po mɑn. L doi niib din tuun tuonbiit nnɑ e. B din be yɑnɑ yɑnɑ nnɑ e, k duɑ nɑn lin nbɑ kuɑ. B tubdɑtu tie muu nbɑ di yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu e mɔtɑɑnɑ, ŋɑnm e tie nyinn k tul’i.
65001008	L nibuolu mun biɑ be i sinsuuk ni k tuun nɑn l doi ni niib nɑ. B duki fɑɑk bont po e, k wɑɑ b gbɑnɑnt niɑnbiit. B k cɔln Yomdɑɑnɔ yiikuo, k biɑ suki yɑbnt mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ.
65001009	Miisiɑl nbɑ din tie mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ sɑɑkuɑ nɑ, din k tun nnɑ. Ŋɑɑn u din kɔn nɑn Sɑɑtɑn e Muois gbɑnɑnt pɑɑk. Ŋɑɑn kɔnn mɑnŋ ni, u din k sukl’ɔ k pɑk k biil’ɔ, ŋɑɑn u din yet ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ n ŋmɑnn ɑ tubl.»
65001010	Ŋɑɑn l nibiit ŋɑnin suki lin nbɑ k b k bɑn e. Bɑɑ mi lin nbɑ, nɑn muuk ni bonkobt nbɑ k mɔk dudukt nɑ, sɑɑ nɑn’m biilu e.
65001011	Pɑlbiil be b pɑɑk. K mɑɑn b wei Kɑɑen sɔnu nɑ wɑɑ. Likli pɑɑk e k b k tɔkn sɔnu nbɑ tuok nɑ nɑn Bɑɑlɑɑnm nbɑ din tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. B biɑ yet Yennu mɔb nɑn Kole nbɑ din tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e k l biil’b.
65001012	Ŋɑnm e jɑkn jiet nbɑ k yinm Klistuweilɑ di nɑ. B bɑkɑ be b ni kuukuɑ e, k b k tiin fei. B tie nɑn sɑnpɑgbɑnt nbɑ k wounŋ gɑɑn’n k l k bɑɑt nɑn sɑɑk nɑ e. B tie nɑn tiini nbɑ k luon luɑnɑ l lonm yuo nɑ e, b kpo e k sɑɑ tɔl, k mɑɑn b jiinɑ kul fikt, k b kuol ɑ.
65001013	B tie nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nyunpɑnɑ nbɑ fi k pukl nɑn jɑknt nɑ e. B biɑ tie nɑn ŋmɑɑbilɑ nbɑ tuu ŋɑbl k lin nɑ e, k bunbɔnciɑɔnŋ nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu be k guu’b.
65001014	Enɔk, wun nbɑ wɑɑ Adɑn yɑɑbuonɑ bɑnlole ni nɑ din sɔkn k yet b po ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑn u mɑlɑkŋɑnm tusɑ tusɑ bɑɑt,
65001015	ɑ wun bu nifosɑɑlk kul buut, k biil bin nbɑ k tiin’ɔ nɑ b biit pɑɑk, nɑn b mɔyetu pɑɑk, nɑn bɑɑ piɑk biil Yennu nɑ pɑɑk.»
65001016	B tie bunbulmi dɑnm e, k b nunm k mi gbuo. B tuun b mɔnŋ lonbiit nbɑ wɑnt’b bɑnnu nbɑ e, k piɑk nɑn pɑlbifɑɑnt, k koln niib ɑ bin lɑ siɑl.
65001017	N yuɑsnbɑ, i tiɑn mɑn mɑɑn nbɑ k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu tuomiinbɑ din yet nɑ.
65001018	B din yet ɑ: «Dɑɑjuonti dɑɑ mɑnŋ ni, niib tɑn sii lɑɑ’i, k wɑɑ b mɔnŋ mɔnŋ gbɑnɑnt lonbiit.»
65001019	L nibuolu e bɑɑt nɑn bɔktu i sinsuuk ni. B gbɑnɑnt lonm kuukuɑ e diɑ’b, k Foŋɑnm kɑɑ b ni.
65001020	Ŋɑɑn n yuɑsnbɑ, i cie i pɑlɑ mɑn, i yɑdɑ nbɑ nyii Yennu tiɑɔnŋ buol ni nɑ pɑɑk, kii mei Yennu Foŋɑnm yiikuo ni,
65001021	kii tie niib nbɑ be Yennu lonm ni, kii guu yuo nbɑ k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu sɑɑ tul’i mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, u ninbɑtinu pɑɑk nɑ.
65001022	I tin bin nbɑ k b dudukt lɑnŋ nɑ ninbɑɑɔk,
65001023	k suol’b k nyinn’b muu ni. Lieb mun, i tin’m ninbɑɑɔk, k biɑ kii tiin’m jɑŋmɑɑni, ŋɑɑn kii nɑn b biit binbenŋ, kii sɑɑ kii nɑn, nɑn b tiɑt nbɑ mɔk b lonbiit dɔuk nɑ.
65001024	Yennu ii guu’i k i dɑɑ bɑɑ, k bɑɑl nɑn’i u tuɑnn yentsɑɑkɑl ni, k i dɑɑ mɔk biit, ŋɑɑn kii mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn.
65001025	Ŋuɑ nbɑ tie Yen-yenɔ kuɑ k fiel’t t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk nɑ, u yen dontl nɑn yɑbnt nɑn yiikuo nɑn yudɑnt, yuo nbɑ din gɑl nɑ, nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Amenn.
66001001	Mɑɑn nbɑ k Yiesu Klistu din fiit nɑ diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni e. Yennu din tul’ɔ mɑɑn mɑnŋ ɑ wun wɑnn u tuontunnɑ lin nbɑ sɑɑ tien l i yɑnn wɑɑn. Klistu din tun u mɑlɑkɑ u tuontunnɔ Sɑn buol ni, ɑ wun yet’ɔ mɑɑn mɑnŋ kul.
66001002	Sɑn din muɑnt lin nbɑ k u din lɑ nɑ kul k l tie mɑɑn nbɑ nyii Yennu buol ni, nɑn bɑlmɔni nbɑ k Yiesu Klistu din fiit k wɑnn’ɔ nɑ.
66001003	Wun nbɑ lii mɑɑn nbɑ nyii Yennu buol ni, k be kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni, pɑlpienn tie u yɑl e, k bin nbɑ gbiɑ mɑɑn mɑnŋ k sɑɑk’l, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e mun, k mɑɑn yuo pel, ɑ k lin nbɑ sɑɑ tun nɑ n tun.
66001004	Min Sɑn, min e dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ, k tien jiɑnti ŋɑnlole nbɑ be Asii tinŋ ni nɑ. Yennu n tul’i yetŋɑnm k biɑ tul’i mɑnu, ŋuɑ nbɑ be, k din be, k biɑ bɑɑt nɑ. U sei ŋɑnlole nbɑ be u nɑɑngbounŋ tuɑnn nɑ,
66001005	nɑn Yiesu Klistu n tul’i l bonɑ. Ŋuɑ Yiesu e tie siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ nɑn mɔni. U tie bikpelk e, k biɑ din fiil kpienm sinsuuk ni. U biɑ tie tingbounŋ kpɑnbɑlɑ Kpɑnbɑl e. Yiesu Klistu luon’t k biɑ din nyinn tinm t biit ni nɑn u sɔn.
66001006	U din te k t tie Yennu nɑɑn ni niib, k biɑ te k t tie mɑnntieb ɑ tii tuun kii tien u Bɑɑ Yennu. Ŋuɑ Yiesu e yen yudɑnt nɑn yiikuo yuo kul ɑ. Amenn.
66001007	Gotl mɑn, ŋuɑ e be sɑnpɑgbɑnt ni k bɑɑt nɑ. Suɑ kul ninbinɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ’u nɑn bin nbɑ din ŋmuu’u nɑ, k tingbounŋ nɑ nibuolu kul tɑn sɑɑ bui u pɑɑk. L sɑɑ tien nnɑ wɑɑ. Amenn
66001008	Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu, nbɑ mɔk yiikuo kul, k be, k din be, k biɑ tɑn sii be yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ, ŋuɑ e yien ɑ: «Min e tie Alfɑ nɑn Omeegɑ.»
66001009	Min e tie Sɑn, i nɑɑ bik nɑ, k mɑɑ be Klistu ni nɑ, n tɑɑ nɑn’i k di fɑlɑ, k biɑ be Yennu nɑɑn ni, k guu nɑn suklu. Mɑɑ din lin k muɑntl Yennu mɑɑn nɑn Yiesu siɑlɑ nɑ, k b din jii’n k sɑɑn nɑn’n Pɑɑtmuos tinŋ nbɑ k nyun lint’l nɑ ni.
66001010	L din tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ dɑɑl k Foŋɑnm fiil n ni, k n gbɑt kunkɔpɑɑll n puolpo k l bui nɑn kɑtkɑɑk nɑ.
66001011	Kunkɔl mɑnŋ yet ɑ: «Diɑnt lin nbɑ k ɑ lɑɑt nɑ k tien kɑdɑɑɔk ni, k nɑkn k tul Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be digbɑnɑ ŋɑnlole nɑ ni. Bin nbɑ be Efes nɑn Simiilinn nɑn Pelgɑnm nɑn Tiɑtiil nɑn Sɑɑlt nɑn Fiilɑdelfi nɑn Lɑodiise nɑ.»
66001012	K n ŋmɑnt k yɑɑ n got wun nbɑ piɑk k tien’n nɑ. Ŋɑnn e k n lɑ sɑlmɑ fitɑ ŋɑnlole k l sie.
66001013	K suɑ be l sinsuuk ni k nɑɑn nɑn nisɑɑlk nɑ, k liɑ liɑtfuouk k l tɑn siit u tɑɑbilɑ, k sɑlmɑ gbɑnn buob u nyɑɑɔk ni,
66001014	k u yut pien nɑn gungunt nɑ, k u ninbinɑ nɑɑn nɑn mupienu nɑ. K u tɑɑ nyili nɑn kut nbɑ k b tuu yɑkn muu pɑɑk k lin nɑnn k nyili biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. K kunkɔl guɑl nɑn kpenu ni nyunmɔnn nbɑ tuu kuon biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
66001015	K u tɑɑ nyili nɑn kut nbɑ k b yi’l blɔns nɑ, k u kunkɔl guɑl nɑn kpenu ni nyunmɔnn nbɑ tuu kuon biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
66001016	K u kub ŋmɑɑbilɑ ŋɑnlole u niidiitu ni, k juk-bɑnjiɑk nbɑ di mɔliemi tɑnt nyii u mɔb ni, k u nunpo yien nɑn yennu nbɑ tuu yien yensuuk ni nɑ.
66001017	Mɑɑ lɑ’u yuo nbɑ k n bɑɑ duɑl u tuɑnn nɑn kpiemɔ nɑ. K u jii u niidiitu k yii n pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «Dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. Min e tie bont kul ɑ pinpiik nɑn l gbennu.
66001018	N tie Fuotɔ nɑ e. N din kpo wɑɑ, k n ji fo k sii fo nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k n mɔk yiikuo kuun nɑn kpientinŋ pɑɑk.
66001019	L pɑɑk, diɑnt lin nbɑ k ɑ lɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑn lin nbɑ tun mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑn lin nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ tun yuo nbɑ wɑɑ.
66001020	Ŋmɑɑbilɑ ŋɑnlole nbɑ k ɑ lɑ n niidiitu ni nɑ nɑn sɑlmɑ fitɑ ŋɑnlole nɑ wuol ni pɑɑk tie nnɑ e: ŋmɑɑbilɑ ŋɑnlole nɑ e tie n mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be digbɑnɑ ŋɑnlole nɑ mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ, k fitɑ ŋɑnlole nɑ mun tie n mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be digbɑnɑ ŋɑnlole mɑnŋ nɑ.»
66002001	«Diɑnt k tul Efes jɑɑnti mɑlɑkɑ ɑ: ‹Wun nbɑ diɑ ŋmɑɑbilɑ ŋɑnlole u niidiitu ni k biɑ sonm fitɑ ŋɑnlole sinsuuk ni nɑ lɑbɑɑl e nɑ:
66002002	N mi ɑ tuonɑ po nɑn fɑɑ yɑbl k tuun tuonŋɑnɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k mi ɑ suklu po. N biɑ mi nɑn ɑ k luon nibiit nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ. A din bikn bin nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ b tie tuomiinbɑ ŋɑɑn k k tie nɑ, k mi nɑn b tie fɑidɑnm e.
66002003	A mɔk suklu k biɑ dii fɑlɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ k nyik’n.
66002004	Ŋɑɑn gotl lin nbɑ k n tɑɑl’ɑ l pɑɑk: ɑ ji k luon’n nɑn fɑɑ din dɔnŋ luon’n sinsinn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
66002005	Tiɑt fɑɑ din tuu be biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ŋɑɑn ji tɑn lebt k nyik’l nɑ. Mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ ŋɑɑn kii tuun tuonɑ nbɑ k ɑ din tuun sinsinn nɑ. L i tie k ɑ k mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, n sɑɑ bɑɑl ɑ buol ni k nyinn ɑ fitl lɑɑ tuu be siɑn nbɑ nɑ.
66002006	Ŋɑɑn fɑɑ tuun lin nbɑ k l ŋɑn e nɑ. A k luon Niikolɑiitnbɑ nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ nɑ, nɑn mɑɑ mun k luon biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e.›
66002007	«Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nɑ yien k tien jiɑnti nɑ. «Wun nbɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu nɑ, ŋuɑ e k n sɑɑ cɑb’ɔ wun di tiik nbɑ tien niib mɑnfuol k be Yennu gɔktuk ni nɑ luɑnɑ.»
66002008	«Diɑnt k tul Simiilinn jɑɑnti mɑlɑkɑ ɑ: ‹Wun nbɑ din sint, k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ juont, k din kpo k biɑ fiil kuun ni nɑ lɑbɑɑl e nɑ:
66002009	N mi ɑ fɑlɑ po, k biɑ mi nɑn ɑ tie nɑndɑɑnɔ e, ŋɑɑn mɔmɔnm, ɑ tie mɔktɔ e, k n mi nɑn nisiɑb piɑk k biil ɑ sɑnn, k biɑ yɑɑ ɑ b tie Suifnbɑ e, ŋɑɑn k k tie nnɑ. B tie Sɑɑtɑn mɔtɑɑɔk niib e.
66002010	A dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni nɑn fɑlɑ nbɑ bɑɑt ɑ pɑɑk nɑ. Sɑɑtɑn sɑɑ kuɑn i siɑb dɑnsɑlk ni k bikn’m. I tɑn sɑɑ lɑ muksuk fɑlɑ k sɑɑ diɑn dɑɑ piik. Ii wɑɑ n mɔb, k l i lek i tie kuun i e, k n tɑn sɑɑ pi’ɑ mɑnfuol foklk.›
66002011	«Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nɑ yien k tien jiɑnti nɑ. «Wun nbɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu mɑnŋ, u kɑn lɑ kuun nbɑ pukn munle nɑ.»
66002012	«Diɑnt k tul Pelgɑnm jɑɑnti mɑlɑkɑ ɑ: ‹Gotl lɑbɑɑl nbɑ nyii wun nbɑ mɔk juk-bɑnjiɑk nbɑ di mɔliemi nɑ buol ni e nɑ:
66002013	N mi nɑn siɑn nbɑ k ɑ kɑl nɑ tie siɑn nbɑ k Sɑɑtɑn nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ be. A set wɑɑ n mɑɑn. B din tɑn kpii Antiipɑɑs nbɑ din tie n siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ, ɑ mɔnŋ duo nbɑ k Sɑɑtɑn be nɑ ni e. L yuo, ɑ din k nyik yɑdɑ nbɑ k ɑ tien’n nɑ.
66002014	Ŋɑɑn ɑ mɔk biit ŋɑnle nnɑ e k n sɑɑ tɑɑl’ɑ: ɑ mɔk nisiɑb nbɑ wɑɑ Bɑɑlɑɑnm wɑnnu. Ŋuɑ e din wɑnn Bɑlɑk bɑnnu nbɑ k u sɑɑ jɑnm Islɑɑeltieb ɑ bin biil Yennu senni k di pɑtɑ nɑnt k biɑ tun boncuncontuonɑ.
66002015	Nnɑ e biɑk ɑ mɔk nisiɑb nbɑ wɑɑ Niikolɑiitnbɑ wɑnnu.
66002016	L pɑɑk, mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ. Nnɑ i kɑɑ, l i yɑnn wɑɑn, n sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑn juk-bɑnjiɑk nbɑ tɑntl k nyi n mɔb ni nɑ, k kɔn nɑn niib nɑ.›
66002017	«Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nɑ yien k tien jiɑnti nɑ. «Wun nbɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu nɑ, ŋuɑ e k n sɑɑ tul’ɔ jiet nbɑ k b bɔl ɑ k l sɑnn yi mɑnn nɑ, k n biɑ sɑɑ tul’ɔ tɑnpienn nbɑ k sɑnpɑɑnn diɑn l pɑɑk k suɑ k mi’l nɑ, sie fin nbɑ gɑɑl’l nɑ kuukuɑ.»
66002018	«Diɑnt k tul Tiɑtiil jɑɑnti mɑlɑkɑ ɑ: ‹Lɑbɑɑl nɑ nyii Yennu Bijɑ nbɑ k u ninbinɑ nɑɑn nɑn mupienu nɑ, k u tɑɑ nyili nɑn kut nbɑ k b yi’l blɔns nɑ.
66002019	N mi ɑ tuonɑ po, k biɑ mi ɑ lonm nɑn ɑ yɑdɑ nɑn tuonɑ nbɑ k ɑ tuun k tien Yennu niib, nɑn fɑɑ mɔk suklu biɑnŋ nbɑ, k biɑ mi nɑn ɑ tuonɑ nbɑ k ɑ tuun k tien lieb nɑ po.
66002020	Ŋɑɑn ɑ biit nbɑ k n sɑɑ tɑɑl’ɑ l pɑɑk tie nnɑ e: fɑɑ sɑk k puo nbɑ k b yi’u Sesɑɑbel k u yi u mɔnŋ Yennu sɔkni nɑ i be i buol ni. U wɑnnu ni e k u kpɑnn n tuontunnɑ, ɑ bii tuun boncuncontuonɑ kii di jiet nbɑ tie pɑtɑ yɑl.
66002021	N tul’ɔ yuo ɑ wun mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ k nyik u cunconsn, ŋɑɑn u k sɑɑk.
66002022	L pɑɑk, n sɑɑ jii’u k lu’u fɑlɑ gɑdo pɑɑk, k l i tie k bin nbɑ conm nɑn’ɔ nɑ k mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ k nyi biit mɑnŋ ni, n sɑɑ kuɑn’m fɑlgbenŋl ni,
66002023	k n biɑ sɑɑ kpi u wɑɑs, k nnɑ e k Yiesu mɔtɑɑɔk niib kul sii mi nɑn n tie wun nbɑ mi nisɑɑli dudukt, k biɑ mi lin nbɑ be b pɑlɑ ni, k n tɑn sɑɑ pɑ suɑ kul u tuonɑ nyuɑt nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
66002024	‹Ŋɑɑn yinm nbɑ be Tiɑtiil k k wɑɑ puo mɑnŋ wɑnnu, k biɑ k wɑɑ lin nbɑ k siɑb yi’l Sɑɑtɑn wuol ni lɑbɑɑl nɑ, n yien yinm e, ɑ n kɑn jinn’i jik-kpiɑtliɑ.
66002025	Ŋɑɑn ii diɑ mɑn lin nbɑ k i mɔk nɑ fɑnu mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k n tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ.
66002026	Wun nbɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu nɑ, k tuun mɑɑ luon lin nbɑ k kɑn nyik, n sɑɑ tul’ɔ yiikuo nbɑ k n gɑɑl n Bɑɑ buol ni nɑ buolu, u sii mɔk tingbounŋ nɑ tini kul yiikuo. U yiikuo sii tie nɑn kut pɑtu nɑ e, k u sɑɑ fɑɑ’b k bil’b nɑn bɑɑ fɑɑ bobɑ k yie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
66002028	N biɑ sɑɑ cɑb l dɑɑnɔ sɑn-nyɑfɑɑl ŋmɑɑbil.› »
66002029	«Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nɑ yien k tien jiɑnti nɑ.»
66003001	«Diɑnt k tul Sɑɑlt jɑɑnti mɑlɑkɑ ɑ: ‹Lɑbɑɑl nɑ nyii wun nbɑ mɔk Yennu Sei ŋɑnlole nɑn ŋmɑɑbilɑ ŋɑnlole nɑ buol e. N mi ɑ tuonɑ po, k biɑ mi nɑn niib duki ɑ ɑ fo, ŋɑɑn k ɑ kpo wɑɑ.
66003002	Fiit k yɑbl k lin nbɑ tenn ɑ buol ni dɑɑ kpenn k gbent, k mɑɑn tuonɑ nbɑ k ɑ tuun nɑ k gbuot Yennu nunm.
66003003	Ii tiɑn tumiu nbɑ k ɑ din gbɑt k biɑ din gɑɑl nɑ. Ii diɑ’l kii biɑ kii mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn kii lebtl binbenŋ. L i tie k ɑ k fiil, n sɑɑ bɑɑl ɑ buol ni nɑn nɑn-yukɔ nbɑ tuu bɑɑl biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e, k ɑ kɑn bɑnn n bɑɑlu yuo.
66003004	Ŋɑɑn nisiɑb be Sɑɑld k b tiɑt k kuɑ jɑknt. Ŋɑnm e sɑɑ liɑ tɑpieni k ŋɑnm nɑn min ii sonm, k mɑɑn bɑɑ ŋɑn nɑn’n nɑ pɑɑk.
66003005	Wun nbɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu mɑnŋ nɑ, u tɑn sɑɑ liɑ tɑpieni nɑ, k n tɑn kɑn piin u sɑnn mɑnfopɑɑnn dɑnm kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni, k n tɑn sɑɑ yet n Bɑɑ nɑn u mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑ pɑɑnu ni ɑ l dɑɑnɔ tie n yuɑ e.›
66003006	«Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nɑ yien k tien jiɑnti nɑ.»
66003007	«Diɑnt k tul Fiilɑdelfi jɑɑnti mɑlɑkɑ ɑ: ‹Gotl, lɑbɑɑl nɑ nyii wun nbɑ tie Ŋɑnɔ, k biɑ tie Bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ nɑ buol e, k u diɑ kpɑnbɑl Dɑɑfiid pienu k lin nbɑ k u luot nɑ, suɑ kɑn fit luon, k lin nbɑ kul k u luon nɑ, suɑ kɑn fit luot.
66003008	N mi ɑ tuonɑ po. Gotl, n senn gɑnn nbɑ yɑɑ e, ɑ tuɑnn k suɑ kɑn fit luon. N mi nɑn ɑ k mɔk pɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn ɑ sɑk n mɑɑn nɑ k dɑɑ kpet nɑn mɔbonn ɑ.
66003009	Gotl, bin nbɑ tie Sɑɑtɑn mɔtɑɑɔk niib, fɑidɑnm nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ b tie Suifnbɑ ŋɑɑn k k tie nɑ, n sɑɑ te k bin bɑɑl k tɑn gbɑɑn ɑ tuɑnn po, k bɑnn nɑn n set luon’ɑ.
66003010	K mɑɑn fɑɑ sɑk n mɑɑn k mɔk mintl nɑ pɑɑk, n sɑɑ diɑ’ɑ bonŋɑnn k ɑ tɑn kɑn kuɑ bonbiil nbɑ bɑɑt tingbounŋ nɑ kul pɑɑk, ɑ lin bikn tingbounŋ nɑ niib nɑ ni.
66003011	N sɑɑ bɑɑl mɔtɑɑnɑ. I diɑ lin nbɑ k ɑ mɔk nɑ fɑnu k suɑ tɑn dɑɑ fiɑl ɑ nɑɑn foklk.
66003012	Wun nbɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu nɑ, n sɑɑ tien’ɔ n Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni jɑɑntɑlk, k u ji kɑn nyi lenŋ. K n biɑ sɑɑ diɑn n Yennu sɑnn u pɑɑk, k diɑn n Yennu duo sɑnn u pɑɑk, k biɑ diɑn n mɔnŋ sɑnpɑɑnn nɑ u pɑɑk. Yennu duo mɑnŋ e tie Selusɑɑlenm pɑɑnn nbɑ sɑɑ nyi Yendɔunŋ ni Yennu buol ni nɑ, k tɑn sik tinŋ nɑ ni.› »
66003013	«Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nɑ yien k tien jiɑnti nɑ.»
66003014	«Diɑnt k tul Lɑodiise jɑɑnti mɑlɑkɑ ɑ: ‹Lɑbɑɑl nɑ nyii wun nbɑ sɑnn yi Amenn nɑ buol e, k u tie bɑlmɔni siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ k ɑ fit tien u mɑɑn nɑ yɑdɑ. Ŋuɑ e tie Yennu nɑɑmi nɑ kul ɑ yudɑɑnɔ:
66003015	N mi ɑ tuonɑ po. A k mei, k biɑ k ton. N bo sii luon k fii tie l yenn e.
66003016	L pɑɑk, fɑɑ k ton k biɑ k mei nɑ, n sɑɑ siil’ɑ n mɔb ni.
66003017	A yien ɑ, ɑ tie mɔktɔ e k mɔk lin nbɑ kul k ɑ luon, ɑ k siɑl kɑn pɔt’ɑ ni. Ŋɑɑn ɑ k mi fɑɑ mɔk pɑlbiil nɑn ninbɑɑɔk biɑnŋ nbɑ. A tie nɑndɑɑnɔ e, k sonm yɑnn, k tie juɑnŋ.
66003018	L pɑɑk, n kpɑɑn’ɑ e, bɑɑt n buol k dɑɑ sɑlmɑ nbɑ k b kuɑn muu ni k nyinn l jɑknt nɑ k set lɑ mɔktuk, k biɑ dɑɑ tɑpieni k dɔkn ɑ fei nɑ, k biɑ dɑɑ kpɑn k bɑnŋ ɑ ninbinɑ nɑ kii lɑɑt.
66003019	Bin nbɑ kul k n luon’m nɑ, n kpɑɑn’m kpɑɑni k dɑɑl b tubɑ. L pɑɑk, ɑ dɑɑ jeln, ŋɑɑn mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ.
66003020	Nnɑlɑ, n sie tɑnmɔb nɑ ni k kpɑɑn gɑnn. Wun nbɑ gbɑt n kunkɔl k luot gɑnn mɑnŋ, n sɑɑ kuɑ, k min nɑn ŋuɑ sɑɑ lɑkn di.
66003021	Wun nbɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu nɑ, n sɑɑ tul’ɔ yiikuo k wun tɑn lɑkn kɑl nɑn’n n nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ pɑɑk nɑn mɑɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu kul k lɑkn kɑl nɑn n Bɑɑ u nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ pɑɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.’»
66003022	«Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nɑ yien k tien jiɑnti nɑ.»
66004001	L puolpo k n biɑ lɑ Yendɔunŋ ni gɑnn k l yɑɑ, k n gbɑt kunkɔl nbɑ k n ponŋ gbɑt nɑ k l biɑ piɑk k tien’n k nɑɑn nɑn kɑtkɑɑk nbɑ tuu mɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k kunkɔl mɑnŋ yet ɑ: «Don nnɑ k n wɑnn’ɑ lin nbɑ sɑɑ tun l puolpo.»
66004002	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Foŋɑnm nɑ fiil n ni, k n lɑ k suɑ kɑl nɑɑngbounŋ pɑɑk Yendɔunŋ ni,
66004003	k u nunpo nyili nɑn tɑnɑ nbɑ k b yi jɑsp nɑn sɑldoenn nɑ, k nɑɑtuoluk buɑn k lint nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ, k l nyili nɑn tɑnn nbɑ k yi’l emeluod.
66004004	K nɑɑngbɑnt piinle nɑn ŋɑnnɑ duɑ k lint nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ. K sɑɑkɑb piinle nɑn bɑnnɑ liɑ tɑpieni k yil sɑlmɑ fokli k kɑl nɑɑngbɑnt piinle nɑn ŋɑnnɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
66004005	K sɑnyiknti nyi nɑɑngbounŋ mɑnŋ ni nɑn fuut nɑn sɑtiɑni. K fitɑ ŋɑnlole lɑkn di nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ tuɑnn. Ŋɑnn e tie Yennu Sei ŋɑnlole nɑ.
66004006	K siɑl nɑɑn nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nɑ k duɑ nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ tuɑnn k tie nɑn miɑnu nbɑ nyili biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. K bonfuɑ bɑnnɑ be nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ sinsuuk ni k biɑ lint nɑɑngbounŋ mɑnŋ, k mɔk ninbinɑ bonciɑnn b nunpo nɑn b puolpo kul.
66004007	Sinsinn bonfuol nɑ nɑɑn nɑn yɑnbɔl nɑ e, k wun nbɑ wɑɑ munle ni nɑ mun nɑɑn nɑn nɑɑjɑk nɑ, k wun nbɑ wɑɑ muntɑ ni nɑ nunpo nɑɑn nɑn nifosɑɑlk nunpo nɑ, k wun nbɑ wɑɑ munnɑ ni nɑ mun nɑɑn nɑn kɔnbɑkpel nbɑ yuuk nɑ.
66004008	K bonfuɑ bɑnnɑ nɑ kul mɔk kpinkpɑnt ŋɑnluob-luob, k biɑ mɔk ninbinɑ bonciɑnn b gbɑnɑnt kul po nɑn b nuɑk ni. K yennu ni nɑn nyiɑɔk kul b k nyikt yɑni yinu. B yiin ɑ: « Ŋɑnɔ, Ŋɑnɔ, Ŋɑnɔ tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu nbɑ mɔk yiikuo kul ɑ, k din be, k biɑ be mɔtɑɑnɑ, k biɑ tɑn sii be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ.»
66004009	Yuo kul bonfuɑ ŋɑnnɑ nɑ i tɑnŋ i yiin yɑni k dontl k jiɑntl k tien wun nbɑ kɑl nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ pɑɑk k be mɔkmɔk nɑn mɔkmɔk nɑ niipuouk,
66004010	l yuo e k sɑɑkɑb piinle nɑn bɑnnɑ nɑ tuu bɑɑ k gbɑɑn wun nbɑ kɑl nɑɑngbounŋ mɑnŋ pɑɑk tuɑnn, k puki wun nbɑ be mɔkmɔk nɑn mɔkmɔk nɑ. B biɑ tuu yit b fokli nɑ e k bil nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ tuɑnn ŋɑɑn yien ɑ:
66004011	«T Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu, l jɑnŋ nɑn tin tul’ɑ yudɑnt, k tul’ɑ bɑɑkl nɑn yiikuo wɑɑ, k mɑɑn fin e din nɑn bont kul ɑ. A nɑɑɔnŋ mɑnŋ kul be k mɔk mɑnfuol, k mɑɑn ɑ din luon nnɑ.»
66005001	Ŋɑnn e, k n biɑ lɑ k suɑ kɑl nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ pɑɑk k diɑ kɑdɑpuɑbl u niidiitu ni, k kɑdɑɑɔk mɑnŋ mɔk diɑni l nunpo nɑn l puolpo, k b tɑbn l ŋmii boɑ ŋɑnlole ni.
66005002	K n lɑ mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ mɔk pɑnŋ k u muɑntl nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl ɑ: «Ŋmee jɑnŋ nɑn wun pɔbt kɑdɑpuɑbl nɑ k tɑbt’l i?»
66005003	Ŋɑɑn k suɑ kɑɑ Yendɔunŋ ni ɑmi tingbounŋ nɑ ni ɑmi kpientinŋ, k sɑɑ fit pɔbt kɑdɑpuɑbl nɑ k got l nuɑk ni.
66005004	L yuo k n bui nɑn nyin-nyuut k mɑɑn suɑ nbɑ kɑɑ k jɑnŋ nɑn wun pɔbt kɑdɑpuɑbl nɑ k got l nuɑk ni nɑ.
66005005	Ŋɑnn e k sɑɑkɑb nɑ yenɔ yet’n ɑ: «Dɑɑ bui. Gotl wun nbɑ tie Suudɑ buolu ni Yɑnbɔl nbɑ tie kpɑnbɑl Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn nɑ. Ŋuɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu k fit tɑbt yiit ŋɑnlole nɑ k pɔbt kɑdɑpuɑbl mɑnŋ.»
66005006	K n lɑ Pebik k u sie nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ buol k bonfuɑ bɑnnɑ nɑ nɑn sɑɑkɑb nɑ sie k lint’ɔ. Pebik nɑ tie nɑn pebik nbɑ k b kpii’u nɑ e, k mɔk yinɑ ŋɑnlole nɑn ninbinɑ ŋɑnlole nbɑ tie Yennu sei ŋɑnlole nbɑ k u tun’m tingbounŋ nɑ kul ni nɑ.
66005007	K Pebik nɑ sɑɑn k sɑɑ gɑɑl kɑdɑpuɑbl nɑ dɑɑnɔ nbɑ kɑl nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ pɑɑk niidiitu ni.
66005008	Wɑɑ gɑɑl kɑdɑpuɑbl nɑ yuo nbɑ k bonfuɑ bɑnnɑ nɑ nɑn sɑɑkɑb piinle nɑn bɑnnɑ nɑ gbɑɑn u tuɑnn, k b kul ɑ diɑ biɑt nɑn sɑlmɑ kɔbi, k bonnunubt nbɑ k b tuu jokt muu k l tie Yennu niib miɑlu nɑ gbie kɔbi mɑnŋ ni.
66005009	K b yiin yɑnpɑɑnŋ k tien Pebik nɑ k yien ɑ: «A set jɑnŋ nɑn fɑn gɑɑl kɑdɑpuɑbl nɑ k tɑbt l yiit nɑ, k mɑɑn ɑ din kpo e k jii ɑ sɔn k dɑɑ niib k tul Yennu. Niib mɑnŋ nyii buolu kul ni, nɑn mɑbuolu kul ni, nɑn nibuolu kul ni, nɑn tini kul niib ni.
66005010	A biɑ te k b tie ɑ nɑɑn ni niib, bin nbɑ tie mɑnntieb, ɑ bin tun Yennu tuonɑ, k b sii yen tingbounŋ nɑ tieb.»
66005011	L puolpo biɑk k n got k lɑ mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ tusɑ tusɑ tusɑ, k biɑ gbɑt b kunkɔlɑ, k b ŋɑɑ lint nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ nɑn bonfuɑ bɑnnɑ nɑ nɑn sɑɑkɑb nɑ.
66005012	K b yien nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl ɑ: «Pebik nbɑ k b din kpii’u nɑ, ŋuɑ e jɑnŋ nɑn wun gɑɑl yiikuo nɑn mɔktuk nɑn yɑn nɑn pɑnŋ nɑn bɑɑkl nɑn dontl nɑn pɑku.»
66005013	K lin nbɑ kul k Yennu din nɑn nɑ, lin nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑn lin nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑn lin nbɑ be kpientinŋ nɑn lin nbɑ be mɔkgbenŋl ni, b kul yien ɑ: «Pɑku nɑn bɑɑkl nɑn dontl nɑn yiikuo kul ii be wun nbɑ kɑl nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ pɑɑk nɑ nɑn Pebik nɑ pɑɑk nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.»
66005014	K bonfuɑ bɑnnɑ nɑ sɑk k yet ɑ: « Amenn.» K sɑɑkɑb nɑ kul gbɑɑn k jiɑntl’ɔ.
66006001	L puolpo k n lɑ k Pebik nɑ tɑbt yiit ŋɑnlole nɑ yenn, k n gbɑt bonfuɑ bɑnnɑ nɑ yenɔ kunkɔl k l tie nɑn sɑtiɑni nɑ k yiin ɑ: «Bɑɑt.»
66006002	K n got k lɑ tɑnpienŋ, k wun nbɑ jɑk u pɑɑk nɑ diɑ tɑdɑɑɔk, k b tul’ɔ nɑɑnfoklk, k u nyii, k tie pɑnŋ dɑɑnɔ, ɑ wun kɔn k nyɑnn bonsiɑl kul.
66006003	K Pebik nɑ biɑ tɑbt yiit nbɑ pukn ŋɑnle nɑ, k n gbɑt bonfuol nbɑ pukn bɑnle nɑ kunkɔl k u yiin ɑ: «Bɑɑt.»
66006004	Ŋɑnn e k n lɑ tɑnmɔnŋ nyii k set, k b tul wun nbɑ jɑk’ɔ nɑ yiikuo ɑ wun bɑɑl nɑn tɑb tingbounŋ kul po k te k niib i kpi b lieb, k b biɑ kubn’ɔ juk-bɑnjɑgbenŋl.
66006005	K Pebik mɑnŋ biɑ tɑbt yiit nbɑ pukn ŋɑntɑ nɑ, k n biɑ gbɑt k bonfuol nbɑ pukn bɑntɑ nɑ yiin ɑ: «Bɑɑt.» K n biɑ lɑ k tɑnbɔnŋ sie lenŋ, k wun nbɑ jɑk’ɔ nɑ diɑ lin nbɑ k b biki bonɑ kpɑiu nɑ u nuu ni.
66006006	K n gbɑt fuut k l tie nɑn kunkɔl nɑ k nyii bonfuɑ bɑnnɑ nɑ ni k yien ɑ: « Ble cilu tie denie, k ɔls cilu ŋɑntɑ mun tie denie, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ biil kpɑn nɑn dɑmunŋ nɑ.»
66006007	K Pebik nɑ tɑbt yiit nbɑ pukn ŋɑnnɑ nɑ, k n gbɑt kunkɔl k l nyii bonfuol nbɑ pukn bɑnnɑ nɑ ni, k u yiin ɑ: «Bɑɑt.»
66006008	Ŋɑnn e k n lɑ tɑnpienwuwul, k wun nbɑ jɑk’ɔ nɑ sɑnn tie Kuun, k Kpientinŋ mun wɑɑ u puol, k Yennu tul’b yiikuo ɑ bin kpi tingbounŋ nɑ niib bɔktu tɑɑl munnɑ ni yenn, ɑ bin kpi’b nɑn juk-bɑnjiɑk nɑn kon nɑn yiɑlu, k biɑ te k tingbounŋ nɑ bonkob-biit n kpi’b.
66006009	K Pebik nɑ biɑ tɑbt yiit nbɑ pukn ŋɑnŋmu nɑ, k n lɑ k bin nbɑ k b din kpii’b Yennu mɑɑn nɑn b bɑlmɔni siɑlɑ pɑɑk nɑ sei, k l be binbintl nɑ nyɑkl,
66006010	k yikn sɑnpɑɑpo k yien ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ, fin nbɑ tie niŋɑnɔ k biɑ tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ, l sɑɑ wei nlee wɑɑ, k ɑ tɑn bu tingbounŋ nɑ niib nɑ buut k dɑt b tubɑ, bɑɑ kpii’t nɑ pɑɑk i?»
66006011	Ŋɑnn e k b tul b kul liɑtfopieni, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ bin guul wɑɑn nɑn yuo nbɑ k b tuontunlieb nɑn b nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ k niib sɑɑ kpi’b nɑ n kpo gbenn.
66006012	K n lɑ k Pebik nɑ tɑbt yiit nbɑ pukn ŋɑnluob nɑ, k tinŋ jekl bonciɑnn, k yennu bɔnn cinm nɑn kuun cincenbounŋ nɑ, k ŋmɑɑlk munn mɔnn nɑn nyunmɔnt nɑ.
66006013	K ŋmɑɑbilɑ nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k bɑɑ tinŋ ni nɑn wounŋ nbɑ tuu fikt k ninŋ tiik nbɑ k b yi fiigie, k u luɑnɑ tuu bɑɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
66006014	K sɑnpɑɑk pɔbn pɔbn nɑn puɑbt nɑ k bot, k juɑt kul nɑn gbingbɑnɑ nbɑ k nyun lint’l nɑ cɑɑt cɑɑt siɑn nbɑ k l tuu be nɑ.
66006015	Ŋɑnn e k tingbounŋ nɑ kpɑnbɑlɑ nɑn nijɑɑnɑ nɑn sejenm yudɑnm nɑn mɔktɑ nɑn yiikuo dɑnm nɑn nibuolu kul, dɑɑbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ yen b mɔnŋ, k b kul ciɑl ciɑl k kuɑ tɑnkɔlt nɑn tɑnfiɑt ni,
66006016	k b yien juɑt nɑn tɑnɑ ɑ: «Bɑɑn t pɑɑk k piin’t k bɔl’t k fɔkt nɑn’t wun nbɑ kɑl nɑɑngbounŋ pɑɑk nɑ nunpo k biɑ fɔkt nɑn’t nɑn Pebik nɑ wutuol nɑ.
66006017	k mɑɑn wun nbɑ kɑl nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ pɑɑk nɑ nɑn Pebik nɑ wutuol dɑgbenŋl dɑɑl mɑnŋ bɑɑl nɑ, k suɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ set b wutuol mɑnŋ tuɑnn po.»
66007001	L puolpo k n lɑ mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑnnɑ k b sie tingbounŋ nɑ lokɑ ŋɑnnɑ nɑ ni, k diɑ wounŋ nbɑ nyi lokɑ kul nɑ ni, ɑ l dɑɑ dɑ tinŋ ni ɑmi mɔkgbenŋl ni ɑmi tisiɑk pɑɑk.
66007002	L yuo k n lɑ mɑlɑkluɑ k u nyii yendopo k diɑ dɔuk nbɑ tie mɑnfodɑɑnɔ Yennu yɑl nɑ, k yikn nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl k yien mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑnnɑ nbɑ k Yennu tul’b yiikuo ɑ bin biil tingbounŋ nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nɑ,
66007003	ɑ: «I dɑɑ biil tingbounŋ nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nɑn tiini mɑn, sie k b tɑn dɔk t Yennu niib b yugbiɑ pɑɑk sinsinn.»
66007004	K n gbɑt bin nbɑ k b dɔk’b nɑn Yennu dɔuk nɑ kɑnn, k b tie niib tusɑ kobk nɑn tusɑ piinnɑ nɑn tusɑ ŋɑnnɑ (144.000), bin nbɑ nyii Islɑɑel nibuolu kul ni:
66007005	k b dɔk Suudɑ buolu ni niib, tusɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle (12.000), Luubenn buolu ni, tusɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle (12.000), Gɑɑd buolu ni, tusɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle (12.000),
66007006	Asel buolu ni, tusɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle (12.000), Neftɑɑli buolu ni, tusɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle (12.000), Mɑnɑɑse buolu ni, tusɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle (12.000),
66007007	Siimeɔn buolu ni, tusɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle (12.000), Leefi buolu ni, tusɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle (12.000), Isɑɑkɑɑl buolu ni, tusɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle (12.000),
66007008	Sɑɑbuulɔn buolu ni, tusɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle (12.000), Suosiɑf buolu ni, tusɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle (12.000), Bensɑɑmen buolu ni mun k b dɔk niib tusɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle (12.000).
66007009	L puolpo e k n got k lɑ nibulciɑɔnŋ k b kɑɑ kɑnn, k nyii tini kul ni, nɑn buolu kul ni, nɑn nibuolu kul ni, nɑn mɑbuolu kul ni, k b sie nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ nɑn Pebik nɑ tuɑnn po k liɑ liɑtfopieni, k diɑ diɑ biɑbfɑɑt b nii ni,
66007010	k b yikn nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑlɑ k yien ɑ: «T fielu nyi t Yennu nbɑ kɑl nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ pɑɑk nɑ nɑn Pebik nɑ buol e.»
66007011	K mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑ kul set k lint nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ nɑn sɑɑkɑb nɑ nɑn bonfuɑ bɑnnɑ nɑ, k bɑɑ finfɑbɑ nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ tuɑnn k jiɑntl Yennu,
66007012	k yien ɑ: « Amenn, pɑku nɑn dontl nɑn yɑn nɑn niipuouk tulu nɑn bɑɑkl nɑn yiikuo nɑn pɑnŋ tie Yennu yɑl e mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Amenn.»
66007013	K sɑɑkɑb nɑ yenɔ boi’n ɑ: «K bin nbɑ liɑ liɑtfopieni nɑ tie lɑnm e, k b nyii lee?»
66007014	K n jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, fin e mi.» K u yet’n ɑ: «Niib nɑ nyii fɑlgbenŋl nɑ ni e, k b wuul b liɑtfɔkt nɑ Pebik nɑ sɔn ni k l ji pien.
66007015	L pɑɑk e, k b sie Yennu nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ tuɑnn k tuun tien’ɔ nyiɑɔk nɑn yennu ni u jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni, k ŋuɑ Yennu nbɑ kɑl nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ pɑɑk nɑ sii be nɑn’m, k biɑ sii guu’b,
66007016	ɑ k kon nɑn nyun-nyuklu kɑn mi suol’b, k yennu tonu ɑmi tongbeŋsiɑl kɑn mi k tonŋ b gbɑnu.
66007017	K mɑɑn Pebik nbɑ be nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ buol nɑ sii tie b pekpɑɑlk, k sɑɑ ciɑn’m sɑɑn nɑn’m nyunbuul nbɑ tien mɑnfuol nɑ ni, k Yennu sɑɑ fiɑl b nyin-nyuut kul.»
66008001	Pebik nɑ nbɑ tɑbt yiit nbɑ pukn ŋɑnlole nɑ, l yuo e k Yendɔunŋ ni ŋmin sulm, k l tien nɑn miit piintɑ nɑ.
66008002	L puolpo e k n lɑ mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑnlole nbɑ sie Yennu tuɑnn nɑ, k u tul’b kɑtkɑi ŋɑnlole.
66008003	Mɑlɑkluɑ nɑ diɑ sɑlmɑ senŋ nbɑ k b wubnt bonnunubt lenŋ nɑ, k sɑɑn sɑɑ set binbintl nɑ tuɑnn. K b tul’ɔ bonnunubt bonciɑnn, ɑ wun pukn Yennu niib kul miɑlu nɑ ni k jii pɑɑn sɑlmɑ binbintl nbɑ sie nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ tuɑnn po nɑ, k tul Yennu.
66008004	K bonnunubt nɑ munyuut nɑn Yennu niib nɑ miɑlu nyii mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ sie Yennu tuɑnn nɑ nii ni k do sɑnpɑɑpo.
66008005	K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ jii sɑlmɑ senŋ nɑ k muɑl muu binbintl nɑ pɑɑk k gbien senŋ nɑ k kpɑɑl muɑn tingbounŋ nɑ ni. K sɑɑk tiɑn, k fuut fu, k sɑnyiknti nyiki, k tinŋ dɑnm.
66008006	K mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑnlole nbɑ diɑ kɑtkɑi ŋɑnlole nɑ tien siil nɑn bin peb kɑtkɑi nɑ.
66008007	Sinsinn mɑlɑkɑ nɑ nbɑ pebl u kɑtkɑɑk nɑ, k sɑkɑɑnɑ nɑn muu k l ŋmɑt nɑn sɔn k mɔ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k tingbounŋ nɑ bɔktu tɑɑl muntɑ nɑ yenn dii muu, k tiini bɔktu tɑɑl muntɑ mun dii muu, k mɔmɑɑsɑ kul dii muu.
66008008	Mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ wɑɑ munle ni nɑ nbɑ pebl u kɑtkɑɑk nɑ, k b lu siɑl k l nɑɑn nɑn jɔgbenŋl nbɑ di muu nɑ, k l tɑn bɑɑ tingbounŋ mɔkgbenŋl ni, k mɔkgbenŋl nɑ bɔktu muntɑ yenn kpɑnt sɔn,
66008009	k lin nbɑ be mɔkgbenŋl nyun nɑ ni bɔktu tɑɑl muntɑ nɑ yenn kpo kpo, k ŋɑlnt nbɑ pɑɑ mɔkgbenŋl nyun nɑ pɑɑk nɑ, k l bɔktu tɑɑl muntɑ ni yenn kul biil.
66008010	Mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ wɑɑ muntɑ ni nɑ nbɑ pebl u kɑtkɑɑk nɑ, k ŋmɑɑbil gbenŋl nbɑ di k nɑɑn nɑn muu nɑ nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k tɑn bɑɑ kpeni nɑn nyunbuɑ nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni l bɔktu tɑɑl muntɑtɑ yenn ni.
66008011	(Ŋmɑɑbil nɑ sɑnn din yi «Bontonn.») K nyun nɑ bɔktu tɑɑl muntɑ yenn kpɑnt ton, k niib bonciɑnn nbɑ nyuu nyun nɑ kpo, k mɑɑn nyun nɑ nbɑ ton nɑ pɑɑk.
66008012	Mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ wɑɑ munnɑ ni nɑ nbɑ pebl u kɑtkɑɑk nɑ, k yennu nɑn ŋmɑɑlk nɑn ŋmɑɑbilɑ l ciɑn-yenni tɑɑl muntɑ nɑ ni yenn yenn bɔnn.
