K yennu nɑn ŋmɑɑlk nɑn ŋmɑɑbilɑ yentu nɑ l ciɑn-yenni tɑɑl muntɑ bɔnn. K yentu nbɑ tuu yien yennu ni nɑ, k l ciɑn-yenŋ tɑɑl muntɑ ni ji k yien, k l mun tie nnɑ e nɑn nyiɑɔk.
66008013	L yuo k n got k lɑ kɔnbɑkpel k u yuuk sɑnpɑgbɑnt ni, k yikn nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl ɑ: «Pɑlbiil be, pɑlbiil be, mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑntɑ nbɑ biɑl nɑ i tɑnŋ i pebl kɑtkɑi nɑ, k l mɔni nɑ bui, pɑlbiil tɑn sii be tingbounŋ nɑ niib pɑɑk.»
66009001	Mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ wɑɑ munŋmu ni nɑ nbɑ pebl u kɑtkɑɑk nɑ, k n lɑ ŋmɑɑbil nbɑ nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k tɑn bɑɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k b tul’ɔ buotuk nbɑ sumi bonciɑnn k kɑɑ telk nɑ pienu.
66009002	K ŋmɑɑbil nɑ luot buotsunsunŋ nɑ, k munyuut nyii lenŋ k tie nɑn musɑɑkɑu munyuut nɑ, k l munyuut nɑ dɔkn yennu, k tingbounŋ nɑ bɔnn.
66009003	K tuɑli nyii munyuut nɑ ni k sik tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k b tul’b tonu nɑn nɑni nbɑ mɔk tonu tingbounŋ nɑ ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
66009004	K Yennu yet’b ɑ b dɑɑ biil muɑt nɑn bonbulkɑlɑ nɑn tiini, ɑ ŋɑɑn bii muks niib nbɑ k mɔk Yennu dɔkt b yugbiɑ pɑɑk nɑ,
66009005	k u tul’b mɔb ɑ b dɑɑ kpi niib mɑnŋ, ɑ ŋɑɑn te k bin di fɑlɑ k sɑɑ diɑn ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnŋmu, ŋɑɑn b i jun nilɔ l tonu sii tie nɑn nɑnŋ tonu nɑ e.
66009006	L yuo mɑnŋ, l nibuolu sɑɑ lon kuun ŋɑɑn kɑn lɑ. B biɑ tɑn sii luon bin kpo, ŋɑɑn kuun sɑɑ ciɑl ŋɑɑn nyik’b e.
66009007	K tuɑli nɑ tie nɑn tɑɑni nbɑ tien siil ɑ bin tuok tɑb nɑ e, k yil lin nbɑ nɑɑn nɑn sɑlmɑ fokli nɑ b yulɑ pɑɑk, k b nunpo nɑɑn nɑn nifosɑɑlk nunpo nɑ,
66009008	k b yut nɑɑn nɑn puob yut nɑ, k b nyɑnɑ nɑɑn nɑn yɑnbɔlɑ nyɑnɑ nɑ.
66009009	K b liɑ nɑɑgbɑnkɔnŋɑ k l nɑɑn nɑn kut nɑ k dɔkn b pɑlɑ pɑɑk, k b kpinkpɑnt fu fuut nɑn tɔb tɑɑni nbɑ tuu tien siil k dɑɑl tolt k tuokt tɔb nɑ.
66009010	K b mɔk juɑ k l mɔk pieni nɑn nɑni yɑl nɑ, k b juɑ mɑnŋ e k b sɑɑ jii k muks nifosɑɑli k sɑɑ diɑn ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnŋmu nɑ.
66009011	K mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ guu buotsunsunŋ mɑnŋ tie b kpɑnbɑl, k Hebluonbɑ mɑɑn ni b yi’u Abɑɑdɔn, k Glek mɑɑn ni b yi’u Apoliɔn. (Sɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk tie «Biiltuɑ.»)
66009012	Sinsinn pɑlbiil nɑ gɑl ɑ, ŋɑɑn pɑlbiil munle biɑ wɑɑ puol.
66009013	Mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ wɑɑ munluob ni nɑ nbɑ pebl u kɑtkɑɑk nɑ, k n gbɑt k kunkɔl nyii sɑlmɑ binbintl nbɑ sie Yennu tuɑnn po nɑ, l lɔti ŋɑnnɑ nɑ ni,
66009014	k kunkɔl nɑ yet mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ wɑɑ munluob nɑ ni k diɑ kɑtkɑɑk nɑ, ɑ wun lot mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑnnɑ nbɑ k b lol’b kpengbenŋl nbɑ k b yi Eflɑɑt nɑ kpinŋ k ŋɑɑ’b,
66009015	k u luot mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑnnɑ nɑ k ŋɑɑ’b. Yennu e din diɑ’b, k u ponŋ din senn l yuo nɑn l dɑɑl nɑn l ŋmɑɑlk nɑn l binn, ɑ bin fit kpi nifosɑɑli bɔktu tɑɑl muntɑ nɑ yenn,
66009016	k n gbɑt k b yien sejenm nbɑ tie tɑnjɑklɑ nɑ kɑnn, k l tie tusɑ-tusl fuunu kobi ŋɑnle.
66009017	K n yelntu mɑnŋ ni k n lɑ tɑɑni nɑn b tɑnjɑklɑ nɑ k b tie nnɑ e: k tɑnjɑklɑ nɑ liɑ nɑɑgbɑnkɔnŋɑ nbɑ dɔkn b pɑlɑ pɑɑk, k l mɔn nɑn muu nɑ k biɑ tie nɑn bonbɔnwuwulɑ nɑ, k biɑ mɔn nɑn sɑlwuutl nɑ, k tɑɑni nɑ yulɑ nɑɑn nɑn yɑnbɔlɑ yulɑ nɑ, k muu nɑn munyuut nɑn sɑlwuutɑ nyi b mɔi ni.
66009018	L bonbiɑ ŋɑntɑ, muu nɑn munyuut nɑn sɑlwuutɑ nbɑ nyi tɑɑni nɑ mɔi ni nɑ kpii nifosɑɑli bɔktu tɑɑl muntɑ nɑ yenn.
66009019	Tɑɑni mɑnŋ pɑnŋ be b mɔi ni nɑn b juɑ ni e, k b juɑ nɑ nɑɑn nɑn wɑi nɑ e, k mɔk yulɑ k b diɑ junt niib.
66009020	K niib nbɑ biɑl k bonbiil mɑnŋ k kpii’b nɑ din k nyik bɑɑ jiɑntl nɑlnbiit nɑn pɑtɑ nbɑ k b tien nɑn sɑlmɑ nɑn likli kut nɑn kut nbɑ k b yi blɔns nɑn tɑnɑ nɑn ciceli nbɑ k nyɔi k biɑ k gbiɑ, k biɑ kɑn fit sonm nɑ.
66009021	Niib mɑnŋ biɑ k nyik b nikpinu nɑn b jɑbɑ bunu nɑn b boncuncontuonɑ nɑn b nɑn-yuk tuonɑ.
66010001	L yuo k n biɑ lɑ mɑlɑksuɑ k u mɔk yiikuo k nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k siik, k gbɑb sɑnpɑgbounŋ nɑn cincenn nɑ, k nɑɑtuoluk buɑn k lint u yul pɑɑk, k u nunpo nɑɑn nɑn yennu nɑ, k u tɑɑ nɑɑn nɑn mupienu nɑ.
66010002	K u diɑ kɑdɑbik nnɑ u nuu ni k l pɔbt, k u diitu tɑɑl tuɑ mɔkgbenŋl pɑɑk, k u gɑnŋ tɑɑl mun sie tinŋ ni,
66010003	k u tiɑn nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl nɑn yɑnbɔl nbɑ tuu yikn biet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Wɑɑ tiɑn gbenn yuo nbɑ nɑ, k sɑtiɑni ŋɑnlole mun tiɑn k jiin.
66010004	Sɑtiɑni mɑnŋ puolpo, k n tien siil ɑ n diɑn, ŋɑɑn gbɑt kunkɔsiɑl k l nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k yet, ɑ n bɔl sɑtiɑni ŋɑnlole nbɑ yet mɑɑn nbɑ nɑ, lii be n ni, k dɑɑ dɑ.
66010005	Ŋɑnn e k mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ k n lɑ’u k u sie mɔkgbenŋl nɑ pɑɑk nɑn tinŋ ni nɑ donn u niidiitu sɑnpɑɑpo,
66010006	k pol nɑn Yennu nbɑ tun be mɔkmɔk nɑn mɔkmɔk nɑ, wun nbɑ din nɑn sɑnpɑɑk nɑn bonɑ kul nbɑ be l ni, tinŋ nɑn bonɑ kul nbɑ be l ni, nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nɑn bonɑ kul nbɑ be l ni nɑ, k yet ɑ: «L biɑl yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ e,
66010007	ŋɑɑn mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ wɑɑ bɑnlole nɑ ni i tɑnŋ i pebl u kɑtkɑɑk nɑ dɑɑl nbɑ, Yennu tɑn sɑɑ tun lin nbɑ k u senn wuol ni nɑn wɑɑ din yet k tul u sɔkniinbɑ nbɑ tie u tuontunnɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.»
66010008	K kunkɔl nbɑ k n gbɑt k l nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k piɑk tien’n nɑ, biɑ piɑk k tien’n ɑ: «I sɑɑ gɑɑl kɑdɑbik nbɑ pɔbt k be mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ sie mɔkgbenŋl nɑn tinŋ ni nɑ nuu ni.»
66010009	Ŋɑnn e k n sɑɑn mɑlɑkɑ nɑ buol k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ wun tul’n kɑdɑbik mɑnŋ, k u yet ɑ: «Gɑɑt k ŋmɑn. A nuɑk ni l sii ton e, ŋɑɑn ɑ mɔb ni l sii mɑn nɑn siɑt nɑ e.»
66010010	Ŋɑnn e k n gɑɑl kɑdɑbik mɑnŋ k ŋmɑn, k l mɑn nɑn siɑt nɑ n mɔb ni, ŋɑɑn lɑɑ sik n puol ni k l ji ton.
66010011	Ŋɑnn e k b yet’n ɑ: «L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn fɑn ŋɑnm k sɔkn Yennu mɑɑn k jiin nibuolu bonciɑnn nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ yent bonciɑnn nɑn mɑbuolu bonciɑnn nɑn kpɑnbɑlɑ bonciɑnn po.»
66011001	Ŋɑnn e k suɑ tul’n biknu pɑtu k yet’n ɑ: «Fiit k sɑɑn k sɑɑ bikn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑn l binbintl, k biɑ kɑn bin nbɑ jiɑntl Yennu lenŋ mɑnŋ,
66011002	ŋɑɑn fɑn nyik dundounŋ k dɑɑ biki l yɑbnt, k mɑɑn n jii ŋɑnn e k tul bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ, k b tɑn sɑɑ ŋmɑɑ k lint Yennu duo ni ŋmɑɑli piinnɑ nɑn ŋɑnle.
66011003	N tɑn sɑɑ te k n siɑlɑɑdɑnm bɑnle n liɑ bɔtuot, k n sɑɑ tul’b yiikuo k bii sɔknt Yennu mɑɑn kii tien niib k sɑɑ jɑnŋ dɑɑ tusl nɑn kobi ŋɑnle nɑn piinluob.»
66011004	Siɑlɑ dɑnm bɑnle nɑ e tie tiini nbɑ k b yi oliifienbɑ ŋɑnle nɑn fitɑ ŋɑnle nbɑ sie Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ yen tingbounŋ nɑ tuɑnn po.
66011005	K suɑ i tɑnŋ i luon wun tul’b dɑnŋ, muu nyi b mɔi ni k tɑn di b dɑtɑi mɑnŋ. Wun nbɑ kul luon wun tul’b dɑnŋ, nnɑ e k b sɑɑ kpi’u.
66011006	B biɑ mɔk yiikuo k sɑɑ suol sɑɑk, k sɑɑk kɑn bɑɑ yuo nbɑ k b sɔknt Yennu mɑɑn nɑ, k biɑ mɔk yiikuo k sɑɑ te k nyun n kpɑnt sɔn, k biɑ sɑɑ fit te k fɑlbiiuk n bɑɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni yuo kul nbɑ k b luon.
66011007	Yuo nbɑ k b tɑn sɑɑ gbenn b siɑlɑ tuonɑ nɑ, bonkobsiɑɔk nbɑ be buotsunsunŋ nbɑ kɑɑ telk nɑ sɑɑ nyi k tuok’b nɑn tɔb, k nyɑnn’b ŋɑɑn kpi’b.
66011008	K b gbɑnɑnt tɑn sii duɑ dogbenŋl sɔnjok ni, siɑn nbɑ k b din kpɑɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk nɑ, k duo nɑ mɔk sɑnjɔi ŋɑnle k l tie Suodonm ɑmi Ejipt.
66011009	K niib nbɑ nyii nibuolu kul ni nɑn buolu kul ni nɑn mɑbuolu kul ni, nɑn tini kul niib ni nɑ, tɑn sɑɑ tikl k got b gbɑnɑnt dɑmunɑ ŋɑntɑ nɑn dɑjinn, k tɑn kɑn cɑb k bin pii b gbɑnɑnt mɑnŋ.
66011010	Tingbounŋ nɑ niib sii mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn niib bɑnle nɑ kuun pɑɑk, k b sɑɑ jeln k pi b lieb piini, k mɑɑn sɔkniinbɑ bɑnle nɑ dɑɑn te k tingbounŋ nɑ niib dii fɑlɑ bonciɑnn.
66011011	K dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ nɑn dɑjinn nɑ nbɑ gɑl, k fuon nbɑ tien mɑnfuol nɑ nyii Yennu buol k bɑɑl kuɑ’b, k b fiil set, k jɑŋmɑɑni bonciɑnn suol bin nbɑ lɑ’b nɑ.
66011012	L yuo nɑ k sɔkniinbɑ bɑnle nɑ gbɑt kunkɔsiɑl k l nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k yet’b ɑ: «Don mɑn nnɑ nɑ.» L yuo e k b duo sɑnpɑɑpo k kuɑ sɑnpɑgbounŋ ni, k b dɑtɑi nɑ sie ŋɑɑn goli.
66011013	L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k tinŋ dɑnm bonciɑnn, k dogbenŋl mɑnŋ ciɑnu tɑɑl piik ni yenn biil, k niib tusɑ ŋɑnlole kpo tinŋ mɑnŋ dɑnmu ni, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol bin nbɑ biɑl nɑ, k b donn Yendɔunŋ ni Yennu sɑnn.
66011014	Gotl mɑn, pɑlbiil nbɑ pukn munle nɑ gɑl ɑ, ŋɑɑn pɑlbiil nbɑ pukn muntɑ nɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl mɔtɑɑnɑ.
66011015	Mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ wɑɑ munlole ni nɑ pebl u kɑtkɑɑk nɑ, k kunkɔsɑɑkɑlɑ yien Yendɔunŋ ni ɑ: «Tingbounŋ nɑ nɑɑn kul kpɑnt t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu nɑn u Klistu yɑl ɑ, k u sɑɑ diɑ’b mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.»
66011016	K sɑɑkɑb piinle nɑn bɑnnɑ nbɑ kɑl b nɑɑngbɑnt pɑɑk Yennu tuɑnn nɑ, k b bɑɑ finfɑbɑ k ji jiɑntl Yennu,
66011017	k yien ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu, wun nbɑ mɔk yiikuo kul, wun nbɑ biɑ be, k din tun be nɑ, t tien’ɑ niipuouk, k mɑɑn ɑ jii ɑ yiikuogbenŋl k ji piin k yen tingbounŋ nɑ.
66011018	K tingbounŋ yent kul niib donn wutuol, k ɑ mɔnŋ wutuol mun duo. K yuo bɑɑl nɑn k ɑ bu bin nbɑ kpo nɑ buut, k tul ɑ tuontunnɑ nbɑ tie ɑ sɔkniinbɑ nɑ b nyuɑt, nɑn ɑ niib kul nbɑ cɔln ɑ sɑnn, bin nbɑ tie nijɑɑnɑ nɑn nitɑli kul, k yuo biɑ bɑɑl nɑn k ɑ biil bin nbɑ biil tingbounŋ nɑ.»
66011019	Ŋɑnn e k Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ luot, k lɑkl nbɑ k Yennu senni be l ni nɑ be dieok nɑ ni. K sɑnyiknti nyikntl, k sɑtiɑni tiɑn nɑn fuut, k tinŋ dɑnm, k sɑkɑɑnɑ nbɑ gbenŋ bonciɑnn bɑɑ.
66012001	L puolpo k nyingbenŋl dɔkt sɑnpɑɑpo, k puo gbɑb yennu nɑn cincenn nɑ, k sie ŋmɑɑlk pɑɑk, k yil ŋmɑɑbilɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle nɑn foklk nɑ,
66012002	k puo mɑnŋ mɔk puol k bui mɑtyiɑlu.
66012003	Ŋɑnn e k nyinliel biɑ dɔkt sɑnpɑɑpo, k timunt nnɑ sie k mɔk yulɑ ŋɑnlole nɑn yinɑ piik, k nɑɑnfokli ŋɑnlole yil u yulɑ ŋɑnlole nɑ pɑɑk.
66012004	K u jii u juol k dɑt ŋmɑɑbilɑ nɑ bɔktu ŋɑntɑ ni yenn k nyinn’l sɑnpɑɑpo k lu’l tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k ji sie puo nbɑ mɔ mɑtyiɑlu nɑ tuɑnn, k guu ɑ, wun mɑl gbenn ɑ, k wun ji ŋmɑn sɑnpɑntk nɑ.
66012005	K puo mɑnŋ tɑn mɑl bonjɑk nbɑ sii diɑ kut dɑnml kii yen i buolu kul nɑn pɑnŋ, k b nyiiɑl bik nɑ k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Yennu buol, u nɑɑngbounŋ pɑɑk.
66012006	K puo nɑ mun ciɑl k sɑɑn pɑɑnpieonŋ ni siɑn nbɑ k Yennu tien siil k guun’ɔ nɑ, k sii dint’ɔ k sɑɑ diɑn dɑɑ tusl nɑn kobi ŋɑnle nɑn piinluob.
66012007	Ŋɑnn e k tɔb fiil Yendɔunŋ ni. K mɑlɑkɑ wun nbɑ k u sɑnn yi Miisiɑl nɑ, k ŋuɑ nɑn u mɑlɑklieb kɔn k tuokt timunt nɑ nɑn u mun yɑɑ mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑ,
66012008	k b nyɑnn timunt nɑn u mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑ, k k cɑb’b ɑ bii be Yendɔunŋ ni.
66012009	K b jii timunt nɑ k lu’u nɑn-yel po. U ponŋ tuu tie wɑɑɔk nbɑ tuu be e wɑɑ, k u sɑnn yi Sɑnbiiltuɑ ɑmi Sɑɑtɑn, k tuu kpɑnn tingbounŋ nɑ tieb kul nɑ. K b nyinn ŋuɑ nɑn u mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ k lu’b tingbounŋ nɑ ni.
66012010	L yuo k n gbɑt kunkɔsɑɑkɑl sɑnpɑɑpo k l yien ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ, Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu fielu nɑn u yiikuo nɑn u nɑɑn nɑn u Klistu yiikuo bɑɑl nɑ, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ tuu tɑɑl t nɑɑ wɑɑs Yennu tuɑnn, yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk nɑ, b ji nyinn’ɔ k lu’u wɑɑ.
66012011	Pebik nɑ sɔn nɑn u lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ k b muɑntl nɑ pɑɑk e k b nyɑnn nyɑnnu, k b din yit b mɑnfuol sɑlk e k gɑɑl kuun.
66012012	L pɑɑk, yinm nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ, ii mɔk mɑn pɑlpienn. Ŋɑɑn tingbounŋ nɑ niib nɑn bin nbɑ be mɔkgbenŋl ni ŋɑnin, pɑlbiil be b pɑɑk, k mɑɑn Sɑɑtɑn sik b pɑɑk nɑn wutogbenŋl, wɑɑ mi nɑn u yuo ji k yɑb nɑ pɑɑk.»
66012013	Timunt nɑ nbɑ bɑnn nɑn b jii’u k lu tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑ, k u ji wɑɑ puo nbɑ mɑl bonjɑk nɑ, ɑ wun suol’ɔ.
66012014	K b jii kɑnbɑgbenŋl kpinkpɑnt ŋɑnle k tul puo nɑ, ɑ wun yukl k sɑɑn muuk ni kii sɑɑ kii be siɑn nbɑ k b sii dint’ɔ k jɑnŋ binɑ ŋɑntɑ nɑn binjinn k wɑɑɔk nɑ ji dɑɑ fit k so’u.
66012015	K timunt nɑ puut nyunpɑnɑ puo nɑ pɑɑk k l nɑɑn nɑn mɔkl ni nyun nɑ, ɑ nyun nɑ n di’u,
66012016	ŋɑɑn k tinŋ sonm puo nɑ k yɑɑt ŋɑɑn jiin mubn nyun nbɑ nyii timunt mɔb ni nɑ pɑɑk.
66012017	K timunt nɑ wutuol duo nɑn puo nɑ bonciɑnn, k u sɑɑn ɑ wun sɑɑ kɔn nɑn puo nɑ yɑɑbuonɑ nbɑ biɑl k wɑɑ Yennu senni k diɑ Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ,
66012018	ŋɑɑn sɑɑn sie mɔk-kpinŋ.
66013001	K n lɑ k muuk ni bonkobuk nyii mɔkgbenŋl ni, k mɔk yinɑ piik nɑn yulɑ ŋɑnlole, k nɑɑnfokli piik yil u yinɑ piik nɑ pɑɑk, k sɑnn nbɑ suki Yennu nɑ diɑn u yulɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
66013002	K muuk ni bonkobuk nbɑ k n lɑ nɑ nɑɑn nɑn nɑɑmuuk nɑ, k mɔk tɑɑnyɑlgbenŋɑ, k u mɔb nɑɑn nɑn yɑnbɔl mɔb nɑ. K timunt nɑ tul muuk ni bonkobuk nɑ u mɔnŋ pɑnŋ nɑn u nɑɑngbounŋ nɑn u yiikuo nbɑ yɑb.
66013003	K n lɑ k l nɑɑn nɑn dɑnŋ nbɑ jɑnŋ nɑn kuun be bonkobuk nɑ yuyenn pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn k u lek pɑɑk ɑ, k l ji bɑkt tingbounŋ nɑ tieb kul, k b ji wɑɑ’u,
66013004	b din jiɑntl timunt nɑ, k mɑɑn u jii u yiikuo k tul muuk ni bonkobuk nɑ k yien ɑ: «Ŋmee tie nɑn muuk ni bonkobuk nɑ? Ŋmee sɑɑ fit kɔn nɑn muuk ni bonkobuk mɑnŋ i?»
66013005	K b cɑb muuk ni bonkobuk nɑ ɑ wuu piɑk nɑn jɑpɑɑt kii suki Yennu, k biɑ cɑb’ɔ yiikuo nbɑ k u sii tuun k sɑɑ diɑn ŋmɑɑli piinnɑ nɑn ŋɑnle.
66013006	K u piin k piɑk suki Yennu nɑn u sɑnn nɑn siɑn nbɑ k u be nɑ, nɑn bin nbɑ kul be Yendɔunŋ ni.
66013007	K b biɑ cɑb’ɔ yiikuo ɑ wun kɔn nɑn Yennu niib k nyɑnn’b, k biɑ cɑb’ɔ yiikuo k u sɑɑ yent buolu kul nɑn nibuolu kul nɑn mɑbuolu kul nɑn tini kul niib.
66013008	Niib kul nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k b sɑnɑ din k diɑn mɑnfuol kɑdɑɑɔk ni yuo nbɑ k dulnyɑ dɑɑ din kɑɑ nɑ, b sɑɑ jiɑnt muuk ni bonkobuk nɑ. Mɑnfuol kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ tie Pebik nbɑ k b din kpii’u nɑ yɑl e.
66013009	Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint.
66013010	Wun nbɑ tie sɑɑ kuɑ dɑnsɑlk, u set sɑɑ kuɑ dɑnsɑlk ɑ. K wun nbɑ mun k b sɑɑ kpi’u nɑn juk-bɑnjiɑk, b sɑɑ kpi’u wɑɑ. L pɑɑk, l ŋɑn k Yennu niib i mɔk mintl k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ fɑnu.
66013011	L puolpo k n biɑ lɑ muuk ni bonkobluɑ k u nyii tinŋ ni k mɔk yinɑ ŋɑnle nbɑ nɑɑn nɑn Pebik yinɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn k u piɑk k u kunkɔl nɑɑn nɑn timunt kunkɔl nɑ,
66013012	k u sie muuk ni bonkobsinsinn nɑ tuɑnn po, k jii muuk ni bonkobsinsinn mɑnŋ yiikuo nbɑ yɑb nɑ, k muks tingbounŋ nɑ tieb kul, ɑ bii jiɑntl muuk ni bonkobsinsinn nbɑ lɑ dɑnŋ nbɑ yɑɑ lin kpi’u k u tɑn pɑɑk nɑ.
66013013	K muuk ni bonkobuk nbɑ pukn bɑnle nɑ biɑ tun bɑktnɔunŋ nyinɑ, k te k muu nɑ nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k sik tinŋ ni, k niib nɑ lɑ nɑn b ninbinɑ.
66013014	K bɑɑ cɑb’ɔ k u tuun bɑktnɔunŋ nyinɑ nɑ muuk ni bonkobsinsinn tuɑnn nɑ, k u kpɑnn tingbounŋ nɑ tieb, k yet’b ɑ bin mɑɑ pɑtl k lii nɑɑn muuk ni bonkobuk nbɑ lɑ juk-bɑnjiɑk dɑnŋ ŋɑɑn tɑn k kpo nɑ.
66013015	K b cɑb muuk ni bonkobuk nbɑ pukn bɑnle nɑ yiikuo k u fuont k tien pɑtl nbɑ nɑɑn nɑn muuk ni bonkobsinsinn nɑ, k pɑtl mɑnŋ tɑn fit piɑk k te k b kpi bin nbɑ k sɑk ɑ bin jiɑnt’ɔ nɑ.
66013016	K muuk ni bonkobuk mɑnŋ biɑ muks niib kul, bin nbɑ tie nitɑli nɑn bin nbɑ tie nijɑɑnɑ, mɔktɑ nɑn fɑlɑ dɑnm, dɑɑbɑ nɑn yent-n-mɔnŋ dɑnm, ɑ wun dɔk b niidiitu ɑmi b yugbiɑ pɑɑk.
66013017	L i tie k dɔuk nɑ kɑɑ nilɔ pɑɑk, u k fit dɑɑ siɑl ɑmi k kɔi siɑl, k dɔuk nɑ tie muuk ni bonkobuk nɑ sɑnn ɑmi u sɑnn nɑnml.
66013018	Lin nbɑ nɑ tie yɑnfɑntl yɑl e. Wun nbɑ kul mɔk yɑn, wun dukn bɑnn k muuk ni bonkobuk mɑnŋ nɑnml pɑɑk, k nɑnml mɑnŋ tie jɑsuɑ sɑnn e, k l nɑnml tie kobi ŋɑnluob nɑn piinluob nɑn ŋɑnluob.
66014001	Ŋɑnn e k n got k lɑ Pebik nɑ k u sie juɑl nbɑ k b yil Siiɔn nɑ pɑɑk, k niib tusɑ kobk nɑn tusɑ piinnɑ nɑn tusɑ ŋɑnnɑ, bin nbɑ mɔk u sɑnn nɑn u Bɑɑ sɑnn b yugbiɑ pɑɑk, k b lɑkn k sie nɑn’ɔ.
66014002	K n gbɑt k kunkɔl nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k fu nɑn siɑɔk kpenu nɑ, k biɑ nɑɑn nɑn sɑtiɑnpɑɑli nbɑ tuu tiɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k biɑ nɑɑn nɑn bɑfɑɑlɑ nbɑ tuu fɑɑ b biɑt k l mɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
66014003	K niib tusɑ kobk nɑn tusɑ piinnɑ nɑn tusɑ ŋɑnnɑ mɑnŋ sie nɑɑngbounŋ nɑn bonfuɑ bɑnnɑ nɑ nɑn sɑɑkɑb nɑ tuɑnn po, k yiin yɑnpɑɑni nbɑ k suɑ k fit tumi, sie niib mɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu dɑɑ’b tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb ni kuukuɑ.
66014004	Ŋɑnm e tie jɑb nbɑ k kuɑ boncunconsn jɑknt ni k k mi duɑ nɑn puo, ŋɑnm e wɑɑ Pebik nɑ k sɑɑ siɑn nbɑ kul k u sɑɑ. Ŋɑnm e tie bin nbɑ k Yennu dɑɑ’b nisɑɑli sinsuuk ni k tie sinsinn mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu nɑn Pebik nɑ.
66014005	Fɑɑk k nyi b mɔi ni k suɑ biɑ k fit tɑɑl’b.
66014006	K n biɑ lɑ mɑlɑkluɑ k u yuuk sɑnpɑɑpo k diɑ lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu ɑ wun muɑntl k tul tingbounŋ nɑ tieb: tini kul niib, nɑn buolu kul, nɑn mɑbuolu kul, nɑn nibuolu kul,
66014007	k u yet nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl ɑ: «Ii tiin mɑn Yennu kii biɑ kii dontl u sɑnn, k mɑɑn yuo nbɑ k u sɑɑ bu niib buut nɑ bɑɑl ɑ. Ii jiɑntl ŋuɑ Yennu nbɑ din nɑn sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nɑn nyuntonɑ kul nɑ.»
66014008	K mɑlɑkluɑ wei k pukn sinsinn yuɑ nɑ pɑɑk k yien ɑ: «Dogbenŋl Bɑbiilonn nɑ bɑɑ wɑɑ. U boncunconsn te k nibuolu kul kuɑ jɑknt ni k tul’b dɑmunŋ nbɑ pɑɑl nɑ k b nyuu k yib k wɑɑt.»
66014009	K mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ pukn bɑntɑ nɑ wɑɑ b pɑɑk k yien nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl ɑ: «Wun nbɑ kul jiɑntl muuk ni bonkobuk nɑ nɑn u nɑɑɔnŋ nɑ, k mɔk b dɔuk u yugbiɑl pɑɑk ɑmi u nuu ni,
66014010	l dɑɑnɔ sɑɑ nyu Yennu wutuol nbɑ tie nɑn dɑpɑɑln nbɑ k u muɑn k tien dɑŋmɑnbɑnŋ ni k nyun kɑɑ lenŋ nɑ. L dɑɑnɔ biɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ fɑlɑ muu nbɑ k sɑlwuutɑ di nɑn’n nɑ ni, Yennu mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑn Pebik nɑ tuɑnn po.
66014011	K b muksuk mɑnŋ munyuut sɑɑ do sɑnpɑɑpo nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Fuon kɑɑ yennu ni k boi nyiɑɔk, k tul bin nbɑ jiɑntl muuk ni bonkobuk nɑ nɑn u nɑɑɔnŋ nɑn wun nbɑ kul mɔk u dɔuk nbɑ tie u sɑnn b pɑɑk nɑ.»
66014012	L pɑɑk, l ŋɑn k Yennu niib nbɑ sɑɑk u senni k tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ ii mɔk suklu.
66014013	K n biɑ gbɑt kunkɔl k l nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k yien ɑ n diɑn mɑɑn nɑ, ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ k jikt sɑɑ, pɑlpienn be dɑnm nbɑ kpo Yonmdɑɑnɔ ni nɑ pɑɑk.» K Foŋɑnm nɑ sɑk ɑ: «Mɔmɔnm, b sɑɑ lɑ fuon b tuongbenŋɑ pɑɑk, k mɑɑn b tuonɑ nyuɑt e nɑ.»
66014014	K n biɑ got k lɑ sɑnpɑgbɑnpieonŋ, k suɑ kɑl l pɑɑk k nɑɑn nisɑɑlk, k yil sɑlmɑ foklk, k diɑ gɔtuk nbɑ di nɑ u nuu ni.
66014015	K mɑlɑkluɑ nyii Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k yien nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl k tien wun nbɑ kɑl sɑnpɑgbounŋ nɑ pɑɑk nɑ ɑ: «Jiin ɑ gɔtuk nɑ k jɑɑn tingbounŋ nɑ, l jɑɑnu mɑnŋ yuo e nɑ, k mɑɑn l kul biel ɑ.»
66014016	K wun nbɑ kɑl sɑnpɑgbounŋ nɑ pɑɑk nɑ jii u gɔtuk nɑ k gɑɑn tingbounŋ pɑɑk, k jɑɑn tingbounŋ nɑ.
66014017	K mɑlɑkluɑ mun nyii Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni k mun diɑ gɔtuk nbɑ di.
66014018	L yuo k mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ tie muu sɑɑkuɑ nɑ nyii binbintl nɑ buol ni k yien nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl k tien mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ diɑ gɔtuk nbɑ di nɑ ɑ: «Jiin ɑ gɔtuk nbɑ di nɑ k siɑ tingbounŋ nɑ tilonti nbɑ k b yi fiinyɑ nɑ luɑnɑ, k mɑɑn luɑnɑ mɑnŋ kul mɔnn ɑ.»
66014019	K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ jii u gɔtuk nɑ k siɑl tingbounŋ nɑ tiluɑnɑ nɑ, k jii luɑnɑ mɑnŋ k tien gbieok nbɑ k b ŋmɑki luɑnɑ l ni k nyun nyi nɑ. Gbieok nɑ tie Yennu wutogbenŋl nyinn nɑ e.
66014020	K b ŋmɑkl luɑnɑ nɑ duo nɑ kpinŋ, k sɔn nyii siɑn nbɑ k b ŋmɑki luɑnɑ nɑ k pukl kiiluomiɑtɑ kobi ŋɑntɑ k l sumiu sɑɑ bɑɑl nilɔ yiɑk ɑ.
66015001	L yuo k n lɑ bɑktnɔunŋ nyinn nbɑ gbenŋ Yendɔunŋ ni, k mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑnlole diɑ bonbiil buolu tɑɑl munlole nbɑ tenn puol k Yennu sɑɑ wɑnn u wutuol l ni k gbenn.
66015002	K n lɑ siɑl k l nɑɑn nɑn miɑnu k tie nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nɑ, k ŋmɑt nɑn muu, k n biɑ lɑ bin nbɑ kɔn k nyɑnn muuk ni bonkobuk nɑ nɑn u nɑɑɔnŋ nɑ nɑn u sɑnn kɑnn nɑ, k b sie k kpiɑ mɔkgbenŋl nbɑ nɑɑn miɑnu nɑ k diɑ biɑt nbɑ k Yennu tul’b nɑ,
66015003	k b yiin yɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu tuontunnɔ Muois din yiin nɑ nɑn Pebik nɑ yɑnŋ ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu nbɑ mɔk yiikuo kul, ɑ tuonɑ tie bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’t, ɑ sɔni tuok k biɑ tie bɑlmɔni. Fin e tie nibuolu kul Kpɑnbɑl.
66015004	Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ŋmee be k kɑn tin’ɑ k biɑ kɑn dont ɑ sɑnn i? K mɑɑn ɑ tuonŋɑnɑ nyii pɑɑnu ni wɑɑ. Nibuolu kul tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl k jiɑnt’ɑ, k mɑɑn ɑ bɑlmɔni tuonɑ nyii pɑɑnu ni wɑɑ.»
66015005	L puolpo e k n biɑ lɑ k Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ, k l luot, k Yennu tuntuok lɑnbounŋ be lenŋ.
66015006	K mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑnlole nbɑ diɑ bonbibuolu ŋɑnlole nɑ nyii Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k liɑ tɑpieni nbɑ kɑɑ jɑknsiɑt i k biɑ nyili, k jii cincenlolɑ k lol b nyɑɑt ni.
66015007	K bonfuɑ bɑnnɑ nɑ yenɔ jii sɑlmɑ seni ŋɑnlole k tul mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑnlole nɑ, k Yennu nbɑ be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ wutuol gbie l seni ni,
66015008	k Yennu yentsɑɑkɑl nɑn u yiikuo te k munyuut gbie u jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ, k suɑ ji k fit kuɑ lenŋ nɑn yuo nbɑ k bonbibuolu ŋɑnlole nbɑ k mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑnlole diɑ nɑ n tɑn gbenn.
66016001	L puolpo k n biɑ gbɑt k kunkɔsɑɑkɑl nyii Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni, k piɑk tien mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑnlole nɑ ɑ: «Jiin seni ŋɑnlole nbɑ gbie nɑn Yennu wutuol nɑ k kpɑɑl muɑn tingbounŋ nɑ ni.»
66016002	K sinsinn mɑlɑkɑ nɑ sɑɑn k sɑɑ kpɑɑl lin nbɑ be u senŋ ni nɑ k muɑn tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k nɑlɑ nbɑ b k yiɑl bonciɑnn suol bin nbɑ mɔk bonkobuk nɑ dɔuk k biɑ jiɑntl u nɑɑɔnŋ nɑ.
66016003	K mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ pukn bɑnle nɑ mun kpɑɑl lin nbɑ be u senŋ ni nɑ k muɑn mɔkgbenŋl ni, k nyun nɑ kpɑnt k nɑɑn nɑn kpiemɔ sɔn nɑ, k bonfuɑ nbɑ kul be mɔkgbenŋl nyun nɑ ni kpo.
66016004	K mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ pukn bɑntɑ nɑ mun kpɑɑl lin nbɑ be u senŋ ni nɑ k muɑn kpeni nɑn nyunbuɑ ni k l nyun nɑ kpɑnt sɔn.
66016005	L puolpo, k n gbɑt mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ tie nyun sɑɑkuɑ nɑ yien ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ, Ŋɑnɔ, wun nbɑ be, k biɑ din tun be nɑ, ɑ buut nɑ bunu tie lin nbɑ tuɑk sɔnu e,
66016006	k mɑɑn niib kpii ɑ niib nɑn ɑ sɔkniinbɑ, k ɑ jii sɔn k tul’b ɑ bin nyu. Ŋɑnn e jɑnŋ nɑn’m.»
66016007	K n biɑ gbɑt k kunkɔl nyii binbintl nɑ buol k yien ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu nbɑ mɔk yiikuo kul, ɑ buutnbɑ nbɑ k ɑ bu nɑ tie mɑmɔnm e, k tie lin nbɑ tuɑk sɔnu.»
66016008	K mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ pukn bɑnnɑ nɑ kpɑɑl lin nbɑ be u senŋ ni nɑ k muɑn yennu pɑɑk ŋɑɑn cɑb’ɔ yiikuo, ɑ l tonu nɑ n ŋɑnm funn niib k yekt’b nɑn muu nɑ.
66016009	K yennu nɑ ŋɑnm yekt’b nɑn muu nɑ, k b ji suki Yennu nbɑ mɔk bonbiil nɑ yiikuo nɑ sɑnn, ŋɑɑn k b lek k sɑk nɑn bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ k tul’ɔ yudɑnt.
66016010	K mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ pukn bɑnŋmu nɑ kpɑɑl lin nbɑ be u senŋ ni nɑ k muɑn bonkobuk nɑ nɑɑngbounŋ pɑɑk, k nɑɑn mɑnŋ yent kul kpɑnt bunbɔnn, k niib nyiitl b nyɑnɑ tont nɑ pɑɑk,
66016011	k biɑ suki Yennu nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ, k mɑɑn b tont nɑn b nɑlɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn biɑ k sɑk nɑn bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ b tuonɑ pɑɑk.
66016012	K mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ pukn bɑnluob nɑ mun kpɑɑl lin nbɑ be u senŋ ni nɑ k muɑn kpengbenŋl nbɑ k b yi’l Eflɑɑt nɑ ni, k l nyun nɑ fuɑl k tul sɔnjok, k kpɑnbɑlɑ nbɑ be yendopo nɑ fit gɑl puot.
66016013	K n lɑ nɑlnbiit bɑntɑ k b nɑɑn nɑn pɔntɑ nɑ k nyii timunt nɑ nɑn bonkobuk nɑ nɑn fɑɑk sɔkni nɑ mɔi ni.
66016014	B tie pol sei nbɑ tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ e k lin tingbounŋ nɑ ni kpɑnbɑlɑ buol, k tiki’b ɑ bin tuok tɑb nɑ, Yennu wun nbɑ mɔk yiikuo kul dɑgbenŋl dɑɑl mɑnŋ.
66016015	Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet ɑ: «Gbiintl mɑn. N bɑɑt nɑn nɑn-yukɔ nbɑ tuu bɑɑl biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e. Pɑlpienn be dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k guɑnt ŋɑɑn nyɔi nɑ pɑɑk, k diɑ u tiɑt k kɑn sonm yɑnn, k niib kɑn lɑ u fei.»
66016016	K nɑlnbiit nɑ tikl kpɑnbɑlɑ nɑ k sɑɑn nɑn’m siɑn nbɑ k Islɑɑeltieb yi Almɑɑgedɔn nɑ.
66016017	K mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ pukn bɑnlole nɑ mun kpɑɑl lin nbɑ be u senŋ ni nɑ k muɑn wɑn ni, k kunkɔsɑɑkɑl nyii nɑɑngbounŋ nbɑ be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni nɑ k yet ɑ: «L tun ɑ.»
66016018	K sɑnyiknti nyikntl, k fuut bonciɑnn be, k sɑtiɑni tiɑn fu, k tinŋ jekl bonciɑnn. L tinŋ jeklu buolu k mi jekl kɑɑ wɑɑ lɑɑ nyii yuo nbɑ k Yennu din nɑn nifosɑɑli, k mɑɑn lɑɑ jekl bonciɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
66016019	K dogbenŋl nɑ bɔkt tɑɑl muntɑ, k nibuolu kul digbɑnɑ bɑɑ. Yennu tiɑl dogbenŋl Bɑbiilonn nɑ po, k tul’ɔ u dɑŋmɑnbɑnŋ k l gbie nɑn dɑmunŋ nbɑ tie u wutogbenŋl nɑ.
66016020	Digbɑnɑ nbɑ k nyun lint’l nɑ kul ɑ ciɑl, k b ji k fit lɑ juɑt kul ɑ.
66016021	K sɑkɑɑnɑ nbɑ gbenŋ k l yenn kpɑi tie nɑn nɑɑl nɑ nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k tɑn bɑɑ niib pɑɑk, k b suki Yennu sɑkɑɑngbenŋɑ nbɑ bɑɑ b pɑɑk nɑ pɑɑk k mɑɑn l din tie fɑlgbenŋl.
66017001	Tɔn, k mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑnlole nbɑ diɑ seni ŋɑnlole nɑ yenɔ bɑɑl n buol ni k yet’n ɑ: «Bɑɑt nɑ, mɑn wɑnn’ɑ puocunconbiiuk nbɑ kɑl kpeni bonciɑnn nyun pɑɑk nɑ tubdɑtu nbɑ tɑn sii tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
66017002	Tingbounŋ nɑ kpɑnbɑlɑ conm nɑn’ɔ, k tingbounŋ nɑ niib nyuu u dɑmunŋ nbɑ tie boncunconsn nɑ k yib.»
66017003	K Foŋɑnm nɑ sik n pɑɑk k mɑlɑkɑ nɑ jii’n k sɑɑn nɑn’n muuk ni, k n lɑ puo k u jɑk muuk ni bonkobmɔnŋ pɑɑk, k sɑnbiit nbɑ suki Yennu sɑnn nɑ diɑn lint muuk ni bonkobuk mɑnŋ gbɑnɑnt kul po, k bonkobuk mɑnŋ mɔk yulɑ ŋɑnlole nɑn yinɑ piik.
66017004	K puo nɑ liɑ tɑmɔnt k b jii sɑlmɑ, nɑn tɑnɑ nbɑ nyili, nɑn lin nbɑ yɑɑ dɑɑuk pɑɑl k b yi pelil nɑ k tien wɑɑ tuu tuutuutɑ nbɑ, nɑn wɑɑ liɑ lɑɑni nbɑ, nɑn bɑni nbɑ k u pil nɑ. K u diɑ sɑlmɑ senŋ nbɑ k u boncuncontuonn jɑknt, nɑn lin nbɑ kul k ŋɑn nɑ gbie lenŋ.
66017005	K sɑnn nbɑ k suɑ k mi l pɑɑk diɑn u yugbiɑl pɑɑk k l tie: «Dogbenŋl Bɑbiilonn, puocunconnɑ nɑn bin nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ b tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑ nɑɑ.»
66017006	K n lɑ k puo nɑ nyuu Yennu niib sɔn nɑn bin nbɑ tie Yiesu siɑlɑɑdɑnm nɑ sɔn k yib. Mɑɑ lɑ’u nnɑ mɑnŋ k l bɑkt’n bonciɑnn.
66017007	K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ boi’n ɑ: «Bee k l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’ɑ ni? N sɑɑ wɑnn’ɑ puo nɑ nɑn bonkobuk nbɑ k u jɑk k l mɔk yulɑ ŋɑnlole nɑn yinɑ piik nɑ pɑɑk nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ:
66017008	Bonkobuk nbɑ k ɑ lɑ nɑ din fo siɑn-yuo, ŋɑɑn ji k fo, ŋɑɑn sɑɑ nyi buotsunsunŋ nbɑ kɑɑ telk nɑ ni k do, k sɑɑ sɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k b sɑɑ biil’ɔ nɑ buol. K l sɑɑ bɑkt niib nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k b sɑnɑ k diɑn mɑnfuol kɑdɑɑɔk ni yuo nbɑ k dulnyɑ dɑɑ din k kɑɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn bonkobuk mɑnŋ din fo, ŋɑɑn ji k fo, ŋɑɑn biɑ tɑn sii fo.
66017009	«Lin nbɑ nɑ luon yɑn nɑn bɑnnu e. Yulɑ ŋɑnlole nɑ tie juɑt ŋɑnlole nbɑ k puo nɑ kɑl l pɑɑk nɑ e, k biɑ tie kpɑnbɑlɑ bɑnlole:
66017010	k bɑnŋmu ji kɑɑ, k yenɔ tie kpɑnbɑl mɔtɑɑnɑ, k luɑ dɑɑ k dii nɑɑn; ŋɑɑn u tɑnŋ i dii nɑɑn, u yuo nɑ kɑn wei.
66017011	Bonkobuk nbɑ din fo k ji k fo nɑ pukn kpɑnbɑlɑ bɑnlole nɑ pɑɑk, k wɑɑ bɑnniin ni. U mun tɑn sɑɑ sɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k b sɑɑ biil’ɔ nɑ buol.
66017012	«K yinɑ piik nbɑ k ɑ lɑ nɑ tie kpɑnbɑlɑ piik, ŋɑɑn b dɑɑ k dii nɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm nɑn bonkobuk nɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑkn di nɑɑn k sɑɑ wei wɑɑnm-nnɑ.
66017013	B piik nɑ tɑn sɑɑ tɑɑn mɔb k jii b pɑnŋ nɑn b yiikuo nɑ k tul bonkobuk nɑ,
66017014	k b tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn Pebik nɑ, ŋɑɑn Pebik nɑ sɑɑ nyɑnn’b, k mɑɑn u tie yonmdɑnm kul Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑn kpɑnbɑlɑ kul Kpɑnbɑl, k u puolpoweitieb nbɑ k u yiin’m k lukt’b, k b diɑ bɑlmɔni wɑnnu nɑ, b mun sɑɑ nyɑnn’b.»
66017015	Ŋɑnn e k mɑlɑkɑ nɑ biɑ yet’n ɑ: «Nyun nbɑ k ɑ lɑ k puocunconn kɑl l pɑɑk nɑ tie nibuolu buolu nɑn nigbounŋ nɑn tingbounŋ yent nɑn mɑbuolu kul niib e.
66017016	Yinɑ piik nbɑ k ɑ lɑ nɑ, ŋɑnm nɑn bonkobuk nɑ sii nɑn puocunconn nɑ, k b sɑɑ liɑt u tiɑt kul k nyik’ɔ yɑnn, k sɑɑ pɑt u gbɑnɑnt k ŋmɑn, ŋɑɑn juo’u lin nbɑ tenn nɑ muu.
66017017	K mɑɑn Yennu tien dudukt b pɑlɑ ni, ɑ bii tuun wɑɑ luon lin nbɑ k b tɑɑn mɔyonm k jii b nɑɑngbounŋ yiikuo k tul bonkobuk nɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn Yennu mɑɑn mɑnŋ nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ gbie.
66017018	Puo nbɑ k ɑ lɑ nɑ mun tie dogbenŋl nbɑ tie tingbounŋ nɑ kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ.»
66018001	L puolpo k n biɑ lɑ mɑlɑksuɑ k u nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k siik, k mɔk yiikuo bonciɑnn, k u yentu ŋɑnm yent tingbounŋ nɑ lokl kul po.
66018002	U yien nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl ɑ: «Dogbenŋl Bɑbiilonn nɑ bɑɑ wɑɑ, l set bɑɑ wɑɑ. U ji kpɑnt siɑn nbɑ k polɑ kuɑ lenŋ k nɑlnbiit kul nɑn nuɑnbiit kul nbɑ mɔk sinsint bɔl b mɔnŋ lenŋ.
66018003	K mɑɑn u te k nibuolu kul nyuu u boncunconsn dɑɑn k l nɑɑn nɑn u tul’b dɑmunŋ nbɑ pɑɑl k b nyuu k yib k wɑɑt, k tingbounŋ kpɑnbɑlɑ conm nɑn’ɔ, k tingbounŋ nɑ kpinkpentɑ kpɑnt mɔktɑ u niɑnbiiuk nbɑ mɑntk yɑbt nɑ pɑɑk.»
66018004	Ŋɑnn e k n biɑ gbɑt kunkɔsɑɑkɑl k l nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k yien ɑ: «N niib, nyint i mɔnŋ mɑn duo nɑ ni, ɑ i dɑɑ lɑknt tuun tuonbiit nɑn’ɔ, k bonbiil nbɑ k u sɑɑ lɑ u biit pɑɑk nɑ dɑɑ tɑɑbt’i ni,
66018005	k mɑɑn duo nɑ biit nɑ yɑb k duo bonciɑnn k bɑɑl sɑnpɑgbɑnt ɑ, k Yennu tiɑn u biit mɑnŋ po.
66018006	Tɔn, tient k jiin’ɔ nɑn wɑɑ tuu tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k pɑ jiin’ɔ u biit pɑnn tɑɑl munle, k gbien u senŋ nɑn dɑmunŋ nbɑ k u din tul’i, k l pɑnŋ ii yɑb tɑɑl munle.
66018007	Tient’ɔ muksuk nɑn pɑlbiil k lin jɑnŋ nɑn dontl nɑn mɔktuk nbɑ k u din tul u mɔnŋ nɑ. U yien u pɑl ni ɑ: ‹N kɑl k tie puo nbɑ tie kpɑnbɑl. N k tie pɑkuɑk kɑɑ, k n kɑn mi lɑ kuun pɑlbiil.›
66018008	L pɑɑk e, bonbiil nbɑ tie u yɑl nɑ, k tie kuun nɑn l pɑlbiil nɑn kon nɑ tɑn sɑɑ suol’ɔ dɑyenn kuɑ ni, k duo mɑnŋ n di muu, k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu nbɑ bu nɑn’ɔ nɑ tie yiikuo dɑɑnɔ e.»
66018009	Tingbounŋ nɑ kpɑnbɑlɑ nbɑ conm nɑn’ɔ k di u mɑnt nɑ, b i tɑnŋ i lɑ u muu dinu munyuut nɑ, b tɑn sɑɑ bui k fɑbn u pɑɑk.
66018010	B tɑn sii tiin jɑŋmɑɑni u fɑlɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k sie bɑnfɔkl ɑ k ji yien ɑ: «Abɑ, dogbenŋl nɑ. Abɑ, Bɑbiilonn, duo nbɑ mɔk pɑnŋ nɑ, yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ jɑnŋ nɑn ɑ tubdɑtu wɑɑ.»
66018011	K tingbounŋ nɑ kpinkpentɑ tɑn sɑɑ bui k fɑbn u pɑɑk, k mɑɑn suɑ nbɑ k dɑɑ b tiɑt nɑ pɑɑk.
66018012	Suɑ ji kɑn mi k dɑɑ b kuɑtn nbɑ tie sɑlmɑ nɑ, nɑn likli kut, nɑn tɑnɑ nbɑ nyili k l dɑɑɔk pɑɑl, nɑn pelilnbɑ, nɑn cɑbfɑlmi, nɑn tiɑt nbɑ k b mɔnt k l dɑɑɔk pɑɑl nɑ, nɑn cɑbɑ nbɑ k b yi soɑ nɑ, nɑn cɑbɑ nbɑ mɔn k nyili, nɑn tɑɑbi nbɑ k l nublu mɑn, nɑn lin nbɑ k b jii luobuk nyɑnɑ k nɑn nɑ, nɑn lin nbɑ k b jii tɑɑbi nbɑ k l dɑɑɔk pɑɑl k nɑn nɑ, nɑn lin nbɑ k b jii kut nbɑ k b yi blɔns k nɑn nɑ, nɑn lin nbɑ k b jii kut k nɑn nɑ, nɑn lin nbɑ k b jii tɑnɑ nbɑ k b yi mɑɑlbl k nɑn nɑ,
66018013	nɑn kɑɑnel, nɑn bonliɑ nbɑ mɑnŋt kpint nɑ, nɑn tulɑɑli nbɑ tie nyun nɑ, nɑn tulɑɑli nbɑ tie kpɑn nɑ, nɑn tulɑɑli nbɑ k b jokt muu k l munyuut nublu mɑn nɑ, nɑn dɑmunŋ, nɑn kpɑn, nɑn yon, nɑn ble, nɑn nei, nɑn pei, nɑn tɑɑni nɑn l tolt, nɑn dɑɑbɑ, nɑn bin nbɑ k b suol’b tɑb ni nɑ.
66018014	K kpinkpentɑ nɑ yien ɑ: «Tiɑt nbɑ kul k ɑ bo luon fii mɔk nɑ, nɑn ɑ mɔktuk kul, nɑn tɑŋɑnt nɑ kul gɑl ɑ, k ɑ ji kɑn mi k lɑ.»
66018015	K kpinkpentɑ nbɑ kpentl k tɑn lɑ nyuɑt bonciɑnn duo mɑnŋ ni nɑ tɑn sii sie bɑnfɔkl ɑ k mɔ ŋɑɑn fɑbn, k mɑɑn b tiin jɑŋmɑɑni u fɑlɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
66018016	B sɑɑ bui k fɑbn k yien ɑ: «Abɑ, dogbenŋl nbɑ nɑɑn nɑn puo nbɑ gbɑb cɑbfɑlmi nɑn tiɑt nbɑ k b mɔnt k l dɑɑɔk pɑɑl nɑn cɑbɑ nbɑ mɔn k nyili nɑn sɑlmɑ nɑn tɑnɑ nbɑ nyili k l dɑɑɔk pɑɑl nɑn pelilnbɑ nɑ,
66018017	yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ sinsuuk ni k ɑ mɔktuk nɑ kul biil.» K bin nbɑ tie ŋɑlnt yudɑnm nɑn bin nbɑ kuɑ k sɑɑ b sɑɑnu nɑ nɑn ŋɑlnkɑnnɑ nɑn bin nbɑ kul tuun mɔkgbenŋl ni, k b ji sie bɑnfɔkl,
66018018	ŋɑɑn yikn, bɑɑ lɑ k muu di’u k l munyuut do sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ, k b yien ɑ: «T k mi lɑ dogbenŋl nɑ buolu.»
66018019	K b fini tɑnt k pukn b mɔnŋ pɑɑk, k bui ŋɑɑn fɑbn k yien ɑ: «Abɑ, dogbenŋl nbɑ k niib mɔk ŋɑlnt k lin mɔkgbenŋl ni k kpentl k lɑɑt gol lenŋ nɑ, k l tɑɑn bɑɑ k biil yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ nuɑk ni.»
66018020	Yendɔunŋ ni tieb nɑn Yennu niib nɑn Yiesu tuomiinbɑ nɑn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ, ii mɔk mɑn pɑlpienn, k mɑɑn Yennu bu dogbenŋl mɑnŋ buut k biil’ɔ, wɑɑ din tuun bonbiil k tien’i nɑ pɑɑk.
66018021	K mɑlɑk-pɑɑlɔ tɔkl tɑnn nbɑ gbenŋ nɑn nɑgbenŋl nɑ, k lu’l mɔkgbenŋl ni, k yet ɑ: «B tɑn sɑɑ wokt dogbenŋl Bɑbiilonn nɑ k lu’u nnɑ e wun biil, k suɑ ji kɑn mi k lɑ’u,
66018022	k suɑ ji kɑn mi k gbɑt k bɑfɑɑlɑ fɑɑ biɑɔk, ɑmi k yɑn-yinnɑ yiin yɑni, ɑmi k yelpeblɑ pieb yeli, ɑmi k kɑtkɑpeblɑ pieb kɑtkɑi duo mɑnŋ ni. Suɑ kɑn mi lɑ tuontunnɔ lenŋ, k suɑ biɑ kɑn mi k gbɑt nɑɑl fuut lenŋ.
66018023	Fitl yentu ji kɑn yent duo mɑnŋ ni. Suɑ ji kɑn mi gbɑt jɑb nbɑ kuɑn puob nɑn puob nbɑ kun jɑb nɑ kunkɔlɑ. Duo mɑnŋ ni kpinkpentɑ e din tie pɑɑlb k cie tingbounŋ nɑ kpinkpentɑ kul ɑ, k duo mɑnŋ niib din tuu diɑ nyɔku k kpɑnn nibuolu kul.
66018024	Bɑbiilonn lɑ tubdɑtu k mɑɑn b lɑ sɔkniinbɑ nɑn Yennu niib nɑn bin nbɑ kul k b kpii’b tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑ sɔn e duo mɑnŋ ni.»
66019001	Lin nbɑ nɑ puolpo, k n gbɑt kunkɔsɑɑkɑlɑ Yendɔunŋ ni k l tie nibulciɑɔnŋ pɑku, k b yien ɑ: «Pɑkn Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑn. Fielu nɑn dontl nɑn yiikuo tie t Yennu yɑl e.
66019002	Wɑɑ bu buut biɑnŋ nbɑ ŋɑn k biɑ tie mɔmɔnm. U bu puocunconbiiuk nbɑ biil tingbounŋ nɑ nɑn u cunconsn nɑ buut. U dɑt u tubl, wɑɑ kpii ŋuɑ Yennu tuontunnɑ nɑ pɑɑk.»
66019003	K nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ biɑ yien ɑ: «Pɑkn Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑn. Duo nbɑ di muu nɑ munyuut do sɑnpɑɑpo nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.»
66019004	K sɑɑkɑb piinle nɑn bɑnnɑ nɑ nɑn bonfuɑ bɑnnɑ nɑ gbɑɑn tinŋ ni k puki ŋuɑ Yennu nbɑ kɑl nɑɑngbounŋ pɑɑk nɑ, k b yien ɑ: « Amenn, pɑkn Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑn.»
66019005	Tɔn, k kunkɔsiɑl nyii nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ buol k yet ɑ: «Pɑkn t Yennu mɑn, yinm kul nbɑ tie u tuontunnɑ, yinm nbɑ tiin’ɔ, nijɑɑnɑ nɑn nitɑli.»
66019006	Ŋɑnn e k n biɑ gbɑt kunkɔsiɑl k l fu nɑn nibulciɑɔnŋ nbɑ tuu piɑk k fu nɑ, k biɑ fu nɑn siɑɔk kpenu nɑ, k biɑ fu nɑn sɑtiɑngbenŋɑ fuut nɑ k yet ɑ: «Pɑkn Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑn, k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu nbɑ mɔk yiikuo kul nɑ dii nɑɑn ɑ.
66019007	Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tii kpɑnm kii mɔk pɑlpienn kii dont u sɑnn, k mɑɑn yuo nɑ bɑɑl ɑ k Pebik nɑ luon wun kuɑn u puo, k sɑlkpenŋ ponŋ tien siil ɑ.
66019008	K b tul sɑlkpenŋ nɑ cincenŋɑnn nbɑ nyili k k mɔk jɑknt, ɑ wun gbɑb.» (Cincenŋɑnn nɑ e tie Yennu niib tuonŋɑnɑ nbɑ ŋɑn ŋuɑ Yennu buol ni.)
66019009	K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ yet’n ɑ n diɑn ɑ: «Bin nbɑ k b yiin’m k b bɑɑl Pebik mɑnŋ puokuɑnt jɑɑnm ni nɑ, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e.» K mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ biɑ yet’n k pukn ɑ: «Mɑɑn nɑ tie Yennu mɑɑn e, k tie mɔmɔnm.»
66019010	Ŋɑnn e k n gbɑɑn u tuɑnn ɑ n jiɑnt’ɔ. K u yet’n ɑ: «Dɑɑ tie nnɑ kɑɑ, N tie fin nɑn ɑ nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ diɑ Yiesu bɑlmɔni siɑlɑ nɑ tuontunluɑ e. Jiɑntl Yennu e. K mɑɑn Yiesu bɑlmɔni siɑlɑ nɑ e te k sɔkniinbɑ muɑntl b lɑbɑɑl.»
66019011	L puolpo k n lɑ k Yendɔunŋ luot, k tɑnpienŋ sie lenŋ, k wun nbɑ jɑk’ɔ nɑ sɑnɑ tie Bɑlmɔndɑɑnɔ nɑn Mɔmɔnm, k u bu buut k biɑ tuokt tɔbi bɑnnu nbɑ ŋɑn Yennu buol.
66019012	U ninbinɑ nɑɑn nɑn mupienu nɑ, k u yil nɑɑnfokli k l yɑb ɑ, k sɑnn diɑn u pɑɑk, k suɑ k mi sɑnn mɑnŋ, sie ŋuɑ kuukuɑ.
66019013	K tiɑɔk nbɑ k u liɑ nɑ fɑl nɑn sɔn, k sɑnn nbɑ k b yi’u nɑ tie: «Yennu Mɑɑn.»
66019014	K Yendɔunŋ ni tɔb niib jɑk tɑnpieni, k liɑ cincenŋɑnɑ nbɑ pien k k mɔk jɑknt, k wɑɑ’u.
66019015	K juk-bɑnjiɑk nbɑ di bonciɑnn tɑnt k nyii u mɔb ni, k u sɑɑ jii’l k kɔn nyɑnn tingbounŋ yent kul niib. U sii diɑ kut pɑtu kii yen’m. K u sɑɑ ŋmɑkl tiluɑnɑ siɑn nbɑ k b ŋmɑkl’l nɑ, k l tie Yennu nbɑ mɔk yiikuo kul wutociɑɔnŋ nɑ.
66019016	K sɑnsiɑl diɑn u liɑtl nɑn u tɑɑl pɑɑk ɑ: «kpɑnbɑlɑ kul Kpɑnbɑl, yonmdɑnm kul Yonmdɑɑnɔ.»
66019017	Ŋɑnn e k n lɑ mɑlɑkɑ k u sie yennu ni k tiɑn k yi nuɑni nbɑ yuuk sɑnpɑɑpo ɑ: «Tikt mɑn k bɑɑl Yennu jɑɑngbenŋl nɑ ni,
66019018	k tɑn di kpɑnbɑlɑ nɑn sejenm yudɑnm nɑn pɑnŋ dɑnm nɑn tɑɑni nɑn tɑnjɑklɑ gbɑnɑnt nɑn niib kul, bin nbɑ tie dɑɑbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ tie yent-n-mɔnŋ dɑnm nɑn bin nbɑ tie nijɑɑnɑ nɑn bin nbɑ tie nitɑli kul gbɑnɑnt.»
66019019	K n lɑ muuk ni bonkobuk nɑ nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ kpɑnbɑlɑ nɑn b tɔb niib, k b tikl ɑ bin kɔn nɑn wun nbɑ jɑk tɑɑnm mɑnŋ pɑɑk nɑ nɑn u mun yɑɑ tɔb niib.
66019020	K b suol muuk ni bonkobuk nɑ, nɑn u fɑɑk sɔkni nbɑ dɑɑn tuu tie bɑktnɔunŋ nyinɑ u tuɑnn po nɑ. U tuun nyinɑ mɑnŋ k kpɑnn bin nbɑ mɔk muuk ni bonkobuk mɑnŋ dɔuk nɑ nɑn bin nbɑ dɑɑn jiɑntl u nɑɑɔnŋ nɑ. B suol muuk ni bonkobuk mɑnŋ nɑn u fɑɑk sɔkni mɑnŋ nɑ k b fo, k lu’b buotuk nbɑ gbie nɑn muu k sɑlwuutɑ di nɑn’n nɑ ni.
66019021	K wun nbɑ jɑk tɑɑnm k juk-bɑnjiɑk tɑnt nyii u mɔb ni nɑ, k u jii juk-bɑnjiɑk mɑnŋ k kpii bin nbɑ biɑl nɑ, k nuɑni dii b gbɑnɑnt k tɑn gbuo.
66020001	K n biɑ lɑ mɑlɑksuɑ k u nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k siik, k diɑ buotsunsunŋ nbɑ kɑɑ telk nɑ pieni nɑn jɑlgbenŋl u nuu ni,
66020002	k u suol timunt nbɑ din tuu be nɑ wɑɑ, k tie Sɑnbiiltuɑ ɑmi Sɑɑtɑn nɑ, k lol’ɔ k u sii be binɑ tusl,
66020003	k jii’u k lu buotsunsunŋ nɑ ni binɑ tusl, ŋɑɑn kpɑl k pɔl ɑ u ji kɑn fit k kpɑnn tingbounŋ nɑ tieb buolu kul, sie k binɑ tusl n tɑn gɑl. L puolpo b sɑɑ luot’ɔ yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ.
66020004	K n lɑ nɑɑngbɑnt k bin nbɑ k b tul’b yiikuo ɑ bin bu buut nɑ kɑl l pɑɑk. K n biɑ lɑ bin nbɑ k b din pot b yulɑ bɑɑ din tie siɑlɑ k tul Yiesu k biɑ muɑntl Yennu mɑɑn nɑ pɑɑk. B din k jiɑnt bonkobuk nɑ, ɑmi l nɑɑɔnŋ nɑ. B biɑ din k gɑɑl bonkobuk mɑnŋ dɔk b yugbiɑ pɑɑk ɑmi b nii ni. B fiil kuun ni e k lɑkn dii nɑɑn nɑn Klistu binɑ tusl.
66020005	Nɑ e tie sinsinn kuun fiilu. (Kpienm nbɑ biɑl nɑ ŋɑnin k fiil kuun ni, sie binɑ tusl nɑ n tɑn gɑl ɑ.)
66020006	Bin nbɑ dɔnŋ sinsinn kuun fiilu nɑ tie Yennu yɑb e k pɑlpienn tie b yɑl. Kuun nbɑ pukn munle nɑ k mɔk yiikuo b pɑɑk. B sii tie Yennu nɑn Klistu mɑnntieb e, k sɑɑ lɑkn k di nɑɑn nɑn Klistu binɑ tusl.
66020007	Binɑ tusl nɑ i tɑnŋ i gɑl, b sɑɑ luot Sɑɑtɑn buotsunsunŋ nɑ ni k ŋɑɑ’u,
66020008	k u sɑɑ nyi k kpɑnn tingbounŋ nɑ yent kul niib nbɑ k b yi’b Gɔg nɑn Mɑɑgɔg nɑ. Sɑɑtɑn sɑɑ tikl b kul ɑ k bin tuok tɑb, k b kɑnn tie nɑn mɔkgbenŋl tɑnbiini kɑnn nɑ e.
66020009	K b nyii k tiɑ k lint lokl kul po, k tɑnt k sɑɑ biɑ lint Yennu niib nbɑ be siɑn nɑ nɑn duo nbɑ k Yennu mɑntk luon nɑ. Ŋɑɑn k muu nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k tɑn dii niib nbɑ k Sɑɑtɑn tikl’b nɑ.
66020010	K b jii Sɑɑtɑn nbɑ kpɑnn tingbounŋ nɑ niib nɑ, k lu’u buotsunsunŋ nbɑ gbie nɑn muu k sɑlwuutɑ di nɑn’n nɑ ni, siɑn nbɑ k b dɔnŋ lu bonkobuk nɑ nɑn u fɑɑk sɔkni nɑ. Lenŋ e k l sɑɑ muks’b yennu ni nɑn nyiɑɔk mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
66020011	Ŋɑnn e k n lɑ nɑɑngbongbenŋl nbɑ pien bonciɑnn nɑn wun nbɑ kɑl l pɑɑk. Tingbounŋ nɑn sɑnpɑɑk mil bot u tuɑnn, k suɑ ji kɑn mi k lɑ’b.
66020012	K n lɑ bin nbɑ din kpo nɑ, nijɑɑnɑ nɑn nitɑli nɑ, k b sie nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ tuɑnn po, k suɑ pɔbt kɑdɑɑt k biɑ pɔbt kɑdɑlieok nbɑ tie mɑnfuol kɑdɑɑɔk K b bu bin nbɑ kpo nɑ buut nɑn bɑɑ din tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k l diɑn kɑdɑɑt mɑnŋ ni.
66020013	K mɔkgbenŋl nyinn kpienm nbɑ be nyun ni, k kuun nɑn kpientinŋ mun nyinn bin nbɑ kpo k be b ni nɑ. K b bu b buut nɑn bɑɑ tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
66020014	K b jii kuun nɑn kpientinŋ k lu’b buotsunsunŋ nbɑ gbie nɑn muu nɑ ni. Kuun nbɑ pukn munle nɑ e tie mɔkl nbɑ di muu mɑnŋ.
66020015	K wun nbɑ yɑɑ sɑnn kul k diɑn mɑnfuol kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni, b jii’u k lu mɔkl nbɑ di muu nɑ ni.
66021001	K n biɑ lɑ sɑnpɑpɑɑnn nɑn tingbonpɑɑnn. K sɑnpɑkpel nɑ nɑn tingbonkpel nɑ din mil k bot, k mɔkgbenŋl ji kɑɑ.
66021002	K n lɑ Yennu duo nbɑ tie Selusɑɑlenm pɑɑnn nɑ, k l nyii Yennu buol Yendɔunŋ ni, k siik, k tie nɑn puoyuokl nbɑ tuu tien siil k fɑnŋt u mɔnŋ k tuokt u sɔlɔ nɑ.
66021003	K n gbɑt k kunkɔsɑɑkɑl nyii nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ buol k yien ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ, Yennu lɑnbounŋ ji be nifosɑɑli buol e, k ŋuɑ Yennu sii be nɑn’m, k b sii tie u niib, k ŋuɑ Yennu mɔnŋ sii be b buol k sii tie b Yennu.
66021004	U sɑɑ fiɑl b nyin-nyuut kul b ninbinɑ ni, k kuun nɑn pɑlbiil nɑn mɔni nɑn yiɑlu ji sii kɑɑ, k mɑɑn bonkpelɑ nɑ kul ji gɑl ɑ.»
66021005	K wun nbɑ kɑl nɑɑngbounŋ mɑnŋ pɑɑk nɑ yet ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ, n tie bont kul bonpɑɑnn e.» Ŋɑnn e k u biɑ yet’n ɑ: «Diɑnt lin nbɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn mɔbonɑ nɑ tie mɔni e k niib sɑɑ fit tien’n yɑdɑ.»
66021006	K u biɑ yet’n ɑ: «L ponŋ tun ɑ. Min e tie Alfɑ nɑn Omeegɑ k l pɑɑk tie piinu nɑn juontu. Wun nbɑ k nyun-nyuklu mɔk’ɔ nɑ, n sɑɑ pi’u mɑnfuol nyun nbɑ buni k nyi nyunkpɑnɑ ni nɑ k wun nyu yɑnn,
66021007	k wun nbɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu nɑ, u sɑɑ gɑɑl lin nbɑ nɑ n buol, k n sii tie u Yennu, k u mun sii tie n bik.
66021008	Ŋɑɑn jɑŋmɑɑndɑnm nɑn bin nbɑ kɑɑ yɑdɑ nɑn bonbiildɑnm nɑn nikpiilt nɑn juonbɑɑlt nɑn jɑbɑɑbulɑ nɑn pɑtjiɑnt-dɑnm nɑn fɑi dɑnm kul, b binbebuol tie mɔkl nbɑ di muu k sɑlwuutɑ di nɑn’n nɑ e. Ŋɑnn e tie kuun nbɑ pukn munle nɑ.»
66021009	L yuo nɑ k mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑnlole nbɑ bo diɑ seni ŋɑnlole, k l gbie nɑn bonbiil ŋɑnlole nbɑ wɑɑ puol nɑ yenɔ yet’n, ɑ n bɑɑl k wun wɑnn’n Pebik nɑ puoyuokl nɑ.
66021010	Ŋɑnn e k Foŋɑnm sik n pɑɑk k mɑlɑkɑ nɑ jii’n k duo nɑn’n juɑl nbɑ yɑb k biɑ fɔk nɑ yul pɑɑk, k wɑnn’n Selusɑɑlenm nbɑ tie Yennu duo nɑ, k l nyii Yendɔunŋ ni, Yennu buol, k siik,
66021011	k nyili nɑn Yennu yentsɑɑkɑl nɑ, k biɑ nyili nɑn tɑnŋɑnn nbɑ k b yi’l jɑsp nɑ, k nyɔkt nɑn miɑnu nɑ.
66021012	K duo mɑnŋ mɔk juongbenŋfuot, k Juonɑ mɑnŋ mɔk gɑnɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle, k mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle guu gɑnɑ mɑnŋ, k Islɑɑel buolu piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ sɑnɑ diɑn gɑnɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
66021013	K gɑnɑ ŋɑntɑɑtɑɑ be juonɑ ŋɑnnɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k ŋɑntɑ be yendopo, k ŋɑntɑ be diitu po, k ŋɑntɑ be gɑnŋ po, k ŋɑntɑ be yenbɑɑpo.
66021014	Duo mɑnŋ juonɑ sie tɑnɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle pɑɑk e, k Pebik nɑ tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ sɑnɑ diɑn tɑnɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle nɑ pɑɑk.
66021015	K mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ piɑk k tien’n nɑ diɑ sɑlmɑ pɑtu nbɑ k b diɑ k biki nɑ, ɑ wun bikn duo mɑnŋ nɑn l tɑnmɔi nɑn l juonɑ nɑ.
66021016	K l mɔk juonɑ ŋɑnnɑ, k juonɑ mɑnŋ fɔknt kul tie yonm. K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ bikn duo nɑ nɑn u pɑtu, k l yɑlimu tie stɑɑdnbɑ tusɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle (stɑɑdnbɑ 12.000), k l fɔknt nɑn l dokiu nɑn l yɑlimu kul tie yonm.
66021017	K u biɑ bikn l juonɑ, k l kpɑkiu tie kuudenbɑ kobik nɑn piinnɑ nɑn ŋɑnnɑ. Mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ bikn k l tie nɑn nifosɑɑlk nbɑ tuu biki bonɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e.
66021018	K Juonɑ nɑ mɑɑ nɑn tɑnɑ nbɑ k b yi jɑsp, ŋɑɑn k duo nɑ mɔnŋ tie sɑlmɑ nbɑ ŋɑn k nyili nɑn miɑnu nɑ,
66021019	k b jii tɑnɑ nbɑ dɑɑɔk pɑɑl bonciɑnn, l buolu buolu, k tɑbn fiɑkl tɑnɑ pɑɑk, k tɑnbuolu mɑnŋ te k l ŋɑn bonciɑnn. Sinsinn tɑnn nbɑ k b tɑbn fiɑkl pɑɑk nɑ yi jɑsp, k tɑnn nbɑ pukn munle nɑ yi sɑɑfiil, k muntɑ ni yɑl yi ɑgɑt, k munnɑ ni yɑl yi emeluod, k munŋmu ni yɑl yi oniiks, k munluob ni yɑl yi sɑldoenn, k munlole ni yɑl yi kliisoliit, k munniin ni yɑl yi beliil, k mun-yiɑ ni yɑl yi topɑɑs, k piik ni yɑl yi kliisoplɑɑs, k lin nbɑ pukn piik nɑn yenn nɑ yi tulkuɑs, k piik nɑn ŋɑnle ni yɑl mun yi ɑmetiist.
66021021	K l gɑnɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle nɑ tie pelilnbɑ nɑ, k gɑnɑ kul tie pelil mɑnŋ yenn yenn k sɑɑ diɑn piik nɑn ŋɑnle mun, k duo nɑ sɔnu tie sɑlmɑ nbɑ ŋɑn, k yien nɑn miɑnu nɑ.
66021022	N k lɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk duo mɑnŋ ni, k mɑɑn duo nɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ mɔk yiikuo kul nɑn Pebik nɑ e.
66021023	K duo mɑnŋ k luon yennu ɑmi ŋmɑɑlk yentu lenŋ, k mɑɑn Yennu yudɑnt nɑ e tie l yentu, k Pebik nɑ mun tie l fitl.
66021024	K tingbounŋ nɑ nibuolu sii be l yentu ni k sonm, k tingbounŋ nɑ kpɑnbɑlɑ sɑɑ kuɑ nɑn b mɔktuk k bil lenŋ.
66021025	Duo mɑnŋ tɑnmɔi k luo, k mɑɑn nyiɑɔk kɑɑ lenŋ.
66021026	K b sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑn lin nbɑ tie tingbounŋ nɑ tini kul niib dontl nɑn yudɑnt k bil duo nɑ ni.
66021027	K lin nbɑ tie jɑknt nɑn wun nbɑ tuun fei tuonn nɑn fɑi dɑnm, kɑn kuɑ duo mɑnŋ ni, sie bin nbɑ yɑɑ sɑnɑ diɑn Pebik nɑ mɑnfuol kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ kuukuɑ e sɑɑ kuɑ duo mɑnŋ ni.
66022001	L yuo k mɑlɑkɑ nɑ wɑnn’n mɑnfuol nyun kpenu nɑ, k l puuk nyi Yennu nɑn Pebik nɑ nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ ni, k nyili nɑn miɑnu nɑ,
66022002	k puuk k gɑɑl duo nɑ sɔnjosinsuuk ni, k tiik nbɑ k b yi’l mɑnfuol tiik nɑ sie kpenkpini ŋɑnle nɑ kul po k kuok sɑɑ wɑɑ, k tiik mɑnŋ lon luɑnɑ tɑɑl piik nɑn ŋɑnle binn nuɑk ni, ŋmɑɑlk kul ni l luon e, k l fɑɑt nɑ tie tebuk k tul tingbounŋ yent kul niib.
66022003	K Yennu nbɑ pol mɔb k wɑnn lin nbɑ kul, l ji kii be duo mɑnŋ ni. Yennu nɑn Pebik nɑ nɑɑngbounŋ mɑnŋ sii be duo mɑnŋ ni, k u tuontunnɑ nɑ sii jiɑntl’ɔ.
66022004	K b sɑɑ lɑ u nunpo, k u sɑnn sɑɑ diɑn b yugbiɑ pɑɑk.
66022005	Nyiɑɔk ji tɑn sii kɑɑ, b tɑn ji kii luon fitl nɑn yennu yentu lenŋ, k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu sii tie b yentu. K b sɑɑ di nɑɑn kii be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
66022006	K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ biɑ yet’n ɑ: «Mɔbonɑ nɑ tie mɔni e, k niib sɑɑ fit tien’l yɑdɑ. K Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu nbɑ te k u sɔkniinbɑ muɑntl b lɑbɑɑl nɑ, ŋuɑ e tun u mɑlɑkɑ ɑ wun bɑɑl k wɑnn u tuontunnɑ lin nbɑ sɑɑ tun mɔtɑɑnɑ.»
66022007	K Yiesu yet ɑ: «Gotl, n bɑɑt e mɔtɑɑnɑ. Tɔn, bin nbɑ sɑɑk Yennu mɑɑn nbɑ diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni nɑ, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e.»
66022008	Min Sɑn gbɑt k biɑ lɑ lin nbɑ nɑ. Mɑɑ gbɑt k biɑ lɑ nɑ, l yuo e k n gbɑɑn mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ wɑnn’n lin nbɑ mɑnŋ nɑ tuɑnn k yɑɑ n jiɑnt’ɔ.
66022009	Ŋɑɑn k u yet’n ɑ: «Dɑɑ tie nnɑ kɑɑ. N tie fin nɑn ɑ nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ tie sɔkniinbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ sɑɑk mɑɑn nbɑ be kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni nɑ tuontunluɑ e. Jiɑntl Yennu e.»
66022010	Ŋɑnn e k u biɑ yet’n ɑ: «Dɑɑ bɔli Yennu mɑɑn nbɑ be kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni, k mɑɑn yuo nɑ pel ɑ.
66022011	Wun nbɑ tuu tuun tuonbiit, wun biɑl kii tuun nnɑ, k wun nbɑ mun tuu tuun jɑknt tuonn, wun mun biɑl kii tuun nnɑ, ŋɑɑn k wun nbɑ mun tuu tuun tuonŋɑnɑ, wun mun biɑl kii tuun nnɑ, k wun nbɑ mun be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ ni, wun mun biɑl kii tie nnɑ.»
66022012	K Yiesu yet ɑ: «Gotl, n bɑɑt e mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ, k diɑ suɑ kul nɑn u tuonɑ nyuɑt ɑ n tɑn pɑ’u.
66022013	Min e tie Alfɑ nɑn Omeegɑ, sinsinn yuɑ nɑn juontu yuɑ, pinpiik nɑn gbennu.»
66022014	Dɑnm nbɑ wuul b tiɑt nɑ, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e, k l pɑɑk k b mɔk yiikuo nbɑ sɑɑ muɑ tiik nbɑ tien mɑnfuol nɑ luɑnɑ, k sɑɑ kuɑ tɑnmɔb nɑ ni k sɑɑn duo nɑ ni.
66022015	Bɔi e biɑl nɑn-yel nɑ, bin nbɑ bu jɑbɑɑt nɑn bin nbɑ tuun jɑknt tuonɑ nɑn nikpiilɑ nɑn bin nbɑ mɑnn pɑtɑ nɑn bin nbɑ luon fɑɑk k biɑ fɑ fɑɑk nɑ.
66022016	«Min Yiesu e tun n mɑlɑkɑ, ɑ wun tɑn fiit mɑɑn nɑ k tul’i ɑ yii tie l siɑlɑ k tul jiɑnti nɑ. N tie kpɑnbɑl Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn e k biɑ tie sɑn-nyɑfɑɑl ŋmɑɑjɑl nbɑ nyɔkt nɑ.»
66022017	Tɔn, Foŋɑnm nɑn Pebik nɑ puoyuokl nɑ yet ɑ: «Bɑɑt.» K wun nbɑ gbɑt’l mun yet ɑ: «Bɑɑt.» K wun nbɑ kul k nyun-nyuklu suol’ɔ, wun bɑɑl, k wun nbɑ luon mɑnfuol nyun, wun bɑɑl k u sɑɑ gɑɑl yɑnn.
66022018	Min, Sɑn, n kpɑɑn wun nbɑ kul gbɑt Yennu mɑɑn nbɑ be kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni nɑn ninmɔnn: wun nbɑ pukn siɑl mɑɑn mɑnŋ ni, Yennu sɑɑ jii bonbiil buolu buolu nbɑ diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni nɑ, k pukn u tubdɑtu po.
66022019	K wun nbɑ mun nyinn siɑl Yennu mɑɑn nbɑ be kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni, Yennu sɑɑ nyinn u tol mɑnfuol tiik nɑ ni nɑn Yennu duo nbɑ k b diɑn l po kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni nɑ.
66022020	Tɔn, k wun nbɑ tul siɑlɑ nɑ yet ɑ: «Mɔmɔnm, n bɑɑt e mɔtɑɑnɑ.» Amenn. Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu, bɑɑt nɑ.
66022021	Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn u niib kul. Amenn.
